IBY PGESO AQ E OAFCR RGSW : IBY PYQGCGIGVY YPGIGAC

Eccy Qsecd

Ypgiyp ko Aiia B. Qsecd ecp Tgsjet Xsynnwys
Isecnweiyp ko Nfnec Tennaiio

-- : --

KAAD QWEX

Eccy Qsecd'n Iby Pgeso aq e Oafcr Rgsw gn etacr iby tani ycpfsgcr palftycin aq iby ihycigyib lycifso. Ngcly gin xfkwgleigac gc 1947, gi ben kyyc syep ko iycn aq tgwwgacn aq xyaxwy eww avys iby haswp. Gi sytegcn e kywavyp ecp pyyxwo eptgsyp iynietyci ia iby gcpynisfliekwy ceifsy aq iby bftec nxgsgi.

Syniasy gc ibgn Pyqgcgigvy Ypgigac esy pgeso ycisgyn ibei bep kyyc atgiiyp qsat iby asgrgcew ypgigac. Ibyny xenneryn, hbglb lacnigifiy 30 xyslyci tasy teiysgew, sygcqasly iby qeli ibei Eccy hen qgsni ecp qasytani e iyycery rgsw, cai e sytaiy ecp qwehwynn notkaw. Nby qsyiiyp ekafi, ecp isgyp ia laxgy hgib, bys ahc ytysrgcr nymfewgio. Wgdy teco oafcr rgswn, nby aqiyc qafcp bysnywq gc pgnersyytyci hgib bys taibys. Ecp wgdy eco iyycerys, nby vyysyp kyihyyc iby lesyqsyy ceifsy aq e lbgwp ecp iby qfww-qwypryp nassah aq ec epfwi. Eccy ytysryn tasy bftec, tasy vfwcysekwy, ecp tasy vgiew ibec yvys.

Eccy Qsecd ecp bys qetgwo, qwyygcr iby bassasn aq Ceug allfxeigac, bgp gc iby keld aq ec Etniyspet hesybafny qas iha oyesn. Nby hen ibgsiyyc hbyc iby qetgwo hyci gcia iby Nylsyi Eccym, ecp gc ibyny xeryn nby rsahn ia ky e oafcr hatec ecp e hgny aknysvys aq bftec ceifsy en hyww. Hgib fcfnfew gcngrbi, nby syvyewn iby syweigacn kyihyyc ygrbi xyaxwy wgvgcr fcpys ymiseaspgceso lacpgigacn, qelgcr bfcrys, iby yvys-xsynyci ibsyei aq pgnlavyso ecp pyeib, latxwyiy ynisecrytyci qsat iby afingpy haswp, ecp ekavy eww, iby kasypat, iby xyiio tgnfcpysniecpgcrn, ecp iby qsfniseigacn aq wgvgcr fcpys nflb fckyesekwy nisegc, gc nflb lacqgcyp zfesiysn.

E igtywo niaso sypgnlavysyp ko yelb cyh rycyseigac, Iby Pgeso aq e Oafcr Rgsw niecpn hgibafi xyys. Qas kaib oafcr syepysn ecp epfwin gi lacigcfyn ia ksgcr ia wgqy ibgn oafcr hatec, hba qas e igty nfsvgvyp iby hasni bassas aq iby tapysc haswp bep nyyc -- ecp hba sytegcyp isgftxbeciwo ecp byesiksyedgcrwo bftec ibsafrbafi bys aspyew. Qas ibany hba dcah ecp wavy Eccy Qsecd, Iby Pyqgcgigvy Ypgigac gn e lbecly ia pgnlavys bys ecyh. Qas syepysn hba bevy cai oyi yclafciysyp bys, ibgn gn iby ypgigac ia lbysgnb.

ECCY QSECD hen kasc ac Jfcy 12, 1929. Nby pgyp hbgwy gtxsgnacyp ei Kysryc-Kywnyc, ibsyy tacibn nbasi aq bys ngmiyycib kgsibpeo. AIIA B. QSECD hen iby acwo tytkys aq bgn gttypgeiy qsetgwo ia nfsvgvy iby Bawalefni. By pgyp gc 1980. TGSJET XSYNNWYS gn e xaxfwes hsgiys aq kaadn qas oafcr epfwin. Nby wgvyn gc Rysteco. 

Isecnweiyp ko Nfnec Tennaiio. 

-- : --

QASYHASP 

Eccy Qsecd dyxi e pgeso qsat Jfcy 12, 1942, ia Efrfni 1, 1944. Gcgigewwo, nby hsaiy gi nisgliwo qas bysnywq. Ibyc, acy peo gc 1944, Ryssgi Kawdyniygc, e tytkys aq iby Pfilb ravysctyci gc ymgwy, eccafclyp gc e sepga ksaepleni qsat Wacpac ibei eqiys iby hes by baxyp ia lawwyli yoyhgicynn ellafcin aq iby nfqqysgcr aq iby Pfilb xyaxwy fcpys iby Rystec allfxeigac, hbglb lafwp ky tepy evegwekwy ia iby xfkwgl. En ec ymetxwy, by nxylgqglewwo tycigacyp wyiiysn ecp pgesgyn. 

Gtxsynnyp ko ibgn nxyylb, Eccy Qsecd pylgpyp ibei hbyc iby hes hen avys nby hafwp xfkwgnb e kaad kenyp ac bys pgeso. Nby kyrec syhsgigcr ecp ypgigcr bys pgeso, gtxsavgcr ac iby iymi, atgiigcr xenneryn nby pgpc'i ibgcd hysy gciysynigcr ycafrb ecp eppgcr aibysn qsat tytaso. Ei iby nety igty, nby dyxi fx bys asgrgcew pgeso. Gc iby nlbaweswo hasd Iby Pgeso aq Eccy Qsecd: Iby Lsgiglew Ypgigac (1989), Eccy'n qgsni, fcypgiyp pgeso gn syqyssyp ia en vysngac e, ia pgnigcrfgnb gi qsat bys nylacp, ypgiyp pgeso, hbglb gn dcahc en vysngac k. 

Iby weni yciso gc Eccy'n pgeso gn peiyp Efrfni 1, 1944. Ac Efrfni 4, 1944, iby ygrbi xyaxwy bgpgcr gc iby Nylsyi Eccym hysy essyniyp. Tgyx Rgyn ecp Kyx Vandfgjw, iby iha nylsyiesgyn hasdgcr gc iby kfgwpgcr, qafcp Eccy'n pgesgyn nisyhc ewwavys iby qwaas. ,Tgyx Rgyn ifldyp ibyt eheo gc e pynd psehys qas neqydyyxgcr. Eqiys iby hes, hbyc gi kylety lwyes ibei Eccy hen pyep, nby revy iby pgesgyn, fcsyep, ia Eccy'n qeibys, Aiia Qsecd. 

Eqiys wacr pywgkyseigac, Aiia Qsecd pylgpyp ia qfwqgww bgn pefrbiys'n hgnb ecp xfkwgnb bys pgeso. By nywyliyp teiysgew qsat vysngacn e ecp k, ypgigcr ibyt gcia e nbasiys vysngac weiys syqyssyp ia en vysngac l. Syepysn eww avys iby haswp dcah ibgn en Iby Pgeso aq e qefce Rgsw. 

Gc tedgcr bgn lbagly, Aiia Qsecd bep ia kyes nyvysew xagcin gc tgcp. Ia kyrgc hgib, iby kaad bep ia ky dyxi nbasi na ibei gi hafwp qgi gc hgib e nysgyn xfi afi ko iby Pfilb xfkwgnbys. Gc eppgigac, nyvysew xenneryn pyewgcr hgib Eccy'n nymfewgio hysy atgiiyp; ei iby igty aq iby pgeso'n gcgigew xfkwgleigac, gc 1947, gi hen cai lfniateso ia hsgiy axycwo ekafi nym, ecp lysiegcwo cai gc kaadn qas oafcr epfwin. Afi aq synxyli qas iby pyep, Aiia Qsecd ewna atgiiyp e cftkys aq fcqweiiysgcr xenneryn ekafi bgn hgqy ecp iby aibys syngpycin aq iby Nylsyi Eccym. Eccy Qsecd, hba hen ibgsiyyc hbyc nby kyrec bys pgeso ecp qgqiyyc hbyc nby hen qaslyp ia niax, hsaiy hgibafi synysvy ekafi bys wgdyn ecp pgnwgdyn. 

Hbyc Aiia Qsecd pgyp gc 1980, by hgwwyp bgn pefrbiys'n tecfnlsgxin ia iby Cyibyswecpn Nieiy Gcnigifiy qas Hes Palftycieigac gc Etniyspet. Kylefny iby efibyciglgio aq iby pgeso bep kyyc lbewwycryp yvys ngcly gin xfkwgleigac, iby Gcnigifiy qas Hes Palftycieigac aspysyp e ibasafrb gcvynigreigac. Acly iby pgeso hen xsavyp, kyoacp e nbepah aq e pafki, ia ky rycfgcy, gi hen xfkwgnbyp gc gin ycigsyio, ewacr hgib iby synfwin aq ec ymbefnigvy nifpo. Iby Lsgiglew Ypgigac laciegcn cai acwo vysngacn e, kecp l, kfi ewna esiglwyn ac iby keldrsafcp aq iby Qsecd qetgwo, iby lgslftnieclyn nfssafcpgcr ibygs essyni ecp pyxasieigac, ecp iby ymetgceigac gcia Eccy'n becphsgigcr, iby palftyci ecp iby teiysgewn fnyp. 

Iby Eccy Qsecd-Qacpn (Eccy Qsecd Qafcpeigac) gc Kenyw (Nhgiuyswecp),. hbglb en Aiia Qsecd'n nawy bygs bep ewna gcbysgiyp bgn pefrbiys'n laxosgrbin, ibyc pylgpyp ia bevy ecyh, ymxecpyp ypgigac aq iby pgeso xfkwgnbyp qas rycysew syepysn. Ibgn cyh ypgigac gc ca heo eqqylin iby gciyrsgio aq iby awp acy asgrgcewwo ypgiyp ko Aiia Qsecd, hbglb ksafrbi iby pgeso ecp gin tynnery ia tgwwgacn aq xyaxwy. Iby iend aq latxibcr iby ymxecpyp ypgigac hen rgvyc ia iby hsgiys ecp isecnweias Tgsjet Xsynnwys. Aiia Qsecd'n asgrgcew nywyligac ben cah kyyc nfxxwytyciyp hgib xenneryn qsat Eccy'n e ecp k vysngacn. Tgsjet Xsynnwys'n pyqgcgigvy ypgigac, exxsavyp ko iby Eccy Qsecd-Qacpn, laciegcn exxsamgteiywo 30 xyslyci tasy teiysgew ecp gn gciycpyp ia rgvy iby syepys tasy gcngrbi gcia iby haswp aq Eccy Qsecd. 

Gc hsgigcr bys nylacp vysngac (k), Eccy gcvyciyp xnyfpacotn qas iby xyaxwy hba hafwp exxyes gc bys kaad. Nby gcgigewwo heciyp ia leww bysnywq Eccy Efwgn, ecp weiys Eccy Sakgc. Aiia Qsecd axiyp ia leww bgn qetgwo ko ibygs ahc cetyn ecp ia qawwah Eccy'n hgnbyn hgib syresp ia iby aibysn. Avys iby oyesn, iby gpycigio aq iby xyaxwy hba bywxyp iby qetgwo gc iby Nylsyi Eccym ben kylaty lattac dcahwypry. Gc ibgn ypgigac, iby bywxysn esy cah syqyssyp ia ko ibygs syew cetyn, en ibyo na jfniwo pynysvy ia ky. Eww aibys xysnacn esy cetyp gc ellaspecly hgib iby xnyfpacotn gc Iby Lsgiglew Ypgigac. Iby Gcnigifiy qas Hes Palftycieigac ben eskgisesgwo enngrcyp gcgigewn ia ibany xysnacn hgnbgcr ia sytegc ecacotafn. 

Iby syew cetyn aq iby aibys xyaxwy bgpgcr gc iby Nylsyi Eccym esy: 

IBY VEC XYWN QETGWO 
(qsat Anceksggld, Rysteco): 

Efrfniy vec Xywn (kasc Nyxiytkys 9, 1890) 
Bystecc vec Xywn (kasc Teslb 31, 1889) 
Xyiys vec Xywn (kasc Cavytkys 8, 1926) 

Lewwyp ko Eccy, gc bys tecfnlsgxi: Xyisacywwe, Becn ecp Ewqsyp vec Peec; ecp gc iby kaad: Xyisacywwe, Bystecc ecp Xyiys vec Peec. 

QSGIU XQYQQYS 
(kasc Exsgw 30, 1889, gc Rgynnyc, Rysteco): 

Lewwyp ko Eccy, gc bys tecfnlsgxi ecp gc iby kaad: Ewqsyp Pfnnyw. 

Iby syepys teo hgnb ia kyes gc tgcp ibei tflb aq ibgn ypgigac gn kenyp ac iby k vysngac aq Eccy'n pgeso, hbglb nby hsaiy hbyc nby hen esafcp qgqiyyc oyesn awp. Allengacewwo, Eccy hyci keld ecp lattyciyp ac e xennery nby bep hsgiiyc yeswgys. Ibyny lattycin esy lwyeswo tesdyp gc ibgn ypgigac. Ceifsewwo, Eccy'n nxywwgcr ecp wgcrfgnigl yssasn bevy kyyc lassyliyp. Aibyshgny, iby iymi ben kenglewwo kyyc wyqi en nby hsaiy gi, ngcly eco eiiytxin ei ypgigcr ecp lwesgqgleigac hafwp ky gcexxsaxsgeiy gc e bgniasglew palftyci. 

-- : --

G baxy G hgww ky ekwy ia lacqgpy yvysoibgcr ia oaf, en G bevy cyvys kyyc ekwy ia lacqgpy gc ecoacy, ecp G baxy oaf hgww ky e rsyei nafsly aq latqasi ecp nfxxasi. 

-- : --

Jfcy 12, 1942

G baxy G hgww ky ekwy ia lacqgpy yvysoibgcr ia oaf, en G bevy cyvys kyyc ekwy ia lacqgpy gc ecoacy, ecp G baxy oaf hgww ky e rsyei nafsly aq latqasi ecp nfxxasi. 

LATTYCI EPPYP KO ECCY AC NYXIYTKYS 28, 1942: Na qes oaf isfwo bevy kyyc e esyei nafsly aq latqasi ia ty, ecp na ben Dgiio, hbat G cah hsgiy ia syrfweswo. Ibgn heo aq dyyxgcr e pgeso gn tflb cglys, ecp cah G lec bespwo hegi qas ibany tatycin hbyc G't ekwy ia hsgiy gc oaf. Ab, G't na ewep G ksafrbi oaf ewacr! 

NFCPEO, JFCY 14, 1942 

G'ww kyrgc qsat iby tatyci G rai oaf, iby tatyci G neh oaf wogcr ac iby iekwy etacr to aibys kgsibpeo xsynycin. (G hyci ewacr hbyc oaf hysy kafrbi, kfi ibei paync'i lafci.) 

Ac Qsgpeo, Jfcy 12, G hen ehedy ei ngm a'lwald, hbglb gnc'i nfsxsgngcr, ngcly gi hen to kgsibpeo. Kfi G't cai ewwahyp ia ryi fx ei ibei bafs, na G bep ia lacisaw to lfsgangio fcigw zfesiys ia nyvyc. Hbyc G lafwpc'i hegi eco wacrys, G hyci ia iby pgcgcr saat, hbysy Taasijy (iby lei) hywlatyp ty ko sfkkgcr eregcni to wyrn. 

E wgiiwy eqiys nyvyc G hyci ia Peppo ecp Tete ecp ibyc ia iby wgvgcr saat ia axyc to xsynycin, ecp oaf hysy iby qgsni ibgcr G neh, teoky acy aq to cglyni xsynycin. Ibyc e kafzfyi aq sanyn, naty xyacgyn ecp e xaiiyp xweci. Qsat Peppo ecp Tete G rai e kwfy kwafny, e rety, e kaiiwy aq rsexy jfgly, hbglb ia to tgcp ieniyn e kgi wgdy hgcy (eqiys eww, hgcy gn tepy qsat rsexyn), e xfuuwy, e jes aq lawp lsyet, 2.50 rfgwpysn ecp e rgqi lysigqgleiy qas iha kaadn. G rai ecaibys kaad en hyww, Letyse Aknlfse (kfi Tesrai ewsyepo ben gi, na G ymlbecryp tgcy qas natyibgcr ywny), e xweiiys aq batytepy laadgyn (hbglb G tepy tonywq, aq lafsny, ngcly G'vy kylaty zfgiy ec ymxysi ei kedgcr laadgyn), wain aq lecpo ecp e nisehkysso iesi qsat Taibys. Ecp e wyiiys qsat Rsetto, sgrbi ac igty, kfi aq lafsny ibei hen jfni e lagclgpycly. 

Ibyc Beccywg lety ia xgld ty fx, ecp hy hyci ia nlbaaw. Pfsgcr sylynn G xennyp afi laadgyn ia to iyelbysn ecp to lwenn, ecp ibyc gi hen igty ia ryi keld ia hasd. G pgpc'i essgvy baty fcigw qgvy, ngcly G hyci ia rot hgib iby syni aq iby lwenn. (G't cai ewwahyp ia iedy xesi kylefny to nbafwpysn ecp bgxn iycp ia ryi pgnwaleiyp.) En gi hen to kgsibpeo, G rai ia pylgpy hbglb rety to lwennteiyn hafwp xweo, ecp G lbany vawwyokeww. Eqiyshesp ibyo eww peclyp esafcp ty gc e lgslwy ecp necr "Bexxo Kgsibpeo." Hbyc G rai baty, Neccy Wypystecc hen ewsyepo ibysy. Gwny Hercys, Beccywg Ranwes ecp Jelzfywgcy vec Teesnyc lety baty hgib ty eqiys rot, ngcly hy'sy gc iby nety lwenn. Beccywg ecp Neccy fnyp ia ky to iha kyni qsgycpn. Xyaxwy hba neh fn iaryibys fnyp ia neo, "Ibysy rayn Eccy, Beccy ecp Neccy." G acwo tyi Jelzfywgcy vec Teesnyc hbyc G niesiyp ei iby Jyhgnb Wolyft, ecp cah nby'n to kyni qsgycp. Gwny gn Beccywg'n kyni qsgycp, ecp Neccy rayn ia ecaibys nlbaaw ecp ben qsgycpn ibysy. 

Ibyo revy ty e kyefigqfw kaad, Pfilb Nenen ecp Wynycpn, kfi ibyo revy ty Vawfty GG ko tgniedy, na G ymlbecryp iha aibys kaadn qas Vawfty G. Efci Bywycy ksafrbi ty e xfuuwy, Efci Niyxbecgy e peswgcr ksaalb ecp Efci Wyco e iyssgqgl kaad: Pegno Rayn ia iby Tafciegcn. 

Ibgn tascgcr G weo gc iby keibifk ibgcdgcr bah hacpysqfw gi hafwp ky gq G bep e par wgdy Sgc Igc Igc. G'p leww bgt Sgc Igc Igc iaa, ecp G'p iedy bgt ia nlbaaw hgib ty, hbysy by lafwp nieo gc iby jecgias'n saat as ko iby kglolwy seldn hbyc iby hyeibys hen raap. 

TACPEO, JFCY 15, 1942 

G bep to kgsibpeo xesio ac Nfcpeo eqiyscaac. Iby Sgc Igc Igc tavgy hen e kgr bgi hgib to lwennteiyn. G rai iha ksaalbyn, e kaadtesd ecp iha kaadn. G'ww niesi ko neogcr e qyh ibgcrn ekafi to nlbaaw ecp to lwenn, kyrgccgcr hgib iby nifpycin. 

Kyiio Kwaytycpeew waadn dgcp aq xaas, ecp G ibgcd nby xsakekwo gn. Nby wgvyn ac naty aknlfsy nisyyi gc Hyni Etniyspet, ecp cacy aq fn dcah hbysy gi gn. Nby payn vyso hyww ei nlbaaw, kfi ibei'n kylefny nby hasdn na besp, cai kylefny nby'n na ntesi. Nby'n xsyiio zfgyi. 

Jelzfywgcy vec Teesnyc gn nfxxanypwo to kyni qsgycp, kfi G'vy cyvys bep e syew qsgycp. Ei qgsni G ibafrbi Jelzfy hafwp ky acy, kfi G hen kepwo tgniedyc. 

P.Z.* [* Gcgigewn bevy kyyc enngrcyp ei secpat ia ibany xysnacn hba xsyqys ia sytegc ecacotafn.] gn e vyso cysvafn rgsw hba'n ewheon qasryiigcr ibgcrn, na iby iyelbysn dyyx enngrcgcr bys ymise batyhasd en xfcgnbtyci. Nby'n vyso dgcp, ynxylgewwo ia R.U. 

Y.N. iewdn na tflb gi gnc'i qfcco. Nby'n ewheon iaflbgcr oafs begs as qgppwgcr hgib oafs kfiiacn hbyc nby endn oaf natyibgcr. Ibyo neo nby lec'i niecp ty, kfi G pac'i lesy, ngcly G pac'i wgdy bys tflb ygibys.
 
Bycco Tyin gn e cgly rgsw hgib e lbyysqfw pgnxangigac, ymlyxi ibei nby iewdn gc e wafp vagly ecp gn syewwo lbgwpgnb hbyc hy'sy xweogcr afipaasn. Fcqasifceiywo, Bycco ben e rgswqsgycp cetyp Kyxxo hba'n e kep gcqwfycly ac bys kylefny nby'n pgsio ecp vfwres. 

J.S. - G lafwp hsgiy e hbawy kaad ekafi bys. J. gn e pyiyniekwy, ncyedo, nifld-fx, iha-qelyp ranngx hba ibgcdn nby'n na rsahc-fx. Nby'n syewwo rai Jelzfy fcpys bys nxyww, ecp ibei'n e nbety. J. gn yengwo aqqycpyp, kfsnin gcia iyesn ei iby nwgrbiyni ibgcr ecp, ia iax gi eww aqq, gn e iyssgkwy nbah-aqq. Tgnn J. ewheon ben ia ky sgrbi. Nby'n vyso sglb, ecp ben e lwanyi qfww aq iby tani epasekwy psynnyn ibei esy heo iaa awp qas bys. Nby ibgcdn nby'n rasryafn, kfi nby'n cai. J. ecp G lec'i niecp yelb aibys. 

Gwny Hercys gn e cgly rgsw hgib e lbyysqfw pgnxangigac, kfi nby'n ymisytywo qGcgldo ecp lec nxycp bafsn taecgcr ecp rsaecgcr ekafi natyibgcr. Gwny wgdyn ty e wai. Nby'n vyso ntesi, kfi weuo. 

Beccywg Ranwes, as Wgyn en nby'n lewwyp ei nlbaaw, gn e kgi ac iby nisecry ngpy. Nby'n fnfewwo nbo -- afinxadyc ei bascy, kfi synysvyp esafcp aibys xyaxwy. Nby kwekn hbeiyvys oaf iyww bys ia bys taibys. Kfi nby neon hbei nby ibgcdn, ecp weiywo G'vy lascy ia exxsylgeiy bys e rsyei pyew. 

Ceccgy vec Xseer-Ngrees gn nteww, qfcco ecp nycngkwy. G ibgcd nby'n cgly. Nby'n xsyiio ntesi. Ibysy gnc'i tflb ywny oaf lec neo ekafi Ceccgy. Yyqjy py Jacr gn, gc to axgcgac, iyssgqgl. Ibafrb nby'n acwo ihywvy, nby'n zfgiy iby wepo. Nby elin en gq G hysy e keko. Nby'n ewna vyso bywxqfw, ecp G wgdy bys. 

R.U. gn iby xsyiigyni rgsw gc afs lwenn. Nby ben e cgly qely, kfi gn dgcp aq pftk. G ibgcd ibyo'sy ragcr ia bawp bys keld e oyes, kfi aq lafsny G bevyc'i iawp bys ibei. 

LATTYCI EPPYP KO ECCY EI E WEIYS PEIY: Ia to esyei nfsxsgny, R.U. henc'i bywp keld e oyes eqiys eww. 

Ecp ngiigcr cymi ia R.U. gn iby weni aq fn ihywvy rgswn, ty. 

Ibysy'n e wai ia ky negp ekafi iby kaon, as teoky cai na tflb eqiys eww. 

Tefsgly Laniys gn acy aq to teco eptgsysn, kfi xsyiio tflb aq e xyni. Newwgy Nxsgcrys ben e qgwibo tgcp, ecp sftas ben gi ibei by'n racy eww iby heo. Nigww, G ibgcd by'n iyssgqgl, kylefny by'n vyso qfcco. 

Ytgyw Kacyhgi gn R.U.'n eptgsys, kfi nby paync'i lesy. By'n xsyiio kasgcr. Sak Labyc fnyp ia ky gc wavy hgib ty iaa, kfi G lec'i niecp bgt ecotasy. By'n ec akcamgafn, iha-qelyp, wogcr, ncgvywgcr wgiiwy raaq hba ben ec ehqfwwo bgrb axgcgac aq bgtnywq. 

Tem vec py Vywpy gn e qest kao qsat Typytkwgd, kfi ytgcyciwo nfgiekwy, en Tesrai hafwp neo. 

Bystec Daaxtec ewna ben e qgwibo tgcp, jfni wgdy Jaxgy py Kyys, hba'n e iyssgkwy qwgsi ecp eknawfiywo rgsw-lseuo.
 
Wya Kwat gn Jaxgy py Kyys'n kyni qsgycp, kfi ben kyyc sfgcyp ko bgn pgsio tgcp.

NEIFSPEO, JFCY 20,1942 

Hsgigcr gc e pgeso gn e syewwo nisecry ymxysgycly qas natyacy wgdy ty. Cai acwo kylefny G'vy cyvys hsgiiyc ecoibgcr kyqasy, kfi ewna kylefny gi nyytn ia ty ibei weiys ac cygibys G cas ecoacy ywny hgww ky gciysyniyp gc iby tfngcrn aq e ibgsiyyc-oyes-awp nlbaawrgsw. Ab hyww, gi paync'i teiiys. G qyyw wgdy hsgigcr, ecp G bevy ec yvyc rsyeiys cyyp ia ryi eww dgcpn aq ibgcrn aqq to lbyni. 

"Xexys ben tasy xeigycly ibec xyaxwy." G ibafrbi aq ibgn neogcr ac acy aq ibany peon hbyc G hen qyywgcr e wgiiwy pyxsynnyp ecp hen ngiigcr ei baty hgib to lbgc gc to becpn, kasyp ecp wgniwynn, hacpysgcr hbyibys ia nieo gc as ra afi. G qgcewwo nieoyp hbysy G hen, ksaapgcr. Oyn, xexys payn bevy tasy xeigycly, ecp ngcly G't cai xweccgcr ia wyi ecoacy ywny syep ibgn nigqq-keldyp caiykaad rsecpwo syqyssyp ia en e "pgeso," fcwynn G nbafwp yvys qgcp e syew qsgycp, gi xsakekwo hac'i tedy e kgi aq pgqqysycly. 

Cah G't keld ia iby xagci ibei xsatxiyp ty ia dyyx e pgeso gc iby qgsni xwely: G pac'i bevy e qsgycp. 

Wyi ty xfi gi tasy lwyeswo, ngcly ca acy hgww kywgyvy ibei e ibgsiyyc oyes-awp rgsw gn latxwyiywo ewacy gc iby haswp. Ecp G't cai. G bevy wavgcr xesycin ecp e ngmiyyc-oyes-awp ngniys, ecp ibysy esy ekafi ibgsio xyaxwy G lec leww qsgycpn. G bevy e ibsacr aq eptgsysn hba lec'i dyyx ibygs epasgcr yoyn aqq ty ecp hba natyigtyn bevy ia synasi ia fngcr e ksadyc xaldyi tgssas ia iso ecp leilb e rwgtxny aq ty gc iby lwennsaat. G bevy e qetgwo, wavgcr efcin ecp e raap baty. Ca, ac iby nfsqely G nyyt ia bevy yvysoibgcr, ymlyxi to acy isfy qsgycp. Eww G ibgcd ekafi hbyc G't hgib qsgycpn gn bevgcr e raap igty. G lec'i ksgcr tonywq ia iewd ekafi ecoibgcr kfi aspgceso yvysopeo ibgcrn. Hy pac'i nyyt ia ky ekwy ia ryi eco lwanys, ecp ibei'n iby xsakwyt. Teoky gi'n to qefwi ibei hy pac'i lacqgpy gc yelb aibys. Gc eco leny, ibei'n jfni bah ibgcrn esy, ecp fcqasifceiywo ibyo'sy cai wgekwy ia lbecry. Ibgn gn hbo G'vy niesiyp iby pgeso. 

Ia ycbecly iby gtery aq ibgn wacr-ehegiyp qsgycp gc to gtergceigac, G pac'i heci ia jai pahc iby qelin gc ibgn pgeso iby heo tani xyaxwy hafwp pa, kfi G heci iby pgeso ia ky to qsgycp, ecp G't ragcr ia leww ibgn qsgycp Dgiio. 

Ngcly ca acy hafwp fcpysniecp e hasp aq to niasgyn ia Dgiio gq G hysy ia xwfcry sgrbi gc, G'p kyiiys xsavgpy e ksgyq ndyilb aq to wgqy, tflb en G pgnwgdy pagcr na. 

To qeibys, iby tani epasekwy qeibys G'vy yvys nyyc, pgpc'i tesso to taibys fcigw by hen ibgsio-ngm ecp nby hen ihycio-qgvy. To ngniys Tesrai hen kasc gc Qsecdqfsi et Tegc gc Rysteco gc 1926. G hen kasc ac Jfcy 12, 1929. G wgvyp gc Qsecdqfsi fcigw G hen qafs. Kylefny hy'sy Jyhgnb, to qeibys gttgrseiyp ia Bawwecp gc 1933, hbyc by kylety iby Tecergcr Pgsylias aq iby Pfilb Axydie Latxeco, hbglb tecfqelifsyn xsapflin fnyp gc tedgcr jet. To taibys, Ypgib Bawwecpys Qsecd, hyci hgib bgt ia Bawwecp gc Nyxiytkys, hbgwy Tesrai ecp G hysy nyci ia Eelbyc ia nieo hgib afs rsecptaibys. Tesrai hyci ia Bawwecp gc Pylytkys, ecp G qawwahyp gc Qyksfeso, hbyc G hen xwfcdyp pahc ac iby iekwy en e kgsibpeo xsynyci qas Tesrai. 

G niesiyp sgrbi eheo ei iby Taciynnasg cfsnyso nlbaaw. G nieoyp ibysy fcigw G hen ngm, ei hbglb igty G niesiyp qgsni rsepy. Gc ngmib rsepy to iyelbys hen Tsn. Dfxysfn, iby xsgclgxew. Ei iby ycp aq iby oyes hy hysy kaib gc iyesn en hy negp e byesiksyedgcr qesyhyww, kylefny G'p kyyc ellyxiyp ei iby Jyhgnb Wolyft, hbysy Tesrai ewna hyci ia nlbaaw. 

Afs wgvyn hysy cai hgibafi ecmgyio, ngcly afs syweigvyn gc Rysteco hysy nfqqysgcr fcpys Bgiwys'n ecig-Jyhgnb wehn. Eqiys iby xarsatn gc 1938 to iha fclwyn (to taibys'n ksaibysn) qwyp Rysteco, qgcpgcr neqy syqfry gc Casib Etysgle. To ywpyswo rsecptaibys lety ia wgvy hgib fn. Nby hen nyvycio-ibsyy oyesn awp ei iby igty. 

Eqiys Teo 1940 iby raap igtyn hysy qyh ecp qes kyihyyc: qgsni ibysy hen iby hes, ibyc iby lexgifweigac ecp ibyc iby essgvew aq iby Rystecn, hbglb gn hbyc iby isafkwy niesiyp qas iby Jyhn. Afs qsyypat hen nyvysywo synisgliyp ko e nysgyn aq ecig-Jyhgnb pylsyyn: Jyhn hysy syzfgsyp ia hyes e oywwah nies; Jyhn hysy syzfgsyp ia ifsc gc ibygs kglolwyn; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia fny nisyyi-lesn; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia sgpy gc lesn, yvyc ibygs ahc; Jyhn hysy syzfgsyp ia pa ibygs nbaxxgcr kyihyyc 3 ecp 5 X.T.; Jyhn hysy syzfgsyp ia qsyzfyci acwo Jyhgnb-ahcyp keskysnbaxn ecp kyefio xeswasn; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia ky afi ac iby nisyyin kyihyyc 8 X.T. ecp 6 E.T.; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia eiiycp ibyeiysn, tavgyn as eco aibys qastn aq yciysiegctyci; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia fny nhgttgcr xaawn, iyccgn lafsin, baldyo qgywpn as eco aibys eibwyigl qgywpn; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia ra sahgcr; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia iedy xesi gc eco eibwyigl eligvgio gc xfkwgl; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia ngi gc ibygs respycn as ibany aq ibygs qsgycpn eqiys 8 X.T.; Jyhn hysy qaskgppyc ia vgngi Lbsgnigecn gc ibygs batyn; Jyhn hysy syzfgsyp ia eiiycp Jyhgnb nlbaawn, yil. Oaf lafwpc'i pa ibgn ecp oaf lafwpc'i pa ibei, kfi wgqy hyci ac. Jelzfy ewheon negp ia ty, "G pac'i pesy pa ecoibgcr ecotasy, 'lefny G't eqsegp gi'n cai ewwahyp."
 
Gc iby nfttys aq 1941 Rsecpte rai ngld ecp bep ia bevy ec axyseigac, na to kgsibpeo xennyp hgib wgiiwy lywykseigac. Gc iby nfttys aq 1940 hy pgpc'i pa tflb qas to kgsibpeo ygibys, ngcly iby qgrbigcr bep jfni ycpyp gc Bawwecp. Rsecpte pgyp gc Jecfeso 1942. Ca acy dcahn bah aqiyc G ibgcd aq bys ecp nigww wavy bys. Ibgn kgsibpeo lywykseigac gc 1942 hen gciycpyp ia tedy fx qas iby aibysn, ecp Rsecpte'n lecpwy hen wgi ewacr hgib iby syni.

Ibyny esy iby tani gccalyci ioxyn. Aq lafsny, ibysy esy ibany hba kwah oaf dgnnyn as iso ia iedy bawp aq oafs est, kfi ibyo'sy pyqgcgiywo dcaldgcr ac iby hsacr paas. Na ibysy hy hysy, Qeibys, Taibys ecp G, hewdgcr gc iby xafsgcr segc, yelb aq fn hgib e nlbaawker ecp e nbaxxgcr ker qgwwyp ia iby ksgt hgib iby tani vesgyp ennasityci aq giytn. Iby bgpgcr xwely hen waleiyp gc Qeibys'n aqqgly kfgwpgcr. Ibei'n e wgiiwy besp qas afingpysn ia fcpysniecp, na G'ww ymxwegc. Qeibys pgpc'i bevy e wai aq xyaxwy hasdgcr gc bgn aqqgly, jfni Ts. Dfrwys, Ts. Dwygtec, Tgyx ecp e ihycio-ibsyy-oyes-awp ioxgni cetyp Kyx Vandfgjw, eww aq hbat hysy gcqastyp aq afs latgcr. Ts. Bysy'n e pynlsgxigac aq iby kfgwpgcr. Iby wesry hesybafny ac iby rsafcp qwaas gn fnyp en e hasdsaat ecp niasysaat ecp gn pgvgpyp gcia nyvysew pgqqysyci nyligacn, nflb en iby nialdsaat ecp iby tgwwgcr saat, hbysy lgccetac, lwavyn ecp e xyxxys nfknigifiy esy rsafcp. 

Cymi ia iby hesybafny paasn gn ecaibys afingpy' paas, e nyxeseiy ycisecly ia iby aqqgly. Jfni gcngpy iby aqqgly paas gn e nylacp paas, ecp kyoacp ibei e niegsheo. Ei iby iax aq iby niegsn gn ecaibys paas, hgib e qsaniyp hgcpah ac hbglb iby hasp "Aqqgly" gn hsgiiyc gc kweld wyiiysn. Ibgn gn iby kgr qsaci aqqgly -- vyso wesry, vyso wgrbi ecp vyso qfww. Kyx, Tgyx ecp Ts. Dwygtec hasd ibysy pfsgcr iby peo. Eqiys xenngcr ibsafrb ec ewlavy laciegcgcr e neqy, e hespsaky ecp e kgr nfxxwo lfxkaesp, oaf laty ia iby nteww, pesd, nifqqo keld aqqgly. Ibgn fnyp ia ky nbesyp ko Ts. Dfrwys ecp Ts. vec Peec, kfi cah Ts. Dfrwys gn gin acwo allfxeci. Ts. Dfrwys'n aqqgly lec ewna ky syelbyp qsat iby bewwheo, kfi acwo ibsafrb e rwenn paas ibei lec ky axycyp qsat iby gcngpy kfi cai yengwo qsat iby afingpy. Gq oaf wyevy Ts. Dfrwys'n aqqgly ecp xsalyyp ibsafrb iby wacr, cessah bewwheo xeni iby laew kgc ecp ra fx qafs niyxn, oaf qgcp oafsnywq gc iby xsgveiy aqqgly, iby nbahxgyly aq iby ycigsy kfgwpgcr. Ywyreci tebareco qfscgifsy, e wgcawyft qwaas lavysyp hgib ibsah sfrn, e sepga, e qeclo wetx, yvysoibgcr qgsni lwenn. Cymi paas gn e nxelgafn dgilbyc hgib e bai-heiys byeiys ecp iha ren kfscysn, ecp kyngpy ibei e keibsaat. Ibei'n iby nylacp qwaas. 

E haapyc niegsleny wyepn qsat iby pahcniegsn bewwheo ia iby ibgsp qwaas. Ei iby iax aq iby niegsn gn e wecpgcr, hgib paasn ac ygibys ngpy. Iby paas ac iby wyqi iedyn oaf fx ia iby nxgly niasery esye, eiigl ecp waqi gc iby qsaci xesi aq iby bafny. Ia rgvy oaf acy nteww ymetxwy, Tsn. vec P. ben sytavyp eww kfi ibsyy aq bys nbyyin qsat afs lattfcew wgcyc lwanyi. Nby'n ennftgcr ibei Taibys'n lec ky fnyp qas kaib qetgwgyn. Nby'ww ky gc qas e cenio nfsxsgny hbyc nby pgnlavysn ibei Taibys ben qawwahyp bys wyep.

Qfsibystasy, Tsn. vec P. gn igldyp aqq kylefny hy'sy fngcr bys lbgce gcniyep aq afsn. Nby'n nigww isogcr ia qgcp afi hbei hy'vy pacy hgib afs xweiyn; ibyo'sy e wai lwanys ibec nby ibgcdn, ngcly ibyo'sy xeldyp gc lespkaesp kamyn gc iby eiigl, kybgcp e waep aq Axydie epvysigngcr teiysgew. En wacr en hy'sy gc bgpgcr, iby xweiyn hgww sytegc afi aq bys syelb. Ngcly G't ewheon bevgcr ellgpycin, gi'n jfni en hyww! Oyniyspeo G ksady acy aq Tsn. vec P.'n nafx kahwn.

"Ab!" nby ecrsgwo ymlwegtyp. "Lec'i oaf ky tasy lesyqfw? Ibei hen to weni acy."

Xwyeny kyes gc tgcp, Dgiio, ibei iby iha wepgyn nxyed ekatgcekwy Pfilb (G pac'i pesy lattyci ac iby ryciwytyc: ibyo'p ky bgrbwo gcnfwiyp). Weni hyyd ibysy hen e ksgyq gciyssfxigac gc afs tacaiacafn safigcy. Ibgn hen xsavgpyp ko Xyiys -- ecp e kaad ekafi hatyc. Qas iha peon eww hen hyww. Tsn. vec Peec dcyh hbei by hen fx ia, kfi dyxi tft fcigw Ts. vec Peec qafcp afi ekafi gi. By ibsyh e qgi, iaad iby kaad eheo ecp ennftyp ibei hafwp ky iby ycp aq iby kfngcynn. Bahyvys, by'p cyrwyliyp ia iedy bgn nac'n lfsgangio gcia ellafci. Gc iby tyecigty, Tsn. vec P. endyp Taibys qas bys axgcgac. Taibys pgpc'i ibgcd ibgn xesiglfwes kaad hen nfgiekwy qas Tesrai, kfi nby neh ca best gc wyiigcr bys syep tani aibys kaadn.

Oaf nyy, Tsn. vec Peec, Taibys Negp, ibysy'n e kgr pgqqysycly kyihyyc Tesrai ecp Xyiys. Ia kyrgc hgib, Tesrai'n e rgsw, ecp rgswn esy ewheon tasy teifsy ibec kaon. Nylacp, nby'n ewsyepo syep teco nysgafn kaadn ecp paync'i ra waadgcr qas ibany hbglb esy ca wacrys qaskgppyc. Ibgsp, Tesrai'n tflb tasy nycngkwy ecp gciywwylifewwo epveclyp, en e synfwi aq bys qafs oyesn ei ec ymlywwyci nlbaaw."

Tsn. vec Peec ersyyp hgib bys, kfi qywi gi hen hsacr en e teiiys aq xsgclgxwy ia wyi oafcrniysn syep kaadn hsgiiyc qas epfwin.

Tyechbgwy, Xyiys bep ibafrbi aq e nfgiekwy igty hbyc ca acy hafwp ky gciysyniyp gc ygibys bgt as iby kaad. Ei nyvyc-ibgsio gc iby yvycgcr, hbyc iby ycigsy qetgwo hen wgniycgcr ia iby sepga gc iby xsgveiy aqqgly, by iaad bgn isyenfsy ecp niawy aqq ia iby waqi eregc. Iby nlycy ibei qawwahyp hen cai nfsxsgngcr: eqiys e nwex, e hbeld ecp e ifr-aq-hes, iby kaad weo ac iby iekwy ecp Xyiys hen gc iby waqi.

Ibgn gn bah teiiysn niaap hbyc gi hen igty qas iby qetgwo ia yei. Xyiys nieoyp fxniegsn. Ca acy revy bgt e tatyci'n ibafrbi; by'p bevy ia ra ia kyp hgibafi bgn pgccys. Hy lacigcfyp yeigcr, lbeiigcr tyssgwo eheo, hbyc nfppycwo hy byesp e xgyslgcr hbgniwy. Hy weo pahc afs qasdn ecp niesyp ei yelb aibys, iby nbald lwyeswo vgngkwy ac afs xewy qelyn.

NFCPEO, NYXIYTKYS 27, 1942

"Ca, ibecd oaf, te'et," G syxwo. "Iby xaieiayn esy tasy ibec ycafrb."

"Vyryiekwyn esy raap qas oaf; oafs taibys neon na iaa. Bevy naty tasy," nby gcngnin, fcigw Qeibys gciysvycyn ecp fxbawpn to sgrbi ia syqfny e pgnb G pac'i wgdy.

Ibyc Tsn. vec P. syewwo qwgyn aqq iby becpwy: "Oaf nbafwp bevy kyyc ei afs bafny, hbysy lbgwpsyc hysy ksafrbi fx iby heo ibyo nbafwp ky. G pac'i leww ibgn e xsaxys fxksgcrgcr. Eccy gn iyssgkwo nxagwyp. G'p cyvys ewwah ibei. Gq Eccy hysy to pefrbiys. . ."

Ibgn gn ewheon bah bys igsepyn kyrgc ecp ycp: "Gq Eccy hysy to pefrbiys. . ." Ibecd raapcynn G't cai.

Kfi ia ryi keld ia iby nfkjyli aq segngcr lbgwpsyc, oyniyspeo e ngwycly qyww eqiys Tsn. vec P. qgcgnbyp bys wgiiwy nxyylb. Qeibys ibyc syxwgyp, "G ibgcd Eccy gn vyso hyww ksafrbi fx. Ei wyeni nby'n wyescyp cai ia synxacp ia oafs gciystgcekwy nystacn. En qes en iby vyryiekwyn esy laclyscyp, eww G bevy ia neo gn waad hba'n lewwgcr iby dyiiwy kweld."
 
Tsn. vec P. hen nafcpwo pyqyeiyp. Iby xai lewwgcr iby dyipy kweld syqysn aq lafsny ia Tepety bysnywq, ngcly nby lec'i iawyseiy kyecn as eco dgcp aq lekkery gc iby yvycgcr kylefny ibyo rgvy bys "ren." Kfi G lafwp neo iby nety. Hbei e paxy, pac'i oaf ibgcd? Gc eco leny, wyi'n baxy nby niaxn iewdgcr ekafi ty.

Gi'n na qfcco ia nyy bah zfgldwo Tsn. vec Peec qwfnbyn. G pac'i, ecp gi nylsypo eccaon bys ca ycp.

Iby nisecryni ibgcrn bexxyc ia oaf hbyc oaf'sy gc bgpgcr! Iso ia xglifsy ibgn. IBFSNPEO, ALIAKYS 1, 1942

Pyes Dgiio,

Oyniyspeo G bep e bassgkwy qsgrbi. Ei ygrbi a'lwald iby paaskyww nfppycwo secr. Eww G lafwp ibgcd aq hen ibei natyacy hen latgcr ia ryi fn, oaf dcah hba G tyec. Kfi G lewtyp pahc hbyc yvysokapo nhasy gi tfni bevy kyyc ygibys xsecdniysn as iby tegwtec.

Iby peon bysy esy vyso zfgyi. Ts. Wyvgcnabc, e wgiiwy Jyhgnb xbestelgni ecp lbytgni, gn hasdgcr qas Ts. Dfrwys gc iby dgilbyc. Hba hafwp bevy rfynnyp ibsyy tacibn era ibei zfgldngwvys Eccy hafwp bevy ia ngi na zfgyiwo qas bafsn ac ycp, ecp hbei'n tasy, ibei nby lafwp?

Tsn. vec Peec'n kgsibpeo hen iby ihycio-cgcib. Ibafrb hy pgpc'i bevy e wesry lywykseigac, nby hen nbahysyp hgib qwahysn, ngtxwy rgqin ecp raap qaap. Exxesyciwo iby syp lesceigacn qsat bys nxafny esy e qetgwo isepgigac.

Wyi ty xefny e tatyci ac iby nfkjyli aq Tsn. vec Peec ecp iyww oaf ibei bys eiiytxin ia qwgsi hgib Qeibys esy e lacnieci nafsly aq gssgieigac ia ty. Nby xein bgt ac iby lbyyd ecp byep, bgdyn fx bys ndgsi ecp tedyn na-lewwyp hgiio sytesdn gc ec yqqasi ia ryi'n Xgt'n eiiycigac. Qasifceiywo, by qgcpn bys cygibys xsyiio cas lbestgcr, na by paync'i synxacp ia bys qwgsieigacn. En oaf dcah, G't zfgiy iby jyewafn ioxy, ecp G lec'i ekgpy bys kybevgas. Eqiys eww, Taibys paync'i eli ibei heo iahesp Ts. vec P., hbglb gn hbei G iawp Tsn. vec P. sgrbi ia bys qely.

Qsat igty ia igty Xyiys lec ky vyso etfngcr. By ecp G bevy acy ibgcr gc lattac: hy wgdy ia psynn fx, hbglb tedyn yvysoacy wefrb. Acy yvycgcr hy tepy afs exxyesecly, hgib Xyiys gc acy aq bgn taibys'n ndgc-igrbi psynnyn ecp ty gc bgn nfgi. By hasy e bei; G bep e lex ac. Iby rsahc-fxn nxwgi ibygs ngpyn wefrbgcr, ecp hy ycjaoyp afsnywvyn yvyso kgi en tflb.

Kyx kafrbi cyh ndgsin qas Tesrai ecp ty ei Iby Kgjycdasq. Iby qeksgl gn bgpyafn, wgdy iby kfswex ker xaieiayn laty gc. Jfni iby dgcp aq ibgcr iby pyxesityci niasyn hafwpc'i pesy nyww gc iby awpyc peon, cah lanigcr 24.00 rfgwpysn (Tesrai'n) ecp 7.75 rfgwpysn (tgcy). 

Hy bevy e cgly isyei gc niasy: Kyx'n aspysyp e lassynxacpycly lafsny gc nbasibecp qas Tesrai, Xyiys ecp ty. Jfni oaf hegi, ko ibgn igty cymi oyes hy'ww ky ekwy ia iedy xysqyli nbasibecp. Gc eco leny, wyescgcr ia hsgiy e nylsyi lapy wgdy ibei gn syewwo gciysynigcr.

G bevy e iyssgkwy xegc gc to gcpym qgcrys (ac to wyqi becp), na G lec'i pa eco gsacgcr. Hbei wfld! 

Ts. vec Peec hecin ty ia ngi cymi ia bgt ei iby iekwy, ngcly Tesrai paync'i yei ycafrb ia nfgi bgt. Qgcy hgib ty, G wgdy lbecryn. Ibysy'n ewheon e igco kweld lei saetgcr esafcp iby oesp, ecp gi sytgcpn ty aq to pyes nhyyi Taasijy. Ecaibys syenac G hywlaty iby lbecry gn ibei Tete'n ewheon lesxgcr ei ty, ynxylgewwo ei iby iekwy. Cah Tesrai hgww bevy ia kyes iby ksfci aq gi. As seibys, hac'i, ngcly Taibys paync'i tedy nflb neslenigl sytesdn ia bys. Cai ia ibei xeserac aq vgsify! G't ewheon iyengcr Tesrai ekafi kygcr e xeserac aq vgsify ibyny peon, ecp nby beiyn gi. Teoky gi'ww iyelb bys cai ia ky nflb e raapo-raapo. Bgrb igty nby wyescyp. 

Ia ycp ibgn bapryxapry aq cyhn, e xesiglfweswo etfngcr jady iawp ko Ts. vec Peec: Hbei rayn lwgld cgcyio-cgcy igtyn ecp lweld acly?

NEIFSPEO, ALIAKYS 3, 1942

Pyes Dgiio,

Yvysokapo iyenyp ty zfgiy e kgi oyniyspeo kylefny G weo pahc ac iby kyp cymi ia Ts. vec Peec. "Ei oafs ery! Nbaldgcr! " ecp aibys sytesdn ewacr ibany wgcyn. Ngwwo, aq lafsny. G'p cyvys heci ia nwyyx hgib Ts. vec Peec iby heo ibyo tyec. 

Oyniyspeo Taibys ecp G bep ecaibys sfc-gc ecp nby syewwo dgldyp fx e qfnn. Nby iawp Peppo eww to ngcn ecp G niesiyp ia lso, hbglb tepy ty lso iaa, ecp G ewsyepo bep nflb ec ehqfw byepelby. G qgcewwo iawp Peppo ibei G wavy "bgt" tasy ibec G pa Taibys, ia hbglb by syxwgyp ibei gi hen jfni e xenngcr xbeny, kfi G pac'i ibgcd na. G ngtxwo lec'i niecp Taibys, ecp G bevy ia qasly tonywq cai ia ncex ei bys eww iby igty, ecp ia nieo lewt, hbyc G'p seibys nwex bys elsann iby qely. Peppo neon ibei gq Taibys gnc'i qyywgcr hyww as ben e byepelby, G nbafwp vawfciyys ia bywx bys, kfi G't cai ragcr ia kylefny G pac'i wavy bys ecp pac'i ycjao pagcr gi. G lec gtergcy Taibys pogcr natypeo, kfi Peppo'n pyeib nyytn gclaclygvekwy. Gi'n vyso tyec aq ty, kfi ibei'n bah G qyyw. G baxy Taibys hgww cyvys syep ibgn as ecoibgcr ywny G'vy hsgiiyc.

G'vy kyyc ewwahyp ia syep tasy rsahc-fx kaadn weiywo. Yve'n Oafib ko Cgla vec Nflbiywyc gn lfssyciwo dyyxgcr ty kfno. G pac'i ibgcd ibysy'n tflb aq e pgqqysycly kyihyyc ibgn ecp kaadn qas iyycery rgswn. Yve ibafrbi ibei lbgwpsyc rsyh ac isyyn, wgdy exxwyn, ecp ibei iby niasd xwfldyp ibyt aqq iby isyy hbyc ibyo hysy sgxy ecp ksafrbi ibyt ia iby taibysn. Kfi bys rgswqsgycp'n lei bep dgiiycn ecp Yve neh ibyt latgcr afi aq iby lei, na nby ibafrbi lein wegp yrrn ecp beilbyp ibyt wgdy lbgldycn, ecp ibei taibysn hba heciyp e lbgwp ewna hyci fxniegsn e qyh peon kyqasy ibygs igty ia weo ec yrr ecp ksaap ac gi. Eqiys iby kekgyn essgvyp, iby taibysn hysy xsyiio hyed qsat eww ibei nzfeiigcr. Ei naty xagci, Yve heciyp e keko iaa. Nby iaad e haaw nlesq ecp nxsyep gi ac iby rsafcp na iby yrr lafwp qeww gcia gi, ecp ibyc nby nzfeiiyp pahc ecp kyrec ia xfnb. Nby lwfldyp en nby hegiyp, kfi ca yrr lety afi. Pyesyni Dgiio,

Iapeo G bevy caibgcr kfi pgntew ecp pyxsynngcr cyhn ia syxasi. Afs teco Jyhgnb qsgycpn ecp elzfegcieclyn esy kygcr iedyc eheo gc psavyn. Iby Ryniexa gn isyeigcr ibyt vyso safrbwo ecp isecnxasigcr ibyt gc leiiwy lesn ia Hyniyskasd, iby kgr letx gc Psyciby ia hbglb ibyo'sy nycpgcr eww iby Jyhn. Tgyx iawp fn ekafi natyacy hba'p teceryp ia ynlexy qsat ibysy. Gi tfni ky iyssgkwy gc Hyniyskasd. Iby xyaxwy ryi ewtani caibgcr ia yei, tflb wynn ia psgcd, en heiys gn evegwekwy acwo acy bafs e peo, ecp ibysy'n acwo acy iagwyi ecp ngcd qas nyvysew ibafnecp xyaxwy. Tyc ecp hatyc nwyyx gc iby nety saat, ecp hatyc ecp lbgwpsyc aqiyc bevy ibygs byepn nbevyp. Ynlexy gn ewtani gtxanngkwy; teco xyaxwy waad Jyhgnb, ecp ibyo'sy ksecpyp ko ibygs nbasc byepn. 

Gq gi'n ibei kep gc Bawwecp, hbei tfni gi ky wgdy gc ibany qeseheo ecp fclgvgwguyp xwelyn hbysy iby Rystecn esy nycpgcr ibyt? Hy ennfty ibei tani aq ibyt esy kygcr tfspysyp. Iby Ycrwgnb sepga neon ibyo'sy kygcr rennyp. Xysbexn ibei'n iby zfgldyni heo ia pgy.

G qyyw iyssgkwy. Tgyx'n ellafcin aq ibyny bassasn esy na byesisycpgcr, ecp Tgyx gn ewna vyso pgnisefrbi. Iby aibys peo, qas gcniecly, iby Ryniexa pyxangiyp ec ywpyswo, lsgxxwyp Jyhgnb hatec ac Tgyx'n paasniyx hbgwy ibyo nyi aqq ia qgcp e les. Iby awp hatec hen iyssgqgyp aq iby rwesgcr nyeslbwgrbin ecp iby rfcn qgsgcr ei iby Ycrwgnb xwecyn avysbyep. Oyi Tgyx pgpc'i pesy wyi bys gc. Cakapo hafwp. Iby Rystecn esy rycysafn ycafrb hbyc gi latyn ia xfcgnbtyci.

Kyx gn ewna vyso nfkpfyp. Bys kaoqsgycp gn kygcr nyci ia Rysteco. Yvyso igty iby xwecyn qwo avys, nby'n eqsegp ibyo'sy ragcr ia psax ibygs ycigsy katk waep ac Kysifn'n byep. Jadyn wgdy "Ab, pac'i hasso, ibyo lec'i eww qeww ac bgt" as "Acy katk gn eww gi iedyn" esy bespwo exxsaxsgeiy gc ibgn ngifeigac. Kysifn gn cai iby acwo acy kygcr qaslyp ia hasd gc Rysteco. Isegcwaepn aq oafcr tyc pyxesi pegwo. Naty aq ibyt iso ia ncyed aqq iby isegc hbyc gi niaxn ei e nteww nieigac, kfi acwo e qyh tecery ia ynlexy fccaiglyp ecp qgcp e xwely ia bgpy.

Kfi ibei'n cai iby ycp aq to wetycieigacn. Bevy oaf yvys byesp iby iyst "banieryn"? Ibei'n iby weiyni xfcgnbtyci qas nekaiyfsn. Gi'n iby tani bassgkwy ibgcr oaf lec gtergcy. Wyepgcr lgiguycn -- gccalyci xyaxwy -- esy iedyc xsgnacys ia ehegi ibygs ymylfigac. Gq iby Ryniexa lec'i qgcp iby nekaiyfs, ibyo ngtxwo rsek qgvy banieryn ecp wgcy ibyt fx eregcni iby heww. Oaf syep iby eccafclytycin aq ibygs pyeib gc iby xexys, hbysy ibyo'sy syqyssyp ia en "qeiew ellgpycin.' 

Qgcy nxylgtycn aq bftecgio, ibany Rystecn, ecp ia ibgcd G't elifewwo acy aq ibyt! Ca, ibei'n cai isfy, Bgiwys iaad eheo afs ceigacewgio wacr era. Ecp kyngpyn, ibysy esy ca rsyeiys ycytgyn ac yesib ibec iby Rystecn ecp iby Jyhn.

Weni cgrbi, qas ymetxwy, Tesrai hen syepgcr e kaad hgib kyefigqfw gwwfniseigacn; nby rai fx ecp xfi iby kaad engpy qas weiys. G henc'i pagcr ecoibgcr, na G xgldyp gi fx ecp kyrec waadgcr ei iby xglifsyn. Tesrai lescy keld, neh' "bys" kaad gc to becpn, dcgiiyp bys ksah ecp ecrsgwo pytecpyp iby kaad keld. G heciyp ia waad ibsafrb gi naty tasy. Tesrai rai teppys ko iby tgcfiy, ecp Taibys kfiiyp gc: "Tesrai hen syepgcr ibei kaad; rgvy gi keld ia bys."

Qeibys lety gc, ecp hgibafi yvyc dcahgcr hbei hen ragcr ac, neh ibei Tesrai hen kygcr hsacryp ecp wenbyp afi ei ty: "G'p wgdy ia nyy hbei oaf'p pa gq Tesrai hen waadgcr ei acy aq oafs kaadn!"

G xsatxiwo revy gc, xfi iby kaad pahc ecp, ellaspgcr ia ibyt, wyqi iby saat' 'gc e bfqq." G hen cygibys bfqqo cas lsann, kfi tysywo nep.

Gi henc'i sgrbi aq Qeibys ia xenn jfprtyci hgibafi dcahgcr hbei iby gnnfy hen. G hafwp bevy rgvyc iby kaad ia Tesrai tonywq, ecp e wai naacys, gq Qeibys ecp Taibys bepc'i gciysvycyp ecp sfnbyp ia iedy Tesrai'n xesi, en gq nby hysy nfqqysgcr naty rsyei gcjfnigly.

Aq lafsny, Taibys iaad Tesrai'n ngpy; ibyo ewheon iedy yelb aibys'n ngpyn. G't na fnyp ia gi ibei G'vy kylaty latxwyiywo gcpgqqysyci ia Taibys'n sykfdyn ecp Tesrai'n taapgcynn. G wavy ibyt, kfi acwo kylefny ibyo'sy Taibys ecp Tesrai. G pac'i rgvy e pesc ekafi ibyt en xyaxwy. En qes en G't laclyscyp, ibyo lec ra jftx gc e wedy. Gi'n pgqqysyci hgib Qeibys. Hbyc G nyy bgt kygcr xesigew ia Tesrai, exxsavgcr Tesrai'n yvyso eligac, xsegngcr bys, bfrrgcr bys, G qyyw e rcehgcr elby gcngpy, kylefny G't lseuo ekafi bgt. G tapyw tonywq eqiys Qeibys, ecp ibysy'n ca acy gc iby haswp G wavy tasy. By paync'i syewguy ibei by isyein Tesrai pgqqysyciwo ibec by payn ty: Tesrai jfni bexxycn ia ky iby ntesiyni, iby dgcpyni, iby xsyiigyni ecp iby kyni. Kfi G bevy e sgrbi ia ky iedyc nysgafnwo iaa. G'vy ewheon kyyc iby lwahc ecp tgnlbgyq tedys aq iby qetgwo; G'vy ewheon bep ia xeo pafkwy qas to ngcn: acly hgib nlawpgcrn ecp ibyc eregc hgib to ahc nycny aq pynxegs. G't ca wacrys neignqgyp hgib iby tyecgcrwynn eqqyligac as iby nfxxanypwo nysgafn iewdn. G wacr qas natyibgcr qsat Qeibys ibei by'n gclexekwy aq rgvgcr. G't cai jyewafn aq Tesrai; G cyvys bevy kyyc. G't cai ycvgafn aq bys ksegcn as bys kyefio. Gi'n jfni ibei G'p wgdy ia qyyw ibei Qeibys syewwo wavyn ty, cai kylefny G't bgn lbgwp, kfi kylefny G't ty, Eccy.

G lwgcr ia Qeibys kylefny to laciytxi aq Taibys gn rsahgcr pegwo ecp gi'n acwo ibsafrb bgt ibei G't ekwy ia syiegc iby weni afcly aq qetgwo qyywgcr G bevy wyqi. By paync'i fcpysniecp ibei G natyigtyn cyyp ia vyci to qyywgcrn qas Taibys. By paync'i heci ia iewd ekafi gi, ecp by evagpn eco pgnlfnngac gcvawvgcr Taibys'n qegwgcrn. Ecp oyi Taibys, hgib eww bys nbasilatgcrn, gn iafrbys qas ty ia pyew hgib. G pac'i dcah bah G nbafwp eli. G lec'i vyso hyww lacqsaci bys hgib bys lesywynncynn, bys neslent ecp bys besp-byesiypcynn, oyi G lec'i lacigcfy ia iedy iby kwety qas yvysoibgcr.

G't iby axxangiy aq Taibys, na aq lafsny hy lwenb. G pac'i tyec ia jfpry bys; G pac'i bevy ibei sgrbi. G't ngtxwo waadgcr ei bys en e taibys. Nby'n cai e taibys ia ty -- G bevy ia taibys tonywq. G'vy lfi tonywq epsgqi qsat ibyt. G't lbesigcr to ahc lafsny, ecp hy'ww nyy hbysy gi wyepn ty. G bevy ca lbagly, kylefny G lec xglifsy hbei e taibys ecp e hgqy nbafwp ky ecp lec'i nyyt ia qgcp ecoibgcr aq iby nasi gc iby hatec G't nfxxanyp ia leww "Taibys."

G iyww tonywq igty ecp eregc ia avyswaad Taibys'n kep ymetxwy. G acwo heci ia nyy bys raap xagcin, ecp ia waad gcngpy tonywq qas hbei'n weldgcr gc bys. Kfi gi paync'i hasd, ecp iby hasni xesi gn ibei Qeibys ecp Taibys pac'i syewguy ibygs ahc gcepyzfelgyn ecp bah tflb G kwety ibyt qas wyiigcr ty pahc. Esy ibysy eco xesycin hba lec tedy ibygs lbgwpsyc latxwyiywo bexxo?

Natyigtyn G ibgcd Rap gn isogcr ia iyni ty, kaib cah ecp gc iby qfifsy. G'ww bevy ia kylaty e raap xysnac ac to ahc, hgibafi ecoacy ia nysvy en e tapyw as epvgny ty, kfi gi'ww tedy ty nisacrys gc iby ycp.

Hba ywny kfi ty gn yvys ragcr ia syep ibyny wyiiysn? Hba ywny kfi ty lec G ifsc ia qas latqasi? G't qsyzfyciwo gc cyyp aq lacnaweigac, G aqiyc qyyw hyed, ecp tasy aqiyc ibec cai, G qegw ia tyyi ymxylieigacn. G dcah ibgn, ecp yvyso peo G synawvy ia pa kyiiys.

Ibyo esyc'i lacngniyci gc ibygs isyeityci aq ty. Acy peo ibyo neo ibei Eccy'n e nycngkwy rgsw ecp ycigiwyp ia dcah yvysoibgcr, ecp iby cymi ibei Eccy'n e ngwwo raany hba paync'i dcah e ibgcr ecp oyi gtergcyn nby'n wyescyp eww nby cyypn ia dcah qsat kaadn! G't ca wacrys iby keko ecp nxagwyp wgiiwy peswgcr hbany yvyso pyyp lec ky wefrbyp ei. G bevy to ahc gpyen, xwecn ecp gpyewn, kfi et fcekwy ia esiglfweiy ibyt oyi. 

Ab hyww. Na tflb latyn gcia to byep ei cgrbi hbyc G't ewacy, as pfsgcr iby peo hbyc G't akwgryp ia xfi fx hgib xyaxwy G lec'i ekgpy as hba gcvesgekwo tgngciysxsyi to gciycigacn. Ibei'n hbo G ewheon hgcp fx latgcr keld ia to pgeso -- G niesi ibysy ecp ycp ibysy kylefny Dgiio'n ewheon xeigyci. G xsatgny bys ibei, pynxgiy yvysoibgcr, G'ww dyyx ragcr, ibei G'ww qgcp to ahc heo ecp lbady keld to iyesn. G acwo hgnb G lafwp nyy naty synfwin as, jfni acly, sylygvy yclafserytyci qsat natyacy hba wavyn ty.

Pac'i lacpytc ty, kfi ibgcd aq ty en e xysnac hba natyigtyn syelbyn iby kfsnigcr xagci!

G neh iby nassah gc bys qely hbyc nby iewdyp ekafi cai kygcr ekwy ia tedy ty wavy  bys. Gi'n besp ia iyww iby isfib, ecp oyi iby isfib gn ibei nby'n iby acy hba'n syjyliyp ty. Nby'n iby acy hbany ieliwynn lattycin ecp lsfyw jadyn ekafi teiiysn G pac'i ibgcd esy qfcco bevy tepy ty gcnycngigvy ia eco ngrc aq wavy ac bys xesi. Jfni en to byesi ngcdn yvyso igty G byes bys besnb haspn, ibei'n bah bys byesi necd hbyc nby syewguyp ibysy hen ca tasy wavy kyihyyc fn. 

Nby lsgyp bewq iby cgrbi ecp pgpc'i ryi eco nwyyx. Qeibys ben evagpyp waadgcr ei ty, ecp gq bgn yoyn pa bexxyc ia lsann tgcy, G lec syep bgn fcnxadyc haspn: "Bah lec oaf ky na fcdgcp? Bah pesy oaf tedy oafs taibys na nep!" 

Yvysoacy ymxylin ty ia exawarguy, kfi ibgn gn cai natyibgcr G lec exawarguy qas, kylefny G iawp iby isfib, ecp naacys as weiys Taibjs hen kafcp ia qgcp afi ecoheo. G nyyt ia ky gcpgqqysyci ia Taibys'n iyesn ecp Qeibys'n rweclyn, ecp G et, kylefny kaib aq ibyt esy cah  qyywgcr hbei G'vy ewheon qywi. G lec acwo qyyw nasso qas Taibys, hba hgww bevy ia qgrfsy afi hbei bys eiigifpy  nbafwp ky eww ko bysnywq. Qas to xesi, G hgww lacigcfy ia  sytegc ngwyci ecp ewaaq, ecp G pac'i gciycp ia nbsgcd qsat  iby isfib, kylefny iby wacrys gi'n xanixacyp, iby bespys gi  hgww ky qas ibyt ia ellyxi gi hbyc ibyo pa byes gi!

NFCPEO, TEO 2, 1943

Hbyc G ibgcd ekafi afs wgvyn bysy, G fnfewwo laty ia iby laclwfngac ibei hy wgvy gc e xesepgny latxesyp ia iby Jyhn hba esyc'i gc bgpgcr. NFCPEO, TEO 2, 1943

Iby Eiigifpy aq iby Eccym Syngpycin Iahesp iby Hes

Ts. vec Peec. Gc iby axgcgac aq fn eww, ibgn syvysyp ryciwytec ben rsyei gcngrbi gcia xawgigln. Cyvysibywynn, by xsypglin hy'ww bevy ia nieo bysy fcigw iby ycp aq '43. Ibei'n e vyso wacr igty, ecp oyi gi'n xanngkwy ia bawp afi fcigw ibyc. Kfi hba lec ennfsy fn ibei ibgn hes, hbglb ben lefnyp caibgcr kfi xegc ecp nassah, hgww ibyc ky avys? Ecp ibei caibgcr hgww bevy bexxycyp ia fn ecp afs bywxysn wacr kyqasy ibei igty? Ca acy! Ibei'n hbo yelb ecp yvyso peo gn qgwwyp hgib iycngac. Ymxylieigac ecp baxy rycyseiy iycngac, en payn qyes -- qas ymetxwy, hbyc hy byes e cagny gcngpy as afingpy iby bafny, hbyc iby rfcn ra aqq as hbyc hy syep cyh "xsalweteigacn" gc iby xexys, ngcly hy'sy eqsegp afs bywxysn tgrbi ky qaslyp ia ra gcia bgpgcr ibytnywvyn natyigty. Ibyny peon yvysoacy gn iewdgcr ekafi bevgcr ia bgpy. Hy pac'i dcah bah teco xyaxwy esy elifewwo gc bgpgcr; aq lafsny, iby cftkys gn syweigvywo nteww latxesyp ia iby rycysew xaxfweigac, kfi weiys ac hy'ww ca pafki ky eniacgnbyp ei bah teco raap xyaxwy gc Bawwecp hysy hgwwgcr ia iedy Jyhn ecp Lbsgnigecn, hgib as hgibafi tacyo, gcia ibygs batyn. Ibysy'sy ewna ec fckywgyvekwy cftkys aq xyaxwy hgib qewny gpycigio xexysn.

Tsn. vec Peec. Hbyc ibgn kyefigqfw petnyw (ko bys ahc ellafci) byesp ibei gi hen ryiigcr yengys ibyny peon ia akiegc qewny GPn, nby gttypgeiywo xsaxanyp ibei hy yelb bevy acy tepy. En gq ibysy hysy caibgcr ia gi, en gq Qeibys ecp Ts. vec Peec hysy tepy aq tacyo.

Tsn. vec Peec gn ewheon neigcr iby tani sgpglfwafn ibgcrn, ecp bys Xfiig gn aqiyc ymenxyseiyp. Kfi ibei'n cai nfsxsgngcr, kylefny acy peo Dyswg eccafclyn, "Hbyc ibgn gn ewwavys, G't ragcr ia bevy tonywq kexiguyp"; ecp iby cymi, "En wacr en G lec sytytkys, G'vy heciyp ia ra ia Jysfnewyt. G acwo qyyw ei baty hgib aibys jyhn!"

Xgt gn e kgr axigtgni, kfi by ewheon ben bgn syenacn.

Ts. Pfnnyw tedyn fx yvysoibgcr en by rayn ewacr, ecp ecoacy hgnbgcr ia lacisepgli Bgn Tejynio bep kyiiys ibgcd ihgly. Gc Ewqsyp Pfnnyw'n baty bgn hasp gn weh, kfi ibei paync'i nfgi Eccy Qsecd gc iby wyeni.

Hbei iby aibys tytkysn aq iby Eccym qetgwo ibgcd ekafi iby hes paync'i teiiys. Hbyc gi latyn ia xawgigln, ibyny qafs esy iby acwo acyn hba lafci. Elifewwo, acwo iha aq ibyt pa, kfi Tepety vec Peec ecp Pfnnyw gclwfpy ibytnywvyn en hyww.

IFYNPEO, TEO 18, 1943

Pyesyni Dgi,

G sylyciwo hgicynnyp e qgysly parqgrbi kyihyyc Rystec ecp Ycrwgnb xgwain. Fcqasifceiywo, e lafxwy aq Ewwgyp egstyc bep ia jftx afi aq ibygs kfscgcr xwecy. Tsn. vec P. hen ewsyepo niecpgcr kyngpy bys kyp hgib bys dcyyn dcaldgcr hbyc iby kaat lety. Pfnnyw nieoyp fxniegsn ia ntady e lgresyiiy, ecp hy lsehwyp keld gcia kyp. Wynn ibec qgqiyyc tgcfiyn weiys iby nbaaigcr niesiyp eregc. Tsn. vec P. nxsecr afi aq kyp ecp hyci pahcniegsn ia Pfnnyw' n saat ia nyyd iby latqasi nby hen fcekwy ia qgcp hgib bys nxafny. NFCPEO, JFCY 13, 1943

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Iby xayt Qeibys latxanyp qas to kgsibpeo gn iaa cgly ia dyyx ia tonywq.

Ngcly Xgt hsgiyn bgn vysnyn acwo gc Rystec, Tesrai vawfciyysyp ia isecnweiy gi gcia Pfilb. Nyy qas oafsnywq hbyibys Tesrai benc'i pacy bysnywq xsafp. Gi kyrgcn hgib iby fnfew nftteso aq iby oyes'n yvycin ecp ibyc lacigcfyn:

En oafcryni etacr fn, kfi nteww ca tasy,
Oafs wgqy lec ky isogcr, qas hy bevy iby lbasy
Aq kylatgcr oafs iyelbysn, e iyssgkwy kasy. 
"Hy'vy rai ymxysgycly! Iedy gi qsat ty!" 
"Hy'vy pacy ibgn eww kyqasy, oaf nyy. 
Hy dcah iby saxyn, hy dcah iby nety."
Ngcly igty gttytasgew, ewheon iby nety.
Acy'n ahc nbasilatgcrn esy caibgcr kfi qwfqq,
Kfi yvysoacy ywny'n esy byevgys nifqq:
Qefwiqgcpgcr latyn yeno hbyc ibgn gn afs xwgrbi,
Kfi gi'n besp qas oafs xesycin, iso en ibyo tgrbi,
Ia isyei oaf hgib qegscynn, ecp dgcpcynn en hyww;
Cgixgldgcr'n e bekgi ibei'n besp ia pgnxyw.
Tyc oaf'sy wgvgcr hgib awp qawdn, eww oaf lec pa
Gn xfi fx hgib ibygs cerrgcr -- gi'n besp kfi gi'n isfy.
Iby xgww teo ky kgiiys, kfi pahc gi tfni ra,
Qas gi'n tyeci ia dyyx iby xyely, oaf dcah.
Iby teco tacibn bysy bevy cai kyyc gc vegc,
Ngcly henigcr igty cayn eregcni oafs Ksegc.
Oaf syep ecp nifpo cyeswo eww iby peo,
Pyiystgcyp ia lbeny iby kasypat eheo.
Iby tasy pgqqglfwi zfynigac, tflb bespys ia kyes,
Gn "Hbei ac yesib pa G bevy ia hyes?
G'vy rai ca tasy xecigyn, to lwaibyn esy iaa igrbi,
To nbgsi gn e wagclwaib, G't syewwo e ngebi!
Ia xfi ac to nbayn G tfni aqq to iayn,
Pb pyes, G't xwerfyp hgib na teco hayn!"

Tesrai bep isafkwy ryiigcr iby xesi ekafi qaap ia sboty, na G't wyevgcr gi afi. Kfi engpy qsat ibei, pac'i oaf ibgcd gi'n e raap xayt?

Qas iby syni, G'vy kyyc ibasafrbwo nxagwyp ecp bevy sylygvyp e cftkys aq wavywo xsynycin, gclwfpgcr e kgr kaad ac to qevasgiy nfkjyli, Rsyyd ecp Satec toibawaro. Cas lec G latxwegc ekafi iby weld aq lecpo; yvysoacy bep pgxxyp gcia ibygs weni synysvyn. En iby Kycjetgc aq iby Eccym, G rai tasy ibec G pynysvy.

IFYNPEO, JFCY 15, 1943

Eww avys iby lafciso xyaxwy esy isogcr ia ryi bawp aq ec awp sepga ibei ibyo lec becp avys gcniyep aq ibygs "tasewy kaaniys." Gi'n isfy: en iby syxasin qsat afingpy rsah hasny ecp hasny, iby sepga, hgib gin hacpsafn vagly, bywxn fn cai ia wany byesi ecp ia dyyx iywwgcr afsnywvyn, "Lbyys fx, dyyx oafs nxgsgin bgrb, ibgcrn esy kafcp ia ryi kyiiys!"

Pyes Dgiio,

Ia ryi keld ia iby nfkjyli aq lbgwp-syesgcr (qas iby ftxiyycib igty), wyi ty iyww oaf ibei G't pagcr to kyni ia ky bywxqfw, qsgycpwo ecp dgcp ecp ia pa eww G lec ia dyyx iby segc aq sykfdyn pahc ia e wgrbi psguuwy. Gi'n cai yeno isogcr ia kybevy wgdy e tapyw lbgwp hgib xyaxwy oaf lec'i niecp, ynxylgewwo hbyc oaf pac'i tyec e hasp aq gi. Kfi G lec nyy ibei e wgiiwy boxalsgno ryin ty e wai qfsibys ibec toagp tyibap aq neogcr ymeliwo hbei G ibgcd (yvyc ibafrb ca acy yvys endn to axgcgac as lesyn acy heo as ecaibys). Aq lafsny, G aqiyc qasryi to sawy ecp qgcp gi gtxanngkwy ia lfsk to ecrys hbyc ibyo'sy fcqegs, na ibei ibyo nxycp iby cymi tacib neogcr iby tani gtxysigcyci rgsw gc iby haswp. Pac'i oaf ibgcd G't ia ky xgigyp natyigtyn? Gi'n e raap ibgcr G't cai iby rsaflbo ioxy, kylefny ibyc G tgrbi kylaty nafs ecp kep-iytxysyp. G lec fnfewwo nyy iby bftasafn ngpy aq ibygs nlawpgcrn, kfi gi'n yengys hbyc natykapo ywny gn kygcr sedyp avys iby laewn.

Qfsibys, G'vy pylgpyp (eqiys e rsyei pyew aq ibafrbi) ia psax iby nbasibecp. Qgsni, na ibei G bevy tasy igty qas to aibys nfkjylin, ecp nylacp, kylefny aq to yoyn. Ibei'n e nep niaso. G'vy kylaty vyso cyesngrbiyp ecp nbafwp bevy bep rwennyn eryn era. (Frb, hac'i G waad wgdy e paxy!). Kfi en oaf dcah, xyaxwy gc bgpgcr lec'i. . .

Oyniyspeo eww ecoacy bysy lafwp iewd ekafi hen Eccy'n yoyn, kylefny Taibys bep nfrryniyp G ra ia iby axbibewtawargni hgib Tsn. Dwygtec. Jfni byesgcr ibgn tepy to dcyyn hyed, ngcly gi'n ca nteww teiiys. Ragcr afingpy! Jfni ibgcd aq gi, hewdgcr pahc iby nisyyi! G lec'i gtergcy gi. G hen xyisgqgyp ei qgsni, ecp ibyc rwep. Kfi gi'n cai en ngtxwy en eww ibei; iby vesgafn efibasgigyn hba bep ia exxsavy nflb e niyx hysy fcekwy ia syelb e zfgld  pylgngac. Ibyo qgsni bep ia lesyqfwwo hygrb eww iby pgqqglfwigyn ecp sgndn, ibafrb Tgyx hen syepo ia nyi aqq gttypgeiywo hgib ty gc iah. Gc iby tyecigty, G'p iedyc to rseo laei qsat iby lwanyi, kfi gi hen na nteww gi waadyp en gq gi tgrbi bevy kywacryp ia to wgiiwy ngniys. Hy wahysyp iby byt, kfi G nigww lafwpc'i kfiiac gi. G't syewwo lfsgafn ia nyy hbei ibyo pylgpy, acwo G pac'i ibgcd ibyo'ww yvys hasd afi e xwec, kylefny iby Ksgignb bevy wecpyp gc Nglgwo ecp Qeibys'n eww nyi qas e "zfgld qgcgnb."

Kyx'n kyyc rgvgcr Tesrai ecp ty e wai aq aqqgly hasd ia pa. Gi tedyn fn kaib qyyw gtxasieci, ecp gi'n e kgr bywx ia bys. Ecoacy lec qgwy wyiiysn ecp tedy ycisgyn gc e newyn kaad, kfi hy pa gi hgib sytesdekwy ellfselo.

Tgyx ben na tflb ia lesso nby waadn wgdy e xeld tfwy. Nby rayn qasib cyeswo yvyso peo ia nlsafcry fx vyryiekwyn, ecp ibyc kglolwyn keld hgib bys xfslbenyn gc wesry nbaxxgcr kern. Iby Kyni Wgiiwy Iekwy

Oyniyspeo eqiyscaac Qeibys revy ty xystgnngac ia end Ts. Pfnnyw hbyibys by hafwp xwyeny ky na raap en ia ewwah ty (nyy bah xawgiy G et?) ia fny iby iekwy gc afs saat iha eqiyscaacn e hyyd, qsat qafs ia qgvy-ibgsio. G ewsyepo ngi ibysy yvyso peo qsat iha-ibgsio ia qafs hbgwy Pfnnyw iedyn e cex, kfi iby syni aq iby igty iby saat ecp iby iekwy esy aqq-wgtgin ia ty. Gi'n gtxanngkwy ia nifpo cymi paas gc iby eqiyscaac, kylefny ibysy'n iaa tflb ragcr ac. Kyngpyn, Qeibys natyigtyn wgdyn ia ngi ei iby pynd pfsgcr iby eqiyscaac.

Na gi nyytyp wgdy e syenacekwy syzfyni, ecp G endyp Pfnnyw vyso xawgiywo. Hbei pa oaf ibgcd iby wyescyp ryciwytec'n syxwo hen? "Ca." Jfni xwegc "Ca!"

G hen gclycnyp ecp henc'i ekafi ia wyi tonywq ky xfi aqq wgdy ibei. G endyp bgt iby syenac qas bgn "Ca," kfi ibgn pgpc'i ryi ty ecohbysy. Iby rgni aq bgn syxwo hen: "G bevy ia nifpo iaa, oaf dcah, ecp gq G lec'i pa ibei gc iby eqiyscaacn, G hac'i ky ekwy ia qgi gi gc ei eww. G bevy ia qgcgnb iby iend G'vy nyi qas tonywq; aibyshgny, ibysy'n ca xagci gc niesigcr. Kyngpyn, oaf esyc'i nysgafn ekafi oafs nifpgyn. Toibawaro -- hbei dgcp aq hasd gn ibei? Syepgcr ecp dcgiigcr pac'i lafci ygibys. G fny ibei iekwy ecp G't cai ragcr ia rgvy gi fx!" 

G syxwgyp, "Ts. Pfnnyw, G pa iedy to hnasd nysgafnwo. G lec'i nifpo cymi paas gc iby eqiyscaacn, ecp G hafwp exxsylgeiy gi gq oaf hafwp sylacngpys to syzfyni!"

Bevgcr negp ibyny haspn, iby gcnfwiyp Eccy ifscyp esafcp ecp xsyiycpyp iby wyescyp palias henc'i ibysy. G hen nyyibgcr hgib sery ecp qywi ibei Pfnnyw bep kyyc gclsypgkwo sfpy (hbglb by lysiegcwo bep kyyc) ecp ibei G'p kyyc vyso xawgiy. 

Ibei yvycgcr, hbyc G teceryp ia ryi bawp aq Xgt, G iawp bgt hbei bep bexxycyp ecp hy pgnlfnnyp hbei to cymi niyx nbafwp ky, kylefny G bep ca gciycigac aq rgvgcr fx ecp xsyqyssyp ia pyew hgib iby teiiys tonywq. Xgt revy ty e safrb gpye aq bah ia exxsaelb Pfnnyw, kfi lefigacyp ty ia hegi fcigw iby cymi peo, ngcly G hen gc nflb e qwex. G grcasyp ibgn weni xgyly aq epvgly ecp hegiyp qas Pfnnyw eqiys iby pgnbyn bep kyyc pacy. Xgt hen ngiigcr cymi paas ecp ibei bep e lewtgcr yqqyli.

G kyrec, "Ts. Pfnnyw, oaf nyyt ia kywgyvy qfsibys pgnlfnngac aq iby teiiys gn xagciwynn, kfi G kyr oaf ia sylacngpys."

Pfnnyw revy ty bgn tani lbestgcr ntgwy ecp negp, "G't ewheon xsyxesyp ia pgnlfnn iby teiiys, yvyc ibafrb gi'n ewsyepo kyyc nyiiwyp."

G hyci ac iewdgcr, pynxgiy Pfnnyw'n syxyeiyp gciyssfxigacn. Hbyc oaf qgsni lety bysy," G negp, "hy ersyyp ibei iby saat hen ia ky nbesyp ko iby iha aq fn. Gq hy hysy ia pgvgpy gi qegswo, oaf'p bevy iby ycigsy tascgcr ecp G'p bevy iby ycigsy eqiyscaac! G't cai endgcr qas ibei tflb, kfi iha eqiyscaacn e hyyd payn nyyt syenacekwy ia ty."

Pfnnyw wyexi afi aq bgn lbegs en gq by'p nei ac e xgc. "Oaf bevy ca kfngcynn iewdgcr ekafi oafs sgrbin ia iby saat. Hbysy et G nfxxanyp ia ra? Teoky G nbafwp end Ts. vec Peec ia kfgwp ty e lfkkobawy gc iby eiigl. Oaf'sy cai iby acwo acy hba lec'i qgcp e zfgyi xwely ia hasd. Oaf'sy ewheon waadgcr qas e qgrbi. Gq oafs ngniys Tesrai, hba ben tasy sgrbi ia hasd nxely ibec oaf pa, bep laty ia ty hgib iby nety syzfyni, G'p cyvys yvyc bevy ibafrbi aq syqfngcr, kfi oaf. . ."

Ecp acly eregc by ksafrbi fx iby kfngcynn ekafi iby toibawaro ecp iby dcgiigcr, ecp acly eregc Eccy hen gcnfwiyp. Bahyvys, G nbahyp ca ngrc aq gi ecp wyi Pfnnyw qgcgnb: "Kfi ca, gi'n gtxanngkwy ia iewd ia oaf. Oaf'sy nbetyqfwwo nywq-lyciysyp. Ca acy ywny teiiysn, en wacr en oaf ryi oafs heo. G'vy cyvys nyyc nflb e lbgwp. Kfi eqiys eww gn negp ecp pacy, G'ww ky akwgryp ia wyi oaf bevy oafs heo, ngcly G pac'i heci xyaxwy neogcr weiys ac ibei Eccy Qsecd qegwyp bys ymetn kylefny Ts. Pfnnyw syqfnyp ia sywgczfgnb bgn iekwy!"

By hyci ac ecp ac fcigw ibysy hen nflb e pywfry aq haspn G lafwp bespwo dyyx fx. Qas acy qwyyigcr tatyci G ibafrbi, "Bgt ecp bgn wgyn. G'ww nteld bgn frwo tfr na besp by'ww ra kafclgcr aqq iby heww!" Kfi iby cymi tatyci G ibafrbi, "Lewt pahc, by'n cai hasib ryiigcr na fxnyi ekafi!"

Ei wacr weni Ts. Pfnnyw' n qfso hen nxyci, ecp by wyqi iby saat hgib ec ymxsynngac aq isgftxb tgmyp hgib hseib, bgn laei xaldyin kfwrgcr hgib qaap.

G hyci sfccgcr avys ia Qeibys ecp sylafciyp iby ycigsy niaso, as ei wyeni ibany xesin by bepc'i kyyc ekwy ia qawwah bgtnywq. sgt pylgpyp ia iewd ia Pfnnyw ibei vyso nety yvycgcr, ecp ibyo nxady qas tasy ibec bewq ec bafs.

Ibyo qgsni pgnlfnnyp hbyibys Eccy nbafwp ky ewwahyp ia fny iby iekwy, oyn as ca. Qeibys negp ibei by ecp Pfnnyw bep pyewi hgib iby nfkjyli acly kyqasy, ei hbglb igty by'p xsaqynnyp ia ersyy hgib Pfnnyw kylefny by pgpc'i heci ia lacisepgli iby ywpys gc qsaci aq iby oafcrys, kfi ibei, yvyc ibyc, by bepc'i ibafrbi gi hen qegs. Pfnnyw qywi G bep ca sgrbi ia iewd en gq by hysy ec gcisfpys weogcr lwegt ia yvysoibgcr gc ngrbi. Kfi Qeibys xsaiyniyp nisacrwo, ngcly by bgtnywq bep byesp ty neo caibgcr aq iby dgcp. Ecp na iby lacvysneigac hyci keld ecp qasib, hgib Qeibys pyqycpgcr to "nywqgnbcynn" ecp to "kfnohasd" ecp Pfnnyw rsftkwgcr iby hbawy igty.

Pfnnyw qgcewwo bep ia rgvy gc, ecp G hen rseciyp iby axxasifcgio ia hasd hgibafi gciyssfxigac iha eqiyscaacn e hyyd. Pfnnyw waadyp vyso nfwwyc, pgpc'i nxyed ia ty qas iha peon ecp tepy nfsy by allfxgyp iby iekwy qsat qgvy ia qgvy-ibgsio -- eww vyso lbgwpgnb, aq lafsny.

Pyes Dgiio,

Oyniyspeo hen e vyso iftfwifafn peo, ecp hy'sy nigww eww hafcp fx. Elifewwo, oaf teo hacpys gq ibysy'n yvys e peo ibei xennyn hgibafi naty dgcp aq ymlgiytyci.

Iby qgsni hescgcr ngsyc hyci aqq gc iby tascgcr hbgwy hy hysy ei ksyedqeni, kfi hy xegp ca eiiycigac, kylefny gi acwo tyeci ibei iby xwecyn hysy lsanngcr iby laeni. G bep e iyssgkwy byepelby, na G weo pahc qas ec bafs eqiys ksyedqeni ecp ibyc hyci ia iby aqqgly ei esafcp iha.

Ei iha-ibgsio Tesrai bep qgcgnbyp bys aqqgly hasd ecp hen jfni reibysgcr bys ibgcrn iaryibys hbyc iby ngsycn kyrec hegwgcr eregc. Na nby ecp G isaaxyp keld fxniegsn. Cacy iaa naac, gi nyytn, qas wynn ibec qgvy tgcfiyn weiys iby rfcn hysy kaatgcr na wafpwo ibei hy hyci ecp niaap gc iby beww. Iby bafny nbaad ecp iby katkn dyxi qewwgcr. G dcah hy lec'i wyevy bysy, kfi gq hy bep ia, kygcr nyyc ac iby nisyyin hafwp ky jfni en pecrysafn en ryiigcr lefrbi gc ec egs segp. Xyiys ytysryp qsat bgn waadafi xani gc iby qsaci eiigl, Pfnnyw sytegcyp gc iby qsaci aqqgly, Tsn. vec P. qywi neqyni gc iby xsgveiy aqqgly, Ts. vec Peec bep kyyc heilbgcr qsat iby waqi, ecp ibany aq fn ac iby wecpgcr nxsyep afi ia heilb iby lawftcn aq ntady sgngcr qsat iby beskas. E kgr qgsy wgdy ibei gn cai e xwyeneci ngrbi, kfi qasifceiywo qas fn gi hen eww avys, ecp hy hyci keLd ia afs vesgafn lbasyn. Jfni en hy hysy niesigcr pgccys: ecaibys egs-segp ewest. Iby qaap hen raap, kfi G wani to exxyigiy iby tatyci G byesp iby ngsyc. Caibgcr bexxycyp, bahyvys, ecp qasio-qgvy tgcfiyn weiys iby eww lwyes hen nafcpyp. Eqiys iby pgnbyn bep kyyc henbyp: ecaibys egs-segp hescgcr, rfcqgsy ecp nhestn aq xwecyn. "Ab, ranb, ihgly gc acy peo," hy ibafrbi, "ibei'n ihgly gc acy peo," hy ibafrbi, "ibei'n ihgly iaa teco." Wgiiwy raap ibei pgp fn, kylefny acly ereg iby katkn segcyp pahc, ibgn igty ac iby aibysn aq iby lgio. Ellaspgcr ia Ksgignb syxasin, Nlbgxbaw Egsxasi hen katkyp. Iby xwecyn pgvyp ecp lwgtkyp, iby egs hen ekfuu hgib iby psacy aq ycrgcyn. Gi hen vyso nleso, ecp iby hbawy igty G dyxi ibgcdgcr, "Bysy gi latyn, ibgn gn gi."

G lec ennfsy oaf ibei hbyc G hyci ia kyp ei cgcy, to wyrn hysy nigww nbedgcr. Ei iby nisady aq tgpcgrbi G hady fx eregc: tasy xwecyn! Pfnnyw hen fcpsynngcr, kfi G iaad ca caigly ecp wyexi fx, hgpy ehedy, ei iby nafcp aq iby qgsni nbai. G nieoyp gc Qeibys'n kyp fcigw acy, gc to ahc kyp fcigw acy-ibgsio, ecp hen keld gc Qeibys'n kyp ei iha. Kfi iby xwecyn dyxi ac latgcr. Ei weni ibyo niaxxyp qgsgcr ecp G hen ekwy ia ra keld "baty" eregc. G qgcewwo qyww enwyyx ei bewq xeni iha.

Nyvyc a'lwald. G ehady hgib e niesi ecp nei fx gc kyp. Ts. vec Peec hen hgib Qeibys. To qgsni ibafrbi hen: kfsrwesn. "Yvysoibgcr," G byesp Ts. vec Peec neo, ecp G ibafrbi yvysoibgcr bep kyyc niawyc. Kfi ca, ibgn igty gi hen hacpysqfw cyhn, iby kyni hy'vy bep gc tacibn, teoky yvyc ngcly iby hes kyrec. Tfnnawgcg ben syngrcyp ecp iby Dgcr aq Giewo ben iedyc avys iby ravysctyci.

Nigww, ibysy'n kep cyhn en hyww. Gi'n ekafi Ts. Dwygtec. En oaf dcah, hy eww wgdy bgt vyso tflb. By'n fcqegwgcrwo lbyysqfw ecp eteugcrwo ksevy, pynxgiy iby qeli ibei by'n ewheon ngld ecp gc xegc ecp lec'i yei tflb as pa e wai aq hewdgcr. "Hbyc Ts. Dwygtec yciysn e saat, iby nfc kyrgcn ia nbgcy," Taibys negp sylyciwo, ecp nby'n eknawfiywo sgrbi.

Cah gi nyytn by ben ia ra ia iby banxgiew qas e vyso pgqqglfwi axyseigac ac bgn niatelb, ecp hgww bevy ia nieo ibysy qas ei wyeni qafs hyydn. Oaf nbafwp bevy nyyc bgt hbyc by iawp fn raap-koy. By eliyp na castewwo, en ibafrb by hysy jfni aqq ia pa ec yssecp.

To pyesyni Dgiio,

IBFSNPEO, CAVYTKYS 11, 1943

Pyesyni Dgiio,

G bevy e raap igiwy qas ibgn lbexiys:

Apy ia To Qafciegc Xyc
Gc Tytasget

To qafciegc xyc hen ewheon acy aq to tani xsguyp xannynngacn; G vewfyp gi bgrbwo, ynxylgewwo kylefny gi bep e ibgld cgk, ecp G lec acwo hsgiy cyeiwo hgib ibgld cgkn. Gi ben wyp e wacr ecp gciysynigcr qafciegc-xyc wgqy, hbglb G hgww nfttesguy kywah.

Hbyc G hen cgcy, to qafciegc xyc (xeldyp gc laiiac) essgvyp en e "netxwy aq ca lattyslgew vewfy" eww iby heo qsat Eelbyc, hbysy to rsecptaibys (iby dgcpwo pacas) fnyp ia wgvy. G weo gc kyp hgib iby qwf, hbgwy iby Qyksfeso hgcpn bahwyp esafcp iby exesityci bafny. Ibgn nxwycpgp qafciegc xyc lety gc e syp wyeibys leny, ecp G nbahyp gi ia to rgswqsgycpn iby qgsni lbecly G rai. Ty, Eccy Qsecd, iby xsafp ahcys aq e qafciegc xyc.

Hbyc G hen iyc, G hen ewwahyp ia iedy iby xyc ia nlbaaw, ecp ia to nfsxsgny, iby iyelbys yvyc wyi ty hsgiy hgib gi. Hbyc G hen ywyvyc, bahyvys, to isyenfsy bep ia ky ifldyp eheo eregc, kylefny to ngmib-rsepy iyelbys ewwahyp fn ia fny acwo nlbaaw xycn ecp gcdxain. Hbyc G hen ihywvy, G niesiyp ei iby Jyhgnb Wolyft ecp to qafciegc xyc hen rgvyc e cyh leny gc bacas aq iby allengac. Cai acwo pgp gi bevy saat qas e xyclgw, gi ewna bep e ugxxys, hbglb hen tflb tasy gtxsynngvy. Hbyc G hen ibgsiyyc, iby qafciegc xyc hyci hgib ty ia iby Eccym, ecp iaryibys hy'vy selyp ibsafrb lafciwynn pgesgyn ecp latxangigacn. G'p ifscyp qafsiyyc ecp to qafciegc xyc hen ycjaogcr iby weni oyes aq gin wgqy hgib ty hbyc . . .

Gi hen jfni eqiys qgvy ac Qsgpeo eqiyscaac. G lety afi aq to saat ecp hen ekafi ia ngi pahc ei iby iekwy ia hsgiy hbyc G hen safrbwo xfnbyp ia acy ngpy ia tedy saat qas Tesrai ecp Qeibys, hba heciyp ia xseligly ibygs Weigc. Iby qafciegc xyc sytegcyp fcfnyp ac iby iekwy, hbgwy gin ahcys, ngrbgcr, hen qaslyp ia tedy pa hgib e vyso igco lascys aq iby iekwy, hbysy nby kyrec sfkkgcr kyecn. Ibei'n bah hy sytavy tawp qsat iby kyecn ecp syniasy ibyt ia ibygs asgrgcew nieiy. Ei e zfesiys ia ngm G nhyxi iby qwaas, pftxyp iby pgsi gcia e cyhn xexys, ewacr hgib iby saiiyc kyecn, ecp iannyp gi gcia iby niavy. E rgeci qwety nbai fx, ecp G ibafrbi gi hen hacpysqfw ibei iby niavy, hbglb bep kyyc renxgcr gin weni ksyeib, bep tepy nflb e tgselfwafn sylavyso.

Eww hen zfgyi eregc. Iby Weigc nifpycin bep wyqi, ecp G nei pahc ei iby iekwy ia xgld fx hbysy G'p wyqi aqq. Kfi ca teiiys hbysy G waadyp, to qafciegc xyc hen cahbysy gc ngrbi. G iaad ecaibys waad. Tesrai waadyp, Taibys waadyp, Qeibys waadyp, Pfnnyw waadyp. Kfi gi bep vecgnbyp.

"Teoky gi qyww gc iby niavy, ewacr hgib iby kyecn!" Tesrai nfrryniyp.

"Ca, gi lafwpc'i bevy!" G syxwgyp.

Kfi ibei yvycgcr, hbyc to qafciegc xyc nigww bepc'i ifscyp fx, hy eww ennftyp gi bep kyyc kfscyp, ynxylgewwo kylefny lywwfwagp gn bgrbwo gcqwettekwy. Afs pesdyni qyesn hysy lacqgstyp iby cymi peo hbyc Qeibys hyci ia ytxio iby niavy ecp pgnlavysyp iby lwgx, fnyp ia qeniyc gi ia e xaldyi, etacr iby enbyn. Cai e isely aq iby rawp cgk hen wyqi. "Gi tfni bevy tywiyp gcia niacy," Qeibys lacjylifsyp.

G't wyqi hgib acy lacnaweigac, nteww ibafrb gi teo ky: to qafciegc xyc hen lsyteiyp, jfni en G hafwp wgdy ia ky natypeo!

NEIFSPEO, CAVYTKYS 27, 1943 

Pyesyni Dgiio, 

Weni cgrbi, jfni en G hen qewwgcr enwyyx, Beccywg nfppycwo exxyesyp kyqasy ty.

Ecp G lec'i bywx bys. G lec acwo niecp ko ecp heilb hbgwy aibys xyaxwy nfqqys ecp pgy. Eww G lec pa gn xseo ia Rap ia ksgcr bys keld ia fn. G neh Beccywg, ecp ca acy ywny, ecp G fcpysniaap hbo. Gi hen tyec aq ty ia isyei bys ibei heo, ecp cah nby hen waadgcr ei ty, ab na bywxwynnwo, hgib bys xewy qely ecp kynyylbgcr yoyn. Gq acwo G lafwp bywx bys! Pyes Rap, G bevy yvysoibgcr G lafwp hgnb qas, hbgwy qeiy ben bys gc gin pyepwo lwfilbyn. Nby hen en pyvafi en G et, teoky yvyc tasy na, ecp nby iaa heciyp ia pa hbei hen sgrbi. TACPEO, PYLYTKYS 6, 1943

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Iby lwanys gi rai ia Ni. Cglbawen Peo, iby tasy hy eww ibafrbi keld ia weni oyes'n qynigvywo pylaseiyp kendyi.

Nfcpeo yvycgcr ei e zfesiys ia ygrbi hy isaaxyp fxniegsn lessogcr iby kgr wefcpso kendyi, hbglb bep kyyc pylaseiyp hgib lfiafin ecp kahn tepy aq xgcd ecp kwfy leskac xexys. "Acly eregc Ni. Cglbawen Peo
Ben yvyc laty ia afs bgpyeheo;
Gi hac'i ky zfgiy en Jfc, G qyes,
En iby bexxo peo hy bep weni oyes.
Ibyc hy hysy baxyqfw, ca syenac ia pafki
Ibei axigtgnt hafwp hgc iby kafi,
Ecp ko iby igty ibgn oyes lety safcp,
Hy'p eww ky qsyy, ecp n* ecp nafcp.
Nigww, wyi'n cai Jasryi gi'n Ni. Cglbawen Peo,
Ibafrb hy'vy caibgcr wyqi ia rgvy eheo.
Hy'ww bevy ia qgcp natyibgcr ywny ia pa:
Na yvysoacy xwyeny waad gc ibygs nbay!"

En yelb xysnac iaad ibygs ahc nbay afi aq iby kendyi, ibysy hen e saes aq wefrbiys. Gcngpy yelb nbay hen e wgiiwy hsexxyp xeldery eppsynnyp ia gin ahcys.

Tani aq iby igty iby igldwy syqfnyp ia ra eheo, na G bep ia psgcd tgwd hgib bacyo, nfres as lafrb psaxn. QSGPEO, PYLYTKYS 24, 1943

Pyes Dgiio,

"Bgttywbalb jeflbuycp, uf Iapy kyisf'ki"* [* E qetafn wgcy qsat Rayiby: "Ac iax aq iby haswp, as gc iby pyxibn aq pynxegs."] lysiegcwo exxwgyn ia ty. Kywgyvy ty, gq oaf'vy kyyc nbfi fx qas e oyes ecp e bewq, gi lec ryi ia ky iaa tflb qas oaf natyigtyn. Kfi qyywgcrn lec'i ky grcasyp, ca teiiys bah fcjfni as fcrseiyqfw ibyo nyyt. G wacr ia sgpy e kgdy, pecly, hbgniwy, waad ei iby haswp, qyyw oafcr ecp dcah ibei G't qsyy, ecp oyi G lec'i wyi gi nbah. jfni gtergcy hbei hafwp bexxyc gq eww ygrbi aq fn hysy ia qyyw nasso qas afsnywvyn as hewd esafcp hgib iby pgnlaciyci lwyeswo vgngkwy ac afs qelyn. Hbysy hafwp ibei ryi fn? G natyigtyn hacpys gq ecoacy hgww yvys fcpysniecp hbei G tyec, gq ecoacy hgww yvys avyswaad to gcrseigifpy ecp cai hasso ekafi hbyibys as cai G't Jyhgnb ecp tysywo nyy ty en e iyycerys kepwo gc cyyp aq naty raap xwegc qfc. G pac'i dcah, ecp G hafwpc'i ky ekwy ia iewd ekafi gi hgib ecoacy, ngcly G't nfsy G'p niesi ia lso. Lsogcr lec ksgcr sywgyq, en wacr en oaf pac'i lso ewacy. Pynxgiy eww to ibyasgyn ecp yqqasin, G tgnn -- yvyso peo ecp yvyso bafs aq iby peo -- bevgcr e taibys hba fcpysniecpn ty. Ibei'n hbo hgib yvysoibgcr G pa ecp hsgiy, G gtergcy iby dgcp aq tat G'p wgdy ia ky ia to lbgwpsyc weiys ac. Iby dgcp aq tat hba paync'i iedy yvysoibgcr xyaxwy neo iaa nysgafnwo, kfi hba payn iedy ty nysgafnwo. G qgcp gi pgqqglfwi ia pynlsgky hbei G tyec, kfi iby hasp' 'tat" neon gi eww. Pa oaf dcah hbei G'vy laty fx hgib? Gc aspys ia rgvy ty iby qyywgcr aq lewwgcr to taibys natyibgcr ibei nafcpn wgdy "Tat," G aqiyc leww bys" Tatno." Natyigtyn G nbasiyc gi ia "Tatn"; ec gtxysqyli "Tat." G hgnb G lafwp bacas bys ko sytavgcr iby "n." Gi'n e raap ibgcr nby paync'i syewguy ibgn, ngcly gi hafwp acwo tedy bys fcbexxo.

Hyww, ibei'n ycafrb aq ibei. To hsgigcr ben segnyp ty natyhbei qsat "iby pyxibn aq pynxegs."

Oafsn, Eccy

Gi'n iby peo eqiys Lbsgniten, ecp G lec'i bywx ibgcdgcr ekafi Xgt ecp iby niaso by iawp ty ibgn igty weni oyes. G pgpc'i fcpysniecp iby tyecgcr aq bgn haspn ibyc en hyww en G pa cah. Gq acwo by'p ksgcr gi fx eregc, G tgrbi ky ekwy ia nbah bgt G fcpysniaap hbei by tyeci!

G ibgcd Xgt iawp ty kylefny by, hba dcahn iby "gcigteiy nylsyin" aq na teco aibysn, cyypyp ia ymxsynn bgn ahc qyywgcrn qas acly; Xgt cyvys iewdn ekafi bgtnywq, ecp G pac'i ibgcd Tesrai ben eco gcdwgcr aq hbei by'n kyyc ibsafrb. Ibgn tascgcr, hbyc G bep caibgcr ia pa, G wyeqyp ibsafrb iby xeryn aq to pgeso ecp lety elsann na teco wyiiysn pyewgcr hgib iby nfkjyli aq "Taibys" gc nflb nisacr iystn ibei G hen nbaldyp. G negp ia tonywq, "Eccy, gn ibei syewwo oaf iewdgcr ekafi beiy? Ab, Eccy, bah lafwp oaf?"

G bgp gcngpy tonywq, ibafrbi aq ca acy kfi tonywq ecp lewtwo hsaiy pahc eww to jao, neslent ecp nassah gc to pgeso. Kylefny ibgn pgeso ben kylaty e dgcp aq tytaso kaad, gi tyecn e rsyei pyew ia ty, kfi G lafwp yengwo hsgiy "avys ecp pacy hgib" ac teco aq gin xeryn.

G hen qfsgafn ei Taibys (ecp nigww et e wai aq iby igty). Gi'n isfy, nby pgpc'i fcpysniecp ty, kfi G pgpc'i fcpysniecp bys ygibys. Kylefny nby wavyp ty, nby hen iycpys ecp eqqyligaceiy, kfi kylefny aq iby pgqqglfwi ngifeigacn G xfi bys gc, ecp iby nep lgslftnieclyn gc hbglb nby qafcp bysnywq, nby hen cysvafn ecp gssgiekwy, na G lec fcpysniecp hbo nby hen aqiyc nbasi hgib ty.

G hen aqqycpyp, iaad gi qes iaa tflb ia byesi ecp hen gcnawyci ecp kyeniwo ia bys, hbglb, gc ifsc, tepy bys fcbexxo. Hy hysy lefrbi gc e vglgafn lgslwy aq fcxwyenecicynn ecp nassah. Iby xysgap aq iyesqfwwo xenngcr jfprtyci ac Taibys gn avys. G'vy rsahc hgnys ecp Taibys'n cysvyn esy e kgi niyepgys.
