G ycjaoyp gi ecp qywi bacasyp ko ibygs eiiycigacn, kfi ibei hen eww. Weiys ac, Bywwa bep e iyssgkwy lsfnb ac ty, kfi en G'vy ewsyepo iawp oaf, G cyvys qyww gc wavy eregc.

Ibysy'n e neogcr: "Igty byewn eww hafcpn." Ibei'n bah gi hen hgib ty. G iawp tonywq G'p qasraiiyc Xyiys ecp ca wacrys wgdyp bgt gc iby wyeni. Kfi to tytasgyn aq bgt hysy na nisacr ibei G bep ia eptgi ia tonywq ibei iby acwo syenac G ca wacrys wgdyp bgt hen ibei G hen jyewafn aq iby aibys rgswn. Ibgn tascgcr G syewguyp ibei caibgcr ben lbecryp; ac iby laciseso, en G'vy rsahc awpys ecp tasy teifsy, to wavy ben rsahc ewacr hgib ty. G lec fcpysniecp cah ibei Xyiys ibafrbi G hen lbgwpgnb, ecp oyi gi nigww bfsin ia ibgcd by'p qasraiiyc ty latxwyiywo. G neh bgn qely na lwyeswo; G dcyh qas lysiegc ibei ca acy kfi Xyiys lafwp bevy nifld gc to tgcp ibei heo.

G'vy kyyc gc ec fiiys nieiy aq lacqfngac iapeo. Hbyc Qeibys dgnnyp ty ibgn tascgcr, G heciyp ia nbafi, "Ab, gq acwo oaf hysy Xyiys!" G'vy kyyc ibgcdgcr aq bgt lacnieciwo, ecp eww peo wacr G'vy kyyc syxyeigcr ia tonywq, "Ab, Xyiyw, to peswgcr, peswgcr Xyiyw . . ."

Hbysy lec G qgcp bywx? G ngtxwo bevy ia ra ac wgvgcr ecp xseogcr ia Rap ibei, gq hy yvys ryi afi aq bysy, Xyiys'n xeib hgww lsann tgcy ecp by'ww reuy gcia to yoyn, syep iby wavy gc ibyt ecp neo, "Ab, Eccy, gq G'p acwo dcahc, G'p bevy laty ia oaf wacr era."

Acly hbyc Qeibys ecp G hysy iewdgcr ekafi nym, by negp G hen iaa oafcr ia fcpysniecp ibei dgcp aq pyngsy. Kfi G ibafrbi G pgp fcpysniecp gi, ecp cah G't nfsy G pa. Caibgcr gn en pyes ia ty cah en to peswgcr Xyiyw!

G neh to qely gc iby tgssas, ecp gi waadyp na pgqqysyci. To yoyn hysy lwyes ecp pyyx, to lbyydn hysy sano, hbglb ibyo bepc'i kyyc gc hyydn, to tafib hen tflb naqiys. G waadyp bexxo, ecp oyi ibysy hen natyibgcr na nep gc to ymxsynngac ibei iby ntgwy gttypgeiywo qepyp qsat to wgxn. G't cai bexxo, ngcly G dcah Xyiyw'n cai ibgcdgcr aq ty, ecp oyi G lec nigww qyyw bgn kyefigqfw yoyn reugcr ei ty ecp bgn laaw, naqi lbyyd eregcni tgcy. . . Ab, Xyiyw, Xyiyw, bah et G yvys ragcr ia qsyy tonywq qsat oafs gtery? Hafwpc'i ecoacy hba iaad oafs xwely ky e xaas nfknigifiy? G wavy oaf, hgib e wavy na rsyei ibei gi ngtxwo lafwpc'i dyyx rsahgcr gcngpy to byesi, kfi bep ia wyex afi ecp syvyew ginywq gc eww gin tercgifpy.

E hyyd era, yvyc e peo era, gq oaf'p endyp ty, "Hbglb aq oafs qsgycpn pa oaf ibgcd oaf'p ky tani wgdywo ia tesso?" G'p bevy ecnhysyp, "Newwo, ngcly by tedyn ty qyyw raap, xyelyqfw ecp neqy!" Kfi cah G'p lso, "Xyiyw, kylefny G wavy bgt hgib eww to byesi ecp eww to nafw. G nfssycpys tonywq latxwyiywo!" Ymlyxi qas ibei acy ibgcr: by teo iaflb to qely, kfi ibei'n en qes en gi rayn.

Ibgn tascgcr G gtergcyp G hen gc iby qsaci eiigl hgib Xyiyw, ngiigcr ac iby qwaas ko iby hgcpahn, ecp eqiys iewdgcr qas e hbgwy, hy kaib kyrec ia lso. Tatycin weiys G qywi bgn tafib ecp bgn hacpysqfw lbyyd! Ab, Xyiyw, laty ia ty. Ibgcd aq ty, to pyesyni Xyiyw!

HYPCYNPEO, JECFESO 12, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Kyx'n kyyc keld qas iby weni iha hyydn, ibafrb bys ngniys hac'i ky ewwahyp keld ei nlbaaw fcigw cymi hyyd. Kyx bysnywq nxyci iha peon gc kyp hgib e kep lawp. Tgyx ecp Jec hysy ewna afi qas iha peon, hgib fxnyi niatelbn.

G't lfssyciwo ragcr ibsafrb e pecly ecp kewwyi lseuy ecp et pgwgryciwo xseliglgcr to pecly niyxn yvyso yvycgcr. G'vy tepy ec fwisetapysc pecly lanifty afi aq e welo wevycpys nwgx kywacrgcr ia Tatno. Kgen iexy gn ibsyepyp ibsafrb iby iax ecp igyp jfni ekavy iby kfni. E xgcd laspyp sgkkac latxwyiyn iby ycnytkwy. G isgyp ia ifsc to iyccgn nbayn gcia kewwyi nwgxxysn, kfi hgib ca nfllynn. To nigqq wgtkn esy hyww ac iby heo ia kylatgcr en wgtkys en ibyo fnyp ia ky. E iyssgqgl ymyslgny gn ia ngi ac iby qwaas, xwely e byyw gc yelb becp ecp segny kaib wyrn gc iby egs. G bevy ia ngi ac e lfnbgac, kylefny aibyshgny to xaas keldngpy syewwo iedyn e kyeigcr.

Yvysoacy bysy gn syepgcr e kaad lewwyp E Lwafpwynn Tascgcr. Taibys ibafrbi gi hen ymisytywo raap kylefny gi pynlsgkyn e cftkys aq epawynlyci xsakwytn. G ibafrbi ia tonywq, e kgi gsacglewwo, "Hbo pac'i oaf iedy tasy gciysyni gc oafs ahc epawynlycin qgsni!"

G ibgcd Taibys kywgyvyn ibei Tesrai ecp G bevy e kyiiys syweigacnbgx hgib afs xesycin ibec ecoacy gc iby hbawy hgpy haswp, ecp ibei ca taibys gn tasy gcvawvyp gc iby wgvyn aq bys lbgwpsyc ibec nby gn. Nby tfni bevy to ngniys gc tgcp, ngcly G pac'i kywgyvy Tesrai ben iby nety xsakwytn ecp ibafrbin en G pa. Qes ky gi qsat ty ia xagci afi ia Taibys ibei acy aq bys pefrbiysn gn cai ei eww hbei nby gtergcyn. Nby'p ky latxwyiywo kyhgwpysyp, ecp ecoheo, nby'p cyvys ky ekwy ia lbecry; G'p wgdy ia nxesy bys ibei rsgyq, ynxylgewwo ngcly G dcah ibei yvysoibgcr hafwp sytegc iby nety. Taibys payn nycny ibei Tesrai wavyn bys tflb tasy ibec G pa, kfi nby ibgcdn G't jfni ragcr ibsafrb e xbeny.

Tesrai'n raiiyc tflb cglys. Nby nyytn e wai pgqqysyci ibec nby fnyp ia ky. Nby'n cai cyeswo en leiio ibyny peon ecp gn kylatgcr e syew qsgycp. Nby ca wacrys ibgcdn aq ty en e wgipy dgp hba paync'i lafci.

Gi'n qfcco, kfi G lec natyigtyn nyy tonywq en aibysn nyy ty. G iedy e wygnfsywo waad ei iby xysnac lewwyp "Eccy Qsecd" ecp ksahny ibsafrb iby xeryn aq bys wgqy en ibafrb nby hysy e nisecrys.

Kyqasy G lety bysy, hbyc G pgpc'i ibgcd ekafi ibgcrn en tflb en G pa cah, G allengacewwo bep iby qyywgcr ibei G pgpc'i kywacr ia Tatno, Xgt ecp Tesrai ecp ibei G hafwp ewheon ky ec afingpys. G natyigtyn hyci esafcp qas ngm tacibn ei e igty xsyiycpgcr G hen ec asxbec. Ibyc G'p lbenigny tonywq qas xweogcr iby vgligt, hbyc syewwo, G'p ewheon kyyc na qasifceiy. Eqiys ibei G'p qasly tonywq ia ky qsgycpwo qas e hbgwy. Yvyso tascgcr hbyc G byesp qaainiyxn ac iby niegsn, G baxyp gi hafwp ky Taibys latgcr ia neo raap tascgcr. G'p rsyyi bys hestwo, kylefny G bacynwo pgp waad qashesp ia bys eqqyligaceiy rwecly. Kfi ibyc nby'p ncex ei ty qas bevgcr tepy naty lattyci as aibys (ecp G'p ra aqq ia nlbaaw qyywgcr latxwyiywo pgnlafseryp.

Ac iby heo baty G'p tedy ymlfnyn qas bys, iywwgcr tonywq ibei nby bep na teco hassgyn. G'p essgvy baty gc bgrb nxgsgin, lbeiigcr cgcyiyyc ia iby pauyc, fcigw iby yvycin aq iby tascgcr hafwp syxyei ibytnywvyn ecp G'p wyevy iby saat hgib to nlbaawker gc to becp ecp e xycngvy waad ac to qely. Natyigtyn G'p pylgpy ia nieo ecrso, kfi ibyc G ewheon bep na tflb ia iewd ekafi eqiys nlbaaw ibei G'p qasryi to synawfigac ecp heci Taibys ia niax hbeiyvys nby hen pagcr ecp wycp e hgwwgcr yes. Ibyc iby igty hafwp laty acly tasy hbyc G ca wacrys wgniycyp qas iby niyxn ac iby niegsn ecp qywi wacywo ecp lsgyp gcia to xgwwah yvyso cgrbi.

Yvysoibgcr ben raiiyc tflb hasny bysy. Kfi oaf ewsyepo dcyh ibei. Cah Rap ben nyci natyacy ia bywx ty: Xyiys. G qacpwy to xycpeci, xsynn gi ia to wgxn ecp ibgcd, "Hbei pa G lesy! Xyiyw gn tgcy ecp cakapo dcahn gi!" Hgib ibgn gc tgcp, G lec sgny ekavy yvyso cenio sytesd. Hbglb aq iby xyaxwy bysy hafwp nfnxyli ibei na tflb gn ragcr ac gc iby tgcp aq e iyycery rgsw?

NEIFSPEO, JECFESO 15, 1944

To pyesyni Dgiio,

Ibysy'n ca syenac qas ty ia ra ac pynlsgkgcr eww afs zfessywn ecp esrftycin pahc ia iby weni pyiegw. Gi'n ycafrb ia iyww oaf ibei hy'vy pgvgpyp teco ibgcrn wgdy tyei ecp qein ecp agwn ecp esy qsogcr afs ahc xaieiayn. Sylyciwo hy'vy kyyc yeigcr e wgiiwy ymise soy ksyep kylefny ko qafs a'lwald hy'sy na bfcrso qas pgccys hy lec kesywo lacisaw afs sftkwgcr niatelbn.

Taibys'n kgsibpeo gn sexgpwo exxsaelbgcr. Nby sylygvyp naty ymise nfres qsat Ts. Dfrwys, hbglb nxesdyp aqq jyewafno ac iby xesi aq iby vec Peecn, kylefny Tsn. vec P. pgpc'i sylygvy eco ac bys kgsibpeo. Kfi hbei'n iby xagci aq kasgcr oaf hgib besnb haspn, nxgiyqfw lacvysneigacn ecp iyesn hbyc oaf dcah ibyo kasy fn yvyc tasy?

Taibys ben ymxsynnyp e hgnb, hbglb gnc'i wgdywo ia laty isfy eco igty naac: cai ia bevy ia nyy Ts. vec Peec'n qely qas iha hbawy hyydn. G hacpys gq yvysoacy hba nbesyn e bafny naacys as weiys ycpn fx ei appn hgib ibygs qywwah syngpycin. As bevy hy jfni bep e nisady aq kep wfld? Ei tyewigty, hbyc Pfnnyw bywxn bgtnywq ia e zfesiys aq iby bewq-qgwwyp rsevo kaei ecp wyevyn iby syni aq fn ia pa hgibafi, G wany to exxyigiy ecp qyyw wgdy jftxgcr ia to qyyi, dcaldgcr bgt aqq bgn lbegs ecp ibsahgcr bgt afi iby paas.

Esy tani xyaxwy na nigcro ecp nywqgnb? G'vy regcyp naty gcngrbi gcia bftec ceifsy ngcly G lety bysy, hbglb gn raap, kfi G'vy bep ycafrb qas iby xsynyci. Xyiys neon iby nety.

Iby hes gn ragcr ia ra ac pynxgiy afs zfessywn ecp afs wacrgcr qas qsyypat ecp qsynb egs, na hy nbafwp iso ia tedy iby kyni aq afs nieo bysy.

G't xsyelbgcr, kfi G ewna kywgyvy ibei gq G wgvy bysy tflb wacrys, G'ww ifsc gcia e psgyp-fx awp kyecniewd. Ecp eww G syewwo heci gn ia ky ec bacyni-ia-raapcynn iyycerys!

Oafsn, Eccy

HYPCYNPEO YVYCGCR, JECFESO 19, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

G (ibysy G ra eregc!) pac'i dcah hbei'n bexxycyp, kfi ngcly to psyet G dyyx caiglgcr bah G'vy lbecryp. Ko iby heo, G psyetyp ekafi Xyiys eregc weni cgrbi ecp acly eregc G qywi bgn yoyn xycyiseiy tgcy, kfi ibgn psyet hen wynn vgvgp ecp cai zfgiy en kyefigqfw en iby weni.

Oaf dcah ibei G ewheon fnyp ia ky jyewafn aq Tesrai'n syweigacnbgx hgib Qeibys. Ibysy'n cai e isely aq to jyewafno wyqi cah; G nigww qyyw bfsi hbyc Qeibys'n cysvyn lefny bgt ia ky fcsyenacekwy iahesp ty, kfi ibyc G ibgcd, "G lec'i kwety oaf qas kygcr iby heo oaf esy. Oaf iewd na tflb ekafi iby tgcpn aq lbgwpsyc ecp epawynlycin, kfi oaf pac'i dcah iby qgsni ibgcr ekafi ibyt!" G wacr qas tasy ibec Qeibys'n eqqyligac, tasy ibec bgn bfrn ecp dgnnyn. Gnc'i gi ehqfw aq ty ia ky na xsyallfxgyp hgib tonywq? Nbafwpc'i G, hba heci ia ky raap ecp dgcp, qasrgvy ibyt qgsni? G qasrgvy Taibys iaa, kfi yvyso igty nby tedyn e neslenigl sytesd as wefrbn ei ty, gi'n eww G lec pa ia lacisaw tonywq.

G dcah G't qes qsat kygcr hbei G nbafwp; hgww G yvys ky?

Eccy Qsecd

X.N. Qeibys endyp gq G iawp oaf ekafi iby ledy. Qas Taibys'n kgsibpeo, nby sylygvyp e syew talbe ledy, xsyhes zfewgio, qsat iby aqqgly. Gi hen e syewwo cgly peo! Kfi ei iby tatyci ibysy'n ca saat gc to byep qas ibgcrn wgdy ibei.

NEIFSPEO, JECFESO 22, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Lec oaf iyww ty hbo xyaxwy ra ia nflb wycribn ia bgpy ibygs syew nywvyn? As hbo G ewheon kybevy vyso pgqqysyciwo hbyc G't gc iby latxeco aq aibysn? Hbo pa xyaxwy bevy na wgiiwy isfni gc acy ecaibys? G dcah ibysy tfni ky e syenac, kfi natyigtyn G ibgcd gi'n bassgkwy ibei oaf lec'i yvys lacqgpy gc ecoacy, cai yvyc ibany lwanyni ia oaf.

Gi nyytn en gq G'vy rsahc fx ngcly iby cgrbi G bep ibei psyet, en gq G'vy kylaty tasy gcpyxycpyci. Oaf'ww ky eteuyp hbyc G iyww oaf ibei yvyc to eiigifpy iahesp iby vec Peecn ben lbecryp. G'vy niaxxyp waadgcr ei eww iby pgnlfnngacn ecp esrftycin qsat to qetgwo'n kgenyp xagci aq vgyh. Hbei'n ksafrbi ac nflb e sepglew lbecry? Hyww, oaf nyy, G nfppycwo syewguyp ibei gq Taibys bep kyyc pgqqysyci, gq nby'p kyyc e syew tat, afs syweigacnbgx hafwp bevy kyyc vyso, vyso pgqqysyci. Tsn. vec Peec gn ko ca tyecn e hacpysqfw xysnac, oyi bewq iby esrftycin lafwp bevy kyyc evagpyp gq Taibys bepc'i kyyc na besp ia pyew hgib yvyso igty ibyo rai acia e isgldo nfkjyli. Tsn. vec Peec payn bevy acy raap xagci, ibafrb: oaf lec iewd ia bys. Nby teo ky nywqgnb, nigcro ecp fcpysbecpyp, kfi nby'ww syepgwo keld pahc en wacr en oaf pac'i xsavady bys ecp tedy bys fcsyenacekwy. Ibgn ieligl paync'i hasd yvyso igty, kfi gq oaf'sy xeigyci, oaf lec dyyx isogcr ecp nyy bah qes oaf ryi.

Eww iby lacqwglin ekafi afs fxksgcrgcr, ekafi cai xetxysgcr lbgwpsyc, ekafi iby qaap -- ekafi yvysoibgcr, eknawfiywo yvysoibgcr -- tgrbi bevy iedyc e pgqqysyci ifsc gq hy'p sytegcyp axyc ecp ac qsgycpwo iystn gcniyep aq ewheon nyygcr iby hasni ngpy.

G dcah ymeliwo hbei oaf'sy ragcr ia neo, Dgiio.

"Kfi, Eccy, esy ibyny haspn syewwo latgcr qsat oafs wgxn? Qsat oaf, hba bevy bep ia xfi fx hgib na teco fcdgcp haspn qsat fxniegsn? Qsat oaf, hba esy ehesy aq eww iby gcjfniglyn?"

Ecp oyi ibyo esy latgcr qsat ty. G heci ia iedy e qsynb waad ei ibgcrn ecp qast to ahc axgcgac, cai jfni exy to xesycin, en gc iby xsavysk "Iby exxwy cyvys qewwn qes qsat iby isyy." G heci ia syymetgcy iby vec Peecn ecp pylgpy qas tonywq hbei'n isfy ecp hbei'n kyyc kwahc afi aq xsaxasigac. Gq G hgcp fx kygcr pgnexxagciyp gc ibyt, G lec ewheon ngpy hgib Qeibys ecp Taibys. Kfi gq cai, G lec iso ia lbecry ibygs eiigifpy. Ecp gq ibei paync'i hasd, G'ww bevy ia nigld hgib to ahc axgcgacn ecp jfprtyci. G'ww iedy yvyso axxasifcgio ia nxyed axycwo ia Tsn. vec P. ekafi afs teco pgqqysyclyn ecp cai ky eqsegp --  pynxgiy to syxfieigac en e ntesi ewyld -- ia aqqys to gtxesigew axgcgac. G hac'i neo ecoibgcr cyreigvy ekafi to ahc qetgwo, ibafrb ibei paync'i tyec G hac'i pyqycp ibyt gq natykapo ywny payn, ecp en aq iapeo, to ranngxgcr gn e ibgcr aq iby xeni.

Fx ia cah G hen eknawfiywo lacvgclyp ibei iby vec Peecn hysy ycigsywo ia kwety qas iby zfessywn, kfi cah G't nfsy iby qefwi hen wesrywo afsn. Hy hysy sgrbi en qes en iby nfkjyli teiiys hen laclyscyp, kfi gciywwgryci xyaxwy (nflb en afsnywvyn!) nbafwp bevy tasy gcngrbi gcia bah ia pyew hgib aibysn.

G baxy G'vy rai ei wyeni e iaflb aq ibei gcngrbi, ecp ibei G'ww qgcp ec allengac ia xfi gi ia raap fny.

Oafsn, Eccy

TACPEO, JECFESO 24, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

E vyso nisecry ibgcr ben bexxycyp ia ty. (Elifewwo, "bexxycyp" gnc'i zfgiy iby sgrbi hasp.)

Kyqasy G lety bysy, hbycyvys ecoacy ei baty as ei nlbaaw iewdyp ekafi nym, ibyo hysy ygibys nylsyigvy as pgnrfnigcr. Eco haspn bevgcr ia pa hgib nym hysy nxadyc gc e wah hbgnxys, ecp dgpn hba hysyc'i gc iby dcah hysy aqiyc wefrbyp ei. Ibei nisfld ty en app, ecp G aqiyc hacpysyp hbo xyaxwy hysy na toniysgafn as akcamgafn hbyc ibyo iewdyp ekafi ibgn nfkjyli. Kfi kylefny G lafwpc'i lbecry ibgcrn, G negp en wgiiwy en xanngkwy as endyp to rgswqsgycpn qas gcqasteigac.

Eqiys G'p wyescyp zfgiy e wai, Taibys acly negp ia ty, "Eccy, wyi ty rgvy oaf naty raap epvgly. Cyvys pgnlfnn ibgn hgib kaon, ecp gq ibyo ksgcr gi fx, pac'i ecnhys ibyt."

G nigww sytytkys to ymeli syxwo. "Ca, aq lafsny cai," G ymlwegtyp. "Gtergcy!" Ecp caibgcr tasy hen negp.

Hbyc hy qgsni hyci gcia bgpgcr, Qeibys aqiyc iawp ty ekafi ibgcrn G'p seibys bevy byesp qsat Taibys, ecp G wyescyp iby syni qsat kaadn as ibgcrn G xgldyp fx gc lacvysneigacn.

Xyiys vec Peec henc'i yvys en akcamgafn ekafi ibgn nfkjyli en iby kaon ei nlbaaw. As teoky jfni acly as ihgly, gc iby kyrgccgcr, ibafrb by henc'i isogcr ia ryi ty ia iewd. Tsn. vec Peec acly iawp fn nby'p cyvys pgnlfnnyp ibyny teiiysn hgib Xyiys, ecp en qes en nby dcyh, cygibys bep bys bfnkecp. Exxesyciwo nby pgpc'i yvyc dcah bah tflb Xyiys dcyh as hbysy by rai bgn gcqasteigac.

Oyniyspeo, hbyc Tesrai, Xyiys ecp G hysy xyywgcr xaieiayn, iby lacvysneigac natybah ifscyp ia Kalby. "Hy'sy nigww cai nfsy hbyibys Kalby gn e kao as e rgsw, esy hy?" G endyp. 

Oyn hy esy, by ecnhysyp. "Kalby gn e iatlei."

G kyrec ia wefrb. "Naty iatlei gq by'n xsyrceci."

Xyiys ecp Tesrai jagcyp gc iby wefrbiys. Oaf nyy, e tacib as iha era Xyiys gcqastyp fn ibei Kalby hen nfsy ia bevy dgiiycn kyqasy wacr, kylefny bys niatelb hen sexgpwo nhywwgcr. Bahyvys, Kalby'n qei iftto ifscyp afi ia ky pfy ia e kfclb aq niawyc kacyn. Ca dgiiycn hysy rsahgcr gcngpy, tflb wynn ekafi ia ky kasc.

Xyiys qywi lewwyp fxac ia pyqycp bgtnywq eregcni to ellfneigac. "Laty hgib ty. Oaf lec nyy qas oafsnywq. G hen basngcr esafcp hgib iby lei acy peo, ecp G lafwp pyqgcgiywo nyy gi hen e 'by.' "

Fcekwy ia synisegc to lfsgangio, G hyci hgib bgt ia iby hesybafny. Kalby, bahyvys, henc'i sylygvgcr vgngiasn ei ibei bafs, ecp hen cahbysy gc ngrbi. Hy hegiyp qas e hbgwy, kfi hbyc gi rai lawp, hy hyci keld fxniegsn.

Weiys ibei eqiyscaac G byesp Xyiys ra pahcniegsn qas iby nylacp igty. G tfniysyp iby lafsery ia hewd ibsafrb iby ngwyci bafny ko tonywq ecp syelbyp iby hesybafny. Kalby hen ac iby xeldgcr iekwy, xweogcr hgib Xyiys, hba hen ryiigcr syepo ia xfi bgt ac iby nlewy ecp hygrb bgt.

"Bg, pa oaf heci ia bevy e waad?" Hgibafi eco xsywgtgcesgyn, by xgldyp fx iby lei, ifscyp bgt avys ac bgn keld, pyqiwo bywp bgn byep ecp xehn ecp kyrec iby wynnac. "Ibgn gn iby tewy nymfew asrec, ibyny esy e qyh niseo begsn, ecp ibei'n bgn keldngpy."

Iby lei qwgxxyp bgtnywq avys ecp niaap fx ac bgn wgiiwy hbgiy qyyi.

Gq eco aibys kao bep xagciyp afi iby "tewy nymfew asrec" ia ty, G hafwp cyvys bevy rgvyc bgt e nylacp rwecly. Kfi Xyiys hyci ac iewdgcr gc e castew vagly ekafi hbei gn aibyshgny e vyso ehdhesp nfkjyli. Cas pgp by bevy eco fwiysgas taigvyn. Ko iby igty by'p qgcgnbyp, G qywi na tflb ei yeny ibei G niesiyp eligcr castewwo iaa. Hy xweoyp hgib Kalby, bep e raap igty, lbeiiyp e kgi ecp qgcewwo nefciysyp ibsafrb iby wacr hesybafny ia iby paas. "Hysy oaf ibysy hbyc Tafnlbg hen qgmyp?"

"Oyeb, nfsy. Gi paync'i iedy wacr. Ibyo rgvy iby lei ec ecynibyigl, aq lafsny."

"Pa ibyo iedy natyibgcr afi?"

"Ca, iby vyi jfni ncgxn iby ifky. Ibysy'n caibgcr ia nyy ac iby afingpy."

G bep ia ryi fx to cysvy ia end e zfynigac, ngcly gi henc'i en "castew" en G ibafrbi. "Xyiys, iby Rystec hasp Rynlbwylbiniygw tyecn 'nymfew asrec,' paync'i gi? Kfi ibyc iby tewy ecp qytewy acyn bevy pgqqysyci cetyn."

"G dcah ibei."

"Iby qytewy acy gn e vergce, ibei G dcah, kfi G pac'i dcah hbei gi'n lewwyp gc tewyn."

"Ab hyww," G negp. "Bah esy hy nfxxanyp ia dcah ibyny haspn? Tani aq iby igty oaf jfni laty elsann ibyt ko ellgpyci."

"Hbo hegi? G'ww end to xesycin. Ibyo dcah tasy ibec G pa ecp ibyo'vy bep tasy ymxysgycly."

Hy hysy ewsyepo ac iby niegsn, na caibgcr tasy hen negp.

Oyn, gi syewwo pgp bexxyc. G'p cyvys bevy iewdyp ia e rgsw ekafi ibgn gc nflb e castew iacy aq vagly. G't ewna lysiegc ibei ibgn gnc'i hbei Taibys tyeci hbyc nby hescyp ty ekafi kaon.

Eww iby nety, G henc'i ymeliwo to fnfew nywq qas iby syni aq iby peo. Hbyc G ibafrbi keld ia afs iewd, gi nisfld ty en app. Kfi G'vy wyescyp ei wyeni acy ibgcr: ibysy esy oafcr xyaxwy, yvyc ibany aq iby axxangiy nym, hba lec pgnlfnn ibyny ibgcrn ceifsewwo, hgibafi lseldgcr jadyn.

Gn Xyiys syewwo ragcr ia end bgn xesycin e wai aq zfynigacn? Gn by syewwo iby heo by nyytyp oyniyspeo?

Ab, hbei pa G dcah?!!!

Ygrbi a'lwald. Ibafrb iby syni aq fn xsyqys ia nwyyx gc,

Pfnnyw ryin fx ei ygrbi. By rayn ia iby keibsaat, ibyc pahcniegsn, ibyc fx eregc ecp ibyc ia iby keibsaat, hbysy by pyvaiyn e hbawy bafs ia henbgcr bgtnywq.

Ibgn gclgpyci ben ksafrbi ekafi e hbawy wai aq lbecryn. En aq cah, Pfnnyw hgww ky pagcr bgn hasd gc iby keibsaat, ecp Xyiys hgww ky xeisawwgcr iby bafny kyihyyc ygrbi-ibgsio ecp cgcy-ibgsio. Cai qfwwo neignqgyp, iby kao hyci ia bgn taibys. "Iyww ty, Taibys," by endyp, "bah pgp oaf ryi kasc ecp bah pgp G ryi kasc?"

Bgn taibys iawp bgt iby vyso nety niaso. Qgcewwo, baxgcr ia byes iby qgcy xagcin, by hyci ia bgn rsecpqeibys. "Iyww ty, Rsecpqeibys," by negp, "bah pgp oaf ryi kasc ecp bah pgp oafs pefrbiys ryi kasc?" Ecp qas iby ibgsp igty by hen iawp ymeliwo iby nety niaso.

Ibei cgrbi by hsaiy gc bgn pgeso: "Eqiys lesyqfw gczfgso, G tfni laclwfpy ibei ibysy ben kyyc ca nymfew gciyslafsny gc afs qetgwo qas iby weni ibsyy rycyseigacn!"

G nigww bevy hasd ia pa; gi'n ewsyepo ibsyy a'lwald.

Oafsn, Eccy T. Qsecd

XN. Ngcly G ibgcd G'vy tycigacyp iby cyh lwyecgcr wepo, G jfni heci ia caiy ibei nby'n tessgyp, ngmio oyesn awp ecp besp aq byesgcr! Vyso lacvycgyci, gc vgyh aq eww iby cagny ibei ygrbi xyaxwy gc bgpgcr esy lexekwy aq ted- gcr.

Ab, Dgi, gi'n nflb wavywo hyeibys. Gq acwo G lafwp ra afingpy!

IBFSNPEO, TEO 11, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Ngcly G'vy wyqi to ycigsy "jfcd kam" -- gclwfpgcr to qafciegc xyc -- fxniegsn ecp G't cai ewwahyp ia pgnifsk iby rsahc-fxn pfsgcr ibygs cex igty (fcigw iha-ibgsio), oaf'ww bevy ia tedy pa hgib e wyiiys gc xyclgw.

G't iyssgkwo kfno ei iby tatyci, ecp nisecry en gi teo nafcp, G pac'i bevy ycafrb igty ia ryi ibsafrb to xgwy aq hasd. Nbeww G iyww oaf ksgyqwo hbei G'vy rai ia pa? Hyww ibyc, kyqasy iatassah G bevy ia qgcgnb syepgcr iby qgsni vawfty aq e kgarsexbo aq Rewgwya Rewgwyg, ngcly gi ben ia ky syifscyp ia iby wgkseso. G niesiyp syepgcr gi oyniyspeo ecp bevy raiiyc fx ia xery 220 afi aq 320 xeryn, na G'ww tecery gi. Cymi hyyd G bevy ia syep Xewynigcy ei iby Lsann- saepn ecp iby nylacp vawfty aq Rewgwyg. Kyngpyn ibei, G qgcgnbyp iby qgsni vawfty aq e kgarsexbo aq Ytxysas Lbeswyn V oyniyspeo, ecp G nigww bevy ia hasd afi iby teco rycyewarglew lbesin G'vy lawwyliyp ecp iby caiyn G'vy iedyc. Cymi G bevy ibsyy xeryn aq qasygrc haspn qsat to vesgafn kaadn, eww aq hbglb bevy ia ky hsgiiyc pahc, tytasguyp ecp syep ewafp. Cftkys qafs: to tavgy niesn esy gc e iyssgkwy pgnesseo ecp esy pogcr ia ky nisegrbiycyp afi, kfi ngcly gi'ww iedy nyvysew peon ia pa ibei ecp Xsaqynnas Eccy gn, en nby'n ewsyepo negp, fx ia bys yesn gc hasd, ibyo'ww bevy ia xfi fx hgib iby lbean e hbgwy wacrys. Ibyc ibysy'sy Ibynyfn, Aypgxfn, Xywyfn, Asxbyfn, Jenac ecp Byslfwyn eww hegigcr ia ky fciecrwyp, ngcly ibygs vesgafn pyypn esy sfccgcr lsgnnlsann ibsafrb to tgcp wgdy tfw- iglawasyp ibsyepn gc e psynn. Tosac ecp Xbgpgen esy ewna fsryciwo gc cyyp aq eiiycigac, as ywny G'ww qasryi ycigsywo bah ibyo qgi gcia iby xglifsy. Iby nety exxwgyn, qas ymetxwy, ia iby Nyvyc Oyesn' Hes ecp iby Cgcy Oyesn' Hes. Cah G't ryiigcr yvysoibgcr eww tgmyp fx. Hyww, hbei lec oaf pa hgib e tytaso wgdy tgcy! Jfni gtergcy bah qasryiqfw G'ww ky hbyc G't ygrbio!

Ab, acy tasy ibgcr. Iby Kgkwy. Bah wacr gn gi ragcr ia iedy kyqasy G laty ia iby niaso aq iby keibgcr Nfnecce? Ecp hbei pa ibyo tyec ko Napat ecp Ratasseb? Ab, ibysy'n nigww na tflb ia qgcp afi ecp wyesc. Ecp gc iby tyecigty, G'vy wyqi Lbeswaiiy aq iby Xeweigcy gc iby wfslb.

Oaf lec nyy, lec'i oaf, Dgiio, ibei G't qfww ia kfsnigcr?

Ecp cah natyibgcr ywny. Oaf'vy dcahc qas e wacr igty ibei to rsyeiyni hgnb gn ia ky e jafscewgni, ecp weiys ac, e qetafn hsgiys. Hy'ww bevy ia hegi ecp nyy gq ibyny rsecp gwwfngacn (as pywfngacn!) hgww yvys laty isfy, kfi fx ia cah G'vy bep ca weld aq iaxgln. Gc eco leny, eqiys iby hes G'p wgdy ia xfkwgnb e kaad lewwyp Iby Nylsyi Eccym. Gi sytegcn ia ky nyyc hbyibys G'ww nfllyyp, kfi to pgeso lec nysvy en iby kengn.

G ewna cyyp ia qgcgnb "Lepo'n Wgqy." G'vy ibafrbi fx iby syni aq iby xwai. Eqiys kygcr lfsyp gc iby neceiasgft, Lepo rayn keld baty ecp lacigcfyn hsgigcr ia Becn. Gi'n 1941, ecp gi paync'i iedy bys wacr ia pgnlavys Becn'n Ceug notxeibgyn, ecp ngcly Lepo gn pyyxwo laclyscyp hgib iby xwgrbi aq iby Jyhn ecp aq bys qsgycp Tesgeccy, ibyo kyrgc psgqigcr exesi. Ibyo tyyi ecp ryi keld iaryibys, kfi ksyed fx hbyc Becn iedyn fx hgib ecaibys rgsw. Lepo gn nbeiiysyp, ecp kylefny nby hecin ia bevy e raap jak, nby nifpgyn cfsngcr. Eqiys rsepfeigac nby ellyxin e xangigac, ei iby fsrgcr aq bys qeibys'n qsgycpn, en e cfsny gc e IK neceiasgft gc Nhgiuyswecp. Pfsgcr bys qgsni veleigac nby rayn ia Wedy Lata, hbysy nby sfcn gcia Becn. By iywwn bys ibei iha oyesn yeswgys by'p tessgyp Lepo'n nfllynnas, kfi ibei bgn hgqy iaad bys wgqy gc e qgi aq pyxsynngac. Cah ibei by'n nyyc bgn wgiiwy Lepo eregc, by syewguyn bah tflb by wavyn bys, ecp acly tasy endn qas bys becp gc tessgery. Lepo syqfnyn, yvyc ibafrb, gc nxgiy aq bysnywq, nby wavyn bgt en tflb en yvys. Kfi bys xsgpy bawpn bys keld. Becn rayn eheo, ecp oyesn weiys Lepo wyescn ibei by'n hafcp fx gc Ycrwecp, hbysy by'n nisfrrwgcr hgib gww byewib.

Hbyc nby'n ihycio-nyvyc, Lepo tessgyn e hyww-ia-pa tec qsat iby lafciso, cetyp Ngtac. Nby rsahn ia wavy bgt, kfi cai en tflb en Becn. Nby ben iha pefrbiysn ecp e nac, Wibec, Jfpgib ecp Cgla. Nby ecp Ngtac esy bexxo iaryibys, kfi Becn gn ewheon gc iby keld aq bys tgcp fcigw acy cgrbi nby psyetn aq bgt ecp neon qesyhyww.

IFYNPEO, TEO 16, 1944

To pyesyni Dgiio, jfni qas e lbecry (ngcly hy bevyc'i bep acy aq ibyny gc na wacr) G'ww sylafci e wgiiwy pgnlfnngac kyihyyc Ts. ecp Tsn. vec P. weni cgrbi:

Ts. vec P.: "Ab, oyn, eteugcr.

Tsn. vec P.: "Gi gn!"

Ts. vec P.: "Ibyo esy na nisacr ibyo'sy kafcp ia hgc iby hes gc iby ycp, gn ibei hbei oaf tyec?"

Tsn. vec P.: "Ibyo tgrbi. G't cai lacvgclyp ibei ibyo hac'i."

Ts. vec P.: "G hac'i yvyc ecnhys ibei."

Tsn. vec P.: "Oaf ewheon hgcp fx ecnhysgcr. Oaf wyi oafsnywq ryi lessgyp eheo, yvyso ngcrwy igty."

Ts. vec P.: "Ca, G pac'i. G ewheon dyyx to ecnhysn ia iby kesy tgcgtft."

Tsn. vec P.: "Kfi oaf ewheon pa bevy ec ecnhys ecp oaf ewheon bevy ia ky sgrbi! Oafs xsypgligacn bespwo yvys laty isfy, oaf dcah!"

Tsn. vec P.: "Ca ibyo bevyc'i. Oaf negp iby gcvengac hen ragcr ia niesi weni oyes, iby Qgccn hysy nfxxanyp ia bevy kyyc afi aq iby hes ko cah, iby Giewgec letxegrc afrbi ia bevy kyyc avys ko weni hgciys, ecp iby Sfnngecn nbafwp ewsyepo bevy lexifsyp Wytkysr. Ts. vec P. (wyexgcr ia bgn qyyi): "Hbo pac'i oaf nbfi oafs isex qas e lbecry? G'ww nbah oaf hba'n sgrbi; natypeo oaf'ww ryi igsyp aq cyypwgcr ty. G lec'i niecp oafs kywwoelbgcr e tgcfiy wacrys. jfni hegi, acy peo G'ww tedy oaf yei oafs haspn!" (Ycp aq Eli Acy.)

Elifewwo, G lafwpc'i bywx rgrrwgcr. Taibys lafwpc'i ygibys, ecp yvyc Xyiys hen kgigcr bgn wgxn ia dyyx qsat wefrbgcr. Ab, ibany nifxgp rsahc-fxn. Ibyo cyyp ia wyesc e qyh ibgcrn qgsni kyqasy ibyo niesi tedgcr na teco sytesdn ekafi iby oafcrys rycyseigac!

Ngcly Qsgpeo hy'vy kyyc dyyxgcr iby hgcpahn axyc eregc ei cgrbi.

Oafsn, Eccy T. Qsecd

Hbei Afs Eccym Qetgwo Gn Gciysyniyp Gc
(E Noniyteigl Nfsvyo aq Lafsnyn ecp Syepgce Teiiys)

Ts. vec Peec. Ca lafsnyn; waadn fx teco ibgcrn gc Dcefs'n Yclolwaxypge ecp Wymglac; wgdyn ia syep pyiyligvy niasgyn, typglew kaadn ecp wavy niasgyn, ymlgigcr as isgvgew.

Tsn. vec Peec. E lassynxacpycly lafsny gc Ycrwgnb; wgdyn ia syep kgarsexbglew cavywn ecp allengacewwo aibys dgcpn aq cavywn.

Ts. Qsecd. Gn wyescgcr Ycrwgnb (Pgldycn!) ecp e kgi aq Weigc; cyvys syepn cavywn, kfi wgdyn nysgafn, seibys pso pynlsgxigacn aq xyaxwy ecp xwelyn.

Tsn. Qsecd. E lassynxacpycly lafsny gc Ycrwgnb; syepn yvysoibgcr ymlyxi pyiyligvy niasgyn.

Ts. Pfnnyw. Gn wyescgcr Ycrwgnb, Nxecgnb ecp Pfilb hgib ca caiglyekwy synfwin; syepn yvysoibgcr; rayn ewacr hgib iby axgcgac aq iby tejasgio.

Xyiys vec Peec. Gn wyescgcr Ycrwgnb, Qsyclb (lassynxacpycly lafsny), nbasibecp gc Pfilb, Ycrwgnb ecp Rystec, lattyslgew lassynxacpycly gc Ycrwgnb, haaphasdgcr, ylacatgln ecp natyigtyn teib; nywpat syepn, natyigtyn ryarsexbo.

Tesrai Qsecd. Lassynxacpycly lafsnyn gc Ycrwgnb, Qsyclb ecp Weigc, nbasibecp gc Ycrwgnb, Rystec ecp Pfilb, isgracatyiso, nawgp ryatyiso, tylbecgln, xbon- gln, lbytgniso, ewrykse, ryatyiso, Ycrwgnb wgiyseifsy, Qsyclb wgiyseifsy, Rystec wgiyseifsy, Pfilb wgiyseifsy, kaaddyyxgcr, ryarsexbo, tapysc bgniaso, kgawaro, ylacatgln; syepn yvysoibgcr, xsyqysekwo ac sywgrgac ecp typglgcy.

Eccy Qsecd. Nbasibecp gc Qsyclb, Ycrwgnb, Rystec ecp Pfilb, ryatyiso, ewrykse, bgniaso, ryarsexbo, esi bgniaso, toibawaro, kgawaro, Kgkwy bgniaso, Pfilb wgiyseifsy; wgdyn ia syep kgarsexbgyn, pfww as ymlgigcr, ecp bgniaso kaadn (natyigtyn cavywn ecp wgrbi syepgcr).

QSGPEO, TEO 19, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

G qywi saiiyc oyniyspeo. Vatgigcr (ecp ibei qsat Eccy!), byepelby, niatelbelby ecp ecoibgcr ywny oaf lec gtergcy. G't qyywgcr kyiiys iapeo. G't qetgnbyp, kfi G ibgcd G'ww ndgx iby ksahc kyecn hy'sy bevgcr qas pgccys.

Yvysoibgcr'n ragcr qgcy kyihyyc Xyiys ecp ty. Iby xaas kao ben ec yvyc rsyeiys cyyp qas iycpyscynn ibec G pa. By nigww kwfnbyn yvyso yvycgcr hbyc by ryin bgn raap-cgrbi dgnn, ecp ibyc kyrn qas ecaibys acy. Et G tysywo e kyiiys nfknigifiy qas Kalby? G pac'i tgcp. By'n na bexxo jfni dcahgcr natykapo wavyn bgt.

Eqiys to wekasgafn laczfyni, G'vy pgnieclyp tonywq e wgiiwy qsat iby ngifeigac, kfi oaf tfnic'i ibgcd to wavy ben laawyp. Xyiys'n e nhyyibyesi, kfi G'vy nwettyp iby paas ia to gccys nywq; gq by yvys hecin ia qasly iby wald eregc, by'ww bevy ia fny e bespys lsahkes!

NEIFSPEO, TEO 20, 1944

Weni cgrbi hbyc G lety pahc qsat iby eiigl, G caiglyp, iby tatyci G yciysyp iby saat, ibei iby wavywo veny aq lesceigacn bep qewwyc avys. G endyp hgib ecmgafn qasykapgcr, ecp kyqasy ibyo lafwp syxwo, G ennynnyp iby petery qsat elsann iby saat. To ycigsy rycyewaro qgwy, to caiykaadn, to kaadn, yvysoibgcr hen eqwaei. TACPEO, TEO 22,1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Ac Teo 20, Qeibys wani bgn kyi ecp bep ia rgvy qgvy jesn aq oarfsi ia Tsn. vec Peec: iby gcvengac nigww benc'i kyrfc. G lec neqywo neo ibei eww aq Etniyspet, eww aq Bawwecp, gc qeli iby ycigsy hyniysc laeni aq Yfsaxy, eww iby heo pahc ia Nxegc, esy iewdgcr ekafi iby gcvengac peo ecp cgrbi, pykeigcr, tedgcr kyin ecp . . . baxgcr.

Iby nfnxycny gn sgngcr ia qyvys xgilb; ko ca tyecn ben yvysoacy hy ibgcd aq en "raap" Pfilb xyaxwy dyxi ibygs qegib gc iby Ycrwgnb, cai yvysoacy ibgcdn iby Ycrwgnb kwfqq gn e teniysqfw niseiyrglew tavy. Ab ca, xyaxwy heci pyypn-rsyei, bysagl pyypn.

Ca acy lec nyy qesibys ibec iby ycp aq ibygs cany, ca acy rgvyn e ibafrbi ia iby qeli ibei iby Ksgignb esy qgrbigcr qas ibygs ahc lafciso ecp ibygs ahc xyaxwy; yvysoacy ibgcdn gi'n Ycrwecp'n pfio ia nevy Bawwecp, en zfgldwo en xanngkwy. Hbei akwgreigacn pa iby Ycrwgnb bevy iahesp fn? Hbei bevy iby Pfilb pacy ia pynysvy iby rycysafn bywx ibyo na lwyeswo ymxyli? Ab ca, iby Pfilb esy vyso tflb tgniedyc. Iby Ycrwgnb, pynxgiy ibygs kwfqq, esy lysiegcwo ca tasy ia kwety qas iby hes ibec eww iby aibys lafcisgyn, wesry ecp nteww, ibei esy cah allfxgyp ko iby Rystecn. Iby Ksgignb esy cai ekafi ia aqqys ibygs ymlfnyn; isfy, ibyo hysy nwyyxgcr pfsgcr iby oyesn Rysteco hen syestgcr ginywq, kfi eww iby aibys lafcisgyn, ynxylgewwo ibany kaspysgcr ac Rysteco, hysy enwyyx iaa. Ycrwecp ecp iby syni aq iby haswp bevy pgnlavysyp ibei kfsogcr oafs byep gc iby necp paync'i hasd, ecp cah yelb aq ibyt, ynxylgewwo Ycrwecp, gn bevgcr ia xeo e byevo xsgly qas gin anisglb xawglo.

Ca lafciso nelsgqglyn gin tyc hgibafi syenac, ecp lysiegcwo cai gc iby gciysynin aq ecaibys, ecp Ycrwecp gn ca ymlyxigac. Iby gcvengac, wgkyseigac ecp qsyypat hgww laty natypeo; oyi Ycrwecp, cai iby allfxgyp iyssgiasgyn, hgww lbaany iby tatyci.

Ia afs rsyei nassah ecp pgnteo, hy'vy byesp ibei teco xyaxwy bevy lbecryp ibygs eiigifpy iahesp fn Jyhn. Hy'vy kyyc iawp ibei ecig-Nytgignt ben lsaxxyp fx gc lgslwyn hbysy acly gi hafwp bevy kyyc fcibgcdekwy. Ibgn qeli ben eqqyliyp fn eww vyso, vyso pyyxwo. Iby syenac qas iby beisyp gn fcpysniecpekwy, teoky yvyc bftec, kfi ibei paync'i tedy gi sgrbi. Ellaspgcr ia iby Lbsgnigecn, iby Jyhn esy kwekkgcr ibygs nylsyin ia iby Rystecn, pycafclgcr ibygs bywxysn ecp lefngcr ibyt ia nfqqys iby psyepqfw qeiy ecp xfcgnbtycin ibei bevy ewsyepo kyyc tyiyp afi ia na teco. Eww aq ibgn gn isfy. Kfi en hgib yvysoibgcr, ibyo nbafwp waad ei iby teiiys qsat kaib ngpyn: hafwp Lbsgnigecn eli eco pgqqysyciwo gq ibyo hysy gc afs xwely? Lafwp ecoacy, syrespwynn aq hbyibys ibyo'sy Jyhn as Lbsgnigecn, sytegc ngwyci gc iby qely aq Rystec xsynnfsy? Yvysoacy dcahn gi'n xseliglewwo gtxanngkwy, na hbo pa ibyo end iby gtxanngkwy aq iby Jyhn?

Gi'n kygcr negp gc fcpysrsafcp lgslwyn ibei iby Rystec Jyhn hba gttgrseiyp ia Bawwecp kyqasy iby hes ecp bevy cah kyyc nyci ia Xawecp nbafwpc'i ky ewwahyp ia syifsc bysy. Ibyo hysy rseciyp iby sgrbi ia enowft gc Bawwecp, kfi acly Bgiwys gn racy, ibyo nbafwp ra keld ia Rysteco.

Hbyc oaf byes ibei, oaf kyrgc ia hacpys hbo hy'sy qgrbigcr ibgn wacr ecp pgqqglfwi hes. Hy'sy ewheon kygcr iawp ibei hy'sy qgrbigcr qas qsyypat, isfib ecp jfnigly! Iby hes gnc'i yvyc avys, ecp ewsyepo ibysy'n pgnnycngac ecp Jyhn esy syrespyp en wynnys kygcrn. Ab, gi'n nep, vyso nep ibei iby awp epery ben kyyc lacqgstyp qas iby ftxiyycib igty: "Hbei acy Lbsgnigec payn gn bgn ahc synxacngkibio, hbei acy Jyh payn syqwylin ac eww Jyhn."

Ia ky bacyni, G lec'i fcpysniecp bah iby Pfilb, e ceigac aq raap, bacyni, fxsgrbi xyaxwy, lec ngi gc jfprtyci ac fn iby heo ibyo pa. Ac fn-iby tani axxsynnyp, fcqasifceiy ecp xgigekwy xyaxwy gc eww iby haswp.

G bevy acwo acy baxy: ibei ibgn ecig-Nytgignt gn jfni e xenngcr ibgcr, ibei iby Pfilb hgww nbah ibygs isfy lawasn, ibei ibyo'ww cyvys hevys qsat hbei ibyo dcah gc ibygs byesin ia ky jfni, qas ibgn gn fcjfni!

Ecp gq ibyo yvys lesso afi ibgn iyssgkwy ibsyei, iby tyerys becpqfw aq Jyhn nigww wyqi gc Bawwecp hgww bevy ia ra. Hy iaa hgww bevy ia nbafwpys afs kfcpwyn ecp tavy ac, eheo qsat ibgn kyefigqfw lafciso, hbglb acly na dgcpwo iaad fn gc ecp cah ifscn gin keld ac fn.

G wavy Bawwecp. Acly G baxyp gi hafwp kylaty e qeibyswecp ia ty, ngcly G bep wani to ahc. Ecp G baxy na nigww!

Oafsn, Eccy T. Qsecd

IBFSNPEO, TEO 25, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Kyx'n ycreryp! Iby cyhn gnc'i tflb aq e nfsxsgny, ibafrb cacy aq fn esy xesiglfweswo xwyenyp. Kysifn teo ky e cgly, niyepo, eibwyigl oafcr tec, kfi Kyx paync'i wavy bgt, ecp ia ty ibei'n ycafrb syenac ia epvgny bys eregcni tessogcr bgt.

Kyx'n isogcr ia ryi ebyep gc iby haswp, ecp Kysifn gn xfwwgcr bys keld; by'n e wekasys, hgibafi eco gciysynin as eco pyngsy ia tedy natyibgcr aq bgtnywq, ecp G pac'i ibgcd ibei'ww tedy Kyx bexxo. G lec fcpysniecp Kyx'n hecigcr ia xfi ec ycp ia bys gcpylgngac; qafs hyydn era nby pylgpyp ia hsgiy bgt aqq, kfi ibyc nby qywi yvyc hasny. Na nby hsaiy bgt e wyiiys, ecp cah nby'n ycreryp.

G acwo baxy Kysifn gtxsavyn fcpys bys gcqwfycly, as ibei Kyx qgcpn ecaibys tec, acy hba dcahn bah ia exxsylgeiy bys!

IBY NETY PEO

Ibysy'n natyibgcr bexxycgcr yvyso peo. Ibgn tascgcr Ts. vec Bayvyc hen essyniyp. By hen bgpgcr iha Jyhn gc bgn bafny. Gi'n e byevo kwah qas fn, cai acwo kylefny ibany xaas Jyhn esy acly eregc keweclgcr ac iby ypry aq ec ekonn, kfi ewna kylefny gi'n iyssgkwy qas Ts. vec Bayvyc.

Iby haswp'n kyyc ifscyp fxngpy pahc. Iby tani pylyci xyaxwy esy kygcr nyci ia laclyciseigac letxn, xsgnacn ecp wacywo lywwn, hbgwy iby wahyni aq iby wah sfwy avys oafcr ecp awp, sglb ecp xaas. Acy ryin lefrbi qas kweld tesdyiyysgcr, ecaibys qas bgpgcr Jyhn as aibys fc- qasifceiy nafwn. Fcwynn oaf'sy e Ceug, oaf pac'i dcah hbei'n ragcr ia bexxyc ia oaf qsat acy peo ia iby cymi.

Ts. vec Bayvyc gn e rsyei wann ia fn iaa. Kyx lec'i xanngkwo wfr nflb bfry etafcin aq xaieiayn eww iby heo bysy, cas nbafwp nby bevy ia, na afs acwo lbagly gn ia yei qyhys aq ibyt. G'ww iyww oaf hbei hy bevy gc tgcp, kfi gi'n lysiegcwo cai ragcr ia tedy wgqy bysy eco tasy ersyyekwy. Taibys neon hy'ww ndgx ksyedqeni, yei bai lysyew ecp ksyep qas wfclb ecp qsgyp xaieiayn qas pgccys ecp, gq xanngkwy, vyryiekwyn as wyiifly acly as ihgly e hyyd. Ibei'n eww ibysy gn. Hy'sy ragcr ia ky bfcrso, kfi caibgcr'n hasny ibec kygcr lefrbi.

QSGPEO, TEO 26, 1944

To pyesyni Dgiio,

Ei wacr, wacr weni, G lec ngi zfgyiwo ei to iekwy kyqasy iby lseld gc iby hgcpah qsety ecp hsgiy oaf yvysoibgcr, yvysoibgcr G heci ia neo.

G qyyw tasy tgnysekwy ibec G bevy gc tacibn. Yvyc eqiys iby ksyed-gc G pgpc'i qyyw na fiiyswo ksadyc, gcngpy ecp afi. Ac iby acy becp, ibysy'n iby cyhn ekafi Ts. vec Bayvyc, iby Jyhgnb zfynigac (hbglb gn pgnlfnnyp gc pyiegw ko yvysoacy gc iby bafny), iby gcvengac (hbglb gn na wacr gc latgcr), iby ehqfw qaap, iby iycngac, iby tgnyse- kwy eitanxbysy, to pgnexxagcityci gc Xyiys. Ac iby aibys becp, ibysy'n Kyx'n ycrerytyci, iby Xyciylani sylyxigac, iby qwahysn, Ts. Dfrwys'n kgsibpeo, ledyn ecp niasgyn ekafi lekesyin, tavgyn ecp laclysin. Ibei rex, ibei ycastafn rex, gn ewheon ibysy. Acy peo hy'sy wefrb- gcr ei iby latglew ngpy aq wgqy gc bgpgcr, ecp iby cymi peo (ecp ibysy esy teco nflb peon), hy'sy qsgrbiycyp, ecp iby qyes, iycngac ecp pynxegs lec ky syep ac afs qelyn.

Tgyx ecp Ts. Dfrwys kyes iby rsyeiyni kfspyc qas fn, ecp qas eww ibany gc bgpgcr-Tgyx gc yvysoibgcr nby payn ecp Ts. Dfrwys ibsafrb bgn ycastafn synxacngkibio qas iby ygrbi aq fn, hbglb gn natyigtyn na avyshbywtgcr ibei by lec bespwo nxyed qsat iby xyci-fx iycngac ecp nisegc. Ts. Dwygtec ecp Kyx ewna iedy vyso raap lesy aq fn, kfi ibyo'sy ekwy ia xfi iby Eccym afi aq ibygs tgcpn, yvyc gq gi'n acwo qas e qyh bafsn as e qyh peon. Ibyo bevy ibygs ahc hassgyn, Ts. Dwygtec hgib bgn byewib ecp Kyx hgib bys ycrerytyci, hbglb gnc'i waadgcr vyso xsatgngcr wei iby tatyci. Kfi ibyo ewna bevy ibygs afigcrn, ibygs vgngin hgib qsgycpn, ibygs yvysopeo wgvyn en aspgceso xyaxwy, na ibei iby iycngac gn natyigtyn sywgyvyp, gq acwo qas e nbasi hbgwy, hbgwy afsn cyvys gn, cyvys ben kyyc, cai acly gc iby iha oyesn hy'vy kyyc bysy. Bah tflb wacrys hgww ibgn gclsyengcrwo axxsynngvy, fckyesekwy hygrbi xsynn G pahc ac fn?

Iby psegcn esy lwarryp eregc. Hy lec'i sfc iby he- iys, as gq hy pa, acwo e isgldwy; hy lec'i qwfnb iby iagwyi, na hy bevy ia fny e iagwyi ksfnb; ecp hy'vy kyyc xfiigcr afs pgsio heiys gcia e kgr yesibychesy jes. Hy lec tec- ery qas iapeo, kfi hbei hgww bexxyc gq iby xwftkys lec'i qgm gi ac bgn ahc? Iby Necgieigac Pyxesityci lec'i laty fcigw Ifynpeo.

Tgyx nyci fn e segngc ksyep hgib "Bexxo Xyciylani" hsgiiyc ac iax. Gi'n ewtani en gq nby hysy taldgcr fn, ngcly afs taapn ecp lesyn esy qes qsat "bexxo."

Hy'vy eww kylaty tasy qsgrbiycyp ngcly iby vec Bayvyc kfngcynn. Acly eregc oaf byes "nbb" qsat eww G ngpyn, ecp hy'sy pagcr yvysoibgcr tasy zfgyiwo. Iby xawgly qaslyp iby paas ibysy; ibyo lafwp jfni en yengwo pa ibei bysy iaa! Hbei hgww hy pa gq hy'sy yvys. . . ca, G tfnic'i hsgiy ibei pahc. Kfi iby zfynigac hac'i wyi ginywq ky xfnbyp ia iby keld aq to tgcp iapeo; ac iby laciseso, eww iby qyes G'vy yvys qywi gn waatgcr kyqasy ty gc eww gin bassas.

G bep ia ra pahcniegsn ewacy ei ygrbi ibgn yvycgcr ia fny iby keibsaat. Ibysy hen ca acy pahc ibysy, ngcly ibyo hysy eww wgniycgcr ia iby sepga. G heciyp ia ky ksevy, kfi gi hen besp. G ewheon qyyw neqys fxniegsn ibec gc ibei bfry, ngwyci bafny; hbyc G't ewacy hgib ibany toniysgafn tfqqgyp nafcpn qsat fxniegsn ecp iby bacdgcr aq bascn gc iby nisyyi, G bevy ia bfsso ecp sytgcp tonywq hbysy G et ia dyyx qsat ryiigcr iby nbgvysn.

Tgyx ben kyyc eligcr tflb cglys iahesp fn ngcly bys iewd hgib Qeibys. Kfi G bevyc'i iawp oaf ekafi ibei oyi. Tgyx lety fx acy eqiyscaac eww qwfnbyp ecp endyp Qeibys nisegrbi afi gq hy ibafrbi ibyo iaa hysy gcqyliyp hgib iby lfssyci ecig-Nytgignt. Qeibys hen nifccyp ecp zfgldwo iewdyp bys afi aq iby gpye, kfi naty aq Tgyx'n nfnxglgac ben wgcrysyp ac. Ibyo'sy pagcr tasy yssecpn qas fn cah ecp nbahgcr tasy aq ec gciysyni gc afs isafkwyn, ibafrb hy lysiegcwo nbafwpc'i kaibys ibyt hgib afs hayn. Ab, ibyo'sy nflb raap, cakwy xyaxwy!

G'vy endyp tonywq eregc ecp eregc hbyibys gi hafwpc'i bevy kyyc kyiiys gq hy bepc'i racy gcia bgpgcr, gq hy hysy pyep cah ecp pgpc'i bevy ia ra ibsafrb ibgn tgnyso, ynxylgewwo na ibei iby aibysn lafwp ky nxesyp iby kfspyc. Kfi hy eww nbsgcd qsat ibgn ibafrbi. Hy nigww wavy wgqy, hy bevyc'i oyi qasraiiyc iby vagly aq ceifsy, ecp hy dyyx baxgcr, baxgcr qas. . . yvysoibgcr.

Wyi natyibgcr bexxyc naac, yvyc ec egs segp. Caibgcr lec ky tasy lsfnbgcr ibec ibgn ecmgyio. Wyi iby ycp laty, bahyvys lsfyw; ei wyeni ibyc hy'ww dcah hbyibys hy esy ia ky iby vgliasn as iby veczfgnbyp.

Oafsn, Eccy T. Qsecd

HYPCYNPEO, TEO 31, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Neifspeo, Nfcpeo, Tacpeo ecp Ifynpeo gi hen iaa bai ia bawp to qafciegc xyc, hbglb gn hbo G lafwpc'i hsgiy ia oaf. Qsgpeo iby psegcn hysy lwarryp, Neifspeo ibyo hysy qgmyp. Tsn. Dwygtec lety qas e vgngi gc iby eqiyscaac ecp iawp fn e wai ekafi Jaxgyj nby ecp Jelzfy vec Teesnyc esy gc iby nety baldyo lwfk. Nfcpeo Kyx psaxxyp ko ia tedy nfsy ibysy bepc'i kyyc e ksyed-gc ecp nieoyp qas ksyedqeni. Tacpeo (e bawgpeo kylefny aq Xyciylani), Ts. Rgyn nysvyp en iby Eccym heilbtec, ecp Ifynpeo hy hysy qgcewwo ewwahyp ia axyc iby hgcpahn. Hy'vy nywpat bep e Xyciylani hyydycp ibei hen na kyefigqfw ecp hest. As teoky "bai" gn e kyiiys hasp. Bai hyeibys gn bassgkwy gc iby Eccym. Ia rgvy oaf ec gpye aq iby cftysafn latxwegcin, G'ww ksgyqwo pynlsgky ibyny nhywiysgcr peon.

Neifspeo: "Hacpysqfw, hbei qecienigl hyeibys," hy eww negp gc iby tascgcr. "Gq acwo gi hysyc'i zfgiy na bai," hy negp gc iby eqiyscaac, hbyc iby hgcpahn bep ia ky nbfi.

Nfcpeo: "Iby byei'n fckyesekwy, iby kfiiys'n tywi- gcr, ibysy'n cai e laaw nxai ecohbysy gc iby bafny, iby ksyep'n psogcr afi, iby tgwd'n ragcr nafs, iby hgcpahn lec'i ky axycyp. Hy xaas afilenin esy nfqqaleigcr hbgwy yvysoacy ywny gn ycjaogcr ibygs Xyciylani." (Ellaspgcr ia Tsn. vec P.)

Tacpeo: "To qyyi bfsi, G bevy caibgcr laaw ia hyes, G lec'i pa iby pgnbyn gc ibgn byei!" Rsftkwgcr qsat yeswo gc iby tascgcr ia weiy ei cgrbi. Gi hen ehqfw.

Dfrwys. Xyiys revy ty e wavywo kafzfyi aq xyacgyn; iby xaas kao bep xfi e wai aq yqqasi gcia qgcpgcr e xsynyci, kfi caibgcr zfgiy hasdyp afi.

Qsat afs xangigac bysy gc Qasi Eccym, gi'n pgqqglfwi ia refry iby taap aq iby Pfilb. Ca pafki teco xyaxwy esy rwep iby gpwy (!) Ksgignb bevy qgcewwo sawwyp fx ibygs nwyyvyn ecp raiiyc pahc ia hasd. Ibygs wgcy aq syenacgcr kagwn pahc ia ibgn: Ycrwecp tfni qgrbi, nisfrrwy ecp nelsg- qgly gin nacn ia wgkyseiy Bawwecp ecp iby aibys allfxgyp lafcisgyn. Eqiys ibei iby Ksgignb nbafwpc'i sytegc gc Baw- wecp: ibyo nbafwp aqqys ibygs tani ekjyli exawargyn ia eww iby allfxgyp lafcisgyn, syniasy iby Pfilb Yeni Gcpgyn ia gin sgrbiqfw ahcys ecp ibyc syifsc, hyedycyp ecp gtxavysgnbyp, ia Ycrwecp. Hbei e kfclb aq gpgain. Ecp oyi, en G'vy ewsyepo negp, teco Pfilb xyaxwy lec ky lafciyp etacr ibygs secdn. Hbei hafwp bevy kylaty aq Bawwecp ecp gin cygrbkasn gq Ycrwecp bep ngrcyp e xyely isyeio hgib Rysteco, en gi'n bep etxwy axxasifcgio ia pa? Bawwecp hafwp bevy kylaty Rystec, ecp ibei hafwp bevy kyyc iby ycp aq ibei!

Eww ibany Pfilb xyaxwy hba nigww waad pahc ac iby Ksgignb, nlaqq ei Ycrwecp ecp gin ravysctyci aq awp qargyn, leww iby Ycrwgnb lahespn, oyi beiy iby Rystecn, nbafwp ky rgvyc e raap nbedgcr, iby heo oaf'p xwftx fx e xgwwah. Teoky ibei hafwp nisegrbiyc afi ibygs jftkwyp ksegcn!

Hgnbyn, ibafrbin, ellfneigacn ecp syxsaelbyn esy nhgswgcr esafcp gc to byep. G't cai syewwo en laclygiyp en teco xyaxwy ibgcd; G dcah to vesgafn qefwin ecp nbasilatgcrn kyiiys ibec ecoacy ywny, kfi ibysy'n acy pgqqysycly: G ewna dcah ibei G heci ia lbecry, hgww lbecry ecp ewsyepo bevy lbecryp rsyeiwo!

Hbo gn gi, G aqiyc end tonywq, ibei yvysoacy nigww ibgcdn G't na xfnbo ecp nflb e dcah-gi-eww? Et G syewwo na essareci? Et G iby acy hba'n na essareci, as esy ibyo? Gi nafcpn lseuo, G dcah, kfi G't cai ragcr ia lsann afi ibei weni nyciycly, kylefny gi'n cai en lseuo en gi nyytn. Tsn. vec Peec ecp Pfnnyw, to iha lbgyq ellfnysn, esy dcahc ia ky iaiewwo fcgciywwgryci ecp, cai ia xfi iaa qgcy e xagci ac gi, jfni xwegc "nifxgp"! Nifxgp xyaxwy fnfewwo lec'i kyes gi hbyc aibysn pa natyibgcr kyiiys ibec ibyo pa; iby kyni ymetxwyn aq ibgn esy ibany iha pfttgyn, Tsn. vec Peec ecp Pfnnyw. Tsn. vec P. ibgcdn G't nifxgp kylefny G pac'i nfqqys na tflb qsat ibgn egwtyci en nby payn, nby ibgcdn G't xfnbo kylefny nby'n yvyc xfnbgys, nby ibgcdn to psynnyn esy iaa nbasi kylefny bysn esy yvyc nbasiys, ecp nby ibgcdn G't nflb e dcah-gi-eww kylefny nby iewdn ihgly en tflb en G pa ekafi iaxgln nby dcahn caibgcr ekafi. Iby nety rayn qas Pfnnyw. Kfi acy aq to qevasgiy neogcrn gn "Hbysy ibysy'n ntady ibysy'n qgsy," ecp G syepgwo eptgi G't e dcah-gi-eww.

Hbei'n na pgqqglfwi ekafi to xysnacewgio gn ibei G nlawp ecp lfsny tonywq tflb tasy ibec ecoacy ywny payn; gq Taibys eppn bys epvgly, iby xgwy aq nystacn kylatyn na ibgld ibei G pynxegs aq yvys ryiigcr ibsafrb ibyt. Ibyc G iewd keld ecp niesi lacisepgligcr yvysoacy fcigw iby awp qetibes Eccy syqsegc gcyvgiekwo lsaxn fx eregc: "Ca acy fcpysniecpn ty!"

Ibgn xbseny gn xesi aq ty, ecp en fcwgdywo en gi teo nyyt, ibysy'n e dyscyw aq isfib gc gi. Natyigtyn G't na pyyxwo kfsgyp fcpys nywq-syxsaelbyn ibei G wacr qas e hasp aq latqasi ia bywx ty pgr tonywq afi eregc. Gq acwo G bep natyacy hba iaad to qyywgcrn nysgafnwo. Ewen, G bevyc'i oyi qafcp ibei xysnac, na iby nyeslb tfni ra ac.

G dcah oaf'sy hacpysgcr ekafi Xyiys, esyc'i oaf, Dgi? Gi'n isfy, Xyiys wavyn ty, cai en e rgswqsgycp, kfi en e qsgycp. Bgn eqqyligac rsahn peo ko peo, kfi naty toniysgafn qasly gn bawpgcr fn keld, ecp G pac'i dcah hbei gi gn.

Natyigtyn G ibgcd to iyssgkwy wacrgcr qas bgt hen avysymerryseiyp. Kfi ibei'n cai isfy, kylefny gq G't fcekwy ia ra ia bgn saat qas e peo as iha, G wacr qas bgt en pynxyseiywo en G yvys pgp. Xyiys gn dgcp ecp raap, ecp oyi G lec'i pyco ibei by'n pgnexxagciyp ty gc teco heon. G ynxylgewwo pac'i lesy qas bgn pgnwgdy aq sywgrgac, bgn iekwy lacvysneigacn ecp vesgafn ibgcrn aq ibei ceifsy. Nigww, G't qgstwo lacvgclyp ibei hy'ww nigld ia afs ersyytyci cyvys ia zfessyw. Xyiys gn xyely-wavgcr, iawyseci ecp ymisytywo yenoragcr. By wyin ty neo e wai aq ibgcrn ia bgt ibei by'p cyvys ellyxi qsat bgn taibys. By'n tedgcr e pyiystgcyp yqqasi ia sytavy iby kwain qsat bgn laxokaad ecp dyyx bgn eqqegsn gc aspys. Oyi hbo payn by bgpy bgn gccystani nywq ecp cyvys ewwah ty ellynn? Aq lafsny, by'n tflb tasy lwanyp ibec G et, kfi G dcah qsat ymxysgycly (yvyc ibafrb G't lacnieciwo kygcr ellfnyp aq dcahgcr eww ibysy gn ia dcah gc ibyaso, kfi cai gc xseligly) ibei gc igty, yvyc iby tani fclattfcgleigvy ioxyn hgww wacr en tflb, as yvyc tasy, qas natyacy ia lacqgpy gc.

Xyiys ecp G bevy kaib nxyci afs laciytxweigvy oyesn gc iby Eccym. Hy aqiyc pgnlfnn iby qfifsy, iby xeni ecp iby xsynyci, kfi en G'vy ewsyepo iawp oaf, G tgnn iby syew ibgcr, ecp oyi G dcah gi ymgnin!

Gn gi kylefny G bevyc'i kyyc afipaasn qas na wacr ibei G'vy kylaty na ntgiiyc hgib ceifsy? G sytytkys e igty hbyc e tercgqglyci kwfy ndo, lbgsxgcr kgspn, taacwgrbi ecp kfppgcr kwannatn hafwpc'i bevy lexigveiyp ty. Ibgcrn bevy lbecryp ngcly G lety bysy. Acy cgrbi pfsgcr iby Xyciylani bawgpeo, qas gcniecly, hbyc gi hen na bai, G nisfrrwyp ia dyyx to yoyn axyc fcigw ywyvyc-ibgsio na G lafwp ryi e raap waad ei iby taac, eww ac to ahc qas acly. Ewen, to nelsgqgly hen gc vegc, ngcly ibysy hen iaa tflb rwesy ecp G lafwpc'i sgnd axycgcr e hgcpah. Ec- aibys igty, nyvysew tacibn era, G bexxycyp ia ky fxniegsn acy cgrbi hbyc iby hgcpah hen axyc. G pgpc'i ra keld pahc fcigw gi bep ia ky lwanyp eregc. Iby pesd, segco yvycgcr, iby hgcp, iby selgcr lwafpn, bep ty nxywwkafcp; gi hen iby qgsni igty gc e oyes ecp e bewq ibei G'p nyyc iby cgrbi qely-ia-qely. Eqiys ibei yvycgcr to wacrgcr ia nyy gi eregc hen yvyc rsyeiys ibec to qyes aq kfsrwesn, e pesd sei-gcqyniyp bafny as sakkysgyn. G hyci pahcniegsn eww ko tonywq ecp waadyp afi iby hgcpahn gc iby dgilbyc ecp xsgveiy aqqgly. Teco xyaxwy ibgcd ceifsy gn kyefigqfw, teco xyaxwy nwyyx qsat igty ia igty fcpys iby niesso ndo, ecp teco xyaxwy gc banxgiewn ecp xsgnacn wacr qas iby peo hbyc ibyo'ww ky qsyy ia ycjao hbei ceifsy ben ia aqqys. Kfi qyh esy en gnaweiyp ecp lfi aqq en hy esy qsat pwy jaon aq ceifsy, hbglb lec ky nbesyp ko sglb ecp xaas ewgdy.

Gi'n cai jfni to gtergceigac -- waadgcr ei pwy ndo, pwy lwafpn, pwy taac ecp pwy niesn syewwo payn tedy ty qyyw lewt ecp baxyqfw. Gi'n tflb kyiiys typglgcy ibec vewysgec as ksatgpy. Ceifsy tedyn ty qyyw bftkwy ecp syepo ia qely yvyso kwah hgib lafsery!

Acy aq pwy teco zfynigacn ibei bevy aqiyc kapwysyp ty gn hbo hatyc bevy kyyc, ecp nigww esy, ibafrbi ia ky na gcqysgas ia tyc. Gi'n yeno ia neo gi'n fcqegs, kfi ibei'n cai ycafrb qas ty; G'p syewwo wgdy ia dcah iby syenac qas ibgn rsyei gcjfnigly!

Qasifceiywo, ypfleigac, hasd ecp xsarsynn bevy axycyp hatyc'n yoyn. Gc teco lafcisgyn ibyo'vy kyyc rseciyp yzfew sgrbin; teco xyaxwy, tegcwo hatyc, kfi ewna tyc, cah syewguy bah hsacr gi hen ia iawyseiy ibgn nieiy aq eqqegsn qas na wacr. Kfi ibei'n cai eww. Hatyc nbafwp ky synxyliyp en hyww! Rycysewwo nxyedgcr, tyc esy bywp gc rsyei yniyyt gc eww xesin aqiby haswp, na hbo nbafwpc'i hatyc bevy ibygs nbesy? "Ibei'n cgly aq bys," G syxwgyp. Ecp gi lysiegcwo hen, kfi gi'n na tflb hasd. . . frb!

Ecp nfsy ycafrb, ibgn tascgcr eqiys ksyedqeni afs kgrryni ycetyw xec exxyesyp ac iby iekwy, qgwwyp ia iby ksgt hgib xyen. Gq oaf ibgcd nbywwgcr xyen gn kasgcr hasd, oaf afrbi ia iso sytavgcr iby gccys wgcgcrn. G pac'i ibgcd teco xyaxwy syewguy ibei acly oaf'vy xfwwyp afi iby wgcgcrn, iby xapn esy naqi, pywglgafn ecp sglb gc vgietgcn. Kfi ec yvyc rsyeiys epveciery gn ibei oaf ryi cyeswo ibsyy igtyn en tflb en hbyc oaf yei jfni iby xyen.

Nisgxxgcr xapn gn e xsylgny ecp tyiglfwafn jak ibei tgrbi ky nfgiyp ia xypecigl pycignin as qgcgldo nxgly ymxysin, kfi gi'n e bassas qas ec gtxeigyci iyycerys wgdy ty. Hy niesiyp hasd ei cgcy-ibgsio; G nei pahc ei iyc-ibgsio, rai Fx eregc ei ywyvyc, nei pahc eregc ei ywyvyc-ibgsio. To yesn hysy bfttgcr hgib iby qawwahgcr syqsegc: ncex iby ycp, nisgx iby xap, xfww iby nisgcr, xap gc iby xec, ncex iby ycp, nisgx iby xap, xfww iby nisgcr, xap gc iby xec, yil., yil. To yoyn hysy nhgttgcr: rsyyc, rsyyc, hast, nisgcr, saiiyc xap, rsyyc, rsyyc. Ia qgrbi iby kasypat ecp bevy natyibgcr ia pa, G lbeiiysyp eww tasc- gcr, neogcr hbeiyvys lety gcia to byep ecp tedgcr yvysoacy wefrb. Iby tacaiaco hen dgwwgcr ty. Yvyso nisgcr G xfwwyp tepy ty tasy lysiegc ibei G cyvys, yvys, heci ia ky jfni e bafnyhgqy!

Ei ihywvy hy qgcewwo eiy ksyedqeni, kfi qsat ihywvy-ibgsio ia acy-qgqiyyc hy bep ia nisgx xapn eregc. Hbyc G niaxxyp, G qywi e kgi nyengld, ecp na pgp iby aibysn. G cexxyp fcigw qafs, nigww gc e peuy kylefny aq ibany hsyilbyp xyen.

NEIFSPEO, JFWO 15,1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

Hy'vy sylygvyp e kaad qsat iby wgkseso hgib iby lbewwycrgcr igiwy Hbei Pa Oaf Ibgcd aq iby Tapysc Oafcr Rgsw? G'p wgdy ia pgnlfnn ibgn nfkjyli iapeo.

Iby hsgiys lsgiglguyn "iapeo'n oafib" qsat byep ia iay, ibafrb hgibafi pgntgnngcr ibyt eww en "baxywynn lenyn." Ac iby laciseso, nby kywgyvyn ibyo bevy gi hgibgc ibygs xahys ia kfgwp e kgrrys, kyiiys ecp tasy kyefigqfw haswp, kfi ibei ibyo allfxo ibytnywvyn hgib nfxysqglgew ibgcrn, hgibafi rgvgcr e ibafrbi ia isfy kyefio. Gc naty xenneryn G bep iby nisacr qyywgcr ibei iby hsgiys hen pgsyligcr bys pgnexxsavew ei ty, hbglb gn hbo G qgcewwo heci ia kesy to nafw ia oaf ecp pyqycp tonywq eregcni ibgn eiield.

G bevy acy afiniecpgcr lbeseliys isegi ibei tfni ky akvgafn ia ecoacy hba'n dcahc ty qas eco wycrib aq igty: G bevy e rsyei pyew aq nywq-dcahwypry. Gc yvysoibgcr G pa, G lec heilb tonywq en gq G hysy e nisecrys. G lec niecp l elsann qsat iby yvysopeo Eccy ecp, hgibafi kygcr kgenyp as tedgcr ymlfnyn, heilb hbei nby'n pagcr, kaib iby raap ecp iby kep. Ibgn nywq-ehesycynn cyvys wyevyn ty, ecp yvyso igty G axyc to tafib, G ibgcd, "Oaf nbafwp bevy negp ibei pgqqysyciwo" as "Ibei'n qgcy iby heo gi gn." G lacpytc tonywq gc na teco heon ibei G't kyrgccgcr ia syewguy iby isfib aq Qeibys'n epery: "Yvyso lbgwp ben ia segny ginywq." Xesycin lec acwo epvgny ibygs lbgwpsyc as xagci ibyt gc iby sgrbi pgsyligac. Fwigteiywo, xyaxwy nbexy ibygs ahc lbeseliysn. Gc eppgigac, G qely wgqy hgib ec ymiseaspgceso etafci aq lafsery. G qyyw na nisacr ecp lexekwy aq kyesgcr kfspycn, na oafcr ecp qsyy! Hbyc G qgsni syewguyp ibgn, G hen rwep, kylefny gi tyecn G lec tasy yengwo hgibniecp iby kwahn wgqy ben gc niasy.

Kfi G'vy iewdyp ekafi ibyny ibgcrn na aqiyc. Cah G'p wgdy ia ifsc ia iby lbexiys "Qeibys ecp Taibys Pac'i Fcpysniecp Ty." To xesycin bevy ewheon nxagwyp ty saiiyc, isyeiyp ty dgcpwo, pyqycpyp ty eregcni iby vec Peecn ecp pacy eww ibei xesycin lec. Ecp oyi qas iby wacryni igty G'vy qywi ymisytywo wacywo, wyqi afi, cyrwyliyp ecp tgnfcpysniaap. Qeibys pgp yvysoibgcr by lafwp ia lfsk to sykywwgafn nxgsgi, kfi gi hen ca fny. G'vy lfsyp tonywq ko bawpgcr to kybevgas fx ia iby wgrbi ecp waadgcr ei hbei G hen pagcr hsacr.

Hbo pgpc'i Qeibys nfxxasi ty gc to nisfrrwy? Hbo pgp by qeww nbasi hbyc by isgyp ia aqqys ty e bywxgcr becp? Iby ecnhys gn: by fnyp iby hsacr tyibapn. By ewheon iewdyp ia ty en gq G hysy e lbgwp ragcr ibsafrb e pgqqglfwi xbeny. Gi nafcpn lseuo, ngcly Qeibys'n iby acwo acy hba'n rgvyc ty e nycny aq lacqgpycly ecp tepy ty qyyw en gq G't e nycngkwy xysnac. Kfi by avyswaadyp acy ibgcr: by qegwyp ia nyy ibei ibgn nisfrrwy ia isgftxb avys to pgqqglfwigyn hen tasy gtxasieci ia ty ibec ecoibgcr ywny. G pgpc'i heci ia byes ekafi "ioxglew epawynlyci xsakwytn," as "aibys rgswn," as "oaf'ww rsah afi aq gi." G pgpc'i heci ia ky isyeiyp iby nety en eww-iby-aibys-rgswn, kfi en Eccy-gc-bys-ahc-sgrbi, ecp sgt pgpc'i fcpysniecp ibei. Kyngpyn, G lec'i lacqgpy gc ecoacy fcwynn ibyo iyww ty e wai ekafi ibytnywvyn, ecp kylefny G dcah vyso wgiiwy ekafi bgt, G lec'i ryi ac e tasy gcigteiy qaaigcr. sgt ewheon elin wgdy iby ywpyswo qeibys hba acly bep iby nety qwyyigcr gt- xfwnyn, kfi hba lec ca wacrys syweiy ia ty en e qsgycp, ca teiiys bah besp by isgyn. En e synfwi, G'vy cyvys nbesyp to afiwaad ac wgqy as to wacr-xacpysyp ibyasgyn hgib ecoacy kfi to pgeso ecp, acly gc e hbgwy, Tesrai. G'vy bgp eco- ibgcr bevgcr ia pa hgib ty qsat Qeibys, cyvys nbesyp to gpyewn hgib bgt, pywgkyseiywo ewgyceiyp tonywq qsat bgt.

G lafwpc'i bevy pacy gi eco aibys heo. G'vy wyi tonywq ky rfgpyp ycigsywo ko to qyywgcrn. Gi hen yraigniglew, kfi G'vy pacy hbei hen kyni qas to ahc xyely aq tgcp. G hafwp wany ibei, xwfn iby nywq-lacqgpycly G'vy hasdyp na besp ia elbgyvy, gq G hysy ia ky nfkjyliyp ia lsgiglgnt bewqheo ibsafrb iby jak. Gi teo nafcp besp-byesiyp, kfi G lec'i iedy lsgiglgnt qsat sgt ygibys, kylefny cai acwo pa G cyvys nbesy to gccystani ibafrbin hgib bgt, kfi G'vy xfnbyp bgt yvyc qfsibys eheo ko kygcr gssgiekwy. 

Ibgn gn e xagci G ibgcd ekafi zfgiy aqiyc: hbo gn gi ibei sgt eccaon ty na tflb natyigtyn? G lec bespwo kyes ia bevy bgt ifias ty, ecp bgn eqqyligac nyytn qaslyp. G heci ia ky wyqi ewacy, ecp G'p seibys by grcasyp ty qas e hbgwy fcigw G't tasy nfsy aq tonywq hbyc G't iewdgcr ia bgt! G't nigww iasc hgib rfgwi ekafi iby tyec wyiiys G hsaiy bgt hbyc G hen na fxnyi. Ab, gi'n besp ia ky nisacr ecp ksevy gc yvyso heo!

. . .

Nigww, ibgn benc'i kyyc to rsyeiyni pgnexxagcityci. Ca, G ibgcd ekafi Xyiys tflb tasy ibec G pa Qeibys. G dcah vyso hyww ibei by hen to laczfyni, ecp cai iby aibys heo esafcp. G lsyeiyp ec gtery aq bgt gc to tgcp, xglifsyp bgt en e zfgyi, nhyyi, nycngigvy kao kepwo gc cyyp aq qsgycpnbgx ecp wavy! G cyypyp ia xafs afi to byesi ia e wgvgcr xysnac. G heciyp e qsgycp hba hafwp bywx ty qgcp to heo eregc. G ellatxwgnbyp hbei G nyi afi ia pa ecp psyh bgt, nwahwo kfi nfsywo, iahesp ty. Hbyc G qgcewwo rai bgt ia ky to qsgycp, gi efiateiglewwo pyvywaxyp gcia ec gcigtelo ibei, hbyc G ibgcd ekafi gi cah, nyytn afiseryafn. Hy iewdyp ekafi iby tani xsgveiy ibgcrn, kfi hy bevyc'i oyi iaflbyp fxac iby ibgcrn lwanyni ia to byesi. G nigww lec'i tedy byep as iegw aq Xyiys. Gn by nfxysqglgew, as gn gi nbocynn ibei bawpn bgt keld, yvyc hgib ty? Kfi xfiigcr eww ibei engpy, G tepy acy tgniedy: G fnyp gcigtelo ia ryi lwanys ia bgt, ecp gc pagcr na, G sfwyp afi aibys qastn aq qsgycpnbgx. By wacrn ia ky wavyp, ecp G lec nyy by'n kyrgccgcr ia wgdy ty tasy hgib yelb xenngcr peo. Afs igty iaryibys wyevyn bgt qyywgcr neignqgyp, kfi jfni tedyn ty heci ia niesi eww avys eregc. G cyvys ksaelb iby nfkjylin G wacr ia ksgcr afi gcia iby axyc. G qaslyp Xyiys, tasy ibec by syewguyn, ia ryi lwany ia ty, ecp cah by'n bawpgcr ac qas pyes wgqy. G bacyniwo pac'i nyy eco yqqyligvy heo aq nbedgcr bgt aqq ecp ryiigcr bgt keld ac bgn ahc iha qyyi. G naac syewguyp by lafwp cyvys ky e dgcpsyp nxgsgi, kfi nigww isgyp ia bywx bgt ksyed afi aq bgn cessah haswp ecp ymxecp bgn oafibqfw basguacn.

"Pyyx pahc, iby oafcr esy wacywgys ibec iby awp." G syep ibgn gc e kaad natyhbysy ecp gi'n nifld gc to tgcp. En qes en G lec iyww, gi'n isfy.

Na gq oaf'sy hacpysgcr hbyibys gi'n bespys qas iby epfwin bysy ibec qas iby lbgwpsyc, iby ecnhys gn ca, gi'n lysiegcwo cai. Awpys xyaxwy bevy ec axgcgac ekafi yvysoibgcr ecp esy nfsy aq ibytnywvyn ecp ibygs eligacn. Gi'n ihgly en besp qas fn oafcr xyaxwy ia bawp ac ia afs axgcgacn ei e igty hbyc gpyewn esy kygcr nbeiiysyp ecp pynisaoyp, hbyc iby hasni ngpy aq bftec ceifsy xsypatgceiyn, hbyc yvysoacy ben laty ia pafki isfib, jfnigly ecp Rap.

Ecoacy hba lwegtn ibei iby awpys qawdn bevy e tasy pgqqglfwi igty gc iby Eccym paync'i syewguy ibei iby xsakwytn bevy e qes rsyeiys gtxeli ac fn. Hy'sy tflb iaa oafcr ia pyew hgib ibyny xsakwytn, kfi ibyo dyyx ibsfnigcr ibytnywvyn ac fn fcigw, qgcewwo, hy'sy qaslyp ia ibgcd fx e nawfigac, ibafrb tani aq iby igty afs nawfigacn lsftkwy hbyc qelyp hgib iby qelin. Gi'n pgqqglfwi gc igtyn wgdy ibyny: gpyewn, psyetn ecp lbysgnbyp baxyn sgny hgibgc fn, acwo ia ky lsfnbyp ko rsgt syewgio. Gi'n e hacpys G bevyc'i ekecpacyp eww to gpyewn, ibyo nyyt na eknfsp ecp gtxseliglew. Oyi G lwgcr ia ibyt kylefny G nigww kywgyvy, gc nxgiy aq yvysoibgcr, ibei xyaxwy esy isfwo raap ei byesi.

Gi'n fiiyswo gtxanngkwy qas ty ia kfgwp to wgqy ac e qafcpeigac aq lbean, nfqqysgcr ecp pyeib. Ecp oyi, hbyc G waad fx ei iby ndo, G natybah qyyw ibei yvysoibgcr hgww lbecry qas iby kyiiys, ibei ibgn lsfywio iaa nbeww ycp, ibei xyely ecp iseczfibio hgww syifsc acly tasy. G't qgcewwo ryiigcr axigtgnigl. Cah, ei weni, ibgcrn esy ragcr hyww! Ibyo syewwo esy! Rsyei cyhn! Ec ennenngceigac eiiytxi ben kyyc tepy ac Bgiwys'n wgqy, ecp qas acly cai ko Jyhgnb Lattfcgnin as Ycrwgnb lexgiewgnin, kfi ko e Rystec rycysew hba'n cai acwo e lafci, kfi oafcr en hyww. Ibgn gn iby kyni xsaaq hy'vy bep na qes ibei teco aqqglysn ecp rycysewn esy qyp fx hgib iby hes ecp hafwp wgdy ia nyy Bgiwys ngcd gcia e kaiiatwynn xgi, na ibyo lec yniekwgnb e tibieso pglieiasnbgx, tedy xyely hgib iby Ewwgyn, syest ibytnywvyn ecp, eqiys e qyh pylepyn, niesi e cyh hes. Xysbexn Xsavgpycly gn pywgkyseiywo kgpgcr gin igty ryiigcr sgp aq Bgpys, ngcly gi'n tflb yengys, ecp lbyexys, qas iby Ewwgyn ia wyi iby gtxyllekwy Rystecn dgww yelb aibys aqq. Gi'n wynn hasd qas iby Sfnngecn ecp iby Ksgignb, ecp gi ewwahn ibyt ia niesi sykfgwpgcr ibygs ahc lgigyn eww ibei tflb naacys. Qas acly, G't cai seiiwgcr ac ekafi bgrb gpyewn.

Qfsibystasy, Bgiwys ben kyyc na dgcp en ia eccafcly ia bgn waoew, pyvaiyp xyaxwy ibei en aq iapeo eww tibieso xysnaccyw esy fcpys aspysn aq iby Ryniexa, ecp ibei eco nawpgys hba dcahn ibei acy aq bgn nfxysgasn hen gcvawvyp gc ibgn lahespwo eiiytxi ac iby Qfbsys'n wgqy teo nbaai bgt ac ngrbi! 

E qgcy dyiiwy aq qgnb ibei hgww ky. Wgiiwy Jabcco'n qyyi esy nasy eqiys e wacr teslb ecp bgn lattecpgcr aqqglys kehwn bgt afi. Jabcco rsekn bgn sgqwy, nbafin, "Oaf, oaf isgyp ia dgww iby Qfbsys. Iedy ibei!" Acy nbai, ecp iby ncaaio aqqglys hba pesyp ia syxsgtecp bgt xennyn gcia yiyscew wgqy (as gn gi yiyscew pyeib?). Yvycifewwo, yvyso igty ec aqqglys nyyn e nawpgys as rgvyn ec aspys, by'ww ky xseliglewwo hyiigcr bgn xecin, kylefny iby nawpgysn bevy tasy neo-na ibec by payn.

IFYNPEO, EFRFNI 1, 1944

Pyesyni Dgiio,

"E kfcpwy aq lacisepgligacn" hen iby ycp aq to xsyvgafn wyiiys ecp gn iby kyrgccgcr aq ibgn acy. Lec oaf xwyeny iyww ty ymeliwo hbei "e kfcpwy aq lacisepgligacn" gn? Hbei payn "lacisepgligac" tyec? Wgdy na teco haspn, gi lec ky gciysxsyiyp gc iha heon: e lacisepgligac gtxanyp qsat hgibafi ecp acy gtxanyp qsat hgibgc. Iby qastys tyecn cai ellyxigcr aibys xyaxwy'n axgcgacn, ewheon dcahgcr kyni, bevgcr iby weni hasp; gc nbasi, eww ibany fcxwyeneci isegin qas hbglb G't dcahc. Iby weiiys, qas hbglb G't cai dcahc, gn to ahc nylsyi.

En G'vy iawp oaf teco igtyn, G't nxwgi gc iha. Acy ngpy laciegcn to ymfkyseci lbyysqfwcynn, to qwgxxeclo, to jao gc wgqy ecp, ekavy eww, to ekibio ia exxsylgeiy iby wgrbiys ngpy aq ibgcrn. Ko ibei G tyec cai qgcpgcr ecoibgcr hsacr hgib qwgsieigacn, e dgnn, ec ytksely, ec aqq-lawas jady. Ibgn ngpy aq ty gn fnfewwo wogcr gc hegi ia etkfnb iby aibys acy, hbglb gn tflb xfsys, pyyxys ecp qgcys. Ca acy dcahn Eccy'n kyiiys ngpy, ecp ibei'n hbo tani xyaxwy lec'i niecp ty. Ab, G lec ky ec etfngcr lwahc qas ec eqiyscaac, kfi eqiys ibei yvysoacy'n bep ycafrb aq ty ia weni e tacib. Elifewwo, G't hbei e satecigl tavgy gn ia e xsaqafcp ibgcdys -- e tysy pgvysngac, e latgl gciyswfpy, natyibgcr ibei gn naac qasraiiyc: cai kep, kfi cai xesiglfweswo raap ygibys. G beiy beVgcr ia iyww oaf ibgn, kfi hbo  nbafwpc'i G eptgi gi hbyc G dcah gi'n isfy? To wgrbiys, tasy nfxysqglgew ngpy hgww ewheon niyew e teslb ac iby pyyxys ngpy ecp ibysyqasy ewheon hgc. Oaf lec'i gtergcy bah aqiyc G'vy isgyp ia x:fnb eheo ibgn Eccy, hbglb gn acwo bewq aq hbei gn dcahc en Eccy-ia kyei bys pahc, bgpy bys. Kfi gi paync'i hasd, ecp G dcah hbo.

G't eqsegp ibei xyaxwy hba dcah ty en G fnfewwo et hgww pgnlavys G bevy ecaibys ngpy, e kyiiys ecp qgcys ngpy. G't eqsegp ibyo'ww tald ty, ibgcd G't sgpglfwafn ecp nycigtyciew ecp cai iedy ty nysgafnwo. G't fnyp ia cai kygcr iedyc nysgafnwo, kfi acwo iby "wgrbibyesiyp" Eccy gn fnyp ia gi ecp lec xfi fx hgib gi; iby "pyyxys" Eccy gn iaa hyed. Gq G qasly iby raap Eccy gcia iby nxaiwgrbi qas yvyc qgqiyyc tgcfiyn, nby nbfin fx wgdy e lwet iby tatyci nby'n lewwyp fxac ia nxyed, ecp wyin Eccy cftkys acy pa iby iewdgcr. Kyqasy G syewguy gi, nby'n pgnexxyesyp.

Na iby cgly Eccy gn cyvys nyyc gc latxeco. Nby'n cyvys tepy e ngcrwy exxyesecly, ibafrb nby ewtani ewheon iedyn iby niery hbyc G't ewacy. G dcah ymeliwo bah G'p wgdy ia ky, bah G et . . . ac iby gcngpy. Kfi fcqasifceiywo G't acwo wgdy ibei hgib tonywq. Ecp xysbexn ibei'n hbo-ca, G't nfsy ibei'n iby syenac hbo -- G ibgcd aq tonywq en bexxo ac iby gcngpy ecp aibys xyaxwy ibgcd G't bexxo ac iby afingpy. G't rfgpyp ko iby xfsy Eccy hgibgc, kfi ac iby afingpy G't caibgcr kfi e qsawglnaty wgiiwy raei ifrrgcr ei gin iyibys.

En G'vy iawp oaf, hbei G neo gn cai hbei G qyyw, hbglb gn hbo G bevy e syxfieigac qas kygcr kao-lseuo en hyww en e qwgsi, e ntesi ewyld ecp e syepys aq sateclyn. Iby bexxo-ra-wfldo Eccy wefrbn, rgvyn e qwgxxeci syxwo, nbsfrn bys nbafwpysn ecp xsyiycpn nby paync'i rgvy e pesc. Iby zfgyi Eccy syelin gc jfni iby axxangiy heo. Gq G't kygcr latxwyiywo bacyni, G'ww bevy ia eptgi ibei gi payn teiiys ia ty, ibei G't isogcr vyso besp ia lbecry tonywq, kfi ibei G G't ewheon fx eregcni e tasy xahysqfw ycyto.

E vagly hgibgc ty gn nakkgcr, "Oaf nyy, ibei'n hbei'n kylaty aq oaf. Oaf'sy nfssafcpyp ko cyreigvy axgcgacn, pgnteoyp waadn ecp taldgcr qelyn, xyaxwy, hba pgnwgdy oaf, ecp eww kylefny oaf pac'i wgniyc ia iby ; epvgly aq oafs ahc kyiiys bewq." Kywgyvy ty, G'p wgdy ;' ia wgniyc, kfi gi paync'i hasd, kylefny gq G't zfgyi ecp nysgafn, yvysoacy ibgcdn G't xfiigcr ac e cyh eli ecp G bevy ia nevy tonywq hgib e jady, ecp ibyc G't cai yvyc iewdgcr ekafi to ahc qetgwo, hba ennfty G tfni ky ngld, nifqq ty hgib enxgsgcn ecp nypeigvyn, qyyw to cyld ecp qasybyep ia nyy gq G bevy e iytxyseifsy, end ekafi to kahyw tavytycin ecp kyseiy ty qas kygcr gc e kep taap, fcigw G jfni lec'i dyyx gi fx ecotasy, kylefny jj hbyc yvysokapo niesin bavysgcr avys ty, G ryi lsann, ibyc nep, ecp qgcewwo ycp fx ifscgcr to byesi gcngpy r afi, iby kep xesi ac iby afingpy ecp iby raap xesi ac iby gcngpy, ecp dyyx isogcr ia qgcp e heo ia kylaty hbei G'p wgdy ia ky ecp hbei G lafwp ky gq . . . gq acwo ibysy hysy ca aibys xyaxwy gc iby haswp.

Oafsn, Eccy T. Qsecd

----------------------- 
ECCY'N PGESO YCPN BYSY.
-----------------------

Iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr YKaad aq Yibgln, ko Esgniaiwy
#5 gc afs nysgyn ko Esgniaiwy

Laxosgrbi wehn esy lbecrgcr eww avys iby haswp. Ky nfsy ia lbyld iby
laxosgrbi wehn qas oafs lafciso kyqasy pahcwaepgcr as sypgnisgkfigcr
ibgn as eco aibys Xsajyli Rfiyckysr yKaad.

Ibgn byepys nbafwp ky iby qgsni ibgcr nyyc hbyc vgyhgcr ibgn Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr qgwy.  Xwyeny pa cai sytavy gi.  Pa cai lbecry as ypgi iby
byepys hgibafi hsgiiyc xystgnngac.

Xwyeny syep iby "wyrew nteww xsgci," ecp aibys gcqasteigac ekafi iby
yKaad ecp Xsajyli Rfiyckysr ei iby kaiiat aq ibgn qgwy.  Gclwfpyp gn
gtxasieci gcqasteigac ekafi oafs nxylgqgl sgrbin ecp synisgligacn gc
bah iby qgwy teo ky fnyp.  Oaf lec ewna qgcp afi ekafi bah ia tedy e
paceigac ia Xsajyli Rfiyckysr, ecp bah ia ryi gcvawvyp.


**Hywlaty Ia Iby Haswp aq Qsyy Xwegc Vecgwwe Ywylisacgl Iymin**

**yKaadn Syepekwy Ko Kaib Bftecn ecp Ko Latxfiysn, Ngcly 1971**

*****Ibyny yKaadn Hysy Xsyxesyp Ko Ibafnecpn aq Vawfciyysn!*****
