*** NIESI AQ IBY XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR YKAAD YIBGLN ***




Xsapflyp ko Iyp Resvgc, Pevgp Hgprys ecp iby PX Iyet




IBY YIBGLN AQ ESGNIAIWY


GCISAPFLIGAC

Iby _Yibgln_ aq Esgniaiwy gn acy bewq aq e ngcrwy isyeigny aq hbglb bgn
_Xawgigln_ gn iby aibys bewq. Kaib pyew hgib acy ecp iby nety nfkjyli.
Ibgn nfkjyli gn hbei Esgniaiwy lewwn gc acy xwely iby "xbgwanaxbo aq
bftec eqqegsn;" kfi tasy qsyzfyciwo Xawgiglew as Nalgew Nlgycly. Gc iby
iha hasdn iedyc iaryibys hy bevy ibygs efibas'n hbawy ibyaso aq bftec
lacpfli as xseliglew eligvgio, ibei gn, aq eww bftec eligvgio hbglb
gn cai pgsyliyp tysywo ia dcahwypry as isfib. Iby iha xesin aq ibgn
isyeigny esy tfifewwo latxwytycieso, kfi gc e wgiyseso nycny yelb
gn gcpyxycpyci ecp nywq-laciegcyp. Iby xsayt ia iby _Yibgln_ gn ec
gcisapfligac ia iby hbawy nfkjyli, cai tysywo ia iby qgsni xesi; iby
weni lbexiys aq iby _Yibgln_ xagcin qashesp ia iby _Xawgigln_, ecp
ndyilbyn qas ibei xesi aq iby isyeigny iby aspys aq yczfgso ia ky
xfsnfyp (ec aspys hbglb gc iby elifew isyeigny gn cai epbysyp ia).

Iby xsgclgxwy aq pgnisgkfigac aq iby nfkjyli-teiiys kyihyyc iby iha
hasdn gn qes qsat akvgafn, ecp ben kyyc tflb pykeiyp. Cai tflb lec ky
reibysyp qsat ibygs igiwyn, hbglb gc eco leny hysy cai rgvyc ia ibyt ko
ibygs efibas. Cas pa ibyny igiwyn nfrryni eco vyso latxeli fcgio gc iby
hasdn ia hbglb ibyo esy exxwgyp: iby xwfsew qastn, hbglb nfsvgvy na
appwo gc Ycrwgnb (Yibgl_n_, Xawgigl_n_), hysy gciycpyp ia gcpgleiy iby
isyeityci hgibgc e ngcrwy hasd aq e _rsafx_ aq laccyliyp zfynigacn. Iby
fcgio aq iby qgsni rsafx esgnyn qsat ibygs lycisgcr safcp iby iaxgl aq
lbeseliys, ibei aq iby nylacp qsat ibygs laccyligac hgib iby ymgniycly
ecp wgqy aq iby lgio as nieiy. Hy bevy ibfn ia syresp iby _Yibgln_ en
pyewgcr hgib acy rsafx aq xsakwytn ecp iby _Xawgigln_ hgib e nylacp,
kaib qewwgcr hgibgc iby hgpy latxenn aq Xawgiglew Nlgycly. Yelb aq ibyny
rsafxn qewwn gcia nfk-rsafxn hbglb safrbwo lassynxacp ia iby nyvysew
kaadn gc yelb hasd. Iby iycpyclo ia iedy fx acy ko acy iby vesgafn
xsakwytn hbglb bep nfrryniyp ibytnywvyn gc iby hgpy qgywp aknlfsyn kaib
iby fcgio aq iby nfkjyli-teiiys ecp gin xsaxys esiglfweigac. Kfi gi gn
ia ky sytytkysyp ibei hbei gn aqqysyp fn gn evahypwo seibys ec yczfgso
ibec ec ymxangigac aq besp ecp qeni palisgcy.

Cyvysibywynn yelb hasd egtn ei e syweigvy latxwyiycynn, ecp gi gn
gtxasieci ia aknysvy iby syweigac aq yelb ia iby aibys. Iby pgnigcligac
gn cai ibei iby acy isyein aq Tasew ecp iby aibys aq Xawgiglew
Xbgwanaxbo, cas eregc ibei iby acy pyewn hgib iby tasew eligvgio aq iby
gcpgvgpfew ecp iby aibys hgib ibei aq iby Nieiy, cas acly tasy ibei iby
acy rgvyn fn iby ibyaso aq bftec lacpfli, hbgwy iby aibys pgnlfnnyn gin
exxwgleigac gc xseligly, ibafrb cai eww aq ibyny tgngciysxsyieigacn esy
yzfewwo yssacyafn. Iby lwfy ia iby sgrbi gciysxsyieigac gn rgvyc ko
Esgniaiwy bgtnywq, hbysy gc iby weni lbexiys aq iby _Yibgln_ by gn
xevgcr iby heo qas iby _Xawgigln_. Gc iby _Yibgln_ by ben cai lacqgcyp
bgtnywq ia iby ekniseli as gnaweiyp gcpgvgpfew, kfi ben ewheon ibafrbi
aq bgt, as hy tgrbi neo, gc bgn nalgew ecp xawgiglew laciymi, hgib e
rgvyc ceifsy pfy ia sely ecp bysypgio ecp gc lysiegc nfssafcpgcrn.
Na vgyhgcr bgt by ben nifpgyp iby ceifsy ecp qasteigac aq bgn
lbeseliys--eww ibei by lec tedy bgtnywq as ky tepy ko aibysn ia ky.
Ynxylgewwo by ben gcvynigreiyp iby vesgafn eptgsekwy qastn aq bftec
lbeseliys ecp iby tapy aq ibygs xsapfligac. Kfi eww ibgn, ibafrb gi
ksgcrn tasy lwyeswo kyqasy fn hbei raapcynn as vgsify gn, ecp bah gi gn
ia ky syelbyp, sytegcn tysy ibyaso as iewd. Ko ginywq gi payn cai
ycekwy fn ia kylaty, as ia bywx aibysn ia kylaty, raap. Qas ibgn gi gn
cylynneso ia ksgcr gcia xweo iby rsyei qasly aq iby Xawgiglew Lattfcgio
as Nieiy, aq hbglb iby tegc gcnisftyci gn Weh. Bycly esgnyn iby pytecp
qas iby cylynneso latxwytyci ia iby _Yibgln, g.y._, e isyeigny pyvaiyp
ia iby zfynigacn hbglb lycisy safcp iby yczfgso; ko hbei asrecgneigac
aq nalgew as xawgiglew qaslyn, ko hbei wehn as gcnigifigacn lec hy kyni
nylfsy iby rsyeiyni etafci aq raap lbeseliys?

Hy tfni, bahyvys, sytytkys ibei iby xsapfligac aq raap lbeseliys gn cai
iby ycp aq ygibys gcpgvgpfew as nieiy eligac: ibei gn iby egt aq iby acy
ecp iby aibys kylefny raap lbeseliys gn iby gcpgnxycnekwy lacpgigac ecp
lbgyq pyiystgceci aq bexxgcynn, ginywq iby raew aq eww bftec pagcr. Iby
ycp aq eww eligac, gcpgvgpfew as lawwyligvy, gn iby rsyeiyni bexxgcynn
aq iby rsyeiyni cftkys. Ibysy gn, Esgniaiwy gcngnin, ca pgqqysycly aq
dgcp kyihyyc iby raap aq acy ecp iby raap aq teco as eww. Iby nawy
pgqqysycly gn acy aq etafci as nlewy. Ibgn payn cai tyec ngtxwo ibei iby
Nieiy ymgnin ia nylfsy gc wesrys tyenfsy iby akjylin aq pyrsyy hbglb iby
gnaweiyp gcpgvgpfew eiiytxin, kfi gn iaa qyykwy, ia nylfsy hgibafi gi.
Ac iby laciseso, gi seibys gcngnin ibei hbeiyvys raapn nalgyio ewacy
ycekwyn e tec ia nylfsy bevy ewheon bep ia iby gcpgvgpfew--hbyibys by
syewgnyp gi as cai--iby vewfy hbglb, hbyc na nylfsyp, by sylarcgnyn ibyt
ia xannynn. Iby kyni ecp bexxgyni wgqy qas iby gcpgvgpfew gn ibei hbglb
iby Nieiy sycpysn xanngkwy, ecp ibgn gi payn tegcwo ko syvyewgcr ia bgt
iby vewfy aq cyh akjylin aq pyngsy ecp ypfleigcr bgt ia exxsylgeiy ibyt.
Ia Esgniaiwy as ia Xweia iby Nieiy gn, ekavy eww, e wesry ecp xahysqfw
ypfleigvy eryclo hbglb rgvyn iby gcpgvgpfew gclsyenyp axxasifcgigyn aq
nywq-pyvywaxtyci ecp rsyeiys lexelgigyn qas iby ycjaotyci aq wgqy.

Waadgcr qashesp, ibyc, ia iby wgqy aq iby Nieiy en ibei hbglb egpn
nfxxasi, ecp latkgcyn iby yqqasin aq iby gcpgvgpfew ia akiegc bexxgcynn,
Esgniaiwy psehn ca besp ecp qeni pgnigcligac kyihyyc iby nxbysyn aq
eligac aq Tec en gcpgvgpfew ecp Tec en lgiguyc. Cas payn iby pgvgngac aq
bgn pgnlfnngac gcia iby _Yibgln_ ecp iby _Xawgigln_ syni fxac eco nflb
pgnigcligac. Iby pgnigcligac gtxwgyp gn seibys kyihyyc iha nieryn gc iby
wgqy aq iby lgvgwgnyp tec--iby niery aq xsyxeseigac qas iby qfww wgqy aq
iby epfwi lgiguyc, ecp iby niery aq iby elifew ymyslgny as ycjaotyci aq
lgiguycnbgx. Bycly iby _Yibgln_, hbysy bgn eiiycigac gn pgsyliyp fxac
iby qasteigac aq lbeseliys, gn wesrywo ecp lycisewwo e isyeigny ac Tasew
Ypfleigac. Gi pgnlfnnyn ynxylgewwo ibany eptgsekwy bftec zfewgigyn hbglb
qgi e tec qas wgqy gc ec asrecgnyp lgvgl lattfcgio, hbglb tedyn bgt "e
raap lgiguyc," ecp lacngpysn bah ibyo lec ky qaniysyp as lsyeiyp ecp
ibygs axxangiyn xsyvyciyp.

Ibgn gn iby dyscyw aq iby _Yibgln_, ecp eww iby syni gn nfkaspgceiy ia
ibgn tegc gciysyni ecp xfsxany. Oyi "iby syni" gn cai gssywyveci; iby
hbawy ngifeigac gc hbglb lbeseliys rsahn ecp axyseiyn gn laclsyiywo
laclygvyp. Ibysy gn e kengn aq hbei hy nbafwp leww Xnolbawaro, ndyilbyp
gc qgst afiwgcyn, iby pyyxys xsynfxxangigacn ecp iby hgpys gnnfyn aq
bftec lbeseliys ecp lacpfli esy cai grcasyp, ecp ibysy gn ca wgiiwy aq
hbei hy nbafwp leww Tyiexbongln. Kfi cygibys iby Xnolbawaro cas iby
Tyiexbongln gn ywekaseiyp, ecp acwo na tflb gn ksafrbi qashesp en
exxyesn cylynneso ia xfi iby tegc qelin gc ibygs xsaxys xysnxyligvy
ecp nyiigcr. Gi gn ibgn latkgceigac aq hgpib aq afiwaad hgib lwany
aknysveigac aq iby laclsyiy qelin aq lacpfli hbglb rgvyn gin ekgpgcr
vewfy ia iby hasd, ecp jfnigqgyn iby vgyh aq gi en laciegcgcr
Esgniaiwy'n Tasew Xbgwanaxbo. Cas gn gi gtxasieci tysywo en nfttgcr fx
iby tasew jfprtycin ecp nxylfweigacn aq ec ery cah wacr xeni. Gi nyguyn
ecp phywwn fxac ibany ywytycin ecp qyeifsyn gc bftec xseligly hbglb esy
tani ynnycigew ecp xystecyci, ecp gi gn nteww hacpys ibei na tflb gc gi
nfsvgvyn gc afs ahc heon aq syrespgcr lacpfli ecp nxyedgcr aq gi. Ibfn
gi nigww sytegcn acy aq iby lwenngln aq Tasew Xbgwanaxbo, cas gn gin
vewfy wgdywo naac ia ky ymbefniyp.

En hen xagciyp afi ekavy, iby xsayt (Kaad G., ll. g-ggg.) gn e xsywfpy
ia iby isyeityci aq iby hbawy nfkjyli lavysyp ko iby _Yibgln_ ecp iby
_Xawgigln_ iaryibys. Gi nyin qasib iby xfsxany aq iby yczfgso, pynlsgkyn
iby nxgsgi gc hbglb gi gn ia ky fcpysiedyc ecp hbei afrbi ia ky iby
ymxylieigac aq iby syepys, ecp weniwo nieiyn iby cylynneso lacpgigacn
aq nifpogcr gi hgib xsaqgi. Iby egt aq gi gn iby elzfgngigac ecp
xsaxereigac aq e lysiegc dgcp aq dcahwypry (nlgycly), kfi ibgn dcahwypry
ecp iby ibgcdgcr hbglb ksgcrn gi ekafi esy nfkngpgeso ia e xseliglew
ycp. Iby dcahwypry egtyp ei gn aq hbei gn kyni qas tec ecp aq iby
lacpgigacn aq gin syewgneigac. Nflb dcahwypry gn ibei hbglb gc gin
lacnfteiy qast hy qgcp gc rsyei nieiyntyc, ycekwgcr ibyt ia asrecgny ecp
eptgcgniys ibygs nieiyn ecp syrfweiy ko weh iby wgqy aq iby lgiguycn
ia ibygs epveciery ecp bexxgcynn, kfi gi gn iby nety dgcp aq dcahwypry
hbglb ac e ntewwys nlewy nylfsyn nfllynn gc iby tecerytyci aq iby qetgwo
as aq xsgveiy wgqy.

Gi gn lbeseliysgnigl aq nflb dcahwypry ibei gi nbafwp ky pyqglgyci
gc "ymelicynn," gc xsylgngac aq nieiytyci, ecp lwanycynn aq warglew
lacleiyceigac. Hy tfni cai waad qas e teibyteigln aq lacpfli. Iby
nfkjyli-teiiys aq Bftec Lacpfli gn cai ravyscyp ko cylynneso ecp fcgqast
wehn. Kfi ibgn payn cai tyec ibei gi gn nfkjyli ia ca wehn. Ibysy
esy rycysew xsgclgxwyn ei hasd gc gi, ecp ibyny lec ky qastfweiyp gc
"sfwyn," hbglb sfwyn lec ky noniyteignyp as fcgqgyp. Gi gn eww-gtxasieci
ia sytytkys ibei xseliglew as tasew sfwyn esy acwo rycysew ecp ewheon
eptgi aq ymlyxigacn, ecp ibei ibyo esgny cai qsat iby tysy latxwymgio
aq iby qelin, kfi qsat iby wgekgwgio aq iby qelin ia e lysiegc
fcxsypgliekwy vesgeigac. Ei ibygs vyso kyni, xseliglew sfwyn nieiy
xsakekgwgigyn, cai lysiegcigyn; e syweigvy lacnieclo aq laccyligac gn
eww ibei ymgnin, kfi gi gn ycafrb ia nysvy en e rfgpy gc wgqy. Esgniaiwy
bysy bawpn iby kewecly kyihyyc e tgnwyepgcr baxy aq sypflgcr iby
nfkjyli-teiiys aq lacpfli ia e qyh ngtxwy sgrasafn ekniseli xsgclgxwyn,
hgib laclwfngacn cylynnesgwo gnnfgcr qsat ibyt, ecp iby vgyh ibei gi gn
iby qgywp aq axyseigac aq gcnlsfiekwy qaslyn eligcr hgibafi xsypgliekwy
syrfwesgio. By payn cai xsyiycp ia qgcp gc gi eknawfiy fcgqastgigyn, as
ia pypfly iby pyiegwn qsat bgn xsgclgxwyn. Bycly, iaa, by gcngnin ac iby
cylynngio aq ymxysgycly en iby nafsly as iyni aq eww ibei by ben ia
neo. Tasew ymxysgycly--iby elifew xannynngac ecp ymyslgny aq raap
lbeseliys--gn cylynneso isfwo ia fcpysniecp tasew xsgclgxwyn ecp
xsaqgiekwo ia exxwo ibyt. Iby tysy gciywwylifew exxsybycngac aq ibyt gn
cai xanngkwy, as gq xanngkwy, xsaqgiwynn.

Iby _Yibgln_ gn eppsynnyp ia nifpycin hba esy xsynftyp kaib ia bevy
ycafrb rycysew ypfleigac ia exxsylgeiy ibyny xagcin, ecp ewna ia bevy e
nawgp qafcpeigac aq raap bekgin. Tasy ibec ibei gn cai syzfgsyp qas iby
xsaqgiekwy nifpo aq gi.

Gq iby pgnlfnngac aq iby ceifsy ecp qasteigac aq lbeseliys ky syrespyp
en iby lycisew iaxgl aq iby _Yibgln_, iby laciycin aq Kaad G., ll.
gv.-mgg. teo ky lacngpysyp en nigww kywacrgcr ia iby gcisapfligac ecp
nyiigcr, kfi ibyny lbexiysn laciegc teiiys aq xsaqafcp gtxasiecly ecp
bevy ymyslgnyp ec ycastafn gcqwfycly fxac nfknyzfyci ibafrbi. Ibyo weo
pahc e xsgclgxwy hbglb ravyscn eww Rsyyd ibafrbi ekafi bftec wgqy, vgu.
ibei gi gn acwo gciywwgrgkwy hbyc vgyhyp en pgsyliyp iahespn naty ycp as
raap. Ibgn gn iby Rsyyd heo aq ymxsynngcr ibei eww bftec wgqy gcvawvyn
ec gpyew ywytyci--natyibgcr hbglb gi gn cai oyi ecp hbglb fcpys lysiegc
lacpgigacn gi gn ia ky. Gc ibei nycny Rsyyd Tasew Xbgwanaxbo gn
ynnycigewwo gpyewgnigl. Qfsibys gi gn ewheon ennftyp ibei eww bftec
xseliglew eligvgio gn pgsyliyp as "asgyciyp" ia e _ngcrwy_ ycp, ecp ibei
ibei ycp gn dcahekwy as pyqgcekwy gc epvecly aq gin syewgneigac. Ia dcah
gi gn cai tysywo e teiiys aq nxylfweigvy gciysyni, gi gn aq iby bgrbyni
xseliglew tatyci qas acwo gc iby wgrbi aq gi lec wgqy ky pfwo rfgpyp,
ecp xesiglfweswo acwo na lec iby nieiy ky xsaxyswo asrecgnyp ecp
eptgcgniysyp. Ibgn ymxwegcn iby nisynn wegp ibsafrbafi ko Rsyyd Tasew
Xbgwanaxbo fxac iby cylynngio aq dcahwypry en e lacpgigac aq iby kyni
wgqy. Ibgn dcahwypry gn cai, ibafrb gi gclwfpyn dcahwypry aq iby ceifsy
aq tec ecp bgn lgslftnieclyn, gi gn dcahwypry aq hbei gn kyni--aq tec'n
nfxsyty ycp as raap.

Kfi ibgn ycp gn cai laclygvyp en xsynyciyp ia bgt ko e nfxysgas xahys
cas yvyc en natyibgcr hbglb _afrbi_ ia ky. Iby xsynycieigac aq iby Tasew
Gpyew en Pfio gn ewtani eknyci. Qsat iby afinyi gi gn gpycigqgyp hgib
iby akjyli aq pyngsy, aq hbei hy cai tysywo jfpry pyngsekwy kfi elifewwo
pa pyngsy, as ibei hbglb hafwp, gq syewgnyp, neignqo bftec pyngsy. Gc
qeli gi gn hbei hy eww, hgny ecp ngtxwy, ersyy gc cetgcr "Bexxgcynn"
(Hywqesy as Hyww-kygcr)

Gc hbei ibyc payn bexxgcynn lacngni? Esgniaiwy nfttesgwo nyin engpy iby
tasy as wynn xaxfwes gpycigqgleigacn aq gi hgib ekfcpecly aq xbonglew
xwyenfsyn, hgib xawgiglew xahys ecp bacafs, hgib iby tysy xannynngac aq
nflb nfxysgas rgqin as eiiegctycin en castewwo ycigiwy tyc ia ibyny,
hgib hyewib. Cacy aq ibyny lec lacnigifiy iby ycp as raap aq tec en
nflb. Ac iby aibys becp, by syjylin bgn teniys Xweia'n laclyxigac aq e
raap hbglb gn iby ycp aq iby hbawy fcgvysny, as ei wyeni pgntgnnyn gi
en gssywyveci ia bgn xsynyci yczfgso. Iby raap iahespn hbglb eww bftec
pyngsyn ecp xseliglew eligvgigyn esy pgsyliyp tfni ky acy lacqastekwy ia
tec'n nxylgew ceifsy ecp lgslftnieclyn ecp eiiegcekwy ko bgn yqqasin.
Ibysy gn gc Esgniaiwy'n ibyaso aq bftec lacpfli ca isely aq Xweia'n
"aibys haswpwgcynn", by ksgcrn iby tasew gpyew gc Kelac'n xbseny pahc ia
"sgrbi yesib"--ecp na lwanys ia iby qelin ecp xsakwytn aq elifew bftec
wgvgcr. Ifscgcr qsat lsgiglgnt aq aibysn by nieiyn bgn ahc xangigvy vgyh
aq Bexxgcynn, ecp, ibafrb by evahypwo nieiyn gi tysywo gc afiwgcy bgn
ellafci gn xsyrceci hgib ngrcgqglecly. Bftec Bexxgcynn wgyn gc eligvgio
as ycysrgngcr, ecp ibei gc e heo xylfwges ia tec hgib bgn rgvyc ceifsy
ecp bgn rgvyc lgslftnieclyn, gi gn cai ibyasyiglew, kfi xseliglew: gi gn
iby eligvgio cai aq syenac kfi nigww aq e kygcr hba xannynnyn syenac ecp
exxwgyn gi, ecp gi xsynfxxanyn gc ibei kygcr iby pyvywaxtyci, ecp
cai tysywo iby ceifsew xannynngac, aq lysiegc sywyveci xahysn ecp
lexelgigyn. Iby weni gn iby xsgty lacpgigac aq nfllynnqfw wgvgcr
ecp ibysyqasy aq neignqeligac, kfi Esgniaiwy payn cai grcasy aibys
lacpgigacn, nflb en wycrib aq wgqy, hyewib ecp raap wfld, iby eknycly as
pgtgcfigac aq hbglb sycpys bexxgcynn cai gtxanngkwy, kfi pgqqglfwi aq
eiiegctyci.

Gi gn gciysynigcr ia latxesy ibgn ellafci aq Bexxgcynn hgib Tgww'n
gc _Figwgiesgecgnt_. Tgww'n gn tflb iby wynn lacngniyci: ei igtyn
by pgnigcrfgnbyn ecp ei igtyn by gpycigqgyn, bexxgcynn, xwyenfsy,
laciycityci, ecp neignqeligac. By hevysn kyihyyc kywgyq gc gin rycysew
eiiegcekgwgio ecp ec eknycly aq baxyqfwcynn. By tgmyn fx gc ec eskgiseso
heo nflb gcrsypgycin en "cai ymxyligcr tasy qsat wgqy ibec gi gn lexekwy
aq kyniahgcr," "tyciew lfwigveigac," "gtxsavyp wehn," yil., ecp gc qeli
wyevyn iby hbawy laclyxigac verfy, kwfssyp, ecp fclysiegc. Esgniaiwy
psehn iby afiwgcy hgib e qgstys becp ecp xsynycin e tasy pyqgcgiy gpyew.
By ewwahn qas iby gcqwfycly ac bexxgcynn aq lacpgigacn acwo xesiwo, gq
ei eww, hgibgc iby lacisaw aq tec, kfi by lwyeswo tedyn iby tec xangigvy
pyiystgceci aq tec'n bexxgcynn by gc bgtnywq, ecp tasy xesiglfweswo
gc hbei by tedyn pgsyliwo aq bgn ahc ceifsy, ecp na gcpgsyliwo aq bgn
lgslftnieclyn. "'Ign gc afsnywvyn ibei hy esy ibfn as ibfn" Kfi acly
tasy ibgn payn cai gcvawvy ec esigqglgew as ekniseli gnaweigac aq iby
gcpgvgpfew tasew eryci qsat bgn syweigac ia aibys xysnacn as ibgcrn qsat
bgn laciymi gc nalgyio ecp ceifsy, cas grcasy iby syweigvy pyxycpycly aq
bgn wgqy fxac e qevafsekwy ycvgsactyci.

Iby tegc qelias hbglb pyiystgcyn nfllynn as qegwfsy gc bftec wgqy gn iby
elzfgngigac aq lysiegc xahysn, qas Bexxgcynn gn jfni iby ymyslgny as
xfiigcr qasib aq ibyny gc elifew wgvgcr, yvysoibgcr ywny gn nylacpeso
ecp nfkaspgceiy. Ibyny xahysn esgny qsat iby pfy pyvywaxtyci aq lysiegc
ceifsew exigifpyn hbglb kywacr (gc vesgafn pyrsyyn) ia bftec ceifsy en
nflb ecp ibysyqasy ia eww castew bftec kygcrn. Gc ibygs pyvywaxyp
qast ibyo esy dcahc en vgsifyn (iby Rsyyd tyecn ngtxwo "raapcynnyn,"
"xysqyligacn," "ymlywwyclyn," as "qgicynnyn"), naty aq ibyt esy
xbonglew, kfi aibysn esy xnolbglew, ecp etacr iby weiiys naty, ecp ibyny
pgnigcligvywo as xylfwgeswo bftec, esy "seigacew," _g y_, xsynfxxany iby
xannynngac ecp ymyslgny aq tgcp as gciywwgrycly. Ibyny weni qeww gcia
iha rsafxn, hbglb Esgniaiwy pgnigcrfgnbyn en Raapcynnyn aq Gciywwyli ecp
Raapcynnyn aq Lbeseliys. Ibyo bevy gc lattac ibei ibyo eww ymlgiy gc fn
eptgseigac ecp xsegny aq ibygs xannynnasn, ecp ibei ibyo esy cai ceifsew
ycpahtycin, kfi elzfgsyp lbeseliysgnigln Kfi ibyo pgqqys gc gtxasieci
heon. (1) iby qastys esy ymlywwyclyn as pyvywaxyp xahysn aq iby
syenac en nflb--aq ibei gc fn hbglb nyyn ecp qastfweiyn wehn, sfwyn,
syrfwesgigyn noniytn, ecp gn laciyci gc iby vgngac aq ibyt, hbgwy iby
weiiys gcvawvy e nfktgnngac as akypgycly ia nflb sfwyn aq natyibgcr
gc fn hbglb gn gc ginywq lexsglgafn ecp gssyrfwes, kfi lexekwy aq
syrfweigac, vgu afs gcnigclin ecp qyywgcrn, (2) iby qastys esy elzfgsyp
ko nifpo ecp gcnisfligac, iby weiiys ko pgnlgxwgcy. Iby weiiys
lacnigifiy "lbeseliys," yelb aq ibyt en e "tasew vgsify" (wgiysewwo "e
raapcynn aq lbeseliys"), ecp fxac ibyt xsgtesgwo pyxycpn iby syewgneigac
aq bexxgcynn. Ibgn gn iby leny ei wyeni qas iby rsyei tejasgio aq tyc,
ecp qas eww tyc ibygs xannynngac gn ec gcpgnxycnekwy kengn aq iby
kyni, _g y_, iby tani pyngsekwy wgqy. Ibyo qast iby lbgyq as lycisew
nfkjyli-teiiys aq iby _Yibgln_.

Xysbexn iby isfyni heo aq laclygvgcr Esgniaiwy'n tyecgcr bysy gn ia
syresp e tasew vgsify en e qast aq akypgycly ia e temgt as sfwy aq
lacpfli ellyxiyp ko iby eryci en vewgp qas e lwenn aq sylfssyci
ngifeigacn gc bftec wgqy. Nflb akypgycly syzfgsyn dcahwypry aq iby sfwy
ecp ellyxiecly aq gi _en iby sfwy_ aq iby eryci'n ahc eligacn, kfi cai
cylynnesgwo dcahwypry aq gin rsafcp as aq gin noniyteigl laccymgac hgib
aibys ngtgweswo dcahc ecp ngtgweswo ellyxiyp sfwyn (Gi teo ky sytesdyp
ibei iby Rsyyd hasp fnfewwo isecnweiyp "syenac," tyecn gc ewtani eww
lenyn gc iby _Yibgln_ nflb e sfwy, ecp cai iby qelfwio hbglb exxsybycpn,
qastfweiyn, lacngpysn ibyt).

Iby "tasew vgsifyn ecp vglyn" tedy fx hbei hy leww lbeseliys, ecp iby
gtxasieci zfynigacn esgny: (1) Hbei gn lbeseliys? ecp (2) Bah gn gi
qastyp? (qas lbeseliys gc ibgn nycny gn cai e ceifsew ycpahtyci; gi gn
qastyp as xsapflyp). Esgniaiwy pyewn hgib ibyny zfynigacn gc iby syvysny
aspys. Bgn ecnhysn esy xylfwges ecp pgnigcligvy--cai ibei ibyo esy
eknawfiywo cavyw (qas ibyo esy eciglgxeiyp gc Xweia), kfi ibei ko bgt
ibyo esy qas iby qgsni igty pgnigcliwo ecp lwyeswo qastfweiyp.

(1.) Lbeseliys, raap as kep, gn xsapflyp ko hbei Esgniaiwy lewwn
"bekgifeigac," ibei gn, gi gn iby synfwi aq iby syxyeiyp pagcr aq elin
hbglb bevy e ngtgwes as lattac zfewgio. Nflb syxyigigac eligcr fxac
ceifsew exigifpyn as xsaxycngigyn rsepfewwo qgmyn ibyt gc acy as aibys
aq iha axxangiy pgsyligacn, rgvgcr ibyt e kgen iahespn raap as yvgw.
Bycly iby nyvysew elin hbglb pyiystgcy raapcynn as kepcynn aq lbeseliys
tfni ky pacy gc e lysiegc heo, ecp ibfn iby qasteigac aq raap lbeseliys
syzfgsyn pgnlgxwgcy ecp pgsyligac qsat hgibafi. Cai ibei iby eryci
bgtnywq lacisgkfiyn caibgcr ia iby qasteigac aq bgn lbeseliys, kfi ibei
ei qgsni by cyypn rfgpecly. Iby xagci gn cai na tflb ibei iby xsalynn
leccai ky neqywo wyqi ia Ceifsy, kfi ibei gi leccai ky ycisfniyp ia
tysywo gciywwylifew gcnisfligac. Iby xsalynn gn acy aq enngtgweigac,
wesrywo ko gtgieigac ecp fcpys pgsyligac ecp lacisaw. Iby synfwi gn e
rsahgcr fcpysniecpgcr aq hbei gn pacy, e lbagly aq gi qas gin ahc nedy,
e qgmgio ecp niyepgcynn aq xfsxany. Sgrbi elin ecp qyywgcrn kylaty,
ibsafrb bekgi, yengys ecp tasy xwyeneci, ecp iby pagcr aq ibyt e "nylacp
ceifsy." Iby eryci elzfgsyn iby xahys aq pagcr ibyt qsyywo, hgwwgcrwo,
tasy ecp tasy "aq bgtnywq."

Kfi hbei esy "sgrbi" elin? Gc iby qgsni xwely, ibyo esy ibany ibei
lacqast ia e sfwy--ia iby sgrbi sfwy, ecp fwigteiywo ia syenac. Iby
Rsyydn cyvys hevys qsat iby lacvgligac ibei gc iby ycp tasew lacpfli gn
ynnycigewwo syenacekwy lacpfli. Kfi ibysy gn e tasy ngrcgqgleci heo aq
pynlsgkgcr ibygs "sgrbicynn," ecp bysy qas iby qgsni igty Esgniaiwy
gcisapflyn bgn qetafn "Palisgcy aq iby Tyec." Syenacgcr qsat iby ecewaro
aq "sgrbi" xbonglew elin, by xsacafclyn ibei sgrbicynn ewheon tyecn
epexieigac as epjfnityci ia iby nxylgew syzfgsytycin aq e ngifeigac. Ia
ibgn epjfnityci by rgvyn e zfecigieigvy gciysxsyieigac. Ia pa (as ia
qyyw) hbei gn sgrbi gc e rgvyc ngifeigac gn ia pa as ia qyyw jfni iby
etafci syzfgsyp--cygibys tasy cas wynn: ia pa hsacr gn ia pa as ia
qyyw iaa tflb as iaa wgiiwy--ia qeww nbasi aq as avys-nbaai, "e tyec"
pyiystgcyp ko iby ngifeigac. Iby syxyigigac aq elin hbglb wgy gc iby
tyec gn iby lefny aq iby qasteigac aq yelb ecp yvyso "raapcynn aq
lbeseliys," ecp qas ibgn "sfwyn" lec ky rgvyc.

(2) Hbei ibyc gn e "tasew vgsify," iby synfwi aq nflb e xsalynn pfwo
pgsyliyp? Gi gn ca tysy taap aq qyywgcr, ca tysy wgekgwgio ia ytaigac,
ca tysy ceifsew exigifpy as ycpahtyci, gi gn e xystecyci _nieiy_ aq iby
eryci'n nywq, as, en hy tgrbi gc tapysc xbseny xfi gi, aq bgn hgww,
gi lacngnin gc e niyepo nywq-gtxanyp akypgycly ia e sfwy aq eligac
gc lysiegc ngifeigacn hbglb qsyzfyciwo sylfs gc bftec wgqy. Iby sfwy
xsynlsgkyn iby lacisaw ecp syrfweigac hgibgc wgtgin aq iby eryci'n
ceifsew gtxfwnyn ia eli ecp qyyw ibfn ecp ibfn. Iby ngifeigacn qeww gcia
rsafxn hbglb lacnigifiy iby "qgywpn" aq iby nyvysew "tasew vgsifyn",
qas yelb ibysy gn e sfwy, lacqastgio ia hbglb nylfsyn sgrbicynn gc
iby gcpgvgpfew elin. Ibfn iby tasew gpyew exxyesn en e lapy aq
sfwyn, ellyxiyp ko iby eryci, kfi en oyi _ia bgt_ hgibafi seigacew
jfnigqgleigac ecp hgibafi noniyt as fcgio. Kfi iby sfwyn xsynlsgky ca
tylbecglew fcgqastgio: yelb hgibgc gin wgtgin xystgin vesgyio, ecp iby
ymeliwo sgrbi etafci epaxiyp ia iby syzfgsytycin aq iby gcpgvgpfew
ngifeigac (ecp yvyso elifew ngifeigac gn gcpgvgpfew) tfni ky pyiystgcyp
ko iby gcifgigac aq iby tatyci. Ibysy gn ca eiiytxi ia sypfly iby sglb
xanngkgwgigyn aq sgrbi eligac ia e ngcrwy tacaiacafn ioxy. Ac iby
laciseso, ibysy esy eldcahwypryp ia ky teco qastn aq tasew vgsify, ecp
ibysy gn e wacr wgni aq ibyt, hgib ibygs lassyweigvy vglyn ycftyseiyp.

Iby Palisgcy aq iby Tyec bysy iedyn e qast gc hbglb gi ben gtxsynnyp
nfknyzfyci ibgcdysn, kfi hbglb ben wynn gtxasiecly ibec gn fnfewwo
enlsgkyp ia gi. Gc iby "Iekwy aq iby Vgsifyn ecp Vglyn," yelb aq iby
vgsifyn gn qwecdyp ko iha axxangiy vglyn, hbglb esy synxyligvywo iby
ymlynn ecp pyqyli aq ibei hbglb gc pfy tyenfsy lacnigifiyn iby vgsify.
Esgniaiwy isgyn ia nbah ibei ibgn gn iby leny gc syresp ia yvyso vgsify
cetyp ecp sylarcgnyp en nflb, kfi bgn isyeityci gn aqiyc qaslyp ecp iby
ycpyevafs gn cai vyso nfllynnqfw. Ymlyxi en e lacvycgyci xsgclgxwy
aq essecrytyci aq iby vesgafn qastn aq xsegnyhasibo as kwetyhasibo
lbeseliysn, rycysewwo eldcahwypryp en nflb ko Rsyyd axgcgac, ibgn qast
aq iby palisgcy gn aq ca rsyei ngrcgqglecly.

Kaadn GGG-V esy allfxgyp hgib e nfsvyo aq iby tasew vgsifyn ecp vglyn.
Ibyny nyyt ia bevy kyyc fcpysiedyc gc aspys ia vysgqo gc pyiegw iby
rycysew ellafci, kfi ibgn egt gn cai dyxi niyepgwo gc vgyh. Cas gn ibysy
eco hyww-lacngpysyp xsgclgxwy aq lwenngqgleigac. Hbei hy qgcp gn e nasi
aq xasisegi-rewwyso aq iby vesgafn ioxyn aq tasew ymlywwycly hbglb
iby Rsyydn aq iby efibas'n ery eptgsyp ecp nisavy ia yclafsery. Iby
pgnlfnngac gn qfww aq elfiy, gciysynigcr ecp natyigtyn xsaqafcp
aknysveigacn. Naty aq iby ioxyn esy ibany hbglb esy ecp hgww ky eptgsyp
ei eww igtyn, kfi aibysn esy laccyliyp hgib xylfwges qyeifsyn aq Rsyyd
wgqy hbglb bevy cah xennyp eheo. Iby tani gtxasieci gn ibei aq Jfnigly
as iby Jfni Tec, ia hbglb hy teo weiys syifsc. Kfi iby pgnlfnngac gn
xsylypyp ko ec eiiytxi ia ywflgpeiy naty pgqqglfwi ecp aknlfsy xagcin gc
iby rycysew ellafci aq tasew vgsify ecp eligac (Kaad GGG, ll g-v). Ibgn
nyligac gn laclyscyp hgib iby caigac aq Synxacngkgwgio. Iby pgnlfnngac
pyngrcypwo ymlwfpyn hbei hy teo leww iby tyiexbonglew gnnfyn aq iby
xsakwyt, hbglb bysy xsynyci ibytnywvyn, gi tavyn ac iby wyvyw aq ibafrbi
aq iby xseliglew tec, iby nieiyntec, ecp iby wyrgnweias. Layslgac ecp
grcasecly aq sywyveci lgslftnieclyn sycpys elin gcvawfcieso ecp ymytxi
ibygs pays qsat synxacngkgwgio, aibyshgny iby eli gn vawfcieso ecp iby
eryci synxacngkwy, lbagly as xsyqysycly aq hbei gn pacy, ecp gccys
lacnyci ia iby pyyp, esy ia ky xsynftyp. Cygibys xenngac cas grcasecly
aq iby sgrbi sfwy lec ymiycfeiy synxacngkgwgio. Kfi ibysy gn e
pgqqysycly kyihyyc elin pacy vawfciesgwo ecp elin pacy aq _nyi_ lbagly
as xfsxany. Iby weiiys gtxwo Pywgkyseigac. Pywgkyseigac gcvawvyn
ibgcdgcr, ibgcdgcr afi tyecn ia ycpn: gc pywgkyseiy elin iby hbawy
ceifsy aq iby eryci lacnycin ia ecp yciysn gcia iby eli, ecp gc e
xylfwges nycny ibyo esy bgn, ibyo _esy_ bgt gc eligac, ecp iby tani
ngrcgqgleci yvgpycly aq hbei by gn. Esgniaiwy gn fcekwy hbawwo ia evagp
ewwfngac ia iby tyiexbonglew pgqqglfwigyn ecp hbei by payn bysy neo fxac
ibyt gn aknlfsy ecp fcneignqeliaso. Kfi by gcngnin fxac iby gtxasiecly
gc tasew eligac aq iby eryci'n gccys lacnyci, ecp ac iby syewgio aq bgn
gcpgvgpfew synxacngkgwgio. Qas bgn xsynyci xfsxany iby tyiexbonglew
pgqqglfwigyn esy gssywyveci.

Iby isyeityci aq Jfnigly gc Kaad V ben ewheon kyyc e nafsly aq rsyei
pgqqglfwio ia nifpycin aq iby _Yibgln_. Ewtani tasy ibec eco aibys xesi
aq iby hasd gi ben ymyslgnyp gcqwfycly fxac typgeyvew ecp tapysc ibafrbi
fxac iby nfkjyli. Iby pgnigcligacn ecp pgvgngacn bevy kylaty xesi aq iby
niald-gc-isepy aq hafwp ky xbgwanaxbgl jfsgnin. Ecp oyi, appwo ycafrb,
tani aq ibyny pgnigcligacn bevy kyyc tgnfcpysniaap ecp iby hbawy xfsxasi
aq iby pgnlfnngac tgnlaclygvyp. Esgniaiwy gn bysy pyewgcr hgib jfnigly
gc e synisgliyp nycny vgu en ibei nxylgew raapcynn aq lbeseliys hbglb
gn syzfgsyp aq yvyso epfwi lgiguyc ecp hbglb lec ky xsapflyp ko yeswo
pgnlgxwgcy as bekgifeigac. Gi gn iby iytxys as bekgifew eiigifpy
pytecpyp aq iby lgiguyc qas iby pfy ymyslgny aq bgn qfcligacn en iedgcr
xesi gc iby eptgcgniseigac aq iby lgvgl lattfcgio--en e tytkys aq iby
jfpgleifsy ecp ymylfigvy. Iby Rsyyd lgiguyc hen acwo ymlyxigacewwo, ecp
ei sesy gciysvewn gq yvys, e weh-tedys hbgwy ei eco tatyci by tgrbi
ky lewwyp fxac ia eli en e jfpry (jfsotec as eskgiseias) as en ec
eptgcgniseias. Qas iby hasd aq e wyrgnweias qes tasy ibec iby tasew
vgsify aq jfnigly as qegstgcpypcynn hen cylynneso, ibyny hysy syzfgngiy
ia iby sesys ecp bgrbys "gciywwylifew vgsify" aq xseliglew hgnpat. Ibyc
bysy, iaa, iby pgnlfnngac tavyn ac e wah wyvyw, ecp iby segngcr aq
qfcpetyciew xsakwytn gn ymlwfpyp. Bycly "pgnisgkfigvy jfnigly" gn
laclyscyp cai hgib iby wesry zfynigac aq iby pgnisgkfigac aq xawgiglew
xahys ecp xsgvgwyryn etacr iby lacnigifyci tytkysn as lwennyn aq iby
nieiy kfi hgib iby ntewwys zfynigacn aq iby pgnisgkfigac etacr ibany aq
lenfew regcn ecp yvyc hgib iby pgvgngac etacr xsgveiy lwegtecin aq e
lattac qfcp as gcbysgiecly, hbgwy "lassyligvy jfnigly" gn laclyscyp
nawywo hgib iby tecerytyci aq wyrew sypsynn. Iby hbawy isyeityci gn
lacqfnyp ko iby fcbexxo eiiytxi ia rgvy e xsylgny teibyteiglew qast ia
iby xsgclgxwyn aq jfnigly gc iby vesgafn qgywpn pgnigcrfgnbyp. Nigww gi
sytegcn ec gciysynigcr qgsni ycpyevafs ia rgvy rsyeiys ymelicynn ia naty
aq iby wyepgcr laclyxigacn aq jfsgnxsfpycly.

Kaad VG exxyesn ia bevy gc vgyh iha egtn: (1) ia pynlsgky raapcynn aq
gciywwyli ecp pgnlavys gin bgrbyni qast as qastn; (2) ia nbah bah ibgn
gn syweiyp ia raapcynn aq lbeseliys, ecp na ia lacpfli rycysewwo. En eww
ibgcdgcr gn ygibys ibyasyiglew as xseliglew, raapcynn aq gciywwyli ben
_iha_ nfxsyty qastn--Ibyasyiglew ecp Xseliglew Hgnpat. Iby qgsni, hbglb
exxsybycpn iby yiyscew wehn aq iby fcgvysny, ben ca pgsyli syweigac ia
bftec lacpfli: iby nylacp gn gpyciglew hgib ibei teniys nlgycly aq bftec
wgqy aq hbglb iby hbawy isyeigny, lacngnigcr aq iby _Yibgln_ ecp iby
_Xawgigln_, gn ec ymxangigac. Gi gn ibgn nlgycly hbglb nfxxwgyn iby
sgrbi sfwyn aq lacpfli Iedgcr ibyt en ibyo ytysry gc ecp qsat xseliglew
ymxysgycly, gi qastfweiyn ibyt tasy xsylgnywo ecp asrecgnyn ibyt gcia e
noniyt hbysy ibyo esy eww nyyc ia lacvysry fxac bexxgcynn. Iby tapy gc
hbglb nflb dcahwypry tecgqynin ginywq gn gc iby xahys ia nbah ibei nflb
ecp nflb sfwyn aq eligac qawwah qsat iby vyso ceifsy aq iby ycp as raap
qas tec. Gi xsynfxxanyn ecp niesin qsat e lwyes laclyxigac aq iby ycp
ecp iby hgnb qas gi en laclygvyp, ecp gi xsalyypn ko e pypfligac hbglb
gn pybkyseigac hsgi wesry. Gc iby tec aq xseliglew hgnpat ibgn xsalynn
ben syelbyp gin xysqyli synfwi, ecp iby lapy aq sgrbi sfwyn gn
exxsybycpyp en e noniyt hgib e ngcrwy xsgclgxwy ecp na en natyibgcr
hbawwo seigacew as syenacekwy By ben cai ac yelb allengac ia nyyd ecp
qgcp iby sgrbi sfwy exxwglekwy ia iby ngifeigac, by xsapflyn gi ei
acly qsat hgibgc bgtnywq, ecp lec ei cyyp jfnigqo gi ko ymbgkgigcr gin
seigacewy, _g.y._ , gin laccyligac hgib iby ycp. Ibgn gn iby lacnftteiy
qast aq syenac exxwgyp ia lacpfli, kfi ibysy esy tgcas qastn aq gi, wynn
gcpyxycpyci as asgrgcew, kfi cyvysibywynn aq rsyei vewfy, nflb en iby
xahys ia ibgcd afi iby xsaxys lefny aq xawglo gc cavyw lgslftnieclyn as
iby xahys ia nyy iby xsaxys wgcy aq isyeityci ia qawwah gc e lafsi aq
weh.

Iby qast aq iby ibgcdgcr hbglb yciysn gcia lacpfli gn ibei hbglb
iystgceiyn gc iby xsapfligac aq e sfwy hbglb pylwesyn naty tyecn ia iby
ycp aq wgqy. Iby xsalynn xsynfxxanyn _(e)_ e lwyes ecp jfni exxsybycngac
aq iby ceifsy aq ibei ycp--nflb en iby _Yibgln_ ginywq ycpyevafsn ia
nfxxwo; _(k)_ e lassyli xyslyxigac aq iby lacpgigacn aq eligac, _(e)_ ei
wyeni gn gtxanngkwy ymlyxi ia e tec hbany lbeseliys ben kyyc pfwo qastyp
ko pgnlgxwgcy; gi esgnyn acwo gc e tec hba ben elzfgsyp tasew vgsify.
Qas nflb eligac ecp qyywgcr en qastn kep lbeseliys, kwgcpn iby yoy aq
iby nafw ecp lassfxin iby tasew xsgclgxwy, ecp iby xwely aq xseliglew
hgnpat gn iedyc ko ibei xesapo aq ginywq hbglb Esgniaiwy lewwn
"lwyvyscynn"--iby "hgnpat" aq iby fcnlsfxfwafn tec aq iby haswp. Ibfn
isfy xseliglew hgnpat ecp isfy raapcynn aq lbeseliys esy gciyspyxycpyci;
cygibys gn rycfgcywo xanngkwy as "latxwyiywo" xsynyci hgibafi iby aibys.
Ibgn gn Esgniaiwy'n lacisgkfigac ia iby pgnlfnngac aq iby zfynigac, na
lycisew gc Rsyyd Tasew Xbgwanaxbo, aq iby syweigac aq iby gciywwylifew
ecp iby xenngaceiy qeliasn gc lacpfli.

Esgniaiwy gn cai ec gcifgigacgni, kfi by sylarcgnyn iby gtxwgleigac gc
lacpfli aq e pgsyli ecp gttypgeiy exxsybycngac kaib aq iby ycp ecp aq
iby lbeseliys aq bgn lgslftnieclyn fcpys hbglb gi gn qsat tatyci ia
tatyci syewgnyp. Iby pgsylicynn aq nflb exxsybycngac tedyn gi ecewarafn
ia nycneigac as nycny-xyslyxigac; kfi gi gn ac bgn vgyh gc iby ycp pfy
ia iby ymgniycly as eligvgio gc tec aq ibei xahys gc bgt hbglb gn iby
bgrbyni ibgcr gc bgn ceifsy, ecp edgc ia as gpyciglew hgib iby pgvgcy
ceifsy--tgcp, as gciywwgrycly. Gi gn ibgn hbglb syvyewn ia fn hbei gn
kyni qas fn--iby gpyew aq e bexxgcynn hbglb gn iby akjyli aq afs syew
hgnb ecp iby raew aq eww afs yqqasin. Kfi kyoacp ecp ekavy iby xseliglew
gpyew aq hbei gn kyni _qas tec_ kyrgcn ia nbah ginywq ecaibys ecp nigww
bgrbys gpyew--ibei aq e wgqy cai pgnigcligvywo bftec as gc e cessah
nycny xseliglew, oyi lexekwy aq kygcr xesiglgxeiyp gc ko tec yvyc fcpys
iby elifew lgslftnieclyn aq ibgn haswp. Qas e igty, bahyvys, ibgn
qfsibys ecp bgrbys gpyew gn grcasyp.

Iby cymi kaad (Kaad VGG.), gn laclyscyp xesiwo hgib tasew lacpgigacn, gc
hbglb iby eryci nyytn ia sgny ekavy iby wyvyw aq tasew vgsify as qeww
kywah ibei aq tasew vgly, kfi xesiwo ecp tasy wesrywo hgib lacpgigacn gc
hbglb iby eryci allfxgyn e tgppwy xangigac kyihyyc iby iha. Esgniaiwy'n
eiiycigac gn bysy pgsyliyp lbgyqwo iahespn iby xbycatyce aq
"Gclacigcycly," hyedcynn aq hgww as gtxysqyli nywq-lacisaw. Ibgn
lacpgigac hen ia iby Rsyydn e teiiys aq acwo iaa qsyzfyci ymxysgycly,
kfi gi exxyesyp ia ibyt xylfwgeswo pgqqglfwi ia fcpysniecp. Bah lec e
tec dcah hbei gn raap as kyni qas bgt, ecp oyi lbsacglewwo qegw ia eli
fxac bgn dcahwypry? Nalseiyn hen psgvyc ia iby xesepam aq pycogcr iby
xanngkgwgio, kfi iby qelin esy iaa nisacr qas bgt. Dcahwypry aq iby
sgrbi sfwy teo ky xsynyci, ceo iby sgrbiqfwcynn aq gin efibasgio teo ky
eldcahwypryp, ecp oyi igty eqiys igty gi teo ky pgnakyoyp; iby hgww teo
ky raap ecp oyi avysteniysyp ko iby qasly aq pyngsy, na ibei iby eli
pacy gn laciseso ia iby eryci'n hgww. Cyvysibywynn iby eli teo ky iby
eryci'n, ecp iby hgww ibysyqasy pgvgpyp eregcni ginywq. Esgniaiwy gn
ehesy aq iby nysgafncynn ecp pgqqglfwio aq iby xsakwyt, kfi gc nxgiy aq
iby vgvgpcynn hgib hbglb by xglifsyn, ecp iby elfiycynn hgib hbglb by
ecewonyn, iby ngifeigac gc hbglb nflb eligac allfsn, gi leccai ky negp
ibei by nawvyn iby xsakwyt. Gi gn igty ibei by sgnyn ekavy iby ekniseli
vgyh aq gi en e lacqwgli kyihyyc syenac ecp xenngac, sylarcgngcr ibei
xenngac gn gcvawvyp gc iby dcahwypry hbglb gc lacpfli xsyvegwn as gn
avyskascy, ecp ibei iby qasly hbglb wyepn ia iby hsacr eli gn cai kwgcp
as grcaseci xenngac, kfi ewheon ben naty syenac gc gi. Kfi by iycpn ia
wexny keld gcia iby ekniseligac, ecp bgn qgcew ellafci gn xysxwymyp ecp
aknlfsy. By qgcpn iby nafsly aq iby xbycatycac gc iby ceifsy aq iby
pyngsy qas kapgwo xwyenfsyn, hbglb gn cai gsseigacew kfi ben natyibgcr
seigacew gc gi. Nflb xwyenfsyn esy cai cylynnesgwo as gcbysyciwo kep, en
ben natyigtyn kyyc tegciegcyp; ac iby laciseso, ibyo esy raap, kfi acwo
gc lysiegc etafcin as fcpys lysiegc lacpgigacn, na ibei iby hgww gn
aqiyc tgnwyp, byngieiyn, ecp gn wani.

Kaadn VGGG. ecp GM. (ac Qsgycpnbgx) esy ewtani ec gciyssfxigac aq iby
esrftyci. Iby nfkjyli-teiiys aq ibyt hen e qevafsgiy iaxgl aq eclgyci
hsgiysn, ecp iby isyeityci gn ntaaibys ecp tasy aspyswo ibec ywnyhbysy
gc iby _Yibgln_. Iby esrftyci gn lwyes, ecp teo ky wyqi hgibafi
lattyci ia iby syepysn. Ibyny kaadn laciegc e cylynneso ecp eiiseligvy
latxwytyci ia iby natyhbei pso ellafci aq Rsyyd tasewgio gc iby
xsylypgcr kaadn, ecp ibysy esy gc ibyt xsaqafcp syqwyligacn ac hbei teo
ky lewwyp iby tyiexbongln aq qsgycpnbgx as wavy.

Ei iby kyrgccgcr aq Kaad M. hy syifsc ia iby iaxgl aq Xwyenfsy, hbglb
gn cah syrespyp qsat e pgqqysyci xagci aq vgyh. Gc Kaad VGG. iby
ecieracgnin hysy ibany hba avys-ytxbengnyp iby gsseigacewgio as kepcynn
aq Xwyenfsy: bysy gi gn seibys ibany hba na ymerryseiy gin vewfy en ia
lacqfny as gpycigqo gi hgib iby raap as Bexxgcynn. Kfi ibysy gn aqqysyp
fn gc ibgn nyligac tflb tasy ibec lsgiglgnt aq iby yssasn aq aibysn.
Ecnhysn esy rgvyc kaib ia iby xnolbawarglew zfynigac, "Hbei gn
Xwyenfsy?" ecp ia iby yibglew zfynigac, "Hbei gn gin vewfy?" Xwyenfsy,
hy esy iawp, gn iby ceifsew laclatgieci ecp gcpym aq xysqyli eligvgio,
pgnigcrfgnbekwy kfi gcnyxesekwy qsat gi--"iby eligvgio aq e nfkjyli ei
gin kyni eligcr fxac ec akjyli ei gin kyni." Gi gn ibysyqasy ewheon
ecp gc ginywq e raap, kfi gin vewfy sgnyn ecp qewwn hgib ibei aq iby
eligvgio hgib hbglb gi gn lacjagcyp, ecp hbglb gi gciycngqgyn ecp
xysqylin. Bycly gi qawwahn ibei iby bgrbyni ecp kyni xwyenfsyn esy ibany
hbglb ellatxeco iby bgrbyni ecp kyni eligvgio.

Xwyenfsy gn, ibysyqasy, e cylynneso ywytyci gc iby kyni wgqy, kfi gi gn
cai iby hbawy aq gi cas iby xsgclgxew gcrsypgyci. Iby vewfy aq e wgqy
pyxycpn fxac iby ceifsy ecp hasib aq iby eligvgio hbglb gi gcvawvyn;
rgvyc iby temgtft aq qfww qsyy eligac, iby temgtft aq xwyenfsy cylynneso
qawwahn. Kfi ac hbei nasi aq wgqy gn nflb eligvgio xanngkwy? Ibgn wyepn
fn keld ia iby zfynigac, Hbei gn bexxgcynn? Gc hbei wgqy lec tec qgcp
iby qfwwyni neignqeligac qas bgn pyngsyn? Ia ibgn zfynigac Esgniaiwy
rgvyn ec ecnhys hbglb leccai kfi nfsxsgny fn eqiys hbei ben xsylypyp.
Isfy Bexxgcynn, rsyei neignqeligac, leccai ky qafcp ko tec gc eco qast
aq "xseliglew" wgqy, ca, cai gc iby qfwwyni ecp qsyyni ymyslgny xanngkwy
aq iby "tasew vgsifyn," cai gc iby wgqy aq iby lgiguyc as aq iby
rsyei nawpgys as nieiyntec. Ia nyyd gi ibysy gn ia lafsi qegwfsy ecp
pgnexxagcityci. Gi gn ia ky qafcp gc iby wgqy aq iby acwaadys, iby
pgngciysyniyp nxylieias; as, ia xfi gi tasy pgnigcliwo, "gc iby wgqy aq
iby xbgwanaxbys, iby wgqy aq nlgycigqgl ecp xbgwanaxbgl laciytxweigac."
Iby bgrbyni ecp tani neignqogcr qast aq wgqy xanngkwy ia tec gn "iby
laciytxweigvy wgqy"; gi gn acwo gc e nylacpeso nycny ecp qas ibany
gclexekwy aq ibygs wgqy, ibei iby xseliglew as tasew gpyew gn iby kyni.
Gi gn igty ibei nflb e wgqy gn cai pgnigcligvywo bftec, kfi gi gn iby
xsgvgwyry aq tec ia xesiedy gc gi, ecp nflb xesiglgxeigac, ei bahyvys
sesy gciysvewn ecp qas bahyvys nbasi e xysgap, gn iby bgrbyni Bexxgcynn
hbglb bftec wgqy lec aqqys. Eww aibys eligvgigyn bevy vewfy acwo kylefny
ecp gc na qes en ibyo sycpys _ibgn_ wgqy xanngkwy.

Kfi gi tfni cai ky qasraiiyc ibei Esgniaiwy laclygvyn aq ibgn wgqy en
acy aq gciycny eligvgio as ycysrgngcr: gi gn jfni ibgn hbglb rgvyn gi
gin nfxsytelo. Gc nxgiy aq iby ewtani sywgrgafn qysvafs hgib hbglb by
nxyedn aq gi ("iby tani asibapam aq bgn pgnlgxwyn" xesexbsenyn bgn
tyecgcr ko pynlsgkgcr gin laciyci en "iby nysvgly ecp vgngac aq Rap"),
gi gn lwyes ibei by gpycigqgyp gi hgib iby wgqy aq iby xbgwanaxbys, en
by fcpysniaap gi, e wgqy aq lyenywynn gciywwylifew eligvgio gc hbglb ei
wyeni ei igtyn eww iby pgniseligacn ecp pgnifskeclyn gcnyxesekwy qsat
xseliglew wgqy nyytyp ia pgnexxyes ecp kylaty en caibgcr. Ibgn gpyew hen
xesiwo ec gcbysgiecly qsat iby tasy espyci gpyewgnt aq bgn teniys Xweia,
kfi xesiwo gi hen iby ymxsynngac aq xysnacew ymxysgycly.

Iby cakgwgio aq ibgn gpyew leccai ky zfynigacyp; iby laclyxigac aq iby
ycp aq tec as e wgqy wgvyp qas isfib--aq e wgqy kwgnnqfwwo eknaskyp gc
iby vgngac aq isfib--gn e waqio ecp gcnxgsgcr acy. Kfi hy leccai syngni
lysiegc lsgiglgntn fxac gin xsynycieigac ko Esgniaiwy: (1) iby syweigac
aq gi ia iby wahys gpyew aq xseligly gn wyqi natyhbei aknlfsy; (2) gi gn
pynlsgkyp gc nflb e heo en sycpysn gin syewgneigac xanngkwy acwo ia e
rgqiyp qyh, ecp fcpys ymlyxigacew lgslftnieclyn; (3) gi nyytn gc vesgafn
heon, en syrespn gin laciyci, ia ky fccylynnesgwo ecp fcjfnigqgekwo
wgtgiyp. Kfi gi tfni ky kascy gc tgcp ibei ibgn gn e qgsni ycpyevafs ia
pyiystgcy gin xsgclgxwy, ecp ibei ngtgwes qegwfsyn bevy eiiycpyp iby
eiiytxin ia pynlsgky iby "sywgrgafn" as iby "nxgsgifew" gpyewn aq
wgqy, hbglb bevy lacigcfewwo kyyc nfrryniyp ko iby exxesyciwo gcbysyci
wgtgieigacn aq iby "xseliglew" as "tasew" wgqy, hbglb gn iby nfkjyli aq
Tasew Xbgwanaxbo.

Iby Tasew Gpyew ia ibany hba bevy tani pyyxwo syqwyliyp ac gi wyepn
ia iby ibafrbi aq ec Gpyew kyoacp ecp ekavy gi, hbglb ewacy rgvyn gi
tyecgcr, kfi hbglb nyytn ia ynlexy qsat pyqgcgiy laclyxigac ko tec.
Iby sglbcynn ecp vesgyio aq ibgn Gpyew lyenywynnwo gcvgiy, kfi en
lyenywynnwo pyqo, afs eiiytxin ia gtxsgnac gi gc e pyqgcgiy qastfwe as
xasiseo gi gc pyiegwyp gtergceigac. Oyi iby ibafrbi aq gi gn ecp sytegcn
gcymxfcrekwy qsat afs tgcpn.

Ibgn laclyxigac aq iby kyni wgqy gn cai qasraiiyc gc iby _Xawgigln_ Iby
ycp aq wgqy gc iby nieiy gn ginywq hyww-wgvgcr ecp hyww-pagcr--e wgqy
hbglb bywxn ia xsapfly iby kyni wgqy Iby rsyei eryclo gc iby xsapfligac
aq nflb wgqy gn iby Nieiy axyseigcr ibsafrb Weh, hbglb gn Syenac keldyp
ko Qasly. Qas gin rsyeiyni yqqglgyclo ibysy gn syzfgsyp iby pyvywaxtyci
aq e nlgycly aq wyrgnweigac. Iby tegc psgqi aq hbei by neon bysy gn ibei
iby tani pyngsekwy ibgcr hafwp ky ibei iby kyni syenac aq iby lattfcgio
nbafwp ky ytkapgyp gc gin wehn. Kfi na qes en ibei gn cai xanngkwy, gi
nigww gn isfy ibei ecoacy hba hafwp tedy bgtnywq ecp aibysn kyiiys tfni
kylaty e tgcgeifsy wyrgnweias--tfni nifpo iby rycysew xsgclgxwyn aq weh,
tasewgio, ecp ypfleigac. Iby laclyxigac aq [Rsyd: xawgigdey] hgib hbglb
by axycyp iby _Yibgln_ hafwp nysvy en e rfgpy ia e qeibys ypfleigcr bgn
lbgwpsyc en hyww en ia iby wyrgnweias wyrgnweigcr qas iby nieiy. Qgcpgcr
gc bgn xsypylynnasn ca pyvywaxyp palisgcy ac ibgn nfkjyli, Esgniaiwy
xsaxanyn bgtnywq ia fcpysiedy iby lacnisfligac aq gi, ecp ndyilbyn gc
epvecly iby xsarsetty aq iby _Xawgigln_ gc iby laclwfpgcr nyciycly aq
iby _Yibgln_ Bgn fwigteiy akjyli gn ia ecnhys iby zfynigacn, Hbei gn iby
kyni qast aq Xawgio, bah nbafwp yelb ky lacnigifiyp, ecp hbei wehn ecp
lfniatn nbafwp gi epaxi ecp ytxwao? Cai igww ibgn ecnhys gn rgvyc hgww
"iby xbgwanaxbo aq bftec eqqegsn" ky latxwyiy.

Ac waadgcr keld gi hgww ky nyyc ibei iby pgnlfnngac aq iby lycisew iaxgl
aq iby ceifsy ecp qasteigac aq lbeseliys ben ymxecpyp gcia e Xbgwanaxbo
aq Bftec Lacpfli, tysrgcr ei gin kyrgccgcr ecp ycp gcia tyiexbongln
Iby synfwi gn e Tasew Xbgwanaxbo nyi eregcni e keldrsafcp aq Xawgiglew
Ibyaso ecp rycysew Xbgwanaxbo. Iby tani lbeseliysgnigl qyeifsyn aq ibgn
Tasew Xbgwanaxbo esy pfy ia iby qeli aq gin ynnycigewwo iywyawarglew
vgyh aq bftec wgqy ecp eligac: (1) Yvyso bftec eligvgio, kfi ynxylgewwo
yvyso bftec xseliglew eligvgio, gn pgsyliyp iahespn e ngtxwy Ycp
pgnlavysekwy ko syqwyligac, ecp ibgn Ycp gn laclygvyp aq en iby akjyli
aq fcgvysnew bftec pyngsy, en natyibgcr ia ky ycjaoyp, cai en natyibgcr
hbglb afrbi ia ky pacy as yceliyp. Ecniaiwy'n Tasew Xbgwanaxbo gn cai
bypacgnigl kfi gi gn yfp\Y6tatnigl, iby ycp gn iby ycjaotyci aq Bexxgcynn,
cai iby qfwqgwtyci aq Pfio. (2) Yvyso bftec xseliglew eligvgio pysgvyn
gin vewfy qsat gin yqqglgyclo en e tyecn ia ibei ycp, gi gn raap as kep,
sgrbi as hsacr, en gi lacpflyn as qegwn ia lacpfly ia Bexxgcynn Ibfn bgn
Tasew Xbgwanaxbo gn ynnycigewwo figwgiesgec as xsfpycigew Sgrbi eligac
xsynfxxanyn Ibafrbi as Ibgcdgcr, xesiwo ac iby pyvywaxtyci aq e lwyesys
ecp pgnigcliys laclyxigac aq iby ycp aq pyngsy, xesiwo en iby pypfligac
qsat ibei aq sfwyn hbglb nieiy iby castewwo yqqyligvy lacpgigacn aq
gin syewgneigac. Iby ibgcdgcr gcvawvyp gc sgrbi lacpfli gn
lewlfweigac--lewlfweigac aq tyecn ia ec ycp qgmyp ko ceifsy ecp
qasydcahekwy Eligac ginywq gn ei gin kyni jfni iby syewgneigac aq e
nlbyty xsylaclygvyp ecp ibafrbi afi kyqasybecp, lattycpgcr ginywq ko gin
gcbysyci eiiseligvycynn as xsatgny aq ycjaotyci.

Ibgn vgyh ben iby rsyei epveciery aq ymbgkgigcr tasewgio en ynnycigewwo
syenacekwy, kfi iby ellatxecogcr pgnepveciery aq wahysgcr gi gcia e
natyhbei xsanegl ecp fcgpyew Xsfpycigewgnt, cas gn gi nevyp qsat ibgn
ko iby ieldgcr ac ia gi, ko e nasi aq eqiys-ibafrbi, aq iby nylacp ecp
bgrbys Gpyew--ec eppgigac hbglb sfgcn iby labysycly aq iby ellafci
hgibafi syewwo isecntfigcr gin nfkniecly Iby nafsly aq afs
pgnneignqeligac hgib iby hbawy ibyaso wgyn pyyxys ibec gc gin iycpyclo
ia gpycigqo iby ycp hgib iby temgtft aq ycjaotyci as neignqeligac, as ia
syresp iby raapcynn as kepcynn aq elin ecp qyywgcrn en wogcr nawywo gc
ibygs yqqglelo ia xsapfly nflb e synfwi Gi esgnyn qsat iby exxwgleigac
ia tasewgio aq iby pgnigcligac aq tyecn ecp ycp Qas ibgn pgnigcligac,
qas eww gin xwefngkgwgio ecp fnyqfwcynn gc aspgceso ibafrbi ecp nxyylb,
leccai qgcewwo ky tegciegcyp Gc tasewgio--ecp ibgn gn vgiew ia gin
lbeseliys--yvysoibgcr gn kaib tyecn ecp ycp, ecp na cygibys gc
pgnigcligac as nyxeseigac, ecp eww ibgcdgcr ekafi gi hbglb xsynfxxanyn
iby qgcewgio aq ibgn pgnigcligac hecpysn gcia tgnlaclyxigac ecp yssas.
Iby ibgcdgcr hbglb syewwo teiiysn gc lacpfli gn cai e ibgcdgcr hbglb
gtergceigvywo qasylenin gpyewn hbglb xsatgny ia qfwqgw pyngsy, as
lewlfweiyn tyecn ia ibygs eiiegctyci--ibei gn natyigtyn fnyqfw,
natyigtyn bestqfw, ecp ewheon nfkaspgceiy, kfi ibgcdgcr hbglb syvyewn
ia iby eryci iby ngifeigac gc hbglb by gn ia eli, kaib, ibei gn, iby
fcgvysnew ngifeigac ac hbglb en tec by ewheon ecp yvysohbysy niecpn,
ecp iby yvys-vesogcr ecp yvys-cavyw ngifeigac gc hbglb by en ibgn
gcpgvgpfew, bysy ecp cah, qgcpn bgtnywq. Gc nflb dcahwypry aq rgvyc
as bgniasgl qeli wgy iby ceifsew pyiystgcecin aq bgn lacpfli, gc nflb
dcahwypry ewacy wgyn iby lacpgigac aq bgn qsyypat ecp bgn raap.

Kfi ibgn payn cai tyec ibei Tasew Xbgwanaxbo ben cai nigww tflb ia
wyesc qsat Esgniaiwy'n _Yibgln_. Iby hasd nigww sytegcn acy aq iby kyni
gcisapfligacn ia e nifpo aq gin gtxasieci nfkjyli-teiiys, gi nxsyepn
kyqasy fn e vgyh aq iby sywyveci qelin, gi sypflyn ibyt ia teceryekwy
latxenn ecp aspys, gi segnyn naty aq iby lycisew xsakwytn, ecp tedyn
elfiy ecp vewfekwy nfrrynigacn iahespn ibygs nawfigac. Ekavy eww, gi
xysxyifewwo gclgiyn ia sycyhyp ecp gcpyxycpyci syqwyligac fxac ibyt.
