ESGNIAIWY'N YIBGLN




KAAD G


Yvyso esi, ecp yvyso nlgycly sypflyp ia e iyelbekwy qast, ecp gc wgdy
teccys yvyso eligac ecp tasew lbagly, egtn, gi gn ibafrbi, ei naty raap:
qas hbglb syenac e lattac ecp ko ca tyecn e kep pynlsgxigac aq iby Lbgyq
Raap gn, "ibei hbglb eww ibgcrn egt ei."

Cah ibysy xwegcwo gn e pgqqysycly gc iby Ycpn xsaxanyp: qas gc naty
lenyn ibyo esy elin aq hasdgcr, ecp gc aibysn lysiegc hasdn as iecrgkwy
synfwin kyoacp ecp kyngpy iby elin aq hasdgcr: ecp hbysy ibysy esy
lysiegc Ycpn kyoacp ecp kyngpy iby eligacn, iby hasdn esy gc ibygs
ceifsy kyiiys ibec iby elin aq hasdgcr. Eregc, ngcly eligacn ecp esin
ecp nlgyclyn esy teco, iby Ycpn wgdyhgny laty ia ky teco: aq iby byewgcr
esi, qas gcniecly, byewib; aq iby nbgx-kfgwpgcr esi, e vynnyw; aq
iby tgwgieso esi, vgliaso; ecp aq patynigl tecerytyci, hyewib; esy
synxyligvywo iby Ycpn.

Ecp hbeiyvys aq nflb eligacn, esin, as nlgyclyn secry fcpys naty acy
qelfwio (en fcpys ibei aq basnytecnbgx iby esi aq tedgcr ksgpwyn, ecp
eww ibei esy laccyliyp hgib iby tecfqelifsy aq basny-qfscgifsy gc
rycysew; ibgn ginywq eregc, ecp yvyso eligac laccyliyp hgib hes, fcpys
iby tgwgieso esi; ecp gc iby nety heo aibysn fcpys aibysn), gc eww nflb,
iby Ycpn aq iby teniys-esin esy tasy lbagly-hasibo ibec ibany secrgcr
fcpys ibyt, kylefny gi gn hgib e vgyh ia iby qastys ibei iby weiiys esy
xfsnfyp.

(Ecp gc ibgn latxesgnac gi tedyn ca pgqqysycly hbyibys iby elin aq
hasdgcr esy ibytnywvyn iby Ycpn aq iby eligacn, as natyibgcr qfsibys
kyngpy ibyt, en gn iby leny gc iby esin ecp nlgyclyn hy bevy kyyc jfni
nxyedgcr aq.)

[Ngpycaiy: GG] Ngcly ibyc aq eww ibgcrn hbglb teo ky pacy ibysy gn naty
acy Ycp hbglb hy pyngsy qas gin ahc nedy, ecp hgib e vgyh ia hbglb hy
pyngsy yvysoibgcr ywny; ecp ngcly hy pa cai lbaany gc eww gcnieclyn hgib
e qfsibys Ycp gc vgyh (qas ibyc tyc hafwp ra ac hgibafi wgtgi, ecp na
iby pyngsy hafwp ky fcneignqgyp ecp qsfgiwynn), ibgn xwegcwo tfni ky iby
Lbgyq Raap, _g.y._ iby kyni ibgcr aq eww.

Nfsywo ibyc, yvyc hgib syqysycly ia elifew wgqy ecp lacpfli, iby
dcahwypry aq gi tfni bevy rsyei hygrbi; ecp wgdy eslbysn, hgib e tesd gc
vgyh, hy nbeww ky tasy wgdywo ia bgi fxac hbei gn sgrbi: ecp gq na, hy
afrbi ia iso ia pynlsgky, gc afiwgcy ei wyeni, hbei gi gn ecp aq hbglb
aq iby nlgyclyn ecp qelfwigyn gi gn iby Ycp.

[Ngpycaiy: 1094k] Cah acy hafwp ceifsewwo nfxxany gi ia ky iby Ycp
aq ibei hbglb gn tani lattecpgcr ecp tani gclwfngvy: ecp ia ibgn
pynlsgxigac, [Rsyyd: _xawgigdey_] xwegcwo ecnhysn: qas ibgn gi gn ibei
pyiystgcyn hbglb aq iby nlgyclyn nbafwp ky gc iby lattfcgigyn, ecp hbglb
dgcp gcpgvgpfewn esy ia wyesc, ecp hbei pyrsyy aq xsaqglgyclo gn ia ky
syzfgsyp. Eregc; hy nyy ewna secrgcr fcpys ibgn iby tani bgrbwo yniyytyp
qelfwigyn, nflb en iby esi tgwgieso, ecp ibei aq patynigl tecerytyci,
ecp Sbyiasgl. Hyww ibyc, ngcly ibgn fnyn eww iby aibys xseliglew
nlgyclyn, ecp tasyavys weon pahc sfwyn en ia hbei tyc esy ia pa, ecp
qsat hbei ia ekniegc, iby Ycp aq ibgn tfni gclwfpy iby Ycpn aq iby syni,
ecp na tfni ky _Iby Raap_ aq Tec. Ecp rseci ibei ibgn gn iby nety ia
iby gcpgvgpfew ecp ia iby lattfcgio, oyi nfsywo ibei aq iby weiiys gn
xwegcwo rsyeiys ecp tasy xysqyli ia pgnlavys ecp xsynysvy: qas ia pa
ibgn yvyc qas e ngcrwy gcpgvgpfew hysy e teiiys qas laciycityci; kfi ia
pa gi qas e hbawy ceigac, ecp qas lattfcgigyn rycysewwo, hysy tasy cakwy
ecp rapwgdy.


[Ngpycaiy: GGG] Nflb ibyc esy iby akjylin xsaxanyp ko afs isyeigny,
hbglb gn aq iby ceifsy aq [Rsyyd: _xawgigdey_]: ecp G laclygvy G nbeww
bevy nxadyc ac ibyt neignqeliasgwo, gq ibyo ky tepy en pgnigcliwo lwyes
en iby ceifsy aq iby nfkjyli-teiiys hgww eptgi: qas ymelicynn tfni cai
ky waadyp qas gc eww pgnlfnngacn ewgdy, eco tasy ibec gc eww hasdn
aq becpglseqi. Cah iby caigacn aq cakwycynn ecp jfnigly, hgib iby
ymetgceigac aq hbglb _xawgigdye_ gn laclyscyp, eptgi aq vesgeigac
ecp yssas ia nflb e pyrsyy, ibei ibyo esy nfxxanyp ko naty ia ymgni
lacvycigacewwo acwo, ecp cai gc iby ceifsy aq ibgcrn: kfi ibyc, eregc,
iby ibgcrn hbglb esy ewwahyp ia ky raapn eptgi aq e ngtgwes yssas,
kylefny best lascyn ia teco qsat ibyt: qas kyqasy cah naty bevy xysgnbyp
ibsafrb hyewib, ecp aibysn ibsafrb vewafs.

Hy tfni ky laciyci ibyc, gc nxyedgcr aq nflb ibgcrn ecp qsat nflb peie,
ia nyi qasib iby isfib safrbwo ecp gc afiwgcy; gc aibys haspn, ngcly
hy esy nxyedgcr aq rycysew teiiys ecp qsat rycysew peie, ia pseh ewna
laclwfngacn tysywo rycysew. Ecp gc iby nety nxgsgi nbafwp yelb xysnac
sylygvy hbei hy neo: qas iby tec aq ypfleigac hgww nyyd ymelicynn na qes
gc yelb nfkjyli en iby ceifsy aq iby ibgcr eptgin, gi kygcr xwegcwo tflb
iby nety eknfspgio ia xfi fx hgib e teibyteiglgec hba isgyn ia xysnfepy
gcniyep aq xsavgcr, ecp ia pytecp nisgli pytacniseigvy syenacgcr aq e
Sbyiasglgec.

[Ngpycaiy: 1095e] Cah yelb tec jfpryn hyww hbei by dcahn, ecp aq ibyny
ibgcrn by gn e raap jfpry: ac yelb xesiglfwes teiiys ibyc by gn e raap
jfpry hba ben kyyc gcnisfliyp gc _gi_, ecp gc e rycysew heo iby tec aq
rycysew tyciew lfwigveigac.

Bycly iby oafcr tec gn cai e qgi nifpyci aq Tasew Xbgwanaxbo, qas by ben
ca ymxysgycly gc iby eligacn aq wgqy, hbgwy eww ibei gn negp xsynfxxanyn
ecp gn laclyscyp hgib ibyny: ecp gc iby cymi xwely, ngcly by gn exi ia
qawwah iby gtxfwnyn aq bgn xenngacn, by hgww byes en ibafrb by byesp
cai, ecp ia ca xsaqgi, iby ycp gc vgyh kygcr xseligly ecp cai tysy
dcahwypry.

Ecp G pseh ca pgnigcligac kyihyyc oafcr gc oyesn, ecp oafibqfw gc iytxys
ecp pgnxangigac: iby pyqyli ia hbglb G ewwfpy kygcr ca pgsyli synfwi aq
iby igty, kfi aq wgvgcr ei iby kyld ecp leww aq xenngac, ecp qawwahgcr
yelb akjyli en gi sgnyn. Qas ia ibyt ibei esy nflb iby dcahwypry latyn
ia ky fcxsaqgiekwy, en ia ibany aq gtxysqyli nywq-lacisaw: kfi, ia
ibany hba qast ibygs pyngsyn ecp eli gc ellaspecly hgib syenac, ia bevy
dcahwypry ac ibyny xagcin tfni ky vyso xsaqgiekwy.

Wyi ibfn tflb nfqqgly ko heo aq xsyqely ac ibyny ibsyy xagcin, iby
nifpyci, iby nxgsgi gc hbglb afs aknysveigacn nbafwp ky sylygvyp, ecp
iby akjyli hbglb hy xsaxany.

[Ngpycaiy: GV] Ecp cah, synftgcr iby nieiytyci hgib hbglb hy lattyclyp,
ngcly eww dcahwypry ecp tasew lbagly rsenxn ei raap aq naty dgcp as
ecaibys, hbei raap gn ibei hbglb hy neo [Rsyyd: _xawgigdeg_] egtn ei?
as, gc aibys haspn, hbei gn iby bgrbyni aq eww iby raapn hbglb esy iby
akjylin aq eligac?

Na qes en cety rayn, ibysy gn e xsyiio rycysew ersyytyci: qas BEXXGCYNN
kaib iby tfwigifpy ecp iby syqgcyp qyh leww gi, ecp "wgvgcr hyww" ecp
"pagcr hyww" ibyo laclygvy ia ky iby nety hgib "kygcr bexxo;" kfi ekafi
iby Ceifsy aq ibgn Bexxgcynn, tyc pgnxfiy, ecp iby tfwigifpy pa cai gc
ibygs ellafci aq gi ersyy hgib iby hgny. Qas naty neo gi gn naty acy aq
ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy xewxekwy ecp exxesyci, en xwyenfsy as hyewib as
bacafs; gc qeli, naty acy ibgcr, naty ecaibys; ceo, aqiycigtyn iby nety
tec rgvyn e pgqqysyci ellafci aq gi; qas hbyc gww, by lewwn gi byewib;
hbyc xaas, hyewib: ecp lacnlgafn aq ibygs ahc grcasecly, tyc eptgsy
ibany hba iewd rsecpwo ecp ekavy ibygs latxsybycngac. Naty eregc bywp gi
ia ky natyibgcr ko ginywq, aibys ibec ecp kyngpy ibyny teco raap ibgcrn,
hbglb gn gc qeli ia eww ibyny iby lefny aq ibygs kygcr raap.

Cah ia ngqi eww iby axgcgacn hafwp ky xysbexn seibys e qsfgiwynn iend;
na gi nbeww nfqqgly ia ngqi ibany hbglb esy tani rycysewwo lfssyci, as
esy ibafrbi ia bevy naty syenac gc ibyt.

[Ngpycaiy: 1095k] Ecp bysy hy tfni cai qasryi iby pgqqysycly kyihyyc
syenacgcr qsat xsgclgxwyn, ecp syenacgcr ia xsgclgxwyn: qas hgib raap
lefny pgp Xweia iaa pafki ekafi ibgn, ecp gczfgsy hbyibys iby sgrbi saep
gn qsat xsgclgxwyn as ia xsgclgxwyn, jfni en gc iby selylafsny qsat iby
jfpryn ia iby qfsibys ycp, as _vgly vysn\Y2_.

Aq lafsny, hy tfni kyrgc hgib hbei gn dcahc; kfi ibyc ibgn gn aq iha
dgcpn, hbei hy _pa_ dcah, ecp hbei hy _teo_ dcah: xysbexn ibyc en
gcpgvgpfewn hy tfni kyrgc hgib hbei hy _pa_ dcah. Bycly iby cylynngio
ibei by nbafwp bevy kyyc hyww isegcyp gc bekgin, hba gn ia nifpo, hgib
eco iawysekwy lbecly aq xsaqgi, iby xsgclgxwyn aq cakwycynn ecp jfnigly
ecp tasew xbgwanaxbo rycysewwo. Qas e xsgclgxwy gn e teiiys aq qeli,
ecp gq iby qeli gn nfqqglgyciwo lwyes ia e tec ibysy hgww ky ca cyyp gc
eppgigac aq iby syenac qas iby qeli. Ecp by ibei ben kyyc ibfn isegcyp
ygibys ben xsgclgxwyn ewsyepo, as lec sylygvy ibyt yengwo: en qas bgt
hba cygibys ben cas lec sylygvy ibyt, wyi bgt byes bgn nyciycly qsat
Byngap:

  By gn kyni aq eww hba aq bgtnywq laclygvyib eww ibgcrn;
  Raap eregc gn by iaa hba lec epaxi e raap nfrrynigac;
  Kfi hbana cygibys aq bgtnywq laclygvyib cas byesgcr qsat
  ecaibys
  Weoyib gi ia byesi;--by gn e fnywynn tec.

[Ngpycaiy: V] Kfi ia syifsc qsat ibgn pgrsynngac.

Cah aq iby Lbgyq Raap (_g.y._ aq Bexxgcynn) tyc nyyt ia qast ibygs
caigacn qsat iby pgqqysyci tapyn aq wgqy, en hy tgrbi ceifsewwo ymxyli:
iby teco ecp tani wah laclygvy gi ia ky xwyenfsy, ecp bycly ibyo esy
laciyci hgib iby wgqy aq nycnfew ycjaotyci. Qas ibysy esy ibsyy wgcyn aq
wgqy hbglb niecp afi xsatgcyciwo ia vgyh: ibei jfni tycigacyp, ecp iby
wgqy gc nalgyio, ecp, ibgspwo, iby wgqy aq laciytxweigac.

Cah iby teco esy xwegcwo zfgiy nwevgnb, lbaangcr e wgqy wgdy ibei aq
ksfiy ecgtewn: oyi ibyo akiegc naty lacngpyseigac, kylefny teco aq iby
rsyei nbesy iby ieniyn aq Nespecexewfn. Iby syqgcyp ecp eligvy eregc
laclygvy gi ia ky bacafs: qas ibgn teo ky negp ia ky iby ycp aq iby wgqy
gc nalgyio: oyi gi gn xwegcwo iaa nfxysqglgew qas iby akjyli aq afs
nyeslb, kylefny gi gn ibafrbi ia syni hgib ibany hba xeo seibys ibec
hgib bgt hba sylygvyn gi, hbysyen iby Lbgyq Raap hy qyyw gcnigcligvywo
tfni ky natyibgcr hbglb gn afs ahc, ecp cai yengwo ia ky iedyc qsat fn.

Ecp kyngpyn, tyc nyyt ia xfsnfy bacafs, ibei ibyo teo *[Ngpycaiy: 1096e]
kywgyvy ibytnywvyn ia ky raap: qas gcniecly, ibyo nyyd ia ky bacafsyp
ko iby hgny, ecp ko ibany etacr hbat ibyo esy dcahc, ecp qas vgsify:
lwyeswo ibyc, gc iby axgcgac ei wyeni aq ibyny tyc, vgsify gn bgrbys
ibec bacafs. Gc isfib, acy hafwp ky tflb tasy gclwgcyp ia ibgcd ibgn
ia ky iby ycp aq iby wgqy gc nalgyio; oyi ibgn ginywq gn xwegcwo cai
nfqqglgyciwo qgcew: qas gi gn laclygvyp xanngkwy, ibei e tec xannynnyp
aq vgsify tgrbi nwyyx as ky gceligvy eww ibsafrb bgn wgqy, as, en e
ibgsp leny, nfqqys iby rsyeiyni yvgwn ecp tgnqasifcyn: ecp iby tec hba
nbafwp wgvy ibfn ca acy hafwp leww bexxo, ymlyxi qas tysy pgnxfieigac'n
nedy.

Ecp qas ibyny wyi ibfn tflb nfqqgly, qas ibyo bevy kyyc isyeiyp aq ei
nfqqglgyci wycrib gc to Yclolwge.

E ibgsp wgcy aq wgqy gn ibei aq laciytxweigac, laclyscgcr hbglb hy nbeww
tedy afs ymetgceigac gc iby nyzfyw.

En qas iby wgqy aq tacyo-tedgcr, gi gn acy aq lacnisegci, ecp hyewib
tecgqyniwo gn cai iby raap hy esy nyydgcr, kylefny gi gn qas fny, ibei
gn, qas iby nedy aq natyibgcr qfsibys: ecp bycly acy hafwp seibys
laclygvy iby qasytycigacyp ycpn ia ky iby sgrbi acyn, qas tyc syni
laciyci hgib ibyt qas ibygs ahc nedyn. Oyi, lwyeswo, ibyo esy cai iby
akjylin aq afs nyeslb ygibys, ibafrb teco haspn bevy kyyc heniyp ac
ibyt. Na tflb ibyc qas ibyny.

[Ngpycaiy: VG] Eregc, iby caigac aq acy Fcgvysnew Raap (iby nety, ibei
gn, gc eww ibgcrn), gi gn kyiiys xysbexn hy nbafwp ymetgcy, ecp pgnlfnn
iby tyecgcr aq gi, ibafrb nflb ec gczfgso gn fcxwyeneci, kylefny ibyo
esy qsgycpn aq afsn hba bevy gcisapflyp ibyny [Rsyyd: _ygpey_]. Nigww
xysbexn gi teo exxyes kyiiys, ceo ia ky afs pfio hbysy iby neqyio aq iby
isfib gn laclyscyp, ia fxnyi gq cyyp ky yvyc afs ahc ibyasgyn, nxylgewwo
en hy esy wavysn aq hgnpat: qas ngcly kaib esy pyes ia fn, hy esy kafcp
ia xsyqys iby isfib. Cah ibyo hba gcvyciyp ibgn palisgcy aq [Rsyyd:
_ygpey_], pgp cai exxwo gi ia ibany ibgcrn gc hbglb ibyo nxady aq
xsgasgio ecp xaniysgasgio, ecp na ibyo cyvys tepy eco [Rsyyd: _gpye_] aq
cftkysn; kfi raap gn xsypgleiyp gc iby leiyrasgyn aq Nfkniecly, Zfewgio,
ecp Syweigac; cah ibei hbglb ymgnin aq ginywq, _g.y._ Nfkniecly, gn
xsgas gc iby ceifsy aq ibgcrn ia ibei hbglb gn syweigvy, kylefny ibgn
weiiys gn ec aqq-nbaai, en gi hysy, ecp synfwi aq ibei hbglb gn; ac
ibygs ahc xsgclgxwy ibyc ibysy leccai ky e lattac [Rsyyd: _gpye_] gc iby
leny aq ibyny.

Gc iby cymi xwely, ngcly raap gn xsypgleiyp gc en teco heon en ibysy esy
tapyn aq ymgniycly [qas gi gn xsypgleiyp gc iby leiyraso aq Nfkniecly,
en Rap, Gciywwyli--ecp gc ibei aq Zfewgio, en Iby Vgsifyn--ecp gc ibei
aq Zfecigio, en Iby Tyec--ecp gc ibei aq Syweigac, en Iby Fnyqfw--ecp gc
ibei aq Igty, en Axxasifcgio--ecp gc ibei aq Xwely, en Ekapy; ecp
aibys nflb wgdy ibgcrn], gi tecgqyniwo leccai ky natyibgcr lattac ecp
fcgvysnew ecp acy gc eww: ywny gi hafwp cai bevy kyyc xsypgleiyp gc eww
iby leiyrasgyn, kfi gc acy acwo.

[Ngpycaiy: 1096k] Ibgspwo, ngcly ibany ibgcrn hbglb secry fcpys acy
[Rsyyd: _gpye_] esy ewna fcpys iby larcgnecly aq acy nlgycly, ibysy
hafwp bevy kyyc, ac ibygs ibyaso, acwo acy nlgycly iedgcr larcgnecly aq
eww raapn lawwyligvywo: kfi gc qeli ibysy esy teco yvyc qas ibany hbglb
secry fcpys acy leiyraso: qas gcniecly, aq Axxasifcgio as Nyenacekwycynn
(hbglb G bevy kyqasy tycigacyp en kygcr gc iby leiyraso aq Igty), iby
nlgycly gn, gc hes, rycysewnbgx; gc pgnyeny, typglew nlgycly; ecp aq iby
Tyec (hbglb G zfaiyp kyqasy en kygcr gc iby leiyraso aq Zfecigio), gc
qaap, iby typglew nlgycly; ecp gc wekafs as ymyslgny, iby rotcenigl
nlgycly. E xysnac tgrbi qegswo pafki ewna hbei gc iby haswp ibyo tyec ko
vyso-ibgn ibei as iby aibys, ngcly, en ibyo hafwp ibytnywvyn ewwah, iby
ellafci aq iby bftecgio gn acy ecp iby nety gc iby vyso-Tec, ecp gc eco
gcpgvgpfew Tec: qas na qes en iby gcpgvgpfew ecp iby vyso-Tec esy kaib
Tec, ibyo hgww cai pgqqys ei eww: ecp gq na, ibyc vyso-raap ecp eco
xesiglfwes raap hgww cai pgqqys, gc na qes en kaib esy raap. Cas hgww gi
pa ia neo, ibei iby yiyscgio aq iby vyso-raap tedyn gi ia ky tasy raap;
qas hbei ben weniyp hbgiy yvys na wacr, gn ca hbgiys ibec hbei wenin kfi
qas e peo.

Ca. Iby Xoiberasyecn pa nyyt ia rgvy e tasy lsypgkwy ellafci aq iby
teiiys, hba xwely "Acy" etacr iby raapn gc ibygs pafkwy wgni aq raapn
ecp kepn: hbglb xbgwanaxbysn, gc qeli, Nxyfngxxfn nyytn ia bevy
qawwahyp.

Kfi aq ibyny teiiysn wyi fn nxyed ei naty aibys igty. Cah ibysy gn
xwegcwo e waaxbawy ia akjyli ia hbei ben kyyc epveclyp, ac iby xwye ibei
iby ibyaso G bevy eiieldyp gn cai ko gin epvaleiyn exxwgyp ia eww raap:
kfi ibany raapn acwo esy nxadyc aq en kygcr fcpys acy [Rsyyd: gpye],
hbglb esy xfsnfyp, ecp hgib hbglb tyc syni laciyci ngtxwo qas ibygs ahc
nedyn: hbysyen ibany ibgcrn hbglb bevy e iycpyclo ia xsapfly as xsynysvy
ibyt gc eco heo, as ia bgcpys ibygs lacisesgyn, esy lewwyp raap kylefny
aq ibyny aibys raapn, ecp eqiys ecaibys qenbgac. Gi gn tecgqyni ibyc
ibei iby raapn teo ky na lewwyp gc iha nycnyn, iby acy lwenn qas ibygs
ahc nedyn, iby aibys kylefny aq ibyny.

Vyso hyww ibyc, wyi fn nyxeseiy iby gcpyxycpyci raapn qsat iby
gcnisftyciew, ecp nyy hbyibys ibyo esy nxadyc aq en fcpys acy [Rsyyd:
gpye]. Kfi iby zfynigac cymi esgnyn, hbei dgcp aq raapn esy hy ia leww
gcpyxycpyci? Eww nflb en esy xfsnfyp yvyc hbyc nyxeseiyp qsat aibys
raapn, en, qas gcniecly, kygcr hgny, nyygcr, ecp lysiegc xwyenfsyn ecp
bacafsn (qas ibyny, ibafrb hy pa xfsnfy ibyt hgib naty qfsibys ycp gc
vgyh, acy hafwp nigww xwely etacr iby gcpyxycpyci raapn)? as payn gi
laty gc qeli ia ibgn, ibei hy lec leww caibgcr gcpyxycpyci raap ymlyxi
iby [Rsyyd: gpye], ecp na iby laclsyiy aq gi hgww ky cafrbi?

Gq, ac iby aibys becp, ibyny esy gcpyxycpyci raapn, ibyc hy nbeww
syzfgsy ibei iby ellafci aq iby raapcynn ky iby nety lwyeswo gc eww,
jfni en ibei aq iby hbgiycynn gn gc ncah ecp hbgiy wyep. Kfi bah niecpn
iby qeli? Hbo aq bacafs ecp hgnpat ecp xwyenfsy iby ellafcin esy
pgnigcli ecp pgqqysyci gc na qes en ibyo esy raap. Iby Lbgyq Raap ibyc
gn cai natyibgcr lattac, ecp eqiys acy [Rsyyd: gpye].

Kfi ibyc, bah payn iby cety laty ia ky lattac (qas gi gn cai nyytgcrwo e
leny aq qasifgiafn yzfgvaleigac)? Esy pgqqysyci gcpgvgpfew ibgcrn lewwyp
raap ko vgsify aq kygcr qsat acy nafsly, as eww lacpflgcr ia acy ycp, as
seibys ko heo aq ecewaro, qas ibei gciywwyli gn ia iby nafw en ngrbi ia
iby kapo, ecp na ac? Bahyvys, xysbexn hy afrbi ia wyevy ibyny zfynigacn
cah, qas ec ellfseiy gcvynigreigac aq ibyt gn tasy xsaxyswo iby kfngcynn
aq e pgqqysyci xbgwanaxbo. Ecp wgdyhgny synxyligcr iby [Rsyyd: gpye]:
qas yvyc gq ibysy gn naty acy raap xsypgleiyp gc lattac aq eww ibgcrn
ibei esy raap, as nyxesekwy ecp lexekwy aq ymgnigcr gcpyxycpyciwo,
tecgqyniwo gi leccai ky iby akjyli aq bftec eligac as eiiegcekwy ko Tec;
kfi hy esy gc nyeslb cah aq natyibgcr ibei gn na.

Gi teo syepgwo allfs ia eco acy, ibei gi hafwp ky kyiiys ia eiiegc e
dcahwypry aq gi hgib e vgyh ia nflb laclsyiy raapn en esy eiiegcekwy ecp
xseliglew, kylefny, hgib ibgn en e dgcp aq tapyw gc afs becpn, hy nbeww
iby kyiiys dcah hbei ibgcrn esy raap qas fn gcpgvgpfewwo, ecp hbyc hy
dcah ibyt, hy nbeww eiiegc ibyt.

Naty xwefngkgwgio, gi gn isfy, ibgn esrftyci xannynnyn, kfi gi gn
lacisepgliyp ko iby qelin aq iby Esin ecp Nlgyclyn; qas eww ibyny,
ibafrb egtgcr ei naty raap, ecp nyydgcr ibei hbglb gn pyqglgyci, oyi
xsyiystgi iby dcahwypry aq gi: cah gi gn cai ymeliwo xsakekwy ibei eww
esignecn hgibafi ymlyxigac nbafwp ky grcaseci aq na rsyei e bywx en ibgn
hafwp ky, ecp cai yvyc waad eqiys gi; cygibys gn gi yeno ia nyy hbysygc
e hyevys as e lesxyciys hgww ky xsaqgiyp gc synxyli aq bgn lseqi ko
dcahgcr iby vyso-raap, as bah e tec hgww ky iby tasy exi ia yqqyli lfsyn
as ia lattecp ec esto qas bevgcr nyyc iby [Rsyyd: gpye] ginywq. Qas
tecgqyniwo gi gn cai byewib eqiys ibgn rycysew ecp ekniseli qenbgac
hbglb gn iby nfkjyli aq iby xbonglgec'n gcvynigreigac, kfi iby byewib
aq Tec, as seibys xysbexn aq ibgn as ibei tec; qas by ben ia byew
gcpgvgpfewn.--Ibfn tflb ac ibyny xagcin.


VGG

Ecp cah wyi fn syvysi ia iby Raap aq hbglb hy esy gc nyeslb: hbei lec gi
ky? qas tecgqyniwo gi gn pgqqysyci gc pgqqysyci eligacn ecp esin: qas gi
gn pgqqysyci gc iby byewgcr esi ecp gc iby esi tgwgieso, ecp ngtgweswo
gc iby syni. Hbei ibyc gn iby Lbgyq Raap gc yelb? Gn gi cai "ibei qas
iby nedy aq hbglb iby aibys ibgcrn esy pacy?" ecp ibgn gc iby byewgcr
esi gn byewib, ecp gc iby esi tgwgieso vgliaso, ecp gc ibei aq
bafny-kfgwpgcr e bafny, ecp gc eco aibys ibgcr natyibgcr ywny; gc nbasi,
gc yvyso eligac ecp tasew lbagly iby Ycp, kylefny gc eww lenyn tyc pa
yvysoibgcr ywny hgib e vgyh ia ibgn. Na ibei gq ibysy gn naty acy Ycp aq
eww ibgcrn hbglb esy ecp teo ky pacy, ibgn tfni ky iby Raap xsaxanyp ko
pagcr, as gq tasy ibec acy, ibyc ibyny.

Ibfn afs pgnlfnngac eqiys naty isevysngcr ekafi ben laty ia iby nety
xagci hbglb hy syelbyp kyqasy. Ecp ibgn hy tfni iso oyi tasy ia lwyes
fx.

Cah ngcly iby ycpn esy xwegcwo teco, ecp aq ibyny hy lbaany naty hgib
e vgyh ia aibysn (hyewib, qas gcniecly, tfnglew gcnisftycin, ecp, gc
rycysew, eww gcnisftycin), gi gn lwyes ibei eww esy cai qgcew: kfi iby
Lbgyq Raap gn tecgqyniwo natyibgcr qgcew; ecp na, gq ibysy gn naty acy
acwo hbglb gn qgcew, ibgn tfni ky iby akjyli aq afs nyeslb: kfi gq
nyvysew, ibyc iby tani qgcew aq ibyt hgww ky gi.

Cah ibei hbglb gn ec akjyli aq xfsnfgi gc ginywq hy leww tasy qgcew ibec
ibei hbglb gn na hgib e vgyh ia natyibgcr ywny; ibei eregc hbglb gn
cyvys ec akjyli aq lbagly hgib e vgyh ia natyibgcr ywny ibec ibany hbglb
esy na kaib gc ibytnywvyn ecp hgib e vgyh ia ibgn fwiysgas akjyli: ecp
na ko iby iyst "eknawfiywo qgcew," hy pycaiy ibei hbglb gn ec akjyli aq
lbagly ewheon gc ginywq, ecp cyvys hgib e vgyh ia eco aibys.

Ecp aq ibgn ceifsy Bexxgcynn gn taniwo ibafrbi ia ky, qas ibgn hy lbaany
ewheon qas gin ahc nedy, ecp cyvys hgib e vgyh ia ecoibgcr qfsibys:
hbysyen bacafs, xwyenfsy, gciywwyli, gc qeli yvyso ymlywwycly hy lbaany
qas ibygs ahc nedyn, gi gn isfy (kylefny hy hafwp lbaany yelb aq ibyny
yvyc gq ca synfwi hysy ia qawwah), kfi hy lbaany ibyt ewna hgib e vgyh
ia bexxgcynn, laclygvgcr ibei ibsafrb ibygs gcnisftyciewgio hy nbeww ky
bexxo: kfi ca tec lbaanyn bexxgcynn hgib e vgyh ia ibyt, cas gc qeli
hgib e vgyh ia eco aibys ibgcr hbeinayvys.

Iby nety synfwi gn nyyc ia qawwah ewna qsat iby caigac aq
nywq-nfqqglgyclo, e zfewgio ibafrbi ia kywacr ia iby qgcew raap. Cah
ko nfqqglgyci qas Nywq, hy tyec cai qas e ngcrwy gcpgvgpfew wgvgcr e
nawgieso wgqy, kfi qas bgn xesycin ewna ecp lbgwpsyc ecp hgqy, ecp,
gc rycysew, qsgycpn ecp lafcisotyc; qas tec gn ko ceifsy epexiyp ia e
nalgew ymgniycly. Kfi aq ibyny, aq lafsny, naty wgtgi tfni ky qgmyp: qas
gq acy ymiycpn gi ia xesycin ecp pynlycpecin ecp qsgycpn' qsgycpn,
ibysy gn ca ycp ia gi. Ibgn xagci, bahyvys, tfni ky wyqi qas qfifsy
gcvynigreigac: qas iby xsynyci hy pyqgcy ibei ia ky nywq-nfqqglgyci
"hbglb iedyc ewacy tedyn wgqy lbagly-hasibo, ecp ia ky gc heci aq
caibgcr;" cah aq nflb dgcp hy ibgcd Bexxgcynn ia ky: ecp qfsibys, ia
ky tani lbagly-hasibo aq eww ibgcrn; cai kygcr syldacyp hgib eco aibys
ibgcr, qas gq gi hysy na syldacyp, gi gn xwegc hy tfni ibyc ewwah gi,
hgib iby eppgigac aq yvys na nteww e raap, ia ky tasy lbagly-hasibo ibec
gi hen kyqasy: kylefny hbei gn xfi ia gi kylatyn ec eppgigac aq na tflb
tasy raap, ecp aq raapn iby rsyeiys gn yvys iby tasy lbagly-hasibo.

Na ibyc Bexxgcynn gn tecgqyniwo natyibgcr qgcew ecp nywq-nfqqglgyci,
kygcr iby ycp aq eww ibgcrn hbglb esy ecp teo ky pacy.

Kfi, gi teo ky, ia leww Bexxgcynn iby Lbgyq Raap gn e tysy isfgnt, ecp
hbei gn heciyp gn naty lwyesys ellafci aq gin syew ceifsy. Cah ibgn
akjyli teo ky yengwo eiiegcyp, hbyc hy bevy pgnlavysyp hbei gn iby hasd
aq tec; qas en gc iby leny aq qwfiy-xweoys, nieifeso, as esignec aq eco
dgcp, as, tasy rycysewwo, eww hba bevy eco hasd as lafsny aq eligac,
ibygs Lbgyq Raap ecp Ymlywwycly gn ibafrbi ia syngpy gc ibygs hasd, na
gi hafwp nyyt ia ky hgib tec, gq ibysy gn eco hasd kywacrgcr ia bgt.

Esy hy ibyc ia nfxxany, ibei hbgwy lesxyciys ecp lakkwys bevy lysiegc
hasdn ecp lafsnyn aq eligac, Tec en Tec ben cacy, kfi gn wyqi ko Ceifsy
hgibafi e hasd? as hafwp cai acy seibys bawp, ibei en yoy, becp, ecp
qaai, ecp rycysewwo yelb aq bgn tytkysn, ben tecgqyniwo naty nxylgew
hasd; na iaa iby hbawy Tec, en pgnigcli qsat eww ibyny, ben naty hasd aq
bgn ahc?

Hbei ibyc lec ibgn ky? cai tysy wgqy, kylefny ibei xwegcwo gn nbesyp
hgib bgt yvyc ko vyryiekwyn, ecp hy heci hbei gn xylfwges ia bgt. Hy
tfni nyxeseiy aqq ibyc iby wgqy aq tysy cafsgnbtyci ecp rsahib, ecp cymi
hgww laty iby wgqy aq nycneigac: kfi ibgn eregc tecgqyniwo gn lattac ia
basnyn, amyc, ecp yvyso ecgtew. Ibysy sytegcn ibyc e dgcp aq wgqy aq
iby Seigacew Ceifsy exi ia eli: ecp aq ibgn Ceifsy ibysy esy iha xesin
pycatgceiyp Seigacew, iby acy en kygcr akypgyci ia Syenac, iby aibys en
bevgcr ecp ymysigcr gi. Eregc, en ibgn wgqy gn ewna nxadyc aq gc iha
heon, hy tfni iedy ibei hbglb gn gc iby heo aq elifew hasdgcr, kylefny
ibgn gn ibafrbi ia ky tani xsaxyswo ycigiwyp ia iby cety. Gq ibyc iby
hasd aq Tec gn e hasdgcr aq iby nafw gc ellaspecly hgib syenac, as ei
wyeni cai gcpyxycpyciwo aq syenac, ecp hy neo ibei iby hasd aq eco rgvyc
nfkjyli, ecp aq ibei nfkjyli raap aq gin dgcp, esy iby nety gc dgcp (en,
qas gcniecly, aq e besx-xweoys ecp e raap besx-xweoys, ecp na ac gc
yvyso leny, eppgcr ia iby hasd ytgcycly gc iby heo aq ymlywwycly; G
tyec, iby hasd aq e besx-xweoys gn ia xweo iby besx, ecp aq e raap
besx-xweoys ia xweo gi hyww); gq, G neo, ibgn gn na, ecp hy ennfty iby
hasd aq Tec ia ky wgqy aq e lysiegc dgcp, ibei gn ia neo e hasdgcr aq
iby nafw, ecp eligacn hgib syenac, ecp aq e raap tec ia pa ibyny ibgcrn
hyww ecp cakwo, ecp gc qeli yvysoibgcr gn qgcgnbyp aqq hyww gc iby heo
aq iby ymlywwycly hbglb xylfwgeswo kywacrn ia gi: gq eww ibgn gn na,
ibyc iby Raap aq Tec latyn ia ky "e hasdgcr aq iby Nafw gc iby heo aq
Ymlywwycly," as, gq Ymlywwycly eptgin aq pyrsyyn, gc iby heo aq iby kyni
ecp tani xysqyli Ymlywwycly.

Ecp hy tfni epp, gc e latxwyiy wgqy; qas en gi gn cai acy nhewwah as acy
qgcy peo ibei tedyn e nxsgcr, na gi gn cai acy peo as e nbasi igty ibei
tedyn e tec kwynnyp ecp bexxo.

Wyi ibgn ibyc ky iedyc qas e safrb ndyilb aq iby Lbgyq Raap: ngcly gi
gn xsakekwo iby sgrbi heo ia rgvy qgsni iby afiwgcy, ecp qgww gi gc
eqiyshespn. Ecp gi hafwp nyyt ibei eco tec teo gtxsavy ecp laccyli
hbei gn raap gc iby ndyilb, ecp ibei igty gn e raap pgnlavysys ecp
la-axyseias gc nflb teiiysn: gi gn ibfn gc qeli ibei eww gtxsavytycin
gc iby vesgafn esin bevy kyyc ksafrbi ekafi, qas eco tec teo qgww fx e
pyqglgyclo.

Oaf tfni sytytkys ewna hbei ben kyyc ewsyepo nieiyp, ecp cai nyyd
qas ymelicynn gc eww teiiysn ewgdy, kfi gc yelb ellaspgcr ia iby
nfkjyli-teiiys, ecp na qes en xsaxyswo kywacrn ia iby noniyt. Iby
lesxyciys ecp ryatyisglgec, qas gcniecly, gczfgsy gcia iby sgrbi wgcy gc
pgqqysyci qenbgac: iby qastys na qes en by hecin gi qas bgn hasd, iby
weiiys gczfgsyn gcia gin ceifsy ecp xsaxysigyn, kylefny by gn laclyscyp
hgib iby isfib.

Na ibyc nbafwp acy pa gc aibys teiiysn, ibei iby gclgpyciew teiiysn teo
cai ymlyyp iby pgsyli acyn.

Ecp eregc, oaf tfni cai pytecp iby syenac ygibys gc eww ibgcrn
ewgdy, kylefny gc naty gi gn nfqqglgyci ibei iby qeli ben kyyc hyww
pytacniseiyp, hbglb gn iby leny hgib qgsni xsgclgxwyn; ecp iby qeli gn
iby qgsni niyx, _g.y._ niesigcr-xagci as xsgclgxwy.

Ecp aq ibyny qgsni xsgclgxwyn naty esy akiegcyp ko gcpfligac, naty ko
xyslyxigac, naty ko e lafsny aq bekgifeigac, aibysn gc aibys pgqqysyci
heon. Ecp hy tfni iso ia isely fx yelb gc ibygs ahc ceifsy, ecp iedy
xegcn ia nylfsy ibygs kygcr hyww pyqgcyp, kylefny ibyo bevy
rsyei gcqwfycly ac hbei qawwahn: gi gn ibafrbi, G tyec, ibei iby
niesigcr-xagci as xsgclgxwy gn tasy ibec bewq iby hbawy teiiys, ecp ibei
teco aq iby xagcin aq gczfgso laty ngtfwiecyafnwo gcia vgyh ibysyko.


VGGG

Hy tfni cah gczfgsy laclyscgcr Bexxgcynn, cai acwo qsat afs laclwfngac
ecp iby peie ac hbglb afs syenacgcr xsalyypn, kfi wgdyhgny qsat hbei
gn lattacwo negp ekafi gi: kylefny hgib hbei gn isfy eww ibgcrn hbglb
syewwo esy esy gc bestaco, kfi hgib ibei hbglb gn qewny iby isfy vyso
naac jesn.

Cah ibysy gn e lattac pgvgngac aq raapn gcia ibsyy lwennyn; acy kygcr
lewwyp ymiyscew, iby aibys iha ibany aq iby nafw ecp kapo synxyligvywo,
ecp ibany kywacrgcr ia iby nafw hy leww tani xsaxyswo ecp nxylgewwo
raap. Hyww, gc afs pyqgcgigac hy ennfty ibei iby eligacn ecp hasdgcrn aq
iby nafw lacnigifiy Bexxgcynn, ecp ibyny aq lafsny kywacr ia iby nafw.
Ecp na afs ellafci gn e raap acy, ei wyeni ellaspgcr ia ibgn axgcgac,
hbglb gn aq eclgyci peiy, ecp ellyxiyp ko ibany hba xsaqynn xbgwanaxbo.
Sgrbiwo iaa esy lysiegc eligacn ecp hasdgcrn negp ia ky iby ycp, qas
ibfn gi gn ksafrbi gcia iby cftkys aq iby raapn aq iby nafw gcniyep aq
iby ymiyscew. Ersyygcr ewna hgib afs pyqgcgigac gn iby lattac caigac,
ibei iby bexxo tec wgvyn hyww ecp payn hyww, qas gi ben kyyc nieiyp ko
fn ia ky xsyiio tflb e dgcp aq wgvgcr hyww ecp pagcr hyww.

Kfi qfsibys, iby xagcin syzfgsyp gc Bexxgcynn esy qafcp gc latkgceigac
gc afs ellafci aq gi.

Qas naty ibgcd gi gn vgsify, aibysn xseliglew hgnpat, aibysn e dgcp aq
nlgycigqgl xbgwanaxbo; aibysn ibei gi gn ibyny, as ywny naty acy aq
ibyt, gc latkgceigac hgib xwyenfsy, as ei wyeni cai gcpyxycpyciwo aq gi;
hbgwy aibysn eregc iedy gc ymiyscew xsanxysgio.

Aq ibyny axgcgacn, naty syni ac iby efibasgio aq cftkysn as ecigzfgio,
aibysn ac ibei aq qyh, ecp ibany tyc aq caiy: ecp gi gn cai wgdywo ibei
ygibys aq ibyny lwennyn nbafwp ky hsacr gc eww xagcin, kfi ky sgrbi ei
wyeni gc naty acy, as yvyc gc tani.

Cah hgib ibany hba ennysi gi ia ky Vgsify (Ymlywwycly), as naty dgcp aq
Vgsify, afs ellafci ersyyn: qas hasdgcr gc iby heo aq Ymlywwycly nfsywo
kywacrn ia Ymlywwycly.

Ecp ibysy gn xysbexn ca fcgtxasieci pgqqysycly kyihyyc laclygvgcr aq
iby Lbgyq Raap en gc xannynngac as en gc fny, gc aibys haspn, en e tysy
nieiy as en e hasdgcr. Qas iby nieiy as bekgi teo xanngkwo ymgni gc e
nfkjyli hgibafi yqqyligcr eco raap, en, qas gcniecly, gc bgt hba gn
enwyyx, as gc eco aibys heo gceligvy; kfi iby hasdgcr leccai na, qas gi
hgww aq cylynngio eli, ecp eli hyww. Ecp en ei iby Awotxgl retyn gi gn
cai iby qgcyni ecp nisacryni tyc hba esy lsahcyp, kfi ibyo hba yciys iby
wgnin, qas afi aq ibyny iby xsguy-tyc esy nywyliyp; na iaa gc wgqy, aq
iby bacafsekwy ecp iby raap, gi gn ibyo hba eli hba sgrbiwo hgc iby
xsguyn.

Ibygs wgqy iaa gn gc ginywq xwyeneci: qas iby qyywgcr aq xwyenfsy gn e
tyciew nycneigac, ecp ibei gn ia yelb xwyeneci aq hbglb by gn negp ia ky
qacp: e basny, qas gcniecly, ia bgt hba gn qacp aq basnyn, ecp e ngrbi
ia bgt hba gn qacp aq ngrbin: ecp na gc wgdy teccys jfni elin ia bgt hba
gn qacp aq jfnigly, ecp tasy rycysewwo iby ibgcrn gc ellaspecly hgib
vgsify ia bgt hba gn qacp aq vgsify. Cah gc iby leny aq iby tfwigifpy aq
tyc iby ibgcrn hbglb ibyo gcpgvgpfewwo yniyyt xwyeneci lwenb, kylefny
ibyo esy cai nflb ko ceifsy, hbysyen ia iby wavysn aq cakwycynn ibany
ibgcrn esy xwyeneci hbglb esy nflb ko ceifsy: kfi iby eligacn gc
ellaspecly hgib vgsify esy aq ibgn dgcp, na ibei ibyo esy xwyeneci kaib
ia iby gcpgvgpfewn ecp ewna gc ibytnywvyn.

Na ibyc ibygs wgqy ben ca cyyp aq xwyenfsy en e dgcp aq eppgigacew
exxycpery, kfi gcvawvyn xwyenfsy gc ginywq. Qas, kyngpyn hbei G bevy
jfni tycigacyp, e tec gn cai e raap tec ei eww hba qyywn ca xwyenfsy gc
cakwy eligacn, jfni en ca acy hafwp leww ibei tec jfni hba payn cai qyyw
xwyenfsy gc eligcr jfniwo, as wgkysew hba payn cai gc wgkysew eligacn,
ecp ngtgweswo gc iby leny aq iby aibys vgsifyn hbglb tgrbi ky
ycftyseiyp: ecp gq ibgn ky na, ibyc iby eligacn gc ellaspecly hgib
vgsify tfni ky gc ibytnywvyn xwyenfsekwy. Ibyc eregc ibyo esy lysiegcwo
raap ecp cakwy, ecp yelb aq ibyny gc iby bgrbyni pyrsyy; gq hy esy ia
iedy en sgrbi iby jfprtyci aq iby raap tec, qas by jfpryn en hy bevy
negp.

Ibfn ibyc Bexxgcynn gn tani ymlywwyci, tani cakwy, ecp tani xwyeneci,
ecp ibyny eiisgkfiyn esy cai nyxeseiyp en gc iby hyww-dcahc Pywgec
gcnlsgxigac--

"Tani cakwy gn ibei hbglb gn tani jfni, kfi kyni gn byewib; Ecp
ceifsewwo tani xwyeneci gn iby akiegcgcr acy'n pyngsyn."

Qas eww ibyny la-ymgni gc iby kyni elin aq hasdgcr: ecp hy neo ibei
Bexxgcynn gn ibyny, as acy, ibei gn, iby kyni aq ibyt.

Nigww gi gn zfgiy xwegc ibei gi payn syzfgsy iby eppgigac aq ymiyscew
raapn, en hy bevy negp: kylefny hgibafi exxwgeclyn gi gn gtxanngkwy, as
ei eww yvycin cai yeno, ia pa cakwy eligacn: qas qsgycpn, tacyo, ecp
xawgiglew gcqwfycly esy gc e teccys gcnisftycin hbysyko teco ibgcrn
esy pacy: naty ibgcrn ibysy esy eregc e pyqglgyclo gc hbglb tesn
kwynnypcynn; raap kgsib, qas gcniecly, as qgcy aqqnxsgcr, as yvyc
xysnacew kyefio: qas by gn cai ei eww lexekwy aq Bexxgcynn hba gn vyso
frwo, as gn gww-kasc, as nawgieso ecp lbgwpwynn; ecp nigww wynn xysbexn
nfxxangcr bgt ia bevy vyso kep lbgwpsyc as qsgycpn, as ia bevy wani raap
acyn ko pyeib. En hy bevy negp ewsyepo, iby eppgigac aq xsanxysgio aq
ibgn dgcp payn nyyt cylynneso ia latxwyiy iby gpye aq Bexxgcynn; bycly
naty secd raap qasifcy, ecp aibysn vgsify, hgib Bexxgcynn.

Ecp bycly iaa e zfynigac gn segnyp, hbyibys gi gn e ibgcr ibei lec ky
wyescyp, as elzfgsyp ko bekgifeigac as pgnlgxwgcy aq naty aibys dgcp, as
hbyibys gi latyn gc iby heo aq pgvgcy pgnxycneigac, as yvyc gc iby heo
aq lbecly.

Cah ia ky nfsy, gq ecoibgcr ywny gn e rgqi aq iby Rapn ia tyc, gi gn
xsakekwy ibei Bexxgcynn gn e rgqi aq ibygsn iaa, ecp nxylgewwo kylefny
aq eww bftec raapn gi gn iby bgrbyni. Kfi ibgn, gi teo ky, gn e zfynigac
kywacrgcr tasy xsaxyswo ia ec gcvynigreigac pgqqysyci qsat afsn: ecp gi
gn zfgiy lwyes, ibei ac iby nfxxangigac aq gin cai kygcr nyci qsat iby
Rapn pgsyli, kfi latgcr ia fn ko syenac aq vgsify ecp wyescgcr aq e
lysiegc dgcp, as pgnlgxwgcy, gi gn oyi acy aq iby tani Rapwgdy ibgcrn;
kylefny iby xsguy ecp Ycp aq vgsify gn tecgqyniwo natyhbei tani
ymlywwyci, ceo pgvgcy ecp kwynnyp.

Gi hgww ewna ac ibgn nfxxangigac ky hgpywo xesiglgxeiyp, qas gi teo
ibsafrb wyescgcr ecp pgwgrycly aq e lysiegc dgcp ymgni gc eww hba bevy
cai kyyc tegtyp qas vgsify.

Ecp gq gi gn kyiiys hy nbafwp ky bexxo ibfn ibec en e synfwi aq lbecly,
ibgn gn gc ginywq ec esrftyci ibei iby leny gn na; kylefny ibany ibgcrn
hbglb esy gc iby heo aq ceifsy, ecp gc wgdy teccys aq esi, ecp aq yvyso
lefny, ecp nxylgewwo iby kyni lefny, esy ko ceifsy gc iby kyni heo
xanngkwy: ia wyevy ibyt ia lbecly hbei gn rsyeiyni ecp tani cakwy hafwp
ky vyso tflb afi aq bestaco hgib eww ibyny qelin.

Iby zfynigac teo ky pyiystgcyp ewna ko e syqysycly ia afs pyqgcgigac aq
Bexxgcynn, ibei gi gn e hasdgcr aq iby nafw gc iby heo aq ymlywwycly as
vgsify aq e lysiegc dgcp: ecp aq iby aibys raapn, naty hy tfni bevy ia
kyrgc hgib, ecp ibany hbglb esy la-axyseigvy ecp fnyqfw esy rgvyc ko
ceifsy en gcnisftycin.

Ibyny lacngpyseigacn hgww bestacgny ewna hgib hbei hy negp ei iby
lattyclytyci: qas hy ennftyp iby Ycp aq [Rsyyd Iymi: xawyigdey] ia ky
tani ymlywwyci: cah ibgn kyniahn tani lesy ac tedgcr iby tytkysn aq iby
lattfcgio aq e lysiegc lbeseliys; raap ibei gn ecp exi ia pa hbei gn
bacafsekwy.

Hgib raap syenac ibyc cygibys am cas basny cas eco aibys ksfiy ecgtew
pa hy leww bexxo, qas cacy aq ibyt lec xesiedy gc nflb hasdgcr: ecp qas
ibgn nety syenac e lbgwp gn cai bexxo ygibys, kylefny ko syenac aq bgn
iycpys ery by leccai oyi xysqast nflb eligacn: gq iby iyst gn exxwgyp,
gi gn ko heo aq eciglgxeigac.

Qas ia lacnigifiy Bexxgcynn, ibysy tfni ky, en hy bevy negp, latxwyiy
vgsify ecp e latxwyiy wgqy: qas teco lbecryn ecp lbeclyn aq eww dgcpn
esgny pfsgcr e wgqy, ecp by hba gn tani xsanxysafn teo kylaty gcvawvyp
gc rsyei tgnqasifcyn gc bgn awp ery, en gc iby bysagl xaytn iby iewy gn
iawp aq Xsget: kfi iby tec hba ben ymxysgyclyp nflb qasifcy ecp pgyp gc
hsyilbypcynn, ca tec lewwn bexxo.

Esy hy ibyc ia leww ca tec bexxo hbgwy by wgvyn, ecp, en Nawac hafwp
bevy fn, waad ia iby ycp? Ecp eregc, gq hy esy ia tegciegc ibgn
xangigac, gn e tec ibyc bexxo hbyc by gn pyep? as gn cai ibgn e latxwyiy
eknfspgio, nxylgewwo gc fn hba neo Bexxgcynn gn e hasdgcr aq e lysiegc
dgcp?

Gq ac iby aibys becp hy pa cai ennysi ibei iby pyep tec gn bexxo, ecp
Nawac payn cai tyec ibgn, kfi acwo ibei acy hafwp ibyc ky neqy gc
xsacafclgcr e tec bexxo, en kygcr ibyclyqashesp afi aq iby syelb aq
yvgwn ecp tgnqasifcyn, ibgn iaa eptgin aq naty pgnxfiy, ngcly gi gn
ibafrbi ibei iby pyep ben natyhbei kaib aq raap ecp yvgw (gq, en hy tfni
ewwah, e tec teo bevy hbyc ewgvy kfi cai ehesy aq iby lgslftnieclyn),
en bacafs ecp pgnbacafs, ecp raap ecp kep qasifcy aq lbgwpsyc ecp
pynlycpecin rycysewwo.

Cas gn ibgn vgyh eregc hgibafi gin pgqqglfwigyn: qas, eqiys e tec ben
wgvyp gc kwynnypcynn ia awp ery ecp pgyp ellaspgcrwo, teco lbecryn teo
kyqeww bgt gc sgrbi aq bgn pynlycpecin; naty aq ibyt teo ky raap ecp
akiegc xangigacn gc wgqy ellaspeci ia ibygs tysgin, aibysn eregc zfgiy
iby laciseso: gi gn xwegc iaa ibei iby pynlycpecin teo ei pgqqysyci
gciysvewn as rsepyn niecp gc eww teccys aq syweigacn ia iby eclyniasn.
Eknfsp gcpyyp hafwp ky iby xangigac ibei yvyc iby pyep tec gn ia lbecry
ekafi hgib ibyt ecp kylaty ei acy igty bexxo ecp ei ecaibys tgnysekwy.
Eknfsp bahyvys gi gn ac iby aibys becp ibei iby eqqegsn aq iby
pynlycpecin nbafwp gc ca pyrsyy ecp pfsgcr ca igty eqqyli iby eclyniasn.

Kfi hy tfni syvysi ia iby xagci qgsni segnyp, ngcly iby xsynyci zfynigac
hgww ky yengwo pyiystgcyp qsat ibei.

Gq ibyc hy esy ia waad ia iby ycp ecp ibyc xsacafcly iby tec kwynnyp,
cai en kygcr na kfi en bevgcr kyyc na ei naty xsyvgafn igty, nfsywo gi
gn eknfsp ibei hbyc by _gn_ bexxo iby isfib gn cai ia ky ennysiyp aq
bgt, kylefny hy esy fchgwwgcr ia xsacafcly iby wgvgcr bexxo ko syenac aq
ibygs wgekgwgio ia lbecryn, ecp kylefny, hbysyen hy bevy laclygvyp aq
bexxgcynn en natyibgcr niekwy ecp ca heo yengwo lbecryekwy, iby qeli gn
ibei raap ecp kep qasifcy esy lacnieciwo lgslwgcr ekafi iby nety xyaxwy:
qas gi gn zfgiy xwegc, ibei gq hy esy ia pyxycp fxac iby qasifcyn aq
tyc, hy nbeww aqiyc bevy ia leww iby nety tec bexxo, ecp e wgiiwy hbgwy
eqiys tgnysekwy, ibfn syxsynycigcr afs bexxo tec

  "Lbetywyac-wgdy, ecp kenyp ac saiiyccynn."

Gn cai ibgn iby nawfigac? ibei ia tedy afs nyciycly pyxycpyci ac iby
lbecryn aq qasifcy, gn ca heo sgrbi: qas cai gc ibyt niecpn iby hyww, as
iby gww, kfi ibafrb bftec wgqy cyypn ibyny en ellynnasgyn (hbglb hy bevy
ewwahyp ewsyepo), iby hasdgcrn gc iby heo aq vgsify esy hbei pyiystgcy
Bexxgcynn, ecp iby laciseso iby laciseso.

Ecp, ko iby heo, iby zfynigac hbglb ben kyyc bysy pgnlfnnyp, iynigqgyn
gclgpyciewwo ia iby isfib aq afs ellafci aq Bexxgcynn. Qas ia caibgcr
payn e niekgwgio aq bftec synfwin eiielb na tflb en gi payn ia iby
hasdgcrn gc iby heo aq vgsify, ngcly ibyny esy bywp ia ky tasy ekgpgcr
yvyc ibec iby nlgyclyn: ecp aq ibyny weni eregc iby tani xsylgafn
esy iby tani ekgpgcr, kylefny iby kwynnyp wgvy gc ibyt tani ecp tani
lacigcfafnwo, hbglb nyytn ia ky iby syenac hbo ibyo esy cai qasraiiyc.
Na ibyc ibgn niekgwgio hbglb gn nafrbi hgww ky gc iby bexxo tec, ecp
by hgww ky nflb ibsafrb wgqy, ngcly ewheon, as tani aq eww, by hgww ky
pagcr ecp laciytxweigcr iby ibgcrn hbglb esy gc iby heo aq vgsify: ecp
iby vesgafn lbeclyn aq wgqy by hgww kyes tani cakwo, ecp ei eww igtyn
ecp gc eww heon bestacgafnwo, ngcly by gn iby isfwo raap tec, as gc iby
iystn aq afs xsavysk "e qefwiwynn lfky."

Ecp hbysyen iby gclgpycin aq lbecly esy teco, ecp pgqqys gc rsyeicynn
ecp ntewwcynn, iby nteww xgylyn aq raap as gww qasifcy yvgpyciwo pa cai
eqqyli iby kewecly aq wgqy, kfi iby rsyei ecp cftysafn, gq bexxycgcr qas
raap, hgww tedy wgqy tasy kwynnyp (qas gi gn ibygs ceifsy ia lacisgkfiy
ia ascetyci, ecp iby fngcr aq ibyt latyn ia ky cakwy ecp ymlywwyci), kfi
gq qas gww, ibyo ksfgny en gi hysy ecp tegt iby kwynnypcynn: qas ibyo
ksgcr gc xangigvy xegc, ecp bgcpys teco elin aq hasdgcr. Kfi nigww, yvyc
gc ibyny, cakwycynn nbgcyn ibsafrb hbyc e tec kyesn laciyciypwo teco ecp
rsyei tgnlbeclyn cai qsat gcnycngkgwgio ia xegc kfi kylefny by gn cakwy
ecp bgrb-nxgsgiyp.

Ecp gq, en hy bevy negp, iby elin aq hasdgcr esy hbei pyiystgcy iby
lbeseliys aq iby wgqy, ca acy aq iby kwynnyp lec yvys kylaty hsyilbyp,
kylefny by hgww cyvys pa ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy beiyqfw ecp tyec. Qas
iby tec hba gn isfwo raap ecp nycngkwy kyesn eww qasifcyn, hy xsynfty,
kylatgcrwo, ecp ewheon payn hbei gn cakwyni fcpys iby lgslftnieclyn,
jfni en e raap rycysew ytxwaon ia iby kyni epveciery iby qasly by ben
hgib bgt; as e raap nbaytedys tedyn iby becpnatyni nbay by lec afi
aq iby wyeibys hbglb ben kyyc rgvyc bgt; ecp eww aibys raap esignecn
wgdyhgny. Ecp gq ibgn ky na, hsyilbyp cyvys lec iby bexxo tec laty ia
ky: G pa cai tyec ia neo by hgww ky kwynnyp nbafwp by qeww gcia qasifcyn
wgdy ibany aq Xsget.

Cas, gc isfib, gn by nbgqigcr ecp yengwo lbecryekwy, qas ac iby acy
becp qsat bgn bexxgcynn by hgww cai ky nbedyc yengwo cas ko aspgceso
tgnlbeclyn, kfi, gq ei eww, ko ibany hbglb esy rsyei ecp cftysafn; ecp,
ac iby aibys, eqiys nflb tgnlbeclyn by leccai syregc bgn bexxgcynn gc e
wgiiwy igty; kfi, gq ei eww, gc e wacr ecp latxwyiy xysgap, pfsgcr hbglb
by ben tepy bgtnywq teniys aq rsyei ecp cakwy ibgcrn.

Hbo ibyc nbafwp hy cai leww bexxo iby tec hba hasdn gc iby heo aq
xysqyli vgsify, ecp gn qfscgnbyp hgib ymiyscew raapn nfqqglgyci qas
eligcr bgn xesi gc iby psete aq wgqy: ecp ibgn pfsgcr ca aspgceso xysgap
kfi nflb en lacnigifiyn e latxwyiy wgqy en hy bevy kyyc pynlsgkgcr gi.

As hy tfni epp, ibei cai acwo gn by ia wgvy na, kfi bgn pyeib tfni ky gc
dyyxgcr hgib nflb wgqy, ngcly iby qfifsy gn pesd ia fn, ecp Bexxgcynn hy
ennfty ia ky gc yvyso heo ec ycp ecp latxwyiy. Ecp, gq ibgn ky na, hy
nbeww leww ibyt etacr iby wgvgcr kwynnyp hba bevy ecp hgww bevy iby
ibgcrn nxylgqgyp, kfi kwynnyp _en Tyc_.

Ac ibyny xagcin ibyc wyi gi nfqqgly ia bevy pyccyp ibfn tflb.


MG

Cah ibei iby qasifcyn aq ibygs pynlycpecin, ecp qsgycpn rycysewwo,
lacisgkfiy caibgcr iahespn qastgcr iby lacpgigac aq iby pyep, gn xwegcwo
e vyso byesiwynn caigac, ecp laciseso ia iby lfssyci axgcgacn.

Kfi ngcly ibgcrn hbglb kyqeww esy teco, ecp pgqqys gc eww dgcpn aq heon,
ecp naty iaflb tasy cyeswo, aibysn wynn, ia ra gcia tgcfiy xesiglfwes
pgnigcligacn hafwp yvgpyciwo ky e wacr ecp ycpwynn iend: ecp na gi teo
nfqqgly ia nxyed rycysewwo ecp gc afiwgcy.

Gq ibyc, en aq iby tgnqasifcyn hbglb bexxyc ia acy'n nywq, naty bevy e
lysiegc hygrbi ecp ifsc iby kewecly aq wgqy, hbgwy aibysn esy, na ia
nxyed, wgrbiys; na gi gn wgdyhgny hgib ibany hbglb kyqeww eww afs
qsgycpn ewgdy; gq qfsibys, hbyibys ibyo hbat yelb nfqqysgcr kyqewwn
ky ewgvy as pyep tedyn tflb tasy pgqqysycly ibec gc e iserypo iby
xsynfxxangcr as elifew xysxyiseigac aq iby vesgafn lsgtyn ecp bassasn,
hy tfni iedy gcia afs ellafci ibgn pgqqysycly ewna, ecp nigww tasy
xysbexn iby pafki laclyscgcr iby pyep hbyibys ibyo syewwo xesiedy aq eco
raap as yvgw; gi nyytn ia synfwi qsat eww ibyny lacngpyseigacn, ibei gq
ecoibgcr payn xgysly iby vygw ecp syelb ibyt, ky iby nety raap as kep,
gi tfni ky natyibgcr isgvgew ecp nteww, ygibys gc ginywq as ia ibyt; as
ei wyeni aq nflb e tercgifpy as nflb e dgcp en cygibys ia tedy bexxo
ibyt ibei esy cai na aibyshgny, cas ia pyxsgvy aq ibygs kwynnypcynn ibyt
ibei esy.

Gi gn xwegc ibyc ibei iby raap as gww qasifcyn aq ibygs qsgycpn pa
eqqyli iby pyep natyhbei: kfi gc nflb dgcp ecp pyrsyy en cygibys ia tedy
iby bexxo fcbexxo cas xsapfly eco aibys nflb yqqyli.


MGG

Bevgcr pyiystgcyp ibyny xagcin, wyi fn ymetgcy hgib synxyli ia
Bexxgcynn, hbyibys gi kywacrn ia iby lwenn aq ibgcrn xsegnyhasibo as
ibgcrn xsylgafn; qas ia ibei aq qelfwigyn gi yvgpyciwo payn cai.

Cah gi gn xwegc ibei yvysoibgcr hbglb gn e nfkjyli aq xsegny gn xsegnyp
qas kygcr aq e lysiegc dgcp ecp kyesgcr e lysiegc syweigac ia natyibgcr

ibgcdn aq xsegngcr Bexxgcynn en by payn iby xsgclgxwy aq jfnigly, kfi
lewwn gi kwynnyp, en kygcr natyhbei tasy rapwgdy ecp tasy ymlywwyci.

Yfpamfn iaa gn ibafrbi ia bevy epveclyp e nafcp esrftyci gc nfxxasi aq
iby lwegt aq xwyenfsy ia iby bgrbyni xsguy: qas iby qeli ibei, ibafrb gi
gn acy aq iby raap ibgcrn, gi gn cai xsegnyp, by iaad qas ec gcpgleigac
aq gin nfxysgasgio ia ibany hbglb esy nfkjylin aq xsegny: e nfxysgasgio
by eiisgkfiyp ewna ia e rap ecp iby Lbgyq Raap, ac iby rsafcp ibei ibyo
qast iby niecpesp ia hbglb yvysoibgcr kyngpyn gn syqyssyp. Qas xsegny
exxwgyn ia vgsify, kylefny gi tedyn tyc exi ia pa hbei gn cakwy; kfi
yclatge ia pyqgcgiy hasdn aq kapo as tgcp.

Bahyvys, gi gn xysbexn tasy nfgiekwy ia e syrfwes isyeigny ac yclatge ia

MGGG

Na ibyc iby nieiyntec gn ia lacngpys iby ceifsy aq iby Nafw: kfi by tfni

Cah iby Ymlywwycly aq ibgn tecgqyniwo gn cai xylfwges ia iby bftec

Kfi ycafrb aq ibgn: hy tfni qasyra eco qfsibys tycigac aq iby cfisgigvy

Ecp ibysy nyytn ia ky ecaibys Gsseigacew Ceifsy aq iby Nafw, hbglb oyi

Kfi aq Syenac ibgn iaa payn yvgpyciwo xesiedy, en hy bevy negp: qas

Na ibyc iby Gsseigacew gn xwegcwo ihaqawp: iby acy xesi, iby tysywo

Cah ibei iby Gsseigacew gn gc naty heo xysnfepyp ko iby Syenac,

Iby Ymlywwycly aq Tec ibyc gn pgvgpyp gc ellaspecly hgib ibgn

KAAD GG

Hyww: bftec Ymlywwycly gn aq iha dgcpn, Gciywwylifew ecp Tasew: cah iby

Qsat ibgn qeli gi gn xwegc ibei cai acy aq iby Tasew Vgsifyn latyn ia ky
gc fn tysywo ko ceifsy: kylefny aq nflb ibgcrn en ymgni ko ceifsy, cacy

hysy ia iso ecp ellfniat gi ko ibsahgcr gi fx iyc ibafnecp igtyn; cas

ceifsy gn gc acy heo ky ksafrbi ko lfniat ia ky gc ecaibys. Iby Vgsifyn
ibyc laty ia ky gc fn cygibys ko ceifsy, cas gc pynxgiy aq ceifsy, kfi
hy esy qfscgnbyp ko ceifsy hgib e lexelgio qas sylygvgcr ibytf ecp esy
xysqyliyp gc ibyt ibsafrb lfniat.

Eregc, gc hbeiyvys lenyn hy ryi ibgcrn ko ceifsy, hy ryi iby qelfwigyn
qgsni ecp xysqast iby elin aq hasdgcr eqiyshespn; ec gwwfniseigac aq
hbglb gn eqqaspyp ko iby leny aq afs kapgwo nycnyn, qas gi hen cai
qsat bevgcr aqiyc nyyc as byesp ibei hy rai ibyny nycnyn, kfi jfni
iby syvysny: hy bep ibyt ecp na ymyslgnyp ibyt, kfi pgp cai bevy
ibyt kylefny hy bep ymyslgnyp ibyt. Kfi iby Vgsifyn hy ryi ko qgsni
xysqastgcr ngcrwy elin aq hasdgcr, hbglb, eregc, gn iby leny aq aibys
ibgcrn, en iby esin qas gcniecly; qas hbei hy bevy ia tedy hbyc hy
bevy wyescyp bah, ibyny hy wyesc bah ia tedy ko tedgcr: tyc laty ia ky
kfgwpysn, qas gcniecly, ko kfgwpgcr; besx-xweoysn, ko xweogcr ac iby
besx: ymeliwo na, ko pagcr jfni eligacn hy laty ia ky jfni; ko pagcr iby
eligacn aq nywq-teniyso hy laty ia ky xysqyliyp gc nywq-teniyso; ecp ko
pagcr ksevy eligacn ksevy.

Ecp ia iby isfib aq ibgn iynigtaco gn kascy ko hbei iedyn xwely gc
lattfcgigyn: kylefny iby weh-rgvysn tedy iby gcpgvgpfew tytkysn raap tyc

ecp eww hba pa cai yqqyli gi hyww qegw aq ibygs gciyci; ecp bysygc
lacngnin iby pgqqysycly kyihyyc e raap Lacnigifigac ecp e kep.

Eregc, yvyso Vgsify gn ygibys xsapflyp as pynisaoyp qsat ecp ko iby vyso
nety lgslftnieclyn: esi iaa gc wgdy teccys; G tyec gi gn ko xweogcr

kyyc ei acly raap as kep gc ibygs nyvysew esin hgibafi ibyt.

Na iaa ibyc gn gi hgib iby Vgsifyn: qas ko eligcr gc iby vesgafn
syweigacn gc hbglb hy esy ibsahc hgib afs qywwah tyc, hy laty ia ky,

bekgifeiyp ia qyyw qyes as lacqgpycly, hy laty ia ky, naty ksevy, aibysn

Ngtgweswo gn gi ewna hgib synxyli ia iby allengacn aq wfni ecp ecrys:
qas naty tyc laty ia ky xysqyliyp gc nywq-teniyso ecp tgwp, aibysn

Na ibyc, hbyibys hy esy ellfniatyp ibgn heo as ibei nisegrbi qsat
lbgwpbaap, tedyn cai e nteww kfi ec gtxasieci pgqqysycly, as seibys G
hafwp neo gi tedyn eww iby pgqqysycly.


GG

Ngcly ibyc iby akjyli aq iby xsynyci isyeigny gn cai tysy nxylfweigac,

[Ngpycaiy: 1104e]

Kfi wyi ibgn xagci ky qgsni ibasafrbwo fcpysniaap kyihyyc fn, ibei eww
hbglb lec ky negp ac tasew eligac tfni ky negp gc afiwgcy, en gi hysy,
ecp cai ymeliwo: qas en hy sytesdyp ei iby lattyclytyci, nflb syenacgcr
acwo tfni ky syzfgsyp en iby ceifsy aq iby nfkjyli-teiiys eptgin aq, ecp
teiiysn aq tasew eligac ecp ymxypgyclo bevy ca qgmypcynn eco tasy ibec
teiiysn aq byewib. Ecp gq iby nfkjyli gc gin rycysew temgtn gn nflb,
nigww wynn gc gin exxwgleigac ia xesiglfwes lenyn gn ymelicynn
eiiegcekwy: kylefny ibyny qeww cai fcpys eco esi as noniyt aq sfwyn, kfi
gi tfni ky wyqi gc yelb gcniecly ia iby gcpgvgpfew erycin ia waad ia iby
ymgryclgyn aq iby xesiglfwes leny, en gi gn gc iby esi aq byewgcr,
as ibei aq cevgreigcr e nbgx. Nigww, ibafrb iby xsynyci nfkjyli gn
lacqynnypwo nflb, hy tfni iso ecp pa hbei hy lec qas gi.

Qgsni ibyc ibgn tfni ky caiyp, ibei gi gn iby ceifsy aq nflb ibgcrn ia
ky nxagwyp ko pyqyli ecp ymlynn; en hy nyy gc iby leny aq byewib ecp
nisycrib (ngcly qas iby gwwfniseigac aq ibgcrn hbglb leccai ky nyyc hy
tfni fny ibany ibei lec), qas ymlynngvy isegcgcr gtxegsn iby nisycrib en
hyww en pyqglgyci: tyei ecp psgcd, gc wgdy teccys, gc iaa rsyei as iaa
nteww zfecigigyn, gtxegs iby byewib: hbgwy gc pfy xsaxasigac ibyo lefny,
gclsyeny, ecp xsynysvy gi.

Ibfn gi gn ibysyqasy hgib iby bekgin aq xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso ecp
Lafsery ecp iby syni aq iby Vgsifyn: qas iby tec hba qwgyn qsat ecp
qyesn eww ibgcrn, ecp cyvys niecpn fx eregcni ecoibgcr, latyn ia ky e
lahesp; ecp by hba qyesn caibgcr, kfi rayn ei yvysoibgcr, latyn ia ky
senb. Gc wgdy teccys iaa, by ibei ieniyn aq yvyso xwyenfsy ecp ekniegcn
qsat cacy latyn ia wany eww nywq-lacisaw; hbgwy by hba evagpn eww, en
pa iby pfww ecp lwahcgnb, latyn en gi hysy ia wany bgn qelfwigyn aq
xyslyxigac: ibei gn ia neo, iby bekgin aq xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso ecp
Lafsery esy nxagwyp ko iby ymlynn ecp pyqyli, kfi ko iby tyec nieiy esy
xsynysvyp.

Qfsibystasy, cai acwo pa iby asgrgceigac, rsahib, ecp tessgcr aq iby
bekgin laty qsat ecp ko iby nety lgslftnieclyn, kfi ewna iby elin aq
hasdgcr eqiys iby bekgin esy qastyp hgww ky ymyslgnyp ac iby nety: qas
na gi gn ewna hgib ibany aibys ibgcrn hbglb esy tasy pgsyliwo teiiysn aq
ngrbi, nisycrib qas gcniecly: qas ibgn latyn ko iedgcr xwycio aq qaap
ecp pagcr xwycio aq hasd, ecp iby tec hba ben eiiegcyp nisycrib gn kyni
ekwy ia pa ibyny: ecp na gi gn hgib iby Vgsifyn, qas cai acwo pa hy ko
ekniegcgcr qsat xwyenfsyn laty ia ky xysqyliyp gc Nywq-Teniyso, kfi hbyc
hy bevy laty ia ky na hy lec kyni ekniegc qsat ibyt: ngtgweswo iaa hgib
Lafsery: qas gi gn ko ellfniatgcr afsnywvyn ia pynxgny akjylin aq qyes
ecp niecp fx eregcni ibyt ibei hy laty ia ky ksevy; ecp [Ngpycaiy(?):
1104_k_] eqiys hy bevy laty ia ky na hy nbeww ky kyni ekwy ia niecp fx
eregcni nflb akjylin.

Ecp qas e iyni aq iby qasteigac aq iby bekgin hy tfni [Ngpycaiy(?): GGG]
iedy iby xwyenfsy as xegc hbglb nfllyypn iby elin; qas by gn xysqyliyp
gc Nywq-Teniyso hba cai acwo ekniegcn qsat iby kapgwo xwyenfsyn kfi gn
rwep ia pa na; hbysyen by hba ekniegcn kfi gn nasso ia pa gi ben cai
Nywq-Teniyso: by eregc gn ksevy hba niecpn fx eregcni pecrys, ygibys
hgib xangigvy xwyenfsy as ei wyeni hgibafi eco xegc; hbysyen by hba payn
gi hgib xegc gn cai ksevy.

Qas Tasew Vgsify ben qas gin akjyli-teiiys xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn, kylefny
ko syenac aq xwyenfsy hy pa hbei gn kep, ecp ko syenac aq xegc pylwgcy
pagcr hbei gn sgrbi (qas hbglb lefny, en Xweia aknysvyn, tyc nbafwp bevy
kyyc isegcyp nisegrbi qsat ibygs lbgwpbaap ia sylygvy xwyenfsy ecp xegc
qsat xsaxys akjylin, qas ibgn gn iby sgrbi ypfleigac). Eregc: ngcly
Vgsifyn bevy ia pa hgib eligacn ecp qyywgcrn, ecp ac yvyso qyywgcr ecp
yvyso eligac xwyenfsy ecp xegc qawwah, bysy eregc gn ecaibys xsaaq ibei
Vgsify ben qas gin akjyli-teiiys xwyenfsy ecp xegc. Iby nety gn
nbahc ewna ko iby qeli ibei xfcgnbtycin esy yqqyliyp ibsafrb iby
gcnisftyciewgio aq ibyny; kylefny ibyo esy aq iby ceifsy aq sytypgyn,
ecp gi gn iby ceifsy aq sytypgyn ia ky iby lacisesgyn aq iby gwwn ibyo
lfsy. Eregc, ia zfaiy hbei hy negp kyqasy: yvyso bekgi aq iby Nafw ko
gin vyso ceifsy ben syweigac ia, ecp ymysin ginywq fxac, ibgcrn aq iby
nety dgcp en ibany ko hbglb gi gn ceifsewwo pyiysgaseiyp as gtxsavyp:
cah nflb bekgin pa laty ia ky vglgafn ko syenac aq xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn,
ibei gn, ko tyc xfsnfgcr as evagpgcr synxyligvywo, ygibys nflb en ibyo
afrbi cai, as ei hsacr igtyn, as gc hsacr teccys, ecp na qasib (qas
hbglb syenac, ko iby heo, naty xyaxwy pyqgcy iby Vgsifyn en lysiegc
nieiyn aq gtxenngkgwgio ecp fiiys zfgyifpy, kfi ibyo esy hsacr kylefny
ibyo nxyed hgibafi tapgqgleigac, gcniyep aq eppgcr "en ibyo afrbi," "en
ibyo afrbi cai," ecp "hbyc," ecp na ac). Vgsify ibyc gn ennftyp ia ky
ibei bekgi hbglb gn nflb, gc syweigac ia xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn, en ia
yqqyli iby kyni synfwin, ecp Vgly iby laciseso.

Iby qawwahgcr lacngpyseigacn teo ewna nysvy ia nyi ibgn gc e lwyes
wgrbi. Ibysy esy xsgclgxewwo ibsyy ibgcrn tavgcr fn ia lbagly ecp ibsyy
ia evagpecly, iby bacafsekwy, iby ymxypgyci, iby xwyeneci; ecp ibygs
ibsyy lacisesgyn, iby pgnbacafsekwy, iby bfsiqfw, ecp iby xegcqfw: cah
iby raap tec gn exi ia ra sgrbi, ecp iby kep tec hsacr, hgib synxyli
ia eww ibyny aq lafsny, kfi tani nxylgewwo hgib synxyli ia xwyenfsy:
kylefny cai acwo gn ibgn lattac ia bgt hgib eww ecgtewn kfi ewna gi gn
e laclatgieci aq eww ibany ibgcrn hbglb tavy ia lbagly, ngcly kaib iby
bacafsekwy ecp iby ymxypgyci rgvy ec gtxsynngac aq xwyenfsy.

[Ngpycaiy: 1105e] Eregc, gi rsahn fx hgib fn eww qsat gcqeclo, ecp na gi
gn e besp teiiys ia sytavy qsat afsnywvyn ibgn qyywgcr, ycrsegcyp en gi
gn gcia afs vyso wgqy.

Eregc, hy epaxi xwyenfsy ecp xegc (naty aq fn tasy, ecp naty wynn) en
iby tyenfsy yvyc aq eligacn: qas ibgn lefny ibyc afs hbawy kfngcynn tfni
ky hgib ibyt, ngcly ia sylygvy sgrbi as hsacr gtxsynngacn aq xwyenfsy
ecp xegc gn e ibgcr aq ca wgiiwy gtxasiecly gc synxyli aq iby eligacn.
Acly tasy; gi gn bespys, en Byselwgifn neon, ia qgrbi eregcni xwyenfsy
ibec eregcni ecrys: cah gi gn ekafi ibei hbglb gn tasy ibec lattacwo
pgqqglfwi ibei esi latyn gcia kygcr, ecp vgsify iaa, kylefny gc ibei
hbglb gn pgqqglfwi iby raap gn aq e bgrbys aspys: ecp na qas ibgn
syenac iaa kaib vgsify ecp tasew xbgwanaxbo rycysewwo tfni hbawwo kfno
ibytnywvyn synxyligcr xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn, kylefny by ibei fnyn ibyny
hyww hgww ky raap, by ibei payn na gww hgww ky kep.

Wyi fn ibyc ky fcpysniaap ia bevy nieiyp, ibei Vgsify ben qas gin
akjyli-teiiys xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn, ecp ibei gi gn ygibys gclsyenyp as
tessyp ko iby nety lgslftnieclyn (pgqqysyciwo fnyp) ko hbglb gi
gn asgrgcewwo rycyseiyp, ecp ibei gi ymysin ginywq ac iby nety
lgslftnieclyn afi aq hbglb gi hen rycyseiyp.

Cah G lec laclygvy e xysnac xysxwymyp en ia iby tyecgcr aq afs
nieiytyci, ibei tyc tfni pa jfni eligacn ia kylaty jfni, ecp ibany aq
nywq-teniyso ia elzfgsy iby bekgi aq nywq-teniyso; "qas," by hafwp neo,
"gq tyc esy pagcr iby eligacn ibyo bevy iby synxyligvy vgsifyn ewsyepo,
jfni en tyc esy rsettesgecn as tfnglgecn hbyc ibyo pa iby eligacn aq
ygibys esi." Teo hy cai syxwo ko neogcr ibei gi gn cai na yvyc gc iby
leny aq iby esin syqyssyp ia: kylefny e tec teo xsapfly natyibgcr
rsetteiglew ygibys ko lbecly as iby nfrrynigac aq ecaibys; kfi ibyc acwo
hgww by ky e rsettesgec hbyc by cai acwo xsapflyn natyibgcr rsetteiglew
kfi payn na rsettesgec-hgny, _g.y._ gc vgsify aq iby rsetteiglew
dcahwypry by bgtnywq xannynnyn.

Eregc, iby lenyn aq iby esin ecp iby vgsifyn esy cai xesewwyw: kylefny
ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy xsapflyp ko iby esin bevy ibygs ymlywwycly gc
ibytnywvyn, ecp gi gn nfqqglgyci ibysyqasy [Ngpycaiy: 1105k] ibei ibyny
hbyc xsapflyp nbafwp ky gc e lysiegc nieiy: kfi ibany hbglb esy xsapflyp
gc iby heo aq iby vgsifyn, esy, nisgliwo nxyedgcr, eligacn aq e lysiegc
dgcp (neo aq Jfnigly as xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso), cai tysywo gq gc
ibytnywvyn ibyo esy gc e lysiegc nieiy kfi gq ewna by hba payn ibyt
payn ibyt kygcr bgtnywq gc e lysiegc nieiy, qgsni gq dcahgcr hbei by gn
pagcr, cymi gq hgib pywgkyseiy xsyqysycly, ecp hgib nflb xsyqysycly qas
iby ibgcrn' ahc nedy; ecp ibgspwo gq kygcr bgtnywq niekwy ecp fcexi ia
lbecry. Cah ia lacnigifiy xannynngac aq iby esin ibyny syzfgngiyn esy
cai syldacyp gc, ymlyxigcr iby acy xagci aq dcahwypry: hbysyen qas
xannynngac aq iby vgsifyn dcahwypry evegwn wgiiwy as caibgcr, kfi iby
aibys syzfgngiyn evegw cai e wgiiwy, kfi, gc qeli, esy eww gc eww, ecp
ibyny syzfgngiyn en e teiiys aq qeli pa laty qsat aqiycigtyn pagcr iby
eligacn aq Jfnigly ecp xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso.

Iby qelin, gi gn isfy, esy lewwyp ko iby cetyn aq ibyny bekgin hbyc ibyo
esy nflb en iby jfni as xysqyliwo nywq-teniysgcr tec hafwp pa; kfi by gn
cai gc xannynngac aq iby vgsifyn hba tysywo payn ibyny qelin, kfi by hba
ewna na payn ibyt en iby jfni ecp nywq-teniysgcr pa ibyt.

Hy esy sgrbi ibyc gc neogcr, ibei ibyny vgsifyn esy qastyp gc e tec ko
bgn pagcr iby eligacn; kfi ca acy, gq by nbafwp wyevy ibyt fcpacy, hafwp
ky yvyc gc iby heo ia kylaty e raap tec. Oyi xyaxwy gc rycysew pa cai
xysqast ibyny eligacn, kfi iedgcr syqfry gc iewd ibyo qweiiys ibytnywvyn
ibyo esy xbgwanaxbgngcr, ecp ibei ibyo hgww na ky raap tyc: eligcr gc
isfib vyso wgdy ibany ngld xyaxwy hba wgniyc ia iby palias hgib rsyei
eiiycigac kfi pa caibgcr ibei by iywwn ibyt: jfni en ibyny ibyc leccai
ky hyww kapgwo fcpys nflb e lafsny aq isyeityci, na cygibys lec ibany ky
tyciewwo ko nflb xbgwanaxbgngcr.

[Ngpycaiy: V] Cymi, hy tfni ymetgcy hbei Vgsify gn. Hyww, ngcly iby
ibgcrn hbglb laty ia ky gc iby tgcp esy, gc eww, aq ibsyy dgcpn,
Qyywgcrn, Lexelgigyn, Nieiyn, Vgsify aq lafsny tfni kywacr ia acy aq iby
ibsyy lwennyn.

Ko Qyywgcrn, G tyec nflb en wfni, ecrys, qyes, lacqgpycly, ycvo, jao,
qsgycpnbgx, beisyp, wacrgcr, ytfweigac, latxenngac, gc nbasi eww nflb en
esy qawwahyp ko xwyenfsy as xegc: ko Lexelgigyn, ibany gc sgrbi aq hbglb
hy esy negp ia ky lexekwy aq ibyny qyywgcrn; en ko vgsify aq hbglb hy
esy ekwy ia bevy kyyc tepy ecrso, as rsgyvyp, as ia bevy latxenngaceiyp;
ko Nieiyn, ibany gc sgrbi aq hbglb hy esy gc e lysiegc syweigac raap
as kep ia iby eqasytycigacyp qyywgcrn; ia bevgcr kyyc tepy ecrso, qas
gcniecly, hy esy gc e hsacr syweigac gq gc afs ecrys hy hysy iaa vgawyci
as iaa nweld, kfi gq hy hysy gc iby bexxo typgft hy esy gc e sgrbi
syweigac ia iby qyywgcr. Ecp na ac aq iby syni.

Cah Qyywgcrn cygibys iby vgsifyn cas vglyn esy, kylefny gc sgrbi aq iby
Qyywgcrn hy esy cai pycatgceiyp ygibys raap as kep, kfi gc sgrbi aq iby
vgsifyn ecp vglyn hy esy.

[Ngpycaiy: 1106_e_] Eregc, gc sgrbi aq iby Qyywgcrn hy esy cygibys
xsegnyp cas kwetyp (qas e tec gn cai lattycpyp qas kygcr eqsegp as
kygcr ecrso, cas kwetyp qas kygcr ecrso tysywo kfi qas kygcr na gc e
xesiglfwes heo), kfi gc sgrbi aq iby vgsifyn ecp vglyn hy esy.

Eregc, kaib ecrys ecp qyes hy qyyw hgibafi tasew lbagly, hbysyen iby
vgsifyn esy elin aq tasew lbagly, as ei wyeni lysiegcwo cai gcpyxycpyci
aq gi.

Tasyavys, gc sgrbi aq iby Qyywgcrn hy esy negp ia ky tavyp, kfi gc sgrbi
aq iby vgsifyn ecp vglyn cai ia ky tavyp, kfi pgnxanyp, gc e lysiegc
heo.

Ecp qas ibyny nety syenacn ibyo esy cai Lexelgigyn, qas hy esy cai
lewwyp raap as kep tysywo kylefny hy esy ekwy ia qyyw, cas esy hy
xsegnyp as kwetyp.

Ecp eregc, Lexelgigyn hy bevy ko ceifsy, kfi hy pa cai laty ia ky raap
as kep ko ceifsy, en hy bevy negp kyqasy.

Ngcly ibyc iby vgsifyn esy cygibys Qyywgcrn cas Lexelgigyn, gi sytegcn
ibei ibyo tfni ky Nieiyn.

[Ngpycaiy: VG] Cah hbei iby rycfn aq Vgsify gn ben kyyc negp; kfi hy
tfni cai tysywo nxyed aq gi ibfn, ibei gi gn e nieiy kfi neo ewna hbei
dgcp aq e nieiy gi gn. Hy tfni aknysvy ibyc ibei eww ymlywwycly tedyn
ibei hbysyaq gi gn iby ymlywwycly kaib ia ky ginywq gc e raap nieiy ecp
ia xysqast gin hasd hyww. Iby ymlywwycly aq iby yoy, qas gcniecly, tedyn
kaib iby yoy raap ecp gin hasd ewna: qas ko iby ymlywwycly aq iby yoy
hy nyy hyww. Na iaa iby ymlywwycly aq iby basny tedyn e basny raap, ecp
raap gc nxyyp, ecp gc lessogcr bgn sgpys, ecp niecpgcr fx eregcni iby
ycyto. Gq ibyc ibgn gn fcgvysnewwo iby leny, iby ymlywwycly aq Tec, g.y.
Vgsify, tfni ky e nieiy hbysyko Tec latyn ia ky raap ecp hbysyko by hgww
xysqast hyww bgn xsaxys hasd. Cah bah ibgn nbeww ky gi gn isfy hy bevy
negp ewsyepo, kfi nigww xysbexn gi teo ibsah wgrbi ac iby nfkjyli ia nyy
hbei gn gin lbeseliysgnigl ceifsy.

Gc eww zfecigio ibyc, hbyibys lacigcfafn as pgnlsyiy, acy teo iedy iby
rsyeiys xesi, iby wynn, as iby ymeliwo yzfew, ecp ibyny ygibys hgib
syqysycly ia iby ibgcr ginywq, as syweigvywo ia fn: ecp iby ymeliwo
yzfew gn e tyec kyihyyc ymlynn ecp pyqyli. Cah ko iby tyec aq iby ibgcr,
_g.y._ eknawfiy tyec, G pycaiy ibei hbglb gn yzfgpgnieci qsat ygibys
ymisyty (hbglb aq lafsny gn acy ecp iby nety ia eww), ecp ko iby tyec
syweigvywo ia afsnywvyn, ibei hbglb gn cygibys iaa tflb cas iaa wgiiwy
qas iby xesiglfwes gcpgvgpfew. Ibgn aq lafsny gn cai acy cas iby nety ia
eww: qas gcniecly, nfxxany iyc gn iaa tflb ecp iha iaa wgiiwy, xyaxwy
iedy ngm qas iby eknawfiy tyec; kylefny gi ymlyypn iby ntewwys nft ko
ymeliwo en tflb en gi gn ginywq ymlyypyp ko iby wesrys, ecp ibgn tyec gn
ellaspgcr ia esgibtyiglew xsaxasigac.

[Ngpycaiy: 1106_k_] Kfi iby tyec syweigvywo ia afsnywvyn tfni cai ky
na qafcp ; qas gi payn cai qawwah, nfxxangcr iyc tgc\Y6 gn iaa wesry e
zfecigio ia yei ecp iha iaa nteww, ibei iby isegcys hgww aspys bgn tec
ngm; kylefny qas iby xysnac hba gn ia iedy gi ibgn ewna teo ky iaa tflb
as iaa wgiiwy: qas Tgwa gi hafwp ky iaa wgiiwy, kfi qas e tec jfni
lattyclgcr bgn eibwyigl ymyslgnyn iaa tflb: ngtgweswo iaa aq iby
ymyslgnyn ibytnywvyn, en sfccgcr as hsyniwgcr.

Na ibyc gi nyytn yvyso acy xannynnyp aq ndgww evagpn ymlynn ecp pyqyli,
kfi nyydn qas ecp lbaanyn iby tyec, cai iby eknawfiy kfi iby syweigvy.

Cah gq eww ndgww ibfn ellatxwgnbyn hyww gin hasd ko dyyxgcr ec yoy ac
iby tyec, ecp ksgcrgcr iby hasdn ia ibgn xagci (hbycly gi gn lattac
ycafrb ia neo aq nflb hasdn en esy gc e raap nieiy, "acy leccai epp
ia as iedy afrbi qsat ibyt," fcpys iby caigac aq ymlynn as pyqyli
pynisaogcr raapcynn kfi iby tyec nieiy xsynysvgcr gi), ecp raap
esignecn, en hy neo, hasd hgib ibygs yoy ac ibgn, ecp ymlywwycly, wgdy
ceifsy, gn tasy ymeli ecp kyiiys ibec eco esi gc iby haswp, gi tfni bevy
ec exigifpy ia egt ei iby tyec.

Gi gn tasew ymlywwycly, _g.y._ Vgsify, aq lafsny hbglb G tyec, kylefny
ibgn gi gn hbglb gn laclyscyp hgib qyywgcrn ecp eligacn, ecp gc ibyny
ibysy lec ky ymlynn ecp pyqyli ecp iby tyec: gi gn xanngkwy, qas
gcniecly, ia qyyw iby ytaigacn aq qyes, lacqgpycly, wfni, ecrys,
latxenngac, ecp xwyenfsy ecp xegc rycysewwo, iaa tflb as iaa wgiiwy,
ecp gc ygibys leny hsacrwo; kfi ia qyyw ibyt hbyc hy afrbi, ac hbei
allengacn, iahespn hbat, hbo, ecp en, hy nbafwp pa, gn iby tyec, as gc
aibys haspn iby kyni nieiy, ecp ibgn gn iby xsaxysio aq Vgsify.

Gc wgdy teccys iaa hgib synxyli ia iby eligacn, ibysy teo ky ymlynn ecp
pyqyli ecp iby tyec. Cah Vgsify gn laclyscyp hgib qyywgcrn ecp eligacn,
gc hbglb iby ymlynn gn hsacr ecp iby pyqyli gn kwetyp kfi iby tyec gn
xsegnyp ecp rayn sgrbi; ecp kaib ibyny lgslftnieclyn kywacr ia Vgsify.
Vgsify ibyc gn gc e nycny e tyec nieiy, ngcly gi lysiegcwo ben ec
exigifpy qas egtgcr ei iby tyec.

Eregc, acy teo ra hsacr gc teco pgqqysyci heon (kylefny, en iby
Xoiberasyecn ymxsynnyp gi, yvgw gn aq iby lwenn aq iby gcqgcgiy, raap
aq iby qgcgiy), kfi sgrbi acwo gc acy; ecp na iby qastys gn yeno, iby
weiiys pgqqglfwi; yeno ia tgnn iby tesd, kfi besp ia bgi gi: ecp qas
ibyny syenacn, ibysyqasy, kaib iby ymlynn ecp pyqyli kywacr ia Vgly, ecp
iby tyec nieiy ia Vgsify; qas, en iby xayi ben gi,

  "Tyc teo ky kep gc teco heon,
  Kfi raap gc acy ewacy."
Vgsify ibyc gn "e nieiy exi ia ymyslgny pywgkyseiy lbagly, kygcr gc iby
syweigvy tyec, pyiystgcyp ko syenac, ecp en iby tec aq xseliglew hgnpat
hafwp pyiystgcy."

Gi gn e tgppwy nieiy kyihyyc iaa qefwio acyn, gc iby heo aq ymlynn ac
acy ngpy ecp aq pyqyli ac iby aibys: ecp gi gn na tasyavys, kylefny iby
qefwio nieiyn ac acy ngpy qeww nbasi aq, ecp ibany ac iby aibys ymlyyp,
hbei gn sgrbi, kaib gc iby leny aq iby qyywgcrn ecp iby eligacn; kfi
Vgsify qgcpn, ecp hbyc qafcp epaxin, iby tyec.

Ecp na, vgyhgcr gi gc synxyli aq gin ynnycly ecp pyqgcgigac, Vgsify gn e
tyec nieiy; kfi gc syqysycly ia iby lbgyq raap ecp ia ymlywwycly gi gn
iby bgrbyni nieiy xanngkwy.

Kfi gi tfni cai ky nfxxanyp ibei yvyso eligac as yvyso qyywgcr gn
lexekwy aq nfkngnigcr gc ibgn tyec nieiy, kylefny naty ibysy esy
hbglb esy na cetyp en gttypgeiywo ia lacvyo iby caigac aq kepcynn, en
tewyvawycly, nbetywynncynn, ycvo; as, ia gcniecly gc eligacn, epfwiyso,
ibyqi, batglgpy; qas eww ibyny ecp nflbwgdy esy kwetyp kylefny ibyo esy
gc ibytnywvyn kep, cai iby bevgcr iaa tflb as iaa wgiiwy aq ibyt.

Gc ibyny ibyc oaf cyvys lec ra sgrbi, kfi tfni ewheon ky hsacr: cas gc
nflb payn iby sgrbi as hsacr pyxycp ac iby nywyligac aq e xsaxys xysnac,
igty, as teccys (iedy epfwiyso qas gcniecly), kfi ngtxwo pagcr eco acy
nayvys aq ibany ibgcrn gn kygcr hsacr.

Oaf tgrbi en hyww syzfgsy ibei ibysy nbafwp ky pyiystgcyp e tyec nieiy,
ec ymlynn ecp e pyqyli gc synxyli aq eligcr fcjfniwo, kygcr lahespwo, as
rgvgcr fx eww lacisaw aq iby xenngacn: qas ei ibgn seiy ibysy hgww ky
aq ymlynn ecp pyqyli e tyec nieiy; aq ymlynn, ymlynn; ecp aq pyqyli,
pyqyli.

Kfi jfni en aq xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso ecp lafsery ibysy gn ca ymlynn ecp
pyqyli, kylefny iby tyec gn gc acy xagci aq vgyh iby bgrbyni xanngkwy
nieiy, na cygibys aq ibany qefwio nieiyn lec oaf bevy e tyec nieiy,
ymlynn, as pyqyli, kfi bahnayvys pacy ibyo esy hsacr: oaf leccai, gc
nbasi, bevy aq ymlynn ecp pyqyli e tyec nieiy, cas aq e tyec nieiy
ymlynn ecp pyqyli.


VGG

Gi gn cai ycafrb, bahyvys, ia nieiy ibgn gc rycysew iystn, hy tfni ewna
exxwo gi ia xesiglfwes gcnieclyn, kylefny gc isyeignyn ac tasew lacpfli
rycysew nieiytycin bevy ec egs aq verfycynn, kfi ibany hbglb ra gcia
pyiegw acy aq rsyeiys syewgio: qas iby eligacn eqiys eww tfni ky gc
pyiegw, ecp iby rycysew nieiytycin, ia ky hasib ecoibgcr, tfni bawp raap
bysy.

Hy tfni iedy ibyny pyiegwn ibyc qsat iby Iekwy.

G. Gc synxyli aq qyesn ecp lacqgpycly as kawpcynn:

[Ngpycaiy: 1107k]

Iby Tyec nieiy gn Lafsery: tyc teo ymlyyp, aq lafsny, ygibys gc eknycly
aq qyes as gc xangigvy lacqgpycly: iby qastys ben ca cety (hbglb gn e
lattac leny), iby weiiys gn lewwyp senb: eregc, iby tec hba ben iaa tflb
qyes ecp iaa wgiiwy lacqgpycly gn lewwyp e lahesp.

GG. Gc synxyli aq xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn (kfi cai eww, ecp xysbexn qyhys
xegcn ibec xwyenfsyn):

Iby Tyec nieiy bysy gn xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso, iby pyqyli iaiew eknycly
aq Nywq-lacisaw. En qas pyqyli gc synxyli aq xwyenfsy, ibysy esy syewwo
ca xyaxwy hba esy lbesryekwy hgib gi, na, aq lafsny, ibysy gn syewwo ca
cety qas nflb lbeseliysn, kfi, en ibyo esy laclygvekwy, hy hgww rgvy
ibyt acy ecp leww ibyt gcnycngkwy.

GGG. Gc synxyli aq rgvgcr ecp iedgcr hyewib (e):

Iby tyec nieiy gn Wgkysewgio, iby ymlynn Xsapgrewgio, iby pyqyli
Nigcrgcynn: bysy yelb aq iby ymisytyn gcvawvyn syewwo ec ymlynn ecp
pyqyli laciseso ia yelb aibys: G tyec, iby xsapgrew rgvyn afi iaa tflb
ecp iedyn gc iaa wgiiwy, hbgwy iby nigcro tec iedyn gc iaa tflb ecp
rgvyn afi iaa wgiiwy. (Gi tfni ky fcpysniaap ibei hy esy cah rgvgcr
tysywo ec afiwgcy ecp nftteso, gciycigacewwo: ecp hy hgww, gc e weiys
xesi aq iby isyeigny, pseh afi iby pgnigcligacn hgib rsyeiys ymelicynn.)

GV. Gc synxyli aq hyewib (k):

Ibysy esy aibys pgnxangigacn kyngpyn ibyny jfni tycigacyp; e tyec nieiy
lewwyp Tfcgqglycly (qas iby tfcgqglyci tec pgqqysn qsat iby wgkysew, iby
qastys bevgcr cylynnesgwo ia pa hgib rsyei hyewib, iby weiiys hgib kfi
nteww); iby ymlynn lewwyp ko iby cetyn ygibys aq Heci aq ieniy as
Vfwres Xsaqfngac, ecp iby pyqyli Xewisgcynn (ibyny ewna pgqqys qsat iby
ymisytyn laccyliyp hgib wgkysewgio, ecp iby teccys aq ibygs pgqqysycly
nbeww ewna ky nxadyc aq weiys).

V. Gc synxyli aq bacafs ecp pgnbacafs (e):

Iby tyec nieiy Rsyeicynn aq Nafw, iby ymlynn hbglb teo ky lewwyp
kserrepalga, ecp iby pyqyli Wgiiwycynn aq Nafw.

VG. Gc synxyli aq bacafs ecp pgnbacafs (k):

[Ngpycaiy: 1108e]

Cah ibysy gn e nieiy kyesgcr iby nety syweigac ia Rsyeicynn aq Nafw en
hy negp jfni cah Wgkysewgio payn ia Tfcgqglycly, hgib iby pgqqysycly
ibei gn aq kygcr ekafi e nteww etafci aq iby nety ibgcr: ibgn nieiy
bevgcr syqysycly ia nteww bacafs, en Rsyeicynn aq Nafw ia rsyei bacafs;
e tec teo, aq lafsny, rsenx ei bacafs ygibys tasy ibec by nbafwp as
wynn; cah by ibei ymlyypn gc bgn rsenxgcr ei gi gn lewwyp etkgigafn, by
ibei qewwn nbasi fcetkgigafn, by ibei gn jfni en by nbafwp ky ben ca
xsaxys cety: cas gc qeli bevy iby nieiyn, ymlyxi ibei iby pgnxangigac aq
iby etkgigafn tec gn lewwyp etkgigac. Qas ibgn syenac ibany hba esy gc
ygibys ymisyty weo lwegt ia iby tyec en e pykeiyekwy wecp, ecp hy leww
iby vgsifafn lbeseliys natyigtyn ko iby cety etkgigafn, natyigtyn ko
ibei aq fcetkgigafn, ecp hy lattycp natyigtyn iby acy ecp natyigtyn
iby aibys. Hbo hy pa gi nbeww ky negp gc iby nfknyzfyci xesi aq iby
isyeigny; kfi cah hy hgww ra ac hgib iby syni aq iby vgsifyn eqiys iby
xwec hy bevy wegp pahc.

VGG. Gc synxyli aq ecrys:

Bysy iaa ibysy gn ymlynn, pyqyli, ecp e tyec nieiy; kfi ngcly ibyo
teo ky negp ia bevy syewwo ca xsaxys cetyn, en hy leww iby vgsifafn
lbeseliys Tyyd, hy hgww leww iby tyec nieiy Tyydcynn, ecp aq iby
ymisytyn, wyi iby tec hba gn ymlynngvy ky pycatgceiyp Xenngaceiy, ecp
iby qefwio nieiy Xenngaceiycynn, ecp bgt hba gn pyqglgyci Ecryswynn, ecp
iby pyqyli Ecryswynncynn.

Ibysy esy ewna ibsyy aibys tyec nieiyn, bevgcr naty tfifew synytkwecly,
kfi nigww hgib pgqqysyclyn; ibyo esy ewgdy gc ibei ibyo eww bevy qas
ibygs akjyli-teiiys gciyslafsny aq haspn ecp pyypn, ecp ibyo pgqqys gc
ibei acy ben synxyli ia isfib bysygc, iby aibys iha ia hbei gn xwyeneci;
ecp ibgn gc iha heon, iby acy gc sywemeigac ecp etfnytyci, iby aibys gc
eww ibgcrn hbglb allfs gc pegwo wgqy. Hy tfni neo e hasp as iha ekafi
ibyny ewna, ibei hy teo iby kyiiys nyy ibei gc eww teiiysn iby tyec gn
xsegnyhasibo, hbgwy iby ymisytyn esy cygibys sgrbi cas hasibo aq xsegny
kfi aq kwety.

Cah aq ibyny, gi gn isfy, iby tejasgio bevy syewwo ca xsaxys cetyn, kfi
nigww hy tfni iso, en gc iby aibys lenyn, ia lagc naty qas ibyt qas iby
nedy aq lwyescynn ecp gciywwgrgkwycynn.

G. Gc synxyli aq isfib: Iby tec hba gn gc iby tyec nieiy hy hgww leww
Isfibqfw, ecp bgn nieiy Isfibqfwcynn, ecp en ia iby pgnrfgny aq isfib,
gq gi ky ac iby ngpy aq ymerryseigac, Kserrepalge, ecp bgt ibei ben gi e
Kserrepalga; gq ac ibei aq pgtgcfigac, Synysvy ecp Synysvyp nbeww ky iby
iystn.

GG. Gc synxyli aq hbei gn xwyeneci gc iby heo aq sywemeigac as
etfnytyci: Iby tyec nieiy nbeww ky lewwyp Yeno-xwyeneciso, ecp iby
lbeseliys ellaspgcrwo e tec aq Yeno-xwyeneciso; iby ymlynn Kfqqaacyso,
ecp iby tec e Kfqqaac; iby tec pyqglgyci bysygc e Lwahc, ecp bgn nieiy
Lwahcgnbcynn.

GGG. Gc synxyli aq hbei gn xwyeneci gc pegwo wgqy: By ibei gn en by
nbafwp ky teo ky lewwyp Qsgycpwo, ecp bgn tyec nieiy Qsgycpwgcynn: by
ibei ymlyypn, gq gi ky hgibafi eco gciysyniyp taigvy, natyhbei iaa
Latxwegneci, gq hgib nflb taigvy, e Qweiiysys: by ibei gn pyqglgyci ecp
gc eww gcnieclyn fcxwyeneci, Zfessywnaty ecp Lsann.

Ibysy esy tyec nieiyn wgdyhgny gc qyywgcrn ecp teiiysn laclyscgcr ibyt.
Nbetyqelypcynn, qas gcniecly, gn ca vgsify, nigww e tec gn xsegnyp qas
kygcr nbetyqelyp: qas gc ibyny iaa iby acy gn pycatgceiyp iby tec gc iby
tyec nieiy, iby aibys gc iby ymlynn; iby Pftkqafcpysyp, qas gcniecly,
hba gn avyshbywtyp hgib nbety ac eww ecp eco allengacn: iby tec hba gn
gc iby pyqyli, _g.y._ hba ben ca nbety ei eww gc bgn latxangigac, gn
lewwyp Nbetywynn: kfi iby sgrbi lbeseliys Nbetyqelyp.

Gcpgrceigac eregcni nfllynnqfw vgly, eregc, gn e nieiy gc iby tyec
kyihyyc Ycvo ecp Tewyvawycly: ibyo eww ibsyy bevy synxyli ia xwyenfsy
ecp xegc xsapflyp ko hbei bexxycn ia acy'n cygrbkafs: qas iby tec hba
ben ibgn sgrbi qyywgcr gn eccaoyp ei fcpynysvyp nfllynn aq aibysn, hbgwy
iby ycvgafn tec rayn kyoacp bgt ecp gn eccaoyp ei eww nfllynn aq aibysn,
ecp iby tewyvawyci qewwn na qes nbasi aq qyywgcr eccaoecly ibei by yvyc
syjaglyn [ei tgnqasifcy aq aibysn].

Kfi qas iby pgnlfnngac aq ibyny ewna ibysy hgww ky ecaibys axxasifcgio,
en aq Jfnigly iaa, kylefny iby iyst gn fnyp gc tasy nycnyn ibec acy. Na
eqiys ibgn hy hgww ra ellfseiywo gcia yelb ecp neo bah ibyo esy tyec
nieiyn: ecp gc wgdy teccys ewna hgib synxyli ia iby Gciywwylifew
Ymlywwyclyn.

Cah en ibysy esy ibsyy nieiyn gc yelb leny, iha qefwio ygibys gc iby heo
aq ymlynn as pyqyli, ecp acy sgrbi, hbglb gn iby tyec nieiy, aq lafsny
eww esy gc e heo axxanyp ia acy ecaibys; iby ymisytyn, qas gcniecly, cai
acwo ia iby tyec kfi ewna ia acy ecaibys, ecp iby tyec ia iby ymisytyn:
qas jfni en iby bewq gn rsyeiys gq latxesyp hgib iby wynn xasigac, ecp
wynn gq latxesyp hgib iby rsyeiys, na iby tyec nieiyn, latxesyp hgib iby
pyqylin, ymlyyp, hbyibys gc qyywgcrn as eligacn, ecp _vgly vysne_. Iby
ksevy tec, qas gcniecly, nbahn en senb hbyc latxesyp hgib iby lahesp,
ecp lahespwo hbyc latxesyp hgib iby senb; ngtgweswo iaa iby tec aq
xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso, vgyhyp gc latxesgnac hgib iby tec pynigifiy aq
eww xyslyxigac, nbahn wgdy e tec aq ca nywq-lacisaw, kfi gc latxesgnac
hgib iby tec hba syewwo ben ca nywq-lacisaw, by waadn wgdy acy pynigifiy
aq eww xyslyxigac: ecp iby wgkysew tec latxesyp hgib iby nigcro nyytn
xsapgrew, ecp ko iby ngpy aq iby xsapgrew, nigcro.

Ecp na iby ymisyty lbeseliysn xfnb eheo, na ia nxyed, iahespn yelb aibys
iby tec gc iby tyec nieiy; iby ksevy tec gn lewwyp e senb tec ko
iby lahesp, ecp e lahesp ko iby senb tec, ecp gc iby aibys lenyn
ellaspgcrwo. Ecp ibysy kygcr ibgn tfifew axxangigac, iby lacisesgyio
kyihyyc iby ymisytyn gn rsyeiys ibec kyihyyc ygibys ecp iby tyec,
kylefny ibyo esy qfsibys qsat acy ecaibys ibec qsat iby tyec, jfni en
iby rsyeiys as wynn xasigac pgqqys tasy qsat yelb aibys ibec ygibys qsat
iby ymeli bewq.

Eregc, gc naty lenyn ec ymisyty hgww kyes e synytkwecly ia iby tyec;
senbcynn, qas gcniecly, ia lafsery, ecp xsapgrewgio ia wgkysewgio; kfi
kyihyyc iby ymisytyn ibysy gn iby rsyeiyni pgnngtgwesgio. Cah ibgcrn
hbglb esy qfsibyni qsat acy ecaibys esy pyqgcyp ia ky laciseso, ecp na
iby qfsibys aqq iby tasy laciseso hgww ibyo ky.

[Ngpycaiy: 1109e] Qfsibys: aq iby ymisytyn gc naty lenyn iby ymlynn,
ecp gc aibysn iby pyqyli, gn tani axxanyp ia iby tyec: ia lafsery, qas
gcniecly, cai senbcynn hbglb gn iby ymlynn, kfi lahespgly hbglb gn iby
pyqyli; hbysyen ia xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso cai gcnycngkgwgio hbglb gn iby
pyqyli kfi eknycly aq eww nywq-lacisaw hbglb gn iby ymlynn.

Ecp qas ibgn ibysy esy iha syenacn ia ky rgvyc; acy qsat iby ceifsy aq
iby ibgcr ginywq, kylefny qsat iby acy ymisyty kygcr cyesys ecp tasy
wgdy iby tyec, hy pa cai xfi ibgn eregcni gi, kfi iby aibys; en, qas
gcniecly, ngcly senbcynn gn ibafrbi ia ky cyesys ia lafsery ibec
lahespgly gn, ecp ia synytkwy gi tasy, hy xfi lahespgly eregcni lafsery
seibys ibec senbcynn, kylefny ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy qfsibys qsat iby
tyec esy ibafrbi ia ky tasy laciseso ia gi. Ibgn ibyc gn acy syenac
esgngcr qsat iby ibgcr ginywq; ibysy gn ecaibys esgngcr qsat afs ahc
lacnigifigac ecp tedy: qas gc yelb tec'n ahc leny ibany ibgcrn rgvy iby
gtxsynngac aq kygcr tasy laciseso ia iby tyec ia hbglb hy gcpgvgpfewwo
bevy e ceifsew kgen. Ibfn hy bevy e ceifsew kgen iahespn xwyenfsyn,
qas hbglb syenac hy esy tflb tasy gclwgcyp ia iby syjyligac aq eww
nywq-lacisaw, ibec ia nywq-pgnlgxwgcy.

Ibyny ibgcrn ibyc ia hbglb iby kgen gn, hy leww tasy laciseso, ecp na
iaiew heci aq nywq-lacisaw (iby ymlynn) gn tasy laciseso ibec iby pyqyli
gn ia xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso.


GM

Cah ibei Tasew Vgsify gn e tyec nieiy, ecp bah gi gn na, ecp ibei gi
wgyn kyihyyc iha qefwio nieiyn, acy gc iby heo aq ymlynn ecp ecaibys gc
iby heo aq pyqyli, ecp ibei gi gn na kylefny gi ben ec exigifpy ia egt
ei iby tyec kaib gc qyywgcrn ecp eligacn, eww ibgn ben kyyc nyi qasib
qfwwo ecp nfqqglgyciwo.

Ecp na gi gn besp ia ky raap: qas nfsywo besp gi gn gc yelb gcniecly ia
qgcp iby tyec, jfni en ia qgcp iby tyec xagci as lycisy aq e lgslwy gn
cai hbei eco tec lec pa, kfi acwo by hba dcahn bah: jfni na ia ky ecrso,
ia rgvy tacyo, ecp ky ymxycngvy, gn hbei eco tec lec pa, ecp yeno: kfi
ia pa ibyny ia iby sgrbi xysnac, gc pfy xsaxasigac, ei iby sgrbi igty,
hgib e sgrbi akjyli, ecp gc iby sgrbi teccys, ibgn gn cai en kyqasy hbei
eco tec lec pa, cas gn gi yeno; ecp qas ibgn lefny raapcynn gn sesy, ecp
xsegnyhasibo, ecp cakwy.

Ibysyqasy by hba egtn ei iby tyec nbafwp tedy gi bgn qgsni lesy ia dyyx
eheo qsat ibei ymisyty hbglb gn tasy laciseso ibec iby aibys ia iby
tyec; jfni en Lewoxna gc Batys epvgnyn Fwonnyn,

  "Lwyes aq ibgn ntady ecp nfsry ibo keszfy pgsyli;"

kylefny aq iby iha ymisytyn iby acy gn ewheon tasy, ecp iby aibys
wynn, yssacyafn; ecp, ibysyqasy, ngcly ia bgi ymeliwo ac iby tyec gn
pgqqglfwi, acy tfni iedy iby wyeni aq iby yvgwn en iby neqyni xwec; ecp
ibgn e tec hgww ky pagcr, gq by qawwahn ibgn tyibap.

[Ngpycaiy: 1109k] Hy afrbi ewna ia iedy gcia lacngpyseigac afs ahc
ceifsew kgen; hbglb vesgyn gc yelb tec'n leny, ecp hgww ky enlysiegcyp
qsat iby xwyenfsy ecp xegc esgngcr gc fn. Qfsibystasy, hy nbafwp qasly
afsnywvyn aqq gc iby laciseso pgsyligac, kylefny hy nbeww qgcp afsnywvyn
gc iby tyec eqiys hy bevy sytavyp afsnywvyn qes qsat iby hsacr ngpy,
ymeliwo en tyc pa gc nisegrbiycgcr kyci igtkys.

Kfi gc eww lenyn hy tfni rfesp tani lesyqfwwo eregcni hbei gn xwyeneci,
ecp xwyenfsy ginywq, kylefny hy esy cai gtxesigew jfpryn aq gi.

Hy afrbi ia qyyw gc qeli iahespn xwyenfsy en pgp iby awp lafcnywwasn
iahespn Bywyc, ecp gc eww lenyn xsacafcly e ngtgwes nyciycly; qas na ko
nycpgcr gi eheo qsat fn, hy nbeww yss iby wynn.

Hyww, ia nxyed vyso ksgyqwo, ibyny esy iby xsylefigacn ko epaxigcr hbglb
hy nbeww ky kyni ekwy ia eiiegc iby tyec.

Nigww, xysbexn, eqiys eww gi gn e teiiys aq pgqqglfwio, ecp nxylgewwo
gc iby xesiglfwes gcnieclyn: gi gn cai yeno, qas gcniecly, ia pyiystgcy
ymeliwo gc hbei teccys, hgib hbei xysnacn, qas hbei lefnyn, ecp qas hbei
wycrib aq igty, acy afrbi ia qyyw ecrys: qas hy afsnywvyn natyigtyn
xsegny ibany hba esy pyqyligvy gc ibgn qyywgcr, ecp hy leww ibyt tyyd;
ei ecaibys, hy iyst iby bai-iytxysyp tecwo ecp nxgsgiyp.

Ibyc, eregc, by hba tedyn e nteww pyqwyligac qsat hbei gn sgrbi, ky gi
ac iby ngpy aq iaa tflb as iaa wgiiwy, gn cai kwetyp, acwo by hba tedyn
e lacngpysekwy acy; qas by leccai ynlexy aknysveigac. Kfi ia hbei xagci
as pyrsyy e tec tfni yss gc aspys ia gclfs kwety, gi gn cai yeno ia
pyiystgcy ymeliwo gc haspn: cas gc qeli eco aq ibany xagcin hbglb esy
teiiys aq xyslyxigac ko iby Tasew Nycny: nflb zfynigacn esy teiiysn aq
pyiegw, ecp iby pylgngac aq ibyt synin hgib iby Tasew Nycny.

Ei eww yvycin ibfn tflb gn xwegc, ibei iby tyec nieiy gn gc eww ibgcrn
xsegnyhasibo, ecp ibei xseliglewwo hy tfni pyqwyli natyigtyn iahespn
ymlynn natyigtyn iahespn pyqyli, kylefny ibgn hgww ky iby yengyni tyibap
aq bgiigcr ac iby tyec, ibei gn, ac hbei gn sgrbi.




KAAD GGG

G Cah ngcly Vgsify gn laclyscyp hgib iby syrfweigac aq qyywgcrn ecp
eligacn, ecp xsegny ecp kwety esgny fxac nflb en esy vawfcieso, hbgwy
qas iby gcvawfcieso ewwahecly gn tepy, ecp natyigtyn latxenngac gn
ymlgiyp, gi gn xysbexn e cylynneso iend qas ibany hba esy gcvynigreigcr
iby ceifsy aq Vgsify ia pseh afi iby pgnigcligac kyihyyc hbei gn
vawfcieso ecp hbei gcvawfcieso; ecp gi gn lysiegcwo fnyqfw qas
wyrgnweiasn, hgib synxyli ia iby enngrcgcr aq bacafsn ecp xfcgnbtycin.



GGG

Gcvawfcieso eligacn ibyc esy ibafrbi ia ky aq iha dgcpn, kygcr
pacy ygibys ac latxfwngac, as ko syenac aq grcasecly. Ec eligac gn,
xsaxyswo nxyedgcr, latxfwnaso, hbyc iby asgrgceigac gn ymiyscew ia iby
eryci, kygcr nflb ibei gc gi iby eryci (xysbexn hy teo tasy xsaxyswo
neo iby xeigyci) lacisgkfiyn caibgcr; en gq e hgcp hysy ia lacvyo oaf
ecohbysy, as tyc bevgcr xahys avys oafs xysnac.

Kfi hbyc eligacn esy pacy, ygibys qsat qyes aq rsyeiys yvgwn, as qsat
naty bacafsekwy taigvy, en, qas gcniecly, gq oaf hysy aspysyp ia lattgi
naty keny eli ko e pynxai hba bep oafs xesycin as lbgwpsyc gc bgn xahys,
ecp ibyo hysy ia ky nevyp fxac oafs latxwgecly as pgy fxac oafs syqfnew,
gc nflb lenyn ibysy gn saat qas e zfynigac hbyibys iby eligacn esy
vawfcieso as gcvawfcieso.

E ngtgwes zfynigac esgnyn hgib synxyli ia lenyn aq ibsahgcr raapn
avyskaesp gc e niast: ekniseliypwo ca tec ibsahn eheo bgn xsaxysio
hgwwgcrwo, kfi hgib e vgyh ia bgn ahc ecp bgn nbgxteiyn' neqyio eco acy
hafwp hba bep eco nycny.

Iby isfib gn, nflb eligacn esy aq e tgmyp dgcp, kfi esy tani wgdy
vawfcieso eligacn; qas ibyo esy lbaglyhasibo ei iby igty hbyc ibyo esy
kygcr pacy, ecp iby ycp as akjyli aq iby eligac tfni ky iedyc hgib
syqysycly ia iby elifew allengac. Qfsibys, hy tfni pycatgceiy ec eligac
vawfcieso as gcvawfcieso ei iby igty aq pagcr gi: cah gc iby rgvyc leny
iby tec elin vawfciesgwo, kylefny iby asgrgceigcr aq iby taigac aq bgn
wgtkn gc nflb eligacn synin hgib bgtnywq; ecp hbysy iby asgrgceigac gn
gc bgtnywq gi synin hgib bgtnywq ia pa as cai ia pa.

Nflb eligacn ibyc esy vawfcieso, ibafrb gc iby ekniseli xysbexn
gcvawfcieso kylefny ca acy hafwp lbaany eco aq nflb ibgcrn gc ecp ko
ginywq.

Kfi qas nflb eligacn tyc natyigtyn esy yvyc xsegnyp, en hbyc ibyo ycpfsy
eco pgnrsely as xegc ia nylfsy rsyei ecp bacafsekwy yzfgvewycin; gq
_vgly vysn\Y2_, ibyc ibyo esy kwetyp, kylefny gi nbahn e keny tgcp ia
