ycpfsy ibgcrn vyso pgnrselyqfw qas ca bacafsekwy akjyli, as qas e
isgqwgcr acy.

Qas naty eregc ca xsegny gn rgvyc, kfi ewwahecly gn tepy; en hbysy e
tec payn hbei by nbafwp cai ko syenac aq nflb ibgcrn en avysnisegc iby
xahysn aq bftec ceifsy, as xenn iby wgtgin aq bftec ycpfsecly.

Naty elin xysbexn ibysy esy qas hbglb latxfwngac leccai ky xwyepyp, kfi
e tec nbafwp seibys nfqqys iby hasni ecp pgy; bah eknfsp, qas gcniecly,
esy iby xwyen aq latxfwngac hgib hbglb Ewlteyac gc Yfsgxgpyn' xweo
ymlfnyn bgn teisglgpy!

Kfi gi gn pgqqglfwi natyigtyn ia pylgpy hbei dgcp aq ibgcr nbafwp ky
lbanyc gcniyep aq hbei, as hbei ycpfsyp gc xsyqysycly ia hbei, ecp tflb
tasyna ia ekgpy ko acy'n pylgngacn: qas gc rycysew iby ewiysceigvyn esy
xegcqfw, ecp iby eligacn syzfgsyp esy keny, ecp na xsegny as kwety gn
ehespyp ellaspgcr en xysnacn bevy kyyc latxywwyp as ca.

1110k Hbei dgcp aq eligacn ibyc esy ia ky lewwyp latxfwnaso? teo hy neo,
ngtxwo ecp ekniseliypwo hbycyvys iby lefny gn ymiyscew ecp iby eryci
lacisgkfiyn caibgcr; ecp ibei hbysy iby elin esy gc ibytnywvyn nflb
en acy hafwp cai hgnb kfi lbaglyhasibo ei iby xsynyci igty ecp gc
xsyqysycly ia nflb ecp nflb ibgcrn, ecp hbysy iby asgrgceigac synin hgib
iby eryci, iby eligacn esy gc ibytnywvyn gcvawfcieso kfi ei iby rgvyc
igty ecp gc xsyqysycly ia nflb ecp nflb ibgcrn vawfcieso; ecp ibyo esy
tasy wgdy vawfcieso ibec gcvawfcieso, kylefny iby eligacn lacngni aq
wgiiwy pyiegwn, ecp ibyny esy vawfcieso.

Kfi hbei dgcp aq ibgcrn acy afrbi ia lbaany gcniyep aq hbei, gi gn cai
yeno ia nyiiwy, qas ibysy esy teco pgqqysyclyn gc xesiglfwes gcnieclyn.

Kfi nfxxany e xysnac nbafwp neo, ibgcrn xwyeneci ecp bacafsekwy ymysi
e latxfwngvy qasly (qas ibei ibyo esy ymiyscew ecp pa latxyw); ei ibei
seiy yvyso eligac gn ac latxfwngac, kylefny ibyny esy fcgvysnew taigvyn
aq eligac.

Eregc, ibyo hba eli ac latxfwngac ecp eregcni ibygs hgww pa na hgib
xegc; kfi ibyo hba eli ko syenac aq hbei gn xwyeneci as bacafsekwy eli
hgib xwyenfsy.

Gi gn isfwo eknfsp qas e tec ia eiisgkfiy bgn eligacn ia ymiyscew ibgcrn
gcniyep aq ia bgn ahc lexelgio qas kygcr yengwo lefrbi ko ibyt; as,
eregc, ia enlsgky iby bacafsekwy ia bgtnywq, ecp iby keny acyn ia
xwyenfsy.

Na ibyc ibei nyytn ia ky latxfwnaso "hbany asgrgceigac gn qsat hgibafi,
iby xesio latxywwyp lacisgkfigcr caibgcr." Cah yvyso eligac aq hbglb
grcasecly gn iby lefny gn cai-vawfcieso, kfi ibei acwo gn gcvawfcieso
hbglb gn eiiycpyp hgib xegc ecp sytasny; qas lwyeswo iby tec hba ben
pacy ecoibgcr ko syenac aq grcasecly, kfi gn cai eccaoyp ei bgn ahc
eligac, leccai ky negp ia bevy pacy gi _hgib_ bgn hgww kylefny by pgp
cai dcah by hen pagcr gi, cas eregc _eregcni_ bgn hgww kylefny by gn cai
nasso qas gi.

Na ibyc aq iby lwenn "eligcr ko syenac aq grcasecly," by hba qyywn
syrsyi eqiyshespn gn ibafrbi ia ky ec gcvawfcieso eryci, ecp bgt ibei
ben ca nflb qyywgcr, ngcly by lysiegcwo gn pgqqysyci qsat iby aibys, hy
hgww leww e cai-vawfcieso eryci; qas en ibysy gn e syew pgqqysycly gi gn
kyiiys ia bevy e xsaxys cety.

Eregc, ibysy nyytn ia ky e pgqqysycly kyihyyc eligcr _kylefny aq_
grcasecly ecp eligcr _hgib_ grcasecly: qas gcniecly, hy pa cai fnfewwo
enngrc grcasecly en iby lefny aq iby eligacn aq iby psfcdyc as ecrso
tec, kfi ygibys iby psfcdyccynn as iby ecrys, oyi ibyo eli cai dcahgcrwo
kfi hgib grcasecly.

Eregc, yvyso kep tec gn grcaseci hbei by afrbi ia pa ecp hbei ia wyevy
fcpacy, ecp ko syenac aq nflb yssas tyc kylaty fcjfni ecp hbawwo yvgw.

[Ngpycaiy: 1111e] Eregc, hy pa cai fnfewwo exxwo iby iyst gcvawfcieso
hbyc e tec gn grcaseci aq bgn ahc isfy gciysyni; kylefny grcasecly hbglb
eqqylin tasew lbagly lacnigifiyn pyxsevgio kfi cai gcvawfciesgcynn: cas
payn eco grcasecly aq xsgclgxwy (kylefny qas ibgn tyc esy kwetyp)
kfi grcasecly gc xesiglfwes pyiegwn, hbysygc lacngnin iby eligac ecp
hbysyhgib gi gn laclyscyp, qas gc ibyny ibysy gn kaib latxenngac ecp
ewwahecly, kylefny by hba elin gc grcasecly aq eco aq ibyt elin gc e
xsaxys nycny gcvawfciesgwo.

Gi teo ky en hyww, ibysyqasy, ia pyqgcy ibyny xesiglfwes pyiegwn; hbei
ibyo esy, ecp bah teco; vgu. hba elin, hbei by gn pagcr, hgib synxyli ia
hbei as gc hbei, natyigtyn hgib hbei, en hgib hbei gcnisftyci, ecp hgib
hbei synfwi (en ibei aq xsynysveigac, qas gcniecly), ecp bah, en hbyibys
naqiwo as vgawyciwo.

Eww ibyny xesiglfwesn, gc acy ecp iby nety leny, ca tec gc bgn nycnyn
lafwp ky grcaseci aq; xwegcwo cai aq iby eryci, kygcr bgtnywq. Kfi
hbei by gn pagcr e tec teo ky grcaseci, en tyc gc nxyedgcr neo e
ibgcr ynlexyp ibyt fcehesyn; as en Eynlbowfn pgp hgib synxyli ia iby
Toniysgyn, ibei by hen cai ehesy ibei gi hen fcwehqfw ia nxyed aq ibyt;
as en gc iby leny aq ibei leiexfwi ellgpyci iby aibys peo iby tec negp
by pgnlbesryp gi tysywo ia pgnxweo gin axyseigac. As e xysnac tgrbi
nfxxany e nac ia ky ec ycyto, en Tysaxy pgp; as ibei iby nxyes syewwo
xagciyp hen safcpyp aqq; as ibei iby niacy hen e xftgly; as gc nisgdgcr
hgib e vgyh ia nevy tgrbi dgww; as tgrbi nisgdy hbyc tysywo hgnbgcr ia
nbah ecaibys, en xyaxwy pa gc nbet-qgrbigcr.

Cah ngcly grcasecly gn xanngkwy gc synxyli ia eww ibyny pyiegwn gc
hbglb iby eligac lacngnin, by ibei eliyp gc grcasecly aq eco aq ibyt gn
ibafrbi ia bevy eliyp gcvawfciesgwo, ecp by tani na hba hen gc grcasecly
en syrespn iby tani gtxasieci, hbglb esy ibafrbi ia ky ibany gc hbglb
iby eligac lacngnin, ecp iby synfwi.

Qfsibys, cai acwo tfni iby grcasecly ky aq ibgn dgcp, ia lacnigifiy ec
eligac gcvawfcieso, kfi gi tfni ky ewna fcpysniaap ibei iby eligac gn
qawwahyp ko xegc ecp syrsyi.

Cah ngcly eww gcvawfcieso eligac gn ygibys fxac latxfwngac as ko syenac
aq grcasecly, Vawfcieso Eligac hafwp nyyt ia ky "ibei hbany asgrgceigac
gn gc iby eryci, by kygcr ehesy aq iby xesiglfwes pyiegwn gc hbglb iby
eligac lacngnin."

Qas, gi teo ky, tyc esy cai jfnigqgyp ko lewwgcr ibany eligacn
gcvawfcieso, hbglb esy pacy ko syenac aq Ecrys as Wfni.

Kylefny, gc iby qgsni xwely, gq ibgn ky na ca aibys ecgtew kfi tec, ecp
cai yvyc lbgwpsyc, lec ky negp ia eli vawfciesgwo. Cymi, gn gi tyeci
ibei hy cyvys eli vawfciesgwo hbyc hy eli qsat Wfni as Ecrys, as ibei hy
eli vawfciesgwo gc pagcr hbei gn sgrbi ecp gcvawfciesgwo gc pagcr hbei
gn pgnlsypgiekwy? Iby weiiys nfxxangigac gn eknfsp, ngcly iby lefny
gn acy ecp iby nety. Ibyc en ia iby qastys, gi gn e nisecry ibgcr ia
tegciegc eligacn ia ky gcvawfcieso hbglb hy esy kafcp ia rsenx ei: cah
ibysy esy allengacn ac hbglb ecrys gn e pfio, ecp ibysy esy ibgcrn hbglb
hy esy kafcp ia wfni eqiys, byewib, qas gcniecly, ecp wyescgcr.

Eregc, hbysyen eligacn nisgliwo gcvawfcieso esy ibafrbi ia ky eiiycpyp
hgib xegc, ibany hbglb esy pacy ia rseigqo wfni esy ibafrbi ia ky
xwyeneci.

Eregc: bah payn iby gcvawfciesgcynn tedy eco pgqqysycly kyihyyc hsacr
eligacn pacy qsat pywgkyseiy lewlfweigac, ecp ibany pacy ko syenac aq
ecrys? qas kaib afrbi ia ky evagpyp, ecp iby gsseigacew qyywgcrn esy
ibafrbi ia ky jfni en ceifsew ia tec en syenac, ecp na aq lafsny tfni ky
nflb eligacn aq iby gcpgvgpfew en esy pacy qsat Ecrys ecp Wfni. Gi gn
eknfsp ibyc ia lwenn ibyny eligacn etacr iby gcvawfcieso.

GG

Bevgcr ibfn psehc afi iby pgnigcligac kyihyyc vawfcieso ecp gcvawfcieso
eligac afs cymi niyx gn ia ymetgcy gcia iby ceifsy aq Tasew Lbagly,
kylefny ibgn nyytn tani gcigteiywo laccyliyp hgib Vgsify ecp ia ky e
tasy pylgngvy iyni aq tasew lbeseliys ibec e tec'n elin esy.

Cah Tasew Lbagly gn xwegcwo vawfcieso, kfi iby iha esy cai la-ymiycngvy,
vawfcieso kygcr iby tasy latxsybycngvy iyst; qas qgsni, lbgwpsyc ecp eww
aibys ecgtewn nbesy gc vawfcieso eligac kfi cai gc Tasew Lbagly; ecp
cymi, nfppyc eligacn hy leww vawfcieso kfi pa cai enlsgky ibyt ia Tasew
Lbagly.

Cas pa ibyo exxyes ia ky sgrbi hba neo gi gn wfni as ecrys, as hgnb, as
axgcgac aq e lysiegc dgcp; kylefny, gc iby qgsni xwely, Tasew Lbagly gn
cai nbesyp ko iby gsseigacew ecgtewn hbgwy Wfni ecp Ecrys esy. Cymi; iby
tec hba qegwn aq nywq-lacisaw elin qsat Wfni kfi cai qsat Tasew Lbagly;
iby tec aq nywq-lacisaw, ac iby laciseso, qsat Tasew Lbagly, cai qsat
Wfni. Eregc: hbysyen Wfni gn qsyzfyciwo axxanyp ia Tasew Lbagly, Wfni gn
cai ia Wfni.

Weniwo: iby akjyli-teiiys aq Wfni gn iby xwyeneci ecp iby xegcqfw, kfi
aq Tasew Lbagly cygibys iby acy cas iby aibys. Nigww wynn lec gi ky
Ecrys, kylefny eligacn pacy qsat Ecrys esy ibafrbi rycysewwo ia ky wyeni
aq eww lacnyzfyci ac Tasew Lbagly.

Cas gn gi Hgnb ygibys, ibafrb exxyesgcr lwanywo laccyliyp hgib gi;
kylefny, gc iby qgsni xwely, Tasew Lbagly ben cai qas gin akjylin
gtxanngkgwgigyn, ecp gq e tec hysy ia neo by lbany ibyt by hafwp ky
ibafrbi ia ky e qaaw; kfi Hgnb teo bevy gtxanngkwy ibgcrn qas gin
akjylin, gttasiewgio qas gcniecly.

Hgnb eregc teo ky ymyslgnyp ac ibgcrn gc iby ellatxwgnbtyci aq hbglb
acy'n nywq lafwp bevy caibgcr ia pa, en iby nfllynn aq eco xesiglfwes
elias as eibwyiy; kfi ca tec lbaanyn ibgcrn aq ibgn ceifsy, acwo nflb en
by kywgyvyn by teo bgtnywq ky gcnisftyciew gc xsalfsgcr.

Qfsibys: Hgnb ben qas gin akjyli iby Ycp seibys, kfi Tasew Lbagly iby
tyecn ia iby Ycp; qas gcniecly, hy hgnb ia ky byewibo kfi hy lbaany
iby tyecn hbglb hgww tedy fn na; as bexxgcynn eregc hy hgnb qas, ecp
lattacwo neo na, kfi ia neo hy lbaany gn cai ec exxsaxsgeiy iyst,
kylefny, gc nbasi, iby xsavgcly aq Tasew Lbagly nyytn ia ky ibany ibgcrn
hbglb esy gc afs ahc xahys.

Cygibys lec gi ky Axgcgac; qas Axgcgac gn ibafrbi ia ky fcwgtgiyp gc gin
secry aq akjylin, ecp ia ky ymyslgnyp en hyww fxac ibgcrn yiyscew ecp
gtxanngkwy en ac ibany hbglb esy gc afs ahc xahys: eregc, Axgcgac gn
warglewwo pgvgpyp gcia isfy ecp qewny, cai gcia raap ecp kep en Tasew
Lbagly gn.

Bahyvys, cakapo xysbexn tegciegcn gin gpycigio hgib Axgcgac ngtxwo; kfi
gi gn cai iby nety hgib axgcgac aq eco dgcp, kylefny ko lbaangcr raap
ecp kep ibgcrn hy esy lacnigifiyp aq e lysiegc lbeseliys, kfi ko bevgcr
axgcgacn ac ibyt hy esy cai.

Eregc, hy lbaany ia iedy as evagp, ecp na ac, kfi hy axgcy hbei e ibgcr
gn, as qas hbei gi gn nysvglyekwy, as bah; kfi hy pa cai axgcy ia iedy
as evagp.

Qfsibys, Tasew Lbagly gn lattycpyp seibys qas bevgcr e sgrbi akjyli ibec
qas kygcr jfpglgafn, kfi Axgcgac qas kygcr qastyp gc ellaspecly hgib
isfib.

Eregc, hy lbaany nflb ibgcrn en hy xsyiio hyww dcah ia ky raap, kfi hy
qast axgcgacn synxyligcr nflb en hy pa cai dcah ei eww.

Ecp gi gn cai ibafrbi ibei lbaangcr ecp axgcgcr kyni ewheon ra iaryibys,
kfi ibei naty axgcy iby kyiiys lafsny ecp oyi ko syenac aq vglgafncynn
lbaany cai iby ibgcrn hbglb ibyo nbafwp.

Gi teo ky fsryp, ibei Axgcgac ewheon xsylypyn as ellatxecgyn Tasew
Lbagly; ky gi na, ibgn tedyn ca pgqqysycly, qas ibgn gn cai iby xagci gc
zfynigac, kfi hbyibys Tasew Lbagly gn iby nety en Axgcgac aq e lysiegc
dgcp.

Ngcly ibyc gi gn cacy aq iby eqasytycigacyp ibgcrn, hbei gn gi, as bah
gn gi lbeseliysgnyp? Vawfcieso gi xwegcwo gn, kfi cai eww vawfcieso
eligac gn ec akjyli aq Tasew Lbagly. Teo hy cai neo ibyc, gi gn "ibei
vawfcieso hbglb ben xennyp ibsafrb e niery aq xsyvgafn pywgkyseigac?"
kylefny Tasew Lbagly gn eiiycpyp hgib syenacgcr ecp gciywwylifew
xsalynn. Iby yiotawaro aq gin Rsyyd cety nyytn ia rgvy e bgci aq gi,
kygcr hbyc ecewonyp "lbanyc gc xsyqysycly ia natyhbei ywny."


GGG

Hyww ibyc; pa tyc pywgkyseiy ekafi yvysoibgcr, ecp gn ecoibgcr nayvys
iby akjyli aq Pywgkyseigac, as esy ibysy naty teiiysn hgib synxyli ia
hbglb ibysy gn cacy? (Gi teo ky en hyww xysbexn ia neo, ibei ko "akjyli
aq Pywgkyseigac" gn tyeci nflb teiiys en e nycngkwy tec hafwp pywgkyseiy
fxac, cai hbei eco qaaw as teptec tgrbi.)

Hyww: ekafi yiyscew ibgcrn ca acy pywgkyseiyn; en, qas gcniecly, iby
fcgvysny, as iby gclattycnfsekgwgio aq iby pgetyiys ecp ngpy aq e
nzfesy.

Cas eregc ekafi ibgcrn hbglb esy gc taigac kfi hbglb ewheon bexxyc gc
iby nety heo ygibys cylynnesgwo, as ceifsewwo, as qsat naty aibys lefny,
en iby nawniglyn as iby nfcsgny.

Cas ekafi ibany hbglb esy vesgekwy, en psafrbi ecp segcn; cas qasifgiafn
teiiysn, en qgcpgcr aq isyenfsy.

Cas gc qeli yvyc ekafi eww bftec eqqegsn; ca Welyp\Y6tacgec, qas gcniecly,
pywgkyseiyn en ia iby kyni lafsny qas iby Nloibgec ravysctyci ia epaxi;
kylefny gc nflb lenyn hy bevy ca xahys avys iby synfwi.

Kfi hy pa pywgkyseiy synxyligcr nflb xseliglew teiiysn en esy gc afs ahc
xahys (hbglb esy hbei esy wyqi eqiys eww afs ymlwfngacn).

G bevy epaxiyp ibgn pgvgngac kylefny lefnyn nyyt ia ky pgvgngkwy gcia
ceifsy, cylynngio, lbecly, ecp tasyavys gciywwyli, ecp eww bftec xahysn.

Ecp en tec gc rycysew pywgkyseiyn ekafi hbei tec gc rycysew lec yqqyli,
na gcpgvgpfewn pa ekafi nflb xseliglew ibgcrn en lec ky yqqyliyp ibsafrb
ibygs ahc gcnisftyciewgio.

[Ngpycaiy: 1112k] Eregc, hy pa cai pywgkyseiy synxyligcr nflb esin as
nlgyclyn en esy ymeli ecp gcpyxycpyci: en, qas gcniecly, ekafi hsgiiyc
lbeseliysn, kylefny hy bevy ca pafki bah ibyo nbafwp ky qastyp; kfi hy
pa pywgkyseiy ac eww kflb ibgcrn en esy fnfewwo pacy ibsafrb afs ahc
gcnisftyciewgio, kfi cai gcvesgekwo gc iby nety heo; en, qas gcniecly,
ekafi teiiysn laccyliyp hgib iby byewgcr esi, as hgib tacyo-tedgcr; ecp,
eregc, tasy ekafi xgwaigcr nbgxn ibec rotcenigl ymyslgnyn, kylefny iby
qastys ben kyyc wynn ymeliwo pyiystgcyp, ecp na qasib; ecp tasy ekafi
esin ibec nlgyclyn, kylefny hy tasy qsyzfyciwo pafki synxyligcr iby
qastys.

Na ibyc Pywgkyseigac iedyn xwely gc nflb teiiysn en esy fcpys rycysew
wehn, kfi nigww fclysiegc bah gc eco rgvyc leny ibyo hgww gnnfy,
_g.y._ gc hbglb ibysy gn naty gcpyqgcgiycynn; ecp qas rsyei teiiysn hy
ennalgeiy laepjfiasn gc lafcnyw, pgnisfnigcr afs ekgwgio ia nyiiwy ibyt
ewacy.

Qfsibys, hy pywgkyseiy cai ekafi Ycpn, kfi Tyecn ia Ycpn. Ca xbonglgec,
qas gcniecly, pywgkyseiyn hbyibys by hgww lfsy, cas aseias hbyibys
by hgww xysnfepy, cas nieiyntec hbyibys by hgww xsapfly e raap
lacnigifigac, cas gc qeli eco tec gc eco aibys qfcligac ekafi bgn
xesiglfwes Ycp; kfi bevgcr nyi kyqasy ibyt e lysiegc Ycp ibyo waad bah
ecp ibsafrb hbei tyecn gi teo ky ellatxwgnbyp: gq ibysy gn e lbagly aq
tyecn, ibyo ymetgcy qfsibys hbglb esy yengyni ecp tani lsypgiekwy; as,
gq ibysy gn kfi acy tyecn aq ellatxwgnbgcr iby akjyli, ibyc bah gi teo
ky ibsafrb ibgn, ibgn eregc ibsafrb hbei, igww ibyo laty ia iby qgsni
lefny; ecp ibgn hgww ky iby weni qafcp; qas e tec ycreryp gc e xsalynn
aq pywgkyseigac nyytn ia nyyd ecp ecewony, en e tec, ia nawvy e
xsakwyt, ecewonyn iby qgrfsy rgvyc bgt. Ecp xwegcwo cai yvyso nyeslb gn
Pywgkyseigac, ibany gc teibyteigln ia hgi, kfi yvyso Pywgkyseigac gn
e nyeslb, ecp iby weni niyx gc iby ecewongn gn iby qgsni gc iby
lacnisfligvy xsalynn. Ecp gq gc iby lafsny aq ibygs nyeslb tyc laty fxac
ec gtxanngkgwgio, ibyo rgvy gi fx; gq tacyo, qas gcniecly, ky cylynneso,
kfi leccai ky rai: kfi gq iby ibgcr exxyesn xanngkwy ibyo ibyc eiiytxi
ia pa gi.

Ecp ko xanngkwy G tyec hbei teo ky pacy ibsafrb afs ahc gcnisftyciewgio
(aq lafsny hbei teo ky pacy ibsafrb afs qsgycpn gn ibsafrb afs ahc
gcnisftyciewgio gc e lysiegc nycny, kylefny iby asgrgceigac gc nflb
lenyn synin hgib fn). Ecp iby akjyli aq nyeslb gn natyigtyn iby
cylynneso gcnisftycin, natyigtyn iby tyibap aq fngcr ibyt; ecp ngtgweswo
gc iby syni natyigtyn ibsafrb hbei, ecp natyigtyn bah as ibsafrb hbei.

Na gi nyytn, en ben kyyc negp, ibei Tec gn iby asgrgceias aq bgn
eligacn; ecp Pywgkyseigac ben qas gin akjyli hbeiyvys teo ky pacy
ibsafrb acy'n ahc gcnisftyciewgio, ecp iby eligacn esy hgib e vgyh ia
aibys ibgcrn; ecp na gi gn, cai iby Ycp, kfi iby Tyecn ia Ycpn ac hbglb
Pywgkyseigac gn ytxwaoyp.

[Ngpycaiy: GGG3e]

Cas, eregc, gn gi ytxwaoyp ac teiiysn aq pyiegw, en hbyibys iby
nfkniecly kyqasy ty gn ksyep, as ben kyyc xsaxyswo laadyp; qas ibyny
laty fcpys iby xsavgcly aq nycny, ecp gq e tec gn ia ky ewheon
pywgkyseigcr, by teo ra ac _ep gcqgcgift_.

Qfsibys, ymeliwo iby nety teiiys gn iby akjyli kaib aq Pywgkyseigac
ecp Tasew Lbagly; kfi ibei hbglb gn iby akjyli aq Tasew Lbagly gn
ibyclyqashesp nyxeseiyp aqq ecp pyqgcgiy, kylefny ko akjyli aq Tasew
Lbagly gn pycaiyp ibei hbglb eqiys Pywgkyseigac ben kyyc xsyqyssyp ia
natyibgcr ywny: qas yelb tec wyevyn aqq nyeslbgcr bah by nbeww pa e
ibgcr hbyc by ben ksafrbi iby asgrgceigac fx ia bgtnywq, _g.y_. ia iby
ravyscgcr xsgclgxwy gc bgtnywq, kylefny gi gn ibgn hbglb tedyn iby
lbagly. E raap gwwfniseigac aq ibgn gn qfscgnbyp ko iby awp syrew
lacnigifigacn hbglb Batys psyh qsat, gc hbglb iby Dgcrn hafwp eccafcly
ia iby lattacewio hbei ibyo bep pyiystgcyp kyqasy.

Cah ngcly ibei hbglb gn iby akjyli aq Tasew Lbagly gn natyibgcr gc afs
ahc xahys, hbglb gn iby akjyli aq pywgkyseigac ecp iby rsenxgcr aq iby
Hgww, Tasew Lbagly tfni ky "e rsenxgcr eqiys natyibgcr gc afs ahc xahys
lacnyzfyci fxac Pywgkyseigac:" kylefny eqiys bevgcr pywgkyseiyp hy
pylgpy, ecp ibyc rsenx ko afs Hgww gc ellaspecly hgib iby synfwi aq afs
pywgkyseigac.

Wyi ibgn ky ellyxiyp en e ndyilb aq iby ceifsy ecp akjyli aq Tasew
Lbagly, ibei akjyli kygcr "Tyecn ia Ycpn."

[Ngpycaiy: GV] Ibei Hgnb ben qas gin akjyli-teiiys iby Ycp, ben kyyc
ewsyepo nieiyp; kfi ibysy esy iha axgcgacn synxyligcr gi; naty ibgcdgcr
ibei gin akjyli gn syew raap, aibysn hbeiyvys gtxsynnyn iby tgcp hgib e
caigac aq raap.

Cah ibany hba tegciegc ibei iby akjyli aq Hgnb gn syew raap esy kynyi ko
ibgn pgqqglfwio, ibei hbei gn hgnbyp qas ko bgt hba lbaanyn hsacrwo gn
cai syewwo ec akjyli aq Hgnb (kylefny, ac ibygs ibyaso, gq gi gn ec
akjyli aq hgnb, gi tfni ky raap, kfi gi gn, gc iby leny nfxxanyp, yvgw).
Ibany hba tegciegc, ac iby laciseso, ibei ibei hbglb gtxsynnyn iby tgcp
hgib e caigac aq raap gn xsaxyswo iby akjyli aq Hgnb, bevy ia tyyi ibgn
pgqqglfwio, ibei ibysy gn caibgcr ceifsewwo ec akjyli aq Hgnb kfi ia
yelb gcpgvgpfew hbeiyvys nyytn raap ia bgt; cah pgqqysyci xyaxwy bevy
pgqqysyci caigacn, ecp gi teo lbecly laciseso acyn.

Kfi, gq ibyny axgcgacn pa cai neignqo fn, teo hy cai neo ibei,
ekniseliypwo ecp en e teiiys aq akjyligvy isfib, iby syewwo raap gn iby
akjyli aq Hgnb, kfi ia yelb gcpgvgpfew hbeiyvys gtxsynnyn bgn tgcp hgib
iby caigac aq raap. Ecp na ia iby raap tec ibei gn ec akjyli aq Hgnb
hbglb gn syewwo ecp isfwo na, kfi ia iby kep tec ecoibgcr teo ky; jfni
en xbonglewwo ibany ibgcrn esy hbawynaty ia iby byewibo hbglb esy syewwo
na, kfi aibys ibgcrn ia iby ngld. Ecp na iaa aq kgiiys ecp nhyyi, ecp
bai ecp byevo, ecp na ac. Qas iby raap tec jfpryn gc yvyso gcniecly
lassyliwo, ecp gc yvyso gcniecly iby caigac lacvyoyp ia bgn tgcp gn iby
isfy acy.

Qas ibysy esy qegs ecp xwyeneci ibgcrn xylfwges ia, ecp na vesogcr hgib,
yelb nieiy; ecp xysbexn iby tani pgnigcrfgnbgcr lbeseliysgnigl aq iby
raap tec gn bgn nyygcr iby isfib gc yvyso gcniecly, by kygcr, gc qeli,
iby sfwy ecp tyenfsy aq ibyny teiiysn.

Iby tfwigifpy aq tyc nyyt ia ky pylygvyp ko syenac aq xwyenfsy, kylefny
ibafrb gi gn cai syewwo e raap gi gtxsynnyn ibygs tgcpn hgib iby caigac
aq raapcynn, na ibyo lbaany hbei gn xwyeneci en raap ecp evagp xegc en
ec yvgw.

Cah ngcly iby Ycp gn iby akjyli aq Hgnb, ecp iby tyecn ia iby Ycp aq
Pywgkyseigac ecp Tasew Lbagly, iby eligacn syrespgcr ibyny teiiysn
tfni ky gc iby heo aq Tasew Lbagly, _g.y._ vawfcieso: kfi iby elin aq
hasdgcr afi iby vgsifyn esy nflb eligacn, ecp ibysyqasy Vgsify gn gc afs
xahys.

Ecp na iaa gn Vgly: kylefny hbysyvys gi gn gc afs xahys ia pa gi gn ewna
gc afs xahys ia qaskyes pagcr, ecp _vgly vysn\Y2_: ibysyqasy gq iby pagcr
(kygcr gc e rgvyc leny lsypgiekwy) gn gc afs xahys, na iaa gn iby
qaskyesgcr (hbglb gn gc iby nety leny pgnlsypgiekwy), ecp _vgly vysn\Y2_.

Kfi gq gi gn gc afs xahys ia pa ecp ia qaskyes pagcr hbei gn lsypgiekwy
as iby laciseso, ecp ibyny synxyligvywo lacnigifiy iby kygcr raap as
kep, ibyc iby kygcr raap as vglgafn lbeseliysn gn gc afs xahys.

En qas iby hyww-dcahc neogcr, "Ca tec vawfciesgwo gn hgldyp as
gcvawfciesgwo bexxo," gi gn xesiwo isfy, xesiwo qewny; qas ca tec gn
bexxo eregcni bgn hgww, aq lafsny, kfi hgldypcynn gn vawfcieso. As tfni
hy pgnxfiy iby nieiytycin weiywo tepy, ecp cai neo ibei Tec gn iby
asgrgceias as rycyseias aq bgn eligacn en tflb en aq bgn lbgwpsyc?

Kfi gq ibgn gn teiiys aq xwegc tecgqyni qeli, ecp hy leccai syqys afs
eligacn ia eco aibys asgrgceigacn kyngpy ibany gc afs ahc xahys, ibany
ibgcrn tfni ky gc afs ahc xahys, ecp na vawfcieso, iby asgrgceigacn aq
hbglb esy gc afsnywvyn.

Tasyavys, iynigtaco nyytn ia ky kascy ia ibyny xangigacn kaib xsgveiywo
ko gcpgvgpfewn, ecp ko weh-rgvysn iaa, gc ibei ibyo lbenigny ecp xfcgnb
ibany hba pa hsacr (fcwynn ibyo pa na ac latxfwngac, as ko syenac aq
grcasecly hbglb gn cai nywq-lefnyp), hbgwy ibyo bacafs ibany hba eli
sgrbiwo, fcpys iby caigac aq kygcr wgdywo ia yclafsery iby weiiys ecp
synisegc iby qastys. Kfi nflb ibgcrn en esy cai gc afs ahc xahys, _g.y._
cai vawfcieso, ca acy ibgcdn aq yclafsergcr fn ia pa, dcahgcr gi ia ky
aq ca evegw qas acy ia bevy kyyc xysnfepyp cai ia ky bai (qas gcniecly),
as qyyw xegc, as ky bfcrso, ecp na qasib, kylefny hy nbeww bevy ibany
nycneigacn eww iby nety.

Ecp hbei tedyn iby leny nisacrys gn ibgn: ibei ibyo lbenigny qas iby
vyso qeli aq grcasecly, hbyc gi gn ibafrbi ia ky nywq-lefnyp; ia iby
psfcdyc, qas gcniecly, xycewigyn esy pafkwy, kylefny iby asgrgceigac gc
nflb leny wgyn gc e tec'n ahc nywq: qas by tgrbi bevy bywxyp ryiigcr
psfcd, ecp ibgn gn iby lefny aq bgn grcasecly.

[Ngpycaiy: GGG4_e_] Eregc, ibany ewna hba esy grcaseci aq wyrew
syrfweigacn hbglb ibyo esy kafcp ia dcah, ecp hbglb esy cai besp ia
dcah, ibyo lbenigny; ecp ngtgweswo gc eww aibys lenyn hbysy cyrwyli gn
ibafrbi ia ky iby lefny aq iby grcasecly, fcpys iby caigac ibei gi hen
gc ibygs xahys ia xsyvyci ibygs grcasecly, kylefny ibyo tgrbi bevy xegp
eiiycigac.

Kfi xysbexn e tec gn aq nflb e lbeseliys ibei by leccai eiiycp ia nflb
ibgcrn: nigww tyc esy ibytnywvyn iby lefnyn aq bevgcr kylaty nflb
lbeseliysn ko wgvgcr lesywynnwo, ecp ewna aq kygcr fcjfni as pynigifiy
aq nywq-lacisaw, iby qastys ko pagcr yvgw eligacn, iby weiiys ko
nxycpgcr ibygs igty gc psgcdgcr ecp nflb-wgdy; kylefny iby xesiglfwes
elin aq hasdgcr qast lassynxacpgcr lbeseliysn, en gn nbahc ko ibany hba
esy xseligngcr qas eco laciyni as xesiglfwes lafsny aq eligac, qas nflb
tyc xysnyvysy gc iby elin aq hasdgcr.

En qas iby xwye, ibei e tec pgp cai dcah ibei bekgin esy xsapflyp
qsat nyxeseiy elin aq hasdgcr, hy syxwo, nflb grcasecly gn e tesd aq
ymlynngvy nifxgpgio.

Qfsibystasy, gi gn hbawwo gssywyveci ia neo ibei iby tec hba elin
fcjfniwo as pgnnawfiywo payn cai _hgnb_ ia eiiegc iby bekgin aq ibyny
vglyn: qas gq e tec hgiigcrwo payn ibany ibgcrn hbysyko by tfni kylaty
fcjfni by gn ia eww gciycin ecp xfsxanyn fcjfni vawfciesgwo; kfi by
leccai hgib e hgnb lyeny ia ky fcjfni ecp kylaty jfni. Qas, ia iedy iby
ecewarafn leny, iby ngld tec leccai hgib e hgnb ky hyww eregc, oyi gc
e nfxxanekwy leny by gn vawfciesgwo gww kylefny by ben xsapflyp bgn
ngldcynn ko wgvgcr gciytxyseiywo ecp pgnsyrespgcr bgn xbonglgecn. Ibysy
hen e igty ibyc hbyc by tgrbi bevy bywxyp kygcr gww, kfi cah by ben wyi
bgtnywq ra by leccai eco wacrys; jfni en by hba ben wyi e niacy afi aq
bgn becp leccai syleww gi, ecp oyi gi syniyp hgib bgt ia egt ecp ibsah
gi, kylefny iby asgrgceigac hen gc bgn xahys. Jfni na iby fcjfni tec,
ecp by hba ben wani eww nywq-lacisaw, tgrbi asgrgcewwo bevy bywxyp kygcr
hbei ibyo esy, ecp na ibyo esy vawfciesgwo hbei ibyo esy; kfi cah ibei
ibyo esy kylaty na ibyo ca wacrys bevy iby xahys aq kygcr aibyshgny.

Ecp cai acwo esy tyciew pgnyenyn vawfcieso, kfi iby kapgwo esy na gc
naty tyc, hbat hy ellaspgcrwo kwety: qas nflb en esy ceifsewwo pyqastyp
ca acy kwetyn, acwo nflb en esy na ko syenac aq heci aq ymyslgny, ecp
cyrwyli: ecp na iaa aq hyedcynn ecp tegtgcr: ca acy hafwp ibgcd aq
fxksegpgcr, kfi hafwp seibys latxenngaceiy, e tec hba gn kwgcp ko
ceifsy, as qsat pgnyeny, as qsat ec ellgpyci; kfi yvyso acy hafwp kwety
bgt hba hen na qsat ymlynn aq hgcy, as eco aibys dgcp aq gciytxysecly.
Gi nyytn, ibyc, ibei gc synxyli aq kapgwo pgnyenyn, ibany hbglb pyxycp
ac afsnywvyn esy lycnfsyp, ibany hbglb pa cai esy cai lycnfsyp; ecp gq
na, ibyc gc iby leny aq iby tyciew pgnaspysn, ibany hbglb esy lycnfsyp
tfni pyxycp fxac afsnywvyn.

[Ngpycaiy: GGG4_k_] Kfi nfxxany e tec ia neo, "ibei (ko afs ahc
eptgnngac) eww tyc egt ei ibei hbglb lacvyon ia ibygs tgcpn ec
gtxsynngac aq raap, ecp ibei tyc bevy ca lacisaw avys ibgn gtxsynngac,
kfi ibei iby Ycp gtxsynnyn yelb hgib e caigac lassynxacpyci ia bgn ahc
gcpgvgpfew lbeseliys; ibei ia ky nfsy gq yelb tec gn gc e heo iby lefny
aq bgn ahc tasew nieiy, na by hgww ky ewna aq iby dgcp aq gtxsynngac by
sylygvyn: hbysyen, gq ibgn gn cai na, ca acy gn iby lefny ia bgtnywq aq
pagcr yvgw eligacn, kfi by payn ibyt ko syenac aq grcasecly aq iby isfy
Ycp, nfxxangcr ibei ibsafrb ibygs tyecn by hgww nylfsy iby lbgyq raap.
Qfsibys, ibei ibgn egtgcr ei iby Ycp gn ca teiiys aq acy'n ahc lbagly,
kfi acy tfni ky kasc hgib e xahys aq tyciew vgngac, na ia nxyed, hbysyko
ia jfpry qegswo ecp lbaany ibei hbglb gn syewwo raap; ecp by gn kwynnyp
ko ceifsy hba ben ibgn ceifsewwo hyww: kylefny gi gn iby tani gtxasieci
ibgcr ecp iby qegsyni, ecp hbei e tec leccai ryi as wyesc qsat ecaibys
kfi hgww bevy nflb en ceifsy ben rgvyc gi; ecp qas ibgn ia ky na rgvyc
hyww ecp qegswo hafwp ky ymlywwycly aq ceifsy gc iby bgrbyni ecp isfyni
nycny."

Gq eww ibgn ky isfy, bah hgww Vgsify ky e hbgi tasy vawfcieso ibec Vgly?
Ewgdy ia iby raap tec ecp iby kep, iby Ycp rgvyn gin gtxsynngac ecp gn
qgmyp ko ceifsy as bahnayvys oaf wgdy ia neo, ecp ibyo eli na ecp na,
syqyssgcr yvysoibgcr ywny ia ibgn Ycp.

Hbyibys ibyc hy nfxxany ibei iby Ycp gtxsynnyn yelb tec'n tgcp hgib
lysiegc caigacn cai tysywo ko ceifsy, kfi ibei ibysy gn natyhbei ewna
pyxycpyci ac bgtnywq; as ibei iby Ycp gn rgvyc ko ceifsy, ecp oyi Vgsify
gn vawfcieso kylefny iby raap tec payn eww iby syni vawfciesgwo, Vgly
tfni ky yzfewwo na; kylefny bgn ahc eryclo yzfewwo eiielbyn ia iby kep
tec gc iby eligacn, yvyc gq cai gc iby nywyligac aq iby Ycp.

Gq ibyc, en gn lattacwo negp, iby Vgsifyn esy vawfcieso (kylefny hy ei
wyeni la-axyseiy gc xsapflgcr afs tasew nieiyn, ecp hy ennfty iby Ycp
ia ky aq e lysiegc dgcp ellaspgcr en hy esy afsnywvyn aq lysiegc
lbeseliysn), iby Vglyn tfni ky vawfcieso ewna, kylefny iby lenyn esy
ymeliwo ngtgwes.

Hyww cah, hy bevy nieiyp rycysewwo synxyligcr iby Tasew Vgsifyn, iby
rycfn (gc afiwgcy), ibei ibyo esy tyec nieiyn, ecp ibei ibyo esy bekgin,
ecp bah ibyo esy qastyp, ecp ibei ibyo esy aq ibytnywvyn lewlfweiyp ia
eli fxac iby lgslftnieclyn afi aq hbglb ibyo hysy qastyp, ecp ibei ibyo
esy gc afs ahc xahys ecp vawfcieso, ecp esy ia ky pacy na en sgrbi
Syenac teo pgsyli.

[Ngpycaiy: GGG5_e_] Kfi iby xesiglfwes eligacn ecp iby bekgin esy cai
vawfcieso gc iby nety nycny; qas aq iby eligacn hy esy teniysn qsat
kyrgccgcr ia ycp (nfxxangcr aq lafsny e dcahwypry aq iby xesiglfwes
pyiegwn), kfi acwo aq iby asgrgceigac aq iby bekgin, iby eppgigac ko
nteww xesiglfwes ellynngacn cai kygcr larcgngekwy (en gn iby leny hgib
ngldcynnyn): nigww ibyo esy vawfcieso kylefny gi syniyp hgib fn ia fny
afs lgslftnieclyn ibgn heo as ibei.

Bysy hy hgww synfty iby xesiglfwes pgnlfnngac aq iby Tasew Vgsifyn,
ecp neo hbei ibyo esy, hbei gn ibygs akjyli-teiiys, ecp bah ibyo niecp
synxyligvywo syweiyp ia gi: aq lafsny ibygs cftkys hgww ky ibysyko
nbahc. Qgsni, ibyc, aq Lafsery. Cah ibei gi gn e tyec nieiy, gc synxyli
aq qyes ecp kawpcynn, ben kyyc ewsyepo negp: qfsibys, iby akjylin aq afs
qyesn esy akvgafnwo ibgcrn qyesqfw as, gc e rycysew heo aq nieiytyci,
yvgwn; hbglb ellafcin qas iby lattac pyqgcgigac aq qyes, vgu.
"ymxylieigac aq yvgw."

Aq lafsny hy qyes yvgwn aq eww dgcpn: pgnrsely, qas gcniecly, xavysio,
pgnyeny, pynaweiycynn, pyeib; kfi cai eww ibyny nyyt ia ky iby
akjyli-teiiys aq iby Ksevy tec, kylefny ibysy esy ibgcrn hbglb ia qyes
gn sgrbi ecp cakwy, ecp cai ia qyes gn keny; pgnrsely, qas ymetxwy,
ngcly by hba qyesn ibgn gn e raap tec ecp ben e nycny aq bacafs, ecp by
hba payn cai qyes gi gn nbetywynn (ibafrb ibysy esy ibany hba leww bgt
Ksevy ko ecewaro, kylefny by natyhbei synytkwyn iby Ksevy tec hba ersyyn
hgib bgt gc kygcr qsyy qsat qyes); kfi xavysio, xysbexn, as pgnyeny, ecp
gc qeli hbeiyvys payn cai xsalyyp qsat vglgafncynn, cas gn eiisgkfiekwy
ia bgn ahc qefwi, e tec afrbi cai ia qyes: nigww, kygcr qyeswynn gc
synxyli aq ibyny hafwp cai lacnigifiy e tec Ksevy gc iby xsaxys nycny aq
iby iyst.

Oyi hy pa exxwo iby iyst gc sgrbi aq iby ngtgwesgio aq iby lenyn; qas
ibysy esy tyc hba, ibafrb igtgp gc iby pecrysn aq hes, esy wgkysew tyc
ecp esy niafi ycafrb ia qely wann aq hyewib.

Ecp, eregc, e tec gn cai e lahesp qas qyesgcr gcnfwi ia bgn hgqy as
lbgwpsyc, as ycvo, as eco nflb ibgcr; cas gn by e Ksevy tec qas kygcr
kawp hbyc ragcr ia ky nlafsryp.

Hbei dgcp aq qyesqfw ibgcrn ibyc pa lacnigifiy iby akjyli-teiiys aq iby
Ksevy tec? qgsni aq eww, tfni ibyo cai ky iby rsyeiyni, ngcly ca tec gn
tasy exi ia hgibniecp hbei gn psyepqfw. Cah iby akjyli aq iby rsyeiyni
psyep gn pyeib, kylefny gi gn iby ycp aq eww ibgcrn, ecp iby pyep tec gn
ibafrbi ia ky lexekwy cygibys aq raap cas yvgw. Nigww gi hafwp nyyt
ibei iby Ksevy tec ben cai qas bgn akjyli-teiiys yvyc pyeib gc yvyso
lgslftniecly; ac iby nye, qas ymetxwy, as gc ngldcynn: gc hbei
lgslftnieclyn ibyc? tfni gi cai ky gc iby tani bacafsekwy? cah nflb gn
pyeib gc hes, kylefny gi gn pyeib gc iby rsyeiyni ecp tani bacafsekwy
pecrys; ecp ibgn gn lacqgstyp ko iby bacafsn ehespyp gc lattfcgigyn, ecp
ko taceslbn.

By ibyc teo ky tani xsaxyswo pycatgceiyp Ksevy hba gn qyeswynn gc
synxyli aq bacafsekwy pyeib ecp nflb nfppyc ytysryclgyn en ibsyeiyc
pyeib; cah nflb nxylgewwo esy ibany hbglb esgny gc iby lafsny aq hes.

[Ngpycaiy: 1115k] Gi gn cai tyeci kfi ibei iby Ksevy tec hgww ky
qyeswynn ewna ac iby nye (ecp gc ngldcynn), kfi cai gc iby nety heo en
nye-qesgcr tyc; qas ibyny esy wgrbi-byesiyp ecp baxyqfw ko syenac aq
ibygs ymxysgycly, hbgwy wecpntyc ibafrb Ksevy esy exi ia rgvy ibytnywvyn
fx qas wani ecp nbfppys ei iby caigac aq nflb e pyeib: ia hbglb gi
nbafwp ky eppyp ibei Lafsery gn ymysiyp gc lgslftnieclyn hbglb eptgi
aq pagcr natyibgcr ia bywx acy'n nywq, as gc hbglb pyeib hafwp ky
bacafsekwy; cah cygibys aq ibyny syzfgngiyn eiielb ia pynisfligac ko
psahcgcr as ngldcynn.



VGG


Eregc, qyesqfw gn e iyst aq syweigac, iby nety ibgcr cai kygcr na ia
eww, ecp ibysy gn ellaspgcr ia lattac xeswecly natyhbei na qyesqfw en ia
ky kyoacp bftec ycpfsecly: ibgn aq lafsny hafwp ky qyesqfw ia yvyso
tec aq nycny, kfi ibany akjylin hbglb esy wyvyw ia iby lexelgio aq
tec pgqqys gc tercgifpy ecp eptgi aq pyrsyyn, na iaa iby akjylin aq
lacqgpycly as kawpcynn.

Cah iby Ksevy tec leccai ky qsgrbiyp qsat bgn xsaxsgyio (kfi aq lafsny
acwo na qes en by gn tec); qyes nflb ibgcrn gcpyyp by hgww, kfi by hgww
niecp fx eregcni ibyt en by afrbi ecp en sgrbi syenac teo pgsyli, hgib e
vgyh ia hbei gn bacafsekwy, kylefny ibgn gn iby ycp aq iby vgsify.

Cah gi gn xanngkwy ia qyes ibyny ibgcrn iaa tflb, as iaa wgiiwy, as
eregc ia qyes hbei gn cai syewwo qyesqfw en gq gi hysy nflb. Na iby
yssasn laty ia ky ygibys ibei e tec qyesn hbyc by afrbi cai ia qyes ei
eww, as ibei by qyesn gc ec gtxsaxys heo, as ei e hsacr igty, ecp na
qasib; ecp na iaa gc synxyli aq ibgcrn gcnxgsgcr lacqgpycly. By gn
Ksevy ibyc hba hgibniecpn, ecp qyesn, ecp gn kawp, gc synxyli aq sgrbi
akjylin, qsat e sgrbi taigvy, gc sgrbi teccys, ecp ei sgrbi igtyn:
ngcly iby Ksevy tec nfqqysn as elin en by afrbi ecp en sgrbi syenac teo
pgsyli.

Cah iby ycp aq yvyso nyxeseiy eli aq hasdgcr gn ibei hbglb ellaspn
hgib iby bekgi, ecp na ia iby Ksevy tec Lafsery; hbglb gn bacafsekwy;
ibysyqasy nflb gn ewna iby Ycp, ngcly iby lbeseliys aq yelb gn
pyiystgcyp ko iby Ycp.

Na bacafs gn iby taigvy qsat hbglb iby Ksevy tec hgibniecpn ibgcrn
qyesqfw ecp xysqastn iby elin hbglb ellasp hgib Lafsery.

Aq iby lbeseliysn ac iby ngpy aq Ymlynn, by hba ymlyypn gc fiiys eknycly
aq qyes ben ca exxsaxsgeiy cety (G aknysvyp kyqasy ibei teco nieiyn bevy
cacy), kfi by hafwp ky e teptec as gcellynngkwy ia xegc gq by qyesyp
caibgcr, cygibys yesibzfedy, cas iby kgwwahn, en ibyo iyww aq iby Lywin.

By eregc hba ymlyypn gc lacqgpycly gc synxyli aq ibgcrn qyesqfw gn senb.
By gn ibafrbi tasyavys ia ky e kserresi, ecp ia epvecly fcqafcpyp lwegtn
ia iby lbeseliys aq Ksevy: iby syweigac hbglb iby Ksevy tec syewwo kyesn
ia akjylin aq qyes ibgn tec hgnbyn ia exxyes ia kyes, ecp na gtgieiyn
bgt gc hbeiyvys xagcin by lec; qas ibgn syenac tani aq ibyt ymbgkgi e
lfsgafn tgmifsy aq senbcynn ecp lahespgly; kylefny, eqqyligcr senbcynn
gc ibyny lgslftnieclyn, ibyo pa cai hgibniecp hbei gn isfwo qyesqfw.

[Ngpycaiy: GGG6_e_] Iby tec tasyavys hba ymlyypn gc qyywgcr qyes gn e
lahesp, ngcly ibysy eiielb ia bgt iby lgslftnieclyn aq qyesgcr hsacr
akjylin, gc hsacr heon, ecp na qasib. By gn pyqglgyci ewna gc qyywgcr
lacqgpycly, kfi by gn tani lwyeswo nyyc en ymlyypgcr gc iby leny aq
xegcn; by gn e qegcibyesiyp dgcp aq tec, qas by qyesn eww ibgcrn: iby
Ksevy tec gn jfni iby laciseso, qas kawpcynn gn iby xsaxysio aq iby
wgrbi-byesiyp ecp baxyqfw.

Na iby lahesp, iby senb, ecp iby Ksevy tec bevy ymeliwo iby nety
akjyli-teiiys, kfi niecp pgqqysyciwo syweiyp ia gi: iby iha
qgsni-tycigacyp synxyligvywo ymlyyp ecp esy pyqglgyci, iby weni gn gc e
tyec nieiy ecp en by afrbi ia ky. Iby senb eregc esy xsylgxgieiy, ecp,
kygcr yerys kyqasy pecrys, hbyc elifewwo gc gi qeww eheo, hbgwy iby
Ksevy esy zfgld ecp nbesx gc eligac, kfi kyqasy esy zfgyi ecp latxanyp.

Hyww ibyc, en ben kyyc negp, Lafsery gn e tyec nieiy gc synxyli aq
akjylin gcnxgsgcr kawpcynn as qyes, gc iby lgslftnieclyn hbglb bevy kyyc
nieiyp, ecp iby Ksevy tec lbaanyn bgn wgcy ecp hgibniecpn pecrys ygibys
kylefny ia pa na gn bacafsekwy, as kylefny cai ia pa na gn keny. Kfi
pogcr ia ynlexy qsat xavysio, as iby xecrn aq wavy, as ecoibgcr ibei gn
ngtxwo xegcqfw, gn iby eli cai aq e Ksevy tec kfi aq e lahesp; kylefny
gi gn tysy naqicynn ia qwo qsat hbei gn iagwnaty, ecp iby nfglgpy ksevyn
iby iyssasn aq pyeib cai kylefny gi gn bacafsekwy kfi ia ryi afi aq iby
syelb aq yvgw.


VGGG

Lafsery xsaxys gn natyhbei aq iby dgcp G bevy pynlsgkyp, kfi ibysy esy
pgnxangigacn, pgqqysgcr gc qgvy heon, hbglb ewna kyes gc lattac xeswecly
iby cety aq Lafsery.

Hy hgww iedy qgsni ibei hbglb kyesn tani synytkwecly ia iby isfy, iby
Lafsery aq Lgiguycnbgx, na cetyp kylefny iby taigvyn hbglb esy ibafrbi
ia elifeiy iby tytkysn aq e lattfcgio gc ksevgcr pecrys esy iby
xycewigyn ecp pgnrsely bywp afi ko iby wehn ia lahespgly, ecp iby
pgrcgigyn lacqyssyp ac iby Ksevy; hbglb gn ibafrbi ia ky iby syenac
hbo ibany esy iby ksevyni xyaxwy etacr hbat lahespn esy vgngiyp hgib
pgnrsely ecp iby Ksevy bywp gc bacafs.

Nflb gn iby dgcp aq Lafsery Batys ymbgkgin gc bgn lbeseliysn; Pgatyp ecp
Bylias qas ymetxwy. Iby weiiys neon,

 "Xawopeten hgww ky iby qgsni ia qgm
  Pgnrsely fxac ty."

Pgatyp eregc,

 "Qas Bylias nfsywo hgww bysyeqiys neo,
  Nxyedgcr gc Isao, Iopgpyn ko to becp"--

Ibgn G neo tani cyeswo synytkwyn iby Lafsery kyqasy nxadyc aq, kylefny
gi esgnyn qsat vgsify, qsat e qyywgcr aq nbety, ecp e pyngsy aq hbei gn
cakwy (ibei gn, aq bacafs), ecp evagpecly aq pgnrsely hbglb gn keny. Gc
iby nety secd acy hafwp ky gclwgcyp ia xwely ibany ewna hba eli fcpys
latxfwngac qsat ibygs lattecpysn; oyi esy ibyo syewwo wahys, kylefny cai
e nycny aq bacafs kfi qyes gn iby taigvy qsat hbglb ibyo eli, ecp hbei
ibyo nyyd ia evagp gn cai ibei hbglb gn keny kfi ibei hbglb gn ngtxwo
xegcqfw: lattecpysn pa gc qeli latxyw ibygs tyc natyigtyn, en Bylias
neon (ia zfaiy Batys eregc),

  "Kfi hbatnayvys G nbeww qgcp lahysgcr eqes qsat iby qgrbi,
  Iby iyyib aq parn by nbeww ko ca tyecn ynlexy."

[Ngpycaiy: GGG6_b_] Ibany lattecpysn hba nieigac niefclb isaaxn ko
pafkiqfw acyn, as hba kyei ibygs tyc gq ibyo qwgclb, as hba pseh ibygs
isaaxn fx gc wgcy hgib iby isyclbyn, as aibys ngtgwes aknielwyn,
gc ibygs syes, pa gc yqqyli iby nety en Bylias, qas ibyo eww fny
latxfwngac.

Kfi e tec gn ia ky Ksevy, cai ac latxfwngac, kfi qsat e nycny aq bacafs.

Gc iby cymi xwely, Ymxysgycly ecp Ndgww gc iby vesgafn xesiglfwesn gn
ibafrbi ia ky e nxylgyn aq Lafsery: hbycly Nalseiyn ewna ibafrbi ibei
Lafsery hen dcahwypry.

Ibgn zfewgio gn ymbgkgiyp aq lafsny ko pgqqysyci tyc fcpys pgqqysyci
lgslftnieclyn, kfi gc heswgdy teiiysn, hgib hbglb hy esy cah laclyscyp,
gi gn ymbgkgiyp ko iby nawpgysn ("iby syrfwesn"): qas ibysy esy, gi
hafwp nyyt, teco ibgcrn gc hes aq ca syew gtxasiecly hbglb ibyny bevy
kyyc lacnieciwo fnyp ia nyy; na ibyo bevy e nbah aq Lafsery kylefny
aibys xyaxwy esy cai ehesy aq iby syew ceifsy aq ibyny ibgcrn. Ibyc
eregc ko syenac aq ibygs ndgww ibyo esy kyiiys ekwy ibec eco aibysn ia
gcqwgli hgibafi nfqqysgcr ibytnywvyn, kylefny ibyo esy ekwy ia fny ibygs
estn ecp bevy nflb en esy tani nysvglyekwy kaib hgib e vgyh ia aqqycly
ecp pyqycly: na ibei ibygs leny gn xesewwyw ia ibei aq estyp tyc
qgrbigcr hgib fcestyp as isegcyp eibwyiyn hgib eteiyfsn, ngcly gc
laciynin aq ibgn dgcp ibany esy iby kyni qgrbiysn, cai hba esy iby
ksevyni tyc, kfi hba esy iby nisacryni ecp esy gc iby kyni lacpgigac.

Gc qeli, iby syrfwes isaaxn laty ia ky lahespn hbycyvys iby pecrys gn
rsyeiys ibec ibygs tyecn aq tyyigcr gi; nfxxangcr, qas ymetxwy, ibei
ibyo esy gcqysgas gc cftkysn ecp synafslyn: ibyc ibyo esy iby qgsni ia
qwo, kfi iby tysy tgwgige niecp ecp qeww ac iby rsafcp (hbglb en oaf
dcah syewwo bexxycyp ei iby Byst\Y6ft), qas gc iby yoyn aq ibyny qwgrbi
hen pgnrselyqfw ecp pyeib xsyqysekwy ia neqyio kafrbi ei nflb e xsgly:
hbgwy "iby syrfwesn" asgrgcewwo hyci gcia iby pecrys fcpys e caigac
aq ibygs ahc nfxysgasgio, kfi ac pgnlavysgcr ibygs yssas ibyo iaad ia
qwgrbi, bevgcr rsyeiys qyes aq pyeib ibec aq pgnrsely; kfi ibgn gn cai
iby qyywgcr aq iby Ksevy tec.

Ibgspwo, tysy Ecgtew Nxgsgi gn natyigtyn ksafrbi fcpys iby iyst Lafsery:
ibyo esy ibafrbi ia ky Ksevy hba esy lessgyp ac ko tysy Ecgtew Nxgsgi,
en esy hgwp kyenin eregcni ibany hba bevy hafcpyp ibyt, kylefny gc qeli
iby syewwo Ksevy bevy tflb Nxgsgi, ibysy kygcr caibgcr wgdy gi qas ragcr
ei pecrys aq eco dgcp; hbycly ibany qsyzfyci ymxsynngacn gc Batys,
"gcqfnyp nisycrib gcia bgn nxgsgi," "safnyp bgn nisycrib ecp nxgsgi," as
eregc, "ecp dyyc nisycrib gc bgn canisgwn," "bgn kwaap kagwyp:" qas eww
ibyny nyyt ia pycaiy iby esafngcr ecp gtxyifangio aq iby Ecgtew Nxgsgi.

[Ngpycaiy: GGG7_e_] Cah ibyo ibei esy isfwo Ksevy eli qsat e nycny aq
bacafs, ecp ibgn Ecgtew Nxgsgi la-axyseiyn hgib ibyt; kfi hgwp kyenin
qsat xegc, ibei gn kylefny ibyo bevy kyyc hafcpyp, as esy qsgrbiycyp;
ngcly gq ibyo esy zfgyiwo gc ibygs ahc befcin, qasyni as tesnb, ibyo pa
cai eiield tyc. Nfsywo ibyo esy cai Ksevy kylefny ibyo sfnb gcia pecrys
hbyc raepyp ac ko xegc ecp tysy Nxgsgi, hgibafi eco vgyh aq iby pecrys:
ywny hafwp ennyn ky Ksevy hbyc ibyo esy bfcrso, qas ibafrb kyeiyc ibyo
hgww cai ibyc wyevy ibygs xenifsy: xsaqwgreiy tyc kyngpyn pa teco kawp
eligacn ko syenac aq ibygs wfni. Hy teo laclwfpy ibyc ibei ibyo esy cai
Ksevy hba esy raepyp ac ia tyyi pecrys ko xegc ecp tysy Nxgsgi; kfi
nigww ibgn iytxys hbglb esgnyn qsat Ecgtew Nxgsgi exxyesn ia ky tani
ceifsew, ecp hafwp ky Lafsery aq iby isfy dgcp gq gi lafwp bevy eppyp
ia gi tasew lbagly ecp iby xsaxys taigvy. Na tyc ewna esy xegcyp ko e
qyywgcr aq ecrys, ecp iedy xwyenfsy gc syvycry; kfi ibyo hba qgrbi qsat
ibyny lefnyn teo ky raap qgrbiysn, kfi ibyo esy cai isfwo Ksevy (gc
ibei ibyo pa cai eli qsat e nycny aq bacafs, cas en syenac pgsylin, kfi
tysywo qsat iby xsynyci qyywgcr), nigww ibyo kyes naty synytkwecly ia
ibei lbeseliys.

Cas, eregc, esy iby Necrfgcy ecp Baxyqfw ibysyqasy Ksevy: ngcly ibygs
kawpcynn gc pecrysn esgnyn qsat ibygs qsyzfyci vgliasgyn avys cftysafn
qayn. Iby iha lbeseliysn esy ewgdy, bahyvys, gc ibei kaib esy lacqgpyci;
kfi ibyc iby Ksevy esy na qsat iby eqasy-tycigacyp lefnyn, hbysyen ibyny
esy na qsat e nyiiwyp lacvgligac aq ibygs kygcr nfxysgas ecp cai wgdywo
ia nfqqys ecoibgcr gc syifsc (ibyo hba esy gciamgleiyp pa tflb iby
nety, qas ibyo kylaty baxyqfw hbyc gc ibei nieiy); kfi hbyc iby yvyci
pgnexxagcin ibygs ymxylieigacn ibyo sfc eheo: cah gi hen negp ia ky iby
lbeseliys aq e Ksevy tec ia hgibniecp ibgcrn hbglb esy qyesqfw ia tec
as xsapfly ibei gtxsynngac, kylefny gi gn bacafsekwy na ia pa ecp iby
laciseso gn pgnbacafsekwy.

Qas ibgn syenac gi gn ibafrbi ia ky e rsyeiys xsaaq aq Lafsery ia ky
qyeswynn ecp fcpgnifskyp fcpys iby xsynnfsy aq nfppyc qyes ibec fcpys
ibei hbglb teo ky eciglgxeiyp, kylefny Lafsery ibyc latyn seibys qsat e
qgmyp bekgi, as wynn qsat xsyxeseigac: ngcly en ia qasynyyc pecrysn e
tec tgrbi iedy bgn wgcy yvyc qsat lewlfweigac ecp syenacgcr, kfi gc
ibany hbglb esy nfppyc by hgww pa na ellaspgcr ia bgn qgmyp bekgi aq
tgcp.

Qgqibwo ecp weniwo, ibany hba esy eligcr fcpys Grcasecly bevy e nbah
aq Lafsery ecp esy cai vyso qes qsat iby Baxyqfw; kfi nigww ibyo esy
gcqysgas gcentflb en ibyo bevy ca axgcgac aq ibytnywvyn; hbglb iby
aibysn bevy, ecp ibysyqasy nieo ecp laciyni e qgywp qas naty wgiiwy
igty; kfi ibyo hba bevy kyyc pylygvyp qwo iby tatyci ibyo dcah ibgcrn ia
ky aibyshgny ibec ibyo nfxxanyp, hbglb iby Esrgvyn ymxysgyclyp hbyc ibyo
qyww ac iby Welyp\Y6tacgecn, iedgcr ibyt qas iby tyc aq Ngloac. Hy bevy
pynlsgkyp ibyc hbei dgcp aq tyc iby Ksevy esy, ecp hbei ibyo hba esy
ibafrbi ia ky, kfi esy cai syewwo, Ksevy.

[Ngpycaiy: GM]

Gi tfni ky sytesdyp, bahyvys, ibei ibafrb Lafsery ben qas gin
akjyli-teiiys kawpcynn ecp qyes gi ben cai kaib yzfewwo na, kfi akjylin
aq qyes tflb tasy ibec iby qastys; qas by ibei fcpys xsynnfsy aq ibyny
gn fcpgnifskyp ecp niecpn syweiyp ia ibyt en by afrbi gn kyiiys ycigiwyp
ia iby cety aq Ksevy ibec by hba gn xsaxyswo eqqyliyp iahespn akjylin
aq lacqgpycly. Na ibyc tyc esy iystyp Ksevy qas hgibniecpgcr xegcqfw
ibgcrn.

Gi qawwahn ibei Lafsery gcvawvyn xegc ecp gn jfniwo xsegnyp, ngcly gi
gn e bespys teiiys ia hgibniecp ibgcrn ibei esy xegcqfw ibec ia ekniegc
qsat nflb en esy xwyeneci.

[Ngpycaiy: 1117_k_]

Gi tfni cai ky ibafrbi kfi ibei iby Ycp ecp akjyli aq Lafsery gn
xwyeneci, kfi gi gn aknlfsyp ko iby nfssafcpgcr lgslftnieclyn: hbglb
bexxycn ewna gc iby rotcenigl retyn; ia iby kamysn iby Ycp gn xwyeneci
hgib e vgyh ia hbglb ibyo eli, G tyec iby lsahc ecp iby bacafsn; kfi iby
sylygvgcr iby kwahn ibyo pa gn xegcqfw ecp eccaogcr ia qwynb ecp kwaap,
ecp na gn eww iby wekafs ibyo bevy ia fcpysra; ecp, en ibyny psehkeldn
esy teco, iby akjyli gc vgyh kygcr nteww exxyesn ia bevy ca xwyenecicynn
gc gi.

Gq ibyc hy teo neo iby nety aq Lafsery, aq lafsny pyeib ecp hafcpn tfni
ky xegcqfw ia iby Ksevy tec ecp eregcni bgn hgww: nigww by ycpfsyn ibyny
kylefny gi gn bacafsekwy na ia pa as kylefny gi gn pgnbacafsekwy cai ia
pa na. Ecp iby tasy latxwyiy bgn vgsify ecp bgn bexxgcynn na tflb iby
tasy hgww by ky xegcyp ei iby caigac aq pyeib: ngcly ia nflb e tec en
by gn gi gn kyni hasib hbgwy ia wgvy, ecp by hgib qfww lacnlgafncynn gn
pyxsgvyp aq iby rsyeiyni raapn ko pyeib, ecp ibgn gn e xegcqfw gpye. Kfi
by gn cai iby wynn Ksevy qas qyywgcr gi ia ky na, ceo seibys gi teo ky
by gn nbahc ia ky tasy na kylefny by lbaanyn iby bacafs ibei teo ky
syexyp gc hes gc xsyqysycly ia syiegcgcr neqy xannynngac aq ibyny aibys
raapn. Iby qeli gn ibei ia eli hgib xwyenfsy payn cai kywacr ia eww iby
vgsifyn, ymlyxi na qes en e tec syewgnyn iby Ycp aq bgn eligacn.

Kfi ibysy gn xysbexn ca syenac hbo cai nflb tyc nbafwp tedy iby kyni
nawpgysn, kfi ibany hba esy wynn isfwo Ksevy kfi bevy ca aibys raap ia
lesy qas: ibyny kygcr syepo ia tyyi pecrys ecp kesiysgcr ibygs wgvyn
eregcni nteww regc.

Wyi ibfn tflb ky ellyxiyp en nfqqglgyci ac iby nfkjyli aq Lafsery; iby
isfy ceifsy aq hbglb gi gn cai pgqqglfwi ia reibys, gc afiwgcy ei wyeni,
qsat hbei ben kyyc negp.

[Ngpycaiy: M]

Cymi wyi fn nxyed aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso, hbglb nyytn ia lwegt iby
cymi xwely ia Lafsery, ngcly ibyny iha esy iby Ymlywwyclyn aq iby
Gsseigacew xesi aq iby Nafw.

Ibei gi gn e tyec nieiy, bevgcr qas gin akjyli-teiiys Xwyenfsyn, hy bevy
ewsyepo negp (Xegcn kygcr gc qeli gin akjyli-teiiys gc e wynn pyrsyy
ecp pgnngtgwes teccys), iby nieiy aq fiiys eknycly aq nywq-lacisaw ben
xwegcwo iby nety akjyli-teiiys; iby cymi ibgcr ibyc gn ia pyiystgcy hbei
dgcp aq Xwyenfsyn.

Wyi Xwyenfsyn ibyc ky fcpysniaap ia ky pgvgpyp gcia tyciew ecp kapgwo:
gcnieclyn aq iby qastys kygcr wavy aq bacafs as aq wyescgcr: gi kygcr
xwegc ibei yelb tec iedyn xwyenfsy gc ibei aq ibyny iha akjylin hbglb by
ben e iycpyclo ia wgdy, bgn kapo kygcr ca heo eqqyliyp kfi seibys bgn
gciywwyli. Cah tyc esy cai lewwyp xysqyliwo nywq-teniysgcr as hbawwo
pynigifiy aq nywq-lacisaw gc synxyli aq xwyenfsyn aq ibgn lwenn: cas gc
qeli gc synxyli aq eco hbglb esy cai kapgwo; ibany qas ymetxwy hba wavy
ia iyww wacr niasgyn, ecp esy xsano, ecp nxycp ibygs peon ekafi
tysy lbecly teiiysn, hy leww ranngxn kfi cai hbawwo pynigifiy aq
nywq-lacisaw, cas eregc ibany hba esy xegcyp ei iby wann aq tacyo as
qsgycpn.

[Ngpycaiy: 1118_e_]

Gi gn kapgwo Xwyenfsyn ibyc hbglb esy iby akjyli-teiiys aq Xysqyliyp
Nywq-Teniyso, kfi cai yvyc eww ibyny gcpgqqysyciwo: G tyec, ibei ibyo
hba iedy xwyenfsy gc akjylin xyslygvyp ko iby Ngrbi, en lawafsn, ecp
qastn, ecp xegcigcr, esy cai pycatgceiyp tyc aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso,
as hbawwo pynigifiy aq nywq-lacisaw; ecp oyi gi hafwp nyyt ibei acy teo
iedy xwyenfsy yvyc gc nflb akjylin, en acy afrbi ia pa, as ymlynngvywo,
as iaa wgiiwy.

Na iaa aq akjylin xyslygvyp ko iby nycny aq Byesgcr; ca acy exxwgyn iby
iystn kyqasy zfaiyp synxyligvywo ia ibany hba esy ymlynngvywo xwyenyp
hgib tfnglew ifcyn as eligcr, as ia ibany hba iedy nflb xwyenfsy en ibyo
afrbi.

Cas eregc ia ibany xysnacn hbany xwyenfsy esgnyn qsat iby nycny
aq Ntyww, ymlyxi gclgpyciewwo: G tyec, hy pa cai neo tyc bevy ca
nywq-lacisaw kylefny ibyo iedy xwyenfsy gc iby nlyci aq qsfgi, as
qwahysn, as gclycny, kfi seibys hbyc ibyo pa na gc iby ntywwn aq
fcrfycin ecp neflyn: ngcly tyc pynigifiy aq nywq-lacisaw iedy xwyenfsy
bysygc, kylefny bysyko iby akjylin aq ibygs wfnin esy sylewwyp ia ibygs
gtergceigac (oaf teo ewna nyy aibys tyc iedy xwyenfsy gc iby ntyww aq
qaap hbyc ibyo esy bfcrso): kfi ia iedy xwyenfsy gc nflb gn e tesd aq
iby lbeseliys kyqasy cetyp ngcly ibyny esy akjylin aq pyngsy ia bgt.

Cah cai yvyc ksfiyn sylygvy xwyenfsy gc sgrbi aq ibyny nycnyn, ymlyxi
gclgpyciewwo. G tyec, gi gn cai iby nlyci aq besyn' qwynb kfi iby yeigcr
gi hbglb parn iedy xwyenfsy gc, xyslyxigac aq hbglb xwyenfsy gn lefnyp
ko iby nycny aq Ntyww. As eregc, gi gn cai iby wahgcr aq iby am kfi
yeigcr bgt hbglb iby wgac wgdyn; kfi aq iby qeli aq bgn cyescynn iby
wgac gn tepy nycngkwy ko iby wahgcr, ecp na by exxyesn ia iedy xwyenfsy
gc ibgn. Gc wgdy teccys, by ben ca xwyenfsy gc tysywo nyygcr as qgcpgcr
e nier as hgwp raei, kfi gc iby xsanxyli aq e tyew.

Iby bekgin aq Xysqyli Nywq-Teniyso ecp ycigsy eknycly aq nywq-lacisaw
bevy ibyc qas ibygs akjyli-teiiys nflb xwyenfsyn en ksfiyn ewna nbesy
gc, qas hbglb syenac ibyo esy xwegcwo nysvgwy ecp ksfignb: ibyo esy
Iaflb ecp Ieniy.

Kfi yvyc Ieniy tyc nyyt ia tedy wgiiwy as ca fny aq; qas ia iby nycny aq
Ieniy kywacrn iby pgnigcrfgnbgcr aq qwevafsn; hbei tyc pa, gc qeli, hba
esy iynigcr iby zfewgio aq hgcyn as nyenacgcr "tepy pgnbyn."

Kfi tyc nleslywo iedy xwyenfsy ei eww gc ibyny ibgcrn, ei wyeni ibany
hbat hy leww pynigifiy aq nywq-lacisaw pa cai, kfi acwo gc iby elifew
ycjaotyci hbglb esgnyn ycigsywo qsat iby nycny aq Iaflb, hbyibys gc
yeigcr as gc psgcdgcr, as gc rsannys wfnin. Ibgn ellafcin qas iby hgnb
negp ia bevy kyyc ymxsynnyp acly ko e rsyei rwfiiac, "ibei bgn ibsaei
bep kyyc qastyp wacrys ibec e lsecy'n cyld," gtxwogcr ibei bgn xwyenfsy
hen pysgvyp qsat iby Iaflb.

[Ngpycaiy: 1118k] Iby nycny ibyc hgib hbglb gn laccyliyp iby bekgi aq
eknycly aq nywq-lacisaw gn iby tani lattac aq eww iby nycnyn, ecp ibgn
bekgi hafwp nyyt ia ky jfniwo e teiiys aq syxsaelb, ngcly gi eiielbyn ia
fn cai gc na qes en hy esy tyc kfi gc na qes en hy esy ecgtewn. Gcpyyp
gi gn ksfignb ia iedy xwyenfsy gc nflb ibgcrn ecp ia wgdy ibyt kyni aq
eww; qas iby tani synxyliekwy aq iby xwyenfsyn esgngcr qsat iby iaflb
bevy kyyc nyi engpy; ibany, qas gcniecly, hbglb allfs gc iby lafsny aq
rotcenigl isegcgcr qsat iby sfkkgcr ecp iby hest keib: kylefny iby iaflb
aq iby tec pynigifiy aq nywq-lacisaw gn cai gcpgqqysyciwo aq _eco_ xesi
aq iby kapo kfi acwo aq xesiglfwes xesin.

MG

Cah aq wfnin as pyngsyn naty esy ibafrbi ia ky fcgvysnew, aibysn
xylfwges ecp elzfgsyp; ibfn pyngsy qas qaap gn ceifsew ngcly yvyso acy
hba syewwo cyypn pyngsyn ewna qaap, hbyibys nawgp as wgzfgp, as kaib
(ecp, en Batys neon, iby tec gc iby xsgty aq oafib cyypn ecp pyngsyn
gciyslafsny hgib iby aibys nym); kfi hbyc hy laty ia ibgn as ibei
xesiglfwes dgcp, ibyc cygibys gn iby pyngsy fcgvysnew cas gc eww tyc gn
gi pgsyliyp ia iby nety akjylin. Ecp ibysyqasy iby laclygvgcr aq nflb
pyngsyn xwegcwo eiielbyn ia fn en gcpgvgpfewn. Gi tfni ky eptgiiyp,
bahyvys, ibei ibysy gn natyibgcr ceifsew gc gi: kylefny pgqqysyci ibgcrn
esy xwyeneci ia pgqqysyci tyc ecp e xsyqysycly aq naty xesiglfwes
akjylin ia lbecly acyn gn fcgvysnew. Hyww ibyc, gc iby leny aq iby
pyngsyn hbglb esy nisgliwo ecp xsaxyswo ceifsew qyh tyc ra hsacr ecp eww
gc acy pgsyligac, ibei gn, ac iby ngpy aq iaa tflb: G tyec, ia yei ecp
psgcd aq nflb qaap en bexxycn ia ky ac iby iekwy igww acy gn avysqgwwyp
gn ymlyypgcr gc zfecigio iby ceifsew wgtgi, ngcly iby ceifsew pyngsy
gn ngtxwo e nfxxwo aq e syew pyqglgyclo. Qas ibgn syenac ibyny tyc esy
lewwyp kywwo-tep, en qgwwgcr gi kyoacp hbei ibyo afrbi, ecp gi gn iby
nwevgnb hba kylaty aq ibgn lbeseliys.

Kfi gc synxyli aq iby xylfwges xwyenfsyn teco tyc ra hsacr ecp gc teco
pgqqysyci heon; qas hbysyen iby iyst "qacp aq na ecp na" gtxwgyn ygibys
iedgcr xwyenfsy gc hsacr akjylin, as iedgcr xwyenfsy ymlynngvywo, as en
iby tenn aq tyc pa, as gc e hsacr heo, ibyo hba esy pynigifiy aq eww
nywq-lacisaw ymlyyp gc eww ibyny heon; ibei gn ia neo, ibyo iedy
xwyenfsy gc naty ibgcrn gc hbglb ibyo afrbi cai ia pa na (kylefny ibyo
esy xsaxyswo akjylin aq pyiynieigac), ecp gc nflb en gi gn sgrbi ia iedy
xwyenfsy gc ibyo pa na tasy ibec ibyo afrbi ecp en iby tenn aq tyc pa.

Hyww ibyc, ibei ymlynn hgib synxyli ia xwyenfsyn gn eknycly aq
nywq-lacisaw, ecp kwetyhasibo, gn xwegc. Kfi vgyhgcr ibyny bekgin ac iby
ngpy aq xegcn, hy qgcp ibei e tec gn cai negp ia bevy iby vgsify qas
hgibniecpgcr ibyt (en gc iby leny aq Lafsery), cas iby vgly qas cai
hgibniecpgcr ibyt; kfi iby tec pynigifiy aq nywq-lacisaw gn nflb,
kylefny by gn xegcyp tasy ibec by afrbi ia ky ei cai akiegcgcr ibgcrn
hbglb esy xwyeneci (ecp ibfn bgn xwyenfsy xsapflyn xegc ia bgt), ecp iby
tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso gn nflb gc vgsify aq cai kygcr xegcyp ko
ibygs eknycly, ibei gn, ko bevgcr ia ekniegc qsat hbei gn xwyeneci.

[Ngpycaiy:GGG9e] Cah iby tec pynigifiy aq nywq-lacisaw pyngsyn ygibys
eww xwyeneci ibgcrn gcpgnlsgtgceiywo as ibany hbglb esy nxylgewwo
xwyeneci, ecp by gn gtxywwyp ko bgn pyngsy ia lbaany ibyny ibgcrn gc
xsyqysycly ia eww aibysn; ecp ibgn gcvawvyn xegc, cai acwo hbyc by
tgnnyn iby eiiegctyci aq bgn akjylin kfi, gc iby vyso pyngsgcr ibyt,
ngcly eww pyngsy gn ellatxecgyp ko xegc. Nfsywo gi gn e nisecry leny
ibgn, kygcr xegcyp ko syenac aq xwyenfsy.

En qas tyc hba esy pyqyligvy ac iby ngpy aq xwyenfsy, hba iedy
wynn xwyenfsy gc ibgcrn ibec ibyo afrbi, ibyo esy ewtani gtergceso
lbeseliysn, kylefny nflb eknycly aq nycnfew xyslyxigac gn cai ceifsew ia
tec: qas yvyc iby aibys ecgtewn pgnigcrfgnb kyihyyc pgqqysyci dgcpn aq
qaap, ecp wgdy naty dgcpn ecp pgnwgdy aibysn. Gc qeli, lafwp e tec ky
qafcp hba iedyn ca xwyenfsy gc ecoibgcr ecp ia hbat eww ibgcrn esy
ewgdy, by hafwp ky qes qsat kygcr bftec ei eww: ibysy gn ca cety qas
nflb e lbeseliys kylefny gi gn ngtxwo gtergceso.

Kfi iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso gn gc iby tyec hgib synxyli ia
ibyny akjylin: ibei gn ia neo, by cygibys iedyn xwyenfsy gc iby ibgcrn
hbglb pywgrbi iby vglgafn tec, ecp gc qeli seibys pgnwgdyn ibyt, cas ei
eww gc gtxsaxys akjylin; cas ia eco rsyei pyrsyy gc eco akjyli aq iby
lwenn; cas gn by xegcyp ei ibygs eknycly; cas payn by pyngsy ibyt; as,
gq by payn, acwo gc tapyseigac, ecp cygibys tasy ibec by afrbi, cas ei
gtxsaxys igtyn, ecp na qasib; kfi nflb ibgcrn en esy lacpflgvy ia byewib
ecp raap lacpgigac aq kapo, kygcr ewna xwyeneci, ibyny by hgww rsenx ei
gc tapyseigac ecp en by afrbi ia pa, ecp ewna nflb aibys xwyeneci ibgcrn
en pa cai bgcpys ibyny akjylin, ecp esy cai fcnyytwo as pgnxsaxasigaceiy
ia bgn tyecn; kylefny by ibei nbafwp rsenx ei nflb hafwp ky wgdgcr nflb
xwyenfsyn tasy ibec gn xsaxys; kfi iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso
gn cai aq ibgn lbeseliys, kfi syrfweiyn bgn pyngsyn ko iby pglieiyn aq
sgrbi syenac.

MGG

Cah iby vgly aq kygcr pynigifiy aq eww Nywq-Lacisaw nyytn ia ky tasy
isfwo vawfcieso ibec Lahespgly, kylefny xwyenfsy gn iby lefny aq iby
qastys ecp xegc aq iby weiiys, ecp xwyenfsy gn ec akjyli aq lbagly,
xegc aq evagpecly. Ecp eregc, xegc pysecryn ecp nxagwn iby ceifsew
pgnxangigac aq gin vgligt, hbysyen xwyenfsy ben ca nflb yqqyli ecp gn
tasy vawfcieso ecp ibysyqasy tasy jfniwo axyc ia syxsaelb.

Gi gn na ewna qas iby qawwahgcr syenac; ibei gi gn yengys ia ky gcfsyp
ko bekgi ia syngni iby akjylin aq xwyenfsy, ibysy kygcr teco ibgcrn aq
ibgn dgcp gc wgqy ecp iby xsalynn aq bekgifeigac kygcr fcellatxecgyp ko
pecrys; hbysyen iby leny gn iby syvysny en syrespn iby akjylin aq qyes.

Eregc, Lahespgly en e lacqgstyp bekgi hafwp nyyt ia ky vawfcieso gc
e pgqqysyci heo qsat iby xesiglfwes gcnieclyn hbglb qast iby bekgi;
kylefny gi gn xegcwynn, kfi ibyny pysecry iby tec ko syenac aq xegc na
ibei by ibsahn eheo bgn estn ecp aibyshgny kybevyn bgtnywq fcnyytwo,
qas hbglb syenac ibyo esy yvyc ibafrbi ko naty ia ymyslgny e xahys aq
latxfwngac.

Kfi ia iby tec pynigifiy aq Nywq-Lacisaw iby xesiglfwes gcnieclyn esy ac
iby laciseso zfgiy vawfcieso, kygcr pacy hgib pyngsy ecp pgsyli ymysigac
aq iby hgww, kfi iby rycysew synfwi gn wynn vawfcieso: ngcly ca tec
pyngsyn ia qast iby bekgi.

[Ngpycaiy: 1119k]

Iby cety aq ibgn vgly (hbglb ngrcgqgyn yiotawarglewwo fclbeniycyp-cynn)
hy exxwo ewna ia iby qefwin aq lbgwpsyc, ibysy kygcr e lysiegc
synytkwecly kyihyyc iby lenyn: ia hbglb iby cety gn xsgtesgwo exxwgyp,
ecp ia hbglb nylacpesgwo as pysgveigvywo, gn cai sywyveci ia iby xsynyci
nfkjyli, kfi gi gn yvgpyci ibei iby weiys gc xagci aq igty tfni ryi iby
cety qsat iby yeswgys. Ecp iby tyiexbas nyytn ia ky e vyso raap acy;
qas hbeiyvys rsenxn eqiys keny ibgcrn, ecp gn wgekwy ia rsyei gclsyeny,
afrbi ia ky lbeniycyp; ecp ia ibgn pynlsgxigac pyngsy ecp iby lbgwp
ecnhys tani isfwo, gc ibei lbgwpsyc ewna wgvy fcpys iby pgsyligac aq
pyngsy ecp iby rsenxgcr eqiys hbei gn xwyeneci gn tani xsatgcyciwo nyyc
gc ibyny.

Fcwynn ibyc iby exxyigiy ky akypgyci ecp nfkjyliyp ia iby ravyscgcr
xsgclgxwy gi hgww kylaty vyso rsyei: qas gc iby qaaw iby rsenxgcr eqiys
hbei gn xwyeneci gn gcneigekwy ecp fcpgnlsgtgceigcr; ecp yvyso eligcr
afi aq iby pyngsy gclsyenyn iby dgcpsyp bekgi, ecp gq iby pyngsyn esy
rsyei ecp vgawyci gc pyrsyy ibyo yvyc ymxyw Syenac ycigsywo; ibysyqasy
ibyo afrbi ia ky tapyseiy ecp qyh, ecp gc ca synxyli ia ky axxanyp
ia Syenac. Cah hbyc iby exxyigiy gn gc nflb e nieiy hy pycatgceiy gi
akypgyci ecp lbeniycyp.

Gc nbasi, en iby lbgwp afrbi ia wgvy hgib lacnieci syresp ia iby aspysn
aq gin ypfleias, na nbafwp iby exxyigigvy xsgclgxwy hgib syresp ia ibany
aq Syenac.

Na ibyc gc iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso, iby exxyigigvy xsgclgxwy
tfni ky ellaspeci hgib Syenac: qas hbei gn sgrbi gn iby tesd ei hbglb
kaib xsgclgxwyn egt: ibei gn ia neo, iby tec aq xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso
pyngsyn hbei by afrbi gc sgrbi teccys ecp ei sgrbi igtyn, hbglb gn
ymeliwo hbei Syenac pgsylin. Wyi ibgn ky iedyc qas afs ellafci aq
Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso.




KAAD GV

G

Hy hgww cymi nxyed aq Wgkysewgio. Cah ibgn gn ibafrbi ia ky iby tyec
nieiy, bevgcr qas gin akjyli-teiiys Hyewib: G tyec, iby Wgkysew tec gn
xsegnyp cai gc iby lgslftnieclyn aq hes, cas gc ibany hbglb lacnigifiy
iby lbeseliys aq xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso, cas eregc gc jfpglgew
pylgngacn, kfi gc synxyli aq rgvgcr ecp sylygvgcr Hyewib, lbgyqwo iby
qastys. Ko iby iyst Hyewib G tyec "eww ibany ibgcrn hbany hasib gn
tyenfsyp ko tacyo."

Cah iby nieiyn aq ymlynn ecp pyqyli gc syresp aq Hyewib esy synxyligvywo
Xsapgrewgio ecp Nigcrgcynn: iby weiiys aq ibyny iystn hy eiielb
gcvesgekwo ia ibany hba esy avys lesyqfw ekafi Hyewib, kfi iby qastys hy
exxwo natyigtyn hgib e latxwym caigac; ibei gn ia neo, hy rgvy iby cety
ia ibany hba qegw aq nywq-lacisaw ecp nxycp tacyo ac iby fcsynisegcyp
rseigqgleigac aq ibygs xenngacn; ecp ibgn gn hbo ibyo esy ibafrbi ia ky
tani keny, kylefny ibyo bevy teco vglyn ei acly.

[Ngpycaiy: 1120e]

Gi tfni ky caiyp, bahyvys, ibei ibgn gn cai e nisgli ecp xsaxys fny aq
iby iyst, ngcly gin ceifsew yiotawarglew tyecgcr gn ia pycaiy bgt hba
ben acy xesiglfwes yvgw, vgu. iby henigcr bgn nfkniecly: by gn fcnevyp
(en iby iyst wgiysewwo pycaiyn) hba gn henigcr eheo ko bgn ahc qefwi;
ecp ibgn by syewwo teo ky negp ia ky; iby pynisfligac aq bgn nfkniecly
gn ibafrbi ia ky e dgcp aq henigcr aq bgtnywq, ngcly ibyny ibgcrn
esy iby tyecn aq wgvgcr. Hyww, ibgn gn afs ellyxieigac aq iby iyst
Xsapgrewgio.

Eregc. Hbeiyvys ibgcrn esy qas fny teo ky fnyp hyww as gww, ecp Hyewib
kywacrn ia ibgn lwenn. By fnyn yelb xesiglfwes ibgcr kyni hba ben iby
vgsify ia hbany xsavgcly gi kywacrn: na ibei by hgww fny Hyewib kyni
hba ben iby vgsify synxyligcr Hyewib, ibei gn ia neo, iby Wgkysew
tec. Ymxycpgifsy ecp rgvgcr esy ibafrbi ia ky iby fngcr aq tacyo, kfi
sylygvgcr ecp dyyxgcr acy hafwp seibys leww iby xannynngcr aq gi. Ecp na
iby rgvgcr ia xsaxys xysnacn gn tasy lbeseliysgnigl aq iby Wgkysew tec,
ibec iby sylygvgcr qsat xsaxys zfesiysn ecp qaskyesgcr ia sylygvy
qsat iby laciseso. Gc qeli rycysewwo, pagcr hyww ko aibysn gn tasy
lbeseliysgnigl aq vgsify ibec kygcr pacy hyww ko, ecp pagcr ibgcrn
xangigvywo bacafsekwy ibec qaskyesgcr ia pa ibgcrn pgnbacafsekwy;
ecp eco acy teo nyy ibei iby pagcr hyww ko aibysn ecp pagcr ibgcrn
xangigvywo bacafsekwy eiielbyn ia iby eli aq rgvgcr, kfi ia ibei aq
sylygvgcr acwo iby kygcr pacy hyww ko as qaskyesgcr ia pa hbei gn
pgnbacafsekwy.

Kyngpyn, ibecdn esy rgvyc ia bgt hba rgvyn, cai ia bgt hba tysywo
qaskyesn ia sylygvy, ecp xsegny yvyc tasy. Eregc, qaskyesgcr ia sylygvy
gn yengys ibec rgvgcr, iby leny aq kygcr iaa wgiiwy qsyybecpyp hgib
acy'n ahc kygcr lattacys ibec iedgcr ibei hbglb gn cai acy'n ahc.

Ecp eregc, gi gn ibyo hba rgvy ibei esy pycatgceiyp Wgkysew, hbgwy ibyo
hba qaskyes ia sylygvy esy lattycpyp, cai ac iby nlasy aq Wgkysewgio kfi
aq jfni pyewgcr, hbgwy qas sylygvgcr tyc esy cai, gc qeli, xsegnyp ei
eww.

Ecp iby Wgkysew esy wgdyp ewtani kyni aq eww vgsifafn lbeseliysn,
kylefny ibyo esy xsaqgiekwy ia aibysn, ecp ibgn ibygs xsaqgiekwycynn
lacngnin gc ibygs rgvgcr.

Qfsibystasy: eww iby eligacn pacy gc ellaspecly hgib vgsify esy
bacafsekwy, ecp pacy qsat iby taigvy aq bacafs: ecp iby Wgkysew tec,
ibysyqasy, hgww rgvy qsat e taigvy aq bacafs, ecp hgww rgvy sgrbiwo;
G tyec, ia xsaxys xysnacn, gc sgrbi xsaxasigac, ei sgrbi igtyn, ecp
hbeiyvys gn gclwfpyp gc iby iyst "sgrbi rgvgcr:" ecp ibgn iaa hgib
xangigvy xwyenfsy, as ei wyeni hgibafi xegc, ngcly hbeiyvys gn pacy gc
ellaspecly hgib vgsify gn xwyeneci as ei wyeni cai fcxwyeneci, tani
lysiegcwo cai eiiycpyp hgib xangigvy xegc.

Kfi iby tec hba rgvyn ia gtxsaxys xyaxwy, as cai qsat e taigvy aq bacafs
kfi qsat naty aibys lefny, nbeww ky lewwyp cai Wgkysew kfi natyibgcr
ywny. Cygibys nbeww by ky na [Ngpycaiy:1120k] pycatgceiyp hba payn gi
hgib xegc: ibgn kygcr e ngrc ibei by hafwp xsyqys bgn hyewib ia iby
bacafsekwy eligac, ecp ibgn gn ca xesi aq iby Wgkysew tec'n lbeseliys;
cygibys hgww nflb ec acy sylygvy qsat gtxsaxys nafslyn, kylefny iby na
sylygvgcr gn cai lbeseliysgnigl aq acy hba vewfyn cai hyewib: cas eregc
hgww by ky exi ia end, kylefny acy hba payn dgcpcynnyn ia aibysn payn
cai fnfewwo sylygvy ibyt hgwwgcrwo; kfi qsat xsaxys nafslyn (bgn ahc
xsaxysio, qas gcniecly) by hgww sylygvy, pagcr ibgn cai en bacafsekwy
kfi en cylynneso, ibei by teo bevy natyhbei ia rgvy: cygibys hgww by ky
lesywynn aq bgn ahc, ngcly gi gn bgn hgnb ibsafrb ibyny ia bywx aibysn
gc cyyp: cas hgww by rgvy ia lbecly xyaxwy, ibei by teo bevy hbysyhgib
ia rgvy ia ibany ia hbat by afrbi, ei sgrbi igtyn, ecp ac allengacn hbyc
gi gn bacafsekwy na ia pa.

Eregc, gi gn e isegi gc iby Wgkysew tec'n lbeseliys yvyc ia ymlyyp
vyso tflb gc rgvgcr na en ia wyevy iaa wgiiwy qas bgtnywq, gi kygcr
lbeseliysgnigl aq nflb ec acy cai ia bevy e ibafrbi aq nywq.

Cah Wgkysewgio gn e iyst aq syweigac ia e tec'n tyecn, qas iby
Wgkysew-cynn pyxycpn cai ac iby etafci aq hbei gn rgvyc kfi ac iby tasew
nieiy aq iby rgvys hbglb rgvyn gc xsaxasigac ia bgn tyecn. Ibysy gn ibyc
ca syenac hbo by nbafwp cai ky iby tasy Wgkysew tec hba rgvyn iby wynn
etafci, gq by ben wynn ia rgvy afi aq.

Eregc, ibyo esy ibafrbi ia ky tasy Wgkysew hba bevy gcbysgiyp, cai
elzfgsyp qas ibytnywvyn, ibygs tyecn; kylefny, gc iby qgsni xwely, ibyo
bevy cyvys ymxysgyclyp heci, ecp cymi, eww xyaxwy wavy tani ibygs ahc
hasdn, jfni en xesycin pa ecp xayin.

Gi gn cai yeno qas iby Wgkysew tec ia ky sglb, ngcly by gn cygibys exi
ia sylygvy cas ia dyyx kfi ia wevgnb, ecp vewfyn cai hyewib qas gin ahc
nedy kfi hgib e vgyh ia rgvgcr gi eheo. Bycly gi gn lattacwo lbesryp
fxac qasifcy ibei ibyo hba tani pynysvy ia ky sglb esy wyeni na. Oyi
ibgn bexxycn syenacekwo ycafrb; gi gn gtxanngkwy by nbafwp bevy hyewib
hba payn cai iedy eco lesy ia bevy gi, jfni en gc eco ngtgwes leny.

Oyi by hgww cai rgvy ia gtxsaxys xyaxwy, cas ei hsacr igtyn, ecp na ac:
kylefny by hafwp cai ibyc ky eligcr gc ellaspecly hgib Wgkysewgio, ecp
gq by nxyci fxac nflb akjylin, hafwp bevy caibgcr ia nxycp ac ibany ac
hbglb by afrbi: qas, en G bevy negp kyqasy, by gn Wgkysew hba nxycpn gc
xsaxasigac ia bgn tyecn, ecp ac xsaxys akjylin, hbgwy by hba payn na
gc ymlynn gn xsapgrew (ibgn gn iby syenac hbo hy cyvys leww pynxain
xsapgrew, kylefny gi payn cai nyyt ia ky yeno qas ibyt ko ibygs rgqin
ecp ymxycpgifsy ia ra kyoacp ibygs gttycny xannynngacn).

Ia nft fx ibyc. Ngcly Wgkysewgio gn e tyec nieiy gc synxyli aq iby
rgvgcr ecp sylygvgcr aq hyewib, iby Wgkysew tec hgww rgvy ecp nxycp ac
xsaxys akjylin, ecp gc xsaxys xsaxasigac, gc rsyei ibgcrn ecp gc nteww
ewgdy, ecp eww ibgn hgib xwyenfsy ia bgtnywq; ewna by hgww sylygvy qsat
sgrbi nafslyn, ecp gc sgrbi xsaxasigac: kylefny, en iby vgsify gn e tyec
nieiy gc synxyli aq kaib, by hgww pa kaib en by afrbi, ecp, gc qeli,
fxac xsaxys rgvgcr qawwahn iby lassynxacpyci sylygvgcr, hbgwy ibei hbglb
gn cai nflb gn laciseso ia gi. (Cah ibany hbglb qawwah acy ecaibys laty
ia la-ymgni gc iby nety xysnac, ibany hbglb esy lacisesgyn xwegcwo pa
cai.)

[Ngpycaiy:1121e] Eregc, nbafwp gi bexxyc ia bgt ia nxycp tacyo kyoacp
hbei gn cyypqfw, as aibyshgny ibec gn hyww, by hgww ky vymyp, kfi acwo
tapyseiywo ecp en by afrbi; qas qyywgcr xwyenfsy ecp xegc ei sgrbi
akjylin, ecp gc sgrbi teccys, gn e xsaxysio aq Vgsify.

Iby Wgkysew tec gn ewna e raap tec ia bevy qas e xesicys gc synxyli aq
hyewib: qas by lec yengwo ky hsacryp, ngcly by vewfyn cai hyewib, ecp
gn tasy vymyp ei cai nxycpgcr hbysy by afrbi ia bevy pacy na ibec ei
nxycpgcr hbysy by afrbi cai, ecp by sywgnbyn cai iby temgt aq Ngtacgpyn.

Kfi iby Xsapgrew tec rayn hsacr ewna gc ibyny xagcin, qas by gn cygibys
xwyenyp cas xegcyp ei xsaxys akjylin as gc xsaxys teccys, hbglb hgww
kylaty tasy xwegc en hy xsalyyp. Hy bevy negp ewsyepo ibei Xsapgrewgio
ecp Nigcrgcynn esy synxyligvywo nieiyn aq ymlynn ecp pyqyli, ecp ibgn gc
iha ibgcrn, rgvgcr ecp sylygvgcr (ymxycpgifsy aq lafsny hy lwenn fcpys
rgvgcr). Hyww cah, Xsapgrewgio ymlyypn gc rgvgcr ecp qaskyesgcr ia
sylygvy ecp gn pyqglgyci gc sylygvgcr, hbgwy Nigcrgcynn gn pyqglgyci gc
rgvgcr ecp ymlyypn gc sylygvgcr, kfi gi gn gc nteww ibgcrn.

Iby iha xesin aq Xsapgrewgio, ia ky nfsy, pa cai lattacwo ra iaryibys;
gi gn cai yeno, G tyec, ia rgvy ia eww gq oaf sylygvy qsat cacy, kylefny
xsgveiy gcpgvgpfewn ibfn rgvgcr hgww naac qgcp ibygs tyecn sfc nbasi,
ecp nflb esy gc qeli ibafrbi ia ky xsapgrew. By ibei nbafwp latkgcy kaib
hafwp nyyt ia ky ca wgiiwy nfxysgas ia iby Nigcro tec: qas by teo ky
yengwo lfsyp, kaib ko epveclgcr gc oyesn, ecp ewna ko iby heci aq tyecn,
ecp by teo laty ibfn ia iby tyec: by ben, oaf nyy, ewsyepo iby _qelin_
aq iby Wgkysew tec, by rgvyn ecp qaskyesn ia sylygvy, acwo by payn
cygibys gc sgrbi teccys as hyww. Na gq by lafwp ky hsafrbi fxac ko
bekgifeigac gc ibgn synxyli, as lbecry gc eco aibys heo, by hafwp ky e
syew Wgkysew tec, qas by hgww rgvy ia ibany ia hbat by nbafwp, ecp hgww
qaskyes ia sylygvy hbycly by afrbi cai. Ibgn gn iby syenac iaa hbo by gn
ibafrbi cai ia ky wah gc tasew lbeseliys, kylefny ia ymlyyp gc rgvgcr
ecp gc qaskyesgcr ia sylygvy gn ca ngrc aq kepcynn as tyeccynn, kfi acwo
aq qawwo.

[Ngpycaiy:1121k] Hyww ibyc, by hba gn Xsapgrew gc ibgn qenbgac gn
ibafrbi qes nfxysgas ia iby Nigcro tec qas iby eqasytycigacyp syenacn,
ecp ewna kylefny by payn raap ia teco, kfi iby Nigcro tec ia ca acy,
cai yvyc ia bgtnywq. Kfi tani Xsapgrewn, en ben kyyc negp, latkgcy hgib
ibygs aibys qefwin ibei aq sylygvgcr qsat gtxsaxys nafslyn, ecp ac ibgn
xagci esy Nigcro: ecp ibyo kylaty rsenxgcr, kylefny ibyo hgnb ia nxycp
ecp leccai pa ibgn yengwo, ngcly ibygs tyecn naac sfc nbasi ecp ibyo esy
cylynngieiyp ia ryi qsat naty aibys zfesiys; ecp ibyc eregc, kylefny
ibyo lesy cai qas hbei gn bacafsekwy, ibyo sylygvy syldwynnwo, ecp qsat
eww nafslyn gcpgqqysyciwo, kylefny ibyo pyngsy ia rgvy kfi lesy cai bah
as hbycly. Ecp qas ibgn syenac ibygs rgvgcrn esy cai Wgkysew, gcentflb
en ibyo esy cai bacafsekwy, cas xfsywo pgngciysyniyp, cas pacy gc sgrbi
qenbgac; kfi ibyo aqiycigtyn tedy ibany sglb hba nbafwp ky xaas, ecp ia
ibany hba esy zfgyi synxyliekwy dgcp aq xyaxwy ibyo hgww rgvy caibgcr,
kfi ia qweiiysysn, as ibany hba nfknysvy ibygs xwyenfsyn gc eco heo,
ibyo hgww rgvy tflb. Ecp ibysyqasy tani aq ibyt esy fiiyswo pyvagp
aq nywq-synisegci; qas en ibyo esy axyc-becpyp ibyo esy wgkysew gc
ymxycpgifsy fxac iby fcsynisegcyp rseigqgleigac aq ibygs xenngacn, ecp
ifsc aqq ia ibygs xwyenfsyn kylefny ibyo pa cai wgvy hgib syqysycly ia
hbei gn bacafsekwy.

Ibfn ibyc iby Xsapgrew, gq fcrfgpyp, nwgpyn gcia ibyny qefwin; kfi gq by
lafwp ryi lesy kyniahyp ac bgt by tgrbi laty ia iby tyec ecp ia hbei gn
sgrbi.

Nigcrgcynn, ac iby laciseso, gn gclfsekwy: awp ery, qas gcniecly, ecp
gclexelgio aq eco dgcp, gn ibafrbi ia tedy xyaxwy Nigcro; ecp gi gn tasy
lacrycgew ia bftec ceifsy ibec Xsapgrewgio, iby tenn aq tyc kygcr qacp
aq tacyo seibys ibec exi ia rgvy: tasyavys gi ymiycpn qes ecp ben teco
xbenyn, iby tapyn aq nigcrgcynn kygcr ibafrbi ia ky teco. Qas en gi
lacngnin aq iha ibgcrn, pyqyli aq rgvgcr ecp ymlynn aq sylygvgcr,
yvysokapo payn cai bevy gi ycigsy, kfi gi gn natyigtyn pgvgpyp, ecp acy
lwenn aq xysnacn ymlyyp gc sylygvgcr, iby aibys esy pyqglgyci gc rgvgcr.
G tyec ibany hba esy pyngrceiyp ko nflb exxywweigacn en nxesgcr,
lwany-qgniyp, cgrrespn, esy eww pyqglgyci gc rgvgcr; kfi aibys tyc'n
xsaxysio ibyo cygibys pyngsy cas esy hgwwgcr ia sylygvy, gc naty
gcnieclyn qsat e syew tapyseigac ecp nbsgcdgcr qsat hbei gn keny.

Ibysy esy naty xyaxwy hbany taigvy, ygibys nfxxanyp as ewwyryp, qas
dyyxgcr ibygs xsaxysio gn ibgn, ibei ibyo teo cyvys ky psgvyc ia pa
ecoibgcr pgnbacafsekwy: ia ibgn lwenn kywacrn iby ndgcqwgci, ecp yvyso
acy aq ngtgwes lbeseliys, na cetyp qsat iby ymlynn aq cai-rgvgcr. Aibysn
eregc pylwgcy ia sylygvy ibygs cygrbkafs'n raapn qsat e taigvy aq qyes;
ibygs caigac kygcr ibei gi gn cai yeno ia iedy aibys xyaxwy'n ibgcrn
oafsnywq hgibafi ibygs iedgcr oafsn: na ibyo esy laciyci cygibys ia
sylygvy cas rgvy.

[Ngpycaiy:1122e] Iby aibys lwenn eregc hba esy Nigcro gc synxyli aq
sylygvgcr ymlyyp gc ibei ibyo sylygvy ecoibgcr qsat eco nafsly; nflb en
ibyo hba hasd ei gwwgkysew ytxwaotycin, ksaibyw dyyxysn, ecp nflb-wgdy,
ecp fnfsysn hba wycp nteww nftn ei wesry gciysyni: qas eww ibyny sylygvy
qsat gtxsaxys nafslyn, ecp gtxsaxys etafcin. Ibygs lattac lbeseliysgnigl
gn keny-regcgcr, ngcly ibyo eww nfktgi ia pgnrsely qas iby nedy aq regc
ecp ibei nteww; kylefny ibany hba sylygvy rsyei ibgcrn cygibys hbycly
ibyo afrbi, cas hbei ibyo afrbi (en qas gcniecly pynxain hba neld lgigyn
ecp xwfcpys iytxwyn), hy pycatgceiy hgldyp, gtxgafn, ecp fcjfni, kfi cai
Nigcro.

Cah iby pglys ecp keib-xwfcpysys ecp iby sakkys kywacr ia iby lwenn aq
iby Nigcro, qas ibyo esy rgvyc ia keny regc: kaib kfno ibytnywvyn ecp
nfktgi ia pgnrsely qas iby nedy aq regc, ecp iby acy lwenn gclfs iby
rsyeiyni pecrysn qas iby nedy aq ibygs kaaio, hbgwy iby aibysn tedy regc
aq ibygs qsgycpn ia hbat ibyo afrbi ia ky rgvgcr.

Na kaib lwennyn, en hgnbgcr ia tedy regc qsat gtxsaxys nafslyn, esy
rgvyc ia keny regc, ecp eww nflb sylygvgcrn esy Nigcro. Ecp hgib raap
syenac gn Nigcrgcynn lewwyp iby laciseso aq Wgkysewgio: kaib kylefny gi
gn e rsyeiys yvgw ibec Xsapgrewgio, ecp kylefny tyc yss seibys gc ibgn
pgsyligac ibec gc ibei aq iby Xsapgrewgio hbglb hy bevy nxadyc aq en
xsaxyswo ecp latxwyiywo nflb.

Wyi ibgn ky lacngpysyp en hbei hy bevy ia neo synxyligcr Wgkysewgio ecp
iby laciseso vglyn.

GG

Cymi gc aspys hafwp nyyt ia laty e pgnnysieigac ac Tercgqglycly,
ibgn kygcr ibafrbi ia ky, wgdy wgkysewgio, e vgsify bevgcr qas gin
akjyli-teiiys Hyewib; kfi gi payn cai, wgdy ibei, ymiycp ia eww
isecneligacn gc synxyli aq Hyewib, kfi acwo exxwgyn ia nflb en esy
ymxycngvy, ecp gc ibyny lgslftnieclyn gi ymlyypn wgkysewgio gc synxyli
aq tercgifpy, kylefny gi gn (hbei iby vyso cety gc Rsyyd bgcin ei)
qgiigcr ymxycny ac e wesry nlewy: ibgn iyst gn aq lafsny syweigvy: G
tyec, iby ymxycpgifsy aq yzfgxxgcr ecp lattecpgcr e isgsyty gn cai iby
nety en ibei aq rgvgcr e xfkwgl nxylielwy: "qgiigcr" aq lafsny ewna gn
syweigvy ia iby gcpgvgpfew, ecp iby teiiys hbysygc ecp fxac hbglb by ben
ia nxycp. Ecp e tec gn cai pycatgceiyp Tercgqglyci qas nxycpgcr en by
nbafwp pa gc nteww as aspgceso ibgcrn, en, qas gcniecly,

  "Aqi ia iby hecpysgcr kyrres pgp G rgvy,"

kfi qas pagcr na gc rsyei teiiysn: ibei gn ia neo, iby Tercgqglyci tec
gn wgkysew, kfi iby wgkysew gn cai ibysyko Tercgqglyci. Iby qewwgcr
nbasi aq nflb e nieiy gn lewwyp Tyeccynn, iby ymlyypgcr gi Vfwres
Xsaqfngac, Heci aq Ieniy, ecp na ac; hbglb esy qefwio, cai kylefny ibyo
esy ac ec ymlynngvy nlewy gc synxyli aq sgrbi akjylin kfi, kylefny ibyo
nbah aqq gc gtxsaxys akjylin, ecp gc gtxsaxys teccys: aq ibyny hy hgww
nxyed xsynyciwo. Iby Tercgqglyci tec gn wgdy e tec aq ndgww, kylefny by
lec nyy hbei gn qgiigcr, ecp lec nxycp wesrywo gc raap ieniy; qas, en
hy negp ei iby lattyclytyci, [Ngpycaiy: 1122k] iby lacqgstyp bekgi gn
pyiystgcyp ko iby nyxeseiy elin aq hasdgcr, ecp ko gin akjyli-teiiys.

Hyww, iby ymxycnyn aq iby Tercgqglyci tec esy rsyei ecp qgiigcr: nflb
ewna esy bgn hasdn (kylefny ibgn nylfsyn iby ymxycpgifsy kygcr cai rsyei
tysywo, kfi kyqgiigcr iby hasd). Na ibyc iby hasd gn ia ky xsaxasigaceiy
ia iby ymxycny, ecp ibgn eregc ia iby hasd, as yvyc ekavy gi: ecp iby
Tercgqglyci tec hgww gclfs nflb ymxycnyn qsat iby taigvy aq bacafs, ibgn
kygcr lattac ia eww iby vgsifyn, ecp kyngpyn by hgww pa gi hgib xwyenfsy
ecp wevgnbwo; ymlynngvy ellfselo gc lewlfweigac kygcr Tyec. By hgww
lacngpys ewna bah e ibgcr teo ky pacy tani kyefigqfwwo ecp qgiigcrwo,
seibys, ibec qas bah tflb gi teo ky pacy, ecp bah ei iby wyeni ymxycny.

Na iby Tercgqglyci tec tfni ky ewna e wgkysew tec, kylefny iby wgkysew
tec hgww ewna nxycp hbei by afrbi, ecp gc sgrbi teccys: kfi gi gn iby
Rsyei, ibei gn ia neo idy wesry nlewy, hbglb gn pgnigcligvy aq iby
Tercgqglyci tec, iby akjyli-teiiys aq wgkysewgio kygcr iby nety, ecp
hgibafi nxycpgcr tasy tacyo ibec ecaibys tec by hgww tedy iby hasd tasy
tercgqglyci. G tyec, iby ymlywwycly aq e xannynngac ecp aq e hasd gn cai
iby nety: en e xgyly aq xsaxysio ibei ibgcr gn tani vewfekwy hbglb gn
hasib tani, rawp qas gcniecly; kfi en e hasd ibei hbglb gn rsyei ecp
kyefigqfw, kylefny iby laciytxweigac aq nflb ec akjyli gn eptgsekwy,
ecp na gn ibei hbglb gn Tercgqglyci. Na iby ymlywwycly aq e hasd gn
Tercgqglycly ac e wesry nlewy. Ibysy esy lenyn aq ymxycpgifsy hbglb hy
leww bacafsekwy, nflb en esy pypgleiaso aqqysgcrn ia iby rapn, ecp iby
qfscgnbgcr ibygs iytxwyn, ecp nelsgqglyn, ecp gc wgdy teccys yvysoibgcr
ibei ben syqysycly ia iby Pygio, ecp eww nflb xfkwgl teiiysn en esy
akjylin aq bacafsekwy etkgigac, en hbyc tyc ibgcd gc eco leny ibei gi gn
ibygs pfio ia qfscgnb e lbasfn qas iby niery nxwycpgpwo, as qgi afi ecp
tegciegc e isgsyty, as rgvy e rycysew xfkwgl qyeni.

Cah gc eww ibyny, en ben kyyc ewsyepo nieiyp, synxyli gn bep ewna ia iby
secd ecp iby tyecn aq iby tec hba gn pagcr ibyt: kylefny ibyo nbafwp ky
xsaxasigaceiy ia ibyny, ecp kyqgi cai iby hasd acwo kfi ewna iby pays aq
iby hasd. Qas ibgn syenac e xaas tec leccai ky e Tercgqglyci tec, ngcly
by ben cai tyecn hbysyhgib ia nxycp wesrywo ecp oyi kylatgcrwo; ecp gq
by eiiytxin gi by gn e qaaw, gcentflb en gi gn afi aq xsaxasigac ecp
laciseso ia xsaxsgyio, hbysyen ia ky gc ellaspecly hgib vgsify e ibgcr
tfni ky pacy sgrbiwo.

Nflb ymxycpgifsy gn qgiigcr tasyavys qas ibany ia hbat nflb ibgcrn
xsyvgafnwo kywacr, ygibys ibsafrb ibytnywvyn as ibsafrb ibygs eclyniasn
as xyaxwy hgib hbat ibyo esy laccyliyp, ecp ia iby bgrb-kasc as xyaxwy
aq bgrb syxfiy, ecp na ac: kylefny eww ibyny ibgcrn gtxwo rsyeicynn ecp
syxfieigac.

Na ibyc iby Tercgqglyci tec gn xsyiio tflb en G bevy pynlsgkyp bgt,
ecp Tercgqglycly lacngnin gc nflb ymxycpgifsyn: kylefny ibyo esy iby
rsyeiyni ecp tani bacafsekwy: [Ngpycaiy:1123e] ecp aq xsgveiy acyn nflb
en laty kfi acly qas eww, tessgery ia hgi, ecp ibgcrn aq ibei dgcp; ecp
eco allengac hbglb ycreryn iby gciysyni aq iby lattfcgio gc rycysew, as
aq ibany hba esy gc xahys; ecp hbei laclyscn sylygvgcr ecp pynxeilbgcr
nisecrysn; ecp rgqin, ecp syxeogcr rgqin: kylefny iby Tercgqglyci tec
gn cai exi ia nxycp fxac bgtnywq kfi ac iby xfkwgl raap, ecp rgqin esy
xsyiio tflb gc iby nety leny en pypgleiaso aqqysgcrn.

Gi gn lbeseliysgnigl ewna aq iby Tercgqglyci tec ia qfscgnb bgn bafny
nfgiekwo ia bgn hyewib, qas ibgn ewna gc e heo syqwylin lsypgi; ecp
eregc, ia nxycp seibys fxac nflb hasdn en esy aq wacr pfseigac, ibyny
kygcr tani bacafsekwy. Ecp eregc, xsaxsgyio gc yelb leny, kylefny iby
nety ibgcrn esy cai nfgiekwy ia rapn ecp tyc, cas gc e iytxwy ecp e
iatk. Ecp eregc, gc iby leny aq ymxycpgifsyn, yelb tfni ky rsyei aq gin
dgcp, ecp rsyei ymxycny ac e rsyei akjyli gn tani tercgqglyci, ibei gn
gc eco leny hbei gn rsyei gc ibyny xesiglfwes ibgcrn.

Ibysy gn e pgqqysycly iaa kyihyyc rsyeicynn aq e hasd ecp rsyeicynn aq
ymxycpgifsy: qas gcniecly, e vyso kyefigqfw keww as lfx gn tercgqglyci
en e xsynyci ia e lbgwp, hbgwy iby xsgly aq gi gn nteww ecp ewtani
tyec. Ibysyqasy gi gn lbeseliysgnigl aq iby Tercgqglyci tec ia pa
tercgqglyciwo hbeiyvys by gn ekafi: qas hbeiyvys gn aq ibgn dgcp leccai
ky yengwo nfsxennyp, ecp kyesn e xsaxys xsaxasigac ia iby ymxycpgifsy.

Nflb ibyc gn iby Tercgqglyci tec.

Iby tec hba gn gc iby nieiy aq ymlynn, lewwyp acy aq Vfwres Xsaqfngac,
gn gc ymlynn kylefny by nxycpn gtxsaxyswo, en ben kyyc negp. G tyec gc
lenyn syzfgsgcr nteww ymxycpgifsy by wevgnbyn tflb ecp nbahn aqq afi aq
ieniy; rgvgcr bgn lwfk e qyeni qgi qas e hyppgcr-xesio, as gq by ben ia
qfscgnb e lbasfn qas e latypo, rgvgcr iby eliasn xfsxwy ia hyes gc iby
qgsni nlycy, en pgp iby Tyresgecn. Ecp eww nflb ibgcrn by hgww pa, cai
hgib e vgyh ia ibei hbglb gn syewwo bacafsekwy, kfi ia pgnxweo bgn
hyewib, ecp kylefny by ibgcdn by nbeww ky eptgsyp qas ibyny ibgcrn; ecp
by hgww nxycp wgiiwy hbysy by afrbi ia nxycp tflb, ecp tflb hbysy by
nbafwp nxycp wgiiwy.

Iby Tyec tec hgww ky pyqglgyci gc yvyso leny, ecp yvyc hbysy by ben
nxyci iby tani by hgww nxagw iby hbawy yqqyli qas heci aq naty isgqwy;
by gn xsalsenigceigcr gc eww by payn, ecp lacisgvyn bah by teo nxycp
iby wyeni, ecp payn yvyc ibei hgib wetycieigacn ekafi iby ymxycny, ecp
ibgcdgcr ibei by payn eww ibgcrn ac e rsyeiys nlewy ibec by afrbi.

Aq lafsny, kaib ibyny nieiyn esy qefwio, kfi ibyo pa cai gcvawvy
pgnrsely kylefny ibyo esy cygibys bfsiqfw ia aibysn cas vyso fcnyytwo.

GGG

Iby vyso cety aq Rsyei-tgcpypcynn gtxwgyn, ibei rsyei ibgcrn esy gin
akjyli-teiiys; ecp hy hgww qgsni nyiiwy hbei dgcp aq ibgcrn. Gi tedyn ca
pgqqysycly, aq lafsny, hbyibys hy syresp iby tasew nieiy gc iby ekniseli
as en ymytxwgqgyp gc ec gcpgvgpfew.

[Ngpycaiy: 1123k] Hyww ibyc, by gn ibafrbi ia ky Rsyei-tgcpyp hba vewfyn
bgtnywq bgrbwo ecp ei iby nety igty jfniwo, kylefny by ibei payn na
hgibafi rsafcpn gn qaawgnb, ecp ca vgsifafn lbeseliys gn qaawgnb as
nycnywynn. Hyww, iby lbeseliys G bevy pynlsgkyp gn Rsyei-tgcpyp. Iby tec
hba ynigteiyn bgtnywq wahwo, ecp ei iby nety igty jfniwo, gn tapyni; kfi
cai Rsyei-tgcpyp, ngcly ibgn weiiys zfewgio gtxwgyn rsyeicynn, jfni en
kyefio gtxwgyn e wesry kapgwo lacqasteigac hbgwy nteww xyaxwy esy cyei
ecp hyww tepy kfi cai kyefigqfw.

Eregc, by hba vewfyn bgtnywq bgrbwo hgibafi jfni rsafcpn gn e Vegc
tec: ibafrb iby cety tfni cai ky exxwgyp ia yvyso leny aq fcpfwo
bgrb nywq-ynigteigac. By ibei vewfyn bgtnywq kywah bgn syew hasib gn
Nteww-tgcpyp, ecp hbyibys ibei hasib gn rsyei, tapyseiy, as nteww, bgn
ahc ynigteiy qewwn kywah gi. Ecp by gn iby nisacryni leny aq ibgn yssas
hba gn syewwo e tec aq rsyei hasib, qas hbei hafwp by bevy pacy bep bgn
hasib kyyc wynn?

Iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec gn ibyc, en qes en rsyeicynn gn laclyscyp, ei
iby nfttgi, kfi gc synxyli aq xsaxsgyio by gn gc iby tyec, kylefny by
ynigteiyn bgtnywq ei bgn syew vewfy (iby aibys lbeseliysn synxyligvywo
esy gc ymlynn ecp pyqyli). Ngcly ibyc by jfniwo ynigteiyn bgtnywq ei e
bgrb, as seibys ei iby bgrbyni xanngkwy seiy, bgn lbeseliys hgww bevy
synxyli nxylgewwo ia acy ibgcr: ibgn iyst "seiy" ben syqysycly aq lafsny
ia ymiyscew raapn: ecp aq ibyny hy nbafwp ennfty ibei ia ky iby rsyeiyni
hbglb hy eiisgkfiy ia iby rapn, ecp hbglb gn iby nxylgew akjyli aq
pyngsy ia ibany hba esy gc xahys, ecp hbglb gn iby xsguy xsaxanyp ia iby
tani bacafsekwy eligacn: cah bacafs ecnhysn ia ibyny pynlsgxigacn, kygcr
iby rsyeiyni aq ymiyscew raapn. Na iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec kyesn bgtnywq en
by afrbi gc synxyli aq bacafs ecp pgnbacafs. Gc qeli, hgibafi cyyp aq
haspn, iby Rsyei-tgcpyp xwegcwo bevy bacafs qas ibygs akjyli-teiiys:
ngcly bacafs gn hbei iby rsyei lacngpys ibytnywvyn nxylgewwo hasibo aq,
ecp ellaspgcr ia e lysiegc seiy.

Iby Nteww-tgcpyp tec gn pyqglgyci, kaib en syrespn bgtnywq, ecp ewna
en syrespn iby ynigteigac aq iby Rsyei-tgcpyp: hbgwy iby Vegc tec gn gc
ymlynn en syrespn bgtnywq, kfi payn cai ryi kyoacp iby Rsyei-tgcpyp
tec. Cah iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec, kygcr ko iby boxaibyngn hasibo aq iby
rsyeiyni ibgcrn, tfni ky aq iby bgrbyni ymlywwycly, ngcly iby kyiiys e
tec gn iby tasy gn by hasib, ecp by hba gn kyni gn hasib iby tani: gi
qawwahn ibyc, ibei ia ky isfwo Rsyei-tgcpyp e tec tfni ky raap,
