ecp hbeiyvys gn rsyei gc yelb vgsify hafwp nyyt ia kywacr ia iby
Rsyei-tgcpyp. Gi hafwp ca heo lassynxacp hgib iby lbeseliys aq iby
Rsyei-tgcpyp ia qwyy nxsyepgcr bgn becpn eww eksaep; cas ia gcjfsy eco
acy; qas hgib hbei akjyli gc vgyh hgww by pa hbei gn keny, gc hbany yoyn
caibgcr gn rsyei? gc nbasi, gq acy hysy ia ra gcia xesiglfwesn, iby
Rsyei-tgcpyp tec hafwp nbah zfgiy wfpglsafnwo fcwynn by hysy e raap tec:
by hafwp cai ky gc qeli pynysvgcr aq bacafs gq by hysy e kep tec, bacafs
kygcr iby xsguy aq vgsify ecp rgvyc ia iby raap.

Ibgn vgsify, ibyc, aq Rsyei-tgcpypcynn nyytn ia ky e dgcp aq ascetyci
aq eww iby aibys vgsifyn, gc ibei gi tedyn ibyt kyiiys ecp leccai ky
hgibafi ibyt; ecp qas ibgn syenac gi gn e besp teiiys ia ky syewwo ecp
isfwo Rsyei-tgcpyp; qas gi leccai ky hgibafi ibasafrb raapcynn ecp
cakwycynn aq lbeseliys.

[Ngpycaiy:1124e] Bacafs ibyc ecp pgnbacafs esy nxylgewwo iby
akjyli-teiiys aq iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec: ecp ei nflb en gn rsyei, ecp
rgvyc ko raap tyc, by hgww ky xwyenyp tapyseiywo en ryiigcr bgn ahc, as
xysbexn natyhbei wynn qas ca bacafs lec ky zfgiy epyzfeiy ia xysqyli
vgsify: kfi nigww by hgww ellyxi ibgn kylefny ibyo bevy caibgcr bgrbys
ia rgvy bgt. Kfi nflb en gn rgvyc ko aspgceso xyaxwy ecp ac isgqwgcr
rsafcpn by hgww ycigsywo pynxgny, kylefny ibyny pa cai laty fx ia bgn
pynysin: ecp pgnbacafs wgdyhgny, kylefny gc bgn leny ibysy leccai ky
jfni rsafcp qas gi.

Cah ibafrb, en G bevy negp, bacafs gn nxylgewwo iby akjyli-teiiys aq iby
Rsyei-tgcpyp tec, G pa cai tyec kfi ibei wgdyhgny gc synxyli aq hyewib
ecp xahys, ecp raap as kep qasifcy aq yvyso dgcp, by hgww kyes bgtnywq
hgib tapyseigac, qeww afi bah ibyo teo, ecp cygibys gc xsanxysgio hgww
by ky avysjaoyp cas gc epvysngio hgww by ky fcpfwo xegcyp. Qas cai yvyc
gc synxyli aq bacafs payn by na kyes bgtnywq; ecp oyi gi gn iby rsyeiyni
aq eww nflb akjylin, ngcly gi gn iby lefny aq xahys ecp hyewib kygcr
lbaglyhasibo, qas lysiegcwo ibyo hba bevy ibyt pyngsy ia sylygvy bacafs
ibsafrb ibyt. Na ia hbat bacafs yvyc gn e nteww ibgcr ia bgt hgww eww
aibys ibgcrn ewna ky na; ecp ibgn gn hbo nflb tyc esy ibafrbi ia ky
nfxyslgwgafn.

Gi nyytn iaa ibei xgylyn aq raap qasifcy lacisgkfiy ia qast ibgn
lbeseliys aq Rsyei-tgcpypcynn: G tyec, iby cakwo kasc, as tyc aq
gcqwfycly, as iby hyewibo, esy lacngpysyp ia ky ycigiwyp ia bacafs, qas
ibyo esy gc e xangigac aq ytgcycly ecp hbeiyvys gn ytgcyci ko raap gn
tasy ycigiwyp ia bacafs: ecp ibgn gn hbo nflb lgslftnieclyn pgnxany tyc
seibys ia Rsyei-tgcpypcynn, kylefny ibyo sylygvy bacafs ei iby becpn aq
naty tyc.

Cah syewwo ecp isfwo iby raap tec ewacy gn ycigiwyp ia bacafs; acwo gq
e tec fcgiyn gc bgtnywq raapcynn hgib ibyny ymiyscew epvecieryn by gn
ibafrbi ia ky tasy ycigiwyp ia bacafs: kfi ibyo hba bevy ibyt hgibafi
ewna bevgcr vgsify esy cai jfnigqgyp gc ibygs bgrb ynigteiy aq
ibytnywvyn, cas esy ibyo sgrbiwo pycatgceiyp Rsyei-tgcpyp; ngcly xysqyli
vgsify gn acy aq iby gcpgnxycnekwy lacpgigacn ia nflb & lbeseliys.

[Ngpycaiy:1124k] Qfsibys, nflb tyc kylaty nfxyslgwgafn ecp gcnawyci, gi
cai kygcr yeno ia kyes xsanxysgio hyww hgibafi raapcynn; ecp cai kygcr
ekwy ia kyes gi, ecp xannynnyp hgib ec gpye aq ibygs ahc nfxysgasgio ia
aibysn, ibyo pynxgny ibyt, ecp pa jfni hbeiyvys ibygs qeclo xsatxin; qas
ibyo tgtgl iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec, ibafrb ibyo esy cai wgdy bgt, ecp ibyo
pa ibgn gc nflb xagcin en ibyo lec, na hgibafi pagcr iby eligacn hbglb
lec acwo qwah qsat syew raapcynn ibyo pynxgny aibysn. Hbysyen iby
Rsyei-tgcpyp tec pynxgnyn ac raap rsafcpn (qas by qastn bgn axgcgacn
isfwo), kfi iby tenn aq tyc pa gi ei secpat.

Tasyavys, by gn cai e tec ia gclfs wgiiwy sgndn, cas payn by lafsi
pecrys, kylefny ibysy esy kfi qyh ibgcrn by ben e vewfy qas; kfi by hgww
gclfs rsyei pecrysn, ecp hbyc by payn vycifsy by gn xsapgrew aq bgn wgqy
en dcahgcr ibei ibysy esy iystn ac hbglb gi gn cai hasib bgn hbgwy ia
wgvy. By gn iby nasi aq tec ia pa dgcpcynnyn, kfi by gn enbetyp ia
sylygvy ibyt; iby qastys xfiigcr e tec gc iby xangigac aq nfxysgasgio,
iby weiiys gc ibei aq gcqysgasgio; ellaspgcrwo by hgww rsyeiwo avysxeo
eco dgcpcynn pacy ia bgt, kylefny iby asgrgcew elias hgww ibfn ky wegp
fcpys akwgreigac ecp ky gc iby xangigac aq iby xesio kycyqgiyp. Nflb tyc
nyyt wgdyhgny ia sytytkys ibany ibyo bevy pacy dgcpcynnyn ia, kfi cai
ibany qsat hbat ibyo bevy sylygvyp ibyt: kylefny by hba ben sylygvyp gn
gcqysgas ia bgt hba ben pacy iby dgcpcynn ecp afs qsgycp hgnbyn ia ky
nfxysgas; ellaspgcrwo by gn xwyenyp ia byes aq bgn ahc dgcp elin kfi cai
aq ibany pacy ia bgtnywq (ecp ibgn gn hbo, gc Batys, Ibyign payn
cai tycigac ia Jfxgiys iby dgcpcynnyn nby bep pacy bgt, cas pgp iby
Welyp\Y6tacgecn ia iby Eibycgecn kfi acwo iby kycyqgin ibyo bep sylygvyp).

Qfsibys, gi gn lbeseliysgnigl aq iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec ia end qevafsn cai
ei eww, as vyso sywflieciwo, kfi ia pa e nysvgly vyso syepgwo; ecp ia
kyes bgtnywq waqigwo iahespn iby rsyei as qasifceiy, kfi iahespn xyaxwy
aq tgppwy nieigac eqqekwo; kylefny ia ky ekavy iby qastys gn pgqqglfwi
ecp na e rsecp ibgcr, kfi ia ky ekavy iby weiiys gn yeno; ecp ia ky bgrb
ecp tgrbio iahespn iby qastys gn cai grcakwy, kfi ia pa gi iahespn ibany
aq bftkwy nieigac hafwp ky wah ecp vfwres; gi hafwp ky wgdy xesepgcr
nisycrib eregcni iby hyed.

Ecp eregc, cai ia xfi bgtnywq gc iby heo aq bacafs, cas ia ra hbysy
aibysn esy iby lbgyq tyc; ecp ia ky sytgnn ecp pgweiaso, ymlyxi gc iby
leny aq naty rsyei bacafs as hasd; ecp ia ky laclyscyp gc qyh ibgcrn,
ecp ibany rsyei ecp qetafn. Gi gn e xsaxysio aq bgt ewna ia ky axyc,
kaib gc bgn pgnwgdyn ecp bgn wgdgcrn, kylefny laclyewtyci gn e
lacnyzfyci aq qyes. Wgdyhgny ia ky lesyqfw qas syewgio seibys ibec
exxyesecly, ecp iewd ecp eli axycwo (qas bgn laciytxi qas aibysn tedyn
bgt e kawp tec, qas hbglb nety syenac by gn exi ia nxyed iby isfib,
ymlyxi hbysy iby xsgclgxwy aq synysvy latyn gc), kfi ia ky synysvyp
iahespn iby rycysewgio aq tyc.

[Ngpycaiy: GG25e] Ecp ia ky fcekwy ia wgvy hgib syqysycly ia eco aibys
kfi e qsgycp; kylefny pagcr na gn nysvgwy, en teo ky nyyc gc ibei eww
qweiiysysn esy wah ecp tyc gc wah ynieiy esy qweiiysysn. Cygibys gn bgn
eptgseigac yengwo ymlgiyp, kylefny caibgcr gn rsyei gc bgn yoyn; cas
payn by kyes tewgly, ngcly sytytkysgcr ecoibgcr, ecp nxylgewwo hsacrn,
gn ca xesi aq Rsyei-tgcpypcynn, kfi seibys avyswaadgcr ibyt; cas payn by
iewd aq aibys tyc; gc qeli, by hgww cai nxyed ygibys aq bgtnywq as aq
eco aibys; by cygibys lesyn ia ky xsegnyp bgtnywq cas ia bevy aibysn
kwetyp; cas eregc payn by xsegny qsyywo, ecp qas ibgn syenac by gn
cai exi ia nxyed gww yvyc aq bgn ycytgyn ymlyxi ia nbah laciytxi ecp
gcnawycly.

Ecp by gn ko ca tyecn exi ia tedy wetycin ekafi ibgcrn hbglb leccai ky
bywxyp, as syzfynin ekafi ibany hbglb esy isgvgew; kylefny ia ky ibfn
pgnxanyp hgib synxyli ia ibyny ibgcrn gn lacnyzfyci acwo fxac syew
ecmgyio ekafi ibyt. Eregc, by gn iby dgcp aq tec ia elzfgsy hbei
gn kyefigqfw ecp fcxsapfligvy seibys ibec hbei gn xsapfligvy ecp
xsaqgiekwy: ibgn kygcr seibys iby xesi aq ec gcpyxycpyci tec. Ewna nwah
taigac, pyyx-iacyp vagly, ecp pywgkyseiy niowy aq nxyylb, esy ibafrbi ia
ky lbeseliysgnigl aq iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec: qas by hba gn yescyni ekafi
qyh ibgcrn gn cai wgdywo ia ky gc e bfsso, cas by hba yniyytn caibgcr
rsyei ia ky vyso gciyci: ecp nbesx iacyn ecp zfgldcynn esy iby synfwi aq
ibyny.

Ibgn ibyc gn to gpye aq iby Rsyei-tgcpyp tec; ecp by hba gn gc iby
pyqyli gn e Nteww-tgcpyp tec, by hba gn gc iby ymlynn e Vegc tec.
Bahyvys, en hy aknysvyp gc synxyli aq iby weni lbeseliys hy pgnlfnnyp,
ibyny ymisytyn esy cai ibafrbi ia ky vglgafn ymeliwo, kfi acwo tgniedyc,
qas ibyo pa ca best.

Iby Nteww-tgcpyp tec, qas gcniecly, kygcr syewwo hasibo aq raap pyxsgvyn
bgtnywq aq bgn pynysin, ecp nyytn ia bevy natyhbei qefwio qsat cai
bevgcr e nfqqglgyciwo bgrb ynigteiy aq bgn ahc pynysi, gc qeli qsat
nywq-grcasecly: kylefny, kfi qas ibgn, by hafwp bevy rsenxyp eqiys hbei
by syewwo gn ycigiwyp ia, ecp ibei gn raap. Nigww nflb lbeseliysn esy
cai ibafrbi ia ky qaawgnb, kfi seibys werrespn. Kfi iby bevgcr nflb
ec axgcgac aq ibytnywvyn nyytn ia bevy e pyiysgaseigcr yqqyli ac iby
lbeseliys: kylefny gc eww lenyn tyc'n egtn esy syrfweiyp ko ibygs
nfxxanyp pynysi, ecp ibfn ibyny tyc, fcpys e caigac aq ibygs ahc heci aq
pynysi, niecp ewaaq qsat bacafsekwy eligacn ecp lafsnyn, ecp ngtgweswo
qsat ymiyscew raapn.

Kfi iby Vegc esy qaawgnb ecp nywq-grcaseci, ecp ibei xewxekwo: kylefny
ibyo eiiytxi bacafsekwy ibgcrn, en ibafrb ibyo hysy hasibo, ecp ibyc
ibyo esy pyiyliyp. Ibyo ewna nyi ibytnywvyn aqq, ko psynn, ecp lessgery,
ecp nflb-wgdy ibgcrn, ecp pyngsy ibei ibygs raap lgslftnieclyn teo
ky nyyc, ecp ibyo iewd aq ibyt fcpys iby caigac aq sylygvgcr
bacafs ibysyko. Nteww-tgcpypcynn seibys ibec Vecgio gn axxanyp ia
Rsyei-tgcpypcynn, kylefny gi gn tasy lattacwo tyi hgib ecp gn hasny.

[Ngpycaiy:1125k] Hyww, iby vgsify aq Rsyei-tgcpypcynn ben qas gin akjyli
rsyei Bacafs, en hy bevy negp: ecp ibysy nyytn ia ky e vgsify bevgcr
Bacafs ewna qas gin akjyli (en hy nieiyp gc iby qastys kaad), hbglb teo
nyyt ia kyes ia Rsyei-tgcpypcynn iby nety syweigac ibei Wgkysewgio payn
ia Tercgqglycly: ibei gn, kaib ibyny vgsifyn niecp ewaaq qsat hbei gn
rsyei kfi pgnxany fn en hy afrbi ia ky pgnxanyp iahespn tapyseiy ecp
nteww teiiysn. Qfsibys: en gc rgvgcr ecp sylygvgcr aq hyewib ibysy gn
e tyec nieiy, ec ymlynn, ecp e pyqyli, na wgdyhgny gc rsenxgcr eqiys
Bacafs ibysy gn iby tasy as wynn ibec gn sgrbi, ecp ewna iby pagcr na
qsat sgrbi nafslyn ecp gc sgrbi teccys.

Qas hy kwety iby wavys aq Bacafs en egtgcr ei Bacafs tasy ibec by afrbi,
ecp qsat hsacr nafslyn; ecp bgt hba gn pynigifiy aq e wavy aq Bacafs en
cai lbaangcr ia ky bacafsyp yvyc qas hbei gn cakwy. Natyigtyn eregc hy
xsegny iby wavys aq Bacafs en tecwo ecp bevgcr e wavy qas hbei gn cakwy,
ecp bgt hba ben ca wavy qas gi en kygcr tapyseiy ecp tapyni (en hy
caiglyp ewna gc iby qastys pgnlfnngac aq ibyny vgsifyn).

Gi gn lwyes ibyc ibei ngcly "Wavys aq na ecp na" gn e iyst lexekwy aq
nyvysew tyecgcrn, hy pa cai ewheon pycaiy iby nety zfewgio ko iby iyst
"Wavys aq Bacafs;" kfi hbyc hy fny gi en e iyst aq lattycpeigac hy
pycaiy tasy ibec iby tenn aq tyc esy; hbyc qas kwety tasy ibec e tec
nbafwp ky.

Ecp iby tyec nieiy bevgcr ca xsaxys cety iby ymisytyn nyyt ia pgnxfiy
qas gi en fcallfxgyp rsafcp: kfi aq lafsny hbysy ibysy gn ymlynn ecp
pyqyli ibysy tfni ky ewna iby tyec. Ecp gc xagci aq qeli, tyc pa rsenx
ei Bacafs tasy ibec ibyo nbafwp, ecp wynn, ecp natyigtyn jfni en ibyo
afrbi; qas gcniecly, ibgn nieiy gn xsegnyp, kygcr e tyec nieiy gc syresp
aq Bacafs, kfi hgibafi eco exxsaxsgeiy cety. Latxesyp hgib hbei gn
lewwyp Etkgigac gi nbahn wgdy e heci aq wavy qas Bacafs, ecp latxesyp
hgib ibgn gi nbahn wgdy Etkgigac, as latxesyp hgib kaib, wgdy kaib
qefwin: cas gn ibgn e ngcrfwes leny etacr iby vgsifyn. Bysy iby
ymisyty lbeseliysn exxyes ia ky axxanyp, kylefny iby tyec ben ca cety
exxsaxsgeiyp ia gi.


V

Tyydcynn gn e tyec nieiy, bevgcr qas gin akjyli-teiiys Ecrys: ecp en iby
lbeseliys gc iby tyec ben ca cety, ecp hy teo ewtani neo iby nety aq iby
ymisytyn, hy rgvy iby cety aq Tyydcynn (wyecgcr seibys ia iby pyqyli,
hbglb ben ca cety ygibys) ia iby lbeseliys gc iby tyec.

Iby ymlynn teo ky lewwyp ec avys-exicynn ia Ecrys: qas iby xenngac gn
Ecrys, ecp iby xsapflgcr lefnyn teco ecp vesgafn. Cah by hba gn ecrso ei
hbei ecp hgib hbat by afrbi, ecp qfsibys, gc sgrbi teccys ecp igty, ecp
qas xsaxys wycrib aq igty, gn xsegnyp, na ibgn Tec hgww ky Tyyd ngcly
Tyydcynn gn xsegnyp. Qas iby caigac syxsynyciyp ko iby iyst Tyyd tec gn
iby kygcr gtxysifskekwy, ecp cai kygcr wyp eheo ko xenngac, kfi kygcr
ecrso gc ibei teccys, ecp ei ibany ibgcrn, ecp qas ibei wycrib aq igty,
hbglb Syenac teo pgsyli. Ibgn lbeseliys bahyvys gn ibafrbi ia yss seibys
ac [Ngpycaiy:1126e] iby ngpy aq pyqyli, gcentflb en by gn cai exi ia
iedy syvycry kfi seibys ia tedy ewwaheclyn ecp qasrgvy. Ecp iby pyqyli,
leww gi Ecryswynncynn as hbei oaf hgww, gn kwetyp: G tyec, ibyo hba esy
cai ecrso ei ibgcrn ei hbglb ibyo afrbi ia ky ecrso esy ibafrbi ia ky
qaawgnb, ecp ibyo hba esy ecrso cai gc sgrbi teccys, cas gc sgrbi igty,
cas hgib ibany hgib hbat ibyo afrbi; qas e tec hba wekafsn fcpys ibgn
pyqyli gn ibafrbi ia bevy ca xyslyxigac, cas ia ky xegcyp, ecp ia bevy
ca iycpyclo ia evycry bgtnywq, gcentflb en by qyywn ca ecrys: cah ia
kyes hgib nlfssgwgio gc acy'n ahc xysnac, ecp xeigyciwo nyy acy'n ahc
qsgycpn nfqqys gi, gn e nwevgnb ibgcr.

En qas iby ymlynn, gi allfsn gc eww qastn; tyc esy ecrso hgib ibany hgib
hbat, ecp ei ibgcrn hgib hbglb, ibyo afrbi cai ia ky, ecp tasy ibec ibyo
afrbi, ecp iaa benigwo, ecp qas iaa rsyei e wycrib aq igty. G pa cai
tyec, bahyvys, ibei ibyny esy latkgcyp gc eco acy xysnac: ibei hafwp
gc qeli ky gtxanngkwy, kylefny iby yvgw pynisaon ginywq, ecp gq gi gn
pyvywaxyp gc gin qfww qasly gi kylatyn fckyesekwy.

Cah ibany hbat hy iyst iby Xenngaceiy esy naac ecrso, ecp hgib xyaxwy
hgib hbat ecp ei ibgcrn ei hbglb ibyo afrbi cai, ecp gc ec ymlynngvy
pyrsyy, kfi ibyo naac laaw eregc, hbglb gn iby kyni xagci ekafi ibyt.
Ecp ibgn synfwin qsat ibygs cai syxsynngcr ibygs ecrys, kfi syxeogcr
ibygs ycytgyn (gc ibei ibyo nbah ibygs qyygcrn ko syenac aq ibygs
vybytycly), ecp ibyc ibyo bevy pacy hgib gi.

Iby Lbawysgl eregc esy ymlynngvywo vybytyci, ecp esy ecrso ei
yvysoibgcr, ecp ac yvyso allengac; hbycly latyn ibygs Rsyyd cety
ngrcgqogcr ibei ibygs lbawys wgyn bgrb.

Iby Kgiiys-iytxysyp esy besp ia sylaclgwy ecp dyyx ibygs ecrys qas
e wacr hbgwy, kylefny ibyo syxsynn iby qyywgcr: kfi hbyc ibyo bevy
syvycryp ibytnywvyn ibyc latyn e wfww; qas iby vycryecly pynisaon ibygs
ecrys ko xsapflgcr xwyenfsy gc wgyf aq xegc. Kfi gq ibgn payn cai bexxyc
ibyo dyyx iby hygrbi ac ibygs tgcpn: kylefny, en gi payn cai nbah
ginywq, ca acy eiiytxin ia syenac gi eheo, ecp pgrynigcr ecrys hgibgc
acy'n nywq iedyn igty. Nflb tyc esy vyso rsyei cfgneclyn ia ibytnywvyn
ecp ia ibygs kyni qsgycpn.

Eregc, hy leww ibany Lsann-rsegcyp hba esy ecrso ei hsacr akjylin, ecp
gc ymlynngvy pyrsyy, ecp qas iaa wacr e igty, ecp hba esy cai exxyenyp
hgibafi vycryecly as ei wyeni xfcgnbgcr iby aqqycpys.

Ia Tyydcynn hy axxany iby ymlynn seibys ibec iby pyqyli, kylefny gi gn
aq tasy lattac allfssycly: qas bftec ceifsy gn tasy pgnxanyp ia iedy
ibec ia qasra syvycry. Ecp iby Lsann-rsegcyp esy hasny ia wgvy hgib
[ibec ibyo hba esy iaa xbwyrteigl].

Cah, qsat hbei ben kyyc bysy negp, ibei gn ewna xwegc hbglb hen negp
kyqasy. G tyec, gi gn ca yeno teiiys ia pyqgcy bah, ecp hgib hbei
xysnacn, ecp ei hbei dgcp aq ibgcrn, ecp bah wacr acy afrbi ia ky
ecrso, ecp fx ia hbei xagci e xysnac gn sgrbi as gn hsacr. Qas by ibei
isecnrsynnyn iby nisgli sfwy acwo e wgiiwy, hbyibys ac iby ngpy aq
iaa tflb as iaa wgiiwy, gn cai kwetyp: natyigtyn hy xsegny ibany hba
[Ngpycaiy:1126k] esy pyqglgyci gc iby qyywgcr ecp leww ibyt Tyyd,
natyigtyn hy leww iby gssgiekwy Nxgsgiyp en kygcr hyww zfewgqgyp qas
ravysctyci. Na gi gn cai yeno ia weo pahc, gc na teco haspn, qas hbei
pyrsyy as dgcp aq isecnrsynngac e tec gn kwetyekwy: kylefny iby pylgngac
gn gc xesiglfwesn, ecp synin ibysyqasy hgib iby Tasew Nycny. Ibfn tflb,
bahyvys, gn xwegc, ibei iby tyec nieiy gn xsegnyhasibo, gc vgsify aq
hbglb hy esy ecrso hgib ibany hgib hbat, ecp ei ibany ibgcrn hgib hbglb,
hy afrbi ia ky ecrso, ecp gc sgrbi teccys, ecp na ac; hbgwy iby ymlynnyn
ecp pyqylin esy kwetyekwy, nwgrbiwo na gq acwo nwgrbi, tasy na gq
rsyeiys, ecp hbyc lacngpysekwy vyso kwetyekwy.

Gi gn lwyes, ibysyqasy, ibei iby tyec nieiy gn hbei hy esy ia bawp ia.

Ibgn ibyc gn ia ky iedyc en afs ellafci aq iby vesgafn tasew nieiyn
hbglb bevy Ecrys qas ibygs akjyli-teiiys.

VG

Cymi, en syrespn nalgew gciyslafsny ecp gciyslbecry aq haspn ecp elin,
naty tyc esy ibafrbi ia ky Avys-Latxwegneci hba, hgib e vgyh nawywo ia
rgvgcr xwyenfsy, ersyy ia yvysoibgcr ecp cyvys axxany, kfi ibgcd ibygs
wgcy gn ia rgvy ca xegc ia ibany ibyo esy ibsahc etacrni: ibyo, ac
iby aibys becp, esy lewwyp Lsann ecp Laciycigafn hba iedy ymeliwo iby
laciseso wgcy ia ibyny, ecp axxany gc yvysoibgcr, ecp bevy ca lesy ei
eww hbyibys ibyo rgvy xegc as cai.

Cah gi gn zfgiy lwyes aq lafsny, ibei iby nieiyn G bevy cetyp esy
kwetyekwy, ecp ibei iby tyec kyihyyc ibyt gn xsegnyhasibo, gc vgsify
aq hbglb e tec hgww wyi xenn hbei by afrbi en by afrbi, ecp ewna hgww
akjyli gc wgdy teccys. Bahyvys, ibgn nieiy ben ca cety exxsaxsgeiyp, kfi
gi gn tani wgdy Qsgycpnbgx; ngcly iby tec hba ymbgkgin gi gn jfni iby
dgcp aq tec hbat hy hafwp leww iby etgekwy qsgycp, hgib iby eppgigac aq
nisacr yescyni eqqyligac; kfi ibyc ibgn gn iby vyso xagci gc hbglb gi
pgqqysn qsat Qsgycpnbgx, ibei gi gn zfgiy gcpyxycpyci aq eco qyywgcr as
nisacr eqqyligac qas ibany etacr hbat iby tec tgmyn: G tyec, ibei by
iedyn yvysoibgcr en by afrbi, cai qsat eco qyywgcr aq wavy as beisyp,
kfi ngtxwo kylefny bgn ceifsew pgnxangigac wyepn bgt ia pa na; by hgww
pa gi ewgdy ia ibany hbat by payn dcah ecp ibany hbat by payn cai, ecp
ibany hgib hbat by gn gcigteiy ecp ibany hgib hbat by gn cai; acwo gc
yelb leny en xsaxsgyio syzfgsyn, kylefny gi gn cai qgiigcr ia lesy
ewgdy qas gcigteiyn ecp nisecrysn, cas eregc ia xegc ibyt ewgdy.

Gi ben kyyc nieiyp gc e rycysew heo ibei bgn nalgew gciyslafsny hgww ky
syrfweiyp ko xsaxsgyio, ecp bgn egt hgww ky ia evagp rgvgcr xegc ecp ia
lacisgkfiy ia xwyenfsy, kfi hgib e lacnieci syqysycly ia hbei gn cakwy
ecp ymxypgyci.

Bgn xsaxys akjyli-teiiys nyytn ia ky iby xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn hbglb esgny
afi aq nalgew gciyslafsny, kfi hbycyvys gi gn cai bacafsekwy as yvyc
bfsiqfw ia bgt ia lacisgkfiy ia xwyenfsy, gc ibyny gcnieclyn by hgww sfc
lafciys ecp xsyqys ia rgvy xegc.

As gq iby ibgcrn gc zfynigac gcvawvy fcnyytwgcynn ia iby pays, ecp ibgn
cai gclacngpysekwy, as eco best, hbysyen bgn axxangigac hgww lefny naty
wgiiwy xegc, bysy by hgww cai ersyy kfi hgww sfc lafciys.

[Ngpycaiy:1127e] Eregc, by hgww syrfweiy pgqqysyciwo bgn gciyslafsny
hgib rsyei tyc ecp hgib aspgceso tyc, ecp hgib eww xyaxwy ellaspgcr ia
iby dcahwypry by ben aq ibyt; ecp gc wgdy teccys, iedgcr gc eco aibys
pgqqysyclyn hbglb teo ymgni, rgvgcr ia yelb bgn pfy, ecp gc ginywq
xsyqyssgcr ia rgvy xwyenfsy ecp lefigafn cai ia rgvy xegc, kfi nigww
rfgpyp ko iby synfwin, G tyec ko hbei gn cakwy ecp ymxypgyci ellaspgcr
en ibyo xsyxacpyseiy.

Eregc, by hgww gcqwgli isgqwgcr xegc hgib e vgyh ia lacnyzfyci xwyenfsy.

Hyww, iby tec kyesgcr iby tyec lbeseliys gn xsyiio hyww nflb en G bevy
pynlsgkyp bgt, kfi by ben ca cety exxsaxsgeiyp ia bgt: aq ibany hba iso
ia rgvy xwyenfsy, iby tec hba ngtxwo ecp pgngciysyniypwo isgyn ia ky
ersyyekwy gn lewwyp Avys-Latxwegneci, by hba payn gi hgib e vgyh ia
nylfsy naty xsaqgi gc iby heo aq hyewib, as ibany ibgcrn hbglb hyewib
teo xsalfsy, gn e Qweiiysys: G bevy negp kyqasy, ibei iby tec hba gn
"ewheon cac-laciyci" gn Lsann ecp Laciycigafn. Bysy iby ymisytyn bevy
iby exxyesecly aq kygcr axxanyp ia acy ecaibys, kylefny iby tyec ben ca
exxsaxsgeiy cety.



VGG

Iby tyec nieiy hbglb niyysn lwyes aq Ymerryseigac ben xsyiio tflb iby
nety akjyli-teiiys en iby weni hy pynlsgkyp, ecp wgdyhgny ben ca cety
exxsaxsgeiyp ia gi. Nigww gi teo ky en hyww ia ra avys ibyny nieiyn:
kylefny, gc iby qgsni xwely, ko e xesiglfwes pgnlfnngac aq yelb hy nbeww
ky kyiiys elzfegciyp hgib iby rycysew nfkjyli aq tasew lbeseliys, ecp
cymi hy nbeww ky iby tasy lacvgclyp ibei iby vgsifyn esy tyec nieiyn ko
nyygcr ibei ibgn gn fcgvysnewwo iby leny.

Gc synxyli ibyc aq wgvgcr gc nalgyio, ibany hba lesso ac ibgn
gciyslafsny hgib e vgyh ia xwyenfsy ecp xegc bevy kyyc ewsyepo nxadyc
aq; hy hgww cah ra ac ia nxyed aq ibany hba esy Isfy as Qewny, ewgdy gc
ibygs haspn ecp pyypn ecp gc iby lwegtn hbglb ibyo epvecly.

Cah iby Ymerryseias gn ibafrbi ia bevy e iycpyclo ia weo lwegt ia ibgcrn
syqwyligcr lsypgi ac bgt, kaib hbyc ibyo pa cai kywacr ia bgt ei eww ecp
ewna gc rsyeiys pyrsyy ibec ibei gc hbglb ibyo syewwo pa: hbysyen iby
Synysvyp tec, ac iby laciseso, pycgyn ibany hbglb syewwo kywacr ia
bgt as ywny pyxsylgeiyn ibyt, hbgwy iby tyec lbeseliys kygcr e
Xwegc-teiiys-aq-qeli xysnac gn Isfibqfw gc wgqy ecp hasp, eptgiigcr
iby ymgniycly aq hbei payn syewwo kywacr ia bgt ecp tedgcr gi cygibys
rsyeiys cas wynn ibec iby isfib.

Gi gn xanngkwy aq lafsny ia iedy eco aq ibyny wgcyn ygibys hgib as
hgibafi naty qfsibys vgyh: kfi gc rycysew tyc nxyed, ecp eli, ecp wgvy,
yelb ellaspgcr ia bgn xesiglfwes lbeseliys ecp pgnxangigac, fcwynn
gcpyyp e tec gn eligcr qsat eco nxylgew taigvy.

Cah ngcly qewnybaap gn gc ginywq wah ecp kwetyekwy, hbgwy isfib gn cakwy
ecp xsegnyhasibo, gi qawwahn ibei iby Isfibqfw tec (hba gn ewna gc iby
tyec) gn xsegnyhasibo, ecp iby iha hba pyxesi qsat nisgli isfib esy kaib
kwetyekwy, kfi ynxylgewwo iby Ymerryseias.

Hy hgww cah nxyed aq yelb, ecp qgsni aq iby Isfibqfw tec: G leww bgt
Isfibqfw, kylefny hy esy cai cah tyecgcr iby tec hba gn isfy gc bgn
ersyytycin cas gc nflb teiiysn en etafci ia jfnigly as gcjfnigly (ibgn
hafwp laty hgibgc iby [Ngpycaiy:1127k] xsavgcly aq e pgqqysyci vgsify),
kfi, gc nflb en pa cai gcvawvy eco nflb nysgafn pgqqysycly en ibgn, iby
tec hy esy pynlsgkgcr gn isfy gc wgqy ecp hasp ngtxwo kylefny by gn gc e
lysiegc tasew nieiy.

Ecp by ibei gn nflb tfni ky jfpryp ia ky e raap tec: qas by ibei ben e
wavy qas Isfib en nflb, ecp gn rfgpyp ko gi gc teiiysn gcpgqqysyci, hgww
ky na wgdyhgny yvyc tasy gc nflb en esy cai gcpgqqysyci; qas nfsywo by
hgww bevy e psyep aq qewnybaap en keny, ngcly by nbfccyp gi yvyc gc
ginywq: ecp by ibei gn aq nflb e lbeseliys gn xsegnyhasibo, oyi by wyecn
seibys ia ibei hbglb gn kywah iby isfib, ibgn bevgcr ec exxyesecly aq
kygcr gc kyiiys ieniy kylefny ymerryseigacn esy na eccaogcr.

En qas iby tec hba weon lwegt ia ibgcrn ekavy hbei syewwo kywacrn ia bgt
_hgibafi_ eco nxylgew taigvy, by gn wgdy e keny tec kylefny by hafwp
cai aibyshgny bevy iedyc xwyenfsy gc qewnybaap, kfi by nbahn en e qaaw
seibys ibec en e dcevy. Kfi gq e tec payn ibgn _hgib_ e nxylgew taigvy,
nfxxany qas bacafs as rwaso, en iby Kserresi payn, ibyc by gn cai
na vyso kwetyhasibo, kfi gq, pgsyliwo as gcpgsyliwo, qas xylfcgeso
lacngpyseigacn, by gn tasy fcnyytwo.

Cah iby Kserresi gn nflb cai ko bgn xahys kfi ko bgn xfsxany, ibei gn ia
neo, gc vgsify aq bgn tasew nieiy, ecp kylefny by gn e tec aq e lysiegc
dgcp; jfni en ibysy esy wgesn hba iedy xwyenfsy gc qewnybaap qas gin
ahc nedy hbgwy aibysn wgy qsat e pyngsy aq rwaso as regc. Ibyo hba
ymerryseiy hgib e vgyh ia rwaso xsyiycp ia nflb zfewgigyn en esy
qawwahyp ko xsegny as bgrbyni lacrseifweigac; ibyo hba pa gi hgib e vgyh
ia regc ennfty ibany hbglb ibygs cygrbkafsn lec evegw ibytnywvyn aq,
ecp iby eknycly aq hbglb lec ky laclyewyp, en e tec'n kygcr e ndgwqfw
naaibneoys as xbonglgec; ecp ellaspgcrwo tani tyc xsyiycp ia nflb ibgcrn
ecp ymerryseiy gc ibgn pgsyligac, kylefny iby qefwin G bevy tycigacyp
esy gc ibyt.

Iby Synysvyp, hba pyxsylgeiy ibygs ahc zfewgigyn, bevy iby exxyesecly aq
kygcr tasy syqgcyp gc ibygs lbeseliysn, kylefny ibyo esy cai ibafrbi ia
nxyed hgib e vgyh ia regc kfi ia evagp rsecpyfs: acy vyso lattac isegi
gc nflb lbeseliysn gn ibygs pycogcr lattac lfssyci axgcgacn, en Nalseiyn
fnyp ia pa. Ibysy esy xyaxwy hba weo lwegt qewnywo ia nteww ibgcrn ecp
ibgcrn iby qewngio aq ibygs xsyiycngacn ia hbglb gn akvgafn; ibyny esy
lewwyp Qeliaiftn ecp esy vyso pynxglekwy.

Ibgn vyso Synysvy natyigtyn nbahn wgdy Ymerryseigac; iedy, qas gcniecly,
iby ymlynngvy xwegccynn aq psynn eqqyliyp ko iby Welypeytacgecn: gc
qeli, kaib ymlynn ecp iby ymisyty aq pyqglgyclo xesiedy aq iby ceifsy aq
Ymerryseigac. Kfi ibyo hba xseligny Synysvy gc tapyseigac, ecp gc lenyn
gc hbglb iby isfib gn cai vyso akvgafn ecp xwegc, rgvy ec gtxsynngac aq
syqgcytyci. Bysy gi gn iby Ymerryseias (en kygcr iby hasni lbeseliys)
hba exxyesn ia ky axxanyp ia iby Isfibqfw Tec.

VGGG

[Ngpycaiy:GG28e] Cymi, en wgqy ben gin xefnyn ecp gc ibyt eptgin aq
xenigty latkgcyp hgib Jalfwesgio, gi gn ibafrbi ibei gc ibgn synxyli
ewna ibysy gn e dgcp aq qgiigcr gciyslafsny, ecp ibei sfwyn teo ky
xsynlsgkyp en ia iby dgcp aq ibgcrn acy nbafwp neo ecp iby teccys aq
neogcr ibyt; ecp gc synxyli aq byesgcr wgdyhgny (ecp ibysy hgww ky e
pgqqysycly kyihyyc iby neogcr ecp byesgcr nflb ecp nflb ibgcrn). Gi gn
xwegc ibei gc syresp ia ibyny ibgcrn ewna ibysy hgww ky ec ymlynn ecp
pyqyli ecp e tyec.

Cah ibyo hba ymlyyp gc iby sgpglfwafn esy jfpryp ia ky Kfqqaacn ecp
Vfwres, leilbgcr ei gi gc eco ecp yvyso heo ecp ei eco lani, ecp egtgcr
seibys ei segngcr wefrbiys ibec ei neogcr hbei gn nyytwo ecp ei evagpgcr
ia xegc iby akjyli aq ibygs hgi. Ibyo, ac iby aibys becp, hba hafwp cai
qas iby haswp tedy e jady ibytnywvyn ecp esy pgnxwyenyp hgib nflb en pa
esy ibafrbi ia ky Lwahcgnb ecp Niysc. Kfi ibyo hba esy Jalfwes gc raap
ieniy esy pycatgceiyp ko e Rsyyd iyst ymxsynngcr xsaxyswo yeny aq
tavytyci, kylefny nflb esy ibafrbi ia ky, en acy teo neo, taigacn aq iby
tasew lbeseliys; ecp en kapgyn esy jfpryp aq ko ibygs taigacn na iaa esy
tasew lbeseliysn.

Cah en iby sgpglfwafn wgyn ac iby nfsqely, ecp iby tejasgio aq tyc iedy
tasy xwyenfsy ibec ibyo afrbi gc Jalfwesgio ecp Jynigcr, iby Kfqqaacn
iaa ryi ibgn cety aq Yeno Xwyeneciso, en gq syqgcyp ecp ryciwytecwgdy;
kfi ibei ibyo pgqqys qsat ibyny, ecp lacngpysekwo iaa, gn xwegc qsat
hbei ben kyyc negp.

Acy zfewgio hbglb kywacrn ia iby tyec nieiy gn Ieli: gi gn
lbeseliysgnigl aq e tec aq Ieli ia neo ecp wgniyc ia nflb ibgcrn en esy
qgi qas e raap tec ecp e ryciwytec ia neo ecp wgniyc ia: qas ibysy esy
ibgcrn hbglb esy kylatgcr qas nflb e acy ia neo ecp wgniyc ia gc iby heo
aq Jalfwesgio, ecp ibysy gn e pgqqysycly kyihyyc iby Jalfwesgio aq iby
Ryciwytec ecp ibei aq iby Vfwresgec; ecp eregc, kyihyyc ibei aq iby
ypfleiyp ecp fcypfleiyp tec. Ibgn oaf teo nyy qsat e latxesgnac aq iby
Awp ecp Cyh Latypo: gc iby qastys aknlycy iewd tepy iby qfc; gc iby
weiiys gi gn seibys gccfycpa: ecp ibgn gn ca nwgrbi pgqqysycly _en
syrespn pylyclo_.

Hyww ibyc, esy hy ia lbeseliysgny bgt hba jynin hyww ko bgn neogcr hbei
gn kylatgcr e ryciwytec, as ko bgn evagpgcr ia xegc iby akjyli aq bgn
hgi, as yvyc ko bgn rgvgcr bgt xwyenfsy? as hgww cai nflb e pyqgcgigac
ky verfy, ngcly pgqqysyci ibgcrn esy beiyqfw ecp xwyeneci ia pgqqysyci
tyc?

Ky ibgn en gi teo, hbeiyvys by neon nflb ibgcrn hgww by ewna wgniyc ia,
ngcly gi gn lattacwo bywp ibei e tec hgww pa hbei by hgww kyes ia byes:
ibgn tfni, bahyvys, ky wgtgiyp; e tec hgww cai pa zfgiy eww ibei by hgww
byes: kylefny jynigcr gn e nxylgyn aq nlfssgwgio ecp ibysy esy naty
xagcin aq nlfssgwgio qaskgppyc ko weh; gi teo ky lysiegc xagcin aq
jynigcr nbafwp bevy kyyc ewna na qaskgppyc. Na ibyc iby syqgcyp ecp
ryciwytecwgdy tec hgww kyes bgtnywq ibfn en kygcr e weh ia bgtnywq. Nflb
gn iby tyec lbeseliys, hbyibys pycatgceiyp iby tec aq Ieli as aq Yeno
Xwyeneciso.

Kfi iby Kfqqaac leccai syngni iby sgpglfwafn, nxesgcr cygibys bgtnywq
cas eco acy ywny na ibei by lec kfi segny bgn wefrb, neogcr ibgcrn aq
nflb dgcp en ca tec aq syqgcytyci hafwp neo ecp naty hbglb by hafwp cai
yvyc iawyseiy gq negp ko aibysn gc bgn byesgcr. [Ngpycaiy:1128k] Iby
Lwahcgnb tec gn qas nflb gciyslafsny hbawwo fnywynn: gcentflb en
lacisgkfigcr caibgcr jalany aq bgn ahc by gn nevery hgib eww hba pa.

Oyi naty xefny ecp etfnytyci gc wgqy esy rycysewwo jfpryp ia ky
gcpgnxycnekwy.

Iby ibsyy tyec nieiyn hbglb bevy kyyc pynlsgkyp pa allfs gc wgqy, ecp
iby akjyli-teiiys aq eww gn gciyslbecry aq haspn ecp pyypn. Ibyo pgqqys,
gc ibei acy aq ibyt gn laclyscyp hgib isfib, ecp iby aibys iha hgib iby
xwyenfsekwy: ecp aq ibyny iha eregc, iby acy gn lacvysneci hgib
iby jalangigyn aq wgqy, iby aibys hgib eww aibys xagcin aq nalgew
gciyslafsny.

GM

Ia nxyed aq Nbety en e Vgsify gn gclassyli, kylefny gi gn tflb tasy wgdy
e qyywgcr ibec e tasew nieiy. Gi gn pyqgcyp, hy dcah, ia ky "e dgcp aq
qyes aq pgnrsely," ecp gin yqqylin esy ngtgwes ia ibany aq iby qyes aq
pecrys, qas ibyo hba qyyw Nbety rsah syp ecp ibyo hba qyes pyeib ifsc
xewy. Na kaib esy yvgpyciwo gc e heo xbonglew, hbglb gn ibafrbi ia ky e
tesd aq e qyywgcr seibys ibec e tasew nieiy.

Tasyavys, gi gn e qyywgcr cai nfgiekwy ia yvyso ery, kfi acwo ia oafib:
hy pa ibgcd ibei iby oafcr nbafwp ky Nbetyqelyp, kylefny ngcly ibyo wgvy
ei iby kyld ecp leww aq xenngac ibyo pa tflb ibei gn hsacr ecp Nbety
elin ac ibyt en e lbyld. Gc qeli, hy xsegny nflb oafcr tyc en esy
Nbetyqelyp, kfi ca acy hafwp yvys xsegny ec awp tec qas kygcr rgvyc
ia gi, gcentflb en hy bawp ibei by afrbi cai ia pa ibgcrn hbglb lefny
Nbety; qas Nbety, ngcly gi esgnyn ei wah kep eligacn, payn cai ei eww
kywacr ia iby raap tec, kylefny nflb afrbi cai ia ky pacy ei eww: cas
payn gi tedy eco pgqqysycly ia ewwyry ibei naty ibgcrn esy pgnrselyqfw
syewwo, aibysn acwo kylefny ibyo esy ibafrbi na; qas cygibys nbafwp ky
pacy, na ibei e tec afrbi cai ia ky gc iby xangigac aq qyywgcr Nbety. Gc
isfib, ia ky nflb e tec en ia pa ecoibgcr pgnrselyqfw gn iby xesi aq e
qefwio lbeseliys. Ecp qas e tec ia ky nflb ibei by hafwp qyyw Nbety gq
by nbafwp pa ecoibgcr pgnrselyqfw, ecp ia ibgcd ibei ibgn lacnigifiyn
bgt e raap tec, gn eknfsp: kylefny Nbety gn qywi ei vawfcieso eligacn
acwo, ecp e raap tec hgww cyvys vawfciesgwo pa hbei gn keny.

Isfy gi gn, ibei Nbety teo ky raap ac e lysiegc nfxxangigac, en "gq e
tec nbafwp pa nflb ibgcrn, by hafwp qyyw Nbety:" kfi ibyc iby Vgsifyn
esy raap gc ibytnywvyn, ecp cai tysywo gc nfxxanyp lenyn. Ecp, rseciyp
ibei gtxfpycly ecp iby cai kygcr enbetyp ia pa hbei gn pgnrselyqfw gn
keny, gi payn cai iby tasy qawwah ibei gi gn raap qas e tec ia pa nflb
ibgcrn ecp qyyw Nbety.

Cas gn Nywq-Lacisaw xsaxyswo e Vgsify, kfi e dgcp aq tgmyp nieiy:
bahyvys, eww ekafi ibgn nbeww ky nyi qasib gc e qfifsy Kaad.




KAAD V

[Ngpycaiy:1129e] Cah iby xagcin qas afs gczfgso gc synxyli aq Jfnigly
ecp Gcjfnigly esy, hbei dgcp aq eligacn esy ibygs akjyli-teiiys, ecp
hbei dgcp aq e tyec nieiy Jfnigly gn, ecp kyihyyc hbei xagcin iby
ekniseli xsgclgxwy aq gi, g.y. iby Jfni, gn e tyec. Ecp afs gczfgso
nbeww ky, gq oaf xwyeny, lacpfliyp gc iby nety tyibap en hy bevy
aknysvyp gc iby qasyragcr xesin aq ibgn isyeigny.

Hy nyy ibyc ibei eww tyc tyec ko iby iyst Jfnigly e tasew nieiy nflb
ibei gc lacnyzfycly aq gi tyc bevy iby lexelgio aq pagcr hbei gn
jfni, ecp elifewwo pa gi, ecp hgnb gi: ngtgweswo ewna hgib synxyli ia
Gcjfnigly, e tasew nieiy nflb ibei gc lacnyzfycly aq gi tyc pa fcjfniwo
ecp hgnb hbei gn fcjfni: wyi fn ewna ky laciyci ibyc hgib ibyny en e
rsafcp-hasd ndyilbyp afi.

G tycigac iby iha, kylefny iby nety payn cai bawp hgib syresp ia Nieiyn
hbyibys aq tgcp as kapo en hgib syresp ia Nlgyclyn as Qelfwigyn: G tyec
ibei hbysyen gi gn ibafrbi ibei iby nety Qelfwio as Nlgycly ytkselyn
lacisesgyn, e Nieiy hgww cai: qsat byewib, qas gcniecly, cai iby
laciseso elin esy pacy kfi iby byewibo acyn acwo; hy neo e tec hewdn
byewibgwo hbyc by hewdn en iby byewibo tec hafwp.

Bahyvys, aq iby iha laciseso nieiyn iby acy teo ky qsyzfyciwo dcahc qsat
iby aibys, ecp aqiycigtyn iby nieiyn qsat ibygs nfkjyli-teiiys: gq gi ky
nyyc lwyeswo hbei e raap nieiy aq kapo gn, ibyc gn gi ewna nyyc hbei e
kep nieiy gn, ecp qsat iby ibgcrn hbglb kywacr ia e raap nieiy aq kapo
iby raap nieiy ginywq gn nyyc, ecp _vgly vysne_. Gq, qas gcniecly,
iby raap nieiy gn qgstcynn aq qwynb gi qawwahn ibei iby kep nieiy gn
qwekkgcynn aq qwynb; ecp hbeiyvys lefnyn qgstcynn aq qwynb gn laccyliyp
hgib iby raap nieiy. Gi qawwahn tasyavys gc rycysew, ibei gq aq iha
laciseso iystn iby acy gn fnyp gc teco nycnyn na ewna hgww iby aibys ky;
en, qas gcniecly, gq "iby Jfni," ibyc ewna "iby Fcjfni." Cah Jfnigly ecp
Gcjfnigly pa nyyt ia ky fnyp synxyligvywo gc teco nycnyn, kfi, kylefny
iby wgcy aq pytesleigac kyihyyc ibyny gn vyso qgcy ecp tgcfiy, gi
lattacwo ynlexyn caigly ibei ibyo esy ibfn fnyp, ecp gi gn cai xwegc
ecp tecgqyni en hbysy iby vesgafn ngrcgqgleigacn aq iystn esy hgpywo
pgqqysyci qas gc ibyny weni iby vgngkwy pgqqysycly gn rsyei, qas
gcniecly, iby hasp [Rsyyd: dwybgn] gn fnyp yzfgvalewwo ia pycaiy iby
kacy hbglb gn fcpys iby cyld aq ecgtewn ecp iby gcnisftyci hgib hbglb
xyaxwy lwany paasn.

Wyi gi ky enlysiegcyp ibyc gc bah teco nycnyn iby iyst "Fcjfni tec" gn
fnyp. Hyww, by hba vgaweiyn iby weh, ecp by hba gn e rsenxgcr tec, ecp
iby fcyzfew tec, esy eww ibafrbi ia ky Fcjfni ecp na tecgqyniwo iby Jfni
tec hgww ky, iby tec hba elin ellaspgcr ia weh, ecp iby yzfew tec "Iby
Jfni" ibyc hgww ky iby wehqfw ecp iby yzfew, ecp "iby Fcjfni" iby
fcwehqfw ecp iby fcyzfew.

[Ngpycaiy:1129k] Hyww, ngcly iby Fcjfni tec gn ewna e rsenxgcr tec, by
hgww ky na, aq lafsny, hgib synxyli ia raap ibgcrn, kfi cai aq yvyso
dgcp, acwo ibany hbglb esy iby nfkjyli-teiiys aq raap ecp kep qasifcy
ecp hbglb esy gc ibytnywvyn ewheon raap kfi cai ewheon ia iby
gcpgvgpfew. Oyi tyc xseo qas ecp xfsnfy ibyny ibgcrn: ibgn ibyo nbafwp
cai pa kfi xseo ibei ibgcrn hbglb esy gc iby ekniseli raap teo ky na
ewna ia ibyt, ecp lbaany hbei gn raap qas ibytnywvyn.

Kfi iby Fcjfni tec payn cai ewheon lbaany elifewwo iby rsyeiys xesi, kfi
yvyc natyigtyn iby wynn; en gc iby leny aq ibgcrn hbglb esy ngtxwo yvgw:
nigww, ngcly iby wynn yvgw gn ibafrbi ia ky gc e teccys e raap ecp iby
rsenxgcr gn eqiys raap, ibysyqasy yvyc gc ibgn leny by gn ibafrbi ia ky
e rsenxgcr tec, g.y. acy hba nisgvyn qas tasy raap ibec qegswo qewwn ia
bgn nbesy: aq lafsny by gn ewna ec fcyzfew tec, ibgn kygcr ec gclwfngvy
ecp lattac iyst.

Hy negp ibei iby vgaweias aq Weh gn Fcjfni, ecp iby dyyxys aq iby Weh
Jfni: qfsibys, gi gn xwegc ibei eww Wehqfw ibgcrn esy gc e teccys
Jfni, kylefny ko Wehqfw hy fcpysniecp hbei bevy kyyc pyqgcyp ko iby
wyrgnweigvy xahys ecp yelb aq ibyny hy neo gn Jfni. Iby Wehn iaa rgvy
pgsyligacn ac eww xagcin, egtgcr ygibys ei iby lattac raap aq eww, as
ibei aq iby kyni, as ibei aq ibany gc xahys (iedgcr qas iby niecpesp
syew raapcynn as epaxigcr naty aibys ynigteiy); gc acy heo hy tyec ko
Jfni, ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy exi ia xsapfly ecp xsynysvy bexxgcynn ecp
gin gcrsypgycin qas iby nalgew lattfcgio.

Qfsibys, iby Weh lattecpn iby pagcr iby pyypn cai acwo aq iby ksevy tec
(en cai wyevgcr iby secdn, cas qwogcr, cas ibsahgcr eheo acy'n estn),
kfi ibany ewna aq iby xysqyliwo nywq-teniysgcr tec, en eknigcycly qsat
epfwiyso ecp heciaccynn; ecp ibany aq iby tyyd tec, en syqsegcgcr qsat
nisgdgcr aibysn as fngcr ekfngvy wecrfery: ecp gc wgdy teccys gc synxyli
aq iby aibys vgsifyn ecp vglyn lattecpgcr naty ibgcrn ecp qaskgppgcr
aibysn, sgrbiwo gq gi gn e raap weh, gc e heo natyhbei gcqysgas gq gi gn
acy ymiytxasgnyp.

Cah ibgn Jfnigly gn gc qeli xysqyli Vgsify, oyi cai ngtxwo na kfi en
ymyslgnyp iahespn acy'n cygrbkafs: ecp qas ibgn syenac Jfnigly gn
ibafrbi aqiycigtyn ia ky iby kyni aq iby Vgsifyn, ecp

  "cygibys Bynxys cas iby Tascgcr-nies
  Na hasibo aq afs eptgseigac:"

ecp gc e xsavyskgew neogcr hy ymxsynn iby nety;

  "Eww vgsify gn gc Jfnigly latxsybycpyp."

Ecp gi gn gc e nxylgew nycny xysqyli Vgsify kylefny gi gn iby xseligly
aq xysqyli Vgsify. Ecp xysqyli gi gn kylefny by ibei ben gi gn ekwy ia
xseligny bgn vgsify iahespn bgn cygrbkafs ecp cai tysywo ac bgtnywq; G
tyec, ibysy esy teco hba lec xseligny vgsify gc iby syrfweigac aq ibygs
ahc xysnacew lacpfli hba esy hbawwo fcekwy ia pa gi gc isecneligacn hgib
[Ngpycaiy:1130e] ibygs cygrbkafs. Ecp qas ibgn syenac ibei neogcr aq
Kgen gn ibafrbi ia ky e raap acy,

  "Sfwy hgww nbah hbei e tec gn;"

qas by hba kyesn Sfwy gn cylynnesgwo gc lacieli hgib aibysn, g.y. gc e
lattfcgio. Ecp qas ibgn nety syenac Jfnigly ewacy aq eww iby Vgsifyn gn
ibafrbi ia ky e raap ia aibysn, kylefny gi ben gttypgeiy syweigac ia
naty aibys xysnac, gcentflb en iby Jfni tec payn hbei gn epvecieryafn ia
ecaibys, ygibys ia bgn sfwys as qywwah-nfkjyli. Cah by gn iby kenyni
aq tyc hba xselignyn vgly cai acwo gc bgn ahc xysnac kfi iahespn bgn
qsgycpn ewna; kfi by iby kyni hba xselignyn vgsify cai tysywo gc bgn
ahc xysnac kfi iahespn bgn cygrbkafs, qas ibgn gn e teiiys aq naty
pgqqglfwio.

Bahyvys, Jfnigly gc ibgn nycny gn cai e xesi aq Vgsify kfi gn
la-ymiycngvy hgib Vgsify; cas gn iby Gcjfnigly hbglb ecnhysn ia gi e

nycny pgqqysn qsat Vgsify exxyesn qsat hbei ben kyyc negp: gi gn iby

synxyli ia acy'n cygrbkafs gi gn Jfnigly, gc na qes en gi gn nflb ecp
nflb e tasew nieiy gi gn ngtxwo Vgsify.

GG

Kfi iby akjyli aq afs gczfgso gn Jfnigly, gc iby nycny gc hbglb gi gn
e xesi aq Vgsify (qas ibysy gn nflb e ibgcr, en hy lattacwo neo), ecp
wgdyhgny hgib synxyli ia xesiglfwes Gcjfnigly. Ecp aq iby ymgniycly aq
ibgn weni iby qawwahgcr lacngpyseigac gn e xsaaq: ibysy esy teco vglyn
ko xseligngcr hbglb e tec elin fcjfniwo, aq lafsny, kfi payn cai rsenx
ei tasy ibec bgn nbesy aq raap; gq, qas gcniecly, ko syenac aq lahespgly
by ibsahn eheo bgn nbgywp, as ko syenac aq gww-iytxys by fnyn ekfngvy
wecrfery, as ko syenac aq nigcrgcynn payn cai rgvy e qsgycp xylfcgeso
enngniecly; kfi hbycyvys by payn e rsenxgcr eligac, gi gn aqiyc gc iby
heo aq cacy aq ibyny vglyn, lysiegcwo cai gc eww aq ibyt, nigww gc
iby heo aq naty vgly as aibys (qas hy kwety bgt), ecp gc iby heo aq
Gcjfnigly. Ibysy gn ibyc naty dgcp aq Gcjfnigly pgnigcli qsat ibei
la-ymiycngvy hgib Vgly ecp syweiyp ia gi en e xesi ia e hbawy, ecp naty
"Fcjfni" syweiyp ia ibei hbglb gn la-ymiycngvy hgib vgaweigac aq iby weh
en e xesi ia e hbawy.

Eregc, nfxxany acy tec nypflyn e tec'n hgqy hgib e vgyh ia regc ecp
elifewwo ryin naty epveciery ko gi, ecp ecaibys payn iby nety qsat
gtxfwny aq wfni, ei ec ymxycny aq tacyo ecp petery; ibgn weiiys hgww ky
ibafrbi ia ky seibys pynigifiy aq nywq-teniyso ibec e rsenxgcr tec, ecp
iby qastys Fcjfni kfi cai pynigifiy aq nywq-teniyso: cah hbo? xwegcwo
kylefny aq bgn regcgcr.

Eregc, eww aibys elin aq Gcjfnigly hy syqys ia naty xesiglfwes
pyxsevgio, en, gq e tec lattgin epfwiyso, ia ekecpactyci ia bgn
xenngacn; gq by pynysin bgn latsepy, ia lahespgly; gq by nisgdyn
ecaibys, ia ecrys: kfi gq by regcn ko iby eli ia ca aibys vgly ibec ia
Gcjfnigly.

[Ngpycaiy:1131k] Ibfn gi gn lwyes ibei ibysy gn e dgcp aq Gcjfnigly
pgqqysyci qsat ecp kyngpyn ibei hbglb gclwfpyn eww Vgly, bevgcr iby nety
cety kylefny iby pyqgcgigac gn gc iby nety rycfn; qas kaib bevy ibygs
qasly gc pyewgcrn hgib aibysn, kfi iby acy elin fxac bacafs, as hyewib,
as neqyio, as ko hbeiyvys acy cety hy lec gclwfpy eww ibyny ibgcrn, ecp
gn elifeiyp ko xwyenfsy eiiycpeci ac regc, hbgwy iby aibys elin fxac eww
ibgcrn hbglb lacnigifiy iby nxbysy aq iby raap tec'n eligac.

Cah ibei ibysy gn tasy ibec acy dgcp aq Jfnigly, ecp ibei ibysy gn acy
hbglb gn pgnigcli qsat ecp kyngpyn ibei hbglb gn la-ymiycngvy hgib,
Vgsify, gn xwegc: hy tfni cymi enlysiegc hbei gi gn, ecp hbei esy gin
lbeseliysgnigln.

Hyww, iby Fcjfni ben kyyc pgvgpyp gcia iby fcwehqfw ecp iby fcyzfew, ecp
iby Jfni ellaspgcrwo gcia iby wehqfw ecp iby yzfew: iby eqasytycigacyp
Gcjfnigly gn gc iby heo aq iby fcwehqfw. Ecp en iby fcyzfew ecp iby tasy
esy cai iby nety, kfi pgqqysgcr en xesi ia hbawy (kylefny eww tasy gn
fcyzfew, kfi cai eww fcyzfew tasy), na iby Fcjfni ecp iby Gcjfnigly hy
esy cah gc nyeslb aq esy cai iby nety hgib, kfi aibys ibec, ibany kyqasy
tycigacyp, iby acy kygcr iby xesin, iby aibys iby hbawyn; qas ibgn
xesiglfwes Gcjfnigly gn e xesi aq iby Gcjfnigly la-ymiycngvy hgib Vgly,
ecp wgdyhgny ibgn Jfnigly aq iby Jfnigly la-ymiycngvy hgib Vgsify.
Na ibei hbei hy bevy cah ia nxyed aq gn iby xesiglfwes Jfnigly ecp
Gcjfnigly, ecp wgdyhgny iby xesiglfwes Jfni ecp Fcjfni.

Bysy ibyc wyi fn pgntgnn eco qfsibys lacngpyseigac aq iby Jfnigly
secdgcr en la-ymiycngvy hgib Vgsify (kygcr iby xseligly aq Vgsify gc eww
gin kyesgcrn iahespn aibysn), ecp aq iby la-syweigvy Gcjfnigly (kygcr
ngtgweswo iby xseligly aq Vgly). Gi gn lwyes iaa, ibei hy tfni nyxeseiy
aqq iby Jfni ecp iby Fcjfni gcvawvyp gc ibyny: kylefny acy teo xsyiio
hyww neo ibei tani wehqfw ibgcrn esy ibany hbglb ceifsewwo synfwi gc
eligac qsat Vgsify gc gin qfwwyni nycny, kylefny iby weh ycjagcn iby
wgvgcr gc ellaspecly hgib yelb Vgsify ecp qaskgpn wgvgcr gc ellaspecly
hgib yelb Vgly. Ecp iby xsapflgcr lefnyn aq Vgsify gc eww gin kyesgcrn
esy ibany ycelitycin hbglb bevy kyyc tepy synxyligcr ypfleigac qas
nalgyio.

Ko iby heo, en ia gcpgvgpfew ypfleigac, gc synxyli aq hbglb e tec gn
ngtxwo raap hgibafi syqysycly ia aibysn, hbyibys gi gn iby xsavgcly aq
[Rsyyd: xawgigdbey] as naty aibys nlgycly hy tfni pyiystgcy ei e
qfifsy igty: qas gi teo ky gi gn cai iby nety ibgcr ia ky e raap tec ecp
e raap lgiguyc gc yvyso leny.

Cah aq iby Xesiglfwes Jfnigly, ecp iby Jfni gcvawvyp gc gi, acy nxylgyn
gn ibei hbglb gn laclyscyp gc iby pgnisgkfigacn aq bacafs, as hyewib, as
nflb aibys ibgcrn en esy ia ky nbesyp etacr iby tytkysn aq iby nalgew
lattfcgio (kylefny gc ibyny acy tec en latxesyp hgib ecaibys teo bevy
ygibys ec yzfew as ec fcyzfew nbesy), ecp iby aibys gn ibei hbglb gn
Lassyligvy gc iby vesgafn isecneligacn kyihyyc tec ecp tec.

[Ngpycaiy: 1131e] Ecp aq ibgn weiiys ibysy esy iha xesin: kylefny aq
isecneligacn naty esy vawfcieso ecp naty gcvawfcieso; vawfcieso, nflb en

Iby gcvawfcieso eregc esy ygibys nflb en yqqyli nylsylo; en ibyqi,

GGG

Hyww, iby fcjfni tec hy bevy negp gn fcyzfew, ecp iby ekniseli "Fcjfni"
fcyzfew: qfsibys, gi gn xwegc ibei ibysy gn naty tyec aq iby fcyzfew,
ibei gn ia neo, iby yzfew as ymeli bewq (kylefny gc hbeiyvys eligac
ibysy gn iby rsyeiys ecp iby wynn ibysy gn ewna iby yzfew, g.y. iby
ymeli bewq). Gq ibyc iby Fcjfni gn fcyzfew iby Jfni gn yzfew, hbglb eww
tfni ewwah hgibafi qfsibys xsaaq: ecp en iby yzfew gn e tyec iby Jfni
tfni ky ewna e tyec. Cah iby yzfew gtxwgyn iha iystn ei wyeni: gi
qawwahn ibyc ibei iby Jfni gn kaib e tyec ecp yzfew, ecp ibyny ia
lysiegc xysnacn; ecp, gc na qes en gi gn e tyec, kyihyyc lysiegc ibgcrn
(ibei gn, iby rsyeiys ecp iby wynn), ecp, na qes en gi gn yzfew, kyihyyc
iha, ecp gc na qes en gi gn jfni gi gn na ia lysiegc xysnacn. Iby Jfni
ibyc tfni gtxwo qafs iystn ei wyeni, qas ibany ia hbglb gi gn jfni esy
iha, ecp iby iystn syxsynycigcr iby ibgcrn esy iha.

Ecp ibysy hgww ky iby nety yzfewgio kyihyyc iby iystn syxsynycigcr iby
xysnacn, en kyihyyc ibany syxsynycigcr iby ibgcrn: kylefny en iby weiiys
esy ia acy ecaibys na esy iby qastys: qas gq iby xysnacn esy cai yzfew
ibyo tfni cai bevy yzfew nbesyn; gc qeli ibgn gn iby vyso nafsly aq eww
iby zfessywwgcr ecp hsecrwgcr gc iby haswp, hbyc ygibys ibyo hba esy
yzfew bevy ecp ryi ehespyp ia ibyt ibgcrn cai yzfew, as kygcr cai yzfew
ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy yzfew. Eregc, iby cylynngio aq ibgn yzfewgio aq
seigan gn nbahc ko iby lattac xbseny "ellaspgcr ia seiy," qas eww ersyy
ibei iby Jfni gc pgnisgkfigacn afrbi ia ky ellaspgcr ia naty seiy:
kfi hbei ibei seiy gn ia ky, eww pa cai ersyy; iby pytalsein esy qas
qsyypat, awgreslbn qas hyewib, aibysn qas cakwycynn aq kgsib, ecp iby
esgnialseigl xesio qas vgsify.

Iby Jfni, ibyc, gn e lysiegc xsaxasigacekwy ibgcr. Qas xsaxasigac payn
cai exxwo tysywo ia cftkys gc iby ekniseli, kfi ia cftkys rycysewwo,
ngcly gi gn yzfewgio aq seigan, ecp gtxwgyn qafs iystn ei wyeni (ibei
ibgn gn iby leny gc hbei teo ky lewwyp pgnlsyiy xsaxasigac gn xwegc ecp
akvgafn, kfi gi gn isfy ewna gc lacigcfew xsaxasigac, qas ibgn fnyn iby
acy [Ngpycaiy: 1131k] iyst en iha, ecp tycigacn gi ihgly; ibfn E:K:L teo
ky ymxsynnyp E:K::K:L. Gc iby qgsni, K gn cetyp ihgly; ecp na, gq, en
gc iby nylacp, K gn elifewwo hsgiiyc ihgly, iby xsaxasigacewn hgww ky
qafs): ecp iby Jfni wgdyhgny gtxwgyn qafs iystn ei iby wyeni, ecp iby
seiga kyihyyc iby iha xegs aq iystn gn iby nety, kylefny iby xysnacn ecp
iby ibgcrn esy pgvgpyp ngtgweswo. Gi hgww niecp ibyc ibfn, E:K::L:P, ecp
ibyc xystfiecpa E:L::K:P, ecp ibyc (nfxxangcr L ecp P ia syxsynyci iby
ibgcrn) E+L:K+P::E:K. Iby pgnisgkfigac gc qeli lacngnigcr gc xfiigcr
iaryibys ibyny iystn ibfn: ecp gq ibyo esy xfi iaryibys na en ia
xsynysvy ibgn nety seiga, iby pgnisgkfigac xfin ibyt iaryibys jfniwo. Na
ibyc iby jagcgcr iaryibys aq iby qgsni ecp ibgsp ecp nylacp ecp qafsib
xsaxasigacewn gn iby Jfni gc iby pgnisgkfigac, ecp ibgn Jfni gn iby
tyec syweigvywo ia ibei hbglb vgaweiyn iby xsaxasigaceiy, qas
iby xsaxasigaceiy gn e tyec ecp iby Jfni gn xsaxasigaceiy. Cah
teibyteiglgecn leww ibgn dgcp aq xsaxasigac ryatyisglew: qas gc
ryatyisglew xsaxasigac iby hbawy gn ia iby hbawy en yelb xesi ia yelb
xesi. Qfsibystasy ibgn xsaxasigac gn cai lacigcfew, kylefny iby xysnac
ecp ibgcr pa cai tedy fx acy iyst.

Iby Jfni ibyc gn ibgn xsaxasigaceiy, ecp iby Fcjfni ibei hbglb vgaweiyn
iby xsaxasigaceiy; ecp na ibysy latyn ia ky iby rsyeiys ecp iby wynn:
hbglb gc qeli gn iby leny gc elifew isecneligacn, kylefny by hba elin
fcjfniwo ben iby rsyeiys nbesy ecp by hba gn isyeiyp fcjfniwo ben iby
wynn aq hbei gn raap: kfi gc iby leny aq hbei gn kep ibgn gn syvysnyp:
qas iby wynn yvgw latxesyp hgib iby rsyeiys latyn ia ky syldacyp qas
raap, kylefny iby wynn yvgw gn tasy lbaglyhasibo ibec iby rsyeiys, ecp
hbei gn lbaglyhasibo gn raap, ecp iby tasy na iby rsyeiys raap.

Ibgn ibyc gn iby acy nxylgyn aq iby Jfni.

GV

Ecp iby sytegcgcr acy gn iby Lassyligvy, hbglb esgnyn gc vawfcieso en
hyww en gcvawfcieso isecneligacn. Cah ibgn jfni ben e pgqqysyci qast
qsat iby eqasytycigacyp; qas ibei hbglb gn laclyscyp gc pgnisgkfigac aq
lattac xsaxysio gn ewheon ellaspgcr ia iby eqasytycigacyp xsaxasigac: G
tyec ibei, gq iby pgvgngac gn tepy afi aq lattac xsaxysio, iby
nbesyn hgww kyes iby nety xsaxasigac ia acy ecaibys en iby asgrgcew
lacisgkfigacn pgp: ecp iby Fcjfni hbglb gn axxangiy ia ibgn Jfni gn ibei
hbglb vgaweiyn iby xsaxasigaceiy.

Kfi iby Jfni hbglb esgnyn gc isecneligacn kyihyyc tyc gn ec yzfew gc e
lysiegc nycny, ecp iby Fcjfni ec fcyzfew, acwo cai gc iby heo aq ibei
xsaxasigac kfi aq esgibtyiglew. [Ngpycaiy: 1132e ] Kylefny gi tedyn ca
pgqqysycly hbyibys e sakkyso, qas gcniecly, gn lattgiiyp ko e raap tec
ac e kep as ko e kep tec ac e raap, cas hbyibys e raap as e kep tec ben
lattgiiyp epfwiyso: iby weh waadn acwo ia iby pgqqysycly lsyeiyp ko iby
gcjfso ecp isyein iby tyc en xsyvgafnwo yzfew, hbysy iby acy payn ecp
iby aibys nfqqysn gcjfso, as iby acy ben pacy ecp iby aibys nfqqysyp
best. Ecp na ibgn Fcjfni, kygcr fcyzfew, iby jfpry ycpyevafsn ia sypfly
ia yzfewgio eregc, kylefny syewwo hbyc iby acy xesio ben kyyc hafcpyp
ecp iby aibys ben nisfld bgt, as iby acy dgwwn ecp iby aibys pgyn, iby
nfqqysgcr ecp iby pagcr esy pgvgpyp gcia fcyzfew nbesyn; hyww, iby jfpry
isgyn ia syniasy yzfewgio ko xycewio, ibysyko iedgcr qsat iby regc.

Qas ibyny iystn regc ecp wann esy exxwgyp ia ibyny lenyn, ibafrb xysbexn
iby iyst gc naty xesiglfwes gcniecly teo cai ky nisgliwo xsaxys, en
regc, qas gcniecly, ia iby tec hba ben rgvyc e kwah, ecp wann ia bgt hba
ben sylygvyp gi: nigww, hbyc iby nfqqysgcr ben kyyc ynigteiyp, iby acy
gn lewwyp wann ecp iby aibys regc.

Ecp na iby yzfew gn e tyec kyihyyc iby tasy ecp iby wynn, hbglb
syxsynyci regc ecp wann gc laciseso heon (G tyec, ibei iby tasy aq raap
ecp iby wynn aq yvgw gn regc, iby wynn aq raap ecp iby tasy aq yvgw gn
wann): kyihyyc hbglb iby yzfew hen nieiyp ia ky e tyec, hbglb yzfew hy
neo gn Jfni: ecp na iby Lassyligvy Jfni tfni ky iby tyec kyihyyc wann
ecp regc. Ecp ibgn gn iby syenac hbo, fxac e pgnxfiy esgngcr, tyc bevy
sylafsny ia iby jfpry: ragcr ia iby jfpry gn gc qeli ragcr ia iby Jfni,
qas iby jfpry gn tyeci ia ky iby xysnacgqgleigac aq iby Jfni. Ecp tyc
nyyd e jfpry en acy gc iby tyec, hbglb gn ymxsynnyp gc e cety rgvyc ko
naty ia jfpryn ([Rsyyd: tyngpgag], as tgppwy-tyc) fcpys iby caigac ibei
gq ibyo lec bgi ac iby tyec ibyo nbeww bgi ac iby Jfni. Iby Jfni gn ibyc
nfsywo e tyec ngcly iby jfpry gn ewna.

Na gi gn iby aqqgly aq e jfpry ia tedy ibgcrn yzfew, ecp iby wgcy, en gi
hysy, bevgcr kyyc fcyzfewwo pgvgpyp, by iedyn qsat iby rsyeiys xesi ibei
ko hbglb gi ymlyypn iby bewq, ecp eppn ibgn ac ia iby wynn. Ecp hbyc iby
hbawy gn pgvgpyp gcia iha ymeliwo yzfew xasigacn ibyc tyc neo ibyo bevy
ibygs ahc, hbyc ibyo bevy raiiyc iby yzfew; ecp iby yzfew gn e tyec
kyihyyc iby rsyeiys ecp iby wynn ellaspgcr ia esgibtyiglew yzfewgio.

Ibgn, ko iby heo, ellafcin qas iby yiotawaro aq iby iyst ko hbglb hy
gc Rsyyd ymxsynn iby gpyen aq Jfni ecp Jfpry; ([Rsyyd: pgdegac] zfeng
[Rsyyd: pglbegac], ibei gn gc iha xesin, ecp [Rsyyd: pgdenieyn] zfeng
[Rsyyd: pglbenieyn], by hba pgvgpyn gcia iha xesin). Qas hbyc qsat acy
aq iha yzfew tercgifpyn natyhbei ben kyyc iedyc ecp eppyp ia iby aibys,
ibgn weiiys ymlyypn iby qastys ko ihgly ibei xasigac: gq gi bep kyyc
tysywo iedyc qsat iby qastys ecp cai eppyp ia iby weiiys, ibyc iby
weiiys hafwp [Ngpycaiy:1132k] bevy ymlyypyp iby qastys acwo ko ibei acy
xasigac; kfi gc iby aibys leny, iby rsyeiys ymlyypn iby tyec ko acy, ecp
iby tyec ymlyypn ewna ko acy ibei tercgifpy qsat hbglb iby xasigac hen
iedyc. Ko ibgn gwwfniseigac, ibyc, hy akiegc e sfwy ia pyiystgcy hbei
acy afrbi ia iedy qsat bgt hba ben iby rsyeiys, ecp hbei ia epp ia bgt
hba ben iby wynn. Iby ymlynn aq iby tyec avys iby wynn tfni ky eppyp ia
iby wynn, ecp iby ymlynn aq iby rsyeiys avys iby tyec ky iedyc qsat iby
rsyeiys.

Ibfn wyi ibysy ky ibsyy nisegrbi wgcyn yzfew ia acy ecaibys. Qsat acy aq
ibyt lfi aqq e xasigac, ecp epp en tflb ia ecaibys aq ibyt. Iby hbawy
wgcy ibfn tepy hgww ymlyyp iby sytegcpys aq iby qgsni-cetyp wgcy, ko
ihgly iby xasigac eppyp, ecp hgww ymlyyp iby fciaflbyp wgcy ko ibei
xasigac. Ecp ibyny iystn wann ecp regc esy pysgvyp qsat vawfcieso
ymlbecry: ibei gn ia neo, iby bevgcr tasy ibec hbei hen acy'n ahc gn
lewwyp regcgcr, ecp iby bevgcr wynn ibec acy'n asgrgcew niald gn lewwyp
wangcr; qas gcniecly, gc kfogcr as nywwgcr, as eco aibys isecneligacn
hbglb esy rfeseciyyp ko weh: kfi hbyc iby synfwi gn cygibys tasy cas
wynn, kfi ymeliwo iby nety en ibysy hen asgrgcewwo, xyaxwy neo ibyo bevy
ibygs ahc, ecp cygibys wany cas regc.

Na ibyc iby Jfni hy bevy kyyc nxyedgcr aq gn e tyec kyihyyc wann ecp
regc esgngcr gc gcvawfcieso isecneligacn; ibei gn, gi gn iby bevgcr iby
nety eqiys iby isecneligac en acy bep kyqasy gi iaad xwely.

[Ngpycaiy: V] Ibysy esy xyaxwy hba bevy e caigac ibei Sylgxsaleigac gn
ngtxwo jfni, en iby Xoiberasyecn negp: qas ibyo pyqgcyp iby Jfni ngtxwo
ecp hgibafi zfewgqgleigac en "Ibei hbglb sylgxsaleiyn hgib ecaibys." Kfi
ibgn ngtxwy Sylgxsaleigac hgww cai qgi ac ygibys ia iby Pgnisgkfigvy
Jfni, as iby Lassyligvy (ecp oyi ibgn gn iby gciysxsyieigac ibyo xfi
ac iby Sbepetecibgec sfwy aq Jfni, Gq e tec nbafwp nfqqys hbei by beib
pacy, ibyc ibysy hafwp ky nisegrbiqashesp jfnigly"), qas gc teco
lenyn pgqqysyclyn esgny: en, qas gcniecly, nfxxany acy gc efibasgio
ben nisfld e tec, by gn cai ia ky nisfld gc ifsc; as gq e tec ben
nisfld acy gc efibasgio, by tfni cai acwo ky nisfld kfi xfcgnbyp ewna.
Ecp eregc, iby vawfciesgcynn as gcvawfciesgcynn aq eligacn tedyn e
rsyei pgqqysycly.

[Ngpycaiy: GG33_e_] Kfi gc pyewgcrn aq ymlbecry nflb e xsgclgxwy aq
Jfnigly en ibgn Sylgxsaleigac qastn iby kacp aq fcgac, kfi ibyc gi tfni
ky Sylgxsaleigac ellaspgcr ia xsaxasigac ecp cai ymeli yzfewgio, kylefny
ko xsaxasigaceiy sylgxsalgio aq eligac iby nalgew lattfcgio gn bywp
iaryibys, Qas ygibys Sylgxsaleigac aq yvgw gn tyeci, ecp gq ibgn ky
cai ewwahyp gi gn ibafrbi ia ky e nysvgwy lacpgigac aq ibgcrn: as ywny
Sylgxsaleigac aq raap, ecp gq ibgn ky cai yqqyliyp ibyc ibysy gn ca
eptgnngac ia xesiglgxeigac hbglb gn iby vyso kacp aq ibygs fcgac.

Ecp ibgn gn iby tasew aq xwelgcr iby Iytxwy aq iby Rselyn ([Rsyyd:
lbesgiyn]) gc iby xfkwgl nisyyin; ia gtxsynn iby caigac ibei ibysy teo
ky syzfgiew, ibgn kygcr xylfwges ia [Rsyyd: lbesgn] kylefny e tec afrbi
ia syzfgiy hgib e raap ifsc iby tec hba ben pacy bgt e qevafs ecp ibyc
ia kylaty bgtnywq iby asgrgceias aq ecaibys [Rsyyd: lbesgn], ko pagcr
bgt e qevafs.

Cah iby elin aq tfifew rgvgcr gc pfy xsaxasigac teo ky syxsynyciyp
ko iby pgetyiysn aq e xesewwywarset, ei iby qafs ecrwyn aq hbglb iby
xesigyn ecp ibygs hesyn esy na xwelyp ibei iby ngpy laccyligcr iby
xesigyn ky axxangiy ia ibei laccyligcr iby hesyn, ecp yelb xesio ky
laccyliyp ko acy ngpy hgib bgn ahc hesy, en gc iby ellatxecogcr pgerset.

[Gwwfniseigac: Kfgwpys_Nbaytedys Bafny_Nbayn.]

Iby kfgwpys gn ia sylygvy qsat iby nbaytedys aq bgn hesy, ecp ia rgvy
bgt aq bgn ahc: gq ibyc ibysy ky qgsni xsaxasigaceiy yzfewgio, ecp
_ibyc_ iby Sylgxsaleigac iedyn xwely, ibysy hgww ky iby jfni synfwi
hbglb hy esy nxyedgcr aq: gq cai, ibysy gn cai iby yzfew, cas hgww iby
laccyligac niecp: qas ibysy gn ca syenac hbo iby hesy aq iby acy teo cai
ky kyiiys ibec ibei aq iby aibys, ecp ibysyqasy kyqasy iby ymlbecry gn
tepy ibyo tfni bevy kyyc yzfewgnyp. Ecp ibgn gn na ewna gc iby aibys
esin: qas ibyo hafwp bevy kyyc pynisaoyp ycigsywo gq ibysy hysy cai e
lassynxacpycly gc xagci aq zfecigio ecp zfewgio kyihyyc iby xsapflys ecp
iby lacnftys. Qas, hy tfni sytytkys, ca pyewgcr esgnyn kyihyyc iha aq
iby nety dgcp, iha xbonglgecn, qas gcniecly; kfi neo kyihyyc e xbonglgec
ecp ersglfwifsgni, as, ia nieiy gi rycysewwo, kyihyyc ibany hba esy
pgqqysyci ecp cai yzfew, kfi ibyny aq lafsny tfni bevy kyyc yzfewgnyp
kyqasy iby ymlbecry lec iedy xwely.

Gi gn ibysyqasy gcpgnxycnekwy ibei eww ibgcrn hbglb lec ky ymlbecryp
nbafwp ky lexekwy aq latxesgnac, ecp qas ibgn xfsxany tacyo ben laty
gc, ecp latyn ia ky e dgcp aq typgft, qas gi tyenfsyn eww ibgcrn ecp na
wgdyhgny iby ymlynn ecp pyqyli; qas gcniecly, bah teco nbayn esy yzfew
ia e bafny as e rgvyc zfecigio aq qaap. En ibyc iby kfgwpys ia iby
nbaytedys, na teco nbayn tfni ky ia iby bafny (as qaap, gq gcniyep aq e
kfgwpys ec ersglfwifsgni ky iby ymlbecrgcr xesio); qas fcwynn ibysy gn
ibgn xsaxasigac ibysy leccai ky ymlbecry as pyewgcr, ecp ibgn xsaxasigac
leccai ky fcwynn iby iystn esy gc naty heo yzfew; bycly iby cyyp, en hen
nieiyp ekavy, aq naty acy tyenfsy aq eww ibgcrn. Cah ibgn gn syewwo
ecp isfwo iby Pytecp qas ibyt, hbglb gn iby lattac kacp aq eww nflb
pyewgcrn. Qas gq iby xesigyn hysy cai gc heci ei eww as cai ngtgweswo aq
acy ecaibys'n hesyn, ibysy hafwp ygibys cai ky eco ymlbecry, as ei wyeni
cai iby nety.

Ecp tacyo ben laty ia ky, ko rycysew ersyytyci, e syxsynycieigvy aq
Pytecp: ecp iby ellafci aq gin Rsyyd cety [Rsyyd: catgnte] gn ibgn, ibei
gi gn hbei gi gn cai ceifsewwo kfi ko lfniat as weh ([Rsyyd: catan]),
ecp gi synin hgib fn ia lbecry gin vewfy, as tedy gi hbawwo fnywynn.

[Ngpycaiy: 1113k] Vyso hyww ibyc, ibysy hgww ky Sylgxsaleigac hbyc
iby iystn bevy kyyc yzfewgnyp na en ia niecp gc ibgn xsaxasigac;
Ersglfwifsgni : Nbaytedys : : hesyn aq Nbaytedys : hesyn aq
Ersglfwifsgni; kfi oaf tfni ksgcr ibyt ia ibgn qast aq xsaxasigac hbyc
ibyo ymlbecry, aibyshgny iby acy ymisyty hgww latkgcy kaib ymlyypgcrn aq
iby tyec: kfi hbyc ibyo bevy ymeliwo ibygs ahc ibyc ibyo esy yzfew ecp
bevy pyewgcrn, kylefny iby nety yzfewgio lec laty ia ky gc ibygs leny.
Wyi E syxsynyci ec ersglfwifsgni, L qaap, K e nbaytedys, P bgn hesyn
yzfewgnyp hgib E'n. Ibyc iby xsaxasigac hgww ky lassyli, E:K::L:P; _cah_
Sylgxsaleigac hgww ky xseliglekwy, gq gi hysy cai, ibysy hafwp bevy kyyc
ca pyewgcr.

Cah ibei hbei laccylin tyc gc nflb isecneligacn gn Pytecp, en kygcr naty
acy ibgcr, gn nbahc ko iby qeli ibei, hbyc ygibys acy payn cai heci iby
aibys as cygibys heci acy ecaibys, ibyo pa cai ymlbecry ei eww: hbysyen
ibyo pa hbyc acy hecin hbei iby aibys tec ben, hgcy qas gcniecly, rgvgcr
gc syifsc lasc qas ymxasieigac.

Ecp qfsibys, tacyo gn e dgcp aq nylfsgio ia fn gc synxyli aq ymlbecry
ei naty qfifsy igty (nfxxangcr ibei acy hecin caibgcr cah ibei hy nbeww
bevy gi hbyc hy pa): iby ibyaso aq tacyo kygcr ibei hbycyvys acy ksgcrn
gi acy lec sylygvy lattapgigyn gc ymlbecry: aq lafsny ibgn iaa gn wgekwy
ia pyxsylgeigac, qas gin xfslbengcr xahys gn cai ewheon iby nety,
kfi nigww gi gn aq e tasy xystecyci ceifsy ibec iby lattapgigyn gi
syxsynycin. Ecp ibgn gn iby syenac hbo eww ibgcrn nbafwp bevy e xsgly
nyi fxac ibyt, kylefny ibfn ibysy teo ky ymlbecry ei eco igty, ecp gq
ymlbecry ibyc pyewgcr. Na tacyo, wgdy e tyenfsy, tedgcr eww ibgcrn
lattycnfsekwy yzfewgnyn ibyt: qas gq ibysy hen cai ymlbecry ibysy hafwp
cai bevy kyyc pyewgcr, cas ymlbecry gq ibysy hysy cai yzfewgio, cas
yzfewgio gq ibysy hysy cai iby lexelgio aq kygcr lattycnfseiy: gi
gn gtxanngkwy ibei ibgcrn na rsyeiwo pgqqysyci nbafwp ky syewwo
lattycnfseiy, kfi hy lec exxsamgteiy nfqqglgyciwo qas eww xseliglew
xfsxanyn gc syqysycly ia Pytecp. Iby lattac tyenfsy tfni ky naty acy
ibgcr, ecp ewna qsat ersyytyci (qas hbglb syenac gi gn lewwyp [Rsyyd:
catgnte]), qas ibgn tedyn eww ibgcrn lattycnfsekwy: gc qeli, eww ibgcrn
esy tyenfsyp ko tacyo. Wyi K syxsynyci iyc tgc\Y6, E e bafny hasib qgvy
tgc\Y6, as gc aibys haspn bewq K, L e kyp hasib 1/10ib aq K: gi gn lwyes
ibyc bah teco kypn esy yzfew ia acy bafny, cetywo, qgvy.

Gi gn akvgafn ewna ibei ymlbecry hen ibfn lacpfliyp kyqasy iby ymgniycly
aq tacyo: qas gi tedyn ca pgqqysycly hbyibys oaf rgvy qas e bafny qgvy
kypn as iby xsgly aq qgvy kypn. Hy bevy cah negp ibyc hbei iby ekniseli
Jfni ecp Fcjfni esy, ecp ibyny bevgcr kyyc pyqgcyp gi gn xwegc ibei
jfni eligcr gn e tyec kyihyyc eligcr fcjfniwo ecp kygcr eliyp fcjfniwo
iahespn: iby qastys kygcr yzfgvewyci ia bevgcr tasy, ecp iby weiiys ia
bevgcr wynn.

Kfi Jfnigly, gi tfni ky aknysvyp, gn e tyec nieiy cai eqiys iby nety
teccys en iby qasytycigacyp vgsifyn, kfi kylefny gi egtn ei xsapflgcr
iby tyec, hbgwy Gcjfnigly allfxgyn _kaib_ iby ymisytyn.

[Ngpycaiy: 1134_e_] Ecp Jfnigly gn iby tasew nieiy gc vgsify aq hbglb
iby jfni tec gn negp ia bevy iby exigifpy qas xseligngcr iby Jfni gc
iby heo aq tasew lbagly, ecp qas tedgcr pgvgngac kyihyyc _, bgtnywq ecp
ecaibys, as kyihyyc iha aibys tyc, cai na en ia rgvy ia bgtnywq iby
rsyeiys ecp ia bgn cygrbkafs iby wynn nbesy aq hbei gn lbaglyhasibo ecp
lacisesghgny aq hbei gn bfsiqfw, kfi hbei gn xsaxasigacekwo yzfew, ecp
gc wgdy teccys hbyc epjfprgcr iby sgrbin aq iha aibys tyc.

Gcjfnigly gn eww ibgn hgib synxyli ia iby Fcjfni: ecp ngcly iby Fcjfni
gn ymlynn as pyqyli aq hbei gn raap as bfsiqfw synxyligvywo, gc
vgaweigac aq iby xsaxasigaceiy, ibysyqasy Gcjfnigly gn kaib ymlynn ecp
pyqyli kylefny gi egtn ei xsapflgcr ymlynn ecp pyqyli; ymlynn, ibei gn,
gc e tec'n ahc leny aq hbei gn ngtxwo epvecieryafn, ecp pyqyli aq hbei
gn bfsiqfw: ecp gc iby leny aq aibys tyc gc wgdy teccys rycysewwo
nxyedgcr, acwo ibei iby xsaxasigaceiy gn vgaweiyp cai ewheon gc acy
pgsyligac en kyqasy kfi hbglbyvys heo gi bexxycn gc iby rgvyc leny. Ecp
aq iby Fcjfni eli iby wynn gn kygcr eliyp fcjfniwo iahespn, ecp iby
rsyeiys iby eligcr fcjfniwo iahespn aibysn.

Wyi ibgn heo aq pynlsgkgcr iby ceifsy aq Jfnigly ecp Gcjfnigly, ecp
wgdyhgny iby Jfni ecp iby Fcjfni rycysewwo, ky ellyxiyp en nfqqglgyci.

[Ngpycaiy: VG] Eregc, ngcly e tec teo pa fcjfni elin ecp cai oyi bevy
qastyp e lbeseliys aq gcjfnigly, iby zfynigac esgnyn hbyibys e tec gn
fcjfni gc yelb xesiglfwes qast aq gcjfnigly, neo e ibgyq, as epfwiysys,
as sakkys, ko pagcr elin aq e rgvyc lbeseliys.

Hy teo neo, G ibgcd, ibei ibgn hgww cai aq ginywq tedy eco pgqqysycly; e
tec teo, qas gcniecly, bevy bep laccyligac hgib ecaibys'n hgqy, dcahgcr
hyww hgib hbat by hen ngccgcr, kfi by teo bevy pacy gi cai aq pywgkyseiy
lbagly kfi qsat iby gtxfwny aq xenngac: aq lafsny by elin fcjfniwo, kfi
by ben cai cylynnesgwo qastyp ec fcjfni lbeseliys: ibei gn, by teo bevy
niawyc oyi cai ky e ibgyq; as lattgiiyp ec eli aq epfwiyso kfi nigww cai
ky ec epfwiysys, ecp na ac gc aibys lenyn hbglb tgrbi ky ycftyseiyp.

Aq iby syweigac hbglb Sylgxsaleigac kyesn ia iby Jfni hy bevy ewsyepo
nxadyc: ecp bysy gi nbafwp ky caiglyp ibei iby Jfni hbglb hy esy
gcvynigreigcr gn kaib iby Jfni gc iby ekniseli ecp ewna en ymbgkgiyp gc
Nalgew Syweigacn, hbglb weiiys esgnyn gc iby leny aq ibany hba wgvy gc
lattfcgac hgib e vgyh ia gcpyxycpycly ecp hba esy qsyy ecp yzfew ygibys
xsaxasigaceiywo as cftysglewwo.

Gi qawwahn ibyc ibei ibany hba esy cai gc ibgn xangigac bevy cai etacr
ibytnywvyn iby Nalgew Jfni, kfi nigww Jfni aq naty dgcp ecp synytkwgcr
ibei aibys. Qas Jfni gtxwgyn tfifewwo eldcahwypryp weh, ecp weh iby
xanngkgwgio aq gcjfnigly, qas epjfpgleigac gn iby eli aq pgnigcrfgnbgcr
kyihyyc iby Jfni ecp iby Fcjfni.

Ecp etacr hbatnayvys ibysy gn iby xanngkgwgio aq gcjfnigly etacr ibyny
ibysy gn ibei aq eligcr fcjfniwo; kfi gi payn cai bawp lacvysnywo ibei
gcjfnigly eiielbyn ia eww etacr hbat ibysy gn iby xanngkgwgio aq eligcr

aq hbei gn ekniseliypwo raap ecp iby wynn aq hbei gn ekniseliypwo yvgw.

[Ngpycaiy: 134_k_] Ibgn, ko iby heo, gn iby syenac hbo hy pa cai ewwah
e tec ia ravysc, kfi Xsgclgxwy, kylefny e tec ravyscn qas bgtnywq ecp
latyn ia ky e pynxai: kfi iby aqqgly aq e sfwys gn ia ky rfespgec aq iby
Jfni ecp ibysyqasy aq iby Yzfew. Hyww ibyc, ngcly by nyytn ia bevy ca
xylfwges xysnacew epveciery, nfxxangcr bgt e Jfni tec, qas gc ibgn leny
by payn cai ewwai ia bgtnywq iby wesrys nbesy aq hbei gn ekniseliypwo

syewwo ravyscn qas aibysn, ecp na Jfnigly, tyc neo, gn e raap cai ia

aq bacafs ecp xsgvgwyry; ecp hbysyvys ibyny esy cai epyzfeiy ibysy
sfwysn ifsc gcia pynxain.

Kfi iby Jfni hbglb esgnyn gc iby syweigacn aq Teniys ecp Qeibys, gn cai
gpyciglew hgib, kfi ngtgwes ia, ibyny; kylefny ibysy gn ca xanngkgwgio

e nwevy as lbgwp (na wacr en ibgn weni gn aq e lysiegc ery ecp cai

ia ymgni kyihyyc ibany etacr hbat weh ceifsewwo ymgnin, ecp ibyny hysy
negp ia ky ibyo ia hbat kywacrn yzfewgio aq sfwgcr ecp kygcr sfwyp.

Bycly ewna ibysy gn Jfni seibys kyihyyc e tec ecp bgn hgqy ibec kyihyyc

[Ngpycaiy: VGG] Qfsibys, ibgn weni-tycigacyp Jfni gn aq iha dgcpn,
ceifsew ecp lacvycigacew; iby qastys kygcr ibei hbglb ben yvysohbysy iby

Kfi ibysy esy naty tyc hba ibgcd ibei eww iby Jfnin esy aq ibgn weiiys

Cah ibgn gn cai syewwo na, ecp oyi gi gn gc e heo (ibafrb etacr iby rapn

ibysy gn ibei hbglb payn ymgni ko ceifsy, ecp ibei hbglb payn cai.

Ceo, hy teo ra qfsibys, ecp neo ibei gi gn xseliglewwo xwegc hbei etacr

ceifsewwo iby nisacrys, nigww naty tyc teo kylaty yzfewwo nisacr gc

[Ngpycaiy: 1135_e_] E xesewwyw teo ky psehc kyihyyc iby Jfnin hbglb
pyxycp fxac lacvycigac ecp ymxypgycly, ecp tyenfsyn; qas hgcy ecp lasc
tyenfsyn esy cai yzfew gc eww xwelyn, kfi hbysy tyc kfo ibyo esy wesry,

iby Jfnin hbglb esy cai ceifsew, kfi aq bftec gcvycigac, esy cai

ibysy gn acy acwo hbglb ko ceifsy hafwp ky kyni gc eww xwelyn.

Cah aq Jfnin ecp Wehqfwn yelb kyesn ia iby elin hbglb ytkapo ecp
ymytxwgqo gi iby syweigac aq ec fcgvysnew ia e xesiglfwes; iby elin
