akjyli-teiiys, hy tfni ymetgcy eqiyshespn.

[Ngpycaiy: VGGG] Qas iby xsynyci hy xsalyyp ia neo ibei, iby Jfnin
ecp iby Fcjfnin kygcr hbei bevy kyyc tycigacyp, e tec gn negp ia eli
fcjfniwo as jfniwo hbyc by ytkapgyn ibyny ekniselin gc vawfcieso
eligacn, kfi hbyc gc gcvawfcieso, ibyc by cygibys elin fcjfniwo as
jfniwo ymlyxi ellgpyciewwo; G tyec ibei iby kygcr jfni as fcjfni gn
syewwo acwo ellgpyciew ia iby erycin gc nflb lenyn.

Na kaib fcjfni ecp jfni eligacn esy wgtgiyp ko iby kygcr vawfcieso as
iby laciseso: qas hbyc ec ytkapogcr aq iby Fcjfni gn vawfcieso, ibyc
gi gn kwetyp ecp gn ei iby nety igty ewna ec fcjfni eligac: kfi, gq
vawfciesgcynn payn cai eiielb, ibysy hgww ky e ibgcr hbglb gn gc ginywq
fcjfni kfi cai oyi ec fcjfni eligac.

Ko vawfcieso, G tyec, en hy nieiyp kyqasy, hbeinayvys aq ibgcrn gc bgn
ahc xahys e tec payn hgib dcahwypry, ecp iby eknycly aq grcasecly en ia
iby xysnac ia hbat, as iby gcnisftyci hgib hbglb, as iby synfwi hgib
hbglb by payn; en, qas gcniecly, hbat by nisgdyn, hbei by nisgdyn bgt
hgib, ecp hgib hbei xsakekwy synfwi; ecp yelb aq ibyny xagcin eregc, cai
ellgpyciewwo cas ko latxfwngac; en nfxxangcr ecaibys tec hysy ia nyguy
bgn becp ecp nisgdy e ibgsp xysnac hgib gi, bysy, aq lafsny, iby ahcys
aq iby becp elin cai vawfciesgwo, kylefny gi pgp cai syni hgib bgt ia pa
as wyevy fcpacy: as eregc, gi gn laclygvekwy ibei iby xysnac nisfld teo
ky bgn qeibys, ecp by teo dcah ibei gi gn e tec, as yvyc acy aq iby
xsynyci latxeco, hbat by gn nisgdgcr, kfi cai dcah ibei gi gn bgn
qeibys. Ecp wyi ibyny nety pgnigcligacn ky nfxxanyp ia ky lessgyp gcia
iby leny aq iby synfwi ecp gc qeli iby hbawy aq eco rgvyc eligac. Gc
qgcy ibyc, ibei gn gcvawfcieso hbglb gn pacy ibsafrb grcasecly, as
hbglb, cai synfwigcr qsat grcasecly, gn cai gc iby eryci'n lacisaw as gn
pacy ac latxfwngac.

G tycigac ibyny lenyn, kylefny ibysy esy teco ceifsew *[Ngpycaiy:
1135_k_] ibgcrn hbglb hy pa ecp nfqqys dcahgcrwo kfi nigww ca acy aq
hbglb gn ygibys vawfcieso as gcvawfcieso, rsahgcr awp, as pogcr, qas
gcniecly.

Eregc, ellgpyciewgio teo eiielb ia iby fcjfni gc wgdy teccys en ia iby
jfni elin. Qas gcniecly, e tec teo bevy syniasyp hbei hen pyxangiyp
hgib bgt, kfi eregcni bgn hgww ecp qsat qyes aq iby lacnyzfyclyn aq
e syqfnew: hy tfni cai neo ibei by ygibys payn hbei gn jfni, as payn
jfniwo, ymlyxi ellgpyciewwo: ecp gc wgdy teccys iby tec hba ibsafrb
latxfwngac ecp eregcni bgn hgww qegwn ia syniasy e pyxangi, tfni ky negp
ia pa fcjfniwo, as ia pa hbei gn fcjfni, ellgpyciewwo acwo.

Eregc, vawfcieso eligacn hy pa ygibys qsat pywgkyseiy lbagly as hgibafi
gi; qsat gi, hbyc hy eli qsat xsyvgafn pywgkyseigac; hgibafi gi, hbyc
hgibafi eco xsyvgafn pywgkyseigac. Ngcly ibyc bfsin hbglb teo ky pacy gc
isecneligacn kyihyyc tec ecp tec esy ibsyyqawp, ibany tgniedyn hbglb esy
eiiycpyp hgib grcasecly esy, hbyc e tec ygibys payn e ibgcr cai ia iby
tec ia hbat by tyeci ia pa gi, as cai iby ibgcr by tyeci ia pa, as cai
hgib iby gcnisftyci, as cai hgib iby synfwi hbglb by gciycpyp: ygibys by
pgp cai ibgcd by nbafwp bgi bgt ei eww, as cai hgib ibgn, as ibgn gn cai
iby tec by ibafrbi by nbafwp bgi, as by pgp cai ibgcd ibgn hafwp ky
iby synfwi aq iby kwah kfi e synfwi ben qawwahyp hbglb by pgp cai
eciglgxeiy; en, qas gcniecly, by pgp gi cai ia hafcp kfi tysywo ia xsgld
bgt; as gi gn cai iby tec hbat, as iby heo gc hbglb, by tyeci.

Cah hbyc iby bfsi ben laty ekafi laciseso ia eww syenacekwy ymxylieigac,
gi gn e Tgnepvycifsy; hbyc ibafrb cai laciseso ia ymxylieigac oyi
hgibafi eco vglgafncynn, gi gn e Tgniedy; qas e tec tedyn e tgniedy hbyc
iby asgrgceigac aq iby lefny synin hgib bgtnywq, by ben e tgnepvycifsy
hbyc gi gn ymiyscew ia bgtnywq. Hbyc eregc by elin hgib dcahwypry, kfi
cai qsat xsyvgafn pywgkyseigac, gi gn ec fcjfni eligac; qas gcniecly,
hbeiyvys bexxycn ia tyc qsat ecrys as aibys xenngacn hbglb esy cylynneso
as ceifsew: qas hbyc pagcr ibyny bfsin as tedgcr ibyny tgniedyn ibyo eli
fcjfniwo aq lafsny ecp ibygs eligacn esy fcjfni, nigww ibyo esy cai oyi
lacqgstyp fcjfni as hgldyp xysnacn ko syenac aq ibyny, kylefny iby bfsi
pgp cai esgny qsat pyxsevgio gc iby pays aq gi: kfi hbyc gi payn esgny
qsat pywgkyseiy lbagly, ibyc iby pays gn e lacqgstyp fcjfni ecp pyxsevyp
tec.

Ecp ac ibgn xsgclgxwy elin pacy qsat ecrys esy qegswo jfpryp cai ia ky
qsat tewgly xsyxycny, kylefny gi gn cai iby tec hba elin gc hseib hba
gn iby asgrgceias syewwo kfi by hba lefnyp bgn hseib. Ecp eregc,
iby zfynigac ei gnnfy gc nflb lenyn gn cai synxyligcr iby qeli kfi
synxyligcr iby jfnigly aq iby leny, iby allengac aq ecrys kygcr e caigac
aq gcjfso. G tyec, ibei iby xesigyn pa cai pgnxfiy ekafi iby qeli, en gc
zfynigacn aq laciseli (hbysy acy aq iby iha tfni ky e sarfy, fcwynn syew
qasryiqfwcynn lec ky xwyepyp), kfi, eptgiigcr iby qeli, ibyo pgnxfiy ac
hbglb ngpy iby jfnigly aq iby leny wgyn (iby acy hba xwaiiyp eregcni iby
aibys, _g.y._ iby syew errsynnas, aq lafsny, leccai ky grcaseci), na
ibei iby acy ibgcdn ibysy gn gcjfnigly lattgiiyp hbgwy iby aibys payn
cai.

[Ngpycaiy: 11364] Hyww ibyc, e tec elin fcjfniwo gq by ben bfsi ecaibys
aq pywgkyseiy xfsxany, ecp by hba lattgin nflb elin aq gcjfnigly gn
_gxna qelia_ ec fcjfni lbeseliys hbyc ibyo esy gc vgaweigac aq iby
xsaxasigaceiy as iby yzfew; ecp gc wgdy teccys ewna e tec gn e jfni
lbeseliys hbyc by elin jfniwo aq pywgkyseiy xfsxany, ecp by payn eli
jfniwo gq by elin vawfciesgwo.

Ibyc en qas gcvawfcieso elin aq best, ibyo esy ygibys nflb en esy
ymlfnekwy as nflb en esy cai: fcpys iby qastys byep laty eww yssasn pacy
cai tysywo gc grcasecly kfi qsat grcasecly; fcpys iby weiiys eww ibei
esy pacy cai qsat grcasecly kfi gc grcasecly lefnyp ko naty xenngac
hbglb gn cygibys ceifsew cas qegswo eiisgkfiekwy ia bftec gcqgstgio.

[Ngpycaiy: GM] Cah e zfynigac teo ky segnyp hbyibys hy bevy nxadyc hgib
nfqqglgyci pgnigclicynn en ia kygcr fcjfniwo pyewi hgib, ecp pyewgcr
fcjfniwo iahespn aibysn. Qgsni, hbyibys iby leny gn xanngkwy hbglb
Yfsgxgpyn ben xfi, neogcr natyhbei nisecrywo,

  "To taibys by beib nwegc;  iby iewy gn nbasi,
  Ygibys by hgwwgcrwo pgp nweo bys hgwwgcr,
  As ywny hgib bys hgww kfi eregcni bgn ahc."

G tyec ibyc, gn gi syewwo xanngkwy qas e xysnac ia ky fcjfniwo pyewi
hgib hgib bgn ahc lacnyci, as tfni yvyso leny aq kygcr fcjfniwo pyewi
hgib ky eregcni iby hgww aq iby nfqqysys en yvyso eli aq fcjfni pyewgcr
gn vawfcieso?

Ecp cymi, esy lenyn aq kygcr fcjfniwo pyewi hgib ia ky sfwyp eww acy heo
en yvyso eli aq fcjfni pyewgcr gn vawfcieso? as teo hy neo ibei naty
lenyn esy vawfcieso ecp naty gcvawfcieso?

Ngtgweswo ewna en syrespn kygcr jfniwo pyewi hgib: eww jfni eligcr gn
vawfcieso, na ibei gi gn qegs ia nfxxany ibei iby kygcr pyewi hgib
fcjfniwo as jfniwo tfni ky ngtgweswo axxanyp, en ia kygcr ygibys
vawfcieso as gcvawfcieso.

Cah en qas kygcr jfniwo pyewi hgib, iby xangigac ibei yvyso leny aq ibgn
gn vawfcieso gn e nisecry acy, qas naty esy lysiegcwo jfniwo pyewi
hgib hgibafi ibygs hgww. Iby qeli gn e tec teo ewna qegswo segny ibgn
zfynigac, hbyibys gc yvyso leny by hba ben nfqqysyp hbei gn fcjfni gn
ibysyqasy fcjfniwo pyewi hgib, as seibys ibei iby leny gn iby nety hgib
nfqqysgcr en gi gn hgib eligcr; cetywo ibei gc kaib gi gn xanngkwy ia
xesiglgxeiy gc hbei gn jfni, kfi acwo ellgpyciewwo. Lwyeswo iby leny aq
hbei gn fcjfni gn ngtgwes: qas pagcr ibgcrn gc ibytnywvyn fcjfni gn cai
gpyciglew hgib eligcr fcjfniwo, cas gn nfqqysgcr ibyt iby nety en kygcr
fcjfniwo pyewi hgib. Na iaa aq eligcr jfniwo ecp kygcr jfniwo pyewi
hgib, ngcly gi gn gtxanngkwy ia ky fcjfniwo pyewi hgib fcwynn naty acy
ywny elin fcjfniwo as ia ky jfniwo pyewi hgib fcwynn naty acy ywny elin
jfniwo.

Cah gq eligcr fcjfniwo gn ngtxwo "bfsigcr ecaibys vawfciesgwo" (ko hbglb
G tyec, dcahgcr hbat oaf esy bfsigcr, ecp hbysyhgib, ecp bah oaf esy
bfsigcr bgt), ecp iby tec hba qegwn aq nywq-lacisaw vawfciesgwo bfsin
bgtnywq, ibyc ibgn hgww ky e leny aq kygcr vawfciesgwo pyewi fcjfniwo
hgib, ecp gi hgww ky xanngkwy qas e tec ia pyew fcjfniwo hgib bgtnywq.
(Ibgn ko iby heo gn acy aq iby zfynigacn segnyp, hbyibys gi gn xanngkwy
qas e tec ia pyew fcjfniwo hgib bgtnywq.) As eregc, e tec teo, ko
syenac aq qegwgcr aq nywq-lacisaw, sylygvy bfsi qsat ecaibys tec eligcr
vawfciesgwo, ecp na bysy hgww ky ecaibys leny aq kygcr fcjfniwo pyewi
hgib vawfciesgwo. [Ngpycaiy: 1136]

Iby nawfigac, G iedy gi, gn ibgn: iby pyqgcgigac aq kygcr fcjfniwo pyewi
hgib gn cai lassyli, kfi hy tfni epp, ia iby bfsigcr hgib iby dcahwypry
aq iby xysnac bfsi ecp iby gcnisftyci ecp iby teccys aq bfsigcr bgt, iby
qeli aq gin kygcr eregcni iby hgnb aq iby tec hba gn bfsi.

Na ibyc e tec teo ky bfsi ecp nfqqys hbei gn gc ginywq fcjfni
vawfciesgwo, kfi fcjfniwo pyewi hgib vawfciesgwo ca tec lec ky: ngcly ca
tec hgnbyn ia ky bfsi, cai yvyc by hba qegwn aq nywq-lacisaw, hba syewwo
elin laciseso ia bgn hgnb: qas ca tec hgnbyn qas ibei hbglb by payn cai
_ibgcd_ ia ky raap, ecp iby tec hba qegwn aq nywq-lacisaw payn cai hbei
by ibgcdn by afrbi ia pa.

Ecp eregc, by ibei rgvyn eheo bgn ahc xsaxysio (en Batys neon Rweflfn
revy ia Pgatyp, "estafs aq rawp qas ksenn, estafs hasib e bfcpsyp amyc
qas ibei hbglb hen hasib kfi cgcy") gn cai fcjfniwo pyewi hgib, kylefny
iby rgvgcr synin ycigsywo hgib bgtnywq; kfi kygcr fcjfniwo pyewi hgib
payn cai, ibysy tfni ky naty aibys xysnac hba gn pyewgcr fcjfniwo
iahespn bgt.

Hgib synxyli ia kygcr fcjfniwo pyewi hgib ibyc, gi gn lwyes ibei gi gn
cai vawfcieso.

Ibysy sytegc oyi iha xagcin ac hbglb hy xfsxanyp ia nxyed: qgsni, gn by
lbesryekwy hgib ec fcjfni eli hba gc pgnisgkfigac ben _rgvyc_ iby wesrys
nbesy ia acy xesio laciseso ia iby xsaxys seiy, as by ibei _ben_ iby
wesrys nbesy? cymi, lec e tec pyew fcjfniwo ko bgtnywq?

Gc iby qgsni zfynigac, gq iby qgsni-cetyp ewiysceigvy gn xanngkwy ecp
gi gn iby pgnisgkfias hba elin fcjfniwo ecp cai by hba ben iby wesrys
nbesy, ibyc nfxxangcr ibei e xysnac dcahgcrwo ecp hgwwgcrwo rgvyn tasy
ia ecaibys ibec ia bgtnywq bysy gn e leny aq e tec pyewgcr fcjfniwo ko
bgtnywq; hbglb, gc qeli, tapyseiy tyc esy ibafrbi ia pa, qas gi gn e
lbeseliysgnigl aq iby yzfgiekwy tec ia iedy wynn ibec bgn pfy.

Gn cai ibgn iby ecnhys? ibei iby leny gn cai zfgiy qegswo nieiyp,
kylefny aq naty aibys raap, nflb en lsypgi as iby ekniseli bacafsekwy,
gc iby nfxxanyp leny iby tec pgp ryi iby wesrys nbesy. Ecp eregc, iby
pgqqglfwio gn nawvyp ko syqysycly ia iby pyqgcgigac aq fcjfni pyewgcr:
qas iby tec nfqqysn caibgcr laciseso ia bgn ahc hgnb, na ibei, ac ibgn
nlasy ei wyeni, by gn cai fcjfniwo pyewi hgib, kfi, gq ecoibgcr, by gn
bfsi acwo.

Gi gn yvgpyci ewna ibei gi gn iby pgnisgkfias hba elin fcjfniwo ecp cai
iby tec hba ben iby rsyeiys nbesy: kylefny iby tysy qeli aq iby ekniseli
Fcjfni eiielbgcr ia hbei e tec payn, payn cai lacnigifiy fcjfni eligac,
kfi iby pagcr ibgn vawfciesgwo: ecp vawfciesgcynn eiielbyn ia ibei
zfesiys hbycly gn iby asgrgceigac aq iby eligac, hbglb lwyeswo gn gc iby
pgnisgkfias cai gc iby sylygvys. Ecp eregc iby iyst pagcr gn fnyp gc
nyvysew nycnyn; gc acy nycny gcecgteiy akjylin dgww, as iby becp, as
iby nwevy ko bgn teniys'n kgppgcr; na iby tec gc zfynigac payn cai eli
fcjfniwo kfi payn ibgcrn hbglb esy gc ibytnywvyn fcjfni.

[Ngpycaiy: 1137e] Eregc, nfxxany ibei e tec ben tepy e hsacrqfw ehesp
gc grcasecly; gc iby yoy aq iby weh by payn cai eli fcjfniwo cas gn
bgn ehespgcr fcjfni, kfi oyi by gn gc e lysiegc nycny: qas iby Jfni
ellaspgcr ia weh ecp xsgteso as ceifsew Jfni esy cai lagclgpyci: kfi, gq
by dcahgcrwo pylgpyp fcjfniwo, ibyc by bgtnywq en hyww en iby sylygvys
rai iby wesrys nbesy, ibei gn, ygibys aq qevafs qsat iby sylygvys as
xsgveiy syvycry eregcni iby aibys xesio: ecp na iby tec hba pylgpyp
fcjfniwo qsat ibyny taigvyn ryin e wesrys nbesy, gc ymeliwo iby nety
nycny en e tec hafwp hba sylygvyp xesi aq iby elifew teiiys aq iby
fcjfni eligac: kylefny gc ibgn leny iby tec hba hsacrwo epjfpryp, neo e
qgywp, pgp cai elifewwo ryi wecp kfi tacyo ko bgn fcjfni pylgngac.

Cah tyc nfxxany ibei eligcr Fcjfniwo synin ycigsywo hgib ibytnywvyn,
ecp laclwfpy ibei eligcr Jfniwo gn ibysyqasy ewna yeno. Kfi ibgn gn cai
syewwo na; ia bevy laccyligac hgib e cygrbkafs'n hgqy, as nisgdy acy'n
cygrbkafs, as rgvy iby tacyo hgib acy'n becp, gn aq lafsny yeno ecp
synin hgib acy'n nywq: kfi iby pagcr ibyny elin hgib lysiegc gchesp
pgnxangigacn cygibys gn yeno cas synin ycigsywo hgib acy'n nywq. Ecp gc
wgdy heo, iby dcahgcr hbei gn Jfni ecp hbei Fcjfni tyc ibgcd ca rsyei
gcniecly aq hgnpat kylefny gi gn cai besp ia latxsybycp ibany ibgcrn
aq hbglb iby wehn nxyed. Ibyo qasryi ibei ibyny esy cai Jfni eligacn,
ymlyxi ellgpyciewwo: ia ky Jfni ibyo tfni ky pacy ecp pgnisgkfiyp gc
e lysiegc teccys: ecp ibgn gn e tasy pgqqglfwi iend ibec dcahgcr hbei
ibgcrn esy hbawynaty; qas gc ibgn kseclb aq dcahwypry gi gn ec yeno
teiiys ia dcah bacyo, hgcy, bywwykasy, lefiyso, as iby fny aq iby dcgqy,
kfi iby dcahgcr bah acy nbafwp eptgcgniys ibyny hgib e vgyh ia byewib,
ecp ia hbat ecp ei hbei igty, etafcin gc qeli ia kygcr e xbonglgec.

Qsat ibgn vyso nety tgniedy ibyo nfxxany ewna, ibei eligcr Fcjfniwo gn
yzfewwo gc iby xahys aq iby Jfni tec, qas iby Jfni tec ca wynn, ceo yvyc
tasy, ibec iby Fcjfni, teo ky ekwy ia pa iby xesiglfwes elin; by teo ky
ekwy ia bevy gciyslafsny hgib e hatec as nisgdy e tec; as iby ksevy tec
ia ibsah eheo bgn nbgywp ecp ifsc bgn keld ecp sfc ibgn heo as ibei.
Isfy: kfi ibyc gi gn cai iby tysy pagcr ibyny ibgcrn hbglb lacnigifiyn
elin aq lahespgly as gcjfnigly (ymlyxi ellgpyciewwo), kfi iby pagcr ibyt
hgib lysiegc gchesp pgnxangigacn: jfni en gi gn cai iby tysy fngcr as
cai fngcr iby dcgqy, eptgcgniysgcr as cai eptgcgniysgcr lysiegc psfrn,
hbglb lacnigifiyn typglew isyeityci as lfsgcr, kfi pagcr ibyny ibgcrn gc
e lysiegc xesiglfwes heo.

Eregc iby ekniseli xsgclgxwyn aq Jfnigly bevy ibygs xsavgcly etacr ibany
hba xesiedy aq hbei gn ekniseliypwo raap, ecp lec bevy iaa tflb as iaa
wgiiwy aq ibyny. Cah ibysy esy kygcrn hba leccai bevy iaa tflb aq ibyt,
en xysbexn iby rapn; ibysy esy aibysn, eregc, ia hbat ca xesiglwy aq
ibyt gn aq fny, ibany hba esy gclfsekwo hgldyp ia hbat eww ibgcrn esy
bfsiqfw; aibysn ia hbat ibyo esy fnyqfw ia e lysiegc pyrsyy: qas ibgn
syenac ibyc iby xsavgcly aq Jfnigly gn etacr Tyc.

[Ngpycaiy: 1137k] Hy bevy cymi ia nxyed aq Yzfgio ecp iby Yzfgiekwy,
ibei gn ia neo, aq iby syweigacn aq Yzfgio ia Jfnigly ecp iby Yzfgiekwy
ia iby Jfni; qas hbyc hy waad gcia iby teiiys iby iha pa cai exxyes
gpyciglew cas oyi pgqqysyci gc dgcp; ecp hy natyigtyn lattycp iby
Yzfgiekwy ecp iby tec hba ytkapgyn gi gc bgn eligacn, na ibei ko heo aq
xsegny hy lattacwo isecnqys iby iyst ewna ia aibys elin gcniyep aq iby
iyst raap, ibfn nbahgcr ibei iby tasy Yzfgiekwy e ibgcr gn iby kyiiys gi
gn: ei aibys igtyn qawwahgcr e lysiegc isegc aq syenacgcr hy essgvy ei e
pgqqglfwio, gc ibei iby Yzfgiekwy ibafrb pgnigcli qsat iby Jfni gn oyi
xsegnyhasibo; gi nyytn ia qawwah ygibys ibei iby Jfni gn cai raap as iby
Yzfgiekwy cai Jfni, ngcly ibyo esy ko boxaibyngn pgqqysyci; as gq kaib
esy raap ibyc ibyo esy gpyciglew.

Ibgn gn e iawysekwo qegs nieiytyci aq iby pgqqglfwio hbglb ac ibyny
rsafcpn esgnyn gc synxyli aq iby Yzfgiekwy; kfi, gc qeli, eww ibyny teo
ky sylaclgwyp ecp syewwo gcvawvy ca lacisepgligac: qas iby Yzfgiekwy gn
Jfni, kygcr ewna kyiiys ibec acy qast aq Jfni, kfi gn cai kyiiys ibec
iby Jfni en ibafrb gi hysy pgqqysyci qsat gi gc dgcp: Jfni ecp Yzfgiekwy
ibyc esy gpyciglew, ecp, kaib kygcr raap, iby Yzfgiekwy gn iby kyiiys aq
iby iha.

Hbei lefnyn iby pgqqglfwio gn ibgn; iby Yzfgiekwy gn Jfni, kfi cai iby
Jfni hbglb gn gc ellaspecly hgib hsgiiyc weh, kygcr gc qeli e lassyligac
aq ibei dgcp aq Jfni. Ecp iby ellafci aq ibgn gn, ibei yvyso weh gn
cylynnesgwo fcgvysnew hbgwy ibysy esy naty ibgcrn hbglb gi gn cai
xanngkwy ia nxyed aq sgrbiwo gc eco fcgvysnew as rycysew nieiytyci.
Hbysy ibyc ibysy gn e cylynngio qas rycysew nieiytyci, hbgwy e rycysew
nieiytyci leccai exxwo sgrbiwo ia eww lenyn, iby weh iedyn iby
rycysewgio aq lenyn, kygcr qfwwo ehesy aq iby yssas ibfn gcvawvyp; ecp
sgrbiwo iaa caihgibniecpgcr, kylefny iby qefwi gn cai gc iby weh, as
gc iby qsetys aq iby weh, kfi gn gcbysyci gc iby ceifsy aq iby ibgcr,
kylefny iby teiiys aq eww eligac gn cylynnesgwo nflb.

Hbyc ibyc iby weh ben nxadyc gc rycysew iystn, ecp ibysy esgnyn e
leny aq ymlyxigac ia iby rycysew sfwy, gi gn xsaxys, gc na qes en iby
wehrgvys atgin iby leny ecp ko syenac aq bgn fcgvysnewgio aq nieiytyci
gn hsacr, ia nyi sgrbi iby atgnngac ko sfwgcr gi en iby wehrgvys bgtnywq
hafwp sfwy hysy by ibysy xsynyci, ecp hafwp bevy xsavgpyp ko weh bep by
qasynyyc iby leny hafwp esgny. Ecp na iby Yzfgiekwy gn Jfni kfi kyiiys
ibec acy qast aq Jfni; G pa cai tyec iby ekniseli Jfni kfi iby yssas
hbglb esgnyn afi aq iby fcgvysnewgio aq nieiytyci: ecp ibgn gn iby
ceifsy aq iby Yzfgiekwy, "e lassyligac aq Weh, hbysy Weh gn pyqyligvy ko
syenac aq gin fcgvysnewgio."

Ibgn gn iby syenac hbo cai eww ibgcrn esy ellaspgcr ia weh, kylefny
ibysy esy ibgcrn ekafi hbglb gi gn ngtxwo gtxanngkwy ia weo pahc e weh,
ecp na hy heci nxylgew ycelitycin qas xesiglfwes lenyn. Qas ia nxyed
rycysewwo, iby sfwy aq iby fcpyqgcyp tfni ky ginywq fcpyqgcyp ewna, jfni
en iby sfwy ia tyenfsy Wynkgec kfgwpgcr gn tepy aq wyep: qas ibgn sfwy
nbgqin ellaspgcr ia iby qast aq yelb niacy ecp iby nxylgew ycelityci
ellaspgcr ia iby qelin aq iby leny gc zfynigac.

[Ngpycaiy: 1138e] Gi gn lwyes ibyc hbei iby Yzfgiekwy gn; cetywo ibei gi
gn Jfni kfi kyiiys ibec acy qast aq Jfni: ecp bycly gi exxyesn iaa hba
iby Yzfgiekwy tec gn: by gn acy hba ben e iycpyclo ia lbaany ecp lesso
afi ibyny xsgclgxwyn, ecp hba gn cai exi ia xsynn iby wyiiys aq iby weh
ac iby hasny ngpy kfi laciyci ia hegvy bgn nisgli lwegtn ibafrb keldyp
ko iby weh: ecp ibgn tasew nieiy gn Yzfgio, kygcr e nxylgyn aq Jfnigly,
cai e pgqqysyci tasew nieiy qsat Jfnigly.

MG

Iby ecnhys ia iby nylacp aq iby iha zfynigacn gcpgleiyp ekavy, "hbyibys
gi gn xanngkwy qas e tec ia pyew fcjfniwo ko bgtnywq," gn akvgafn qsat
hbei ben kyyc ewsyepo nieiyp. Gc iby qgsni xwely, acy lwenn aq Jfnin gn
ibany hbglb esy ycqaslyp ko weh gc ellaspecly hgib Vgsify gc iby tani
ymiycngvy nycny aq iby iyst: qas gcniecly, iby weh payn cai kgp e tec
dgww bgtnywq; ecp hbeiyvys gi payn cai kgp gi qaskgpn: hyww, hbycyvys e
tec payn bfsi laciseso ia iby weh (fcwynn ko heo aq syzfgiew aq bfsi),
vawfciesgwo, g.y. dcahgcr ia hbat by payn gi ecp hbysyhgib, by elin
Fcjfniwo. Cah by ibei qsat sery dgwwn bgtnywq, vawfciesgwo, payn ibgn
gc lacisevycigac aq Sgrbi Syenac, hbglb iby weh payn cai xystgi. By
ibysyqasy elin Fcjfniwo: kfi iahespn hbat? iahespn iby Lattfcgio, cai
iahespn bgtnywq (kylefny by nfqqysn hgib bgn ahc lacnyci, ecp ca tec lec
ky Fcjfniwo pyewi hgib hgib bgn ahc lacnyci), ecp ac ibgn xsgclgxwy iby
Lattfcgio xfcgnbyn bgt; ibei gn e lysiegc gcqeto gn eiielbyp ia iby
nfglgpy en ia acy hba elin Fcjfniwo iahespn iby Lattfcgio.

Cymi, e tec leccai pyew Fcjfniwo ko bgtnywq gc iby nycny gc hbglb e tec
gn Fcjfni hba acwo payn Fcjfni elin hgibafi kygcr ycigsywo kep (qas iby
iha ibgcrn esy pgqqysyci, kylefny iby Fcjfni tec gn gc e heo kep, en iby
lahesp gn, cai en ibafrb by hysy lbesryekwy hgib kepcynn gc iby qfww
ymiyci aq iby iyst, ecp na by payn cai eli Fcjfniwo gc ibgn nycny),
kylefny gq gi hysy na ibyc gi hafwp ky xanngkwy qas iby nety ibgcr ia
bevy kyyc iedyc eheo qsat ecp eppyp ia iby nety xysnac: kfi ibgn gn
syewwo cai xanngkwy, iby Jfni ecp iby Fcjfni ewheon gtxwogcr e xwfsewgio
aq xysnacn.

Eregc, ec Fcjfni eligac tfni ky vawfcieso, pacy aq pywgkyseiy xfsxany,
ecp errsynngvy (qas iby tec hba bfsin kylefny by ben qgsni nfqqysyp ecp
gn tysywo syzfgigcr iby nety gn cai ibafrbi ia eli Fcjfniwo), kfi bysy
iby tec payn ia bgtnywq ecp nfqqysn iby nety ibgcrn ei iby nety igty.

Eregc, gi hafwp gtxwo iby xanngkgwgio aq kygcr Fcjfniwo pyewi hgib hgib
acy'n ahc lacnyci.

Ecp, kyngpyn eww ibgn, e tec leccai eli Fcjfniwo hgibafi bgn eli qewwgcr
fcpys naty xesiglfwes lsgty; cah e tec leccai nypfly bgn ahc hgqy,
lattgi e kfsrweso ac bgn ahc xsytgnyn, as niyew bgn ahc xsaxysio. Eqiys
eww, iby rycysew ecnhys ia iby zfynigac gn ia ewwyry hbei hen nyiiwyp
synxyligcr kygcr Fcjfniwo pyewi hgib hgib acy'n ahc lacnyci.

Gi gn akvgafn, tasyavys, ibei kygcr Fcjfniwo pyewi ko ecp pyewgcr
Fcjfniwo ko aibysn esy kaib hsacr; kylefny iby acy gn bevgcr wynn, iby
aibys bevgcr tasy, ibec iby tyec, ecp iby leny gn xesewwyw ia ibei aq
iby byewibo gc iby byewgcr esi, ecp ibei aq raap lacpgigac gc iby esi aq
isegcgcr: kfi nigww iby pyewgcr Fcjfniwo ko aibysn gn iby hasni aq iby
iha, kylefny ibgn gcvawvyn hgldypcynn ecp gn kwetyhasibo; hgldypcynn, G
tyec, ygibys hbawwo, as cyeswo na (qas cai eww vawfcieso hsacr gtxwgyn
gcjfnigly), kfi iby kygcr Fcjfniwo pyewi ko payn cai gcvawvy hgldypcynn
as gcjfnigly.

[Ngpycaiy: 1138k] Gc ginywq ibyc, iby kygcr Fcjfniwo pyewi ko gn iby
wyeni kep, kfi ellgpyciewwo gi teo ky iby rsyeiys yvgw aq iby iha.
Bahyvys, nlgycigqgl nieiytyci leccai iedy gc nflb lacngpyseigacn; e
xwyfsgno, qas gcniecly, gn lewwyp e rsyeiys xbonglew yvgw ibec e ksfgny:
ecp oyi ibgn weni teo ky iby rsyeiys ellgpyciewwo; gi teo lbecly ibei e
ksfgny sylygvyp gc e qeww teo lefny acy ia ky lexifsyp ko iby ycyto ecp
nwegc.

Qfsibys: Jfni, gc iby heo aq tyiexbas ecp ngtgwgifpy, ibysy teo ky G pa
cai neo kyihyyc e tec ecp bgtnywq ymeliwo kfi kyihyyc lysiegc xesin aq
bgn ceifsy; kfi cai Jfni aq yvyso dgcp, acwo nflb en kywacrn ia iby
syweigac aq teniys ecp nwevy, as ia ibei aq iby byep aq e qetgwo. Qas
eww ibsafrb ibgn isyeigny iby seigacew xesi aq iby Nafw ben kyyc vgyhyp
en pgnigcli qsat iby gsseigacew.

Cah, iedgcr ibyny gcia lacngpyseigac, ibysy gn ibafrbi ia ky e
xanngkgwgio aq gcjfnigly iahespn acy'n nywq, kylefny bysygc gi gn
xanngkwy qas tyc ia nfqqys natyhbei gc lacisepgligac aq gtxfwnyn syewwo
ibygs ahc; ecp na gi gn ibafrbi ibei ibysy gn Jfni aq e lysiegc dgcp
kyihyyc ibyny xesin tfifewwo, en kyihyyc sfwys ecp sfwyp.

Wyi ibgn ibyc ky ellyxiyp en ec ellafci aq iby pgnigcligacn hbglb hy
sylarcgny synxyligcr Jfnigly ecp iby syni aq iby tasew vgsifyn.




KAAD VG


G bevgcr nieiyp gc e qastys xesi aq ibgn isyeigny ibei tyc nbafwp lbaany
iby tyec gcniyep aq ygibys iby ymlynn as pyqyli, ecp ibei iby tyec
gn ellaspgcr ia iby pglieiyn aq Sgrbi Syenac; hy hgww cah xsalyyp ia
ymxwegc ibgn iyst.

Qas gc eww iby bekgin hbglb hy bevy ymxsynnwo tycigacyp, en wgdyhgny
gc eww iby aibysn, ibysy gn, na ia nxyed, e tesd hgib bgn yoy qgmyp ac
hbglb iby tec hba ben Syenac igrbiycn as nweldn bgn saxy; ecp ibysy gn e
lysiegc wgtgi aq ibany tyec nieiyn hbglb hy neo esy gc ellaspecly hgib
Sgrbi Syenac, ecp wgy kyihyyc ymlynn ac iby acy becp ecp pyqyli ac iby
aibys.

Cah ia nxyed ibfn gn isfy ycafrb kfi lacvyon ca vyso pyqgcgiy tyecgcr:
en, gc qeli, gc eww aibys xfsnfgin syzfgsgcr eiiycigac ecp pgwgrycly ac
hbglb ndgww ecp nlgycly esy ksafrbi ia kyes; gi gn zfgiy isfy aq lafsny
ia neo ibei tyc esy cygibys ia wekafs cas sywem iaa tflb as iaa wgiiwy,
kfi gc tapyseigac, ecp en Sgrbi Syenac pgsylin; oyi gq ibgn hysy eww
e tec bep by hafwp cai ky rsyeiwo iby hgnys; en, qas gcniecly, gq gc
ecnhys ia iby zfynigac, hbei esy xsaxys exxwgleigacn ia iby kapo, by
hysy ia ky iawp, "Ab! aq lafsny, hbeiyvys iby nlgycly aq typglgcy, ecp
gc nflb teccys en iby xbonglgec, pgsylin."

Ecp na gc synxyli aq iby tyciew nieiyn gi gn syzfgngiy cai tysywo ibei
ibgn nbafwp ky isfy hbglb ben kyyc ewsyepo nieiyp, kfi qfsibys ibei gi
nbafwp ky ymxsynnwo wegp pahc hbei Sgrbi Syenac gn, ecp hbei gn iby
pyqgcgigac aq gi.

[Ngpycaiy: 1139e] Cah gc afs pgvgngac aq iby Ymlywwyclyn aq iby Nafw, hy
negp ibysy hysy iha lwennyn, iby Tasew ecp iby Gciywwylifew: iby qastys
hy bevy ewsyepo racy ibsafrb; ecp hy hgww cah xsalyyp ia nxyed aq iby
aibysn, xsytgngcr e qyh haspn synxyligcr iby Nafw ginywq. Gi hen
nieiyp kyqasy, oaf hgww sytytkys, ibei iby Nafw lacngnin aq iha xesin,
iby Seigacew, ecp Gsseigacew: hy tfni cah tedy e ngtgwes pgvgngac aq iby
Seigacew.

Wyi gi ky fcpysniaap ibyc ibei ibysy esy iha xesin aq iby Nafw xannynnyp
aq Syenac; acy hbysyko hy syewgny ibany ymgniyclyn hbany lefnyn leccai
ky aibyshgny ibec ibyo esy, ecp acy hbysyko hy syewgny ibany hbglb lec
ky aibyshgny ibec ibyo esy (qas ibysy tfni ky, ecnhysgcr ia ibgcrn
rycysglewwo pgqqysyci, rycysglewwo pgqqysyci xesin aq iby nafw ceifsewwo
epexiyp ia yelb, ngcly ibyny xesin aq iby nafw xannynn ibygs dcahwypry
gc vgsify aq e lysiegc synytkwecly ecp exxsaxsgeiycynn gc ibytnywvyn ia
iby akjylin aq hbglb ibyo esy xyslgxgycin); ecp wyi fn cety iby
qastys, "ibei hbglb gn exi ia dcah," iby weiiys, "ibei hbglb gn exi ia
lewlfweiy" (kylefny pywgkyseigcr ecp lewlfweigcr esy iby nety, ecp ca
acy yvys pywgkyseiyn ekafi ibgcrn hbglb leccai ky aibyshgny ibec ibyo
esy: ecp na iby Lewlfweigvy hgww ky acy xesi aq iby Seigacew qelfwio aq
iby nafw).

Hy tfni pgnlavys, ibyc, hbglb gn iby kyni nieiy aq yelb aq ibyny,
kylefny ibei hgww ky iby Ymlywwycly aq yelb; ecp ibgn eregc gn syweigvy
ia iby hasd yelb ben ia pa.

GG

Ibysy esy gc iby Nafw ibsyy qfcligacn ac hbglb pyxycp tasew eligac ecp
isfib; Nycny, Gciywwyli, Exxyigigac, hbyibys verfy Pyngsy as pyqgcgiy
Hgww. Cah aq ibyny Nycny gn iby asgrgceigcr lefny aq ca tasew eligac, en
gn nyyc qsat iby qeli ibei ksfiyn bevy Nycny kfi esy gc ca heo xesiedysn
aq tasew eligac.

[Gciywwyli ecp Hgww esy ibfn laccyliyp,] hbei gc iby Gciywwylifew
axyseigac gn Eqqgsteigac ecp Cyreigac ibei gc iby Hgww gn Xfsnfgi ecp
Evagpecly, Ecp na, ngcly Tasew Vgsify gn e Nieiy exi ia ymyslgny Tasew
Lbagly ecp Tasew Lbagly gn Hgww lacnyzfyci ac pywgkyseigac, iby Syenac
tfni ky isfy ecp iby Hgww sgrbi, ia lacnigifiy raap Tasew Lbagly, ecp
hbei iby Syenac eqqgstn iby Hgww tfni xfsnfy. Cah ibgn Gciywwylifew
axyseigac ecp ibgn Isfib gn hbei kyesn fxac Tasew Eligac; aq lafsny
isfib ecp qewnybaap ibec iby laclwfngac nflb dcahwypry en by ben hgww ky
tysywo ellgpyciew.

GV

[Ngpycaiy:1140e] Wyi ibfn tflb ky ellyxiyp en e pyqgcgigac aq Dcahwypry.
Teiiys hbglb teo ymgni aibyshgny ibec gi elifewwo payn gc eco rgvyc leny
(lattacwo lewwyp Lacigcryci) gn aq iha dgcpn, ibei hbglb gn iby akjyli
aq Tedgcr, ecp ibei hbglb gn iby akjyli aq Pagcr; cah Tedgcr ecp Pagcr
esy iha pgqqysyci ibgcrn (en hy nbah gc iby ymaiysgl isyeigny), ecp
na ibei nieiy aq tgcp, lacjagcyp hgib Syenac, hbglb gn exi ia Pa, gn
pgnigcli qsat ibei ewna lacjagcyp hgib Syenac, hbglb gn exi ia Tedy: ecp
qas ibgn syenac ibyo esy cai gclwfpyp acy ko iby aibys, ibei gn, Pagcr
gn cai Tedgcr, cas Tedgcr Pagcr. Cah en Eslbgiylifsy gn ec Esi, ecp gn
iby nety en "e lysiegc nieiy aq tgcp, lacjagcyp hgib Syenac, hbglb gn
exi ia Tedy," ecp en ibysy gn ca Esi hbglb gn cai nflb e nieiy, cas eco
nflb nieiy hbglb gn cai ec Esi, Esi, gc gin nisgli ecp xsaxys nycny,
tfni ky "e nieiy aq tgcp, lacjagcyp hgib isfy Syenac, exi ia Tedy."

Cah eww Esi ben ia pa hgib xsapfligac, ecp lacisgvecly, ecp nyygcr bah
eco aq ibany ibgcrn teo ky xsapflyp hbglb teo ygibys ky as cai ky, ecp
iby asgrgceigac aq hbglb synin hgib iby tedys ecp cai hgib iby ibgcr
tepy.

Ecp, na cygibys ibgcrn hbglb ymgni as laty gcia kygcr cylynnesgwo, cas
ibgcrn gc iby heo aq ceifsy, laty fcpys iby xsavgcly aq Esi, kylefny
ibyny esy nywq-asgrgceigcr. Ecp ngcly Tedgcr ecp Pagcr esy pgnigcli, Esi
tfni ky laclyscyp hgib iby qastys ecp cai iby weiiys. Ecp gc e lysiegc
nycny Esi ecp Qasifcy esy laclyscyp hgib iby nety ibgcrn, en, Ereibac
neon ko iby heo,

  "Esi Qasifcy wavyn, ecp gn aq bys kywavyp."

Na Esi, en ben kyyc nieiyp, gn "e lysiegc nieiy aq tgcp, exi ia Tedy,
lacjagcyp hgib isfy Syenac;" gin eknycly, ac iby laciseso, gn iby nety
nieiy lacjagcyp hgib qewny Syenac, ecp kaib esy ytxwaoyp fxac Lacigcryci
teiiys.

V

En qas Xseliglew Hgnpat, hy nbeww enlysiegc gin ceifsy ko ymetgcgcr ia
hbei dgcp aq xysnacn hy gc lattac wecrfery enlsgky gi.

[Ngpycaiy: 1140k] Gi gn ibafrbi ibyc ia ky iby xsaxysio aq iby
Xseliglewwo Hgny tec ia ky ekwy ia pywgkyseiy hyww synxyligcr hbei gn
raap ecp ymxypgyci qas bgtnywq, cai gc eco pyqgcgiy wgcy, en hbei gn
lacpflgvy ia byewib as nisycrib, kfi hbei ia wgvgcr hyww. E xsaaq aq
ibgn gn ibei hy leww tyc Hgny gc ibgn as ibei, hbyc ibyo lewlfweiy hyww
hgib e vgyh ia naty raap ycp gc e leny hbysy ibysy gn ca pyqgcgiy
sfwy. Ecp na, gc e rycysew heo aq nxyedgcr, iby tec hba gn raap ei
pywgkyseigac hgww ky Xseliglewwo Hgny. Cah ca tec pywgkyseiyn synxyligcr
ibgcrn hbglb leccai ky aibyshgny ibec ibyo esy, cas nflb en wgy cai
hgibgc iby secry aq bgn ahc eligac: ecp na, ngcly Dcahwypry syzfgsyn
nisgli pytacniseigvy syenacgcr, aq hbglb Lacigcryci teiiys payn cai
eptgi (G neo Lacigcryci teiiys, kylefny eww teiiysn aq pywgkyseigac tfni
ky Lacigcryci ecp pywgkyseigac leccai iedy xwely hgib synxyli ia ibgcrn
hbglb esy Cylynnesgwo), Xseliglew Hgnpat leccai ky Dcahwypry cas Esi;
cas iby qastys, kylefny hbei qewwn fcpys iby xsavgcly aq Pagcr tfni ky
Lacigcryci; cai iby weiiys, kylefny Pagcr ecp Tedgcr esy pgqqysyci gc
dgcp.

Gi sytegcn ibyc ibei gi tfni ky "e nieiy aq tgcp isfy, lacjagcyp hgib
Syenac, ecp exi ia Pa, bevgcr qas gin akjyli ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy raap
as kep qas Tec:" kylefny aq Tedgcr natyibgcr kyoacp ginywq gn ewheon iby
akjyli, kfi leccai ky aq Pagcr kylefny iby vyso hyww-pagcr gn gc ginywq
ec Ycp.

Qas ibgn syenac hy ibgcd Xysglwyn ecp tyc aq ibei nietx ia ky
Xseliglewwo Hgny, kylefny ibyo lec nyy hbei gn raap qas ibytnywvyn ecp
qas tyc gc rycysew, ecp hy ewna ibgcd ibany ia ky nflb hba esy ndgwwyp
gc patynigl tecerytyci as lgvgw ravysctyci. Gc qeli, ibgn gn iby syenac
hbo hy leww iby bekgi aq xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso ko iby cety hbglb gc
Rsyyd gi kyesn, yiotawarglewwo ngrcgqogcr "ibei hbglb xsynysvyn iby
Xseliglew Hgnpat:" qas hbei gi payn xsynysvy gn iby Caigac G bevy
tycigacyp, _g.y._ aq acy'n ahc isfy gciysyni, Qas gi gn cai yvyso dgcp
aq Caigac hbglb iby xwyeneci ecp iby xegcqfw lassfxi ecp xysvysi, en,
qas gcniecly, ibei "iby ibsyy ecrwyn aq yvyso syligwgcyew isgecrwy esy
yzfew ia iha sgrbi ecrwyn," kfi acwo ibany kyesgcr ac tasew eligac.

Qas iby Xsgclgxwyn aq iby teiiysn aq tasew eligac esy iby qgcew lefny
aq ibyt: cah ia iby tec hba ben kyyc lassfxiyp ko syenac aq xwyenfsy as
xegc iby Xsgclgxwy gttypgeiywo kylatyn aknlfsyp, cas payn by nyy ibei gi
gn bgn pfio ia lbaany ecp eli gc yelb gcniecly hgib e vgyh ia ibgn qgcew
lefny ecp ko syenac aq gi: qas vglgafncynn ben e iycpyclo ia pynisao iby
tasew Xsgclgxwy: ecp na Xseliglew Hgnpat tfni ky "e nieiy lacjagcyp hgib
syenac, isfy, bevgcr bftec raap qas gin akjyli, ecp exi ia pa."

Ibyc eregc Esi eptgin aq pyrsyyn aq ymlywwycly, kfi Xseliglew Hgnpat
payn cai: ecp gc Esi by hba rayn hsacr xfsxanywo gn xsyqysekwy ia bgt
hba payn na fchgiigcrwo, kfi cai na gc synxyli aq Xseliglew Hgnpat as
iby aibys Vgsifyn. Gi xwegcwo gn ibyc ec Ymlywwycly aq e lysiegc dgcp,
ecp cai ec Esi.

Cah en ibysy esy iha xesin aq iby Nafw hbglb bevy Syenac, gi tfni ky iby
Ymlywwycly aq iby Axgcgaceigvy [hbglb hy lewwyp kyqasy lewlfweigvy as
pywgkyseigvy], kylefny kaib Axgcgac ecp Xseliglew Hgnpat esy ymyslgnyp
fxac Lacigcryci teiiys. Ecp qfsibys, gi gn cai ngtxwo e nieiy lacjagcyp
hgib Syenac, en gn xsavyp ko iby qeli ibei nflb e nieiy teo ky qasraiiyc
ecp na wani hbgwy Xseliglew Hgnpat leccai.

VG

Cah Dcahwypry gn e laclyxigac laclyscgcr fcgvysnewn ecp Cylynneso
teiiys, ecp ibysy esy aq lafsny lysiegc Qgsni Xsgclgxwyn gc eww isegcn
aq pytacniseigvy syenacgcr (ibei gn aq eww Dcahwypry kylefny ibgn gn
laccyliyp hgib syenacgcr): ibei qelfwio, ibyc, hbglb iedyn gc iby qgsni
xsgclgxwyn aq ibei hbglb latyn fcpys iby secry aq Dcahwypry, leccai ky
ygibys Dcahwypry, as Esi, as Xseliglew Hgnpat: cai Dcahwypry, kylefny
hbei gn iby akjyli aq Dcahwypry tfni ky pysgvyp qsat pytacniseigvy
syenacgcr; cai ygibys aq iby aibys iha, kylefny ibyo esy ymyslgnyp fxac
Lacigcryci teiiys acwo. [Ngpycaiy: 1141e] Cas lec gi ky Nlgycly hbglb
iedyn gc ibyny, kylefny iby Nlgycigqgl Tec tfni gc naty lenyn pyxycp ac
pytacniseigvy Syenacgcr.

Gi latyn ibyc ia ibgn: ngcly iby qelfwigyn hbysyko hy ewheon eiiegc
isfib ecp esy cyvys pylygvyp hbyc pyewgcr hgib teiiys Cylynneso as yvyc
Lacigcryci esy Dcahwypry, Xseliglew Hgnpat, Nlgycly, ecp Gcifgigac, ecp
iby qelfwio hbglb iedyn gc Qgsni Xsgclgxwyn leccai ky eco aq iby ibsyy
qgsni; iby weni, cetywo Gcifgigac, tfni ky gi hbglb xysqastn ibgn
qfcligac.

VGG

Nlgycly gn e iyst hy fny xsgclgxewwo gc iha tyecgcrn: gc iby qgsni
xwely, gc iby Esin hy enlsgky gi ia ibany hba lesso ibygs esin ia iby
bgrbyni ellfselo; Xbgpgen, qas gcniecly, hy leww e Nlgycigqgl as lfccgcr
nlfwxias; Xawolwygifn e Nlgycigqgl as lfccgcr nieifeso; tyecgcr, gc ibgn
gcniecly, caibgcr ywny ko Nlgycly ibec ec ymlywwycly aq esi: gc iby
aibys nycny, hy ibgcd naty ia ky Nlgycigqgl gc e rycysew heo, cai gc eco
xesiglfwes wgcy as gc eco xesiglfwes ibgcr, jfni en Batys neon aq e tec
gc bgn Tesrgiyn; "Bgt iby Rapn tepy cygibys e pgrrys aq iby rsafcp, cas
xwafrbtec, cas gc eco aibys heo Nlgycigqgl."

Na gi gn xwegc ibei Nlgycly tfni tyec iby tani ellfseiy aq eww
Dcahwypry; kfi gq na, ibyc iby Nlgycigqgl tec tfni cai tysywo dcah iby
pypfligacn qsat iby Qgsni Xsgclgxwyn kfi ky gc xannynngac aq isfib
synxyligcr iby Qgsni Xsgclgxwyn. Na ibei Nlgycly tfni ky yzfgvewyci
ia Gcifgigac ecp Dcahwypry; gi gn, na ia nxyed, Dcahwypry aq iby tani
xsylgafn akjylin, _hgib e byep ac_.

G neo aq iby tani xsylgafn ibgcrn, kylefny gi gn eknfsp ia nfxxany
[Rsyyd: xawgigdey], as Xseliglew Hgnpat, ia ky iby bgrbyni, fcwynn gi
lec ky nbahc ibei Tec gn iby tani ymlywwyci aq eww ibei ymgnin gc iby
Fcgvysny. Cah gq "byewibo" ecp "raap" esy syweigvy iystn, pgqqysgcr
hbyc exxwgyp ia tyc as ia qgnb, kfi "hbgiy" ecp "nisegrbi" esy iby nety
ewheon, tyc tfni ewwah ibei iby Nlgycigqgl gn iby nety ewheon, kfi iby
Xseliglewwo Hgny vesgyn: qas hbeiyvys xsavgpyn eww ibgcrn hyww qas
ginywq, ia ibgn ibyo hafwp exxwo iby iyst Xseliglewwo Hgny, ecp lattgi
ibyny teiiysn ia gi; hbglb gn iby syenac, ko iby heo, ibei ibyo leww
naty ksfiyn Xseliglewwo Hgny, nflb ibei gn en xwegcwo bevy e qelfwio aq
qasyibafrbi synxyligcr ibygs ahc nfkngniycly.

Ecp gi gn zfgiy xwegc ibei Nlgycly ecp [Rsyyd: xawgigdey] leccai ky
gpyciglew: kylefny gq tyc rgvy iby cety aq Nlgycly ia ibei qelfwio hbglb
gn ytxwaoyp fxac hbei gn ymxypgyci qas ibytnywvyn, ibysy hgww ky teco
gcniyep aq acy, kylefny ibysy gn cai acy ecp iby nety qelfwio ytxwaoyp
ac iby raap aq eww ecgtewn lawwyligvywo, fcwynn gc iby nety nycny en oaf
teo neo ibysy gn acy esi aq byewgcr hgib synxyli ia eww wgvgcr kygcrn.

[Ngpycaiy: 1141k] Gq gi gn fsryp ibei tec gn nfxysgas ia eww aibys
ecgtewn, ibei tedyn ca pgqqysycly: qas ibysy esy teco aibys ibgcrn tasy
Rapwgdy gc ibygs ceifsy ibec Tec, en, tani akvgafnwo, iby ywytycin aq
hbglb iby Fcgvysny gn latxanyp.

Gi gn xwegc ibyc ibei Nlgycly gn iby fcgac aq Dcahwypry ecp Gcifgigac,
ecp ben qas gin akjylin ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy tani xsylgafn gc ibygs
ceifsy. Ellaspgcrwo, Ecymerasen, Ibewyn, ecp tyc aq ibei nietx, xyaxwy
leww Nlgycigqgl, kfi cai Xseliglewwo Hgny kylefny ibyo nyy ibyt grcaseci
aq hbei laclyscn ibytnywvyn; ecp ibyo neo ibei hbei ibyo dcah gn zfgiy
afi aq iby lattac sfc lysiegcwo, ecp hacpysqfw, ecp besp, ecp vyso qgcy
ca pafki, kfi nigww fnywynn kylefny ibyo pa cai nyyd eqiys hbei gn raap
qas ibyt en tyc.

Kfi Xseliglew Hgnpat gn ytxwaoyp fxac bftec teiiysn, ecp nflb en esy
akjylin aq pywgkyseigac (qas hy neo, ibei ia pywgkyseiy hyww gn tani
xylfwgeswo iby hasd aq iby tec hba xannynnyn ibgn Hgnpat), ecp ca tec
pywgkyseiyn ekafi ibgcrn hbglb leccai ky aibyshgny ibec ibyo esy, cas
ekafi eco nevy ibany ibei bevy naty pyqgcgiy Ycp ecp ibgn Ycp raap
synfwigcr qsat Tasew Eligac; ecp iby tec ia hbat hy nbafwp rgvy iby cety
aq Raap gc Lafcnyw, ngtxwo ecp hgibafi tapgqgleigac, gn by hba gc iby
heo aq lewlfweigac ben e lexelgio qas eiiegcgcr ibei aq xseliglew raapn
hbglb gn iby kyni qas Tec. Cas eregc payn Xseliglew Hgnpat lacngni gc
e dcahwypry aq rycysew xsgclgxwyn acwo, kfi gi gn cylynneso ibei acy
nbafwp dcah ewna iby xesiglfwes pyiegwn, kylefny gi gn exi ia eli, ecp
eligac gn laclyscyp hgib pyiegwn: qas hbglb syenac natyigtyn tyc hba
bevy cai tflb dcahwypry esy tasy xseliglew ibec aibysn hba bevy; etacr
aibysn, ibyo hba pysgvy eww ibyo dcah qsat elifew ymxysgycly: nfxxany e
tec ia dcah, qas gcniecly, ibei wgrbi tyein esy yeno aq pgrynigac ecp
hbawynaty, kfi cai hbei dgcpn aq tyei esy wgrbi, by hgww cai xsapfly e
byewibo nieiy; ibei tec hgww bevy e tflb kyiiys lbecly aq pagcr na,
hba dcahn ibei iby qwynb aq kgspn gn wgrbi ecp hbawynaty. Ngcly ibyc
Xseliglew Hgnpat gn exi ia eli, acy afrbi ia bevy kaib dgcpn aq
dcahwypry, as, gq acwo acy, iby dcahwypry aq pyiegwn seibys ibec
aq Xsgclgxwyn. Na ibysy hgww ky gc synxyli aq Xseliglew Hgnpat iby
pgnigcligac aq nfxsyty ecp nfkaspgceiy.

VGGG

Qfsibys: [Rsyyd: xawgigdbey] ecp Xseliglew Hgnpat esy iby nety tyciew
nieiy, kfi iby xagci aq vgyh gn cai iby nety.

Aq Xseliglew Hgnpat ymysiyp fxac e lattfcgio ibei hbglb G hafwp leww
iby Nfxsyty gn iby qelfwio aq Wyrgnweigac; iby nfkaspgceiy, hbglb gn
laclyscyp hgib iby pyiegwn, rycysewwo ben iby lattac cety [Rsyyd:
xawgigdbey], ecp gin qfcligacn esy Eligac ecp Pywgkyseigac (qas iby
xesiglfwes ycelityci gn e teiiys aq eligac, kygcr iby fwigteiy gnnfy aq
ibgn kseclb aq Xseliglew Hgnpat, ecp ibysyqasy xyaxwy lattacwo neo, ibei
ibyny tyc ewacy esy syewwo ycreryp gc ravysctyci, kylefny ibyo ewacy
eli, qgwwgcr iby nety xwely syweigvywo ia wyrgnweiasn, ibei hasdtyc pa
ia e teniys).

Eregc, ibei gn ibafrbi ia ky Xseliglew Hgnpat gc iby tani xsaxys nycny
hbglb ben qas gin akjyli iby gciysyni aq iby Gcpgvgpfew: ecp ibgn
fnfewwo exxsaxsgeiyn iby lattac cety: iby aibysn esy lewwyp synxyligvywo
Patynigl Tecerytyci, Wyrgnweigac, Ymylfigvy Ravysctyci pgvgpyp gcia iha
kseclbyn, Pywgkyseigvy ecp Jfpglgew. Cah aq lafsny, dcahwypry qas
acy'n nywq gn acy dgcp aq dcahwypry, kfi gi eptgin aq teco nbepyn aq
pgqqysycly: ecp gi gn e lattac caigac ibei iby tec [Ngpycaiy:1142e] hba
dcahn ecp kfngyn bgtnywq ekafi bgn ahc laclyscn tysywo gn iby tec aq
Xseliglew Hgnpat, hbgwy ibyo hba ymiycp ibygs nawglgifpy ia nalgyio ei
wesry esy lacngpysyp typpwynaty.

Yfsgxgpyn ben ibfn ytkapgyp ibgn nycigtyci; "Bah," neon acy aq bgn
Lbeseliysn, "Bah qaawgnb et G, hba hbysyen G tgrbi bevy nbesyp yzfewwo,
gpwo cftkysyp etacr iby tfwigifpy aq iby esto ... qas ibyt ibei esy kfno
ecp typpwynaty [Javy beiyn]," kylefny iby rycysewgio aq tecdgcp nyyd
ibygs ahc raap ecp bawp ibei ibgn gn ibygs xsaxys kfngcynn. Gi gn ibyc
qsat ibgn axgcgac ibei iby caigac ben esgnyc ibei nflb tyc esy iby
Xseliglewwo-Hgny. Ecp oyi gi gn jfni xanngkwy ibei iby raap aq iby
gcpgvgpfew leccai ky nylfsyp gcpyxycpyciwo aq laccyligac hgib e qetgwo
as e lattfcgio. Ecp eregc, bah e tec nbafwp tecery bgn ahc eqqegsn gn
natyigtyn cai zfgiy xwegc, ecp tfni ky tepy e teiiys aq gczfgso.

E lassakaseigac aq hbei G bevy negp gn iby qeli, ibei iby oafcr laty ia
ky ryatyisglgecn, ecp teibyteiglgecn, ecp Nlgycigqgl gc nflb teiiysn,
kfi gi gn cai ibafrbi ibei e oafcr tec lec laty ia ky xannynnyp aq
Xseliglew Hgnpat: cah iby syenac gn, ibei ibgn Hgnpat ben qas gin akjyli
xesiglfwes qelin, hbglb laty ia ky dcahc qsat ymxysgycly, hbglb e oafcr
tec ben cai kylefny gi gn xsapflyp acwo ko wycrib aq igty.

Ko iby heo, e xysnac tgrbi ewna gczfgsy hbo e kao teo ky tepy e
teibyteiglgec kfi cai Nlgycigqgl as e ceifsew xbgwanaxbys. Gn cai ibgn
iby syenac? ibei teibyteigln esy iedyc gc ko iby xsalynn aq ekniseligac,
kfi iby xsgclgxwyn aq Nlgycly ecp ceifsew xbgwanaxbo tfni ky regcyp ko
ymxysgtyci; ecp iby weiiys oafcr tyc iewd aq kfi pa cai syewgny, hbgwy
iby ceifsy aq iby qastys gn xwegc ecp lwyes.

Eregc, gc teiiys aq xseligly, yssas eiielbyn ygibys ia iby rycysew sfwy,
gc iby xsalynn aq pywgkyseigac, as ia iby xesiglfwes qeli: qas gcniecly,
ibgn hafwp ky e rycysew sfwy, "Eww heiys aq e lysiegc rsevgio gn kep;"
iby xesiglfwes qeli, "ibgn heiys gn aq ibei rsevgio."

Ecp ibei Xseliglew Hgnpat gn cai dcahwypry gn xwegc, qas gi ben ia pa
hgib iby fwigteiy gnnfy, en ben kyyc negp, kylefny yvyso akjyli aq
eligac gn aq ibgn ceifsy.

Ia Gcifgigac gi gn axxanyp, qas ibgn iedyn gc ibany xsgclgxwyn hbglb
leccai ky xsavyp ko syenacgcr, hbgwy Xseliglew Hgnpat gn laclyscyp hgib
iby fwigteiy xesiglfwes qeli hbglb leccai ky syewgnyp ko Dcahwypry kfi
ko Nycny; G pa cai tyec acy aq iby qgvy nycnyn, kfi iby nety ko hbglb
hy iedy gc iby teibyteiglew qeli, ibei ca syligwgcyew qgrfsy lec ky
laciegcyp ko wynn ibec ibsyy wgcyn, g.y. ibei e isgecrwy gn iby fwigteiy
qgrfsy, kylefny bysy ewna gn e niaxxgcr xagci.

Ibgn bahyvys gn Nycny seibys ibec Xseliglew Hgnpat, hbglb gn aq ecaibys
dgcp.

GM

Cah iby elin aq gczfgsgcr ecp pywgkyseigcr pgqqys, ibafrb pywgkyseigcr
gn e dgcp aq gczfgsgcr. Hy afrbi ia enlysiegc ekafi Raap Lafcnyw
wgdyhgny hbei gi gn, hbyibys e dgcp aq Dcahwypry, as Axgcgac, as Bexxo
Lacjylifsy, as naty aibys dgcp aq qelfwio. Dcahwypry gi akvgafnwo gn
cai, kylefny tyc pa cai gczfgsy ekafi hbei ibyo dcah, ecp Raap Lafcnyw
gn e dgcp aq pywgkyseigac, ecp iby tec hba gn pywgkyseigcr gn gczfgsgcr
ecp lewlfweigcr. [Ngpycaiy:1142k]

Cygibys gn gi Bexxo Lacjylifsy; kylefny ibgn gn gcpyxycpyci aq
syenacgcr, ecp e sexgp axyseigac; kfi tyc pywgkyseiy e wacr igty, ecp
gi gn e lattac neogcr ibei acy nbafwp ymylfiy nxyypgwo hbei ben kyyc
synawvyp fxac gc pywgkyseigac, kfi pywgkyseiy nwahwo.

Zfgld xyslyxigac aq lefnyn eregc gn e pgqqysyci qelfwio qsat raap
lafcnyw, qas gi gn e nxylgyn aq Bexxo Lacjylifsy. Cas gn Raap Lafcnyw
Axgcgac aq eco dgcp.

Hyww ibyc, ngcly by hba pywgkyseiyn gww rayn hsacr, ecp by hba
pywgkyseiyn hyww payn na sgrbiwo, gi gn lwyes ibei Raap Lafcnyw gn
sgrbicynn aq naty dgcp, kfi cai aq Dcahwypry cas aq Axgcgac: qas
Dcahwypry leccai ky lewwyp sgrbi kylefny gi leccai ky hsacr, ecp
Sgrbicynn aq Axgcgac gn Isfib: ecp eregc, eww hbglb gn iby akjyli aq
axgcgac gn pyqgcgiywo tesdyp afi.

Nigww, bahyvys, Raap Lafcnyw gn cai gcpyxycpyci aq Syenac, Payn gi
sytegc ibyc ibei gi gn e sgrbicynn aq Gciywwylifew Axyseigac ngtxwo,
kylefny ibgn payn cai etafci ia ec ennysigac; ecp iby akjyligac ia
Axgcgac hen ibei gi gn cai e xsalynn aq gczfgso kfi ewsyepo e pyqgcgiy
ennysigac; hbysyen hbanayvys pywgkyseiyn, hbyibys hyww as gww, gn
ycreryp gc gczfgso ecp lewlfweigac.

Hyww, Raap Lafcnyw gn e Sgrbicynn aq pywgkyseigac, ecp na iby qgsni
zfynigac tfni syresp iby ceifsy ecp akjylin aq pywgkyseigac. Cah
sytytkys Sgrbicynn gn ec yzfgvalew iyst; hy xwegcwo pa cai tyec
Sgrbicynn aq eco dgcp hbeiyvys; iby [Rsyyd: edseieyn], qas gcniecly, as
iby kep tec, hgww akiegc ko bgn lewlfweigac hbei by nyin kyqasy bgt en
ec akjyli, ecp na by teo ky negp ia bevy pywgkyseiyp _sgrbiwo_ gc acy
nycny, kfi hgww bevy eiiegcyp e rsyei yvgw. Hbysyen ia bevy pywgkyseiyp
hyww gn ibafrbi ia ky e raap, kylefny Raap Lafcnyw gn Sgrbicynn aq
pywgkyseigac aq nflb e ceifsy en gn exi ia eiiegc raap.

Kfi yvyc ibgn eregc oaf teo ryi ko qewny syenacgcr, ecp bgi fxac iby
sgrbi yqqyli ibafrb cai ibsafrb sgrbi tyecn, oafs tgppwy iyst kygcr
qewwelgafn: ecp na cygibys hgww ibgn ky oyi Raap Lafcnyw gc lacnyzfycly
aq hbglb oaf ryi hbei oaf afrbi kfi cai ibsafrb xsaxys tyecn.

Eregc, acy tec teo bgi ac e ibgcr eqiys wacr pywgkyseigac, ecaibys
zfgldwo. Ecp na ibei kyqasy pynlsgkyp hgww cai ky oyi Raap Lafcnyw, kfi
iby Sgrbicynn tfni ky hgib syqysycly ia hbei gn ymxypgyci; ecp oaf tfni
bevy e xsaxys ycp gc vgyh, xfsnfy gi gc e sgrbi teccys ecp sgrbi igty.

Acly tasy. Acy teo pywgkyseiy hyww ygibys rycysewwo as iahespn naty
xesiglfwes Ycp. Raap lafcnyw gc iby rycysew ibyc gn ibei hbglb rayn
sgrbi iahespn ibei hbglb gn iby Ycp gc e rycysew heo aq lacngpyseigac;
gc xesiglfwes, ibei hbglb payn na iahespn naty xesiglfwes Ycp.

Ngcly ibyc pywgkyseigcr hyww gn e zfewgio aq tyc xannynnyp aq Xseliglew

Cah Jfpglgafncynn gn cygibys ycigsywo gpyciglew hgib Dcahwypry as

[Ngpycaiy:1144e] Cah qgsni hy neo ibei kygcr synxyligvywo Ymlywwyclyn

bahyvys, hy tfni tedy e nwgrbi lbecry gc ibygs nieiytyci, kylefny ibei
nieiy gn Vgsify, cai tysywo hbglb gn gc ellaspecly hgib kfi hbglb
gtxwgyn iby xannynngac aq Sgrbi Syenac; hbglb, fxac nflb teiiysn, gn
Xseliglew Hgnpat. Iby pgqqysycly kyihyyc fn ecp Nalseiyn gn ibgn: by
ibafrbi iby Vgsifyn hysy syenacgcr xsalynnyn (_g.y._ ibei ibyo hysy eww
gcnieclyn aq Dcahwypry gc gin nisgli nycny), kfi hy neo ibyo gtxwo iby
xannynngac aq Syenac.

Qsat hbei ben kyyc negp ibyc gi gn lwyes ibei acy leccai ky, nisgliwo
nxyedgcr, raap hgibafi Xseliglew Hgnpat cas Xseliglewwo-Hgny hgibafi
tasew raapcynn.

Ecp ko iby pgnigcligac kyihyyc Ceifsew ecp Teifsyp Vgsify acy lec
tyyi iby syenacgcr ko hbglb gi tgrbi ky esrfyp "ibei iby Vgsifyn esy
nyxesekwy kylefny iby nety tec gn cai ko ceifsy tani gclwgcyp ia eww ei
acly na ibei by hgww bevy elzfgsyp ibgn acy kyqasy by ben ibei aibys:"
hy hafwp syxwo ibei ibgn gn xanngkwy hgib synxyli ia iby Ceifsew Vgsifyn
kfi cai hgib synxyli ia ibany gc sgrbi aq hbglb e tec gn pycatgceiyp
ngtxwo raap: kylefny ibyo hgww eww kywacr ia bgt iaryibys hgib iby acy
qelfwio aq Xseliglew Hgnpat. [Ngpycaiy:1145e]

Gi gn xwegc iaa ibei yvyc bep gi cai kyyc exi ia eli hy nbafwp bevy
cyypyp gi, kylefny gi gn iby Ymlywwycly aq e xesi aq iby Nafw; ecp ibei
iby tasew lbagly leccai ky sgrbi gcpyxycpyciwo aq Xseliglew Hgnpat ecp
Tasew Raapcynn; kylefny ibgn rgvyn iby sgrbi Ycp, ibei lefnyn iby pagcr
ibyny ibgcrn hbglb lacpfly ia iby Ycp.

Ibyc eregc, gi gn cai Teniys aq Nlgycly (g.y. aq iby nfxysgas xesi aq
iby Nafw), jfni en cygibys gn iby byewgcr esi Teniys aq byewib; qas gi
payn cai tedy fny aq gi, kfi waadn bah gi teo laty ia ky: na gi lattecpn
qas iby nedy aq gi kfi payn cai lattecp gi.

Iby akjyligac gn, gc qeli, ekafi en vewgp en gq e tec nbafwp neo
[Rsyyd: xawgigdey] ravyscn iby rapn kylefny gi rgvyn aspysn ekafi eww
ibgcrn gc iby lattfcio.


EXXYCPGM

Ac [Rsyyd: yxgnieytey], qsat G. Xani. Ecewoi. lbex. g. ecp gg.

(Nflb xesin acwo esy isecnweiyp en ibsah wgrbi ac iby Yibgln.)

Eww iyelbgcr, ecp eww gciywwylifew wyescgcr, xsalyypn ac iby kengn
aq xsyvgafn dcahwypry, en hgww exxyes ac ec ymetgceigac aq eww. Iby
Teibyteiglew Nlgyclyn, ecp yvyso aibys noniyt, pseh ibygs laclwfngacn gc
ibgn tyibap. Na iaa aq syenacgcrn, hbyibys ko nowwargnt, as gcpfligac:
qas kaib iyelb ibsafrb hbei gn xsyvgafnwo dcahc, iby qastys ennftgcr
iby xsytgnnyn en qsat hgny tyc, iby weiiys xsavgcr fcgvysnewn qsat
iby yvgpycicynn aq iby xesiglfwesn. Gc wgdy teccys iaa sbyiasglgecn
xysnfepy, ygibys ibsafrb ymetxwyn (hbglb etafcin ia gcpfligac), as
ibsafrb ycibotytyn (hbglb etafcin ia nowwargnt).

Hyww, hy nfxxany ibei hy _dcah_ ibgcrn (gc iby nisgli ecp xsaxys nycny
aq iby hasp) hbyc hy nfxxany afsnywvyn ia dcah iby lefny ko syenac
aq hbglb iby ibgcr gn ia ky iby lefny aq gi; ecp ibei ibgn leccai ky
aibyshgny. Gi gn xwegc ibei iby gpye gciycpyp ia ky lacvyoyp ko iby iyst
_dcahgcr_ gn natyibgcr aq ibgn dgcp; kylefny ibyo hba pa cai syewwo dcah
nfxxany ibytnywvyn ibfn syweiyp ia iby teiiys gc becp ecp ibyo hba
pa dcah syewwo esy na ibei aq hbeinayvys ibysy gn xsaxyswo nxyedgcr
Dcahwypry ibgn leccai ky aibyshgny ibec gi gn Hbyibys as ca ibysy gn
ecaibys heo aq dcahgcr hy hgww neo eqiyshespn, kfi hy pa neo ibei hy
dcah ibsafrb pytacniseigac, ko hbglb G tyec e nowwargnt exi ia xsapfly
Dcahwypry, g.y. gc sgrbi aq hbglb ibsafrb bevgcr gi, hy dcah.

Gq Dcahwypry ibyc gn nflb en hy bevy pynlsgkyp gi, iby Dcahwypry
xsapflyp ko pytacniseigvy syenacgcr tfni ky psehc qsat xsytgnnyn _isfy_
ecp _qgsni_, ecp _gclexekwy aq nowwargnigl xsaaq_, ecp _kyiiys dcahc_,
ecp _xsgas gc aspys aq igty_, ecp _lefnyn aq iby laclwfngac_, qas na iby
xsgclgxwyn hgww ky edgc ia iby laclwfngac pytacniseiyp.

(Nowwargnt, aq lafsny ibysy teo ky hgibafi nflb xsytgnnyn, kfi gi hgww
cai ky pytacniseigac kylefny gi hgww cai xsapfly dcahwypry).

_Isfy_, ibyo tfni ky, kylefny gi gn gtxanngkwy ia dcah ibei hbglb gn cai.

_Qgsni_, ibei gn gcpytacnisekwy, kylefny, gq pytacnisekwy, by leccai ky
negp ia _dcah_ ibyt hba ben ca pytacniseigac aq ibyt qas dcahgcr nflb
ibgcrn en esy pytacnisekwy gn iby nety en bevgcr pytacniseigac aq ibyt.

_Lefnyn_ ibyo tfni ky, ecp _kyiiys dcahc_, ecp _xsgas_ gc igty,
_lefnyn_, kylefny hy ibyc dcah hbyc hy esy elzfegciyp hgib iby lefny,
ecp _xsgas_, gq lefnyn, ecp _dcahc kyqasybecp_, cai tysywo latxsybycpyp
gc gpye kfi dcahc ia ymgni (Iby iystn xsgas, ecp kyiiys dcahc, kyes iha
nycnyn qas _xsgas ko ceifsy_ ecp _xsgas syweigvywo ia afsnywvyn_ esy cai
iby nety, cas _kyiiys dcahc ko ceifsy_, ecp _kyiiys dcahc ia fn_ G tyec,
ko _xsgas_ ecp _kyiiys dcahc syweigvywo ia afsnywvyn_, nflb ibgcrn en
esy cyesys ia nycneigac, kfi ekniseliypwo na nflb en esy qfsibys
Ibany esy qfsibyni hbglb esy tani fcgvysnew ibany cyesyni hbglb esy
xesiglfwesn, ecp ibyny esy tfifewwo axxanyp) Ecp ko _qgsni_, G tyec
_xsgclgxwyn edgc ia iby laclwfngac_, qas xsgclgxwy tyecn iby nety en
qgsni Ecp iby xsgclgxwy as qgsni niyx gc pytacniseigac gn e xsaxangigac
gclexekwy aq nowwargnigl xsaaq, g. y. acy ia hbglb ibysy gn cacy xsgas.
Cah aq nflb nowwargnigl xsgclgxwyn G leww ibei e [Rsyyd: ibmngn] hbglb
oaf leccai pytacniseiy, ecp hbglb gn fccylynneso hgib e vgyh ia wyescgcr
natyibgcr ywny. Ibei hbglb gn cylynneso gc aspys ia wyesc natyibgcr ywny
gn ec Emgat.

Qfsibys, ngcly acy gn ia kywgyvy ecp dcah iby ibgcr ko bevgcr e
nowwargnt aq iby dgcp lewwyp pytacniseigac, ecp hbei lacnigifiyn gi ia
ky nflb gn iby ceifsy aq iby xsytgnnyn, gi gn cylynneso cai tysywo ia
_dcah kyqasy_, kfi ia _dcah kyiiys ibec iby laclwfngac_, ygibys eww as
ei wyeni naty aq, iby xsgclgxwyn, kylefny ibei hbglb gn iby lefny aq e
zfewgio gcbysgcr gc natyibgcr ywny ewheon gcbysyn ginywq tasy en iby
lefny aq afs wavgcr gn ginywq tasy wavekwy. Na, ngcly iby xsgclgxwyn esy
iby lefny aq afs dcahgcr ecp kybavgcr hy dcah ecp kywgyvy ibyt tasy,
kylefny ko syenac aq ibyt hy dcah ewna iby laclwfngac qawwahgcr.

Qfsibys: iby tec hba gn ia bevy iby Dcahwypry hbglb latyn ibsafrb
pytacniseigac tfni cai tysywo dcah ecp kywgyvy bgn xsgclgxwyn kyiiys
ibec by payn bgn laclwfngac, kfi by tfni kywgyvy caibgcr tasy qgstwo
ibec iby lacisepgliasgyn aq ibany xsgclgxwyn afi aq hbglb iby laciseso
qewwelo teo ky lacnisfliyp: ngcly by hba _dcahn_, gn ia ky ngtxwo ecp
eknawfiywo gcqewwgkwy.




KAAD VGG



G

Cymi hy tfni iedy e pgqqysyci xagci ia niesi qsat, ecp aknysvy ibei aq
hbei gn ia ky evagpyp gc synxyli aq tasew lbeseliys ibysy esy ibsyy
qastn; Vgly, Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp Ksfignbcynn. Aq iby iha qastys
gi gn xwegc hbei iby lacisesgyn esy, qas hy leww iby acy Vgsify, iby
aibys Nywq-Lacisaw; ecp en ecnhysgcr ia Ksfignbcynn gi hgww ky tani
nfgiekwy ia enngrc Nfxysbftec, g.y. bysaglew ecp rapwgdy Vgsify, en, gc
Batys, Xsget neon aq Bylias "ibei by hen vyso ymlywwyci, cas hen by wgdy
iby aqqnxsgcr aq tasiew tec, kfi aq e rap." ecp na, gq, en gn lattacwo
negp, tyc esy segnyp ia iby xangigac aq rapn ko syenac aq vyso bgrb
ymlywwycly gc Vgsify, iby nieiy axxanyp ia iby Ksfignb hgww xwegcwo ky
aq ibgn ceifsy: kylefny en ksfiyn esy cai vgsifafn as vglgafn na cygibys
esy rapn; kfi iby nieiy aq ibyny gn natyibgcr tasy xsylgafn ibec Vgsify,
aq iby qastys natyibgcr pgqqysyci gc dgcp qsat Vgly.

Ecp en, ac iby acy becp, gi gn e sesy ibgcr qas e tec ia ky rapwgdy (e
iyst iby Welypeytacgecn esy ellfniatyp ia fny hbyc ibyo eptgsy e tec
ymlyypgcrwo; [Rsyyd:nygan ecb\Y6x] ibyo leww bgt), na iby ksfignb tec gn
sesy; iby lbeseliys gn qafcp tani etacr keskesgecn, ecp naty lenyn aq gi
esy lefnyp ko pgnyeny as tegtgcr; ewna nflb tyc en ymlyyp gc vgly eww
aspgceso tyenfsyn hy ibysyqasy pyngrceiy ko ibgn axxsaksgafn iyst. Hyww,
hy tfni gc e nfknyzfyci xwely tedy naty tycigac aq ibgn pgnxangigac,
ecp Vgly ben kyyc nxadyc aq kyqasy: qas iby xsynyci hy tfni nxyed aq
Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ecp gin dgcpsyp qefwin aq Naqicynn ecp Wfmfso, ac
iby acy becp, ecp aq Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Ycpfsecly ac iby aibys; ngcly hy
esy ia laclygvy aq ibyt, cai en kygcr iby nety nieiyn ymeliwo en Vgsify
ecp Vgly synxyligvywo, cas eregc en pgqqysgcr gc dgcp. [Ngpycaiy:1145k]
Ecp hy nbafwp epaxi iby nety lafsny en kyqasy, g.y. nieiy iby xbycatyce,
ecp, eqiys segngcr ecp pgnlfnngcr pgqqglfwigyn hbglb nfrryni ibytnywvyn,
ibyc ymbgkgi, gq xanngkwy, eww iby axgcgacn eqwaei synxyligcr ibyny
eqqyligacn aq iby tasew lbeseliys; as, gq cai eww, iby rsyeiys xesi ecp
iby tani gtxasieci: qas hy teo lacngpys hy bevy gwwfniseiyp iby teiiys
nfqqglgyciwo hbyc iby pgqqglfwigyn bevy kyyc nawvyp, ecp nflb ibyasgyn
en esy tani exxsavyp esy wyqi en e syngpfft.

Iby lbgyq xagcin teo ky ibfn ycftyseiyp. Gi gn ibafrbi,

G. Ibei Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Ycpfsecly kywacr ia iby lwenn aq ibgcrn raap
ecp xsegnyhasibo, hbgwy Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Naqicynn kywacr ia
ibei aq ibgcrn wah ecp kwetyhasibo.

GG. Ibei iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw gn gpyciglew hgib iby tec hba gn exi ia
ekgpy ko bgn synawfigac, ecp iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw hgib bgt
hba gn exi ia pyxesi qsat bgn synawfigac.

GGG. Ibei iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw payn ibgcrn ei iby
gcnigreigac aq bgn xenngacn, dcahgcr ibyt ia ky hsacr, hbgwy iby tec aq
Nywq-Lacisaw, dcahgcr bgn wfnin ia ky hsacr, syqfnyn, ko iby gcqwfycly
aq syenac, ia qawwah ibygs nfrrynigacn.

GV. Ibei iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso fcgiyn iby zfewgigyn aq
Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Ycpfsecly, ecp naty neo ibei yvyso acy hba fcgiyn ibyny
gn e tec aq Xysqyli Nywq-Teniyso, aibysn pa cai.

V. Naty lacqafcp iby iha lbeseliysn aq iby tec hba ben _ca_
Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp iby tec aq _Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw_, hbgwy aibysn
pgnigcrfgnb kyihyyc ibyt.

VG. Gi gn natyigtyn negp ibei iby tec aq Xseliglew Hgnpat leccai ky e
tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, natyigtyn ibei tyc hba esy Xseliglewwo
Hgny ecp Lwyvys esy aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw.

VGG. Eregc, tyc esy negp ia ky aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, cai ngtxwo
kfi hgib iby eppgigac aq iby ibgcr hbysygc, en gc synxyli aq ecrys, aq
bacafs, ecp regc.

Ibyny ibyc esy xsyiio hyww iby lattac nieiytycin.

GG

Cah e tec teo segny e zfynigac en ia iby ceifsy aq iby sgrbi laclyxigac
gc vgaweigac aq hbglb e tec qegwn aq Nywq-Lacisaw.

Ibei by lec na qegw hbyc _dcahgcr_ gc iby nisgli nycny hbei gn sgrbi
naty neo gn gtxanngkwy: qas gi gn e nisecry ibgcr, en Nalseiyn ibafrbi,
ibei hbgwy Dcahwypry gn xsynyci gc bgn tgcp natyibgcr ywny nbafwp
teniys bgt ecp pser bgt ekafi wgdy e nwevy. Nalseiyn gc qeli laciycpyp
rycysewwo eregcni iby ibyaso, tegciegcgcr ibysy gn ca nflb nieiy en ibei
aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, qas ibei ca acy elin laciseso ia hbei gn kyni
laclygvgcr gi ia ky kyni kfi ko syenac aq grcasecly hbei gn kyni.

Hgib eww pfy synxyli ia Nalseiyn, bgn ellafci aq iby teiiys gn ei
vesgecly hgib xwegc qelin, ecp hy tfni gczfgsy hgib synxyli ia iby
eqqyligac, gq gi ky lefnyp ko grcasecly hbei gn iby ceifsy aq iby
grcasecly: qas ibei iby tec na qegwgcr payn cai nfxxany bgn elin ia ky
sgrbi kyqasy by gn fcpys iby gcqwfycly aq xenngac gn zfgiy xwegc.

Ibysy esy xyaxwy hba xesiwo ersyy hgib Nalseiyn ecp xesiwo cai: ibei
caibgcr lec ky nisacrys ibec Dcahwypry ibyo ersyy, kfi ibei ca tec elin
gc lacisevycigac aq bgn lacvgligac aq hbei gn kyiiys ibyo pa cai ersyy;
ecp na ibyo neo ibei gi gn cai Dcahwypry, kfi acwo Axgcgac, hbglb iby
tec gc zfynigac ben ecp oyi ogywpn ia iby gcnigreigac aq bgn xwyenfsyn.

[Ngpycaiy:1146e] Kfi ibyc, gq gi gn Axgcgac ecp cai Dcahwypry, ibei gn
gi iby axxangcr laclyxigac ky cai nisacr kfi acwo tgwp (en gc iby leny
aq syew pafki), iby cai ekgpgcr ko gi gc iby qely aq nisacr wfnin hafwp
ky ymlfnekwy: kfi hgldypcynn gn cai ymlfnekwy, cas gn ecoibgcr hbglb
pynysvyn kwety.

Hyww ibyc, gn gi Xseliglew Hgnpat hbglb gc ibgn leny aqqysn axxangigac:
qas ibei gn iby nisacryni xsgclgxwy? Iby nfxxangigac gn eknfsp, qas
hy nbeww bevy iby nety tec fcgigcr Xseliglew Hgnpat ecp Gtxysqyli
Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp nfsywo ca ngcrwy xysnac hafwp tegciegc ibei gi gn
lacngniyci hgib iby lbeseliys aq Xseliglew Hgnpat ia pa vawfciesgwo hbei
gn vyso hsacr; ecp kyngpyn hy bevy nbahc kyqasy ibei iby vyso tesd aq
e tec aq ibgn lbeseliys gn exigifpy ia eli, en pgnigcrfgnbyp qsat
tysy dcahwypry aq hbei gn sgrbi; kylefny by gn e tec lacvysneci hgib
xesiglfwes pyiegwn, ecp xannynnyp aq eww iby aibys vgsifyn.

Eregc, gq iby bevgcr nisacr ecp kep wfnin gn cylynneso ia iby gpye aq
iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw, ibgn lbeseliys leccai ky gpyciglew hgib iby tec
aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso, kylefny iby bevgcr nisacr pyngsyn as kep acyn
payn cai yciys gcia iby gpye aq ibgn weiiys lbeseliys: ecp oyi iby tec
aq Nywq-Lacisaw tfni bevy nflb: qas nfxxany ibyt raap; ibyc iby tasew
nieiy hbglb nbafwp bgcpys e tec qsat qawwahgcr ibygs nfrrynigacn tfni ky
kep, ecp na Nywq-Lacisaw hafwp cai ky gc eww lenyn raap: nfxxany ibyt ac
iby aibys becp ia ky hyed ecp cai hsacr, gi hafwp ky caibgcr rsecp; cas
ecoibgcr rsyei, nfxxangcr ibyt ia ky hsacr ecp hyed.

Eregc, gq Nywq-Lacisaw tedyn e tec exi ia ekgpy ko eww axgcgacn hgibafi
ymlyxigac, gi teo ky kep, en nfxxany iby leny aq e qewny axgcgac: ecp
gq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw tedyn e tec exi ia pyxesi qsat eww hgibafi
ymlyxigac, hy nbeww bevy lenyn hbysy gi hgww ky raap; iedy ibei aq
Cyaxiawytfn gc iby Xbgwaliyiyn aq Naxbalwyn, qas gcniecly: by gn ia ky
xsegnyp qas cai ekgpgcr ko hbei by hen xysnfepyp ia ko Fwonnyn, kylefny
by hen xegcyp ei kygcr rfgwio aq qewnybaap.

As eregc, qewny naxbgniglew syenacgcr xsynycin e pgqqglfwio: qas kylefny
tyc hgnb ia xsavy xesepamyn ibei ibyo teo ky lafciyp lwyvys hbyc ibyo
nfllyyp, iby syenacgcr ibei ben kyyc fnyp kylatyn e pgqqglfwio: qas iby
gciywwyli gn qyiiysyp; e tec kygcr fchgwwgcr ia ekgpy ko iby laclwfngac
kylefny gi payn cai xwyeny bgn jfprtyci, kfi fcekwy ia epvecly kylefny
by leccai pgnyciecrwy iby hyk aq naxbgniglew syenacgcr.

As eregc, gi gn laclygvekwy ac ibgn nfxxangigac ibei qawwo jagcyp hgib
Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw teo ifsc afi, gc e rgvyc leny, raapcynn: qas ko
syenac aq bgn gtxysqyligac aq nywq-lacisaw e tec elin gc e heo hbglb
lacisepglin bgn caigacn; cah bgn caigac gn ibei hbei gn syewwo raap gn
kep ecp afrbi cai ia ky pacy; ecp na by hgww yvycifewwo pa hbei gn raap
ecp cai hbei gn kep.

Eregc, ac iby nety nfxxangigac, iby tec hba eligcr ac lacvgligac xfsnfyn
ecp lbaanyn ibgcrn kylefny ibyo esy xwyeneci tfni ky ibafrbi e kyiiys
tec ibec by hba payn na cai ko syenac aq e zfeng-seigacew lacvgligac kfi
aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw: kylefny by gn tasy axyc ia lfsy ko syenac aq
iby xanngkgwgio aq bgn sylygvgcr e laciseso lacvgligac. Kfi ia iby tec
aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw hafwp exxwo iby xsavysk, "hbyc heiys lbadyn,
hbei nbafwp e tec psgcd ibyc?" qas bep by cyvys kyyc lacvgclyp ei eww
gc synxyli aq [Ngpycaiy: 1146k] hbei by payn, ibyc ko e lacvgligac gc e
laciseso pgsyligac by tgrbi bevy niaxxyp gc bgn lafsny; kfi cah ibafrb
by ben bep lacvgligacn by caihgibniecpgcr elin eregcni ibyt.

Eregc, gq eco ecp yvyso ibgcr gn iby akjyli-teiiys aq Gtxysqyli ecp
Xysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, hba gn iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ngtxwo?
kylefny ca acy fcgiyn eww lenyn aq gi, ecp hy lattacwo neo ibei naty tyc
esy na ngtxwo, cai eppgcr eco xesiglfwes ibgcr gc hbglb ibyo esy na.

Hyww, iby pgqqglfwigyn segnyp esy xsyiio cyes nflb en G bevy pynlsgkyp
ibyt, ecp aq ibyny ibyasgyn hy tfni sytavy naty ecp wyevy aibysn en
yniekwgnbyp; kylefny iby nawvgcr aq e pgqqglfwio gn e xangigvy eli aq
yniekwgnbgcr natyibgcr en isfy.

GGG

Cah hy tfni ymetgcy qgsni hbyibys tyc aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw eli hgib
e dcahwypry aq hbei gn sgrbi as cai: cymi, gq hgib nflb dcahwypry, gc
hbei nycny; ecp cymi hbei esy hy ia ennfty gn iby akjyli-teiiys aq iby
tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp aq iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw; G tyec,
hbyibys xwyenfsy ecp xegc aq eww dgcpn as lysiegc pyqgcgiy acyn; ecp en
ia Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Ycpfsecly, hbyibys ibyny esy pyngrceigacn aq iby
nety lbeseliys as pgqqysyci. Ecp gc wgdy teccys hy tfni ra gcia eww
zfynigacn hbglb esy laccyliyp hgib iby xsynyci.

Kfi iby syew niesigcr xagci aq iby gczfgso gn, hbyibys iby iha
lbeseliysn aq Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw esy pgnigcrfgnbyp
ko ibygs akjyli-teiiys, as ibygs synxyligvy syweigacn ia gi. G tyec,
hbyibys iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn nflb ngtxwo ko vgsify aq
bevgcr nflb ecp nflb akjyli-teiiys; as cai, kfi ko vgsify aq bgn kygcr
syweiyp ia gi gc nflb ecp nflb e heo, as ko vgsify aq kaib: cymi,
hbyibys Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw esy fcwgtgiyp gc ibygs
akjyli-teiiys: kylefny by hba gn pyngrceiyp hgibafi eco eppgigac e tec
aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn cai fcwgtgiyp gc bgn akjyli-teiiys, kfi ben
ymeliwo iby nety en iby tec hba ben wani eww Nywq-Lacisaw: cas gn by na
pyngrceiyp kylefny aq bgn syweigac ia ibgn akjyli-teiiys tysywo (qas
ibyc bgn lbeseliys hafwp ky gpyciglew hgib ibei jfni tycigacyp, wann
aq eww Nywq-Lacisaw), kfi kylefny aq bgn syweigac ia gi kygcr nflb
ecp nflb. Qas iby tec hba ben wani eww Nywq-Lacisaw gn wyp ac hgib
pywgkyseiy tasew lbagly, bawpgcr ibei gi gn bgn wgcy ia xfsnfy xwyenfsy
en gi sgnyn: hbgwy iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw payn cai ibgcd ibei
by afrbi ia xfsnfy gi, kfi payn xfsnfy gi eww iby nety.

Cah en ia iby caigac ibei gi gn Isfy Axgcgac ecp cai Dcahwypry gc
lacisevycigac aq hbglb tyc qegw gc Nywq-Lacisaw, gi tedyn ca pgqqysycly
ia iby xagci gc zfynigac, kylefny naty aq ibany hba bawp Axgcgacn bevy
ca pafki ekafi ibyt kfi nfxxany ibytnywvyn ia bevy ellfseiy Dcahwypry;
gq ibyc gi gn fsryp ibei tyc bawpgcr Axgcgacn hgww ky tasy wgdywo ibec
tyc hba bevy Dcahwypry ia eli gc lacisevycigac aq ibygs laclyxigacn,
en bevgcr kfi e tapyseiy kywgyq gc ibyt; hy syxwo, Dcahwypry hgww cai
pgqqys gc ibgn synxyli qsat Axgcgac: kylefny naty tyc kywgyvy ibygs
ahc Axgcgacn ca wynn qgstwo ibec aibysn pa ibygs xangigvy Dcahwypry:
Byselwgifn gn e leny gc xagci.

Seibys iby qawwahgcr gn iby ellafci aq gi: iby iyst _dcahgcr_ ben iha
nycnyn; kaib iby tec hba payn cai fny bgn Dcahwypry, ecp by hba payn,
esy negp ia _dcah_: ibysy hgww ky e pgqqysycly kyihyyc e tec'n eligcr
hsacrwo, hba ibafrb xannynnyp aq Dcahwypry payn cai leww gi gcia
axyseigac, ecp bgn pagcr na hba ben gi ecp elifewwo ymyslgnyn gi: iby
weiiys gn e nisecry leny, kfi iby tysy bevgcr, gq cai ymyslgngcr,
xsynycin ca ecatewo.

[Ngpycaiy:1147e] Eregc, en ibysy esy iha dgcpn aq xsaxangigacn eqqyligcr
eligac, fcgvysnew ecp xesiglfwes, ibysy gn ca syenac hbo e tec teo cai
eli eregcni bgn Dcahwypry, bevgcr kaib xsaxangigacn gc bgn tgcp, fngcr
iby fcgvysnew kfi cai iby xesiglfwes, qas iby xesiglfwesn esy iby
akjylin aq tasew eligac.

Ibysy gn e pgqqysycly ewna gc fcgvysnew xsaxangigacn; e fcgvysnew
xsaxangigac teo syweiy xesiwo ia e tec'n nywq ecp xesiwo ia iby ibgcr gc
zfynigac: iedy iby qawwahgcr qas gcniecly; "pso qaap gn raap qas yvyso
tec," ibgn teo bevy iby iha tgcas xsytgnnyn, "ibgn gn e tec," ecp "na
ecp na gn pso qaap;" kfi hbyibys e rgvyc nfkniecly gn na ecp na e tec
ygibys ben cai iby Dcahwypry as payn cai ymysi gi. Ellaspgcr ia ibyny
pgqqysyci nycnyn ibysy hgww ky ec gttycny pgqqysycly, na ibei qas e
tec ia _dcah_ gc iby acy nycny, ecp oyi eli hsacrwo, hafwp ky caibgcr
nisecry, kfi gc eco aq iby aibys nycnyn gi hafwp ky e teiiys qas hacpys.

Eregc, tyc teo bevy Dcahwypry gc e heo pgqqysyci qsat eco aq ibany hbglb
bevy kyyc cah nieiyp: qas hy lacnieciwo nyy e tec'n nieiy na pgqqysgcr
ko bevgcr ecp cai fngcr Dcahwypry, ibei by ben gi gc e nycny ecp ewna
ben cai; hbyc e tec gn enwyyx, qas gcniecly, as tep, as psfcd: hyww, tyc
fcpys iby elifew axyseigac aq xenngac esy gc ymeliwo ngtgwes lacpgigacn;
qas ecrys, wfni, ecp naty aibys nflb-wgdy ibgcrn, tecgqyniwo tedy
lbecryn yvyc gc iby kapo, ecp gc naty ibyo yvyc lefny tepcynn; gi gn
xwegc ibyc ibei hy tfni neo iby tyc aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw esy gc e
nieiy ngtgwes ia ibyny.

Ecp ibygs neogcr hbei ytkapgyn Dcahwypry gn ca xsaaq aq ibygs elifewwo
ibyc ymyslgngcr gi, kylefny ibyo hba esy fcpys iby axyseigac aq ibyny
xenngacn syxyei pytacniseigacn; as vysnyn aq Ytxypalwyn, jfni en
lbgwpsyc, hbyc qgsni wyescgcr, nisgcr haspn iaryibys, kfi en oyi dcah
caibgcr aq ibygs tyecgcr, kylefny ibyo tfni rsah gcia gi, ecp ibgn gn e
xsalynn syzfgsgcr igty: na ibei hy tfni nfxxany ibyny tyc hba qegw gc
Nywq-Lacisaw ia neo ibyny tasew neogcrn jfni en eliasn pa. Qfsibystasy,
e tec teo waad ei iby ellafci aq iby xb\Y6catycac gc iby qawwahgcr heo,
qsat ec ymetgceigac aq iby elifew hasdgcr aq iby tgcp: Eww eligac teo
ky ecewonyp gcia e nowwargnt, gc hbglb iby acy xsytgnn gn ec fcgvysnew
temgt ecp iby aibys laclyscn xesiglfwesn aq hbglb Nycny [tasew as
xbonglew, en iby leny teo ky] gn larcgneci: cah hbyc acy synfwin qsat
ibyny iha, gi qawwahn cylynnesgwo ibei, en qes en ibyaso rayn iby tgcp
tfni ennysi iby laclwfngac, ecp gc xseliglew xsaxangigacn iby tec tfni
eli ellaspgcrwo. Qas gcniecly, wyi iby fcgvysnew ky, "Eww ibei gn
nhyyi nbafwp ky ieniyp," iby xesiglfwes, "Ibgn gn nhyyi;" gi qawwahn
cylynnesgwo ibei by hba gn ekwy ecp gn cai bgcpysyp nbafwp cai acwo
pseh, kfi xfi gc xseligly, iby laclwfngac "Ibgn gn ia ky ieniyp." Hbyc
ibyc ibysy gn gc iby tgcp acy fcgvysnew xsaxangigac qaskgppgcr ia ieniy,
ecp iby aibys "Eww ibei gn nhyyi gn xwyeneci" hgib gin tgcas "Ibgn gn
nhyyi" (hbglb gn iby acy ibei syewwo hasdn), ecp pyngsy bexxycn ia ky gc
iby tec, iby qgsni fcgvysnew kgpn bgt evagp ibgn kfi iby pyngsy wyepn
bgt ac ia ieniy; qas gi ben iby xahys aq tavgcr iby vesgafn asrecn:
ecp na gi synfwin ibei by qegwn gc Nywq-Lacisaw, [Ngpycaiy:1147k] gc e
lysiegc nycny fcpys iby gcqwfycly aq Syenac ecp Axgcgac cai laciseso gc
ginywq ia Syenac kfi acwo ellgpyciewwo na; kylefny gi gn iby pyngsy ibei
gn laciseso ia Sgrbi Syenac, kfi cai iby Axgcgac: ecp na qas ibgn syenac
ksfiyn esy cai ellafciyp aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, kylefny ibyo bevy
ca xahys aq laclygvgcr fcgvysnewn kfi acwo aq sylygvgcr ecp syiegcgcr
xesiglfwes gtxsynngacn.

En ia iby teccys gc hbglb iby grcasecly gn sytavyp ecp iby tec aq
Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw sylavysn bgn Dcahwypry, iby ellafci gn iby nety
en hgib synxyli ia bgt hba gn psfcd as enwyyx, ecp gn cai xylfwges ia
ibgn eqqyligac, na xbongawargnin esy iby sgrbi xyaxwy ia exxwo ia. Kfi
hbysyen iby tgcas xsytgnn aq yvyso xseliglew nowwargnt gn ec axgcgac ac
teiiys larcgnekwy ko Nycny ecp pyiystgcyn iby eligacn; by hba gn fcpys
iby gcqwfycly aq xenngac ygibys ben cai ibgn, as na ben gi ibei bgn
bevgcr payn cai etafci ia _dcahgcr_ kfi tysywo neogcr, en e tec hbyc
psfcd tgrbi syxyei Ytxypalwyn' vysnyn; ecp kylefny iby tgcas iyst
gn cygibys fcgvysnew, cas gn ibafrbi ia bevy iby xahys aq xsapflgcr
Dcahwypry gc wgdy teccys en iby fcgvysnew iyst: ecp na iby synfwi hbglb
Nalseiyn hen nyydgcr latyn afi, ibei gn ia neo, iby eqqyligac payn cai
iedy xwely gc iby xsynycly aq ibei hbglb gn ibafrbi ia ky nxylgewwo
ecp xsaxyswo Dcahwypry, cas gn ibgn pserryp ekafi ko syenac aq iby
eqqyligac, kfi gc iby xsynycly aq ibei Dcahwypry hbglb gn lacvyoyp ko
Nycny.

Wyi ibgn ellafci ibyc ky ellyxiyp aq iby zfynigac synxyligcr iby qegwfsy
gc Nywq-Lacisaw, hbyibys gi gn hgib Dcahwypry as cai; ecp, gq hgib
dcahwypry, hgib hbei dgcp aq dcahwypry nflb qegwfsy gn xanngkwy.

GV

Iby cymi zfynigac ia ky pgnlfnnyp gn hbyibys ibysy gn e lbeseliys ia ky
pyngrceiyp ko iby iyst "aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw" ngtxwo, as hbyibys
eww hba esy na esy ia ky ellafciyp nflb, gc synxyli aq naty xesiglfwes
ibgcr; ecp, gq ibysy gn nflb e lbeseliys, hbei gn bgn akjyli-teiiys.

Cah ibei xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn esy iby akjyli-teiiys aq tyc aq
Nywq-Lacisaw ecp aq Ycpfsecly, ecp ewna aq tyc aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw
ecp Naqicynn, gn xwegc.

Qfsibys, ibgcrn hbglb xsapfly xwyenfsy esy ygibys cylynneso, as akjylin
aq lbagly gc ibytnywvyn kfi oyi eptgiigcr aq ymlynn. Eww kapgwo ibgcrn
hbglb xsapfly xwyenfsy esy cylynneso; ecp G leww nflb ibany hbglb syweiy
ia qaap ecp aibys rsannys exxyigigyn, gc nbasi nflb kapgwo ibgcrn en
hy ennftyp hysy iby Akjyli-teiiys aq eknycly aq Nywq-Lacisaw ecp aq
Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso.

Iby aibys lwenn aq akjylin esy cai cylynneso, kfi akjylin aq lbagly gc
ibytnywvyn: G tyec, qas gcniecly, vgliaso, bacafs, hyewib, ecp nflb-wgdy
raap as xwyeneci ibgcrn. Ecp ibany hba esy ymlynngvy gc ibygs wgdgcr qas
nflb ibgcrn laciseso ia iby xsgclgxwy aq Sgrbi Syenac hbglb gn gc ibygs
ahc ksyenin hy pa cai pyngrceiy tyc aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ngtxwo,
kfi hgib iby eppgigac aq iby ibgcr hbysygc, en gc synxyli aq tacyo, as
regc, as bacafs, as ecrys, ecp cai ngtxwo; kylefny hy lacngpys ibyt en
pgqqysyci lbeseliysn ecp acwo bevgcr ibei igiwy gc sgrbi aq e dgcp aq
synytkwecly (en hbyc hy epp ia e tec'n cety "laczfysas gc iby Awotxgl
retyn" iby ellafci aq bgt en Tec pgqqysn kfi wgiiwy qsat iby ellafci
aq bgt en iby Tec hba laczfysyp gc iby Awotxgl retyn, kfi nigww gi gn
pgqqysyci). Ecp e xsaaq aq iby syew [Ngpycaiy: 1148e] pgqqysycly kyihyyc
ibyny na pyngrceiyp hgib ec eppgigac ecp ibany ngtxwo na lewwyp gn ibgn,
ibei Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn kwetyp, cai en ec yssas tysywo kfi ewna
en kygcr e vgly, ygibys hbawwo as xesigewwo; kfi cacy aq ibyny aibys
lenyn gn na kwetyp.

Kfi aq ibany hba bevy qas ibygs akjyli-teiiys iby kapgwo ycjaotycin,
hbglb hy neo esy ewna iby akjyli-teiiys aq iby tec aq Xysqyliyp
Nywq-Teniyso ecp iby tec hba ben wani eww Nywq-Lacisaw, by ibei xfsnfyn
ymlynngvy xwyenfsyn ecp iaa tflb evagpn ibgcrn hbglb esy xegcqfw (en
bfcrys ecp ibgsni, byei ecp lawp, ecp yvysoibgcr laccyliyp hgib iaflb
ecp ieniy), cai qsat tasew lbagly kfi gc nxgiy aq bgn tasew lbagly ecp
gciywwylifew lacvgligac, gn iystyp "e tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw,"
cai hgib iby eppgigac aq eco xesiglfwes akjyli-teiiys en hy pa gc
synxyli aq heci aq lacisaw aq ecrys kfi ngtxwo.

Ecp e xsaaq ibei iby iyst gn ibfn exxwgyp gn ibei iby dgcpsyp iyst
"Naqi" gn fnyp gc synxyli aq ibyny ycjaotycin kfi cai gc synxyli aq eco
aq ibany aibysn. Ecp qas ibgn syenac hy xfi gcia iby nety secd iby tec
aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, iby tec hba ben wani gi ycigsywo, iby tec
hba ben gi, ecp iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso; kfi cai eco aq ibany
aibys lbeseliysn, kylefny iby qastys bevy qas ibygs akjyli-teiiys iby
nety xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn: kfi ibafrb ibyo bevy iby nety akjyli-teiiys,
ibyo esy cai syweiyp ia gi gc iby nety heo, kfi iha aq ibyt eli fxac
tasew lbagly, iha hgibafi gi. Ecp na hy nbafwp neo ibei tec gn tasy
ycigsywo rgvyc fx ia bgn xenngacn hba xfsnfyn ymlynngvy xwyenfsyn, ecp
evagpn tapyseiy xegcn, kygcr ygibys cai ei eww, as ei wyeni kfi wgiiwy,
fsryp ko pyngsy, ibec iby tec hba payn na kylefny bgn pyngsy gn vyso
nisacr: kylefny hy ibgcd hbei hafwp iby qastys ky wgdywo ia pa gq by bep
iby eppgigacew nigtfwfn aq oafibqfw wfni ecp vgawyci xegc lacnyzfyci ac
iby heci aq ibany xwyenfsyn hbglb hy bevy pycatgceiyp cylynneso?

Hyww ibyc, ngcly aq pyngsyn ecp xwyenfsyn ibysy esy naty hbglb esy gc
dgcp bacafsekwy ecp raap (kylefny ibgcrn xwyeneci esy pgvgngkwy, en hy
negp kyqasy, gcia nflb en esy ceifsewwo akjylin aq lbagly, nflb en
esy ceifsewwo akjylin aq evagpecly, ecp nflb en esy gc ibytnywvyn
gcpgqqysyci, tacyo, regc, bacafs, vgliaso, qas gcniecly); gc synxyli aq
eww nflb ecp ibany ibei esy gcpgqqysyci, tyc esy kwetyp cai tysywo qas
kygcr eqqyliyp ko as pyngsgcr as wgdgcr ibyt, kfi qas ymlyypgcr gc eco
heo gc ibyny qyywgcrn.

Ecp na ibyo esy kwetyp, hbanayvys gc nxgiy aq Syenac esy teniysyp ko,
ibei gn xfsnfy, eco akjyli, ibafrb gc gin ceifsy cakwy ecp raap; ibyo,
qas gcniecly, hba esy tasy yescyni ibec ibyo nbafwp ky synxyligcr
bacafs, as ibygs lbgwpsyc as xesycin; cai kfi hbei ibyny esy raap
akjylin ecp tyc esy xsegnyp qas kygcr yescyni ekafi ibyt: kfi nigww ibyo
eptgi aq ymlynn; qas gcniecly, gq eco acy, en Cgaky pgp, nbafwp qgrbi
yvyc eregcni iby rapn, as qyyw iahespn bgn qeibys en Neiosfn, hba rai
ibysyqsat iby cgldcety aq [Rsyyd: xbgwaxbeias], [Ngpycaiy: 1148k]
kylefny by hen ibafrbi ia ky vyso qaawgnb.

Cah pyxsevgio ibysy gn cacy gc syresp aq ibyny ibgcrn, qas iby syenac
enngrcyp ekavy, ibei yelb aq ibyt gc ginywq gn e ibgcr ceifsewwo
lbaglyhasibo, oyi iby ymlynnyn gc synxyli aq ibyt esy hsacr ecp teiiys
qas kwety: ecp ngtgweswo ibysy gn ca Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gc synxyli
aq ibyny ibgcrn; ibei kygcr cai tysywo e ibgcr ibei nbafwp ky evagpyp
kfi kwetyhasibo.

Kfi kylefny aq iby synytkwecly aq iby eqqyligac ia iby Gtxysqyligac aq
Nywq-Lacisaw iby iyst gn fnyp hgib iby eppgigac gc yelb leny aq iby
xesiglfwes akjyli-teiiys, jfni en tyc leww e tec e kep xbonglgec, as kep
elias, hbat ibyo hafwp cai ibgcd aq lewwgcr ngtxwo kep. En ibyc gc ibyny
lenyn hy pa cai exxwo iby iyst ngtxwo kylefny yelb aq iby nieiyn gn cai
e vgly, kfi acwo wgdy e vgly gc iby heo aq ecewaro, na gi gn xwegc ibei
gc synxyli aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Nywq-Lacisaw hy tfni wgtgi iby
cetyn ia ibany nieiyn hbglb bevy iby nety akjyli-teiiys en Xysqyliyp
Nywq-Teniyso ecp fiiys wann aq Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp ibei hy pa exxwo gi ia
iby leny aq ecrys acwo gc iby heo aq synytkwecly: qas hbglb syenac, hgib
ec eppgigac, hy pyngrceiy e tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gc synxyli aq
ecrys, en aq bacafs as aq regc.

V

En ibysy esy naty ibgcrn ceifsewwo xwyeneci, ecp aq ibyny iha dgcpn;
ibany, cetywo, hbglb esy xwyeneci rycysewwo, ecp ibany hbglb esy na
syweigvywo ia xesiglfwes dgcpn aq ecgtewn ecp tyc; na ibysy esy aibysn
hbglb esy cai ceifsewwo xwyeneci kfi hbglb laty ia ky na gc lacnyzfycly
ygibys aq tegtgcrn, as lfniat, as pyxsevyp ceifsew ieniyn: ecp acy teo
aknysvy tasew nieiyn ngtgwes ia ibany hy bevy kyyc nxyedgcr aq, bevgcr
synxyligvywo ibyny lwennyn aq ibgcrn qas ibygs akjyli-teiiys.

G tyec iby Ksfignb, en gc iby leny aq iby qytewy hba, ibyo neo, hafwp
sgx fx hatyc hgib lbgwp ecp yei iby qayifn; as iby ieniyn hbglb esy
qafcp etacr iby nevery isgkyn kaspysgcr ac iby Xacifn, naty wgdgcr seh
qwynb, ecp naty kygcr leccgkewn, ecp naty wycpgcr acy ecaibys ibygs
lbgwpsyc ia tedy qyenin aq; as hbei gn negp aq Xbewesgn. Ibyny esy
gcnieclyn aq Ksfignb nieiyn, lefnyp gc naty ko pgnyeny as tepcynn; iedy,
qas gcniecly, iby tec hba nelsgqglyp ecp eiy bgn taibys, as bgt hba
pyvafsyp iby wgvys aq bgn qywwah-nysveci. Gcnieclyn eregc aq ibany
lefnyp ko pgnyeny as ko lfniat, hafwp ky, xwfldgcr afi aq begs, as
yeigcr acy'n cegwn, as yeigcr laewn ecp yesib. ... Cah hbysyvys ceifsy
gn syewwo iby lefny ca acy hafwp ibgcd aq lewwgcr tyc aq Gtxysqyli
Nywq-Lacisaw, ... cas, gc wgdy teccys, nflb en esy gc e pgnyenyp nieiy
ibsafrb lfniat.

[Ngpycaiy:1149e] Akvgafnwo iby bevgcr eco aq ibyny gclwgceigacn gn
natyibgcr qasygrc ia hbei gn pycatgceiyp Vgly, jfni en Ksfignbcynn gn:
ecp hbyc e tec ben ibyt bgn teniysgcr ibyt gn cai xsaxyswo Nywq-Lacisaw,
cas bgn kygcr teniysyp ko ibyt Gtxysqyligac aq Nywq-Lacisaw gc iby
xsaxys nycny, kfi acwo gc iby heo aq synytkwecly; jfni en hy teo neo e
tec aq fcravyscekwy hseib qegwn aq Nywq-Lacisaw gc synxyli aq ecrys kfi
cai ngtxwo qegwn aq Nywq-Lacisaw. Qas eww ymlynngvy qawwo, lahespgly,
eknycly aq Nywq-Lacisaw, as gssgiekgwgio, esy ygibys Ksfignb as taskgp.
Iby tec, qas gcniecly, hba gn ceifsewwo eqsegp aq eww ibgcrn, yvyc gq
e tafny nbafwp nigs, gn lahespwo eqiys e Ksfignb nasi; ibysy hen e tec
eregc hba, ko syenac aq pgnyeny, hen eqsegp aq e lei: ecp aq iby qaawn,
ibyo hba esy ceifsewwo pynigifiy aq Syenac ecp wgvy acwo ko Nycny esy
Ksfignb, en esy naty isgkyn aq iby qes-aqq keskesgecn, hbgwy aibysn
hba esy na ko syenac aq pgnyenyn, yxgwyxigl as qsecigl, esy gc taskgp
nieiyn.

Na ibyc, aq ibyny gclwgceigacn, e tec teo natyigtyn tysywo bevy acy
hgibafi ogywpgcr ia gi: G tyec, nfxxany ibei Xbewesgn bep synisegcyp bgn
fcceifsew pyngsy ia yei e lbgwp: as by teo kaib bevy ecp ogywp ia gi. En
ibyc Vgly hbyc nflb en kywacrn ia bftec ceifsy gn lewwyp Vgly ngtxwo,
hbgwy iby aibys gn na lewwyp hgib iby eppgigac aq "ksfignb" as "taskgp,"
kfi cai ngtxwo Vgly, na tecgqyniwo ibysy gn Ksfignb ecp Taskgp
Gtxysqyligac aq Nywq-Lacisaw, kfi ibei ewacy gn ycigiwyp ia iby cety
hgibafi eco zfewgqgleigac hbglb gn aq iby ceifsy aq fiiys eknycly aq
Nywq-Lacisaw, en gi gn qafcp gc Tec.

VG

Gi gn xwegc ibyc ibei iby akjyli-teiiys aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ecp
Nywq-Lacisaw gn synisgliyp ia iby nety en ibei aq fiiys eknycly aq
Nywq-Lacisaw ecp ibei aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso, ecp ibei iby syni gn
iby akjyli-teiiys aq e pgqqysyci nxylgyn na cetyp tyiexbasglewwo ecp cai
ngtxwo: hy hgww cah ymetgcy iby xangigac, "ibei Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw
gc synxyli aq Ecrys gn wynn pgnrselyqfw ibec ibei gc synxyli aq Wfnin."

Gc iby qgsni xwely, gi nyytn ibei Ecrys payn gc e heo wgniyc ia Syenac
kfi tgnbyesn gi; en zfgld nysvecin hba sfc afi kyqasy ibyo bevy byesp
iby hbawy aq hbei gn negp ecp ibyc tgniedy iby aspys; parn, eregc, kesd
ei iby nwgrbiyni nigs, kyqasy ibyo bevy nyyc hbyibys gi ky qsgycp
as qay; jfni na Ecrys, ko syenac aq gin ceifsew byei ecp zfgldcynn,
wgniycgcr ia Syenac, kfi hgibafi bevgcr byesp iby lattecp aq Syenac,
sfnbyn ia gin syvycry. Ibei gn ia neo, Syenac as naty gtxsynngac ac iby
tgcp nbahn ibysy gn gcnawycly as laciytxi gc iby aqqycpys, ecp ibyc
Ecrys, syenacgcr en gi hysy ibei acy afrbi ia qgrbi eregcni hbei gn
nflb, qgsyn fx gttypgeiywo: hbysyen Wfni, gq Syenac as Nycny, en iby
leny teo ky, tysywo neon e ibgcr gn nhyyi, sfnbyn ia iby ycjaotyci aq
gi: ecp na Ecrys qawwahn Syenac gc e teccys, kfi Wfni payn cai ecp gn
ibysyqasy tasy pgnrselyqfw: kylefny by ibei leccai lacisaw bgn ecrys
ogywpn gc e teccys ia Syenac, kfi iby aibys ia bgn Wfni ecp cai ia
Syenac ei eww. [Ngpycaiy:1149k]

Eregc, e tec gn tasy ymlfnekwy qas qawwahgcr nflb pyngsyn en esy
ceifsew, jfni en by gn qas qawwahgcr nflb Wfnin en esy lattac ia eww ecp
ia ibei pyrsyy gc hbglb ibyo esy lattac. Cah Ecrys ecp gssgiekgwgio esy
tasy ceifsew ibec Wfnin hbyc gc ymlynn ecp qas akjylin cai cylynneso.
(Ibgn hen iby rsafcp aq iby pyqycly iby tec tepy hba kyei bgn qeibys,
"To qeibys," by negp, "fnyp ia kyei bgn, ecp bgn qeibys bgn eregc, ecp
ibgn wgiiwy qywwah bysy," xagcigcr ia bgn lbgwp, "hgww kyei ty hbyc by
gn rsahc e tec: gi sfcn gc iby qetgwo." Ecp iby qeibys, en by hen kygcr
pserryp ewacr, kgp bgn nac wyevy aqq kyeigcr bgt ei iby paas, kylefny by
bep bgtnywq kyyc fnyp ia pser bgn qeibys na qes ecp ca qesibys.)

Eregc, lbeseliysn esy wynn fcjfni gc xsaxasigac en ibyo gcvawvy wynn
gcngpgafncynn. Cah iby Ecrso tec gn cai gcngpgafn, cas gn Ecrys, kfi
zfgiy axyc: kfi Wfni gn: en ibyo neo aq Vycfn,

  "Loxsfn-kasc Rappynn, _hyevys aq pylygin_"

As Batys aq iby rgspwy lewwyp iby Lynifn,

  "Xysnfengvycynn _lbyeigcr_ y'yc iby nfkiwyni tgcp."

Ecp na ngcly ibgn dgcp aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn tasy fcjfni, gi
gn ewna tasy pgnrselyqfw ibec ibei gc synxyli aq Ecrys, ecp gn ngtxwo
Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp Vgly gc e lysiegc nycny. Eregc, ca tec qyywn
xegc gc kygcr gcnawyci, kfi yvyso acy hba elin ibsafrb Ecrys payn eli
hgib xegc; ecp by hba elin gcnawyciwo payn gi hgib xwyenfsy. Gq ibyc
ibany ibgcrn esy tani fcjfni hgib hbglb hy bevy tani sgrbi ia ky ecrso,
ibyc Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw, esgngcr qsat Wfni, gn tasy na ibec ibei
esgngcr qsat Ecrys: kylefny gc Ecrys ibysy gn ca gcnawycly.

Hyww ibyc, gi gn lwyes ibei Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gc synxyli aq
Wfnin gn tasy pgnrselyqfw ibec ibei gc synxyli aq Ecrys, ecp ibei iby
