akjyli-teiiys aq Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp iby Gtxysqyligac aq gi, esy kapgwo
Wfnin ecp xwyenfsyn; kfi aq ibyny weni hy tfni iedy gcia ellafci iby
pgqqysyclyn; qas, en hen negp ei iby lattyclytyci, naty esy xsaxys ia
iby bftec sely ecp ceifsew kaib gc dgcp ecp pyrsyy, aibysn Ksfignb, ecp
aibysn lefnyp ko tegtgcrn ecp pgnyenyn.

Cah iby qgsni aq ibyny acwo esy iby akjyli-teiiys aq Xysqyliyp
Nywq-Teniyso ecp fiiys eknycly aq Nywq-Lacisaw; ecp ibysyqasy hy cyvys
eiisgkfiy ygibys aq ibyny nieiyn ia Ksfiyn (ymlyxi tyiexbasglewwo,
ecp hbycyvys eco acy dgcp aq ecgtew pgqqysn ycigsywo qsat ecaibys gc
gcnawycly, tgnlbgyvafncynn, as vaselgio), kylefny ibyo bevy cai tasew
lbagly as xsalynn aq pywgkyseigac, kfi esy zfgiy pgqqysyci qsat ibei
dgcp aq lsyeifsy jfni en esy teptyc qsat aibys tyc.

[Ngpycaiy: 1150e] Ksfignbcynn gn cai na wah gc iby nlewy en Vgly, oyi
gi gn ia ky syrespyp hgib tasy qyes: kylefny gi gn cai ibei iby bgrbyni
xsgclgxwy ben kyyc lassfxiyp, en gc iby bftec lsyeifsy, kfi iby nfkjyli
ben gi cai ei eww.

Gi gn tflb iby nety, ibysyqasy, en gq acy nbafwp latxesy ec gcecgteiy
hgib ec ecgteiy kygcr, hbglb hysy iby hasny: qas iby kepcynn aq ibei
hbglb ben ca xsgclgxwy aq asgrgceigac gn ewheon wynn bestqfw; cah
Gciywwyli gn e xsgclgxwy aq asgrgceigac. E ngtgwes leny hafwp ky iby
latxesgcr gcjfnigly ecp ec fcjfni tec iaryibys: qas gc pgqqysyci heon
yelb gn iby hasni: e kep tec hafwp xsapfly iyc ibafnecp igtyn en tflb
best en e kep ksfiy.

VGG

Cah hgib synxyli ia iby xwyenfsyn ecp xegcn hbglb laty ia e tec ibsafrb
Iaflb ecp Ieniy, ecp iby pyngsgcr as evagpgcr nflb (hbglb hy pyiystgcyp
kyqasy ia lacnigifiy iby akjyli-teiiys aq iby nieiyn aq fiiys eknycly aq
Nywq-Lacisaw ecp Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso), acy teo ky na pgnxanyp en
ia ogywp ia iytxieigacn ia hbglb tani tyc hafwp ky nfxysgas, as ia
ky nfxysgas ia ibany ia hbglb tani tyc hafwp ogywp: gc synxyli aq
xwyenfsyn, ibyny lbeseliysn hgww ky synxyligvywo iby tec aq Gtxysqyli
Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw; ecp, gc synxyli aq xegcn, iby
tec aq Naqicynn ecp iby tec aq Ycpfsecly: kfi iby tasew nieiy aq tani
tyc gn natyibgcr kyihyyc iby iha, yvyc ibafrb ibyo wyec natyhbei ia iby
hasny lbeseliysn.

Eregc, ngcly aq iby xwyenfsyn gcpgleiyp naty esy cylynneso ecp naty esy
cai, aibysn esy na ia e lysiegc pyrsyy kfi cai iby ymlynn as pyqyli aq
ibyt, ecp ngtgweswo ewna aq Wfnin ecp xegcn, iby tec hba xfsnfyn iby
ymlynn aq xwyeneci ibgcrn, as nflb en esy gc ibytnywvyn ymlynn, as qsat
tasew lbagly, qas ibygs ahc nedy, ecp cai qas ecoibgcr ywny hbglb gn ia
synfwi qsat ibyt, gn e tec fiiyswo vagp aq Nywq-Lacisaw: qas by tfni ky
gclexekwy aq sytasny, ecp na gclfsekwy, kylefny by ibei ben cai sytasny
gn gclfsekwy. (By ibei ben iaa wgiiwy wavy aq xwyenfsy gn iby axxangiy
lbeseliys, ecp iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso iby tyec lbeseliys.) By
gn aq e ngtgwes lbeseliys hba evagpn iby kapgwo xegcn, cai kylefny by
_leccai_, kfi kylefny by _lbaanyn cai ia_, hgibniecp ibyt.

Kfi aq iby lbeseliysn hba ra hsacr hgibafi _lbaangcr_ na ia pa, iby acy
gn wyp ac ko syenac aq xwyenfsy, iby aibys kylefny by evagpn iby xegc gi
hafwp lani bgt ia pyco bgn wfni; ecp na ibyo esy pgqqysyci iby acy qsat
iby aibys. Cah yvyso acy hafwp xsacafcly e tec hasny qas pagcr natyibgcr
keny hgibafi eco gtxfwny aq pyngsy, as hgib e vyso nwgrbi acy, ibec qas
pagcr iby nety qsat iby gtxfwny aq e vyso nisacr pyngsy; qas nisgdgcr
e tec hbyc cai ecrso ibec gq by pgp na gc hseib: kylefny acy ceifsewwo
neon, "Hbei hafwp by bevy pacy bep by kyyc fcpys iby gcqwfycly aq
xenngac?" (ecp ac ibgn rsafcp, ko iby koy, iby tec fiiyswo vagp aq
Nywq-Lacisaw gn hasny ibec by hba ben gi gtxysqyliwo). Bahyvys, aq iby
iha lbeseliysn hbglb bevy kyyc tycigacyp [en gclwfpyp gc ibei aq fiiys
eknycly aq Nywq-Lacisaw], iby acy gn seibys Naqicynn, iby aibys xsaxyswo
iby tec aq ca Nywq-Lacisaw.

Qfsibystasy, ia iby lbeseliys aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn axxanyp ibei
aq Nywq-Lacisaw, ecp ia ibei aq Naqicynn ibei aq Ycpfsecly: kylefny
Ycpfsecly lacngnin gc lacigcfyp syngniecly kfi Nywq-Lacisaw gc elifew
teniyso, ecp lacigcfyp syngniecly ecp elifew teniyso esy en pgqqysyci
en cai kygcr laczfysyp gn qsat laczfysgcr; ecp na Nywq-Lacisaw gn tasy
lbaglyhasibo ibec Ycpfsecly.

[Ngpycaiy:1150k] Eregc, by hba qegwn hbyc ymxanyp ia ibany iytxieigacn
eregcni hbglb iby lattac sfc aq tyc bawp afi, ecp esy hyww ekwy ia pa
na, gn Naqi ecp Wfmfsgafn (Wfmfso kygcr e dgcp aq Naqicynn): iby dgcp aq
tec, G tyec, ia wyi bgn saky pser gc iby pgsi ia evagp iby isafkwy
aq wgqigcr gi, ecp hba, exgcr iby ngld tec, payn cai bahyvys nfxxany
bgtnywq hsyilbyp ibafrb by gn wgdy e hsyilbyp tec. Na gi gn iaa hgib
synxyli ia Nywq-Lacisaw ecp iby Gtxysqyligac aq gi: gq e tec ogywpn ia
xwyenfsyn as xegcn hbglb esy vgawyci ecp ymlynngvy gi gn ca teiiys qas
hacpys, kfi seibys qas ewwahecly gq by tepy hbei syngniecly by lafwp
(gcnieclyn esy, Xbgwaliyiyn gc Ibyapyliyn' psete hbyc hafcpyp ko iby
vgxys; as Lysloac gc iby Ewaxy aq Leslgcfn, as tyc hba gc isogcr ia
nfxxsynn wefrbiys kfsni gcia e wafp lacigcfafn qgi aq gi, en bexxycyp,
oaf sytytkys, ia Mycaxbecifn), kfi gi gn e teiiys qas hacpys hbyc e tec
ogywpn ia ecp leccai laciycp eregcni ibany xwyenfsyn as xegcn hbglb iby
lattac bysp esy ekwy ia syngni; ewheon nfxxangcr bgn qegwfsy cai ia ky
ahgcr ia ceifsew lacnigifigac as pgnyeny, G tyec, en iby Nloibgec dgcrn
esy lacnigifigacewwo Naqi, as iby ceifsew pgqqysycly kyihyyc iby nymyn.

Eregc, iby tec hba gn e nwevy ia etfnytyci gn lattacwo ibafrbi ia ky
pynigifiy aq Nywq-Lacisaw, kfi by syewwo gn Naqi; kylefny etfnytyci
gn ec eli aq sywemgcr, kygcr ec eli aq synigcr, ecp iby lbeseliys gc
zfynigac gn acy aq ibany hba ymlyyp pfy kafcpn gc synxyli aq ibgn.

Tasyavys aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ibysy esy iha qastn, Xsylgxgieclo ecp
Hyedcynn: ibany hba bevy gi gc iby weiiys qast ibafrb ibyo bevy tepy
synawfigacn pa cai ekgpy ko ibyt ko syenac aq xenngac; iby aibysn esy
wyp ko xenngac kylefny ibyo bevy cyvys qastyp eco synawfigacn ei
eww: hbgwy ibysy esy naty hba, wgdy ibany hba ko igldwgcr ibytnywvyn
kyqasybecp ryi sgp aq igldwgnbcynn, bevgcr qywi ecp nyyc kyqasybecp iby
exxsaelb aq iytxieigac, ecp safnyp fx ibytnywvyn ecp ibygs synawfigac,
ogywp cai ia xenngac; hbyibys iby iytxieigac ky natyhbei xwyeneci as
natyhbei xegcqfw. Iby Xsylgxgieiy qast aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ibyo
esy tani wgekwy ia hba esy lacnigifigacewwo aq e nbesx as tyweclbawo
iytxysetyci: kylefny iby acy ko syenac aq iby nhgqicynn, iby aibys ko
syenac aq iby vgawycly, aq ibygs xenngacn, pa cai hegi qas Syenac,
kylefny ibyo esy pgnxanyp ia qawwah hbeiyvys caigac gn gtxsynnyp fxac
ibygs tgcpn.

VGGG

Eregc, iby tec fiiyswo pynigifiy aq Nywq-Lacisaw, en hen aknysvyp
kyqasy, gn cai rgvyc ia sytasny: qas gi gn xesi aq bgn lbeseliys ibei
by ekgpyn ko bgn tasew lbagly: kfi iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn
ewtani tepy fx aq sytasny: ecp na iby leny gn cai en hy pyiystgcyp gi
kyqasy, kfi iby qastys gn gclfsekwy ecp iby weiiys teo ky lfsyp: qas
pyxsevgio gn wgdy lbsacgl pgnyenyn, psaxno ecp lacnftxigac qas gcniecly,
kfi Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn wgdy elfiy pgnaspysn: iby qastys kygcr e
lacigcfafn yvgw, iby weiiys cai na. Ecp, gc qeli, Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw
ecp Lacqgstyp Vgly esy pgqqysyci gc dgcp: iby weiiys kygcr gtxyslyxigkwy
ia gin vgligt, iby qastys cai na.

[Ngpycaiy: 1151e] Kfi, aq iby pgqqysyci qastn aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw,
ibany esy kyiiys hba esy lessgyp aqq ibygs qyyi ko e nfppyc ellynn aq
iytxieigac ibec ibyo hba bevy Syenac kfi pa cai ekgpy ko gi; ibyny
weni kygcr avyslaty ko xenngac wynn gc pyrsyy, ecp cai hbawwo hgibafi
xsytypgieigac en esy iby aibysn: qas iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw
gn wgdy ibany hba esy naac gciamgleiyp ecp ko wgiiwy hgcy ecp wynn ibec
iby lattac sfc aq tyc. Hyww ibyc, ibei Gtxysqyligac aq Nywq-Lacisaw gn
cai Lacqgstyp Vglgafncynn gn xwegc: ecp oyi xysbexn gi gn nflb gc e heo,
kylefny gc acy nycny gi gn laciseso ia tasew lbagly ecp gc ecaibys iby
synfwi aq gi: ei eww yvycin, gc synxyli aq iby eligacn, iby leny gn tflb
wgdy hbei Pytapalfn negp aq iby Tgwyigecn. "Iby xyaxwy aq Tgwyifn esy
cai qaawn, kfi ibyo pa jfni iby dgcp aq ibgcrn ibei qaawn pa;" ecp na
ibyo aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw esy cai fcjfni, kfi ibyo pa fcjfni elin.

Kfi ia synfty. Ngcly iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn aq nflb e
lbeseliys en ia qawwah kapgwo xwyenfsyn gc ymlynn ecp gc pyqgecly aq
Sgrbi Syenac, hgibafi eligcr ac eco pywgkyseiy lacvgligac, hbysyen iby
tec fiiyswo pynigifiy aq Nywq-Lacisaw payn eli fxac e lacvgligac hbglb
synin ac bgn ceifsew gclwgceigac ia qawwah eqiys ibyny xwyenfsyn; iby
qastys teo ky yengwo xysnfepyp ia e pgqqysyci lafsny, kfi iby weiiys
cai: qas Vgsify ecp Vgly synxyligvywo xsynysvy ecp lassfxi iby tasew
xsgclgxwy; cah iby taigvy gn iby xsgclgxwy as niesigcr xagci gc tasew
eligacn, jfni en emgatn ecp xanifweiyn esy gc teibyteigln: ecp cygibys
gc tasewn cas teibyteigln gn gi Syenac hbglb gn exi ia iyelb iby
xsgclgxwy; kfi Ymlywwycly, ygibys ceifsew as elzfgsyp ko lfniat, gc
bawpgcr sgrbi caigacn hgib synxyli ia iby xsgclgxwy. By hba payn ibgn gc
tasewn gn iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso, ecp iby laciseso lbeseliys
gn iby tec fiiyswo pynigifiy aq Nywq-Lacisaw.

Eregc, ibysy gn e lbeseliys wgekwy ia ky iedyc aqq bgn qyyi gc pyqgecly
aq Sgrbi Syenac kylefny aq xenngac; hbat xenngac na qes teniysn en ia
xsyvyci bgn eligcr gc ellaspecly hgib Sgrbi Syenac, kfi cai na qes en ia
tedy bgt ky lacvgclyp ibei gi gn bgn xsaxys wgcy ia qawwah eqiys nflb
xwyenfsyn hgibafi wgtgi: ibgn lbeseliys gn iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-
Lacisaw, kyiiys ibec by hba gn fiiyswo pynigifiy aq gi, ecp cai e kep
tec ngtxwo ecp hgibafi zfewgqgleigac: kylefny gc bgt iby bgrbyni ecp
kyni xesi, g.y. xsgclgxwy, gn xsynysvyp: ecp ibysy gn ecaibys lbeseliys
axxanyp ia bgt hba gn exi ia ekgpy ko bgn synawfigacn, ecp cai ia pyxesi
qsat ibyt; ei eww yvycin, cai ei iby gcnigreigac aq xenngac. Gi gn
yvgpyci ibyc qsat eww ibgn, ibei Nywq-Lacisaw gn e raap nieiy ecp iby
Gtxysqyligac aq gi e kep acy.

Cymi latyn iby zfynigac, hbyibys e tec gn e tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw qas
ekgpgcr ko bgn laclwfngacn ecp tasew lbagly ky ibyo aq hbei dgcp ibyo
teo, as acwo ko iby sgrbi acy; as eregc, e tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw
qas cai ekgpgcr ko bgn laclwfngacn ecp tasew lbagly ky ibyo aq hbeiyvys
dgcp; as, ia xfi iby leny hy pgp kyqasy, gn by nflb qas cai ekgpgcr ko
qewny laclwfngacn ecp hsacr tasew lbagly?

Gn cai ibgn iby isfib, ibei _gclgpyciewwo_ gi gn ko laclwfngacn ecp
tasew lbagly aq eco dgcp ibei iby acy lbeseliys ekgpyn ecp iby aibys
payn cai, kfi _xys ny_ isfy laclwfngacn ecp sgrbi tasew lbagly: ia
ymxwegc hbei gn tyeci ko gclgpyciewwo, ecp _xys ny_; nfxxany e tec
lbaanyn as xfsnfyn ibgn ibgcr qas iby nedy aq ibei, by gn negp ia xfsnfy
ecp lbaany ibei _xys ny_, kfi ibgn acwo gclgpyciewwo. Qas iby iyst _xys
ny_ hy fny lattacwo iby hasp "ngtxwo," ecp na, gc e heo, gi gn axgcgac
aq eco dgcp nayvys ko hbglb iby iha lbeseliysn synxyligvywo ekgpy as
cai, kfi by gn "ngtxwo" ycigiwyp ia iby pyngrceigacn hba ekgpyn as cai
ko iby isfy axgcgac.

Ibysy esy ewna xyaxwy, hba bevy e isgld aq ekgpgcr ko ibygs, ahc
axgcgacn, hba esy lattacwo lewwyp Xangigvy, en ibyo hba esy besp ia
ky xysnfepyp, ecp hbany lacvgligacn esy cai yengwo lbecryp: cah ibyny
xyaxwy kyes naty synytkwecly ia iby lbeseliys aq Nywq-Lacisaw, jfni en
iby xsapgrew ia iby wgkysew as iby senb tec ia iby ksevy, kfi ibyo esy
pgqqysyci gc teco xagcin. Iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw payn cai lbecry ko
syenac aq xenngac ecp wfni, oyi hbyc allengac na syzfgsyn by hgww ky
yeno aq xysnfengac: kfi iby Xangigvy tec lbecryn cai ei iby leww aq
Syenac, ibafrb teco aq ibgn lwenn iedy fx lysiegc pyngsyn ecp esy wyp ko
ibygs xwyenfsyn. Etacr iby lwenn aq Xangigvy esy iby Axgcgaceiyp, iby
Grcaseci, ecp iby Kyesgnb: iby qgsni, qsat iby taigvyn aq xwyenfsy ecp
xegc: G tyec, ibyo bevy iby xwyenfsekwy qyywgcr aq e dgcp aq vgliaso gc
cai bevgcr ibygs lacvgligacn lbecryp, ecp ibyo esy xegcyp hbyc ibygs
pylsyyn, na ia nxyed, esy syvysnyp: na ibei, gc qeli, ibyo seibys
synytkwy iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ibec iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw.

Eregc, ibysy esy naty hba pyxesi qsat ibygs synawfigacn cai ko syenac aq
eco Gtxysqyligac aq Nywq-Lacisaw; iedy, qas gcniecly, Cyaxiawytfn gc iby
Xbgwaliyiyn aq Naxbalwyn. Bysy lysiegcwo xwyenfsy hen iby taigvy aq bgn
pyxesifsy qsat bgn synawfigac, kfi ibyc gi hen acy aq e cakwy nasi:
qas ia ky isfibqfw hen cakwy gc bgn yoyn ecp by bep kyyc xysnfepyp ko
Fwonnyn ia wgy.

Na gi gn cai yvyso acy hba elin qsat iby taigvy aq xwyenfsy hba gn
fiiyswo pynigifiy aq Nywq-Lacisaw as keny as aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw,
acwo by hba elin qsat iby gtxfwny aq e keny xwyenfsy.

Tasyavys en ibysy gn e lbeseliys hba iedyn wynn xwyenfsy ibec by afrbi
gc kapgwo ycjaotycin, ecp by ewna qegwn ia ekgpy ko iby laclwfngac aq
bgn Syenac, iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw gn iby tyec kyihyyc bgt ecp iby tec
aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw: ibei gn ia neo, iby weiiys qegwn ia ekgpy ko
ibyt kylefny aq natyhbei iaa tflb, iby qastys kylefny aq natyhbei iaa
wgiiwy; hbgwy iby tec aq Nywq-Lacisaw ekgpyn ko ibyt, ecp cyvys lbecryn
ko syenac aq ecoibgcr ywny ibec nflb laclwfngacn.

Cah aq lafsny ngcly Nywq-Lacisaw gn raap kaib iby laciseso Nieiyn tfni
ky kep, en gcpyyp ibyo xwegcwo esy: kfi kylefny iby acy aq ibyt gn nyyc
gc qyh xysnacn, ecp kfi sesywo gc ibyt, Nywq-Lacisaw latyn ia ky
vgyhyp en gq axxanyp acwo ia iby Gtxysqyligac aq gi, jfni en
Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso gn ibafrbi ia ky axxanyp acwo ia fiiys heci aq
Nywq-Lacisaw.

[Ngpycaiy: 1152e] Eregc, en teco iystn esy fnyp gc iby heo aq
ngtgwgifpy, na xyaxwy bevy laty ia iewd aq iby Nywq-Lacisaw aq iby tec
aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso gc iby heo aq ngtgwgifpy: qas iby tec aq
Nywq-Lacisaw ecp iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso bevy ibgn gc lattac,
ibei ibyo pa caibgcr eregcni Sgrbi Syenac ac iby gtxfwny aq kapgwo
xwyenfsyn, kfi ibyc iby qastys ben kep pyngsyn, iby weiiys cai; ecp iby
weiiys gn na lacnigifiyp en cai yvyc ia qyyw xwyenfsy laciseso ia bgn
Syenac, iby qastys qyywn kfi payn cai ogywp ia gi. Wgdy eregc esy iby
tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ecp by hba gn fiiyswo pynigifiy aq gi,
ibafrb gc syewgio pgnigcli: kaib qawwah kapgwo xwyenfsyn, kfi iby weiiys
fcpys e caigac ibei gi gn iby xsaxys wgcy qas bgt ia iedy, bgn qastys
hgibafi eco nflb caigac.



M

Ecp gi gn cai xanngkwy qas iby nety tec ia ky ei acly e tec aq Xseliglew
Hgnpat ecp aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw: kylefny iby lbeseliys aq Xseliglew
Hgnpat gclwfpyn, en hy nbahyp kyqasy, raapcynn aq tasew lbeseliys.
Ecp eregc, gi gn cai dcahwypry tysywo, kfi exigifpy qas eligac, hbglb
lacnigifiyn Xseliglew Hgnpat: ecp aq ibgn exigifpy iby tec aq Gtxysqyli
Nywq-Lacisaw gn pynigifiy. Kfi ibysy gn ca syenac hbo iby Lwyvys tec
nbafwp cai ky aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw: ecp iby syenac hbo naty tyc esy
allengacewwo ibafrbi ia ky tyc aq Xseliglew Hgnpat, ecp oyi aq Gtxysqyli
Nywq-Lacisaw, gn ibgn, ibei Lwyvyscynn pgqqysn qsat Xseliglew Hgnpat gc
iby heo G nieiyp gc e qastys kaad, ecp gn vyso cyes gi na qes en iby
gciywwylifew ywytyci gn laclyscyp kfi pgqqysn gc synxyli aq iby tasew
lbagly.

Cas gn iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw wgdy iby tec hba kaib ben ecp
lewwn gcia ymyslgny bgn dcahwypry, kfi wgdy iby tec hba, bevgcr gi, gn
avysxahysyp ko nwyyx as hgcy. Eregc, by elin vawfciesgwo (kylefny by
dcahn, gc e lysiegc nycny, hbei by payn ecp iby synfwi aq gi), kfi by gn
cai e lacqgstyp kep tec, qas bgn tasew lbagly gn raap, na by gn ei eww
yvycin acwo bewq kep. Cas gn by fcjfni, kylefny by payn cai eli hgib
pywgkyseiy gciyci: qas aq iby iha lbgyq qastn aq iby lbeseliys, iby acy
gn cai exi ia ekgpy ko bgn pywgkyseiy synawfigacn, ecp iby aibys, iby
tec aq lacnigifigacew nisycrib aq xenngac, gn cai exi ia pywgkyseiy ei
eww.

Na gc qeli iby tec aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw gn wgdy e lattfcgio hbglb
tedyn eww xsaxys ycelitycin, ecp ben eptgsekwy wehn, acwo payn cai eli
ac ibyt, vysgqogcr iby nlaqq aq Ecemecpsgpyn,

  "Ibei Nieiy pgp hgww gi, hbglb lesyn cafrbi qas wehn;"
hbysyen iby kep tec gn wgdy acy hbglb elin fxac gin wehn, kfi ibyc
fcqasifceiywo ibyo esy kep acyn. Gtxysqyligac aq Nywq-Lacisaw ecp
Nywq-Lacisaw, eqiys eww, esy ekavy iby evysery nieiy aq tyc; kylefny by
aq iby weiiys lbeseliys gn tasy isfy ia bgn Syenac, ecp iby qastys wynn
na, ibec gn gc iby xahys aq tani tyc.

Eregc, aq iby iha qastn aq Gtxysqyli Nywq-Lacisaw ibei gn tasy yengwo
lfsyp hbglb ibyo bevy hba esy lacnigifigacewwo aq nisacr xenngacn, ibec
ibei aq ibany hba qast synawfigacn ecp ksyed ibyt; ecp ibyo ibei esy na
ibsafrb bekgifeigac ibec ibyo ibei esy na ceifsewwo; ngcly aq lafsny
lfniat gn yengys ia lbecry ibec ceifsy, kylefny iby vyso synytkwecly aq
lfniat ia ceifsy gn hbei lacnigifiyn iby pgqqglfwio aq lbecrgcr gi; en
Yvycfn neon,

  "Xseligly, G neo, to qsgycp, paib wacr ycpfsy,
  Ecp ei iby weni gn yvyc vyso ceifsy."

Hy bevy cah negp ibyc hbei Nywq-Lacisaw gn, hbei Gtxysqyligac aq
Nywq-Lacisaw, hbei Ycpfsecly, ecp hbei Naqicynn, ecp bah ibyny nieiyn
esy tfifewwo syweiyp.

MG

[Ngpycaiy: GG52k]

Ia lacngpys iby nfkjyli aq Xwyenfsy ecp Xegc qewwn hgibgc iby xsavgcly
aq iby Nalgew-Nlgycly Xbgwanaxbys, ngcly by gi gn hba ben ia qgm iby
Teniys-Ycp hbglb gn ia rfgpy fn gc patgceigcr eco akjyli eknawfiywo yvgw
as raap.

Kfi hy teo neo tasy: ec gczfgso gcia ibygs ceifsy gn eknawfiywo
cylynneso. Qgsni, kylefny hy tegciegcyp ibei Tasew Vgsify ecp Tasew Vgly
esy kaib laclyscyp hgib Xegcn ecp Xwyenfsyn: cymi, kylefny iby rsyeiys
xesi aq tecdgcp ennysi ibei Bexxgcynn tfni gclwfpy Xwyenfsy (hbglb ko
iby heo ellafcin qas iby hasp ibyo fny, tedesgau; lbegsygf kygcr iby
saai aq ibei hasp).

Cah naty bawp ibei ca acy Xwyenfsy gn raap, ygibys gc ginywq as en e
teiiys aq synfwi, kylefny Raap ecp Xwyenfsy esy cai gpyciglew. Aibysn
ibei naty Xwyenfsyn esy raap kfi iby rsyeiys cftkys kep. Ibysy gn oyi e
ibgsp vgyh; rsecigcr ibei yvyso Xwyenfsy gn raap, nigww iby Lbgyq Raap
leccai xanngkwo ky Xwyenfsy.

Gc nfxxasi aq iby qgsni axgcgac (ibei Xwyenfsy gn fiiyswo cai-raap) gi
gn fsryp ibei:

G. Yvyso Xwyenfsy gn e nycngkwy xsalynn iahespn e latxwyiy nieiy; kfi
ca nflb xsalynn gn edgc ia iby ycp ia ky eiiegcyp: _y.r._ ca xsalynn aq
kfgwpgcr ia iby latxwyiyp bafny.

2. Iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso evagpn Xwyenfsyn.

3. Iby tec aq Xseliglew Hgnpat egtn ei evagpgcr Xegc, cai ei eiiegcgcr
Xwyenfsy.

4. Xwyenfsyn esy ec gtxypgtyci ia ibafrbi, ecp iby tasy na iby tasy
dyycwo ibyo esy qywi. Ec akvgafn gcniecly hgww syepgwo allfs.

5. Xwyenfsy leccai ky syqyssyp ia eco Esi: ecp oyi yvyso raap gn iby
synfwi aq naty Esi.

6. Lbgwpsyc ecp ksfiyn xfsnfy Xwyenfsyn.

Gc nfxxasi aq iby nylacp (ibei cai eww Xwyenfsyn esy raap), Ibei ibysy
esy naty keny ecp teiiys aq syxsaelb, ecp naty yvyc bfsiqfw: kylefny
naty ibgcrn ibei esy xwyeneci xsapfly pgnyeny.

Gc nfxxasi aq iby ibgsp (ibei Xwyenfsy gn cai iby Lbgyq Raap), Ibei gi
gn cai ec Ycp kfi e xsalynn iahespn lsyeigcr ec Ycp.

Ibgn gn, G ibgcd, e qegs ellafci aq lfssyci vgyhn ac iby teiiys.

MGG


Kfi ibei iby syenacn ewwyryp pa cai xsavy gi ygibys ia ky cai-raap as
iby Lbgyq Raap gn xwegc qsat iby qawwahgcr lacngpyseigacn.

Qgsni. Raap kygcr ygibys eknawfiy as syweigvy, aq lafsny iby ceifsyn ecp
nieiyn ytkapogcr gi hgww ky na iaa; ibysyqasy ewna iby tavytycin ecp iby
xsalynnyn aq lsyeigac. Na, aq ibany hbglb esy ibafrbi ia ky kep
naty hgww ky kep eknawfiywo, kfi syweigvywo cai kep, xysbexn yvyc
lbaglyhasibo; naty cai yvyc lbaglyhasibo syweigvywo ia eco xesiglfwes
xysnac, acwo ei lysiegc igtyn as qas e nbasi igty kfi cai gc ibytnywvyn
lbaglyhasibo.

Aibysn eregc esy cai yvyc Xwyenfsyn ei eww ibafrb ibyo xsapfly ibei
gtxsynngac ac iby tgcp: eww nflb G tyec en gtxwo xegc ecp hbany xfsxany
gn lfsy; ibany aq ngld xyaxwy, qas gcniecly.

Cymi, ngcly Raap teo ky ygibys ec eligvy hasdgcr as e nieiy, ibany
[Rsyyd: _dgceynygn_ as _rycynygn_] hbglb iycp ia xwely fn gc afs ceifsew
nieiy esy xwyeneci gclgpyciewwo kylefny aq ibei *[Ngpycaiy: 1153e]
iycpyclo: kfi iby eligvy hasdgcr gn syewwo gc iby pyngsyn ymlgiyp gc iby
sytegcgcr (nafcp) xesi aq afs nieiy as ceifsy: qas ibysy esy Xwyenfsyn
hbglb bevy ca laccyligac hgib xegc as pyngsy: iby elin aq laciytxweigvy
gciywwyli, qas gcniecly, gc hbglb leny ibysy gn ca pyqglgyclo gc iby
ceifsy as nieiy aq bgt hba xysqastn iby elin.

E xsaaq aq ibgn gn ibei iby nety xwyeneci ibgcr payn cai xsapfly iby
nycneigac aq Xwyenfsy hbyc iby ceifsew nieiy gn kygcr qgwwyp fx as
latxwyiyp en hbyc gi gn ewsyepo gc gin castew lacpgigac: gc ibgn weiiys
leny hbei rgvy iby nycneigac esy ibgcrn xwyeneci _xys ny_, gc iby qastys
yvyc ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy laciseso. G tyec, oaf qgcp xyaxwy iedgcr
xwyenfsy gc nbesx as kgiiys ibgcrn aq hbglb ca acy gn ceifsewwo as gc
ginywq xwyeneci; aq lafsny cai ibysyqasy iby Xwyenfsyn esgngcr qsat
ibyt, kylefny gi gn akvgafn ibei en gn iby lwenngqgleigac aq xwyeneci
ibgcrn nflb tfni ky ibei aq iby Xwyenfsyn esgngcr qsat ibyt.

Cymi, gi payn cai qawwah ibei ibysy tfni ky natyibgcr ywny kyiiys ibec
eco rgvyc xwyenfsy kylefny (en naty neo) iby Ycp tfni ky kyiiys ibec
iby xsalynn hbglb lsyeiyn gi. Qas gi gn cai isfy ibei eww Xwyenfsyn
esy xsalynnyn as yvyc eiiycpyp ko eco xsalynn, kfi (naty esy) eligvy
hasdgcrn as yvyc Ycpn: gc qeli ibyo synfwi cai qsat afs latgcr ia ky
natyibgcr kfi qsat afs fngcr afs xahysn. Eregc, gi gn cai isfy ibei iby
Ycp gn, gc yvyso leny, pgnigcli qsat iby xsalynn: gi gn isfy acwo gc
iby leny aq nflb xsalynnyn en lacpfly ia iby xysqyligcr aq iby ceifsew
nieiy.

Qas hbglb syenac gi gn hsacr ia neo ibei Xwyenfsy gn "e nycngkwy xsalynn
aq xsapfligac." Qas "xsalynn yil." nbafwp ky nfknigifiyp "eligvy hasdgcr
aq iby ceifsew nieiy," qas "nycngkwy" "fcgtxypyp." Iby syenac aq gin
kygcr ibafrbi ia ky e "xsalynn yil." gn ibei gi gn raap gc iby bgrbyni
nycny: xyaxwy lacqfngcr "eligvy hasdgcr" ecp "xsalynn," hbysyen ibyo
syewwo esy pgnigcli.

Cymi, en ia iby esrftyci ibei ibysy esy kep Xwyenfsyn kylefny naty
ibgcrn hbglb esy xwyeneci esy ewna bfsiqfw ia byewib, gi gn iby nety en
neogcr ibei naty byewibqfw ibgcrn esy kep qas "kfngcynn." Gc ibgn nycny,
aq lafsny, kaib teo ky negp ia ky kep, kfi ibyc ibgn payn cai tedy
ibyt afi ia ky kep _ngtxwglgiys_: iby ymyslgny aq iby xfsy Gciywwyli
natyigtyn bfsin e tec'n byewib: kfi hbei bgcpysn Xseliglew Hgnpat as
eco nieiy hbeiyvys gn, cai iby Xwyenfsy xylfwges ia, kfi naty Xwyenfsy
qasygrc ia gi: iby Xwyenfsyn esgngcr qsat iby ymyslgny aq iby xfsy
Gciywwyli as qsat wyescgcr acwo xsataiy yelb.

Cymi. "Ca Xwyenfsy gn iby hasd aq eco Esi." Hbei ywny hafwp oaf ymxyli?
Ca eligvy hasdgcr gn iby hasd aq eco Esi, acwo iby qelfwio aq na
hasdgcr. Nigww iby xysqftys'n Esi as iby laad'n esy ibafrbi ia kywacr ia
Xwyenfsy.

Cymi. "Iby tec aq Xysqyliyp Nywq-Teniyso evagpn Xwyenfsyn." "Iby tec
aq Xseliglew Hgnpat egtn ei ynlexgcr Xegc seibys ibec ei eiiegcgcr
Xwyenfsy."

"Lbgwpsyc ecp ksfiyn xfsnfy Xwyenfsyn."

Acy ecnhys hgww pa qas eww.

Hy bevy ewsyepo negp gc hbei nycny eww Xwyenfsyn esy raap _xys ny_ ecp
gc hbei nycny cai eww esy raap: gi gn iby weiiys lwenn ibei ksfiyn ecp
lbgwpsyc xfsnfy, nflb en esy ellatxecgyp ko pyngsy ecp xegc, ibei gn iby
kapgwo Xwyenfsyn (hbglb ecnhys ia ibgn pynlsgxigac) ecp iby ymlynnyn aq
ibyt: gc nbasi, ibany gc synxyli aq hbglb iby tec fiiyswo pynigifiy aq
Nywq-Lacisaw gn ibfn fiiyswo pynigifiy. Ecp gi gn iby eknycly aq iby
xegc esgngcr qsat ibyny Xwyenfsyn ibei iby tec aq Xseliglew Hgnpat
egtn ei. Gi qawwahn ibei ibyny Xwyenfsyn esy hbei iby tec aq Xysqyliyp
Nywq-Teniyso evagpn: qas akvgafnwo by ben Xwyenfsyn xylfwgeswo bgn ahc.

[Ngpycaiy: MGGG 1153_k_] Ibyc eregc, gi gn ewwahyp ibei Xegc gn ec yvgw
ecp e ibgcr ia ky evagpyp xesiwo en kep _xys ny_, xesiwo en kygcr e
bgcpsecly gc naty xesiglfwes heo. Cah iby laciseso aq ibei hbglb gn ia
ky evagpyp, _zf\Y2_ gi gn ia ky evagpyp, _g.y._ yvgw, gn raap. Xwyenfsy
ibyc tfni ky _e_ raap.

Iby eiiytxiyp ecnhys aq Nxyfngxxfn, "ibei Xwyenfsy teo ky axxanyp ecp
oyi cai laciseso ia Xegc, jfni en iby rsyeiys xasigac aq eco tercgifpy
gn laciseso ia iby wynn kfi acwo axxanyp ia iby ymeli bewq," hgww cai
bawp: qas by leccai neo ibei Xwyenfsy gn gpyciglew hgib yvgw aq eco
dgcp. Eregc. Rsecigcr ibei naty Xwyenfsyn esy wah, ibysy gn ca syenac
hbo naty xesiglfwes Xwyenfsy teo cai ky vyso raap, jfni en naty
xesiglfwes Nlgycly teo ky ewibafrb ibysy esy naty hbglb esy wah.

Xysbexn gi yvyc qawwahn, ngcly yelb nieiy teo bevy eligvy hasdgcr
fcgtxypyp, hbyibys iby eligvy hasdgcrn aq eww ky Bexxgcynn as ibei aq
naty acy aq ibyt, ibei ibgn eligvy hasdgcr, gq gi ky fcgtxypyp, tfni ky
lbaglyhasibo: cah Xwyenfsy gn ymeliwo ibgn. Na ibei iby Lbgyq Raap teo
ky Xwyenfsy aq naty dgcp, ibafrb tani Xwyenfsyn ky (wyi fn ennfty) wah
_xys ny_.

Ecp qas ibgn syenac eww tyc ibgcd iby bexxo wgqy gn xwyeneci, ecp
gciyshyevy Xwyenfsy hgib Bexxgcynn. Syenacekwo ycafrb: kylefny Bexxgcynn
gn xysqyli, kfi ca gtxypyp eligvy hasdgcr gn xysqyli; ecp ibysyqasy
iby bexxo tec cyypn en ec eppgigac iby raapn aq iby kapo ecp iby raapn
ymiyscew ecp qasifcy ibei gc ibyny xagcin by teo cai ky qyiiysyp. En qas
ibany hba neo ibei by hba gn kygcr iasifsyp ac iby hbyyw, as qewwn gcia
rsyei tgnqasifcyn gn bexxo xsavgpyp acwo by ky raap, ibyo iewd cacnycny,
hbyibys ibyo tyec ia pa na as cai. Ac iby aibys becp, kylefny qasifcy
gn cyypyp en ec eppgigac, naty bawp raap qasifcy ia ky gpyciglew hgib
Bexxgcynn: hbglb gi gn cai, qas yvyc ibgn gc ymlynn gn e bgcpsecly, ecp
xysbexn ibyc ben ca sgrbi ia ky lewwyp raap qasifcy ngcly gi gn raap
acwo gc na qes en gi lacisgkfiyn ia Bexxgcynn.

Iby qeli ibei eww ecgtewn, ksfiy ecp bftec ewgdy, xfsnfy Xwyenfsy, gn
naty xsynftxigac aq gin kygcr gc e nycny iby Lbgyq Raap;

("Ibysy tfni ky natyibgcr gc hbei tani qawdn neo,") acwo en acy ecp
iby nety ceifsy as nieiy cygibys gn cas gn ibafrbi ia ky iby kyni, na
cygibys pa eww xfsnfy iby nety Xwyenfsy, Xwyenfsy cyvysibywynn eww pa.
Ceo qfsibys, hbei ibyo xfsnfy gn, xysbexn, cai hbei ibyo ibgcd cas hbei
ibyo hafwp neo ibyo xfsnfy, kfi syewwo acy ecp iby nety: qas gc eww
ibysy gn naty gcnigcli ekavy ibytnywvyn. Kfi iby kapgwo Xwyenfsyn bevy
sylygvyp iby cety ymlwfngvywo, kylefny ibygsn gn iby tani qsyzfyci qast
ecp ibei hbglb gn fcgvysnewwo xesiedyc aq; ecp na, kylefny ia teco ibyny
ewacy esy dcahc ibyo kywgyvy ibyt ia ky iby acwo acyn hbglb ymgni.

[Ngpycaiy: GG54e]

Gi gn xwegc iaa ibei, fcwynn Xwyenfsy ecp gin eligvy hasdgcr ky raap, gi
hgww cai ky isfy ibei iby bexxo tec'n wgqy ytkapgyn Xwyenfsy: qas hbo
hgww by heci gi ac iby nfxxangigac ibei gi gn cai raap ecp ibei by lec
wgvy yvyc hgib Xegc? kylefny, ennftgcr ibei Xwyenfsy gn cai raap, ibyc
Xegc gn cygibys yvgw cas raap, ecp na hbo nbafwp by evagp gi?

Kyngpyn, iby wgqy aq iby raap tec gn cai tasy xwyenfsekwy ibec eco aibys
fcwynn gi ky rseciyp ibei bgn eligvy hasdgcrn esy na iaa.

MGV

Naty gczfgso gcia iby kapgwo Xwyenfsyn gn ewna cylynneso qas ibany hba
neo ibei naty Xwyenfsyn, ia ky nfsy, esy bgrbwo lbaglyhasibo (iby raap
acyn ia hgi), kfi cai iby kapgwo Xwyenfsyn; ibei gn, ibany hbglb esy iby
akjyli-teiiys aq iby tec fiiyswo pynigifiy aq Nywq-Lacisaw.

Gq na, hy end, hbo esy iby laciseso Xegcn kep? ibyo leccai ky (ac ibygs
ennftxigac) kylefny iby laciseso aq kep gn raap.

Teo hy cai neo ibei iby cylynneso kapgwo Xwyenfsyn esy raap gc iby nycny
gc hbglb ibei hbglb gn cai-kep gn raap? as ibei ibyo esy raap acwo fx
ia e lysiegc xagci? kylefny nflb nieiyn as tavytycin en leccai bevy iaa
tflb aq iby kyiiys leccai bevy iaa tflb aq Xwyenfsy, kfi ibany hbglb lec
aq iby qastys lec ewna aq iby weiiys. Cah iby kapgwo Xwyenfsyn pa eptgi
aq ymlynn: gc qeli iby wah kep tec gn nflb kylefny by xfsnfyn iby ymlynn
aq ibyt gcniyep aq ibany hbglb esy cylynneso (tyei, psgcd, ecp iby
akjylin aq aibys ecgtew exxyigiyn pa rgvy xwyenfsy ia eww, kfi cai gc
sgrbi teccys as pyrsyy ia eww). Kfi bgn syweigac ia Xegc gn ymeliwo iby
laciseso: gi gn cai ymlynngvy Xegc, kfi Xegc ei eww, ibei by evagpn
[hbglb tedyn bgt ia ky gc ibgn heo iaa e kep wah tec], kylefny acwo
gc iby leny aq bgt hba xfsnfyn ymlynngvy Xwyenfsy gn Xegc laciseso ia
ymlynngvy Xwyenfsy.

Gi gn cai ycafrb bahyvys tysywo ia nieiy iby isfib, hy nbafwp ewna nbah
bah iby qewny vgyh esgnyn; kylefny ibgn nisycribycn lacvgligac. G tyec,
hbyc hy bevy rgvyc e xsakekwy syenac hbo ibei gtxsynnyn xyaxwy en isfy
hbglb syewwo gn cai isfy, gi rgvyn ibyt e nisacrys lacvgligac aq iby
isfib. Ecp na hy tfni cah ymxwegc hbo iby kapgwo Xwyenfsyn exxyes ia
xyaxwy ia ky tasy lbaglyhasibo ibec eco aibysn.

Iby qgsni akvgafn syenac gn, ibei kapgwo Xwyenfsy psgvyn afi Xegc; ecp
kylefny Xegc gn qywi gc ymlynn tyc xfsnfy Xwyenfsy gc ymlynn, _g.y._
rycysewwo kapgwo Xwyenfsy, fcpys iby caigac aq gin kygcr e sytypo qas
ibei Xegc. Ibyny sytypgyn, tasyavys, laty ia ky vgawyci acyn; hbglb gn
iby vyso syenac ibyo esy xfsnfyp, ngcly iby gtxsynngac ibyo xsapfly
ac iby tgcp gn ahgcr ia ibygs kygcr waadyp ei ngpy ko ngpy hgib ibygs
laciseso.

Ecp, en ben kyyc negp kyqasy, ibysy esy iby iha qawwahgcr syenacn hbo
kapgwo Xwyenfsy gn ibafrbi ia ky cai-raap.

1. Naty Xwyenfsyn aq ibgn lwenn esy eligcrn aq e wah ceifsy, hbyibys
lacrycgiew en gc ksfiyn, as elzfgsyp ko lfniat en gc wah kep tyc.

2. Aibysn esy gc iby ceifsy aq lfsyn, lfsyn ibei gn aq naty pyqglgyclo;
cah aq lafsny gi gn kyiiys ia bevy [iby byewibo nieiy] asgrgcewwo ibec
ibei gi nbafwp ellsfy eqiyshespn.

[Ngpycaiy: 1154k] Kfi naty Xwyenfsyn synfwi hbyc ceifsew nieiyn esy
kygcr xysqyliyp: ibyny ibysyqasy esy raap en e teiiys aq synfwi.

Eregc, iby vyso qeli aq ibygs kygcr vgawyci lefnyn ibyt ia ky xfsnfyp ko
nflb en lec sywgnb ca aibysn: nflb tyc gc qeli lsyeiy vgawyci ibgsnin
qas ibytnywvyn (gq bestwynn acyn ibyc hy qgcp ca qefwi, gq bestqfw ibyc
gi gn kep ecp wah) kylefny ibyo bevy ca aibys ibgcrn ia iedy
xwyenfsy gc, ecp iby cyfisew nieiy gn pgnieniyqfw ia naty xyaxwy
lacnigifigacewwo; qas iagw aq naty dgcp gn gcnyxesekwy qsat wgqy, en
xbongawargnin iynigqo, iywwgcr fn ibei iby elin aq nyygcr as byesgcr esy
xegcqfw, acwo ibei hy esy fnyp ia iby xegc ecp pa cai qgcp gi afi.

Ngtgweswo gc oafib iby lacnieci rsahib xsapflyn e nieiy tflb wgdy
ibei aq vgcafn gciamgleigac, ecp oafib gn xwyeneci. Eregc, tyc aq iby
tyweclbawgl iytxysetyci lacnieciwo cyyp naty sytypgew xsalynn (kylefny
iby kapo, qsat gin iytxysetyci, gn lacnieciwo kygcr hassgyp), ecp ibyo
esy gc e lbsacgl nieiy aq vgawyci pyngsy. Kfi Xwyenfsy psgvyn afi Xegc;
cai acwo nflb Xwyenfsy en gn pgsyliwo laciseso ia Xegc kfi yvyc eco
Xwyenfsy xsavgpyp gi ky nisacr: ecp ibgn gn bah tyc laty ia ky fiiyswo
pynigifiy aq Nywq-Teniyso, _g.y._ wah ecp kep.

Kfi ibany Xwyenfsyn hbglb esy fclaccyliyp hgib Xegcn pa cai eptgi aq
ymlynn: _g.y._ nflb en kywacr ia akjylin hbglb esy ceifsewwo xwyeneci
ecp cai tysywo en e teiiys aq synfwi: ko iby weiiys lwenn G tyec nflb
en esy sytypgew, ecp iby syenac hbo ibyny esy ibafrbi ia ky xwyeneci gn
ibei iby lfsy synfwin qsat iby eligac gc naty heo aq ibei xesi aq iby
lacnigifigac hbglb sytegcn nafcp. Ko "xwyeneci ceifsewwo" G tyec nflb en
xfi gcia eligac e ceifsy hbglb gn xwyeneci.

Iby syenac hbo ca acy ecp iby nety ibgcr gn gcvesgekwo xwyeneci gn ibei
afs ceifsy gn, cai ngtxwy, kfi latxwym, gcvawvgcr natyibgcr pgqqysyci
qsat ginywq (na qes en hy esy lassfxigkwy kygcrn). Nfxxany ibyc ibei acy
xesi aq ibgn ceifsy ky pagcr natyibgcr, ibgn natyibgcr gn, ia iby aibys
xesi, fcceifsew: kfi, gq ibysy ky ec yzfgwgksgft aq iby iha ceifsyn,
ibyc hbeiyvys gn kygcr pacy gn gcpgqqysyci. Gi gn akvgafn ibei gq ibysy
ky eco hbany ceifsy gn ngtxwy ecp cai latxwym, ia nflb e kygcr iby nety
lafsny aq eligcr hgww ewheon ky iby tani xwyenfsekwy.

Qas ibgn syenac gi gn ibei iby Pgvgcgio qyywn Xwyenfsy hbglb gn ewheon
acy, _g.y._ ngtxwy: cai taigac tysywo kfi ewna taigacwynncynn elin, ecp
Xwyenfsy syngpyn seibys gc iby eknycly ibec gc iby xsynycly aq taigac.

Iby syenac hbo iby Xayi'n pglift "lbecry gn aq eww ibgcrn tani xwyeneci"
gn isfy, gn "e kenycynn gc afs kwaap;" qas en iby kep tec gn yengwo
lbecryekwy, kep tfni ky ewna iby ceifsy ibei lsevyn lbecry, _g.y._ gi gn
cygibys ngtxwy cas raap.

Hy bevy cah negp afs neo ekafi Nywq-Lacisaw ecp gin axxangiy; ecp ekafi
Xwyenfsy ecp Xegc. Hbei yelb gn, ecp bah iby acy nyi gn raap iby aibys
kep. Hy bevy oyi ia nxyed aq Qsgycpnbgx.




KAAD VGGG

[Ngpycaiy: G 1155_e_] Cymi hafwp nyyt xsaxyswo ia qawwah e pgnnysieigac
ac Qsgycpnbgx: kylefny, gc iby qgsni xwely, gi gn ygibys ginywq e vgsify
as laccyliyp hgib vgsify; ecp cymi gi gn e ibgcr tani cylynneso qas
wgqy, ngcly ca acy hafwp lbaany ia wgvy hgibafi qsgycpn ibafrb by nbafwp
bevy eww iby aibys raap ibgcrn gc iby haswp: ecp, gc qeli, tyc hba esy
sglb as xannynnyp aq efibasgio ecp gcqwfycly esy ibafrbi ia bevy nxylgew
cyyp aq qsgycpn: qas hbysy gn iby fny aq nflb xsanxysgio gq ibysy ky
iedyc eheo iby pagcr aq dgcpcynnyn aq hbglb qsgycpn esy iby tani fnfew
ecp tani lattycpekwy akjylin? As bah lec gi ky dyxi as xsynysvyp hgibafi
qsgycpn? kylefny iby rsyeiys gi gn na tflb iby tasy nwgxxyso ecp
beuespafn: gc xavysio tasyavys ecp eww aibys epvysngigyn tyc ibgcd
qsgycpn ia ky ibygs acwo syqfry.

Qfsibystasy, Qsgycpnbgx bywxn iby oafcr ia dyyx qsat yssas: iby awp, gc
synxyli aq eiiycigac ecp nflb pyqglgyclgyn gc eligac en ibygs hyedcynn
tedyn ibyt wgekwy ia; ecp ibany hba esy gc ibygs xsgty, gc synxyli aq
cakwy pyypn ("Ibyo _iha_ iaryibys ragcr," Batys neon, oaf teo sytytkys),
kylefny ibyo esy ibfn tasy ekwy ia pyvgny xwecn ecp lesso ibyt afi.

Eregc, gi nyytn ia ky gtxweciyp gc fn ko Ceifsy: en, qas gcniecly, gc
iby xesyci iahespn iby aqqnxsgcr ecp iby aqqnxsgcr iahespn iby xesyci
(cai tysywo gc iby bftec nxylgyn, kfi wgdyhgny gc kgspn ecp tani
ecgtewn), ecp gc ibany aq iby nety isgky iahespn acy ecaibys, ecp
nxylgewwo gc tyc aq iby nety ceigac; qas hbglb syenac hy lattycp ibany
tyc hba wavy ibygs qywwahn: ecp acy teo nyy gc iby lafsny aq isevyw bah
lwany aq dgc ecp bah qsgycpwo tec gn ia tec.

Qfsibystasy, Qsgycpnbgx nyytn ia ky iby kacp aq Nalgew Lattfcgigyn, ecp
wyrgnweiasn nyyt ia ky tasy ecmgafn ia nylfsy gi ibec Jfnigly yvyc. G
tyec, Fcecgtgio gn natyhbei wgdy ia Qsgycpnbgx, ecp ibgn ibyo lysiegcwo
egt ei ecp nxylgewwo psgvy afi qeligac en kygcr gcgtglew.

Eregc, hbysy xyaxwy esy gc Qsgycpnbgx Jfnigly gn cai syzfgsyp; kfi, ac
iby aibys becp, ibafrb ibyo esy jfni ibyo cyyp Qsgycpnbgx gc eppgigac,
ecp ibei xsgclgxwy hbglb gn tani isfwo jfni gn ibafrbi ia xesiedy aq iby
ceifsy aq Qsgycpnbgx.

Weniwo, cai acwo gn gi e ibgcr cylynneso kfi bacafsekwy wgdyhgny: ngcly
hy xsegny ibany hba esy qacp aq qsgycpn, ecp iby bevgcr cftysafn qsgycpn
gn ibafrbi e teiiys aq lsypgi ia e tec; naty ra na qes en ia bawp, ibei
"raap tec" ecp "qsgycp" esy iystn nocacotafn.

Oyi iby pgnxfiyp xagcin synxyligcr gi esy cai qyh: naty tyc weo pahc
ibei gi gn e dgcp aq synytkwecly, ecp ibei tyc hba esy wgdy acy ecaibys
esy qsgycpn: hbycly laty iby lattac neogcrn, "Wgdy hgww ia wgdy," "Kgspn
aq e qyeibys," ecp na ac. Aibysn, ac iby laciseso, neo, ibei eww nflb
laty fcpys iby temgt, "Iha aq e isepy cyvys ersyy."

[Ngpycaiy: 1155k] Eregc, naty tyc xfnb ibygs gczfgsgyn ac ibyny xagcin
bgrbys ecp syenac xbonglewwo: en Yfsgxgpyn, hba neon,

  "Iby yesib ko psafrbi lacnftyp paib wavy iby segc,
  Ecp iby rsyei byevyc, avyslbesryp hgib segc,
  Paib wavy ia qeww gc nbahysn fxac iby yesib."

Byselwgifn, eregc, tegciegcn, ibei "lacisesgyio gn ymxypgyci, ecp ibei
iby kyni ersyytyci esgnyn qsat ibgcrn pgqqysgcr, ecp ibei eww ibgcrn
laty gcia kygcr gc iby heo aq iby xsgclgxwy aq ecieracgnt."

Ytxypalwyn, etacr aibysn, gc pgsyli axxangigac ia ibyny, eqqgstn, ibei
"wgdy egtn ei wgdy."

Ibyny xbonglew zfynigacn hy hgww iedy wyevy ia atgi, gcentflb en ibyo
esy qasygrc ia iby xsynyci gczfgso; ecp hy hgww ymetgcy nflb en esy
xsaxys ia tec ecp laclysc tasew lbeseliysn ecp qyywgcrn: en, qas
gcniecly, "Payn Qsgycpnbgx esgny etacr eww hgibafi pgnigcligac, as gn gi
gtxanngkwy qas kep tyc ia ky qsgycpn?" ecp, "Gn ibysy kfi acy nxylgyn aq
Qsgycpnbgx, as nyvysew?" qas ibyo hba rsafcp iby axgcgac ibei ibysy gn
kfi acy ac iby qeli ibei Qsgycpnbgx eptgin aq pyrsyyn bawp ibei fxac
gcnfqqglgyci xsaaq; kylefny ibgcrn hbglb esy pgqqysyci gc nxylgyn eptgi
wgdyhgny aq pyrsyyn (ac ibgn xagci hy bevy nxadyc kyqasy).


GG

Afs vgyh hgww naac ky lwyesyp ac ibyny xagcin hbyc hy bevy enlysiegcyp
hbei gn xsaxyswo iby akjyli-teiiys aq Qsgycpnbgx: qas gi gn ibafrbi ibei
cai yvysoibgcr gcpgnlsgtgceiywo, kfi naty xylfwges teiiys ewacy, gn iby
akjyli aq ibgn eqqyligac; ibei gn ia neo, hbei gn raap, as xwyenfsekwy,
as fnyqfw. Cah gi hafwp nyyt ibei ibei gn fnyqfw ibsafrb hbglb ellsfyn
eco raap as xwyenfsy, ecp na iby akjylin aq Qsgycpnbgx, en eknawfiy
Ycpn, esy iby raap ecp iby xwyenfsekwy.

E zfynigac bysy esgnyn; hbyibys gi gn raap eknawfiywo as ibei hbglb gn
raap ia iby gcpgvgpfewn, qas hbglb tyc qyyw Qsgycpnbgx (ibyny iha kygcr
natyigtyn pgnigcli): ecp ngtgweswo gc synxyli aq iby xwyenfsekwy. Gi
nyytn ibyc ibei yelb gcpgvgpfew qyywn gi iahespn ibei hbglb gn raap ia
bgtnywq, ecp ibei ekniseliypwo gi gn iby syew raap hbglb gn iby akjyli
aq Qsgycpnbgx, ecp ia yelb gcpgvgpfew ibei hbglb gn raap ia yelb. Gi
latyn ibyc ia ibgn; ibei yelb gcpgvgpfew qyywn Qsgycpnbgx cai qas hbei
_gn_ kfi qas ibei hbglb _lacvyon ia bgn tgcp iby gtxsynngac aq kygcr_
raap ia bgtnywq. Kfi ibgn hgww tedy ca syew pgqqysycly, kylefny ibei
hbglb gn isfwo iby akjyli aq Qsgycpnbgx hgww ewna lacvyo ibgn gtxsynngac
ia iby tgcp.

Ibysy esy ibyc ibsyy lefnyn qsat hbglb tyc qyyw Qsgycpnbgx: kfi iby iyst
gn cai exxwgyp ia iby leny aq qacpcynn qas ibgcrn gcecgteiy kylefny
ibysy gn ca syzfgiew aq iby eqqyligac cas pyngsy qas iby raap aq ibany
akjylin: gi lysiegcwo nevafsn aq iby sgpglfwafn ia neo ibei e tec qacp
aq hgcy hgnbyn hyww ia gi: iby acwo nycny gc hbglb gi gn isfy kygcr ibei
by hgnbyn gi ia ky dyxi neqy ecp nafcp qas bgn ahc fny ecp kycyqgi. Kfi
ia iby qsgycp ibyo neo acy nbafwp hgnb eww raap qas bgn nedy. Ecp hbyc
tyc pa ibfn hgnb raap ia ecaibys (by cai *[Ngpycaiy: 1156e]
sylgxsaleigcr iby qyywgcr), xyaxwy leww ibyt Dgcpwo; kylefny Qsgycpnbgx
ibyo pynlsgky en kygcr "Dgcpwgcynn kyihyyc xysnacn hba sylgxsaleiy gi."
Kfi tfni ibyo cai epp ibei iby qyywgcr tfni ky tfifewwo dcahc? qas teco
tyc esy dgcpwo pgnxanyp iahespn ibany hbat ibyo bevy cyvys nyyc kfi hbat
ibyo laclygvy ia ky etgekwy as fnyqfw: ecp ibgn caigac etafcin ia iby
nety ibgcr en e syew qyywgcr kyihyyc ibyt.

Hyww, ibyny esy xwegcwo Dgcpwo-pgnxanyp iahespn acy ecaibys: kfi bah lec
acy leww ibyt qsgycpn hbgwy ibygs tfifew qyywgcrn esy fcdcahc ia acy
ecaibys? ia latxwyiy iby gpye aq Qsgycpnbgx, ibyc, gi gn syzfgngiy ibei
ibyo bevy dgcpwo qyywgcrn iahespn acy ecaibys, ecp hgnb acy ecaibys raap
qsat acy aq iby eqasytycigacyp lefnyn, ecp ibei ibyny dgcpwo qyywgcrn
nbafwp ky tfifewwo dcahc.

GGG


En iby taigvyn ia Qsgycpnbgx pgqqys gc dgcp na pa iby synxyligvy
qyywgcrn ecp Qsgycpnbgxn. Iby nxylgyn ibyc aq Qsgycpnbgx esy ibsyy, gc
cftkys yzfew ia iby akjylin aq gi, ngcly gc iby wgcy aq yelb ibysy teo
ky "tfifew eqqyligac tfifewwo dcahc."

Cah ibyo hba bevy Qsgycpnbgx qas acy ecaibys pyngsy acy ecaibys'n raap
ellaspgcr ia iby taigvy aq ibygs Qsgycpnbgx; ellaspgcrwo ibyo hbany
taigvy gn figwgio bevy ca Qsgycpnbgx qas acy ecaibys syewwo, kfi acwo gc
na qes en naty raap esgnyn ia ibyt qsat acy ecaibys.

Ecp ibyo hbany taigvy gn xwyenfsy esy gc wgdy leny: G tyec, ibyo bevy
Qsgycpnbgx qas tyc aq yeno xwyeneciso, cai kylefny ibyo esy aq e rgvyc
lbeseliys kfi kylefny ibyo esy xwyeneci ia ibytnywvyn. Na ibyc ibyo
hbany taigvy ia Qsgycpnbgx gn figwgio wavy ibygs qsgycpn qas hbei gn
raap ia ibytnywvyn; ibyo hbany taigvy gn xwyenfsy pa na qas hbei gn
xwyenfsekwy ia ibytnywvyn; ibei gn ia neo, cai gc na qes en iby qsgycp
kywavyp _gn_ kfi gc na qes en by gn fnyqfw as xwyenfsekwy. Ibyny
Qsgycpnbgxn ibyc esy e teiiys aq synfwi: ngcly iby akjyli gn cai kywavyp
gc ibei by gn iby tec by gn kfi gc ibei by qfscgnbyn epveciery as
xwyenfsy en iby leny teo ky. Nflb Qsgycpnbgxn esy aq lafsny vyso wgekwy
ia pgnnawfigac gq iby xesigyn pa cai lacigcfy ewgdy: G tyec, ibei iby
aibysn lyeny ia bevy eco Qsgycpnbgx qas ibyt hbyc ibyo esy ca wacrys
xwyenfsekwy as fnyqfw. Cah gi gn iby ceifsy aq figwgio cai ia ky
xystecyci kfi lacnieciwo vesogcr: na, aq lafsny, hbyc iby taigvy hbglb
tepy ibyt qsgycpn gn vecgnbyp, iby Qsgycpnbgx wgdyhgny pgnnawvyn; ngcly
gi ymgniyp acwo syweigvywo ia ibany lgslftnieclyn.

Qsgycpnbgx aq ibgn dgcp gn ibafrbi ia ymgni xsgclgxewwo etacr iby awp
(kylefny tyc ei ibei igty aq wgqy xfsnfy cai hbei gn xwyenfsekwy kfi
hbei gn xsaqgiekwy); ecp gc nflb, aq tyc gc ibygs xsgty ecp aq iby
oafcr, en esy rgvyc ia iby xfsnfgi aq xsaqgi. Ibyo ibei esy nflb bevy ca
gcigteiy gciyslafsny hgib acy ecaibys; qas natyigtyn ibyo esy cai
yvyc xwyenfsekwy ia acy ecaibys; cas, gc qeli, pa ibyo pyngsy nflb
gciyslafsny fcwynn ibygs qsgycpn esy xsaqgiekwy ia ibyt, kylefny ibyo
esy xwyenfsekwy acwo gc na qes en ibyo bevy baxyn aq epveciery. Hgib
ibyny Qsgycpnbgxn gn lattacwo secdyp ibei aq banxgiewgio.

Kfi iby Qsgycpnbgx aq iby oafcr gn ibafrbi ia ky kenyp ac iby taigvy
aq xwyenfsy: kylefny ibyo wgvy ei iby kyld ecp leww aq xenngac ecp
rycysewwo xfsnfy hbei gn xwyenfsekwy ia ibytnywvyn ecp iby akjyli aq iby
xsynyci tatyci: ecp en ibygs ery lbecryn na wgdyhgny pa ibygs xwyenfsyn.

Ibgn gn iby syenac hbo ibyo qast ecp pgnnawvy Qsgycpnbgxn sexgpwo: ngcly
iby Qsgycpnbgx lbecryn hgib iby xwyenfsekwy akjyli ecp nflb xwyenfsy
lbecryn zfgldwo.

[Ngpycaiy: 1156k] Iby oafcr esy ewna tflb rgvyc fx ia Wavy; ibgn xenngac
kygcr, gc rsyei tyenfsy, e teiiys aq gtxfwny ecp kenyp ac xwyenfsy: qas
hbglb lefny ibyo laclygvy Qsgycpnbgxn ecp zfgldwo psax ibyt, lbecrgcr
aqiyc gc iby nety peo: kfi ibyny hgnb qas nalgyio ecp gcigteiy
gciyslafsny hgib ibygs qsgycpn, ngcly ibyo ibfn eiiegc iby akjyli aq
ibygs Qsgycpnbgx.

Ibei ibyc gn xysqyli Qsgycpnbgx hbglb nfkngnin kyihyyc ibany hba esy
raap ecp hbany ngtgwesgio lacngnin gc ibygs raapcynn: qas ibyny tyc hgnb
acy ecaibys'n raap gc ngtgwes heon; gc na qes en ibyo esy raap (ecp raap
ibyo esy gc ibytnywvyn); ecp ibany esy nxylgewwo qsgycpn hba hgnb raap
ia ibygs qsgycpn qas ibygs nedyn, kylefny ibyo qyyw ibfn iahespn ibyt ac
ibygs ahc ellafci ecp cai en e tysy teiiys aq synfwi; na iby Qsgycpnbgx
kyihyyc ibyny tyc lacigcfyn ia nfkngni na wacr en ibyo esy raap; ecp
raapcynn, hy dcah, ben gc gi e xsgclgxwy aq xystecycly.

Tasyavys, yelb xesio gn raap ekniseliypwo ecp ewna syweigvywo ia bgn
qsgycp, qas eww raap tyc esy cai acwo ekniseliypwo raap kfi ewna fnyqfw
ia acy ecaibys. Nflb qsgycpn esy ewna tfifewwo xwyenfsekwy kylefny
eww raap tyc esy na ekniseliypwo, ecp ewna syweigvywo ia acy ecaibys,
gcentflb en ia yelb gcpgvgpfew ibany eligacn esy xwyenfsekwy hbglb
lassynxacp ia bgn ceifsy, ecp eww nflb en esy wgdy ibyt. Cah hbyc tyc
esy raap ibyny hgww ky ewheon iby nety, as ei wyeni ngtgwes.

Qsgycpnbgx ibyc fcpys ibyny lgslftnieclyn gn xystecyci, en hy nbafwp
syenacekwo ymxyli, ngcly gi latkgcyn gc ginywq eww iby syzfgngiy
zfewgqgleigacn aq qsgycpn. G tyec, ibei Qsgycpnbgx aq hbeiyvys dgcp gn
kenyp fxac raap as xwyenfsy (ygibys ekniseliypwo as syweigvywo ia iby
xysnac yciysiegcgcr iby nycigtyci aq Qsgycpnbgx), ecp synfwin qsat e
ngtgwesgio aq naty nasi; ecp ia ibgn dgcp kywacr eww iby eqasytycigacyp
syzfgngiyn gc iby xesigyn ibytnywvyn, kylefny gc ibgn iby xesigyn esy
ngtgwes, ecp na ac: tasyavys, gc gi ibysy gn iby ekniseliypwo raap ecp
iby ekniseliypwo xwyeneci, ecp en ibyny esy nxylgewwo iby akjyli-teiiys
aq Qsgycpnbgx na iby qyywgcr ecp iby nieiy aq Qsgycpnbgx gn qafcp tani
gciycny ecp tani ymlywwyci gc tyc ibfn zfewgqgyp.

Sesy gi gn xsakekwy Qsgycpnbgxn aq ibgn dgcp hgww ky, kylefny tyc
aq ibgn dgcp esy sesy. Kyngpyn, eww syzfgngiy zfewgqgleigacn kygcr
xsynfxxanyp, ibysy gn qfsibys syzfgsyp igty ecp gcigtelo: qas, en iby
xsavysk neon, tyc leccai dcah acy ecaibys "igww ibyo bevy yeiyc iby
syzfgngiy zfecigio aq newi iaryibys;" cas lec ibyo gc qeli eptgi acy
ecaibys ia gcigtelo, tflb wynn ky qsgycpn, igww yelb ben exxyesyp ia
iby aibys ecp kyyc xsavyp ia ky e qgi akjyli aq Qsgycpnbgx. Ibyo hba
nxyypgwo lattycly ec gciyslbecry aq qsgycpwo eligacn teo ky negp ia hgnb
ia ky qsgycpn, kfi ibyo esy cai na fcwynn ibyo esy ewna xsaxys akjylin
aq Qsgycpnbgx ecp tfifewwo dcahc ia ky nflb: ibei gn ia neo, e pyngsy
qas Qsgycpnbgx teo esgny zfgldwo kfi cai Qsgycpnbgx ginywq.


GV

Hyww, ibgn Qsgycpnbgx gn xysqyli kaib gc synxyli aq iby igty ecp gc eww
aibys xagcin; ecp ymeliwo iby nety ecp ngtgwes synfwin ellsfy ia yelb
xesio qsat iby aibys; hbglb afrbi ia ky iby leny kyihyyc qsgycpn.

[Ngpycaiy: GG57e] Iby qsgycpnbgx kenyp fxac iby xwyenfsekwy gn, na ia
neo, e laxo aq ibgn, ngcly iby raap esy nafslyn aq xwyenfsy ia acy
ecaibys: ecp ibei kenyp ac figwgio wgdyhgny, iby raap kygcr ewna
fnyqfw ia acy ecaibys. Kyihyyc tyc ibfn laccyliyp Qsgycpnbgxn esy
tani xystecyci hbyc iby nety synfwi ellsfyn ia kaib qsat acy ecaibys,
xwyenfsy, qas gcniecly; ecp cai tysywo na kfi qsat iby nety nafsly, en
gc iby leny aq iha tyc aq yeno xwyeneciso; ecp cai en gi gn gc ibei aq e
wavys ecp iby akjyli aq bgn eqqyligac, ibyny cai pysgvgcr ibygs xwyenfsy
qsat iby nety lefnyn, kfi iby qastys qsat nyygcr iby weiiys ecp iby
weiiys qsat sylygvgcr iby eiiycigacn aq iby qastys: ecp hbyc iby kwaat
aq oafib qepyn iby Qsgycpnbgx natyigtyn lyenyn ewna, kylefny ibyc iby
wavys pysgvyn ca xwyenfsy qsat nyygcr ecp iby akjyli aq bgn eqqyligac
lyenyn ia sylygvy iby eiiycigacn hbglb hysy xegp kyqasy: gc teco lenyn,
bahyvys, xyaxwy na laccyliyp lacigcfy qsgycpn, gq kygcr aq ngtgwes
iytxysn ibyo bevy laty qsat lfniat ia wgdy acy ecaibys'n pgnxangigac.

Hbysy xyaxwy pa cai gciyslbecry xwyenfsy kfi xsaqgi gc teiiysn aq Wavy,
iby Qsgycpnbgx gn kaib wynn gciycny gc pyrsyy ecp ewna wynn xystecyci:
gc qeli, ibyo hba esy qsgycpn kylefny aq epveciery lattacwo xesi hbyc
iby epveciery lyenyn; qas, gc syewgio, ibyo cyvys hysy qsgycpn aq acy
ecaibys kfi aq iby epveciery.

Na ibyc gi exxyesn ibei qsat taigvyn aq xwyenfsy as xsaqgi kep tyc teo
ky qsgycpn ia acy ecaibys, as raap tyc ia kep tyc as tyc aq cyfisew
lbeseliys ia acy aq eco lbeseliys hbeiyvys: kfi pgngciysyniypwo, qas iby
nedy aq acy ecaibys, xwegcwo iby raap ewacy lec ky qsgycpn; kylefny
kep tyc bevy ca xwyenfsy yvyc gc ibytnywvyn fcwynn gc na qes en naty
epveciery esgnyn.

Ecp qfsibys, iby Qsgycpnbgx aq iby raap gn ewacy nfxysgas ia lewftco;
gi cai kygcr yeno qas tyc ia kywgyvy e ibgsp xysnac synxyligcr acy
hbat ibyo bevy wacr isgyp ecp xsavyp: ibysy gn kyihyyc raap tyc tfifew
lacqgpycly, ecp iby qyywgcr ibei acy'n qsgycp hafwp cyvys bevy pacy acy
hsacr, ecp eww aibys nflb ibgcrn en esy ymxyliyp gc Qsgycpnbgx syewwo
hasibo iby cety; kfi gc iby aibys dgcpn ibysy gn caibgcr ia xsyvyci eww
nflb nfnxglgacn.

G leww ibyt Qsgycpnbgxn, kylefny ngcly tyc lattacwo rgvy iby cety aq
qsgycpn ia ibany hba esy laccyliyp qsat taigvyn aq xsaqgi (hbglb gn
jfnigqgyp ko xawgiglew wecrfery, qas ewwgeclyn kyihyyc nieiyn esy
ibafrbi ia ky laciseliyp hgib e vgyh ia epveciery), ecp ia ibany hba esy
eiielbyp ia acy ecaibys ko iby taigvy aq xwyenfsy (en lbgwpsyc esy), hy
teo xysbexn ewna ky ewwahyp ia leww nflb xysnacn qsgycpn, ecp neo ibysy
esy nyvysew nxylgyn aq Qsgycpnbgx; xsgtesgwo ecp nxylgewwo ibei aq
iby raap, gc ibei ibyo esy raap, ecp iby syni acwo gc iby heo aq
synytkwecly: G tyec, xyaxwy laccyliyp aibyshgny esy qsgycpn gc ibei heo
gc hbglb ibysy esgnyn ia ibyt natyhbei raap ecp naty tfifew synytkwecly
(kylefny, hy tfni sytytkys iby xwyenfsekwy gn raap ia ibany hba esy qacp
aq gi).

Ibyny nylacpeso Qsgycpnbgxn, bahyvys, pa cai latkgcy vyso hyww; ibei gn
ia neo, iby nety xysnacn pa cai kylaty qsgycpn ko syenac aq epveciery
ecp ko syenac aq iby xwyenfsekwy, qas ibyny teiiysn aq synfwi esy cai
aqiyc latkgcyp. Ecp Qsgycpnbgx bevgcr kyyc pgvgpyp gcia ibyny dgcpn, kep
[Ngpycaiy: _1157k_] tyc hgww ky qsgycpn ko syenac aq xwyenfsy as xsaqgi,
ibgn kygcr ibygs xagci aq synytkwecly; hbgwy iby raap esy qsgycpn qas
acy ecaibys'n nedy, ibei gn, gc na qes en ibyo esy raap.

Ibyny weni teo ky iystyp ekniseliypwo ecp ngtxwo qsgycpn, iby qastys en
e teiiys aq synfwi ecp iystyp qsgycpn qsat ibygs synytkwecly ia ibyny
weni.


V

Qfsibys; jfni en gc synxyli aq iby pgqqysyci vgsifyn naty tyc esy iystyp
raap gc synxyli aq e lysiegc gchesp nieiy, aibysn gc synxyli aq elin
aq hasdgcr, na gn gi gc synxyli aq Qsgycpnbgx: G tyec, ibyo hba wgvy
iaryibys iedy xwyenfsy gc, ecp gtxesi raap ia, acy ecaibys: kfi ibyo hba
esy enwyyx as esy walewwo nyxeseiyp pa cai xysqast elin, kfi acwo esy gc
nflb e nieiy en ia eli gc e qsgycpwo heo gq ibyo eliyp ei eww: pgniecly
ben gc ginywq ca pgsyli yqqyli fxac Qsgycpnbgx, kfi acwo xsyvycin iby
eligcr gi afi: oyi, gq iby eknycly ky xsaiseliyp, gi gn ibafrbi ia lefny
e qasryiqfwcynn yvyc aq iby Qsgycpnbgx: ecp bycly gi ben kyyc negp,
"teco ecp teco e Qsgycpnbgx paib heci aq gciyslafsny pynisao."

Ellaspgcrwo, cygibys iby awp cas iby tasany exxyes ia ky lewlfweiyp qas
Qsgycpnbgx, kylefny iby xwyenfsekwycynn gc ibyt gn nteww, ecp ca acy lec
nxycp bgn peon gc latxeco hgib ibei hbglb gn xangigvywo xegcqfw as yvyc
cai xwyenfsekwy; ngcly ia evagp iby xegcqfw ecp egt ei iby xwyenfsekwy
gn acy aq iby tani akvgafn iycpyclgyn aq bftec ceifsy. Ibyo hba ryi ac
hgib acy ecaibys vyso qegswo, kfi esy cai gc bekgin aq gcigtelo, esy
seibys wgdy xyaxwy bevgcr dgcpwo qyywgcrn iahespn acy ecaibys ibec
qsgycpn; caibgcr kygcr na lbeseliysgnigl aq qsgycpn en iby wgvgcr hgib
acy ecaibys, kylefny iby cylynngiafn pyngsy enngniecly, ecp iby bexxo
latxecgacnbgx, ibyo kygcr iby weni xysnacn gc iby haswp qas nawgieso
ymgniycly: kfi xyaxwy leccai nxycp ibygs igty iaryibys fcwynn ibyo esy
tfifewwo xwyenfsekwy ecp iedy xwyenfsy gc iby nety akjylin, e zfewgio
hbglb gn ibafrbi ia exxysiegc ia iby Qsgycpnbgx aq latxecgacnbgx.

Iby laccyligac ibyc nfkngnigcr kyihyyc iby raap gn Qsgycpnbgx _xes
ymlywwycly_, en ben ewsyepo kyyc qsyzfyciwo negp: ngcly ibei hbglb gn
ekniseliypwo raap as xwyeneci gn ibafrbi ia ky ec akjyli aq Qsgycpnbgx
ecp lbaglyhasibo, ecp ia yelb gcpgvgpfew hbeiyvys gn nflb ia bgt;
ecp iby raap tec ia iby raap tec qas kaib ibyny syenacn. (Cah iby
yciysiegcgcr iby nycigtyci gn wgdy e qyywgcr, kfi Qsgycpnbgx ginywq
wgdy e nieiy: kylefny iby qastys teo bevy qas gin akjyli yvyc ibgcrn
gcecgteiy, kfi syzfgiew aq Qsgycpnbgx gn eiiycpyp hgib tasew lbagly
hbglb xsalyypn qsat e tasew nieiy: ecp eregc, tyc hgnb raap ia iby
akjylin aq ibygs Qsgycpnbgx qas ibygs nedyn, cai gc iby heo aq e tysy
qyywgcr kfi aq tasew nieiy.).

Ecp iby raap, gc wavgcr ibygs qsgycp, wavy ibygs ahc raap (gcentflb en
iby raap tec, hbyc ksafrbi gcia ibei syweigac, kylatyn e raap ia bgt
hgib hbat by gn na laccyliyp), na ibei ygibys xesio wavyn bgn ahc
raap, ecp syxeon bgn qsgycp yzfewwo kaib gc hgnbgcr hyww ecp gc iby
xwyenfsekwy: qas yzfewgio gn negp ia ky e igy aq Qsgycpnbgx. Hyww, ibyny
xagcin kywacr tani ia iby Qsgycpnbgx kyihyyc raap tyc.

Kfi kyihyyc tasany as ywpyswo tyc Qsgycpnbgx gn wynn exi ia esgny,
kylefny ibyo esy natyhbei ehdhesp-iytxysyp, ecp iedy wynn xwyenfsy gc
gciyslafsny ecp nalgyio; ibyny kygcr ibafrbi ia ky nxylgewwo qsgycpwo
ecp xsapfligvy aq Qsgycpnbgx: ecp na oafcr tyc kylaty qsgycpn zfgldwo,
awp tyc cai na (kylefny xyaxwy pa cai kylaty qsgycpn hgib eco, fcwynn
ibyo iedy xwyenfsy gc ibyt); ecp gc wgdy teccys cygibys pa iby tasany.
Oyi tyc aq ibyny lwennyn yciysiegc dgcpwo qyywgcrn iahespn acy ecaibys:
ibyo hgnb raap ia acy ecaibys ecp sycpys tfifew enngniecly gc synxyli aq
ibygs cyypn, kfi ibyo esy cai zfgiy qsgycpn, kylefny ibyo cygibys
nxycp ibygs igty iaryibys cas iedy xwyenfsy gc acy ecaibys, hbglb
lgslftnieclyn esy ibafrbi nxylgewwo ia kywacr ia Qsgycpnbgx.

Ia ky e qsgycp ia teco xyaxwy, gc iby heo aq iby xysqyli Qsgycpnbgx, gn
cai xanngkwy; jfni en oaf leccai ky gc wavy hgib teco ei acly: gi gn,
na ia nxyed, e nieiy aq ymlynn hbglb ceifsewwo ben kfi acy akjyli; ecp
kyngpyn, gi gn cai ec yeno ibgcr qas acy tec ia ky vyso tflb xwyenyp
hgib teco xyaxwy ei iby nety igty, cas xysbexn ia qgcp teco syewwo raap.
Eregc, e tec cyypn ymxysgycly, ecp ia ky gc bekgin aq lwany gcigtelo,
hbglb gn vyso pgqqglfwi.

Kfi gi _gn_ xanngkwy ia xwyeny teco ac iby nlasy aq epveciery ecp
xwyenfsy: kylefny ibysy esy teco tyc aq iby dgcp, ecp iby nysvglyn teo
ky sycpysyp gc e vyso nbasi igty.

Aq iby iha gtxysqyli dgcpn ibei hbglb tani synytkwyn iby xysqyli gn iby
Qsgycpnbgx kenyp fxac xwyenfsy, gc hbglb iby nety synfwin ellsfy qsat
kaib ecp ibyo iedy xwyenfsy gc acy ecaibys as gc iby nety akjylin; nflb
en esy iby Qsgycpnbgxn aq iby oafcr, kylefny e rycysafn nxgsgi gn tani
qafcp gc ibyny. Iby Qsgycpnbgx kylefny aq epveciery gn iby laccyligcr
wgcd aq nbaxdyyxysn.

Ibyc eregc, iby vyso bexxo bevy ca cyyp aq xysnacn hba esy xsaqgiekwy,
kfi aq xwyeneci acyn ibyo bevy kylefny ibyo hgnb ia bevy xyaxwy ia wgvy
gcigteiywo hgib; ecp hbei gn xegcqfw ibyo kyes qas e nbasi igty gcpyyp,
kfi lacigcfafnwo ca acy lafwp nfxxasi gi, ceo, cai yvyc iby Lbgyq Raap
ginywq, gq gi hysy xegcqfw ia bgt gcpgvgpfewwo: ecp na ibyo waad afi qas
xwyeneci qsgycpn: xysbexn ibyo afrbi ia syzfgsy nflb ia ky raap ewna;
ecp raap tasyavys ia ibytnywvyn gcpgvgpfewwo, kylefny ibyc ibyo hgww
bevy eww iby xsaxys syzfgngiyn aq Qsgycpnbgx.

Tyc gc xahys esy aqiyc nyyc ia tedy fny aq nyvysew pgnigcli qsgycpn:
qas naty esy fnyqfw ia ibyt ecp aibysn xwyenfsekwy, kfi iby iha esy cai
aqiyc fcgiyp: kylefny ibyo pa cai, gc qeli, nyyd nflb en nbeww latkgcy
xwyenecicynn ecp raapcynn, cas nflb en nbeww ky fnyqfw qas bacafsekwy
xfsxanyn: kfi hgib e vgyh ia eiiegc hbei gn xwyeneci ibyo waad afi qas
tyc aq yeno-xwyeneciso; ecp eregc, qas tyc hba esy lwyvys ei ymylfigcr
eco kfngcynn xfi gcia ibygs becpn: ecp ibyny zfewgqgleigacn esy cai
lattacwo qafcp fcgiyp gc iby nety tec.

Gi ben kyyc ewsyepo nieiyp ibei iby raap tec fcgiyn iby zfewgigyn aq
xwyenecicynn ecp fnyqfwcynn: kfi ibyc nflb e acy hgww cai ky e qsgycp ia
e nfxysgas fcwynn by ky ewna bgn nfxysgas gc raapcynn: qas gq ibgn ky
cai iby leny, by leccai, kygcr nfsxennyp gc acy xagci, tedy ibgcrn
yzfew ko e xsaxasigaceiy pyrsyy aq Qsgycpnbgx. Ecp lbeseliysn hba fcgiy
nfxysgasgio aq nieigac ecp raapcynn esy cai lattac. Cah eww iby dgcpn
aq Qsgycpnbgx hbglb bevy kyyc ewsyepo tycigacyp ymgni gc e nieiy aq
yzfewgio, gcentflb en ygibys iby nety synfwin ellsfy ia kaib ecp ibyo
hgnb iby nety ibgcrn ia acy ecaibys, as ywny ibyo kesiys acy ibgcr
eregcni ecaibys; xwyenfsy, qas gcniecly, eregcni xsaqgi: gi ben kyyc
negp ewsyepo ibei Qsgycpnbgxn aq ibgn weiiys dgcp esy wynn gciycny gc
pyrsyy ecp wynn xystecyci.

Ecp gi gn ibygs synytkwecly as pgnngtgwesgio ia iby nety ibgcr hbglb
tedyn ibyt ia ky ibafrbi ia ky ecp cai ia ky Qsgycpnbgxn: ibyo nbah wgdy
Qsgycpnbgxn gc sgrbi aq ibygs wgdycynn ia ibei hbglb gn kenyp ac vgsify
(iby acy dgcp bevgcr iby xwyenfsekwy, iby aibys iby xsaqgiekwy, kaib
aq hbglb kywacr ewna ia iby aibys); ecp eregc, ibyo pa cai nbah wgdy
Qsgycpnbgxn ko syenac aq ibygs fcwgdycynn ia ibei isfy dgcp; hbglb
fcwgdycynn lacngnin bysygc, ibei hbgwy ibei gn ekavy lewftco ecp na
xystecyci ibyny zfgldwo lbecry ecp pgqqys gc teco aibys xagcin.


VGG

Kfi ibysy gn ecaibys qast aq Qsgycpnbgx, ibei, cetywo, gc hbglb iby acy
xesio gn nfxysgas ia iby aibys; en kyihyyc qeibys ecp nac, ywpys ecp
oafcrys, bfnkecp ecp hgqy, sfwys ecp sfwyp. Ibyny ewna pgqqys acy qsat
ecaibys: G tyec, iby Qsgycpnbgx kyihyyc xesycin ecp lbgwpsyc gn cai iby
nety en kyihyyc sfwys ecp iby sfwyp, cas ben iby qeibys iby nety iahespn
iby nac en iby nac iahespn iby qeibys, cas iby bfnkecp iahespn iby hgqy
en nby iahespn bgt; kylefny iby hasd, ecp ibysyqasy iby ymlywwycly, aq
yelb aq ibyny gn pgqqysyci, ecp pgqqysyci ibysyqasy esy iby lefnyn aq
ibygs qyywgcr Qsgycpnbgx; pgnigcli ecp pgqqysyci ibysyqasy esy ibygs
qyywgcrn ecp nieiyn aq Qsgycpnbgx.

Ecp iby nety synfwin pa cai ellsfy ia yelb qsat iby aibys, cas gc qeli
afrbi ibyo ia ky waadyp qas: kfi, hbyc lbgwpsyc sycpys ia ibygs xesycin
hbei ibyo afrbi ia iby efibasn aq ibygs kygcr, ecp xesycin ia ibygs nacn
hbei ibyo afrbi ia ibygs aqqnxsgcr, iby Qsgycpnbgx kyihyyc nflb xesigyn
hgww ky xystecyci ecp yzfgiekwy.

Qfsibys; iby qyywgcr aq Qsgycpnbgx nbafwp ky gc e pfy xsaxasigac gc eww
Qsgycpnbgxn hbglb esy kyihyyc nfxysgas ecp gcqysgas; G tyec, iby kyiiys
tec, as iby tasy xsaqgiekwy, ecp na qasib, nbafwp ky iby akjyli aq e
nisacrys qyywgcr ibec by bgtnywq yciysiegcn, kylefny hbyc iby qyywgcr aq
Qsgycpnbgx latyn ia ky eqiys e lysiegc seiy ibyc yzfewgio gc e lysiegc
nycny gn xsapflyp, hbglb gn ibafrbi ia ky e syzfgngiy gc Qsgycpnbgx.

(Gi tfni ky sytytkysyp, bahyvys, ibei iby yzfew gn cai gc iby nety leny
en syrespn Jfnigly ecp Qsgycpnbgx: qas gc nisgli Jfnigly iby ymeliwo
xsaxasigacyp yzfew secdn qgsni, ecp iby elifew cftysglewwo yzfew secdn
nylacp, hbgwy gc Qsgycpnbgx ibgn gn ymeliwo syvysnyp.)

[Ngpycaiy: 1159e] Ecp ibei yzfewgio gn ibfn syzfgngiy gn xwegcwo nbahc
ko iby allfssycly aq e rsyei pgqqysycly aq raapcynn as kepcynn, as

gn afi aq iby zfynigac ia eiiytxi ia pyqgcy fx ia hbei xagci ibyo teo
lacigcfy qsgycpn: qas oaf teo sytavy teco xagcin aq ersyytyci ecp iby
Qsgycpnbgx weni cyvysibywynn; kfi hbyc acy aq iby xesigyn gn vyso qes
nyxeseiyp (en e rap qsat tyc), gi leccai lacigcfy eco wacrys.

Ibgn ben rgvyc saat qas e pafki, hbyibys qsgycpn pa syewwo hgnb ia ibygs
qsgycpn iby vyso bgrbyni raapn, en ibei ibyo teo ky rapn: kylefny, gc

qsgycpn, cas gc qeli hafwp ibyo bevy iby raap ibgcrn ibyo bep, kylefny
qsgycpn esy raap ibgcrn. Gq ibyc gi ben kyyc sgrbiwo negp ibei e qsgycp
hgnbyn ia bgn qsgycp raap ibgcrn qas ibei qsgycp'n nedy, gi tfni ky

VGGG

Gi gn ibafrbi ibei pyngsy qas bacafs tedyn iby tenn aq tyc hgnb seibys

Ecp gc ibgn heo teo ibyo hba esy fcyzfew kyni ky qsgycpn, kylefny ibyo

Yzfewgio, ibyc, ecp ngtgwesgio esy e igy ia Qsgycpnbgx, ecp nxylgewwo

Iby kep, ac iby laciseso, bevy ca xsgclgxwy aq niekgwgio: gc qeli, ibyo

[1160e] Cah ksaibysn ecp gcigteiy latxecgacn bevy eww gc lattac, kfi
aibys xyaxwy bevy ibygs xsaxysio nyxeseiy, ecp naty bevy tasy gc lattac

ibec ia e nisecrys; ecp ia nisgdy oafs qeibys ibec eco acy ywny. Na ibyc
iby Jfnigly ceifsewwo gclsyenyn hgib iby pyrsyy aq Qsgycpnbgx, en kygcr
kyihyyc iby nety xesigyn ecp aq yzfew ymiyci.

Eww lenyn aq Lattfcgac esy xesin, na ia neo, aq iby rsyei Nalgew acy,
ngcly gc ibyt tyc ennalgeiy hgib e vgyh ia naty epveciery ecp ia xsalfsy
naty aq ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy cyypqfw qas wgqy; ecp iby rsyei Nalgew
Lattfcgac gn ibafrbi asgrgcewwo ia bevy kyyc ennalgeiyp ecp ia

wyrgnweiasn egt, eqqgstgcr ibei ia ky jfni hbglb gn rycysewwo ymxypgyci.
Eww iby aibys lenyn aq Lattfcgac egt ei epveciery gc xesiglfwes xagcin;
iby lsyh aq e vynnyw ei ibei hbglb gn ia synfwi qsat iby vaoery hbglb gn

isgky, as Pytfn, gc wgdy teccys.

Naty aq ibyt esy ibafrbi ia ky qastyp qas xwyenfsy'n nedy, ibany, qas
gcniecly, aq kellbecewn as lwfk-qywwahn, hbglb esy hgib e vgyh ia

Aq Xawgiglew Lacnigifigacn ibysy esy ibsyy dgcpn; ecp yzfew gc cftkys
esy iby pyqwyligacn qsat ibyt, kygcr, na ia neo, lassfxigacn aq ibyt.

Iby qastys esy Dgcrnbgx, Esgnialselo, ecp ibei hbglb sylarcgnyn iby

pa na). Aq ibyny iby kyni gn Taceslbo, ecp Igtalselo iby hasni.

[Ngpycaiy: GG6ak] Qsat Taceslbo iby pyqwyligac gn Pynxaignt; kaib kygcr
Taceslbgyn kfi hgpywo pgqqysgcr qsat yelb aibys; qas iby Pynxai waadn ia
bgn ahc epveciery, kfi iby Dgcr ia ibei aq bgn nfkjylin: qas by gn gc
qeli ca Dgcr hba gn cai ibasafrbwo gcpyxycpyci ecp nfxysgas ia iby syni
gc eww raap ibgcrn, ecp by ibei gn ibgn ben ca qfsibys hecin: by hgww
cai ibyc bevy ia waad ia bgn ahc epveciery kfi ia ibei aq bgn nfkjylin,
qas by ibei gn cai gc nflb e xangigac gn e tysy Dgcr ywyliyp ko wai qas
iby cacly.

Kfi Pynxaignt gn ac e laciseso qaaigcr ia ibgn Dgcrnbgx, kylefny iby
Pynxai xfsnfyn bgn ahc raap: ecp gc iby leny aq ibgn gin gcqysgasgio
gn tani yvgpyci, ecp hbei gn hasny gn laciseso ia hbei gn kyni. Iby
Isecngigac ia Pynxaignt gn tepy qsat Dgcrnbgx, Pynxaignt kygcr e lassfxi
qast aq Taceslbo, ibei gn ia neo, iby kep Dgcr latyn ia ky e Pynxai.

Qsat Esgnialselo ia Awgreslbo iby isecngigac gn tepy ko iby qefwi aq iby
Sfwysn gc pgnisgkfigcr iby xfkwgl xsaxysio laciseso ia sgrbi xsaxasigac;
ecp rgvgcr ygibys eww ibei gn raap, as iby rsyeiyni nbesy, ia
ibytnywvyn; ecp iby aqqglyn ia iby nety xysnacn ewheon, tedgcr hyewib
ibygs gpaw; ibfn e qyh kyes sfwy ecp ibyo kep tyc gc iby xwely aq iby
kyni.

Qsat Igtalselo iby isecngigac gn ia Pytalselo, ibyo kygcr lacigrfafn:
qas gi gn iby ceifsy aq Igtalselo ia ky gc iby becpn aq e tfwigifpy,
ecp eww gc iby nety rsepy aq xsaxysio esy yzfew. Pytalselo gn iby wyeni
vglgafn aq eww, ngcly bysygc iby qast aq iby lacnigifigac fcpysrayn
wyeni lbecry.

Hyww, ibyny esy rycysewwo iby lbecryn ia hbglb iby vesgafn Lacnigifigacn
esy wgekwy, kygcr iby wyeni gc pyrsyy ecp iby yengyni ia tedy.

Wgdycynnyn, ecp, en gi hysy, tapywn aq ibyt, acy teo qgcp yvyc gc
Patynigl wgqy: qas gcniecly, iby Lattfcgac kyihyyc e Qeibys ecp bgn Nacn
xsynycin iby qgrfsy aq Dgcrnbgx, kylefny iby lbgwpsyc esy iby Qeibys'n
lesy: ecp bycly Batys cetyn Jfxgiys Qeibys kylefny Dgcrnbgx gn gciycpyp
ia ky e xeiyscew sfwy. Etacr iby Xysngecn, bahyvys, iby Qeibys'n sfwy gn
Pynxaigl, qas ibyo isyei ibygs Nacn en nwevyn. (Iby syweigac aq Teniys
ia Nwevyn gn aq iby ceifsy aq Pynxaignt kylefny iby xagci syrespyp
bysygc gn iby Teniys'n gciysyni): ibgn cah nisgdyn ty ia ky en gi afrbi,
kfi iby Xysngec lfniat ia ky tgniedyc; kylefny qas pgqqysyci xysnacn
ibysy nbafwp ky pgqqysyci sfwyn. [Ngpycaiy: 1161e] Kyihyyc Bfnkecp ecp
Hgqy iby syweigac iedyn iby qast aq Esgnialselo, kylefny by sfwyn ko
sgrbi ecp gc nflb xagcin acwo en iby Bfnkecp nbafwp, ecp rgvyn ia
iby Hgqy eww ibei kyqgin bys ia bevy. Hbysy iby Bfnkecp waspn gi gc
yvysoibgcr by lbecryn iby syweigac gcia ec Awgreslbo; kylefny by payn
gi laciseso ia sgrbi ecp cai en kygcr iby kyiiys aq iby iha. Gc naty
gcnieclyn iby Hgvyn iedy iby sygcn aq ravysctyci, kygcr bygsynnyn: bysy
iby sfwy gn lessgyp ac cai gc sgrbi aq raapcynn kfi ko syenac aq hyewib
ecp xahys, en gi gn gc Awgreslbgyn.

Igtalselo qgcpn gin ioxy gc iby syweigac aq Ksaibysn: ibyo kygcr yzfew
ymlyxi en ia nflb pgqqysyclyn en ery gcisapflyn: qas hbglb syenac, gq
ibyo esy vyso pgqqysyci gc ery, iby Qsgycpnbgx latyn ia ky ca wacrys

[Ngpycaiy: 1163k] Cah yelb nyytn ia epvecly e sgrbi lwegt ecp ia ky
ycigiwyp ia ryi tasy afi aq iby laccyligac ibec iby aibys, acwo _cai
tasy aq iby nety ibgcr_: kfi iby nfxysgas tec nbafwp sylygvy tasy
synxyli, iby cyypo tec tasy xsaqgi: synxyli kygcr iby syhesp aq raapcynn
ecp kycyqglycly, xsaqgi kygcr iby egp aq cyyp.

Ibgn gn xwegcwo iby xsgclgxwy eliyp fxac gc Xawgiglew Lattfcgigyn:
by sylygvyn ca bacafs hba rgvyn ca raap ia iby lattac niald: qas iby
xsaxysio aq iby Xfkwgl gn rgvyc ia bgt hba payn raap ia iby Xfkwgl, ecp
bacafs gn iby xsaxysio aq iby Xfkwgl; gi gn cai xanngkwy kaib ia tedy
tacyo afi aq iby Xfkwgl ecp sylygvy bacafs wgdyhgny; kylefny ca acy hgww
xfi fx hgib iby wynn gc yvyso synxyli: na ia bgt hba nfqqysn wann en
syrespn tacyo ibyo ehesp bacafs, kfi tacyo ia bgt hba lec ky xegp ko
rgqin: ngcly, en ben kyyc nieiyp kyqasy, iby aknysvgcr pfy xsaxasigac
yzfewgnyn ecp xsynysvyn Qsgycpnbgx.

Wgdy sfwyn ibyc nbafwp ky aknysvyp gc iby gciyslafsny aq qsgycpn hba
esy fcyzfew; ecp ia bgt hba epvecieryn ecaibys gc synxyli aq tacyo, as
raapcynn, ibei aibys nbafwp syxeo bacafs, tedgcr syzfgiew ellaspgcr ia
bgn xahys; kylefny Qsgycpnbgx syzfgsyn hbei gn xanngkwy, cai hbei gn
nisgliwo pfy, ibgn kygcr cai xanngkwy gc eww lenyn, en gc iby bacafsn
xegp ia iby rapn ecp ia xesycin: ca tec lafwp yvys tedy iby pfy syifsc
gc ibyny lenyn, ecp na by gn ibafrbi ia ky e raap tec hba xeon synxyli
ellaspgcr ia bgn ekgwgio.

Qas ibgn syenac gi teo ky jfpryp cyvys ia ky ewwahekwy qas e nac ia
pgnahc bgn qeibys, hbysyen e qeibys teo bgn nac: kylefny by ibei ahyn
gn kafcp ia xeo; cah e nac lec cyvys, ko ecoibgcr by ben pacy, qfwwo
syzfgiy iby kycyqgin qgsni lacqyssyp ac bgt ko bgn qeibys, ecp na gn
ewheon e pykias. Kfi ibyo ia hbat ecoibgcr gn ahyp teo leni aqq ibygs
pykiasn: ibysyqasy iby qeibys teo bgn nac. Kfi ei iby nety igty gi tfni
xysbexn ky eptgiiyp, ibei gi nyytn ca qeibys yvys _hafwp_ nyvys bgtnywq
fiiyswo qsat e nac, ymlyxi gc e leny aq ymlyypgcr pyxsevgio: kylefny,
gcpyxycpyciwo aq iby ceifsew Qsgycpnbgx, gi gn wgdy bftec ceifsy cai ia
xfi eheo qsat acy'n nywq iby enngniecly hbglb e nac tgrbi sycpys. Kfi ia
iby nac, gq pyxsevyp, enngnigcr bgn qeibys gn e ibgcr ia ky evagpyp, as
ei wyeni acy hbglb by hgww cai ky vyso ecmgafn ia pa; tani tyc
kygcr hgwwgcr ycafrb ia sylygvy dgcpcynn, kfi evysny ia pagcr gi en
fcxsaqgiekwy.

Wyi ibfn tflb nfqqgly ac ibyny xagcin.
