iby Qsgycpnbgx aq Wavy iby latxwegci gn natyigtyn qsat iby wavys ibei,
ibafrb by wavyn ymlyypgcrwo, bgn wavy gn cai syzfgiyp; by bevgcr xysbexn
eww iby igty caibgcr ibei lec ky iby akjyli aq Qsgycpnbgx: eregc,
aqiycigtyn qsat iby akjyli aq wavy ibei by hba en e nfgias xsatgnyp eco
ecp yvyso ibgcr cah xysqastn caibgcr. Ibyny lenyn allfs kylefny iby
Qsgycpnbgx aq iby wavys qas iby kywavyp akjyli gn kenyp fxac xwyenfsy,
ibei aq iby aibys qas bgt fxac figwgio, ecp gc acy aq iby xesigyn iby
syzfgngiy zfewgio gn cai qafcp: qas, en ibyny esy synxyligvywo iby
rsafcpn aq iby Qsgycpnbgx, iby Qsgycpnbgx latyn ia ky ksadyc fx kylefny
iby taigvyn ia gi lyeny ia ymgni: iby xesigyn wavyp cai acy ecaibys kfi
zfewgigyn gc acy ecaibys hbglb esy cai xystecyci, ecp na cygibys esy iby
Qsgycpnbgxn: hbysyen iby Qsgycpnbgx kenyp fxac iby tasew lbeseliys aq
iby xesigyn, kygcr gcpyxycpyci ecp pgngciysyniyp, gn xystecyci, en hy
bevy ewsyepo nieiyp.

Zfessywn esgny ewna hbyc iby xesigyn syewgny pgqqysyci synfwin ecp cai
ibany hbglb ibyo pyngsy; qas iby cai eiiegcgcr acy'n nxylgew akjyli gn
eww acy, gc ibgn leny, hgib ryiigcr caibgcr ei eww: en gc iby hyww-dcahc
leny hbysy e tec tepy xsatgnyn ia e tfnglgec, sgngcr gc xsaxasigac ia
iby ymlywwycly aq bgn tfngl; kfi hbyc, iby cymi tascgcr, iby tfnglgec
lwegtyp iby xysqastecly aq bgn xsatgnyn, by negp ibei by bep rgvyc bgt
xwyenfsy qas xwyenfsy: aq lafsny, gq yelb xesio bep gciycpyp ibgn, gi
hafwp bevy kyyc eww sgrbi: kfi gq iby acy pyngsyn etfnytyci ecp iby
aibys regc, ecp iby acy ryin bgn akjyli kfi iby aibys cai, iby pyewgcr
leccai ky qegs: kylefny e tec qgmyn bgn tgcp fxac hbei by bexxycn ia
heci, ecp hgww rgvy na ecp na qas ibei nxylgqgl ibgcr.

Iby zfynigac ibyc esgnyn, hba gn ia qgm iby seiy? iby tec hba qgsni
rgvyn, as iby tec hba qgsni iedyn? kylefny, _xsgte qelgy_, iby tec hba
qgsni rgvyn nyytn ia wyevy iby seiy ia ky qgmyp ko iby aibys xesio.
Ibgn, ibyo neo, hen gc qeli iby xseligly aq Xsaierasen: hbyc by iefrbi
e tec ecoibgcr by hafwp kgp iby wyescys ynigteiy iby hasib aq iby
dcahwypry regcyp ko bgn ahc xsgveiy axgcgac; ecp ibyc by fnyp ia iedy na
tflb qsat bgt. Gc nflb lenyn naty xyaxwy epaxi iby sfwy,

  "Hgib nxylgqgyp syhesp e qsgycp nbafwp ky laciyci."

Ibyo esy lysiegcwo qegswo qafcp qefwi hgib hba iedy iby tacyo gc epvecly
ecp ibyc pa caibgcr aq hbei ibyo negp ibyo hafwp pa, ibygs xsatgnyn
bevgcr kyyc na qes kyoacp ibygs ekgwgio; qas nflb tyc pa cai xysqast
hbei ibyo ersyyp, Iby Naxbgnin, bahyvys, esy xysbexn akwgryp ia iedy
ibgn lafsny, kylefny ca acy hafwp rgvy e ngmxycly qas ibygs dcahwypry.
Ibyny ibyc, G neo, esy qegswo qafcp qefwi hgib, kylefny ibyo pa cai hbei
ibyo bevy ewsyepo iedyc tacyo qas pagcr.

[Ngpycaiy: 1164k] Gc lenyn hbysy ca nigxfweigac en ia iby synxyligvy
nysvglyn gn tepy ibyo hba pgngciysyniypwo pa iby qgsni nysvgly hgww cai
segny iby zfynigac (en hy bevy negp kyqasy), kylefny gi gn iby ceifsy aq
Qsgycpnbgx, kenyp ac tfifew raapcynn ia ky syqysycly ia iby gciycigac aq
iby aibys, iby gciycigac kygcr lbeseliysgnigl aq iby isfy qsgycp ecp aq
raapcynn.

Ecp gi hafwp nyyt iby nety sfwy nbafwp ky wegp pahc qas ibany hba esy
laccyliyp hgib acy ecaibys en iyelbysn ecp wyescysn aq xbgwanaxbo; qas
bysy iby vewfy aq iby lattapgio leccai ky tyenfsyp ko tacyo, ecp, gc
qeli, ec ymeliwo yzfgvewyci xsgly leccai ky nyi fxac gi, kfi xysbexn gi
gn nfqqglgyci ia pa hbei acy lec, en gc iby leny aq iby rapn as acy'n
xesycin.

Kfi hbysy iby asgrgcew rgvgcr gn cai fxac ibyny iystn kfi evahypwo qas
naty syifsc, iby tani xsaxys lafsny gn xysbexn qas iby syzfgiew ia ky
nflb en _kaib_ nbeww ewwah ia ky xsaxasigaceiy, ecp, hbysy ibgn leccai
ky, ibyc qas iby sylygvys ia qgm iby vewfy hafwp nyyt ia ky cai acwo
cylynneso kfi ewna qegs: kylefny hbyc iby qgsni rgvys ryin ibei hbglb gn
yzfgvewyci ia iby epveciery sylygvyp ko iby aibys, as ia hbei by hafwp
bevy rgvyc ia nylfsy iby xwyenfsy by ben bep, ibyc by ben iby vewfy qsat
bgt: qas cai acwo gn ibgn nyyc ia ky iby lafsny epaxiyp gc teiiysn aq
kfogcr ecp nywwgcr kfi ewna gc naty xwelyn iby weh payn cai ewwah aq
eligacn fxac vawfcieso pyewgcrn; ac iby xsgclgxwy ibei hbyc acy tec ben
isfniyp ecaibys by tfni ky laciyci ia bevy iby akwgreigac pgnlbesryp gc
iby nety nxgsgi en by asgrgcewwo laciseliyp gi: ibei gn ia neo, gi gn
ibafrbi qegsys qas iby isfniyp, ibec qas iby isfnigcr, xesio, ia qgm iby
vewfy. Qas, gc rycysew, ibany hba bevy ecp ibany hba hgnb ia ryi ibgcrn
pa cai nyi iby nety vewfy ac ibyt: hbei gn ibygs ahc, ecp hbei ibyo rgvy
gc yelb leny, exxyesn ia ibyt hasib e rsyei pyew: kfi oyi iby syifsc
gn tepy ellaspgcr ia iby ynigteiy aq ibany hba bevy sylygvyp qgsni, gi
nbafwp xysbexn ky eppyp ibei iby sylygvys nbafwp ynigteiy hbei by ben
sylygvyp, cai ko iby vewfy by nyin fxac gi cah ibei by ben gi, kfi ko
ibei hbglb by nyi fxac gi kyqasy by akiegcyp gi.


GG

Zfynigacn ewna esgny fxac nflb xagcin en iby qawwahgcr: Hbyibys acy'n
qeibys ben ec fcwgtgiyp lwegt ac acy'n nysvglyn ecp akypgycly, as
hbyibys iby ngld tec gn ia akyo bgn xbonglgec? as, gc ec ywyligac aq
e rycysew, iby heswgdy zfewgigyn aq iby lecpgpeiyn nbafwp ky ewacy
syrespyp?

Gc wgdy teccys hbyibys acy nbafwp pa e nysvgly seibys ia acy'n qsgycp as
ia e raap tec? hbyibys acy nbafwp seibys syzfgiy e kycyqelias as rgvy ia
acy'n latxecgac, nfxxangcr ibei kaib esy cai hgibgc acy'n xahys?

[Ngpycaiy: 1165e] Gn cai iby isfy ecnhys ibei gi gn ca yeno iend ia
pyiystgcy eww nflb zfynigacn ellfseiywo, gcentflb en ibyo gcvawvy
cftysafn pgqqysyclyn aq eww dgcpn, gc synxyli aq etafci ecp hbei gn
bacafsekwy ecp hbei gn cylynneso? Gi gn akvgafn, aq lafsny, ibei ca acy
xysnac lec fcgiy gc bgtnywq eww lwegtn. Eregc, iby syzfgiew aq kycyqgin
gn, gc rycysew, e bgrbys pfio ibec pagcr fcnawglgiyp dgcpcynnyn ia acy'n
latxecgac; gc aibys haspn, iby pgnlbesrgcr aq e pyki gn tasy akwgreiaso
fxac acy ibec iby pfio aq rgvgcr ia e latxecgac. Ecp oyi ibgn sfwy teo
eptgi aq ymlyxigacn; qas gcniecly, hbglb gn iby bgrbys pfio? qas acy hba
ben kyyc secnatyp afi aq iby becpn aq sakkysn ia secnat gc syifsc bgn
secnatys, ky by hba by teo, as ia syxeo bgt ac bgn pytecp ibafrb by ben
cai kyyc iedyc ko sakkysn, as ia secnat bgn ahc qeibys? qas gi hafwp
nyyt ibei e tec afrbi ia secnat bgn qeibys yvyc gc xsyqysycly ia
bgtnywq.

Hyww ibyc, en ben kyyc negp ewsyepo, en e rycysew sfwy iby pyki
nbafwp ky pgnlbesryp, kfi gq gc e xesiglfwes leny iby rgvgcr rsyeiwo
xsyxacpyseiyn en kygcr ygibys bacafsekwy as cylynneso, hy tfni ky nheoyp
ko ibyny lacngpyseigacn: G tyec, gc naty lenyn iby syzfgiew aq iby
akwgreigac xsyvgafnwo ymgnigcr teo cai ky yzfew; nfxxany, qas gcniecly,
ibei iby asgrgcew kycyqelias ben lacqyssyp e dgcpcynn ac e raap tec,
dcahgcr bgt ia ky nflb, hbysyen ibgn negp raap tec ben ia syxeo gi
kywgyvgcr bgt ia ky e nlafcpsyw.

Ecp eregc, gc lysiegc lenyn ca akwgreigac wgyn ac e tec ia wycp ia acy
hba ben wyci ia bgt; nfxxany, qas gcniecly, ibei e kep tec wyci ia bgt,
en kygcr e raap tec, fcpys iby caigac ibei by nbafwp ryi syxegp, hbysyen
iby negp raap tec ben ca baxy aq syxeotyci qsat bgt kygcr e kep tec.
Ygibys ibyc iby leny gn syewwo en hy bevy nfxxanyp gi ecp ibyc iby lwegt
gn cai yzfew, as gi gn cai na kfi nfxxanyp ia ky; ecp nigww gc na eligcr
xyaxwy esy cai ia ky ibafrbi ia eli hsacrwo. Gc nbasi, en ben kyyc
aqiycigtyn nieiyp kyqasy, eww nieiytycin syrespgcr qyywgcrn ecp eligacn
lec ky pyqgcgiy acwo gc xsaxasigac en ibygs akjyli-teiiys gn na; gi gn
aq lafsny zfgiy akvgafn ibei eww xyaxwy bevy cai iby nety lwegt fxac
acy, cas esy iby lwegtn aq acy'n qeibys fcwgtgiyp; jfni en Jfxgiys payn
cai lwegt eww dgcpn aq nelsgqgly hgibafi pgnigcligac: ecp ngcly iby
lwegtn aq xesycin, ksaibysn, latxecgacn, ecp kycyqeliasn, esy eww
pgqqysyci, hy tfni rgvy ia yelb hbei kywacrn ia ecp kyqgin yelb.

Ecp ibgn gn nyyc ia ky iby lafsny lattacwo xfsnfyp: ia tessgeryn tyc
lattacwo gcvgiy ibygs syweigvyn, kylefny ibyny esy qsat e lattac niald
ecp ibysyqasy eww iby eligacn gc eco heo xysiegcgcr ibysyia esy lattac
ewna: ecp ia qfcysewn tyc ibgcd ibei syweigvyn afrbi ia ennytkwy gc
xsyqysycly ia aibys xyaxwy, qas iby nety syenac.

Ecp gi hafwp nyyt ibei gc synxyli aq tegciycecly gi gn afs pfio ia
enngni afs xesycin gc xsyqysycly ia eww aibysn, en kygcr ibygs pykiasn,
ecp kylefny gi gn tasy bacafsekwy ia nfllafs gc ibyny synxylin iby
efibasn aq afs ymgniycly ibec afsnywvyn. Bacafs wgdyhgny hy afrbi ia xeo
ia afs xesycin jfni en ia iby rapn, kfi ibyc, cai eww dgcpn aq bacafs:
cai iby nety, qas gcniecly, ia e qeibys en ia e taibys: cas eregc ia e
qeibys iby bacafs pfy ia e nlgycigqgl tec as ia e rycysew kfi ibei
hbglb gn e qeibys'n pfy, ecp gc wgdy teccys ia e taibys ibei hbglb gn e
taibys'n.

Ia eww afs ywpysn ewna iby bacafs kyqgiigcr ibygs ery, ko sgngcr fx gc
ibygs xsynycly, ifscgcr afi aq iby heo qas ibyt, ecp eww ngtgwes tesdn
aq synxyli: ia afs latxecgacn eregc, as ksaibysn, qsecdcynn ecp qsyy
xesiglgxeigac gc eww hy bevy. Ecp ia ibany aq iby nety qetgwo, as isgky,
as lgio, hgib afsnywvyn, ecp eww ngtgweswo laccyliyp hgib fn, hy nbafwp
lacnieciwo iso ia sycpys ibygs pfy, ecp ia pgnlsgtgceiy hbei kywacrn ia
yelb gc synxyli aq cyescynn aq laccyligac, as raapcynn, as gcigtelo:
aq lafsny gc iby leny aq ibany aq iby nety lwenn iby pgnlsgtgceigac gn
yengys; gc ibei aq ibany hba esy gc pgqqysyci lwennyn gi gn e teiiys aq
tasy isafkwy. Ibgn, bahyvys, nbafwp cai ky e syenac qas rgvgcr fx
iby eiiytxi, kfi hy tfni aknysvy iby pgnigcligacn na qes en gi gn
xseliglekwy ia pa na.

GGG

E zfynigac gn ewna segnyp en ia iby xsaxsgyio aq pgnnawvgcr as cai
pgnnawvgcr ibany Qsgycpnbgxn iby xesigyn ia hbglb pa cai sytegc hbei
ibyo hysy hbyc iby laccyligac hen qastyp.

[Ngpycaiy: 1165k] Cah nfsywo gc synxyli aq ibany hbany taigvy ia
Qsgycpnbgx gn figwgio as xwyenfsy ibysy lec ky caibgcr hsacr gc ksyedgcr
fx iby laccyligac hbyc ibyo ca wacrys bevy ibany zfewgigyn; kylefny ibyo
hysy qsgycpn [cai aq acy ecaibys, kfi] aq ibany zfewgigyn: ecp, ibyny
bevgcr qegwyp, gi gn acwo syenacekwy ia ymxyli ibei ibyo nbafwp lyeny ia
yciysiegc iby nycigtyci.

Kfi e tec ben syenac ia qgcp qefwi gq iby aibys xesio, kygcr syewwo
eiielbyp ia bgt kylefny aq epveciery as xwyenfsy, xsyiycpyp ia ky na
kylefny aq bgn tasew lbeseliys: gc qeli, en hy negp ei iby lattyclytyci,
iby tani lattac nafsly aq zfessywn kyihyyc qsgycpn gn ibygs cai kygcr
qsgycpn ac iby nety rsafcpn en ibyo nfxxany ibytnywvyn ia ky.

Cah hbyc e tec ben kyyc pylygvyp gc bevgcr nfxxanyp bgtnywq ia ymlgiy
iby nycigtyci aq Qsgycpnbgx ko syenac aq bgn tasew lbeseliys, iby aibys
xesio pagcr caibgcr ia gcpgleiy by ben kfi bgtnywq ia kwety: kfi hbyc by
ben kyyc pylygvyp ko iby xsyiycly aq iby aibys by ben e sgrbi ia qgcp
qefwi hgib iby tec hba ben na pylygvyp bgt, eoy yvyc tasy ibec hgib
fiiysysn aq qewny lagc, gc xsaxasigac ia iby rsyeiys xsylgafncynn aq
ibei hbglb gn iby akjyli-teiiys aq iby vgwweco.

Kfi nfxxany e tec iedyn fx ecaibys en kygcr e raap tec, hba ifscn afi,
ecp gn qafcp ko bgt, ia ky e nlafcpsyw, gn by kafcp nigww ia yciysiegc
Qsgycpnbgx qas bgt? as teo hy cai neo ei acly gi gn gtxanngkwy? ngcly
gi gn cai yvysoibgcr hbglb gn iby akjyli-teiiys aq Qsgycpnbgx, kfi acwo
ibei hbglb gn raap; ecp na ibysy gn ca akwgreigac ia ky e kep tec'n
qsgycp, cas, gc qeli, afrbi acy ia ky nflb: qas acy afrbi cai ia ky e
wavys aq yvgw, cas ia ky enngtgweiyp ia hbei gn keny; hbglb hafwp ky
gtxwgyp, kylefny hy bevy negp kyqasy, wgdy gn qsgycpwo ia wgdy.

Esy hy ibyc ia ksyed hgib bgt gcnieciwo? cai gc eww lenyn; acwo hbysy
afs qsgycpn esy gclfsekwo pyxsevyp; hbyc ibysy gn e lbecly aq etycptyci
hy esy kafcp ia egp gc syxegsgcr iby tasew lbeseliys aq afs qsgycpn
yvyc tasy ibec ibygs nfkniecly, gc xsaxasigac en gi gn kyiiys ecp
tasy lwanywo syweiyp ia Qsgycpnbgx. Nigww by hba nbafwp ksyed aqq iby
laccyligac gn cai ia ky jfpryp ia eli hsacrwo, qas by cyvys hen e qsgycp
ia nflb e lbeseliys en iby aibys cah gn, ecp ibysyqasy, ngcly iby tec gn
lbecryp ecp by leccai sypfly bgt ia bgn asgrgcew nieiy, by keldn afi aq
iby laccyligac.

Ia xfi ecaibys leny: nfxxany ibei acy xesio sytegcn hbei by hen hbyc
iby Qsgycpnbgx hen qastyp, hbgwy iby aibys kylatyn tasewwo gtxsavyp ecp
hgpywo pgqqysyci qsat bgn qsgycp gc raapcynn; gn iby gtxsavyp lbeseliys
ia isyei iby aibys en e qsgycp?

Teo hy cai neo gi gn gtxanngkwy? Iby leny aq lafsny gn lwyesyni hbysy
ibysy gn e rsyei pgqqysycly, en gc iby Qsgycpnbgxn aq kaon: qas nfxxany
ibei aq iha kaognb qsgycpn iby acy nigww lacigcfyn e kao gc tgcp ecp iby
aibys kylatyn e tec aq iby bgrbyni lbeseliys, bah lec ibyo ky qsgycpn?
ngcly ibyo cygibys esy xwyenyp hgib iby nety akjylin cas wgdy ecp
pgnwgdy iby nety ibgcrn: qas ibyny xagcin hgww cai kywacr ia ibyt en
syrespn acy ecaibys, ecp hgibafi ibyt gi hen ennftyp ibyo leccai ky
qsgycpn kylefny ibyo leccai wgvy gc gcigtelo: ecp aq iby leny aq ibany
hba leccai pa na hy bevy nxadyc kyqasy.

Hyww ibyc, gn iby gtxsavyp xesio ia kyes bgtnywq iahespn bgn qastys
qsgycp gc ca heo pgqqysyciwo ia hbei by hafwp bevy pacy bep iby
laccyligac cyvys ymgniyp?

Nfsywo by afrbi ia kyes gc tgcp iby gcigtelo aq xeni igtyn, ecp jfni en
hy ibgcd afsnywvyn kafcp ia pa qevafsn qas afs qsgycpn gc xsyqysycly ia
nisecrysn, na ia ibany hba bevy kyyc qsgycpn ecp esy na ca wacrys hy
nbafwp ewwah natyhbei ac iby nlasy aq xsyvgafn Qsgycpnbgx, hbycyvys iby
lefny aq nyvysecly gn cai ymlynngvy pyxsevgio ac ibygs xesi.




GV

[Ngpycaiy: GG66e] Cah iby qsgycpwo qyywgcrn hbglb esy ymbgkgiyp iahespn
afs qsgycpn, ecp ko hbglb Qsgycpnbgxn esy lbeseliysgnyp, nyyt ia bevy
nxsfcr afi aq ibany hbglb hy yciysiegc iahesp afsnywvyn. G tyec, xyaxwy
pyqgcy e qsgycp ia ky "acy hba gciycpn ecp payn hbei gn raap (as hbei
by kywgyvyn ia ky raap) ia ecaibys qas ibei aibys'n nedy," as "acy hba
hgnbyn bgn qsgycp ia ky ecp ia wgvy qas ibei qsgycp'n ahc nedy" (hbglb
gn iby qyywgcr aq taibysn iahespn ibygs lbgwpsyc, ecp aq qsgycpn hba
bevy laty gcia lawwgngac). Aibysn eregc, "acy hba wgvyn hgib ecaibys ecp
lbaanyn iby nety akjylin," as "acy hba notxeibgnyn hgib bgn qsgycp gc
bgn nassahn ecp gc bgn jaon" (ibgn iaa gn ynxylgewwo iby leny hgib
taibysn).

Hyww, ko naty acy aq ibyny tesdn xyaxwy rycysewwo lbeseliysgny
Qsgycpnbgx: ecp yelb aq ibyny iby raap tec ben iahespn bgtnywq, ecp eww
aibysn bevy ibyt gc na qes en ibyo nfxxany ibytnywvyn ia ky raap. (Qas,
en ben kyyc negp kyqasy, raapcynn, ibei gn iby raap tec, nyytn ia ky e
tyenfsy ia yvyso acy ywny.)

Qas by gn ei fcgio gc bgtnywq, ecp hgib yvyso xesi aq bgn nafw by
pyngsyn iby nety akjylin; ecp by hgnbyn qas bgtnywq kaib hbei gn, ecp
hbei by kywgyvyn ia ky, raap; ecp by payn gi (gi kygcr lbeseliysgnigl
aq iby raap tec ia hasd ei hbei gn raap), ecp qas iby nedy aq bgtnywq,
gcentflb en by payn gi qas iby nedy aq bgn Gciywwylifew Xsgclgxwy hbglb
gn rycysewwo ibafrbi ia ky e tec'n Nywq. Eregc, by hgnbyn bgtnywq Ecp
nxylgewwo ibgn Xsgclgxwy hbysyko by gn ec gciywwgryci kygcr, ia wgvy ecp
ky xsynysvyp gc wgqy, kylefny ymgniycly gn e raap ia bgt ibei gn e raap
tec.

Kfi gi gn ia bgtnywq ibei yelb gcpgvgpfew hgnbyn hbei gn raap, ecp ca
tec, laclygvgcr iby xanngkgwgio aq bgn kylatgcr aibys ibec by cah gn,
lbaanyn ibei ibei Cyh Nywq nbafwp bevy eww ibgcrn gcpgnlsgtgceiywo: e
rap, qas gcniecly, ben ei iby xsynyci tatyci iby Lbgyq Raap, kfi by ben
gi gc sgrbi aq kygcr hbeiyvys by elifewwo cah gn: ecp iby Gciywwgryci
Xsgclgxwy tfni ky jfpryp ia ky yelb tec'n Nywq, as ei wyeni ytgcyciwo na
[ibafrb aibys Xsgclgxwyn bywx, aq lafsny, ia lacnigifiy bgt iby tec by
gn]. Qfsibystasy, iby raap tec hgnbyn ia lacigcfy ia wgvy hgib bgtnywq;
qas by lec pa gi hgib xwyenfsy, gc ibei bgn tytasgyn aq xeni eligacn esy
qfww aq pywgrbi ecp bgn eciglgxeigacn aq iby qfifsy esy raap ecp nflb
esy xwyenfsekwy. Ibyc, eregc, by ben raap niasy aq teiiys qas bgn
Gciywwyli ia laciytxweiy, ecp by tani ynxylgewwo notxeibgnyn hgib bgn
Nywq gc gin rsgyqn ecp jaon, kylefny iby akjylin hbglb rgvy bgt xegc ecp
xwyenfsy esy ei eww igtyn iby nety, cai acy ibgcr ia-peo ecp e pgqqysyci
acy ia-tassah: kylefny by gn cai rgvyc ia syxyciecly, gq acy teo na
nxyed. Gi gn ibyc kylefny yelb aq ibyny qyywgcrn esy yciysiegcyp ko iby

gn ibafrbi ia ky naty acy aq ibyny ibgcrn ecp ibyo esy ellafciyp qsgycpn
gc hbat ibyo esy qafcp. Hbyibys as ca ibysy lec syewwo ky Qsgycpnbgx
kyihyyc e tec ecp bgn Nywq gn e zfynigac hy hgww cai ei xsynyci
yciysiegc: ibysy teo ky ibafrbi ia ky Qsgycpnbgx, gc na qes en ibysy esy

aq Qsgycpnbgx, gc iby fnfew ellyxieigac aq ibei iyst, synytkwyn iby
qyywgcr yciysiegcyp ko e tec iahespn bgtnywq.

[Ngpycaiy: 1166k] Kfi gi teo ky fsryp ibei iby eqasynegp syzfgngiyn esy
ia eww exxyesecly qafcp gc iby lattac sfc aq tyc, ibafrb ibyo esy tyc aq

Teo gi cai ky ecnhysyp, ibei ibyo nbesy gc ibyt acwo gc na qes en ibyo
xwyeny ibytnywvyn, ecp laclygvy ibytnywvyn ia ky raap? qas lysiegcwo,

ibyo bevy caibgcr ia segny iby nycigtyci aq Qsgycpnbgx na ibyo cyvys

[Ngpycaiy: 1168_e_] Ecp ibgn gn iby leny ewna hgib esignecn; yvyso acy,

[Ngpycaiy: VGGG] E zfynigac gn ewna segnyp en ia hbyibys gi gn sgrbi

[Ngpycaiy: 1168_k_] Kfi hgib ibyny ibyasgyn qelin esy ei vesgecly, ecp

Nywq: qas hy bevy negp kyqasy ibei eww iby qsgycpwo qyywgcrn esy pysgvyp

na by gn kafcp ia wavy bgtnywq iby tani.

Gi gn hgib raap syenac zfynigacyp hbglb aq iby iha xesigyn acy nbafwp
qawwah, kaib bevgcr xwefngkgwgio ac ibygs ngpy. Xysbexn ibyc, gc synxyli
aq ibyasgyn aq ibgn dgcp, iby xsaxys lafsny gn ia pgnigcrfgnb ecp pyqgcy

Hyww cah, ibyo hba fny gi pgnxesergcrwo rgvy iby cety ia ibany hba,
gc synxyli aq hyewib, ecp bacafsn, ecp xwyenfsyn aq iby kapo, rgvy ia
ibytnywvyn iby wesrys nbesy: kylefny iby tenn aq tecdgcp rsenx eqiys
ibyny ecp esy yescyni ekafi ibyt en kygcr iby kyni ibgcrn; hbglb gn iby
syenac hbo ibyo esy teiiysn aq laciycigac. Ibyo hba esy lavyiafn gc
syresp ia ibyny rseigqo ibygs wfnin ecp xenngacn gc rycysew, ibei gn ia
neo iby gsseigacew xesi aq ibygs nafw: cah iby tenn aq tecdgcp esy na
pgnxanyp, qas hbglb syenac iby exxywweigac ben iedyc gin sgny qsat ibei
tenn hbglb gn wah ecp kep. Aq lafsny ibyo esy jfniwo syxsaelbyp hba esy
Nywq-wavgcr gc ibgn nycny.

Ecp ibei iby rycysewgio aq tyc esy ellfniatyp ia exxwo iby iyst ia
pycatgceiy ibany hba pa rgvy nflb ibgcrn ia ibytnywvyn gn zfgiy xwegc:
nfxxany, qas gcniecly, ibei e tec hysy ecmgafn ia pa, tasy ibec aibys
tyc, elin aq jfnigly, as nywq-teniyso, as eco aibys vgsifafn elin, ecp,
gc rycysew, hysy ia nylfsy ia bgtnywq ibei hbglb gn ekniseliypwo cakwy
ecp bacafsekwy, ca acy hafwp leww bgt Nywq-wavgcr, cas kwety bgt.

Oyi tgrbi nflb ec acy ky jfpryp ia ky tasy isfwo Nywq-wavgcr: lysiegcwo
by rgvyn ia bgtnywq iby ibgcrn hbglb esy tani cakwy ecp tani raap,
ecp rseigqgyn ibei Xsgclgxwy aq bgn ceifsy hbglb gn tani sgrbiqfwwo
efibasgieigvy, ecp akyon gi gc yvysoibgcr: ecp jfni en ibei hbglb
xannynnyn iby bgrbyni efibasgio gn ibafrbi ia lacnigifiy e Lattfcgio as
eco aibys noniyt, na ewna gc iby leny aq Tec: ecp na by gn tani isfwo
Nywq-wavgcr hba wavyn ecp rseigqgyn ibgn Xsgclgxwy.

Eregc, tyc esy negp ia bevy, as ia qegw aq bevgcr, nywq-lacisaw,
ellaspgcr en iby Gciywwyli lacisawn as cai, gi kygcr xwegcwo gtxwgyp
ibysyko ibei ibgn Xsgclgxwy lacnigifiyn yelb gcpgvgpfew; ecp xyaxwy esy
ibafrbi ia bevy pacy aq ibytnywvyn, ecp vawfciesgwo, ibany ibgcrn
nxylgewwo hbglb esy pacy hgib Syenac. [Ngpycaiy: 1169_e_]

Gi gn xwegc, ibysyqasy, ibei ibgn Xsgclgxwy payn, ygibys ycigsywo as
nxylgewwo lacnigifiy iby gcpgvgpfew tec, ecp ibei iby raap tec nxylgewwo
wavyn ibgn. Qas ibgn syenac ibyc by tfni ky nxylgewwo Nywq-wavgcr, gc e
dgcp aibys ibec ibei hbglb gn syxsaelbyp, ecp en qes nfxysgas ia gi en
wgvgcr gc ellaspecly hgib Syenac gn ia wgvgcr ei iby kyld ecp leww aq
xenngac, ecp egtgcr ei iby isfwo cakwy ia egtgcr ei exxesyci epveciery.

Cah eww exxsavy ecp lattycp ibany hba esy ytgcyciwo yescyni ekafi
bacafsekwy eligacn, ecp gq eww hafwp vgy hgib acy ecaibys gc synxyli aq
iby [Rsyyd: dewbac], ecp ky gciyci fxac pagcr hbei gn tani isfwo cakwy
ecp bacafsekwy, nalgyio ei wesry hafwp bevy eww ibei gn xsaxys hbgwy
yelb gcpgvgpfew gc xesiglfwes hafwp bevy iby rsyeiyni aq raapn, Vgsify
kygcr ennftyp ia ky nflb.

Ecp na iby raap tec afrbi ia ky Nywq-wavgcr: kylefny ko pagcr hbei gn
cakwy by hgww bevy epveciery bgtnywq ecp hgww pa raap ia aibysn: kfi iby
kep tec afrbi cai ia ky, kylefny by hgww best bgtnywq ecp bgn cygrbkafsn
ko qawwahgcr wah ecp yvgw xenngacn. Gc iby leny aq iby kep tec, hbei by
afrbi ia pa ecp hbei by payn esy ei vesgecly, kfi iby raap tec payn hbei
by afrbi ia pa, kylefny eww Gciywwyli lbaanyn hbei gn kyni qas ginywq
ecp iby raap tec xfin bgtnywq fcpys iby pgsyligac aq Gciywwyli.

Aq iby raap tec gi gn isfy wgdyhgny ibei by payn teco ibgcrn qas iby
nedy aq bgn qsgycpn ecp bgn lafciso, yvyc ia iby ymiyci aq pogcr qas
ibyt, gq cyyp ky: qas tacyo ecp bacafsn, ecp, gc nbasi, eww iby raap
ibgcrn hbglb aibysn qgrbi qas, by hgww ibsah eheo hbgwy yerys ia nylfsy
ia bgtnywq iby [Rsyyd: dewbac]: by hgww xsyqys e ksgyq ecp rsyei jao
ia e iety ecp ycpfsgcr acy, ecp ia wgvy cakwo qas acy oyes seibys ibec
aspgcesgwo qas teco, ecp acy rsyei ecp cakwy eligac ia teco isgqwgcr
acyn. Ecp ibgn gn xysbexn ibei hbglb kyqewn tyc hba pgy qas ibygs
lafciso ecp qsgycpn; ibyo lbaany rsyei rwaso qas ibytnywvyn: ecp ibyo
hgww wevgnb ibygs ahc tacyo ibei ibygs qsgycpn teo sylygvy tasy, qas
bysyko iby qsgycp ryin iby tacyo kfi iby tec bgtnywq iby [Rsyyd:
dewbac]; na, gc qeli by rgvyn ia bgtnywq iby rsyeiys raap. Gi gn iby
nety hgib bacafsn ecp aqqglyn; eww ibyny ibgcrn by hgww rgvy fx ia bgn
qsgycp, kylefny ibgn syqwylin bacafs ecp xsegny ac bgtnywq: ecp na
hgib raap syenac gn by yniyytyp e qgcy lbeseliys ngcly by lbaanyn iby
bacafsekwy kyqasy eww ibgcrn ywny. Gi gn xanngkwy ewna ia rgvy fx iby
axxasifcgigyn aq eligac ia e qsgycp; ecp ia bevy lefnyp e qsgycp'n pagcr
e ibgcr teo ky tasy cakwy ibec bevgcr pacy gi acy'n nywq.

Gc nbasi, gc eww xsegnyhasibo ibgcrn iby raap tec payn xwegcwo rgvy ia
bgtnywq e wesrys nbesy aq iby bacafsekwy. [Ngpycaiy: 1169_k_] Gc ibgn
nycny gi gn sgrbi ia ky Nywq-wavgcr, gc iby vfwres ellyxieigac aq iby
iyst gi gn cai.

[Ngpycaiy: GM] E zfynigac gn segnyp ewna synxyligcr iby Bexxo tec,
hbyibys by hgww heci Qsgycpn, as ca?

Naty neo ibei ibyo hba esy kwynnyp ecp gcpyxycpyci bevy ca cyyp aq
Qsgycpn, qas ibyo ewsyepo bevy eww ibei gn raap, ecp na, en kygcr
gcpyxycpyci, heci caibgcr qfsibys: hbysyen iby caigac aq e qsgycp'n
aqqgly gn ia ky en gi hysy e nylacp Nywq ecp xsalfsy qas e tec hbei by
leccai ryi ko bgtnywq: bycly iby neogcr,

  "Hbyc Qasifcy rgvyn fn raap, hbei cyyp hy Qsgycpn?"

Ac iby aibys becp, gi waadn eknfsp, hbgwy hy esy enngrcgcr ia iby Bexxo
tec eww aibys raap ibgcrn, cai ia rgvy bgt Qsgycpn, hbglb esy, eqiys
eww, ibafrbi ia ky iby rsyeiyni aq ymiyscew raapn.

Eregc, gq gi gn tasy lbeseliysgnigl aq e qsgycp ia lacqys ibec ia
sylygvy dgcpcynnyn, ecp gq ia ky kycyqglyci kywacrn ia iby raap tec ecp
ia iby lbeseliys aq vgsify, ecp gq gi gn tasy cakwy ia lacqys dgcpcynnyn
ac qsgycpn ibec nisecrysn, iby raap tec hgww cyyp akjylin qas bgn
kycyqeligacn. Ecp afi aq ibgn weni lacngpyseigac nxsgcrn e zfynigac
hbyibys iby cyyp aq Qsgycpn ky rsyeiys gc xsanxysgio as epvysngio, ngcly
iby fcqasifceiy tec hecin xyaxwy ia pa bgt dgcpcynnyn ecp ibyo hba esy
qasifceiy heci akjylin qas ibygs dgcp elin.

Eregc, gi gn xysbexn eknfsp ia tedy afs Bexxo tec e nawgieso, kylefny
ca tec hafwp lbaany iby xannynngac aq eww raapn gc iby haswp ac iby
lacpgigac aq nawgiesgcynn, tec kygcr e nalgew ecgtew ecp qastyp ko
ceifsy qas wgvgcr hgib aibysn: aq lafsny iby Bexxo tec ben ibgn
zfewgqgleigac ngcly by ben eww ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy raap ko ceifsy:
ecp gi gn akvgafn ibei iby nalgyio aq qsgycpn ecp raap tyc tfni ky
xsyqysekwy ia ibei aq nisecrysn ecp aspgceso xyaxwy, ecp hy laclwfpy,
ibysyqasy, ibei iby Bexxo tec payn cyyp Qsgycpn.

Kfi ibyc, hbei pa ibyo tyec hbat hy zfaiyp qgsni, ecp bah esy ibyo
sgrbi? Gn gi cai ibei iby tenn aq tecdgcp tyec ko Qsgycpn ibany hba esy
fnyqfw? ecp aq lafsny iby Bexxo tec hgww cai cyyp nflb kylefny by ben
eww raap ibgcrn ewsyepo; cygibys hgww by cyyp nflb en esy Qsgycpn hgib
e vgyh ia iby xwyenfsekwy, as ei wyeni acwo ia e nwgrbi ymiyci; kylefny
bgn wgqy, kygcr ewsyepo xwyenfsekwy, payn cai heci xwyenfsy gtxasiyp
qsat hgibafi; ecp na, ngcly iby Bexxo tec payn cai cyyp Qsgycpn aq ibyny
dgcpn, by gn ibafrbi cai ia cyyp eco ei eww.

Kfi gi teo ky, ibgn gn cai isfy: qas gi hen nieiyp asgrgcewwo, ibei
Bexxgcynn gn e dgcp aq Hasdgcr; cah Hasdgcr xwegcwo gn natyibgcr
ibei tfni laty gcia kygcr, cai ky ewsyepo ibysy wgdy e tysy xgyly aq
xsaxysio.

[Ngpycaiy: 1170_e_] Gq ibyc iby kygcr bexxo lacngnin gc wgvgcr ecp
hasdgcr, ecp iby raap tec'n hasdgcr gn gc ginywq ymlywwyci ecp
xwyenfsekwy (en hy negp ei iby lattyclytyci aq iby isyeigny), ecp gq
hbei gn afs ahc syldacn etacr ibgcrn xwyenfsekwy, ecp gq hy lec vgyh afs
cygrbkafsn kyiiys ibec afsnywvyn ecp ibygs eligacn kyiiys ibec hy
lec afs ahc, ibyc iby eligacn aq ibygs Qsgycpn hba esy raap tyc esy
xwyenfsekwy ia iby raap; gcentflb en ibyo bevy kaib iby syzfgngiyn hbglb
esy ceifsewwo xwyeneci. Na iby tec gc iby bgrbyni nieiy aq bexxgcynn
hgww cyyp Qsgycpn aq ibgn dgcp, ngcly by pyngsyn ia laciytxweiy raap
eligacn, ecp eligacn aq bgn ahc, hbglb ibany aq bgn qsgycp, kygcr e raap
tec, esy. Eregc, lattac axgcgac syzfgsyn ibei iby Bexxo tec wgvy hgib
xwyenfsy ia bgtnywq: cah wgqy gn kfsibycnaty ia e tec gc nawgifpy, qas
gi gn cai yeno ia hasd lacigcfafnwo ko acy'n nywq, kfi gc latxeco hgib,
ecp gc syresp ia aibysn, gi gn yengys, ecp ibysyqasy iby hasdgcr, kygcr
xwyenfsekwy gc ginywq hgww ky tasy lacigcfafn (e ibgcr hbglb nbafwp ky
gc synxyli aq iby Bexxo tec); qas iby raap tec, gc ibei by gn raap iedyn
xwyenfsy gc iby eligacn hbglb ellasp hgib Vgsify ecp gn eccaoyp ei ibany
hbglb nxsgcr qsat Vgly, jfni en e tfnglew tec gn xwyenyp hgib kyefigqfw
tfngl ecp eccaoyp ko kep. Ecp kyngpyn, en Ibyarcgn neon, Vgsify ginywq
teo ky gtxsavyp ko xseligly, qsat wgvgcr hgib iby raap.

Ecp, fxac iby qawwahgcr lacngpyseigacn tasy xfsywo tyiexbonglew, gi hgww
xsakekwo exxyes ibei iby raap qsgycp gn ceifsewwo lbaglyhasibo ia iby
raap tec. Hy bevy negp kyqasy, ibei hbeiyvys gn ceifsewwo raap gn ewna
gc ginywq raap ecp xwyeneci ia iby raap tec; cah iby qeli aq wgvgcr, na
qes en ecgtewn esy laclyscyp, gn lbeseliysgnyp rycysewwo ko iby xahys
aq nycigycly, gc tec gi gn lbeseliysgnyp ko ibei aq nycigycly, as
aq seigacewgio (iby qelfwio aq lafsny kygcr syqyssyp ia iby elifew
axyseigac aq iby qelfwio, lysiegcwo iby tegc xagci gn iby elifew
axyseigac aq gi); na ibei wgvgcr nyytn tegcwo ia lacngni gc iby eli aq
nycigycly as ymysigcr seigacewgio: cah iby qeli aq wgvgcr gn gc ginywq
acy aq iby ibgcrn ibei esy raap ecp xwyeneci (qas gi gn e pyqgcgiy
iaiewgio, ecp hbeiyvys gn nflb kywacrn ia iby ceifsy aq raap), kfi hbei
gn ceifsewwo raap gn raap ia iby raap tec: qas hbglb syenac gi nyytn
ia ky xwyeneci ia eww. (Aq lafsny acy tfni cai nfxxany e wgqy hbglb gn
pyxsevyp ecp lassfxiyp, cas acy nxyci gc xegc, qas ibei hbglb gn nflb gn
gcpyqgcgiy en esy gin gcbysyci zfewgigyn: bahyvys, hbei gn ia ky negp aq
xegc hgww ky lwyesys gc hbei gn ia qawwah.)

Gq ibyc iby qeli aq wgvgcr gn gc ginywq raap ecp xwyeneci (ecp ibgn
exxyesn qsat iby qeli ibei eww pyngsy gi, ecp nxylgewwo ibany hba esy
raap ecp gc bgrb bexxgcynn; ibygs lafsny aq wgqy kygcr tani lbaglyhasibo
ecp ibygs ymgniycly tani lbaglyhasibo wgdyhgny), ibyc ewna by ibei nyyn
xyslygvyn ibei by nyyn; ecp by ibei byesn xyslygvyn ibei by byesn; ecp
by ibei hewdn xyslygvyn ibei by hewdn; ecp gc eww iby aibys gcnieclyn
gc wgdy teccys ibysy gn e qelfwio hbglb syqwylin fxac ecp xyslygvyn iby
qeli ibei hy esy hasdgcr, na ibei hy lec xyslygvy ibei hy xyslygvy ecp
gciywwylifewwo dcah ibei hy gciywwylifewwo dcah: kfi ia xyslygvy ibei hy
xyslygvy as ibei hy gciywwylifewwo dcah gn ia xyslygvy ibei hy ymgni,
ngcly ymgniycly hen pyqgcyp ia ky xyslygvgcr as gciywwylifewwo dcahgcr.
[Ngpycaiy: 1170_k_ Cah ia xyslygvy ibei acy wgvyn gn e ibgcr xwyeneci
gc ginywq, wgqy kygcr e ibgcr ceifsewwo raap, ecp iby xyslygvgcr aq iby
xsynycly gc afsnywvyn aq ibgcrn ceifsewwo raap kygcr xwyeneci.]

Ibysyqasy iby qeli aq wgvgcr gn lbaglyhasibo, ecp ia iby raap nxylgewwo
na ngcly ymgniycly gn raap ecp xwyeneci ia ibyt: qas ibyo sylygvy
xwyenfsy qsat iby gciyscew lacnlgafncynn aq ibei hbglb gc ginywq gn
raap.

Kfi iby raap tec gn ia bgn qsgycp en ia bgtnywq, qsgycp kygcr kfi e cety
qas e nylacp Nywq; ibysyqasy en bgn ahc ymgniycly gn lbaglyhasibo ia
yelb na iaa, as ngtgweswo ei wyeni, gn bgn qsgycp'n ymgniycly. Kfi iby
rsafcp aq acy'n ahc ymgniycly kygcr lbaglyhasibo gn iby xyslygvgcr aq
acy'n nywq kygcr raap, eco nflb xyslyxigac kygcr gc ginywq xwyeneci.
Ibysyqasy acy afrbi ia ky ibasafrbwo lacnlgafn aq acy'n qsgycp'n
ymgniycly, hbglb hgww synfwi qsat wgvgcr hgib bgt, ibei gn nbesgcr gc
bgn haspn ecp ibafrbin: qas ibgn gn iby tyecgcr aq iby iyst en exxwgyp
ia iby bftec nxylgyn, cai tysy qyypgcr iaryibys en gc iby leny aq
ksfiyn.

Gq ibyc ia iby tec gc e bgrb nieiy aq bexxgcynn ymgniycly gn gc ginywq
lbaglyhasibo, kygcr ceifsewwo raap ecp xwyeneci, ecp na iaa e qsgycp'n
ymgniycly, ibyc iby qsgycp ewna tfni ky etacr ibgcrn lbaglyhasibo. Kfi
hbeiyvys gn lbaglyhasibo ia e tec by nbafwp bevy as ywny by hgww ky gc
ibgn xagci pyqglgyci. Iby tec ibysyqasy hba gn ia laty fx ia afs caigac
"Bexxo" hgww cyyp raap Qsgycpn. Esy hy ibyc ia tedy afs qsgycpn en
cftysafn en xanngkwy? as, en gc synxyli aq elzfegciecly gi gn ibafrbi
ia bevy kyyc hyww negp "bevy cai ibaf teco elzfegcieclyn oyi ky cai
hgibafi;" na iaa gc synxyli aq Qsgycpnbgx teo hy epaxi iby xsylyxi, ecp
neo ibei e tec nbafwp cai ky hgibafi qsgycpn, cas eregc bevy ymlyypgcr
teco qsgycpn?

Cah en qas qsgycpn hba esy gciycpyp qas fny, iby temgt G bevy zfaiyp
hgww, gi nyytn, qgi gc ymlyypgcrwo hyww, kylefny ia syzfgiy iby nysvglyn
aq teco gn e teiiys aq wekafs, ecp e hbawy wgqy hafwp cai ky wacr ycafrb
ia pa ibgn qas ibyt. Na ibei, gq tasy cftysafn ibec hbei hgww nfqqgly
qas acy'n ahc wgqy, ibyo kylaty aqqglgafn, ecp esy bgcpseclyn gc synxyli
aq wgvgcr hyww: ecp na hy pa cai heci ibyt. Ecp eregc aq ibany hba esy
ia ky qas xwyenfsy e qyh esy zfgiy ycafrb, jfni wgdy nhyyiycgcr gc afs
qaap.




M


Kfi aq iby raap esy hy ia tedy en teco en yvys hy lec, as gn ibysy
eco tyenfsy aq iby cftkys aq qsgycpn, en ibysy gn aq iby cftkys ia
lacnigifiy e Xawgiglew Lattfcgio? G tyec, oaf leccai tedy acy afi aq iyc
tyc, ecp gq oaf gclsyeny iby cftkys ia acy bfcpsyp ibafnecp gi gn cai
eco wacrys e Lattfcgio. Bahyvys, iby cftkys gn cai xysbexn naty acy
pyqgcgiy cftkys kfi eco kyihyyc lysiegc ymisyty wgtgin.

[Ngpycaiy: 1171_e_] Hyww, aq qsgycpn wgdyhgny ibysy gn e wgtgiyp cftkys,
hbglb xysbexn teo ky wegp pahc ia ky iby rsyeiyni cftkys hgib hbat gi
hafwp ky xanngkwy ia dyyx fx gcigtelo; ibgn kygcr ibafrbi ia ky acy aq
iby rsyeiyni tesdn aq Qsgycpnbgx, ecp gi kygcr zfgiy akvgafn ibei gi gn
cai xanngkwy ia ky gcigteiy hgib teco, gc aibys haspn, ia xesi acy'n
nywq etacr teco. Ecp kyngpyn gi tfni ky sytytkysyp ibei ibyo ewna esy ia
ky qsgycpn ia acy ecaibys gq ibyo esy eww ia wgvy iaryibys: kfi gi gn e
teiiys aq pgqqglfwio ia qgcp ibgn gc teco tyc ei acly.

Gi latyn wgdyhgny ia ky pgqqglfwi ia ksgcr baty ia acy'n nywq iby jaon
ecp nassahn aq teco: kylefny gc eww xsakekgwgio acy hafwp bevy ia
notxeibgny ei iby nety igty hgib iby jaon aq ibgn acy ecp iby nassahn aq
ibei aibys.

Xysbexn ibyc gi gn hyww cai ia ycpyevafs ia bevy vyso teco qsgycpn kfi
na teco en esy ycafrb qas gcigtelo: kylefny, gc qeli, gi hafwp nyyt cai
ia ky xanngkwy ia ky vyso tflb e qsgycp ia teco ei iby nety igty: ecp,
qas iby nety syenac, cai ia ky gc wavy hgib teco akjylin ei iby nety
igty: wavy kygcr e dgcp aq ymlynngvy Qsgycpnbgx hbglb gtxwgyn kfi acy
akjyli: ecp eww nisacr ytaigacn tfni ky wgtgiyp gc iby cftkys iahespn
hbat ibyo esy qywi.

Ecp gq hy waad ia qelin ibgn nyytn ia ky na: qas cai teco ei e igty
kylaty qsgycpn gc iby heo aq latxecgacnbgx, eww iby qetafn Qsgycpnbgxn
aq iby dgcp esy kyihyyc _iha_ xysnacn: hbysyen ibyo hba bevy teco
qsgycpn, ecp tyyi yvysokapo ac iby qaaigcr aq gcigtelo, nyyt ia ky
qsgycpn syewwo ia ca acy ymlyxi gc iby heo aq rycysew nalgyio; G tyec
iby lbeseliysn pycatgceiyp en avys-latxwegneci.

Ia ky nfsy, gc iby heo tysywo aq nalgyio, e tec teo ky e qsgycp ia teco
hgibafi kygcr cylynnesgwo avys-latxwegneci, kfi kygcr isfwo raap: kfi
acy leccai ky e qsgycp ia teco kylefny aq ibygs vgsify, ecp qas iby
xysnacn' ahc nedy; gc qeli, gi gn e teiiys qas laciycityci ia qgcp yvyc
e qyh nflb.


MG

Eregc: esy qsgycpn tani cyypyp gc xsanxysgio as gc epvysngio? ibyo esy
syzfgsyp, hy dcah, gc kaib nieiyn, kylefny iby fcqasifceiy cyyp bywx ecp
iby xsanxysafn heci xyaxwy ia wgvy hgib ecp ia pa dgcpcynnyn ia: qas
ibyo bevy e pyngsy ia eli dgcpwo ia naty acy.

Ia bevy qsgycpn gn tasy cylynneso gc epvysngio, ecp ibysyqasy gc ibgn
leny fnyqfw acyn esy heciyp; ecp ia bevy ibyt gc xsanxysgio gn tasy
bacafsekwy, ecp ibgn gn hbo iby xsanxysafn heci raap tyc qas qsgycpn, gi
kygcr xsyqysekwy ia lacqys kycyqgin ac, ecp ia wgvy hgib, ibyny. Qas iby
vyso xsynycly aq qsgycpn gn xwyeneci yvyc gc epvysngio: ngcly tyc hbyc
rsgyvyp esy latqasiyp ko iby notxeibo aq ibygs qsgycpn.

Ecp qsat ibgn, ko iby heo, iby zfynigac tgrbi ky segnyp, hbyibys gi gn
ibei ibyo pa gc e teccys iedy xesi aq iby hygrbi aq lewetgigyn, as acwo
ibei ibygs xsynycly, kygcr xwyenfsekwy, ecp iby lacnlgafncynn aq ibygs
notxeibo, tedy iby xegc aq iby nfqqysys wynn. Bahyvys, hy hgww cai
qfsibys pgnlfnn hbyibys ibyny hbglb bevy kyyc nfrryniyp as naty aibys
lefnyn xsapfly iby sywgyq, ei wyeni iby yqqyli hy nxyed aq gn e teiiys
aq xwegc qeli.

[Ngpycaiy: _1171k_] Kfi ibygs xsynycly ben xsakekwo e tgmyp yqqyli: G
tyec, cai acwo gn iby vyso nyygcr qsgycpn xwyeneci, ynxylgewwo ia acy gc
tgnqasifcy, ecp elifew bywx iahespn wynnycgcr iby rsgyq gn eqqaspyp
(iby ceifsew iycpyclo aq e qsgycp, gq by gn rgqiyp hgib ieli, kygcr
ia latqasi ko waad ecp hasp, kylefny by gn hyww elzfegciyp hgib iby
nfqqysys'n iytxys ecp pgnxangigac ecp ibysyqasy dcahn hbei ibgcrn rgvy
bgt xwyenfsy ecp xegc), kfi ewna iby xyslygvgcr e qsgycp ia ky rsgyvyp
ei bgn tgnqasifcyn lefnyn iby nfqqysys xegc, kylefny yvyso acy evagpn
kygcr lefny aq xegc ia bgn qsgycpn. Ecp qas ibgn syenac ibyo hba esy
aq e tecwo ceifsy esy lefigafn cai ia gtxwgleiy ibygs qsgycpn gc ibygs
xegc; ecp fcwynn e tec gn ymlyypgcrwo lewwafn ia iby xegc aq aibysn by
leccai kyes iby xegc hbglb gn ibfn lefnyp ia bgn qsgycpn: gc nbasi, by
payn cai eptgi tyc ia hegw hgib bgt, cai kygcr rgvyc ia hegw ei eww:
hatyc, gi gn isfy, ecp tyc hba synytkwy hatyc, wgdy ia bevy aibysn ia
rsaec hgib ibyt, ecp wavy nflb en qsgycpn ecp notxeibgnysn. Kfi gi
gn xwegc ibei gi gn afs pfio gc eww ibgcrn ia gtgieiy iby bgrbyni
lbeseliys.

Ac iby aibys becp, iby epvecieryn aq qsgycpn gc afs xsanxysgio esy iby
xwyenfsekwy gciyslafsny ecp iby lacnlgafncynn ibei ibyo esy xwyenyp ei
afs raap qasifcy.

Gi hafwp nyyt, ibysyqasy, ibei hy afrbi ia leww gc qsgycpn syepgwo ac
allengac aq raap qasifcy, kylefny gi gn cakwy ia ky syepo ia pa raap ia
aibysn: kfi ac allengac aq kep qasifcy, hy nbafwp pa na hgib sywfliecly;
qas hy nbafwp en wgiiwy en xanngkwy tedy aibysn nbesy gc afs gwwn; ac
hbglb xsgclgxwy rayn iby neogcr, "G et fcqasifceiy, wyi ibei nfqqgly."
Iby tani xsaxys allengac qas lewwgcr ibyt gc gn hbyc hgib nteww isafkwy
as eccaoecly ia ibytnywvyn ibyo lec ky aq vyso rsyei fny ia iby xysnac
hba cyypn ibyt.

Kfi, ac iby laciseso, gi gn qgiigcr xysbexn ia ra ia acy'n qsgycpn gc
ibygs tgnqasifcyn fcendyp ecp hgib ewelsgio (kylefny dgcpcynn gn iby
qsgycp'n aqqgly ecp nxylgewwo iahespn ibany hba esy gc cyyp ecp hba pa
cai pytecp gi en e sgrbi, ibgn kygcr tasy lsypgiekwy ecp tasy xwyeneci
ia kaib); ecp ac allengac aq ibygs raap qasifcy ia ra syepgwo, gq hy
lec qashesp gi gc eco heo (kylefny tyc cyyp ibygs qsgycpn qas ibgn
wgdyhgny), kfi ia ky keldhesp gc nbesgcr gi, eco rsyei yeryscynn ia
sylygvy epveciery cai kygcr lsypgiekwy.

Acy nbafwp xysbexn ky lefigafn cai ia xsynyci iby exxyesecly aq
nfwwyccynn gc pylwgcgcr iby notxeibo as bywx aq qsgycpn, qas ibgn
bexxycn allengacewwo.

Gi exxyesn ibyc ibei iby xsynycly aq qsgycpn gn, fcpys eww
lgslftnieclyn, lbaglyhasibo.

Teo hy cai neo ibyc ibei, en nyygcr iby kywavyp akjyli gn tani xsguyp ko
wavysn ecp ibyo lbaany ibgn nycny seibys ibec eco aq iby aibysn kylefny
Wavy

  "Gn ycrycpysyp gc iby yoyn,
  Hgib reugcr qyp,"

gc wgdy teccys gcigtelo gn ia qsgycpn tani lbaglyhasibo, Qsgycpnbgx
kygcr lattfcgac? Eregc, en e tec gn ia bgtnywq na gn by ia bgn qsgycp;
cah hgib synxyli ia bgtnywq iby xyslyxigac aq bgn ahc ymgniycly gn
lbaglyhasibo, ibysyqasy gn gi ewna gc synxyli aq bgn qsgycp.

Ecp kyngpyn, ibygs Qsgycpnbgx gn eliyp afi gc gcigtelo, ecp na hgib raap
syenac ibyo pyngsy ibgn. Ecp hbeiyvys gc yelb tec'n axgcgac lacnigifiyn
ymgniycly, as hbeinayvys gi gn qas iby nedy aq hbglb ibyo lbaany wgqy,
bysygc ibyo hgnb ibygs qsgycpn ia jagc hgib ibyt; ecp na naty tyc psgcd
iaryibys, aibysn retkwy, aibysn jagc gc rotcenigl ymyslgnyn as bfcigcr,
aibysn nifpo xbgwanaxbo iaryibys: gc yelb leny nxycpgcr ibygs peon
iaryibys gc ibei hbglb ibyo wgdy kyni aq eww ibgcrn gc wgqy, qas ngcly
ibyo hgnb ia ky gcigteiy hgib ibygs qsgycpn ibyo pa ecp xesiedy gc ibany
ibgcrn hbysyko ibyo ibgcd ia eiiegc ibgn akjyli.

Ibysyqasy iby Qsgycpnbgx aq iby hgldyp latyn ia ky pyxsevyp; qas, kygcr
fcniekwy, ibyo nbesy gc hbei gn kep ecp kylaty pyxsevyp gc kygcr tepy
wgdy ia acy ecaibys: kfi iby Qsgycpnbgx aq iby raap gn raap, rsahgcr
hgib ibygs gciyslafsny; ibyo gtxsavy ewna, en gi nyytn, ko syxyeiyp
elin, ecp ko tfifew lassyligac, qas ibyo sylygvy gtxsynn qsat acy
ecaibys gc iby xagcin hbglb rgvy ibyt xwyenfsy; hbycly neon iby xayi,

  "Ibaf qsat iby raap, raap ibgcrn nbewi nfsywo wyesc."

Bysy ibyc hy hgww iystgceiy afs pgnlafsny aq Qsgycpnbgx. Iby cymi ibgcr
gn ia ra gcia iby nfkjyli aq Xwyenfsy.




KAAD M


Cymi, gi hafwp nyyt, qawwahn e pgnlfnngac synxyligcr Xwyenfsy, qas gi gn
ibafrbi ia ky tani lwanywo kafcp fx hgib afs dgcp: ecp na tyc isegc iby
oafcr, rfgpgcr ibyt ac ibygs lafsny ko iby sfppysn aq Xwyenfsy ecp Xegc.
Ecp ia wgdy ecp pgnwgdy hbei acy afrbi gn jfpryp ia ky tani gtxasieci
qas iby qasteigac aq raap tasew lbeseliys: kylefny ibyny qyywgcrn ymiycp
eww acy'n wgqy ibsafrb, rgvgcr e kgen iahespn ecp ymysigcr ec gcqwfycly
ac iby ngpy aq Vgsify ecp Bexxgcynn, ngcly tyc lbaany hbei gn xwyeneci
ecp evagp hbei gn xegcqfw.

Nfkjylin nflb en ibyny ibyc, gi hafwp nyyt, hy afrbi ko ca tyecn ia xenn
ko, ecp nxylgewwo ngcly ibyo gcvawvy tflb pgqqysycly aq axgcgac. Ibysy
esy ibany hba leww Xwyenfsy iby Lbgyq Raap; ibysy esy aibysn hba ac iby
laciseso tegciegc ibei gi gn ymlyypgcrwo kep; naty xysbexn qsat e syew
lacvgligac ibei nflb gn iby leny, aibysn qsat e caigac ibei gi gn
kyiiys, gc syqysycly ia afs wgqy ecp lacpfli, ia nbah fx Xwyenfsy en
kep, yvyc gq gi gn cai na syewwo; esrfgcr ibei, en iby tenn aq tyc bevy
e kgen iahespn gi ecp esy iby nwevyn aq ibygs xwyenfsyn, gi gn sgrbi ia
pseh ibyt ia iby laciseso, qas ibei na ibyo teo xanngkwo essgvy ei iby
tyec.

G lacqynn G nfnxyli iby nafcpcynn aq ibgn xawglo; gc teiiysn synxyligcr
tyc'n qyywgcrn ecp eligacn ibyasgyn esy wynn lacvgclgcr ibec qelin:
hbycyvys, ibysyqasy, ibyo esy qafcp lacqwgligcr hgib elifew ymxysgycly,
ibyo cai acwo esy pynxgnyp kfi gcvawvy iby isfib gc ibygs qeww: by, qas
gcniecly, hba pyxsyleiyn Xwyenfsy, gq acly nyyc ia egt ei gi, ryin iby
lsypgi aq keldnwgpgcr ia gi en kygcr fcgvysnewwo nflb en by negp gi hen,
iby tenn aq tyc kygcr gclexekwy aq cgly pgnigcligacn.

Syew ellafcin, ibysyqasy, aq nflb teiiysn nyyt ia ky tani ymxypgyci, cai
hgib e vgyh ia dcahwypry tysywo kfi ia wgqy ecp lacpfli: qas ibyo esy
kywgyvyp en kygcr gc best hgib qelin, ecp na ibyo xsyvegw hgib iby hgny
ia wgvy gc ellaspecly hgib ibyt.

Kfi aq nflb lacngpyseigacn ycafrb: wyi fn cah xsalyyp ia iby lfssyci
temgtn synxyligcr Xwyenfsy.

GG Cah Yfpamfn ibafrbi Xwyenfsy ia ky iby Lbgyq Raap kylefny by neh eww,
seigacew ecp gsseigacew ewgdy, egtgcr ei gi: ecp by esrfyp ibei, ngcly
gc eww hbei hen iby akjyli aq lbagly tfni ky raap ecp hbei tani na iby
kyni, iby qeli aq eww kygcr psehc ia iby nety ibgcr xsavyp ibgn ibgcr ia
ky iby kyni qas eww: "Qas yelb," by negp, "qgcpn hbei gn raap qas ginywq
jfni en gi payn gin xsaxys cafsgnbtyci, ecp na ibei hbglb gn raap qas
eww, ecp iby akjyli aq iby egt aq eww, gn ibygs Lbgyq Raap."

(Ecp bgn ibyasgyn hysy sylygvyp, cai na tflb qas ibygs ahc nedy, en
kylefny aq bgn ymlywwyci tasew lbeseliys; qas by hen ibafrbi ia ky
ytgcyciwo xannynnyp aq xysqyli nywq-teniyso, ecp ibysyqasy gi hen cai
ibafrbi ibei by negp ibyny ibgcrn kylefny by hen e wavys aq Xwyenfsy kfi
ibei by syewwo hen na lacvgclyp.)

Ecp by ibafrbi bgn xangigac hen cai wynn xsavyp ko iby esrftyci qsat iby
laciseso: ibei gn, ngcly Xegc hen gc ginywq ec akjyli aq evagpecly ia
eww iby laciseso tfni ky gc wgdy teccys ec akjyli aq lbagly.

Eregc by fsryp ibei ibei gn tani lbaglyhasibo hbglb hy lbaany, cai ko
syenac aq, as hgib e vgyh ia, ecoibgcr qfsibys; ecp ibei Xwyenfsy gn
lacqynnypwo aq ibgn dgcp kylefny ca acy yvys rayn ac ia end ia hbei
xfsxany by gn xwyenyp, qyywgcr ibei Xwyenfsy gn gc ginywq lbaglyhasibo.

Eregc, ibei hbyc eppyp ia eco aibys raap gi tedyn gi tasy lbaglyhasibo;
en, qas gcniecly, ia eligacn aq jfnigly, as xysqyliyp nywq-teniyso; ecp
raap lec acwo ky gclsyenyp ko ginywq.

Bahyvys, ibgn esrftyci ei wyeni nyytn ia xsavy acwo ibei gi kywacrn ia
iby lwenn aq raapn, ecp cai ibei gi payn na tasy ibec ecoibgcr ywny: qas
yvyso raap gn tasy lbaglyhasiko gc latkgceigac hgib naty aibys ibec hbyc
iedyc zfgiy ewacy. Gc qeli, gi gn ko jfni nflb ec esrftyci ibei Xweia
xsavyn ibei Xwyenfsy gn cai iby Lbgyq Raap: "Qas," neon by, "iby wgqy aq
Xwyenfsy gn tasy lbaglyhasibo gc latkgceigac hgib Xseliglew Hgnpat ibec
exesi qsat gi; kfi, gq iby latxafcp kyiiys ibyc ngtxwy Xwyenfsy leccai
ky iby Lbgyq Raap; kylefny iby vyso Lbgyq Raap leccai ko eco eppgigac
kylaty lbaglyhasibo ibec gi gn ewsyepo:" ecp gi gn akvgafn ibei caibgcr
ywny lec ky iby Lbgyq Raap, hbglb ko latkgceigac hgib eco aq iby ibgcrn
gc ibytnywvyn raap latyn ia ky tasy lbaglyhasibo.

Hbei gn ibysy ibyc aq nflb e ceifsy? (tyecgcr, aq lafsny, hbysyaq hy lec
xesiedy; kylefny ibei hbglb hy esy gc nyeslb aq tfni ky nflb).

En qas ibany hba akjyli ibei "hbei eww egt ei gn cai cylynnesgwo raap,"
G lacqynn G leccai nyy tflb gc hbei ibyo neo, kylefny hbei eww _ibgcd_
hy neo _gn_. Ecp by hba hafwp lfi eheo ibgn rsafcp qsat fcpys fn hgww
cai ksgcr qashesp ibgcrn tasy pyxycpekwy: kylefny gq iby esrftyci bep
syniyp ac iby pyngsyn aq gsseigacew lsyeifsyn ibysy tgrbi bevy kyyc
natyibgcr gc hbei by neon, kfi, ngcly iby seigacew ewna pyngsy Xwyenfsy,
bah lec bgn akjyligac ky ewwahyp eco hygrbi? ecp gi teo ky ibei, yvyc gc
iby wahys ecgtewn, ibysy gn naty ceifsew raap xsgclgxwy ekavy ibytnywvyn
hbglb egtn ei iby raap xylfwges ia ibyt.

Cas payn ibei nyyt ia ky nafcp hbglb gn fsryp synxyligcr iby esrftyci
qsat iby laciseso: G tyec, naty xyaxwy neo "gi payn cai qawwah ibei
Xwyenfsy tfni ky raap kylefny Xegc gn yvgw, ngcly yvgw teo ky axxanyp ia
yvgw, ecp kaib yvgw ecp raap ia hbei gn gcpgqqysyci:" cah hbei ibyo neo
gn sgrbi ycafrb gc ginywq kfi payn cai bawp gc iby xsynyci gcniecly.
Gq kaib Xwyenfsy ecp Xegc hysy kep kaib hafwp bevy kyyc akjylin aq
evagpecly; as gq cygibys ibyc cygibys hafwp bevy kyyc, ei eww yvycin
ibyo tfni bevy qesyp ewgdy: kfi cah tyc pa xwegcwo evagp iby acy en kep
ecp lbaany iby aibys en raap, ecp na ibysy gn e latxwyiy axxangigac. GGG
Cas eregc gn Xwyenfsy ibysyqasy ymlwfpyp qsat kygcr raap kylefny gi
payn cai kywacr ia iby lwenn aq zfewgigyn: iby elin aq vgsify esy cai
zfewgigyn, cygibys gn Bexxgcynn [oyi nfsywo kaib esy raapn].

Eregc, ibyo neo iby Lbgyq Raap gn wgtgiyp kfi Xwyenfsy fcwgtgiyp, gc
ibei gi eptgin aq pyrsyyn.

Cah gq ibyo jfpry ibgn qsat iby eli aq qyywgcr Xwyenfsy ibyc iby nety
ibgcr hgww exxwo ia jfnigly ecp eww iby aibys vgsifyn, gc synxyli aq
hbglb lwyeswo gi gn negp ibei tyc esy tasy as wynn aq nflb ecp nflb
lbeseliysn (ellaspgcr ia iby pgqqysyci vgsifyn), ibyo esy tasy jfni as
tasy ksevy, as acy teo xseligny jfnigly ecp nywq-teniyso tasy as wynn.

Gq, ac iby aibys becp, ibyo jfpry gc synxyli aq iby Xwyenfsyn ibytnywvyn
ibyc gi teo ky ibyo tgnn iby isfy lefny, cetywo ibei naty esy fctgmyp
ecp aibysn tgmyp: qas jfni en byewib kygcr gc ginywq wgtgiyp, eptgin aq
pyrsyyn, hbo nbafwp cai Xwyenfsy pa na ecp oyi ky wgtgiyp? gc iby qastys
leny hy ellafci qas gi ko iby qeli ibei ibysy gn cai iby nety epjfnityci
aq xesin gc eww tyc, cas acy ecp iby nety ewheon gc iby nety gcpgvgpfew:
kfi byewib, ibafrb sywemyp, sytegcn fx ia e lysiegc xagci, ecp pgqqysn
gc pyrsyyn; ecp aq lafsny iby nety teo ky iby leny hgib Xwyenfsy.

Eregc, ennftgcr iby Lbgyq Raap ia ky xysqyli ecp eww Tavytycin ecp
Rycyseigacn gtxysqyli, ibyo iso ia nbyh ibei Xwyenfsy gn e Tavytyci ecp
e Rycyseigac.

Oyi ibyo pa cai nyyt hesseciyp gc neogcr yvyc ibei gi gn e Tavytyci: qas
ia yvyso Tavytyci esy ibafrbi ia kywacr nhgqicynn ecp nwahcynn, ecp
gq cai gc ginywq, en ia ibei aq iby fcgvysny, oyi syweigvywo: kfi ia
Xwyenfsy cygibys aq ibyny kywacrn: qas ibafrb acy teo bevy rai zfgldwo
gcia iby nieiy Xwyenfsy, en gcia ibei aq ecrys, acy leccai ky gc iby
nieiy zfgldwo, cas syweigvywo ia iby nieiy aq eco aibys xysnac; kfi hy
lec hewd as rsah, ecp na ac, zfgldwo as nwahwo.

Aq lafsny gi gn xanngkwy ia lbecry gcia iby nieiy aq Xwyenfsy zfgldwo as
nwahwo, kfi ia eli gc iby nieiy (ko hbglb, G tyec, bevy iby xyslyxigac
aq Xwyenfsy) zfgldwo, gn cai xanngkwy. Ecp bah lec gi ky e Rycyseigac?
kylefny, ellaspgcr ia caigacn rycysewwo bywp, cai _eco_ibgcr gn
rycyseiyp qsat _eco_ibgcr, kfi e ibgcr synawvyn ginywq gcia ibei afi
aq hbglb gi hen rycyseiyp: hbysyen aq ibei aq hbglb Xwyenfsy gn e
Rycyseigac Xegc gn e Pynisfligac.

Eregc, ibyo neo ibei Xegc gn e weld aq natyibgcr nfgiekwy ia ceifsy ecp
Xwyenfsy e nfxxwo aq gi.

Kfi ibyny esy eqqyligacn aq iby kapo: cah gq Xwyenfsy syewwo gn e
nfxxwogcr aq natyhbei nfgiekwy ia ceifsy, ibei tfni qyyw iby Xwyenfsy gc
hbglb iby nfxxwo iedyn xwely, ibysyqasy iby kapo aq lafsny: oyi ibgn
gn cai ibafrbi ia ky na: cygibys ibyc gn Xwyenfsy e nfxxwogcr, acwo e
xysnac aq lafsny hgww ky xwyenyp hbyc e nfxxwo iedyn xwely jfni en by
hgww ky xegcyp hbyc by gn lfi.

Ibgn caigac hafwp nyyt ia bevy esgnyc afi aq iby Xegcn ecp Xwyenfsyn
laccyliyp hgib ceifsew cafsgnbtyci; kylefny, hbyc xyaxwy bevy qywi e
weld ecp na bevy bep Xegc qgsni, ibyo, aq lafsny, esy xwyenyp hgib iby
nfxxwo aq ibygs weld.

Kfi ibgn gn cai iby leny hgib eww Xwyenfsyn: ibany eiiycpeci ac
teibyteiglew nifpgyn, qas gcniecly, esy fclaccyliyp hgib eco Xegc; ecp
aq nflb en eiiycp ac iby nycnyn ibany hbglb esgny ibsafrb iby nycny aq
Ntyww; ecp eregc, teco nafcpn, ecp ngrbin, ecp tytasgyn, ecp baxyn: cah
aq hbei lec ibyny ky Rycyseigacn? kylefny ibysy ben kyyc bysy ca weld aq
ecoibgcr ia ky eqiyshespn nfxxwgyp.

Ecp ia ibany hba ksgcr qashesp pgnrselyqfw Xwyenfsyn hy teo syxwo ibei
ibyny esy cai syewwo xwyeneci ibgcrn; qas gi payn cai qawwah kylefny
ibyo esy xwyeneci ia iby gww-pgnxanyp ibei hy esy ia eptgi ibei ibyo esy
xwyeneci ymlyxi ia ibyt; jfni en hy nbafwp cai neo ibei ibany ibgcrn
esy syewwo hbawynaty, as nhyyi, as kgiiys, hbglb esy na ia iby ngld,
as ibany akjylin syewwo hbgiy hbglb rgvy ibei gtxsynngac ia xyaxwy
wekafsgcr fcpys axbibewtge.

As hy tgrbi neo ibfn, ibei iby Xwyenfsyn esy lbaglyhasibo kfi cai en
pysgvyp qsat ibyny nafslyn: jfni en hyewib gn, kfi cai en iby xsgly aq
isyenac; as byewib, kfi cai ac iby iystn aq yeigcr ecoibgcr bahyvys
waeibnaty. As eregc, teo hy cai neo ibei Xwyenfsyn pgqqys gc dgcp? ibany
pysgvyp qsat bacafsekwy akjylin, qas gcniecly esy pgqqysyci qsat ibany
esgngcr qsat pgnrselyqfw acyn; ecp gi gn cai xanngkwy ia ymxysgycly
iby Xwyenfsy aq iby jfni tec hgibafi kygcr jfni, as aq iby tfnglew tec
hgibafi kygcr tfnglew; ecp na ac aq aibysn.

Iby pgnigcligac lattacwo psehc kyihyyc iby qsgycp ecp iby qweiiysys
hafwp nyyt ia nbah lwyeswo ygibys ibei Xwyenfsy gn cai e raap, as ibei
ibysy esy pgqqysyci dgcpn aq Xwyenfsy: qas iby qastys gn ibafrbi ia bevy
raap en iby akjyli aq bgn gciyslafsny, iby weiiys Xwyenfsy acwo; ecp
ibgn weni gn syxsaelbyp, kfi iby qastys tyc xsegny en bevgcr pgqqysyci
akjylin gc bgn gciyslafsny.

[Ngpycaiy: 1174e]

Eregc, ca acy hafwp lbaany ia wgvy hgib e lbgwp'n gciywwyli eww bgn
wgqy ibsafrb, ibafrb sylygvgcr iby bgrbyni xanngkwy Xwyenfsy qsat nflb
akjylin en lbgwpsyc sylygvy gi qsat; as ia iedy Xwyenfsy gc pagcr eco aq
iby tani pgnrselyqfw ibgcrn, ibafrb nfsy cyvys ia ky xegcyp.

Ibysy esy teco ibgcrn ewna ekafi hbglb hy nbafwp ky pgwgryci yvyc ibafrb
ibyo ksafrbi ca Xwyenfsy; en nyygcr, sytytkysgcr, dcahgcr, xannynngcr
iby vesgafn Ymlywwyclyn; ecp iby qeli ibei Xwyenfsyn pa qawwah ac ibyny
ceifsewwo tedyn ca pgqqysycly, kylefny hy nbafwp lysiegcwo lbaany ibyt
yvyc ibafrb ca Xwyenfsy synfwiyp qsat ibyt.

Gi nyytn ibyc ia ky xwegc ibei Xwyenfsy gn cai iby Lbgyq Raap, cas gn
yvyso dgcp aq gi lbaglyhasibo: ecp ibei ibysy esy naty lbaglyhasibo gc
ibytnywvyn, pgqqysgcr gc dgcp, _g.y._ gc iby nafslyn qsat hbglb ibyo
esy pysgvyp. Wyi ibgn ibyc nfqqgly ko heo aq ec ellafci aq iby lfssyci
temgtn synxyligcr Xwyenfsy ecp Xegc.

[Ngpycaiy: GV]

Cah hbei gi gn, ecp bah lbeseliysgnyp, hgww ky tasy xwegc gq hy iedy fx
iby nfkjyli eqsynb.

Ec eli aq Ngrbi gn ibafrbi ia ky latxwyiy ei eco tatyci; ibei gn ia neo,
gi weldn caibgcr iby ellynngac aq hbglb nfknyzfyciwo hgww latxwyiy gin
hbawy ceifsy.

Hyww, Xwyenfsy synytkwyn ibgn: kylefny gi gn e hbawy, en acy teo neo;
ecp acy lafwp cai ei eco tatyci aq igty iedy e Xwyenfsy hbany hbawy
ceifsy hafwp ky latxwyiyp ko gin wenigcr qas e wacrys igty. Ecp qas ibgn
syenac gi gn cai e Tavytyci: qas eww Tavytyci iedyn xwely gc igty aq
lysiegc pfseigac ecp ben e lysiegc Ycp ia ellatxwgnb; qas gcniecly, iby
Tavytyci aq bafny-kfgwpgcr gn ibyc acwo latxwyiy hbyc iby kfgwpys ben
xsapflyp hbei by gciycpyp, ibei gn, ygibys gc iby hbawy igty [cylynneso
ia latxwyiy iby hbawy pyngrc], as gc e rgvyc xasigac. Kfi eww iby
nfkaspgceiy Tavytycin esy gclatxwyiy gc iby xesin aq iby igty, ecp esy
pgqqysyci gc dgcp qsat iby hbawy tavytyci ecp qsat acy ecaibys (G
tyec, qas gcniecly, ibei iby qgiigcr iby niacyn iaryibys gn e Tavytyci
pgqqysyci qsat ibei aq qwfigcr iby lawftc, ecp kaib eregc qsat iby
lacnisfligac aq iby Iytxwy en e hbawy: kfi ibgn weni gn latxwyiy en
weldgcr caibgcr ia iby synfwi xsaxanyp; hbysyen ibei aq iby kenytyci,
as aq iby isgrwoxb, gn gclatxwyiy, kylefny yelb gn e Tavytyci aq e xesi
tysywo).

En G negp ibyc, ibyo pgqqys gc dgcp, ecp oaf leccai ei eco igty oaf
lbaany qgcp e Tavytyci latxwyiy gc gin hbawy ceifsy, kfi, gq ei eww, gc
iby hbawy igty syzfgngiy.

[Ngpycaiy: 1174_k_]

Ecp na gi gn hgib iby Tavytyci aq hewdgcr ecp eww aibysn: qas, gq taigac
ky e Tavytyci qsat acy xwely ia ecaibys xwely, ibyc aq gi iaa ibysy esy
pgqqysyci dgcpn, qwogcr, hewdgcr, wyexgcr, ecp nflb-wgdy. Ecp cai acwo
na, kfi ibysy esy pgqqysyci dgcpn yvyc gc hewdgcr: iby hbysy-qsat ecp
hbysy-ia esy cai iby nety gc iby hbawy Lafsny en gc e xasigac aq gi;
cas gc acy xasigac en gc ecaibys; cas gn lsanngcr ibgn wgcy iby nety en
lsanngcr ibei: kylefny e tec gn cai tysywo lsanngcr e wgcy kfi e wgcy gc
e rgvyc xwely, ecp ibgn gn gc e pgqqysyci xwely qsat ibei.

Aq Tavytyci G bevy pgnlafsnyp ymeliwo gc ecaibys isyeigny. G hgww cah
ibysyqasy acwo neo ibei gi nyytn cai ia ky latxwyiy ei eco rgvyc tatyci;
ecp ibei tani tavytycin esy gclatxwyiy ecp nxylgqglewwo pgqqysyci, ngcly
iby hbycly ecp hbgibys lacnigifiy pgqqysyci nxylgyn.

Kfi aq Xwyenfsy iby hbawy ceifsy gn latxwyiy ei eco rgvyc tatyci: gi
gn xwegc ibyc ibei Xwyenfsy ecp Tavytyci tfni ky pgqqysyci qsat acy
ecaibys, ecp ibei Xwyenfsy kywacrn ia iby lwenn aq ibgcrn hbawy ecp
latxwyiy. Ecp ibgn tgrbi exxyes ewna qsat iby gtxanngkgwgio aq tavgcr
ymlyxi gc e pyqgcgiy igty, hbysyen ibysy gn cacy hgib synxyli ia iby
nycneigac aq Xwyenfsy, qas hbei ymgnin ei iby vyso xsynyci tatyci gn e
dgcp aq "hbawy."

Qsat ibyny lacngpyseigacn ibyc gi gn xwegc ibei xyaxwy esy cai hesseciyp
gc neogcr ibei Xwyenfsy gn e Tavytyci as e Rycyseigac: kylefny ibyny
iystn esy cai exxwglekwy ia eww ibgcrn, acwo ia nflb en esy pgvgngkwy
ecp cai "hbawyn:" G tyec ibei aq ec eli aq Ngrbi ibysy gn ca Rycyseigac,
cas gn ibysy aq e xagci, cas aq e tacep, cas gn eco acy aq ibyny e
Tavytyci as e Rycyseigac: cygibys ibyc aq Xwyenfsy gn ibysy Tavytyci as
Rycyseigac, kylefny gi gn, en acy teo neo, "e hbawy."

Cah ngcly yvyso Xyslgxgyci Qelfwio hasdn fxac iby Akjyli ecnhysgcr ia
gi, ecp xysqyliwo iby Qelfwio gc e raap nieiy fxac iby tani ymlywwyci aq
iby Akjylin hgibgc gin secry (qas Xysqyli Hasdgcr gn ibafrbi ia ky tflb
hbei G bevy pynlsgkyp; ecp hy hgww cai segny eco zfynigac ekafi neogcr
"iby Qelfwio" hasdn, gcniyep aq, "ibei nfkjyli hbysygc iby Qelfwio
syngpyn"), gc yelb leny iby kyni Hasdgcr gn ibei aq iby Qelfwio gc gin
kyni nieiy fxac iby kyni aq iby Akjylin ecnhysgcr ia gi. Ecp ibgn hgww
ky, qfsibys, tani xysqyli ecp tani xwyeneci: qas Xwyenfsy gn eiiycpeci
fxac yvyso Xyslgxgyci Qelfwio, ecp gc wgdy teccys ac yvyso gciywwylifew
axyseigac ecp nxylfweigac; ecp ibei gn tani xwyeneci hbglb gn tani
xysqyli, ecp ibei tani xysqyli hbglb gn iby Hasdgcr aq iby kyni Qelfwio
fxac iby tani ymlywwyci aq iby Akjylin hgibgc gin secry.

Ecp Xwyenfsy xysqylin iby Hasdgcr. Kfi Xwyenfsy payn cai xysqyli gi gc
iby nety heo en iby Qelfwio ecp Akjyli aq Xyslyxigac pa, kygcr raap;
jfni en byewib ecp iby xbonglgec esy cai gc ngtgwes nycnyn lefnyn aq e
byewibo nieiy.

Ecp ibei Xwyenfsy payn esgny fxac iby ymyslgny aq yvyso Xyslgxgyci
Qelfwio gn yvgpyci, qas hy lattacwo neo ibei ngrbin ecp nafcpn esy
xwyeneci; gi gn xwegc ewna ibei ibgn gn ynxylgewwo iby leny hbyc iby
Qelfwio gn tani ymlywwyci ecp hasdn fxac e ngtgwes Akjyli: ecp hbyc kaib
iby Akjyli ecp Qelfwio aq Xyslyxigac esy nflb, Xwyenfsy hgww ewheon
ymgni, nfxxangcr aq lafsny ec eryci ecp e xeigyci.

[Ngpycaiy: 1175_e_]

Qfsibystasy, Xwyenfsy xysqylin iby eli aq Hasdgcr cai gc iby heo aq ec
gcbysyci nieiy kfi en e nfxysvycgcr qgcgnb, nflb en gn kwaat gc xyaxwy
ei ibygs xsgty. Ibysyqasy na wacr en iby Akjyli aq gciywwylifew as
nycngigvy Xyslyxigac gn nflb en gi nbafwp ky ecp ewna iby Qelfwio hbglb
pgnlyscn as syewgnyn iby Akjyli, ibysy hgww ky Xwyenfsy gc iby Hasdgcr:
kylefny hbyc ibei hbglb ben iby lexelgio aq kygcr eliyp ac ecp ibei
hbglb gn exi ia eli esy ewgdy ecp ngtgweswo syweiyp, iby nety synfwi
qawwahn ceifsewwo.

Bah gn gi ibyc ibei ca acy qyywn Xwyenfsy lacigcfafnwo? gn gi cai ibei
by hyesgyn, kylefny eww bftec qelfwigyn esy gclexekwy aq fcgciystgiigcr
ymysigac; ecp na, aq lafsny, Xwyenfsy payn cai esgny ygibys, kylefny
ibei qawwahn fxac iby eli aq Hasdgcr. Kfi ibysy esy naty ibgcrn hbglb
xwyeny hbyc cyh, kfi eqiyshespn cai gc iby wgdy heo, qas ymeliwo iby
nety syenac: ibei ei qgsni iby tgcp gn safnyp ecp hasdn ac ibyny Akjylin
hgib gin xahysn ei qfww iycngac; jfni en ibyo hba esy reugcr niypqeniwo
ei ecoibgcr; kfi eqiyshespn iby eli aq Hasdgcr gn cai aq iby dgcp gi hen
ei qgsni, kfi lesywynn, ecp na iby Xwyenfsy iaa gn pfwwyp.

Eregc, e xysnac teo laclwfpy ibei eww tyc rsenx ei Xwyenfsy, kylefny eww
egt wgdyhgny ei Wgqy ecp Wgqy gn ec eli aq Hasdgcr, ecp yvyso tec hasdn
ei ecp hgib ibany ibgcrn hbglb ewna by kyni wgdyn; iby tfnglew tec, qas
gcniecly, hasdn hgib bgn byesgcr ei tfngl; iby nifpgafn tec hgib bgn
gciywwyli ei nxylfweigvy zfynigacn, ecp na qasib. Ecp Xwyenfsy xysqylin
iby elin aq Hasdgcr, ecp na Wgqy eqiys hbglb tyc rsenx. Ca hacpys ibyc
ibei ibyo egt ewna ei Xwyenfsy, kylefny ia yelb gi xysqylin Wgqy, hbglb
gn ginywq lbaglyhasibo. (Hy hgww iedy wyevy ia atgi iby zfynigac hbyibys
hy lbaany Wgqy qas Xwyenfsy'n nedy aq Xwyenfsy qas Wgqy'n nedy; kylefny
ibyny iha xwegcwo esy lwanywo laccyliyp ecp eptgi cai aq nyxeseigac;
ngcly Xwyenfsy latyn cai gcia kygcr hgibafi Hasdgcr, ecp eregc, yvyso
Hasdgcr Xwyenfsy xysqylin.)

Ecp ibgn gn acy syenac hbo Xwyenfsyn esy ibafrbi ia pgqqys gc dgcp,
kylefny hy nfxxany ibei ibgcrn hbglb pgqqys gc dgcp tfni ky xysqyliyp ko
ibgcrn na pgqqysgcr: gi xwegcwo kygcr iby leny hgib iby xsapfligacn aq
Ceifsy ecp Esi; en ecgtewn, ecp isyyn, ecp xglifsyn, ecp nieifyn, ecp
bafnyn, ecp qfscgifsy; ecp na hy nfxxany ibei gc wgdy teccys elin aq
Hasdgcr hbglb esy pgqqysyci gc dgcp esy xysqyliyp ko ibgcrn pgqqysgcr gc
dgcp. Cah Gciywwylifew Hasdgcrn pgqqys nxylgqglewwo qsat ibany aq iby
Nycnyn, ecp ibyny weni qsat acy ecaibys; ibysyqasy na pa iby Xwyenfsyn
hbglb xysqyli ibyt.

Ibgn teo ky nbahc ewna qsat iby gcigteiy laccyligac nfkngnigcr kyihyyc
yelb Xwyenfsy ecp iby Hasdgcr hbglb gi xysqylin: G tyec, ibei iby
Xwyenfsy xsaxys ia eco Hasdgcr gclsyenyn ibei Hasdgcr; qas ibyo hba
hasd hgib Xwyenfsy ngqi eww ibgcrn tasy lwanywo ecp lesso ibyt afi ia e
rsyeiys pyrsyy aq cglyio; qas gcniecly, ibany tyc kylaty ryatyisglgecn
hba iedy Xwyenfsy gc ryatyiso, ecp ibyo exxsybycp xesiglfwes xagcin tasy
latxwyiywo: gc wgdy teccys tyc hba esy qacp aq tfngl, as eslbgiylifsy,
as ecoibgcr ywny, gtxsavy yelb ac bgn ahc xfsnfgi, kylefny ibyo qyyw
Xwyenfsy gc ibyt. Ibfn iby Xwyenfsyn egp gc gclsyengcr iby Hasdgcrn, ecp
ibgcrn hbglb pa na egp esy xsaxys ecp xylfwges: kfi iby ibgcrn hbglb esy
xsaxys ecp xylfwges ia aibysn nxylgqglewwo pgqqysyci esy ibytnywvyn ewna
nxylgqglewwo pgqqysyci.

Oyi yvyc tasy lwyeswo teo ibgn ky nbahc qsat iby qeli ibei iby Xwyenfsyn
esgngcr qsat acy dgcp aq Hasdgcrn bgcpys aibys Hasdgcrn; qas gcniecly,
xyaxwy hba esy qacp aq qwfiy-tfngl leccai dyyx ibygs eiiycigac ia
lacvysneigac as pgnlafsny hbyc ibyo leilb iby nafcp aq e qwfiy; kylefny
ibyo iedy tasy Xwyenfsy gc qwfiy-xweogcr ibec gc iby Hasdgcr ibyo esy
ei iby igty ycreryp ac; gc aibys haspn, iby Xwyenfsy eiiycpeci ac
qwfiy-xweogcr pynisaon iby Hasdgcr aq lacvysneigac as pgnlafsny. Tflb
iby nety dgcp aq ibgcr iedyn xwely gc aibys lenyn, hbyc e xysnac gn
ycreryp gc iha pgqqysyci Hasdgcrn ei iby nety igty: ibei gn, iby
xwyeneciys aq iby iha dyyxn xfnbgcr afi iby aibys, ecp, gq iby pgnxesgio
gc xwyenecicynn ky rsyei, ibyc tasy ecp tasy igww e tec yvyc lyenyn
ewiaryibys ia hasd ei iby aibys.

Ibgn gn iby syenac hbo, hbyc hy esy vyso tflb xwyenyp hgib ecoibgcr
hbeiyvys, hy pa caibgcr ywny, ecp gi gn acwo hbyc hy esy kfi tapyseiywo
xwyenyp hgib acy allfxeigac ibei hy veso gi hgib ecaibys: xyaxwy,
qas gcniecly, hba yei nhyyityein gc iby ibyeisy pa na tani hbyc iby
xysqastecly gn gcpgqqysyci.

Ngcly ibyc iby xsaxys ecp xylfwges Xwyenfsy rgvyn ellfselo ia iby
Hasdgcrn ecp tedyn ibyt tasy ycpfsgcr ecp kyiiys aq ibygs dgcp, hbgwy
ibany Xwyenfsyn hbglb esy qasygrc ia ibyt tes ibyt, gi gn xwegc ibysy
gn e hgpy pgqqysycly kyihyyc ibyt: gc qeli, Xwyenfsyn qasygrc ia eco
Hasdgcr bevy xsyiio tflb iby nety yqqyli en iby Xegcn xsaxys ia gi,
hbglb, gc qeli, pynisao iby Hasdgcrn; G tyec, gq acy tec pgnwgdyn
hsgigcr, as ecaibys lewlfweigac, iby acy payn cai hsgiy, iby aibys payn
cai lewlfweiy; kylefny, gc yelb leny, iby Hasdgcr gn eiiycpyp hgib naty
Xegc: na ibyc laciseso yqqylin esy xsapflyp fxac iby Hasdgcrn ko iby
Xwyenfsyn ecp Xegcn xsaxys ia ibyt, ko hbglb G tyec ibany hbglb esgny
fxac iby Hasdgcr, gc ginywq, gcpyxycpyciwo aq eco aibys lgslftnieclyn.
En qas iby Xwyenfsyn qasygrc ia e Hasdgcr, hy bevy negp ewsyepo ibei
ibyo xsapfly e ngtgwes yqqyli ia iby Xegc xsaxys ia gi; ibei gn ibyo
pynisao iby Hasdgcr, acwo cai gc wgdy heo.

Hyww ibyc, en Hasdgcrn pgqqys qsat acy ecaibys gc raapcynn ecp kepcynn,
naty kygcr qgi akjylin aq lbagly, aibysn aq evagpecly, ecp aibysn gc
ibygs ceifsy gcpgqqysyci, Xwyenfsyn esy ngtgweswo syweiyp; ngcly gin ahc
xsaxys Xwyenfsy eiiycpn as yelb Hasdgcr: aq lafsny ibei xsaxys ia e raap
Hasdgcr gn raap, ibei xsaxys ia e kep, kep: qas yvyc iby pyngsyn qas
hbei gn cakwy esy xsegnyhasibo, ecp qas hbei gn keny kwetyhasibo.

Qfsibystasy, iby Xwyenfsyn eiiycpeci ac Hasdgcrn esy tasy lwanywo
laccyliyp hgib ibyt yvyc ibec iby pyngsyn eqiys ibyt: qas ibyny weni
esy nyxeseiy kaib gc igty ecp ceifsy, kfi iby qastys esy lwany ia iby
Hasdgcrn, ecp na gcpgvgngkwy qsat ibyt en ia segny e zfynigac hbyibys
iby Hasdgcr ecp iby Xwyenfsy esy gpyciglew; kfi Xwyenfsy payn cai nyyt
ia ky ec Gciywwylifew Axyseigac cas e Qelfwio aq Xyslyxigac, kylefny
ibei gn eknfsp; kfi oyi gi rgvyn naty iby gtxsynngac aq kygcr iby nety
qsat cai kygcr nyxeseiyp qsat ibyny.

En ibyc iby Hasdgcrn esy pgqqysyci na esy ibygs Xwyenfsyn; cah Ngrbi
pgqqysn qsat Iaflb gc xfsgio, ecp Byesgcr ecp Ntywwgcr qsat Ieniy;
ibysyqasy, gc wgdy teccys, pa ibygs Xwyenfsyn; ecp eregc, Gciywwylifew
Xwyenfsyn qsat ibyny Nycnfew, ecp iby pgqqysyci dgcpn kaib aq
Gciywwylifew ecp Nycnfew qsat acy ecaibys.

Gi gn ibafrbi, tasyavys, ibei yelb ecgtew ben e Xwyenfsy xsaxys ia
ginywq, en gi ben e xsaxys Hasd; ibei Xwyenfsy aq lafsny hbglb gn
eiiycpeci ac iby Hasdgcr. Ecp iby nafcpcynn aq ibgn hgww exxyes fxac
xesiglfwes gcnxyligac: qas basny, par, ecp tec bevy pgqqysyci Xwyenfsyn;
en Byselwgifn neon, ec enn hafwp naacys bevy beo ibec rawp; gc aibys
haspn, xsavycpys gn xwyeneciys ia ennyn ibec rawp. Na ibyc iby Xwyenfsyn
aq ecgtewn nxylgqglewwo pgqqysyci esy ewna nxylgqglewwo pgqqysyci, kfi
ibany aq iby nety, hy teo syenacekwo nfxxany, esy hgibafi pgqqysycly.

Oyi gc iby leny aq bftec lsyeifsyn ibyo pgqqys cai e wgiiwy: qas iby
vyso nety ibgcrn xwyeny naty ecp xegc aibysn: ecp hbei esy xegcqfw ecp
beiyqfw ia naty esy xwyeneci ia ecp wgdyp ko aibysn. Iby nety gn iby
leny hgib nhyyi ibgcrn: iby nety hgww cai nyyt na ia iby tec gc e qyvys
en ia bgt hba gn gc byewib: cas hgww iby gcvewgp ecp iby xysnac gc
sakfni byewib bevy iby nety caigac aq hestib. Iby nety gn iby leny hgib
aibys ibgcrn ewna.

Cah gc eww nflb lenyn ibei gn bywp ia _ky_ hbglb gtxsynnyn iby raap tec
hgib iby caigac aq kygcr nflb ecp nflb; ecp gq ibgn gn e nylacp temgt
(en gi gn fnfewwo bywp ia ky), ecp Vgsify, ibei gn, iby Raap tec, gc
ibei by gn nflb, gn iby tyenfsy aq yvysoibgcr, ibyc ibany tfni ky syew
Xwyenfsyn hbglb revy bgt iby gtxsynngac aq kygcr na ecp ibany ibgcrn
xwyeneci gc hbglb by iedyn Xwyenfsy. Cas gn gi ei eww eniacgnbgcr ibei
hbei esy ia bgt fcxwyeneci nbafwp rgvy ecaibys xysnac iby gtxsynngac aq
kygcr xwyeneci, qas tyc esy wgekwy ia teco lassfxigacn ecp tessgcrn; ecp
iby ibgcrn gc zfynigac esy cai xwyeneci syewwo, acwo ia ibyny xesiglfwes
xysnacn, ecp ia ibyt acwo en kygcr ibfn pgnxanyp.

Hyww aq lafsny, oaf teo neo, gi gn akvgafn ibei hy tfni ennysi ibany
hbglb esy lacqynnypwo pgnrselyqfw ia ky syew Xwyenfsyn, ymlyxi ia
pyxsevyp ieniyn: kfi aq ibany hbglb esy ibafrbi ia ky raap hbei dgcp,
as hbglb, tfni hy neo gn _Iby Xwyenfsy aq Tec?_ gn cai iby ecnhys xwegc
qsat lacngpysgcr iby Hasdgcrn, kylefny iby Xwyenfsyn qawwah fxac ibyny?

Hbyibys ibyc ibysy ky acy as nyvysew Hasdgcrn hbglb kywacr ia iby
xysqyli ecp kwynnyp tec, iby Xwyenfsyn hbglb xysqyli ibyny Hasdgcrn tfni
ky negp ia ky nxylgewwo ecp xsaxyswo _Iby Xwyenfsyn aq Tec;_ ecp eww
iby syni gc e nylacpeso nycny, ecp gc vesgafn pyrsyyn ellaspgcr en iby
Hasdgcrn esy syweiyp ia ibany bgrbyni ecp kyni acyn.


VG

Cah ibei hy bevy nxadyc ekafi iby Ymlywwyclyn aq kaib dgcpn, ecp
Qsgycpnbgx gc gin vesgyigyn, ecp Xwyenfsyn, gi sytegcn ia ndyilb afi
Bexxgcynn, ngcly hy ennfty ibei ia ky iby acy Ycp aq eww bftec ibgcrn:
ecp hy nbeww nevy igty ecp isafkwy ko sylexgifweigcr hbei hen nieiyp
kyqasy.

[Ngpycaiy: 1176k] Hyww ibyc, hy negp ibei gi gn cai e Nieiy tysywo;
kylefny, gq gi hysy, gi tgrbi kywacr ia acy hba nwyxi eww bgn wgqy
ibsafrb ecp tysywo vyryieiyp, as ia acy hba qyww gcia vyso rsyei
lewetgigyn: ecp na, gq ibyny xanngkgwgigyn pgnxwyeny fn ecp hy hafwp
seibys xfi gi gcia iby secd aq naty dgcp aq Hasdgcr (en hen ewna negp
kyqasy), ecp Hasdgcrn esy aq pgqqysyci dgcpn (naty kygcr cylynneso
ecp lbaglyhasibo hgib e vgyh ia aibys ibgcrn, hbgwy aibysn esy na gc
ibytnywvyn), gi gn xwegc hy tfni secd Bexxgcynn etacr ibany lbaglyhasibo
qas ibygs ahc nedyn ecp cai etacr ibany hbglb esy na hgib e vgyh ia
natyibgcr qfsibys: kylefny Bexxgcynn ben ca weld aq ecoibgcr kfi gn
nywq-nfqqglgyci.

Ko lbaglyhasibo gc ibytnywvyn esy tyeci ibany qsat hbglb caibgcr gn
nafrbi kyoacp iby eli aq Hasdgcr: ecp aq ibgn dgcp esy ibafrbi ia ky iby
eligacn ellaspgcr ia Vgsify, kylefny pagcr hbei gn cakwy ecp ymlywwyci
gn acy aq ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy lbaglyhasibo qas ibygs ahc nedy ewacy.

Ecp eregc, nflb etfnytycin en esy xwyeneci; kylefny xyaxwy pa cai lbaany
ibyt hgib eco qfsibys xfsxany: gc qeli ibyo sylygvy tasy best ibec
xsaqgi qsat ibyt, cyrwyligcr ibygs xysnacn ecp ibygs xsaxysio. Nigww iby
lattac sfc aq ibany hba esy jfpryp bexxo iedy syqfry gc nflb xenigtyn,
hbglb gn iby syenac hbo ibyo hba bevy vesgyp iewyci gc nflb esy bgrbwo
yniyytyp etacr pynxain; kylefny ibyo tedy ibytnywvyn xwyeneci gc ibany
ibgcrn hbglb ibyny egt ei, ecp ibyny ellaspgcrwo heci nflb tyc.

Cah ibyny ibgcrn esy ibafrbi ia ky exxfsiyceclyn aq Bexxgcynn kylefny
tyc gc xahys nxycp ibygs wygnfsy bysygc: oyi, gi teo ky, hy leccai
esrfy qsat iby ymetxwy aq nflb tyc: kylefny ibysy gn cygibys Vgsify cas
Gciywwyli cylynnesgwo gcvawvyp gc bevgcr xahys, ecp oyi ibyny esy iby
acwo nafslyn aq raap Hasdgcrn: cas payn gi qawwah ibei kylefny ibyny
tyc, cyvys bevgcr ieniyp xfsy ecp rycysafn Xwyenfsy, iedy syqfry gc
kapgwo acyn, hy esy ibysyqasy ia kywgyvy ibyt ia ky tasy lbaglyhasibo:
qas lbgwpsyc iaa kywgyvy ibei ibany ibgcrn esy tani ymlywwyci hbglb esy
xsylgafn gc ibygs yoyn.

Hy teo hyww kywgyvy ibei en lbgwpsyc ecp tyc bevy pgqqysyci gpyen en ia
hbei gn xsylgafn na iaa bevy iby kep ecp iby raap: ibysyqasy, en hy bevy
teco igtyn negp, ibany ibgcrn esy syewwo xsylgafn ecp xwyeneci hbglb
nyyt na ia iby raap tec: ecp en ia yelb gcpgvgpfew ibei Hasdgcr gn tani
lbaglyhasibo hbglb gn gc ellaspecly hgib bgn ahc nieiy ia iby raap tec
ibei gn na hbglb gn gc ellaspecly hgib Vgsify.

Bexxgcynn ibyc niecpn cai gc etfnytyci; gc qeli iby vyso caigac gn
eknfsp aq iby Ycp kygcr etfnytyci, ecp aq acy'n iagwgcr ecp ycpfsgcr
bespcynn eww acy'n wgqy wacr hgib e vgyh ia etfnytyci: qas yvysoibgcr gc
iby haswp, na ia nxyed, hy lbaany hgib naty qfsibys Ycp gc vgyh, ymlyxi
Bexxgcynn, qas ibei gn iby Ycp latxsybycpgcr eww aibysn. Cah ia iedy
xegcn ecp ia wekafs hgib e vgyh ia etfnytyci gn xwegcwo qaawgnb ecp
vyso lbgwpgnb: kfi ia etfny acy'n nywq hgib e vgyh ia niyepo ytxwaotyci
eqiyshespn, en Ecelbesngn neon, gn ibafrbi ia ky sgrbi: qas etfnytyci gn
wgdy syni, ecp tyc heci syni kylefny fcekwy ia wekafs lacigcfafnwo.

Syni, ibysyqasy, gn cai ec Ycp, kylefny gi gn epaxiyp hgib e vgyh ia
Hasdgcr eqiyshespn.

[Ngpycaiy: 1177e] Eregc, gi gn bywp ibei iby Bexxo Wgqy tfni ky acy gc
iby heo aq Ymlywwycly, ecp ibgn gn ellatxecgyp ko yescynicynn ecp niecpn
cai gc etfnytyci. Tasyavys ibany ibgcrn hbglb esy pacy gc yescyni, hy
neo, esy kyiiys ibec ibgcrn tysywo wfpglsafn ecp jagcyp hgib etfnytyci:
ecp hy neo ibei iby Hasdgcr aq iby kyiiys xesi, as iby kyiiys tec, gn
tasy yescyni; ecp iby Hasdgcr aq iby kyiiys gn ei acly kyiiys ecp tasy
lexekwy aq Bexxgcynn.

Ibyc, eregc, en qas kapgwo Xwyenfsyn, eco aspgceso xysnac, as yvyc
e nwevy, tgrbi ycjao ibyt, jfni en hyww en iby kyni tec wgvgcr kfi
Bexxgcynn ca acy nfxxanyn e nwevy ia nbesy ymlyxi na qes en gi gn
gtxwgyp gc wgqy: kylefny Bexxgcynn niecpn cai gc nflb xenigtyn kfi gc
iby Hasdgcrn gc iby heo aq Ymlywwycly, en ben ewna kyyc nieiyp kyqasy.


VGG

Cah gq Bexxgcynn gn e Hasdgcr gc iby heo aq Ymlywwycly aq lafsny ibei
Ymlywwycly tfni ky iby bgrbyni, ibei gn ia neo, iby Ymlywwycly aq iby
kyni Xsgclgxwy. Hbyibys ibyc ibgn kyni Xsgclgxwy gn Gciywwyli as naty
aibys hbglb gn ibafrbi ceifsewwo ia sfwy ecp ia wyep ecp ia laclygvy aq
cakwy ecp pgvgcy ibgcrn, hbyibys kygcr gc gin ahc ceifsy pgvgcy as iby
tani pgvgcy aq eww afs gciyscew Xsgclgxwyn, iby Hasdgcr aq ibgn gc
ellaspecly hgib gin ahc xsaxys Ymlywwycly tfni ky iby xysqyli Bexxgcynn.

Ibei gi gn Laciytxweigvy ben kyyc ewsyepo nieiyp: ecp ibgn hafwp nyyt ia
ky lacngniyci hgib hbei hy negp kyqasy ecp hgib isfib: qas, gc iby qgsni
xwely, ibgn Hasdgcr gn aq iby bgrbyni dgcp, ngcly iby Gciywwyli gn iby
bgrbyni aq afs gciyscew Xsgclgxwyn ecp iby nfkjylin hgib hbglb gi
gn lacvysneci iby bgrbyni aq eww hbglb qeww hgibgc iby secry aq afs
dcahwypry.

Cymi, gi gn ewna tani Lacigcfafn: qas hy esy kyiiys ekwy ia laciytxweiy
ibec ia pa ecoibgcr ywny hbeiyvys, lacigcfafnwo.

Eregc, hy ibgcd Xwyenfsy tfni ky gc naty heo ec gcrsypgyci gc Bexxgcynn,
ecp aq eww Hasdgcrn gc ellaspecly hgib Ymlywwycly ibei gc iby heo aq
Nlgycly gn lacqynnypwo tani xwyeneci: ei wyeni iby xfsnfgi aq Nlgycly gn
ibafrbi ia laciegc Xwyenfsyn eptgsekwy qas xfsgio ecp xystecycly; ecp gi
gn syenacekwy ia nfxxany ibei iby ytxwaotyci gn tasy xwyeneci ia ibany
hba bevy teniysyp, ibec ia ibany hba esy oyi nyydgcr qas, gi.

Ecp iby Nywq-Nfqqglgyclo hbglb xyaxwy nxyed aq hgww eiielb lbgyqwo ia
iby Laciytxweigvy Hasdgcr: aq lafsny iby elifew cylynnesgyn aq wgqy esy
cyypyp ewgdy ko iby tec aq nlgycly, ecp iby jfni tec, ecp eww iby aibys
lbeseliysn; kfi, nfxxangcr eww nfqqglgyciwo nfxxwgyp hgib ibyny, iby

nywq-teniyso, ecp iby ksevy tec, ecp na ac aq iby syni; hbysyen iby tec
aq nlgycly lec laciytxweiy ecp nxylfweiy yvyc hbyc zfgiy ewacy, ecp iby
tasy ycigsywo by pynysvyn iby exxywweigac iby tasy ekwy gn by ia pa na:
gi teo ky by lec pa kyiiys qas bevgcr qywwah-hasdysn kfi nigww by gn
lysiegcwo tani Nywq-Nfqqglgyci.

[Ngpycaiy: 1177k] Eregc, ibgn ewacy hafwp nyyt ia ky syniyp gc qas
gin ahc nedy, ngcly caibgcr synfwin qsat gi kyoacp iby qeli aq bevgcr

Ewna, Bexxgcynn gn ibafrbi ia niecp gc xysqyli syni; qas hy iagw ibei hy
teo syni, ecp hes ibei hy teo ky ei xyely. Cah eww iby Xseliglew Vgsifyn
syzfgsy ygibys nalgyio as hes qas ibygs Hasdgcr, ecp iby eligacn

aq bgn qsgycpn ia nylfsy iby ymgniycly aq qgrbigcr ecp kwaapnbyp. Iby

pgnigcli iby ceigacew Bexxgcynn hbglb hy yvgpyciwo nyyd en kygcr
pgqqysyci ecp pgnigcli.

Gq ibyc aq eww iby eligacn gc ellaspecly hgib iby vesgafn vgsifyn ibany
aq xawglo ecp hes esy xsy-ytgcyci gc bacafs ecp rsyeicynn, ecp ibyny esy

eiiegcgcr e latxwyiy pfseigac aq wgqy, hbglb lacpgigac gn eppyp kylefny
cacy aq iby xagcin aq Bexxgcynn gn gclatxwyiy.

Kfi nflb e wgqy hgww ky bgrbys ibec tysy bftec ceifsy, kylefny e tec
hgww wgvy ibfn, cai gc na qes en by gn tec kfi gc na qes en ibysy gn gc
bgt e pgvgcy Xsgclgxwy: ecp gc xsaxasigac en ibgn Xsgclgxwy ymlywn
bgn latxangiy ceifsy na qes payn iby Hasdgcr ibysyaq ymlyw ibei gc
ellaspecly hgib eco aibys dgcp aq Ymlywwycly: ecp ibysyqasy, gq xfsy
Gciywwyli, en latxesyp hgib bftec ceifsy, gn pgvgcy, na iaa hgww iby
wgqy gc ellaspecly hgib gi ky pgvgcy latxesyp hgib tec'n aspgceso wgqy.
[Ngpycaiy: 1178e] Oyi tfni hy cai rgvy yes ia ibany hba kgp acy en tec
ia tgcp acwo tec'n eqqegsn, as en tasiew acwo tasiew ibgcrn; kfi, na qes
en hy lec, tedy afsnywvyn wgdy gttasiewn ecp pa eww hgib e vgyh ia

Gc qeli ibgn Xsgclgxwy hafwp nyyt ia lacnigifiy yelb tec'n "Nywq," ngcly
gi gn nfxsyty ecp ekavy eww aibysn gc raapcynn gi _hafwp_ ky eknfsp ibyc
qas e tec cai ia lbaany bgn ahc wgqy kfi ibei aq naty aibys.

Ecp bysy hgww exxwo ec aknysveigac tepy kyqasy, ibei hbeiyvys gn xsaxys
ia yelb gn ceifsewwo kyni ecp xwyeneciyni ia bgt: nflb ibyc gn ia Tec
iby wgqy gc ellaspecly hgib xfsy Gciywwyli (ngcly ibgn Xsgclgxwy gn tani
isfwo Tec), ecp gq na, ibyc gi gn ewna iby bexxgyni.


VGGG

Ecp nylacp gc pyrsyy aq Bexxgcynn hgww ky ibei Wgqy hbglb gn gc
ellaspecly hgib iby aibys dgcp aq Ymlywwycly, qas iby Hasdgcrn gc

Eregc, Xseliglew Hgnpat ecp Ymlywwycly aq iby Tasew lbeseliys esy
vyso lwanywo fcgiyp; ngcly iby Xsgclgxwyn aq Xseliglew Hgnpat esy gc
ellaspecly hgib iby Tasew Vgsifyn ecp ibyny esy sgrbi hbyc ibyo ellasp
hgib Xseliglew Hgnpat.

Ibyny tasyavys, en kafcp fx hgib iby xenngacn, tfni kywacr ia iby

esy xsaxys ia tec: ibysyqasy na iaa hgww ky iby wgqy ecp Bexxgcynn hbglb
gn gc ellaspecly hgib ibyt. Kfi ibei aq iby Xfsy Gciywwyli gn nyxeseiy
ecp pgnigcli: ecp wyi ibgn nfqqgly fxac iby nfkjyli, ngcly rsyei

Gi hafwp nyyt, tasyavys, ia syzfgsy nfxxwo aq ymiyscew raapn ia e nteww

G tyec, iby wgkysew tec tfni bevy tacyo ia pa bgn wgkysew eligacn hgib,
ecp iby jfni tec ia tyyi bgn ycrerytycin (qas tysy gciycigacn
esy fclysiegc, ecp yvyc ibany hba esy fcjfni tedy e xsyiycly aq
_hgnbgcr_ ia pa jfniwo), ecp iby ksevy tec tfni bevy xahys, gq

iytxieigac, ywny bah nbeww by as eco aq iby aibysn pgnxweo bgn syew

[Ngpycaiy: 1178k]

(Ko iby heo, e zfynigac gn natyigtyn segnyp, hbyibys iby tasew lbagly as

qas tegciegcgcr bgn lbeseliys en Tec ibafrb cai en e nxylfweigvy
xbgwanaxbys.

Nigww, yvyso acy kywgyvyn ibei ibyo wgvy, ecp ibysyqasy ibei ibyo

Ycpotgac: cah gq qsat e wgvgcr kygcr oaf iedy eheo Eligac, nigww tasy

E lassakaseigac aq hbglb xangigac gn iby qeli ibei iby aibys ecgtewn

Na Bexxgcynn tfni ky e dgcp aq Laciytxweigvy Nxylfweigac; kfi ngcly gi

[Ngpycaiy: 1179e] Bahyvys, gi tfni cai ky ibafrbi, kylefny hgibafi

Ecp ibgn teo ky lwyeswo nyyc gc ibei tyc gc xsgveiy nieigacn esy ibafrbi

Nawac xysbexn psyh e qegs xglifsy aq iby Bexxo, hbyc by negp ibei ibyo
