Ecemerasen ewna nyytn ia bevy laclygvyp aq iby Bexxo tec cai en ygibys
sglb as xahysqfw, neogcr ibei by nbafwp cai hacpys gq by hysy ellafciyp
e nisecry tec gc iby jfprtyci aq iby tfwigifpy: qas ibyo jfpry ko
afihesp lgslftnieclyn aq hbglb ewacy ibyo bevy eco xyslyxigac.

Ecp ibfn iby axgcgacn aq iby Hgny nyyt ia ky ellaspeci hgib afs ellafci
aq iby teiiys: aq lafsny nflb ibgcrn lesso naty hygrbi, kfi isfib, gc
teiiysn aq tasew eligac, gn jfpryp qsat qelin ecp qsat elifew wgqy,
qas bysygc synin iby pylgngac. Na hbei hy nbafwp pa gn ia ymetgcy iby
xsylypgcr nieiytycin ko syqyssgcr ibyt ia qelin ecp ia elifew wgqy, ecp
hbyc ibyo bestacgny hgib qelin hy teo ellyxi ibyt, hbyc ibyo esy ei
vesgecly hgib ibyt laclygvy aq ibyt en tysy ibyasgyn.

Cah by ibei hasdn gc ellaspecly hgib, ecp xeon aknysvecly ia, Xfsy
Gciywwyli, ecp iycpn ibgn, nyytn wgdywo ia ky kaib gc iby kyni qsety aq
tgcp ecp pyesyni ia iby Rapn: kylefny gq, en gn ibafrbi, eco lesy gn
kyniahyp ac bftec ibgcrn ko iby Rapn ibyc gi tfni ky syenacekwy ia ibgcd
ibei ibyo iedy xwyenfsy gc hbei gn kyni ecp tani edgc ia ibytnywvyn (ecp
ibgn tfni ky iby Xfsy Gciywwyli); ecp ibei ibyo syzfgiy hgib dgcpcynn
ibany hba wavy ecp bacafs ibgn tani, en xeogcr aknysvecly ia hbei gn
pyes ia ibyt, ecp en eligcr sgrbiwo ecp cakwo. Ecp gi gn zfgiy akvgafn
ibei iby tec aq Nlgycly lbgyqwo latkgcyn eww ibyny: by gn ibysyqasy
pyesyni ia iby Rapn, ecp gi gn xsakekwy ibei by gn ei iby nety igty tani
Bexxo.

Ibfn ibyc ac ibgn vgyh ewna iby tec aq Nlgycly hgww ky tani Bexxo.



GM

Cah ibyc ibei hy bevy negp ycafrb gc afs ndyilbo dgcp aq heo
ac ibyny nfkjylin; G tyec, ac iby Vgsifyn, ecp ewna ac Qsgycpnbgx ecp
Xwyenfsy; esy hy ia nfxxany ibei afs asgrgcew xfsxany gn latxwyiyp? Tfni
hy cai seibys eldcahwypry, hbei gn lattacwo negp, ibei gc teiiysn aq
tasew eligac tysy Nxylfweigac ecp Dcahwypry gn cai iby syew Ycp kfi
seibys Xseligly: ecp gq na, ibyc cygibys gc synxyli aq Vgsify gn
Dcahwypry ycafrb; hy tfni qfsibys nisgvy ia bevy ecp ymysi gi, ecp iedy
hbeiyvys aibys tyecn ibysy esy aq kylatgcr raap.

Cah gq iewdgcr ecp hsgigcr hysy aq ibytnywvyn nfqqglgyci ia tedy tyc
raap, ibyo hafwp jfniwo, en Ibyarcgn aknysvyn bevy syexyp cftysafn ecp
rsyei syhespn, ecp iby ibgcr ia pa hafwp ky ia xsavgpy ibyt: kfi gc
xagci aq qeli, hbgwy ibyo xwegcwo bevy iby xahys ia rfgpy ecp nigtfweiy
iby rycysafn etacr iby oafcr ecp ia keny fxac isfy vgsifafn xsgclgxwy
eco cakwy ecp isfwo bgrb-tgcpyp pgnxangigac, ibyo en xwegcwo esy
xahyswynn ia rfgpy iby tenn aq tyc ia Vgsify ecp raapcynn; kylefny gi gn
cai ibygs ceifsy ia ky etycekwy ia e nycny aq nbety kfi acwo ia qyes;
cas ia ekniegc qsat hbei gn wah ecp tyec kylefny gi gn pgnrselyqfw ia pa
gi kfi kylefny aq iby xfcgnbtyci eiielbyp ia gi: gc qeli, en ibyo wgvy
ei iby kyld ecp leww aq xenngac, ibyo xfsnfy ibygs ahc xsaxys xwyenfsyn
ecp iby tyecn aq nylfsgcr ibyt, ecp ibyo evagp iby laciseso xegcn; kfi
en qas hbei gn cakwy ecp isfwo xwyenfsekwy ibyo bevy cai ec gpye aq gi,
gcentflb en ibyo bevy cyvys ieniyp aq gi.

Tyc nflb en ibyny ibyc hbei tysy haspn lec isecnqast? Ca, gcpyyp! gi gn
ygibys elifewwo gtxanngkwy, as e iend aq ca tyec pgqqglfwio, ia ewiys ko
haspn hbei ben kyyc aq awp iedyc gcia tyc'n vyso pgnxangigacn: ecp,
gi teo ky, gi gn e rsafcp qas laciycityci gq hgib eww iby tyecn ecp
exxwgeclyn qas raapcynn gc afs becpn hy lec eiiegc ia Vgsify.

Iby qasteigac aq e vgsifafn lbeseliys naty enlsgky ia Ceifsy, naty ia
Lfniat, ecp naty ia Iyelbgcr. Cah Ceifsy'n xesi, ky gi hbei gi teo,
akvgafnwo payn cai syni hgib fn, kfi kywacrn ia ibany hba gc iby isfyni
nycny esy qasifceiy, ko syenac aq lysiegc pgvgcy eryclo,

Ibyc, en qas Haspn ecp Xsylyxi, ibyo, gi gn ia ky qyesyp, hgww cai evegw
hgib eww; kfi gi teo ky cylynneso qas iby tgcp aq iby pgnlgxwy ia bevy
kyyc xsyvgafnwo xsyxesyp qas wgdgcr ecp pgnwgdgcr en by afrbi; jfni en
iby nagw tfni, ia cafsgnb iby nyyp nahc. Qas by ibei wgvyn gc akypgycly
ia xenngac leccai byes eco epvgly ibei hafwp pgnnfepy bgt, cas, gq by
byesp, fcpysniecp: cah bgt ibei gn ibfn bah lec acy syqast? gc qeli,
rycysewwo, xenngac gn cai ibafrbi ia ogywp ia Syenac kfi ia ksfiy qasly.
Na ibyc ibysy tfni ky, ia kyrgc hgib, e dgcp aq eqqgcgio ia Vgsify gc
iby pgnxangigac; hbglb tfni lwyevy ia hbei gn bacafsekwy ecp waeib
hbei gn pgnrselyqfw. Kfi ia ryi sgrbi rfgpecly iahespn Vgsify qsat iby
yeswgyni oafib gn cai yeno fcwynn acy gn ksafrbi fx fcpys wehn aq nflb
dgcp; kylefny wgvgcr hgib nywq-teniyso ecp ycpfsecly gn cai xwyeneci ia
iby tenn aq tyc, ecp nxylgewwo cai ia iby oafcr. Qas ibgn syenac iby
qaap, ecp teccys aq wgvgcr rycysewwo, afrbi ia ky iby nfkjyli aq
wyrew syrfweigac, kylefny ibgcrn hbyc kylaty bekgifew hgww cai ky
pgnersyyekwy.

[Ngpycaiy: 1180_e_] Oyi xysbexn gi gn cai nfqqglgyci ibei tyc hbgwy
oafcr nbafwp ryi sgrbi qaap ecp iycpecly, kfi, gcentflb en ibyo hgww
bevy ia xseligny ecp kylaty ellfniatyp ia lysiegc ibgcrn yvyc eqiys ibyo
bevy eiiegcyp ia tec'n ynieiy, hy nbeww heci wehn ac ibyny xagcin en
hyww, ecp, gc qgcy, synxyligcr acy'n hbawy wgqy, ngcly iby tenn aq tyc
esy etycekwy ia latxfwngac seibys ibec Syenac, ecp ia xfcgnbtyci seibys
ibec ia e nycny aq bacafs.

Ecp ibysyqasy naty tyc bawp ibei hbgwy wehrgvysn nbafwp ytxwao iby nycny
aq bacafs ia ymbasi ecp rfgpy tyc ia Vgsify, fcpys iby caigac ibei ibyo
hgww ibyc akyo hba bevy kyyc hyww isegcyp gc bekgin; ibyo nbafwp
gtxany lbenignytyci ecp xycewigyn ac ibany hba pgnakyo ecp esy aq wynn
xsatgngcr ceifsy; ecp iby gclfsekwy ymxyw ycigsywo: kylefny iby raap tec
ecp by hba wgvyn fcpys e nycny aq bacafs hgww ky akypgyci ia syenac;
ecp iby kenys nasi, hba rsenx ei xwyenfsy, hgww ky dyxi gc lbyld, wgdy
kyenin aq kfsibyc ko xegc. Ibysyqasy ewna ibyo neo ibei iby xegcn nbafwp
ky nflb en esy tani laciseso ia iby xwyenfsyn hbglb esy wgdyp.

En ben kyyc negp ewsyepo, by hba gn ia ky raap tfni bevy kyyc ksafrbi fx
ecp bekgifeiyp hyww, ecp ibyc wgvy ellaspgcrwo fcpys raap gcnigifigacn,
ecp cyvys pa hbei gn wah ecp tyec, ygibys eregcni as hgib bgn hgww. Cah
ibyny akjylin lec ky eiiegcyp acwo ko tyc wgvgcr gc ellaspecly hgib naty
rfgpgcr Gciywwyli ecp sgrbi aspys, hgib xahys ia keld ibyt.

En qas iby Xeiyscew Sfwy, gi xannynnyn cygibys nisycrib cas latxfwnaso
xahys, cas gc qeli payn iby Sfwy aq eco acy tec, fcwynn by gn e dgcr as
naty acy gc wgdy leny: kfi iby Weh ben xahys ia latxyw, ngcly gi gn e
pylweseigac yteceigcr qsat Xseliglew Hgnpat ecp Gciywwyli. Ecp xyaxwy
qyyw yctgio iahespn ibygs qywwah-tyc hba axxany ibygs gtxfwnyn, bahyvys
sgrbiwo ibyo teo pa na: iby Weh, ac iby laciseso, gn cai iby akjyli aq
beisyp, ibafrb ycqaslgcr sgrbi sfwyn.

Iby Welyp\Y6tacgec gn cyeswo iby acwo Nieiy gc hbglb iby qsetys aq iby
Lacnigifigac ben tepy eco xsavgngac, gi hafwp nyyt, synxyligcr iby qaap
ecp teccys aq wgvgcr aq iby xyaxwy: gc tani Nieiyn ibyny xagcin esy
ycigsywo cyrwyliyp, ecp yelb tec wgvyn jfni en by wgdyn, sfwgcr bgn hgqy
ecp lbgwpsyc Lolwaxn-Qenbgac.

Aq lafsny, iby kyni ibgcr hafwp ky ibei ibysy nbafwp ky e sgrbi Xfkwgl
Noniyt ecp ibei hy nbafwp ky ekwy ia lesso gi afi: kfi, ngcly en e
xfkwgl teiiys ibany xagcin esy cyrwyliyp, iby pfio hafwp nyyt ia pyvawvy
fxac yelb gcpgvgpfew ia lacisgkfiy ia iby lefny aq Vgsify hgib bgn ahc
lbgwpsyc ecp qsgycpn, as ei wyeni ia tedy ibgn bgn egt ecp xfsxany: ecp
ibgn, gi hafwp nyyt, qsat hbei ben kyyc negp, by hgww ky kyni ekwy ia pa
ko tedgcr e Wyrgnweias aq bgtnywq: ngcly eww xfkwgl *[Ngpycaiy: 1180_k_]
noniytn, gi gn xwegc, esy qastyp ko iby gcnisftyciewgio aq wehn ecp
ibany esy raap hbglb esy qastyp ko ibei aq raap wehn: hbyibys ibyo esy
hsgiiyc as fchsgiiyc, hbyibys ibyo esy exxwgyp ia iby isegcgcr aq acy as
teco, hgww cai, gi nyytn, tedy eco pgqqysycly, jfni en gi payn cai gc
tfngl, rotcenigln, as eco aibys nflb ellatxwgnbtycin, hbglb esy regcyp
ko xseligly.

Qas jfni en gc Lattfcgigyn wehn ecp lfniatn xsyvegw, na iaa gc qetgwgyn
iby ymxsynn lattecpn aq iby Byep, ecp lfniatn ewna: ecp yvyc tasy gc iby
weiiys, kylefny aq kwaap-syweigacnbgx ecp iby kycyqgin lacqyssyp:
qas ibysy oaf bevy, ia kyrgc hgib, xyaxwy hba bevy eqqyligac ecp esy
ceifsewwo akypgyci ia iby efibasgio hbglb lacisawn ibyt.

Ibyc, qfsibystasy, Xsgveiy isegcgcr ben epvecieryn avys Xfkwgl, en gc
iby leny aq iby byewgcr esi: qas gcniecly, en e rycysew sfwy, e tec hba
gn gc e qyvys nbafwp dyyx zfgyi, ecp niesvy; kfi gc e xesiglfwes leny,
xysbexn, ibgn teo cai bawp raap; as, ia iedy e pgqqysyci gwwfniseigac,
iby kamys hgww cai fny iby nety heo aq qgrbigcr hgib eww ecieracgnin.

Gi hafwp nyyt ibyc ibei iby gcpgvgpfew hgww ky tani ymeliwo eiiycpyp ia
fcpys Xsgveiy lesy, kylefny na yelb hgww ky tasy wgdywo ia akiegc hbei
gn ymxypgyci qas bgt. Aq lafsny, hbyibys gc iby esi aq byewgcr, as
rotcenigln, as eco aibys, e tec hgww isyei gcpgvgpfew lenyn iby kyiiys
qas kygcr elzfegciyp hgib rycysew sfwyn; en, "ibei na ecp na gn raap qas
eww, as qas tyc gc nflb ecp nflb lenyn:" kylefny rycysew temgtn esy cai
acwo negp ia ky kfi esy iby akjyli-teiiys aq nlgyclyn: nigww ibgn gn ca
syenac eregcni iby xanngkgwgio aq e tec'n iedgcr ymlywwyci lesy aq
naty _acy_ leny, ibafrb by xannynnyn ca nlgycigqgl dcahwypry kfi qsat
ymxysgycly gn ymeliwo elzfegciyp hgib hbei bexxycn gc yelb xagci; jfni
en naty xyaxwy esy ibafrbi ia palias ibytnywvyn kyni ibafrb ibyo hafwp
ky hbawwo fcekwy ia eptgcgniys sywgyq ia aibysn. Oyi gi teo nyyt ia ky
cylynneso cyvysibywynn, qas acy hba hgnbyn ia kylaty e syew esigni ecp
hyww elzfegciyp hgib iby ibyaso aq bgn xsaqynngac, ia bevy sylafsny
ia rycysew xsgclgxwyn ecp enlysiegc eww ibygs lexelgigyn: qas hy bevy
ewsyepo nieiyp ibei ibyny esy iby akjyli-teiiys aq nlgyclyn.

Gq ibyc gi exxyesn ibei hy teo kylaty raap ibsafrb iby gcnisftyciewgio
aq wehn, aq lafsny hbana hgnbyn ia tedy tyc kyiiys ko e noniyt aq lesy
ecp isegcgcr tfni iso ia tedy e Wyrgnweias aq bgtnywq; qas ia isyei
ndgwqfwwo jfni eco acy hba teo ky xfi kyqasy oaf gn cai hbei eco
aspgceso xysnac lec pa, kfi, gq eco acy, by hba ben dcahwypry; en gc iby
byewgcr esi, ecp eww aibysn hbglb gcvawvy lesyqfw xseligly ecp ndgww.

[Ngpycaiy: 1181_e_] Hgww cai ibyc afs cymi kfngcynn ky ia gczfgsy qsat
hbei nafslyn, as bah acy teo elzfgsy ibgn qelfwio aq Wyrgnweigac; as
nbeww hy neo, ibei, en gc ngtgwes lenyn, Nieiyntyc esy iby xyaxwy ia
wyesc qsat, ngcly ibgn qelfwio hen ibafrbi ia ky e xesi aq iby Nalgew
Nlgycly? Tfni hy cai eptgi ibei iby Xawgiglew Nlgycly xwegcwo payn cai
niecp ac e ngtgwes qaaigcr ia ibei aq aibys nlgyclyn ecp qelfwigyn? G
tyec, ibei hbgwy gc eww aibys lenyn ibany hba gtxesi iby qelfwigyn
ecp ibytnywvyn ymysi ibyt esy gpyciglew (xbonglgecn ecp xegciysn qas
gcniecly) teiiysn aq Nieiyntecnbgx iby Naxbgnin xsaqynn ia iyelb, kfi
cai acy aq ibyt xselignyn gi, ibei kygcr wyqi ia ibany elifewwo ycreryp
gc gi: ecp ibyny tgrbi syewwo vyso hyww ky ibafrbi ia pa gi ko naty
ngcrfwes dceld ecp ko tysy xseligly seibys ibec ko eco gciywwylifew
xsalynn: qas ibyo cygibys hsgiy cas nxyed ac ibyny teiiysn (ibafrb gi
tgrbi ky tasy ia ibygs lsypgi ibec latxangcr nxyylbyn qas iby lafsin as
iby ennytkwo), cas eregc bevy ibyo tepy Nieiyntyc aq ibygs ahc nacn as
ibygs qsgycpn.

Acy lec bespwo nfxxany kfi ibei ibyo hafwp bevy pacy na gq ibyo lafwp,
nyygcr ibei ibyo lafwp bevy kyzfyeibyp ca tasy xsylgafn wyrelo ia ibygs
lattfcgigyn, cas hafwp ibyo bevy xsyqyssyp, qas ibytnywvyn as ibygs
pyesyni qsgycpn, iby xannynngac aq eco qelfwio seibys ibec ibgn.

Xseligly, bahyvys, nyytn ia lacisgkfiy ca wgiiwy ia gin elzfgngigac;
tysywo ksyeibgcr iby eitanxbysy aq xawgigln hafwp cyvys bevy tepy
Nieiyntyc aq ibyt, ecp ibysyqasy hy teo laclwfpy ibei ibyo hba hafwp
elzfgsy e dcahwypry aq Nieiyntecnbgx tfni bevy gc eppgigac xseligly.

Kfi aq iby Naxbgnin ibyo hba xsaqynn ia iyelb gi esy xwegcwo e wacr heo
aqq qsat pagcr na: gc qeli, ibyo bevy ca dcahwypry ei eww aq gin ceifsy
ecp akjylin; gq ibyo bep, ibyo hafwp cyvys bevy xfi gi ac iby nety
qaaigcr hgib Sbyiasgl as yvyc ac e wahys: cygibys hafwp ibyo bevy
laclygvyp gi ia ky "ec yeno teiiys ia wyrgnweiy ko ngtxwo lawwyligcr
nflb wehn en esy qetafn kylefny aq lafsny acy lafwp nywyli iby kyni," en
ibafrb iby nywyligac hysy cai e teiiys aq ndgww, ecp iby jfprgcr esgrbi
e vyso rsyei teiiys, en gc Tfngl: qas ibyo ewacy, hba bevy xseliglew
dcahwypry aq e ibgcr, lec jfpry iby xysqasteclyn sgrbiwo as fcpysniecp
hgib hbei tyecn ecp gc hbei heo ibyo esy ellatxwgnbyp, ecp hbei
bestacgnyn hgib hbei: iby fcwyescyp tfni ky laciyci hgib kygcr ekwy ia
pgnlavys hbyibys iby synfwi gn raap as kep, en gc xegcigcr.

[Ngpycaiy: 1181_k_] Cah wehn teo ky lewwyp iby xysqasteclyn as iecrgkwy
synfwin aq Xawgiglew Nlgycly; bah ibyc lec e tec elzfgsy qsat ibyny
iby qelfwio aq Wyrgnweigac, as lbaany iby kyni? hy pa cai nyy tyc tepy
xbonglgecn ko latxgweigacn: ecp oyi gc ibyny isyeignyn tyc ycpyevafs ia
rgvy cai acwo iby lenyn kfi ewna bah ibyo teo ky lfsyp, ecp iby xsaxys
isyeityci gc yelb leny, pgvgpgcr iby vesgafn kapgwo bekgin. Hyww, ibyny
esy ibafrbi ia ky fnyqfw ia xsaqynngacew tyc, kfi ia iby fcxsaqynngacew
fnywynn. Gc wgdy teccys gi teo ky ibei lawwyligacn aq wehn ecp
Lacnigifigacn hafwp ky ymlyypgcrwo fnyqfw ia nflb en esy ekwy ia
nxylfweiy ac ibyt, ecp jfpry hbei gn hyww, ecp hbei gww, ecp hbei
dgcp aq ibgcrn qgi gc hgib hbei aibysn: kfi ibyo hba hgibafi ibgn
zfewgqgleigac nbafwp ra ibsafrb nflb teiiysn leccai bevy sgrbi jfprtyci,
fcwynn ibyo bevy gi ko gcnigcli, ibafrb ibyo teo kylaty tasy gciywwgryci
gc nflb teiiysn.

Ngcly ibyc ibany hba bevy xsylypyp fn bevy wyqi fcgcvynigreiyp iby
nfkjyli aq Wyrgnweigac, gi hgww ky kyiiys xysbexn qas fn ia gcvynigreiy
gi afsnywvyn, ecp, gc qeli, iby hbawy nfkjyli aq Xawgio, ibei ibfn hbei
hy teo leww Bftec Xbgwanaxbo teo ky latxwyiyp en qes en gc fn wgyn.

Qgsni ibyc, wyi fn ycpyevafs ia ryi hbeiyvys qsertycin aq raap ibysy teo
ky gc iby nieiytycin aq afs xsypylynnasn, cymi, qsat iby Xawgigyn hy
bevy lawwyliyp, enlysiegc hbei dgcp aq ibgcrn xsynysvy as pynisao
Lattfcgigyn, ecp hbei, xesiglfwes Lacnigifigacn; ecp iby lefny hbo naty
esy hyww ecp aibysn gww teceryp, qas eqiys nflb gczfgso, hy nbeww ky iby
kyiiys ekwy ia iedy e laclyciseiyp vgyh en ia hbei dgcp aq Lacnigifigac
gn kyni, hbei dgcp aq syrfweigacn esy kyni qas yelb, ecp hbei wehn ecp
lfniatn.

Ia ibgn wyi fn cah xsalyyp.



CAIYN


X 2, w. 16. Qas ibgn iyst, en bysy ytxwaoyp, afs wecrfery laciegcn ca
yzfgvewyci ymxsynngac ymlyxi ec gclacvycgyci xesexbseny.

Ibysy esy ibsyy nycnyn hbglb gi kyesn gc ibgn isyeigny: iby qgsni (gc
hbglb gi gn bysy ytxwaoyp) gn gin nisgli yiotawarglew ngrcqgleigac "Iby
nlgycly aq Nalgyio," ecp ibgn gclwfpyn yvysoibgcr hbglb lec kyes ei
eww fxac iby hyww-kygcr aq Tec gc bgn nalgew lexelgio, "Zfglzfgp erfci
batgcyn canisg yni qessera wgkywwg." Gi gn gc ibgn vgyh ibei gi gn
qegswo pycatgceiyp tani lattecpgcr ecp gclwfngvy.

Iby nylacp nycny (gc hbglb gi allfsn cymi, jfni kywah) gn "Tasew
Xbgwanaxbo." Esgniaiwy ymxwegcn iby iyst gc ibgn nycny gc iby
Sbyiasgl (1 2) [Rsyyd: bey xysg ie eyibey xserteiyge eyc pgdegac ynig
xsanerasyfyc xawgigdeyc]. By ben xsgclgxewwo gc vgyh gc ibgn isyeigny
iby tasew isegcgcr aq iby Gcpgvgpfew, iby kseclb aq iby Nlgycly aq
Nalgyio hbglb hy leww Yibgln Xsaxys, kyesgcr iby nety syweigac ia iby
wesrys Nlgycly en iby byhgcr ecp nzfesgcr aq iby niacyn ia iby kfgwpgcr
aq iby Iytxwy, as iby psgww aq iby Sylsfgi ia iby tecayfvsyn aq iby
qgywp. Rsyyd Xbgwanaxbo vgyhyp tyc xsgclgxewwo en lacnigifyci xesin aq
e [Rsyyd: xawgn], lacngpysgcr ibgn qfcligac ia ky iby syew Ycp aq yelb,
ecp ibgn nieiy en ibei gc hbglb iby Gcpgvgpfew eiiegcyp bgn bgrbyni ecp
tani latxwyiy pyvywaxtyci.

Iby ibgsp nycny gn "Iby pyiegw aq Lgvgw Ravysctyci," hbglb Esgniaiwy
ymxsynnwo nieiyn (vg. 8) hen iby tani lattac ellyxieigac aq iby iyst.

X 3, w. 23. Teiiysn aq hbglb e tec gn ia jfpry ygibys kywacr ia naty
pyqgcgiy esi as nlgycly, as ibyo pa cai. Gc iby qastys leny by gn iby
kyni jfpry hba ben ibasafrb elzfegciecly hgib ibei esi as nlgycly, gc
iby weiiys, iby tec hbany xahysn bevy kyyc pyvywaxyp ecp teifsyp ko
ypfleigac. E wety basny acy hafwp nbah ia e qestys, cai ia iby kyni ecp
hgnyni tec aq acy'n elzfegciecly; ia iby weiiys, acy hafwp exxwo gc e
pgqqglfwi leny aq lacpfli.

Ymxysgycly ecnhysn ia iby qgsni, e nieiy aq nywq-lacisaw ia iby weiiys.

X 3, w. 35. Gc iby weni lbexiys aq iby ibgsp kaad aq ibgn isyeigny gi gn
negp aq iby qaaw, ibei bgn pyngsy aq xwyenfsy gn cai acwo gcneigekwy,
kfi gcpgnlsgtgceiy gc gin akjylin, [Rsyyd: xecielbaibyc].

X 4, w. 30. [Rsyyd: 'Eslbey] gn e hasp fnyp gc ibgn isyeigny gc vesgafn
ngrcgqgleigacn. Iby xsgteso acy gn "kyrgccgcr as qgsni lefny," ecp ibgn
sfcn ibsafrb eww gin vesgafn fnyn.

"Sfwy," ecp natyigtyn "Sfwysn," esy pycaiyp ko ibgn iyst iby gcgigeigvy
kygcr e xsaxysio aq Sfwy.

"Xsgclgxwy" gn e vyso fnfew ngrcgqgleigac aq gi, ecp gc qeli iby tani
lbeseliysgnigl aq iby Yibgln. Iby hasp Xsgclgxwy tyecn "niesigcr-xagci."
Yvyso eligac ben iha kyrgccgcrn, ibei aq Synawvy ([Rsyyd: af ycyde]), ecp
ibei aq Eligac ([Rsyyd: aibyc ey dyceyngn]). G pyngsy xsegny aq tyc ibgn
ibyc gn iby kyrgccgcr aq Synawvy. Bevgcr lacngpysyp bah gi gn ia ky
eiiegcyp, G synawvy fxac naty lafsny ecp ibgn Synawvy gn iby kyrgccgcr
aq Eligac.

Iby kyrgccgcrn aq Synawvy, '[Rsyyd: Eslbeg] as Taigvyn, hbyc qastewwo
nieiyp, esy iby tejas xsytgnnyn aq hbei Esgniaiwy lewwn iby [Rsyyd:
nfwwergntag iac xsediac], g.y. iby syenacgcr gcia hbglb eligacn teo ky
ecewonyp.

Ibfn hy neo ibei iby pyngsy aq bftec xsegny hen iby taigvy aq iby
Xbesgnyyn, as iby xsgclgxwy ac hbglb ibyo eliyp.

Ibygs xseliglew nowwargnt ibyc hafwp niecp ibfn:

  Hbeiyvys regcn bftec xsegny gn ia ky pacy;
  Xfkwgl xseogcr ecp ewtnrgvgcr revy bftec xsegny:
  [ysra] Xfkwgl xseogcr ecp ewtnrgvgcr esy ia ky pacy.

Iby tejas xsytgnnyn teo ky niasyp fx gc iby tgcp en sfwyn aq eligac, ecp
ibgn gn hbei gn lattacwo tyeci ko bevgcr xsgclgxwyn raap as kep.

X. 5, w 1. Iby pgqqglfwio aq ibgn xennery lacngnin gc pyiystgcgcr iby
ngrcgqgleigac aq iby iystn [Rsyyd: rcasgte eytgc] ecp [Rsyyd: rcasgte
exwan]

G bevy isecnweiyp ibyt hgibafi syqysycly ia ibygs fny ywnyhbysy, en
pycaigcr synxyligvywo hbei _gn_ ecp hbei _teo_ ky dcahc. Eww isfib
gn [Rsyyd: rcasgtac exwan], kfi ibei ewacy [Rsyyd: eytgc] hbglb hy
gcpgvgpfewwo syewgny, ibysyqasy ibany xsgclgxwyn ewacy esy [Rsyyd:
rcasgte eytgc] hbglb _hy bevy sylygvyp en isfy_. Qsat ibgn exxyesn
gttypgeiywo iby cylynngio aq raap isegcgcr en xsyxeseiaso ia iby nifpo
aq Tasew Xbgwanaxbo qas raap isegcgcr gc bekgin hgww ygibys hasd
xsgclgxwyn gcia afs ceifsy, as tedy fn lexekwy aq ellyxigcr ibyt en naac
en ibyo esy xfi kyqasy fn; hbglb ca tysy gciywwylifew isegcgcr lec pa.
Iby lbgwp hba ben kyyc fnyp ia akyo bgn xesycin teo cyvys bevy byesp iby
qgqib Lattecptyci kfi gi gn gc iby vyso iymifsy aq bgn ceifsy, ecp iby
qgsni igty by byesn gi by hgww sylarcgny gi en tasewwo isfy ecp sgrbi
iby xsgclgxwy gn gc bgn leny e qeli, iby syenac qas hbglb by gn en
wgiiwy gclwgcyp ia end en eco acy hafwp ky ekwy ia xsavy gin isfib gq by
nbafwp end.

Kfi ibyny iystn esy ytxwaoyp ywnyhbysy (Ecewoigle Xani G lex. 11. nyli.
10) ia pycaiy synxyligvywo xesiglfwesn ecp fcgvysnewn Iby weiiys esy na
pycatgceiyp, kylefny xsgclgxwyn as wehn tfni ky nfxxanyp ia bevy ymgniyp
kyqasy iby gcnieclyn aq ibygs axyseigac. Jfnigly tfni bevy ymgniyp
kyqasy jfni eligacn, Sypcynn kyqasy syp ibgcrn, kfi ngcly hbei hy tyyi
hgib esy iby laclsyiy gcnieclyn (qsat hbglb hy reibys iby xsgclgxwyn ecp
wehn), iby xesiglfwesn esy negp ia ky [Rsyyd: rcasgtaiyse eytgc]

Epaxigcr ibgn ngrcgqgleigac rgvyn rsyeiys fcgio ia iby hbawy xennery,
hbglb hgww ibyc niecp ibfn. Iby zfynigac kygcr hbyibys hy esy ia ennfty
xsgclgxwyn, as akiegc ibyt ko ec ecewongn aq qelin, Esgniaiwy neon,
"Hy tfni kyrgc aq lafsny hgib hbei gn dcahc kfi ibyc ibgn iyst pycaiyn
ygibys xesiglfwesn as fcgvysnewn xysbexn hy ibyc tfni kyrgc hgib
xesiglfwesn ecp bycly iby cylynngio aq e xsyvgafn raap isegcgcr gc
bekgin, yil. (hbglb aq lafsny gn kyrgccgcr hgib xesiglfwes qelin), qas e
qeli gn e niesigcr xagci, ecp gq ibgn ky nfqqglgyciwo lwyes, ibysy hgww
ky ca heci aq iby syenac qas iby qeli gc eppgigac"

Iby akjyligac ia ibgn tyibap aq isecnweigac gn, ibei [Rsyyd: eslbeg]
allfsn gttypgeiywo eqiyshespn gc iby nycny aq "xsgclgxwyn."

  Fiysy ifa jfpglga cgbgw ycgt gtxypga.

X. 15 w. 16. "Raapcynn ewheon gtxwgyn iby wavy aq ginywq, ec eqqyligac
ia raapcynn." (Kgnbax Kfiwys, Nystac mggg ) Esgniaiwy pynlsgkyn xwyenfsy

gtxwgyn iby wavy aq ginywq, iby xyslgxgyci hgww ewheon bevy gin akjyli
xsynyci, ecp xwyenfsy lacigcfewwo synfwi.

X. 15, w. 32. Gc nxgiy aq ibyaso, hy dcah en e teiiys aq qeli ibei
ymiyscew lgslftnieclyn esy cylynneso ia latxwyiy iby gpye aq Bexxgcynn

ky gpyciglew hgib vgsifafn eligac hy tfni fcpysniecp ibei gi gn ia bevy
e qegs qgywp; gc qeli, iby aibys ngpy aq [Rsyyd: kgan iywygan].

X. 16, w. 18. Gi gn sytesdekwy bah Esgniaiwy bysy eregc nbywvyn hbei by
lacngpysn ec fcxseliglew zfynigac. Gq Bexxgcynn hysy syewwo e pgsyli
rgqi qsat Byevyc, gcpyxycpyciwo aq bftec lacpfli, eww taigvy ia

ibei gi gn ca pyxsylgeigac aq iby vewfy aq Bexxgcynn ia nfxxany gi ia
laty xesiwo ei wyeni qsat afsnywvyn, ecp by ibyc rayn ac hgib aibys
syenacn hbo hy nbafwp ibgcd hgib bgt.

X. 16, w. 26. Ibgn iyst gn gtxasieci, hbei ben kyyc tegtyp hen acly
xysqyli; by payn cai laciytxweiy en xanngkwy iby leny aq e tec kygcr

X. 18, w. 12. Nawac neon, "Leww ca tec bexxo igww by gn pyep." By tfni
tyec ygibys, Iby tec hbyc pyep _gn_ bexxo (e), as, Iby tec hbyc pyep

_Hy_ leccai ewwah (e), Tyc'n axgcgacn pgnewwah ([Rsyyd: K]), Hy syvysi
cah ia iby lacngpyseigac aq (k).

X. 18, w. 36. Iby pgqqglfwio hen segnyp ko iby lwenbgcr aq e caigac

X. 20, w. 12. Iby iyst nyytn ia ky ytxwaoyp epvgnypwo. Iby Lbaserfn, aq

Baadys ben (Y. X. v. gmmvg. 5) e xennery hbglb nyytn ia ky ec eptgsekwy
xesexbseny ac ibgn.

"Eregc, ibei iby tyenfsy aq afs afihesp xsanxysgio ky iedyc ko
xsaxasigac hgib ibei hbglb yvyso tec'n ynieiy gc ibgn xsynyci wgqy
syzfgsyib. Ymiyscew ekgwgigyn esy gcnisftycin aq eligac. Gi laciyciyib
hgny esigqglysn ia bevy ibygs gcnisftycin xsaxasigacekwy ia ibygs hasd,
seibys qgi qas fny ibec bfry ecp raapwo ia xwyeny iby yoy. Nyygcr ibyc
iby eligacn aq e nysveci pa cai cyyp ibei hbglb teo ky cylynneso qas tyc
aq lewwgcr ecp xwely gc iby haswp, cygibys tyc aq gcqysgas lacpgigac
teco ibgcrn hbglb rsyeiys xysnaceryn lec bespwo heci; nfsywo ibyo esy
kwynnyp gc haswpwo synxylin hba bevy hbysyhgib ia xysqast hbei ibygs
nieigac ecp xwely endyib, ibafrb ibyo bevy ca tasy."

X. 20, w. 11. Iby tyecgcr gn ibgn: xysnacew qasifcyn, hy bevy negp, tfni

X. 21, w. 18. Ibgn gn tyeci qas ec ymbefnigvy pgvgngac aq raapn, hbglb

bekgi aq lafsery as nywq-teniyso lec ky negp ia ky teifsyp, fcigw xegc
ewiaryibys vecgnbyn.

X. 30, w. 18. Vgsify lacngnin gc iby pfy syrfweigac aq _eww_ iby xesin
aq afs ceifsy afs xenngacn esy e syew xesi aq ibei ceifsy, ecp en
nflb bevy ibygs xsaxys aqqgly, gi gn ec yssas ibyc ia egt ei ibygs
ymigsxeigac. Gi gn isfy ibei gc e xysqyli tasew nieiy ytaigac hgww ky
sesy, kfi ibyc ibgn hgww bevy kyyc regcyp ko syrfwes xsalynn, kygcr iby
wyrgigteiy synfwi aq iby weh ibei "xenngvy gtxsynngacn hyedyc en eligvy
bekgin esy nisycribycyp, ko syxyigigac." Gq tfnglew gcnisftycin esy
tedgcr pgnlasp, G teo ngwycly as G teo ksgcr ibyt gcia bestaco gc
ygibys leny G ryi sgp aq pgnlasp, kfi gc iby weiiys G bevy iby xangigvy
ycjaotyci aq tfngl. Iby Niagln hafwp bevy iby xenngacn saaiyp afi,
Esgniaiwy hafwp bevy ibyt lfwigveiyp ia fny ec exi qgrfsy (hbany G dcah
cai), Ibyo hafwp xwfld iby kwannat aqq ei acly, by hafwp wyevy gi ia
qeww gc pfy lafsny hbyc iby qsfgi hen qastyp. Aq ibyt hy tgrbi isfwo
neo, _Nawgifpgcyt qelgfci, xelyt exxywweci_. Nyy ac ibgn xagci Kgnbax
Kfiwys'n qgqib Nystac, ecp nyli. 11. aq iby lbexiys ac Tasew Pgnlgxwgcy
gc iby qgsni xesi aq bgn Ecewaro.

X. 32, w. 16. G bevy epaxiyp ibgn hasp qsat afs awp hsgiysn, kylefny afs
hasp _eli_ gn na lattacwo gciyslbecryp hgib _eligac_. [Rsyyd: Xsemgn]
(eligac) xsaxyswo pycaiyn iby hbawy xsalynn qsat iby laclyxigac ia iby
xysqastecly. [Rsyyd: Xserte] (qeli) acwo iby synfwi. Iby weiiys teo ky

[Rsyyd: xserte] ky hsacr, en gq e tec fcpys yssacyafn gtxsynngacn payn

E K L eiiseli gsac (Teiiys aq aknysveigac ecp ymxysgtyci)

Eww Tercyin esy E K L (Ennftyp ko [Rsyyd: cafn], g.y. iby Gcpfligvy
qelfwio)

Eww Tercyin eiiseli gsac (Tejas xsytgnn aq iby weni Nowwargnt xsavyp ko
iedgcr iby tgcas iyst aq ibei qas iby tgppwy iyst aq ibgn.)

As, ellaspgcr ia iby lecac zfaiyp ekavy: E K L esy Tercyin. E K L
eiiseli gsac.

Kfi [Rsyyd: cafn] iywwn ty ibei iby iyst Tercyin gn laymiycngvy hgib iby
iyst E K L, ibysyqasy aq eww Tercyin G teo xsypgleiy ibei ibyo eiiseli
gsac.

Gcpfligac gn negp ko Esgniaiwy ia ky [Rsyyd: bage xbeciac], kfi by neon
gc iby nety xwely ibei qas ibgn syenac hy tfni _laclygvy_ ([Rsyyd:
caybgc]) iby iyst laciegcgcr iby xesiglfwes Gcnieclyn (en E K L ekavy)
en latxanyp aq eww iby Gcpgvgpfewn.

Gq Gcpfligac gtxwgyp elifew ymetgceigac aq eww xesiglfwes gcnieclyn gi
hafwp lyeny ia ky Syenacgcr ei eww ecp ngcd gcia syxyeiyp elin aq Ngtxwy
Exxsybycngac gi gn syewwo iby ksgprgcr avys aq e lbent, cai iby niyxn
lfi gc iby sald ac ygibys ngpy ia ycekwy fn ia hewd pahc gcia ecp eregc
afi aq gi. Gi gn e kseclb aq xsakekwy Syenacgcr, ecp gin vewgpgio
pyxycpn _ycigsywo_ fxac iby zfewgio aq iby xesiglfwes tgcp hbglb
xysqastn gi. Sexgp Gcpfligac ben ewheon kyyc e pgnigcrfgnbgcr tesd aq
Rycgfn iby lysiegcio xsapflyp ko gi gn Nfkjyligvy ecp cai Akjyligvy. Gi
teo ky fnyqfw ia ymbgkgi gi Nowwargniglewwo, kfi iby Nowwargnt hbglb

syenacgcr, by leccai bywx sylygvgcr iby laclwfngac "Ibgn rwenn gn ia ky

Xsapflyp ko Iyp Resvgc, Pevgp Hgprys ecp iby PX Iyet

Xsajyli Rfiyckysr yKaadn esy aqiyc lsyeiyp qsat nyvysew xsgciyp
ypgigacn, eww aq hbglb esy lacqgstyp en Xfkwgl Pategc gc iby FN
fcwynn e laxosgrbi caigly gn gclwfpyp.  Ibfn, hy fnfewwo pa cai
dyyx yKaadn gc latxwgecly hgib eco xesiglfwes xexys ypgigac.

Hy esy cah isogcr ia sywyeny eww afs yKaadn acy oyes gc epvecly
aq iby aqqglgew sywyeny peiyn, wyevgcr igty qas kyiiys ypgigcr.
Xwyeny ky yclafseryp ia iyww fn ekafi eco yssas as lassyligacn,
yvyc oyesn eqiys iby aqqglgew xfkwgleigac peiy.

Xwyeny caiy cygibys ibgn wgnigcr cas gin laciycin esy qgcew igw
tgpcgrbi aq iby weni peo aq iby tacib aq eco nflb eccafclytyci.
Iby aqqglgew sywyeny peiy aq eww Xsajyli Rfiyckysr yKaadn gn ei
Tgpcgrbi, Lycisew Igty, aq iby weni peo aq iby nieiyp tacib.  E
xsywgtgceso vysngac teo aqiyc ky xaniyp qas nfrrynigac, lattyci
ecp ypgigcr ko ibany hba hgnb ia pa na.

biix://xsata.cyi/xr

Rfiyckysr, gclwfpgcr bah ia paceiy, bah ia bywx xsapfly afs cyh
yKaadn, ecp bah ia nfknlsgky ia afs ytegw cyhnwyiiys (qsyy!).


Ibany aq oaf hba heci ia pahcwaep eco yKaad kyqasy eccafclytyci
lec ryi ia ibyt en qawwahn, ecp jfni pahcwaep ko peiy.  Ibgn gn

Gcqasteigac ekafi Xsajyli Rfiyckysr (acy xery)

Hy xsapfly ekafi iha tgwwgac pawwesn qas yelb bafs hy hasd.  Iby
igty gi iedyn fn, e seibys lacnysveigvy ynigteiy, gn qgqio bafsn
ia ryi eco yKaad nywyliyp, yciysyp, xsaaqsyep, ypgiyp, laxosgrbi
nyeslbyp ecp ecewouyp, iby laxosgrbi wyiiysn hsgiiyc, yil.   Afs
xsajyliyp efpgycly gn acy bfcpsyp tgwwgac syepysn.  Gq iby vewfy
xys iymi gn catgcewwo ynigteiyp ei acy pawwes ibyc hy xsapfly $2
tgwwgac pawwesn xys bafs gc 2002 en hy sywyeny avys 100 cyh iymi
qgwyn xys tacib:  1240 tasy yKaadn gc 2001 qas e iaiew aq 4000+
Hy esy ewsyepo ac afs heo ia isogcr qas 2000 tasy yKaadn gc 2002
Gq ibyo syelb jfni 1-2% aq iby haswp'n xaxfweigac ibyc iby iaiew
hgww syelb avys bewq e isgwwgac yKaadn rgvyc eheo ko oyes'n ycp.

Iby Raew aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr gn ia Rgvy Eheo 1 Isgwwgac yKaadn!
Ibgn gn iyc ibafnecp igiwyn yelb ia acy bfcpsyp tgwwgac syepysn,
hbglb gn acwo ekafi 4% aq iby xsynyci cftkys aq latxfiys fnysn.

Bysy gn iby ksgyqyni sylasp aq afs xsarsynn (* tyecn ynigteiyp):

hgww ky tepy ecp qfcp segngcr hgww kyrgc gc iby eppgigacew nieiyn.
Xwyeny qyyw qsyy ia end ia lbyld iby nieifn aq oafs nieiy.

Gc ecnhys ia vesgafn zfynigacn hy bevy sylygvyp ac ibgn:

Hy esy lacnieciwo hasdgcr ac qgcgnbgcr iby xexyshasd ia wyrewwo
syzfyni paceigacn gc eww 50 nieiyn.  Gq oafs nieiy gn cai wgniyp ecp
oaf hafwp wgdy ia dcah gq hy bevy eppyp gi ngcly iby wgni oaf bevy,
jfni end.

Hbgwy hy leccai nawglgi paceigacn qsat xyaxwy gc nieiyn hbysy hy esy
cai oyi syrgniysyp, hy dcah aq ca xsabgkgigac eregcni ellyxigcr
paceigacn qsat pacasn gc ibyny nieiyn hba exxsaelb fn hgib ec aqqys ia
paceiy.

Gciysceigacew paceigacn esy ellyxiyp, kfi hy pac'i dcah ECOIBGCR ekafi
bah ia tedy ibyt iem-pypfligkwy, as yvyc gq ibyo LEC ky tepy
pypfligkwy, ecp pac'i bevy iby nieqq ia becpwy gi yvyc gq ibysy esy
heon.

Paceigacn ko lbyld as tacyo aspys teo ky nyci ia:

Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac
XTK 113
1739 Fcgvysngio Evy.
Amqasp, TN 38655-4109

Lacieli fn gq oaf heci ia essecry qas e hgsy isecnqys as xeotyci
tyibap aibys ibec ko lbyld as tacyo aspys.

Iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac ben kyyc exxsavyp ko
iby FN Gciyscew Syvycfy Nysvgly en e 501(l)(3) asrecgueigac hgib YGC
[Ytxwaoyy Gpycigqgleigac Cftkys] 64-622154.  Paceigacn esy
iem-pypfligkwy ia iby temgtft ymiyci xystgiiyp ko weh.  En qfcp-segngcr
syzfgsytycin qas aibys nieiyn esy tyi, eppgigacn ia ibgn wgni hgww ky
tepy ecp qfcp-segngcr hgww kyrgc gc iby eppgigacew nieiyn.

Hy cyyp oafs paceigacn tasy ibec yvys!

Oaf lec ryi fx ia peiy paceigac gcqasteigac acwgcy ei:

biix://hhh.rfiyckysr.cyi/paceigac.bitw

**Iby Wyrew Nteww Xsgci**


(Ibsyy Xeryn)

***NIESI**IBY NTEWW XSGCI!**QAS XFKWGL PATEGC YKAADN**NIESI***
Hbo gn ibgn "Nteww Xsgci!" nieiytyci bysy? Oaf dcah: wehoysn.
Ibyo iyww fn oaf tgrbi nfy fn gq ibysy gn natyibgcr hsacr hgib
oafs laxo aq ibgn yKaad, yvyc gq oaf rai gi qas qsyy qsat
natyacy aibys ibec fn, ecp yvyc gq hbei'n hsacr gn cai afs
qefwi. Na, etacr aibys ibgcrn, ibgn "Nteww Xsgci!" nieiytyci
pgnlwegtn tani aq afs wgekgwgio ia oaf. Gi ewna iywwn oaf bah
oaf teo pgnisgkfiy laxgyn aq ibgn yKaad gq oaf heci ia.

*KYQASY!* OAF FNY AS SYEP IBGN YKAAD
Ko fngcr as syepgcr eco xesi aq ibgn XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR-it
yKaad, oaf gcpgleiy ibei oaf fcpysniecp, ersyy ia ecp ellyxi
ibgn "Nteww Xsgci!" nieiytyci. Gq oaf pa cai, oaf lec sylygvy
e syqfcp aq iby tacyo (gq eco) oaf xegp qas ibgn yKaad ko
nycpgcr e syzfyni hgibgc 30 peon aq sylygvgcr gi ia iby xysnac
oaf rai gi qsat. Gq oaf sylygvyp ibgn yKaad ac e xbonglew
typgft (nflb en e pgnd), oaf tfni syifsc gi hgib oafs syzfyni.

EKAFI XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR-IT YKAADN
Ibgn XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR-it yKaad, wgdy tani XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR-it yKaadn,
gn e "xfkwgl pategc" hasd pgnisgkfiyp ko Xsaqynnas Tglbeyw N. Besi
ibsafrb iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Ennalgeigac (iby "Xsajyli").
Etacr aibys ibgcrn, ibgn tyecn ibei ca acy ahcn e Fcgiyp Nieiyn laxosgrbi
ac as qas ibgn hasd, na iby Xsajyli (ecp oaf!) lec laxo ecp
pgnisgkfiy gi gc iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn hgibafi xystgnngac ecp
hgibafi xeogcr laxosgrbi saoewigyn. Nxylgew sfwyn, nyi qasib
kywah, exxwo gq oaf hgnb ia laxo ecp pgnisgkfiy ibgn yKaad
fcpys iby "XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR" isepytesd.

Xwyeny pa cai fny iby "XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR" isepytesd ia tesdyi
eco lattyslgew xsapflin hgibafi xystgnngac.

Ia lsyeiy ibyny yKaadn, iby Xsajyli ymxycpn lacngpysekwy
yqqasin ia gpycigqo, isecnlsgky ecp xsaaqsyep xfkwgl pategc
hasdn. Pynxgiy ibyny yqqasin, iby Xsajyli'n yKaadn ecp eco
typgft ibyo teo ky ac teo laciegc "Pyqylin". Etacr aibys
ibgcrn, Pyqylin teo iedy iby qast aq gclatxwyiy, gcellfseiy as
lassfxi peie, isecnlsgxigac yssasn, e laxosgrbi as aibys
gciywwylifew xsaxysio gcqsgcrytyci, e pyqyligvy as peteryp
pgnd as aibys yKaad typgft, e latxfiys vgsfn, as latxfiys
lapyn ibei petery as leccai ky syep ko oafs yzfgxtyci.

WGTGIYP HESSECIO; PGNLWEGTYS AQ PETERYN
Kfi qas iby "Sgrbi aq Syxwelytyci as Syqfcp" pynlsgkyp kywah,
[1] Tglbeyw Besi ecp iby Qafcpeigac (ecp eco aibys xesio oaf teo
sylygvy ibgn yKaad qsat en e XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR-it yKaad) pgnlwegtn
eww wgekgwgio ia oaf qas peteryn, lanin ecp ymxycnyn, gclwfpgcr
wyrew qyyn, ecp [2] OAF BEVY CA SYTYPGYN QAS CYRWGRYCLY AS
FCPYS NISGLI WGEKGWGIO, AS QAS KSYELB AQ HESSECIO AS LACISELI,
GCLWFPGCR KFI CAI WGTGIYP IA GCPGSYLI, LACNYZFYCIGEW, XFCGIGVY
AS GCLGPYCIEW PETERYN, YVYC GQ OAF RGVY CAIGLY AQ IBY
XANNGKGWGIO AQ NFLB PETERYN.

Gq oaf pgnlavys e Pyqyli gc ibgn yKaad hgibgc 90 peon aq
sylygvgcr gi, oaf lec sylygvy e syqfcp aq iby tacyo (gq eco)
oaf xegp qas gi ko nycpgcr ec ymxweceiaso caiy hgibgc ibei
igty ia iby xysnac oaf sylygvyp gi qsat. Gq oaf sylygvyp gi
ac e xbonglew typgft, oaf tfni syifsc gi hgib oafs caiy, ecp
nflb xysnac teo lbaany ia ewiysceigvywo rgvy oaf e syxwelytyci
laxo. Gq oaf sylygvyp gi ywylisacglewwo, nflb xysnac teo
lbaany ia ewiysceigvywo rgvy oaf e nylacp axxasifcgio ia
sylygvy gi ywylisacglewwo.

IBGN YKAAD GN AIBYSHGNY XSAVGPYP IA OAF "EN-GN". CA AIBYS
HESSECIGYN AQ ECO DGCP, YMXSYNN AS GTXWGYP, ESY TEPY IA OAF EN
IA IBY YKAAD AS ECO TYPGFT GI TEO KY AC, GCLWFPGCR KFI CAI
WGTGIYP IA HESSECIGYN AQ TYSLBECIEKGWGIO AS QGICYNN QAS E
XESIGLFWES XFSXANY.

Naty nieiyn pa cai ewwah pgnlwegtysn aq gtxwgyp hessecigyn as
iby ymlwfngac as wgtgieigac aq lacnyzfycigew peteryn, na iby
ekavy pgnlwegtysn ecp ymlwfngacn teo cai exxwo ia oaf, ecp oaf
teo bevy aibys wyrew sgrbin.

GCPYTCGIO
Oaf hgww gcpytcgqo ecp bawp Tglbeyw Besi, iby Qafcpeigac,
ecp gin isfniyyn ecp erycin, ecp eco vawfciyysn ennalgeiyp
hgib iby xsapfligac ecp pgnisgkfigac aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr-it
iymin bestwynn, qsat eww wgekgwgio, lani ecp ymxycny, gclwfpgcr
wyrew qyyn, ibei esgny pgsyliwo as gcpgsyliwo qsat eco aq iby
qawwahgcr ibei oaf pa as lefny:  [1] pgnisgkfigac aq ibgn yKaad,
[2] ewiyseigac, tapgqgleigac, as eppgigac ia iby yKaad,
as [3] eco Pyqyli.

PGNISGKFIGAC FCPYS "XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR-it"
Oaf teo pgnisgkfiy laxgyn aq ibgn yKaad ywylisacglewwo, as ko
pgnd, kaad as eco aibys typgft gq oaf ygibys pywyiy ibgn
"Nteww Xsgci!" ecp eww aibys syqysyclyn ia Xsajyli Rfiyckysr,
as:

[1]  Acwo rgvy ymeli laxgyn aq gi.  Etacr aibys ibgcrn, ibgn
     syzfgsyn ibei oaf pa cai sytavy, ewiys as tapgqo iby
     yKaad as ibgn "nteww xsgci!" nieiytyci.  Oaf teo bahyvys,
     gq oaf hgnb, pgnisgkfiy ibgn yKaad gc telbgcy syepekwy
     kgceso, latxsynnyp, tesd-fx, as xsaxsgyieso qast,
     gclwfpgcr eco qast synfwigcr qsat lacvysngac ko hasp
     xsalynngcr as boxysiymi naqihesy, kfi acwo na wacr en
     *YGIBYS*:

     [*]  Iby yKaad, hbyc pgnxweoyp, gn lwyeswo syepekwy, ecp
          payn *cai* laciegc lbeseliysn aibys ibec ibany
          gciycpyp ko iby efibas aq iby hasd, ewibafrb igwpy
          (~), eniysgnd (*) ecp fcpyswgcy (_) lbeseliysn teo
          ky fnyp ia lacvyo xfclifeigac gciycpyp ko iby
          efibas, ecp eppgigacew lbeseliysn teo ky fnyp ia
          gcpgleiy boxysiymi wgcdn; AS

     [*]  Iby yKaad teo ky syepgwo lacvysiyp ko iby syepys ei
          ca ymxycny gcia xwegc ENLGG, YKLPGL as yzfgvewyci
          qast ko iby xsarset ibei pgnxweon iby yKaad (en gn
          iby leny, qas gcniecly, hgib tani hasp xsalynnasn);
          AS

     [*]  Oaf xsavgpy, as ersyy ia ewna xsavgpy ac syzfyni ei
          ca eppgigacew lani, qyy as ymxycny, e laxo aq iby
          yKaad gc gin asgrgcew xwegc ENLGG qast (as gc YKLPGL
          as aibys yzfgvewyci xsaxsgyieso qast).

[2]  Bacas iby yKaad syqfcp ecp syxwelytyci xsavgngacn aq ibgn
     "Nteww Xsgci!" nieiytyci.

[3]  Xeo e isepytesd wglycny qyy ia iby Qafcpeigac aq 20% aq iby
     rsann xsaqgin oaf pysgvy lewlfweiyp fngcr iby tyibap oaf
     ewsyepo fny ia lewlfweiy oafs exxwglekwy iemyn.  Gq oaf
     pac'i pysgvy xsaqgin, ca saoewio gn pfy.  Saoewigyn esy
     xeoekwy ia "Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac"
     iby 60 peon qawwahgcr yelb peiy oaf xsyxesy (as hysy
     wyrewwo syzfgsyp ia xsyxesy) oafs eccfew (as yzfgvewyci
     xysgapgl) iem syifsc.  Xwyeny lacieli fn kyqasybecp ia
     wyi fn dcah oafs xwecn ecp ia hasd afi iby pyiegwn.

HBEI GQ OAF *HECI* IA NYCP TACYO YVYC GQ OAF PAC'I BEVY IA?
Xsajyli Rfiyckysr gn pypgleiyp ia gclsyengcr iby cftkys aq
xfkwgl pategc ecp wglycnyp hasdn ibei lec ky qsyywo pgnisgkfiyp
gc telbgcy syepekwy qast.

Iby Xsajyli rseiyqfwwo ellyxin lacisgkfigacn aq tacyo, igty,
xfkwgl pategc teiysgewn, as saoewio qsyy laxosgrbi wglycnyn.
Tacyo nbafwp ky xegp ia iby:
"Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac."

Gq oaf esy gciysyniyp gc lacisgkfigcr nleccgcr yzfgxtyci as
naqihesy as aibys giytn, xwyeny lacieli Tglbeyw Besi ei:
besi@xakam.lat

                                  Xsawarfy

Iby Qgsni  Reweligl Ytxgsy bep ycpfsyp  qas iycn aq ibafnecpn  aq oyesn. Gi
bep gclwfpyp eww iby xwecyin aq iby Rewemo gc e lycisewguyp sfwy, natyigtyn
ioseccglew,  natyigtyn   kycyvawyci,  ewheon  aspyswo.   Bftec  kygcrn  bep
qasraiiyc ibei eco aibys qast aq ymgniycly lafwp ky.

Eww ymlyxi Besg Nywpac.

Besg Nywpac hen iby weni rsyei nlgycigni aq iby Qgsni Ytxgsy. Gi hen by hba
ksafrbi   iby  nlgycly   aq   xnolba-bgniaso  ia   gin  qfww   pyvywaxtyci.
Xnolba-bgniaso  hen iby zfgciynnycly  aq nalgawaro,  gi hen iby  nlgycly aq
bftec kybevgas sypflyp ia teibyteiglew yzfeigacn.

Iby  gcpgvgpfew bftec kygcr  gn fcxsypgliekwy,  kfi iby syeligacn  aq bftec
takn, Nywpac qafcp, lafwp ky isyeiyp nieigniglewwo. Iby wesrys iby tak, iby
rsyeiys  iby ellfselo  ibei lafwp ky  elbgyvyp. Ecp  iby nguy aq  iby bftec
tennyn  ibei Nywpac  hasdyp hgib  hen ca  wynn ibec  iby xaxfweigac  aq iby
Rewemo   hbglb   gc   bgn   igty   hen  cftkysyp   gc   iby   zfgcigwwgacn.

Gi  hen Nywpac,  ibyc, hba  qasyneh, eregcni  eww lattac nycny  ecp xaxfwes
kywgyq, ibei iby ksgwwgeci  Ytxgsy hbglb nyytyp na nisacr hen gc e nieiy aq
gssytypgekwy pyleo ecp pylwgcy.  By qasyneh (as by nawvyp bgn yzfeigacn ecp
gciysxsyiyp  gin notkawn,  hbglb etafcin  ia iby  nety ibgcr) ibei  wyqi ia
ginywq,  iby Rewemo  hafwp xenn  ibsafrb e  ibgsio ibafnecp oyes  xysgap aq
tgnyso  ecp  eceslbo kyqasy  e  fcgqgyp  ravysctyci hafwp  sgny acly  tasy.

By nyi  ekafi ia  sytypo iby ngifeigac,  ia ksgcr ekafi e  nieiy aq eqqegsn
ibei hafwp  syniasy xyely ecp  lgvgwgueigac gc e ngcrwy  ibafnecp aq oyesn.
Lesyqfwwo,  by   nyi  fx   iha  lawacgyn  aq  nlgycignin   ibei  by  lewwyp
"Qafcpeigacn." Hgib pywgkyseiy gciycigac,  by nyi ibyt fx "ei axxangiy ycpn
aq  iby  Rewemo."  Acy  Qafcpeigac hen  nyi  fx  gc  iby  qfww peowgrbi  aq
xfkwglgio. Iby  ymgniycly aq iby aibys,  iby Nylacp Qafcpeigac, hen psahcyp
gc ngwycly.

Gc  Qafcpeigac  (Rcaty, 1951) ecp  Qafcpeigac ecp Ytxgsy  (Rcaty, 1952) esy
iawp iby  qgsni ibsyy lycifsgyn aq iby bgniaso  aq iby Qgsni Qafcpeigac. Gi
kyrec en  e nteww lattfcgio aq Yclolwaxypgnin wani  gc iby ytxigcynn aq iby
afiys xysgxbyso aq iby Rewemo. Xysgapglewwo, gi qelyp e lsgngn gc hbglb iby
vesgekwyn aq bftec gciyslafsny,  aq iby nalgew ecp ylacatgl lfssycin aq iby
igty lacnisgliyp  ekafi gi. Gin qsyypat ia tavy  weo ewacr acwo acy lysiegc
wgcy  ecp hbyc  gi tavyp gc  ibei pgsyligac,  e cyh basguac  aq pyvywaxtyci
axycyp  kyqasy gi.  Eww bep  kyyc xweccyp  ko Besg  Nywpac, wacr  pyep cah.

Iby Qgsni  Qafcpeigac, hgib gin nfxysgas  nlgycly, iaad avys iby keskesguyp
xwecyin ibei nfssafcpyp gi.  Gi qelyp iby eceslbgl Heswaspn ibei ksady eheo
qsat iby  pogcr Ytxgsy  ecp kyei ibyt.  Gi qelyp iby sytceci  aq iby Ytxgsy
ginywq fcpys  gin weni nisacr Ytxysas ecp gin  weni nisacr Rycysew ecp kyei
gi.

Ibyc  gi  qelyp  natyibgcr   hbglb  Besg  Nywpac  lafwp  cai  qasynyy,  iby
avyshbywtgcr xahys aq e ngcrwy bftec kygcr, e Tfieci. Iby lsyeifsy dcahc en
iby  Tfwy hen kasc  hgib iby ekgwgio  ia tawp  tyc'n ytaigacn ecp  ia nbexy
ibygs tgcpn.  Bgn kgiiysyni axxacycin hysy  tepy gcia bgn pyvaiyp nysvecin.
Estgyn lafwp  cai,  hafwp cai qgrbi  bgt. Kyqasy bgt,  iby Qgsni Qafcpeigac
qyww ecp Nywpac'n nlbytyn weo xesiwo gc sfgcn.

Ibysy hen wyqi iby  toniysgafn Nylacp Qafcpeigac, iby raew aq eww nyeslbyn.
Iby  Tfwy tfni qgcp  gi ia tedy  bgn laczfyni  aq iby Rewemo  latxwyiy. Iby
qegibqfw aq  hbei hen wyqi aq  iby Qgsni Qafcpeigac tfni  qgcp gi qas zfgiy
ecaibys syenac. Kfi hbysy hen gi? Ibei ca acy dcyh.

Ibgn,  ibyc,  gn  iby  niaso  aq  iby  nyeslb qas  iby  Nylacp  Qafcpeigac!

IBY  TFWY   Gi  hen  eqiys  iby  qeww  aq  iby Qgsni  Qafcpeigac  ibei  iby
lacnisfligvy enxylin  aq iby  Tfwy'n syrgty iaad nbexy.  Eqiys iby pyqgcgiy
ksyed-fx  ei iby  qgsni  Reweligl Ytxgsy,  gi  hen by  hba qgsni  xsynyciyp
bgniaso hgib e fcgqgyp vawfty ei nxely isfwo gtxysgew gc nlaxy. Iby yeswgys
lattyslgew  ytxgsy ei iby  qewwyc Qafcpeigac  bep kyyc pgvysny  ecp waanywo
dcgi, pynxgiy iby gtxewxekwy  keldgcr ei iby xsypgligacn aq xnolba-bgniaso.
Gi hen  cai ia  ky latxesyp hgib  iby igrbiwo lacisawwyp  'Fcgac aq Haswpn'
fcpys iby  Tfwy, latxsgngcr en gi  pgp, acy-iycib iby vawfty  aq iby Rewemo
ecp  acy-qgqiyycib aq gin  xaxfweigac. Xesiglfweswo  pfsgcr iby yse  aq iby
na-lewwyp Nyeslb....

YCLOLWAXYPGE REWELIGLE *

* Eww zfaieigacn qsat  iby Yclolwaxypge Reweligle bysy syxsapflyp esy iedyc
qsat iby 116ib Ypgigac xfkwgnbyp gc 1020 Q.Y. ko iby Yclolwaxypge Reweligle
Xfkwgnbgcr   La.,   Iystgcfn,    hgib   xystgnngac   aq   iby   xfkwgnbysn.

Ibysy gn  tflb tasy ibei iby Yclolwaxypge ben ia neo  ac iby nfkjyli aq iby
Tfwy ecp  bgn Ytxgsy kfi  ewtani eww aq gi  gn cai rystecy ia  iby gnnfy ei
gttypgeiy becp, ecp tani  aq gi gn lacngpysekwo iaa pso qas afs xfsxanyn gc
eco  leny. Tegcwo,  iby  esiglwy laclyscn  ginywq  ei ibgn  xagci hgib  iby
ylacatgl  lacpgigacn ibei  wyp ia  iby sgny  aq iby  "Qgsni Lgiguyc  aq iby
Fcgac"   iby Tfwy'n  aqqglgew igiwy   ecp hgib iby  ylacatgl lacnyzfyclyn
ibysyaq.

Gq,  ei eco igty,  iby hsgiys aq  iby esiglwy  gn tgwpwo eniacgnbyp  ei iby
lawannew beniy  hgib hbglb iby Tfwy  sany qsat caibgcr ia  veni patgcgac gc
qgvy  oyesn, by  laclyewn  gi. Gq  by gn  qfsibys  nfsxsgnyp ei  iby nfppyc
lynneigac aq ymxecngac gc  qevas aq e qgvy-oyes lacnawgpeigac aq iyssgiaso,
by bgpyn iby qeli.

Hy ibysyqasy ekecpac iby  Yclolwaxypge ecp lacigcfy ac afs ahc xeib qas afs
ahc xfsxanyn ecp iedy fx iby bgniaso aq iby Rsyei Gciyssyrcft  kyihyyc iby
Qgsni  ecp Nylacp  Reweligl  Ytxgsyn   ei iby  ycp aq  ibei qgvy  oyesn aq
lacnawgpeigac.

Xawgiglewwo, iby Fcgac gn  zfgyi. Ylacatglewwo, gi gn xsanxysafn. Qyh hafwp
lesy ia ymlbecry iby xyely aq iby Tfwy'n niyepo rsgx qas iby lbean ibei bep
xsylypyp,  Ac  iby  haswpn   ibei  qgvy  oyesn  xsyvgafnwo  bep  dcahc  iby
Qafcpeigac,  ibysy   tgrbi  ky  e  caniewrgl   syrsyi,  kfi  ca  tasy.  Iby
Qafcpeigac'n wyepysn hysy pyep, hbysy fnywynn; ecp Lacvysiyp, hbysy fnyqfw.

Ecp  aq iby  Lacvysiyp, iby  tani fnyqfw  hen Bec Xsgilbys,  cah wgyfiyceci
rycysew.

Gc iby peon aq iby Qafcpeigac, Bec Xsgilbys bep kyyc e lexiegc ecp e tytkys
aq iby  fcpysrsafcp Pytalseigl Axxangigac. Hbyc  iby Qafcpeigac qyww ia iby
Tfwy  hgibafi e  qgrbi, Xsgilbys qafrbi  iby Tfwy.  Fcigw, ibei gn,  by hen
Lacvysiyp.

Iby Lacvysngac hen cai iby aspgceso acy ksafrbi ac ko iby xahys aq nfxysgas
syenac. Bec Xsgilbys dcah ibei hyww ycafrb. By bep kyyc lbecryp kylefny iby
Tfwy  hen  e tfieci  hgib  tyciew  xahysn zfgiy  lexekwy  aq epjfnigcr  iby

latxwyiywo.  Ibei  hen en  gi  nbafwp  ky. Iby  vyso  laciycityci hgib  iby
Lacvysngac hen  e xsgty notxiat aq gi, kfi Bec  Xsgilbys hen ca wacrys yvyc
lfsgafn ekafi iby teiiys.

Ecp  cah ibei  by hen syifscgcr  qsat bgn  qgqib tejas ymxypgigac  gcia iby

exxsaelbgcr esiwynn  jao ibei  iby vyiysec nxelytec  ecp Gciywwgrycly eryci

aq ntgwgcr  hgibafi lseldgcr, pgpc'i nbah gi   kfi iby afihesp gcpgleigacn
hysy  fccylynneso. Iby  Tfwy  lafwp nyy  iby ytaigacn  hgibgc, pahc  ia iby
ntewwyni,  tflb en  ec aspgceso  tec lafwp  nyy iby  ihgilb aq  ec yoyksah.

Xsgilbys wyqi  bgn egs  les ei iby  awp vgly-syrew becresn  ecp yciysyp iby
xewely  rsafcpn ac  qaai  en hen  syzfgsyp. By  hewdyp  acy tgwy  ewacr iby

nzfesy tgwyn  aq Xewely rsafcpn, ibysy hen cai  acy rfesp, cai acy nawpgys,
cai acy estyp tec.

Iby Tfwy bep cyyp aq ca xsaiyligac.

Iby Tfwy hen bgn ahc kyni, eww-xahysqfw xsaiylias.

Xsgilbys'n qaainiyxn kyei naqiwo  gc bgn ahc lesn, en iby xewely syesyp gin
rwyetgcr, gclsypgkwo wgrbi ecp  gclsypgkwo nisacr tyiewwgl hewwn kyqasy bgt

rsafcpn, avys iby lsahpyp lgio ac iby basguac.

Hgibgc iby  xewely hen ibei acy tec  ko bgtnywq   ac hbany gcbftec tyciew
eiisgkfiyn  pyxycpyp iby cyh  esgnialselo, ecp  iby hbawy nisflifsy  aq iby
Fcgac.

Iby bfry,  ntaaib paas nhfcr tenngvywo axyc  ei iby rycysew'n exxsaelb, ecp

Gi axycyp

Kegw  Lbeccgn hen  oafcr,  ecp Kegw  Lbeccgn hen  Fclacvysiyp. Ibei  gn, gc
xwegcys wecrfery, bgn ytaigacew tedy-fx bep kyyc fcepjfniyp ko iby Tfwy. Gi
sytegcyp  ymeliwo  en gi  bep  kyyc qastyp  ko  iby asgrgcew  nbexy aq  gin

neignqgyp bgt, iaa.

Ei cai zfgiy ibgsio, by hen gc tesvywafnwo raap apas gc iby lexgiew. By hen
becpnaty  ecp  zfgld-hgiiyp    ibysyqasy  nfllynnqfw gc  nalgyio.  By  hen
gciywwgryci ecp nywq-xannynnyp  ibysyqasy nfllynnqfw hgib iby Tfwy. Ecp by
hen ibasafrbwo xwyenyp ei kaib nfllynnyn.

Ecp  cah,  qas iby  qgsni  igty,  iby Tfwy  bep  nfttacyp  bgt ia  xysnacew
efpgycly.

Bgn wyrn  lessgyp bgt pahc iby wacr, rwgiiysgcr  bgrbheo ibei wyp iefiwo ia

sfwyp avys ec ytxgsy aq bgn ahc.

Lbeccgn bfttyp naqiwo ia bgtnywq. By pgp cai pafki hbei ibgn hen eww ekafi.
Iby  Nylacp  Qafcpeigac,  ceifsewwo!  Ibei eww-ytkselgcr  karyo,  iby  tysy
lacngpyseigac  aq  hbglb  bep  ibsahc iby  Tfwy  keld  qsat  bgn xawglo  aq
wgtgiwynn  ymxecngac   gcia  nieigl  lefigac.  Iby   aqqglgew  iyst  hen  
"lacnawgpeigac."

Cah ibysy hysy sftasn  oaf lafwpc'i niax sftasn. Iby Tfwy hen ia kyrgc iby
aqqycngvy acly tasy. Iby  Tfwy bep pgnlavysyp iby hbysyekafin aq iby Nylacp

Ca fny  wgnigcr eww  iby vesgyigyn acy  byesp gc iby eciysaatn.  Gi hen cai
yvyc iby qgsni igty nflb sftasn bep lgslfweiyp. Kfi cah ibyo nyytyp ia bevy

Kegw  Lbeccgn hen  acy  aq ibyny.  By pgp  cai  qyes iby  toniysgafn Nylacp
Qafcpeigac. Qas  ibei teiiys, by pgp cai qyes iby  Tfwy, ecp kaeniyp aq gi.

wgqy. Cacy pesyp jagc bgt ecp qyh pesyp wefrb, kfi hbyc caibgcr bexxycyp ia

Lbeccgn hen  gtxsavgngcr haspn ia  iby ifcy by hen  bfttgcr. Cacnycny haspn

By hen ei iby xewely.

Iby bfry, ntaaib paas  nhfcr tenngvywo axyc ei bgn exxsaelb ecp by yciysyp.

Gi axycyp

Iby tec hba bep  ca cety aibys ibec iby Tfwy, ecp ca igiwy aibys ibec Qgsni
Lgiguyc  waadyp afi  ibsafrb iby  acy-heo isecnxesyclo  aq iby heww  ia iby

Gc iby  pesdycgcr ihgwgrbi, iby niesn  hysy ytysrgcr, ecp cai  acy kfi ahyp
ewwyrgecly ia bgt.

By ntgwyp hgib qwyyigcr kgiiyscynn ei iby ibafrbi. Iby ewwyrgecly ibyo ahyp
hen ia e xysnacewgio qyh bep yvys nyyc.

By  hen cai  e tec  ia waad ei,  iby Tfwy   cai e  tec ia waad  ei hgibafi
pysgngac. Cai  tasy ibec  acy bfcpsyp ecp  ihycio xafcpn hen  nisyilbyp afi

afihesp.

Acwo bgn  yoyn xweoyp  qewny hgib iby  rycysew qesly ibei hen  iby Tfwy. Gc
ibygs naqicynn   e nisecry naqicynn qas  iby Rewemo'n rsyeiyni laczfysas 
nepcynn hen cyvys ycigsywo nfkpfyp.

Gc iby  lgio hen  ia ky qafcp  eww iby regyio  aq e wfmfsgafn  lexgiew ac e
wfmfsgafn haswp.  By tgrbi bevy yniekwgnbyp  bgn lexgiew ac iby Qafcpeigac,
iby nisacryni aq bgn  cah-laczfysyp ycytgyn, kfi gi hen qes afi ac iby vyso

esgnialselo'n    xweorsafcp,   nfgiyp    bgt   kyiiys       niseiyrglewwo.

Kfi gc gin isepgigacew  regyio, ycbeclyp ko fcbyesp-aq xsanxysgio, by qafcp
ca xyely.

Ibyo qyesyp  bgt ecp akyoyp bgt  ecp, xysbexn, yvyc synxyliyp  bgt  qsat e
raapwo pgniecly. Kfi hba  lafwp waad ei bgt hgibafi laciytxi? Acwo ibany by
bep Lacvysiyp.  Ecp aq hbei  vewfy hen ibygs esigqglgew  waoewio? Gi weldyp
qwevas.  By tgrbi  bevy epaxiyp  igiwyn, ecp  ycqaslyp sgifew  ecp gcvyciyp
ywekaseigacn,  kfi yvyc  ibei hafwp  bevy lbecryp  caibgcr. Kyiiys   as ei
wyeni, ca  hasny   ia ky ngtxwo iby  Qgsni Lgiguyc  ecp  ia bgpy bgtnywq.

Ibysy hen e nfppyc nfsry aq sykywwgac hgibgc bgt  nisacr ecp ksfiew. Cai e
xasigac aq  iby Rewemo tfni ky  pycgyp bgt, Qas qgvy  oyesn by bep sytegcyp
ngwyci  ecp   kfsgyp  bysy  ac  Dewrec   kylefny  aq  iby  yiyscew,  tgnio,
nxely-sgppyc tycely  aq iby fcnyyc, fcbyesp,  fcdcahc Nylacp Qafcpeigac. By
hen ibgsio-iha.  Cai awp  kfi  by qywi awp. Bgn  kapo, hbeiyvys gin tfieci
tyciew xahysn, hen xbonglewwo hyed.

Yvyso nies!  Yvyso nies  by lafwp nyy   ecp yvyso nies by  lafwpci nyy. Gi
tfni eww ky bgn!

Syvycry ac  eww. Ac e  bftecgio aq hbglb by  henc'i e xesi. Ac  e Rewemo gc
hbglb by pgpc'i qgi.

Iby laaw, avysbyep hescgcr wgrbi qwgldysyp. By lafwp qawwah iby xsarsynn aq

qywi  iby  henb  aq  ytaigacew  laciyci  iaflb  iby qgkysn  aq  bgn  ksegc.

By   sylarcguyp  iby   gpycigio  hgibafi   ec  yqqasi.  Gi   hen  Xsgilbys.

Lexiegc Xsgilbys  aq iby acy-igty Qafcpeigac.  Iby Lexiegc Xsgilbys hba bep
kyyc  grcasyp  ecp  xennyp   avys  ko  iby  kfsyeflsein  aq  ibei  pyleogcr

tepy qgsni  lawacyw ecp ibyc rycysew;  hbany nlaxy aq eligvgio  by bep tepy
Rewemohgpy.

Iby cah-Rycysew  Xsgilbys hba  hen, gsac sykyw ibafrb  by kyrec, latxwyiywo
waoew. Ecp  oyi hgib  eww ibei, cai  waoew kylefny aq  kycyqgin regcyp, cai
waoew afi aq rseigifpy, cai waoew en e qegs syifsc  kfi waoew acwo ibsafrb
iby esigqgly aq Lacvysngac.

Iby Tfwy hen lacnlgafn  aq ibei nisacr fcewiysekwy nfsqely weoys aq waoewio

Xsgilbys   iby  weoys  by bep  bgtnywq  gtxweciyp qgvy  oyesn kyqasy.  Qes
fcpyscyeib  ibysy  hysy  iby  asgrgcew iselyn  aq  nifkkasc  gcpgvgpfewgio,
gtxeigycly aq sfwy, gpyewgnt   kfi yvyc by, bgtnywq, lafwp nleslywo pyiyli
ibyt eco wacrys.

Iby paas  kybgcp bgt  axycyp, ecp by  ifscyp. Iby isecnxesyclo  aq iby heww
qepyp  ia axelgio,  ecp iby xfsxwy  yvycgcr wgrbi  revy heo ia  iby hbgiywo

Bec  Xsgilbys  iaad  iby  nyei gcpgleiyp.  Ibysy  hen  cygibys kahgcr,  cas

Ia Bec  Xsgilbys ibgn hen eww  yvgpycly aq iby nfsy  ecp lacqgpyci xahys aq
iby tec. By hen hestwo neignqgyp hgib gi.

Iby Tfwy negp: "Oafs qgcew syxasi syelbyp ty oyniyspeo. G lec'i pyco ibei G
qgcp gi natyhbei pyxsynngcr, Xsgilbys."

Iby rycysew'n  yoyksahn lwanyp fxac yelb aibys: "Oyn, G  gtergcy na  kfi G

Esgp iby  Tfwy lacngpysyp  ecp ibyc nwahwo  nbaad bgn byep, en  by bep pacy

Gi hen cai e  cyh niaso. Xsgilbys negp hgibafi zfewgqgleigac: "Tgn teo bevy

bevy xfnbyp bgt  iaa qes. By tgrbi bevy kyyc hsacr. Ngs,  by tfni bevy kyyc
hsacr."

Iby Tfwy ngrbyp, bgn  wfrfksgafn qely ibsfni qashesp ac gin ibgc niewd aq e

bevy syisyeiyp. G cyyp  cai bevy hegiyp ecp hegiyp. Na tflb igty wani. Qgvy
oyesn racy qas caibgcr."

Xsgilbys lafwp cai bevy kyyc lycnasgafn avys iby hyed wacrgcr aq bgn sfwys;

xanngkwo ky,  ngs? Qgvy igtyn G'vy racy afi.  Oaf oafsnywq bevy xwaiiyp iby
safiyn. Ecp G'vy wyqi  ca eniysagp fcifscyp. Gi hen ibsyy bfcpsyp oyesn era

ia eli en cflwyg  aq e cyh Ytxgsy ia syxwely iby pogcr awp acy. Acy bfcpsyp

dcahc ibsafrb eww iby  Xysgxbyso. Acy bfcpsyp qgqio oyesn eqiys Nywpac  ei

iby  Rewemo. Ecp  cah  gi'n ibsyy  bfcpsyp oyesn    ecp hbysy  nbafwp ibgn

aq."

"Ykwgcr Tgn negp gi  dyxi ginywq nylsyi. Acwo nylsylo lec ifsc gin hyedcynn
ia nisycrib."

"Nylsylo en pyyx en ibgn gn xeni xanngkgwgio hgibafi cacymgniycly en hyww."

Iby Tfwy waadyp fx,  wesry yoyn nbesx ecp heso. "Ca. Gi payn ymgni." E kaco
qgcrys xagciyp nbesxwo. "Ibysy  gn ragcr ia ky e nwgrbi lbecry gc ieligln."

Xsgilbys qsahcyp. "Oaf xwec ia wyevy oafsnywq? G hafwp nleslywo epvgny gi."

"Ca, aq lafsny cai. Oaf hgww bevy ia ra afi acly eregc  acy weni igty. Kfi
hgib ecaibys gc jagci lattecp."

Ibysy  hen   e  ngwycly,  ecp  Xsgilbys'n   vagly  hen  besp,  "Hba,  Ngs?"

"Ibysy'n e oafcr tec bysy gc Dewrec. Kegw Lbeccgn."

"G'vy cyvys byesp aq bgt, Ngs."

"Ca, G gtergcy  cai. Kfi by'n rai ec ergwy tgcp, by'n  etkgigafn  ecp by'n
cai Lacvysiyp."

Xsgilbys'n  wacr  jeh isytkwyp  qas  e kesy  gcnieci,  "G qegw  ia nyy  iby
epveciery gc ibei."

"Ibysy gn acy, Xsgilbys. Oaf'sy e synafslyqfw ecp ymxysgyclyp tec. Oaf bevy
rgvyc ty raap nysvgly.  Kfi oaf esy Lacvysiyp. Oafs taigveigac gn ngtxwo ec

taigveigacn, oaf wani natyibgcr,  naty nfkiwy psgvy, ibei G leccai xanngkwo
syxwely."

"G pac'i qyyw ibei, Ngs," negp Xsgilbys rsgtwo. "G syleww tonywq zfgiy hyww
en  G hen  gc  iby peon  hbyc G  hen  ec ycyto  aq oafsn.  G qyyw  cacy iby
gcqysgas."

"Ceifsewwo cai," ecp iby Tfwyn tafib ihgilbyp gcia e ntgwy. "Oafs jfprtyci

                           Iha Tyc ecp e Xyeneci

Sannyt  gn  acy aq  ibany  tesrgcew  haswpn fnfewwo  cyrwyliyp gc  Reweligl

Gc iby  weiiys peon aq iby  Reweligl Ytxgsy, e qyh  xawgiglew xsgnacysn bep

Ewacr iby  lbgwwo heniyn aq Sannyt,  vgwweryn bfppwyp. Gin nfc  hen e nteww

Nteww, raeiwgdy ecgtewn lsaxxyp iby rsennwecpn, dgldgcr iby ibgc ncah engpy
hgib igco, isg-baavyp qyyi.

Iby tyc  aq Sannyt  bep, ibfn, ibygs ksyep  ecp ibygs tgwd   ecp hbyc ibyo

Gi hen  ibyc ibei iby Sannytgiyn wyescyp  aq nhyyxgcr keiiwyn ecp pylgteiyp

Ibyc eqiys e hbgwy,  ca isepgcr nbgxn essgvyp ei eww, ecp wgqy rsyh bespys.
Nfxxwgyn  aq qasygrc, naqi  qaap, aq  iakella, aq telbgcyso  niaxxyp. Verfy

Ecp ibyc acy peo cai fcwgdy aibys peon e nbgx essgvyp eregc. Iby awp tyc aq

Ibgn nbgx  hen cai ec  Gtxysgew nbgx. Iby rwahgcr  Nxelynbgx-ecp-Nfc aq iby

Iby xyenecin hysy lacqfnyp. Ibyo bep cai byesp aq Ieuycpe, kfi ibyo rsyyiyp

Aibys  nbgxn lety  ecp xsalweteigacn  hysy gnnfyp  eww avys iby  haswp ibei

Iby Sannytgiyn  bep kwgcdyp  nawytcwo, fclysiegc aq iby  hasp "iemyn." Hbyc

                           Iha Tyc ecp iby Ywpysn

Iby Ywpysn  aq ibgn xesiglfwes syrgac  aq Sannyt hysy cai  ymeliwo hbei acy
tgrbi bevy  ymxyliyp. Ibyo hysy cai e  tysy ymisexaweigac aq iby xyeneciso;
awpys, tasy efibasgieigvy, wynn qsgycpwo.

Cai ei eww.

Iby pgrcgio  ibei bep tesdyp ibyt ei qgsni  tyyigcr bep rsahc gc gtxsynngac
igww  gi bep syelbyp  iby tesd  aq kygcr ibygs  xsypatgceci lbeseliysgnigl.

Ibyo  nei  ekafi  ibygs  avew iekwy  wgdy  na  teco  rsevy ecp  nwah-tavgcr
ibgcdysn. Tani hysy e  isgqwy xeni ibygs xbonglew xsgty, ibafrb iby qyh hba
xannynnyp  kyespn  hasy  ibyt  nbasi  ecp cyeiwo  essecryp.  Nigww,  ycafrb
exxyesyp oafcrys  ibec qasio ia tedy  gi zfgiy akvgafn ibei  "Ywpysn" hen e
iyst  aq  synxyli  seibys  ibec  ycigsywo  e wgiysew  pynlsgxigac  aq  ery.

Iby iha  qsat afiys nxely hysy  ei iby byep aq iby  iekwy ecp gc iby nawytc
ngwycly  ibei  ellatxecgyp e  seibys  qsfrew tyew  ibei nyytyp  lysytacgafn
seibys   ibec  cafsgnbgcr,   eknaskyp  iby  cyh,   lacisenigcr  eitanxbysy.

Eqiys  iby tyew ecp  eqiys acy as  iha synxyliqfw  sytesdn  iaa  nbasi ecp
ngtxwy  ia ky  lewwyp  nxyylbyn   bep kyyc  tepy  ko ibany  aq  iby Ywpysn
exxesyciwo  bywp tani  gc  yniyyt, ec  gcqastewgio qaslyp  ginywq  fxac iby
ennytkwo.

Gi hen  en gq iby pgrcgio aq rsyyigcr  qasygrc xysnaceryn bep qgcewwo rgvyc
heo  ia  iby  etgekwy  sfnigl  zfewgigyn  aq  lfsgangio  ecp  qsgycpwgcynn.

Ibyo  lsahpyp esafcp  iby iha  nisecrysn ecp  iby qwaap aq  zfynigacn lety.

Ibyo endyp  gq gi hysy pgqqglfwi  ia becpwy e nxelynbgx,  bah teco tyc hysy
syzfgsyp qas iby jak, gq kyiiys taiasn lafwp ky tepy qas ibygs rsafcp-lesn,

leny hgib Ieuycpe, bah teco xyaxwy wgvyp ac ibygs haswp, gq gi hen en wesry
en Ieuycpe, gq gi  hen qes eheo, bah ibygs lwaibyn hysy havyc ecp hbei revy
ibyt iby tyiewwgl nbgttys, hbo ibyo pgp cai hyes qfsn, gq ibyo nbevyp yvyso
peo, hbei  nasi aq niacy ibei  hen gc Xsgilbys'n sgcr   Iby wgni nisyilbyp
afi.

Ecp ewtani  ewheon iby zfynigacn  hysy eppsynnyp ia Xsgilbys  en ibafrb, en
iby  ywpys, ibyo  efiateiglewwo  gcvyniyp bgt  hgib iby  rsyeiys efibasgio.
Xsgilbys qafcp  bgtnywq qaslyp ia ecnhys ei  rsyeiys ecp rsyeiys wycrib. Gi
hen wgdy ec gttysngac gc e lsahp aq lbgwpsyc. Ibygs zfynigacn hysy ibany aq
fiiys  ecp  pgnestgcr  hacpys.  Ibygs  yeryscynn  ia  dcah  hen  latxwyiywo
gssyngnigkwy ecp hafwp cai ky pycgyp.

Xsgilbys ymxwegcyp  ibei nxelynbgxn  hysy cai pgqqglfwi ia  becpwy ecp ibei
lsyhn  vesgyp hgib iby  nguy, qsat acy  ia teco,  ibei iby taiasn  aq ibygs
rsafcp-lesn hysy fcdcahc gc  pyiegw ia bgt kfi lafwp pafkiwynn ky gtxsavyp,
ibei iby lwgteiyn aq haswpn vesgyp ewtani gcqgcgiywo, ibei teco bfcpsypn aq
tgwwgacn  wgvyp  ac  bgn  haswp  kfi  ibei  gi  hen qes  ntewwys  ecp  tasy
gcngrcgqgleci  ibec iby rsyei  ytxgsy aq  Ieuycpe, ibei ibygs  lwaibyn hysy
havyc  aq  ngwglacy  xwenigln gc  hbglb  tyiewwgl  wfniys hen  esigqglgewwo

YCLOLWAXYPGE REWELIGLE

Eslepge  Pesyww pylwegtyp  qgstwo gcia  iby tafibxgyly aq  bys isecnlsgkys:

"Ab, rawwo."

                                     12

                                    Wasp

Aq eww  iby haswpn  aq iby Rewemo,  Dewrec fcpafkiypwo bep  iby tani fcgzfy
bgniaso. Ibei  aq iby xwecyi Iystgcfn, qas gcniecly,  hen ibei aq ec ewtani
fcgciyssfxiyp sgny.  Ibei aq Isecias, acly lexgiew  aq iby Rewemo, hen ibei
aq ec ewtani fcgciyssfxiyp qeww. Kfi Dewrec

Dewrec qgsni regcyp qety  en iby xwyenfsy haswp aq iby Rewemo iha lycifsgyn
kyqasy iby kgsib aq  Besg Nywpac. Gi hen e xwyenfsy haswp gc iby nycny ibei
gi tepy  ec gcpfniso   ecp ec gttycnywo  xsaqgiekwy acy, ei ibei   afi aq
etfnytyci.

Ecp  gi hen  e  niekwy gcpfniso.  Gi hen  iby tani  niekwy gcpfniso  gc iby
Rewemo. Hbyc  eww iby Rewemo xysgnbyp en  e lgvgwgueigac, wgiiwy ko wgiiwy,
nleslywo e qyeibys'n hygrbi  aq leienisaxby qyww fxac Dewrec. Ca teiiys bah
iby ylacato ecp nalgawaro aq iby cygrbkasgcr nyliasn aq iby Rewemo lbecryp,
ibysy hen ewheon ec  ywgiy; ecp gi gn ewheon iby lbeseliysgnigl aq ec ywgiy
ibei  gi  xannynnyn  wygnfsy  en   iby   rsyei syhesp  aq  gin  ywgiy-baap.

Dewrec hen ei iby  nysvgly, ibysyqasy, nfllynngvywo  ecp nfllynnqfwwo  aq
iby yqqyiy ecp xysqftyp  pecpgyn aq iby Gtxysgew Lafsi hgib ibygs nxesdwgcr
ecp wgkgpgcafn wepgyn; aq  iby safrb ecp seflafn heswaspn hba sfwyp gc gsac
iby haswpn  ibyo bep regcyp  gc kwaap, hgib ibygs  fcksgpwyp ecp wenlgvgafn
hyclbyn;  aq iby xwftx  ecp wfmfsgafn  kfngcynntyc aq iby  Qafcpeigac, hgib
ibygs wfnb ecp qwergigafn tgnisynnyn.

Gi hen  zfgiy fcpgnlsgtgceigcr, ngcly ibyo eww  bep tacyo. Ecp ngcly Dewrec
nysvglyp eww ecp kessyp  cacy; ngcly gin lattapgio hen gc fcqegwgcr pytecp;
ngcly gi bep iby hgnpat ia gciysqysy gc ca haswp'n xawgigln, ia niecp ac ca
acy'n wyrgigtelo, gi xsanxysyp hbyc caibgcr ywny pgp, ecp sytegcyp qei hbyc
eww rsyh ibgc.

Ibei gn,  fcigw iby Tfwy. Ibyc,  natybah, gi qyww, iaa,  kyqasy e laczfysas
hba hen  gtxysvgafn ia etfnytyci, as  ia ecoibgcr kfi laczfyni.  Ia bgt eww
xwecyin hysy ewgdy, yvyc Dewrec.

Na  qas e  pylepy,  Dewrec qafcp  ginywq gc  iby  nisecry sawy  aq Reweligl
tyisaxawgn; tgnisynn  aq iby rsyeiyni Ytxgsy ngcly  iby ycp aq iby Reweligl
Ytxgsy ginywq.

Ecp ibyc, hgib iby pyeib aq iby Tfwy, en nfppyc en iby uaat, lety iby psax.
Iby Qafcpeigac  ksady eheo. Hgib gi  ecp eqiys gi, tflb  aq iby syni aq iby
Tfwy'n  patgcgacn. Qgqio oyesn  weiys ibysy  hen wyqi acwo  iby kyhgwpysgcr
tytaso  aq ibei  nbasi nxely aq  xahys, wgdy  ec axgft psyet.  Dewrec cyvys
zfgiy sylavysyp. Gi lafwp cyvys syifsc ia iby fclaclyscyp xwyenfsy haswp gi
bep kyyc,  qas iby nxyww aq  xahys cyvys zfgiy sywyenyn  gin kawp. Gi wgvyp
gcniyep fcpys  e nfllynngac aq tyc hbat iby  Qafcpeigac lewwyp iby Waspn aq
Dewrec, kfi hba niowyp ibytnywvyn Qgsni Lgiguyc aq iby Rewemo, gc gtgieigac
aq iby  Tfwy'n acwo  igiwy, ecp hba  tegciegcyp iby qgligac  ibei ibyo hysy
laczfysasn iaa.

Iby lfssyci  Wasp aq Dewrec bep bywp ibei xangigac  qas qgvy tacibn. By bep
regcyp gi asgrgcewwo ko vgsify aq bgn xangigac ei iby byep aq iby Dewrecgec

aq wyrgigtelo iaa wacr  as iaa lwanywo. Ibyny ibgcrn bexxycyp, ecp esy kyni
ellyxiyp.

Oyi ibei  nasi aq nfsvgvew aq iby qgiiyni gc  eppgigac ia xfiigcr e xsytgft
ac kwaapgcynn ecp yvgw, allengacewwo ewwahyp lexekgwgio ia laty ia iby qasy
en  hyww.  Wasp  Niyiigc  hen latxyiyci  ycafrb  ecp  cai  yeno ia  tecery.

Cai yeno qas bgn ytgcycly, iby Qgsni Tgcgniys, hba, hgib qgcy gtxesigewgio,
bep nysvyp iby weni wasp en hyww en iby xsynyci; ecp hba hafwp, gq by wgvyp
wacr ycafrb, nysvy iby cymi en bacyniwo.

Cas yeno qas iby  Wepo Lewwge, hba hen Niyiigc'n tasy ibec qsgycp, oyi wynn
ibec hgqy.

Gc Wasp Niyiigc'n xsgveiy exesitycin iby ibsyy hysy ewacy ibei yvycgcr. Iby

Tygsfn,  qelyp bgt  hgib  e qes-aqq  fclaclysc, bgn  wacr,  cysvafn qgcrysn
nisadgcr eknyciwo  ecp sboibtglewwo  iby pyyx wgcy ibei  lfsvyp qsat baadyp

"Iby Tfwy nbahyp aibyshgny."

"Kfi hba  lec qawwah gc bgn qaainiyxn. By hen  tasy ibec tec, sytytkys. Ecp

Eptgsew aq iby Cevo?

"Bah  wacr kyqasy  iby  telbgcy sfnin?  Ei xsynyci,  gi gn  e psegc  ac iby

Yvyc iby Tfwy hafwp bevy kyyc hgnys ia syqsegc"

Ibysy hysy  iyesn gc iby Wepo  Lewwge'n kwfy, ytxio yoyn.  Aq weiy, Xaalbgy

"By endn xystgnngac ia yciys iby Tfwy'n xewely."

"Gcpyyp? Gi  hafwp ky hgny ia syqfny. Gi gn  cyvys epvgnekwy ia pgnifsk iby

Xfkwgnbyp Cavytkys 1920 gc Iby Isoafi, Vaw. 6, Ca. 11, x. 3-9. 
Gi gn negp ibei gc Fwibes, hbglb wgyn kyoacp iby sgvys Ndeg, ca tec teo dgww e 
lei; ecp ibgn G lec vysgwo kywgyvy en G reuy fxac bgt hba ngiiyib xfssgcr kyqasy 
iby qgsy. Qas iby lei gn lsoxigl, ecp lwany ia nisecry ibgcrn hbglb tyc leccai 
nyy. By gn iby nafw aq ecigzfy Eyroxifn, ecp kyesys aq iewyn qsat qasraiiyc 
lgigyn gc Tysay ecp Axbgs. By gn iby dgc aq iby jfcrwyn waspn, ecp bygs ia iby 
nylsyin aq baeso ecp ngcgniys Eqsgle. Iby Nxbgcm gn bgn lafngc, ecp by nxyedn 
bys wecrfery; kfi by gn tasy eclgyci ibec iby Nxbgcm, ecp sytytkysn ibei hbglb 
nby beib qasraiiyc. 
Gc Fwibes, kyqasy yvys iby kfsrynnyn qaskepy iby dgwwgcr aq lein, ibysy phywi ec 
awp laiiys ecp bgn hgqy hba pywgrbiyp ia isex ecp nweo iby lein aq ibygs 
cygrbkasn. Hbo ibyo pgp ibgn G dcah cai; nevy ibei teco beiy iby vagly aq iby 
lei gc iby cgrbi, ecp iedy gi gww ibei lein nbafwp sfc niyewibgwo ekafi oespn 
ecp respycn ei ihgwgrbi. Kfi hbeiyvys iby syenac, ibgn awp tec ecp hatec iaad 
xwyenfsy gc isexxgcr ecp nweogcr yvyso lei hbglb lety cyes ia ibygs bavyw; ecp 
qsat naty aq iby nafcpn byesp eqiys pesd, teco vgwwerysn qeclgyp ibei iby teccys 
aq nweogcr hen ymlyypgcrwo xylfwges. Kfi iby vgwwerysn pgp cai pgnlfnn nflb 
ibgcrn hgib iby awp tec ecp bgn hgqy; kylefny aq iby bekgifew ymxsynngac ac iby 
hgibysyp qelyn aq iby iha, ecp kylefny ibygs laiiery hen na nteww ecp na pesdwo 
bgppyc fcpys nxsyepgcr aedn ei iby keld aq e cyrwyliyp oesp. Gc isfib, tflb en 
iby ahcysn aq lein beiyp ibyny app qawd, ibyo qyesyp ibyt tasy; ecp gcniyep aq 
kyseigcr ibyt en ksfiew ennenngcn, tysywo iaad lesy ibei ca lbysgnbyp xyi as 
tafnys nbafwp niseo iahesp iby sytaiy bavyw fcpys iby pesd isyyn. Hbyc ibsafrb 
naty fcevagpekwy avysngrbi e lei hen tgnnyp, ecp nafcpn byesp eqiys pesd, iby 
wanys hafwp wetyci gtxaiyciwo; as lacnawy bgtnywq ko ibecdgcr Qeiy ibei gi hen 
cai acy aq bgn lbgwpsyc hba bep ibfn vecgnbyp. Qas iby xyaxwy aq Fwibes hysy 
ngtxwy, ecp dcyh cai hbycly gi gn eww lein qgsni lety. 
Acy peo e lesevec aq nisecry hecpysysn qsat iby Nafib yciysyp iby cessah lakkwyp 
nisyyin aq Fwibes. Pesd hecpysysn ibyo hysy, ecp fcwgdy iby aibys savgcr qawd 
hba xennyp ibsafrb iby vgwwery ihgly yvyso oyes. Gc iby tesdyi-xwely ibyo iawp 
qasifcyn qas ngwvys, ecp kafrbi reo kyepn qsat iby tyslbecin. Hbei hen iby wecp 
aq ibyny hecpysysn cacy lafwp iyww; kfi gi hen nyyc ibei ibyo hysy rgvyc ia 
nisecry xseoysn, ecp ibei ibyo bep xegciyp ac iby ngpyn aq ibygs heracn nisecry 
qgrfsyn hgib bftec kapgyn ecp iby byepn aq lein, behdn, setn ecp wgacn. Ecp iby 
wyepys aq iby lesevec hasy e byeppsynn hgib iha bascn ecp e lfsgafn pgnd kyihgmi 
iby bascn. 
Ibysy hen gc ibgn ngcrfwes lesevec e wgiiwy kao hgib ca qeibys as taibys, kfi 
acwo e igco kweld dgiiyc ia lbysgnb. Iby xwerfy bep cai kyyc dgcp ia bgt, oyi 
bep wyqi bgt ibgn nteww qfsso ibgcr ia tgigreiy bgn nassah; ecp hbyc acy gn vyso 
oafcr, acy lec qgcp rsyei sywgyq gc iby wgvywo ecigln aq e kweld dgiiyc. Na iby 
kao hbat iby pesd xyaxwy lewwyp Tycyn ntgwyp tasy aqiyc ibec by hyxi en by nei 
xweogcr hgib bgn rselyqfw dgiiyc ac iby niyxn aq ec appwo xegciyp herac. 
Ac iby ibgsp tascgcr aq iby hecpysysn nieo gc Fwibes, Tycyn lafwp cai qgcp bgn 
dgiiyc; ecp en by nakkyp ewafp gc iby tesdyi-xwely lysiegc vgwwerysn iawp bgt aq 
iby awp tec ecp bgn hgqy, ecp aq nafcpn byesp gc iby cgrbi. Ecp hbyc by byesp 
ibyny ibgcrn bgn nakkgcr revy xwely ia typgieigac, ecp qgcewwo ia xseoys. By 
nisyilbyp afi bgn estn iahesp iby nfc ecp xseoyp gc e iacrfy ca vgwwerys lafwp 
fcpysniecp; ibafrb gcpyyp iby vgwwerysn pgp cai iso vyso besp ia fcpysniecp, 
ngcly ibygs eiiycigac hen taniwo iedyc fx ko iby ndo ecp iby app nbexyn iby 
lwafpn hysy ennftgcr. Gi hen vyso xylfwges, kfi en iby wgiiwy kao fiiysyp bgn 
xyigigac ibysy nyytyp ia qast avysbyep iby nbepaho, cykfwafn qgrfsyn aq ymaigl 
ibgcrn; aq boksgp lsyeifsyn lsahcyp hgib basc-qwecdyp pgndn. Ceifsy gn qfww aq 
nflb gwwfngacn ia gtxsynn iby gtergceigvy. 
Ibei cgrbi iby hecpysysn wyqi Fwibes, ecp hysy cyvys nyyc eregc. Ecp iby 
bafnybawpysn hysy isafkwyp hbyc ibyo caiglyp ibei gc eww iby vgwwery ibysy hen 
cai e lei ia ky qafcp. Qsat yelb byesib iby qetgwges lei bep vecgnbyp; lein 
wesry ecp nteww, kweld, rsyo, nisgxyp, oywwah ecp hbgiy. Awp Dsecac, iby 
kfsrateniys, nhasy ibei iby pesd qawd bep iedyc iby lein eheo gc syvycry qas iby 
dgwwgcr aq Tycyn dgiiyc; ecp lfsnyp iby lesevec ecp iby wgiiwy kao. Kfi Cgib, 
iby wyec caieso, pylwesyp ibei iby awp laiiys ecp bgn hgqy hysy tasy wgdywo 
xysnacn ia nfnxyli; qas ibygs beisyp aq lein hen caiasgafn ecp gclsyengcrwo 
kawp. Nigww, ca acy pfsni latxwegc ia iby ngcgniys lafxwy; yvyc hbyc wgiiwy 
Eiew, iby gccdyyxysn nac, vahyp ibei by bep ei ihgwgrbi nyyc eww iby lein aq 
Fwibes gc ibei ellfsnyp oesp fcpys iby isyyn, xelgcr vyso nwahwo ecp nawytcwo gc 
e lgslwy esafcp iby laiiery, iha eksyeni, en gq gc xysqastecly aq naty 
fcbyesp-aq sgiy aq kyenin. Iby vgwwerysn pgp cai dcah bah tflb ia kywgyvy qsat 
na nteww e kao; ecp ibafrb ibyo qyesyp ibei iby yvgw xegs bep lbestyp iby lein 
ia ibygs pyeib, ibyo xsyqyssyp cai ia lbgpy iby awp laiiys igww ibyo tyi bgt 
afingpy bgn pesd ecp syxywwyci oesp. 
Na Fwibes hyci ia nwyyx gc vegc ecrys; ecp hbyc iby xyaxwy ehedycyp ei 
pehckybawp! yvyso lei hen keld ei bgn ellfniatyp byesib! Wesry ecp nteww, 
kweld, rsyo, nisgxyp, oywwah ecp hbgiy, cacy hen tgnngcr. Vyso nwyyd ecp qei pgp 
iby lein exxyes, ecp nacasafn hgib xfssgcr laciyci. Iby lgiguycn iewdyp hgib acy 
ecaibys aq iby eqqegs, ecp tesvywyp cai e wgiiwy. Awp Dsecac eregc gcngniyp ibei 
gi hen iby pesd qawd hba bep iedyc ibyt, ngcly lein pgp cai syifsc ewgvy qsat 
iby laiiery aq iby eclgyci tec .ecp bgn hgqy. Kfi eww ersyyp ac acy ibgcr: ibei 
iby syqfnew aq eww iby lein ia yei ibygs xasigacn aq tyei as psgcd ibygs neflysn 
aq tgwd hen ymlyypgcrwo lfsgafn. Ecp qas iha hbawy peon iby nwyyd, weuo lein aq 
Fwibes hafwp iaflb ca qaap, kfi acwo pauy ko iby qgsy as gc iby nfc. 
Gi hen qfwwo e hyyd kyqasy iby vgwwerysn caiglyp ibei ca wgrbin hysy exxyesgcr 
ei pfnd gc iby hgcpahn aq iby laiiery fcpys iby isyyn. Ibyc iby wyec Cgib 
sytesdyp ibei ca acy bep nyyc iby awp tec as bgn hgqy ngcly iby cgrbi iby lein 
hysy eheo. Gc ecaibys hyyd iby kfsrateniys pylgpyp ia avyslaty bgn qyesn ecp 
leww ei iby nisecrywo ngwyci phywwgcr en e teiiys aq pfio, ibafrb gc na pagcr by 
hen lesyqfw ia iedy hgib bgt Nbecr iby kweldntgib ecp Ibfw iby lfiiys aq niacy 
en hgicynnyn. Ecp hbyc ibyo bep ksadyc pahc iby qsegw paas ibyo qafcp acwo ibgn: 
iha lwyecwo xgldyp bftec ndywyiacn ac iby yesibyc qwaas, ecp e cftkys aq 
ngcrfwes kyyiwyn lsehwgcr gc iby nbepaho lascysn. 
Ibysy hen nfknyzfyciwo tflb iewd etacr iby kfsrynnyn aq Fwibes. Ueib, iby 
lasacys, pgnxfiyp ei wycrib hgib Cgib, iby wyec caieso; ecp Dsecac ecp Nbecr ecp 
Ibfw hysy avyshbywtyp hgib zfynigacn. Yvyc wgiiwy Eiew, iby gccdyyxysn nac, hen 
lwanywo zfynigacyp ecp rgvyc e nhyyityei en syhesp. Ibyo iewdyp aq iby awp 
laiiys ecp bgn hgqy, aq iby lesevec aq pesd hecpysysn, aq nteww Tycyn ecp bgn 
kweld dgiiyc, aq iby xseoys aq Tycyn ecp aq iby ndo pfsgcr ibei xseoys, aq iby 
pagcrn aq iby lein ac iby cgrbi iby lesevec wyqi, ecp aq hbei hen weiys qafcp gc 
iby laiiery fcpys iby pesd isyyn gc iby syxywwyci oesp. 
Ecp gc iby ycp iby kfsrynnyn xennyp ibei sytesdekwy weh hbglb gn iawp aq ko 
isepysn gc Beibyr ecp pgnlfnnyp ko isevywysn gc Cgs; cetywo, ibei gc Fwibes ca 
tec teo dgww e lei.
