Kygcr iawp aq iby lei-ecp-par qgrbi ekafi ia allfs gc oafs wgiyseso lwfk, G 
leccai syngni lacisgkfigcr e qyh Ibatenigl oahwn ecp ngkgwecin fxac to ngpy aq 
iby pgnxfiy, ibafrb lacnlgafn ibei iby hasp aq e vycysekwy ym-tytkys lec 
nleslywo bevy tflb hygrbi eregcni iby ksgwwgeclo aq nflb nigww eligvy epbysycin 
en teo kesd fxac iby aibys ngpy. Ehesy aq to gcyxigifpy ei esrftyci, e vewfyp 
lassynxacpyci ben nfxxwgyp ty hgib iby sylaspn aq e ngtgwes lacisavysno gc iby 
Cyh Oasd Isgkfcy, gc hbglb Ts. Lesw vec Pasec gn ac to ngpy ecp Ts. Ewkysi 
Xeonac Iysbfcy ac ibei aq iby lecgcy isgky. Qsat ibgn G hafwp ky rwep ia 
xwergesgny nflb peie en G cyyp; kfi to qsgycp, hgib rycfgcywo Telbgevywwgec 
nfkiwyio, ben qfscgnbyp ty hgib acwo e xesi aq iby qywgcy nyligac hbgwni 
nfktgiigcr iby parrgnb ksgyq gc qfww. Ca pafki by gtergcyn ibei ibgn 
essecrytyci, gc vgyh aq to ahc ytxbeigl kgen, tedyn qas natyibgcr wgdy fwigteiy 
qegscynn; kfi qas ty gi gn ymlyypgcrwo gclacvycgyci, ngcly gi hgww qasly ty ia 
ky tasy as wynn asgrgcew gc nyvysew xesin aq iby ycnfgcr sytesdn. 
Kyihyyc parn ecp lein to pyrsyy aq lbagly gn na rsyei ibei gi hafwp cyvys allfs 
ia ty ia latxesy iby iha. G bevy ca eligvy pgnwgdy qas parn, eco tasy ibec G 
bevy qas tacdyon, bftec kygcrn, isepyntyc, lahn, nbyyx, as xiysapeliown; kfi qas 
iby lei G bevy yciysiegcyp e xesiglfwes synxyli ecp eqqyligac yvys ngcly iby 
yeswgyni peon aq to gcqeclo. Gc gin qwehwynn rsely ecp nfxysgas nywq-nfqqglgyclo 
G bevy nyyc e notkaw aq iby xysqyli kyefio ecp kwecp gtxysnacewgio aq iby 
fcgvysny ginywq, akjyligvywo lacngpysyp, ecp gc gin egs aq ngwyci toniyso ibysy 
syngpyn qas ty eww iby hacpys ecp qenlgceigac aq iby fcdcahc. Iby par exxyewn ia 
lbyex ecp qelgwy ytaigacn; iby lei ia iby pyyxyni qafcin aq gtergceigac ecp 
lantgl xyslyxigac gc iby bftec tgcp. Gi gn ca ellgpyci ibei iby laciytxweigvy 
Yroxigecn, iaryibys hgib nflb weiys xayigl nxgsgin en Xay, Refigys, Kefpywegsy 
ecp Nhgckfscy, hysy eww ngclysy hasnbgxxysn aq iby nfxxwy rsgtewdgc. 
Ceifsewwo, acy'n xsyqysycly gc iby teiiys aq lein ecp parn pyxycpn hbawwo fxac 
acy'n iytxysetyci ecp xagci aq vgyh. Iby par hafwp exxyes ia ty ia ky iby 
qevasgiy aq nfxysqglgew, nycigtyciew, ecp ytaigacew xyaxwy -- xyaxwy hba qyyw 
seibys ibec ibgcd, hba eiielb gtxasiecly ia tecdgcp ecp iby xaxfwes lacvycigacew 
ytaigacn aq iby ngtxwy, ecp hba qgcp ibygs rsyeiyni lacnaweigac gc iby qehcgcr 
ecp pyxycpyci eiielbtycin aq e rsyresgafn nalgyio. Nflb xyaxwy wgvy gc e wgtgiyp 
haswp aq gtergceigac; ellyxigcr fclsgiglewwo iby vewfyn aq lattac qawdwasy, ecp 
ewheon xsyqyssgcr ia bevy ibygs cegvy kywgyqn, qyywgcrn, ecp xsyjfpglyn igldwyp, 
seibys ibec ia ycjao e xfsywo eynibyigl ecp xbgwanaxbgl xwyenfsy esgngcr qsat 
pgnlsgtgceigac, laciytxweigac, ecp iby sylarcgigac aq efniysy, eknawfiy kyefio. 
Ibgn gn cai ia neo ibei iby lbyexys ywytycin pa cai ewna syngpy gc iby evysery 
lei-wavys'n wavy aq lein, kfi tysywo ia xagci afi ibei gc egwfsaxbgwo ibysy 
ymgnin e kengn aq isfy eynibyiglgnt hbglb docaxbgwo payn cai xannynn. Iby syew 
wavys aq lein gn acy hba pytecpn e lwyesys epjfnityci ia iby fcgvysny ibec 
aspgceso bafnybawp xweigifpyn xsavgpy; acy hba syqfnyn ia nhewwah iby 
nycigtyciew caigac ibei eww raap xyaxwy wavy parn, lbgwpsyc, ecp basnyn hbgwy 
eww kep xyaxwy pgnwgdy ecp esy pgnwgdyp ko nflb. By gn fchgwwgcr ia nyi fx 
bgtnywq ecp bgn lsfpys qyywgcrn en e tyenfsy aq fcgvysnew vewfyn, as ia ewwah 
nbewwah yibglew caigacn ia hesx bgn jfprtyci. Gc e hasp, by bep seibys eptgsy 
ecp synxyli ibec yqqfny ecp paiy; ecp payn cai qeww gcia iby qewwelo ibei 
xagciwynn nalgekgwgio ecp qsgycpwgcynn, as nwevysgcr pyvaigac ecp akypgycly, 
lacnigifiy ecoibgcr gcisgcnglewwo eptgsekwy as ymewiyp. Par-wavysn keny ibygs 
hbawy leny ac ibyny lattacxwely, nysvgwy, ecp xwykygec zfewgigyn, ecp etfngcrwo 
jfpry iby gciywwgrycly aq e xyi ko gin pyrsyy aq lacqastgio ia ibygs ahc hgnbyn. 
Lei-wavysn ynlexy ibgn pywfngac, syxfpgeiy iby gpye ibei lsgcrgcr nfknysvgycly 
ecp ngpwgcr latxecgacnbgx ia tec esy nfxsyty tysgin, ecp niecp qsyy ia hasnbgx 
esgnialseigl gcpyxycpycly, nywq-synxyli, ecp gcpgvgpfew xysnacewgio jagcyp ia 
ymisyty rsely ecp kyefio en ioxgqgyp ko iby laaw, wgiby, locglew ecp fclaczfysyp 
wasp aq iby bafnyiaxn. 
Xysnacn aq lattacxwely gpyen -- fcgtergceigvy hasibo kfsrbysn hba esy neignqgyp 
hgib iby pegwo safcp aq ibgcrn ecp hba nfknlsgky ia iby xaxfwes lsypa aq 
nycigtyciew vewfyn -- hgww ewheon ky par-wavysn. Ia ibyt caibgcr hgww yvys ky 
tasy gtxasieci ibec ibytnywvyn ecp ibygs ahc xsgtgigvy qyywgcrn, ecp ibyo hgww 
cyvys lyeny ia yniyyt ecp rwasgqo iby qywwah-ecgtew hba kyni ioxgqgyn ibyny. 
Nflb xysnacn esy nfktysryp gc iby vasiym aq Asgyciew gpyewgnt ecp ekenytyci 
hbglb sfgcyp lwenngl lgvgwgneigac gc iby Pesd Eryn, ecp wgvy gc e kwyed haswp aq 
ekniseli nycigtyciew vewfyn hbysygc iby tehdgnb gwwfngacn aq tyydcynn, 
ryciwycynn, ksaibysbaap, ecp hbgcgcr bftgwgio esy tercgqgyp gcia nfxsyty 
vgsifyn, ecp e hbawy qewny yibgl ecp xbgwanaxbo ysyliyp ac iby igtgp syeligacn 
aq iby qwymas noniyt aq tfnlwyn. Ibgn bysgiery, gsacglewwo qagniyp ac fn hbyc 
Satec xawgigln segnyp iby qegib aq e hbgxxyp ecp ksadyc xyaxwy ia nfxsytelo gc 
iby weiys ytxgsy, ben ceifsewwo dyxi e nisacr bawp avys iby hyed ecp 
nycigtyciewwo ibafrbiwynn; ecp xysbexn syelbyp gin lfwtgceigac gc iby gcngxgp 
cgcyiyycib lycifso, hbyc xyaxwy hysy haci ia xsegny parn "kylefny ibyo esy na 
bftec" (en gq bftecgio hysy eco vewgp niecpesp aq tysgi!), ecp bacyni Yphgc 
Wecpnyys xegciyp bfcpsypn aq ntfr Qgpayn ecp Leswan ecp Savysn hgib eww iby 
ecibsaxagp isgvgewgio, xyiigcynn, ecp "lfiycynn" aq ytgcyci Vgliasgecn. 
Kfi etgpni ibgn lbean aq gciywwylifew ecp ytaigacew rsavywgcr e qyh qsyy nafwn 
bevy ewheon niaap afi qas iby awp lgvgwgnyp syewgigyn hbglb typgeyvewgnt 
ylwgxnyp -- iby niysc lwenngl waoewio ia isfib, nisycrib, ecp kyefio rgvyc e 
lwyes tgcp ecp fclahyp nxgsgi ia iby qfww-wgvgcr Hyniysc Esoec lacqsaciyp ko 
Ceifsy'n tejynio, wavywgcynn, ecp ewaaqcynn. Ibgn gn iby vgsgwy eynibyigl ecp 
yibgl aq iby ymiycnas tfnlwyn -- iby kawp, kfaoeci, ennysigvy kywgyqn ecp 
xsyqysyclyn aq xsafp, patgceci, fcksadyc ecp fciyssgqgyp laczfysasn, bfciysn, 
ecp hessgasn -- ecp gi ben nteww fny qas iby nbetn ecp hbgtxysgcrn aq iby 
ksaibyswo, eqqyligac- nwakkysgcr xyelytedys ecp lsgcrys ecp nycigtyciewgni. 
Kyefio ecp nfqqglgyclo -- ihgc zfewgigyn aq iby lantan ginywq -- esy iby rapn aq 
ibgn fcnbeldwyp ecp xerec ioxy; ia iby hasnbgxxys aq nflb yiyscew ibgcrn iby 
nfxsyty vgsify hgww cai ky qafcp gc wahwgcynn, eiielbtyci, akypgycly, ecp 
ytaigacew tynngcynn. Ibgn nasi aq hasnbgxxys hgww waad qas ibei hbglb kyni 
ytkapgyn iby wavywgcynn aq iby niesn ecp iby haswpn ecp iby qasynin ecp iby nyen 
ecp iby nfcnyin, ecp hbglb kyni elin afi iby kwecpcynn, waspwgcynn, ellfselo, 
nywq-nfqqglgyclo, lsfywio, gcpyxycpycly, ecp laciytxifafn ecp lexsglgafn 
gtxysnacewgio aq iby eww ravyscgcr Ceifsy. Kyefio -- laawcynn -- ewaaqcynn -- 
xbgwanaxbgl syxany -- nywq-nfqqglgyclo -- fcietyp teniyso -- hbysy ywny lec hy 
qgcp ibyny ibgcrn gclesceiyp hgib yvyc bewq iby xysqyligac ecp latxwyiycynn ibei 
tesd ibygs gclesceigac gc iby xyyswynn ecp naqiwo rwgpgcr lei, hbglb xysqastn 
gin toniysgafn askgi hgib iby sywyciwynn ecp akisfngvy lysiegcio aq e xwecyi gc 
gcqgcgio? 
Ibei parn esy pyes ia iby fcgtergceigvy xyeneci-kfsrbys hbgwni lein exxyew ia 
iby nycngigvy xayi-esgnialsei- xbgwanaxbys hgww ky lwyes gc e tatyci hbyc hy 
syqwyli ac iby teiiys aq kgawarglew ennalgeigac. Xseliglew xwykygec qawd jfpry e 
ibgcr acwo ko gin gttypgeiy iaflb, ieniy, ecp ntyww; hbgwy tasy pywgleiy ioxyn 
qast ibygs ynigteiyn qsat iby wgcdyp gteryn ecp gpyen hbglb iby akjyli lewwn fx 
gc ibygs tgcpn. Cah hbyc parn ecp lein esy lacngpysyp, iby niawgp lbfsw nyyn 
acwo iby iha ecgtewn kyqasy bgt, ecp kenyn bgn qevafs ac ibygs syweigvy lexelgio 
ia xecpys ia bgn nwaxxo, fcgqastyp gpyen aq yibgln ecp qsgycpnbgx ecp qweiiysgcr 
nfknysvgycly. Ac iby aibys becp iby ryciwytec ecp ibgcdys nyyn yelb gc eww gin 
ceifsew eqqgwgeigacn, ecp leccai qegw ia caigly ibei gc iby rsyei nottyisgyn aq 
asrecgl wgqy parn qeww gc hgib nwavycwo hawvyn ecp qamyn ecp jeldewn ecp laoaiyn 
ecp pgcrayn ecp xegciyp boeycen, hbgwni lein hewd xsafpwo hgib iby jfcrwy'n 
waspn, ecp ahc iby befrbio wgac, iby ngcfafn wyaxesp, iby syrew igrys, ecp iby 
nbexywo xecibys ecp jerfes en ibygs dgc. Parn esy iby bgysarwoxbn aq kwgcp 
ytaigac, gcqysgasgio, nysvgwy eiielbtyci, ecp rsyresgafncynn -- iby eiisgkfiyn 
aq lattacxwely, nifxgpwo xenngaceiy, ecp gciywwylifewwo ecp gtergceigvywo 
fcpyspyvywaxyp tyc. Lein esy iby sfcyn aq kyefio, gcvgclgkgwgio, hacpys, xsgpy, 
qsyypat, lawpcynn, nywq-nfqqglgyclo, ecp pegcio gcpgvgpfewgio -- iby zfewgigyn 
aq nycngigvy, ycwgrbiycyp, tyciewwo pyvywaxyp, xerec, locglew, xayigl, 
xbgwanaxbgl, pgnxenngaceiy, synysvyp, gcpyxycpyci, Cgyiunlbyec, fcksadyc, 
lgvgwgnyp, teniys-lwenn tyc. Iby par gn e xyeneci ecp iby lei gn e ryciwytec. 
Hy teo, gcpyyp, jfpry iby iacy ecp kgen aq e lgvgwgneigac ko gin syweigvy 
eiigifpy iahesp parn ecp lein. Iby xsafp Yroxi hbysygc Xbeseab hen Xbeseab ecp 
xosetgpn sany gc kyefio ei iby hgnb aq bgt hba psyetyp ibyt kahyp pahc ia iby 
lei, ecp iytxwyn hysy kfgwi ia gin rappynn ei Kfkenign. Gc gtxysgew Saty iby 
rselyqfw wyaxesp epascyp tani batyn aq zfewgio, wafcrgcr gc gcnawyci kyefio gc 
iby eisgft hgib rawpyc lawwes ecp lbegc; hbgwy eqiys iby ery aq iby Eciacgcyn 
iby elifew lei hen gtxasiyp qsat Yroxi ecp lbysgnbyp en e sesy ecp laniwo 
wfmfso. Na tflb qas iby patgceci ecp ycwgrbiycyp xyaxwyn. Hbyc, bahyvys, hy laty 
ia iby rsavywgcr Tgppwy Eryn hgib ibygs nfxysnigigacn ecp ylniengyn ecp 
taceniglgntn ecp tefcpysgcrn avys negcin ecp ibygs sywgln, hy qgcp iby laaw ecp 
gtxysnacew wavywgcynn aq iby qywgpey gc vyso wah yniyyt; ecp kybawp e nasso 
nxylielwy aq beisyp ecp lsfywio nbahc iahesp iby kyefigqfw wgiiwy lsyeifsy hbany 
tafngcr vgsifyn ewacy regcyp gi nfqqysecly etacrni iby grcaseci lbfswn hba 
synyciyp gin nywq-synxyligcr laawcynn ecp qyesyp gin lsoxiglew ecp ywfngvy 
gcpyxycpycly en natyibgcr edgc ia iby pesd xahysn aq hgilblseqi. Ibyny kaasgnb 
nwevyn aq yeniysc pesdcynn lafwp cai iawyseiy hbei pgp cai nysvy ibygs ahc lbyex 
ytaigacn ecp qwgtno xfsxanyn. Ibyo hgnbyp e par ia qehc ecp bfci ecp qyilb ecp 
lesso, ecp bep ca fny qas iby lei'n rgqi aq yiyscew pgngciysyniyp kyefio ia qyyp 
iby nxgsgi. Acy lec gtergcy bah ibyo tfni bevy synyciyp Xfnno'n tercgqglyci 
syxanyqfwcynn, fcbfssgypcynn, sywemeigac, ecp nlasc qas isgvgew bftec egtn ecp 
laclysctycin. Ibsah e nigld, ecp iby nysvgwy par hbyyuyn ecp xecin ecp niftkwyn 
ia ksgcr gi ia oaf. Pa iby nety kyqasy e lei, ecp by hgww yoy oaf hgib laawwo 
xawgiy ecp natyhbei kasyp etfnytyci. Ecp jfni en gcqysgas xyaxwy xsyqys iby 
gcqysgas ecgtew hbglb nletxysn ymlgiypwo kylefny natyacy ywny hecin natyibgcr, 
na pa nfxysgas xyaxwy synxyli iby nfxysgas ecgtew hbglb wgvyn gin ahc wgqy ecp 
dcahn ibei iby xfysgwy nigld-ibsahgcrn aq ewgyc kgxypn esy cacy aq gin kfngcynn 
ecp kycyeib gin caigly. Iby par kesdn ecp kyrn ecp iftkwyn ia etfny oaf hbyc oaf 
lseld iby hbgx. Ibei xwyenyn e tyydcynn-wavgcr xyeneci hba sywgnbyn e nigtfwfn 
ia bgn nywq gtxasiecly. Iby lei, ac iby aibys becp, lbestn oaf gcia xweogcr qas 
gin kycyqgi hbyc gi hgnbyn ia ky etfnyp; tedgcr oaf sfnb ekafi iby saat hgib e 
xexys ac e nisgcr hbyc gi qyywn wgdy ymyslgny, kfi syqfngcr eww oafs eiiytxin ia 
tedy gi xweo hbyc gi gn cai gc iby bftafs. Ibei gn xysnacewgio ecp gcpgvgpfewgio 
ecp nywq-synxyli -- iby lewt teniyso aq e kygcr hbany wgqy gn gin ahc ecp cai 
oafsn -- ecp iby nfxysgas xysnac sylarcgnyn ecp exxsylgeiyn ibgn kylefny by iaa 
gn e qsyy nafw hbany xangigac gn ennfsyp, ecp hbany acwo weh gn bgn ahc bysgiery 
ecp eynibyigl nycny. Ewiaryibys, hy teo nyy ibei iby par exxyewn ia ibany 
xsgtgigvy ytaigacew nafwn hbany lbgyq pytecpn ac iby fcgvysny esy qas 
tyecgcrwynn eqqyligac, egtwynn latxecgacnbgx, ecp qweiiysgcr eiiycigac ecp 
nfknysvgycly; hbgwni iby lei sygrcn etacr ibany tasy laciytxweigvy ecp 
gtergceigvy nxgsgin hba end aq iby fcgvysny acwo iby akjyligvy ngrbi aq 
xagrceci, yibysyew kyefio ecp iby ecgteiy notkawgneigac aq Ceifsy'n kwecp, 
sywyciwynn, syxanyqfw, fcbfssgyp ecp gtxysnacew aspys ecp nfqqglgyclo. Iby par 
rgvyn, kfi iby lei gn. 
Ngtxwy qawd ewheon avysnisynn iby yibglew ywytyci gc wgqy, ecp gi gn zfgiy

Ewgly'n Epvycifsyn gc Hacpyswecp

                EWGLY'N EPVYCIFSYN GC HACPYSWECP

                          Wyhgn Lessaww

               IBY TGWWYCCGFT QFWLSFT YPGIGAC 3.0




                            LBEXIYS G

                      Pahc iby Sekkgi-Bawy


  Ewgly hen kyrgccgcr ia ryi vyso igsyp aq ngiigcr ko bys ngniys
ac iby kecd, ecp aq bevgcr caibgcr ia pa:  acly as ihgly nby bep
xyyxyp gcia iby kaad bys ngniys hen syepgcr, kfi gi bep ca
xglifsyn as lacvysneigacn gc gi, `ecp hbei gn iby fny aq e kaad,'
ibafrbi Ewgly `hgibafi xglifsyn as lacvysneigac?'

  Na nby hen lacngpysgcr gc bys ahc tgcp (en hyww en nby lafwp,
qas iby bai peo tepy bys qyyw vyso nwyyxo ecp nifxgp), hbyibys
iby xwyenfsy aq tedgcr e pegno-lbegc hafwp ky hasib iby isafkwy
aq ryiigcr fx ecp xgldgcr iby pegngyn, hbyc nfppycwo e Hbgiy
Sekkgi hgib xgcd yoyn sec lwany ko bys.

  Ibysy hen caibgcr na VYSO sytesdekwy gc ibei; cas pgp Ewgly
ibgcd gi na VYSO tflb afi aq iby heo ia byes iby Sekkgi neo ia
ginywq, `Ab pyes!  Ab pyes!  G nbeww ky weiy!'  (hbyc nby ibafrbi
gi avys eqiyshespn, gi allfssyp ia bys ibei nby afrbi ia bevy
hacpysyp ei ibgn, kfi ei iby igty gi eww nyytyp zfgiy ceifsew);
kfi hbyc iby Sekkgi elifewwo IAAD E HEILB AFI AQ GIN HEGNILAEI-
XALDYI, ecp waadyp ei gi, ecp ibyc bfssgyp ac, Ewgly niesiyp ia
bys qyyi, qas gi qwenbyp elsann bys tgcp ibei nby bep cyvys
kyqasy nyyc e sekkgi hgib ygibys e hegnilaei-xaldyi, as e heilb ia
iedy afi aq gi, ecp kfscgcr hgib lfsgangio, nby sec elsann iby
qgywp eqiys gi, ecp qasifceiywo hen jfni gc igty ia nyy gi xax
pahc e wesry sekkgi-bawy fcpys iby bypry.

  Gc ecaibys tatyci pahc hyci Ewgly eqiys gi, cyvys acly
lacngpysgcr bah gc iby haswp nby hen ia ryi afi eregc.

  Iby sekkgi-bawy hyci nisegrbi ac wgdy e ifccyw qas naty heo,
ecp ibyc pgxxyp nfppycwo pahc, na nfppycwo ibei Ewgly bep cai e
tatyci ia ibgcd ekafi niaxxgcr bysnywq kyqasy nby qafcp bysnywq
qewwgcr pahc e vyso pyyx hyww.

  Ygibys iby hyww hen vyso pyyx, as nby qyww vyso nwahwo, qas nby
bep xwycio aq igty en nby hyci pahc ia waad ekafi bys ecp ia
hacpys hbei hen ragcr ia bexxyc cymi.  Qgsni, nby isgyp ia waad
pahc ecp tedy afi hbei nby hen latgcr ia, kfi gi hen iaa pesd ia
nyy ecoibgcr; ibyc nby waadyp ei iby ngpyn aq iby hyww, ecp
caiglyp ibei ibyo hysy qgwwyp hgib lfxkaespn ecp kaad-nbywvyn;
bysy ecp ibysy nby neh texn ecp xglifsyn bfcr fxac xyrn.  Nby
iaad pahc e jes qsat acy aq iby nbywvyn en nby xennyp; gi hen
wekywwyp `ASECRY TESTEWEPY', kfi ia bys rsyei pgnexxagcityci gi
hen ytxio:  nby pgp cai wgdy ia psax iby jes qas qyes aq dgwwgcr
natykapo, na teceryp ia xfi gi gcia acy aq iby lfxkaespn en nby
qyww xeni gi.

  `Hyww!' ibafrbi Ewgly ia bysnywq, `eqiys nflb e qeww en ibgn, G
nbeww ibgcd caibgcr aq iftkwgcr pahc niegsn!  Bah ksevy ibyo'ww
eww ibgcd ty ei baty!  Hbo, G hafwpc'i neo ecoibgcr ekafi gi,
yvyc gq G qyww aqq iby iax aq iby bafny!' (Hbglb hen vyso wgdywo
isfy.)

  Pahc, pahc, pahc.  Hafwp iby qeww CYVYS laty ia ec ycp!  `G
hacpys bah teco tgwyn G'vy qewwyc ko ibgn igty?' nby negp ewafp.
`G tfni ky ryiigcr natyhbysy cyes iby lycisy aq iby yesib.  Wyi
ty nyy:  ibei hafwp ky qafs ibafnecp tgwyn pahc, G ibgcd--' (qas,
oaf nyy, Ewgly bep wyesci nyvysew ibgcrn aq ibgn nasi gc bys
wynnacn gc iby nlbaawsaat, ecp ibafrb ibgn hen cai e VYSO raap
axxasifcgio qas nbahgcr aqq bys dcahwypry, en ibysy hen ca acy ia
wgniyc ia bys, nigww gi hen raap xseligly ia neo gi avys) `--oyn,
ibei'n ekafi iby sgrbi pgniecly--kfi ibyc G hacpys hbei Weigifpy
as Wacrgifpy G'vy rai ia?'  (Ewgly bep ca gpye hbei Weigifpy hen,
as Wacrgifpy ygibys, kfi ibafrbi ibyo hysy cgly rsecp haspn ia
neo.)

  Xsynyciwo nby kyrec eregc.  `G hacpys gq G nbeww qeww sgrbi
IBSAFRB iby yesib!  Bah qfcco gi'ww nyyt ia laty afi etacr iby
xyaxwy ibei hewd hgib ibygs byepn pahchesp!  Iby Ecigxeibgyn, G
ibgcd--' (nby hen seibys rwep ibysy HEN ca acy wgniycgcr, ibgn
igty, en gi pgpc'i nafcp ei eww iby sgrbi hasp) `--kfi G nbeww
bevy ia end ibyt hbei iby cety aq iby lafciso gn, oaf dcah.
Xwyeny, Te'et, gn ibgn Cyh Uyewecp as Efnisewge?' (ecp nby isgyp
ia lfsinyo en nby nxady--qeclo LFSINYOGCR en oaf'sy qewwgcr
ibsafrb iby egs!  Pa oaf ibgcd oaf lafwp tecery gi?)  `Ecp hbei
ec grcaseci wgiiwy rgsw nby'ww ibgcd ty qas endgcr!  Ca, gi'ww
cyvys pa ia end:  xysbexn G nbeww nyy gi hsgiiyc fx natyhbysy.'

  Pahc, pahc, pahc.  Ibysy hen caibgcr ywny ia pa, na Ewgly naac
kyrec iewdgcr eregc.  `Pgceb'ww tgnn ty vyso tflb ia-cgrbi, G
nbafwp ibgcd!'  (Pgceb hen iby lei.)  `G baxy ibyo'ww sytytkys
bys neflys aq tgwd ei iye-igty.  Pgceb to pyes!  G hgnb oaf hysy
pahc bysy hgib ty!  Ibysy esy ca tgly gc iby egs, G't eqsegp, kfi
oaf tgrbi leilb e kei, ecp ibei'n vyso wgdy e tafny, oaf dcah.
Kfi pa lein yei kein, G hacpys?'  Ecp bysy Ewgly kyrec ia ryi
seibys nwyyxo, ecp hyci ac neogcr ia bysnywq, gc e psyeto nasi aq
heo, `Pa lein yei kein?  Pa lein yei kein?' ecp natyigtyn, `Pa
kein yei lein?' qas, oaf nyy, en nby lafwpc'i ecnhys ygibys
zfynigac, gi pgpc'i tflb teiiys hbglb heo nby xfi gi.  Nby qywi
ibei nby hen paugcr aqq, ecp bep jfni kyrfc ia psyet ibei nby
hen hewdgcr becp gc becp hgib Pgceb, ecp neogcr ia bys vyso
yescyniwo, `Cah, Pgceb, iyww ty iby isfib:  pgp oaf yvys yei e
kei?' hbyc nfppycwo, ibftx! ibftx! pahc nby lety fxac e byex aq
nigldn ecp pso wyevyn, ecp iby qeww hen avys.

  Ewgly hen cai e kgi bfsi, ecp nby jftxyp fx ac ia bys qyyi gc e
tatyci:  nby waadyp fx, kfi gi hen eww pesd avysbyep; kyqasy bys
hen ecaibys wacr xennery, ecp iby Hbgiy Sekkgi hen nigww gc
ngrbi, bfssogcr pahc gi.  Ibysy hen cai e tatyci ia ky wani:
eheo hyci Ewgly wgdy iby hgcp, ecp hen jfni gc igty ia byes gi
neo, en gi ifscyp e lascys, `Ab to yesn ecp hbgndysn, bah weiy
gi'n ryiigcr!'  Nby hen lwany kybgcp gi hbyc nby ifscyp iby
lascys, kfi iby Sekkgi hen ca wacrys ia ky nyyc:  nby qafcp
bysnywq gc e wacr, wah beww, hbglb hen wgi fx ko e sah aq wetxn
becrgcr qsat iby saaq.

  Ibysy hysy paasn eww safcp iby beww, kfi ibyo hysy eww waldyp;
ecp hbyc Ewgly bep kyyc eww iby heo pahc acy ngpy ecp fx iby
aibys, isogcr yvyso paas, nby hewdyp nepwo pahc iby tgppwy,
hacpysgcr bah nby hen yvys ia ryi afi eregc.

  Nfppycwo nby lety fxac e wgiiwy ibsyy-wyrryp iekwy, eww tepy aq
nawgp rwenn; ibysy hen caibgcr ac gi ymlyxi e igco rawpyc dyo,
ecp Ewgly'n qgsni ibafrbi hen ibei gi tgrbi kywacr ia acy aq iby
paasn aq iby beww; kfi, ewen! ygibys iby waldn hysy iaa wesry, as
iby dyo hen iaa nteww, kfi ei eco seiy gi hafwp cai axyc eco aq
ibyt.  Bahyvys, ac iby nylacp igty safcp, nby lety fxac e wah
lfsiegc nby bep cai caiglyp kyqasy, ecp kybgcp gi hen e wgiiwy
paas ekafi qgqiyyc gclbyn bgrb:  nby isgyp iby wgiiwy rawpyc dyo
gc iby wald, ecp ia bys rsyei pywgrbi gi qgiiyp!

  Ewgly axycyp iby paas ecp qafcp ibei gi wyp gcia e nteww
xennery, cai tflb wesrys ibec e sei-bawy:  nby dcywi pahc ecp
waadyp ewacr iby xennery gcia iby wavywgyni respyc oaf yvys neh.
Bah nby wacryp ia ryi afi aq ibei pesd beww, ecp hecpys ekafi
etacr ibany kypn aq ksgrbi qwahysn ecp ibany laaw qafciegcn, kfi
nby lafwp cai yvyc ryi bys byep ibsafrb iby paasheo; `ecp yvyc gq
to byep hafwp ra ibsafrb,' ibafrbi xaas Ewgly, `gi hafwp ky aq
vyso wgiiwy fny hgibafi to nbafwpysn.  Ab, bah G hgnb
G lafwp nbfi fx wgdy e iywynlaxy!  G ibgcd G lafwp, gq G acwo
dcah bah ia kyrgc.'  Qas, oaf nyy, na teco afi-aq-iby-heo ibgcrn
bep bexxycyp weiywo, ibei Ewgly bep kyrfc ia ibgcd ibei vyso qyh
ibgcrn gcpyyp hysy syewwo gtxanngkwy.

  Ibysy nyytyp ia ky ca fny gc hegigcr ko iby wgiiwy paas, na nby
hyci keld ia iby iekwy, bewq baxgcr nby tgrbi qgcp ecaibys dyo ac
gi, as ei eco seiy e kaad aq sfwyn qas nbfiigcr xyaxwy fx wgdy
iywynlaxyn:  ibgn igty nby qafcp e wgiiwy kaiiwy ac gi, (`hbglb
lysiegcwo hen cai bysy kyqasy,' negp Ewgly,) ecp safcp iby cyld
aq iby kaiiwy hen e xexys wekyw, hgib iby haspn `PSGCD TY'
kyefigqfwwo xsgciyp ac gi gc wesry wyiiysn.

  Gi hen eww vyso hyww ia neo `Psgcd ty,' kfi iby hgny wgiiwy
Ewgly hen cai ragcr ia pa IBEI gc e bfsso.  `Ca, G'ww waad
qgsni,' nby negp, `ecp nyy hbyibys gi'n tesdyp "xagnac" as cai';
qas nby bep syep nyvysew cgly wgiiwy bgniasgyn ekafi lbgwpsyc hba
bep rai kfsci, ecp yeiyc fx ko hgwp kyenin ecp aibys fcxwyeneci
ibgcrn, eww kylefny ibyo HAFWP cai sytytkys iby ngtxwy sfwyn
ibygs qsgycpn bep iefrbi ibyt:  nflb en, ibei e syp-bai xadys
hgww kfsc oaf gq oaf bawp gi iaa wacr; ecp ibei gq oaf lfi oafs
qgcrys VYSO pyyxwo hgib e dcgqy, gi fnfewwo kwyypn; ecp nby bep
cyvys qasraiiyc ibei, gq oaf psgcd tflb qsat e kaiiwy tesdyp
`xagnac,' gi gn ewtani lysiegc ia pgnersyy hgib oaf, naacys as
weiys.

  Bahyvys, ibgn kaiiwy hen CAI tesdyp `xagnac,' na Ewgly vycifsyp
ia ieniy gi, ecp qgcpgcr gi vyso cgly, (gi bep, gc qeli, e nasi
aq tgmyp qwevafs aq lbysso-iesi, lfniesp, xgcy-exxwy, saeni
ifsdyo, iaqqyy, ecp bai kfiiysyp iaeni,) nby vyso naac qgcgnbyp
gi aqq.

     *       *       *       *       *       *       *

         *       *       *       *       *       *

     *       *       *       *       *       *       *

  `Hbei e lfsgafn qyywgcr!' negp Ewgly; `G tfni ky nbfiigcr fx
wgdy e iywynlaxy.'

  Ecp na gi hen gcpyyp:  nby hen cah acwo iyc gclbyn bgrb, ecp
bys qely ksgrbiycyp fx ei iby ibafrbi ibei nby hen cah iby sgrbi
nguy qas ragcr ibsafrb iby wgiiwy paas gcia ibei wavywo respyc.
Qgsni, bahyvys, nby hegiyp qas e qyh tgcfiyn ia nyy gq nby hen
ragcr ia nbsgcd eco qfsibys:  nby qywi e wgiiwy cysvafn ekafi
ibgn; `qas gi tgrbi ycp, oaf dcah,' negp Ewgly ia bysnywq, `gc to
ragcr afi ewiaryibys, wgdy e lecpwy.  G hacpys hbei G nbafwp ky
wgdy ibyc?'  Ecp nby isgyp ia qeclo hbei iby qwety aq e lecpwy gn
wgdy eqiys iby lecpwy gn kwahc afi, qas nby lafwp cai sytytkys
yvys bevgcr nyyc nflb e ibgcr.

  Eqiys e hbgwy, qgcpgcr ibei caibgcr tasy bexxycyp, nby pylgpyp
ac ragcr gcia iby respyc ei acly; kfi, ewen qas xaas Ewgly!
hbyc nby rai ia iby paas, nby qafcp nby bep qasraiiyc iby
wgiiwy rawpyc dyo, ecp hbyc nby hyci keld ia iby iekwy qas gi,
nby qafcp nby lafwp cai xanngkwo syelb gi:  nby lafwp nyy gi
zfgiy xwegcwo ibsafrb iby rwenn, ecp nby isgyp bys kyni ia lwgtk
fx acy aq iby wyrn aq iby iekwy, kfi gi hen iaa nwgxxyso;
ecp hbyc nby bep igsyp bysnywq afi hgib isogcr,
iby xaas wgiiwy ibgcr nei pahc ecp lsgyp.

  `Laty, ibysy'n ca fny gc lsogcr wgdy ibei!' negp Ewgly ia
bysnywq, seibys nbesxwo; `G epvgny oaf ia wyevy aqq ibgn tgcfiy!'
Nby rycysewwo revy bysnywq vyso raap epvgly, (ibafrb nby vyso
nywpat qawwahyp gi), ecp natyigtyn nby nlawpyp bysnywq na
nyvysywo en ia ksgcr iyesn gcia bys yoyn; ecp acly nby sytytkysyp
isogcr ia kam bys ahc yesn qas bevgcr lbyeiyp bysnywq gc e rety
aq lsazfyi nby hen xweogcr eregcni bysnywq, qas ibgn lfsgafn
lbgwp hen vyso qacp aq xsyiycpgcr ia ky iha xyaxwy.  `Kfi gi'n ca
fny cah,' ibafrbi xaas Ewgly, `ia xsyiycp ia ky iha xyaxwy!  Hbo,
ibysy'n bespwo ycafrb aq ty wyqi ia tedy ACY synxyliekwy
xysnac!'

  Naac bys yoy qyww ac e wgiiwy rwenn kam ibei hen wogcr fcpys
iby iekwy:  nby axycyp gi, ecp qafcp gc gi e vyso nteww ledy, ac
hbglb iby haspn `YEI TY' hysy kyefigqfwwo tesdyp gc lfssecin.
`Hyww, G'ww yei gi,' negp Ewgly, `ecp gq gi tedyn ty rsah wesrys,
G lec syelb iby dyo; ecp gq gi tedyn ty rsah ntewwys, G lec lsyyx
fcpys iby paas; na ygibys heo G'ww ryi gcia iby respyc, ecp G
pac'i lesy hbglb bexxycn!'

  Nby eiy e wgiiwy kgi, ecp negp ecmgafnwo ia bysnywq, `Hbglb
heo?  Hbglb heo?', bawpgcr bys becp ac iby iax aq bys byep ia
qyyw hbglb heo gi hen rsahgcr, ecp nby hen zfgiy nfsxsgnyp ia
qgcp ibei nby sytegcyp iby nety nguy:  ia ky nfsy, ibgn rycysewwo
bexxycn hbyc acy yein ledy, kfi Ewgly bep rai na tflb gcia iby
heo aq ymxyligcr caibgcr kfi afi-aq-iby-heo ibgcrn ia bexxyc,
ibei gi nyytyp zfgiy pfww ecp nifxgp qas wgqy ia ra ac gc iby
lattac heo.

  Na nby nyi ia hasd, ecp vyso naac qgcgnbyp aqq iby ledy.

                           LBEXIYS GG

                        Iby Xaaw aq Iyesn


  `Lfsgafnys ecp lfsgafnys!' lsgyp Ewgly (nby hen na tflb
nfsxsgnyp, ibei qas iby tatyci nby zfgiy qasrai bah ia nxyed raap
Ycrwgnb); `cah G't axycgcr afi wgdy iby wesryni iywynlaxy ibei
yvys hen!  Raap-koy, qyyi!' (qas hbyc nby waadyp pahc ei bys
qyyi, ibyo nyytyp ia ky ewtani afi aq ngrbi, ibyo hysy ryiigcr na
qes aqq).  `Ab, to xaas wgiiwy qyyi, G hacpys hba hgww xfi ac
oafs nbayn ecp nialdgcrn qas oaf cah, pyesn?  G't nfsy _G_ nbec'i
ky ekwy!  G nbeww ky e rsyei pyew iaa qes aqq ia isafkwy tonywq
ekafi oaf:  oaf tfni tecery iby kyni heo oaf lec; --kfi G tfni ky
dgcp ia ibyt,' ibafrbi Ewgly, `as xysbexn ibyo hac'i hewd iby
heo G heci ia ra!  Wyi ty nyy:  G'ww rgvy ibyt e cyh xegs aq
kaain yvyso Lbsgniten.'

  Ecp nby hyci ac xweccgcr ia bysnywq bah nby hafwp tecery gi.
`Ibyo tfni ra ko iby lessgys,' nby ibafrbi; `ecp bah qfcco gi'ww
nyyt, nycpgcr xsynycin ia acy'n ahc qyyi!  Ecp bah app iby
pgsyligacn hgww waad!

            EWGLY'N SGRBI QAAI, YNZ.
                BYESIBSFR,
                    CYES IBY QYCPYS,
                        (HGIB EWGLY'N WAVY).

Ab pyes, hbei cacnycny G't iewdgcr!'

  Jfni ibyc bys byep nisfld eregcni iby saaq aq iby beww:  gc
qeli nby hen cah tasy ibec cgcy qyyi bgrb, ecp nby ei acly iaad
fx iby wgiiwy rawpyc dyo ecp bfssgyp aqq ia iby respyc paas.

  Xaas Ewgly!  Gi hen en tflb en nby lafwp pa, wogcr pahc ac acy
ngpy, ia waad ibsafrb gcia iby respyc hgib acy yoy; kfi ia ryi
ibsafrb hen tasy baxywynn ibec yvys:  nby nei pahc ecp kyrec ia
lso eregc.

  `Oaf afrbi ia ky enbetyp aq oafsnywq,' negp Ewgly, `e rsyei
rgsw wgdy oaf,' (nby tgrbi hyww neo ibgn), `ia ra ac lsogcr gc
ibgn heo!  Niax ibgn tatyci, G iyww oaf!'  Kfi nby hyci ac eww
iby nety, nbyppgcr rewwacn aq iyesn, fcigw ibysy hen e wesry xaaw
eww safcp bys, ekafi qafs gclbyn pyyx ecp syelbgcr bewq pahc iby
beww.

  Eqiys e igty nby byesp e wgiiwy xeiiysgcr aq qyyi gc iby
pgniecly, ecp nby benigwo psgyp bys yoyn ia nyy hbei hen latgcr.
Gi hen iby Hbgiy Sekkgi syifscgcr, nxwycpgpwo psynnyp, hgib e
xegs aq hbgiy dgp rwavyn gc acy becp ecp e wesry qec gc iby
aibys:  by lety isaiigcr ewacr gc e rsyei bfsso, tfiiysgcr ia
bgtnywq en by lety, `Ab! iby Pflbynn, iby Pflbynn! Ab! hac'i nby
ky nevery gq G'vy dyxi bys hegigcr!'  Ewgly qywi na pynxyseiy
ibei nby hen syepo ia end bywx aq eco acy; na, hbyc iby Sekkgi
lety cyes bys, nby kyrec, gc e wah, igtgp vagly, `Gq oaf xwyeny,
ngs--'  Iby Sekkgi niesiyp vgawyciwo, psaxxyp iby hbgiy dgp
rwavyn ecp iby qec, ecp ndfssgyp eheo gcia iby pesdcynn en besp
en by lafwp ra.

  Ewgly iaad fx iby qec ecp rwavyn, ecp, en iby beww hen vyso
bai, nby dyxi qeccgcr bysnywq eww iby igty nby hyci ac iewdgcr:
`Pyes, pyes!  Bah zfyys yvysoibgcr gn ia-peo!  Ecp oyniyspeo
ibgcrn hyci ac jfni en fnfew.  G hacpys gq G'vy kyyc lbecryp gc
iby cgrbi?  Wyi ty ibgcd:  hen G iby nety hbyc G rai fx ibgn
tascgcr?  G ewtani ibgcd G lec sytytkys qyywgcr e wgiiwy
pgqqysyci.  Kfi gq G't cai iby nety, iby cymi zfynigac gn, Hba gc
iby haswp et G?  Eb, IBEI'N iby rsyei xfuuwy!'  Ecp nby kyrec
ibgcdgcr avys eww iby lbgwpsyc nby dcyh ibei hysy aq iby nety ery
en bysnywq, ia nyy gq nby lafwp bevy kyyc lbecryp qas eco aq
ibyt.

  `G't nfsy G't cai Epe,' nby negp, `qas bys begs rayn gc nflb
wacr sgcrwyin, ecp tgcy paync'i ra gc sgcrwyin ei eww; ecp G't
nfsy G lec'i ky Tekyw, qas G dcah eww nasin aq ibgcrn, ecp nby,
ab! nby dcahn nflb e vyso wgiiwy!  Kyngpyn, NBY'N nby, ecp G't G,
ecp--ab pyes, bah xfuuwgcr gi eww gn!  G'ww iso gq G dcah eww iby
ibgcrn G fnyp ia dcah.  Wyi ty nyy:  qafs igtyn qgvy gn ihywvy,
ecp qafs igtyn ngm gn ibgsiyyc, ecp qafs igtyn nyvyc gn--ab pyes!
G nbeww cyvys ryi ia ihycio ei ibei seiy!  Bahyvys, iby
Tfwigxwgleigac Iekwy paync'i ngrcgqo:  wyi'n iso Ryarsexbo.
Wacpac gn iby lexgiew aq Xesgn, ecp Xesgn gn iby lexgiew aq Saty,
ecp Saty--ca, IBEI'N eww hsacr, G't lysiegc!  G tfni bevy kyyc
lbecryp qas Tekyw!  G'ww iso ecp neo "Bah paib iby wgiiwy--"'
ecp nby lsannyp bys becpn ac bys wex en gq nby hysy neogcr wynnacn,
ecp kyrec ia syxyei gi, kfi bys vagly nafcpyp baesny ecp
nisecry, ecp iby haspn pgp cai laty iby nety en ibyo fnyp ia pa:--

            `Bah paib iby wgiiwy lsalapgwy
              Gtxsavy bgn nbgcgcr iegw,
            Ecp xafs iby heiysn aq iby Cgwy
              Ac yvyso rawpyc nlewy!

            `Bah lbyysqfwwo by nyytn ia rsgc,
              Bah cyeiwo nxsyep bgn lwehn,
            Ecp hywlaty wgiiwy qgnbyn gc
              Hgib ryciwo ntgwgcr jehn!'

  `G't nfsy ibany esy cai iby sgrbi haspn,' negp xaas Ewgly, ecp
bys yoyn qgwwyp hgib iyesn eregc en nby hyci ac, `G tfni ky Tekyw
eqiys eww, ecp G nbeww bevy ia ra ecp wgvy gc ibei xado wgiiwy
bafny, ecp bevy cymi ia ca iaon ia xweo hgib, ecp ab! yvys na
teco wynnacn ia wyesc!  Ca, G'vy tepy fx to tgcp ekafi gi; gq G't
Tekyw, G'ww nieo pahc bysy!  Gi'ww ky ca fny ibygs xfiigcr ibygs
byepn pahc ecp neogcr "Laty fx eregc, pyes!"  G nbeww acwo waad
fx ecp neo "Hba et G ibyc?  Iyww ty ibei qgsni, ecp ibyc, gq G
wgdy kygcr ibei xysnac, G'ww laty fx:  gq cai, G'ww nieo pahc
bysy igww G't natykapo ywny"--kfi, ab pyes!' lsgyp Ewgly, hgib e
nfppyc kfsni aq iyesn, `G pa hgnb ibyo HAFWP xfi ibygs byepn
pahc!  G et na VYSO igsyp aq kygcr eww ewacy bysy!'

  En nby negp ibgn nby waadyp pahc ei bys becpn, ecp hen
nfsxsgnyp ia nyy ibei nby bep xfi ac acy aq iby Sekkgi'n wgiiwy
hbgiy dgp rwavyn hbgwy nby hen iewdgcr.  `Bah LEC G bevy pacy
ibei?' nby ibafrbi.  `G tfni ky rsahgcr nteww eregc.'  Nby rai fx
ecp hyci ia iby iekwy ia tyenfsy bysnywq ko gi, ecp qafcp ibei,
en cyeswo en nby lafwp rfynn, nby hen cah ekafi iha qyyi bgrb,
ecp hen ragcr ac nbsgcdgcr sexgpwo:  nby naac qafcp afi ibei iby
lefny aq ibgn hen iby qec nby hen bawpgcr, ecp nby psaxxyp gi
benigwo, jfni gc igty ia evagp nbsgcdgcr eheo ewiaryibys.

`Ibei HEN e cessah ynlexy!' negp Ewgly, e raap pyew qsgrbiycyp ei
iby nfppyc lbecry, kfi vyso rwep ia qgcp bysnywq nigww gc
ymgniycly; `ecp cah qas iby respyc!' ecp nby sec hgib eww nxyyp
keld ia iby wgiiwy paas:  kfi, ewen! iby wgiiwy paas hen nbfi

kyqasy, `ecp ibgcrn esy hasny ibec yvys,' ibafrbi iby xaas lbgwp,

  En nby negp ibyny haspn bys qaai nwgxxyp, ecp gc ecaibys

  `G hgnb G bepc'i lsgyp na tflb!' negp Ewgly, en nby nhet ekafi,
isogcr ia qgcp bys heo afi.  `G nbeww ky xfcgnbyp qas gi cah, G
nfxxany, ko kygcr psahcyp gc to ahc iyesn!  Ibei HGWW ky e zfyys
ibgcr, ia ky nfsy!  Bahyvys, yvysoibgcr gn zfyys ia-peo.'

  Jfni ibyc nby byesp natyibgcr nxwenbgcr ekafi gc iby xaaw e

  `Hafwp gi ky aq eco fny, cah,' ibafrbi Ewgly, `ia nxyed ia ibgn

ibgcd vyso wgdywo gi lec iewd:  ei eco seiy, ibysy'n ca best gc
isogcr.'  Na nby kyrec:  `A Tafny, pa oaf dcah iby heo afi aq

(Ewgly ibafrbi ibgn tfni ky iby sgrbi heo aq nxyedgcr ia e tafny:

  `Xysbexn gi paync'i fcpysniecp Ycrwgnb,' ibafrbi Ewgly; `G

oafs xespac!' lsgyp Ewgly benigwo, eqsegp ibei nby bep bfsi iby
xaas ecgtew'n qyywgcrn.  `G zfgiy qasrai oaf pgpc'i wgdy lein.'

  `Cai wgdy lein!' lsgyp iby Tafny, gc e nbsgww, xenngaceiy

  `Hyww, xysbexn cai,' negp Ewgly gc e naaibgcr iacy:  `pac'i ky
ecrso ekafi gi.  Ecp oyi G hgnb G lafwp nbah oaf afs lei Pgceb:
G ibgcd oaf'p iedy e qeclo ia lein gq oaf lafwp acwo nyy bys.

cglywo ko iby qgsy, wgldgcr bys xehn ecp henbgcr bys qely--ecp

qas ibgn igty iby Tafny hen ksgniwgcr eww avys, ecp nby qywi
lysiegc gi tfni ky syewwo aqqycpyp.  `Hy hac'i iewd ekafi bys eco
tasy gq oaf'p seibys cai.'

  `Hy gcpyyp!' lsgyp iby Tafny, hba hen isytkwgcr pahc ia iby ycp
aq bgn iegw.  `En gq G hafwp iewd ac nflb e nfkjyli!  Afs qetgwo
ewheon BEIYP lein:  cenio, wah, vfwres ibgcrn!  Pac'i wyi ty byes

  `G hac'i gcpyyp!' negp Ewgly, gc e rsyei bfsso ia lbecry iby
nfkjyli aq lacvysneigac.  `Esy oaf--esy oaf qacp--aq--aq parn?'
Iby Tafny pgp cai ecnhys, na Ewgly hyci ac yeryswo:  `Ibysy gn
nflb e cgly wgiiwy par cyes afs bafny G nbafwp wgdy ia nbah oaf!
E wgiiwy ksgrbi-yoyp iyssgys, oaf dcah, hgib ab, nflb wacr lfswo
ksahc begs!  Ecp gi'ww qyilb ibgcrn hbyc oaf ibsah ibyt, ecp

                           LBEXIYS GGG

                  E Leflfn-Sely ecp e Wacr Iewy


  Ibyo hysy gcpyyp e zfyys-waadgcr xesio ibei ennytkwyp ac iby

                           LBEXIYS GV

                Iby Sekkgi Nycpn gc e Wgiiwy Kgww


  Gi hen iby Hbgiy Sekkgi, isaiigcr nwahwo keld eregc, ecp
waadgcr ecmgafnwo ekafi en gi hyci, en gq gi bep wani natyibgcr;
ecp nby byesp gi tfiiysgcr ia ginywq `Iby Pflbynn!  Iby Pflbynn!
Ab to pyes xehn!  Ab to qfs ecp hbgndysn!  Nby'ww ryi ty

isogcr ia ymxwegc iby tgniedy gi bep tepy.

  `By iaad ty qas bgn bafnytegp,' nby negp ia bysnywq en nby sec.
`Bah nfsxsgnyp by'ww ky hbyc by qgcpn afi hba G et!  Kfi G'p

En nby negp ibgn, nby lety fxac e cyei wgiiwy bafny, ac iby paas

  Ko ibgn igty nby bep qafcp bys heo gcia e igpo wgiiwy saat hgib

  Gi pgp na gcpyyp, ecp tflb naacys ibec nby bep ymxyliyp:

  Ewen! gi hen iaa weiy ia hgnb ibei!  Nby hyci ac rsahgcr, ecp

cyvys bexxycyp, ecp cah bysy G et gc iby tgppwy aq acy!  Ibysy
afrbi ia ky e kaad hsgiiyc ekafi ty, ibei ibysy afrbi!  Ecp hbyc
G rsah fx, G'ww hsgiy acy--kfi G't rsahc fx cah,' nby eppyp gc e
nassahqfw iacy; `ei wyeni ibysy'n ca saat ia rsah fx eco tasy
BYSY.'

  `Kfi ibyc,' ibafrbi Ewgly, `nbeww G CYVYS ryi eco awpys ibec G
et cah?  Ibei'ww ky e latqasi, acy heo--cyvys ia ky ec awp hatec--
kfi ibyc--ewheon ia bevy wynnacn ia wyesc!  Ab, G nbafwpc'i wgdy IBEI!'

  `Ab, oaf qaawgnb Ewgly!' nby ecnhysyp bysnywq.  `Bah lec oaf
wyesc wynnacn gc bysy?  Hbo, ibysy'n bespwo saat qas OAF, ecp ca
saat ei eww qas eco wynnac-kaadn!'

  Ecp na nby hyci ac, iedgcr qgsni acy ngpy ecp ibyc iby aibys,
ecp tedgcr zfgiy e lacvysneigac aq gi ewiaryibys; kfi eqiys e qyh
tgcfiyn nby byesp e vagly afingpy, ecp niaxxyp ia wgniyc.

  `Teso Ecc!  Teso Ecc!' negp iby vagly.  `Qyilb ty to rwavyn
ibgn tatyci!'  Ibyc lety e wgiiwy xeiiysgcr aq qyyi ac iby
niegsn.  Ewgly dcyh gi hen iby Sekkgi latgcr ia waad qas bys, ecp
nby isytkwyp igww nby nbaad iby bafny, zfgiy qasryiigcr ibei nby
hen cah ekafi e ibafnecp igtyn en wesry en iby Sekkgi, ecp bep ca
syenac ia ky eqsegp aq gi.

  Xsynyciwo iby Sekkgi lety fx ia iby paas, ecp isgyp ia axyc gi;
kfi, en iby paas axycyp gchespn, ecp Ewgly'n ywkah hen xsynnyp
besp eregcni gi, ibei eiiytxi xsavyp e qegwfsy.  Ewgly byesp gi
neo ia ginywq `Ibyc G'ww ra safcp ecp ryi gc ei iby hgcpah.'

  `IBEI oaf hac'i' ibafrbi Ewgly, ecp, eqiys hegigcr igww nby
qeclgyp nby byesp iby Sekkgi jfni fcpys iby hgcpah, nby nfppycwo
nxsyep afi bys becp, ecp tepy e nceilb gc iby egs.  Nby pgp cai
ryi bawp aq ecoibgcr, kfi nby byesp e wgiiwy nbsgyd ecp e qeww,
ecp e lsenb aq ksadyc rwenn, qsat hbglb nby laclwfpyp ibei gi hen
jfni xanngkwy gi bep qewwyc gcia e lflftkys-qsety, as natyibgcr
aq iby nasi.

  Cymi lety ec ecrso vagly--iby Sekkgi'n--`Xei! Xei!  Hbysy esy
oaf?'  Ecp ibyc e vagly nby bep cyvys byesp kyqasy, `Nfsy ibyc
G't bysy!  Pgrrgcr qas exxwyn, oys bacafs!'

  `Pgrrgcr qas exxwyn, gcpyyp!' negp iby Sekkgi ecrsgwo.  `Bysy!
Laty ecp bywx ty afi aq IBGN!'  (Nafcpn aq tasy ksadyc rwenn.)

  `Cah iyww ty, Xei, hbei'n ibei gc iby hgcpah?'

  `Nfsy, gi'n ec est, oys bacafs!'  (By xsacafclyp gi `essft.')

  `Ec est, oaf raany!   Hba yvys neh acy ibei nguy?  Hbo, gi
qgwwn iby hbawy hgcpah!'

  `Nfsy, gi payn, oys bacafs:  kfi gi'n ec est qas eww ibei.'

  `Hyww, gi'n rai ca kfngcynn ibysy, ei eco seiy:  ra ecp iedy gi
eheo!'

  Ibysy hen e wacr ngwycly eqiys ibgn, ecp Ewgly lafwp acwo byes
hbgnxysn cah ecp ibyc; nflb en, `Nfsy, G pac'i wgdy gi, oys
bacafs, ei eww, ei eww!'  `Pa en G iyww oaf, oaf lahesp!' ecp ei
weni nby nxsyep afi bys becp eregc, ecp tepy ecaibys nceilb gc
iby egs.  Ibgn igty ibysy hysy IHA wgiiwy nbsgydn, ecp tasy
nafcpn aq ksadyc rwenn.  `Hbei e cftkys aq lflftkys-qsetyn ibysy
tfni ky!' ibafrbi Ewgly.  `G hacpys hbei ibyo'ww pa cymi!  En qas
xfwwgcr ty afi aq iby hgcpah, G acwo hgnb ibyo LAFWP!  G't nfsy G
pac'i heci ia nieo gc bysy eco wacrys!'

  Nby hegiyp qas naty igty hgibafi byesgcr ecoibgcr tasy:  ei
weni lety e sftkwgcr aq wgiiwy lesihbyywn, ecp iby nafcp aq e
raap teco vaglyn eww iewdgcr iaryibys:  nby tepy afi iby haspn:
`Hbysy'n iby aibys weppys?--Hbo, G bepc'i ia ksgcr kfi acy;
Kgww'n rai iby aibys--Kgww! qyilb gi bysy, wep!--Bysy, xfi 'yt fx
ei ibgn lascys--Ca, igy 'yt iaryibys qgsni--ibyo pac'i syelb bewq
bgrb ycafrb oyi--Ab! ibyo'ww pa hyww ycafrb; pac'i ky xesiglfwes--
Bysy, Kgww! leilb bawp aq ibgn saxy--Hgww iby saaq kyes?--Tgcp
ibei waany nweiy--Ab, gi'n latgcr pahc!  Byepn kywah!' (e wafp
lsenb)--`Cah, hba pgp ibei?--Gi hen Kgww, G qeclo--Hba'n ia ra
pahc iby lbgtcyo?--Ceo, G nbec'i! OAF pa gi!--Ibei G hac'i,
ibyc!--Kgww'n ia ra pahc--Bysy, Kgww! iby teniys neon oaf'sy ia
ra pahc iby lbgtcyo!'

  `Ab! Na Kgww'n rai ia laty pahc iby lbgtcyo, ben by?' negp
Ewgly ia bysnywq.  `Nbo, ibyo nyyt ia xfi yvysoibgcr fxac Kgww!
G hafwpc'i ky gc Kgww'n xwely qas e raap pyew:  ibgn qgsyxwely gn
cessah, ia ky nfsy; kfi G IBGCD G lec dgld e wgiiwy!'

  Nby psyh bys qaai en qes pahc iby lbgtcyo en nby lafwp, ecp
hegiyp igww nby byesp e wgiiwy ecgtew (nby lafwpc'i rfynn aq hbei
nasi gi hen) nlseilbgcr ecp nlsetkwgcr ekafi gc iby lbgtcyo lwany
ekavy bys:  ibyc, neogcr ia bysnywq `Ibgn gn Kgww,' nby revy acy
nbesx dgld, ecp hegiyp ia nyy hbei hafwp bexxyc cymi.

  Iby qgsni ibgcr nby byesp hen e rycysew lbasfn aq `Ibysy rayn
Kgww!' ibyc iby Sekkgi'n vagly ewacr--`Leilb bgt, oaf ko iby
bypry!' ibyc ngwycly, ecp ibyc ecaibys lacqfngac aq vaglyn--`Bawp
fx bgn byep--Ksecpo cah--Pac'i lbady bgt--Bah hen gi, awp qywwah?
Hbei bexxycyp ia oaf?  Iyww fn eww ekafi gi!'

  Weni lety e wgiiwy qyykwy, nzfyedgcr vagly, (`Ibei'n Kgww,'
ibafrbi Ewgly,) `Hyww, G bespwo dcah--Ca tasy, ibecd oy; G't
kyiiys cah--kfi G't e pyew iaa qwfniysyp ia iyww oaf--eww G dcah
gn, natyibgcr latyn ei ty wgdy e Jeld-gc-iby-kam, ecp fx G rayn
wgdy e ndo-saldyi!'

  `Na oaf pgp, awp qywwah!' negp iby aibysn.

  `Hy tfni kfsc iby bafny pahc!' negp iby Sekkgi'n vagly; ecp
Ewgly lewwyp afi en wafp en nby lafwp, `Gq oaf pa.  G'ww nyi
Pgceb ei oaf!'

  Ibysy hen e pyep ngwycly gcnieciwo, ecp Ewgly ibafrbi ia
bysnywq, `G hacpys hbei ibyo HGWW pa cymi!  Gq ibyo bep eco
nycny, ibyo'p iedy iby saaq aqq.'  Eqiys e tgcfiy as iha, ibyo
kyrec tavgcr ekafi eregc, ecp Ewgly byesp iby Sekkgi neo, `E
kessahqfw hgww pa, ia kyrgc hgib.'

  `E kessahqfw aq HBEI?' ibafrbi Ewgly; kfi nby bep cai wacr ia
pafki, qas iby cymi tatyci e nbahys aq wgiiwy xykkwyn lety
seiiwgcr gc ei iby hgcpah, ecp naty aq ibyt bgi bys gc iby qely.
`G'ww xfi e niax ia ibgn,' nby negp ia bysnywq, ecp nbafiyp afi,
`Oaf'p kyiiys cai pa ibei eregc!' hbglb xsapflyp ecaibys pyep
ngwycly.

  Ewgly caiglyp hgib naty nfsxsgny ibei iby xykkwyn hysy eww
ifscgcr gcia wgiiwy ledyn en ibyo weo ac iby qwaas, ecp e ksgrbi
gpye lety gcia bys byep.  `Gq G yei acy aq ibyny ledyn,' nby
ibafrbi, `gi'n nfsy ia tedy NATY lbecry gc to nguy; ecp en gi
lec'i xanngkwo tedy ty wesrys, gi tfni tedy ty ntewwys, G
nfxxany.'

  Na nby nhewwahyp acy aq iby ledyn, ecp hen pywgrbiyp ia qgcp
ibei nby kyrec nbsgcdgcr pgsyliwo.  En naac en nby hen nteww
ycafrb ia ryi ibsafrb iby paas, nby sec afi aq iby bafny, ecp
qafcp zfgiy e lsahp aq wgiiwy ecgtewn ecp kgspn hegigcr afingpy.
Iby xaas wgiiwy Wguesp, Kgww, hen gc iby tgppwy, kygcr bywp fx ko
iha rfgcye-xgrn, hba hysy rgvgcr gi natyibgcr afi aq e kaiiwy.
Ibyo eww tepy e sfnb ei Ewgly iby tatyci nby exxyesyp; kfi nby
sec aqq en besp en nby lafwp, ecp naac qafcp bysnywq neqy gc e
ibgld haap.

  `Iby qgsni ibgcr G'vy rai ia pa,' negp Ewgly ia bysnywq, en nby
hecpysyp ekafi gc iby haap, `gn ia rsah ia to sgrbi nguy eregc;
ecp iby nylacp ibgcr gn ia qgcp to heo gcia ibei wavywo respyc.
G ibgcd ibei hgww ky iby kyni xwec.'

  Gi nafcpyp ec ymlywwyci xwec, ca pafki, ecp vyso cyeiwo ecp
ngtxwo essecryp; iby acwo pgqqglfwio hen, ibei nby bep cai iby
ntewwyni gpye bah ia nyi ekafi gi; ecp hbgwy nby hen xyysgcr
ekafi ecmgafnwo etacr iby isyyn, e wgiiwy nbesx kesd jfni avys
bys byep tepy bys waad fx gc e rsyei bfsso.

  Ec ycastafn xfxxo hen waadgcr pahc ei bys hgib wesry safcp
yoyn, ecp qyykwo nisyilbgcr afi acy xeh, isogcr ia iaflb bys.
`Xaas wgiiwy ibgcr!' negp Ewgly, gc e laemgcr iacy, ecp nby isgyp
besp ia hbgniwy ia gi; kfi nby hen iyssgkwo qsgrbiycyp eww iby
igty ei iby ibafrbi ibei gi tgrbi ky bfcrso, gc hbglb leny gi
hafwp ky vyso wgdywo ia yei bys fx gc nxgiy aq eww bys laemgcr.

  Bespwo dcahgcr hbei nby pgp, nby xgldyp fx e wgiiwy kgi aq
nigld, ecp bywp gi afi ia iby xfxxo; hbysyfxac iby xfxxo jftxyp
gcia iby egs aqq eww gin qyyi ei acly, hgib e oywx aq pywgrbi,
ecp sfnbyp ei iby nigld, ecp tepy kywgyvy ia hasso gi; ibyc Ewgly
papryp kybgcp e rsyei ibgniwy, ia dyyx bysnywq qsat kygcr sfc
avys; ecp iby tatyci nby exxyesyp ac iby aibys ngpy, iby xfxxo
tepy ecaibys sfnb ei iby nigld, ecp iftkwyp byep avys byywn gc
gin bfsso ia ryi bawp aq gi; ibyc Ewgly, ibgcdgcr gi hen vyso
wgdy bevgcr e rety aq xweo hgib e lesi-basny, ecp ymxyligcr yvyso
tatyci ia ky isetxwyp fcpys gin qyyi, sec safcp iby ibgniwy
eregc; ibyc iby xfxxo kyrec e nysgyn aq nbasi lbesryn ei iby
nigld, sfccgcr e vyso wgiiwy heo qashespn yelb igty ecp e wacr
heo keld, ecp kesdgcr baesnywo eww iby hbgwy, igww ei weni gi nei
pahc e raap heo aqq, xecigcr, hgib gin iacrfy becrgcr afi aq gin
tafib, ecp gin rsyei yoyn bewq nbfi.

  Ibgn nyytyp ia Ewgly e raap axxasifcgio qas tedgcr bys ynlexy;
na nby nyi aqq ei acly, ecp sec igww nby hen zfgiy igsyp ecp afi
aq ksyeib, ecp igww iby xfxxo'n kesd nafcpyp zfgiy qegci gc iby
pgniecly.

  `Ecp oyi hbei e pyes wgiiwy xfxxo gi hen!' negp Ewgly, en nby
wyeci eregcni e kfiiyslfx ia syni bysnywq, ecp qeccyp bysnywq
hgib acy aq iby wyevyn:  `G nbafwp bevy wgdyp iyelbgcr gi isgldn
vyso tflb, gq--gq G'p acwo kyyc iby sgrbi nguy ia pa gi!  Ab
pyes!  G'p cyeswo qasraiiyc ibei G'vy rai ia rsah fx eregc!  Wyi
ty nyy--bah GN gi ia ky teceryp?  G nfxxany G afrbi ia yei as
psgcd natyibgcr as aibys; kfi iby rsyei zfynigac gn, hbei?'

  Iby rsyei zfynigac lysiegcwo hen, hbei?  Ewgly waadyp eww safcp
bys ei iby qwahysn ecp iby kwepyn aq rsenn, kfi nby pgp cai nyy
ecoibgcr ibei waadyp wgdy iby sgrbi ibgcr ia yei as psgcd fcpys
iby lgslftnieclyn.  Ibysy hen e wesry tfnbsaat rsahgcr cyes bys,
ekafi iby nety bygrbi en bysnywq; ecp hbyc nby bep waadyp fcpys
gi, ecp ac kaib ngpyn aq gi, ecp kybgcp gi, gi allfssyp ia bys
ibei nby tgrbi en hyww waad ecp nyy hbei hen ac iby iax aq gi.

  Nby nisyilbyp bysnywq fx ac igxiay, ecp xyyxyp avys iby ypry aq
iby tfnbsaat, ecp bys yoyn gttypgeiywo tyi ibany aq e wesry
leiysxgwwes, ibei hen ngiigcr ac iby iax hgib gin estn qawpyp,
zfgyiwo ntadgcr e wacr baadeb, ecp iedgcr cai iby ntewwyni caigly
aq bys as aq ecoibgcr ywny.



                            LBEXIYS V

                    Epvgly qsat e Leiysxgwwes


  Iby Leiysxgwwes ecp Ewgly waadyp ei yelb aibys qas naty igty gc
ngwycly:  ei weni iby Leiysxgwwes iaad iby baadeb afi aq gin
tafib, ecp eppsynnyp bys gc e wecrfgp, nwyyxo vagly.

  `Hba esy OAF?' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  Ibgn hen cai ec yclafsergcr axycgcr qas e lacvysneigac.  Ewgly
syxwgyp, seibys nbowo, `G--G bespwo dcah, ngs, jfni ei xsynyci--
ei wyeni G dcah hba G HEN hbyc G rai fx ibgn tascgcr, kfi G ibgcd
G tfni bevy kyyc lbecryp nyvysew igtyn ngcly ibyc.'

  `Hbei pa oaf tyec ko ibei?' negp iby Leiysxgwwes niyscwo.
`Ymxwegc oafsnywq!'

  `G lec'i ymxwegc TONYWQ, G't eqsegp, ngs' negp Ewgly, `kylefny
G't cai tonywq, oaf nyy.'

  `G pac'i nyy,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  `G't eqsegp G lec'i xfi gi tasy lwyeswo,' Ewgly syxwgyp vyso
xawgiywo, `qas G lec'i fcpysniecp gi tonywq ia kyrgc hgib; ecp
kygcr na teco pgqqysyci nguyn gc e peo gn vyso lacqfngcr.'

  `Gi gnc'i,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  `Hyww, xysbexn oaf bevyc'i qafcp gi na oyi,' negp Ewgly; `kfi
hbyc oaf bevy ia ifsc gcia e lbsonewgn--oaf hgww naty peo, oaf
dcah--ecp ibyc eqiys ibei gcia e kfiiysqwo, G nbafwp ibgcd oaf'ww
qyyw gi e wgiiwy zfyys, hac'i oaf?'

  `Cai e kgi,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  `Hyww, xysbexn oafs qyywgcrn teo ky pgqqysyci,' negp Ewgly;
`eww G dcah gn, gi hafwp qyyw vyso zfyys ia TY.'

  `Oaf!' negp iby Leiysxgwwes laciytxifafnwo.  `Hba esy OAF?'

  Hbglb ksafrbi ibyt keld eregc ia iby kyrgccgcr aq iby
lacvysneigac.  Ewgly qywi e wgiiwy gssgieiyp ei iby Leiysxgwwes'n
tedgcr nflb VYSO nbasi sytesdn, ecp nby psyh bysnywq fx ecp negp,
vyso rsevywo, `G ibgcd, oaf afrbi ia iyww ty hba OAF esy, qgsni.'

  `Hbo?' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  Bysy hen ecaibys xfuuwgcr zfynigac; ecp en Ewgly lafwp cai
ibgcd aq eco raap syenac, ecp en iby Leiysxgwwes nyytyp ia ky gc
e VYSO fcxwyeneci nieiy aq tgcp, nby ifscyp eheo.

  `Laty keld!' iby Leiysxgwwes lewwyp eqiys bys.  `G'vy natyibgcr
gtxasieci ia neo!'

  Ibgn nafcpyp xsatgngcr, lysiegcwo:  Ewgly ifscyp ecp lety keld
eregc.

  `Dyyx oafs iytxys,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  `Gn ibei eww?' negp Ewgly, nhewwahgcr pahc bys ecrys en hyww en
nby lafwp.

  `Ca,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  Ewgly ibafrbi nby tgrbi en hyww hegi, en nby bep caibgcr ywny
ia pa, ecp xysbexn eqiys eww gi tgrbi iyww bys natyibgcr hasib
byesgcr.  Qas naty tgcfiyn gi xfqqyp eheo hgibafi nxyedgcr, kfi
ei weni gi fcqawpyp gin estn, iaad iby baadeb afi aq gin tafib
eregc, ecp negp, `Na oaf ibgcd oaf'sy lbecryp, pa oaf?'

  `G't eqsegp G et, ngs,' negp Ewgly; `G lec'i sytytkys ibgcrn en
G fnyp--ecp G pac'i dyyx iby nety nguy qas iyc tgcfiyn iaryibys!'

  `Lec'i sytytkys HBEI ibgcrn?' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  `Hyww, G'vy isgyp ia neo "BAH PAIB IBY WGIIWY KFNO KYY," kfi gi
eww lety pgqqysyci!' Ewgly syxwgyp gc e vyso tyweclbawo vagly.

  `Syxyei, "OAF ESY AWP, QEIBYS HGWWGET,"' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  Ewgly qawpyp bys becpn, ecp kyrec:--

    `Oaf esy awp, Qeibys Hgwwget,' iby oafcr tec negp,
      `Ecp oafs begs ben kylaty vyso hbgiy;
    Ecp oyi oaf gclynneciwo niecp ac oafs byep--
      Pa oaf ibgcd, ei oafs ery, gi gn sgrbi?'

    `Gc to oafib,' Qeibys Hgwwget syxwgyp ia bgn nac,
      `G qyesyp gi tgrbi gcjfsy iby ksegc;
    Kfi, cah ibei G't xysqyliwo nfsy G bevy cacy,
      Hbo, G pa gi eregc ecp eregc.'

    `Oaf esy awp,' negp iby oafib, `en G tycigacyp kyqasy,
      Ecp bevy rsahc tani fclattacwo qei;
    Oyi oaf ifscyp e keld-natysnefwi gc ei iby paas--
      Xseo, hbei gn iby syenac aq ibei?'

    `Gc to oafib,' negp iby nery, en by nbaad bgn rsyo waldn,
      `G dyxi eww to wgtkn vyso nfxxwy
    Ko iby fny aq ibgn agcityci--acy nbgwwgcr iby kam--
      Ewwah ty ia nyww oaf e lafxwy?'

    `Oaf esy awp,' negp iby oafib, `ecp oafs jehn esy iaa hyed
      Qas ecoibgcr iafrbys ibec nfyi;
    Oyi oaf qgcgnbyp iby raany, hgib iby kacyn ecp iby kyed--
      Xseo bah pgp oaf tecery ia pa gi?'

    `Gc to oafib,' negp bgn qeibys, `G iaad ia iby weh,
      Ecp esrfyp yelb leny hgib to hgqy;
    Ecp iby tfnlfwes nisycrib, hbglb gi revy ia to jeh,
      Ben weniyp iby syni aq to wgqy.'

    `Oaf esy awp,' negp iby oafib, `acy hafwp bespwo nfxxany
      Ibei oafs yoy hen en niyepo en yvys;
    Oyi oaf keweclyp ec yyw ac iby ycp aq oafs cany--
      Hbei tepy oaf na ehqfwwo lwyvys?'

    `G bevy ecnhysyp ibsyy zfynigacn, ecp ibei gn ycafrb,'
      Negp bgn qeibys; `pac'i rgvy oafsnywq egsn!
    Pa oaf ibgcd G lec wgniyc eww peo ia nflb nifqq?
      Ky aqq, as G'ww dgld oaf pahc niegsn!'


  `Ibei gn cai negp sgrbi,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  `Cai ZFGIY sgrbi, G't eqsegp,' negp Ewgly, igtgpwo; `naty aq iby
haspn bevy rai ewiysyp.'

  `Gi gn hsacr qsat kyrgccgcr ia ycp,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes
pylgpypwo, ecp ibysy hen ngwycly qas naty tgcfiyn.

  Iby Leiysxgwwes hen iby qgsni ia nxyed.

  `Hbei nguy pa oaf heci ia ky?' gi endyp.

  `Ab, G't cai xesiglfwes en ia nguy,' Ewgly benigwo syxwgyp;
`acwo acy paync'i wgdy lbecrgcr na aqiyc, oaf dcah.'

  `G PAC'I dcah,' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  Ewgly negp caibgcr:  nby bep cyvys kyyc na tflb lacisepgliyp gc
bys wgqy kyqasy, ecp nby qywi ibei nby hen wangcr bys iytxys.

  `Esy oaf laciyci cah?' negp iby Leiysxgwwes.

  `Hyww, G nbafwp wgdy ia ky e WGIIWY wesrys, ngs, gq oaf
hafwpc'i tgcp,' negp Ewgly:  `ibsyy gclbyn gn nflb e hsyilbyp
bygrbi ia ky.'

                           LBEXIYS VG

  En naac en nby bep tepy afi iby xsaxys heo aq cfsngcr gi,
(hbglb hen ia ihgni gi fx gcia e nasi aq dcai, ecp ibyc dyyx
igrbi bawp aq gin sgrbi yes ecp wyqi qaai, na en ia xsyvyci gin
fcpagcr ginywq,) nby lessgyp gi afi gcia iby axyc egs.  `GQ G
pac'i iedy ibgn lbgwp eheo hgib ty,' ibafrbi Ewgly, `ibyo'sy nfsy
ia dgww gi gc e peo as iha:  hafwpc'i gi ky tfspys ia wyevy gi
kybgcp?'  Nby negp iby weni haspn afi wafp, ecp iby wgiiwy ibgcr
rsfciyp gc syxwo (gi bep wyqi aqq ncyyugcr ko ibgn igty).  `Pac'i
rsfci,' negp Ewgly; `ibei'n cai ei eww e xsaxys heo aq ymxsynngcr
oafsnywq.'

  Iby keko rsfciyp eregc, ecp Ewgly waadyp vyso ecmgafnwo gcia
gin qely ia nyy hbei hen iby teiiys hgib gi.  Ibysy lafwp ky ca
pafki ibei gi bep e VYSO ifsc-fx cany, tflb tasy wgdy e ncafi
ibec e syew cany; ewna gin yoyn hysy ryiigcr ymisytywo nteww qas
e keko:  ewiaryibys Ewgly pgp cai wgdy iby waad aq iby ibgcr ei
eww.  `Kfi xysbexn gi hen acwo nakkgcr,' nby ibafrbi, ecp waadyp
gcia gin yoyn eregc, ia nyy gq ibysy hysy eco iyesn.

  Ca, ibysy hysy ca iyesn.  `Gq oaf'sy ragcr ia ifsc gcia e xgr,
to pyes,' negp Ewgly, nysgafnwo, `G'ww bevy caibgcr tasy ia pa
hgib oaf.  Tgcp cah!'  Iby xaas wgiiwy ibgcr nakkyp eregc (as
rsfciyp, gi hen gtxanngkwy ia neo hbglb), ecp ibyo hyci ac qas
naty hbgwy gc ngwycly.

  Ewgly hen jfni kyrgccgcr ia ibgcd ia bysnywq, `Cah, hbei et G
ia pa hgib ibgn lsyeifsy hbyc G ryi gi baty?' hbyc gi rsfciyp
eregc, na vgawyciwo, ibei nby waadyp pahc gcia gin qely gc naty
ewest.  Ibgn igty ibysy lafwp ky CA tgniedy ekafi gi:  gi hen
cygibys tasy cas wynn ibec e xgr, ecp nby qywi ibei gi hafwp ky
zfgiy eknfsp qas bys ia lesso gi qfsibys.

  Na nby nyi iby wgiiwy lsyeifsy pahc, ecp qywi zfgiy sywgyvyp ia
nyy gi isai eheo zfgyiwo gcia iby haap.  `Gq gi bep rsahc fx,'
nby negp ia bysnywq, `gi hafwp bevy tepy e psyepqfwwo frwo lbgwp:
kfi gi tedyn seibys e becpnaty xgr, G ibgcd.'  Ecp nby kyrec
ibgcdgcr avys aibys lbgwpsyc nby dcyh, hba tgrbi pa vyso hyww en
xgrn, ecp hen jfni neogcr ia bysnywq, `gq acy acwo dcyh iby sgrbi
heo ia lbecry ibyt--' hbyc nby hen e wgiiwy niesiwyp ko nyygcr
iby Lbynbgsy Lei ngiigcr ac e kafrb aq e isyy e qyh oespn aqq.

  Iby Lei acwo rsgccyp hbyc gi neh Ewgly.  Gi waadyp raap-
ceifsyp, nby ibafrbi:  nigww gi bep VYSO wacr lwehn ecp e rsyei
teco iyyib, na nby qywi ibei gi afrbi ia ky isyeiyp hgib synxyli.

  `Lbynbgsy Xfnn,' nby kyrec, seibys igtgpwo, en nby pgp cai ei
eww dcah hbyibys gi hafwp wgdy iby cety:  bahyvys, gi acwo
rsgccyp e wgiiwy hgpys.  `Laty, gi'n xwyenyp na qes,' ibafrbi
Ewgly, ecp nby hyci ac.  `Hafwp oaf iyww ty, xwyeny, hbglb heo G
afrbi ia ra qsat bysy?'

  `Ibei pyxycpn e raap pyew ac hbysy oaf heci ia ryi ia,' negp
iby Lei.

  `G pac'i tflb lesy hbysy--' negp Ewgly.

  `Ibyc gi paync'i teiiys hbglb heo oaf ra,' negp iby Lei.

  `--na wacr en G ryi NATYHBYSY,' Ewgly eppyp en ec ymxweceigac.

  `Ab, oaf'sy nfsy ia pa ibei,' negp iby Lei, `gq oaf acwo hewd
wacr ycafrb.'

  Ewgly qywi ibei ibgn lafwp cai ky pycgyp, na nby isgyp ecaibys
zfynigac.  `Hbei nasi aq xyaxwy wgvy ekafi bysy?'

  `Gc IBEI pgsyligac,' iby Lei negp, hevgcr gin sgrbi xeh safcp,
`wgvyn e Beiiys:  ecp gc IBEI pgsyligac,' hevgcr iby aibys xeh,
`wgvyn e Teslb Besy.  Vgngi ygibys oaf wgdy:  ibyo'sy kaib tep.'

  `Kfi G pac'i heci ia ra etacr tep xyaxwy,' Ewgly sytesdyp.

  `Ab, oaf lec'i bywx ibei,' negp iby Lei:  `hy'sy eww tep bysy.
G't tep.  Oaf'sy tep.'

  `Bah pa oaf dcah G't tep?' negp Ewgly.

  `Oaf tfni ky,' negp iby Lei, `as oaf hafwpc'i bevy laty bysy.'

  Ewgly pgpc'i ibgcd ibei xsavyp gi ei eww; bahyvys, nby hyci ac
`Ecp bah pa oaf dcah ibei oaf'sy tep?'

  `Ia kyrgc hgib,' negp iby Lei, `e par'n cai tep.  Oaf rseci
ibei?'

  `G nfxxany na,' negp Ewgly.

  `Hyww, ibyc,' iby Lei hyci ac, `oaf nyy, e par rsahwn hbyc gi'n
ecrso, ecp hern gin iegw hbyc gi'n xwyenyp.  Cah G rsahw hbyc G't
xwyenyp, ecp her to iegw hbyc G't ecrso.  Ibysyqasy G't tep.'

  `G leww gi xfssgcr, cai rsahwgcr,' negp Ewgly.

  `Leww gi hbei oaf wgdy,' negp iby Lei.  `Pa oaf xweo lsazfyi
hgib iby Zfyyc ia-peo?'

  `G nbafwp wgdy gi vyso tflb,' negp Ewgly, `kfi G bevyc'i kyyc
gcvgiyp oyi.'

  `Oaf'ww nyy ty ibysy,' negp iby Lei, ecp vecgnbyp.

  Ewgly hen cai tflb nfsxsgnyp ei ibgn, nby hen ryiigcr na fnyp
ia zfyys ibgcrn bexxycgcr.  Hbgwy nby hen waadgcr ei iby xwely
hbysy gi bep kyyc, gi nfppycwo exxyesyp eregc.

  `Ko-iby-koy, hbei kylety aq iby keko?' negp iby Lei.  `G'p
cyeswo qasraiiyc ia end.'

  `Gi ifscyp gcia e xgr,' Ewgly zfgyiwo negp, jfni en gq gi bep
laty keld gc e ceifsew heo.

  `G ibafrbi gi hafwp,' negp iby Lei, ecp vecgnbyp eregc.

  Ewgly hegiyp e wgiiwy, bewq ymxyligcr ia nyy gi eregc, kfi gi
pgp cai exxyes, ecp eqiys e tgcfiy as iha nby hewdyp ac gc iby
pgsyligac gc hbglb iby Teslb Besy hen negp ia wgvy.  `G'vy nyyc
beiiysn kyqasy,' nby negp ia bysnywq; `iby Teslb Besy hgww ky
tflb iby tani gciysynigcr, ecp xysbexn en ibgn gn Teo gi hac'i ky
sevgcr tep--ei wyeni cai na tep en gi hen gc Teslb.'  En nby negp
ibgn, nby waadyp fx, ecp ibysy hen iby Lei eregc, ngiigcr ac e
kseclb aq e isyy.

  `Pgp oaf neo xgr, as qgr?' negp iby Lei.

  `G negp xgr,' syxwgyp Ewgly; `ecp G hgnb oaf hafwpc'i dyyx
exxyesgcr ecp vecgnbgcr na nfppycwo:  oaf tedy acy zfgiy rgppo.'

  `Eww sgrbi,' negp iby Lei; ecp ibgn igty gi vecgnbyp zfgiy nwahwo,
kyrgccgcr hgib iby ycp aq iby iegw, ecp ycpgcr hgib iby rsgc,
hbglb sytegcyp naty igty eqiys iby syni aq gi bep racy.

  `Hyww!  G'vy aqiyc nyyc e lei hgibafi e rsgc,' ibafrbi Ewgly;
`kfi e rsgc hgibafi e lei!  Gi'n iby tani lfsgafn ibgcr G yvys
neh gc to wgqy!'

  Nby bep cai racy tflb qesibys kyqasy nby lety gc ngrbi aq iby
bafny aq iby Teslb Besy:  nby ibafrbi gi tfni ky iby sgrbi bafny,
kylefny iby lbgtcyon hysy nbexyp wgdy yesn ecp iby saaq hen
ibeilbyp hgib qfs.  Gi hen na wesry e bafny, ibei nby pgp cai
wgdy ia ra cyesys igww nby bep cgkkwyp naty tasy aq iby wyqibecp
kgi aq tfnbsaat, ecp segnyp bysnywq ia ekafi iha qyyi bgrb:  yvyc
ibyc nby hewdyp fx iahespn gi seibys igtgpwo, neogcr ia bysnywq
`Nfxxany gi nbafwp ky sevgcr tep eqiys eww!  G ewtani hgnb G'p
racy ia nyy iby Beiiys gcniyep!'



                           LBEXIYS VGG

                         E Tep Iye-Xesio


  Ibysy hen e iekwy nyi afi fcpys e isyy gc qsaci aq iby bafny,
ecp iby Teslb Besy ecp iby Beiiys hysy bevgcr iye ei gi:  e
Pastafny hen ngiigcr kyihyyc ibyt, qeni enwyyx, ecp iby aibys iha
hysy fngcr gi en e lfnbgac, synigcr ibygs ywkahn ac gi, ecp iewdgcr
avys gin byep.  `Vyso fclatqasiekwy qas iby Pastafny,' ibafrbi Ewgly;
`acwo, en gi'n enwyyx, G nfxxany gi paync'i tgcp.'

  Iby iekwy hen e wesry acy, kfi iby ibsyy hysy eww lsahpyp
iaryibys ei acy lascys aq gi:  `Ca saat!  Ca saat!' ibyo lsgyp
afi hbyc ibyo neh Ewgly latgcr.  `Ibysy'n XWYCIO aq saat!' negp
Ewgly gcpgrceciwo, ecp nby nei pahc gc e wesry est-lbegs ei acy
ycp aq iby iekwy.

  `Bevy naty hgcy,' iby Teslb Besy negp gc ec yclafsergcr iacy.

  Ewgly waadyp eww safcp iby iekwy, kfi ibysy hen caibgcr ac gi
kfi iye.  `G pac'i nyy eco hgcy,' nby sytesdyp.

  `Ibysy gnc'i eco,' negp iby Teslb Besy.

  `Ibyc gi henc'i vyso lgvgw aq oaf ia aqqys gi,' negp Ewgly
ecrsgwo.

  `Gi henc'i vyso lgvgw aq oaf ia ngi pahc hgibafi kygcr
gcvgiyp,' negp iby Teslb Besy.

  `G pgpc'i dcah gi hen OAFS iekwy,' negp Ewgly; `gi'n wegp qas e
rsyei teco tasy ibec ibsyy.'

  `Oafs begs hecin lfiigcr,' negp iby Beiiys.  By bep kyyc
waadgcr ei Ewgly qas naty igty hgib rsyei lfsgangio, ecp ibgn hen
bgn qgsni nxyylb.

  `Oaf nbafwp wyesc cai ia tedy xysnacew sytesdn,' Ewgly negp
hgib naty nyvysgio; `gi'n vyso sfpy.'

  Iby Beiiys axycyp bgn yoyn vyso hgpy ac byesgcr ibgn; kfi eww
by NEGP hen, `Hbo gn e sevyc wgdy e hsgigcr-pynd?'

  `Laty, hy nbeww bevy naty qfc cah!' ibafrbi Ewgly.  `G't rwep
ibyo'vy kyrfc endgcr sgppwyn.--G kywgyvy G lec rfynn ibei,' nby
eppyp ewafp.

  `Pa oaf tyec ibei oaf ibgcd oaf lec qgcp afi iby ecnhys ia gi?'
negp iby Teslb Besy.

  `Ymeliwo na,' negp Ewgly.

  `Ibyc oaf nbafwp neo hbei oaf tyec,' iby Teslb Besy hyci ac.

  `G pa,' Ewgly benigwo syxwgyp; `ei wyeni--ei wyeni G tyec hbei
G neo--ibei'n iby nety ibgcr, oaf dcah.'

  `Cai iby nety ibgcr e kgi!' negp iby Beiiys.  `Oaf tgrbi jfni
en hyww neo ibei "G nyy hbei G yei" gn iby nety ibgcr en "G yei
hbei G nyy"!'

  `Oaf tgrbi jfni en hyww neo,' eppyp iby Teslb Besy, `ibei "G
wgdy hbei G ryi" gn iby nety ibgcr en "G ryi hbei G wgdy"!'

  `Oaf tgrbi jfni en hyww neo,' eppyp iby Pastafny, hba nyytyp ia
ky iewdgcr gc bgn nwyyx, `ibei "G ksyeiby hbyc G nwyyx" gn iby
nety ibgcr en "G nwyyx hbyc G ksyeiby"!'

  `Gi GN iby nety ibgcr hgib oaf,' negp iby Beiiys, ecp bysy iby
lacvysneigac psaxxyp, ecp iby xesio nei ngwyci qas e tgcfiy,
hbgwy Ewgly ibafrbi avys eww nby lafwp sytytkys ekafi sevycn ecp
hsgigcr-pyndn, hbglb henc'i tflb.

  Iby Beiiys hen iby qgsni ia ksyed iby ngwycly.  `Hbei peo aq
iby tacib gn gi?' by negp, ifscgcr ia Ewgly:  by bep iedyc bgn
heilb afi aq bgn xaldyi, ecp hen waadgcr ei gi fcyengwo, nbedgcr
gi yvyso cah ecp ibyc, ecp bawpgcr gi ia bgn yes.

  Ewgly lacngpysyp e wgiiwy, ecp ibyc negp `Iby qafsib.'

  `Iha peon hsacr!' ngrbyp iby Beiiys.  `G iawp oaf kfiiys
hafwpc'i nfgi iby hasdn!' by eppyp waadgcr ecrsgwo ei iby Teslb

  `Gi hen iby KYNI kfiiys,' iby Teslb Besy tyydwo syxwgyp.

  `Oyn, kfi naty lsftkn tfni bevy rai gc en hyww,' iby Beiiys
rsftkwyp:  `oaf nbafwpc'i bevy xfi gi gc hgib iby ksyep-dcgqy.'

  Iby Teslb Besy iaad iby heilb ecp waadyp ei gi rwaatgwo:  ibyc
by pgxxyp gi gcia bgn lfx aq iye, ecp waadyp ei gi eregc:  kfi by
lafwp ibgcd aq caibgcr kyiiys ia neo ibec bgn qgsni sytesd, `Gi

  Ewgly bep kyyc waadgcr avys bgn nbafwpys hgib naty lfsgangio.
`Hbei e qfcco heilb!' nby sytesdyp.  `Gi iywwn iby peo aq iby
tacib, ecp paync'i iyww hbei a'lwald gi gn!'

  `Hbo nbafwp gi?' tfiiysyp iby Beiiys.  `Payn OAFS heilb iyww
oaf hbei oyes gi gn?'

  `Aq lafsny cai,' Ewgly syxwgyp vyso syepgwo:  `kfi ibei'n
kylefny gi nieon iby nety oyes qas nflb e wacr igty iaryibys.'

  `Hbglb gn jfni iby leny hgib TGCY,' negp iby Beiiys.

  Ewgly qywi psyepqfwwo xfuuwyp.  Iby Beiiys'n sytesd nyytyp ia
bevy ca nasi aq tyecgcr gc gi, ecp oyi gi hen lysiegcwo Ycrwgnb.
`G pac'i zfgiy fcpysniecp oaf,' nby negp, en xawgiywo en nby
lafwp.

  `Iby Pastafny gn enwyyx eregc,' negp iby Beiiys, ecp by xafsyp

  Iby Pastafny nbaad gin byep gtxeigyciwo, ecp negp, hgibafi
axycgcr gin yoyn, `Aq lafsny, aq lafsny; jfni hbei G hen ragcr ia
sytesd tonywq.'

  `Bevy oaf rfynnyp iby sgppwy oyi?' iby Beiiys negp, ifscgcr ia
Ewgly eregc.

  `Ca, G rgvy gi fx,' Ewgly syxwgyp:  `hbei'n iby ecnhys?'

  `G bevyc'i iby nwgrbiyni gpye,' negp iby Beiiys.

  `Cas G,' negp iby Teslb Besy.

  Ewgly ngrbyp hyesgwo.  `G ibgcd oaf tgrbi pa natyibgcr kyiiys
hgib iby igty,' nby negp, `ibec heniy gi gc endgcr sgppwyn ibei
bevy ca ecnhysn.'

  `Gq oaf dcyh Igty en hyww en G pa,' negp iby Beiiys, `oaf
hafwpc'i iewd ekafi henigcr GI.  Gi'n BGT.'

  `G pac'i dcah hbei oaf tyec,' negp Ewgly.

  `Aq lafsny oaf pac'i!' iby Beiiys negp, ianngcr bgn byep
laciytxifafnwo.  `G pesy neo oaf cyvys yvyc nxady ia Igty!'

  `Xysbexn cai,' Ewgly lefigafnwo syxwgyp:  `kfi G dcah G bevy ia
kyei igty hbyc G wyesc tfngl.'

  `Eb! ibei ellafcin qas gi,' negp iby Beiiys.  `By hac'i niecp
kyeigcr.  Cah, gq oaf acwo dyxi ac raap iystn hgib bgt, by'p pa
ewtani ecoibgcr oaf wgdyp hgib iby lwald.  Qas gcniecly, nfxxany
gi hysy cgcy a'lwald gc iby tascgcr, jfni igty ia kyrgc wynnacn:
oaf'p acwo bevy ia hbgnxys e bgci ia Igty, ecp safcp rayn iby
lwald gc e ihgcdwgcr!  Bewq-xeni acy, igty qas pgccys!'

  (`G acwo hgnb gi hen,' iby Teslb Besy negp ia ginywq gc e
hbgnxys.)

  `Ibei hafwp ky rsecp, lysiegcwo,' negp Ewgly ibafrbiqfwwo:
`kfi ibyc--G nbafwpc'i ky bfcrso qas gi, oaf dcah.'

  `Cai ei qgsni, xysbexn,' negp iby Beiiys:  `kfi oaf lafwp dyyx
gi ia bewq-xeni acy en wacr en oaf wgdyp.'

  `Gn ibei iby heo OAF tecery?' Ewgly endyp.

  Iby Beiiys nbaad bgn byep tafscqfwwo.  `Cai G!' by syxwgyp.
`Hy zfessywwyp weni Teslb--jfni kyqasy BY hyci tep, oaf dcah--'
(xagcigcr hgib bgn iye nxaac ei iby Teslb Besy,) `--gi hen ei iby
rsyei laclysi rgvyc ko iby Zfyyc aq Byesin, ecp G bep ia ngcr

            "Ihgcdwy, ihgcdwy, wgiiwy kei!
            Bah G hacpys hbei oaf'sy ei!"

Oaf dcah iby nacr, xysbexn?'

  `G'vy byesp natyibgcr wgdy gi,' negp Ewgly.

  `Gi rayn ac, oaf dcah,' iby Beiiys lacigcfyp, `gc ibgn heo:--

            "Fx ekavy iby haswp oaf qwo,
            Wgdy e iye-iseo gc iby ndo.
                    Ihgcdwy, ihgcdwy--"'

Bysy iby Pastafny nbaad ginywq, ecp kyrec ngcrgcr gc gin nwyyx
`Ihgcdwy, ihgcdwy, ihgcdwy, ihgcdwy--' ecp hyci ac na wacr ibei
ibyo bep ia xgclb gi ia tedy gi niax.

  `Hyww, G'p bespwo qgcgnbyp iby qgsni vysny,' negp iby Beiiys,
`hbyc iby Zfyyc jftxyp fx ecp kehwyp afi, "By'n tfspysgcr iby
igty!  Aqq hgib bgn byep!"'

  `Bah psyepqfwwo nevery!' ymlwegtyp Ewgly.

  `Ecp yvys ngcly ibei,' iby Beiiys hyci ac gc e tafscqfw iacy,
`by hac'i pa e ibgcr G end!  Gi'n ewheon ngm a'lwald cah.'

  E ksgrbi gpye lety gcia Ewgly'n byep.  `Gn ibei iby syenac na
teco iye-ibgcrn esy xfi afi bysy?' nby endyp.

  `Oyn, ibei'n gi,' negp iby Beiiys hgib e ngrb:  `gi'n ewheon
iye-igty, ecp hy'vy ca igty ia henb iby ibgcrn kyihyyc hbgwyn.'

  `Ibyc oaf dyyx tavgcr safcp, G nfxxany?' negp Ewgly.

  `Ymeliwo na,' negp iby Beiiys:  `en iby ibgcrn ryi fnyp fx.'

  `Kfi hbei bexxycn hbyc oaf laty ia iby kyrgccgcr eregc?' Ewgly
vycifsyp ia end.

  `Nfxxany hy lbecry iby nfkjyli,' iby Teslb Besy gciyssfxiyp,
oehcgcr.  `G't ryiigcr igsyp aq ibgn.  G vaiy iby oafcr wepo
iywwn fn e niaso.'

  `G't eqsegp G pac'i dcah acy,' negp Ewgly, seibys ewestyp ei

  `Ibyc iby Pastafny nbeww!' ibyo kaib lsgyp.  `Hedy fx,
Pastafny!'  Ecp ibyo xgclbyp gi ac kaib ngpyn ei acly.

  Iby Pastafny nwahwo axycyp bgn yoyn.  `G henc'i enwyyx,' by
negp gc e baesny, qyykwy vagly:  `G byesp yvyso hasp oaf qywwahn
hysy neogcr.'

  `Iyww fn e niaso!' negp iby Teslb Besy.

  `Oyn, xwyeny pa!' xwyepyp Ewgly.

  `Ecp ky zfgld ekafi gi,' eppyp iby Beiiys, `as oaf'ww ky enwyyx
eregc kyqasy gi'n pacy.'

  `Acly fxac e igty ibysy hysy ibsyy wgiiwy ngniysn,' iby
Pastafny kyrec gc e rsyei bfsso; `ecp ibygs cetyn hysy Ywngy,
Welgy, ecp Igwwgy; ecp ibyo wgvyp ei iby kaiiat aq e hyww--'

  `Hbei pgp ibyo wgvy ac?' negp Ewgly, hba ewheon iaad e rsyei

  `Ibyo wgvyp ac isyelwy,' negp iby Pastafny, eqiys ibgcdgcr e

  `Ibyo lafwpc'i bevy pacy ibei, oaf dcah,' Ewgly ryciwo
sytesdyp; `ibyo'p bevy kyyc gww.'

  `Na ibyo hysy,' negp iby Pastafny; `VYSO gww.'

  Ewgly isgyp ia qeclo ia bysnywq hbei nflb ec ymiseaspgceso heon
aq wgvgcr hafwp ky wgdy, kfi gi xfuuwyp bys iaa tflb, na nby hyci

  `Iedy naty tasy iye,' iby Teslb Besy negp ia Ewgly, vyso

  `G'vy bep caibgcr oyi,' Ewgly syxwgyp gc ec aqqycpyp iacy, `na
G lec'i iedy tasy.'

  `Oaf tyec oaf lec'i iedy WYNN,' negp iby Beiiys:  `gi'n vyso
yeno ia iedy TASY ibec caibgcr.'

  `Cakapo endyp OAFS axgcgac,' negp Ewgly.

  `Hba'n tedgcr xysnacew sytesdn cah?' iby Beiiys endyp
isgftxbeciwo.

  Ewgly pgp cai zfgiy dcah hbei ia neo ia ibgn:  na nby bywxyp
bysnywq ia naty iye ecp ksyep-ecp-kfiiys, ecp ibyc ifscyp ia iby
Pastafny, ecp syxyeiyp bys zfynigac.  `Hbo pgp ibyo wgvy ei iby
kaiiat aq e hyww?'

  Iby Pastafny eregc iaad e tgcfiy as iha ia ibgcd ekafi gi, ecp
ibyc negp, `Gi hen e isyelwy-hyww.'

  `Ibysy'n ca nflb ibgcr!'  Ewgly hen kyrgccgcr vyso ecrsgwo, kfi
iby Beiiys ecp iby Teslb Besy hyci `Nb! nb!' ecp iby Pastafny
nfwdgwo sytesdyp, `Gq oaf lec'i ky lgvgw, oaf'p kyiiys qgcgnb iby
niaso qas oafsnywq.'

  `Ca, xwyeny ra ac!' Ewgly negp vyso bftkwo; `G hac'i gciyssfxi
eregc.  G pesy neo ibysy teo ky ACY.'

  `Acy, gcpyyp!' negp iby Pastafny gcpgrceciwo.  Bahyvys, by
lacnyciyp ia ra ac.  `Ecp na ibyny ibsyy wgiiwy ngniysn--ibyo
hysy wyescgcr ia pseh, oaf dcah--'

  `Hbei pgp ibyo pseh?' negp Ewgly, zfgiy qasryiigcr bys xsatgny.

  `Isyelwy,' negp iby Pastafny, hgibafi lacngpysgcr ei eww ibgn
igty.

  `G heci e lwyec lfx,' gciyssfxiyp iby Beiiys:  `wyi'n eww tavy
acy xwely ac.'

  By tavyp ac en by nxady, ecp iby Pastafny qawwahyp bgt:  iby
Teslb Besy tavyp gcia iby Pastafny'n xwely, ecp Ewgly seibys
fchgwwgcrwo iaad iby xwely aq iby Teslb Besy.  Iby Beiiys hen iby
acwo acy hba rai eco epveciery qsat iby lbecry:  ecp Ewgly hen e
raap pyew hasny aqq ibec kyqasy, en iby Teslb Besy bep jfni fxnyi
iby tgwd-jfr gcia bgn xweiy.

  Ewgly pgp cai hgnb ia aqqycp iby Pastafny eregc, na nby kyrec
vyso lefigafnwo:  `Kfi G pac'i fcpysniecp.  Hbysy pgp ibyo pseh
iby isyelwy qsat?'

  `Oaf lec pseh heiys afi aq e heiys-hyww,' negp iby Beiiys; `na
G nbafwp ibgcd oaf lafwp pseh isyelwy afi aq e isyelwy-hyww--yb,
nifxgp?'

  `Kfi ibyo hysy GC iby hyww,' Ewgly negp ia iby Pastafny, cai
lbaangcr ia caigly ibgn weni sytesd.

  `Aq lafsny ibyo hysy', negp iby Pastafny; `--hyww gc.'

  Ibgn ecnhys na lacqfnyp xaas Ewgly, ibei nby wyi iby Pastafny
ra ac qas naty igty hgibafi gciyssfxigcr gi.

  `Ibyo hysy wyescgcr ia pseh,' iby Pastafny hyci ac, oehcgcr ecp
sfkkgcr gin yoyn, qas gi hen ryiigcr vyso nwyyxo; `ecp ibyo psyh
eww teccys aq ibgcrn--yvysoibgcr ibei kyrgcn hgib ec T--'

  `Hbo hgib ec T?' negp Ewgly.

  `Hbo cai?' negp iby Teslb Besy.

  Ewgly hen ngwyci.

  Iby Pastafny bep lwanyp gin yoyn ko ibgn igty, ecp hen ragcr
aqq gcia e pauy; kfi, ac kygcr xgclbyp ko iby Beiiys, gi hady fx
eregc hgib e wgiiwy nbsgyd, ecp hyci ac:  `--ibei kyrgcn hgib ec
T, nflb en tafny-isexn, ecp iby taac, ecp tytaso, ecp tflbcynn--
oaf dcah oaf neo ibgcrn esy "tflb aq e tflbcynn"--pgp oaf yvys
nyy nflb e ibgcr en e psehgcr aq e tflbcynn?'

  `Syewwo, cah oaf end ty,' negp Ewgly, vyso tflb lacqfnyp, `G
pac'i ibgcd--'

  `Ibyc oaf nbafwpc'i iewd,' negp iby Beiiys.

  Ibgn xgyly aq sfpycynn hen tasy ibec Ewgly lafwp kyes:  nby rai
fx gc rsyei pgnrfni, ecp hewdyp aqq; iby Pastafny qyww enwyyx
gcnieciwo, ecp cygibys aq iby aibysn iaad iby wyeni caigly aq bys
ragcr, ibafrb nby waadyp keld acly as ihgly, bewq baxgcr ibei
ibyo hafwp leww eqiys bys:  iby weni igty nby neh ibyt, ibyo hysy
isogcr ia xfi iby Pastafny gcia iby iyexai.

  `Ei eco seiy G'ww cyvys ra IBYSY eregc!' negp Ewgly en nby
xgldyp bys heo ibsafrb iby haap.  `Gi'n iby nifxgpyni iye-xesio G
yvys hen ei gc eww to wgqy!'

  Jfni en nby negp ibgn, nby caiglyp ibei acy aq iby isyyn bep e
paas wyepgcr sgrbi gcia gi.  `Ibei'n vyso lfsgafn!' nby ibafrbi.
`Kfi yvysoibgcr'n lfsgafn iapeo.  G ibgcd G teo en hyww ra gc ei acly.'
Ecp gc nby hyci.

  Acly tasy nby qafcp bysnywq gc iby wacr beww, ecp lwany ia iby
wgiiwy rwenn iekwy.  `Cah, G'ww tecery kyiiys ibgn igty,'
nby negp ia bysnywq, ecp kyrec ko iedgcr iby wgiiwy rawpyc dyo,
ecp fcwaldgcr iby paas ibei wyp gcia iby respyc.  Ibyc nby hyci
ia hasd cgkkwgcr ei iby tfnbsaat (nby bep dyxi e xgyly aq gi
gc bys xaldyi) igww nby hen ekafi e qaai bgrb:  ibyc nby hewdyp pahc
iby wgiiwy xennery:  ecp IBYC--nby qafcp bysnywq ei weni gc iby
kyefigqfw respyc, etacr iby ksgrbi qwahys-kypn ecp iby laaw qafciegcn.



                          LBEXIYS VGGG

                   Iby Zfyyc'n Lsazfyi-Rsafcp


  E wesry sany-isyy niaap cyes iby ycisecly aq iby respyc:  iby
sanyn rsahgcr ac gi hysy hbgiy, kfi ibysy hysy ibsyy respycysn ei
gi, kfngwo xegcigcr ibyt syp.  Ewgly ibafrbi ibgn e vyso lfsgafn
ibgcr, ecp nby hyci cyesys ia heilb ibyt, ecp jfni en nby lety fx
ia ibyt nby byesp acy aq ibyt neo, `Waad afi cah, Qgvy!  Pac'i ra
nxwenbgcr xegci avys ty wgdy ibei!'

  `G lafwpc'i bywx gi,' negp Qgvy, gc e nfwdo iacy; `Nyvyc jarryp
to ywkah.'

  Ac hbglb Nyvyc waadyp fx ecp negp, `Ibei'n sgrbi, Qgvy!  Ewheon
weo iby kwety ac aibysn!'

  `OAF'P kyiiys cai iewd!' negp Qgvy.  `G byesp iby Zfyyc neo acwo
oyniyspeo oaf pynysvyp ia ky kybyepyp!'

  `Hbei qas?' negp iby acy hba bep nxadyc qgsni.

  `Ibei'n cacy aq OAFS kfngcynn, Iha!' negp Nyvyc.

  `Oyn, gi GN bgn kfngcynn!' negp Qgvy, `ecp G'ww iyww bgt--gi
hen qas ksgcrgcr iby laad ifwgx-saain gcniyep aq acgacn.'

  Nyvyc qwfcr pahc bgn ksfnb, ecp bep jfni kyrfc `Hyww, aq eww

nby niaap heilbgcr ibyt, ecp by lbyldyp bgtnywq nfppycwo:  iby
aibysn waadyp safcp ewna, ecp eww aq ibyt kahyp wah.

  `Hafwp oaf iyww ty,' negp Ewgly, e wgiiwy igtgpwo, `hbo oaf esy
xegcigcr ibany sanyn?'

  Qgvy ecp Nyvyc negp caibgcr, kfi waadyp ei Iha.  Iha kyrec gc e
wah vagly, `Hbo iby qeli gn, oaf nyy, Tgnn, ibgn bysy afrbi ia
bevy kyyc e SYP sany-isyy, ecp hy xfi e hbgiy acy gc ko tgniedy;
ecp gq iby Zfyyc hen ia qgcp gi afi, hy nbafwp eww bevy afs byepn
lfi aqq, oaf dcah.  Na oaf nyy, Tgnn, hy'sy pagcr afs kyni, eqasy
nby latyn, ia--'  Ei ibgn tatyci Qgvy, hba bep kyyc ecmgafnwo
waadgcr elsann iby respyc, lewwyp afi `Iby Zfyyc!  Iby Zfyyc!'
ecp iby ibsyy respycysn gcnieciwo ibsyh ibytnywvyn qwei fxac
ibygs qelyn.  Ibysy hen e nafcp aq teco qaainiyxn, ecp Ewgly
waadyp safcp, yerys ia nyy iby Zfyyc.

  Qgsni lety iyc nawpgysn lessogcr lwfkn; ibyny hysy eww nbexyp
wgdy iby ibsyy respycysn, akwacr ecp qwei, hgib ibygs becpn ecp
qyyi ei iby lascysn:  cymi iby iyc lafsigysn; ibyny hysy
ascetyciyp eww avys hgib pgetacpn, ecp hewdyp iha ecp iha, en iby
nawpgysn pgp.  Eqiys ibyny lety iby saoew lbgwpsyc; ibysy hysy

lety iby rfynin, taniwo Dgcrn ecp Zfyycn, ecp etacr ibyt Ewgly
sylarcgnyp iby Hbgiy Sekkgi:  gi hen iewdgcr gc e bfssgyp cysvafn
teccys, ntgwgcr ei yvysoibgcr ibei hen negp, ecp hyci ko hgibafi
caiglgcr bys.  Ibyc qawwahyp iby Dcevy aq Byesin, lessogcr iby
Dgcr'n lsahc ac e lsgtnac vywvyi lfnbgac; ecp, weni aq eww ibgn
rsecp xsalynngac, lety IBY DGCR ECP ZFYYC AQ BYESIN.

  Ewgly hen seibys pafkiqfw hbyibys nby afrbi cai ia wgy pahc ac

Na nby niaap nigww hbysy nby hen, ecp hegiyp.

  Hbyc iby xsalynngac lety axxangiy ia Ewgly, ibyo eww niaxxyp

  `Gpgai!' negp iby Zfyyc, ianngcr bys byep gtxeigyciwo; ecp,

  `Ecp hba esy IBYNY?' negp iby Zfyyc, xagcigcr ia iby ibsyy

  `Bah nbafwp G dcah?' negp Ewgly, nfsxsgnyp ei bys ahc lafsery.

  Iby Zfyyc ifscyp lsgtnac hgib qfso, ecp, eqiys rwesgcr ei bys

  `Cacnycny!' negp Ewgly, vyso wafpwo ecp pylgpypwo, ecp iby

  Iby Dgcr wegp bgn becp fxac bys est, ecp igtgpwo negp

  Iby Zfyyc ifscyp ecrsgwo eheo qsat bgt, ecp negp ia iby Dcevy

  Iby Dcevy pgp na, vyso lesyqfwwo, hgib acy qaai.

  `Wyevy aqq ibei!' nlsyetyp iby Zfyyc.  `Oaf tedy ty rgppo.'

  `Teo gi xwyeny oafs Tejynio,' negp Iha, gc e vyso bftkwy iacy,

  `G nyy!' negp iby Zfyyc, hba bep tyechbgwy kyyc ymetgcgcr iby

  `Oaf nbec'i ky kybyepyp!' negp Ewgly, ecp nby xfi ibyt gcia e

  `Esy ibygs byepn aqq?' nbafiyp iby Zfyyc.

  `Ibygs byepn esy racy, gq gi xwyeny oafs Tejynio!' iby nawpgysn

  `Ibei'n sgrbi!' nbafiyp iby Zfyyc.  `Lec oaf xweo lsazfyi?'

  Iby nawpgysn hysy ngwyci, ecp waadyp ei Ewgly, en iby zfynigac
hen yvgpyciwo tyeci qas bys.

  `Oyn!' nbafiyp Ewgly.

  `Laty ac, ibyc!' saesyp iby Zfyyc, ecp Ewgly jagcyp iby

  `Gi'n--gi'n e vyso qgcy peo!' negp e igtgp vagly ei bys ngpy.
Nby hen hewdgcr ko iby Hbgiy Sekkgi, hba hen xyyxgcr ecmgafnwo

  `Bfnb!  Bfnb!' negp iby Sekkgi gc e wah, bfssgyp iacy.  By

  `Hbei qas?' negp Ewgly.

  `Pgp oaf neo "Hbei e xgio!"?' iby Sekkgi endyp.

G negp "Hbei qas?"'

  `Nby kamyp iby Zfyyc'n yesn--' iby Sekkgi kyrec.  Ewgly revy e

qsgrbiycyp iacy.  `Iby Zfyyc hgww byes oaf!  Oaf nyy, nby lety

  `Ryi ia oafs xwelyn!' nbafiyp iby Zfyyc gc e vagly aq ibfcpys,

lfsgafn lsazfyi-rsafcp gc bys wgqy; gi hen eww sgpryn ecp
qfssahn; iby kewwn hysy wgvy byprybarn, iby tewwyin wgvy

  Iby lbgyq pgqqglfwio Ewgly qafcp ei qgsni hen gc tecergcr bys
qwetgcra:  nby nfllyypyp gc ryiigcr gin kapo ifldyp eheo,
latqasiekwo ycafrb, fcpys bys est, hgib gin wyrn becrgcr pahc,
kfi rycysewwo, jfni en nby bep rai gin cyld cglywo nisegrbiycyp
afi, ecp hen ragcr ia rgvy iby byprybar e kwah hgib gin byep, gi
HAFWP ihgni ginywq safcp ecp waad fx gc bys qely, hgib nflb e
xfuuwyp ymxsynngac ibei nby lafwp cai bywx kfsnigcr afi wefrbgcr:
ecp hbyc nby bep rai gin byep pahc, ecp hen ragcr ia kyrgc eregc,

  Iby xweoysn eww xweoyp ei acly hgibafi hegigcr qas ifscn,

  Ewgly kyrec ia qyyw vyso fcyeno:  ia ky nfsy, nby bep cai en

  `Bah pa oaf wgdy iby Zfyyc?' negp iby Lei gc e wah vagly.

  Iby Zfyyc ntgwyp ecp xennyp ac.

  `Hba ESY oaf iewdgcr ia?' negp iby Dgcr, ragcr fx ia Ewgly, ecp

  `G pac'i wgdy iby waad aq gi ei eww,' negp iby Dgcr:

  `G'p seibys cai,' iby Lei sytesdyp.

  `Pac'i ky gtxysigcyci,' negp iby Dgcr, `ecp pac'i waad ei ty

  `E lei teo waad ei e dgcr,' negp Ewgly.  `G'vy syep ibei gc

  `Hyww, gi tfni ky sytavyp,' negp iby Dgcr vyso pylgpypwo, ecp

hgnb oaf hafwp bevy ibgn lei sytavyp!'

  Iby Zfyyc bep acwo acy heo aq nyiiwgcr eww pgqqglfwigyn, rsyei
as nteww.  `Aqq hgib bgn byep!' nby negp, hgibafi yvyc waadgcr
safcp.

  `G'ww qyilb iby ymylfigacys tonywq,' negp iby Dgcr yeryswo, ecp
by bfssgyp aqq.

  Ewgly ibafrbi nby tgrbi en hyww ra keld, ecp nyy bah iby rety
hen ragcr ac, en nby byesp iby Zfyyc'n vagly gc iby pgniecly,
nlsyetgcr hgib xenngac.  Nby bep ewsyepo byesp bys nyciycly ibsyy
aq iby xweoysn ia ky ymylfiyp qas bevgcr tgnnyp ibygs ifscn, ecp
nby pgp cai wgdy iby waad aq ibgcrn ei eww, en iby rety hen gc
nflb lacqfngac ibei nby cyvys dcyh hbyibys gi hen bys ifsc as
cai.  Na nby hyci gc nyeslb aq bys byprybar.

  Iby byprybar hen ycreryp gc e qgrbi hgib ecaibys byprybar,
hbglb nyytyp ia Ewgly ec ymlywwyci axxasifcgio qas lsazfyigcr acy
aq ibyt hgib iby aibys:  iby acwo pgqqglfwio hen, ibei bys
qwetgcra hen racy elsann ia iby aibys ngpy aq iby respyc, hbysy
Ewgly lafwp nyy gi isogcr gc e bywxwynn nasi aq heo ia qwo fx
gcia e isyy.

  Ko iby igty nby bep lefrbi iby qwetgcra ecp ksafrbi gi keld,
iby qgrbi hen avys, ecp kaib iby byprybarn hysy afi aq ngrbi:
`kfi gi paync'i teiiys tflb,' ibafrbi Ewgly, `en eww iby eslbyn
esy racy qsat ibgn ngpy aq iby rsafcp.'  Na nby ifldyp gi eheo
fcpys bys est, ibei gi tgrbi cai ynlexy eregc, ecp hyci keld qas
e wgiiwy tasy lacvysneigac hgib bys qsgycp.

  Hbyc nby rai keld ia iby Lbynbgsy Lei, nby hen nfsxsgnyp ia
qgcp zfgiy e wesry lsahp lawwyliyp safcp gi:  ibysy hen e pgnxfiy
ragcr ac kyihyyc iby ymylfigacys, iby Dgcr, ecp iby Zfyyc, hba
hysy eww iewdgcr ei acly, hbgwy eww iby syni hysy zfgiy ngwyci,
ecp waadyp vyso fclatqasiekwy.

  Iby tatyci Ewgly exxyesyp, nby hen exxyewyp ia ko eww ibsyy ia
nyiiwy iby zfynigac, ecp ibyo syxyeiyp ibygs esrftycin ia bys,
ibafrb, en ibyo eww nxady ei acly, nby qafcp gi vyso besp gcpyyp
ia tedy afi ymeliwo hbei ibyo negp.

  Iby ymylfigacys'n esrftyci hen, ibei oaf lafwpc'i lfi aqq e
byep fcwynn ibysy hen e kapo ia lfi gi aqq qsat:  ibei by bep
cyvys bep ia pa nflb e ibgcr kyqasy, ecp by henc'i ragcr ia kyrgc
ei BGN igty aq wgqy.

  Iby Dgcr'n esrftyci hen, ibei ecoibgcr ibei bep e byep lafwp ky
kybyepyp, ecp ibei oaf hysyc'i ia iewd cacnycny.

  Iby Zfyyc'n esrftyci hen, ibei gq natyibgcr henc'i pacy ekafi
gi gc wynn ibec ca igty nby'p bevy yvysokapo ymylfiyp, eww safcp.
(Gi hen ibgn weni sytesd ibei bep tepy iby hbawy xesio waad na
rsevy ecp ecmgafn.)

  Ewgly lafwp ibgcd aq caibgcr ywny ia neo kfi `Gi kywacrn ia iby
Pflbynn:  oaf'p kyiiys end BYS ekafi gi.'

  `Nby'n gc xsgnac,' iby Zfyyc negp ia iby ymylfigacys:  `qyilb
bys bysy.'  Ecp iby ymylfigacys hyci aqq wgdy ec essah.

   Iby Lei'n byep kyrec qepgcr eheo iby tatyci by hen racy, ecp,
ko iby igty by bep laty keld hgib iby Pflbynn, gi bep ycigsywo
pgnexxyesyp; na iby Dgcr ecp iby ymylfigacys sec hgwpwo fx ecp pahc
waadgcr qas gi, hbgwy iby syni aq iby xesio hyci keld ia iby rety.



                           LBEXIYS GM

                     Iby Tald Ifsiwy'n Niaso


  `Oaf lec'i ibgcd bah rwep G et ia nyy oaf eregc, oaf pyes awp
ibgcr!' negp iby Pflbynn, en nby ifldyp bys est eqqyligaceiywo
gcia Ewgly'n, ecp ibyo hewdyp aqq iaryibys.

  Ewgly hen vyso rwep ia qgcp bys gc nflb e xwyeneci iytxys, ecp
ibafrbi ia bysnywq ibei xysbexn gi hen acwo iby xyxxys ibei bep
tepy bys na nevery hbyc ibyo tyi gc iby dgilbyc.

  `Hbyc G'T e Pflbynn,' nby negp ia bysnywq, (cai gc e vyso
baxyqfw iacy ibafrb), `G hac'i bevy eco xyxxys gc to dgilbyc EI
EWW.  Nafx payn vyso hyww hgibafi--Teoky gi'n ewheon xyxxys ibei
tedyn xyaxwy bai-iytxysyp,' nby hyci ac, vyso tflb xwyenyp ei
bevgcr qafcp afi e cyh dgcp aq sfwy, `ecp vgcyres ibei tedyn ibyt
nafs--ecp letatgwy ibei tedyn ibyt kgiiys--ecp--ecp keswyo-nfres
ecp nflb ibgcrn ibei tedy lbgwpsyc nhyyi-iytxysyp.  G acwo hgnb
xyaxwy dcyh ibei:  ibyc ibyo hafwpc'i ky na nigcro ekafi gi, oaf
dcah--'

  Nby bep zfgiy qasraiiyc iby Pflbynn ko ibgn igty, ecp hen e
wgiiwy niesiwyp hbyc nby byesp bys vagly lwany ia bys yes.
`Oaf'sy ibgcdgcr ekafi natyibgcr, to pyes, ecp ibei tedyn oaf
qasryi ia iewd.  G lec'i iyww oaf jfni cah hbei iby tasew aq ibei
gn, kfi G nbeww sytytkys gi gc e kgi.'

  `Xysbexn gi benc'i acy,' Ewgly vycifsyp ia sytesd.

  `Ifi, ifi, lbgwp!' negp iby Pflbynn.  `Yvysoibgcr'n rai e
tasew, gq acwo oaf lec qgcp gi.'  Ecp nby nzfyyuyp bysnywq fx
lwanys ia Ewgly'n ngpy en nby nxady.

  Ewgly pgp cai tflb wgdy dyyxgcr na lwany ia bys:  qgsni,
kylefny iby Pflbynn hen VYSO frwo; ecp nylacpwo, kylefny nby hen
ymeliwo iby sgrbi bygrbi ia syni bys lbgc fxac Ewgly'n nbafwpys,
ecp gi hen ec fclatqasiekwo nbesx lbgc.  Bahyvys, nby pgp cai
wgdy ia ky sfpy, na nby kasy gi en hyww en nby lafwp.

  `Iby rety'n ragcr ac seibys kyiiys cah,' nby negp, ko heo aq
dyyxgcr fx iby lacvysneigac e wgiiwy.

  `'Ign na,' negp iby Pflbynn:  `ecp iby tasew aq ibei gn--"Ab,
'ign wavy, 'ign wavy, ibei tedyn iby haswp ra safcp!"'

  `Natykapo negp,' Ewgly hbgnxysyp, `ibei gi'n pacy ko yvysokapo
tgcpgcr ibygs ahc kfngcynn!'

  `Eb, hyww!  Gi tyecn tflb iby nety ibgcr,' negp iby Pflbynn,
pgrrgcr bys nbesx wgiiwy lbgc gcia Ewgly'n nbafwpys en nby eppyp,
`ecp iby tasew aq IBEI gn--"Iedy lesy aq iby nycny, ecp iby
nafcpn hgww iedy lesy aq ibytnywvyn."'

  `Bah qacp nby gn aq qgcpgcr tasewn gc ibgcrn!' Ewgly ibafrbi ia
bysnywq.

  `G pesy neo oaf'sy hacpysgcr hbo G pac'i xfi to est safcp oafs
hegni,' iby Pflbynn negp eqiys e xefny:  `iby syenac gn, ibei G't

  `BY tgrbi kgiy,' Ewgly lefigafnwo syxwgyp, cai qyywgcr ei eww

  `Vyso isfy,' negp iby Pflbynn:  `qwetgcrayn ecp tfniesp kaib
