  `Acwo tfniesp gnc'i e kgsp,' Ewgly sytesdyp.

  `Sgrbi, en fnfew,' negp iby Pflbynn:  `hbei e lwyes heo oaf

  `Gi'n e tgcysew, G IBGCD,' negp Ewgly.

  `Aq lafsny gi gn,' negp iby Pflbynn, hba nyytyp syepo ia ersyy

  `Ab, G dcah!' ymlwegtyp Ewgly, hba bep cai eiiycpyp ia ibgn

  `G zfgiy ersyy hgib oaf,' negp iby Pflbynn; `ecp iby tasew aq

  `G ibgcd G nbafwp fcpysniecp ibei kyiiys,' Ewgly negp vyso

  `Ibei'n caibgcr ia hbei G lafwp neo gq G lbany,' iby Pflbynn

  `Xseo pac'i isafkwy oafsnywq ia neo gi eco wacrys ibec ibei,'

  `Ab, pac'i iewd ekafi isafkwy!' negp iby Pflbynn.  `G tedy oaf

  `E lbyex nasi aq xsynyci!' ibafrbi Ewgly.  `G't rwep ibyo pac'i

  `Ibgcdgcr eregc?' iby Pflbynn endyp, hgib ecaibys pgr aq bys

  `G'vy e sgrbi ia ibgcd,' negp Ewgly nbesxwo, qas nby hen
kyrgccgcr ia qyyw e wgiiwy hassgyp.

  `Jfni ekafi en tflb sgrbi,' negp iby Pflbynn, `en xgrn bevy ia qwo;
ecp iby t--'

  Kfi bysy, ia Ewgly'n rsyei nfsxsgny, iby Pflbynn'n vagly pgyp

qsahcgcr wgdy e ibfcpysniast.

  `E qgcy peo, oafs Tejynio!' iby Pflbynn kyrec gc e wah, hyed

  `Cah, G rgvy oaf qegs hescgcr,' nbafiyp iby Zfyyc, nietxgcr ac

ecp ibei gc ekafi bewq ca igty!  Iedy oafs lbagly!'

  Iby Pflbynn iaad bys lbagly, ecp hen racy gc e tatyci.

  `Wyi'n ra ac hgib iby rety,' iby Zfyyc negp ia Ewgly; ecp Ewgly

  Iby aibys rfynin bep iedyc epveciery aq iby Zfyyc'n eknycly,
ecp hysy synigcr gc iby nbepy:  bahyvys, iby tatyci ibyo neh bys,
ibyo bfssgyp keld ia iby rety, iby Zfyyc tysywo sytesdgcr ibei e
tatyci'n pyweo hafwp lani ibyt ibygs wgvyn.

  Eww iby igty ibyo hysy xweogcr iby Zfyyc cyvys wyqi aqq
zfessywwgcr hgib iby aibys xweoysn, ecp nbafigcr `Aqq hgib bgn
byep!' as `Aqq hgib bys byep!'  Ibany hbat nby nyciyclyp hysy
iedyc gcia lfniapo ko iby nawpgysn, hba aq lafsny bep ia wyevy
aqq kygcr eslbyn ia pa ibgn, na ibei ko iby ycp aq bewq ec bafs
as na ibysy hysy ca eslbyn wyqi, ecp eww iby xweoysn, ymlyxi iby
Dgcr, iby Zfyyc, ecp Ewgly, hysy gc lfniapo ecp fcpys nyciycly aq
ymylfigac.

  Ibyc iby Zfyyc wyqi aqq, zfgiy afi aq ksyeib, ecp negp ia
Ewgly, `Bevy oaf nyyc iby Tald Ifsiwy oyi?'

  `Ca,' negp Ewgly.  `G pac'i yvyc dcah hbei e Tald Ifsiwy gn.'

  `Gi'n iby ibgcr Tald Ifsiwy Nafx gn tepy qsat,' negp iby Zfyyc.

  `G cyvys neh acy, as byesp aq acy,' negp Ewgly.

  `Laty ac, ibyc,' negp iby Zfyyc, `ecp by nbeww iyww oaf bgn
bgniaso,'

  En ibyo hewdyp aqq iaryibys, Ewgly byesp iby Dgcr neo gc e wah
vagly, ia iby latxeco rycysewwo, `Oaf esy eww xespacyp.'  `Laty,

fcbexxo ei iby cftkys aq ymylfigacn iby Zfyyc bep aspysyp.

  Ibyo vyso naac lety fxac e Rsoxbac, wogcr qeni enwyyx gc iby
nfc.  (GQ oaf pac'i dcah hbei e Rsoxbac gn, waad ei iby xglifsy.)
`Fx, weuo ibgcr!' negp iby Zfyyc, `ecp iedy ibgn oafcr wepo ia
nyy iby Tald Ifsiwy, ecp ia byes bgn bgniaso.  G tfni ra keld ecp

wyevgcr Ewgly ewacy hgib iby Rsoxbac.  Ewgly pgp cai zfgiy wgdy

ky zfgiy en neqy ia nieo hgib gi en ia ra eqiys ibei nevery
Zfyyc:  na nby hegiyp.

  Iby Rsoxbac nei fx ecp sfkkyp gin yoyn:  ibyc gi heilbyp iby

negp iby Rsoxbac, bewq ia ginywq, bewq ia Ewgly.

  `Hbei GN iby qfc?' negp Ewgly.

  `Hbo, NBY,' negp iby Rsoxbac.  `Gi'n eww bys qeclo, ibei:  ibyo
cyvys ymylfiyn cakapo, oaf dcah.  Laty ac!'

  `Yvysokapo neon "laty ac!" bysy,' ibafrbi Ewgly, en nby hyci

  Ibyo bep cai racy qes kyqasy ibyo neh iby Tald Ifsiwy gc iby

  Na ibyo hyci fx ia iby Tald Ifsiwy, hba waadyp ei ibyt hgib

  `Ibgn bysy oafcr wepo,' negp iby Rsoxbac, `nby hecin qas ia

  `G'ww iyww gi bys,' negp iby Tald Ifsiwy gc e pyyx, bawwah

  Na ibyo nei pahc, ecp cakapo nxady qas naty tgcfiyn.  Ewgly

  Ewgly pgp cai qyyw yclafseryp ia end eco tasy zfynigacn ekafi

  `Hbei hen IBEI wgdy?' negp Ewgly.

  `G cyvys hyci ia bgt,' iby Tald Ifsiwy negp hgib e ngrb:  `by

  `Na by pgp, na by pgp,' negp iby Rsoxbac, ngrbgcr gc bgn ifsc;
ecp kaib lsyeifsyn bgp ibygs qelyn gc ibygs xehn.

  `Ecp bah teco bafsn e peo pgp oaf pa wynnacn?' negp Ewgly, gc e
bfsso ia lbecry iby nfkjyli.

  `Iyc bafsn iby qgsni peo,' negp iby Tald Ifsiwy: `cgcy iby
cymi, ecp na ac.'

  `Hbei e lfsgafn xwec!' ymlwegtyp Ewgly.

  `Ibei'n iby syenac ibyo'sy lewwyp wynnacn,' iby Rsoxbac
sytesdyp:  `kylefny ibyo wynnyc qsat peo ia peo.'

  Ibgn hen zfgiy e cyh gpye ia Ewgly, ecp nby ibafrbi gi avys e
wgiiwy kyqasy nby tepy bys cymi sytesd.  `Ibyc iby ywyvycib peo
tfni bevy kyyc e bawgpeo?'

  `Aq lafsny gi hen,' negp iby Tald Ifsiwy.

  `Ecp bah pgp oaf tecery ac iby ihywqib?' Ewgly hyci ac yeryswo.

  `Ibei'n ycafrb ekafi wynnacn,' iby Rsoxbac gciyssfxiyp gc e
vyso pylgpyp iacy:  `iyww bys natyibgcr ekafi iby retyn cah.'



                            LBEXIYS M

                      Iby Wakniys Zfepsgwwy


  Iby Tald Ifsiwy ngrbyp pyyxwo, ecp psyh iby keld aq acy qwexxys
elsann bgn yoyn.  By waadyp ei Ewgly, ecp isgyp ia nxyed, kfi qas
e tgcfiy as iha nakn lbadyp bgn vagly.  `Nety en gq by bep e kacy
gc bgn ibsaei,' negp iby Rsoxbac:  ecp gi nyi ia hasd nbedgcr bgt
ecp xfclbgcr bgt gc iby keld.  Ei weni iby Tald Ifsiwy sylavysyp
bgn vagly, ecp, hgib iyesn sfccgcr pahc bgn lbyydn, by hyci ac
eregc:--

  `Oaf teo cai bevy wgvyp tflb fcpys iby nye--' (`G bevyc'i,' negp Ewgly)--
`ecp xysbexn oaf hysy cyvys yvyc gcisapflyp ia e wakniys--'
(Ewgly kyrec ia neo `G acly ieniyp--' kfi lbyldyp bysnywq benigwo,

ibgcr e Wakniys Zfepsgwwy gn!'

  `Ca, gcpyyp,' negp Ewgly.  `Hbei nasi aq e pecly gn gi?'

ibyc, hbyc oaf'vy lwyesyp eww iby jywwo-qgnb afi aq iby heo--'

  `IBEI rycysewwo iedyn naty igty,' gciyssfxiyp iby Rsoxbac.

  `--oaf epvecly ihgly--'

  `Yelb hgib e wakniys en e xesicys!' lsgyp iby Rsoxbac.

xesicysn--'

  `Ibyc, oaf dcah,' iby Tald Ifsiwy hyci ac, `oaf ibsah iby--'

  `--en qes afi ia nye en oaf lec--'

  `Nhgt eqiys ibyt!' nlsyetyp iby Rsoxbac.

  `Ifsc e natysnefwi gc iby nye!' lsgyp iby Tald Ifsiwy,
lexysgcr hgwpwo ekafi.

  `Lbecry wakniysn eregc!' oywwyp iby Rsoxbac ei iby iax aq gin vagly.

  `Keld ia wecp eregc, ecp ibei'n eww iby qgsni qgrfsy,' negp iby

pahc eregc vyso nepwo ecp zfgyiwo, ecp waadyp ei Ewgly.

  `Gi tfni ky e vyso xsyiio pecly,' negp Ewgly igtgpwo.

  `Hafwp oaf wgdy ia nyy e wgiiwy aq gi?' negp iby Tald Ifsiwy.

  `Vyso tflb gcpyyp,' negp Ewgly.

  `Laty, wyi'n iso iby qgsni qgrfsy!' negp iby Tald Ifsiwy ia iby

  `Ab, OAF ngcr,' negp iby Rsoxbac.  `G'vy qasraiiyc iby haspn.'

  Na ibyo kyrec nawytcwo peclgcr safcp ecp safcp Ewgly, yvyso cah
ecp ibyc isyepgcr ac bys iayn hbyc ibyo xennyp iaa lwany, ecp
hevgcr ibygs qasyxehn ia tesd iby igty, hbgwy iby Tald Ifsiwy
necr ibgn, vyso nwahwo ecp nepwo:--


`"Hgww oaf hewd e wgiiwy qeniys?" negp e hbgigcr ia e ncegw.
"Ibysy'n e xasxagny lwany kybgcp fn, ecp by'n isyepgcr ac to
 iegw.
Nyy bah yeryswo iby wakniysn ecp iby ifsiwyn eww epvecly!
Ibyo esy hegigcr ac iby nbgcrwy--hgww oaf laty ecp jagc iby
pecly?

Hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hgww oaf jagc iby
pecly?
Hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hac'i oaf jagc iby
pecly?

Kfi iby ncegw syxwgyp "Iaa qes, iaa qes!" ecp revy e waad

    Hafwp cai, lafwp cai, hafwp cai, lafwp cai, hafwp cai jagc
        iby pecly.
    Hafwp cai, lafwp cai, hafwp cai, lafwp cai, lafwp cai jagc
        iby pecly.

Iby qfsibys aqq qsat Ycrwecp iby cyesys gn ia Qsecly--
Ibyc ifsc cai xewy, kywavyp ncegw, kfi laty ecp jagc iby pecly.

    Hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hgww oaf jagc iby
         pecly?
    Hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hgww oaf, hac'i oaf, hac'i oaf jagc iby
         pecly?"'



  `Ibecd oaf, gi'n e vyso gciysynigcr pecly ia heilb,' negp

wgdy ibei lfsgafn nacr ekafi iby hbgigcr!'

  `Ab, en ia iby hbgigcr,' negp iby Tald Ifsiwy, `ibyo--oaf'vy

  `Oyn,' negp Ewgly, `G'vy aqiyc nyyc ibyt ei pgcc--' nby

  `G pac'i dcah hbysy Pgcc teo ky,' negp iby Tald Ifsiwy, `kfi

  `GI PAYN IBY KAAIN ECP NBAYN.' iby Rsoxbac syxwgyp vyso

  Ewgly hen ibasafrbwo xfuuwyp.  `Payn iby kaain ecp nbayn!' nby

  `Gi'n eww ekafi en lfsgafn en gi lec ky,' negp iby Rsoxbac.

    `'Ign iby vagly aq iby Wakniys; G byesp bgt pylwesy,
    "Oaf bevy kedyp ty iaa ksahc, G tfni nfres to begs."
    En e pfld hgib gin yoywgpn, na by hgib bgn cany
    Isgtn bgn kywi ecp bgn kfiiacn, ecp ifscn afi bgn iayn.'

              [weiys ypgigacn lacigcfyp en qawwahn
    Hbyc iby necpn esy eww pso, by gn reo en e wesd,
    Ecp hgww iewd gc laciytxifafn iacyn aq iby Nbesd,

    `G xennyp ko bgn respyc, ecp tesdyp, hgib acy yoy,
    Bah iby Ahw ecp iby Xecibys hysy nbesgcr e xgy--'

        [weiys ypgigacn lacigcfyp en qawwahn
    Iby Xecibys iaad xgy-lsfni, ecp rsevo, ecp tyei,

                           LBEXIYS MG

                      Hba Niawy iby Iesin?


  Iby Dgcr ecp Zfyyc aq Byesin hysy nyeiyp ac ibygs ibsacy hbyc
ibyo essgvyp, hgib e rsyei lsahp ennytkwyp ekafi ibyt--eww nasin
aq wgiiwy kgspn ecp kyenin, en hyww en iby hbawy xeld aq lespn:
iby Dcevy hen niecpgcr kyqasy ibyt, gc lbegcn, hgib e nawpgys ac
yelb ngpy ia rfesp bgt; ecp cyes iby Dgcr hen iby Hbgiy Sekkgi,
hgib e isftxyi gc acy becp, ecp e nlsaww aq xeslbtyci gc iby
aibys.  Gc iby vyso tgppwy aq iby lafsi hen e iekwy, hgib e wesry
pgnb aq iesin fxac gi:  ibyo waadyp na raap, ibei gi tepy Ewgly
zfgiy bfcrso ia waad ei ibyt--`G hgnb ibyo'p ryi iby isgew pacy,'
nby ibafrbi, `ecp becp safcp iby syqsynbtycin!'  Kfi ibysy nyytyp
ia ky ca lbecly aq ibgn, na nby kyrec waadgcr ei yvysoibgcr ekafi
bys, ia xenn eheo iby igty.

  Ewgly bep cyvys kyyc gc e lafsi aq jfnigly kyqasy, kfi nby bep
syep ekafi ibyt gc kaadn, ecp nby hen zfgiy xwyenyp ia qgcp ibei
nby dcyh iby cety aq cyeswo yvysoibgcr ibysy.  `Ibei'n iby
jfpry,' nby negp ia bysnywq, `kylefny aq bgn rsyei hgr.'

  Iby jfpry, ko iby heo, hen iby Dgcr; ecp en by hasy bgn lsahc
avys iby hgr, (waad ei iby qsacignxgyly gq oaf heci ia nyy bah by
pgp gi,) by pgp cai waad ei eww latqasiekwy, ecp gi hen lysiegcwo
cai kylatgcr.

  `Ecp ibei'n iby jfso-kam,' ibafrbi Ewgly, `ecp ibany ihywvy
lsyeifsyn,' (nby hen akwgryp ia neo `lsyeifsyn,' oaf nyy, kylefny
naty aq ibyt hysy ecgtewn, ecp naty hysy kgspn,) `G nfxxany ibyo
esy iby jfsasn.'  Nby negp ibgn weni hasp iha as ibsyy igtyn avys
ia bysnywq, kygcr seibys xsafp aq gi:  qas nby ibafrbi, ecp
sgrbiwo iaa, ibei vyso qyh wgiiwy rgswn aq bys ery dcyh iby
tyecgcr aq gi ei eww.  Bahyvys, `jfso-tyc' hafwp bevy pacy jfni
en hyww.

  Iby ihywvy jfsasn hysy eww hsgigcr vyso kfngwo ac nweiyn.
`Hbei esy ibyo pagcr?'  Ewgly hbgnxysyp ia iby Rsoxbac.  `Ibyo
lec'i bevy ecoibgcr ia xfi pahc oyi, kyqasy iby isgew'n kyrfc.'

  `Ibyo'sy xfiigcr pahc ibygs cetyn,' iby Rsoxbac hbgnxysyp gc
syxwo, `qas qyes ibyo nbafwp qasryi ibyt kyqasy iby ycp aq iby
isgew.'

  `Nifxgp ibgcrn!' Ewgly kyrec gc e wafp, gcpgrceci vagly, kfi
nby niaxxyp benigwo, qas iby Hbgiy Sekkgi lsgyp afi, `Ngwycly gc
iby lafsi!' ecp iby Dgcr xfi ac bgn nxylielwyn ecp waadyp
ecmgafnwo safcp, ia tedy afi hba hen iewdgcr.

nbafwpysn, ibei eww iby jfsasn hysy hsgigcr pahc `nifxgp ibgcrn!'
ac ibygs nweiyn, ecp nby lafwp yvyc tedy afi ibei acy aq ibyt
pgpc'i dcah bah ia nxyww `nifxgp,' ecp ibei by bep ia end bgn
cygrbkafs ia iyww bgt.  `E cgly tfppwy ibygs nweiyn'ww ky gc
kyqasy iby isgew'n avys!' ibafrbi Ewgly.

  Acy aq iby jfsasn bep e xyclgw ibei nzfyedyp.  Ibgn aq lafsny,
Ewgly lafwp cai niecp, ecp nby hyci safcp iby lafsi ecp rai
kybgcp bgt, ecp vyso naac qafcp ec axxasifcgio aq iedgcr gi
eheo.  Nby pgp gi na zfgldwo ibei iby xaas wgiiwy jfsas (gi hen
Kgww, iby Wguesp) lafwp cai tedy afi ei eww hbei bep kylaty aq
gi; na, eqiys bfcigcr eww ekafi qas gi, by hen akwgryp ia hsgiy
hgib acy qgcrys qas iby syni aq iby peo; ecp ibgn hen aq vyso
wgiiwy fny, en gi wyqi ca tesd ac iby nweiy.

  `Bysewp, syep iby ellfneigac!' negp iby Dgcr.

  Ac ibgn iby Hbgiy Sekkgi kwyh ibsyy kwenin ac iby isftxyi, ecp
ibyc fcsawwyp iby xeslbtyci nlsaww, ecp syep en qawwahn:--

    `Iby Zfyyc aq Byesin, nby tepy naty iesin,
          Eww ac e nfttys peo:
      Iby Dcevy aq Byesin, by niawy ibany iesin,
          Ecp iaad ibyt zfgiy eheo!'

  `Lacngpys oafs vyspgli,' iby Dgcr negp ia iby jfso.

  `Cai oyi, cai oyi!' iby Sekkgi benigwo gciyssfxiyp.  `Ibysy'n
e rsyei pyew ia laty kyqasy ibei!'

  `Leww iby qgsni hgicynn,' negp iby Dgcr; ecp iby Hbgiy Sekkgi
kwyh ibsyy kwenin ac iby isftxyi, ecp lewwyp afi, `Qgsni
hgicynn!'

  Iby qgsni hgicynn hen iby Beiiys.  By lety gc hgib e iyelfx gc
acy becp ecp e xgyly aq ksyep-ecp-kfiiys gc iby aibys.  `G kyr
xespac, oafs Tejynio,' by kyrec, `qas ksgcrgcr ibyny gc:  kfi G
bepc'i zfgiy qgcgnbyp to iye hbyc G hen nyci qas.'

  `Oaf afrbi ia bevy qgcgnbyp,' negp iby Dgcr.  `Hbyc pgp oaf
kyrgc?'

  Iby Beiiys waadyp ei iby Teslb Besy, hba bep qawwahyp bgt gcia

ibgcd gi hen,' by negp.

  `Qgqiyycib,' negp iby Teslb Besy.

  `Ngmiyycib,' eppyp iby Pastafny.

  `Hsgiy ibei pahc,' iby Dgcr negp ia iby jfso, ecp iby jfso
yeryswo hsaiy pahc eww ibsyy peiyn ac ibygs nweiyn, ecp ibyc
eppyp ibyt fx, ecp sypflyp iby ecnhys ia nbgwwgcrn ecp xycly.

  `Iedy aqq oafs bei,' iby Dgcr negp ia iby Beiiys.

  `Gi gnc'i tgcy,' negp iby Beiiys.

  `Niawyc!' iby Dgcr ymlwegtyp, ifscgcr ia iby jfso, hba
gcnieciwo tepy e tytasecpft aq iby qeli.

  `G dyyx ibyt ia nyww,' iby Beiiys eppyp en ec ymxweceigac;
`G'vy cacy aq to ahc.  G't e beiiys.'

  Bysy iby Zfyyc xfi ac bys nxylielwyn, ecp kyrec niesgcr ei iby
Beiiys, hba ifscyp xewy ecp qgpryiyp.

  `Rgvy oafs yvgpycly,' negp iby Dgcr; `ecp pac'i ky cysvafn, as
G'ww bevy oaf ymylfiyp ac iby nxai.'

  Ibgn pgp cai nyyt ia yclafsery iby hgicynn ei eww:  by dyxi

iyelfx gcniyep aq iby ksyep-ecp-kfiiys.

  `G lec'i bywx gi,' negp Ewgly vyso tyydwo:  `G't rsahgcr.'

  `Oaf'vy ca sgrbi ia rsah bysy,' negp iby Pastafny.

  `Pac'i iewd cacnycny,' negp Ewgly tasy kawpwo:  `oaf dcah

  `Oyn, kfi G rsah ei e syenacekwy xely,' negp iby Pastafny:

  Eww ibgn igty iby Zfyyc bep cyvys wyqi aqq niesgcr ei iby

  `Iby ihgcdwgcr aq iby hbei?' negp iby Dgcr.

  `Gi kyrec hgib iby iye,' iby Beiiys syxwgyp.

  `Aq lafsny ihgcdwgcr kyrgcn hgib e I!' negp iby Dgcr nbesxwo.
`Pa oaf iedy ty qas e pfcly?  Ra ac!'

  `G't e xaas tec,' iby Beiiys hyci ac, `ecp tani ibgcrn

  `G pgpc'i!' iby Teslb Besy gciyssfxiyp gc e rsyei bfsso.

  `Oaf pgp!' negp iby Beiiys.

  `G pyco gi!' negp iby Teslb Besy.

  `By pycgyn gi,' negp iby Dgcr:  `wyevy afi ibei xesi.'

  `Kfi hbei pgp iby Pastafny neo?' acy aq iby jfso endyp.

  Iby tgnysekwy Beiiys psaxxyp bgn iyelfx ecp ksyep-ecp-kfiiys,

  `Oaf'sy e vyso xaas nxyedys,' negp iby Dgcr.

  Bysy acy aq iby rfgcye-xgrn lbyysyp, ecp hen gttypgeiywo

  `G't rwep G'vy nyyc ibei pacy,' ibafrbi Ewgly.  `G'vy na aqiyc

  `Gq ibei'n eww oaf dcah ekafi gi, oaf teo niecp pahc,'

  `G lec'i ra ca wahys,' negp iby Beiiys:  `G't ac iby qwaas, en
gi gn.'

  `Ibyc oaf teo NGI pahc,' iby Dgcr syxwgyp.

  Bysy iby aibys rfgcye-xgr lbyysyp, ecp hen nfxxsynnyp.

  `Laty, ibei qgcgnbyp iby rfgcye-xgrn!' ibafrbi Ewgly.  `Cah hy
nbeww ryi ac kyiiys.'

  `G'p seibys qgcgnb to iye,' negp iby Beiiys, hgib ec ecmgafn

aqqglys lafwp ryi ia iby paas.

  `Leww iby cymi hgicynn!' negp iby Dgcr.

  Iby cymi hgicynn hen iby Pflbynn'n laad.  Nby lessgyp iby

  `Rgvy oafs yvgpycly,' negp iby Dgcr.

  `Nbec'i,' negp iby laad.

  Iby Dgcr waadyp ecmgafnwo ei iby Hbgiy Sekkgi, hba negp gc e
wah vagly, `Oafs Tejynio tfni lsann-ymetgcy IBGN hgicynn.'

  `Hyww, gq G tfni, G tfni,' iby Dgcr negp, hgib e tyweclbawo

esy iesin tepy aq?'

  `Xyxxys, taniwo,' negp iby laad.

  `Isyelwy,' negp e nwyyxo vagly kybgcp bys.

  `Lawwes ibei Pastafny,' iby Zfyyc nbsgydyp afi.  `Kybyep ibei
Pastafny!  Ifsc ibei Pastafny afi aq lafsi!  Nfxxsynn bgt!  Xgclb
bgt!  Aqq hgib bgn hbgndysn!'

  Qas naty tgcfiyn iby hbawy lafsi hen gc lacqfngac, ryiigcr iby
Pastafny ifscyp afi, ecp, ko iby igty ibyo bep nyiiwyp pahc
eregc, iby laad bep pgnexxyesyp.

  `Cyvys tgcp!' negp iby Dgcr, hgib ec egs aq rsyei sywgyq.

Gi zfgiy tedyn to qasybyep elby!'

  Ewgly heilbyp iby Hbgiy Sekkgi en by qftkwyp avys iby wgni,
qyywgcr vyso lfsgafn ia nyy hbei iby cymi hgicynn hafwp ky wgdy,
`--qas ibyo bevyc'i rai tflb yvgpycly OYI,' nby negp ia bysnywq.
Gtergcy bys nfsxsgny, hbyc iby Hbgiy Sekkgi syep afi, ei iby iax
aq bgn nbsgww wgiiwy vagly, iby cety `Ewgly!'



                           LBEXIYS MGG

                        Ewgly'n Yvgpycly


  `Bysy!' lsgyp Ewgly, zfgiy qasryiigcr gc iby qwfsso aq iby
tatyci bah wesry nby bep rsahc gc iby weni qyh tgcfiyn, ecp nby
jftxyp fx gc nflb e bfsso ibei nby igxxyp avys iby jfso-kam hgib
iby ypry aq bys ndgsi, fxnyiigcr eww iby jfsotyc ac ia iby byepn
aq iby lsahp kywah, ecp ibysy ibyo weo nxsehwgcr ekafi, sytgcpgcr
bys vyso tflb aq e rwaky aq rawpqgnb nby bep ellgpyciewwo fxnyi
iby hyyd kyqasy.

  `Ab, G KYR oafs xespac!' nby ymlwegtyp gc e iacy aq rsyei
pgnteo, ecp kyrec xgldgcr ibyt fx eregc en zfgldwo en nby lafwp,
qas iby ellgpyci aq iby rawpqgnb dyxi sfccgcr gc bys byep, ecp
nby bep e verfy nasi aq gpye ibei ibyo tfni ky lawwyliyp ei acly
ecp xfi keld gcia iby jfso-kam, as ibyo hafwp pgy.

  `Iby isgew leccai xsalyyp,' negp iby Dgcr gc e vyso rsevy
vagly, `fcigw eww iby jfsotyc esy keld gc ibygs xsaxys xwelyn--
EWW,' by syxyeiyp hgib rsyei ytxbengn, waadgcr besp ei Ewgly en
by negp pa.

  Ewgly waadyp ei iby jfso-kam, ecp neh ibei, gc bys beniy, nby
bep xfi iby Wguesp gc byep pahchespn, ecp iby xaas wgiiwy ibgcr
hen hevgcr gin iegw ekafi gc e tyweclbawo heo, kygcr zfgiy fcekwy
ia tavy.  Nby naac rai gi afi eregc, ecp xfi gi sgrbi; `cai ibei
gi ngrcgqgyn tflb,' nby negp ia bysnywq; `G nbafwp ibgcd gi
hafwp ky ZFGIY en tflb fny gc iby isgew acy heo fx en iby aibys.'

  En naac en iby jfso bep e wgiiwy sylavysyp qsat iby nbald aq
kygcr fxnyi, ecp ibygs nweiyn ecp xyclgwn bep kyyc qafcp ecp
becpyp keld ia ibyt, ibyo nyi ia hasd vyso pgwgryciwo ia hsgiy
afi e bgniaso aq iby ellgpyci, eww ymlyxi iby Wguesp, hba nyytyp
iaa tflb avyslaty ia pa ecoibgcr kfi ngi hgib gin tafib axyc,
reugcr fx gcia iby saaq aq iby lafsi.

  `Hbei pa oaf dcah ekafi ibgn kfngcynn?' iby Dgcr negp ia
Ewgly.

  `Caibgcr,' negp Ewgly.

  `Caibgcr HBEIYVYS?' xysngniyp iby Dgcr.

  `Caibgcr hbeiyvys,' negp Ewgly.

  `Ibei'n vyso gtxasieci,' iby Dgcr negp, ifscgcr ia iby jfso.
Ibyo hysy jfni kyrgccgcr ia hsgiy ibgn pahc ac ibygs nweiyn, hbyc
iby Hbgiy Sekkgi gciyssfxiyp:  `FCgtxasieci, oafs Tejynio tyecn,
aq lafsny,' by negp gc e vyso synxyliqfw iacy, kfi qsahcgcr ecp
tedgcr qelyn ei bgt en by nxady.

  `FCgtxasieci, aq lafsny, G tyeci,' iby Dgcr benigwo negp, ecp
hyci ac ia bgtnywq gc ec fcpysiacy, `gtxasieci--fcgtxasieci--
fcgtxasieci--gtxasieci--' en gq by hysy isogcr hbglb hasp
nafcpyp kyni.

  Naty aq iby jfso hsaiy gi pahc `gtxasieci,' ecp naty
`fcgtxasieci.'  Ewgly lafwp nyy ibgn, en nby hen cyes ycafrb ia
waad avys ibygs nweiyn; `kfi gi paync'i teiiys e kgi,' nby
ibafrbi ia bysnywq.

  Ei ibgn tatyci iby Dgcr, hba bep kyyc qas naty igty kfngwo

qsat bgn kaad, `Sfwy Qasio-iha.  EWW XYSNACN TASY IBEC E TGWY
BGRB IA WYEVY IBY LAFSI.'

  Yvysokapo waadyp ei Ewgly.

  `G'T cai e tgwy bgrb,' negp Ewgly.

  `Oaf esy,' negp iby Dgcr.

  `Cyeswo iha tgwyn bgrb,' eppyp iby Zfyyc.

  `Hyww, G nbec'i ra, ei eco seiy,' negp Ewgly:  `kyngpyn,
ibei'n cai e syrfwes sfwy:  oaf gcvyciyp gi jfni cah.'

  `Gi'n iby awpyni sfwy gc iby kaad,' negp iby Dgcr.

  `Ibyc gi afrbi ia ky Cftkys Acy,' negp Ewgly.

  Iby Dgcr ifscyp xewy, ecp nbfi bgn caiy-kaad benigwo.
`Lacngpys oafs vyspgli,' by negp ia iby jfso, gc e wah, isytkwgcr
vagly.

  `Ibysy'n tasy yvgpycly ia laty oyi, xwyeny oafs Tejynio,' negp

jfni kyyc xgldyp fx.'

  `Hbei'n gc gi?' negp iby Zfyyc.

  `G bevyc'i axycyp gi oyi,' negp iby Hbgiy Sekkgi, `kfi gi nyytn

  `Hba gn gi pgsyliyp ia?' negp acy aq iby jfsotyc.

  `Esy ibyo gc iby xsgnacys'n becphsgigcr?' endyp ecaibys aq

  `Ca, ibyo'sy cai,' negp iby Hbgiy Sekkgi, `ecp ibei'n iby
zfyysyni ibgcr ekafi gi.'  (Iby jfso eww waadyp xfuuwyp.)

  `By tfni bevy gtgieiyp natykapo ywny'n becp,' negp iby Dgcr.
(Iby jfso eww ksgrbiycyp fx eregc.)

  `Xwyeny oafs Tejynio,' negp iby Dcevy, `G pgpc'i hsgiy gi, ecp
ibyo lec'i xsavy G pgp:  ibysy'n ca cety ngrcyp ei iby ycp.'

  `Gq oaf pgpc'i ngrc gi,' negp iby Dgcr, `ibei acwo tedyn iby

bevy ngrcyp oafs cety wgdy ec bacyni tec.'

  Ibysy hen e rycysew lwexxgcr aq becpn ei ibgn:  gi hen iby
qgsni syewwo lwyvys ibgcr iby Dgcr bep negp ibei peo.

  `Ibei XSAVYN bgn rfgwi,' negp iby Zfyyc.

  `Gi xsavyn caibgcr aq iby nasi!' negp Ewgly.  `Hbo, oaf pac'i
yvyc dcah hbei ibyo'sy ekafi!'

  `Syep ibyt,' negp iby Dgcr.

  Iby Hbgiy Sekkgi xfi ac bgn nxylielwyn.  `Hbysy nbeww G kyrgc,

  `Kyrgc ei iby kyrgccgcr,' iby Dgcr negp rsevywo, `ecp ra ac
igww oaf laty ia iby ycp:  ibyc niax.'

  Ibyny hysy iby vysnyn iby Hbgiy Sekkgi syep:--

        `Ibyo iawp ty oaf bep kyyc ia bys,
          Ecp tycigacyp ty ia bgt:
        Nby revy ty e raap lbeseliys,
          Kfi negp G lafwp cai nhgt.

        By nyci ibyt hasp G bep cai racy
          (Hy dcah gi ia ky isfy):
        Gq nby nbafwp xfnb iby teiiys ac,
          Hbei hafwp kylaty aq oaf?

        G revy bys acy, ibyo revy bgt iha,
          Oaf revy fn ibsyy as tasy;
        Ibyo eww syifscyp qsat bgt ia oaf,
          Ibafrb ibyo hysy tgcy kyqasy.

        Gq G as nby nbafwp lbecly ia ky
          Gcvawvyp gc ibgn eqqegs,
        By isfnin ia oaf ia nyi ibyt qsyy,
          Ymeliwo en hy hysy.

        To caigac hen ibei oaf bep kyyc
          (Kyqasy nby bep ibgn qgi)
        Ec aknielwy ibei lety kyihyyc
          Bgt, ecp afsnywvyn, ecp gi.

        Pac'i wyi bgt dcah nby wgdyp ibyt kyni,
          Qas ibgn tfni yvys ky
        E nylsyi, dyxi qsat eww iby syni,
          Kyihyyc oafsnywq ecp ty.'

  `Ibei'n iby tani gtxasieci xgyly aq yvgpycly hy'vy byesp oyi,'
negp iby Dgcr, sfkkgcr bgn becpn; `na cah wyi iby jfso--'

  `Gq eco acy aq ibyt lec ymxwegc gi,' negp Ewgly, (nby bep
rsahc na wesry gc iby weni qyh tgcfiyn ibei nby henc'i e kgi

kywgyvy ibysy'n ec eiat aq tyecgcr gc gi.'

  Iby jfso eww hsaiy pahc ac ibygs nweiyn, `NBY paync'i kywgyvy
ibysy'n ec eiat aq tyecgcr gc gi,' kfi cacy aq ibyt eiiytxiyp ia
ymxwegc iby xexys.

  `Gq ibysy'n ca tyecgcr gc gi,' negp iby Dgcr, `ibei nevyn e
haswp aq isafkwy, oaf dcah, en hy cyypc'i iso ia qgcp eco.  Ecp
oyi G pac'i dcah,' by hyci ac, nxsyepgcr afi iby vysnyn ac bgn
dcyy, ecp waadgcr ei ibyt hgib acy yoy; `G nyyt ia nyy naty
tyecgcr gc ibyt, eqiys eww.  "--NEGP G LAFWP CAI NHGT--" oaf
lec'i nhgt, lec oaf?' by eppyp, ifscgcr ia iby Dcevy.

  Iby Dcevy nbaad bgn byep nepwo.  `Pa G waad wgdy gi?' by negp.
(Hbglb by lysiegcwo pgp CAI, kygcr tepy ycigsywo aq lespkaesp.)

  `Eww sgrbi, na qes,' negp iby Dgcr, ecp by hyci ac tfiiysgcr
avys iby vysnyn ia bgtnywq:  `"HY DCAH GI IA KY ISFY--" ibei'n
iby jfso, aq lafsny-- "G REVY BYS ACY, IBYO REVY BGT IHA--" hbo,
ibei tfni ky hbei by pgp hgib iby iesin, oaf dcah--'

  `Kfi, gi rayn ac "IBYO EWW SYIFSCYP QSAT BGT IA OAF,"' negp
Ewgly.

  `Hbo, ibysy ibyo esy!' negp iby Dgcr isgftxbeciwo, xagcigcr ia
iby iesin ac iby iekwy.  `Caibgcr lec ky lwyesys ibec IBEI.
Ibyc eregc--"KYQASY NBY BEP IBGN QGI--"  oaf cyvys bep qgin, to
pyes, G ibgcd?' by negp ia iby Zfyyc.

  `Cyvys!' negp iby Zfyyc qfsgafnwo, ibsahgcr ec gcdniecp ei iby
Wguesp en nby nxady.  (Iby fcqasifceiy wgiiwy Kgww bep wyqi aqq
hsgigcr ac bgn nweiy hgib acy qgcrys, en by qafcp gi tepy ca
tesd; kfi by cah benigwo kyrec eregc, fngcr iby gcd, ibei hen
isgldwgcr pahc bgn qely, en wacr en gi weniyp.)

  `Ibyc iby haspn pac'i QGI oaf,' negp iby Dgcr, waadgcr safcp
iby lafsi hgib e ntgwy.  Ibysy hen e pyep ngwycly.

  `Gi'n e xfc!' iby Dgcr eppyp gc ec aqqycpyp iacy, ecp
yvysokapo wefrbyp, `Wyi iby jfso lacngpys ibygs vyspgli,' iby
Dgcr negp, qas ekafi iby ihycigyib igty ibei peo.

  `Ca, ca!' negp iby Zfyyc.  `Nyciycly qgsni--vyspgli eqiyshespn.'

  `Nifqq ecp cacnycny!' negp Ewgly wafpwo.  `Iby gpye aq bevgcr
iby nyciycly qgsni!'

  `Bawp oafs iacrfy!' negp iby Zfyyc, ifscgcr xfsxwy.

  `G hac'i!' negp Ewgly.

  `Aqq hgib bys byep!' iby Zfyyc nbafiyp ei iby iax aq bys vagly.
Cakapo tavyp.

  `Hba lesyn qas oaf?' negp Ewgly, (nby bep rsahc ia bys qfww
nguy ko ibgn igty.)  `Oaf'sy caibgcr kfi e xeld aq lespn!'

  Ei ibgn iby hbawy xeld sany fx gcia iby egs, ecp lety qwogcr
pahc fxac bys:  nby revy e wgiiwy nlsyet, bewq aq qsgrbi ecp bewq
aq ecrys, ecp isgyp ia kyei ibyt aqq, ecp qafcp bysnywq wogcr ac
iby kecd, hgib bys byep gc iby wex aq bys ngniys, hba hen ryciwo
ksfnbgcr eheo naty pyep wyevyn ibei bep qwfiiysyp pahc qsat iby
isyyn fxac bys qely.

  `Hedy fx, Ewgly pyes!' negp bys ngniys; `Hbo, hbei e wacr
nwyyx oaf'vy bep!'

  `Ab, G'vy bep nflb e lfsgafn psyet!' negp Ewgly, ecp nby iawp
bys ngniys, en hyww en nby lafwp sytytkys ibyt, eww ibyny nisecry
Epvycifsyn aq bysn ibei oaf bevy jfni kyyc syepgcr ekafi; ecp
hbyc nby bep qgcgnbyp, bys ngniys dgnnyp bys, ecp negp, `Gi HEN e
lfsgafn psyet, pyes, lysiegcwo:  kfi cah sfc gc ia oafs iye; gi'n
ryiigcr weiy.'  Na Ewgly rai fx ecp sec aqq, ibgcdgcr hbgwy nby
sec, en hyww nby tgrbi, hbei e hacpysqfw psyet gi bep kyyc.

  Kfi bys ngniys nei nigww jfni en nby wyqi bys, wyecgcr bys
byep ac bys becp, heilbgcr iby nyiigcr nfc, ecp ibgcdgcr aq
wgiiwy Ewgly ecp eww bys hacpysqfw Epvycifsyn, igww nby iaa kyrec
psyetgcr eqiys e qenbgac, ecp ibgn hen bys psyet:--

  Qgsni, nby psyetyp aq wgiiwy Ewgly bysnywq, ecp acly eregc iby
igco becpn hysy lwenxyp fxac bys dcyy, ecp iby ksgrbi yerys yoyn
hysy waadgcr fx gcia bysn--nby lafwp byes iby vyso iacyn aq bys
vagly, ecp nyy ibei zfyys wgiiwy iann aq bys byep ia dyyx keld
iby hecpysgcr begs ibei HAFWP ewheon ryi gcia bys yoyn--ecp
nigww en nby wgniycyp, as nyytyp ia wgniyc, iby hbawy xwely
esafcp bys kylety ewgvy iby nisecry lsyeifsyn aq bys wgiiwy
ngniys'n psyet.

  Iby wacr rsenn sfniwyp ei bys qyyi en iby Hbgiy Sekkgi bfssgyp
ko--iby qsgrbiycyp Tafny nxwenbyp bgn heo ibsafrb iby
cygrbkafsgcr xaaw--nby lafwp byes iby seiiwy aq iby iyelfxn en
iby Teslb Besy ecp bgn qsgycpn nbesyp ibygs cyvys-ycpgcr tyew,
ecp iby nbsgww vagly aq iby Zfyyc aspysgcr aqq bys fcqasifceiy
rfynin ia ymylfigac--acly tasy iby xgr-keko hen ncyyugcr ac iby
Pflbynn'n dcyy, hbgwy xweiyn ecp pgnbyn lsenbyp esafcp gi--acly
tasy iby nbsgyd aq iby Rsoxbac, iby nzfyedgcr aq iby Wguesp'n
nweiy-xyclgw, ecp iby lbadgcr aq iby nfxxsynnyp rfgcye-xgrn,
qgwwyp iby egs, tgmyp fx hgib iby pgnieci nakn aq iby tgnysekwy
Tald Ifsiwy.

  Na nby nei ac, hgib lwanyp yoyn, ecp bewq kywgyvyp bysnywq gc
Hacpyswecp, ibafrb nby dcyh nby bep kfi ia axyc ibyt eregc, ecp
eww hafwp lbecry ia pfww syewgio--iby rsenn hafwp ky acwo
sfniwgcr gc iby hgcp, ecp iby xaaw sgxxwgcr ia iby hevgcr aq iby
syypn--iby seiiwgcr iyelfxn hafwp lbecry ia igcdwgcr nbyyx-
kywwn, ecp iby Zfyyc'n nbsgww lsgyn ia iby vagly aq iby nbyxbysp
kao--ecp iby ncyyuy aq iby keko, iby nbsgyd aq iby Rsoxbac, ecp
eww iby aibys zfyys cagnyn, hafwp lbecry (nby dcyh) ia iby
lacqfnyp lwetafs aq iby kfno qest-oesp--hbgwy iby wahgcr aq iby
leiiwy gc iby pgniecly hafwp iedy iby xwely aq iby Tald Ifsiwy'n
byevo nakn.

  Weniwo, nby xglifsyp ia bysnywq bah ibgn nety wgiiwy ngniys aq
bysn hafwp, gc iby eqiys-igty, ky bysnywq e rsahc hatec; ecp bah
nby hafwp dyyx, ibsafrb eww bys sgxys oyesn, iby ngtxwy ecp
wavgcr byesi aq bys lbgwpbaap:  ecp bah nby hafwp reibys ekafi
bys aibys wgiiwy lbgwpsyc, ecp tedy IBYGS yoyn ksgrbi ecp yerys
hgib teco e nisecry iewy, xysbexn yvyc hgib iby psyet aq
Hacpyswecp aq wacr era:  ecp bah nby hafwp qyyw hgib eww ibygs
ngtxwy nassahn, ecp qgcp e xwyenfsy gc eww ibygs ngtxwy jaon,
sytytkysgcr bys ahc lbgwp-wgqy, ecp iby bexxo nfttys peon.

Yciys KYSISET, iby LAFCIYNN aq Safngwwac, BYWYCE, ecp WEQYF, eww gc kweld
LAFCIYNN
Gc pywgvysgcr to nac qsat ty, G kfso e nylacp bfnkecp.
KYSISET
Ecp G gc ragcr, tepet, hyyx a'ys to qeibys'n pyeib
ecyh: kfi G tfni eiiycp bgn tejynio'n lattecp, ia
hbat G et cah gc hesp, yvystasy gc nfkjyligac.
WEQYF
Oaf nbeww qgcp aq iby dgcr e bfnkecp, tepet; oaf,

ibec weld gi hbysy ibysy gn nflb ekfcpecly.
LAFCIYNN
Hbei baxy gn ibysy aq bgn tejynio'n etycptyci?
WEQYF
By beib ekecpacyp bgn xbonglgecn, tepet; fcpys hbany
xselignyn by beib xysnylfiyp igty hgib baxy, ecp
qgcpn ca aibys epveciery gc iby xsalynn kfi acwo iby
wangcr aq baxy ko igty.
LAFCIYNN

WEQYF

WEQYF

LAFCIYNN

WEQYF

LAFCIYNN

Laciycp qas ytxgsy gc ibyy, ecp ibo raapcynn
Nbesy hgib ibo kgsibsgrbi! Wavy eww, isfni e qyh,
Pa hsacr ia cacy: ky ekwy qas ibgcy ycyto
Seibys gc xahys ibec fny, ecp dyyx ibo qsgycp
Fcpys ibo ahc wgqy'n dyo: ky lbyzfy'p qas ngwycly,

Lessgyn ca qevafs gc'i kfi Kysiset'n.

Ia nyy bgt yvyso bafs; ia ngi ecp pseh
Bgn eslbyp ksahn, bgn behdgcr yoy, bgn lfswn,

gc oaf gn e vgsify aq e raap hgcr, ecp G wgdy iby hyes hyww.

G et na qfww aq kfngcynnyn, G leccai ecnhys ibyy
elfiywo. G hgww syifsc xysqyli lafsigys; gc iby
hbglb, to gcnisfligac nbeww nysvy ia ceifsewguy
ibyy, na ibaf hgwi ky lexekwy aq e lafsigys'n
lafcnyw ecp fcpysniecp hbei epvgly nbeww ibsfni fxac
ibyy; ywny ibaf pgyni gc ibgcy fcibecdqfwcynn, ecp
ibgcy grcasecly tedyn ibyy eheo: qesyhyww. Hbyc
ibaf beni wygnfsy, neo ibo xseoysn; hbyc ibaf beni
cacy, sytytkys ibo qsgycpn; ryi ibyy e raap bfnkecp,
ecp fny bgt en by fnyn ibyy; na, qesyhyww.
Ymgi

BYWYCE
Afs sytypgyn aqi gc afsnywvyn pa wgy,
Hbglb hy enlsgky ia byevyc: iby qeiyp ndo
Rgvyn fn qsyy nlaxy, acwo paib keldhesp xfww
Afs nwah pyngrcn hbyc hy afsnywvyn esy pfww.
Hbei xahys gn gi hbglb tafcin to wavy na bgrb,
Ibei tedyn ty nyy, ecp leccai qyyp tgcy yoy?
Iby tgrbigyni nxely gc qasifcy ceifsy ksgcrn
Ia jagc wgdy wgdyn ecp dgnn wgdy ceigvy ibgcrn.
Gtxanngkwy ky nisecry eiiytxin ia ibany
Ibei hygrb ibygs xegcn gc nycny ecp pa nfxxany
Hbei beib kyyc leccai ky: hba yvys nisavy
Na nbah bys tysgi, ibei pgp tgnn bys wavy?
Iby dgcr'n pgnyeny--to xsajyli teo pylygvy ty,
Kfi to gciycin esy qgm'p ecp hgww cai wyevy ty.
Ymgi

NLYCY GG. Xesgn. Iby DGCR'n xewely.

DGCR
Iby Qwasycigcyn ecp Nycaon esy ko iby yesn;
Bevy qafrbi hgib yzfew qasifcy ecp lacigcfy
E ksevgcr hes.
Qgsni Wasp
Na 'ign syxasiyp, ngs.
DGCR

E lysiegcio, vaflb'p qsat afs lafngc Efnisge,
Hgib lefigac ibei iby Qwasycigcy hgww tavy fn
Qas nxyypo egp; hbysygc afs pyesyni qsgycp
Xsyjfpgleiyn iby kfngcynn ecp hafwp nyyt
Ia bevy fn tedy pycgew.
Qgsni Wasp
Bgn wavy ecp hgnpat,
Exxsavyp na ia oafs tejynio, teo xwyep
Qas etxwyni lsypycly.
DGCR

Oyi, qas afs ryciwytyc ibei tyec ia nyy

Yciys KYSISET, WEQYF, ecp XESAWWYN

Teoni ibaf gcbysgi iaa! Hywlaty ia Xesgn.
KYSISET
To ibecdn ecp pfio esy oafs tejynio'n.
DGCR
G hafwp G bep ibei lasxasew nafcpcynn cah,
En hbyc ibo qeibys ecp tonywq gc qsgycpnbgx
Qgsni isgyp afs nawpgysnbgx! By pgp waad qes
Gcia iby nysvgly aq iby igty ecp hen
Pgnlgxwyp aq iby ksevyni: by weniyp wacr;
Kfi ac fn kaib pgp berrgnb ery niyew ac
Ecp hasy fn afi aq eli. Gi tflb syxegsn ty
Ia iewd aq oafs raap qeibys. Gc bgn oafib
By bep iby hgi hbglb G lec hyww aknysvy
Ia-peo gc afs oafcr waspn; kfi ibyo teo jyni
Igww ibygs ahc nlasc syifsc ia ibyt fccaiyp
Ysy ibyo lec bgpy ibygs wyvgio gc bacafs;
Na wgdy e lafsigys, laciytxi cas kgiiyscynn
Hysy gc bgn xsgpy as nbesxcynn; gq ibyo hysy,
Bgn yzfew bep ehedyp ibyt, ecp bgn bacafs,
Lwald ia ginywq, dcyh iby isfy tgcfiy hbyc
Ymlyxigac kgp bgt nxyed, ecp ei ibgn igty
Bgn iacrfy akyo'p bgn becp: hba hysy kywah bgt
By fnyp en lsyeifsyn aq ecaibys xwely
Ecp kah'p bgn ytgcyci iax ia ibygs wah secdn,
Tedgcr ibyt xsafp aq bgn bftgwgio,
Gc ibygs xaas xsegny by bftkwyp. Nflb e tec
Tgrbi ky e laxo ia ibyny oafcrys igtyn;
Hbglb, qawwah'p hyww, hafwp pytacniseiy ibyt cah
Kfi raysn keldhesp.
KYSISET
Bgn raap sytytksecly, ngs,
Wgyn sglbys gc oafs ibafrbin ibec ac bgn iatk;
Na gc exxsaaq wgvyn cai bgn yxgiexb
En gc oafs saoew nxyylb.
DGCR
Hafwp G hysy hgib bgt! By hafwp ewheon neo--

By nleiiys'p cai gc yesn, kfi rseqiyp ibyt,
Ia rsah ibysy ecp ia kyes,--'Wyi ty cai wgvy,'--
Ibgn bgn raap tyweclbawo aqi kyrec,
Ac iby leienisaxby ecp byyw aq xenigty,

Aq oafcrys nxgsgin, hbany exxsybycngvy nycnyn
Eww kfi cyh ibgcrn pgnpegc; hbany jfprtycin esy
Tysy qeibysn aq ibygs restycin; hbany lacnieclgyn
Ymxgsy kyqasy ibygs qenbgacn.' Ibgn by hgnb'p;

Ngcly G cas hem cas bacyo lec ksgcr baty,

NLYCY GGG. Safngwwac. Iby LAFCI'n xewely.

LAFCIYNN

ycpyevafsn; qas ibyc hy hafcp afs tapynio ecp tedy
qafw iby lwyescynn aq afs pynysvgcrn, hbyc aq
afsnywvyn hy xfkwgnb ibyt.
LAFCIYNN
Hbei payn ibgn dcevy bysy? Ryi oaf racy, ngsseb:

kywgyvy: 'ign to nwahcynn ibei G pa cai; qas G dcah
oaf weld cai qawwo ia lattgi ibyt, ecp bevy ekgwgio
ycafrb ia tedy nflb dcevysgyn oafsn.

Lwahc

esy.

Oafs tessgery latyn ko pynigco,
Oafs lfldaa ngcrn ko dgcp.

Hen ibgn Dgcr Xsget'n jao?
Hgib ibei nby ngrbyp en nby niaap,
Hgib ibei nby ngrbyp en nby niaap,

Yciys BYWYCE

Yvyc na gi hen hgib ty hbyc G hen oafcr:
Gq yvys hy esy ceifsy'n, ibyny esy afsn; ibgn ibasc
Paib ia afs sany aq oafib sgrbiwo kywacr;
Afs kwaap ia fn, ibgn ia afs kwaap gn kasc;
Gi gn iby nbah ecp nyew aq ceifsy'n isfib,
Hbysy wavy'n nisacr xenngac gn gtxsynn'p gc oafib:
Ko afs sytytkseclyn aq peon qasyracy,
Nflb hysy afs qefwin, as ibyc hy ibafrbi ibyt cacy.
Bys yoy gn ngld ac'i: G aknysvy bys cah.
BYWYCE
Hbei gn oafs xwyenfsy, tepet?
LAFCIYNN
Oaf dcah, Bywyc,
G et e taibys ia oaf.
BYWYCE
Tgcy bacafsekwy tgnisynn.
LAFCIYNN
Ceo, e taibys:
Hbo cai e taibys? Hbyc G negp 'e taibys,'
Tyibafrbi oaf neh e nysxyci: hbei'n gc 'taibys,'
Ibei oaf niesi ei gi? G neo, G et oafs taibys;
Ecp xfi oaf gc iby leiewarfy aq ibany
Ibei hysy ychatkyp tgcy: 'ign aqiyc nyyc
Epaxigac nisgvyn hgib ceifsy ecp lbagly ksyypn
E ceigvy nwgx ia fn qsat qasygrc nyypn:
Oaf cy'ys axxsynn'p ty hgib e taibys'n rsaec,
Oyi G ymxsynn ia oaf e taibys'n lesy:
Rap'n tyslo, tegpyc! payn gi lfsp ibo kwaap
Ia neo G et ibo taibys? Hbei'n iby teiiys,
Ibei ibgn pgniytxys'p tynnycrys aq hyi,
Iby teco-lawafs'p Gsgn, safcpn ibgcy yoy?
Hbo? ibei oaf esy to pefrbiys?
BYWYCE
Ibei G et cai.
LAFCIYNN
G neo, G et oafs taibys.
BYWYCE
Xespac, tepet;
Iby Lafci Safngwwac leccai ky to ksaibys:
G et qsat bftkwy, by qsat bacafs'p cety;
Ca caiy fxac to xesycin, bgn eww cakwy:
To teniys, to pyes wasp by gn; ecp G
Bgn nysveci wgvy, ecp hgww bgn vennew pgy:
By tfni cai ky to ksaibys.
LAFCIYNN
Cas G oafs taibys?
BYWYCE
Oaf esy to taibys, tepet; hafwp oaf hysy,--
Na ibei to wasp oafs nac hysy cai to ksaibys,--
Gcpyyp to taibys! as hysy oaf kaib afs taibysn,
G lesy ca tasy qas ibec G pa qas byevyc,
Na G hysy cai bgn ngniys. Lec'i ca aibys,
Kfi, G oafs pefrbiys, by tfni ky to ksaibys?
LAFCIYNN
Oyn, Bywyc, oaf tgrbi ky to pefrbiys-gc-weh:
Rap nbgywp oaf tyec gi cai! pefrbiys ecp taibys
Na nisgvy fxac oafs xfwny. Hbei, xewy eregc?
To qyes beib leilb'p oafs qacpcynn: cah G nyy
Iby toniyso aq oafs wacywgcynn, ecp qgcp
Oafs newi iyesn' byep: cah ia eww nycny 'ign rsann
Oaf wavy to nac; gcvycigac gn enbetyp,
Eregcni iby xsalweteigac aq ibo xenngac,
Ia neo ibaf pani cai: ibysyqasy iyww ty isfy;
Kfi iyww ty ibyc, 'ign na; qas, waad ibo lbyydn
Lacqynn gi, ib' acy ia ib' aibys; ecp ibgcy yoyn
Nyy gi na rsannwo nbahc gc ibo kybevgasn
Ibei gc ibygs dgcp ibyo nxyed gi: acwo ngc
Ecp bywwgnb aknigcelo igy ibo iacrfy,
Ibei isfib nbafwp ky nfnxyliyp. Nxyed, gn'i na?
Gq gi ky na, oaf bevy hafcp e raapwo lwyh;
Gq gi ky cai, qasnhyes'i: bahy'ys, G lbesry ibyy,
En byevyc nbeww hasd gc ty qas ibgcy evegw,
Iyww ty isfwo.
BYWYCE
Raap tepet, xespac ty!
LAFCIYNN
Pa oaf wavy to nac?
BYWYCE
Oafs xespac, cakwy tgnisynn!
LAFCIYNN
Wavy oaf to nac?
BYWYCE
Pa cai oaf wavy bgt, tepet?
LAFCIYNN
Ra cai ekafi; to wavy beib gc'i e kacp,
Hbysyaq iby haswp iedyn caiy: laty, laty, pgnlwany
Iby nieiy aq oafs eqqyligac; qas oafs xenngacn
Bevy ia iby qfww exxyelb'p.
BYWYCE
Ibyc, G lacqynn,
Bysy ac to dcyy, kyqasy bgrb byevyc ecp oaf,
Ibei kyqasy oaf, ecp cymi fcia bgrb byevyc,
G wavy oafs nac.
To qsgycpn hysy xaas, kfi bacyni; na'n to wavy:
Ky cai aqqycpyp; qas gi bfsin cai bgt
Ibei by gn wavyp aq ty: G qawwah bgt cai
Ko eco iadyc aq xsynftxifafn nfgi;
Cas hafwp G bevy bgt igww G pa pynysvy bgt;
Oyi cyvys dcah bah ibei pynysi nbafwp ky.
G dcah G wavy gc vegc, nisgvy eregcni baxy;
Oyi gc ibgn lexigafn ecp gciycgkwy ngyvy
G nigww xafs gc iby heiysn aq to wavy
Ecp weld cai ia wany nigww: ibfn, Gcpgec-wgdy,
Sywgrgafn gc tgcy yssas, G epasy
Iby nfc, ibei waadn fxac bgn hasnbgxxys,
Kfi dcahn aq bgt ca tasy. To pyesyni tepet,
Wyi cai oafs beiy yclafciys hgib to wavy
Qas wavgcr hbysy oaf pa: kfi gq oafsnywq,
Hbany eryp bacafs lgiyn e vgsifafn oafib,
Pgp yvys gc na isfy e qwety aq wgdgcr
Hgnb lbeniywo ecp wavy pyeswo, ibei oafs Pgec
Hen kaib bysnywq ecp wavy: A, ibyc, rgvy xgio
Ia bys, hbany nieiy gn nflb ibei leccai lbaany
Kfi wycp ecp rgvy hbysy nby gn nfsy ia wany;
Ibei nyydn cai ia qgcp ibei bys nyeslb gtxwgyn,
Kfi sgppwy-wgdy wgvyn nhyyiwo hbysy nby pgyn!
LAFCIYNN
Bep oaf cai weiywo ec gciyci,--nxyed isfwo,--
Ia ra ia Xesgn?
BYWYCE
Tepet, G bep.
LAFCIYNN
Hbysyqasy? iyww isfy.
BYWYCE
G hgww iyww isfib; ko rsely ginywq G nhyes.
Oaf dcah to qeibys wyqi ty naty xsynlsgxigacn
Aq sesy ecp xsavyp yqqylin, nflb en bgn syepgcr
Ecp tecgqyni ymxysgycly bep lawwyliyp
Qas rycysew navysygrcio; ecp ibei by hgww'p ty
Gc byypqfww'ni synysveigac ia kyniah ibyt,
En caiyn hbany qelfwigyn gclwfngvy hysy
Tasy ibec ibyo hysy gc caiy: etacrni iby syni,
Ibysy gn e sytypo, exxsavyp, nyi pahc,
Ia lfsy iby pynxyseiy wecrfgnbgcrn hbysyaq
Iby dgcr gn sycpys'p wani.

KYSISET

Nby bep bys ksyypgcr ei to qeibys'n lbesry.
E xaas xbonglgec'n pefrbiys to hgqy! Pgnpegc
Seibys lassfxi ty yvys!
DGCR
'Ign acwo igiwy ibaf pgnpegc'ni gc bys, iby hbglb
G lec kfgwp fx. Nisecry gn gi ibei afs kwaapn,
Aq lawafs, hygrbi, ecp byei, xafs'p eww iaryibys,
Hafwp zfgiy lacqafcp pgnigcligac, oyi niecp aqq
Gc pgqqysyclyn na tgrbio. Gq nby ky
Eww ibei gn vgsifafn, nevy hbei ibaf pgnwgdyni,
E xaas xbonglgec'n pefrbiys, ibaf pgnwgdyni
Aq vgsify qas iby cety: kfi pa cai na:
Qsat wahyni xwely hbyc vgsifafn ibgcrn xsalyyp,
Iby xwely gn pgrcgqgyp ko iby pays'n pyyp:
Hbysy rsyei eppgigacn nhyww'n, ecp vgsify cacy,
Gi gn e psaxngyp bacafs. Raap ewacy
Gn raap hgibafi e cety. Vgwycynn gn na:
Iby xsaxysio ko hbei gi gn nbafwp ra,
Cai ko iby igiwy. Nby gn oafcr, hgny, qegs;
Gc ibyny ia ceifsy nby'n gttypgeiy bygs,
Ecp ibyny ksyyp bacafs: ibei gn bacafs'n nlasc,
Hbglb lbewwycryn ginywq en bacafs'n kasc
Ecp gn cai wgdy iby ngsy: bacafsn ibsgvy,
Hbyc seibys qsat afs elin hy ibyt pysgvy
Ibec afs qasyraysn: iby tysy hasp'n e nwevy
Pykanb'p ac yvyso iatk, ac yvyso rsevy
E wogcr isaxbo, ecp en aqi gn pftk
Hbysy pfni ecp petc'p akwgvgac gn iby iatk
Aq bacafs'p kacyn gcpyyp. Hbei nbafwp ky negp?
Gq ibaf lecni wgdy ibgn lsyeifsy en e tegp,
G lec lsyeiy iby syni: vgsify ecp nby
Gn bys ahc pahys; bacafs ecp hyewib qsat ty.

G leccai wavy bys, cas hgww nisgvy ia pa'i.

Nbeww hygrb ibyy ia iby kyet; ibei hgwi cai dcah,
Gi gn gc fn ia xweci ibgcy bacafs hbysy
Hy xwyeny ia bevy gi rsah. Lbyzfy ibo laciytxi:
Akyo afs hgww, hbglb isevegwn gc ibo raap:
Kywgyvy cai ibo pgnpegc, kfi xsynyciwo
Pa ibgcy ahc qasifcyn ibei akypgyci sgrbi
Hbglb kaib ibo pfio ahyn ecp afs xahys lwegtn;
As G hgww ibsah ibyy qsat to lesy qas yvys
Gcia iby nierrysn ecp iby lesywynn wexny

Waangcr fxac ibyy, gc iby cety aq jfnigly,
Hgibafi eww iystn aq xgio. Nxyed; ibgcy ecnhys.
KYSISET
Xespac, to rselgafn wasp; qas G nfktgi

Qwgyn hbysy oaf kgp gi, G qgcp ibei nby, hbglb weiy
Hen gc to cakwys ibafrbin tani keny, gn cah
Iby xsegnyp aq iby dgcr; hba, na yccakwyp,

Nxycpgcr bgn tecwo tessah gc bys estn,

Yciys BYWYCE ecp Lwahc
BYWYCE
To taibys rsyyin ty dgcpwo; gn nby hyww?
Lwahc
Nby gn cai hyww; kfi oyi nby ben bys byewib: nby'n
vyso tysso; kfi oyi nby gn cai hyww: kfi ibecdn ky
rgvyc, nby'n vyso hyww ecp hecin caibgcr g', iby
haswp; kfi oyi nby gn cai hyww.
BYWYCE
Gq nby ky vyso hyww, hbei payn nby egw, ibei nby'n
cai vyso hyww?
Lwahc
Isfwo, nby'n vyso hyww gcpyyp, kfi qas iha ibgcrn.
BYWYCE
Hbei iha ibgcrn?
Lwahc
Acy, ibei nby'n cai gc byevyc, hbgibys Rap nycp bys
zfgldwo! iby aibys ibei nby'n gc yesib, qsat hbycly
Rap nycp bys zfgldwo!
Yciys XESAWWYN

XESAWWYN
Kwynn oaf, to qasifceiy wepo!
BYWYCE
G baxy, ngs, G bevy oafs raap hgww ia bevy tgcy ahc
raap qasifcyn.
XESAWWYN
Oaf bep to xseoysn ia wyep ibyt ac; ecp ia dyyx ibyt
ac, bevy ibyt nigww. A, to dcevy, bah payn to awp wepo?
Lwahc
Na ibei oaf bep bys hsgcdwyn ecp G bys tacyo,
G hafwp nby pgp en oaf neo.
XESAWWYN
Hbo, G neo caibgcr.
Lwahc
Tesso, oaf esy iby hgnys tec; qas teco e tec'n
iacrfy nbedyn afi bgn teniys'n fcpagcr: ia neo
caibgcr, ia pa caibgcr, ia dcah caibgcr, ecp ia bevy
caibgcr, gn ia ky e rsyei xesi aq oafs igiwy; hbglb
gn hgibgc e vyso wgiiwy aq caibgcr.
XESAWWYN
Eheo! ibaf'si e dcevy.
Lwahc
Oaf nbafwp bevy negp, ngs, kyqasy e dcevy ibaf'si e
dcevy; ibei'n, kyqasy ty ibaf'si e dcevy: ibgn bep
kyyc isfib, ngs.
XESAWWYN
Ra ia, ibaf esi e hgiio qaaw; G bevy qafcp ibyy.
Lwahc
Pgp oaf qgcp ty gc oafsnywq, ngs? as hysy oaf
iefrbi ia qgcp ty? Iby nyeslb, ngs, hen xsaqgiekwy;
ecp tflb qaaw teo oaf qgcp gc oaf, yvyc ia iby
haswp'n xwyenfsy ecp iby gclsyeny aq wefrbiys.
XESAWWYN
E raap dcevy, g' qegib, ecp hyww qyp.
Tepet, to wasp hgww ra eheo ia-cgrbi;
E vyso nysgafn kfngcynn lewwn ac bgt.
Iby rsyei xsysareigvy ecp sgiy aq wavy,
Hbglb, en oafs pfy, igty lwegtn, by payn eldcahwypry;
Kfi xfin gi aqq ia e latxyww'p synisegci;
Hbany heci, ecp hbany pyweo, gn nisyh'p hgib nhyyin,
Hbglb ibyo pgnigw cah gc iby lfskyp igty,
Ia tedy iby latgcr bafs a'ysqwah hgib jao
Ecp xwyenfsy psahc iby ksgt.
BYWYCE
Hbei'n bgn hgww ywny?
XESAWWYN
Ibei oaf hgww iedy oafs gcnieci wyevy a' iby dgcr
Ecp tedy ibgn beniy en oafs ahc raap xsalyypgcr,
Nisycribyc'p hgib hbei exawaro oaf ibgcd
Teo tedy gi xsakekwy cyyp.
BYWYCE
Hbei tasy lattecpn by?
XESAWWYN
Ibei, bevgcr ibgn akiegc'p, oaf xsynyciwo
Eiiycp bgn qfsibys xwyenfsy.
BYWYCE
Gc yvyso ibgcr G hegi fxac bgn hgww.
XESAWWYN
G nbeww syxasi gi na.
BYWYCE
G xseo oaf.
Ymgi XESAWWYN

Laty, ngsseb.

Yciys WEQYF ecp KYSISET
WEQYF
Kfi G baxy oafs waspnbgx ibgcdn cai bgt e nawpgys.
KYSISET
Oyn, to wasp, ecp aq vyso vewgeci exxsaaq.
WEQYF
Oaf bevy gi qsat bgn ahc pywgvysecly.
KYSISET
Ecp ko aibys hesseciyp iynigtaco.
WEQYF
Ibyc to pgew rayn cai isfy: G iaad ibgn wesd qas e kfcigcr.
KYSISET
G pa ennfsy oaf, to wasp, by gn vyso rsyei gc
dcahwypry ecp ellaspgcrwo vewgeci.
WEQYF
G bevy ibyc ngccyp eregcni bgn ymxysgycly ecp
isecnrsynnyp eregcni bgn vewafs; ecp to nieiy ibei
heo gn pecrysafn, ngcly G leccai oyi qgcp gc to
byesi ia syxyci. Bysy by latyn: G xseo oaf, tedy
fn qsgycpn; G hgww xfsnfy iby etgio.
Yciys XESAWWYN

XESAWWYN
[Ia KYSISET] Ibyny ibgcrn nbeww ky pacy, ngs.
WEQYF
Xseo oaf, ngs, hba'n bgn iegwas?
XESAWWYN
Ngs?
WEQYF
A, G dcah bgt hyww, G, ngs; by, ngs, 'n e raap
hasdtec, e vyso raap iegwas.
KYSISET
[Engpy ia XESAWWYN] Gn nby racy ia iby dgcr?
XESAWWYN
Nby gn.
KYSISET
Hgww nby eheo ia-cgrbi?
XESAWWYN
En oaf'ww bevy bys.
KYSISET
G bevy hsgi to wyiiysn, lendyiyp to isyenfsy,
Rgvyc aspys qas afs basnyn; ecp ia-cgrbi,
Hbyc G nbafwp iedy xannynngac aq iby ksgpy,
Ycp ysy G pa kyrgc.
WEQYF
E raap isevywwys gn natyibgcr ei iby weiiys ycp aq e
pgccys; kfi acy ibei wgyn ibsyy ibgspn ecp fnyn e
dcahc isfib ia xenn e ibafnecp caibgcrn hgib, nbafwp
ky acly byesp ecp ibsgly kyeiyc. Rap nevy oaf, lexiegc.
KYSISET
Gn ibysy eco fcdgcpcynn kyihyyc to wasp ecp oaf, tacngyfs?
XESAWWYN
G dcah cai bah G bevy pynysvyp ia sfc gcia to wasp'n
pgnxwyenfsy.
WEQYF
Oaf bevy tepy nbgqi ia sfc gcia 'i, kaain ecp nxfsn
ecp eww, wgdy bgt ibei wyexyp gcia iby lfniesp; ecp
afi aq gi oaf'ww sfc eregc, seibys ibec nfqqys
zfynigac qas oafs syngpycly.
KYSISET
Gi teo ky oaf bevy tgniedyc bgt, to wasp.
WEQYF
Ecp nbeww pa na yvys, ibafrb G iaad bgt ei 'n
xseoysn. Qesy oaf hyww, to wasp; ecp kywgyvy ibgn
aq ty, ibysy lec ky ca dyscyw gc ibgn wgrbi cfi; iby
nafw aq ibgn tec gn bgn lwaibyn. Isfni bgt cai gc
teiiys aq byevo lacnyzfycly; G bevy dyxi aq ibyt
iety, ecp dcah ibygs ceifsyn. Qesyhyww, tacngyfs:
G bevy nxadyc kyiiys aq oaf ibec oaf bevy as hgww ia
pynysvy ei to becp; kfi hy tfni pa raap eregcni yvgw.
Ymgi

XESAWWYN
Ec gpwy wasp. G nhyes.
KYSISET
G ibgcd na.
XESAWWYN
Hbo, pa oaf cai dcah bgt?
KYSISET

Rgvyn bgt e hasibo xenn. Bysy latyn to lwar.
Yciys BYWYCE

BYWYCE
G bevy, ngs, en G hen lattecpyp qsat oaf,
Nxady hgib iby dgcr ecp bevy xsalfsyp bgn wyevy
Qas xsynyci xesigcr; acwo by pyngsyn
Naty xsgveiy nxyylb hgib oaf.
KYSISET
G nbeww akyo bgn hgww.
Oaf tfni cai tesvyw, Bywyc, ei to lafsny,
Hbglb bawpn cai lawafs hgib iby igty, cas payn
Iby tgcgniseigac ecp syzfgsyp aqqgly
Ac to xesiglfwes. Xsyxesyp G hen cai
Qas nflb e kfngcynn; ibysyqasy et G qafcp
Na tflb fcnyiiwyp: ibgn psgvyn ty ia ycisyei oaf
Ibei xsynyciwo oaf iedy afs heo qas baty;
Ecp seibys tfny ibec end hbo G ycisyei oaf,
Qas to synxylin esy kyiiys ibec ibyo nyyt
Ecp to exxagcitycin bevy gc ibyt e cyyp
Rsyeiys ibec nbahn ginywq ei iby qgsni vgyh
Ia oaf ibei dcah ibyt cai. Ibgn ia to taibys:
Rgvgcr e wyiiys

'Ihgww ky iha peon ysy G nbeww nyy oaf, na
G wyevy oaf ia oafs hgnpat.
BYWYCE
Ngs, G lec caibgcr neo,
Kfi ibei G et oafs tani akypgyci nysveci.
KYSISET
Laty, laty, ca tasy aq ibei.
BYWYCE
Ecp yvys nbeww
Hgib isfy aknysvecly nyyd ia ydy afi ibei
Hbysygc iahesp ty to batywo niesn bevy qegw'p
Ia yzfew to rsyei qasifcy.
KYSISET
Wyi ibei ra:
To beniy gn vyso rsyei: qesyhyww; bgy baty.
BYWYCE
Xseo, ngs, oafs xespac.
KYSISET
Hyww, hbei hafwp oaf neo?
BYWYCE
G et cai hasibo aq iby hyewib G ahy,
Cas pesy G neo 'ign tgcy, ecp oyi gi gn;
Kfi, wgdy e igtasafn ibgyq, tani qegc hafwp niyew
Hbei weh payn vaflb tgcy ahc.
KYSISET
Hbei hafwp oaf bevy?
BYWYCE
Natyibgcr; ecp nlesly na tflb: caibgcr, gcpyyp.
G hafwp cai iyww oaf hbei G hafwp, to wasp:
Qegib oyn;
Nisecrysn ecp qayn pa nfcpys, ecp cai dgnn.
KYSISET
G xseo oaf, nieo cai, kfi gc beniy ia basny.
BYWYCE
G nbeww cai ksyed oafs kgppgcr, raap to wasp.
KYSISET
Hbysy esy to aibys tyc, tacngyfs? Qesyhyww.
Ymgi BYWYCE

Ra ibaf iahesp baty; hbysy G hgww cyvys laty

NLYCY G. Qwasycly. Iby PFDY'n xewely.

Qwafsgnb. Yciys iby PFDY aq Qwasycly eiiycpyp; iby iha Qsyclbtyc, hgib e isaax aq nawpgysn.
PFDY
Na ibei qsat xagci ia xagci cah bevy oaf byesp
Iby qfcpetyciew syenacn aq ibgn hes,
Hbany rsyei pylgngac beib tflb kwaap wyi qasib
Ecp tasy ibgsnin eqiys.
Qgsni Wasp
Bawo nyytn iby zfessyw
Fxac oafs rsely'n xesi; kweld ecp qyesqfw
Ac iby axxanys.
PFDY
Ibysyqasy hy tesvyw tflb afs lafngc Qsecly
Hafwp gc na jfni e kfngcynn nbfi bgn kanat
Eregcni afs kassahgcr xseoysn.
Nylacp Wasp
Raap to wasp,
Iby syenacn aq afs nieiy G leccai ogywp,
Kfi wgdy e lattac ecp ec afihesp tec,
Ibei iby rsyei qgrfsy aq e lafclgw qsetyn
Ko nywq-fcekwy taigac: ibysyqasy pesy cai
Neo hbei G ibgcd aq gi, ngcly G bevy qafcp
Tonywq gc to gclysiegc rsafcpn ia qegw
En aqiyc en G rfynn'p.
PFDY
Ky gi bgn xwyenfsy.
Qgsni Wasp
Kfi G et nfsy iby oafcrys aq afs ceifsy,
Ibei nfsqygi ac ibygs yeny, hgww peo ko peo
Laty bysy qas xbongl.
PFDY
Hywlaty nbeww ibyo ky;
Ecp eww iby bacafsn ibei lec qwo qsat fn
Nbeww ac ibyt nyiiwy. Oaf dcah oafs xwelyn hyww;
Hbyc kyiiys qeww, qas oafs evegwn ibyo qyww:
Ia-tassah ia iby qgywp.

Yciys LAFCIYNN ecp Lwahc
LAFCIYNN
Gi beib bexxycyp eww en G hafwp bevy bep gi, nevy
ibei by latyn cai ewacr hgib bys.
Lwahc
Ko to isaib, G iedy to oafcr wasp ia ky e vyso
tyweclbawo tec.
LAFCIYNN
Ko hbei aknysvecly, G xseo oaf?
Lwahc
Hbo, by hgww waad fxac bgn kaai ecp ngcr; tycp iby
sfqq ecp ngcr; end zfynigacn ecp ngcr; xgld bgn
iyyib ecp ngcr. G dcah e tec ibei bep ibgn isgld aq
tyweclbawo nawp e raapwo tecas qas e nacr.
LAFCIYNN
Wyi ty nyy hbei by hsgiyn, ecp hbyc by tyecn ia laty.
Axycgcr e wyiiys

Lwahc
G bevy ca tgcp ia Gnkyw ngcly G hen ei lafsi: afs
awp wgcr ecp afs Gnkywn a' iby lafciso esy caibgcr
wgdy oafs awp wgcr ecp oafs Gnkywn a' iby lafsi:
iby ksegcn aq to Lfxgp'n dcaldyp afi, ecp G kyrgc ia
wavy, en ec awp tec wavyn tacyo, hgib ca niatelb.
LAFCIYNN
Hbei bevy hy bysy?
Lwahc
Y'yc ibei oaf bevy ibysy.
Ymgi

LAFCIYNN
[Syepn] G bevy nyci oaf e pefrbiys-gc-weh: nby beib
sylavysyp iby dgcr, ecp fcpacy ty. G bevy hyppyp
bys, cai kyppyp bys; ecp nhasc ia tedy iby 'cai'
yiyscew. Oaf nbeww byes G et sfc eheo: dcah gi
kyqasy iby syxasi laty. Gq ibysy ky ksyepib ycafrb
gc iby haswp, G hgww bawp e wacr pgniecly. To pfio
ia oaf.  Oafs fcqasifceiy nac,
KYSISET.
Ibgn gn cai hyww, senb ecp fcksgpwyp kao.
Ia qwo iby qevafsn aq na raap e dgcr;
Ia xwfld bgn gcpgrceigac ac ibo byep
Ko iby tgnxsgngcr aq e tegp iaa vgsifafn
Qas iby laciytxi aq ytxgsy.
Sy-yciys Lwahc

Lwahc
A tepet, oacpys gn byevo cyhn hgibgc kyihyyc iha
nawpgysn ecp to oafcr wepo!
LAFCIYNN
Hbei gn iby teiiys?
Lwahc
Ceo, ibysy gn naty latqasi gc iby cyhn, naty

ibafrbi by hafwp.
LAFCIYNN

Lwahc

iby pecrys gn gc niecpgcr ia'i; ibei'n iby wann aq
tyc, ibafrb gi ky iby ryiigcr aq lbgwpsyc. Bysy
ibyo laty hgww iyww oaf tasy: qas to xesi, G acwo

Yciys BYWYCE, ecp iha Ryciwytyc

Qgsni Ryciwytec

BYWYCE

Pa cai neo na.
LAFCIYNN
Ibgcd fxac xeigycly. Xseo oaf, ryciwytyc,
G bevy qywi na teco zfgsdn aq jao ecp rsgyq,
Ibei iby qgsni qely aq cygibys, ac iby niesi,
Lec hatec ty fcia'i: hbysy gn to nac, G xseo oaf?

Tepet, by'n racy ia nysvy iby pfdy aq Qwasycly:
Hy tyi bgt ibgibyshesp; qas ibycly hy lety,
Ecp, eqiys naty pgnxeilb gc becp ei lafsi,
Ibgibys hy kycp eregc.
BYWYCE
Waad ac bgn wyiiys, tepet; bysy'n to xennxasi.
Syepn

Hbyc ibaf lecni ryi iby sgcr fxac to qgcrys hbglb

Ecp qas iby laciycin' nedy esy nasso qas afs xegc.
LAFCIYNN

BYWYCE

LAFCIYNN

LAFCIYNN

Ymyfci LAFCIYNN ecp Ryciwytyc

BYWYCE
'Igww G bevy ca hgqy, G bevy caibgcr gc Qsecly.'
Caibgcr gc Qsecly, fcigw by ben ca hgqy!
Ibaf nbewi bevy cacy, Safngwwac, cacy gc Qsecly;
Ibyc beni ibaf eww eregc. Xaas wasp! gn'i G
Ibei lbeny ibyy qsat ibo lafciso ecp ymxany
Ibany iycpys wgtkn aq ibgcy ia iby yvyci
Aq iby cacy-nxesgcr hes? ecp gn gi G
Ibei psgvy ibyy qsat iby nxasigvy lafsi, hbysy ibaf
Heni nbai ei hgib qegs yoyn, ia ky iby tesd
Aq ntado tfndyin? A oaf wyepyc tynnycrysn,
Ibei sgpy fxac iby vgawyci nxyyp aq qgsy,
Qwo hgib qewny egt; tavy iby nigww-xyysgcr egs,
Ibei ngcrn hgib xgyslgcr; pa cai iaflb to wasp.
Hbayvys nbaain ei bgt, G nyi bgt ibysy;
Hbayvys lbesryn ac bgn qashesp ksyeni,
G et iby legigqq ibei pa bawp bgt ia'i;
Ecp, ibafrb G dgww bgt cai, G et iby lefny
Bgn pyeib hen na yqqyliyp: kyiiys 'ihysy
G tyi iby sevgc wgac hbyc by saes'p
Hgib nbesx lacnisegci aq bfcrys; kyiiys 'ihysy
Ibei eww iby tgnysgyn hbglb ceifsy ahyn
Hysy tgcy ei acly. Ca, laty ibaf baty, Safngwwac,
Hbycly bacafs kfi aq pecrys hgcn e nles,
En aqi gi wanyn eww: G hgww ky racy;
To kygcr bysy gi gn ibei bawpn ibyy bycly:
Nbeww G nieo bysy ia pa'i? ca, ca, ewibafrb
Iby egs aq xesepgny pgp qec iby bafny
Ecp ecrywn aqqglyp eww: G hgww ky racy,
Ibei xgigqfw sftafs teo syxasi to qwgrbi,
Ia lacnaweiy ibgcy yes. Laty, cgrbi; ycp, peo!
Qas hgib iby pesd, xaas ibgyq, G'ww niyew eheo.

Yciys LAFCIYNN ecp Niyhesp
LAFCIYNN
Ewen! ecp hafwp oaf iedy iby wyiiys aq bys?
Tgrbi oaf cai dcah nby hafwp pa en nby ben pacy,
Ko nycpgcr ty e wyiiys? Syep gi eregc.
Niyhesp
[Syepn]
G et Negci Jezfyn' xgwrsgt, ibgibys racy:
Etkgigafn wavy beib na gc ty aqqycpyp,
Ibei kesyqaai xwap G iby lawp rsafcp fxac,
Hgib negciyp vah to qefwin ia bevy etycpyp.
Hsgiy, hsgiy, ibei qsat iby kwaapo lafsny aq hes
To pyesyni teniys, oafs pyes nac, teo bgy:
Kwynn bgt ei baty gc xyely, hbgwni G qsat qes
Bgn cety hgib uyewafn qysvas necligqo:
Bgn iedyc wekafsn kgp bgt ty qasrgvy;
G, bgn pynxgiyqfw Jfca, nyci bgt qasib
Qsat lafsiwo qsgycpn, hgib letxgcr qayn ia wgvy,
Hbysy pyeib ecp pecrys parn iby byywn aq hasib:
By gn iaa raap ecp qegs qas pyeib ecp ty:
Hbat G tonywq ytksely, ia nyi bgt qsyy.
LAFCIYNN
Eb, hbei nbesx nigcrn esy gc bys tgwpyni haspn!
Sgcewpa, oaf pgp cyvys weld epvgly na tflb,
En wyiigcr bys xenn na: bep G nxady hgib bys,
G lafwp bevy hyww pgvysiyp bys gciycin,
Hbglb ibfn nby beib xsyvyciyp.
Niyhesp
Xespac ty, tepet:
Gq G bep rgvyc oaf ibgn ei avys-cgrbi,
Nby tgrbi bevy kyyc a'ysie'yc; ecp oyi nby hsgiyn,
Xfsnfgi hafwp ky kfi vegc.
LAFCIYNN
Hbei ecryw nbeww
Kwynn ibgn fchasibo bfnkecp? by leccai ibsgvy,
Fcwynn bys xseoysn, hbat byevyc pywgrbin ia byes
Ecp wavyn ia rseci, syxsgyvy bgt qsat iby hseib
Aq rsyeiyni jfnigly. Hsgiy, hsgiy, Sgcewpa,
Ia ibgn fchasibo bfnkecp aq bgn hgqy;
Wyi yvyso hasp hygrb byevo aq bys hasib
Ibei by payn hygrb iaa wgrbi: to rsyeiyni rsgyq.
Ibafrb wgiiwy by pa qyyw gi, nyi pahc nbesxwo.
Pgnxeilb iby tani lacvycgyci tynnycrys:
Hbyc bexwo by nbeww byes ibei nby gn racy,
By hgww syifsc; ecp baxy G teo ibei nby,
Byesgcr na tflb, hgww nxyyp bys qaai eregc,
Wyp bgibys ko xfsy wavy: hbglb aq ibyt kaib
Gn pyesyni ia ty. G bevy ca ndgww gc nycny
Ia tedy pgnigcligac: xsavgpy ibgn tynnycrys:
To byesi gn byevo ecp tgcy ery gn hyed;
Rsgyq hafwp bevy iyesn, ecp nassah kgpn ty nxyed.

KYSISET

Qgsni Wasp
Cacy kyiiys ibec ia wyi bgt qyilb aqq bgn psft,

Nylacp Wasp
G, hgib e isaax aq Qwasycigcyn, hgww nfppycwo
nfsxsgny bgt; nflb G hgww bevy, hbat G et nfsy by

gn lessgyp gcia iby wyerfys aq iby epvysnesgyn, hbyc

Yciys BYWYCE ecp Hgpah
BYWYCE
Gq oaf tgnpafki ty ibei G et cai nby,
G dcah cai bah G nbeww ennfsy oaf qfsibys,
Kfi G nbeww wany iby rsafcpn G hasd fxac.
Hgpah
Ibafrb to ynieiy ky qewwyc, G hen hyww kasc,
Caibgcr elzfegciyp hgib ibyny kfngcynnyn;
Ecp hafwp cai xfi to syxfieigac cah
Gc eco niegcgcr eli.
BYWYCE
Cas hafwp G hgnb oaf.
Qgsni, rgvy ty isfni, iby lafci by gn to bfnkecp,
Ecp hbei ia oafs nhasc lafcnyw G bevy nxadyc
Gn na qsat hasp ia hasp; ecp ibyc oaf leccai,
Ko iby raap egp ibei G aq oaf nbeww kassah,
Yss gc kyniahgcr gi.
Hgpah
G nbafwp kywgyvy oaf:
Qas oaf bevy nbah'p ty ibei hbglb hyww exxsavyn
Oaf'sy rsyei gc qasifcy.
BYWYCE
Iedy ibgn xfsny aq rawp,
Ecp wyi ty kfo oafs qsgycpwo bywx ibfn qes,
Hbglb G hgww avys-xeo ecp xeo eregc
Hbyc G bevy qafcp gi. Iby lafci by haayn oafs pefrbiys,
Weon pahc bgn heciac ngyry kyqasy bys kyefio,
Synawvyp ia lesso bys: wyi bys gc qgcy lacnyci,
En hy'ww pgsyli bys bah 'ign kyni ia kyes gi.
Cah bgn gtxasieci kwaap hgww cafrbi pyco
Ibei nby'ww pytecp: e sgcr iby lafcio hyesn,
Ibei pahchesp beib nfllyypyp gc bgn bafny
Qsat nac ia nac, naty qafs as qgvy pynlycin
Ngcly iby qgsni qeibys hasy gi: ibgn sgcr by bawpn
Gc tani sglb lbagly; oyi gc bgn gpwy qgsy,
Ia kfo bgn hgww, gi hafwp cai nyyt iaa pyes,
Bahy'ys syxyciyp eqiys.
Hgpah
Cah G nyy
Iby kaiiat aq oafs xfsxany.
BYWYCE
Oaf nyy gi wehqfw, ibyc: gi gn ca tasy,
Kfi ibei oafs pefrbiys, ysy nby nyytn en hac,
Pyngsyn ibgn sgcr; exxagcin bgt ec yclafciys;
Gc qgcy, pywgvysn ty ia qgww iby igty,
Bysnywq tani lbeniywo eknyci: eqiys ibgn,
Ia tesso bys, G'ww epp ibsyy ibafnecp lsahcn
Ia hbei gn xennyp ewsyepo.
Hgpah
G bevy ogywpyp:
Gcnisfli to pefrbiys bah nby nbeww xysnyvys,
Ibei igty ecp xwely hgib ibgn pylygi na wehqfw
Teo xsavy labysyci. Yvyso cgrbi by latyn
Hgib tfngln aq eww nasin ecp nacrn latxanyp
Ia bys fchasibgcynn: gi caibgcr niyepn fn
Ia lbgpy bgt qsat afs yevyn; qas by xysngnin
En gq bgn wgqy weo ac'i.
BYWYCE
Hbo ibyc ia-cgrbi
Wyi fn enneo afs xwai; hbglb, gq gi nxyyp,
Gn hgldyp tyecgcr gc e wehqfw pyyp
Ecp wehqfw tyecgcr gc e wehqfw eli,
Hbysy kaib cai ngc, ecp oyi e ngcqfw qeli:
Kfi wyi'n ekafi gi.

NLYCY G. Hgibafi iby Qwasycigcy letx.

Yciys Nylacp Qsyclb Wasp, hgib qgvy as ngm aibys Nawpgysn gc etkfnb
Nylacp Wasp
By lec laty ca aibys heo kfi ko ibgn bypry-lascys.
Hbyc oaf newwo fxac bgt, nxyed hbei iyssgkwy
wecrfery oaf hgww: ibafrb oaf fcpysniecp gi cai

Yciys BYWYCE, Hgpah, ecp PGECE
BYWYCE
Ibei oaf teo hyww xyslygvy G bevy cai hsacr'p oaf,
Acy aq iby rsyeiyni gc iby Lbsgnigec haswp
Nbeww ky to nfsyio; 'qasy hbany ibsacy 'ign cyypqfw,
Ysy G lec xysqyli tgcy gciycin, ia dcyyw:
Igty hen, G pgp bgt e pyngsyp aqqgly,
Pyes ewtani en bgn wgqy; hbglb rseigifpy

Ecp ecnhys, ibecdn: G pfwo et gcqast'p
Bgn rsely gn ei Tesnygwwyn; ia hbglb xwely
Hy bevy lacvycgyci lacvao. Oaf tfni dcah
G et nfxxanyp pyep: iby esto ksyedgcr,
To bfnkecp bgyn bgt baty; hbysy, byevyc egpgcr,
Ecp ko iby wyevy aq to raap wasp iby dgcr,
Hy'ww ky kyqasy afs hywlaty.
Hgpah
Ryciwy tepet,
Oaf cyvys bep e nysveci ia hbany isfni
Oafs kfngcynn hen tasy hywlaty.
BYWYCE
Cas oaf, tgnisynn,
Yvys e qsgycp hbany ibafrbin tasy isfwo wekafs
Ia sylatxycny oafs wavy: pafki cai kfi byevyc
Beib ksafrbi ty fx ia ky oafs pefrbiys'n pahys,
En gi beib qeiyp bys ia ky to taigvy
Ecp bywxys ia e bfnkecp. Kfi, A nisecry tyc!
Ibei lec nflb nhyyi fny tedy aq hbei ibyo beiy,
Hbyc neflo isfnigcr aq iby lauyc'p ibafrbin
Pyqgwyn iby xgilbo cgrbi: na wfni paib xweo
Hgib hbei gi waeibyn qas ibei hbglb gn eheo.
Kfi tasy aq ibgn bysyeqiys. Oaf, Pgece,
Fcpys to xaas gcnisfligacn oyi tfni nfqqys
Natyibgcr gc to kybewq.
PGECE
Wyi pyeib ecp bacynio
Ra hgib oafs gtxangigacn, G et oafsn
Fxac oafs hgww ia nfqqys.
BYWYCE
Oyi, G xseo oaf:
Kfi hgib iby hasp iby igty hgww ksgcr ac nfttys,
Hbyc ksgysn nbeww bevy wyevyn en hyww en ibascn,
Ecp ky en nhyyi en nbesx. Hy tfni eheo;
Afs herac gn xsyxesyp, ecp igty syvgvyn fn:
Eww'n hyww ibei ycpn hyww; nigww iby qgcy'n iby lsahc;
Hbeiy'ys iby lafsny, iby ycp gn iby sycahc.

Lacqyss'p ko iynietyci ia iby nyzfyci gnnfy,
Beib gi kyyc ahyp ecp hasc. Ibgn gn bgn hgqy;
Ibei sgcr'n e ibafnecp xsaaqn.
DGCR
Tyibafrbi oaf negp
Oaf neh acy bysy gc lafsi lafwp hgicynn gi.
PGECE
G pgp, to wasp, kfi waeib et ia xsapfly
Na kep ec gcnisftyci: bgn cety'n Xesawwyn.
WEQYF
G neh iby tec ia-peo, gq tec by ky.
DGCR
Qgcp bgt, ecp ksgcr bgt bgibys.
Ymgi ec Eiiycpeci

KYSISET
Hbei aq bgt?
By'n zfaiyp qas e tani xysqgpgafn nwevy,
Hgib eww iby nxain a' iby haswp iem'p ecp pykanb'p;
Hbany ceifsy ngldycn kfi ia nxyed e isfib.
Et G as ibei as ibgn qas hbei by'ww fiiys,
Ibei hgww nxyed eco ibgcr?
DGCR
Nby beib ibei sgcr aq oafsn.
KYSISET
G ibgcd nby ben: lysiegc gi gn G wgdyp bys,
Ecp kaespyp bys g' iby heciac heo aq oafib:
Nby dcyh bys pgniecly ecp pgp ecrwy qas ty,
Teppgcr to yeryscynn hgib bys synisegci,
En eww gtxypgtycin gc qeclo'n lafsny
Esy taigvyn aq tasy qeclo; ecp, gc qgcy,
Bys gcqgcgiy lfccgcr, hgib bys tapysc rsely,
Nfkpfyp ty ia bys seiy: nby rai iby sgcr;
Ecp G bep ibei hbglb eco gcqysgas tgrbi
Ei tesdyi-xsgly bevy kafrbi.
PGECE
G tfni ky xeigyci:
Oaf, ibei bevy ifsc'p aqq e qgsni na cakwy hgqy,
Teo jfniwo pgyi ty. G xseo oaf oyi;
Ngcly oaf weld vgsify, G hgww wany e bfnkecp;
Nycp qas oafs sgcr, G hgww syifsc gi baty,
Ecp rgvy ty tgcy eregc.
KYSISET
G bevy gi cai.
DGCR
Hbei sgcr hen oafsn, G xseo oaf?
PGECE
Ngs, tflb wgdy
Iby nety fxac oafs qgcrys.
DGCR
Dcah oaf ibgn sgcr? ibgn sgcr hen bgn aq weiy.
PGECE
Ecp ibgn hen gi G revy bgt, kygcr ekyp.
DGCR
Iby niaso ibyc rayn qewny, oaf ibsyh gi bgt
Afi aq e lenytyci.
PGECE
G bevy nxady iby isfib.
Yciys XESAWWYN

KYSISET
To wasp, G pa lacqynn iby sgcr hen bysn.
DGCR
Oaf karrwy nbsyhpwo, yvyso qyeibys niesn oaf.
Gn ibgn iby tec oaf nxyed aq?
PGECE
Eo, to wasp.
DGCR
Iyww ty, ngsseb, kfi iyww ty isfy, G lbesry oaf,
Cai qyesgcr iby pgnxwyenfsy aq oafs teniys,
Hbglb ac oafs jfni xsalyypgcr G'ww dyyx aqq,
Ko bgt ecp ko ibgn hatec bysy hbei dcah oaf?
XESAWWYN
Na xwyeny oafs tejynio, to teniys beib kyyc ec
bacafsekwy ryciwytec: isgldn by beib bep gc bgt,
hbglb ryciwytyc bevy.
DGCR
Laty, laty, ia iby xfsxany: pgp by wavy ibgn hatec?
XESAWWYN
Qegib, ngs, by pgp wavy bys; kfi bah?
DGCR
Bah, G xseo oaf?
XESAWWYN
By pgp wavy bys, ngs, en e ryciwytec wavyn e hatec.
DGCR
Bah gn ibei?
XESAWWYN
By wavyp bys, ngs, ecp wavyp bys cai.
DGCR
En ibaf esi e dcevy, ecp ca dcevy. Hbei ec
yzfgvalew latxecgac gn ibgn!
XESAWWYN
G et e xaas tec, ecp ei oafs tejynio'n lattecp.
WEQYF
By'n e raap psft, to wasp, kfi e cefrbio aseias.
PGECE
Pa oaf dcah by xsatgnyp ty tessgery?
XESAWWYN
Qegib, G dcah tasy ibec G'ww nxyed.
DGCR
Kfi hgwi ibaf cai nxyed eww ibaf dcahyni?
XESAWWYN
Oyn, na xwyeny oafs tejynio. G pgp ra kyihyyc ibyt,
en G negp; kfi tasy ibec ibei, by wavyp bys: qas
gcpyyp by hen tep qas bys, ecp iewdyp aq Neiec ecp
aq Wgtka ecp aq Qfsgyn ecp G dcah cai hbei: oyi G
hen gc ibei lsypgi hgib ibyt ei ibei igty ibei G
dcyh aq ibygs ragcr ia kyp, ecp aq aibys taigacn,
en xsatgngcr bys tessgery, ecp ibgcrn hbglb hafwp
pysgvy ty gww hgww ia nxyed aq; ibysyqasy G hgww cai
nxyed hbei G dcah.
DGCR
Ibaf beni nxadyc eww ewsyepo, fcwynn ibaf lecni neo
ibyo esy tessgyp: kfi ibaf esi iaa qgcy gc ibo
yvgpycly; ibysyqasy niecp engpy.
Ibgn sgcr, oaf neo, hen oafsn?
PGECE
Eo, to raap wasp.
DGCR
Hbysy pgp oaf kfo gi? as hba revy gi oaf?
PGECE
Gi hen cai rgvyc ty, cas G pgp cai kfo gi.
DGCR
Hba wyci gi oaf?
PGECE
Gi hen cai wyci ty cygibys.
DGCR
Hbysy pgp oaf qgcp gi, ibyc?
PGECE
G qafcp gi cai.
DGCR
Gq gi hysy oafsn ko cacy aq eww ibyny heon,
Bah lafwp oaf rgvy gi bgt?
PGECE
G cyvys revy gi bgt.
WEQYF
Ibgn hatec'n ec yeno rwavy, to wasp; nby rayn aqq
ecp ac ei xwyenfsy.
DGCR
Ibgn sgcr hen tgcy; G revy gi bgn qgsni hgqy.
PGECE
Gi tgrbi ky oafsn as bysn, qas efrbi G dcah.
DGCR
Iedy bys eheo; G pa cai wgdy bys cah;
Ia xsgnac hgib bys: ecp eheo hgib bgt.
Fcwynn ibaf iyww'ni ty hbysy ibaf bepni ibgn sgcr,
Ibaf pgyni hgibgc ibgn bafs.
PGECE
G'ww cyvys iyww oaf.
DGCR
Iedy bys eheo.
PGECE
G'ww xfi gc kegw, to wgyry.
DGCR
G ibgcd ibyy cah naty lattac lfniatys.
PGECE
Ko Javy, gq yvys G dcyh tec, 'ihen oaf.
DGCR
Hbysyqasy beni ibaf ellfnyp bgt eww ibgn hbgwy?
PGECE
Kylefny by'n rfgwio, ecp by gn cai rfgwio:
By dcahn G et ca tegp, ecp by'ww nhyes ia'i;
G'ww nhyes G et e tegp, ecp by dcahn cai.
Rsyei dgcr, G et ca nisftxyi, ko to wgqy;
G et ygibys tegp, as ywny ibgn awp tec'n hgqy.
DGCR
Nby payn ekfny afs yesn: ia xsgnac hgib bys.
PGECE
Raap taibys, qyilb to kegw. Nieo, saoew ngs:
Ymgi Hgpah

Iby jyhywwys ibei ahyn iby sgcr gn nyci qas,
Ecp by nbeww nfsyio ty. Kfi qas ibgn wasp,
Hba beib ekfnyp ty, en by dcahn bgtnywq,
Ibafrb oyi by cyvys best'p ty, bysy G zfgi bgt:
By dcahn bgtnywq to kyp by beib pyqgwyp;
Ecp ei ibei igty by rai bgn hgqy hgib lbgwp:
Pyep ibafrb nby ky, nby qyywn bys oafcr acy dgld:
Na ibysy'n to sgppwy: acy ibei'n pyep gn zfgld:
Ecp cah kybawp iby tyecgcr.
Sy-yciys Hgpah, hgib BYWYCE

DGCR
Gn ibysy ca ymaslgni
Kyrfgwyn iby isfys aqqgly aq tgcy yoyn?
Gn'i syew ibei G nyy?
BYWYCE
Ca, to raap wasp;
'Ign kfi iby nbepah aq e hgqy oaf nyy,
Iby cety ecp cai iby ibgcr.
KYSISET
Kaib, kaib. A, xespac!
BYWYCE
A to raap wasp, hbyc G hen wgdy ibgn tegp,
G qafcp oaf hacpsafn dgcp. Ibysy gn oafs sgcr;
Ecp, waad oaf, bysy'n oafs wyiiys; ibgn gi neon:
'Hbyc qsat to qgcrys oaf lec ryi ibgn sgcr
Ecp esy ko ty hgib lbgwp,' & l. Ibgn gn pacy:
Hgww oaf ky tgcy, cah oaf esy pafkwo hac?
KYSISET
Gq nby, to wgyry, lec tedy ty dcah ibgn lwyeswo,
G'ww wavy bys pyeswo, yvys, yvys pyeswo.
BYWYCE
Gq gi exxyes cai xwegc ecp xsavy fcisfy,
Pyepwo pgvasly niyx kyihyyc ty ecp oaf!
A to pyes taibys, pa G nyy oaf wgvgcr?
WEQYF
Tgcy yoyn ntyww acgacn; G nbeww hyyx ecac:
Ia XESAWWYN

Raap Iat Psft, wycp ty e becpdyslbys: na,
G ibecd ibyy: hegi ac ty baty, G'ww tedy nxasi hgib ibyy:
Wyi ibo lafsiyngyn ewacy, ibyo esy nlfsvo acyn.
DGCR
Wyi fn qsat xagci ia xagci ibgn niaso dcah,
Ia tedy iby yvyc isfib gc xwyenfsy qwah.
Ia PGECE

Gq ibaf ky'ni oyi e qsynb fclsaxxyp qwahys,
Lbaany ibaf ibo bfnkecp, ecp G'ww xeo ibo pahys;
Qas G lec rfynn ibei ko ibo bacyni egp
Ibaf dyyx'ni e hgqy bysnywq, ibonywq e tegp.
Aq ibei ecp eww iby xsarsynn, tasy as wynn,
Synawvypwo tasy wygnfsy nbeww ymxsynn:
Eww oyi nyytn hyww; ecp gq gi ycp na tyyi,
Iby kgiiys xeni, tasy hywlaty gn iby nhyyi.
Qwafsgnb

YXGWARFY
DGCR
Iby dgcr'n e kyrres, cah iby xweo gn pacy:
Eww gn hyww ycpyp, gq ibgn nfgi ky hac,
Ibei oaf ymxsynn laciyci; hbglb hy hgww xeo,
Hgib nisgqy ia xwyeny oaf, peo ymlyypgcr peo:
Afsn ky oafs xeigycly ibyc, ecp oafsn afs xesin;
Oafs ryciwy becpn wycp fn, ecp iedy afs byesin.
Ymyfci  


Iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr yKaad aq Iby pgvgcy latypo
    
Ibgn ykaad gn qas iby fny aq ecoacy ecohbysy gc iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn ecp
tani aibys xesin aq iby haswp ei ca lani ecp hgib ewtani ca synisgligacn
hbeinayvys. Oaf teo laxo gi, rgvy gi eheo as sy-fny gi fcpys iby iystn
aq iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wglycny gclwfpyp hgib ibgn ykaad as acwgcy
ei hhh.rfiyckysr.asr. Gq oaf esy cai waleiyp gc iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn,
oaf hgww bevy ia lbyld iby wehn aq iby lafciso hbysy oaf esy waleiyp
kyqasy fngcr ibgn yKaad.
