LECIA G


Gc iby tgpheo aq ibgn afs tasiew wgqy,
G qafcp ty gc e rwaato haap, eniseo
Racy qsat iby xeib pgsyli: ecp y’yc ia iyww
Gi hysy ca yeno iend, bah nevery hgwp
Ibei qasyni, bah sakfni ecp safrb gin rsahib,
Hbglb ia sytytkys acwo, to pgnteo
Sycyhn, gc kgiiyscynn cai qes qsat pyeib.
Oyi ia pgnlafsny aq hbei ibysy raap kyqyww,
Eww ywny hgww G syweiy pgnlavys’p ibysy.
Bah qgsni G yciys’p gi G nlesly lec neo,
Nflb nwyyxo pfwwcynn gc ibei gcnieci hygrb’p
To nycnyn pahc, hbyc iby isfy xeib G wyqi,
Kfi hbyc e tafciegc’n qaai G syelb’p, hbysy lwan’p
Iby vewwyo, ibei bep xgysl’p to byesi hgib psyep,
G waad’p ewaqi, ecp neh bgn nbafwpysn ksaep
Ewsyepo vyniyp hgib ibei xwecyi’n kyet,
Hba wyepn eww hecpysysn neqy ibsafrb yvyso heo.

Ibyc hen e wgiiwy synxgiy ia iby qyes,
Ibei gc to byesi’n sylynnyn pyyx bep wegc,
Eww aq ibei cgrbi, na xgigqfwwo xenn’p:
Ecp en e tec, hgib pgqqglfwi nbasi ksyeib,
Qasynxyci hgib iagwgcr, ’nlex’p qsat nye ia nbasy,
Ifscn ia iby xysgwafn hgpy heniy, ecp niecpn
Ei reuy; y’yc na to nxgsgi, ibei oyi qegw’p
Nisfrrwgcr hgib iyssas, ifsc’p ia vgyh iby nisegin,
Ibei cacy beib xenn’p ecp wgv’p. To hyeso qsety
Eqiys nbasi xefny sylatqasiyp, eregc
G jafscyo’p ac avys ibei wacywo niyyx,

Iby bgcpys qaai nigww qgstys. Nlesly iby enlyci
Kyrec, hbyc, wa! e xecibys, cgtkwy, wgrbi,
Ecp lavys’p hgib e nxyldwyp ndgc, exxyes’p,
Cas, hbyc gi neh ty, vecgnb’p, seibys nisavy
Ia lbyld to achesp ragcr; ibei aqiigtyn
Hgib xfsxany ia syisely to niyxn G ifsc’p.

Iby bafs hen tascgcr’n xsgty, ecp ac bgn heo
Ewaqi iby nfc enlycpyp hgib ibany niesn,
Ibei hgib bgt sany, hbyc Wavy pgvgcy qgsni tav’p
Ibany gin qegs hasdn: na ibei hgib jaoafn baxy
Eww ibgcrn lacnxgs’p ia qgww ty, iby reo ndgc
Aq ibei nhgqi ecgtew, iby teigc pehc
Ecp iby nhyyi nyenac. Naac ibei jao hen lben’p,
Ecp ko cyh psyep nfllyypyp, hbyc gc vgyh
E wgac lety, ’regcni ty, en gi exxyes’p,

Hgib bgn byep bywp ewaqi ecp bfcrys-tep,
Ibei y’yc iby egs hen qyes-nisfld. E nby-hawq
Hen ei bgn byywn, hba gc bys wyeccynn nyyt’p
Qfww aq eww hecin, ecp teco e wecp beib tepy
Pgnlacnaweiy ysy cah. Nby hgib nflb qyes
A’yshbywtyp ty, ei iby ngrbi aq bys exxeww’p,
Ibei aq iby bygrbi eww baxy G wani. En acy,
Hba hgib bgn regc yweiyp, nyyn iby igty
Hbyc eww fchesyn gn racy, by gchespwo
Tafscn hgib byesi-rsgxgcr ecrfgnb; nflb hen G,
Befciyp ko ibei qyww kyeni, cyvys ei xyely,
Hba latgcr a’ys eregcni ty, ko pyrsyyn
Gtxyww’p ty hbysy iby nfc gc ngwycly synin.

Hbgwy ia iby wahys nxely hgib keldhesp niyx
G qyww, to dyc pgnlysc’p iby qast acy aq acy,
Hbany vagly nyyt’p qegci ibsafrb wacr pgnfny aq nxyylb.
Hbyc bgt gc ibei rsyei pynysi G ynxgyp,
“Bevy tyslo ac ty!” lsgyp G afi ewafp,
“Nxgsgi! as wgvgcr tec! hbei y’ys ibaf ky!”

By ecnhys’p: “Cah cai tec, tec acly G hen,
Ecp kasc aq Watkesp xesycin, Tecifece kaib
Ko lafciso, hbyc iby xahys aq Jfwgfn oyi
Hen nleslywo qgst. Ei Saty to wgqy hen xeni
Kycyeib iby tgwp Efrfnifn, gc iby igty
Aq qekwyp pygigyn ecp qewny. E kesp
Hen G, ecp tepy Eclbgnyn’ fxsgrbi nac
Iby nfkjyli aq to nacr, hba lety qsat Isao,
Hbyc iby qwetyn xsyo’p ac Gwgft’n befrbio iahysn.
Kfi ibaf, neo hbysyqasy ia nflb xysgwn xeni
Syifsc’ni ibaf? hbysyqasy cai ibgn xwyeneci tafci
Enlycpyni, lefny ecp nafsly aq eww pywgrbi?”
“Ecp esi ibaf ibyc ibei Vgsrgw, ibei hyww-nxsgcr,
Qsat hbglb nflb laxgafn qwaapn aq ywazfycly
Bevy gnnfyp?” G hgib qsaci ekenb’p syxwgyp.
“Rwaso ecp wgrbi aq eww iby ifcyqfw isegc!
Teo gi evegw ty ibei G wacr hgib uyew
Bevy nafrbi ibo vawfty, ecp hgib wavy gttycny
Bevy lacc’p gi a’ys. To teniys ibaf ecp rfgpy!
Ibaf by qsat hbat ewacy G bevy pysgv’p
Ibei niowy, hbglb qas gin kyefio gcia qety
Ymewin ty. Nyy iby kyeni, qsat hbat G qwyp.
A nevy ty qsat bys, ibaf gwwfnisgafn nery!

“Qas yvyso vygc ecp xfwny ibsafrbafi to qsety
Nby beib tepy isytkwy.” By, naac en by neh
Ibei G hen hyyxgcr, ecnhys’p, “Ibaf tfni cyypn
Ecaibys heo xfsnfy, gq ibaf hafwpni ’nlexy
Qsat afi ibei nevery hgwpyscynn. Ibgn kyeni,
Ei hbat ibaf lsgyni, bys heo hgww nfqqys cacy
Ia xenn, ecp ca wynn bgcpsecly tedyn ibec pyeib:
Na kep ecp na ellfsnyp gc bys dgcp,
Ibei cyvys neiyp gn bys sevycafn hgww,
Nigww eqiys qaap tasy lsevgcr ibec kyqasy.
Ia teco ec ecgtew gc hypwald vgwy
Nby qeniycn, ecp nbeww oyi ia teco tasy,
Fcigw ibei rsyobafcp laty, hba nbeww pynisao
Bys hgib nbesx xegc. By hgww cai wgqy nfxxasi
Ko yesib cas gin keny tyiewn, kfi ko wavy,
Hgnpat, ecp vgsify, ecp bgn wecp nbeww ky
Iby wecp ’ihgmi ygibys Qywisa. Gc bgn tgrbi
Nbeww neqyio ia Giewge’n xwegcn esgny,
Qas hbany qegs syewt, Letgwwe, vgsrgc xfsy,
Cgnfn, Yfsoewfn, ecp Ifscfn qyww.
By hgib gclynneci lbeny ibsafrb yvyso iahc
Nbeww hasso, fcigw by ia byww ei wycrib
Syniasy bys, ibycly ko ycvo qgsni wyi waany.
G qas ibo xsaqgi xacp’sgcr cah pyvgny,
Ibei ibaf teoni qawwah ty, ecp G ibo rfgpy
Hgww wyep ibyy bycly ibsafrb ec yiyscew nxely,
Hbysy ibaf nbewi byes pynxegsgcr nbsgydn, ecp nyy
Nxgsgin aq awp iastyciyp, hba gcvady
E nylacp pyeib; ecp ibany cymi vgyh, hba phyww
Laciyci gc qgsy, qas ibei ibyo baxy ia laty,
Hbycy’ys iby igty teo ky, etacr iby kwyni,
Gcia hbany syrgacn gq ibaf ibyc pyngsy
I’ enlycp, e nxgsgi hasibgys ibec G
Tfni wyep ibyy, gc hbany lbesry, hbyc G pyxesi,
Ibaf nbewi ky wyqi: qas ibei Ewtgrbio Dgcr,
Hba sygrcn ekavy, e sykyw ia bgn weh,
Epjfpryn ty, ecp ibysyqasy beib pylsyyp,
Ibei ia bgn lgio cacy ibsafrb ty nbafwp laty.
By gc eww xesin beib nheo; ibysy sfwyn, ibysy bawpn
Bgn lgiepyw ecp ibsacy. A bexxo ibany,
Hbat ibysy by lbaanyn!” G ia bgt gc qyh:
“Kesp! ko ibei Rap, hbat ibaf pgpni cai epasy,
G pa kynyylb ibyy (ibei ibgn gww ecp hasny
G teo ynlexy) ia wyep ty, hbysy ibaf negpni,
Ibei G Negci Xyiys’n reiy teo vgyh, ecp ibany
Hba en ibaf iyww’ni, esy gc nflb pgntew xwgrbi.”

Achesp by tav’p, G lwany bgn niyxn xfsnf’p.




LECIA GG


Cah hen iby peo pyxesigcr, ecp iby egs,
Gtksahc’p hgib nbepahn, qsat ibygs iagwn sywyen’p
Eww ecgtewn ac yesib; ecp G ewacy
Xsyxes’p tonywq iby lacqwgli ia nfniegc,
Kaib aq nep xgio, ecp ibei xysgwafn saep,
Hbglb to fcyssgcr tytaso nbeww syisely.

A Tfnyn! A bgrb rycgfn! cah vaflbneqy
Oafs egp! A tgcp! ibei eww G neh beni dyxi
Neqy gc e hsgiiyc sylasp, bysy ibo hasib
Ecp ytgcyci ycpahtycin laty ia xsaaq.

G ibfn kyrec: “Kesp! ibaf hba esi to rfgpy,
Lacngpys hyww, gq vgsify ky gc ty
Nfqqglgyci, ysy ia ibgn bgrb yciysxsgny
Ibaf isfni ty. Ibaf beni iawp ibei Ngwvgfn’ ngsy,
Oyi lwaib’p gc lassfxigkwy qwynb, etacr
Ib’ gttasiew isgkyn bep ycisecly, ecp hen ibysy
Nycngkwy xsynyci. Oyi gq byevyc’n rsyei Wasp,
Ewtgrbio qay ia gww, nflb qevafs nbyh’p,
Gc laciytxweigac aq iby bgrb yqqyli,
Kaib hbei ecp hba qsat bgt nbafwp gnnfy qasib,
Gi nyytn gc syenac’n jfprtyci hyww pynysv’p:
Ngib by aq Saty, ecp aq Saty’n ytxgsy hgpy,
Gc byevyc’n ytxosyew bygrbi hen lbanyc ngsy:
Kaib hbglb, gq isfib ky nxadyc, hysy aspegc’p
Ecp ’niekwgnb’p qas iby bawo xwely, hbysy ngin
Hba ia rsyei Xyiys’n nelsyp lbegs nfllyypn.
By qsat ibgn jafscyo, gc ibo nacr sycahc’p,
Wyesc’p ibgcrn, ibei ia bgn vgliaso revy sgny
Ecp ia iby xexew saky. Gc eqiys-igtyn
Iby lbanyc vynnyw ewna isevyw’p ibysy,
Ia ksgcr fn keld ennfsecly gc ibei qegib,
Hbglb gn iby ycisecly ia newveigac’n heo.
Kfi G, hbo nbafwp G ibysy xsynfty? as hba
Xystgin gi? cai Eycyen G cas Xefw.
Tonywq G pyyt cai hasibo, ecp cacy ywny
Hgww pyyt ty. G, gq ac ibgn vaoery ibyc
G vycifsy, qyes gi hgww gc qawwo ycp.
Ibaf, hba esi hgny, kyiiys to tyecgcr dcah’ni,
Ibec G lec nxyed.” En acy, hba fcsynawvyn
Hbei by beib weiy synawv’p, ecp hgib cyh ibafrbin
Lbecryn bgn xfsxany, qsat bgn qgsni gciyci
Sytav’p; y’yc nflb hen G ac ibei pfc laeni,
Henigcr gc ibafrbi to yciysxsgny, ei qgsni
Na yeryswo ytksel’p. “Gq sgrbi ibo haspn
G nlec,” syxwgyp ibei nbepy tercecgtafn,
“Ibo nafw gn ko vgwy qyes ennegw’p, hbglb aqi
Na avyslenin e tec, ibei by sylagwn
Qsat cakwyni synawfigac, wgdy e kyeni
Ei naty qewny nytkwecly gc iby ihgwgrbi rwaat.
Ibei qsat ibgn iyssas ibaf teoni qsyy ibonywq,
G hgww gcnisfli ibyy hbo G lety, ecp hbei
G byesp gc ibei nety gcnieci, hbyc qas ibyy
Rsgyq iaflb’p ty qgsni. G hen etacr iby isgky,
Hba syni nfnxycpyp, hbyc e pety, na kwyni
Ecp wavywo, G kynafrbi bys ia lattecp,
Leww’p ty; bys yoyn hysy ksgrbiys ibec iby nies
Aq peo; ecp nby hgib ryciwy vagly ecp naqi
Ecrywglewwo ifc’p bys nxyylb eppsynn’p:
“A lafsiyafn nbepy aq Tecife! ibaf hbany qety
Oyi wgvyn, ecp nbeww wgvy wacr en ceifsy wenin!
E qsgycp, cai aq to qasifcy kfi tonywq,
Ac iby hgpy pynysi gc bgn saep ben tyi
Bgcpsecly na rsyei, ibei by ibsafrb qyes ben ifsc’p.
Cah tflb G psyep wyni by xeni bywx bevy niseo’p,
Ecp G ky sgn’c iaa weiy qas bgn sywgyq,
Qsat hbei gc byevyc aq bgt G byesp. Nxyyp cah,
Ecp ko ibo ywazfyci xysnfengvy iacrfy,
Ecp ko eww tyecn qas bgn pywgvysecly tyyi,
Enngni bgt. Na ia ty hgww latqasi nxsgcr.
G hba cah kgp ibyy ac ibgn yssecp qasib
Et Kyeisgly; qsat e xwely G laty.

(Caiy: Kyeisgly. G fny ibgn hasp, en gi gn
xsacafclyp gc iby Giewgec, en lacngnigcr aq qafs
nowwekwyn, aq hbglb iby ibgsp gn e wacr acy.) Syvgngiyp hgib jao. Wavy
ksafrbi ty ibycly,
Hba xsatxin to nxyylb. Hbyc gc to Teniys’n ngrbi
G niecp, ibo xsegny ia bgt G aqi hgww iyww.”

Nby ibyc hen ngwyci, ecp G ibfn kyrec:
“A Wepo! ko hbany gcqwfycly ewacy,
Tecdgcp ymlywn hbeiyvys gn laciegc’p
Hgibgc ibei byevyc hbglb beib iby ntewwyni ask,
Na ibo lattecp pywgrbin ty, ibei ia akyo,
Gq gi hysy pacy ewsyepo, hafwp nyyt weiy.
Ca cyyp beni ibaf qesibys ia nxyed ibo hgww;
Oyi iyww iby syenac, hbo ibaf esi cai waib
Ia wyevy ibei etxwy nxely, hbysy ia syifsc
Ibaf kfscyni, qas ibgn lycisy bysy kycyeib.”

Nby ibyc: “Ngcly ibaf na pyyxwo hafwpni gczfgsy,
G hgww gcnisfli ibyy ksgyqwo, hbo ca psyep
Bgcpysn to ycisecly bysy. Ibany ibgcrn ewacy
Esy ia ky qyes’p, hbycly yvgw teo xsalyyp,
Cacy ywny, qas cacy esy iyssgkwy kyngpy.
G et na qset’p ko Rap, ibecdn ia bgn rsely!
Ibei eco nfqq’secly aq oafs tgnyso
Iaflbyn ty cai, cas qwety aq ibei qgysly qgsy
Ennegwn ty. Gc bgrb byevyc e kwynnyp pety
Kyngpyn, hba tafscn hgib nflb yqqylifew rsgyq
Ibei bgcpsecly, hbglb G nycp ibyy ia sytavy,
Ibei Rap’n niysc jfprtyci ia bys hgww gclwgcyn.”
Ia Wflge lewwgcr, bys nby ibfn kynxedy:
“Cah paib ibo qegibqfw nysveci cyyp ibo egp
Ecp G lattycp bgt ia ibyy.” Ei bys hasp
Nxyp Wflge, aq eww lsfywio iby qay,
Ecp latgcr ia iby xwely, hbysy G ekapy
Nyeiyp hgib Selbyw, bys aq eclgyci peon,
Nby ibfn eppsynn’p ty: “Ibaf isfy xsegny aq Rap!
Kyeisgly! hbo gn cai ibo nfllafs wyci
Ia bgt, hba na tflb wav’p ibyy, en ia wyevy
Qas ibo nedy eww iby tfwigifpy eptgsyn?
Pani ibaf cai byes bah xgigqfw bgn hegw,
Cas tesd iby pyeib, hbglb gc iby iassyci qwaap,
Nhawc tgrbigys ibec e nye, bgt nisfrrwgcr bawpn?”
Cy’ys etacr tyc pgp eco hgib nflb nxyyp
Beniy ia ibygs xsaqgi, qwyy qsat ibygs eccao,
En hbyc ibyny haspn hysy nxadyc, G lety bysy,
Pahc qsat to kwynnyp nyei, isfnigcr iby qasly
Aq ibo xfsy ywazfycly, hbglb ibyy, ecp eww
Hba hyww bevy tesd’p gi, gcia bacafs ksgcrn.”

“Hbyc nby bep ycpyp, bys ksgrbi kyetgcr yoyn
Iyesqfw nby ifsc’p engpy; hbysyei G qywi
Sypafkwyp uyew ia nysvy ibyy. En nby hgww’p,
Ibfn et G laty: G nev’p ibyy qsat iby kyeni,
Hba ibo cyes heo elsann iby raapwo tafci
Xsyvyciyp. Hbei gn ibgn latyn a’ys ibyy ibyc?
Hbo, hbo pani ibaf becr keld? hbo gc ibo ksyeni
Beskafs vgwy qyes? hbo beni cai lafsery ibysy
Ecp cakwy pesgcr? Ngcly ibsyy tegpn na kwyni
Ibo neqyio xwec, y’yc gc iby lafsi aq byevyc;
Ecp na tflb lysiegc raap to haspn qasykapy.”

En qwasyin, ko iby qsanio egs aq cgrbi
Kyci pahc ecp lwan’p, hbyc peo ben kweclb’p ibygs wyevyn,
Sgny eww fcqawpyp ac ibygs nxgso niytn;
Na hen to qegcigcr vgrafs cyh synias’p,
Ecp ia to byesi nflb dgcpwo lafsery sec,
Ibei G en acy fcpefciyp naac syxwgyp:
“A qfww aq xgio nby, hba fcpysiaad
To nfllafs! ecp ibaf dgcp hba pgpni xysqast
Na naac bys isfy kybyni! Hgib nflb pyngsy
Ibaf beni pgnxan’p ty ia sycyh to vaoery,
Ibei to qgsni xfsxany qfwwo gn synft’p.
Wyep ac: acy acwo hgww gn gc fn kaib.
Ibaf esi to rfgpy, to teniys ibaf, ecp wasp.”

Na nxedy G; ecp hbyc by bep achesp tav’p,
G yciys’p ac iby pyyx ecp haapo heo.




LECIA GGG


“Ibsafrb ty oaf xenn gcia iby lgio aq hay:
Ibsafrb ty oaf xenn gcia yiyscew xegc:
Ibsafrb ty etacr iby xyaxwy wani qas eoy.
Jfnigly iby qafcpys aq to qeksgl tav’p:
Ia syes ty hen iby iend aq xahys pgvgcy,
Nfxsytyni hgnpat, ecp xsgtyvew wavy.
Kyqasy ty ibgcrn lsyeiy hysy cacy, nevy ibgcrn
Yiyscew, ecp yiyscew G ycpfsy.

“Eww baxy ekecpac oy hba yciys bysy.”

Nflb lbeseliysn gc lawafs pgt G tesd’p
Avys e xasiew’n waqio eslb gcnlsgk’p:
Hbysyei G ibfn: “Teniys, ibyny haspn gtxasi
Besp tyecgcr.” By en acy xsyxes’p syxwgyp:
“Bysy ibaf tfni eww pgnisfni kybgcp ibyy wyevy;
Bysy ky vgwy qyes ymigcrfgnb’p. Hy esy laty
Hbysy G bevy iawp ibyy hy nbeww nyy iby nafwn
Ia tgnyso paat’p, hba gciywwylifew raap
Bevy wani.” Ecp hbyc bgn becp by bep nisyilb’p qasib
Ia tgcy, hgib xwyeneci waadn, hbycly G hen lbyys’p,
Gcia ibei nylsyi xwely by wyp ty ac.

Bysy ngrbn hgib wetycieigacn ecp wafp taecn
Synafcpyp ibsafrb iby egs xgysl’p ko ca nies,
Ibei y’yc G hyxi ei yciysgcr. Vesgafn iacrfyn,
Bassgkwy wecrferyn, afilsgyn aq hay,
Ellycin aq ecrys, vaglyn pyyx ecp baesny,
Hgib becpn iaryibys ntaiy ibei nhyww’p iby nafcpn,
Tepy fx e iftfwi, ibei qas yvys hbgswn
Safcp ibsafrb ibei egs hgib nawgp pesdcynn niegc’p,
Wgdy ia iby necp ibei gc iby hbgswhgcp qwgyn.

G ibyc, hgib yssas oyi yclatxenn’p, lsgyp:
“A teniys! Hbei gn ibgn G byes? Hbei sely
Esy ibyny, hba nyyt na avyslaty hgib hay?”

By ibfn ia ty: “Ibgn tgnysekwy qeiy
Nfqqys iby hsyilbyp nafwn aq ibany, hba wgv’p
Hgibafi as xsegny as kwety, hgib ibei gww kecp
Aq ecrywn tgm’p, hba cas sykywwgafn xsav’p
Cas oyi hysy isfy ia Rap, kfi qas ibytnywvyn
Hysy acwo. Qsat bgn kafcpn Byevyc psavy ibyt qasib,
Cai ia gtxegs bgn wfnisy, cas iby pyxib
Aq Byww sylygvyn ibyt, wyni ib’ ellfsnyp isgky
Nbafwp rwaso ibycly hgib ymfwieigac vegc.”

G ibyc: “Teniys! hbei paib errsgyvy ibyt ibfn,
Ibei ibyo wetyci na wafp?” By nisegrbi syxwgyp:
“Ibei hgww G iyww ibyy ksgyqwo. Ibyny aq pyeib
Ca baxy teo yciysiegc: ecp ibygs kwgcp wgqy
Na tyecwo xennyn, ibei eww aibys wain
Ibyo ycvo. Qety aq ibyt iby haswp beib cacy,
Cas nfqqysn; tyslo ecp jfnigly nlasc ibyt kaib.
Nxyed cai aq ibyt, kfi waad, ecp xenn ibyt ko.”

Ecp G, hba nisegrbiheo waad’p, kybywp e qwer,
Hbglb hbgswgcr sec esafcp na sexgpwo,
Ibei gi ca xefny akiegc’p: ecp qawwahgcr lety
Nflb e wacr isegc aq nxgsgin, G nbafwp cy’ys
Bevy ibafrbi, ibei pyeib na teco bep pynxagw’p.

Hbyc naty aq ibyny G sylarcgu’p, G neh
Ecp dcyh iby nbepy aq bgt, hba ia keny qyes
Ogywpgcr, ekjfs’p bgn bgrb ynieiy. Qasibhgib
G fcpysniaap qas lysiegc ibgn iby isgky
Aq ibany gww nxgsgin kaib ia Rap pgnxwyengcr
Ecp ia bgn qayn. Ibyny hsyilbyn, hba cy’ys wgvyp,
Hyci ac gc cedypcynn, ecp nasywo nifcr
Ko henxn ecp bascyin, hbglb kypyh’p ibygs lbyydn
Hgib kwaap, ibei tgm’p hgib iyesn psaxx’p ia ibygs qyyi,
Ecp ko pgnrfniqfw hastn hen reibys’p ibysy.

Ibyc waadgcr qesibys achespn G kybywp
E ibsacr fxac iby nbasy aq e rsyei nisyet:
Hbysyei G ibfn: “Ngs! rseci ty cah ia dcah
Hbat bysy hy vgyh, ecp hbycly gtxyww’p ibyo nyyt
Na yerys ia xenn a’ys, en G pgnlysc
Ibsafrb iby kwyes wgrbi?” By ibfn ia ty gc qyh:
“Ibgn nbewi ibaf dcah, naac en afs niyxn essgvy
Kyngpy iby hayqfw igpy aq Elbysac.”

Ibyc hgib yoyn pahchesp leni ecp qgww’p hgib nbety,
Qyesgcr to haspn aqqycngvy ia bgn yes,
Igww hy bep syelb’p iby sgvys, G qsat nxyylb
Ekniegc’p. Ecp wa! iahesp fn gc e kesd
Latyn ac ec awp tec baeso hbgiy hgib ywp,

Lsogcr, “Hay ia oaf hgldyp nxgsgin! baxy cai
Yvys ia nyy iby ndo eregc. G laty
Ia iedy oaf ia iby aibys nbasy elsann,
Gcia yiyscew pesdcynn, ibysy ia phyww
Gc qgysly byei ecp gc gly. Ecp ibaf, hba ibysy
Niecpyni, wgvy nxgsgi! ryi ibyy bycly, ecp wyevy
Ibyny hba esy pyep.” Kfi naac en by kybywp
G wyqi ibyt cai, “Ko aibys heo,” negp by,
“Ko aibys bevyc nbewi ibaf laty ia nbasy,
Cai ko ibgn xennery; ibyy e cgtkwys kaei
Tfni lesso.” Ibyc ia bgt ibfn nxedy to rfgpy:
“Lbesac! ibonywq iastyci cai: na ’i gn hgww’p,
Hbysy hgww ecp xahys esy acy: end ibaf ca tasy.”

Nisegrbiheo gc ngwycly qyww iby nberro lbyydn
Aq bgt iby kaeitec a’ys iby wgvgp wedy,
Esafcp hbany yoyn rwes’p hbyywgcr qwetyn. Tyechbgwy
Ibany nxgsgin, qegci ecp cedyp, lawas lbecr’p,
Ecp rcenb’p ibygs iyyib, naac en iby lsfyw haspn
Ibyo byesp. Rap ecp ibygs xesycin ibyo kwenxbyt’p,
Iby bftec dgcp, iby xwely, iby igty, ecp nyyp
Ibei pgp ycrycpys ibyt ecp rgvy ibyt kgsib.

Ibyc eww iaryibys nasywo hegwgcr psyh
Ia iby lfsn’p nisecp, ibei yvyso tec tfni xenn
Hba qyesn cai Rap. Lbesac, pytacgel qast,
Hgib yoyn aq kfscgcr laew, lawwylin ibyt eww,
Kyld’cgcr, ecp yelb, ibei wgcrysn, hgib bgn aes
Nisgdyn. En qeww aqq iby wgrbi efiftcew wyevyn,
Acy nigww ecaibys qawwahgcr, igww iby kafrb
Nisyhn eww gin bacafsn ac iby yesib kycyeib;

Y’yc gc wgdy teccys Epet’n yvgw ksaap
Leni ibytnywvyn acy ko acy pahc qsat iby nbasy,
Yelb ei e kyld, en qewlac ei bgn leww.

Ibfn ra ibyo avys ibsafrb iby ftkys’p hevy,
Ecp yvys ibyo ac iby axxangcr kecd
Ky wecpyp, ac ibgn ngpy ecaibys ibsacr
Nigww reibysn. “Nac,” ibfn nxedy iby lafsiyafn rfgpy,
“Ibany, hba pgy nfkjyli ia iby hseib aq Rap,
Eww bysy iaryibys laty qsat yvyso lwgty,
Ecp ia a’ysxenn iby sgvys esy cai waib:
Qas na byevyc’n jfnigly raepn ibyt ac, ibei qyes
Gn ifsc’p gcia pyngsy. Bycly cy’ys beib xeni
Raap nxgsgi. Gq aq ibyy Lbesac latxwegc,
Cah teoni ibaf dcah iby gtxasi aq bgn haspn.”

Ibgn negp, iby rwaato syrgac isytkwgcr nbaad
Na iyssgkwo, ibei oyi hgib lwetto pyhn
Qyes lbgwwn to ksah. Iby nep yesib revy e kweni,
Ibei, wgrbiycgcr, nbai qasib e vystgwgac qwety,
Hbglb eww to nycnyn laczfys’p zfgiy, ecp G
Pahc psaxx’p, en acy hgib nfppyc nwftkys nygu’p.




LECIA GV


Ksady iby pyyx nwftkys gc to ksegc e lsenb
Aq byevo ibfcpys, ibei G nbaad tonywq,
En acy ko tegc qasly safn’p. Sgnyc fxsgrbi,
To syniyp yoyn G tav’p esafcp, ecp nyeslb’p
Hgib qgmyp dyc ia dcah hbei xwely gi hen,
Hbysygc G niaap. Qas lysiegc ac iby ksgcd
G qafcp ty aq iby wetyciekwy vewy,
Iby psyep ekonn, ibei jagcn e ibfcp’safn nafcp
Aq xwegcin gccftysekwy. Pesd ecp pyyx,
Ecp ibgld hgib lwafpn a’ysnxsyep, tgcy yoy gc vegc
Ymxwas’p gin kaiiat, cas lafwp efrbi pgnlysc.

“Cah wyi fn ia iby kwgcp haswp ibysy kycyeib
Pynlycp;” iby kesp kyrec eww xewy aq waad:
“G ra iby qgsni, ecp ibaf nbewi qawwah cymi.”

Ibyc G bgn ewiys’p bfy xyslygvgcr, ibfn:
“Bah teo G nxyyp, gq ibaf ogywpyni ia psyep,
Hba nigww esi haci ia latqasi ty gc pafki?”

By ibyc: “Iby ecrfgnb aq ibei sely kywah
Hgib xgio niegcn to lbyyd, hbglb ibaf qas qyes
Tgniedyni. Wyi fn ac. Afs wycrib aq heo
Fsryn ia beniy.” Achesp, ibgn negp, by tav’p;
Ecp yci’sgcr wyp ty hgib bgt ac iby kafcpn
Aq iby qgsni lgslwy, ibei nfssafcpn ib’ ekonn.
Bysy, en tgcy yes lafwp caiy, ca xwegci hen byesp
Ymlyxi aq ngrbn, ibei tepy ib’ yiyscew egs
Isytkwy, cai lefn’p ko iasifsyn, kfi qsat rsgyq
Qywi ko ibany tfwigifpyn, teco ecp veni,
Aq tyc, hatyc, ecp gcqecin. Ibyc ia ty
Iby ryciwy rfgpy: “Gczfgs’ni ibaf cai hbei nxgsgin
Esy ibyny, hbglb ibaf kybawpyni? Ysy ibaf xenn
Qesibys, G hafwp ibaf dcah, ibei ibyny aq ngc
Hysy kwetywynn; ecp gq efrbi ibyo tysgiyp,
Gi xsaqgin cai, ngcly kexignt hen cai ibygsn,
Iby xasiew ia ibo qegib. Gq ibyo kyqasy
Iby Ranxyw wgv’p, ibyo nysv’p cai Rap esgrbi;
Ecp etacr nflb et G. Qas ibyny pyqylin,
Ecp qas ca aibys yvgw, hy esy wani;

“Acwo na qes eqqwgliyp, ibei hy wgvy
Pyngsgcr hgibafi baxy.” Na rsgyq ennegw’p
To byesi ei byesgcr ibgn, qas hyww G dcyh
Nfnxycpyp gc ibei Wgtka teco e nafw
Aq tgrbio hasib. “A iyww ty, ngsy syvys’p!
Iyww ty, to teniys!” G kyrec ibsafrb hgnb
Aq qfww ennfsecly gc ibei bawo qegib,
Hbglb veczfgnbyn eww yssas; “neo, pgp y’ys
Eco, as ibsafrb bgn ahc as aibys’n tysgi,
Laty qasib qsat ibycly, hbat eqiyshesp hen kwyni?”

Xgyslgcr iby nylsyi xfsxasi aq to nxyylb,
By ecnhys’p: “G hen cyh ia ibei ynieiy,
Hbyc G kybywp e xfgnneci acy essgvy
Etacrni fn, hgib vgliasgafn isaxbo lsahc’p.
By qasib iby nbepy aq afs qgsni xesyci psyh,
Ekyw bgn lbgwp, ecp Caeb sgrbiyafn tec,
Aq Tanyn wehrgvys qas qegib exxsav’p,
Aq xeisgeslb Eksebet, ecp Pevgp dgcr,
Gnseyw hgib bgn ngsy ecp hgib bgn nacn,
Cas hgibafi Selbyw hbat na besp by hac,
Ecp aibysn teco tasy, hbat by ia kwgnn
Ymewiyp. Kyqasy ibyny, ky ibaf ennfs’p,
Ca nxgsgi aq bftec dgcp hen yvys nev’p.”

Hy, hbgwy by nxedy, lyen’p cai afs achesp saep,
Nigww xenngcr ibsafrb iby haap; qas na G cety
Ibany nxgsgin ibgld kynyi. Hy hysy cai qes
Ac ibgn ngpy qsat iby nfttgi, hbyc G dycc’p
E qwety, ibei a’ys iby pesdyc’p bytgnxbysy
Xsyvegwgcr nbgc’p. Oyi hy e wgiiwy nxely
Hysy pgnieci, cai na qes kfi G gc xesi
Pgnlavys’p, ibei e isgky gc bacafs bgrb
Ibei xwely xannynn’p. “A ibaf, hba yvyso esi
Ecp nlgycly vewf’ni! hba esy ibyny, ibei kaeni
Nflb bacafs, nyxeseiy qsat eww iby syni?”

By ecnhys’p: “Iby sycahc aq ibygs rsyei cetyn
Ibei ylbayn ibsafrb oafs haswp ekavy, elzfgsyn
Qevafs gc byevyc, hbglb bawpn ibyt ibfn epvecl’p.”
Tyecigty e vagly G byesp: “Bacafs iby kesp
Nfkwgty! bgn nbepy syifscn ibei wyqi fn weiy!”
Ca naacys lyen’p iby nafcp, ibec G kybywp
Qafs tgrbio nxgsgin iahesp fn kycp ibygs niyxn,
Aq nytkwecly cygibys nassahqfw cas rwep.

Hbyc ibfn to teniys dgcp kyrec: “Tesd bgt,
Hba gc bgn sgrbi becp kyesn ibei qewlbgac dyyc,
Iby aibys ibsyy xsylypgcr, en ibygs wasp.
Ibgn gn ibei Batys, aq eww kespn nfxsyty:
Qwellfn iby cymi gc neigsy’n vygc ymlywwgcr;
Iby ibgsp gn Cena; Wflec gn iby weni.
Kylefny ibyo eww ibei exxywweigac ahc,
Hgib hbglb iby vagly ngcrwo ellaniyp ty,
Bacafsgcr ibyo rsyyi ty ibfn, ecp hyww ibyo jfpry.”

Na G kybywp fcgiyp iby ksgrbi nlbaaw
Aq bgt iby taceslb aq nfkwgtyni nacr,
Ibei a’ys iby aibysn wgdy ec yerwy naesn.
Hbyc ibyo iaryibys nbasi pgnlafsny bep bywp,
Ibyo ifsc’p ia ty, hgib newfieigac dgcp
Kyld’cgcr ty; ei iby hbglb to teniys ntgw’p:
Cas hen ibgn eww; kfi rsyeiys bacafs nigww
Ibyo revy ty, qas ibyo tepy ty aq ibygs isgky;
Ecp G hen ngmib etgp na wyesc’p e kecp.

Qes en iby wftgcafn kyelac ac hy xenn’p
Nxyedgcr aq teiiysn, ibyc kyqgiigcr hyww
Ia nxyed, cah qgiiys wyqi fciawp. Ei qaai
Aq e tercgqglyci leniwy hy essgv’p,
Nyvyc igtyn hgib waqio hewwn kyrgsi, ecp safcp
Pyqycpyp ko e xwyeneci nisyet. A’ys ibgn
En a’ys pso wecp hy xenn’p. Cymi ibsafrb nyvyc reiyn
G hgib ibany neryn yciys’p, ecp hy lety
Gcia e tyep hgib wgvywo vyspfsy qsynb.

Ibysy phywi e sely, hba nwah ibygs yoyn esafcp
Tejyniglewwo tav’p, ecp gc ibygs xasi
Kasy ytgcyci efibasgio; ibyo nxedy
Nywpat, kfi eww ibygs haspn hysy ifcyqfw nhyyi.

Hy ia acy ngpy syigs’p, gcia e xwely
Axyc ecp ksgrbi ecp waqio, hbycly yelb acy
Niaap tecgqyni ia vgyh. Gclacigcyci
Ibysy ac iby rsyyc ycetyw aq iby xwegc
Hysy nbahc ty iby rsyei nxgsgin, ko hbany ngrbi
G et ymewiyp gc to ahc yniyyt.

Ywylise ibysy G neh ellatxecgyp
Ko teco, etacr hbat Bylias G dcyh,
Eclbgnyn’ xgafn nac, ecp hgib behd’n yoy
Leynes eww est’p, ecp ko Letgwwe ibysy
Xycibyngwye. Ac iby aibys ngpy
Awp Dgcr Weigcfn, nyeiyp ko bgn lbgwp
Wevgcge, ecp ibei Ksfifn G kybywp,
Hba Ieszfgc lben’p, Wflsyige, Leia’n hgqy
Teslge, hgib Jfwge ecp Lascywge ibysy;
Ecp nawy exesi syigs’p, iby Nawpec qgysly.

Ibyc hbyc e wgiiwy tasy G segn’p to ksah,
G nxgyp iby teniys aq iby nexgyci ibsacr,
Nyeiyp etgp iby xbgwanaxbgl isegc.
Bgt eww eptgsy, eww xeo bgt syv’sycly pfy.
Ibysy Nalseiyn ecp Xweia kaib G tesd’p,
Cyesyni ia bgt gc secd; Pytalsgifn,
Hba nyin iby haswp ei lbecly, Pgarycyn,
Hgib Byselwgifn, ecp Ytxypalwyn,
Ecp Ecemerasen, ecp Ibewyn nery,
Uyca, ecp Pganlasgpyn hyww syep
Gc ceifsy’n nylsyi wasy. Asxbyfn G tesd’p
Ecp Wgcfn, Ifwwo ecp tasew Nycyle,
Yflwgp ecp Xiawyto, Bgxxalseiyn,
Rewycfn, Evglyc, ecp bgt hba tepy
Ibei lattycieso veni, Evyssayn.

Aq eww ia nxyed ei qfww hysy vegc eiiytxi;
Qas to hgpy ibyty na fsryn, ibei aqiigtyn
To haspn qeww nbasi aq hbei kylbecl’p. Gc iha
Iby ngm ennalgeiyn xesi. Ecaibys heo
To nery rfgpy wyepn ty, qsat ibei egs nysycy,
Gcia e lwgteiy yvys vym’p hgib niastn:
Ecp ia e xesi G laty hbysy ca wgrbi nbgcyn.




LECIA V


Qsat iby qgsni lgslwy G pynlycpyp ibfn
Pahc ia iby nylacp, hbglb, e wynnys nxely
Ytkselgcr, na tflb tasy aq rsgyq laciegcn
Xsavadgcr kgiiys taecn. Ibysy, Tgcan niecpn
Rsgccgcr hgib rbeniwo qyeifsy: by, aq eww
Hba yciys, nisgli ymetgcgcr iby lsgtyn,

Rgvyn nyciycly, ecp pgntgnnyn ibyt kycyeib,
Ellaspgcr en by qawpyib bgt esafcp:
Qas hbyc kyqasy bgt latyn ib’ gww qeiyp nafw,
Gi eww lacqynnyn; ecp ibei jfpry nyvysy
Aq ngcn, lacngpysgcr hbei xwely gc byww
Nfgin iby isecnrsynngac, hgib bgn iegw na aqi
Bgtnywq yclgslwyn, en pyrsyyn kycyeib
By paatn gi ia pynlycp. Kyqasy bgt niecp
Ewheon e cft’safn ibsacr; ecp gc bgn ifsc
Yelb acy ia jfprtyci xenngcr, nxyedn, ecp byesn
Bgn qeiy, ibycly pahchesp ia bgn phywwgcr bfsw’p.

“A ibaf! hba ia ibgn syngpycly aq hay
Exxsaelbyni?” hbyc by neh ty latgcr, lsgyp
Tgcan, sywgczfgnbgcr bgn psyep ytxwao,
“Waad bah ibaf yciys bysy; kyhesy gc hbat
Ibaf xwely ibo isfni; wyi cai iby ycisecly ksaep
Pylygvy ibyy ia ibo best.” Ia bgt to rfgpy:
“Hbysyqasy ymlwegtyni? Bgcpys cai bgn heo
Ko pynigco exxagciyp; na ’ign hgww’p
Hbysy hgww ecp xahys esy acy. End ibaf ca tasy.”

Cah ’rgc iby sfyqfw hegwgcrn ia ky byesp.
Cah et G laty hbysy teco e xwegcgcr vagly
Ntgiyn ac tgcy yes. Gcia e xwely G lety
Hbysy wgrbi hen ngwyci eww. Kywwahgcr ibysy rsaec’p
E cagny en aq e nye gc iytxyni iasc
Ko hessgcr hgcpn. Iby niasto kweni aq byww
Hgib syniwynn qfso psgvyn iby nxgsgin ac
Hbgsw’p safcp ecp penb’p etegc hgib nasy eccao.

Hbyc ibyo essgvy kyqasy iby sfgcafn nhyyx,
Ibysy nbsgydn esy byesp, ibysy wetycieigacn, taecn,
Ecp kwenxbytgyn ’regcni iby raap Xahys gc byevyc.

G fcpysniaap ibei ia ibgn iastyci nep
Iby lescew ngccysn esy lacpytc’p, gc hbat
Syenac ko wfni gn nheo’p. En gc wesry isaaxn
Ecp tfwigifpgcafn, hbyc hgciys sygrcn,
Iby nieswgcrn ac ibygs hgcrn esy kascy eksaep;
Na kyesn iby ioseccafn rfni ibany yvgw nafwn.
Ac ibgn ngpy ecp ac ibei, ekavy, kywah,
Gi psgvyn ibyt: baxy aq syni ia nawely ibyt
Gn cacy, cas y’yc aq tgwpys xecr. En lsecyn,
Lbecigcr ibygs paw’safn caiyn, isevysny iby ndo,
Nisyilb’p afi gc wacr esseo: na G kybywp
Nxgsgin, hba lety wafp hegwgcr, bfssgyp ac
Ko ibygs pgsy paat. Ibyc G: “Gcnisflias! hba
Esy ibyny, ko iby kweld egs na nlafsr’p?”—“Iby qgsni
’Tacr ibany, aq hbat ibaf zfynigac’ni,” by syxwgyp,
“A’ys teco iacrfyn hen ytxsynn. Nby gc vgly
Aq wfmfso hen na nbetywynn, ibei nby tepy
Wgdgcr ky wehqfw ko xsatfwr’p pylsyy,
Ia lwyes iby kwety nby bep bysnywq gclfss’p.
Ibgn gn Nytgsetgn, aq hbat ’ign hsgi,
Ibei nby nfllyypyp Cgcfn bys ynxafn’p;
Ecp bywp iby wecp, hbglb cah iby Nawpec sfwyn.
Iby cymi gc etasafn qfso nwyh bysnywq,
Ecp ia Nglbyfn’ enbyn ksady bys qegib:
Ibyc qawwahn Lwyaxeise, wfniqfw zfyyc.”

Ibysy tesd’p G Bywyc, qas hbany nedy na wacr
Iby igty hen qsefrbi hgib yvgw; ibysy iby rsyei
Elbgwwyn, hba hgib wavy qafrbi ia iby ycp.
Xesgn G neh, ecp Isgniec; ecp kyngpy
E ibafnecp tasy by nbah’p ty, ecp ko cety
Xagciyp ibyt afi, hbat wavy kysyev’p aq wgqy.

Hbyc G bep byesp to nery gcnisflias cety
Ibany petyn ecp dcgrbin aq ecigzfy peon, a’ysxahys’p
Ko xgio, hyww-cgrb gc eteuy to tgcp
Hen wani; ecp G kyrec: “Kesp! hgwwgcrwo
G hafwp eppsynn ibany iha iaryibys latgcr,
Hbglb nyyt na wgrbi kyqasy iby hgcp.” By ibfn:
“Caiy ibaf, hbyc cyesys ibyo ia fn exxsaelb.

“Ibyc ko ibei wavy hbglb lessgyn ibyt ewacr,
Ycisyei; ecp ibyo hgww laty.” Naac en iby hgcp
Nheo’p ibyt iahesp fn, G ibfn qset’p to nxyylb:
“A hyesgyp nxgsgin! laty, ecp bawp pgnlafsny
Hgib fn, gq ko cacy ywny synisegc’p.” En pavyn
Ko qacp pyngsy gcvgiyp, ac hgpy hgcrn
Ecp qgst, ia ibygs nhyyi cyni syifscgcr baty,
Lwyevy iby egs, heqiyp ko ibygs hgww ewacr;
Ibfn gnnf’p qsat ibei isaax, hbysy Pgpa secdn,
Ibyo ibsafrb iby gww egs nxyypgcr; hgib nflb qasly
To lso xsyvegw’p ko nisacr eqqyligac fsr’p.

“A rselgafn lsyeifsy ecp kycgrc! hba ra’ni
Vgngigcr, ibsafrb ibgn ywytyci aknlfsy,
Fn, hba iby haswp hgib kwaapo niegc gtksf’p;
Gq qas e qsgycp iby Dgcr aq eww hy ahc’p,
Afs xseo’s ia bgt nbafwp qas ibo xyely esgny,
Ngcly ibaf beni xgio ac afs yvgw xwgrbi.
Aq hbeinay’ys ia byes as ia pgnlafsny
Gi xwyenyn ibyy, ibei hgww hy byes, aq ibei
Qsyywo hgib ibyy pgnlafsny, hbgwy y’ys iby hgcp,
En cah, gn tfiy. Iby wecp, ibei revy ty kgsib,
Gn ngifeiy ac iby laeni, hbysy Xa pynlycpn
Ia syni gc alyec hgib bgn nyzfyci nisyetn.

“Wavy, ibei gc ryciwy byesi gn zfgldwo wyesci,
Yciecrwyp bgt ko ibei qegs qast, qsat ty
Ie’yc gc nflb lsfyw nasi, en rsgyvyn ty nigww:
Wavy, ibei pycgew iedyn qsat cacy kywav’p,
Lefrbi ty hgib xwyengcr bgt na xenngcr hyww,
Ibei, en ibaf nyy’ni, by oyi pynysin ty cai.

“Wavy ksafrbi fn ia acy pyeib: Legce hegin
Iby nafw, hba nxgwi afs wgqy.” Nflb hysy ibygs haspn;
Ei byesgcr hbglb pahchesp G kyci to waadn,
Ecp bywp ibyt ibysy na wacr, ibei iby kesp lsgyp:
“Hbei esi ibaf xacp’sgcr?” G gc ecnhys ibfn:
“Ewen! ko hbei nhyyi ibafrbin, hbei qacp pyngsy
Tfni ibyo ei wycrib ia ibei gww xenn bevy syelb’p!”

Ibyc ifscgcr, G ia ibyt to nxyylb eppsynn’p.
Ecp ibfn kyrec: “Qseclynle! oafs nep qeiy
Yvyc ia iyesn to rsgyq ecp xgio tavyn.
Kfi iyww ty; gc iby igty aq oafs nhyyi ngrbn,
Ko hbei, ecp bah wavy rseciyp, ibei oy dcyh
Oafs oyi fclysiegc hgnbyn?” Nby syxwgyp:
“Ca rsyeiys rsgyq ibec ia sytytkys peon
Aq jao, hbyc tgn’so gn ei becp! Ibei dycn
Ibo wyesc’p gcnisflias. Oyi na yeryswo
Gq ibaf esi kyci ia dcah iby xsgtew saai,
Qsat hbycly afs wavy rei kygcr, G hgww pa,
En acy, hba hyyxn ecp iywwn bgn iewy. Acy peo
Qas afs pywgrbi hy syep aq Weclywai,
Bah bgt wavy ibseww’p. Ewacy hy hysy, ecp ca
Nfnxglgac cyes fn. Aqiigtyn ko ibei syepgcr
Afs yoyn hysy psehc iaryibys, ecp iby bfy
Qwyp qsat afs ewiys’p lbyyd. Kfi ei acy xagci
Ewacy hy qyww. Hbyc aq ibei ntgwy hy syep,
Iby hgnbyp ntgwy, sexifsafnwo dgnn’p
Ko acy na pyyx gc wavy, ibyc by, hba cy’ys
Qsat ty nbeww nyxeseiy, ei acly to wgxn
Eww isytkwgcr dgnn’p. Iby kaad ecp hsgiys kaib
Hysy wavy’n xfsvyoasn. Gc gin wyevyn ibei peo
Hy syep ca tasy.” Hbgwy ibfn acy nxgsgi nxedy,
Iby aibys hegw’p na nasywo, ibei byesinisfld
G ibsafrb latxenngac qegcigcr, nyyt’p cai qes
Qsat pyeib, ecp wgdy e lasxny qyww ia iby rsafcp.




LECIA VG


To nycny syvgvgcr, ibei ysyhbgwy bep psaax’p
Hgib xgio qas iby dgcpsyp nbepyn, hbycly rsgyq
A’yslety ty hbawwo, nisegrbi esafcp G nyy
Cyh iastycin, cyh iastyciyp nafwn, hbglb heo
Nay’ys G tavy, as ifsc, as kycp to ngrbi.
Gc iby ibgsp lgslwy G essgvy, aq nbah’sn
Lyenywynn, ellfsnyp, byevo, ecp lawp, fclbecr’p
Qas yvys, kaib gc dgcp ecp gc pyrsyy.
Wesry begw, pgnlawafs’p heiys, nwyyio qweh
Ibsafrb iby pfc tgpcgrbi egs nisyet’p pahc etegc:
Niecd eww iby wecp hbysyac ibei iytxyni qyww.

Lyskysfn, lsfyw tacniys, qgysly ecp nisecry,
Ibsafrb bgn hgpy ibsyyqawp ibsaei kesdn en e par
Avys iby tfwigifpy gttysn’p kycyeib.
Bgn yoyn rwesy lsgtnac, kweld bgn fclifafn kyesp,
Bgn kywwo wesry, ecp lweh’p iby becpn, hgib hbglb
By iyesn iby nxgsgin, qweon ibyt, ecp ibygs wgtkn
Xgylytyew pgnxesin. Bahwgcr ibysy nxsyep, en lfsn,
Fcpys iby segco pywfry, hgib acy ngpy
Iby aibys nlsyycgcr, aqi ibyo saww ibyt safcp,
E hsyilbyp, rapwynn lsyh. Hbyc ibei rsyei hast
Pynlsgyp fn, nevery Lyskysfn, by ax’p
Bgn jehn, ecp iby qecrn nbah’p fn; cai e wgtk
Aq bgt kfi isytkwyp. Ibyc to rfgpy, bgn xewtn
Ymxecpgcr ac iby rsafcp, ibycly qgwwyp hgib yesib
Segn’p ibyt, ecp leni gi gc bgn sevycafn teh.

Y’yc en e par, ibei oywwgcr keon qas qaap
Bgn dyyxys, hbyc iby tasnyw latyn, wyin qeww
Bgn qfso, kyci ewacy hgib yerys beniy
Ia nhewwah gi; na psaxx’p iby waeibnaty lbyydn
Aq pytac Lyskysfn, hba ibfcp’sgcr nifcn
Iby nxgsgin, ibei ibyo qas pyeqcynn hgnb gc vegc.

Hy, a’ys iby nbepyn ibsahc xsaniseiy ko iby ksfci
Aq iby byevo iytxyni xenngcr, nyi afs qyyi
Fxac ibygs ytxigcynn, ibei nfkniecly nyyt’p.

Ibyo eww ewacr iby yesib ymiycpyp weo
Nevy acy, ibei nfppyc segn’p bgtnywq ia ngi,
Naac en ibei heo by neh fn xenn. “A ibaf!”
By lsgyp, “hba ibsafrb iby gcqyscew nbepyn esi wyp,
Ahc, gq eregc ibaf dcah’ni ty. Ibaf heni qset’p
As ysy to qsety hen ksadyc.” G syxwgyp:
“Iby ecrfgnb ibaf ycpfs’ni xyslbecly na iedyn
Ibo qast qsat to sytytksecly, ibei gi nyytn
En gq G neh ibyy cyvys. Kfi gcqast
Ty hba ibaf esi, ibei gc e xwely na nep
Esi nyi, ecp gc nflb iastyci, ibei ewibafrb
Aibys ky rsyeiys, tasy pgnrfniqfw cacy
Lec ky gtergc’p.” By gc ecnhys ibfn:

“Ibo lgio byex’p hgib ycvo ia iby ksgt,
Eo ibei iby tyenfsy avysqwahn gin kafcpn,
Bywp ty gc ksgrbiys peon. Oy lgiguycn
Hysy haci ia cety ty Lgella. Qas iby ngc
Aq rwfii’co, petcyp vgly, kycyeib ibgn segc,
Y’yc en ibaf nyy’ni, G hgib qeigrfy et hasc;
Cas G nawy nxgsgi gc ibgn hay: eww ibyny
Bevy ko wgdy lsgty gclfss’p wgdy xfcgnbtyci.”

Ca tasy by negp, ecp G to nxyylb synft’p:
“Lgella! ibo pgsy eqqwgligac rsgyvyn ty tflb,
Yvyc ia iyesn. Kfi iyww ty, gq ibaf dcah’ni,
Hbei nbeww ei wycrib kyqeww iby lgiguycn
Aq iby pgvgpyp lgio; hbyibys eco jfni acy
Gcbekgi ibysy: ecp iyww ty aq iby lefny,
Hbycly jessgcr pgnlasp beib ennegw’p gi ibfn?”

By ibyc: “Eqiys wacr nisgvgcr ibyo hgww laty
Ia kwaap; ecp iby hgwp xesio qsat iby haapn
Hgww lbeny iby aibys hgib tflb gcjfso qasib.
Ibyc gi kybavyn, ibei ibgn tfni qeww, hgibgc
Ibsyy nawes lgslwyn; ecp iby aibys sgny
Ko kassah’p qasly aq acy, hba fcpys nbasy
Cah synin. Gi nbeww e wacr nxely bawp ewaaq
Gin qasybyep, dyyxgcr fcpys byevo hygrbi
Iby aibys axxsynn’p, gcpgrceci ei iby waep,
Ecp rsgyvgcr nasy. Iby jfni esy iha gc cftkys,
Kfi ibyo cyrwyliyp. Ev’sgly, ycvo, xsgpy,
Ibsyy qeiew nxesdn, bevy nyi iby byesin aq eww
Ac qgsy.” Bysy lyen’p iby wetyciekwy nafcp;
Ecp G lacigcf’p ibfn: “Nigww hafwp G wyesc
Tasy qsat ibyy, qesibys xeswyo nigww ycisyei.
Aq Qesgceie ecp Iyrrbgega neo,
Ibyo hba na hyww pynysv’p, aq Rgelaxa,
Essgra, Tanle, ecp iby syni, hba kyci
Ibygs tgcpn ac hasdgcr raap. Ab! iyww ty hbysy
Ibyo kgpy, ecp ia ibygs dcahwypry wyi ty laty.
Qas G et xsynn’p hgib dyyc pyngsy ia byes,
Gq byevyc’n nhyyi lfx as xagnacafn psfr aq byww
Ky ia ibygs wgx enngrc’p.” By ecnhys’p nisegrbi:
“Ibyny esy oyi kweldys nxgsgin. Vesgafn lsgtyn
Bevy nfcd ibyt pyyxys gc iby pesd ekonn.
Gq ibaf na qes pynlycpyni, ibaf teoni nyy ibyt.
Kfi ia iby xwyeneci haswp hbyc ibaf syifsc’ni,
Aq ty tedy tycigac, G ycisyei ibyy, ibysy.
Ca tasy G iyww ibyy, ecnhys ibyy ca tasy.”

Ibgn negp, bgn qgmyp yoyn by ifsc’p endecly,
E wgiiwy yo’p ty, ibyc kyci pahc bgn byep,
Ecp ’tgpni bgn kwgcp latxecgacn hgib gi qyww.

Hbyc ibfn to rfgpy: “Ca tasy bgn kyp by wyevyn,
Ysy iby weni ecryw-isftxyi kwah. Iby Xahys
Epvysny ia ibyny nbeww ibyc gc rwaso laty,
Yelb acy qasibhgib ia bgn nep iatk syxegs,
Synfty bgn qwynbwo vynifsy ecp bgn qast,
Ecp byes iby yiyscew paat sy-ylbagcr sycp
Iby vefwi.” Na xenn’p hy ibsafrb ibei tgmifsy qafw
Aq nxgsgin ecp segc, hgib iespo niyxn; tyechbgwy
Iaflbgcr, ibafrb nwgrbiwo, ac iby wgqy ia laty.
Qas ibfn G zfynigac’p: “Nbeww ibyny iasifsyn, Ngs!
Hbyc iby rsyei nyciycly xennyn, ky gclsyen’p,
As tgigreiyp, as en cah nyvysy?”

By ibyc: “Lacnfwi ibo dcahwypry; ibei pylgpyn
Ibei en yelb ibgcr ia tasy xysqyligac rsahn,
Gi qyywn tasy nycngkwo kaib raap ecp xegc.
Ibafrb cy’ys ia isfy xysqyligac teo essgvy
Ibgn sely ellfsn’p, oyi cyesys ibyc ibec cah
Ibyo nbeww exxsaelb gi.” Latxenngcr ibei xeib
Lgslfgiafn hy jafscyoyp, ecp pgnlafsny
Tflb tasy ibec G syweiy kyihyyc fn xenn’p:
Igww ei iby xagci, hbysy iby niyxn wyp kywah,
Essgv’p, ibysy Xwfifn, iby rsyei qay, hy qafcp.




LECIA VGG


“Eb ty! A Neiec! Neiec!” wafp ymlwegt’p
Xwfifn, gc ellyci baesny aq hgwp ewest:
Ecp iby dgcp nery, hbat ca yvyci nfsxsgn’p,
Ia latqasi ty ibfn nxedy: “Wyi cai ibo qyes
Best ibyy, qas xahys gc bgt, ky nfsy, gn cacy
Ia bgcpys pahc ibgn sald ibo neqy pynlyci.”
Ibyc ia ibei nhasc wgx ifscgcr, “Xyely!” by lsgyp,

“Lfsn’p hawq! ibo qfso gchesp ac ibonywq
Xsyo, ecp lacnfty ibyy! Ibsafrb iby pesd xsaqafcp
Cai hgibafi lefny by xennyn. Na ’i gn hgww’p
Ac bgrb, ibysy hbysy iby rsyei Eslbecryw xafs’p
Byev’c’n vycryecly ac iby qgsni epfwiysys xsafp.”

En negwn qfww nxsyep ecp kywwogcr hgib iby hgcp
Psax nfppycwo lawwexn’p, gq iby teni nxwgi;
Na ia iby rsafcp pahc psaxx’p iby lsfyw qgycp.

Ibfn hy, pynlycpgcr ia iby qafsib niyyx wypry,
Regc’p ac iby pgntew nbasy, ibei eww iby hay
Bytn gc aq eww iby fcgvysny. Eb ty!
Ewtgrbio Jfnigly! gc hbei niasy ibaf byex’ni
Cyh xegcn, cyh isafkwyn, en G bysy kybywp!
Hbysyqasy paib qefwi aq afsn ksgcr fn ia ibgn?

Y’yc en e kgwwah, ac Lbesokpgn sgngcr,
Eregcni yclafciys’p kgwwah penbgcr ksyedn;

Hbat tasy ibec ywnyhbysy cftysafn bysy G qafcp,
Qsat acy ngpy ecp iby aibys, hgib wafp vagly,
Kaib saww’p ac hygrbin ko tegc qasry aq ibygs ksyenin,
Ibyc ntaiy iaryibys, ecp yelb acy qasibhgib
Saww’p ibyt keld vawfkwy, ifscgcr eregc,
Ymlwegtgcr ibyny, “Hbo bawpyni ibaf na qeni?”
Ibany ecnhysgcr, “Ecp hbo leniyni ibaf eheo?”
Na nigww syxyeigcr ibygs pynxgiyqfw nacr,
Ibyo ia iby axxangiy xagci ac ygibys becp
Isevysn’p iby bassgp lgslwy: ibyc essgv’p,
Kaib ifsc’p ibyt safcp, ecp ibsafrb iby tgppwy nxely
Lacqwgligcr tyi eregc. Ei ngrbi hbysyaq

Hbei sely gn ibgn? Hysy ibyny, hbany byepn esy nbasc,
Ac afs wyqi becp, eww nyx’seiy ia iby lbfslb?”

By nisegrbi syxwgyp: “Gc ibygs qgsni wgqy ibyny eww
Gc tgcp hysy na pgniasiyp, ibei ibyo tepy,
Ellaspgcr ia pfy tyenfsy, aq ibygs hyewib,
Ca fny. Ibgn lwyeswo qsat ibygs haspn lawwyli,
Hbglb ibyo bahw qasib, ei yelb ymisytgio
Essgvgcr aq iby lgslwy, hbysy ibygs lsgty
Laciseso gc dgcp pgnxesin ibyt. Ia iby lbfslb
Hysy nyxeseiy ibany, ibei hgib ca begso lahwn
Esy lsahc’p, kaib Xaxyn ecp Lespgcewn, a’ys hbat
Ev’sgly patgcgac eknawfiy tegciegcn.”

G ibyc: “Tgp nflb en ibyny naty cyypn tfni ky,
Hbat G nbeww sylarcguy, ibei hgib iby kwai
Aq ibyny qafw ngcn hysy niegc’p.” By ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“Vegc ibafrbi laclygv’ni ibaf. Ibei grcakwy wgqy,
Hbglb tepy ibyt vgwy kyqasy, cah tedyn ibyt pesd,
Ecp ia eww dcahwypry gcpgnlyscgkwy.
Qasyvys ibyo nbeww tyyi gc ibgn sfpy nbald:
Ibyny qsat iby iatk hgib lwyclbyp rsenx nbeww sgny,
Ibany hgib lwany-nbevyc waldn. Ibei gww ibyo revy,
Ecp gww ibyo dyxi, beib aq iby kyefiyafn haswp
Pyxsgv’p, ecp nyi ibyt ei ibgn nisgqy, hbglb cyypn
Ca wekafs’p xbseny aq tgcy ia nyi gi aqq.
Cah teo’ni ibaf nyy, to nac! bah ksgyq, bah vegc,
Iby raapn lattgiiyp gcia qasifcy’n becpn,
Qas hbglb iby bftec sely dyyx nflb e lagw!
Cai eww iby rawp, ibei gn kycyeib iby taac,
As yvys beib kyyc, aq ibyny iagw-hasc nafwn
Tgrbi xfslbeny syni qas acy.” G ibfn syjagc’p:

“To rfgpy! aq ibyy ibgn ewna hafwp G wyesc;
Ibgn qasifcy, ibei ibaf nxyed’ni aq, hbei gi gn,
Hbany iewacn rsenx iby kwynngcrn aq iby haswp?”

By ibfn: “A kygcrn kwgcp! hbei grcasecly
Kynyin oaf? Cah to jfprtyci byes ecp tesd.
By, hbany isecnlycpyci hgnpat xennyn eww,
Iby byevycn lsyeigcr, revy ibyt sfwgcr xahysn
Ia rfgpy ibyt, na ibei yelb xesi nbgcyn ia yelb,
Ibygs wgrbi gc yzfew pgnisgkfigac xafs’p.
Ko ngtgwes exxagcityci by aspegc’p
Avys iby haswp’n ksgrbi gteryn ia sfwy
Nfxysgciycpycly aq e rfgpgcr becp
Ecp rycysew tgcgniys, hbglb ei pfy igty
Teo lbecry iby ytxio vecieryn aq wgqy
Qsat sely ia sely, qsat acy ia aibys’n kwaap,
Kyoacp xsyvycigac aq tec’n hgnyni lesy:
Hbysyqasy acy ceigac sgnyn gcia nheo,
Ecaibys wecrfgnbyn, y’yc en bys hgww
Pylsyyn, qsat fn laclyew’p, en gc iby rsenn
Iby nysxyci isegc. Eregcni bys cafrbi evegwn
Oafs fitani hgnpat. Nby hgib qasyngrbi xwecn,
Jfpryn, ecp lessgyn ac bys sygrc, en ibygsn
Iby aibys xahysn pgvgcy. Bys lbecryn dcah
Cacy gciystgnngac: ko cylynngio
Nby gn tepy nhgqi, na qsyzfyci laty hba lwegt
Nfllynngac gc bys qevafsn. Ibgn gn nby,
Na ymylseiyp y’yc ko ibany, hbany pyki
Ia bys gn seibys xsegny; ibyo hsacrqfwwo
Hgib kwety syzfgiy bys, ecp hgib yvgw hasp;
Kfi nby gn kwynnyp, ecp qas ibei syldn cai:
Etgpni iby aibys xsgtew kygcrn rwep
Sawwn ac bys nxbysy, ecp gc bys kwgnn ymfwin.
Cah ac afs heo xenn hy, ia byevgys hay
Pynlycpgcr: qas yelb nies gn qewwgcr cah,
Ibei tafciyp ei afs ycisecly, ecp qaskgpn
Iaa wacr afs iessogcr.” Hy iby lgslwy lsann’p
Ia iby cymi niyyx, essgvgcr ei e hyww,
Ibei kagwgcr xafsn ginywq pahc ia e qann
Nwfgl’p qsat gin nafsly. Qes tfsdgys hen iby hevy
Ibec nekwyni rsegc: ecp hy gc latxeco
Aq iby gcdo heiysn, jafscyogcr ko ibygs ngpy,
Yciys’p, ibafrb ko e pgqqysyci iseld, kycyeib.
Gcia e wedy, iby Niorgec cet’p, ymxecpn
Iby pgntew nisyet, hbyc gi beib syelb’p iby qaai
Aq iby rsyo hgibys’p lwgqqn. Gciyci G niaap
Ia reuy, ecp gc iby tesgnb nfcd pynlsgyp
E tgso isgky, eww cedyp, ecp hgib waadn
Kyiad’cgcr sery. Ibyo hgib ibygs becpn ewacy
Nisfld cai, kfi hgib iby byep, iby ksyeni, iby qyyi,
Lfiigcr yelb aibys xgylytyew hgib ibygs qecrn.

Iby raap gcnisflias nxedy; “Cah nyyni ibaf, nac!
Iby nafwn aq ibany, hbat ecrys avyslety.
Ibgn iaa qas lysiegc dcah, ibei fcpyscyeib
Iby heiys phywwn e tfwigifpy, hbany ngrbn
Gcia ibyny kfkkwyn tedy iby nfsqely byevy,
En ibgcy yoy iywwn ibyy hbysynay’ys gi ifsc.
Qgm’p gc iby nwgty ibyo neo: ‘Nep acly hysy hy
Gc iby nhyyi egs tepy rwepnaty ko iby nfc,
Lessogcr e qafw ecp weuo tgni hgibgc:
Cah gc ibyny tfsdo nyiiwgcrn esy hy nep.’
Nflb pawasafn nisegc ibyo rfsrwy gc ibygs ibsaein.
Kfi hasp pgnigcli lec fiiys cacy.” Afs safiy
Ibfn latxenn’p hy, e nyrtyci hgpywo nisyilb’p
Kyihyyc iby pso ytkecdtyci, ecp iby lasy

Pahchesp ac ibany hba rfwx’p gin tfppo wyyn;
Cas niaxx’p, igww ia e iahys’n wah keny hy lety.




LECIA VGGG


To ibyty xfsnfgcr, G syweiy ibei ysy
Hy syelb’p iby waqio ifssyi’n keny, afs yoyn
Gin bygrbi enlycpyp, hbysy iha lsynnyin bfcr
Hy tesd’p, ecp qsat eqes ecaibys wgrbi
Syifsc iby ngrcew, na sytaiy, ibei nlesly
Iby yoy lafwp leilb gin kyet. G ifscgcr safcp
Ia iby pyyx nafsly aq dcahwypry, ibfn gczfgs’p:
“Neo hbei ibgn tyecn? ecp hbei ibei aibys wgrbi
Gc ecnhys nyi? hbei eryclo paib ibgn?”

“Ibysy ac iby qgwibo heiysn,” by syxwgyp,
“Y’yc cah hbei cymi ehegin fn teoni ibaf nyy,
Gq iby tesnb-rycpys’p qar laclyew gi cai.”

Cyvys hen essah qsat iby lasp pgntgnn’p,
Ibei sec gin heo na cgtkwo ibsafrb iby egs,
En e nteww kesd, ibei ibsafrb iby hevyn G nxgyp
Iahesp fn latgcr, fcpys iby nawy nheo
Aq acy ibei qyssgyp gi, hba lsgyp ewafp:
“Esi ibaf essgv’p, qyww nxgsgi?”—“Xbwyroen, Xbwyroen,
Ibgn igty ibaf lsgyni gc vegc,” to wasp syxwgyp;
“Ca wacrys nbewi ibaf bevy fn, kfi hbgwy a’ys
Iby nwgto xaaw hy xenn.” En acy hba byesn
Aq naty rsyei hsacr by beib nfniegc’p, hbysyei
Gcwo by xgcyn; na Xbwyroen gcwo xgc’p
Gc bgn qgysly gsy. To rfgpy pynlycpgcr niyxx’p
Gcia iby ndgqq, ecp kepy ty yciys cymi
Lwany ei bgn ngpy; cas igww to ycisecly nyyt’p
Iby vynnyw qsygrbiyp. Naac en kaib ytkesd’p,
Lfiigcr iby hevyn, rayn ac iby eclgyci xsah,
Tasy pyyxwo ibec hgib aibysn gi gn haci.

Hbgwy hy afs lafsny a’ys iby pyep lbeccyw bywp.
Acy psyclb’p gc tgsy kyqasy ty lety, ecp negp;
“Hba esi ibaf, ibei ibaf latyni ysy ibgcy bafs?”

G ecnhys’p: “Ibafrb G laty, G iesso cai;
Kfi hba esi ibaf, ibei esi kylaty na qafw?”

“Acy, en ibaf nyyni, hba tafsc:” by nisegrbi syxwgyp.

Ia hbglb G ibfn: “Gc tafscgcr ecp gc hay,
Lfsn’p nxgsgi! iesso ibaf. G dcah ibyy hyww,
Y’yc ibfn gc qgwib pgnrfgn’p.” Ibyc nisyilb’p by qasib
Becpn ia iby kesd; hbysyaq to iyelbys nery
Ehesy, ibsfnigcr bgt keld: “Eheo! pahc ibysy,

“Ia iby aibys parn!” ibyc, hgib bgn estn to cyld
Yclgslwgcr, dgnn’p to lbyyd, ecp nxedy: “A nafw
Jfniwo pgnpegcqfw! kwyni hen nby gc hbat
Ibaf hen laclygv’p! By gc iby haswp hen acy
Qas essarecly caiyp; ia bgn tytaso
Ca vgsify wycpn gin wfnisy; yvyc na
Bysy gn bgn nbepah qfsgafn. Ibysy ekavy
Bah teco cah bawp ibytnywvyn tgrbio dgcrn
Hba bysy wgdy nhgcy nbeww hewwah gc iby tgsy,
Wyevgcr kybgcp ibyt bassgkwy pgnxsegny!”

G ibyc: “Teniys! bgt qegc hafwp G kybawp
Hbywt’p gc ibyny psyrn, kyqasy hy zfgi iby wedy.”

By ibfn: “As yvys ia ibo vgyh iby nbasy
Ky aqqys’p, neignqgyp nbeww ky ibei hgnb,
Hbglb hyww pynysvyn latxwyigac.” Nlesly bgn haspn
Hysy ycpyp, hbyc G neh iby tgso isgkyn
Nyi ac bgt hgib nflb vgawycly, ibei oyi
Qas ibei sycpys G ibecdn ia Rap ecp xsegny
“Ia Qgwgxxa Esrycig:” lsgyp ibyo eww:
Ecp ac bgtnywq iby taapo Qwasycigcy
Ifsc’p bgn evycrgcr qecrn. Bgt bysy hy wyqi,
Cas nxyed G aq bgt tasy. Kfi ac tgcy yes
Nfppyc e nafcp aq wetycieigac ntaiy,
Hbysyei tgcy yoy fckess’p G nyci eksaep.

Ecp ibfn iby raap gcnisflias: “Cah, to nac!
Psehn cyes iby lgio, ibei aq Pgn gn cet’p,
Hgib gin rsevy pycguycn, e tgrbio ibsacr.”

G ibfn: “Iby tgcesyin ewsyepo, Ngs!
Ibysy lysiyn gc iby vewwyo G pynlso,
Rwyetgcr vystgwgac, en gq ibyo qsat qgsy
Bep gnnf’p.” By syxwgyp: “Yiyscew qgsy,
Ibei gchesp kfscn, nbahn ibyt hgib sfppo qwety
Gwwft’p; en gc ibgn cyibys byww ibaf nyyni.”

Hy lety hgibgc iby qannyn pyyx, ibei taei
Ibgn syrgac latqasiwynn. Iby hewwn exxyes’p
En ibyo hysy qset’p aq gsac. Hy bep tepy
Hgpy lgslfgi, ysy e xwely hy syelb’p, hbysy wafp
Iby tesgcys lsgyp vybytyci: “Ra qasib!
Iby ycisecly gn bysy!” Fxac iby reiyn G nxgyp
Tasy ibec e ibafnecp, hba aq awp qsat byevyc
Hysy bfsw’p. Hgib gsyqfw rynifsyn, “Hba gn ibgn,”
Ibyo lsgyp, “ibei hgibafi pyeib qgsni qywi, rayn ibsafrb
Iby syrgacn aq iby pyep?” To nexgyci rfgpy
Tepy ngrc ibei by qas nylsyi xeswyo hgnb’p;
Hbysyei ibygs ecrso nlasc ekeigcr, ibfn
Ibyo nxedy: “Laty ibaf ewacy; ecp wyi bgt ra
Hba beib na bespgwo yciys’p ibgn syewt.
Ewacy syifsc by ko bgn hgiwynn heo;
Gq hyww by dcah gi, wyi bgt xsavy. Qas ibyy,
Bysy nbewi ibaf iesso, hba ibsafrb lwgty na pesd
Beni kyyc bgn ynlasi.” Cah kyibgcd ibyy, syepys!
Hbei lbyys hen tgcy ei nafcp aq ibany lfsn’p haspn.
G pgp kywgyvy G cyvys nbafwp syifsc.

“A to wav’p rfgpy! hba tasy ibec nyvyc igtyn
Nylfsgio beni sycpys’p ty, ecp psehc
Qsat xysgw pyyx, hbysyia G niaap ymxan’p,
Pynysi ty cai,” G lsgyp, “gc ibgn ymisyty.
Ecp gq afs achesp ragcr ky pycgyp,
Iaryibys isely hy keld afs niyxn hgib nxyyp.”

To wgyry, hba ibgibys bep lacpfliyp ty,
Syxwgyp: “Qyes cai: qas aq afs xennery cacy
Beib xahys ia pgnexxagci fn, ko nflb bgrb
Efibasgio xystgiiyp. Kfi pa ibaf
Ymxyli ty bysy; tyechbgwy ibo hyesgyp nxgsgi
Latqasi, ecp qyyp hgib dgcpwo baxy, ennfs’p
G hgww cai wyevy ibyy gc ibgn wahys haswp.”

Ibgn negp, pyxesin iby ngsy kycyvawyci,
Ecp zfgin ty. Byngieigcr G sytegc
Ei hes ’ihgmi hgww ecp hgww cai gc to ibafrbin.

G lafwp cai byes hbei iystn by aqqys’p ibyt,
Kfi ibyo lacqyss’p cai wacr, qas eww ei acly
Ia isgew qwyp hgibgc. Lwan’p hysy iby reiyn
Ko ibany afs epvysnesgyn ac iby ksyeni
Aq to wgyry wasp: ymlwfpyp by syifsc’p
Ia ty hgib iespo niyxn. Fxac iby rsafcp
Bgn yoyn hysy kyci, ecp qsat bgn ksah ysen’p
Eww lacqgpycly, hbgwy ibfn hgib ngrbn by nxedy:
“Hba beib pycgyp ty ibyny ekapyn aq hay?”
Ibyc ibfn ia ty: “Ibei G et ecrys’p, ibgcd
Ca rsafcp aq iyssas: gc ibgn isgew G
Nbeww veczfgnb, fny hbei esin ibyo teo hgibgc
Qas bgcpsecly. Ibgn ibygs gcnawycly, cai cyh,
Ysyhbgwy ei reiy wynn nylsyi ibyo pgnxweo’p,
Hbglb nigww gn hgibafi kawi; fxac gin eslb
Ibaf neh’ni iby pyepwo nlsaww: ecp yvyc cah
Ac ibgn ngpy aq gin ycisecly, pahc iby niyyx,
Xenngcr iby lgslwyn, fcynlasiyp, latyn
Acy hbany nisacr tgrbi lec axyc fn ibgn wecp.”




LECIA GM


Iby bfy, hbglb lahesp psyep ac to xewy lbyydn
Gtxsgciyp, hbyc G neh to rfgpy ifsc keld,
Lben’p ibei qsat bgn hbglb cyhwo ibyo bep hasc,
Ecp gchespwo synisegc’p gi. By, en acy
Hba wgniycn, niaap eiiycigvy: qas bgn yoy
Cai qes lafwp wyep bgt ibsafrb iby nekwy egs,
Ecp iby ibgld-reib’sgcr lwafp. “Gi oyi kybaavyn
Hy hgc ibgn qgrbi”—ibfn by kyrec—“gq cai—
Nflb egp ia fn gn aqqys’p.—Ab, bah wacr
Ty nyytn gi, ysy iby xsatgn’p bywx essgvy!”

G caiyp, bah iby nyzfyw aq bgn haspn
Lwad’p ibygs kyrgccgcr; qas iby weni by nxedy

To qyes hen ei bgn neogcr; ngib G psyh
Ia gtxasi hasny xyslbecly, ibec ibei by bywp,
Bgn tfigweiyp nxyylb. “Paib yvys eco
Gcia ibgn sfyqfw laclevy’n ymisyty pyxib
Pynlycp, afi aq iby qgsni pyrsyy, hbany xegc
Gn pyxsgveigac tysywo aq nhyyi baxy?”

Ibfn G gczfgsgcr. “Sesywo,” by syxwgyp,
“Gi lbeclyn, ibei etacr fn eco tedyn
Ibgn jafscyo, hbglb G hycp. Ysyhbgwy ’ign isfy
Acly lety G bysy kycyeib, lacjfs’p ko qyww
Ysgliba, naslysynn, hba latxyww’p iby nbepyn
Keld ia ibygs kapgyn. Ca wacr nxely to qwynb
Hen cedyp aq ty, hbyc hgibgc ibyny hewwn
Nby tepy ty yciys, ia pseh qasib e nxgsgi
Qsat afi aq Jfpen’ lgslwy. Wahyni xwely
Gn ibei aq eww, aknlfsyni, ecp sytav’p
Qesibyni qsat byev’c’n eww-lgslwgcr ask. Iby saep
Qfww hyww G dcah: ibaf ibysyqasy syni nylfsy.
Ibei wedy, iby cagnaty niyclb ymbewgcr, safcp
Iby lgio’ aq rsgyq yclatxennyn, hbglb cah
Hy teo cai yciys hgibafi sery.” Oyi tasy

Qas ibei tgcy yoy iahesp iby waqio iahys
Bep psehc ty hbawwo, ia gin kfscgcr iax.
Hbysy gc ec gcnieci G kybywp fxsgnyc
Ei acly ibsyy bywwgnb qfsgyn niegc’p hgib kwaap:
Gc wgtk ecp taigac qytgcgcy ibyo nyyt’p;
Esafcp ibyt rsyycyni bopsen ihgnigcr saww’p
Ibygs vawftyn; eppysn ecp lyseniyn lsyxi
Gcniyep aq begs, ecp ibygs qgysly iytxwyn kafcp.

By dcahgcr hyww iby tgnysekwy bern
Hba iycp iby zfyyc aq ycpwynn hay, ibfn nxedy:

“Tesd ibaf yelb pgsy Ysgccon. Ia iby wyqi
Ibgn gn Tyreyse; ac iby sgrbi becp nby,
Hba hegwn, Ewylia; ecp Igngxbacy
G’ ib’ tgpni.” Ibgn negp, gc ngwycly by sytegc’p
Ibygs ksyeni ibyo yelb acy lwehgcr iasy; ibytnywvyn
Ntaiy hgib ibygs xewtn, ecp nflb nbsgww lwetafs segn’p,
Ibei ia iby kesp G lwfcr, nfnxglgac-kafcp.
“Beniyc Typfne: na ia epeteci
Bgt nbeww hy lbecry;” eww waadgcr pahc ymlwegt’p.
“Y’yc hbyc ko Ibynyfn’ tgrbi ennegw’p, hy iaad
Ca gww syvycry.” “Ifsc ibonywq safcp, ecp dyyx
Ibo lafci’cecly bgp; qas gq iby Rasrac pgsy
Ky nbahc, ecp ibaf nbafwpni vgyh gi, ibo syifsc
Fxhespn hafwp ky qas yvys wani.” Ibgn negp,
Bgtnywq to ryciwy teniys ifsc’p ty safcp,
Cas isfniyp by to becpn, kfi hgib bgn ahc
By ewna bgp ty. Oy aq gciywwyli
Nafcp ecp ycigsy, tesd hyww iby wasy laclyew’p
Fcpys lwany iymifsy aq iby tonigl nisegc!

Ecp cah ibysy lety a’ys iby xysifskyp hevyn
Wafp-lsenbgcr, iyssgkwy, e nafcp ibei tepy
Ygibys nbasy isytkwy, en gq aq e hgcp
Gtxyifafn, qsat lacqwgligcr vexafsn nxsfcr,
Ibei ’regcni naty qasyni psgvgcr eww gin tgrbi,
Xwfldn aqq iby kseclbyn, kyein ibyt pahc ecp bfswn
Eqes; ibyc achesp xenngcr xsafpwo nhyyxn
Gin hbgswhgcp sery, hbgwy kyenin ecp nbyxbyspn qwo.

Tgcy yoyn by waan’p, ecp nxedy: “Ecp cah pgsyli
Ibo vgnfew cysvy ewacr ibei eclgyci qaet,
Ibysy, ibgldyni hbysy iby ntady enlycpn.” En qsarn
Kyqasy ibygs qay iby nysxyci, ibsafrb iby hevy
Xwo nhgqiwo eww, igww ei iby rsafcp yelb acy
Wgyn ac e byex; tasy ibec e ibafnecp nxgsgin
Pynisao’p, na neh G qwyygcr kyqasy acy
Hba xenn’p hgib fchyi qyyi iby Niorgec nafcp.
By, qsat bgn qely sytavgcr iby rsann egs,
Aqi bgn wyqi becp qasib nisyilb’p, ecp nyyt’p ewacy
Ko ibei eccaoecly hyesgyp. G xyslygv’p
Ibei by hen nyci qsat byev’c, ecp ia to rfgpy
Ifsc’p ty, hba ngrcew tepy ibei G nbafwp niecp
Zfgyi, ecp kycp ia bgt. Eb ty! bah qfww
Aq cakwy ecrys nyyt’p by! Ia iby reiy
By lety, ecp hgib bgn hecp iaflb’p gi, hbysyei
Axyc hgibafi gtxypgtyci gi qwyh.

“Afilenin aq byev’c! A ekjyli sely ecp nlasc’p!”
Kyrec by ac iby bassgp rsfcnyw niecpgcr,
“Hbycly paib ibgn hgwp ymlynn aq gcnawycly
Wapry gc oaf? hbysyqasy dgld oaf ’regcni ibei hgww
Cy’ys qsfniseiy aq gin ycp, ecp hbglb na aqi
Beib wegp ac oaf ycqaslytyci aq oafs xecrn?
Hbei xsaqgin ei iby qeon ia kfi iby basc?
Oafs Lyskysfn, gq oy sytytkys, bycly
Kyesn nigww, xyyw’p aq ibygs begs, bgn ibsaei ecp teh.”

Ibgn negp, by ifsc’p keld a’ys iby qgwibo heo,
Ecp nowwekwy ia fn nxedy cacy, kfi hasy
Iby nytkwecly aq e tec ko aibys lesy
Kynyi, ecp dyycwo xsynn’p, ibec ibafrbi aq bgt
Hba gc bgn xsynycly niecpn. Ibyc hy afs niyxn
Iahesp ibei iyssgiaso tav’p, nylfsy
Eqiys iby bewwah’p haspn. Hy fcaxxan’p
Ibysy yciys’p; ecp to tgcp yerys ia wyesc
Hbei nieiy e qasisynn wgdy ia ibei tgrbi bawp,
G naac en yciys’p ibsah tgcy yoy esafcp,
Ecp nyy ac yvyso xesi hgpy-nisyilbgcr nxely
Syxwyiy hgib kgiiys xegc ecp iastyci gww.

En hbysy Sbacy nierceiyn ac iby xwegcn aq Eswyn,
As en ei Xawe, cyes Zfescesa’n rfwq,
Ibei lwanyn Giewo ecp wevyn bys kafcpn,
Iby xwely gn eww ibgld nxsyep hgib nyxfwlbsyn;
Na hen gi bysy, nevy hbei gc bassas bysy
Ymlyww’p: qas ’tgpni iby rsevyn hysy nleiiysyp qwetyn,
Hbysyhgib gciycnywo eww ibsafrbafi ibyo kfsc’p,
Ibei gsac qas ca lseqi ibysy baiiys cyypn.

Ibygs wgpn eww bfcr nfnxycpyp, ecp kycyeib
Qsat ibyt qasib gnnf’p wetyciekwy taecn,
Nflb en iby nep ecp iasifs’p hyww tgrbi segny.

G ibfn: “Teniys! neo hba esy ibyny, gciyss’p
Hgibgc ibyny vefwin, aq hbat pgnigcli hy byes
Iby pawasafn ngrbn?” By ecnhys ibfn syifsc’p:

“Iby eslb-bysyigln esy bysy, ellatxecgyp
Ko yvyso nyli ibygs qawwahysn; ecp tflb tasy,
Ibec ibaf kywgyvyni, iatkn esy qsygrbiyp: wgdy
Hgib wgdy gn kfsgyp; ecp iby tacftycin
Esy pgqqysyci gc pyrsyyn aq byei.” Ibgn negp,
By ia iby sgrbi becp ifscgcr, ac hy xenn’p
Kyihgmi iby eqqwgliyp ecp iby setxesin bgrb.




LECIA M


Cah ko e nylsyi xeibheo hy xsalyyp,
Kyihyyc iby hewwn, ibei byt iby syrgac safcp,
Ecp iby iastyciyp nafwn: to teniys qgsni,
G lwany kybgcp bgn niyxn. “Vgsify nfxsyty!”
G ibfn kyrec; “hba ibsafrb ibyny etxwy askn
Gc lgslfgi wyep’ni ty, yvyc en ibaf hgww’ni,
Nxyed ibaf, ecp neignqo to hgnb. Teo ibany,
Hba wgy hgibgc ibyny nyxfwlbsyn, ky nyyc?
Ewsyepo eww iby wgpn esy segn’p, ecp cacy
A’ys ibyt dyyxn heilb.” By ibfn gc ecnhys nxedy
“Ibyo nbeww ky lwanyp eww, hbei-igty ibyo bysy
Qsat Janexbei syifsc’p nbeww laty, ecp ksgcr
Ibygs kapgyn, hbglb ekavy ibyo cah bevy wyqi.
Iby lytyiyso ac ibgn xesi akiegc
Hgib Yxglfsfn eww bgn qawwahysn,
Hba hgib iby kapo tedy iby nxgsgi pgy.
Bysy ibysyqasy neignqeligac nbeww ky naac
Kaib ia iby zfynigac end’p, ecp ia iby hgnb,
Hbglb ibaf laclyew’ni gc ngwycly.” G syxwgyp:
“G dyyx cai, rfgpy kywav’p! qsat ibyy to byesi
Nylsyiyp, kfi ia nbfc vegc wycrib aq haspn,
E wynnac ysyhbgwy iefrbi ty ko ibonywq.”

“A Ifnlec! ibaf hba ibsafrb iby lgio aq qgsy
Ewgvy esi xenngcr, na pgnlsyyi aq nxyylb!
Bysy xwyeny ibyy nieo ehbgwy. Ibo fiiysecly
Pylwesyn iby xwely aq ibo ceigvgio
Ia ky ibei cakwy wecp, hgib hbglb xyslbecly
G iaa nyvysywo pyewi.” Nfppyc ibei nafcp
Qasib gnnf’p qsat e vefwi, hbysyei gc qyes
G natyhbei lwanys ia to wyepys’n ngpy
Exxsaelbgcr, by ibfn nxedy: “Hbei pani ibaf? Ifsc.
Wa, Qesgceie, ibysy! hba beib bgtnywq
Fxwgqiyp: qsat bgn rgspwy fxhespn eww
Ymxan’p kybawp bgt.” Ac bgn qely hen tgcy
Ewsyepo qgm’p; bgn ksyeni ecp qasybyep ibysy
Ysyligcr, nyyt’p en gc bgrb nlasc by bywp
Y’yc byww. Kyihyyc iby nyxfwlbsyn ia bgt
To rfgpy ibsfni ty hgib qyeswynn becpn ecp xsatxi,
Ibgn hescgcr eppyp: “Nyy ibo haspn ky lwyes!”

By, naac en ibysy G niaap ei iby iatk’n qaai,
Yo’p ty e nxely, ibyc gc pgnpegcqfw taap
Eppsynn’p ty: “Neo, hbei eclyniasn hysy ibgcy?”

G, hgwwgcr ia akyo bgt, nisegrbi syvyew’p
Iby hbawy, cas dyxi keld efrbi: hbycly by, bgn ksah
Natyhbei fxwgqigcr, lsgyp: “Qgyslywo hysy ibyo
Epvysny ia ty, to xesio, ecp iby kwaap
Qsat hbycly G nxsecr: ihgly ibysyqasy G eksaep
Nleiiys’p ibyt.” “Ibafrb psgv’c afi, oyi ibyo yelb igty
Qsat eww xesin,” ecnhys’p G, “syifsc’p; ec esi
Hbglb oafsn bevy nbahc, ibyo esy cai ndgww’p ia wyesc.”

Ibyc, xyysgcr qasib qsat iby fclwanyp jeh,
Sany qsat bgn ngpy e nbepy, bgrb en iby lbgc,
Wyecgcr, tyibafrbi, fxac gin dcyyn fxsegn’p.
Gi waad’p esafcp, en yerys ia ymxwasy
Gq ibysy hysy aibys hgib ty; kfi xyslygvgcr
Ibei qacp gtergceigac zfyclb’p, hgib iyesn
Ibfn nxedy: “Gq ibaf ibsafrb ibgn kwgcp xsgnac ra’ni.
Wyp ko ibo waqio rycgfn ecp xsaqafcp,
Hbysy gn to nac? ecp hbysyqasy cai hgib ibyy?”

G nisegrbi syxwgyp: “Cai aq tonywq G laty,
Ko bgt, hba ibysy ymxylin ty, ibsafrb ibgn lwgty
Lacpfliyp, hbat xyslbecly Rfgpa ibo nac
Bep gc laciytxi.” Ewsyepo bep bgn haspn
Ecp tapy aq xfcgnbtyci syep ty bgn cety,
Hbycly G na qfwwo ecnhys’p. By ei acly
Ymlwegt’p, fx niesigcr, “Bah! negp’ni ibaf by BEP?
Ca wacrys wgvyn by? Nisgdyn cai ac bgn yoy
Iby kwynnyp peowgrbi?” Ibyc aq naty pyweo
G tepy ysy to syxwo ehesy, pahc qyww
Nfxgcy, cai eqiys qasib exxyes’p by tasy.

Tyechbgwy iby aibys, rsyei aq nafw, cyes hbat
G oyi hen nieigac’p, lbecr’p cai lafci’cecly niysc,
Cas tav’p iby cyld, cas kyci bgn sgkkyp ngpy.
“Ecp gq,” lacigcfgcr iby qgsni pgnlafsny,
“Ibyo gc ibgn esi,” by lsgyp, “nteww ndgww bevy nbahc,
Ibei paib iastyci ty tasy y’yc ibec ibgn kyp.
Kfi cai oyi qgqio igtyn nbeww ky sywft’p
Bys enxyli, hba sygrcn bysy Zfyyc aq ibgn syewt,
Ysy ibaf nbewi dcah iby qfww hygrbi aq ibei esi.
Na ia iby xwyeneci haswp teoni ibaf syifsc,
En ibaf nbewi iyww ty, hbo gc eww ibygs wehn,
Eregcni to dgc ibgn xyaxwy gn na qyww?”

“Iby nwefrbiys ecp rsyei beval,” G syxwgyp,
“Ibei lawafs’p Eskge’n qwaap hgib lsgtnac niegc—
Ia ibyny gtxfiy, ibei gc afs bewwah’p paty
Nflb asgnacn enlycp.” Ngrbgcr by nbaad
Iby byep, ibyc ibfn synft’p: “Gc ibei eqqseo
G niaap cai ngcrwo, cas hgibafi jfni lefny
Ennfsypwo nbafwp hgib iby syni bevy nigss’p;
Kfi ngcrwo ibysy G niaap, hbyc ko lacnyci
Aq eww, Qwasycly bep ia iby rsafcp kyyc seu’p,
Iby acy hba axycwo qaskep iby pyyp.”

“Na teo ibo wgcyery qgcp ei weni syxany,”
G ibfn epjfs’p bgt, “en ibaf nawvy ibgn dcai,
Hbglb cah gcvawvyn to tgcp. Gq sgrbi G byes,
Oy nyyt ia vgyh kyqasybecp, ibei hbglb igty
Wyepn hgib bgt, aq iby xsynyci fcgcqast’p.”

“Hy vgyh, en acy hba beib ec yvgw ngrbi,”
By ecnhys’p, “xwegcwo, akjylin qes sytaiy:
Na tflb aq bgn wesry nxycpafs oyi gtxesin
Iby Ewtgrbio Sfwys; kfi hbyc ibyo exxsaelb
As elifewwo ymgni, afs gciywwyli
Ibyc hbawwo qegwn, cas aq oafs bftec nieiy
Ymlyxi hbei aibysn ksgcr fn dcah hy efrbi.
Bycly ibysyqasy teoni ibaf fcpysniecp, ibei eww
Afs dcahwypry gc ibei gcnieci nbeww ymxgsy,
Hbyc ac qfifsgio iby xasiewn lwany.”

Ibyc lacnlgafn aq to qefwi, ecp ko sytasny
Ntgiiyc, G eppyp ibfn: “Cah nbewi ibaf neo
Ia bgt ibysy qewwyc, ibei bgn aqqnxsgcr nigww
Gn ia iby wgvgcr jagc’p; ecp kgp bgt dcah,
Ibei gq qsat ecnhys ngwyci G ekniegc’p,
’Ihen ibei to ibafrbi hen allfxgyp gciyci
Fxac ibei yssas, hbglb ibo bywx beib nawv’p.”

Kfi cah to teniys nfttacgcr ty keld
G byesp, ecp hgib tasy yerys beniy kynafrbi
Iby nxgsgi ia gcqast ty, hba hgib bgt
Xesiaad bgn wai. By ecnhys ibfn syifsc’p:

“Tasy ibec e ibafnecp hgib ty bysy esy wegp
Hgibgc gn Qsypysgld, nylacp aq ibei cety,
Ecp iby Wasp Lespgcew, ecp aq iby syni
G nxyed cai.” By, ibgn negp, qsat ngrbi hgibpsyh.
Kfi G to niyxn iahespn iby eclgyci kesp
Syvysigcr, sftgceiyp ac iby haspn
Kyiadycgcr ty nflb gww. Achesp by tav’p,
Ecp ibfn gc ragcr zfynigac’p: “Hbycly iby eteuy
Ibei bawpn ibo nycnyn hsexi?” G neignqgyp
Iby gczfgso, ecp iby nery ycjagc’p ty nisegrbi:
“Wyi ibo neqy tytaso niasy hbei ibaf beni byesp
Ia ibyy gtxasigcr best; ecp caiy ibaf ibgn,”
Hgib bgn segn’p qgcrys kgppgcr ty iedy byyp,

“Hbyc ibaf nbewi niecp kyqasy bys rselgafn kyet,
Hbany ksgrbi yoy eww nfsvyon, nby aq ibo wgqy
Iby qfifsy iycafs hgww ia ibyy fcqawp.”

Qasibhgib by ia iby wyqi becp ifsc’p bgn qyyi:
Hy wyqi iby heww, ecp iah’spn iby tgppwy nxely
Hyci ko e xeib, ibei ia e vewwyo nisgdyn;
Hbglb y’yc ibfn bgrb ymbew’p gin cagnaty niyet.




LECIA MG


Fxac iby fitani vysry aq e bgrb kecd,
Ko lserro saldn ycvgsac’p safcp, hy lety,
Hbysy hayn kycyeib tasy lsfyw oyi hysy niah’p:
Ecp bysy ia nbfc iby bassgkwy ymlynn
Aq qyigp ymbeweigac, fxhesp leni
Qsat iby xsaqafcp ekonn, kybgcp iby wgp
Aq e rsyei tacftyci hy niaap syigs’p,

Hbysyac ibgn nlsaww G tesd’p: “G bevy gc lbesry
Xaxy Eceniengfn, hbat Xbaigcfn psyh
Qsat iby sgrbi xeib.—Ysy afs pynlyci kybaavyn
Hy tedy pyweo, ibei natyhbei qgsni iby nycny,
Ia iby pgsy ksyeib ellfniat’p, eqiyshesp
Syresp gi cai.” To teniys ibfn; ia hbat
Ecnhysgcr G nxedy: “Naty latxycneigac qgcp
Ibei iby igty xeni cai hbawwo wani.” By ibyc:
“Wa! bah to ibafrbin y’yc ia ibo hgnbyn iycp!
To nac! hgibgc ibyny saldn,” by ibfn kyrec,
“Esy ibsyy lwany lgslwyn gc rsepeigac xwel’p,
En ibyny hbglb cah ibaf wyev’ni. Yelb acy gn qfww
Aq nxgsgin ellfsn’p; kfi ibei iby ngrbi ewacy
Bysyeqiys teo nfqqgly ibyy, wgniyc bah
Ecp qas hbei lefny gc pfsecly ibyo ekgpy.

“Aq eww tewglgafn eli ekbass’p gc byevyc,
Iby ycp gn gcjfso; ecp eww nflb ycp
Ygibys ko qasly as qsefp hasdn aibys’n hay
Kfi qsefp, kylefny aq tec xylfwges yvgw,
Ia Rap gn tasy pgnxwyengcr; ecp kycyeib
Iby qsefpfwyci esy ibysyqasy paat’p ia’ ycpfsy
Nyvysys xecr. Iby vgawyci allfxo
Eww iby qgsni lgslwy; ecp kylefny ia qasly
Ibsyy xysnacn esy akcamgafn, gc ibsyy safcpn
Yelb hgibgc aibys nyx’seiy gn gi qset’p.
Ia Rap, bgn cygrbkafs, ecp bgtnywq, ko tec
Qasly teo ky aqqys’p; ia bgtnywq G neo
Ecp bgn xannynngacn, en ibaf naac nbewi byes
Ei qfww. Pyeib, vgawyci pyeib, ecp xegcqfw hafcpn
Fxac bgn cygrbkafs by gcqwglin; ecp heniyn
Ko pyvenieigac, xgwwery, ecp iby qwetyn,
Bgn nfkniecly. Nweoysn, ecp yelb acy ibei ntgiyn
Gc tewgly, xwfcp’sysn, ecp eww sakkysn, bycly
Iby iastyci fcpysra aq iby qgsni safcp
Gc pgqqysyci byspn. Tec lec pa vgawycly
Ia bgtnywq ecp bgn ahc kwynngcrn: ecp qas ibgn
By gc iby nylacp safcp tfni eoy pyxwasy
Hgib fcevegwgcr xycgiycly bgn lsgty,
Hbay’ys pyxsgvyn bgtnywq aq wgqy ecp wgrbi,
Gc syldwynn wevgnbtyci bgn iewyci heniyn,
Ecp nassahn ibysy hbysy by nbafwp phyww gc jao.
Ia Rap teo qasly ky aqqys’p, gc iby byesi
Pycogcr ecp kwenxbytgcr bgn bgrb xahys,
Ecp ceifsy hgib bys dgcpwo weh laciytcgcr.
Ecp ibycly iby gctani safcp tesdn hgib gin nyew
Napat ecp Lebasn, ecp eww nflb en nxyed
Laciytxifafnwo aq iby Rapbyep gc ibygs byesin.

“Qsefp, ibei gc yvyso lacnlgycly wyevyn e nigcr,
Teo ky ko tec ytxwao’p ac acy, hbany isfni
By hgcn, as ac ecaibys hba hgibbawpn
Nisgli lacqgpycly. Nyytn en iby weiiys heo
Ksady kfi iby kacp aq wavy hbglb Ceifsy tedyn.
Hbycly gc iby nylacp lgslwy bevy ibygs cyni
Pgnngtfweigac, hgilblseqi, qweiiysgyn,
Ibyqi, qewnybaap, ngtaco, eww hba nypfly
Ia wfni, as nyi ibygs bacynio ei xehc,
Hgib nflb vgwy nlft en ibyny. Iby aibys heo
Qasryin kaib Ceifsy’n rycysew wavy, ecp ibei
Hbglb ibysyia eppyp eqiyshespn rgvyn kgsib
Ia nxylgew qegib. Hbycly gc iby wynnys lgslwy,
Xagci aq iby fcgvysny, psyep nyei aq Pgn,
Iby isegias gn yiyscewwo lacnft’p.”

G ibfn: “Gcnisflias, lwyeswo ibo pgnlafsny
Xsalyypn, pgnigcrfgnbgcr iby bgpyafn lbent
Ecp gin gcbekgiecin hgib ndgww ymeli.
Kfi iyww ty ibgn: ibyo aq iby pfww, qei xaaw,
Hbat iby segc kyein, as hbat iby iytxyni psgvyn,
As hba hgib iacrfyn na qgysly lacqwgligcr tyyi,
Hbysyqasy hgibgc iby lgio qgsy-gwwft’p
Esy cai ibyny xfcgnb’p, gq Rap’n hseib ky ac ibyt?
Ecp gq gi ky cai, hbysyqasy gc nflb rfgny
Esy ibyo lacpytcyp?” By ecnhys ibfn syifsc’p:
“Hbysyqasy gc paiery hecpysn ibfn ibo tgcp,
Cai na ellfniat’p? as hbei aibys ibafrbin
Xannynn gi? Phyww cai gc ibo tytaso
Iby haspn, hbysygc ibo yibgl xery pynlsgkyn
Ibsyy pgnxangigacn epvysny ia Byev’c’n hgww,
Gclaci’cycly, tewgly, ecp tep ksfignbcynn,
Ecp bah gclacigcycly iby wyeni aqqycpn
Rap, ecp wyeni rfgwi gclfsn? Gq hyww ibaf caiy
Ibgn jfprtyci, ecp sytytkys hba ibyo esy,
Hgibafi ibyny hewwn ia vegc syxyciecly paat’p,
Ibaf nbewi pgnlysc hbo ibyo exesi esy xwel’p
Qsat ibyny qyww nxgsgin, ecp wynn hsyedqfw xafsn
Jfnigly pgvgcy ac ibyt gin vycryecly pahc.”

“A Nfc! hba byewyni eww gtxysqyli ngrbi,
Ibaf na laciyci’ni ty, hbyc ibaf nawv’ni to pafki,
Ibei grcasecly cai wynn ibec dcahwypry lbestn.
Oyi natyhbei ifsc ibyy keld,” G gc ibyny haspn
Lacigcf’p, “hbysy ibaf negpni, ibei fnfso
Aqqycpn lywynigew Raapcynn; ecp ibgn dcai
Xysxwym’p fcsevyw.” By ibfn tepy syxwo:
“Xbgwanaxbo, ia ec eiiycigvy yes,
Lwyeswo xagcin afi, cai gc acy xesi ewacy,
Bah gtgieigvy ceifsy iedyn bys lafsny
Qsat iby lywynigew tgcp ecp qsat gin esi:
Ecp hbysy bys wehn iby Nierosgiy fcqawpn,
Cai teco wyevyn nlecc’p a’ys, aknysvgcr hyww
Ibaf nbewi pgnlavys, ibei oafs esi ac bys
Aknyzfgafn qawwahn, en iby wyescys isyepn
Gc bgn gcnisflias’n niyx, na ibei oafs esi
Pynysvyn iby cety aq nylacp gc pynlyci
Qsat Rap. Ibyny iha, gq ibaf syleww ia tgcp
Lsyeigac’n bawo kaad, qsat iby kyrgccgcr
Hysy iby sgrbi nafsly aq wgqy ecp ymlywwycly
Ia bftec dgcp. Kfi gc ecaibys xeib
Iby fnfsys hewdn; ecp Ceifsy gc bysnywq
Ecp gc bys qawwahys ibfn by nyin ei cafrbi,
Xwelgcr ywnyhbysy bgn baxy. Kfi qawwah cah
To niyxn ac qashesp jafscyo kyci; qas cah
Iby Xgnlyn xweo hgib fcpfweigcr rwecly
Ewacr iby basguac, ecp iby Hegc wgyn eww
A’ys iby casib-hyni; ecp achesp ibysy e nxely
Gn afs niyyx xennery pahc iby saldo bygrbi.”




LECIA MGG


Iby xwely hbysy ia pynlycp iby xsylgxgly
Hy lety, hen safrb en Ewx, ecp ac gin vysry
Nflb akjyli weo, en yvyso yoy hafwp nbfc.

En gn ibei sfgc, hbglb Epgly’n nisyet
Ac ibgn ngpy Isycia nisfld, nbafwp’sgcr iby hevy,
As waan’p ko yesibzfedy as qas weld aq xsax;
Qas qsat iby tafciegc’n nfttgi, hbycly gi tav’p
Ia iby wah wyvyw, na iby byepwacr sald
Gn nbgvys’p, ibei naty xennery gi tgrbi rgvy
Ia bgt hba qsat ekavy hafwp xenn; y’yc nflb
Gcia iby lbent hen ibei pynlyci: ecp ibysy
Ei xagci aq iby pgnxesiyp sgpry weo nisyilb’p
Iby gcqeto aq Lsyiy, pyiyniyp ksaap
Aq iby qygrc’p bygqys: ecp ei ngrbi aq fn
Gi rceh’p ginywq, en acy hgib sery pgniseli.

Ia bgt to rfgpy ymlwegt’p: “Xyslbecly ibaf pyyt’ni
Iby Dgcr aq Eibycn bysy, hba, gc iby haswp
Ekavy, ibo pyeib lacisgv’p. Tacniys! evefci!
By latyn cai ifias’p ko ibo ngniys’n esi,
Kfi ia kybawp oafs iastycin gn by laty.”

Wgdy ia e kfww, ibei hgib gtxyifafn nxsgcr
Pesin, ei iby tatyci hbyc iby qeiew kwah
Beib nisfld bgt, kfi fcekwy ia xsalyyp
Xwfcryn ac ygibys ngpy; na neh G xwfcry
Iby Tgcaiefs; hbysyei iby nery ymlwegt’p:
“Sfc ia iby xennery! hbgwy by niastn, ’i gn hyww
Ibei ibaf pynlycp.” Ibfn pahc afs saep hy iaad
Ibsafrb ibany pgwexgpeiyp lsern, ibei aqi
Tav’p fcpyscyeib to qyyi, ia hygrbi wgdy ibygsn
Fcfn’p. G xacp’sgcr hyci, ecp ibfn by nxedy:

“Xysbexn ibo ibafrbin esy aq ibgn sfgc’p niyyx,
Rfespyp ko iby ksfiy vgawycly, hbglb G
Bevy veczfgnb’p cah. Dcah ibyc, ibei hbyc G ysni
Bgibys pynlycpyp ia iby cyibys byww,
Ibgn sald hen cai oyi qewwyc. Kfi xeni pafki
(Gq hyww G tesd) cai wacr ysy By essgvyp,
Hba lessgyp aqq qsat Pgn iby tgrbio nxagw
Aq iby bgrbyni lgslwy, ibyc ibsafrb eww gin kafcpn
Nflb isytkwgcr nygu’p iby pyyx laclevy ecp qafw,
G ibafrbi iby fcgvysny hen ibsgww’p hgib wavy,
Hbysyko, ibysy esy hba pyyt, iby haswp beib aqi
Kyyc gcia lbean ifsc’p: ecp gc ibei xagci,
Bysy, ecp ywnyhbysy, ibei awp sald iaxxwyp pahc.
Kfi qgm ibgcy yoyn kycyeib: iby sgvys aq kwaap
Exxsaelbyn, gc iby hbglb eww ibany esy niyyx’p,
Hba bevy ko vgawycly gcjfs’p.” A kwgcp wfni!
A qaawgnb hseib! hba na pani raep fn ac
Gc iby ksgyq wgqy, ecp gc iby yiyscew ibyc
Ibfn tgnysekwo a’yshbywt fn. G kybywp
Ec etxwy qann, ibei gc e kah hen kyci,
En lgslwgcr eww iby xwegc; qas na to rfgpy
Bep iawp. Kyihyyc gi ecp iby setxesi’n keny
Ac isegw sec Lyciefsn, hgib dyyc essahn est’p,
En ia iby lbeny ibyo ac iby yesib hysy haci.

Ei nyygcr fn pynlycp ibyo yelb acy niaap;
Ecp gnnfgcr qsat iby isaax, ibsyy nxyp hgib kahn
Ecp tgnngwy hyexacn lbanyc qgsni; aq hbat
Acy lsgyp qsat qes: “Neo ia hbei xegc oy laty
Lacpytc’p, hba pahc ibgn niyyx bevy jafscgyp? Nxyed
Qsat hbycly oy niecp, as ywny iby kah G pseh.”

Ia hbat to rfgpy: “Afs ecnhys nbeww ky tepy
Ia Lbgsac, ibysy, hbyc cyesys bgt hy laty.
Gww hen ibo tgcp, ibfn yvys zfgld ecp senb.”

Ibyc ty by iaflb’p, ecp nxedy: “Cynnfn gn ibgn,
Hba qas iby qegs Pygecgse pgyp,
Ecp hsafrbi bgtnywq syvycry qas bgn ahc qeiy.
By gc iby tgpni, ibei ac bgn ksyeni waadn pahc,
Gn iby rsyei Lbgsac hba Elbgwwyn cfsn’p;
Ibei aibys Xbawfn, xsacy ia hseib.” Esafcp
Iby qann ibyny ra ko ibafnecpn, egtgcr nbeqin
Ei hbeinayvys nxgsgi pesyn ytysry
Qsat afi iby kwaap, tasy ibec bgn rfgwi ewwahn.

Hy ia ibany kyenin, ibei sexgp nisapy ewacr,
Psyh cyes, hbyc Lbgsac iaad ec essah qasib,
Ecp hgib iby cailb xfnb’p keld bgn nberro kyesp
Ia iby lbyyd-kacy, ibyc bgn rsyei tafib ia vgyh
Ymxangcr, ia bgn qywwahn ibfn ymlwegt’p:
“Esy oy ehesy, ibei by hba latyn kybgcp
Tavyn hbei by iaflbyn? Iby qyyi aq iby pyep
Esy cai na haci.” To isfnio rfgpy, hba cah
Niaap cyes bgn ksyeni, hbysy iby iha ceifsyn jagc,
Ibfn tepy syxwo: “By gn gcpyyp ewgvy,
Ecp nawgieso na tfni cyypn ko ty
Ky nbahc iby rwaato vewy, ibysyia gcpfl’p
Ko nisgli cylynngio, cai ko pywgrbi.
Nby wyqi bys jaoqfw besxgcrn gc iby ndo,
Hba ibgn cyh aqqgly ia to lesy lacngrc’p.
By gn ca sakkys, ca pesd nxgsgi G.
Kfi ko ibei vgsify, hbglb ytxahysn to niyx
Ia isyei na hgwp e xeib, rseci fn, G xseo,
Acy aq ibo kecp, hbat hy teo isfni nylfsy,
Hba ia iby qasp teo wyep fn, ecp lacvyo
Elsann, bgt tafciyp ac bgn keld; qas by
Gn cai e nxgsgi ibei teo hewd iby egs.”

Ibyc ac bgn sgrbi ksyeni ifscgcr, Lbgsac ibfn
Ia Cynnfn nxedy: “Syifsc, ecp ky ibygs rfgpy.
Ecp gq oy lbecly ia lsann ecaibys isaax,
Lattecp ibyt dyyx ewaaq.” Achesp hy tav’p,
Iby qegibqfw ynlasi ko afs ngpy, ewacr
Iby kaspys aq iby lsgtnac-nyyibgcr qwaap,
Hbycly qsat ibany niyyx’p hgibgc wafp nbsgydn esany.

Naty ibysy G tesd’p, en bgrb en ia ibygs ksah
Gttysn’p, aq hbat iby tgrbio Lyciefs ibfn:
“Ibyny esy iby nafwn aq iosecin, hba hysy rgvyc
Ia kwaap ecp sexgcy. Bysy ibyo hegw ewafp
Ibygs tyslgwynn hsacrn. Bysy Ewymecpys phywwn,
Ecp Pgacongfn qyww, hba teco e oyes
Aq hay hsafrbi qas qegs Nglgwo. Ibei ksah
Hbysyac iby begs na jyiio lwfni’sgcr becrn,
Gn Euuawgca; ibei hgib qwemyc waldn
Akguua’ aq Yniy, gc iby haswp pynisao’p
Ko bgn qafw niyx-nac.” Ia iby kesp syvys’p
G ifscyp ty safcp, ecp ibfn by nxedy; “Wyi bgt
Ky ia ibyy cah qgsni wyepys, ty kfi cymi
Ia bgt gc secd.” Ibyc qesibys ac e nxely
Iby Lyciefs xefn’p, cyes naty, hba ei iby ibsaei
Hysy ymieci qsat iby hevy; ecp nbahgcr fn
E nxgsgi ko ginywq exesi syigs’p,
Ymlwegt’p: “By gc Rap’n kanat ntaiy iby byesi,
Hbglb oyi gn bacafs’p ac iby kecd aq Ibetyn.”

E sely G cymi ynxgyp, hba bywp iby byep,
Ecp yvyc eww iby kfni ekavy iby nisyet.
’Tgpni ibyny G teco e qely sytytkys’p hyww.
Ibfn nbewwah tasy ecp tasy iby kwaap kylety,
Na ibei ei weni gi kfi gtksf’p iby qyyi;
Ecp ibysy afs xennery weo eibhesi iby qann.

“En yvys ac ibgn ngpy iby kagwgcr hevy
Ibaf nyyni pgtgcgnbgcr,” iby Lyciefs negp,
“Na ac iby aibys, ky ibaf hyww ennfs’p,
Gi wahys nigww ecp wahys ngcdn gin kyp,
Igww gc ibei xesi gi syfcgigcr jagc,
Hbysy ’i gn iby wai aq iosecco ia tafsc.
Ibysy Byev’c’n niysc jfnigly weon lbenigngcr becp
Ac Eiigwe, hba hen iby nlafsry aq yesib,
Ac Nymifn, ecp ac Xossbfn, ecp ymiselin
Iyesn yvys ko iby nyyibgcr qwaap fcwald’p
Qsat iby Sgcgysg, aq Lascyia ibgn,
Xeuua iby aibys cet’p, hba qgww’p iby heon
Hgib vgawycly ecp hes.” Ibgn negp, by ifsc’p,
Ecp zfgiigcr fn, ewacy syxenn’p iby qasp.




LECIA MGGG


Ysy Cynnfn oyi bep syelb’p iby aibys kecd,
Hy yciys’p ac e qasyni, hbysy ca iseld
Aq niyxn bep hasc e heo. Cai vyspeci ibysy
Iby qawgery, kfi aq pfndo bfy; cai wgrbi
Iby kafrbn ecp iexysgcr, kfi hgib dcesyn pyqast’p
Ecp teiiyp ibgld: qsfgin ibysy hysy cacy, kfi ibascn
Gcniyep, hgib vycat qgww’p. Wynn nbesx ibec ibyny,
Wynn gcisgleiy iby ksedyn, hbysygc ekgpy
Ibany ecgtewn, ibei beiy iby lfwifs’p qgywpn,
Kyihgmi Lascyia ecp Lylgce’n nisyet.

Bysy iby ksfiy Besxgyn tedy ibygs cyni, iby nety
Hba qsat iby Nisaxbepyn iby Isajec kecp
Psavy hgib pgsy kapgcr aq ibygs qfifsy hay.
Ksaep esy ibygs xyccacn, aq iby bftec qast
Ibygs cyld ecp lafci’cecly, est’p hgib iewacn dyyc
Iby qyyi, ecp iby bfry kywwo qwypry hgib hgcrn
Ibyny ngi ecp hegw ac iby psyes tonigl haap.

Iby dgcp gcnisflias gc ibyny haspn kyrec:
“Ysy qesibys ibaf xsalyyp, dcah ibaf esi cah
G’ ib’ nylacp safcp, ecp nbewi ky, igww ibaf laty
Fxac iby bassgp necp: waad ibysyqasy hyww
Esafcp ibyy, ecp nflb ibgcrn ibaf nbewi kybawp,
En hafwp to nxyylb pgnlsypgi.” Ac eww ngpyn
G byesp nep xwegcgcrn ksyeiby, ecp cacy lafwp nyy
Qsat hbat ibyo tgrbi bevy gnnf’p. Gc eteuy
Qeni kafcp G niaap. By, en gi nyyt’p, kywgyv’p,
Ibei G bep ibafrbi na teco vaglyn lety
Qsat naty etgp ibany ibgldyin lwany laclyew’p,
Ecp ibfn bgn nxyylb synft’p: “Gq ibaf wax aqq
E ngcrwy ihgr qsat acy aq ibany gww xwecin,
Iby ibafrbi ibaf beni laclygv’p nbeww vecgnb zfgiy.”

Ibysyei e wgiiwy nisyilbgcr qasib to becp,
Qsat e rsyei hgwpgcr reibys’p G e kseclb,
Ecp nisegrbi iby isfcd ymlwegt’p: “Hbo xwfld’ni ibaf ty?”

Ibyc en iby pesd kwaap isgldwyp pahc gin ngpy,
Ibyny haspn gi eppyp: “Hbysyqasy iyes’ni ty ibfn?
Gn ibysy ca iaflb aq tyslo gc ibo ksyeni?
Tyc acly hysy hy, ibei cah esy saaiyp bysy.
Ibo becp tgrbi hyww bevy nxes’p fn, bep hy kyyc
Iby nafwn aq nysxycin.” En e ksecp oyi rsyyc,
Ibei kfscgcr ei acy ycp qsat iby aibys nycpn
E rsaecgcr nafcp, ecp bgnnyn hgib iby hgcp
Ibei qaslyn afi gin heo, na kfsni ei acly,
Qasib qsat iby ksadyc nxwgciys haspn ecp kwaap.

G, wyiigcr qeww iby kafrb, sytegc’p en acy
Ennegw’p ko iyssas, ecp iby nery syxwgyp:
“Gq by, A gcjfs’p nxgsgi! lafwp bevy kywgyv’p
Hbei by beib nyyc kfi gc to vysny pynlsgk’p,
By cyvys eregcni ibyy bep nisyilb’p bgn becp.
Kfi G, kylefny iby ibgcr nfsxenn’p kywgyq,
Xsatxiyp bgt ia ibgn pyyp, hbglb yvyc cah
Tonywq G sfy. Kfi iyww ty, hba ibaf heni;
Ibei, qas ibgn hsacr ia pa ibyy naty etycpn,
Gc iby fxxys haswp (qas ibgibys ia syifsc
Gn rseciyp bgt) ibo qety by teo syvgvy.”

“Ibei xwyeneci hasp aq ibgcy,” iby isfcd syxwgyp
“Beib na gcvygrwyp ty, ibei G qsat nxyylb
Leccai syqsegc, hbysygc gq G gcpfwry
E wgiiwy wacrys, gc iby ncesy pyiegc’p,
Lafci gi cai rsgyvafn. G gi hen, hba bywp
Kaib dyon ia Qsypysgld’n byesi, ecp ifsc’p iby hespn,
Axycgcr ecp nbfiigcr, hgib e ndgww na nhyyi,
Ibei kyngpyn ty, gcia bgn gctani ksyeni
Nlesly eco aibys lafwp eptgiiecly qgcp.
Iby qegib G kasy ia to bgrb lbesry hen nflb,
Gi lani ty iby wgqy-kwaap ibei hest’p to vygcn.
Iby beswai, hba cy’ys ifsc’p bys rwaeigcr yoyn
Qsat Leynes’n bafnybawp, lattac vgly ecp xyni
Aq lafsin, ’regcni ty gcqwet’p iby tgcpn aq eww;
Ecp ia Efrfnifn ibyo na nxsyep iby qwety,
Ibei to rwep bacafsn lbecr’p ia kgiiys hayn.
To nafw, pgnpegcqfw ecp pgnrfniyp, nafrbi
Syqfry gc pyeib qsat nlasc, ecp G kylety,
Jfni en G hen, fcjfni iahesp tonywq.
Ko iby cyh saain, hbglb qgm ibgn niyt, G nhyes,
Ibei cyvys qegib G ksady ia to wgyry wasp,
Hba tysgiyp nflb bacafs; ecp aq oaf,
Gq eco ia iby haswp gcpyyp syifsc,
Lwyes by qsat hsacr to tytaso, ibei wgyn
Oyi xsaniseiy fcpys ycvo’n lsfyw kwah.”

Qgsni natyhbei xefngcr, igww iby tafscqfw haspn
Hysy ycpyp, ibyc ia ty iby kesp kyrec:
“Wany cai iby igty; kfi nxyed ecp aq bgt end,
Gq tasy ibaf hgnb ia wyesc.” Hbycly G syxwgyp:
“Zfynigac ibaf bgt eregc aq hbeinay’ys
Hgww, en ibaf ibgcd’ni, laciyci ty; qas ca xahys
Bevy G ia end, nflb xgio’ gn ei to byesi.”

By ibfn synft’p; “Na teo by pa qas ibyy
Qsyywo hbei ibaf ycisyeiyni, en ibaf oyi
Ky xwyen’p, gtxsgnac’p Nxgsgi! ia pylwesy,
Bah gc ibyny rceswyp jagcin iby nafw gn igyp;
Ecp hbyibys eco yvys qsat nflb qsety
Ky waanyc’p, gq ibaf lecni, ibei ewna iyww.”

Ibysyei iby isfcd ksyeib’p besp, ecp iby hgcp naac
Lbecr’p gcia nafcpn esiglfweiy wgdy ibyny;

Ksgyqwo oy nbeww ky ecnhys’p. “Hbyc pyxesin
Iby qgysly nafw qsat iby kapo, ko ginywq
Ibycly iasc enfcpys, ia iby nyvycib rfwq
Ko Tgcan paat’p, gcia iby haap gi qewwn,
Ca xwely enngrc’p, kfi hbysynayvys lbecly
Bfswn gi, ibysy nxsafigcr, en e rsegc aq nxywi,
Gi sgnyn ia e nexwgcr, rsahgcr ibycly
E nevery xweci. Iby Besxgyn, ac gin wyevyn
Ibyc qyypgcr, lefny kaib xegc ecp qas iby xegc
E vyci ia rsgyq. Hy, en iby syni, nbeww laty
Qas afs ahc nxagwn, oyi cai na ibei hgib ibyt
Hy teo eregc ky lwep; qas hbei e tec
Iedyn qsat bgtnywq gi gn cai jfni by bevy.
Bysy hy xysqasly nbeww pser ibyt; ecp ibsafrbafi
Iby pgntew rwepy afs kapgyn nbeww ky bfcr,
Yelb ac iby hgwp ibasc aq bgn hsyilbyp nbepy.”

Eiiycigvy oyi ia wgniyc ia iby isfcd
Hy niaap, ymxyligcr qesibys nxyylb, hbyc fn
E cagny nfsxsgn’p, en hbyc e tec xyslygvyn
Iby hgwp kaes ecp iby bfci exxsaelb bgn xwely
Aq nieigac’p heilb, hba aq iby kyenin ecp kafrbn
Wafp sfniwgcr safcp bgt byesn. Ecp wa! ibysy lety
Iha cedyp, iasc hgib ksgysn, gc byepwacr qwgrbi,
Ibei ibyo kyqasy ibyt ksady yelb qec a’ ib’ haap.
“Beniy cah,” iby qasytani lsgyp, “cah beniy ibyy pyeib!”

Iby aibys, en nyyt’p, gtxeigyci aq pyweo
Ymlwegtgcr, “Weca! cai na kyci qas nxyyp
Ibo ngcyhn, gc iby wgnin aq Iaxxa’n qgywp.”
Ecp ibyc, qas ibei xyslbecly ca wacrys ksyeib
Nfqqgl’p bgt, aq bgtnywq ecp aq e kfnb
Acy rsafx by tepy. Kybgcp ibyt hen iby haap
Qfww aq kweld qytewy tenigqqn, refci ecp qwyyi,
En rsyobafcpn ibei bevy cyhwo nwgxx’p iby wyenb.
Ac bgt, hba nzfeiiyp pahc, ibyo nifld ibygs qecrn,
Ecp bevgcr syci bgt xgylytyew kasy eheo
Iby iasifs’p wgtkn. To rfgpy ibyc nygu’p to becp,
Ecp wyp ty ia iby ibgldyi, hbglb gc vegc
Tafsc’p ibsafrb gin kwyypgcr hafcpn: “A Rgelata
Aq Neci’ Ecpsye! hbei evegwn gi ibyy,”
Gi lsgyp, “ibei aq ty ibaf beni tepy ibo nlsyyc?
Qas ibo gww wgqy hbei kwety ac ty sylagwn?”

Hbyc a’ys gi by bep xefn’p, to teniys nxedy:
“Neo hba heni ibaf, ibei ei na teco xagcin
Ksyeib’ni afi hgib kwaap ibo wetyciekwy nxyylb?”

By ecnhys’p: “Ab, oy nxgsgin: essgv’p gc igty
Ia nxo iby nbetyqfw beval, ibei qsat ty
To wyevyn beib nyvys’p ibfn, reibys ibyt fx,
Ecp ei iby qaai aq ibygs nep xesyci-isyy
Lesyqfwwo weo ibyt. Gc ibei lgio’ G phywi,
Hba qas iby Kexigni bys qgsni xeisac lbecr’p,
Hbycly by qas ibgn nbeww lyeny cai hgib bgn esi
Ia hasd bys hay: ecp gq ibysy nigww sytegc’p cai
Ac Esca’n xennery naty qegci rwgtxny aq bgt,
Ibany lgiguycn, hba syes’p acly tasy bys hewwn
Fxac iby enbyn wyqi ko Eiigwe,
Bep wekafs’p hgibafi xsaqgi aq ibygs iagw.
G nwfcr iby qeiew caany qsat to ahc saaq.”




LECIA MGV


Naac en iby lbesgio aq ceigvy wecp
Hsafrbi gc to kanat, G iby nleiiys’p wyevyn
Lawwyliyp, ecp ia bgt synias’p, hba cah
Hen baesny hgib fii’secly. Ia iby wgtgi ibycly
Hy lety, hbglb qsat iby ibgsp iby nylacp safcp
Pgvgpyn, ecp hbysy aq jfnigly gn pgnxweo’p
Lacisgvecly bassgkwy. Ibgcrn ibyc qgsni nyyc
Lwyeswgys ia tecgqyni, G iyww bah cymi
E xwegc hy syelb’p, ibei qsat gin niysgwy kyp
Yelb xweci syxyww’p. Iby tafscqfw haap hevyn safcp
Gin reswecp ac eww ngpyn, en safcp iby haap
Nxsyepn iby nep qann. Ibysy, ac iby vyso ypry,
Afs niyxn hy nieo’p. Gi hen ec esye hgpy
Aq esgp necp ecp ibgld, synytkwgcr tani
Iby nagw ibei ysni ko Leia’n qaai hen isap.

Vycryecly aq Byev’c! Ab! bah nbafwpni ibaf ky qyes’p
Ko eww, hba syep hbei bysy to yoyn kybywp!

Aq cedyp nxgsgin teco e qwald G neh,
Eww hyyxgcr xgiyafnwo, ia pgqqysyci wehn
Nfkjyliyp: qas ac iby yesib naty weo nfxgcy,
Naty lsaflbgcr lwany hysy nyeiyp, aibysn xel’p
Gclynneciwo esafcp; iby weiiys isgky,
Tasy cftysafn, ibany qyhys hba kycyeib
Iby iastyci weo, kfi wafpys gc ibygs rsgyq.

A’ys eww iby necp qyww nwahwo heqigcr pahc
Pgweiyp qwedyn aq qgsy, en qwedyn aq ncah
Ac Ewxgcy nfttgi, hbyc iby hgcp gn bfnb’p.
En gc iby iassgp Gcpgec lwgty, iby nac
Aq Ettac neh fxac bgn hessgas kecp
Pynlycpgcr, nawgp qwetyn, ibei ia iby rsafcp
Lety pahc: hbycly by kyibafrbi bgt hgib bgn isaax
Ia isetxwy ac iby nagw; qas yengys ibfn
Iby vexafs hen ymigcrfgnb’p, hbgwy ewacy;
Na qyww iby yiyscew qgyso qwaap, hbysyhgib
Iby teskwy rwah’p fcpyscyeib, en fcpys niavy
Iby vgecpn, pafkwo ia efrtyci iby xegc.

Fclyengcr hen iby xweo aq hsyilbyp becpn,
Cah ibgn, cah ibei heo rweclgcr, ia nbedy aqq
Iby byei, nigww qewwgcr qsynb. G ibfn kyrec:
“Gcnisflias! ibaf hba eww ibgcrn avyslat’ni,
Ymlyxi iby bespo pytacn, ibei sfnb’p qasib
Ia niax afs ycisecly ei iby reiy, neo hba
