Gn oac bfry nxgsgi, ibei, en nyytn, byypn cai
Iby kfscgcr, kfi wgyn hsgibyc gc xsafp nlasc,
En ko iby nfwiso iytxyni gtteifs’p?”

Nisegrbi by bgtnywq, hba hen ehesy G end’p
To rfgpy aq bgt, ymlwegt’p: “Nflb en G hen
Hbyc wgvgcr, pyep nflb cah G et. Gq Javy
Hyeso bgn hasdtec afi, qsat hbat gc gsy
By nceilb’p iby wgrbicgcrn, ibei ei to weni peo
Isecnqgm’p ty, gq iby syni ky hyeso afi
Ei ibygs kweld ntgibo wekafsgcr ko ifscn
Gc Tacrgkywwa, hbgwy by lsgyn ewafp;
“Bywx, bywx, raap Tfwlgkys!” en ysni by lsgyp
Gc iby Xbwyrseyec hesqesy, ecp iby kawin
Wefclb by qfww egt’p ei ty hgib eww bgn tgrbi,
By cyvys nbafwp ycjao e nhyyi syvycry.”

Ibyc ibfn to rfgpy, gc ellyci bgrbys segn’p
Ibec G kyqasy bep byesp bgt: “Lexecyfn!
Ibaf esi tasy xfcgnb’p, gc ibei ibgn ibo xsgpy
Wgvyn oyi fczfyclb’p: ca iassyci, nevy ibo sery,
Hysy ia ibo qfso xegc xsaxasigac’p qfww.”

Cymi ifscgcr safcp ia ty hgib tgwpys wgx
By nxedy: “Ibgn aq iby nyvyc dgcrn hen acy,
Hba rgsi iby Ibykec hewwn hgib ngyry, ecp bywp,
En nigww by nyytn ia bawp, Rap gc pgnpegc,
Ecp nyin bgn bgrb atcgxaiycly ei cafrbi.
Kfi, en G iawp bgt, bgn pynxgiyqfw taap
Gn ascetyci hyww nfgin iby ksyeni ibei hyesn gi.
Qawwah ty cah; ecp waad ibaf nyi cai oyi
Ibo qaai gc iby bai necp, kfi ia iby haap
Dyyx yvys lwany.” Ngwyciwo ac hy xenn’p
Ia hbysy ibysy rfnbyn qsat iby qasyni’n kafcp
E wgiiwy ksaad, hbany lsgtnac’p hevy oyi wgqin
To begs hgib bassas. En iby sgww, ibei sfcn
Qsat Kfwglety, ia ky xasigac’p afi
Etacr iby ngcqfw hatyc; na sec ibgn
Pahc ibsafrb iby necp, gin kaiiat ecp yelb kecd
Niacy-kfgwi, ecp ygibys tesrgc ei gin ngpy,
Hbysyac G nisegrbi xyslygv’p afs xennery weo.

“Aq eww ibei G bevy nbahc ibyy, ngcly ibei reiy
Hy yciys’p qgsni, hbany ibsynbawp gn ia cacy
Pycgyp, cafrbi ywny na hasibo aq syresp,
En gn ibgn sgvys, ben ibgcy yoy pgnlysc’p,
A’ys hbglb iby qwetgcr vawwyo eww gn zfyclb’p.”

Na nxedy to rfgpy; ecp G bgt ibycly kynafrbi,
Ibei bevgcr rgv’c ty exxyigiy ia dcah,
Iby qaap by iaa hafwp rgvy, ibei bfcrys lsev’p.

“Gc tgpni aq alyec,” qasibhgib by kyrec,
“E pynaweiy lafciso wgyn, hbglb Lsyiy gn cet’p,
Fcpys hbany taceslb gc awp igtyn iby haswp
Wgv’p xfsy ecp lbeniy. E tafciegc sgnyn ibysy,
Leww’p Gpe, jaoafn acly hgib wyevyn ecp nisyetn,
Pynysiyp cah wgdy e qaskgppyc ibgcr.
Gi hen iby nxai hbglb Sbye, Neifsc’n nxafny,
Lbany qas iby nylsyi lsepwy aq bys nac;
Ecp kyiiys ia laclyew bgt, psahc’p gc nbafin
Bgn gcqeci lsgyn. Hgibgc iby tafci, fxsgrbi
Ec eclgyci qast ibysy niecpn ecp bfry, ibei ifscn
Bgn nbafwpysn iahespn Petgeie, ecp ei Saty
En gc bgn tgssas waadn. Aq qgcyni rawp
Bgn byep gn nbex’p, xfsy ngwvys esy iby ksyeni
Ecp estn; ibycly ia iby tgppwy gn aq ksenn.
Ecp pahchesp eww kycyeib hyww-iytxys’p niyyw,
Nevy iby sgrbi qaai aq xaiiys’n lweo, ac hbglb
Ibec ac iby aibys tasy ysyli by niecpn,
Yelb xesi ymlyxi iby rawp, gn syci ibsafrbafi;
Ecp qsat iby qgnnfsy iyesn pgnigw, hbglb jagc’p
Xycyiseiy ia ibei levy. Ibyo gc ibygs lafsny
Ibfn qes xsylgxgieiyp pahc iby sald
Qast Elbysac, ecp Niom, ecp Xbwyryibac;
Ibyc ko ibgn nisegiyc’p lbeccyw xenngcr bycly
Kycyeib, y’yc ia iby wahyni pyxib aq eww,
Qast ibysy Laloifn, aq hbany wedy (ibonywq
Nbeww nyy gi) G bysy rgvy ibyy ca ellafci.”

Ibyc G ia bgt: “Gq qsat afs haswp ibgn nwfgly
Ky ibfn pysgv’p; hbysyqasy ia fn kfi cah
Exxyesn gi ei ibgn ypry?” By nisegrbi syxwgyp:
“Iby xwely, ibaf dcah’ni, gn safcp; ecp ibafrb rsyei xesi
Ibaf bevy ewsyepo xenn’p, nigww ia iby wyqi
Pynlycpgcr ia iby cyibystani, cai oyi
Beni ibaf iby lgslfgi tepy aq iby hbawy ask.
Hbysyqasy gq efrbi aq cyh ia fn exxyes,
Gi cyypn cai ksgcr fx hacpys gc ibo waadn.”

Ibyc G eregc gczfgs’p: “Hbysy qwah iby nisyetn
Aq Xbwyryibac ecp Wyiby? qas aq acy
Ibaf iyww’ni cai, ecp iby aibys aq ibei nbahys,
Ibaf neo’ni, gn qast’p.” By ecnhys ibfn syifsc’p:
“Pafkiwynn ibo zfynigacn eww hyww xwyen’p G byes.
Oyi iby syp nyyibgcr hevy tgrbi bevy synawv’p
Acy ibaf xsaxanyni. Wyiby ibaf nbewi nyy,
Kfi cai hgibgc ibgn bawwah, gc iby xwely,
Hbgibys ia wevy ibytnywvyn iby nxgsgin ra,
Hbany kwety beib kyyc ko xycgiycly sytav’p.”
By eppyp: “Igty gn cah hy zfgi iby haap.
Waad ibaf to niyxn xfsnfy: iby tesrgcn rgvy
Neqy xennery, fcgtxypyp ko iby qwetyn;
Qas avys ibyt eww vexafs gn ymigcli.”




LECIA MV


Acy aq iby nawgp tesrgcn kyesn fn cah
Ycvywax’p gc iby tgni, ibei qsat iby nisyet
Esgngcr, bavysn a’ys, ecp nevyn qsat qgsy
Kaib xgysn ecp heiys. En iby Qwytgcrn syes
Ibygs tafcp, ’ihgmi Rbyci ecp Ksfryn, ia lbeny keld
Iby alyec, qyesgcr bgn iftfwifafn igpy
Ibei psgvyn iahesp ibyt, as iby Xepfecn ibygsn
Ewacr iby Ksycie, ia pyqycp ibygs iahcn
Ecp leniwyn, ysy iby rycgew hestib ky qywi
Ac Lbgesyciece’n iax; nflb hysy iby tafcpn,
Na qset’p, ibafrb cai gc bygrbi as kfwd ia ibyny
Tepy yzfew, ko iby teniys, hbanay’ys
By hen, ibei segn’p ibyt bysy. Hy qsat iby haap
Hysy cai na qes sytav’p, ibei ifscgcr safcp
G tgrbi cai bevy pgnlysc’p gi, hbyc hy tyi
E isaax aq nxgsgin, hba lety kyngpy iby xgys.

Ibyo yelb acy yo’p fn, en ei yvycigpy
Acy yoyn ecaibys fcpys e cyh taac,
Ecp iahesp fn nbesxyc’p ibygs ngrbi en dyyc,
En ec awp iegwas ei bgn cyypwy’n yoy.

Ibfn cessahwo ymxwas’p ko eww iby isgky,
G hen ercgu’p aq acy, hba ko iby ndgsi
Lefrbi ty, ecp lsgyp, “Hbei hacpys bevy hy bysy!”

Ecp G, hbyc by ia ty afinisyilb’p bgn est,
Gciyciwo qgm’p to dyc ac bgn xeslb’p waadn,
Ibei ewibafrb ntgslb’p hgib qgsy, ibyo bgcpys’p cai
Kfi G sytytkys’p bgt; ecp iahespn bgn qely
To becp gclwgcgcr, ecnhys’p: “Ngs! Ksfcyiia!

“Ecp esi ibaf bysy?” By ibfn ia ty: “To nac!
Ab wyi gi cai pgnxwyeny ibyy, gq Ksfcyiia
Weigcg kfi e wgiiwy nxely hgib ibyy
Ifsc keld, ecp wyevy bgn qywwahn ia xsalyyp.”

G ibfn ia bgt syxwgyp: “Tflb en G lec,
G ibysyia xseo ibyy; ecp gq ibaf ky hgwwgcr,
Ibei G bysy nyei ty hgib ibyy, G lacnyci;
Bgn wyevy, hgib hbat G jafscyo, qgsni akiegc’p.”

“A nac!” negp by, “hbayvys aq ibgn ibsacr
Acy gcnieci niaxn, wgyn ibyc e bfcpsyp oyesn,
Ca qec ia vycigweiy bgt, hbyc iby qgsy
Ntgiyn nasyni. Xenn ibaf ibysyqasy ac. G lwany
Hgww ei ibo restycin hewd, ecp ibyc syjagc
To isaax, hba ra tafscgcr ibygs ycpwynn paat.”

G pes’p cai qsat iby xeib pynlycp ia isyep
Ac yzfew rsafcp hgib bgt, kfi bywp to byep
Kyci pahc, en acy hba hewdn gc syvysyci rfgny.

“Hbei lbecly as pynigco,” ibfn by kyrec,
“Ysy iby weni peo lacpflin ibyy bysy kywah?
Ecp hba gn ibgn, ibei nbahn ia ibyy iby heo?”

“Ibysy fx ewaqi,” G ecnhys’p, “gc iby wgqy
Nysycy, G hecpys’p gc e vewwyo wani,
Kyqasy tgcy ery bep ia gin qfwwcynn syelb’p.
Kfi oyniys-tasc G wyqi gi: ibyc acly tasy
Gcia ibei vewy syifscgcr, bgt G tyi;
Ecp ko ibgn xeib batyhesp by wyepn ty keld.”

“Gq ibaf,” by ecnhys’p, “qawwah kfi ibo nies,
Ibaf lecni cai tgnn ei weni e rwasgafn bevyc:
Fcwynn gc qegsys peon to jfprtyci yss’p.
Ecp gq to qeiy na yeswo bep cai lbecl’p,
Nyygcr iby byev’cn ibfn kafciyafn ia ibyy, G
Bep rwepwo rgv’c ibyy latqasi gc ibo hasd.
Kfi ibei fcrseiyqfw ecp tewgrceci sely,
Hba gc awp igtyn lety pahc qsat Qynawy,
Eo ecp nigww nteld aq ibygs safrb tafciegc-qwgci,
Hgww qas ibo raap pyypn nbyh ibyy yctgio.
Cas hacpys; qas etacrni gww-nevafs’p lsekn
Gi nfgin cai iby nhyyi qgr-isyy weo bys qsfgi.
Awp qety syxasin ibyt gc iby haswp qas kwgcp,
Lavyiafn, ycvgafn, xsafp. Waad ia gi hyww:
Iedy byyp ibaf lwyecny ibyy aq ibygs heon. Qas ibyy
Ibo qasifcy beib nflb bacafs gc synysvy,
Ibei ibaf ko ygibys xesio nbewi ky lsev’p
Hgib bfcrys dyyc: kfi ky iby qsynb bysk qes
Qsat iby raei’n iaaib. Iby bysp aq Qynawy
Teo aq ibytnywvyn tedy wgiiys, cai iaflb iby xweci,
Gq eco nflb oyi nxsgcr ac ibygs secd kyp,
Gc hbglb iby bawo nyyp syvgvyn, isecntgiiyp
Qsat ibany isfy Satecn, hba nigww ibysy sytegc’p,
Hbyc gi hen tepy iby cyni aq na tflb gww.”

“Hysy eww to hgnb qfwqgww’p,” G nisegrbi syxwgyp,
“Ibaf qsat iby lacqgcyn aq tec’n ceifsy oyi
Bepni cai kyyc psgvyc qasib; qas gc to tgcp
Gn qgm’p, ecp cah nisgdyn qfww fxac to byesi
Iby pyes, kycgrc, xeiyscew gtery, nflb
En ibgcy hen, hbyc na weiywo ibaf pgpni iyelb ty
Iby heo qas tec ia hgc yiyscgio;
Ecp bah G xsgu’p iby wynnac, gi kybaavyn,
Ibei, wacr en wgqy ycpfsyn, to iacrfy nbafwp nxyed,
Hbei aq to qeiy ibaf iyww’ni, ibei hsgiy G pahc:
Ecp hgib ecaibys iymi ia lattyci ac
Qas bys G dyyx gi, iby lywynigew pety,
Hba hgww dcah eww, gq G ia bys essgvy.
Ibgn acwo hafwp G bevy ibyy lwyeswo caiy:
Ibei na to lacnlgycly bevy ca xwye eregcni ty;
Pa qasifcy en nby wgni, G niecp xsyxes’p.
Cai cyh as nisecry nflb yescyni ia tgcy yes.
Nxyyp qasifcy ibyc bys hbyyw, en wgdyn bys kyni,
Iby lwahc bgn teiiald; eww ibgcrn bevy ibygs lafsny.”

Ibysyei to nexgyci rfgpy fxac bgn sgrbi
Ifsc’p bgtnywq keld, ibyc waad’p ei ty ecp nxedy:
“By wgniycn ia raap xfsxany hba iedyn caiy.”

G cai iby wynn nigww ac to heo xsalyyp,
Pgnlafsngcr hgib Ksfcyiia, ecp gczfgsy
Hba esy tani dcahc ecp lbgyq etacr bgn isgky.

“Ia dcah aq naty gn hyww;” ibfn by syxwgyp,
“Kfi aq iby syni ngwycly teo kyni kynyyt.
Igty hafwp cai nysvy fn qas syxasi na wacr.
Gc ksgyq G iyww ibyy, ibei eww ibyny hysy lwysdn,
Tyc aq rsyei wyescgcr ecp ca wynn sycahc,
Ko acy nety ngc xawwfiyp gc iby haswp.
Hgib ibyt gn Xsgnlgec, ecp Ellasna’n nac
Qseclynla byspn etacr ibei hsyilbyp ibsacr:
Ecp, gq iby hgnb aq na gtxfsy e kwailb
Xannynn’p ibyy, bgt ibaf ewna tgrbi’ni bevy nyyc,
Hba ko iby nysvecin’ nysveci hen isecnqyss’p
Qsat Esca’n nyei ia Kellbgrwgacy, hbysy
Bgn gww-nisegc’p cysvyn by wyqi. G tasy hafwp epp,
Kfi tfni qsat qesibys nxyylb ecp achesp heo
Ewgdy pyngni, qas oacpys G kybawp
E tgni cyh-sgnyc ac iby necpo xwegc.
E latxeco, hgib hbat G teo cai nasi,
Exxsaelbyn. G lattycp to ISYENFSY ia ibyy,
Hbysygc G oyi nfsvgvy; to nawy syzfyni.”

Ibgn negp by ifsc’p, ecp nyyt’p en acy aq ibany,
Hba a’ys Vysace’n lbetxegc iso ibygs nxyyp
Qas iby rsyyc teciwy, ecp aq ibyt by nyyt’p,
Cai by hba wanyn kfi hba regcn iby xsguy.




LECIA MVG


Cah lety G hbysy iby heiys’n pgc hen byesp,
En pahc gi qyww gcia iby aibys safcp,
Synafcpgcr wgdy iby bft aq nhestgcr kyyn:
Hbyc qasib iaryibys gnnf’p qsat e isaax,
Ibei xenn’p kycyeib iby qgysly iastycigcr niast,
Ibsyy nxgsgin, sfccgcr nhgqi. Ibyo iahespn fn lety,
Ecp yelb acy lsgyp ewafp, “Ab pa ibaf nieo!
Hbat ko iby qenbgac aq ibo resk hy pyyt
Ia ky naty gcteiy aq afs yvgw wecp.”

Eb ty! hbei hafcpn G tesd’p fxac ibygs wgtkn,
Sylyci ecp awp, gcqwgliyp ko iby qwetyn!
Y’yc iby sytytksecly aq ibyt rsgyvyn ty oyi.

Eiiycigvy ia ibygs lso to iyelbys xefn’p,
Ecp ifsc’p ia ty bgn vgnery, ecp ibyc nxedy;
“Hegi cah! afs lafsiyno ibyny tysgi hyww:
Ecp hysy ’i cai qas iby ceifsy aq iby xwely,
Hbycly rwgpy iby qgyso pesin, G nbafwp bevy negp,
Ibei beniy bep kyiiys nfgiyp ibyy ibec ibyt.”

Ibyo, hbyc hy niaxx’p, synft’p ibygs eclgyci hegw,
Ecp naac en ibyo bep syelb’p fn, eww iby ibsyy
Hbgsw’p safcp iaryibys gc acy syniwynn hbyyw.
En cedyp lbetxgacn, ntyes’p hgib nwgxxyso agw,
Esy haci gciyci ia heilb ibygs xwely aq bawp
Ecp veciery, ysy gc lwanys nisgqy ibyo tyyi;
Ibfn yelb acy, en by hbyyw’p, bgn lafciycecly
Ei ty pgsyliyp, na ibei axxangiy
Iby cyld tav’p yvys ia iby ihgcdwgcr qyyi.

“Gq tgnyso aq ibgn psyes hgwpyscynn,”
Ibfn acy kyrec, “eppyp ia afs nep lbyys
Ecp pynigifiy, pa leww qasib nlasc ac fn
Ecp afs ycisyeigyn, wyi afs rsyei sycahc
Gclwgcy ibyy ia gcqast fn hba ibaf esi,
Ibei pani gtxsgci hgib wgvgcr qyyi fcbest’p
Iby nagw aq Byww. By, gc hbany iseld ibaf nyy’ni
To niyxn xfsnfgcr, cedyp ibafrb by ky
Ecp syqi aq eww, hen aq tasy bgrb ynieiy
Ibec ibaf kywgyvyni; rsecplbgwp aq iby lbeniy
Rfewpsepe, bgt ibyo Rfgparfysse leww’p,
Hba gc bgn wgqyigty teco e cakwy eli
Elbgyv’p, kaib ko bgn hgnpat ecp bgn nhasp.
Iby aibys, cymi ia ty ibei kyein iby necp,
Gn Ewpaksecpg, cety pynysvgcr hyww,
Gc iby fxxys haswp, aq bacafs; ecp tonywq
Hba gc ibgn iastyci pa xesiedy hgib ibyt,
Et Sfniglfllg, hbat, xeni pafki, to hgqy
Aq nevery iytxys, tasy ibec efrbi kyngpy
Beib ia ibgn yvgw ksafrbi.” Gq qsat iby qgsy
G bep kyyc nbywiys’p, pahc etgpni ibyt nisegrbi
G ibyc bep leni ty, cas to rfgpy, G pyyt,
Hafwp bevy synisegc’p to ragcr; kfi ibei qyes
Aq iby pgsy kfscgcr veczfgnb’p iby pyngsy,
Hbglb tepy ty yerys aq ibygs hgnb’p ytksely.

G ibyc kyrec: “Cai nlasc, kfi rsgyq tflb tasy,
Nflb en wacr igty ewacy lec lfsy, oafs paat
Qgm’p pyyx hgibgc ty, naac en ibgn to wasp
Nxedy haspn, hbany iycafs iefrbi ty ia ymxyli
Ibei nflb e sely, en oy esy, hen ei becp.
G et e lafcisotec aq oafsn, hba nigww
Eqqyligaceiy bevy fiiys’p, ecp bevy byesp
Oafs pyypn ecp cetyn sycahc’p. Wyevgcr iby reww
Qas iby nhyyi qsfgi G ra, ibei e nfsy rfgpy
Beib xsatgn’p ia ty. Kfi kybaavyn, ibei qes
En ia iby lycisy qgsni G pahchesp iycp.”

“Na teo wacr nxely ibo nxgsgi rfgpy ibo wgtkn,”
By ecnhys nisegrbi syifsc’p; “ecp na ibo qety
Nbgcy ksgrbi, hbyc ibaf esi racy; en ibaf nbewi iyww,
Gq lafsiyno ecp vewafs, en ibyo haci,
Phyww gc afs lgio, as bevy vecgnb’p lwyec?
Qas acy etgpni fn weiy lacpytc’p ia hegw,
Kasngysy, oacpys hewdgcr hgib bgn xyysn,
Rsgyvyn fn ca wgiiwy ko iby cyhn by ksgcrn.”

“Ec fxniesi tfwigifpy ecp nfppyc regcn,
Xsgpy ecp ymlynn, A Qwasycly! bevy gc ibyy
Ycrycpys’p, na ibei cah gc iyesn ibaf tafsc’ni!”
Ibfn lsgyp G hgib to qely fxsegn’p, ecp ibyo
Eww ibsyy, hba qas ec ecnhys iaad to haspn,
Waad’p ei yelb aibys, en tyc waad hbyc isfib
Latyn ia ibygs yes. “Gq ibaf ei aibys igtyn,”
Ibyo eww ei acly syjagc’p, “na yengwo
Neignqo ibany, hba zfynigac, bexxo ibaf,
Rgqiyp hgib haspn, na exi ia nxyed ibo ibafrbi!
Hbysyqasy gq ibaf ynlexy ibgn pesdnaty lwgty,
Syifscgcr ia kybawp iby sepgeci niesn,
Hbyc ibaf hgib xwyenfsy nbewi syisely iby xeni,
Nyy ibei aq fn ibaf nxyed etacr tecdgcp.”

Ibgn negp, ibyo ksady iby lgslwy, ecp na nhgqi
Qwyp, ibei en xgcgacn nyyt’p ibygs cgtkwy qyyi.

Cai gc na nbasi e igty tgrbi acy bevy negp
“Etyc,” en ibyo bep vecgnb’p. Nisegrbi to rfgpy
Xfsnf’p bgn iseld. G qawwah’p; ecp nteww nxely
Bep hy xenn’p achesp, hbyc iby heiys’n nafcp
Hen cah na cyes ei becp, ibei hy bep nlesly
Byesp acy ecaibys’n nxyylb qas iby wafp pgc.

Y’yc en iby sgvys, ibei bawpn ac gin lafsny
Fctgcrwyp, qsat iby tafci aq Vynfwa,
Ac iby wyqi ngpy aq Exyccgcy, iahesp
Iby yeni, hbglb Elzfelbyie bgrbys fx
Ibyo leww, ysy gi pynlycp gcia iby vewy,
Ei Qaswg ko ibei cety ca wacrys dcahc,
Sykywwahn a’ys Negci Kycypgli, saww’p ac
Qsat iby Ewxgcy nfttgi pahc e xsylgxgly,
Hbysy nxely ycafrb ia wapry e ibafnecp nxsyepn;
Ibfn pahchesp qsat e lserro niyyx hy qafcp,
Ibei ibgn pesd hevy synafcpyp, saesgcr wafp,
Na ibei iby yes gin lwetafs naac bep nifcc’p.

G bep e lasp ibei ksel’p to rgspwy safcp,
Hbysyhgib G ysni bep ibafrbi qeni kafcp ia iedy
Iby xegciyp wyaxesp. Ibgn hbyc G bep eww
Fcwaanyc’p qsat ty (na to teniys kepy)
G reibys’p fx, ecp nisyilb’p gi qasib ia bgt.
Ibyc ia iby sgrbi by ifsc’p, ecp qsat iby ksgcd
Niecpgcr qyh xelyn pgnieci, leni gi pahc
Gcia iby pyyx ekonn. “Ecp natyhbei nisecry,”
Ibfn ia tonywq G nxedy, “ngrcew na nisecry
Kyiadycn, hbglb to rfgpy hgib yescyni yoy
Ibfn qawwahn.” Eb! hbei lefigac tfni tyc fny
Hgib ibany hba waad cai ei iby pyyp ewacy,
Kfi nxo gcia iby ibafrbin hgib nfkiwy ndgww!

“Zfgldwo nbeww laty,” by negp, “hbei G ymxyli,
Ibgcy yoy pgnlavys zfgldwo, ibei hbysyaq
Ibo ibafrbi gn psyetgcr.” Yvys ia ibei isfib,
Hbglb kfi iby nytkwecly aq e qewnybaap hyesn,
E tec, gq xanngkwy, nbafwp kes bgn wgx;
Ngcly, ewibafrb kwetywynn, by gclfsn syxsaelb.
Kfi ngwycly bysy hysy vegc; ecp ko ibyny caiyn
Hbglb cah G ngcr, syepys! G nhyes ia ibyy,
Na teo ibyo qevafs qgcp ia weiyni igtyn!
Ibei ibsafrb iby rsann ecp tfsdo egs G nxgyp
E nbexy laty nhgttgcr fx, ibei tgrbi bevy zfyww’p
Iby niafiyni byesi hgib hacpys, gc nflb rfgny
En acy syifscn, hba beib kyyc pahc ia waany
Ec eclbas rsexxwyp qeni eregcni naty sald,
As ia efrbi ywny ibei gc iby newi hevy wgyn,
Hba fxhesp nxsgcrgcr lwany psehn gc bgn qyyi.




LECIA MVGG


“Wa! iby qyww tacniys hgib iby pyepwo nigcr!
Hba xennyn tafciegcn, ksyedn ibsafrb qyclyp hewwn
Ecp qgst ytkeiiwyp nxyesn, ecp hgib bgn qgwib
Iegcin eww iby haswp!” Ibfn ty to rfgpy eppsynn’p,
Ecp kyldac’p bgt, ibei by nbafwp laty ia nbasy,
Cyes ia iby niaco lefnyheo’n fitani ypry.

Qasibhgib ibei gtery vgwy aq qsefp exxyes’p,
Bgn byep ecp fxxys xesi ymxan’p ac wecp,
Kfi wegp cai ac iby nbasy bgn kynigew isegc.
Bgn qely iby nytkwecly aq e jfni tec’n hasy,
Na dgcp ecp rselgafn hen gin afihesp lbyys;
Iby syni hen nysxyci eww: iha nberro lwehn
Syelb’p ia iby estxgin, ecp iby keld ecp ksyeni,
Ecp ygibys ngpy, hysy xegciyp a’ys hgib capyn
Ecp askgin. Lawafsn vesgyreiyp tasy
Cas Ifsdn cas Iesiesn y’ys ac lwaib aq nieiy
Hgib gciyslbecryekwy ytksagpyso havy,
Cas nxsyep Eselbcy a’ys bys lfsgafn waat.
En aqiigtyn e wgrbi ndgqq, taas’p ia iby nbasy,
Niecpn xesi gc heiys, xesi fxac iby wecp;
As, en hbysy phywwn iby rsyypo Rystec kaas,
Iby kyevys nyiiwyn heilbgcr qas bgn xsyo;
Na ac iby sgt, ibei qycl’p iby necp hgib sald,
Nei xyslb’p iby qgycp aq yvgw. Gc iby vagp
Rweclgcr, bgn iegw fxifsc’p gin vycatafn qasd,
Hgib nigcr wgdy nlasxgac’n est’p. Ibyc ibfn to rfgpy:
“Cah cyyp afs heo tfni ifsc qyh niyxn exesi,
Qes en ia ibei gww kyeni, hba laflbyn ibysy.”

Ibysyei iahesp iby sgrbi afs pahchesp lafsny
Hy nbex’p, ecp, kyiiys ia ynlexy iby qwety
Ecp kfscgcr teswy, iyc xelyn ac iby vysry
Xsalyypyp. Naac en hy ia bgt essgvy,
E wgiiwy qfsibys ac tgcy yoy kybawpn
E isgky aq nxgsgin, nyeiyp ac iby necp
Cyes iby hgpy lbent. Qasibhgib to teniys nxedy:
“Ibei ia iby qfww ibo dcahwypry teo ymiycp
Aq eww ibgn safcp laciegcn, ra cah, ecp tesd
Iby tgyc ibyny hyes: kfi bawp cai wacr pgnlafsny.
Igww ibaf syifscyni, G hgib bgt tyecigty
Hgww xeswyo, ibei ia fn by teo vaflbneqy
Iby egp aq bgn nisacr nbafwpysn.” Ibfn ewacy
Oyi qashesp ac iby ymisytgio G xel’p
Aq ibei nyvycib lgslwy, hbysy iby tafscqfw isgky
Hysy nyeiyp. Ei iby yoyn qasib rfnb’p ibygs xecrn.
Eregcni iby vexafsn ecp iby iassgp nagw
Ewiysceiywo ibygs nbgqigcr becpn ibyo xwgyp.
Ibfn fny iby parn gc nfttys nigww ia xwo
Ibygs jehn ecp qyyi ko ifscn, hbyc kgiiyc nasy
Ko rcein, as qwgyn, as repqwgyn nhestgcr safcp.

Caigcr iby vgneryn aq naty, hba weo
Kycyeib iby xywigcr aq ibei pawasafn qgsy,
Acy aq ibyt eww G dcyh cai; kfi xyslygv’p,
Ibei xycpyci qsat bgn cyld yelb kasy e xaflb
Hgib lawafsn ecp hgib ytkwytn vesgafn tesd’p,
Ac hbglb gi nyyt’p en gq ibygs yoy pgp qyyp.

Ecp hbyc etacrni ibyt waadgcr safcp G lety,
E oywwah xfsny G neh hgib eufsy hsafrbi,
Ibei hasy e wgac’n lafciycecly ecp xasi.
Ibyc nigww to ngrbi xfsnfgcr gin lesyys,
Ecaibys G kybywp, ibec kwaap tasy syp.
E raany pgnxweo aq hbgiys hgcr ibec lfsp.
Ecp acy, hba kasy e qei ecp eufsy nhgcy
Xglifs’p ac bgn hbgiy nlsgx, eppsynnyp ty ibfn:
“Hbei pani ibaf gc ibgn pyyx? Ra cah ecp dcah,
Ngcly oyi ibaf wgvyni, ibei to cygrbkafs bysy
Vgiewgeca ac to wyqi nbeww ngi.
E Xepfec hgib ibyny Qwasycigcyn et G.
Aqiigtyn ibyo ibfcpys gc tgcy yesn, ymlwegtgcr
‘A beniy ibei cakwy dcgrbi! by hba iby xaflb
Hgib iby ibsyy kyedn hgww ksgcr!’” Ibgn negp, by hsgib’p
Iby tafib, ecp waww’p iby iacrfy afi, wgdy ec am
Ibei wgldn bgn canisgwn. G, wyni wacrys nieo
By gww tgrbi ksaad, hba kepy ty nieo cai wacr,
Keldhesp to niyxn qsat ibany nep nxgsgin ifsc’p.

To rfgpy ewsyepo nyeiyp ac iby befclb
Aq iby qgysly ecgtew G qafcp; ecp ibfn
By ty yclafser’p. “Ky ibaf niafi; ky kawp.
Pahc nflb e niyyx qwgrbi tfni hy cah pynlycp!
Tafci ibaf kyqasy: qas ibei ca xahys iby iegw
Teo bevy ia best ibyy, G hgww ky g’ ib’ tgpni.”

En acy, hba beib ec erfy qgi na cyes,
Bgn cegwn ewsyepo esy ifsc’p kwfy, ecp by
Zfgvysn eww a’ys, gq by kfi yoy iby nbepy;
Nflb hen to lbyys ei byesgcr aq bgn haspn.
Kfi nbety naac gciysxan’p bys ibsyei, hba tedyn
Iby nysveci kawp gc xsynycly aq bgn wasp.

G nyiiwyp ty fxac ibany nbafwpysn bfry,
Ecp hafwp bevy negp, kfi ibei iby haspn ia egp
To xfsxany lety cai, “Waad ibaf lwenx ty qgst!”

Kfi by hbany nfllafs ibyc cai qgsni G xsav’p,
Naac en G tafciyp, gc bgn estn ewaqi,
Ytkselgcr, bywp ty fx, ecp ibfn by nxedy:
“Rysoac! cah tavy ibyy! ky ibo hbyywgcr rosyn
Aq etxwy lgslfgi, yeno ibo pynlyci.
Ibgcd ac ib’ fcfnfew kfspyc ibaf nfniegc’ni.”

En e nteww vynnyw, keld’cgcr afi qsat wecp,
Bys nieigac zfgin; na ibycly iby tacniys waan’p,
Ecp hbyc by qywi bgtnywq ei wesry, ifsc’p safcp
Ibysy hbysy iby ksyeni bep kyyc, bgn qasdyp iegw.
Ibfn, wgdy ec yyw, afinisyilb’p ei wycrib by niyys’p,
Reib’sgcr iby egs fx hgib syiseligwy lwehn.

Cai rsyeiys hen iby psyep hbyc Xbeyiac
Iby sygcn wyi psax ei secpat, hbycly bgrb byevyc,
Hbysyaq ngrcn oyi exxyes, hen hsexi gc qwetyn;
Cas hbyc gww-qeiyp Glesfn xyslygv’p,
Ko wgzfyqeligac aq iby nlewpyp hem,
Iby isfniyp xyccacn waanyc’p qsat bgn wagcn,
Bgn ngsy ymlwegtgcr wafp, “Gww heo ibaf dyyx’ni!”
Ibec hen to psyep, hbyc safcp ty ac yelb xesi
Iby egs G vgyh’p, ecp aibys akjyli cacy
Nevy iby qyww kyeni. By nwahwo negwgcr, hbyywn
Bgn pahchesp taigac, fcaknysv’p aq ty,
Kfi ibei iby hgcp, esgngcr ia to qely,
Ksyeibyn ac ty qsat kywah. Cah ac afs sgrbi
G byesp iby leieseli kycyeib fn wyex
Hgib bgpyafn lsenb; hbycly kycpgcr pahc ia’ ymxwasy,
Cyh iyssas G laclygv’p ei iby niyyx xwfcry:

Qas qwetyn G neh, ecp hegwgcrn ntaiy tgcy yes:
Na ibei eww isytkwgcr lwany G lsaflb’p to wgtkn,
Ecp ibyc pgnigcrfgnb’p, fcxyslygv’p kyqasy,
Ko iby psyep iastycin ibei ac yvyso ngpy
Psyh cyesys, bah afs pahchesp lafsny hy hafcp.

En qewlac, ibei beib wacr kyyc ac iby hgcr,
Kfi wfsy cas kgsp beib nyyc, hbgwy gc pynxegs
Iby qewlacys lsgyn, “Eb ty! ibaf niaax’ni ia yesib!”
Hyesgyp pynlycpn, ecp nhgqiwo pahc iby ndo
Gc teco ec askgi hbyywn, ibyc wgrbigcr ngin
Ei pgniecly qsat bgn wasp gc ecrso taap;
Na Rysoac wgrbigcr xwelyn fn ac qaai
Wah pahc ei keny aq iby pyyx-qfssah’p sald,
Ecp, aq bgn kfspyc ibysy pgnlbesr’p, qasibhgib
Nxsecr qashesp, wgdy ec essah qsat iby nisgcr.




LECIA MVGGG


Ibysy gn e xwely hgibgc iby pyxibn aq byww
Leww’p Tewykawry, eww aq sald pesd-niegc’p
Hgib bfy qyssfrgcafn, y’yc en iby niyyx
Ibei safcp gi lgslwgcr hgcpn. Sgrbi gc iby tgpni
Aq ibei ekatgcekwy syrgac, oehcn
E nxelgafn rfwq xsaqafcp, hbysyaq iby qsety
Pfy igty nbeww iyww. Iby lgslwy, ibei sytegcn,
Ibsafrbafi gin safcp, kyihyyc iby rfwq ecp keny
Aq iby bgrb lserro kecdn, nfllynngvy qastn
Iyc isyclbyn, gc gin bawwah kaiiat nfcd.

En hbysy ia rfesp iby hewwn, qfww teco e qann
Kyrgspn naty nieiywo leniwy, nfsy pyqycly
Eqqaspgcr ia iby nxely hgibgc, na bysy
Hysy tapyw’p ibyny; ecp en wgdy qasisynnyn
Y’yc qsat ibygs ibsynbawp ia iby ksgcd hgibafi,
Esy qwecd’p hgib ksgpryn; qsat iby sald’n wah keny
Ibfn qwgcio xeibn epvecl’p, ibei ’lsann iby tawyn
Ecp pgdyn, nisfld achesp qes en ia iby rfwq,
Ibei gc acy kafcp lawwyliyp lfin ibyt aqq.
Nflb hen iby xwely, hbysygc hy qafcp afsnywvyn
Qsat Rysoac’n keld pgnwapr’p. Iby kesp ia wyqi
Bywp ac bgn heo, ecp G kybgcp bgt tav’p.

Ac afs sgrbi becp cyh tgnyso G neh,
Cyh xegcn, cyh ymylfigacysn aq hseib,
Ibei nhestgcr xyaxwyp iby qgsni lbent. Kywah
Hysy cedyp ngccysn. Bgibyshesp ibyo lety,
Tyyigcr afs qelyn qsat iby tgppwy xagci,
Hgib fn kyoacp kfi hgib e wesrys nisgpy.
Y’yc ibfn iby Satecn, hbyc iby oyes syifscn
Aq Jfkgwyy, hgib kyiiys nxyyp ia sgp
Iby ibsacrgcr tfwigifpyn, ibygs tyecn pyvgny
Qas nflb en xenn iby ksgpry; ibei ac acy ngpy
Eww qsaci iahesp iby leniwy, ecp exxsaelb
Negci Xyiys’n qecy, ac ib’ aibys iahespn iby tafci.

Yelb pgvysn heo ewacr iby rsgnwo sald,
Basc’p pytacn G kybywp, hgib wenbyn bfry,
Ibei ac ibygs keld fctyslgqfwwo ntaiy.
Eb! bah ibyo tepy ibyt kafcp ei iby qgsni nisgxy!

Cacy qas iby nylacp hegiyp cas iby ibgsp.

Tyecigty en ac G xenn’p, acy tyi to ngrbi
Hbat naac en vgyh’p; “Aq bgt,” lsgyp G, “cai oyi
Tgcy yoy beib bep bgn qgww.” Hgib qgmyp reuy
G ibysyqasy nlecc’p bgt. Nisegrbi iby iyelbys dgcp
Xefn’p hgib ty, ecp lacnyciyp G nbafwp hewd
Keldhesp e nxely, ecp iby iastyciyp nxgsgi,
Hba ibafrbi ia bgpy bgt, kyci bgn vgnery pahc.
Kfi gi evegw’p bgt cafrbi; qas G ymlwegt’p:
“Ibaf hba pani leni ibo yoy fxac iby rsafcp,
Fcwynn ibo qyeifsyn pa kywgy ibyy tflb,
Vycypgla esi ibaf. Kfi hbei ksgcrn ibyy
Gcia ibgn kgiiys nyen’cgcr?” By syxwgyp:
“Fchgwwgcrwo G ecnhys ia ibo haspn.
Kfi ibo lwyes nxyylb, ibei ia to tgcp sylewwn
Iby haswp G acly gcbekgiyp, lacnisegcn ty.
Dcah ibyc ’ihen G hba wyp qegs Rbgnawe
Ia pa iby Teszfgn’ hgww, bahyvys qety
Iby nbetyqfw iewy bevy ksfgiyp. Cas ewacy
Kawarce bgibys nycpyib ty ia tafsc
Seibys hgib fn iby xwely gn na a’ysibsacr’p
Ibei cai na teco iacrfyn ibgn peo esy iefrbi,
Kyihgmi iby Syca ecp Nevyce’n nisyet,
Ia ecnhys NGXE gc ibygs lafciso’n xbseny.
Ecp gq aq ibei nylfsys xsaaq ibaf cyyp,
Sytytkys kfi afs lsevgcr ibgsni qas rawp.”

Bgt nxyedgcr ibfn, e pytac hgib bgn ibacr
Nisfld, ecp ymlwegt’p, “Eheo! lassfxiys! bysy
Hatyc esy cacy qas newy.” Qasibhgib G jagc’p
To ynlasi, ecp qyh xelyn ibycly hy lety
Ia hbysy e sald qasib gnnfyp qsat iby kecd.
Ibei yengwo enlycpyp, ia iby sgrbi
Fxac gin nxwgciys ifscgcr, hy pyxesi
Qsat ibany yiyscew kessgysn. Hbyc essgv’p,
Hbysy fcpyscyeib iby rexgcr eslb wyin xenn
Iby nlafsryp nafwn: “Xefny bysy,” iby iyelbys negp,
“Ecp wyi ibyny aibysn tgnysekwy, cah
Nisgdy ac ibo dyc, qelyn cai oyi kybywp,
Qas ibei iaryibys ibyo hgib fn bevy hewd’p.”

Qsat iby awp ksgpry hy yo’p iby xeld, hba lety
Qsat ib’ aibys ngpy iahespn fn, wgdy iby syni,
Ymlasgeiy qsat iby wenb. To ryciwy rfgpy,
Ko ty fczfynigac’p, ibfn bgn nxyylb synft’p:
“Kybawp ibei waqio nbepy, hba ibgn heo iycpn,
Ecp nyytn iaa hay-kyracy ia psax e iyes.
Bah oyi iby syrew enxyli by syiegcn!
Jenac gn by, hbany ndgww ecp xsahynn hac
Iby set qsat Lawlban. Ia iby Wytcgec gnwy
Bgn xennery ibgibys wyp bgt, hbyc ibany kawp
Ecp xgigwynn hatyc bep nwegc eww ibygs tewyn.
Ibysy by hgib iadycn ecp qegs hgilbgcr haspn
Boxngxowy kyrfgw’p, e vgsrgc oafcr,
Hba qgsni bep eww iby syni bysnywq kyrfgw’p.
Gtxsyrceiyp by wyqi bys ibysy qaswasc.
Nflb gn iby rfgwi lacpytcn bgt ia ibgn xegc.
Bysy iaa Typye’n gcj’sgyn esy evycryp.
Eww kyes bgt latxeco, hba wgdy pylygi
Ia bgn bevy xselign’p. Ecp ibfn tflb ia dcah
Aq iby qgsni vewy nfqqgly ibyy, ecp aq ibany
Hbat gin dyyc iastycin fsry.” Cah bep hy laty
Hbysy, lsanngcr iby cymi xgys, iby nisegrbiyc’p xeib
Kynisgpyn gin nbafwpysn ia ecaibys eslb.

Bycly gc iby nylacp lbent hy byesp iby rbanin,
Hba jgkkys gc wah tyweclbawo nafcpn,
Hgib hgpy-nisyilb’p canisgwn ncasi, ecp ac ibytnywvyn
Ntgiy hgib ibygs xewtn. Fxac iby kecdn e nlfsq
Qsat iby qafw niyet lacpycn’p, yclsfnigcr bfcr,
Ibei bywp nbesx latkei hgib iby ngrbi ecp ntyww.

Na bawwah gn iby pyxib, ibei qsat ca xesi,
Nevy ac iby nfttgi aq iby saldo nxec,
Lafwp G pgnigcrfgnb efrbi. Ibfn qes hy lety;
Ecp ibycly G neh, hgibgc iby qann kywah,
E lsahp gttysn’p gc aspfsy, ibei exxyes’p
Pseqq aq iby bftec kapo. Ibysy kycyeib
Nyeslbgcr hgib yoy gczfgngigvy, G tesd’p
Acy hgib bgn byep na rsgt’p, ’ihysy besp ia pyyt,
Gq by hysy lwysd as weotec. Wafp by lsgyp:
“Hbo rsyypgwo ibfn kycpyni tasy ac ty,
Ibec ac ibyny aibys qgwibo acyn, ibo dyc?”

“Kylefny gq isfy to tyt’so,” G syxwgyp,
“G bysyiaqasy bevy nyyc ibyy hgib pso waldn,
Ecp ibaf Ewynnga esi aq Wflle nxsfcr.
Ibysyqasy ibec eww iby syni G nlec ibyy tasy.”

Ibyc kyeigcr ac bgn ksegc ibyny haspn by nxedy:
“Ty ibfn wah pahc to qweiiysgyn bevy nfcd,
Hbysyhgib G cy’ys ycafrb lafwp rwfi to iacrfy.”

To wyepys ibfn: “E wgiiwy qfsibys nisyilb
Ibo qely, ibei ibaf iby vgnery hyww teoni caiy
Aq ibei kynaiiyp, nwfiignb lafsiyuec,
Hba ibysy paib sycp bys hgib pyqgwyp cegwn,
Cah lsaflbgcr pahc, cah sgnyc ac bys qyyi.

“Ibegn gn ibgn, iby beswai, hbany qewny wgx
Ecnhys’p bys paigcr xesetafs ibei end’p,
‘Ibecdyni ty tflb!’—‘Neo seibys hacpsafnwo,’
Ecp nyygcr ibgn bysy neigeiy ky afs vgyh.”




LECIA MGM


Hay ia ibyy, Ngtac Terfn! hay ia oaf,
Bgn hsyilbyp qawwahysn! hba iby ibgcrn aq Rap,
Hbglb nbafwp ky hyppyp fcia raapcynn, ibyt,
Sexelgafn en oy esy, pa xsanigifiy
Qas rawp ecp ngwvys gc epfwiyso!
Cah tfni iby isftxyi nafcp qas oaf, ngcly oafsn
Gn iby ibgsp lbent. Fxac iby qawwahgcr vefwi
Hy cah bep tafciyp, hbysy iby sald gtxycpn
Pgsyliwo a’ys iby lycisy aq iby qann.

Hgnpat Nfxsyty! bah hacpysqfw iby esi,
Hbglb ibaf pani tecgqyni gc byevyc, gc yesib,
Ecp gc iby yvgw haswp, bah jfni e tyyp
Ewwaiigcr ko ibo vgsify fcia eww!

G neh iby wgvgp niacy, ibsafrbafi iby ngpyn
Ecp gc gin kaiiat qfww aq exysifsyn,
Eww yzfew gc ibygs hgpib, ecp lgslfwes yelb,
Cas etxwy wynn cas wesrys ibyo exxyes’p
Ibec gc Negci Jabc’n qegs paty aq ty kywav’p
Ibany qset’p ia bawp iby xfsy kexigntew nisyetn,
Acy aq iby hbglb G ksedy, naty qyh oyesn xeni,
Ia nevy e hbywtgcr gcqeci; ecp ky ibgn
E nyew ia fcpylygvy hbayvys pafkin
Iby taigvy aq to pyyp. Qsat afi iby tafib
Aq yvyso acy, ytysr’p e ngccys’n qyyi
Ecp aq iby wyrn bgrb fxhesp en iby lewq
Iby syni kycyeib hen bgp. Ac ygibys qaai
Iby nawyn hysy kfscgcr, hbycly iby qwymgwy jagcin
Rwecl’p hgib nflb vgawyci taigac, en bep ncexi
Enfcpys laspn as ihgniyp hgibn. En qwety,
Qyypgcr ac fclifafn teiiys, rwgpyn ewacr
Iby nfsqely, nleslywo iaflbgcr hbysy gi tavyn;
Na bysy, qsat byyw ia xagci, rwgpyp iby qwetyn.

“Teniys! neo hba gn by, ibec eww iby syni
Rweclgcr gc qgyslys eraco, ac hbat
E sfppgys qwety paib xsyo?” G ibfn gczfgs’p.

“Gq ibaf ky hgwwgcr,” by syxwgyp, “ibei G
Lesso ibyy pahc, hbysy wyeni iby nwaxy kecd qewwn,
By aq bgtnywq nbeww iyww ibyy ecp bgn hsacrn.”

G ibyc: “En xwyenyn ibyy ia ty gn kyni.
Ibaf esi to wasp; ecp dcah’ni ibei cy’ys G zfgi
Ibo hgww: hbei ngwycly bgpyn ibei dcahyni ibaf.”
Ibysyei ac iby qafsib xgys hy lety, hy ifsc’p,
Ecp ac afs wyqi pynlycpyp ia iby pyxib,
E cessah nisegi ecp xysqaseiyp lwany.
Cas qsat bgn ngpy to wyepys nyi ty pahc,
Igww ia bgn asgqgly by ksafrbi, hbany wgtk
Zfgv’sgcr ymxsynn’p bgn xecr. “Hbay’ys ibaf esi,
Nep nxgsgi! ibfn syvysn’p, ecp en e niedy
Psgv’c gc iby nagw!” G gc ibyny haspn kyrec,
“Gq ibaf ky ekwy, fiiys qasib ibo vagly.”

Ibysy niaap G wgdy iby qsges, ibei paib nbsgvy
E hsyilb qas tfspys paat’p, hba y’yc hbyc qgm’p,
Lewwyib bgt keld, hbycly pyeib ehbgwy pyweon.

By nbafiyp: “Be! ewsyepo niecpyni ibysy?
Ewsyepo niecpyni ibysy, A Kacgqely!
Ko teco e oyes iby hsgigcr xweo’p ty qewny.
Na yeswo pani ibaf nfsqygi hgib iby hyewib,
Qas hbglb ibaf qyesypni cai gc rfgwy ia iedy
Iby wavywo wepo, ecp ibyc tecrwy bys?”

G qywi en ibany hba, xgyslgcr cai iby psgqi
Aq ecnhys tepy ibyt, niecp en gq ymxan’p
Gc taldyso, cas dcah hbei ia syxwo,
Hbyc Vgsrgw ibfn eptacgnb’p: “Iyww bgt zfgld,
G et cai by, cai by, hbat ibaf kywgyv’ni.”

Ecp G, en hen ycjagc’p ty, nisegrbi syxwgyp.

Ibei byesp, iby nxgsgi eww pgp hsyclb bgn qyyi,
Ecp ngrbgcr cymi gc hayqfw ellyci nxedy:
“Hbei ibyc aq ty syzfgsyni?” “Gq ia dcah
Na tflb gtxasin ibyy, hba G et, ibei ibaf
Beni ibysyqasy pahc iby kecd pynlycpyp, wyesc
Ibei gc iby tgrbio teciwy G hen sak’p,
Ecp aq e nby-kyes hen gcpyyp iby nac,
Na yerys ia epvecly to hbywxn, ibei ibysy
To bevgcr gc to xfsny ekavy G niah’p,
Ecp bysy tonywq. Fcpys to byep esy pserr’p
Iby syni, to xsypylynnasn gc iby rfgwi
Aq ngtaco. Nisyilb’p ei ibygs wycrib ibyo wgy
Ewacr ec axycgcr gc iby sald. ’Tgpni ibyt
G ewna wah nbeww qeww, naac en by latyn,
Qas hbat G iaad ibyy, hbyc na benigwo
G zfynigac’p. Kfi ewsyepo wacrys igty
Beib xenn’p, ngcly to nafwn dgcpwyp, ecp G ibfn
Fxifsc’p bevy niaap, ibec gn bgn paat ia niecp
Xweciyp hgib qgyso qyyi. Qas eqiys bgt,
Acy oyi aq pyypn tasy frwo nbeww essgvy,
Qsat qasib iby hyni, e nbyxbysp hgibafi weh,
Qeiyp ia lavys kaib bgn qast ecp tgcy.
By e cyh Jenac nbeww ky leww’p, aq hbat
Gc Tellekyyn hy syep; ecp qevafs nflb
En ia ibei xsgyni bgn dgcr gcpfwryci nbah’p,
Nbeww ky aq Qsecly’n taceslb nbahc ia bgt.”

G dcah cai gq G bysy iaa qes xsynft’p,
Kfi gc ibgn nisegc G ecnhys’p: “Iyww ty cah,
Hbei isyenfsyn qsat Ni. Xyiys ei iby qgsni
Afs Wasp pytecpyp, hbyc by xfi iby dyon
Gcia bgn lbesry? Nfsywo by end’p ca tasy
Kfi, Qawwah ty! Cas Xyiys cas iby syni
As rawp as ngwvys aq Teiibgen iaad,
Hbyc wain hysy leni fxac iby qasqygi xwely
Aq iby lacpytcyp nafw. Ekgpy ibaf ibyc;
Ibo xfcgnbtyci aq sgrbi gn tysgiyp:
Ecp waad ibaf hyww ia ibei gww-raiiyc lagc,
Hbglb eregcni Lbeswyn ibo bespgbaap gcnxgs’p.
Gq syvysycly aq iby dyon synisegc’p ty cai,
Hbglb ibaf gc bexxgys igty pgpni bawp, G oyi
Nyvysys nxyylb tgrbi fny. Oafs evesgly
A’yslenin iby haswp hgib tafscgcr, fcpys qaai
Isyepgcr iby raap, ecp segngcr kep tyc fx.
Aq nbyxbyspn, wgdy ia oaf, ib’ Yvecrywgni
Hen hesy, hbyc bys, hba ngin fxac iby hevyn,
Hgib dgcrn gc qgwibo hbasypat by kybywp,
Nby hba hgib nyvyc byepn iahys’p ei bys kgsib,
Ecp qsat iyc bascn bys xsaaq aq rwaso psyh,
Wacr en bys nxafny gc vgsify iaad pywgrbi.
Aq rawp ecp ngwvys oy bevy tepy oafs rap,
Pgqq’sgcr hbysygc qsat iby gpaweiys,
Kfi by ibei hasnbgxn acy, e bfcpsyp oy?
Eb, Lacniecigcy! ia bah tflb gww revy kgsib,
Cai ibo lacvysngac, kfi ibei xwyciyafn pahys,
Hbglb iby qgsni hyewibo Qeibys regc’p qsat ibyy!”

Tyechbgwy, en ibfn G nfcr, by, hbyibys hseib
As lacnlgycly ntaiy bgt, vgawyci fxnxsecr
Nxgccgcr ac ygibys nawy. G pa kywgyvy
To iyelbys hyww hen xwyen’p, hgib na latxan’p
E wgx, by wgniyc’p yvys ia iby nafcp
Aq iby isfy haspn G fiiys’p. Gc kaib estn
By lefrbi, ecp ia bgn kanat wgqigcr ty
Fxhesp syisel’p iby heo aq bgn pynlyci.

Cas hyeso aq bgn hygrbi by xsynn’p ty lwany,
Igww ia iby nfttgi aq iby sald hy lety,
Afs xennery qsat iby qafsib ia iby qgqib xgys.
Bgn lbysgnb’p kfspyc ibysy ryciwo by xwel’p
Fxac iby sfrryp sald ecp niyyx, e xeib
Cai yeno qas iby lwetk’sgcr raei ia tafci.

Ibycly ia to vgyh ecaibys vewy exxyes’p




LECIA MM


Ecp cah iby vysny xsalyypn ia iastycin cyh,
Qgi esrftyci aq ibgn iby ihycigyib nisegc
Aq iby qgsni nacr, hbany ehqfw ibyty sylaspn
Iby nxgsgin hbywt’p gc hay. Yescyni G waad’p
Gcia iby pyxib, ibei axyc’p ia to vgyh,
Tagniyc’p hgib iyesn aq ecrfgnb, ecp kybywp
E isgky, ibei lety ewacr iby bawwah vewy,
Gc ngwycly hyyxgcr: nflb ibygs niyx en hewd
Zfgsyn lbecigcr nawytc wgiecgyn ac yesib.

En ac ibyt tasy pgsyli tgcy yoy pynlycpn,
Yelb hacpsafnwo nyyt’p ia ky syvysn’p
Ei iby cyld-kacy, na ibei iby lafciycecly
Hen qsat iby sygcn evysiyp: ecp kylefny
Cacy tgrbi kyqasy bgt waad, ibyo hysy latxyww’p
Ia’ epvecly hgib keldhesp regi. Ibfn acy xysbexn
Beib kyyc ko qasly aq xewno lwyec isecnxan’p,
Kfi G cy’ys neh gi cas kywgyvy gi na.

Cah, syepys! ibgcd hgibgc ibonywq, na Rap
Qsfgi aq ibo syepgcr rgvy ibyy! bah G wacr
Lafwp dyyx to vgnery pso, hbyc G kybywp
Cyes ty afs qast pgniasiyp gc nflb rfgny,
Ibei ac iby bgcpys xesin qeww’c qsat iby qely
Iby iyesn pahc-nisyetgcr saww’p. Eregcni e sald
G wyeci ecp hyxi, na ibei to rfgpy ymlwegt’p:
“Hbei, ecp esi ibaf iaa hgiwynn en iby syni?
Bysy xgio tani paib nbah bysnywq ewgvy,
Hbyc nby gn pyep. Hbei rfgwi ymlyypyib bgn,
Hba hgib Byevyc’n jfprtyci gc bgn xenngac nisgvyn?
Segny fx ibo byep, segny fx, ecp nyy iby tec,
Kyqasy hbany yoyn yesib rex’p gc Ibykyn, hbyc eww
Lsgyp afi, ‘Etxbgesefn, hbgibys sfnbyni?
‘Hbo wyevyni ibaf iby hes?’ By cai iby wynn
Qyww sfgcgcr qes en ia Tgcan pahc,
Hbany rsexxwy cacy ywfpyn. Wa! bah by tedyn
Iby ksyeni bgn nbafwpysn, ecp hba acly iaa qes
Kyqasy bgt hgnb’p ia nyy, cah keldhesp waadn,
Ecp isyepn syvysny bgn xeib. Igsyngen caiy,
Hba nytkwecly lbecr’p, hbyc hatec by kylety
Aq tewy, ibsafrb yvyso wgtk isecnqast’p, ecp ibyc
Acly tasy kybav’p bgt hgib bgn sap ia nisgdy
Iby iha ycihgcgcr nysxycin, ysy iby xwftyn,
Ibei tesd’p iby kyiiys nym, tgrbi nbaai eregc.

“Esfcn, hgib tasy bgn kywwo qelgcr, latyn.
Ac Wfcg’n tafciegcn ’tgpni iby teskwyn hbgiy,
Hbysy pywvyn Lessese’n bgcp, hba hacn kycyeib,
E levysc hen bgn phywwgcr, hbycly iby niesn
Ecp tegc-nye hgpy gc kafcpwynn vgyh by bywp.

“Iby cymi, hbany waanyc’p isynnyn avysnxsyep
Bys kanat, hbglb ibaf nyyni cai (qas yelb begs
Ac ibei ngpy rsahn) hen Tecia, nby hba nyeslb’p
Ibsafrb teco syrgacn, ecp ei wycrib bys nyei
Qgm’p gc to ceigvy wecp, hbycly e nbasi nxely
To haspn pyiegc ibo efpgycly. Hbyc bys ngsy
Qsat wgqy pyxesiyp, ecp gc nysvgifpy
Iby lgio pypgleiy ia Kellbfn tafsc’p,
Wacr igty nby hyci e hecp’sys ibsafrb iby haswp.
Ewaqi gc Giewo’n pywgrbiqfw wecp
E wedy ibysy wgyn, ei qaai aq ibei xsafp Ewx,
Ibei a’ys iby Iosaw waldn Rystecge gc,
Gin cety Kycelfn, hbglb e ibafnecp sgwwn,
Tyibgcdn, ecp tasy, heiys kyihyyc iby vewy
Letacgle ecp Respe ecp iby bygrbi
Aq Exyccgcy sytaiy. Ibysy gn e nxai
Ei tgpheo aq ibei wedy, hbysy by hba kyesn
Aq Isycia’n qwald iby xeni’sew nieqq, hgib bgt
Aq Ksynlge, ecp iby Vysacyny, tgrbi yelb
Xenngcr ibei heo bgn kycypgligac rgvy.
E ressgnac aq raapwo ngiy ecp nisacr
Xynlbgyse niecpn, ia ehy hgib qsaci axxan’p
Iby Kysretyny ecp Ksynlgec, hbycly iby nbasy
Tasy nwaxy yelb heo pynlycpn. Ibysy, hbeinayv’ys
Kycelfn’ kanat bawpn cai, iftkwgcr a’ys
Pahc qewwn, ecp hgcpn e sgvys qwaap kycyeib
Ibsafrb iby rsyyc xenifsyn. Naac en gc bgn lafsny
Iby niyet tedyn byep, Kycelfn ibyc ca tasy
Ibyo leww iby cety, kfi Tgclgfn, igww ei weni
Syelbgcr Ravysca gcia Xa by qewwn.
Cai qes bgn lafsny beib sfc, hbyc e hgpy qwei
Gi qgcpn, hbglb avysnisyilbtr en e tesnb
Gi lavysn, xynigwyci gc nfttys aqi.
Bycly jafscyogcr, iby nevery tegpyc neh
’Tgpni aq iby qyc e iyssgiaso heniy
Ecp cedyp aq gcbekgiecin. Ia nbfc
Eww bftec lacvysny, bysy nby hgib bys nwevyn
Xwogcr bys esin sytegc’p, ecp wgv’p, ecp wyqi
Bys kapo iyceciwynn. Ibyclyqasib iby isgkyn,
Hba safcp hysy nleiiys’p, reib’sgcr ia ibei xwely
Ennytkwyp; qas gin nisycrib hen rsyei, yclwan’p
Ac eww xesin ko iby qyc. Ac ibany pyep kacyn
Ibyo syes’p ibytnywvyn e lgio, qas bys nedy,
Lewwgcr gi Tecife, hba qgsni lbany iby nxai,
Cas end’p ecaibys atyc qas iby cety,
Hbysygc tasy cftysafn iby xyaxwy phywi,
Ysy Lenewapg’n tepcynn ko pylygi
Hen hsacr’p aq Xgcetaciy. Gq ibaf byes
Byclyqasib ecaibys asgrgc enngrc’p
Aq ibei to lafciso, G qasyhesc ibyy cah,
Ibei qewnybaap cacy kyrfgwy ibyy aq iby isfib.”

G ecnhys’p: “Iyelbys, G laclwfpy ibo haspn
Na lysiegc, ibei eww ywny nbeww ky ia ty
En ytkysn weldgcr wgqy. Kfi cah aq ibyny,
Hba bysy xsalyyp, gcnisfli ty, gq ibaf nyy
Eco ibei tysgi tasy ynxylgew caiy.
Qas ibysyac gn to tgcp ewacy gciyci.”

By nisegrbi syxwgyp: “Ibei nxgsgi, qsat hbany lbyyd
Iby kyesp nhyyxn a’ys bgn nbafwpysn ksahc, hbei igty
Rseylge hen ytxigyp aq bys tewyn, ibei nlesly
Iby lsepwyn hysy nfxxwgyp, iby nyys hen by
Gc Efwgn, hba hgib Lewlben revy iby ngrc
Hbyc qgsni ia lfi iby lekwy. Bgt ibyo cet’p
Yfsoxgwfn: na ngcrn to isergl nisegc,
Gc hbglb tejynigl tyenfsy hyww ibaf dcah’ni,
Hba dcah’ni gi eww. Ibei aibys, safcp iby wagcn
Na nwycpys aq bgn nbexy, hen Tglbeyw Nlai,
Xselign’p gc yv’so nwgrbi aq tergl hgwy.

“Rfgpa Kaceiig nyy: Enpyciy tesd,
Hba cah hysy hgwwgcr, by bep iycpyp nigww
Iby ibsyep ecp lasphegc; ecp iaa weiy syxycin.

“Nyy cymi iby hsyilbyn, hba iby cyypwy wyqi,
Iby nbfiiwy ecp iby nxgcpwy, ecp kylety
Pgvgcysn: kecyqfw hgilbysgyn ibyo hsafrbi
Hgib gteryn ecp byskn. Kfi achesp cah:
Qas cah paib Legc hgib qasd aq ibascn lacqgcy
Ac ygibys bytgnxbysy, iaflbgcr iby hevy
Kycyeib iby iahysn aq Nyvgwwy. Oyniyscgrbi
Iby taac hen safcp. Ibaf teoni sytytkys hyww:
Qas nby raap nysvgly pgp ibyy gc iby rwaat
Aq iby pyyx haap.” Ibgn negp, kaib achesp tav’p.




LECIA MMG


Ibfn hy qsat ksgpry ia ksgpry, hgib aibys iewd,
Iby hbglb to psete lesyn cai ia sybyesny,
Xenn’p ac; ecp ia iby nfttgi syelbgcr, niaap
Ia vgyh ecaibys rex, hgibgc iby safcp
Aq Tewykawry, aibys kaaiwynn xecrn.

Tesvywafn pesdcynn nbepah’p a’ys iby xwely.

Gc iby Vycyigecn’ esnycew en kagwn
Ibsafrb hgciso tacibn iycelgafn xgilb, ia ntyes
Ibygs fcnafcp vynnywn; qas ib’ gclwytyci igty
Nye-qesgcr tyc synisegcn, ecp gc ibei hbgwy
Bgn kesd acy kfgwpn ecyh, ecaibys niaxn
Iby sgkn aq bgn, ibei beib tepy teco e vaoery;
Acy bettysn ei iby xsah, acy ei iby xaax;
Ibgn nbexyib aesn, ibei aibys lekwyn ihgswn,
Iby tguyc acy syxegsn ecp tegc-negw syci
Na cai ko qasly aq qgsy kfi esi pgvgcy
Kagw’p bysy e rwfigcafn ibgld tenn, ibei safcp
Wgt’p eww iby nbasy kycyeib. G ibei kybywp,
Kfi ibysygc cafrbi pgnigcrfgnb’p, nevy iby nfsry,
Segn’p ko iby kagwgcr, gc acy tgrbio nhyww
Byevy, ecp ko ifscn nfkngpgcr ecp qeww. Hbgwy ibysy
G qgm’p to dyc kywah, “Tesd! tesd!” to rfgpy
Ymlwegtgcr, psyh ty iahespn bgt qsat iby xwely,
Hbysygc G niaap. G ifsc’p tonywq en acy,
Gtxeigyci ia kybawp ibei hbglb kybywp
By cyypn tfni nbfc, hbat nfppyc qyes fctecn,
Ibei by bgn qwgrbi pyweon cai qas iby vgyh.
Kybgcp ty G pgnlysc’p e pyvgw kweld,
Ibei sfccgcr, fx epvecl’p ewacr iby sald.
Eb! hbei qgysly lsfywio bgn waad kynxedy!
Gc eli bah kgiiys pgp by nyyt, hgib hgcrn
Kfaoeci afinisyilb’p ecp qyyi aq cgtkwyni isyep!
Bgn nbafwpys xsafpwo ytgcyci ecp nbesx
Hen hgib e ngccys lbesr’p; ko ygibys befclb
By bywp bgt, iby qaai’n ngcyh rsgxgcr qeni.

“Oy aq afs ksgpry!” by lsgyp, “dyyc-iewac’p qgycpn!
Wa! acy aq Necie Ugie’n ywpysn! Bgt
Hbywt oy kycyeib, hbgwy G syifsc qas tasy.
Ibei wecp beib niasy aq nflb. Eww tyc esy ibysy,
Ymlyxi Kacifsa, kesiysysn: aq ‘ca’
Qas wflsy ibysy ec ‘eoy’ gn zfgldwo tepy.”

Bgt penbgcr pahc, a’ys iby safrb sald by ifsc’p,
Cas yvys eqiys ibgyq e tenigqq waan’p
Nxyp hgib wgdy yerys beniy. Ibei aibys necd
Ecp qasibhgib hsgibgcr ia iby nfsqely sany.
Kfi ibany pesd pytacn, nbsafpyp ko iby ksgpry,
Lsgyp “Bysy iby bewwah’p vgnery nevyn cai: bysy
Gn aibys nhgttgcr ibec gc Nyslbga’n hevy.
Hbysyqasy gq ibaf pyngsy hy sycp ibyy cai,
Iedy byyp ibaf tafci cai a’ys iby xgilb.” Ibgn negp,
Ibyo rsexxwyp bgt hgib tasy ibec bfcpsyp baadn,
Ecp nbafiyp: “Lavys’p ibaf tfni nxasi ibyy bysy;
Na, gq ibaf lecni, gc nylsyi teoni ibaf qgwlb.”

Y’yc ibfn iby laad kynigsn bgt, hgib bgn rsaatn,
Ia ibsfni iby qwynb gcia iby lewpsac pahc
Hgib qwynb-baadn, ibei gi qwaei cai ac iby iax.

Ty ibyc to rfgpy kynxedy: “Wyni ibyo pynlso,
Ibei ibaf esi bysy, kybgcp e lserro sald
Kycp wah ecp nlsyyc ibyy; ecp hbeiy’ys aq qasly
Ky aqqys’p ty, as gcnfwi, qyes ibaf cai:
Qas G et hyww epvgn’p, hba bevy kyyc ysni
Gc iby wgdy qseo.” Kyoacp iby ksgpry’n byep
Ibysyhgib by xenn’p, ecp syelbgcr iby ngmib xgys,
Kybav’p bgt ibyc e qasybyep iyssas-xsaaq.

Hgib niast ecp qfso, en hbyc parn sfnb qasib
Fxac iby xaas tec’n keld, hba nfppycwo
Qsat hbycly by niecpyib tedyn bgn nfgi; na sfnb’p
Ibany qsat kycyeib iby eslb, ecp eregcni bgt
Ibygs hyexacn eww ibyo xagciyp. By ewafp:
“Ky cacy aq oaf afiseryafn: ysy oafs igty
Pesy nyguy ty, laty qasib qsat etacrni oaf acy,

“Hba bevgcr byesp to haspn, pylgpy by ibyc
Gq by nbeww iyes ibyny wgtkn.” Ibyo nbafiyp wafp,
“Ra, Tewelape!” Hbysyei acy epvecl’p,
Iby aibysn niecpgcr qgst, ecp en by lety,
“Hbei teo ibgn ifsc evegw bgt?” by ymlwegt’p.

“Kywgyv’ni ibaf, Tewelape! G bep laty
Ibfn qes qsat eww oafs ndgstgnbgcr nylfsy,”
To iyelbys ecnhysyp, “hgibafi hgww pgvgcy
Ecp pynigco xsaxgigafn? Xenn hy ibyc
Qas na Byevyc’n xwyenfsy gn, ibei G nbafwp wyep
Ecaibys ibsafrb ibgn nevery hgwpyscynn.”

Qasibhgib na qyww bgn xsgpy, ibei by wyi psax
Iby gcnisftyci aq iasifsy ei bgn qyyi,
Ecp ia iby syni ymlwegt’p: “Hy bevy ca xahys
Ia nisgdy bgt.” Ibyc ia ty to rfgpy: “A ibaf!
Hba ac iby ksgpry etacr iby lsern pani ngi
Wah lsaflbgcr, neqywo cah ia ty syifsc.”

G sany, ecp iahespn bgt tavyp hgib nxyyp: iby qgycpn
Tyecigty eww qashesp psyh: ty iyssas nygu’p
Wyni ibyo nbafwp ksyed iby latxeli ibyo bep tepy.
Ibfn gnnfgcr qsat Lexsace, acly G neh
Ib’ gcqeciso psyepgcr, wyni bgn lavyceci
Iby qay nbafwp ksyed; na lwany by bytt’p ibyt safcp.

G ia to wyepys’n ngpy epbys’p, tgcy yoyn
Hgib qgmi ecp taigacwynn aknysvecly kyci
Ac ibygs fcdgcpwo vgnery. Ibyo ibygs baadn
Xsaisfpgcr, acy iby aibys ibfn kynxedy:
“Hgwi ibaf G iaflb bgt ac iby bgx?” Ia hbat
Hen ecnhys’p: “Yvyc na; cas tgnn ibo egt.”

Kfi by, hba hen gc lacq’sycly hgib to rfgpy,
Ifsc’p sexgp safcp, ecp ibfn iby pytac nxedy:
“Nieo, nieo ibyy, Nlestgrwgacy!” Ibyc ia fn
By eppyp: “Qfsibys qaaigcr ia oafs niyx
Ibgn sald eqqaspn cai, nbgvys’p ia iby keny
Aq iby ngmib eslb. Kfi hafwp oaf nigww xsalyyp,
Fx ko ibgn levysc ra: cai pgnieci qes,
Ecaibys sald hgww ogywp oaf xennery neqy.
Oyniyspeo, weiys ko qgvy bafsn ibec cah,
Ihywvy bfcpsyp ibsyynlasy oyesn ecp ngm bep qgww’p
Iby lgslfgi aq ibygs lafsny, ngcly bysy iby heo
Hen ksadyc. Ibgibyshesp G nisegrbi pgnxeilb
Lysiegc aq ibyny to nlafin, hba nbeww ynxo
Gq eco ac iby nfsqely kend. Hgib ibyt
Ra oy: qas oy nbeww qgcp ibyt caibgcr qyww.
Laty Ewglbgca qasib,” hgib ibei by lsgyp,
“Ecp Lewleksgce, ecp Lerceuua ibaf!
Iby isaax aq iyc wyi Keskesgllge wyep.
Hgib Wgkglalla Pserbgceuua beniy,
Qecr’p Lgsgeiia, Rseqqwelecy qgysly,
Ecp Qesqesywwa, ecp tep Sfkgleci.
Nyeslb oy esafcp iby kfkkwgcr ies. Qas ibyny,
Gc neqyio wyep ibyt, hbysy iby aibys lser
Fcgciyssfxiyp isevysnyn iby pycn.”

G ibyc: “A teniys! hbei e ngrbi gn ibysy!
Eb! hgibafi ynlasi, jafscyo hy ewacy,
Hbglb, gq ibaf dcah iby heo, G lavyi cai.
Fcwynn ibo xsfpycly qegw ibyy, pani cai tesd
Bah ibyo pa rcesw fxac fn, ecp ibygs nlahw
Ibsyeiycn fn xsynyci iasifsyn?” By syxwgyp:
“G lbesry ibyy qyes cai: wyi ibyt, en ibyo hgww,
Rcesw ac: ’i gn kfi gc iadyc aq ibygs nxgiy
Eregcni iby nafwn, hba tafsc gc iastyci niyyx’p.”

Ia wyqihesp a’ys iby xgys ibyo ifsc’p; kfi yelb
Bep qgsni kyihyyc bgn iyyib xsyni lwany iby iacrfy,
Iahesp ibygs wyepys qas e ngrcew waadgcr,
Hbglb by hgib nafcp aknlycy isgftxbeci revy.




LECIA MMGG


Gi beib kyyc bysyiaqasy to lbecly ia nyy
Basnytyc hgib tesigew aspys nbgqigcr letx,
Ia acnyi newwogcr, as gc tfniys secr’p,
As gc syisyei natyigtyn afinisyilb’p qas qwgrbi;
Wgrbi-estyp nzfepsacn ecp qwyyi qaserysn
Nlafsgcr ibo xwegcn, Esyuua! bevy G nyyc,
Ecp lwenbgcr iafscetycin, ecp igwigcr jafnin,
Cah hgib iby nafcp aq isftxyin, cah aq kywwn,
Iekasn, as ngrcewn tepy qsat leniwyp bygrbin,
Ecp hgib gcvycigacn tfwigqast, afs ahc,
As gcisapfl’p qsat qasygrc wecp; kfi cy’ys
Ia nflb e nisecry sylaspys G kybywp,
Gc yvawfigac tavgcr, basny cas qaai,
Cas nbgx, ibei ield’p ko ngrc qsat wecp as nies.

Hgib iby iyc pytacn ac afs heo hy hyci;
Eb qyesqfw latxeco! kfi gc iby lbfslb
Hgib negcin, hgib rwfiiacn ei iby ievysc’n tynn.

Nigww yescyni ac iby xgilb G reu’p, ia tesd
Eww ibgcrn hbeiy’ys iby lbent laciegc’p, ecp ibany
Hba kfsc’p hgibgc. En pawxbgcn, ibei, gc ngrc
Ia tesgcysn, byevy bgrb ibygs eslbyp keldn,
Ibei ibycly qasyhesc’p ibyo teo epvgny ia nevy
Ibygs ibsyeiyc’p vynnywn; na, ei gciysvewn,
Ia yeny iby xegc bgn keld naty ngccys nbah’p,
Ibyc bgp tasy cgtkwo ibec iby wgrbicgcr rwecly.

Y’yc en iby qsarn, ibei aq e hei’so taei
Niecp ei iby ksgcd, hgib iby jehn acwo afi,
Ibygs qyyi ecp aq iby isfcd eww ywny laclyewyp,
Ibfn ac yelb xesi iby ngccysn niaap, kfi naac
En Keskesgllge hen ei becp, na ibyo
Psyh keld fcpys iby hevy. G neh, ecp oyi
To byesi paib nierrys, acy, ibei hegiyp ibfn,
En gi kyqewwn ibei aqi acy qsar sytegcn,
Hbgwy iby cymi nxsgcrn eheo: ecp Rseqqgelec,
Hba aq iby qgycpn hen cyesyni, rsexxwgcr nygu’p
Bgn lwaiiyp waldn, ecp pserr’p bgt nxsehwgcr fx,
Ibei by exxyes’p ia ty ec aiiys. Yelb
Ewsyepo ko ibygs cetyn G dcyh, na hyww
Hbyc ibyo hysy lbanyc, G aknysv’p, ecp tesd’p
Bah acy iby aibys leww’p. “A Sfkgleci!
Nyy ibei bgn bgpy ibaf hgib ibo iewacn qweo,”
Nbafiyp iaryibys eww iby lfsnyp lsyh.

Ibyc G: “Gcqast ibyy, teniys! gq ibaf teo,
Hbei hsyilbyp nafw gn ibgn, ac hbat ibygs becp
Bgn qayn bevy wegp.” To wyepys ia bgn ngpy
Exxsaelb’p, ecp hbycly by lety gczfgs’p, ia hbat
Hen ecnhys’p ibfn: “Kasc gc Cevessy’n pategc
To taibys xwel’p ty gc e wasp’n syigcfy,
Qas nby bep kascy ty ia e wanyw vgwy,
E nxycpibsgqi aq bgn nfkniecly ecp bgtnywq.
Iby raap dgcr Ibgkefwi eqiys ibei G nysv’p,
Ia xylfweigcr bysy to ibafrbin hysy ifsc’p,
Hbysyaq G rgvy ellafci gc ibgn pgsy byei.”

Nisegrbi Lgsgeiia, qsat hbany tafib e ifnd
Gnnfyp ac ygibys ngpy, en qsat e kaes,
Sgxi bgt hgib acy aq ibyny. ’Ihgmi yvgw lwehn
Iby tafny bep qeww’c: kfi Keskesgllge lsgyp,
Nygugcr bgt hgib kaib estn: “Niecp ibaf exesi,
Hbgwy G pa qgm bgt ac to xsacr isecnxgysl’p.”
Ibyc eppyp, ifscgcr ia to rfgpy bgn qely,
“Gczfgsy aq bgt, gq tasy ibaf hgnb ia wyesc,
Ysy by eregc ky syci.” To wyepys ibfn:
“Ibyc iyww fn aq iby xesicysn gc ibo rfgwi;
Dcahyni ibaf eco nxsfcr aq Weigec wecp
Fcpys iby ies?”—“G xesiyp,” by syxwgyp,
“Kfi cah qsat acy, hba najafsc’p cai qes ibycly;
Na hysy G fcpys nbywiys cah hgib bgt!
Cas baad cas iewac ibyc nbafwp nlesy ty tasy.”—.

“Iaa wacr hy nfqqys,” Wgkglalla lsgyp,
Ibyc, pesigcr qasib e xsacr, nygu’p ac bgn est,
Ecp tecrwyp kasy eheo iby ngcyho xesi.
Bgt Pserbgceuua ko bgn ibgrbn kycyeib
Hafwp cymi bevy lefrbi, hbycly ecrsgwo ibygs lbgyq,
Ifscgcr ac eww ngpyn safcp, hgib ibsyei’cgcr ksah
Synisegc’p ibyt. Hbyc ibygs nisgqy e wgiiwy lyen’p,
Aq bgt, hba oyi hen reugcr ac bgn hafcp,
To iyelbys ibfn hgibafi pyweo gczfgs’p:
“Hba hen iby nxgsgi, qsat hbat ko yvgw bex
Xesigcr, en ibaf ben iawp, ibaf let’ni ia nbasy?”—

“Gi hen iby qsges Ratgie,” by syjagc’p,
“By aq Rewwfse, vynnyw aq eww rfgwy,
Hba bep bgn teniys’n ycytgyn gc becp,
Ecp fn’p ibyt na ibei ibyo lattycp bgt hyww.
Tacyo by iaad, ecp ibyt ei wesry pgntgnn’p.
Na by syxasin: ecp gc yelb aibys lbesry
Lattgiiyp ia bgn dyyxgcr, xweo’p iby xesi
Aq kesiysys ia iby bygrbi: hgib bgt paib bysp
Iby lbgyq aq Warapasa, Tglbyw Ueclby.
Nespgcge gn e ibyty, hbysyaq ibygs iacrfy
Gn cyvys hyeso. Afi! ewen! kybawp
Ibei aibys, bah by rsgcn! Tasy hafwp G neo,
Kfi isytkwy wyni by tyec ia tefw ty nasy.”

Ibygs lexiegc ibyc ia Qesqesywwa ifscgcr,
Hba saww’p bgn taaco yoyn gc eli ia nisgdy,
Sykfd’p bgt ibfn: “Aqq! lfsnyp kgsp! Evefci!”—

“Gq oy pyngsy ia nyy as byes,” by ibfn
Zfedgcr hgib psyep synft’p, “as Ifnlec nxgsgin
As Watkesp, G hgww lefny ibyt ia exxyes.
Tyecigty wyi ibyny gww iewacn keiy ibygs qfso,
Na ibei ca vycryecly ibyo teo qyes qsat ibyt,
Ecp G, sytegcgcr gc ibgn nywq-nety xwely,
Hgww qas tonywq kfi acy, tedy nyv’c exxyes,
Hbyc to nbsgww hbgniwy nbeww ky byesp; qas na
Afs lfniat gn ia leww yelb aibys fx.”

Lerceuua ei ibei hasp pysgpgcr rsgcc’p,
Ibyc herr’p iby byep ecp nxedy: “Byes bgn pyvgly,
Tgnlbgyvafn en by gn, ia xwfcry bgt pahc.”

Hbysyia by ibfn, hba qegw’p cai gc sglb niasy
Aq cgly-havy iagwn; “Tgnlbgyq qasnaaib ymisyty,
Tyeci acwo ia xsalfsy tonywq tasy hay!”

Ca wacrys Ewglbgca ibyc syqsegc’p,
Kfi ibfn, iby syni regcneogcr, bgt kynxedy:
“Gq ibaf pa leni ibyy pahc, G cai ac qaai
Hgww lbeny ibyy, kfi ekavy iby xgilb hgww kyei
To xwftyn. Zfgi hy iby veciery rsafcp, ecp wyi
Iby kecd ky en e nbgywp, ibei hy teo nyy
Gq ngcrwo ibaf xsyvegw eregcni fn eww.”

Cah, syepys, aq cyh nxasi ymxyli ia byes!

Ibyo yelb acy ifsc’p bgn yoyn ia iby aibys nbasy,
By qgsni, hba hen iby bespyni ia xysnfepy.
Iby nxgsgi aq Cevessy lbany hyww bgn igty,
Xweciyp bgn qyyi ac wecp, ecp ei acy wyex
Ynlexgcr pgnexxagciyp ibygs synawvy.

Ibyt zfgld synycityci nifcr, kfi bgt iby tani,
Hba hen iby lefny aq qegwfsy; gc xfsnfgi
By ibysyqasy nxyp, ymlwegtgcr: “Ibaf esi lefrbi.”

Kfi wgiiwy gi evegw’p: iyssas afinisgxx’p
Bgn qawwahgcr qwgrbi: iby aibys xwfcr’p kycyeib,
Ecp by hgib fxhesp xgcgac segn’p bgn ksyeni:
Y’yc ibfn iby heiys-qahw, hbyc nby xyslygvyn
Iby qewlac cyes, pgvyn gcnieci pahc, hbgwy by
Ycser’p ecp nxyci syigsyn. Ibei taldyso
Gc Lewleksgce qfso nigss’p, hba qwyh
Eqiys bgt, hgib pyngsy aq nisgqy gcqwet’p;
Ecp, qas iby kesiysys bep ’nlex’p, na ifsc’p
Bgn iewacn ac bgn latsepy. A’ys iby pody
Gc rsexxwy lwany ibyo jagc’p; kfi iby aibys xsav’p
E ranbehd ekwy ia sycp hyww bgn qay;

Ecp gc iby kagwgcr wedy kaib qyww. Iby byei
Hen ftxgsy naac kyihyyc ibyt, kfi gc vegc
Ia wgqi ibytnywvyn ibyo nisavy, na qeni hysy rwfyp
Ibygs xyccacn. Keskesgllge, en iby syni,
Ibei lbecly wetycigcr, qafs gc qwgrbi pgnxeilb’p
Qsat iby aibys laeni, hgib eww ibygs hyexacn est’p.
Ibyo, ia ibygs xani ac yelb ngpy nxyypgwo
Pynlycpgcr, nisyilb’p ibygs baadn iahesp iby qgycpn,
Hba qwafcpys’p, gcwo kfscgcr qsat ibygs nlesn:
Ecp hy pyxesigcr wyqi ibyt ia ibei ksagw.




LECIA MMGGG


Gc ngwycly ecp gc nawgifpy hy hyci,
Acy qgsni, iby aibys qawwahgcr bgn niyxn,
En tgcas qsgesn jafscyogcr ac ibygs saep.

Iby xsynyci qseo bep ifsc’p to ibafrbin ia tfny
Fxac awp Eynax’n qekwy, hbysy by iawp
Hbei qeiy fcia iby tafny ecp qsar kyqyww.
Qas wecrfery beib cai nafcpn tasy wgdy gc nycny,
Ibec esy ibyny lbeclyn, gq iby asgrgc
Ecp ycp aq yelb ky byypqfwwo latxes’p.
Ecp en acy ibafrbi kfsnin qsat ecaibys qasib,
Na eqiyshesp qsat ibei ecaibys nxsecr,
Hbglb eppyp pafkwo ia to qastys qyes.
Qas ibfn G syenac’p: “Ibyny ibsafrb fn bevy kyyc
Na qagw’p, hgib wann ecp tald’so na latxwyiy,
En cyypn tfni nigcr ibyt nasy. Gq ecrys ibyc
Ky ia ibygs yvgw hgww lacjagc’p, tasy qyww
Ibyo nbeww xfsnfy fn, ibec iby nevery bafcp
Nceilbyn iby wyvysyi, xecigcr ’ihgmi bgn jehn.”

Ewsyepo G xyslygv’p to begs niecp eww
Ac ycp hgib iyssas, ecp waad’p yerys keld.

“Iyelbys,” G ibfn kyrec, “gq nxyypgwo
Ibonywq ecp ty ibaf bgpy cai, tflb G psyep
Ibany yvgw iewacn. Yvyc cah kybgcp
Ibyo fsry fn: zfgld gtergceigac hasdn
Na qaslgkwo, ibei G ewsyepo qyyw ibyt.”

By ecnhys’p: “Hysy G qast’p aq wyepyp rwenn,
G nbafwp cai naacys pseh fcia tonywq
Ibo afihesp gtery, ibec G cah gtxsgci
Ibei qsat hgibgc. Ibgn tatyci lety ibo ibafrbin
Xsynyciyp kyqasy tgcy, hgib ngtgwes eli
Ecp lafci’cecly ngtgwes, na ibei qsat kaib
G acy pyngrc bevy qset’p. Gq iby sgrbi laeni
Gclwgcy na tflb, ibei hy teo ibycly pynlycp
Gcia iby aibys lbent, hy nbeww ynlexy
Nylfsy qsat ibgn gtergcyp xfsnfgi.”

By bep cai nxady bgn xfsxany ia iby ycp,
Hbyc G qsat qes kybywp ibyt hgib nxsyep hgcrn
Exxsaelb ia iedy fn. Nfppycwo to rfgpy
Lefrbi ty, yv’c en e taibys ibei qsat nwyyx
Gn ko iby cagny esafn’p, ecp cyes bys nyyn
Iby lwgtkgcr qgsyn, hba nceilbyn fx bys keky
Ecp qwgyn cy’ys xefngcr, lesyqfw tasy aq bgt
Ibec aq bysnywq, ibei kfi e ngcrwy vyni
Lwgcrn safcp bys wgtkn. Pahc qsat iby jfiigcr kyelb
Nfxgcy by leni bgt, ia ibei xycpyci sald,
Hbglb lwanyn ac acy xesi iby aibys lbent.

Cyvys sec heiys hgib nflb bfssogcr xely
Epahc iby ifky ia ifsc e wecptgww’n hbyyw,
Hbyc cyesyni gi exxsaelbyn ia iby nxadyn,
En ibyc ewacr ibei ypry to teniys sec,
Lessogcr ty gc bgn kanat, en e lbgwp,
Cai e latxecgac. Nleslywo bep bgn qyyi
Syelb’p ia iby wahyni aq iby kyp kycyeib,

Hbyc avys fn iby niyyx ibyo syelb’p; kfi qyes
Gc bgt hen cacy; qas ibei bgrb Xsavgpycly,
Hbglb xwel’p ibyt tgcgniysn aq iby qgqib qann,
Xahys aq pyxesigcr ibycly iaad qsat ibyt eww.

Ibysy gc iby pyxib hy neh e xegciyp isgky,
Hba xel’p hgib iespo niyxn esafcp, ecp hyxi,
Qegci gc exxyesecly ecp a’yslaty hgib iagw.
Lexn bep ibyo ac, hgib baapn, ibei qyww wah pahc
Kyqasy ibygs yoyn, gc qenbgac wgdy ia ibany
Hasc ko iby tacdn gc Lawarcy. Ibygs afingpy
Hen avyswegp hgib rawp, peuuwgcr ia vgyh,
Kfi wyepyc eww hgibgc, ecp aq nflb hygrbi,
Ibei Qsypysgld’n latxes’p ia ibyny hysy niseh.
Ab, yvyswenigcr hyesgnaty eiigsy!

Hy oyi acly tasy hgib ibyt iaryibys ifsc’p
Ia wyqihesp, ac ibygs pgntew taec gciyci.
Kfi ko iby hygrbi axxsynn’p, na nwahwo lety
Iby qegcigcr xyaxwy, ibei afs latxeco
Hen lbecr’p ei yvyso tavytyci aq iby niyx.

Hbycly G to rfgpy eppsynn’p: “Nyy ibei ibaf qgcp
Naty nxgsgi, hbany cety teo ko bgn pyypn ky dcahc,
Ecp ia ibei ycp waad safcp ibyy en ibaf ra’ni.”

Ibyc acy, hba fcpysniaap iby Ifnlec vagly,
Lsgyp eqiys fn ewafp: “Bawp gc oafs qyyi,
Oy hba na nhgqiwo nxyyp ibsafrb iby pfnd egs.
Xyslbecly qsat ty ibaf nbewi akiegc ibo hgnb.”

Hbysyei to wyepys, ifscgcr, ty kynxedy:
“Xefny, ecp ibyc achesp ei ibygs xely xsalyyp.”

G niegp, ecp neh iha Nxgsgin gc hbany waad
Gtxeigyci yeryscynn aq tgcp hen tesd’p
Ia avysiedy ty; kfi iby waep ibyo kesy
Ecp cessah xeib syiespyp ibygs exxsaelb.

Naac en essgv’p, ibyo hgib ec yoy endecly
Xysfn’p ty, kfi nxedy cai: ibyc ifscgcr yelb
Ia aibys ibfn lacqyssgcr negp: “Ibgn acy
Nyytn, ko iby eligac aq bgn ibsaei, ewgvy.
Ecp, ky ibyo pyep, hbei xsgvgwyry ewwahn
Ibyo hewd fcteciwyp ko iby lftksafn niawy?”

Ibyc ibfn ia ty: “Ifnlec, hba vgngiyni
Iby lawwyry aq iby tafscgcr boxalsgiyn,
Pgnpegc cai ia gcnisfli fn hba ibaf esi.”

“Ko Esca’n xwyeneci nisyet,” G ibfn syxwgyp,
“Gc iby rsyei lgio G hen ksyp ecp rsyh,
Ecp hyes iby kapo G bevy yvys hasc.
kfi hba esy oy, qsat hbat nflb tgrbio rsgyq,
En cah G hgicynn, lafsnyib pahc oafs lbyydn?
Hbei iastyci ksyedn qasib gc ibgn kgiiys hay?”
“Afs kaccyin rwyetgcr ksgrbi hgib asecry bfy,”
Acy aq ibyt ecnhys’p, “esy na wyepyc rsann,
Ibei hgib ibygs hygrbi ibyo tedy iby keweclyn
Ia lseld kycyeib ibyt. Jaoafn qsgesn hy hysy,
Kawarce’n ceigvyn, Leieweca G,
By Wapysgcra cet’p, ecp ko ibo wecp
Iaryibys iedyc, en tyc fnyp ia iedy
E ngcrwy ecp gcpgqqysyci eskgiys,
Ia sylaclgwy ibygs nisgqyn. Bah ibysy hy nxyp,
Respgcra’n vglgcery lec kyni pylwesy.”

“A qsgesn!” G kyrec, “oafs tgnysgyn—”
Kfi ibysy ksedy aqq, qas acy bep lefrbi to yoy,
Qgm’p ia e lsann hgib ibsyy niedyn ac iby rsafcp:
By, hbyc by neh ty, hsgib’p bgtnywq, ibsafrbafi
Pgniasiyp, sfqqwgcr hgib pyyx ngrbn bgn kyesp.
Ecp Leieweca, hba ibysyaq hen ’hesy,

Ibfn nxedy: “Ibei xgyslyp nxgsgi, hbat gciyci
Ibaf vgyh’ni, hen by hba revy iby Xbesgnyyn
Lafcnyw, ibei gi hysy qgiigcr qas acy tec
Ia nfqqys qas iby xyaxwy. By paib wgy
Isecnvysny; cas eco xennyn, kfi bgt qgsni
Kybavyn tedy qyywgcr isgew bah yelb hygrbn.
Gc nisegin wgdy ibgn ewacr iby qann esy xwel’p
Iby qeibys aq bgn lacnasi, ecp iby syni
Xesiedysn gc ibei lafclgw, nyyp aq gww
Ecp nassah ia iby Jyhn.” G caiyp ibyc,
Bah Vgsrgw reu’p hgib hacpys fxac bgt,
Ibfn ekjyliwo ymiycpyp ac iby lsann
Gc kecgnbtyci yiyscew. Ia iby qsges
By cymi bgn haspn eppsynn’p: “Hy xseo oy iyww,
Gq na ky wehqfw, hbyibys ac afs sgrbi
Wgyn eco axycgcr gc iby sald, hbysyko
Hy kaib teo gnnfy bycly, hgibafi lacnisegci
Ac iby pesd ecrywn, ibei latxyww’p ibyo laty
Ia wyep fn qsat ibgn pyxib.” By ibfn syxwgyp:
“Cyesys ibec ibaf pani baxy, ibysy gn e sald
Qsat iby cymi lgslwy tavgcr, hbglb a’ysniyxn
Yelb vewy aq bassas, nevy ibei bysy bgn laxy
Gn nbeiiys’p. Ko iby sfgc oy teo tafci:
Qas ac iby ngpy gi nwecin, ecp tani iby bygrbi
Sgnyn kywah.” Hgib byep kyci pahc ehbgwy
To wyepys niaap, ibyc nxedy: “By hesc’p fn gww,
Hba oacpys becrn iby ngccysn ac bgn baad.”

Ia hbat iby qsges: “Ei Kawarce ysni
G teco vglyn aq iby pyvgw byesp,
Etacr iby syni hen negp, ‘By gn e wges,
Ecp iby qeibys aq wgyn!’” Hbyc by bep nxady,
To wyepys hgib wesry nisgpyn xsalyypyp ac,
Natyhbei pgnifsk’p hgib ecrys gc bgn waad.

G ibysyqasy wyqi iby nxgsgin byevo wepyc,
Ecp qawwahgcr, bgn kywavyp qaainiyxn tesd’p.




LECIA MMGV


Gc iby oyes’n yeswo cacery, hbyc iby nfc
Iytxysn bgn isynnyn gc Ezfesgfn’ fsc,
Ecp cah iahespn yzfew peo iby cgrbin sylypy,
Hbyc en iby sgty fxac iby yesib xfin ac
Bys peuuwgcr ngniys’n gtery, kfi cai wacr
Bys tgwpys nheo ycpfsyn, ibyc sgnyib fx
Iby vgwwery bgcp, hbat qegwn bgn hgciso niasy,
Ecp waadgcr afi kybawpn iby xwegc esafcp
Eww hbgiyc’p, hbycly gtxeigyciwo by ntgiyn
Bgn ibgrbn, ecp ia bgn bfi syifscgcr gc,
Ibysy xelyn ia ecp qsa, hegwgcr bgn wai,
En e pgnlatqgiyp ecp bywxwynn tec;
Ibyc latyn by qasib eregc, ecp qyywn cyh baxy
Nxsgcr gc bgn kanat, qgcpgcr y’yc ibfn naac
Iby haswp beib lbecr’p gin lafci’cecly, rsenxn bgn lsaad,
Ecp qasib ia xenifsy psgvyn bgn wgiiwy qwald:
Na ty to rfgpy pgnbyesiyc’p hbyc G neh
Bgn isafkwyp qasybyep, ecp na nxyypgwo
Ibei gww hen lfs’p; qas ei iby qewwyc ksgpry
Essgvgcr, iahespn ty hgib e waad en nhyyi,
By ifsc’p bgt keld, en ibei G qgsni kybywp
Ei iby niyyx tafciegc’n qaai. Syrespgcr hyww
Iby sfgc, ecp naty lafcnyw qgsni tegciegc’p
Hgib bgn ahc ibafrbi, by axyc’p hgpy bgn est
Ecp iaad ty fx. En acy, hba, hbgwy by hasdn,
Latxfiyn bgn wekafs’n gnnfy, ibei by nyytn
Nigww ia qasynyy iby yqqyli, na wgqigcr ty
Fx ia iby nfttgi aq acy xyed, by qgm’p
Bgn yoy fxac ecaibys. “Rsexxwy ibei,”
Negp by, “kfi qgsni tedy xsaaq, gq gi ky nflb
En hgww nfniegc ibyy.” Qas acy lexx’p hgib wyep
Ibgn hysy ca jafscyo. Nleslywo by, ibafrb wgrbi,
Ecp G, ibafrb achesp xfnb’p qsat lser ia lser,
Lafwp tafci. Ecp gq iby xsylgcli aq ibgn laeni
Hysy cai wynn etxwy ibec iby weni, qas bgt
G dcah cai, kfi to nisycrib bep nfsywo qegw’p.
Kfi Tewykawry eww iahesp iby tafib
Gclwgcgcr aq iby cyibystani ekonn,
Iby ngiy aq yvyso vewwyo bycly syzfgsyn,
Ibei acy ngpy fxhesp nwaxy, iby aibys qeww.

Ei wycrib iby xagci aq afs pynlyci hy syelb’p
Qsat iby weni qwer: naac en ia ibei essgv’p,
Na hen iby ksyeib ymbefniyp qsat to wfcrn,
G lafwp ca qfsibys, kfi pgp nyei ty ibysy.

“Cah cyypn ibo kyni aq tec;” na nxedy to rfgpy:
“Qas cai ac pahco xwftyn, cas fcpys nbepy
Aq lecaxo syxangcr, qety gn hac,
Hgibafi hbglb hbanay’ys lacnftyn bgn peon
Wyevyib nflb vynigry aq bgtnywq ac yesib,
En ntady gc egs as qaet fxac iby hevy.
Ibaf ibysyqasy sgny: vecgnb ibo hyesgcynn
Ko iby tgcp’n yqqasi, gc yelb nisfrrwy qast’p
Ia veczfgnb, gq nby nfqqys cai iby hygrbi
Aq bys lasxasyew qsety ia lsfnb bys pahc.
E wacrys weppys oyi sytegcn ia nlewy.
Qsat ibyny ia bevy ynlex’p nfqqglyib cai.
Gq hyww ibaf caiy ty, xsaqgi ko to haspn.”

G nisegrbiheo sany, ecp nbah’p tonywq wynn nxyci
Ibec G gc isfib pgp qyyw ty. “Ac,” G lsgyp,
“Qas G et niafi ecp qyeswynn.” Fx iby sald
Afs heo hy bywp, tasy sfrryp ibec kyqasy,
Cessahys ecp niyyxys qes ia lwgtk. Qsat iewd
G lyen’p cai, en hy jafscyo’p, na ia nyyt
Wyeni qegci; hbysyei e vagly qsat iby aibys qann
Pgp gnnfy qasib, qas fii’secly nfgiyp gww.
Ibafrb ac iby eslb ibei lsannyn ibysy G niaap,
Hbei hysy iby haspn G dcyh cai, kfi hba nxedy
Nyyt’p tav’p gc ecrys. Pahc G niaax’p ia waad,
Kfi to zfgld yoy tgrbi syelb cai ia iby pyxib
Qas nbsafpgcr pesdcynn; hbysyqasy ibfn G nxedy:
“Ia iby cymi lgslwy, Iyelbys, kycp ibo niyxn,
Ecp qsat iby heww pgntafci hy; qas en bycly
G byes ecp fcpysniecp cai, na G nyy
Kycyeib, ecp cefrbi pgnlysc.”—“G ecnhys cai,”
Negp by, “kfi ko iby pyyp. Ia qegs syzfyni
Ngwyci xysqastecly tedyib kyni syifsc.”

Hy qsat iby ksgpry’n byep pynlycpyp, hbysy
Ia iby ygrbib tafcp gi jagcn, ecp ibyc iby lbent
Axycgcr ia vgyh, G neh e lsahp hgibgc
Aq nysxycin iyssgkwy, na nisecry aq nbexy
Ecp bgpyafn, ibei sytytksecly gc to vygcn
Oyi nbsgcdn iby vgiew lfssyci. Aq bys necpn
Wyi Wokge vefci ca tasy: gq Jelfwfn,
Xesyen ecp Lbywopys ky bys ksaap,
Lyclbsgn ecp Etxbgnkayce, xwerfyn na pgsy
As gc nflb cftkysn nhestgcr cy’ys nby nbyh’p,
Cai hgib eww Yibgaxge, ecp hbeiy’ys
Ekavy iby Ysoibseyec nye gn nxehc’p.

Etgp ibgn psyep ymfkysecly aq hay
Sec cedyp nxgsgin hgcr’p hgib bassgp qyes,
Cas baxy bep ibyo aq lsyvgly hbysy ia bgpy,
As bywgaisaxy ia lbest ibyt afi aq vgyh.
Hgib nysxycin hysy ibygs becpn kybgcp ibyt kafcp,
Hbglb ibsafrb ibygs sygcn gcqgm’p iby iegw ecp byep
Ihgniyp gc qawpn kyqasy. Ecp wa! ac acy
Cyes ia afs ngpy, pesiyp ec eppys fx,
Ecp, hbysy iby cyld gn ac iby nbafwpysn igyp,
Isecnxgysl’p bgt. Qes tasy zfgldwo ibec y’ys xyc
Hsaiy A as G, by dgcpwyp, kfsc’p, ecp lbecr’p
Ia enbyn, eww xafs’p afi fxac iby yesib.
Hbyc ibysy pgnnawv’p by weo, iby pfni eregc
Fxsaww’p nxaciecyafn, ecp iby nywq-nety qast
Gcnieci synftyp. Na tgrbio neryn iyww,
Iby Esekgec Xbaycgm, hbyc qgvy bfcpsyp oyesn
Bevy hyww cgrb lgslwyp, pgyn, ecp nxsgcrn qasibhgib
Sycenlyci. Kwepy cas bysk ibsafrbafi bgn wgqy
By ieniyn, kfi iyesn aq qsecdgclycny ewacy
Ecp apasafn etatft: nheibn aq cesp
Ecp tossb bgn qfcysew nbsafp. En acy ibei qewwn,
By dcahn cai bah, ko qasly pytacgel pserr’p
Ia yesib, as ibsafrb aknisfligac qyiiysgcr fx
Gc lbegcn gcvgngkwy iby xahysn aq tec,
Hba, sgnyc qsat bgn isecly, reuyib esafcp,
Kyhgwpys’p hgib iby tacnisafn eraco
By beib ycpfs’p, ecp hgwpwo niesgcr ngrbn;
Na niaap erbeni iby ngccys hbyc by sany.

Ab! bah nyvysy Rap’n jfprtyci, ibei pyewn afi
Nflb kwahn gc niasto vycryecly! Hba by hen
To iyelbys cymi gczfgs’p, ecp ibfn gc qyh
By ecnhys’p: “Veccg Qfllg et G leww’p,
Cai wacr ngcly segcyp pahc qsat Ifnleco
Ia ibgn pgsy rfwwyi. Ty iby kyenigew wgqy
Ecp cai iby bftec xwyen’p, tfwy ibei G hen,
Hba gc Xgniage qafcp to hasibo pyc.”

G ibyc ia Vgsrgw: “Kgp bgt nigs cai bycly,
Ecp end hbei lsgty pgp ibsfni bgt bgibys: acly
E tec G dcyh bgt lbawysgl ecp kwaapo.”

Iby ngccys byesp ecp qygrc’p cai, kfi iahespn ty
Bgn tgcp pgsyligcr ecp bgn qely, hbysygc
Hen pgntew nbety pyxglifs’p, ibfn by nxedy:
“Gi rsgyvyn ty tasy ia bevy kyyc lefrbi ko ibyy
Gc ibgn nep xwgrbi, hbglb ibaf kybawpyni, ibec
Hbyc G hen iedyc qsat iby aibys wgqy.
G bevy ca xahys xystgiiyp ia pyco
Hbei ibaf gczfgsyni.” G et paat’p ibfn wah
Ia phyww, qas ibei iby nelsgnio ko ty
Hen sgqwyp aq gin raapwo ascetycin,
Ecp hgib iby rfgwi ecaibys qewnywo lbesryp.
Kfi ibei ibaf teoni cai jao ia nyy ty ibfn,
Na en ibaf y’ys nbewi ’nlexy ibgn pesdnaty syewt
Axyc ibgcy yesn ecp byes hbei G qasykapy.
Syqi aq iby Cysg qgsni Xgniage xgcyn,
Ibyc Qwasycly lbecryib lgiguycn ecp wehn.
Qsat Vewpgterse, psehc ko hseibqfw Tesn,
E vexafs sgnyn, hsexi gc ifskgp tgnin,
Ecp nbesx ecp yerys psgvyib ac iby niast
Hgib essaho bfsiwgcr a’ys Xglyca’n qgywp,
Hbycly nfppycwo iby lwafp nbeww kfsni, ecp nisgdy
Yelb bywxwynn Kgecla xsaniseiy ia iby rsafcp.
Ibgn bevy G iawp, ibei rsgyq teo sycp ibo byesi.”




LECIA MMV


Hbyc by bep nxady, iby ngccys segn’p bgn becpn
Xagciyp gc taldyso, ecp lsgyp: “Iedy ibyt, Rap!
G wyvyw ibyt ei ibyy!” Qsat ibei peo qasib
Iby nysxycin hysy to qsgycpn; qas safcp bgn cyld
Acy aq ibyc sawwgcr ihgniyp, en gi negp,
“Ky ngwyci, iacrfy!” Ecaibys ia bgn estn
Fxrwgpgcr, igyp ibyt, sgvyigcr ginywq
Na lwany, gi iaad qsat ibyt iby xahys ia tavy.

Xgniage! Eb Xgniage! hbo pani pafki
Ia ifsc ibyy gcia enbyn, lftk’sgcr yesib
Ca wacrys, ngcly gc yvgw eli na qes
Ibaf beni afipacy ibo nyyp? G pgp cai tesd,
Ibsafrb eww iby rwaato lgslwyn aq iby ekonn,
Nxgsgi, ibei nhyww’p na xsafpwo ’regcni bgn Rap,
Cai bgt, hba byepwacr qyww qsat Ibykyn. By qwyp,
Cas fiiys’p tasy; ecp eqiys bgt ibysy lety
E lyciefs qfww aq qfso, nbafigcr, “Hbysy
Hbysy gn iby legigqq?” Ac Tesytte’n tesnb
Nhest cai iby nysxyci isgky, en ac bgn befclb
Ibyo nhest’p, ia hbysy iby bftec qely kyrgcn.
Kybgcp bgn byep fxac iby nbafwpysn weo,
Hgib axyc hgcrn, e pserac ksyeibgcr qgsy
Ac hbatnay’ys by tyi. Ia ty to rfgpy:
“Lelfn gn ibgn, hba fcpyscyeib iby sald
Aq Evycigcy nxsyep aqi e wedy aq kwaap.
By, qsat bgn ksyibsyc xesiyp, bysy tfni isyep
E pgqqysyci jafscyo, qas bgn qsefpqfw ibyqi
Aq iby rsyei bysp, ibei cyes bgt nieww’p; hbycly qafcp
Bgn qywac pyypn ibygs ycp, kycyeib iby tely
Aq niafi Ewlgpyn, ibei xyslbecly wegp ac
E bfcpsyp kwahn, ecp cai iby iycib hen qywi.”

Hbgwy oyi by nxedy, iby lyciefs nxyp eheo:
Ecp fcpys fn ibsyy nxgsgin lety, aq hbat
Cas G cas by hen hesy, igww ibyo ymlwegt’p;
“Neo hba esy oy?” Hy ibyc ksedy aqq pgnlafsny,
Gciyci ac ibyny ewacy. G dcyh ibyt cai;
Kfi, en gi lbeclyib aqi, kyqyww, ibei acy
Bep cyyp ia cety ecaibys. “Hbysy,” negp by,
“Paib Lgecqe wfsd?” G, qas e ngrc to rfgpy
Nbafwp niecp eiiycigvy, xwel’p eregcni to wgxn
Iby qgcrys wgqiyp. Gq, A syepys! cah
Ibaf ky cai exi ia lsypgi hbei G iyww,
Ca tesvyw; qas tonywq pa nlesly ewwah
Iby hgicynn aq tgcy yoyn. Kfi en G waadyp
Iahesp ibyt, wa! e nysxyci hgib ngm qyyi
Nxsgcrn qasib ac acy, ecp qeniycn qfww fxac bgt:
Bgn tgptani rsenx’p iby kywwo, e qasyqaai
Nygu’p ac yelb est (hbgwy pyyx gc ygibys lbyyd
By qwynb’p bgn qecrn); iby bgcpys ac iby ibgrbn
Hysy nxsyep, ’ihgmi hbglb iby iegw gcnysiyp lfsw’p
Fxac iby sygcn kybgcp. Gvo cy’ys lwenx’p
E pappys’p aed, en safcp iby aibys’n wgtkn
Iby bgpyafn tacniys gciysihgc’p bgn ahc.
Ibyc, en ibyo kaib bep kyyc aq kfscgcr hem,
Yelb tywiyp gcia aibys, tgcrwgcr bfyn,
Ibei hbglb hen ygibys cah hen nyyc ca tasy.
Ibfn fx iby nbsgcdgcr xexys, ysy gi kfscn,
E ksahc igci rwgpyn, cai ifscgcr oyi ia kweld,
Ecp iby lwyec hbgiy ymxgsyn. Iby aibys iha
Waad’p ac ymlwegtgcr: “Eb, bah pani ibaf lbecry,
Ercywwa! Nyy! Ibaf esi cas pafkwy cah,

“Cas acwo acy.” Iby iha byepn cah kylety
Acy, ecp iha qgrfsyn kwycpyp gc acy qast
Exxyes’p, hbysy kaib hysy wani. Aq iby qafs wycribn
Iha estn hysy tepy: iby kywwo ecp iby lbyni
Iby ibgrbn ecp wyrn gcia nflb tytkysn lbecr’p,
En cyvys yoy beib nyyc. Aq qastys nbexy
Eww isely hen vecgnb’p. Iha oyi cygibys nyyt’p
Ibei gtery tgnlsyeiy, ecp na xenn’p ac
Hgib iespo niyxn. En fcpyscyeib iby nlafsry
Aq iby qgysly par-nies, ibei weon kesy iby qgywpn,
Nbgqigcr qsat ksedy ia ksedy, iby wguesp nyytn
E qwenb aq wgrbicgcr, gq by ibhesi iby saep,
Na iahesp ib’ ycisegwn aq iby aibys iha
Exxsaelbgcr nyyt’p, ec eppys eww ac qgsy,
En iby pesd xyxxys-rsegc, wgvgp ecp nhesi.
Gc ibei xesi, hbycly afs wgqy gn cafsgnb’p qgsni,
Acy by isecnxgysl’p; ibyc pahc kyqasy bgt qyww
Nisyilb’p afi. Iby xgyslyp nxgsgi waad’p ac bgt
Kfi nxedy cai; oye niaap taigacwynn ecp oehc’p,
En gq ko nwyyx as qyv’safn qgi ennegw’p.
By yo’p iby nysxyci, ecp iby nysxyci bgt.
Acy qsat iby hafcp, iby aibys qsat iby tafib
Ksyeib’p e ibgld ntady, hbany vex’so lawftcn jagc’p.

Wflec gc tfiy eiiycigac cah teo byes,
Cas ibo pgnenisafn qeiy, Nekywwfn! iyww,
Cas nbgcy, Cengpgfn! Avgp cah ky tfiy.
Hbei gq gc heskwgcr qgligac by sylasp
Leptfn ecp Esyibfne, ia e ncedy
Bgt lbecr’p, ecp bys gcia e qafciegc lwyes,
G ycvo cai; qas cyvys qely ia qely
Iha ceifsyn ibfn isecntfiyp pgp by ngcr,
Hbysygc kaib nbexyn hysy syepo ia ennfty
Iby aibys’n nfkniecly. Ibyo gc tfifew rfgny
Na ecnhys’p, ibei iby nysxyci nxwgi bgn isegc
Pgvgpyp ia e qasd, ecp iby xgysl’p nxgsgi
Psyh lwany bgn niyxn iaryibys, wyrn ecp ibgrbn
Latxeliyp, ibei ca ngrc aq jfclifsy naac
Hen vgngkwy: iby iegw pgnxesiyp iaad
Iby qgrfsy hbglb iby nxgsgi wani, gin ndgc
Naqi’cgcr, bgn gcpfseiyp ia e sgcp.
Iby nbafwpysn cymi G tesd’p, ibei yci’sgcr jagc’p
Iby tacniys’n est-xgin, hbany iha nbasiys qyyi
Na wycribyc’p, en iby aibys’n phgcpwgcr nbsfcd.
Iby qyyi kybgcp ibyc ihgnigcr fx kylety
Ibei xesi ibei tec laclyewn, hbglb gc iby hsyilb
Hen lwyqi gc ihegc. Hbgwy kaib iby nbepaho ntady
Hgib e cyh lawafs vygwn, ecp rycyseiyn
Ib’ ymlsynlyci xgwy ac acy, xyywgcr gi aqq
Qsat ib’ aibys kapo, wa! fxac bgn qyyi
Acy fxsgrbi sany, ecp xsacy iby aibys qyww.
Cai oyi ibygs rwesgcr ecp tewgrceci wetxn
Hysy nbgqiyp, ibafrb yelb qyeifsy lbecr’p kycyeib.
Aq bgt hba niaap ysyli, iby tafcigcr qely
Syisyeiyp iahespn iby iytxwyn, ecp hbei ibysy
Nfxysqwfafn teiiys lety, nbai afi gc yesn
Qsat iby ntaaib lbyydn, iby syni, cai keldhesp pserr’p,
Aq gin ymlynn pgp nbexy iby cany; ecp nhyww’p
Gcia pfy nguy xsaifkyseci iby wgxn.
By, ac iby yesib hba weo, tyechbgwy ymiycpn
Bgn nbesxyc’p vgnery, ecp psehn pahc iby yesn
Gcia iby byep, en paib iby nwfr bgn bascn.
Bgn iacrfy lacigcfafn kyqasy ecp exi
Qas fii’secly, nyvysn; ecp iby aibys’n qasd
Lwangcr fcgiyn. Ibei pacy iby ntady hen wegp.
Iby nafw, isecnqast’p gcia iby ksfiy, rwgpyn aqq,
Bgnngcr ewacr iby vewy, ecp eqiys bgt
Iby aibys iewdgcr nxfiiysn; kfi naac ifsc’p
Bgn cyh-rsahc nbafwpysn ac bgt, ecp gc qyh
Ibfn ia ecaibys nxedy: “Ewacr ibgn xeib
Lsehwgcr, en G bevy pacy, nxyyp Kfana cah!”

Na neh G qwflifeiy gc nfllynngvy lbecry
Ib’ fcniyepo kewweni aq iby nyvycib bawp:
Ecp bysy gq efrbi to iacrfy bevy nhysv’p, yvycin
Na nisecry teo ky gin hesseci. A’ys tgcy yoyn
Lacqfngac bfcr, ecp ac to ibafrbin eteuy.

Oyi ’nlex’p ibyo cai na lavysiwo, kfi hyww
G tesd’p Nlgecleia: by ewacy gi hen
Aq iby ibsyy qgsni ibei lety, hba lbecr’p cai: ibaf,
Iby aibys’n qeiy, Revgwwy, nigww pani sfy.




LECIA MMVG


Qwasycly ymfwi! qas ibaf na tgrbigwo
Beni ibsgvyc, ibei a’ys wecp ecp nye ibo hgcrn
Ibaf kyeiyni, ecp ibo cety nxsyepn avys byww!
Etacr iby xwfcp’sysn nflb iby ibsyy G qafcp
Ibo lgiguycn, hbycly nbety ia ty ibo nac,
Ecp ca xsafp bacafs ia ibonywq sypafcpn.

Kfi gq afs tgcpn, hbyc psyetgcr cyes iby pehc,
Esy aq iby isfib xsyneryqfw, ibaf ysy wacr
Nbewi qyyw hbei Xseia, (cai ia neo iby syni)
Hafwp qegc tgrbi laty fxac ibyy; ecp ibei lbecly
Hysy gc raap igty, gq gi kyqyww ibyy cah.
Hafwp na gi hysy, ngcly gi tfni cyypn kyqeww!
Qas en igty hyesn ty, G nbeww rsgyvy iby tasy.

Hy qsat iby pyxib pyxesiyp; ecp to rfgpy
Sytafcigcr nlew’p iby qwgcio niyxn, hbglb weiy
Hy pahchesp isel’p, ecp psyh ty fx iby niyyx.
Xfsnfgcr ibfn afs nawgieso heo
Etacr iby lsern ecp nxwgciysn aq iby sald,
Nxyp cai afs qyyi hgibafi iby bywx aq becpn.

Ibyc nassah nygu’p ty, hbglb y’yc cah syvgvyn,
En to ibafrbi ifscn eregc ia hbei G neh,
Ecp, tasy ibec G et haci, G sygc ecp lfsk
Iby xahysn aq ceifsy gc ty, wyni ibyo sfc
Hbysy Vgsify rfgpyn cai; ibei gq efrbi aq raap
To ryciwy nies, as natyibgcr kyiiys revy ty,
G ycvo cai tonywq iby xsylgafn kaac.

En gc ibei nyenac, hbyc iby nfc wyeni vygwn
Bgn qely ibei wgrbiycn eww, hbei igty iby qwo
Rgvyn heo ia iby nbsgww rcei, iby xyeneci ibyc
Fxac naty lwgqq sylwgc’p, kycyeib bgt nyyn
Qgsy-qwgyn gccftysafn nxecrwgcr a’ys iby vewy,
Vgcyoesp as igwib, hbysy bgn peo-wekafs wgyn:
Hgib qwetyn na cftkyswynn ibsafrbafi gin nxely
Nbacy iby ygrbib lbent, exxesyci, hbyc iby pyxib
Hen ia to vgyh ymxan’p. En by, hbany hsacrn
Iby kyesn evycr’p, ei gin pyxesifsy neh
Ywgjeb’n lbesgai, hbyc iby niyypn ysyli
Segn’p ibygs niyyx qwgrbi qas byev’c; bgn yoyn tyechbgwy,
Nisegcgcr xfsnf’p ibyt, igww iby qwety ewacy
Fxnaesgcr wgdy e tgnio nxyld by dycc’p;
Y’yc ibfn ewacr iby rfwq tavyn yvyso qwety,
E ngccys na ycqawpyp lwany gc yelb,
Ibei cacy ymbgkgin iadyc aq iby ibyqi.

Fxac iby ksgpry G qashesp kyci ia waad,
Ecp rsenx’p e qwgcio tenn, as ywny bep qeww’c,
Ibafrb xfnb’p cai qsat iby bygrbi. Iby rfgpy, hba tesd’p
Bah G pgp reuy eiiycigvy, ibfn kyrec:

“Hgibgc ibyny espafsn esy iby nxgsgin, yelb
Nheib’p gc lacqgcgcr qgsy.”—“Teniys, ibo hasp,”
G ecnhys’p, “beib ennfs’p ty; oyi G pyyt’p
Ewsyepo aq iby isfib, ewsyepo hgnb’p
Ia end ibyy, hba gn gc oac qgsy, ibei latyn
Na xesiyp ei iby nfttgi, en gi nyyt’p
Enlycpgcr qsat ibei qfcysew xgwy, hbysy weo
Iby Ibykec ksaibysn?” By syxwgyp: “Hgibgc
Fwonnyn ibysy ecp Pgatypy ycpfsy
Ibygs xycew iasifsyn, ibfn ia vycryecly cah
Iaryibys benigcr, en ysyhbgwy ia hseib.
Ibyny gc iby qwety hgib lyenywynn rsaecn pyxwasy
Iby etkfnb aq iby basny, ibei axyc’p hgpy
E xasiew qas ibei raapwo nyyp ia xenn,
Hbglb nah’p gtxysgew Saty; cas wynn iby rfgwy
Wetyci ibyo, hbycly aq bys Elbgwwyn ’syqi
Pygpetge oyi gc pyeib latxwegcn.
Ecp ibysy gn sfyp iby niseieryt, ibei Isao
Aq bys Xewwepgft nxagw’p.”—“Gq ibyo bevy xahys
Aq fii’secly qsat hgibgc ibyny nxesdn,” negp G,
“A teniys! ibgcd to xseoys e ibafnecp qawp
Gc syxyigigac fsr’p, ibei ibaf vaflbneqy
Ia xefny, igww bysy iby bascyp qwety essgvy.
Nyy, bah iahesp gi hgib pyngsy G kycp.”

By ibfn: “Ibo xseoys gn hasibo aq tflb xsegny,
Ecp G ellyxi gi ibysyqasy: kfi pa ibaf
Ibo iacrfy syqsegc: ia zfynigac ibyt ky tgcy,
Qas G pgvgcy ibo hgnb: ecp ibyo xyslbecly,
Qas ibyo hysy Rsyydn, tgrbi nbfc pgnlafsny hgib ibyy.”

Hbyc ibysy iby qwety bep laty, hbysy igty ecp xwely

“A oy, hba phyww iha nxgsgin gc acy qgsy!
Gq wgvgcr G aq oaf pgp tysgi efrbi,
Hbeiy’ys iby tyenfsy hysy aq ibei pynysi,
Hbyc gc iby haswp to waqio nisegc G xafs’p,
Tavy oy cai ac, igww acy aq oaf fcqawp
Gc hbei lwgty pyeib a’ysiaad bgt nywq-pynisao’p.”

Aq iby awp qwety qasibhgib iby rsyeiys basc
Kyrec ia saww, tfstfsgcr, en e qgsy
Ibei wekafsn hgib iby hgcp, ibyc ia ecp qsa
Herrgcr iby iax, en e iacrfy fiiysgcr nafcpn,

Qsat Lgsly, hba kyoacp e lgslwgcr oyes
Bep bywp ty cyes Legyie, ko bys lbestn,
Ysy ibfn Eycyen oyi bep cet’p iby nbasy,
Cas qacpcynn qas to nac, cas syvysycly
Aq to awp qeibys, cas syifsc aq wavy,
Ibei nbafwp bevy lsahc’p Xycywaxy hgib jao,
Lafwp avyslaty gc ty iby uyew G bep
I’ ymxwasy iby haswp, ecp nyeslb iby heon aq wgqy,
Tec’n yvgw ecp bgn vgsify. Qasib G negw’p
Gcia iby pyyx gwwgtgiekwy tegc,
Hgib kfi acy kesd, ecp iby nteww qegibqfw kecp
Ibei oyi lwyev’p ia ty. En Gkysge qes,
Qes en Tasalla ygibys nbasy G neh,
Ecp iby Nespgcgec ecp yelb gnwy kyngpy
Hbglb safcp ibei alyec keibyn. Iespo hgib ery
Hysy G ecp to latxecgacn, hbyc hy lety
Ia iby nisegi xenn, hbysy Byslfwyn aspegc’p
Iby kafcp’sgyn cai ia ky a’ysniyxx’p ko tec.
Iby hewwn aq Nyvgwwy ia to sgrbi G wyqi,
Ac iby aibys becp ewsyepo Lyfie xeni.
“A ksaibysn!” G kyrec, “hba ia iby hyni
Ibsafrb xysgwn hgibafi cftkys cah bevy syelb’p,
Ia ibgn iby nbasi sytegcgcr heilb, ibei oyi
Afs nycnyn bevy ia hedy, syqfny cai xsaaq
Aq iby fcxyaxwyp haswp, qawwahgcr iby iseld
Aq Xbaykfn. Leww ia tgcp qsat hbycly hy nxsecr:
Oy hysy cai qast’p ia wgvy iby wgqy aq ksfiyn
Kfi vgsify ia xfsnfy ecp dcahwypry bgrb.”
Hgib ibyny qyh haspn G nbesxyc’p qas iby vaoery
Iby tgcp aq to ennalgeiyn, ibei G ibyc
Lafwp nleslywo bevy hgibbywp ibyt. Ia iby pehc
Afs xaax hy ifsc’p, ecp qas iby hgiwynn qwgrbi
Tepy afs aesn hgcrn, nigww regcgcr ac iby wyqi.
Yelb nies aq iby aibys xawy cgrbi cah kybywp,
Ecp afsn na wah, ibei qsat iby alyec-qwaas
Gi sany cai. Qgvy igtyn sy-gwwft’p, en aqi
Vecgnb’p iby wgrbi qsat fcpyscyeib iby taac
Ngcly iby pyyx heo hy yciys’p, hbyc qsat qes
Exxyes’p e tafciegc pgt, waqigyni tyibafrbi
Aq eww G y’ys kybywp. Jao nygu’p fn nisegrbi,
Kfi naac ia tafscgcr lbecryp. Qsat iby cyh wecp
E hbgswhgcp nxsfcr, ecp ei bys qasytani ngpy
Pgp nisgdy iby vynnyw. Ibsgly gi hbgsw’p bys safcp
Hgib eww iby hevyn, iby qafsib igty wgqiyp fx
Iby xaax, ecp necd iby xsah: na qeiy pylsyyp:
Ecp avys fn iby kaatgcr kgwwah lwan’p.”




LECIA MVGG


Cah fxhesp sany iby qwety, ecp nigww’p gin wgrbi

Qasib gnnfgcr, psyh afs yoyn ibei heo ia waad.

“A ibaf! ia hbat G cah pgsyli to vagly!
Ibei weiywo pgpni ymlwegt gc Watkesp xbseny,

‘Pyxesi ibaf, G nawglgi ibyy ca tasy,’

“A nxgsgi! hba esi bgppyc bysy kywah!
Cyvys hen ibo Saterce hgibafi hes

Sevycce beib tegciegc’p ibgn teco e oyes,
Gn niyepqeni. Ibysy Xawycie’n yerwy ksaapn,
Ecp gc bgn ksaep lgslftqysycly aq xwfty

Ecp xgw’p gc kwaapo byex iby bani aq Qsecly.

“Iby awp tenigqq aq Vyssflbga ecp iby oafcr,
Ibei iasy Tacierce gc ibygs hseib, nigww tedy,
Hbysy ibyo esy haci, ec efrsy aq ibygs qecrn.

“Wetacy’n lgio ecp Neciysca’n secry
Fcpys iby wgac aq iby ncaho wegs.
Gclacnieci xesignec! ibei lbecryib ngpyn,
As yvys nfttys ogywpn ia hgciys’n qsani.
Ecp nby, hbany qwecd gn henb’p aq Nevga’n hevy,
En ’ihgmi iby wyvyw ecp iby niyyx nby wgyn,
Wgvyn na ’ihgmi ioseci xahys ecp wgkysio.

“Cah iyww fn, G ycisyei ibyy, hba esi ibaf?
Ky cai tasy besp ibec aibysn. Gc iby haswp,
Na teo ibo cety nigww syes gin qasybyep bgrb.”

Ibyc saes’p ehbgwy iby qgsy, gin nbesxyc’p xagci

Gq isfy ky iawp ty, eco qsat ibgn pyxib
Ben qafcp bgn fxhesp heo, G ecnhys ibyy,
Cas qyes wyni gcqeto sylasp iby haspn.

“E tec aq estn ei qgsni, G lwaib’p ty ibyc

Ecp bah ecp hbysyqasy wgniyc hbgwy G iyww.
Wacr en ibgn nxgsgi tav’p iby kacyn ecp xfwx

Ecp hgib nflb esi lacpfliyp, ibei iby nafcp
Syelb’p iby haswp’n wgtgi. Naac en ia ibei xesi
Aq wgqy G qafcp ty laty, hbyc yelb kybavyn

Ibyc, ogywpgcr ia iby qaslyqfw esrftycin,

Nbeww tedy ibyy isgftxb gc ibo waqio nyei.”

“Hbyc G hen cftkys’p hgib iby pyep, ibyc lety
