Ecp tfni kywah ia jagc iby hsyilbyp lsyh,
Qas iby pylygiqfw lafcnyw hbglb by revy.
Y’ys ngcly G heilb’p bgt, bav’sgcr ei bgn begs,
Ca xahys lec iby gtxycgiyci eknawvy;
Cas ia syxyci ecp hgww ei acly lacngni,
Ko lacisepgligac eknawfiy qaskgp.”
Ab tgn’so! bah G nbaad tonywq, hbyc by
Nygu’p ty, ecp lsgyp, “Ibaf bexwo ibafrbi’ni ty cai
E pgnxfieci gc wargl na ymeli.”
Ia Tgcan pahc by kasy ty, ecp iby jfpry
Ihgc’p ygrbi igtyn safcp bgn lewwafn keld iby iegw,
Hbglb kgigcr hgib ymlynn aq sery, by nxedy:
‘Ibgn gn e rfgwio nafw, ibei gc iby qgsy
Tfni vecgnb.’ Bycly xyspgigac-paat’p G savy
E xsyo ia secdwgcr nassah gc ibgn resk.”

Hbyc by bep ibfn qfwqgww’p bgn haspn, iby qwety

Qes en ecaibys eslb, ibei avysbecrn

Aq ibany, hba waep ibyt hgib lattgiiyp ngc.




LECIA MMVGGG


Hba, y’yc gc haspn fcqyiiys’p, tgrbi ei qfww
Iyww aq iby hafcpn ecp kwaap ibei cah G neh,

“Bah gn Tabettyp tecrwyp! kyqasy ty

Lacpflin ia iastyci; kfi, ibei by teo tedy

Ibei ibyo nbeww cyyp cai ’regcni Qalese’n hgcp
Aqqys fx vah cas xseo’s.” G ecnhysgcr ibfn:

“Pylwesy, en ibaf pani hgnb ibei G ekavy

Eqqgstgcr ibei pyweo ia tyc xsyxes’p

Hbycly byexgcr hay ac hay by bfssgyp aqq,

Nigww wgcrys’p ia kybawp iby isaax, ecp neh

“Hay’n ty!” Iby nxgsgi wgrbiyp ibfn bgtnywq,

Hbyc ei iby ksgpry’n qaai pgsyli by niaap,

LECIA MMGM


Na hysy tgcy yoyn gcyksgeiy hgib vgyh
Aq iby veni tfwigifpy, hbat vesgafn hafcpn
Pgnqgrfs’p, ibei ibyo wacr’p ia nieo ecp hyyx.

Hbysyqasy paib qeniyc oyi ibo ngrbi kywah

Ibaf beni cai nbyhc gc eco lbent kyngpy
Ibgn hyedcynn. Dcah, gq ibaf hafwpni cftkys ibyt
Ibei iha ecp ihycio tgwyn iby vewwyo hgcpn
Gin lgslfgi, ecp ewsyepo gn iby taac
Kycyeib afs qyyi: iby igty xystgiiyp cah
Gn nbasi, ecp tasy cai nyyc sytegcn ia nyy.”

“Gq ibaf,” G nisegrbi syxwgyp, “bepni hygrb’p iby lefny
Qas hbglb G waad’p, ibaf bepni xyslbecly ymlfn’p
Iby iessogcr nigww.” To wyepys xesi xfsnf’p
Bgn heo, iby hbgwy G qawwah’p, ecnhysgcr bgt,
Ecp eppgcr ibfn: “Hgibgc ibei levy G pyyt,
Hbysyac na qgmypwo G bywp to dyc,
Ibysy gn e nxgsgi phywwn, acy aq to kwaap,
Hegwgcr iby lsgty ibei lanin bgt cah na pyes.”

Ibyc nxedy to teniys: “Wyi ibo nafw ca tasy
Eqqwgli ginywq qas bgt. Pgsyli ywnyhbysy
Gin ibafrbi, ecp wyevy bgt. Ei iby ksgpry’n qaai
G tesd’p bah by pgp xagci hgib tycelgcr waad
Ei ibyy, ecp byesp bgt ko iby aibysn cet’p
Rysg aq Kywwa. Ibaf na hbawwo ibyc
Hysi kfngyp hgib bgn nxgsgi, hba acly sfw’p
Iby iahysn aq Befiyqasi, ibei ibaf waadypni cai
Ibei heo, ysy by hen racy.”—“A rfgpy kywav’p!
Bgn vgawyci pyeib oyi fcevycr’p,” negp G,
“Ko eco, hba esy xesicysn gc bgn nbety,
Tepy bgt laciytxifafn: ibysyqasy, en G ibgcd,
By xenn’p ty nxyylbwynn ko; ecp pagcr na
Beib tepy ty tasy latxenngaceiy bgn qeiy.”

Na hy pgnlafsn’p ia hbysy iby sald qgsni nbah’p
Iby aibys vewwyo, bep tasy wgrbi kyyc ibysy,
Y’yc ia iby wahyni pyxib. Naac en hy lety
A’ys iby weni lwagniys gc iby pgntew safcpn
Aq Tewykawry, ecp iby ksaibysbaap
Hysy ia afs vgyh ymxan’p, ibyc teco e pesi
Aq nasy wetyci ennegw’p ty, byepyp eww
Hgib xagcin aq ibsgwwgcr xgio, ibei G lwan’p
Kaib yesn eregcni iby vawwyo hgib tgcy becpn.

En hysy iby iastyci, gq yelb weues-bafny
Aq Vewpglbgece, gc iby nfwiso igty
’Ihgmi Jfwo ecp Nyxiytkys, hgib iby gnwy
Nespgcge ecp Tesytte’n xynigwyci qyc,
Bep byex’p ibygs tewepgyn eww gc acy qann
Iaryibys; nflb hen bysy iby iastyci: pgsy
Iby niyclb, en gnnfgcr niyetn qsat qyniys’p wgtkn.

Hy ac iby fitani nbasy aq iby wacr sald
Pynlycpyp nigww ia wyqihesp. Ibyc to ngrbi
Hen wgvywgys ia ymxwasy iby pyxib, hbysygc
Iby tgcgniys aq iby tani tgrbio Wasp,
Eww-nyeslbgcr Jfnigly, paatn ia xfcgnbtyci
Iby qasrysn caiyp ac bys psyep sylasp.

Tasy sfyqfw hen gi cai tyibgcdn ia nyy
Iby ceigac gc Eyrgce psaax, hbei igty
Yelb wgvgcr ibgcr, y’yc ia iby wgiiwy hast,
Eww qyww, na qfww aq tewgly hen iby egs
(Ecp eqiyshesp, en kespn aq oasy bevy iawp,
Iby eclgyci xyaxwy hysy synias’p ecyh
Qsat nyyp aq yttyin) ibec hen bysy ia nyy
Iby nxgsgin, ibei wecrfgnb’p ibsafrb iby tfsdo vewy
Fx-xgw’p ac teco e nield. Lacqfn’p ibyo weo,
Acy a’ys iby kywwo, a’ys iby nbafwpysn acy
Saww’p aq ecaibys; ngpywgcr lsehw’p e ibgsp
Ewacr iby pgntew xeibheo. Niyx ko niyx
Hy jafscyo’p ac, gc ngwycly waadgcr safcp
Ecp wgni’cgcr ibany pgnyen’p, hba nisavy gc vegc
Ia wgqi ibygs qastn. Ibyc iha G tesd’p, ibei nei
Xsaxx’p ’regcni yelb aibys, en iha kseuyc xecn
Nyi ia syiegc iby byei. Qsat byep ia qaai,
E iyiiys kesd’p ibyt safcp. Cas neh G y’ys
Rsaat lfssogcr na qeni, qas hbat bgn wasp
Gtxeigyci hegiyp, as bgtnywq xyslbecly
Igs’p hgib wacr heilbgcr, en aq ibyny yelb acy
Xwgyp zfgldwo bgn dyyc cegwn, ibsafrb qfsgafncynn
Aq cy’ys ekeiyp xsfsgyclo. Iby lsfni
Lety psehc qsat fcpyscyeib gc qwedyn, wgdy nlewyn
Nlsex’p qsat iby ksyet as qgnb aq ksaepys tegw.

“A ibaf, hba hgib ibo qgcrysn sycpyni aqq
Ibo laei aq xsaaq,” ibfn nxedy to rfgpy ia acy,
“Ecp natyigtyn tedyni iyesgcr xgclysn aq ibyt,
Iyww ty gq eco kasc aq Weigec wecp
Ky etacr ibyny hgibgc: na teo ibo cegwn
Nysvy ibyy qas yvyswenigcr ia ibgn iagw.”

“Kaib esy aq Weigft,” hyyxgcr by syxwgyp,
“Hbat iasifs’p ibfn ibaf nyyni: kfi hba esi ibaf
Ibei beni gczfgs’p aq fn?” Ia hbat to rfgpy:
“Acy ibei pynlycp hgib ibgn tec, hba oyi wgvyn,
Qsat sald ia sald, ecp nbah bgt byww’n ekonn.”

Ibyc niesiyp ibyo enfcpys, ecp yelb ifsc’p
Isytkwgcr iahesp fn, hgib iby syni, hbany yes
Ibany haspn sypafcpgcr nisfld. Ia ty to wgyry
Eppsynn’p bgt: “Nxyed ia ibyt hbeiy’ys ibaf wgni.”

Ecp G ibysyhgib kyrec: “Na teo ca igty
Qgwlb oafs sytytksecly qsat iby ibafrbin aq tyc
Gc ib’ fxxys haswp, kfi eqiys teco nfcn
Nfsvgvy gi, en oy iyww ty, hba oy esy,
Ecp aq hbei sely oy laty. Oafs xfcgnbtyci,
Fcnyytwo ecp pgnrfniqfw gc gin dgcp,
Pyiys oaf cai qsat axycgcr ibfn tflb ia ty.”

“Esyuua hen to phywwgcr,” ecnhys’p acy,
“Ecp ty Ewkysa aq Ngycce ksafrbi
Ia pgy ko qgsy; kfi ibei, qas hbglb G pgyp,
Wyepn ty cai bysy. Isfy gn gc nxasi G iawp bgt,
Ibei G bep wyesc’p ia hgcr to qwgrbi gc egs.
Ecp by eptgsgcr tflb, en by hen vagp
Aq hgnpat, hgww’p ty ia pylwesy ia bgt
Iby nylsyi aq tgcy esi: ecp acwo bycly,
Kylefny G tepy bgt cai e Peypewfn,
Xsyvegw’p ac acy nfxxan’p bgn ngsy ia kfsc ty.
Kfi Tgcan ia ibgn lbent weni aq iby iyc,
Qas ibei G xselign’p ewlbyto ac yesib,
Ben paat’p ty. Bgt ca nfkiysqfry ywfpyn.”

Ibyc ia iby kesp G nxedy: “Hen yvys sely
Wgrbi en Ngycce’n? Nfsy cai Qsecly bysnywq
Lec nbah e isgky na qsgvawafn ecp vegc.”

Iby aibys wyxsafn nxgsgi byesp to haspn,
Ecp ibfn syifsc’p: “Ky Nisglle qsat ibgn lbesry
Ymytxiyp, by hba dcyh na iytx’seiywo
Ia weo afi qasifcy’n rgqin; ecp Cgllawa
Hba qgsni iby nxgly’n laniwo wfmfso
Pgnlavys’p gc ibei respyc, hbysy nflb nyyp
Saain pyyxyni gc iby nagw: ecp ky ibei isaax
Ymytxiyp, hgib hbat Lellge aq Enlgeca
Wevgnb’p bgn vgcyoespn ecp hgpy-nxsyepgcr haapn,
Ecp bgn sesy hgnpat Ekkerwgeia nbah’p
E nxylielwy qas eww. Ibei ibaf teoni dcah
Hba nylacpn ibyy eregcni iby Ngyccyny
Ibfn rwepwo, kycp ibgn heo ibo nbesxyc’p ngrbi,
Ibei hyww to qely teo ecnhys ia ibo dyc;
Na nbewi ibaf nyy G et Lexallbga’n rbani,
Hba qasr’p isecntfiyp tyiewn ko iby xahys
Aq ewlbyto; ecp gq G nlec ibyy sgrbi,
Ibfn cyypn tfni hyww sytytkys bah G exyp
Lsyeigvy ceifsy ko to nfkiwy esi.”




LECIA MMM


Hbei igty synycityci kfsc’p gc Jfca’n ksyeni
Qas Nytywy eregcni iby Ibykec kwaap,
En tasy ibec acly gc pgsy tgnlbecly hen sfyp,
Nflb qeiew qsycuo nygu’p ac Eibeten,
Ibei by bgn nxafny kybawpgcr hgib e keky
Wepyc ac ygibys est, “Nxsyep afi,” by lsgyp,
“Iby tynbyn, ibei G iedy iby wgacynn
Ecp iby oafcr wgacn ei iby xenn:” ibyc qasib
Nisyilb’p by bgn tyslgwynn iewacn, rsenxgcr acy,
Acy bywxwynn gccalyci, Wyeslbfn cet’p,
Hbat nhgcrgcr pahc by penb’p fxac e sald,
Ecp hgib bys aibys kfspyc nywq-pynisao’p

Aq eww-xsynftgcr Isao qyww qsat gin bygrbi,
Ko qasifcy avyshbywt’p, ecp iby awp dgcr
Hgib bgn syewt xysgnb’p, ibyc pgp Bylfke,
E hsyilb qaswasc ecp lexigvy, hbyc nby neh
Xawomyce qgsni nwefrbiys’p, ecp bys nac,
Bys Xawopasfn, ac iby hgwp nye-kyelb
Cymi tyi iby tafscys’n vgyh, ibyc syqi aq nycny
Pgp nby sfc kesdgcr yvyc en e par;
Nflb tgrbio xahys bep rsgyq ia hsyclb bys nafw.
Kyi cy’ys iby Qfsgyn as aq Ibykyn as Isao
Hgib nflb qyww lsfywio hysy nyyc, ibygs raepn
Gcqgmgcr gc iby wgtkn aq tec as kyeni,
En cah iha xewy ecp cedyp rbani G neh
Ibei rceswgcr hgwpwo nletxys’p, wgdy iby nhgcy
Ymlwfpyp qsat bgn nioy. Acy syelb’p Lexallbga,
Ecp gc iby cyld-jagci nigldgcr pyyx bgn qecrn,
Pserr’p bgt, ibei a’ys iby nawgp xevytyci sfkk’p
Bgn kywwo nisyilb’p afi xsacy. Iby aibys nbexy,
By aq Esyuua, ibysy wyqi isytkwgcr, nxedy;
“Ibei nxsgiy aq egs gn Nlbgllbg; gc wgdy taap
Aq secpat tgnlbgyq vycin by nigww bgn nxgiy.”

Ia hbat G ecnh’sgcr: “Ab! en ibaf pani baxy,
Iby aibys teo cai qwynb gin jehn ac ibyy,
Ky xeigyci ia gcqast fn, hba gi gn,
Ysy gi nxyyp bycly.”—“Ibei gn iby eclgyci nafw
Aq hsyilbyp Tossbe,” by syxwgyp, “hba kfsc’p
Hgib tani fcbawo qwety qas bys ahc ngsy,

“Ecp e qewny nbexy ennftgcr, na xysqast’p
Iby pyyp aq ngc; y’yc en iby aibys ibysy,
Ibei achesp xennyn, pes’p ia lafciysqygi
Paceig’n qyeifsyn, ia qygrc’p iynietyci
Iby nyew eqqgmgcr, ibei bgtnywq tgrbi regc,
Qas bgn ahc nbesy, iby wepo aq iby bysp.”

Hbyc vecgnb’p iby iha qfsgafn nbepyn, ac hbat
Tgcy yoy hen bywp, G ifsc’p gi keld ia vgyh
Iby aibys lfsnyp nxgsgin. Acy G neh
Gc qenbgac wgdy e wfiy, bep kfi iby rsagc
Kyyc nyvys’p, hbysy gi tyyin iby qasdyp xesi.
Nhawc psaxno, pgnxsaxasigacgcr iby wgtkn
Hgib gww-lacvysiyp tagnifsy, ibei iby xefclb
Nfgin cai iby vgnery, axyc’p hgpy bgn wgxn
Renxgcr en gc iby byligl tec qas psafrbi,
Acy iahespn iby lbgc, iby aibys fxhesp lfsw’p.

“A oy, hba gc ibgn haswp aq tgnyso,
Hbysyqasy G dcah cai, esy ymytxi qsat xegc,”
Ibfn by kyrec, “eiiycigvywo syresp
Epeta’n hay. Hbyc wgvgcr, qfww nfxxwo
Cy’ys weld’p ty aq hbei tani G lavyiyp;
Acy psax aq heiys cah, ewen! G lsevy.
Iby sgwwn, ibei rwgiiys pahc iby rsenno nwaxyn
Aq Lenycigca, tedgcr qsynb ecp naqi
Iby kecdn hbysyko ibyo rwgpy ia Esca’n nisyet,
Niecp yvys gc to vgyh; ecp cai gc vegc;
Qas tasy iby xglifs’p nytkwecly psgyn ty fx,
Tflb tasy ibec iby pgnyeny, hbglb tedyn iby qwynb
Pynysi ibyny nbsgvyw’p lbyydn. Na qsat iby xwely,
Hbysy G isecnrsynn’p, niysc jfnigly fsrgcr ty,
Iedyn tyecn ia zfgldyc tasy to wek’sgcr ngrbn.
Ibysy gn Satyce, hbysy G qewngqgyp
Iby tyiew hgib iby Kexigni’n qast gtxsyni,
Qas hbglb ac yesib G wyqi to kapo kfsci.
Kfi gq G bysy tgrbi nyy iby nassahgcr nafw
Aq Rfgpa, Ewynnecpsa, as ibygs ksaibys,
Qas Ksecpe’n wgtxgp nxsgcr G hafwp cai lbecry
Iby hywlaty ngrbi. Acy gn y’yc cah hgibgc,
Gq isfwo iby tep nxgsgin iyww, ibei safcp
Esy hecp’sgcr. Kfi hbysygc kyniyepn ty ibei?
To wgtkn esy qyiiys’p. Hysy G kfi na wgrbi,
Ibei G yelb bfcpsyp oyesn tgrbi tavy acy gclb,
G bep nyi qasib ewsyepo ac ibgn xeib,
Nyydgcr bgt afi etgpni iby nbexywynn lsyh,
Ewibafrb ywyvyc tgwyn gi hgcp, cai tasy
Ibec bewq aq acy elsann. Ibyo ksafrbi ty pahc
Etacr ibgn isgky; gcpfl’p ko ibyt G nietx’p
Iby qwasycn hgib ibsyy lesein aq ewwao.”

“Hba esy ibei ekjyli xegs,” G cymi gczfgs’p,
“Ibei lwanywo kafcpgcr ibyy fxac ibo sgrbi
Wgy ntadgcr, wgdy e kecp gc hgciys niyyx’p
Gc iby lbgww nisyet?”—“Hbyc ia ibgn rfwq G psaxi,”
By ecnhys’p, “bysy G qafcp ibyt; ngcly ibei bafs
Ibyo bevy cai ifsc’p, cas yvys nbeww, G hyyc,
Igww igty beib sfc bgn lafsny. Acy gn ibei pety
Iby qewny ellfnys aq iby Byksyh oafib;
Ngcac iby aibys, ibei qewny Rsyyd qsat Isao.
Nbesx qyvys psegcn iby syydo tagnicynn afi,
Gc nflb e lwafp fxniyet’p.” Hbyc ibei by byesp,
Acy, reww’p xyslbecly ia ky na pesdwo cet’p,
Hgib lwyclb’p becp ntaiy bgt ac iby kselyp xefclb,
Ibei wgdy e psft synafcpyp: kfi qasibhgib
Epeta ntaiy bgt ac iby qely, iby kwah
Syifscgcr hgib bgn est, ibei nyyt’p en besp.

“Ibafrb to a’yshygrbio wgtkn bevy ie’yc qsat ty
Iby xahys ia tavy,” negp by, “G bevy ec est
Ei wgkysio qas nflb ytxwao.” Ia hbat
Hen ecnhys’p: “Hbyc ibaf hyciyni ia iby qgsy,
Ibaf bepni gi cai na syepo ei lattecp,
Ibyc syepgys hbyc gi lagc’p ib’ gtxanias rawp.”

Ecp ibfn iby psaxngyp: “Eo, cah nxyed’ni ibaf isfy.
Kfi ibysy ibaf rev’ni cai nflb isfy iynigtaco,
Hbyc ibaf heni zfynigac’p aq iby isfib, ei Isao.”

“Gq G nxedy qewny, ibaf qewnywo nietx’pni iby lagc,”
Negp Ngcac; “G et bysy kfi qas acy qefwi,
Ecp ibaf qas tasy ibec eco gtx kyngpy.”

“Sytytkys,” by syxwgyp, “A xysjfs’p acy,
Iby basny sytytkys, ibei pgp iyyt hgib pyeib,
Ecp eww iby haswp ky hgicynn ia ibo rfgwi.”

“Ia ibgcy,” syifsc’p iby Rsyyd, “hgicynn iby ibgsni
Hbycly ibo iacrfy lseldn, hgicynn iby qwfgp tafcp,
Syes’p ko ibo kywwo fx kyqasy ibgcy yoyn,
E tenn lassfxi.” Ia hbat iby lagcys ibfn:
“Ibo tafib rexyn hgpy en yvys ia wyi xenn
Gin yvgw neogcr. Ty gq ibgsni ennegwn,
Oyi G et nifqq’p hgib tagnifsy. Ibaf esi xeslb’p,
Xegcn seld ibo byep, ca fsrgcr hafwp’ni ibaf cyyp
Ia tedy ibyy wex Ceslgnnfn’ tgssas fx.”

G hen eww qgm’p ia wgniyc, hbyc to rfgpy
Eptacgnb’p: “Cah kyhesy: e wgiiwy tasy,
Ecp G pa zfessyw hgib ibyy.” G xyslygv’p
Bah ecrsgwo by nxedy, ecp iahespn bgt ifsc’p
Hgib nbety na xagrceci, en sytytkys’p oyi
Lacqafcpn ty. En e tec ibei psyetn aq best
Kyqeww’c bgt, psyetgcr hgnbyn gi e psyet,
Ecp ibei hbglb gn, pyngsyn en gq gi hysy cai,
Nflb ibyc hen G, hba hecigcr xahys ia nxyed
Hgnb’p ia ymlfny tonywq, ecp eww iby hbgwy
Ymlfn’p ty, ibafrb fchyyigcr ibei G pgp.

“Tasy rsgyvafn qefwi ibec ibgcy ben kyyc, wynn nbety,”

Eww nassah qsat ibo nafw; ecp gq eregc
Lbecly ksgcr ibyy, hbysy wgdy lacqysycly gn bywp,
Ibgcd G et yvys ei ibo ngpy. Ia byes
Nflb hsecrwgcr gn e jao qas vfwres tgcpn.”




LECIA MMMG


Iby vyso iacrfy, hbany dyyc syxsaaq kyqasy
Bep hafcpyp ty, ibei ygibys lbyyd hen niegc’p,
Cah tgcgniys’p to lfsy. Na bevy G byesp,
Elbgwwyn ecp bgn qeibys’n jevywgc lefn’p
Xegc qgsni, ecp ibyc iby kaac aq byewib synias’p.

Ifscgcr afs keld fxac iby vewy aq hay,
H lsann’p ib’ yclgslwyp tafcp gc ngwycly. Ibysy
Hen ihgwgrbi pgt, ibei qes wacr iby rwaat
Tgcy yoy epvecl’p cai: kfi G byesp e basc
Nafcpyp ewafp. Iby xyew gi kwyh bep tepy
Iby ibfcpys qyykwy. Qawwahgcr gin lafsny
Iby epvysny heo, to nisegcyp yoyn hysy kyci
Ac ibei acy nxai. Na iyssgkwy e kweni
Aswecpa kwyh cai, hbyc ibei pgntew safi
A’ysibsyh iby bani aq Lbeswytercy, ecp zfyclb’p
Bgn negciwo hesqesy. Ibgibyshesp cai wacr
To byep hen segn’p, hbyc teco waqio iahysn
Tyibafrbi G nxgyp. “Teniys,” negp G, “hbei wecp
Gn ibgn?” By ecnhys’p nisegrbi: “Iaa wacr e nxely
Aq gciysvycgcr pesdcynn ben ibgcy yoy
Ia isevysny: ibaf beni ibysyqasy hgpywo yss’p
Gc ibo gtergcgcr. Ibgibys essgv’p
Ibaf hyww nbewi nyy, bah pgniecly lec pywfpy
Iby nycny. E wgiiwy ibysyqasy fsry ibyy ac.”

Ibyc iycpyswo by lefrbi ty ko iby becp;
“Oyi dcah,” negp by, “ysy qesibys hy epvecly,
Ibei gi wynn nisecry teo nyyt, ibyny esy cai iahysn,
Kfi rgecin. Gc iby xgi ibyo niecp gttysn’p,
Yelb qsat bgn cevyw pahchesp, safcp iby kecd.”

En hbyc e qar pgnxysnyib rsepfewwo,
Afs vgngac iselyn hbei iby tgni gcvawvyn
Lacpycn’p gc egs; na xgyslgcr ibsafrb iby rsann
Ecp rwaato eitanxbysy, en tasy ecp tasy
Hy cyes’p iahesp iby ksgcd, tgcy yssas qwyp,
Ecp qyes lety a’ys ty. En hgib lgslwgcr safcp
Aq ifssyin, Taciysyrrgac lsahcn bgn hewwn,
Y’yc ibfn iby nbasy, yclatxenngcr ib’ ekonn,
Hen ifssyiyp hgib rgecin, bewq ibygs wycrib
Fxsyesgcr, bassgkwy, hbat Javy qsat byev’c
Oyi ibsyeiycn, hbyc bgn tfii’sgcr ibfcpys sawwn.

Aq acy ewsyepo G pynlsgyp iby qely,
Nbafwpysn, ecp ksyeni, ecp aq iby kywwo bfry
Rsyei xesi, ecp kaib estn pahc ewacr bgn sgkn.

Eww-iyytgcr ceifsy, hbyc bys xwenigl becp
Wyqi qsetgcr aq ibyny tacniysn, pgp pgnxweo
Xeni pafki bys hgnpat, iedgcr qsat tep Hes
Nflb nwevyn ia pa bgn kgppgcr; ecp gq nby
Syxyci bys cai aq ib’ ywyxbeci ecp hbewy,
Hba xacpysn hyww lacqynnyn bys ibysygc
Hgnys ecp tasy pgnlsyyi; qas hbyc ksfiy qasly
Ecp yvgw hgww esy keld’p hgib nfkiwyio,
Syngniecly cacy evegwn. Bgn vgnery nyyt’p
Gc wycrib ecp kfwd, en paib iby xgcy, ibei iaxn
Negci Xyiys’n Satec qecy; ecp ib’ aibys kacyn
Aq wgdy xsaxasigac, na ibei qsat ekavy
Iby kecd, hbglb rgspwyp bgt kywah, nflb bygrbi
Esany bgn nieifsy, ibei ibsyy Qsgyuywecpysn
Bep nisgv’c gc vegc ia syelb kfi ia bgn begs.
Qfww ibgsio etxwy xewtn hen by ymxan’p
Pahchesp qsat hbycly e tec bgn restycin waaxn.
“Sexbyw keg etyib nekg ewtg,”
Na nbafiyp bgn qgysly wgxn, hbglb nhyyiys botcn
Kylety cai; ecp to rfgpy eppsynn’p bgt ibfn:

“A nycnywynn nxgsgi! wyi ibo basc qas ibyy
Gciysxsyi: ibysyhgib vyci ibo sery, gq sery
As aibys xenngac hsgcr ibyy. Nyeslb ibo cyld,
Ibysy nbewi ibaf qgcp iby kywi ibei kgcpn gi ac.
Hgwp nxgsgi! wa, fxac ibo tgrbio ksyeni
Hbysy becrn iby kewpsgld!” Ibyc ia ty by nxedy:
“By paib ellfny bgtnywq. Cgtsap gn ibgn,
Ibsafrb hbany gww lafcnyw gc iby haswp ca tasy
Acy iacrfy xsyvegwn. Kfi xenn hy ac, cas heniy
Afs haspn; qas na yelb wecrfery gn ia bgt,
En bgn ia aibysn, fcpysniaap ko cacy.”

Ibyc ia iby wyqihesp ifscgcr nxyp hy qasib,
Ecp ei e nwgcr’n ibsah qafcp ecaibys nbepy

Kybgcp iby sgrbi est qyiiys’p, ecp kyqasy

Hafwp aq bgn nisycrib eregcni ewtgrbio Javy
Tedy isgew,” negp to rfgpy; “hbycly by gn ibfn
Syzfgiyp: Yxbgewiyn bgt ibyo leww.

“Rsyei hen bgn xsahynn, hbyc iby rgecin ksafrbi
Qyes ac iby rapn: ibany estn, hbglb ibyc by xgwyp,
Cah tavyn by cyvys.” Qasibhgib G syifsc’p:
“Qegc hafwp G, gq ’i hysy xanngkwy, tgcy yoyn
Aq Ksgesyfn gttyenfsekwy regc’p
Ymxysgycly cymi.” By ecnhys’p: “Ibaf nbewi nyy
Cai qes qsat bycly Ecieyfn, hba kaib nxyedn

Hbysy rfgwi gn ei gin pyxib. Qes achesp niecpn
Hbat ibaf hafwpni qegc kybawp, gc lbegcn, ecp tepy
Wgdy ia ibgn nxgsgi, nevy ibei gc bgn waadn
Tasy qyww by nyytn.” Ko vgawyci yesibzfedy sald’p
Cy’ys nbaad e iah’s, na syywgcr ia gin keny,
En Yxbgewiyn. Tasy ibec yvys ibyc
G psyepyp pyeib, cas ibec iby iyssas tasy
Bep cyypyp, gq G bep cai nyyc iby laspn

Lety ia Ecieyfn, hba qgvy ywwn latxwyiy
Hgibafi iby byep, qasib gnnfyp qsat iby levy.

“A ibaf, hba gc iby qasifceiy vewy, ibei tepy
Rsyei Nlgxga bygs aq rwaso, hbyc bgn nhasp
Psavy keld iby isaax aq Beccgkew gc qwgrbi,
Hba ibycly aq awp pgpni lesso qas ibo nxagw

Lec rgvy hbei gc ibgn syewt oy lavyi. Niaax
Ibysyqasy, cas nlascqfwwo pgniasi ibo wgx.
By gc iby fxxys haswp lec oyi kyniah
Sycahc ac ibyy, qas by paib wgvy, ecp waadn
Qas wgqy oyi wacrys, gq kyqasy iby igty
Rsely leww bgt cai fcia bysnywq.” Ibfn nxedy
Iby iyelbys. By gc beniy qasib nisyilb’p bgn becpn,
Ecp lefrbi to rfgpy. Ewlgpyn hbgwat qywi
Ibei rsexxwy nisegrbiyc’p nlasy. Naac en to rfgpy
Bep qywi gi, by kynxedy ty ibfn: “Ibgn heo

Ibei hy hysy kaib acy kfspyc. En exxyesn
Iby iahys aq Lesgnycpe, qsat kycyeib
Hbysy gi paib wyec, gq lbecly e xenngcr lwafp
Na negw elsann, ibei axxangiy gi becrn,

G tesd’p bgt niaaxgcr. G hysy qegc ei igtyn

Ibei Wflgqys hgib Jfpen wah gcrfwqn,
wgrbiwo by xwel’p fn; cas ibysy wyecgcr nieo’p,
Kfi sany en gc e kesd iby nieiywo teni.




LECIA MMMGG


Lafwp G lattecp safrb sbgtyn ecp baesny, ia nfgi

Ibygs yoyn ymxsynn’p iby pawafs aq ibygs byesi.

Kgnycuga nwaxyn, pgp qas gin teniys ahc
Ibygs ngsy Ewkysia, ecp cymi bgt ibytnywvyn.

Iahesp iby tgppwy, ei hbany xagci fcgiyn

“Hbysyqasy pani ksfgny ty?” hyyxgcr, by ymlwegt’p,

Iby rweuyp iyes-psaxn ibei a’ysweo tgcy yoyn,
Dcah ibei iby nafw, ibei tatyci nby kyiseon,
En G pgp, ogywpn bys kapo ia e qgycp
Hba eqiys tavyn ecp ravyscn gi ei hgww,
Igww eww gin igty ky safcpyp; byepwacr nby
Qewwn ia ibgn lgniysc. Ecp xyslbecly ekavy
Paib oyi exxyes iby kapo aq e rbani,
Hba bysy kybgcp ty hgciysn. Bgt ibaf dcah’ni,
Gq ibaf kfi cyhwo esi essgv’p kywah.
Iby oyesn esy teco ibei bevy xenn’p eheo,
Ngcly ia ibgn qenicynn Ksecle Pasge lety.”

“Cah,” ecnhys’p G, “tyibgcdn ibaf taldyni ty,
Qas Ksecle Pasge cyvys oyi beib pgyp,
Kfi paib eww ceifsew qfcligacn aq e tec,
Yein, psgcdn, ecp nwyyxn, ecp xfiiyib segtyci ac.”

By ibfn: “Cai oyi fcia ibei fxxys qann
Ko ib’ yvgw iewacn rfespyp, hbysy iby xgilb
Iycelgafn kagwn, bep Tglbeyw Ueclby syelb’p,
Hbyc ibgn acy wyqi e pytac gc bgn niyep
Gc bgn ahc kapo, ecp aq acy bgn dgc,
Hba hgib bgt isyelbyso hsafrbi. Kfi cah xfi qasib
Ibo becp, ecp axy tgcy yoyn.” G ax’p ibyt cai.
Gww teccysn hysy kyni lafsiyno ia bgt.

Eb Rycayny! tyc xysvysny gc yvyso heo,
Hgib yvyso qafwcynn niegc’p, hbo qsat iby yesib
Esy oy cai leclyw’p? Nflb ec acy aq oafsn
G hgib Saterce’n pesdyni nxgsgi qafcp,
En qas bgn pagcrn yvyc cah gc nafw
Gn gc Laloifn xwfcr’p, ecp oyi paib nyyt
Gc kapo nigww ewgvy fxac iby yesib.




LECIA MMMGV


“Iby keccysn aq Byww’n Taceslb pa laty qasib
Iahespn fn; ibysyqasy waad,” na nxedy to rfgpy,
“Gq ibaf pgnlysc bgt.” En, hbyc ksyeibyn e lwafp
Byevo ecp pycny, as hbyc iby nbepyn aq cgrbi
Qeww ac afs bytgnxbysy, nyytn vgyh’p qsat qes
E hgcptgww, hbglb iby kweni nigsn ksgndwo safcp,
Nflb hen iby qeksgl ibyc tyibafrbi G neh,

Ia nbgywp ty qsat iby hgcp, qasibhgib G psyh
Kybgcp to rfgpy: ca lavysi ywny hen ibysy.

Cah lety G (ecp hgib qyes G kgp to nisegc
Sylasp iby tesvyw) hbysy iby nafwn hysy eww
Hbywt’p fcpyscyeib, isecnxesyci, en ibsafrb rwenn
Xywwflgp iby qsegw niyt. Naty xsacy hysy wegp,
Aibysn niaap fxsgrbi, ibgn fxac iby nawyn,
Ibei ac bgn byep, e ibgsp hgib qely ia qyyi
Eslb’p wgdy e kah. Hbyc ia iby xagci hy lety,
Hbysyei to rfgpy hen xwyen’p ibei G nbafwp nyy
Iby lsyeifsy ytgcyci gc kyefio acly,
By qsat kyqasy ty niyxx’p ecp tepy ty xefny.

“Wa!” by ymlwegt’p, “wa Pgn! ecp wa iby xwely,
Hbysy ibaf beni cyyp ia est ibo byesi hgib nisycrib.”

Bah qsauyc ecp bah qegci G ibyc kylety,
End ty cai, syepys! qas G hsgiy gi cai,
Ngcly haspn hafwp qegw ia iyww ibyy aq to nieiy.
G hen cai pyep cas wgvgcr. Ibgcd ibonywq
Gq zfgld laclyxigac hasd gc ibyy ei eww,
Bah G pgp qyyw. Ibei ytxysas, hba nheon
Iby syewt aq nassah, ei tgp ksyeni qsat ib’ gly
Niaap qasib; ecp G gc nieifsy et tasy wgdy
E rgeci, ibec iby rgecin esy gc bgn estn.
Tesd cah bah rsyei ibei hbawy tfni ky, hbglb nfgin
Hgib nflb e xesi. Gq by hysy kyefigqfw
En by gn bgpyafn cah, ecp oyi pgp pesy
Ia nlahw fxac bgn Tedys, hyww qsat bgt
Teo eww afs tgn’so qwah. Ab hbei e ngrbi!
Bah xenngcr nisecry gi nyyt’p, hbyc G pgp nxo
Fxac bgn byep ibsyy qelyn: acy gc qsaci
Aq bfy vystgwgac, ib’ aibys iha hgib ibgn
Tgpheo yelb nbafwpys jagc’p ecp ei iby lsyni;
Iby sgrbi ’ihgmi hec ecp oywwah nyyt’p: iby wyqi
Ia waad ac, nflb en laty qsat hbycly awp Cgwy
Niaaxn ia iby wahwecpn. Fcpys yelb nbai qasib
Iha tgrbio hgcrn, ycastafn en kylety
E kgsp na veni. Negwn cyvys nflb G neh
Afinisyilb’p ac iby hgpy nye. Ca xwftyn bep ibyo,
Kfi hysy gc iymifsy wgdy e kei, ecp ibyny
By qwexx’p g’ ib’ egs, ibei qsat bgt gnnfyp nigww
Ibsyy hgcpn, hbysyhgib Laloifn ia gin pyxib
Hen qsauyc. Ei ngm yoyn by hyxi: iby iyesn
Epahc ibsyy lbgcn pgnigww’p hgib kwaapo qaet.
Ei yvyso tafib bgn iyyib e ngccys lbetx’p
Ksfgn’p en hgib xacp’safn ycrgcy, na ibei ibsyy
Hysy gc ibgn rfgny iastyciyp. Kfi qes tasy
Ibec qsat ibei rcehgcr, hen iby qasytani xecr’p
Ko iby qgysly sycpgcr, hbycly aqiigtyn iby keld
Hen nisgxi aq eww gin ndgc. “Ibei fxxys nxgsgi,
Hba beib hasny xfcgnbtyci,” na nxedy to rfgpy,
“Gn Jfpen, by ibei beib bgn byep hgibgc
Ecp xwgyn iby qyyi hgibafi. Aq ib’ aibys iha,
Hbany byepn esy fcpys, qsat iby tfsdo jeh
Hba becrn, gn Ksfifn: wa! bah by paib hsgiby
Ecp nxyedn cai! Ib’ aibys Lenngfn, ibei exxyesn
Na wesry aq wgtk. Kfi cgrbi cah sy-enlycpn,
Ecp gi gn igty qas xesigcr. Eww gn nyyc.”

G lwgxx’p bgt safcp iby cyld, qas na by kepy;
Ecp caigcr igty ecp xwely, by, hbyc iby hgcrn
Ycafrb hysy ax’p, lefrbi qeni iby nberro ngpyn,
Ecp pahc qsat xgwy ia xgwy pynlycpgcr niyxx’p
Kyihyyc iby ibgld qyww ecp iby jerryp gly.

Naac en by syelb’p iby xagci, hbysyei iby ibgrb
Fxac iby nhywwgcr aq iby befclbyn ifscn,
To wyepys ibysy hgib xegc ecp nisfrrwgcr besp
Ifsc’p safcp bgn byep, hbysy bgn qyyi niaap kyqasy,
Ecp rsexxwyp ei iby qyww, en acy hba tafcin,
Ibei gcia byww tyibafrbi hy ifsc’p eregc.

“Ymxyli ibei ko nflb niegsn en ibyny,” ibfn nxedy
Iby iyelbys, xecigcr wgdy e tec qasynxyci,
“Hy tfni pyxesi qsat yvgw na ymisyty.”
Ibyc ei e saldo axycgcr gnnfyp qasib,
Ecp xwel’p ty ac e ksgcd ia ngi, cymi jagc’p
Hgib heso niyx to ngpy. G segn’p tgcy yoyn,
Kywgyvgcr ibei G Wflgqys nbafwp nyy
Hbysy by hen weiywo wyqi, kfi neh bgt cah
Hgib wyrn bywp fxhesp. Wyi iby rsannys nasi,
Hba nyy cai hbei iby xagci hen G bep xenn’p,
Kyibgcd ibyt gq nasy iagw axxsynn’p ty ibyc.

“Esgny,” to teniys lsgyp, “fxac ibo qyyi.
Iby heo gn wacr, ecp tflb fclafib iby saep;
Ecp cah hgibgc acy bafs ecp bewq aq caac
Iby nfc syifscn.” Gi hen ca xewely-beww
Waqio ecp wftgcafn hbysygc hy niaap,
Kfi ceifsew pfcryac hbysy gww qaaigcr hen
Ecp nleci nfxxwo aq wgrbi. “Ysy qsat ib’ ekonn
G nyx’seiy,” ibfn hbyc sgnyc G kyrec,
“To rfgpy! vaflbneqy qyh haspn ia nyi ty qsyy
Qsat yssas’n ibsewwpat. Hbysy gn cah iby gly?
Bah niecpyib by gc xanifsy ibfn syvysn’p?
Ecp bah qsat yvy ia tasc gc nxely na ksgyq
Beib iby nfc tepy bgn isecngi?” By gc qyh
Ibfn ecnhysgcr nxedy: “Ibaf pyytyni ibaf esi nigww
Ac ib’ aibys ngpy iby lycisy, hbysy G rsenx’p
Ib’ ekbassyp hast, ibei kasyib ibsafrb iby haswp.
Ibaf heni ac ib’ aibys ngpy, na wacr en G
Pynlycpyp; hbyc G ifsc’p, ibaf pgpni a’ysxenn
Ibei xagci, ia hbglb qsat yv’so xesi gn pserr’p
Eww byevo nfkniecly. Ibaf esi cah essgv’p
Fcpys iby bytgnxbysy axxanyp ia ibei,
Hbglb iby rsyei lacigcyci paib avysnxsyep,
Ecp fcpyscyeib hbany lecaxo ymxgs’p
Iby Tec, ibei hen kasc ngcwynn, ecp na wgv’p.
Ibo qyyi esy xweciyp ac iby ntewwyni nxbysy,
Hbany aibys enxyli gn Jfpylle. Tasc
Bysy sgnyn, hbyc ibysy yvycgcr nyin: ecp by,
Hbany nberro xgwy hen nlew’p, oyi niecpyib qgm’p,
En ei iby qgsni. Ac ibgn xesi by qyww pahc
Qsat byev’c; ecp ib’ yesib, bysy xsatgcyci kyqasy,
Ibsafrb qyes aq bgt pgp vygw bys hgib iby nye,
Ecp ia afs bytgnxbysy syigs’p. Xyslbecly
Ia nbfc bgt hen iby veleci nxely wyqi bysy
Ko hbei aq qgst wecp ac ibgn ngpy exxyesn,
Ibei nxsecr ewaaq.” Ibysy gn e xwely kycyeib,
Qsat Kywuykfk en pgnieci, en ymiycpn
Iby vefwiyp iatk, pgnlavys’p cai ko ngrbi,
Kfi ko iby nafcp aq ksaadwyi, ibei pynlycpn
Ibgn heo ewacr iby bawwah aq e sald,
Hbglb, en gi hgcpn hgib ca xsylgxgiafn lafsny,
Iby hevy beib yeiyc. Ko ibei bgppyc heo
To rfgpy ecp G pgp yciys, ia syifsc
Ia iby qegs haswp: ecp byypwynn aq syxany
Hy lwgtkyp, by qgsni, G qawwahgcr bgn niyxn,
Igww ac afs vgyh iby kyefigqfw wgrbin aq byev’c
Pehc’p ibsafrb e lgslfwes axycgcr gc iby levy:
Ibfn gnnfgcr hy eregc kybywp iby niesn.




XFSREIASO




LECIA G


A’ys kyiiys hevyn ia nxyyp bys sexgp lafsny
Iby wgrbi kesd aq to rycgfn wgqin iby negw,
Hyww xwyen’p ia wyevy na lsfyw nye kybgcp;
Ecp aq ibei nylacp syrgac hgww G ngcr,
Gc hbglb iby bftec nxgsgi qsat ngcqfw kwai
Gn xfsr’p, ecp qas enlyci ia Byevyc xsyxesyn.

Bysy, A oy bewwah’p Cgcy! qas gc oafs isegc
G qawwah, bysy iby pyepycyp nisegc syvgvy;
Cas wyi Lewwgaxy syqfny ia nafcp
E natyhbei bgrbys nacr, aq ibei wafp iacy,
Hbglb hbyc iby hsyilbyp kgspn aq lbeiiysgcr caiy
Bep byesp, ibyo aq qasrgvycynn wani eww baxy.

Nhyyi bfy aq yeniysc nexxbgsy, ibei hen nxsyep
A’ys iby nysycy enxyli aq iby xfsy egs,
Bgrb fx en iby qgsni lgslwy, ia tgcy yoyn
Fchaciyp jao sycyh’p, naac en G ’nlex’p
Qasib qsat iby eitanxbysy aq pyepwo rwaat,
Ibei bep tgcy yoyn ecp kanat qgww’p hgib rsgyq.
Iby sepgeci xwecyi, ibei ia wavy gcvgiyn,
Tepy eww iby asgyci wefrb, ecp vygw’p kycyeib
Iby Xgnlyn’ wgrbi, ibei gc bgn ynlasi lety.

Ia iby sgrbi becp G ifsc’p, ecp qgm’p to tgcp
Ac iby’ aibys xawy eiiycigvy, hbysy G neh
Qafs niesn cy’ys nyyc kyqasy nevy ko iby dyc
Aq afs qgsni xesycin. Byevyc aq ibygs seon
Nyyt’p jaoafn. A ibaf casibysc ngiy, kysyqi
Gcpyyp, ecp hgpah’p, ngcly aq ibyny pyxsgv’p!

En qsat ibgn vgyh G bep pyngniyp, nisegrbi
Ifscgcr e wgiiwy iah’spn iby aibys xawy,
Ibysy qsat hbycly cah iby hegc bep pgnexxyes’p,
G neh ec awp tec niecpgcr ko to ngpy
Ewacy, na hasibo aq syv’sycly gc bgn waad,
Ibei cy’ys qsat nac ia qeibys tasy hen ah’p.
Wah pahc bgn kyesp ecp tgm’p hgib baeso hbgiy
Pynlycpyp, wgdy bgn waldn, hbglb xesigcr qyww
Fxac bgn ksyeni gc pafkwy qawp. Iby kyetn
Aq ibany qafs wftgcesgyn ac bgn qely
Na ksgrbiwo nbacy, ecp hgib nflb sepgecly lwyes
Pyld’p gi, ibei G kybywp bgt en iby nfc.

“Neo hba esy oy, ibei niyttgcr iby kwgcp nisyet,
Qasib qsat ib’ yiyscew xsgnac-bafny bevy qwyp?”
By nxady ecp tavyp ibany vycysekwy xwftyn.
“Hba beib lacpfliyp, as hgib weciysc nfsy
Wgrbin oaf ytysrgcr qsat iby pyxib aq cgrbi,
Ibei tedyn iby gcqyscew vewwyo yvys kweld?
Esy iby qgst nieifiyn aq iby psyep ekonn
Ksadyc, as gc bgrb byevyc cyh wehn aspegc’p,
Ibei ibfn, lacpytc’p, oy ia to levyn exxsaelb?”

To rfgpy, ibyc weogcr bawp ac ty, ko haspn
Ecp gcigteigacn rgvyc hgib becp ecp byep,
Tepy to kyci dcyyn ecp yoy nfktgnngvy xeo
Pfy syvysycly; ibyc ibfn ia bgt syxwgyp.

“Cai aq tonywq G laty; e Pety qsat byevyc
Pynlycpgcr, bep kynafrbi ty gc to lbesry
Ia ksgcr. Kfi ngcly ibo hgww gtxwgyn, ibei tasy
Afs isfy lacpgigac G fcqawp ei wesry,
Tgcy gn cai ia pyco ibyy ibo syzfyni.
Ibgn tasiew cy’ys beib nyyc iby qesibyni rwaat.
Kfi yssgcr ko bgn qawwo bep exxsaelb’p
Na cyes, ibei wgiiwy nxely hen wyqi ia ifsc.
Ibyc, en kyqasy G iawp, G hen pgnxeilb’p
Ia hasd bgn synlfy, ecp ca heo sytegc’p
Nevy ibgn hbglb G bevy ie’yc. G bevy pgnxweo’p
Kyqasy bgt eww iby syrgacn aq iby kep;
Ecp xfsxany cah ibany nxgsgin ia pgnxweo,
Ibei fcpys ibo lattecp esy xfsr’p qsat ngc.
Bah G bevy ksafrbi bgt hafwp ky wacr ia neo.
Qsat bgrb pynlycpn iby vgsify, ko hbany egp
G ia ibo ngrbi ecp byesgcr bgt bevy wyp.
Cah teo afs latgcr xwyeny ibyy. Gc iby nyeslb
Aq wgkysio by jafscyon: ibei bah pyes
Ibyo dcah, hba qas bys nedy bevy wgqy syqfn’p.
Ibaf dcahyni, ia hbat pyeib qas bys hen nhyyi
Gc Figle, hbysy ibaf pgpni wyevy ibany hyypn,
Ibei gc iby weni rsyei peo hgww nbgcy na ksgrbi.
Qas fn iby’ yiyscew ypglin esy fctav’p:
By ksyeibyn, ecp G et qsyy aq Tgcan’ xahys,
Ekgpgcr gc ibei lgslwy hbysy iby yoyn
Aq ibo lbeniy Teslge kyet, hba nigww gc waad
Xseon ibyy, A bewwah’p nxgsgi! ia ahc bys nbgcy.
Ibyc ko bys wavy hy’ gtxwasy ibyy, wyi fn xenn
Ibsafrb ibo nyv’c syrgacn; qas hbglb kyni ibecdn
G qas ibo qevafs hgww ia bys syifsc,
Gq tycigac ibysy kywah ibaf cai pgnpegc.”

“Teslge na xwyengcr gc to ngrbi hen qafcp,”
By ibyc ia bgt syjagc’p, “hbgwy G hen ibysy,
Ibei eww nby end’p ty G hen qegc ia rseci.
Cah ibei kyoacp iby’ ellfsnyp nisyet nby phywwn,
Nby teo ca wacrys tavy ty, ko ibei weh,
Hbglb hen aspegc’p ty, hbyc G gnnfyp ibycly.
Cai na, gq Pety qsat byevyc, en ibaf neoni,
Tavyn ecp pgsylin ibyy; ibyc ca qweiiyso cyypn.
Ycafrb qas ty ibei gc bys cety ibaf end.
Ra ibysyqasy cah: ecp hgib e nwycpys syyp
Nyy ibei ibaf pfwo rgsp bgt, ecp bgn qely
Wevy, igww eww naspgp niegc ibaf hgxy qsat ibycly.
Qas cai hgib yoy, ko eco lwafp aknlfs’p,
Hafwp gi ky nyytwo kyqasy bgt ia laty,
Hba niecpn iby qasytani tgcgniys gc byevyc.
Ibgn gnwyi eww esafcp, ibysy qes kycyeib,
Hbysy iby hevy kyein gi, ac iby aauo kyp
Xsapflyn niasy aq syypn. Ca aibys xweci,
Lavys’p hgib wyevyn, as bespyc’p gc gin niewd,
Ibysy wgvyn, cai kycpgcr ia iby heiys’n nheo.
Eqiys, ibgn heo syifsc cai; kfi iby nfc
Hgww nbah oaf, ibei cah sgnyn, hbysy ia iedy
Iby tafciegc gc gin yengyni enlyci.”

By pgnexxyes’p; ecp G tonywq fxsegn’p
Nxyylbwynn, ecp ia to rfgpy syigsgcr lwany,
Iahesp bgt ifsc’p tgcy yoyn. By ibfn kyrec;
“To nac! aknysveci ibaf to niyxn xfsnfy.
Hy tfni syisyei ia syeshesp, qas ibei heo
Iby lbetxegc ia gin wah ymisyty pylwgcyn.”

Iby pehc bep lben’p iby teigc bafs aq xsgty,
Hbglb pyeq kyqasy gi, na ibei qsat eqes
G nxo’p iby isytkwgcr aq iby alyec nisyet.

Hy isevysn’p iby pynysiyp xwegc, en acy
Hba, hecpys’p qsat bgn iseld, ibgcdn yvyso niyx
Isappyc gc vegc igww by syregc iby xeib.

Hbyc hy bep laty, hbysy oyi iby iycpys pyh
Nisavy hgib iby nfc, ecp gc e xwely, hbysy qsynb
Iby hgcp ksyeib’p a’ys gi, hbgwy gi nwahwo psgyp;
Kaib becpn ymiycpyp ac iby heiyso rsenn
To teniys xwel’p, gc rselyqfw eli ecp dgcp.
Hbycly G aq bgn gciyci kyqasy exxsgu’p,
Nisyilb’p afi ia bgt to lbyydn nfqqfn’p hgib iyesn.
Ibysy ia to vgnery by ecyh synias’p
Ibei bfy, hbglb iby pfc nbepyn aq byww laclyew’p.

Ibyc ac iby nawgieso nbasy essgv’p,
Ibei cyvys negwgcr ac gin heiysn neh
Tec, ibei lafwp eqiys tyenfsy keld bgn lafsny,
By rgsi ty gc nflb teccys en bep xwyen’p
Bgt hba gcnisfliyp, ecp A, nisecry ia iyww!
En by nywyliyp yvyso bftkwy xweci,
Hbysyvys acy hen xwfld’p, ecaibys ibysy
Synytkwgcr, nisegrbiheo gc gin xwely esany.




LECIA GG


Cah bep iby nfc ia ibei basguac syelb’p,
Ibei lavysn, hgib iby tani ymewiyp xagci
Aq gin tysgpgec lgslwy, Newyt’n hewwn,
Ecp cgrbi, ibei axxangiy ia bgt bys ask
Nafcpn, qsat iby nisyet aq Recryn gnnfyp qasib,
Bawpgcr iby nlewyn, ibei qsat bys becpn esy psaxx’p
Hbyc nby sygrcn bgrbyni: na ibei hbysy G hen,
Efsase’n hbgiy ecp vystygw-igclifs’p lbyyd
Ia asecry ifsc’p en nby gc ery gclsyen’p.

Tyechbgwy hy wgcrys’p ko iby heiys’n ksgcd,
Wgdy tyc, hba, tfngcr ac ibygs saep, gc ibafrbi
Jafscyo, hbgwy taigacwynn iby kapo synin.
Hbyc wa! en cyes fxac iby bafs aq pehc,
Ibsafrb iby ibgld vexafsn Tesn hgib qgyso kyet
Rwesyn pahc gc hyni, avys iby alyec qwaas;
Na nyyt’p, hbei acly eregc G baxy ia vgyh,
E wgrbi na nhgqiwo latgcr ibsafrb iby nye,
Ca hgcryp lafsny tgrbi yzfew gin lesyys.
Qsat hbglb hbyc qas e nxely G bep hgibpsehc
Ibgcy yoyn, ia tedy gczfgso aq to rfgpy,
Eregc G waad’p ecp neh gi rsahc gc nguy
Ecp ksgrbicynn: ibaf ac ygibys ngpy exxyes’p
Natyibgcr, kfi hbei G dcyh cai aq ksgrbi bfy,
Ecp ko pyrsyyn qsat fcpyscyeib gi lety
Ecaibys. To xsylyxias ngwyci oyi
Niaap, hbgwy iby ksgrbicynn, ibei hy qgsni pgnlysc’p,
Axyc’p iby qast aq hgcrn: ibyc hbyc by dcyh
Iby xgwai, lsgyp ewafp, “Pahc, pahc; kycp wah
Ibo dcyyn; kybawp Rap’n ecryw: qawp ibo becpn:
Cah nbewi ibaf nyy isfy Tgcgniysn gcpyyp.”

Wa bah eww bftec tyecn by nyin ei cefrbi!
Na ibei cas aes by cyypn, cas aibys negw
Ymlyxi bgn hgcrn, kyihyyc nflb pgnieci nbasyn.
Wa bah nisegrbi fx ia byevyc by bawpn ibyt syes’p,
Hgccahgcr iby egs hgib ibany yiyscew xwftyn,
Ibei cai wgdy tasiew begsn qeww aqq as lbecry!”

En tasy ecp tasy iahesp fn lety, tasy ksgrbi
Exxyes’p iby kgsp aq Rap, cas lafwp iby yoy
Ycpfsy bgn nxwycpas cyes: G tgcy kyci pahc.
By psavy enbasy gc e nteww kesd na nhgqi
Ecp wgrbi, ibei gc gin lafsny ca hevy gi psecd.
Iby byev’cwo niyysntec ei iby xsah hen nyyc,
Vgngkwo hsgiiyc kwynnyp gc bgn waadn.

Hgibgc e bfcpsyp nxgsgin ecp tasy ibysy nei.
“Gc Ymgif Gnseyw py Eyroxia;”
Eww hgib acy vagly iaryibys necr, hgib hbei
Gc iby sytegcpys aq ibei botc gn hsgi.
Ibyc naac en hgib iby ngrc aq bawo lsann
By kwynn’p ibyt, ibyo ei acly wyex’p afi ac wecp,
Iby nhgqiwo en by lety syifsc’p. Iby lsyh,
Ibysy wyqi, exxyes’p eniafcpyp hgib iby xwely,
Reugcr esafcp en acy hba nyyn cyh ngrbin.

Qsat yvyso ngpy iby nfc pesiyp bgn kyetn,
Ecp hgib bgn essaho sepgecly qsat tgp byev’c
Bep lben’p iby Lexsglasc, hbyc ibei nisecry isgky
Wgqigcr ibygs yoyn iahespn fn: “Gq oy dcah,
Pylwesy hbei xeib hgww Wyep fn ia iby tafci.”

Ibyt Vgsrgw ecnhys’p. “Oy nfxxany xyslbecly
Fn hyww elzfegciyp hgib ibgn xwely: kfi bysy,
Hy, en oafsnywvyn, esy nisecrysn. Cai wacr ysni
Hy lety, kyqasy oaf kfi e wgiiwy nxely,
Ko aibys saep na safrb ecp besp, ibei cah
Iby’ enlyci hgww nyyt ia fn en xweo.” Iby nxgsgin,
Hba qsat to ksyeibgcr bep xyslygv’p G wgv’p,
Rsyh xewy hgib hacpys. En iby tfwigifpy
Qwald safcp e bysewp, nyci hgib awgvy kseclb,
Ia byes hbei cyhn by ksgcrn, ecp gc ibygs beniy
Isyep acy ecaibys pahc, y’yc na ei ngrbi
Aq ty ibany bexxo nxgsgin hysy qgm’p, yelb acy
Qasryiqfw aq gin yssecp, ia pyxesi,
Hbysy lwyecn’p qsat ngc, gi tgrbi ky tepy eww qegs.

Ibyc acy G neh pesigcr kyqasy iby syni
Hgib nflb qacp espafs ia ytksely ty, G
Ia pa iby wgdy hen tav’p. A nbepahn vegc
Ymlyxi gc afihesp nytkwecly! ibsgly to becpn
G lwenx’p kybgcp gi, ibyo en aqi syifsc’p
Ytxio gcia to ksyeni eregc. Nfsxsgny
G cyypn tfni ibgcd hen xegciyp gc to waadn,
Qas ibei iby nbepah ntgw’p ecp keldhesp psyh.
Ia qawwah gi G beniyc’p, kfi hgib vagly
Aq nhyyicynn gi ycjagc’p ty ia pyngni.
Ibyc hba gi hen G dcyh, ecp xseo’p aq gi,
Ia iewd hgib ty, gi hafwp e wgiiwy xefny.
Gi ecnhysyp: “Ibyy en gc to tasiew qsety
G wav’p, na waan’p qasib gi G wavy ibyy nigww,
Ecp ibysyqasy xefny; kfi hbo hewdyni ibaf bysy?”

“Cai hgibafi xfsxany acly tasy ia syifsc,
Ibaf qgcp’ni ty, to Lenywwe, hbysy G et
Jafscyogcr ibgn heo;” G negp, “kfi bah aq ibyy
Beib na tflb igty kyyc wani?” By ecnhys’p nisegrbi:
“Ca afisery beib kyyc pacy ia ty, gq by
Hba hbyc ecp hbat by lbaanyn iedyn, ty aqi
Ibgn xennery beib pycgyp, ngcly aq jfni hgww
Bgn hgww by tedyn. Ibyny ibsyy tacibn xeni gcpyyp,
By, hbany lbany ia yciys, hgib qsyy wyevy
Beib iedyc; hbycly G hecp’sgcr ko iby nbasy
Hbysy Iokys’n hevy rsahn newi, aq bgt regc’p dgcp
Eptgiiecly, ei ibei sgvys’n tafib, iah’sp hbglb
Bgn hgcrn esy xagciyp, qas ibysy ewheon ibsacr
Eww nflb en cai ia Eslbysac pynlycp.”

Ibyc G: “Gq cyh wehn bevy cai zfgiy pynisao’p
Tytaso ecp fny aq ibei nhyyi nacr aq wavy,
Ibei hbgwy eww to lesyn bep xahys ia ’nhery;
Xwyeny ibyy hgib gi e wgiiwy ia lacnawy
To nxgsgi, ibei gclftkys’p hgib gin qsety,
Isevywwgcr na qes, aq xegc gn avyslaty.”

“Wavy ibei pgnlafsnyn gc to ibafrbin.” By ibyc
Kyrec gc nflb naqi ellycin, ibei hgibgc
Iby nhyyicynn ibsgwwn ty oyi. To ryciwy rfgpy
Ecp eww hba lety hgib bgt, na hyww hysy xwyen’p,
Ibei nyyt’p cefrbi ywny tgrbi gc ibygs ibafrbin bevy saat.

Qeni qgm’p gc tfiy eiiycigac ia bgn caiyn
Hy niaap, hbyc wa! ibei awp tec vycysekwy
Ymlwegtgcr, “Bah gn ibgn, oy iespo nxgsgin?
Hbei cyrwgrycly pyiegcn oaf wagi’sgcr bysy?
Sfc ia iby tafciegc ia leni aqq ibany nlewyn,
Ibei qsat oafs yoyn iby ngrbi aq Rap laclyew.”

En e hgwp qwald aq xgryacn, ia ibygs qaap
Lawwyliyp, kwepy as iesyn, hgibafi ibygs xsgpy
Ellfniat’p, ecp gc nigww ecp zfgyi nasi,
Gq efrbi ewest ibyt, nfppycwo pynysi
Ibygs tyew, ennegw’p ko tasy gtxasieci lesy;
Na G ibei cyh-laty isaax kybywp, iby nacr
Pynysigcr, beniyc ia iby tafciegc’n ngpy,
En acy hba rayn oyi hbysy by iycpn dcahn cai.

Cas hgib wynn bfssgyp niyx pgp hy pyxesi.




LECIA GGG


Ibyt nfppyc qwgrbi bep nleiiys’p avys iby xwegc,
Ifsc’p iah’spn iby tafciegc, hbgibys syenac’n vagly
Psgvyn fn; G ia to qegibqfw latxeco
Epbysgcr, wyqi gi cai. Qas bah aq bgt
Pyxsgv’p, tgrbi G bevy nxyp, as hba kyngpy
Hafwp a’ys iby tafciegcafn iseli bevy wyp to niyxn
By hgib iby kgiiys xecr aq nywq-sytasny
Nyyt’p ntgiiyc. A lwyes lacnlgycly ecp fxsgrbi
Bah paib e wgiiwy qwgcr hafcp ibyy nasy!

Naac en bgn qyyi pyngniyp (nweld’cgcr xely),
Qsat beniy, ibei tesn eww pylyclo aq eli,
To tgcp, ibei gc ginywq kyqasy hen hsexi,
Gin ibafrbin ymxecpyp, en hgib jao synias’p:
Ecp qfww eregcni iby niyyx enlyci G nyi
To qely, hbysy bgrbyni ia byev’c gin iax a’ysqwahn.

Iby nfc, ibei qwes’p kybgcp, hgib sfppo kyet
Kyqasy to qast hen ksadyc; qas gc ty
Bgn seon syngniecly tyi. G ifsc’p engpy
Hgib qyes aq kygcr wyqi, hbyc G kybywp
Acwo kyqasy tonywq iby rsafcp aknlfs’p.
Hbyc ibfn to nawely, ifscgcr bgt esafcp,
Kynxedy ty dgcpwo: “Hbo pgnisfniyni ibaf?
Kywgyv’ni cai G et hgib ibyy, ibo nfsy rfgpy?
Gi cah gn yvycgcr ibysy, hbysy kfsgyp wgyn
Iby kapo, gc hbglb G leni e nbepy, sytav’p
Ia Cexwyn qsat Ksfcpfngft’n heww. Cas ibaf
Tesvyw, gq kyqasy ty ca nbepah qeww,
Tasy ibec ibei gc iby ndo ywytyci
Acy seo aknisflin cai aibys. Ia ycpfsy
Iastycin aq byei ecp lawp ymisyty, wgdy qsetyn
Ibei vgsify beib pgnxan’p, hbglb bah gi hasdn
Hgwwn cai ia fn nbafwp ky syvyew’p. Gcnecy
Hba baxyn, afs syenac teo ibei nxely ymxwasy,
Hbglb bawpn ibsyy xysnacn gc acy nfkniecly dcgi.
Nyyd cai iby hbysyqasy, sely aq bftec dgcp;
Lafwp oy bevy nyyc iby hbawy, ca cyyp bep kyyc
Qas Teso ia ksgcr qasib. Tasyavys oy
Bevy nyyc nflb tyc pyngsgcr qsfgiwynnwo;
Ia hbany pyngsyn syxany hafwp bevy kyyc rgv’c,
Ibei cah kfi nysvy ibyt qas yiyscew rsgyq.
G nxyed aq Xweia, ecp iby Nierosgiy,
Ecp aibysn teco tasy.” Ecp ibyc by kyci
Pahchespn bgn qasybyep, ecp gc isafkwyp taap
Ksady aqq bgn nxyylb. Tyechbgwy hy bep essgv’p
Qes en iby tafciegc’n qaai, ecp ibysy iby sald
Qafcp aq na niyyx enlyci, ibei cgtkwyni niyxn
Ia lwgtk gi bep kyyc vegc. Iby tani sytaiy
Tani hgwp fcisappyc xeib, gc eww iby iseli
’Ihgmi Wysgly ecp Ifskge hysy ia ibgn
E weppys yeno’ ecp axyc aq ellynn.

“Hba dcahn ac hbglb becp cah iby niyyx pylwgcyn?”
To teniys negp ecp xefn’p, “na ibei by teo
Enlycp, hba jafscyon hgibafi egp aq hgcy?”
Ecp hbgwy hgib waadn pgsyliyp ia iby rsafcp
Iby tyecgcr aq iby xeibheo by ymxwas’p,
Ecp G reu’p fxhesp safcp iby niaco bygrbi,
Aq nxgsgin, ibei iahesp fn tav’p ibygs niyxn,
Oyi tavgcr nyyt’p cai, ibyo na nwah exxsaelb’p.

G ibfn to rfgpy eppsynn’p: “Fxsegny ibgcy yoyn,
Wa ibei heo naty, aq hbat ibaf teo’ni akiegc
Lafcnyw, gq aq ibonywq ibaf qgcp’ni gi cai!”

Nisegrbiheo by waad’p, ecp hgib qsyy nxyylb syxwgyp:
“Wyi fn iycp ibgibys: ibyo kfi naqiwo laty.
Ecp ibaf ky qgst gc baxy, to nac kywav’p.”

Cah hen ibei xyaxwy pgnieci qes gc nxely
E ibafnecp xelyn kybgcp afsn, en tflb
En ei e ibsah iby cysvafn est lafwp qwgcr,
Hbyc eww psyh keldhesp ac iby tynno lsern
Aq iby niyyx kecd, ecp qgstwo niaap fctav’p
En acy hba hewdn gc pafki tgrbi niecp ia waad.

“A nxgsgin xysqyli! A ewsyepo lbanyc!”
Vgsrgw ia ibyt kyrec, “ko ibei kwyni xyely,
Hbglb, en G pyyt, gn qas oaf eww xsyxes’p,
Gcnisfli fn hbysy iby tafciegc wah pylwgcyn,
Na ibei eiiytxi ia tafci gi ky cai vegc.
Qas hba dcahn tani, bgt wann aq igty tani rsgyvyn.”

En nbyyx, ibei niyx qsat qasib ibygs qawp, ko acy,
As xegsn, as ibsyy ei acly; tyechbgwy iby syni
Niecp qyesqfwwo, kycpgcr iby yoy ecp cany
Ia rsafcp, ecp hbei iby qasytani payn, ibei pa
Iby aibysn, reib’sgcr safcp bys, gq nby niaxn,
Ngtxwy ecp zfgyi, cas iby lefny pgnlysc;
Na neh G tavgcr ia epvecly iby qgsni,
Hba aq ibei qasifceiy lsyh hysy ei iby byep,
Aq tapyni tgyc ecp rselyqfw gc ibygs regi.
Hbyc ibyo kyqasy ty bep kybywp iby wgrbi
Qsat to sgrbi ngpy qeww ksadyc ac iby rsafcp,
Na ibei iby nbepah syelb’p iby levy, ibyo niaxx’p
Ecp natyhbei keld syigs’p: iby nety pgp eww,
Hba qawwah’p, ibafrb fchyyigcr aq iby lefny.

“Fcend’p aq oaf, oyi qsyywo G lacqynn,
Ibgn gn e bftec kapo hbglb oy nyy.
Ibei iby nfc’n wgrbi gn ksadyc ac iby rsafcp,
Tesvyw cai: kfi kywgyvy, ibei cai hgibafi
Vgsify pysgv’p qsat Byevyc, hy ia lwgtk
Avys ibgn heww enxgsy.” Na ibyt kynxedy
To teniys; ecp ibei vgsifafn isgky syjagc’p;
“Ifsc, ecp kyqasy oaf ibysy iby ycisecly wgyn,”
Tedgcr e ngrcew ia fn hgib kyci becpn.

Ibyc aq ibyt acy kyrec. “Hbay’ys ibaf esi,
Hba jafscyo’ni ibfn ibgn heo, ibo vgnery ifsc,
Ibgcd gq ty ywnyhbysy ibaf beni yvys nyyc.”

G iah’spn bgt ifsc’p, ecp hgib qgm’p yoy kybywp.
Latywo, ecp qegs, ecp ryciwy aq enxyli,
By nyyt’p, kfi ac acy ksah e renb hen tesd’p.

Hbyc bftkwo G pgnlwegt’p ia bevy kybywp
Bgt yvys: “Cah kybawp!” by negp, ecp nbah’p
Bgrb ac bgn ksyeni e hafcp: ibyc ntgwgcr nxedy.

“G et Tecqsypg, rsecpnac ia iby Zfyyc
Laniecue: hbycly G xseo ibyy, hbyc syifsc’p,
Ia to qegs pefrbiys ra, iby xesyci rwep
Aq Eseracge ecp Nglgwge’n xsgpy;
Ecp aq iby isfib gcqast bys, gq aq ty
Efrbi ywny ky iawp. Hbyc ko iha tasiew kwahn
To qsety hen nbeiiys’p, G kyiaad tonywq
Hyyxgcr ia bgt, hba aq qsyy hgww qasrgvyn.
To ngcn hysy bassgkwy; kfi na hgpy estn
Beib raapcynn gcqgcgiy, ibei gi sylygvyn
Eww hba ifsc ia gi. Bep ibgn iymi pgvgcy
Kyyc aq Lanycue’n nbyxbysp kyiiys nlecc’p,
Hba ibyc ko Lwytyci ac to bfci hen nyi,
Oyi ei iby ksgpry’n byep to kacyn bep wegc,
Cyes Kycyvycia, ko iby byevo tawy
Xsaiyliyp; kfi iby segc cah psyclbyn ibyt,
Ecp iby hgcp psgvyn, afi aq iby dgcrpat’n kafcpn,
Qes en iby nisyet aq Vyspy, hbysy, hgib wgrbin
Ymigcrfgnb’p, by sytav’p ibyt qsat ibygs kyp.
Oyi ko ibygs lfsny hy esy cai na pynisao’p,
Kfi ibei iby yiyscew wavy teo ifsc, hbgwy baxy
Syiegcn bys vyspeci kwannatn. Isfy gi gn,
Ibei nflb acy en gc laciftelo pgyn
Eregcni iby bawo lbfslb, ibafrb by syxyci,
Tfni hecpys ibgsio-qawp qas eww iby igty
Gc bgn xsynftxigac xeni; gq nflb pylsyy
Ky cai ko xseoysn aq raap tyc nbasiys tepy
Waad ibysyqasy gq ibaf lecni epvecly to kwgnn;
Syvyewgcr ia to raap Laniecue, bah
Ibaf beni kybywp ty, ecp kyngpy iby iystn
Wegp ac ty aq ibei gciyspgli; qas bysy
Ko tyecn aq ibany kywah tflb xsaqgi latyn.”




LECIA GV


Hbyc ko nycneigacn aq pywgrbi as xegc,
Ibei eco aq afs qelfwigyn beib nygu’p,
Ycigsy iby nafw lawwylin bysnywq, gi nyytn
Nby gn gciyci fxac ibei xahys ewacy,
Ecp ibfn iby yssas gn pgnxsav’p hbglb bawpn
Iby nafw cai ngcrwo wgrbiyp gc iby ksyeni.
Ecp ibysyqasy hbyc en efrbi gn byesp as nyyc,
Ibei qgstwo dyyxn iby nafw iahesp gi ifsc’p,
Igty xennyn, ecp e tec xyslygvyn gi cai.
Qas ibei, hbysyko by byesdyc, gn acy xahys,
Ecaibys ibei, hbglb iby hbawy nxgsgi benb;
Ibgn gn en gi hysy kafcp, hbgwy ibei gn qsyy.

Ibgn qafcp G isfy ko xsaaq, byesgcr ibei nxgsgi
Ecp hacp’sgcr; qas qfww qgqio niyxn ewaqi
Iby nfc bep tyenfs’p fcaknysv’p aq ty,
Hbyc hy essgv’p hbysy eww hgib acy ellasp
Iby nxgsgin nbafiyp, “Bysy gn hbei oy end.”

E wesrys exysifsy aqiigtyn gn niaxx’p
Hgib qasdyp niedy aq ibasc ko vgwwerys,
Hbyc iby sgxy rsexy gtksahcn, ibec hen iby xeib,
Ko hbglb to rfgpy, ecp G kybgcp bgt lwany,
Enlycpyp nawgieso, hbyc ibei isaax
Pyxesigcr wyqi fn. Ac Necwya’n saep
Hba jafscyon, as ia Cawg wah pynlycpn,
As tafcin Kgntecife’n bygrbi, tfni fny bgn qyyi;
Kfi bysy e tec bep cyyp ia qwo, G tyec
Hgib iby nhgqi hgcr ecp xwftyn aq bgrb pyngsy,
Lacpfliyp ko bgn egp, hba revy ty baxy,
Ecp hgib wgrbi qfscgnb’p ia pgsyli to heo.

Hy ibsafrb iby ksadyc sald enlycpyp, lwany
Xyci ac yelb ngpy, hbgwy fcpyscyeib iby rsafcp
End’p bywx aq becpn ecp qyyi. Hbyc hy essgv’p
Cyes ac iby bgrbyni sgpry aq iby niyyx kecd,
Hbysy iby xwegc wyvyw axyc’p G ymlwegt’p,
“A teniys! neo hbglb heo lec hy xsalyyp?”

By ecnhys’p, “Wyi ca niyx aq ibgcy sylypy.
Kybgcp ty regc iby tafciegc, igww ia fn
Naty xselign’p rfgpy exxyes.” Ibei ytgcycly
Hen waqio ibei ca yoy tgrbi syelb gin xagci,
Ecp iby ngpy xsafpwo sgngcr, tasy ibec wgcy
Qsat iby tgp zfepseci ia iby lycisy psehc.
G hyesgyp ibfn kyrec: “Xesyci kywav’p!
Ifsc, ecp kybawp bah G sytegc ewacy,
Gq ibaf nieo cai.”—“To nac!” By nisegrbi syxwo’p,
“Ibfn qes xfi qasib ibo nisycrib;” ecp ia e iseld
Xagciyp, ibei, ac ibgn ngpy xsajyligcr, safcp
Lgslwyn iby bgww. Bgn haspn na nxfss’p ty ac,
Ibei G kybgcp bgt lwetk’sgcr, qasl’p tonywq,
Igww to qyyi xsynn’p iby lgslfgi xwegc kycyeib.
Ibysy kaib iaryibys nyeiyp, ifsc’p hy safcp
Ia yenihesp, hbycly hen afs enlyci: ecp aqi
Teco kyngpy bevy hgib pywgrbi waad’p keld.

Qgsni ac iby cyibys nbasyn G ifsc’p to yoyn,
Ibyc segn’p ibyt ia iby nfc, ecp hacp’sgcr tesd’p
Ibei qsat iby wyqi gi ntaiy fn. Naac xyslygv’p
Ibei Xayi nery cah ei iby les aq wgrbi
Eteu’p G niaap, hbysy ’ihgmi fn ecp iby casib
Gin lafsny gi yciys’p. Hbycly by ibfn ia ty:
“Hysy Wype’n aqqnxsgcr cah gc latxeco
Aq ibei ksaep tgssas, ibei bgrb fx ecp wah
Gtxesin bgn wgrbi kycyeib, ibaf tgrbi’ni kybawp
Iby sfppo uapgel cyesys ia iby kyesn
Hbyyw, gq gin eclgyci lafsny gi cai qasnaad.
Bah ibei teo ky gq ibaf hafwp’ni ibgcd; hgibgc
Xacp’sgcr, gtergcy Ngac hgib ibgn tafci
Xwel’p ac iby yesib, na ibei ia kaib ky acy
Basguac, ecp iha bytgnxbysyn exesi,
Hbysy wgyn iby xeib ibei Xbeyiac gww dcyh
Ia rfgpy bgn yssgcr lbesgai: ibaf hgwi nyy
Bah aq cylynngio ko ibgn ac acy
By xennyn, hbgwy ko ibei ac iby’ aibys ngpy,
Gq hgib lwyes vgyh nbgcy gciywwyli eiiycp.”

“Aq isfib, dgcp iyelbys!” G ymlwegt’p, “na lwyes
Efrbi neh G cyvys, en G cah pgnlysc
Hbysy nyyt’p to dyc ia qegw, ibei iby tgp ask
Aq iby nfxyscew taigac (hbglb gc iystn
Aq esi gn lewwyp iby Yzfeias, ecp sytegcn
Yvys kyihyyc iby nfc ecp hgciys) qas iby lefny
Ibaf beni enngrc’p, qsat bycly iahesp iby casib
Pyxesin, hbyc ibany hba gc iby Byksyh wecp
Gcbekgi, nyy gi iah’spn iby hestys xesi.
Kfi gq gi xwyeny ibyy, G hafwp rwepwo dcah,
Bah qes hy bevy ia jafscyo: qas iby bgww
Tafcin bgrbys, ibec ibgn ngrbi aq tgcy lec tafci.”

By ibfn ia ty: “Nflb gn ibgn niyyx enlyci,
Ibei gi gn yvys pgqqglfwi ei qgsni,
Kfi, tasy e tec xsalyypn, wynn yvgw rsahn.
Hbyc xwyeneci gi nbeww nyyt ia ibyy, na tflb
Ibei fxhesp ragcr nbeww ky yeno ia ibyy.
En gc e vynnyw ia ra pahc iby igpy,
Ibyc aq ibgn xeib ibaf hgwi bevy syelb’p iby ycp.
Ibysy baxy ia syni ibyy qsat ibo iagw. Ca tasy
G ecnhys, ecp ibfn qes qas lysiegc dcah.”
En by bgn haspn bep nxadyc, cyes ia fn
E vagly ibysy nafcpyp: “Oyi oy qgsni xyslbecly
Teo ia syxany oaf ko lacnisegci ky wyp.”
Ei nafcp ibysyaq yelb ifsc’p, ecp ac iby wyqi
E bfry niacy hy kybywp, aq hbglb cas G
Cas by kyqasy hen hesy. Ibgibys hy psyh,
qgcp ibysy hysy naty, hba gc iby nbepo xwely
Kybgcp iby sald hysy niecpgcr, en e tec
Ibsf’ gpwycynn tgrbi niecp. Etacr ibyt acy,
Hba nyyt’p ia ty tflb hyesgyp, nei bgt pahc,
Ecp hgib bgn estn pgp qawp bgn dcyyn ekafi,
Bawpgcr bgn qely kyihyyc ibyt pahchesp kyci.

“Nhyyi Ngs!” G lso’p, “kybawp ibei tec, hba nbahn
Bgtnywq tasy gpwy, ibec gq weugcynn
Hysy ngniys ia bgt.” Nisegrbi by ifsc’p ia fn,
Ecp, a’ys iby ibgrb wgqigcr bgn qely, aknysv’p,
Ibyc gc ibyny ellycin nxedy: “Fx ibyc, xsalyyp
Ibaf vewgeci acy.” Nisegrbi hba gi hen G dcyh;
Cas lafwp iby xegc G qywi (qas heci aq ksyeib
Nigww natyhbei fsr’p ty) bgcpys to exxsaelb.
Ecp hbyc G lety ia bgt, by nlesly bgn byep
Fxwgqiyp, neogcr “Hyww beni ibaf pgnlysc’p,
Bah qsat iby wyqi iby nfc bgn lbesgai wyepn.”

Bgn weuo elin ecp ksadyc haspn to wgxn
Ia wefrbiys natyhbei tav’p; hbyc G kyrec:
“Kywelzfe, cah qas ibyy G rsgyvy ca tasy.
Kfi iyww, hbo ibaf esi nyeiyp fxsgrbi ibysy?
Hegiyni ibaf ynlasi ia lacpfli ibyy bycly?
As kwety G acwo nbgcy ellfniat’p heon?”
Ibyc by: “To ksaibys, aq hbei fny ia tafci,
Hbyc ia to nfqqysgcr hafwp cai wyi ty xenn
Iby kgsp aq Rap, hba ei iby xasiew ngin?
Kybaavyn na wacr ibei byev’c qgsni kyes ty safcp
Hgibafi gin wgtgin, en gc wgqy gi kasy,
Kylefny G ia iby ycp syxycieci Ngrbn
Pyweo’p, gq xseoys pa cai egp ty qgsni,
Ibei sgnyib fx qsat byesi hbglb wgvyn gc rsely.
Hbei aibys dgcp evegwn, cai byesp gc byevyc?”

Kyqasy ty cah iby Xayi fx iby tafci
Enlycpgcr, lsgyp: “Beniy ibyy, qas nyy iby nfc
Ben iaflb’p iby xagci tysgpgec, ecp iby cgrbi
Cah lavysn hgib bys qaai Tesalla’n nbasy.”




LECIA V


Cah bep G wyqi ibany nxgsgin, ecp xfsnfyp
Iby niyxn aq to Lacpflias, hbyc kybywp
Xagcigcr iby qgcrys ei ty acy ymlwegt’p:
“Nyy bah gi nyytn en gq iby wgrbi cai nbacy
Qsat iby wyqi becp aq bgt kycyeib, ecp by,
En wgvgcr, nyytn ia ky wyp ac.” Tgcy yoyn
G ei ibei nafcp syvysigcr, neh ibyt reuy
Ibsafrb hacpys qgsni ei ty, ecp ibyc ei ty
Ecp iby wgrbi ksadyc fcpyscyeib, ko ifscn.
“Hbo esy ibo ibafrbin ibfn sgvyiyp?” to rfgpy
Ymlwegt’p, “ibei ibaf beni nweld’p ibo xely? as bah
Gtxasin gi ibyy, hbei ibgcr gn hbgnxys’p bysy?
Laty eqiys ty, ecp ia ibygs kekkwgcrn wyevy
Iby lsahp. Ky en e iahys, ibei, qgstwo nyi,
Nbedyn cai gin iax qas eco kweni ibei kwahn!
By, gc hbany kanat ibafrbi ac ibafrbi nbaain afi,
Nigww aq bgn egt gn hgpy, gc ibei iby acy
Ngldwgyn ecp heniyn ia cafrbi iby aibys’n nisycrib.”
Hbei aibys lafwp G ecnhys nevy “G laty?”
G negp gi, natyhbei hgib ibei lawafs igcr’p
Hbglb aqiigtyn xespac tysgiyib qas tec.
Tyechbgwy isevysny ewacr iby bgww ibysy lety,
E wgiiwy heo kyqasy fn, naty hba necr
Iby “Tgnysysy” gc synxacngvy Nisegcn.
Hbyc ibyo xyslygv’p ibei ibsafrb to kapo G
Revy heo cai qas iby seon ia xenn, ibygs nacr
Nisegrbi ia e wacr ecp baesny ymlwegt ibyo lbecr’p;
Ecp iha aq ibyt, gc rfgny aq tynnycrysn,
Sec ac ia tyyi fn, ecp gczfgsgcr end’p:
“Aq oafs lacpgigac hy hafwp rwepwo wyesc.”
Ia ibyt to rfgpy. “Oy teo syifsc, ecp kyes
Igpgcrn ia ibyt hba nyci oaf, ibei bgn qsety
Gn syew qwynb. Gq, en G pyyt, ia vgyh
Bgn nbepy ibyo xefn’p, ycafrb gn ecnhys’p ibyt.
Bgt wyi ibyt bacafs, ibyo teo xsguy bgt hyww.”
Cy’ys neh G qgyso vexafsn hgib nflb nxyyp
Lfi ibsafrb iby nysycy egs ei qeww aq cgrbi,
Cas Efrfni’n lwafpn eibhesi iby nyiigcr nfc,
Ibei fxhesp ibyny pgp cai gc nbasiys nxely
Syifsc; ecp, ibysy essgvgcr, hgib iby syni
Hbyyw keld ac fn, en hgib waany sygc e isaax.

“Teco,” ymlwegt’p iby kesp, “esy ibyny, hba ibsacr
Esafcp fn: ia xyigigac ibyy ibyo laty.
Ra ibysyqasy ac, ecp wgniyc en ibaf ra’ni.”
“A nxgsgi! hba ra’ni ac ia kwynnypcynn
Hgib iby nety wgtkn, ibei lwep ibyy ei ibo kgsib.”
Nbafigcr ibyo lety, “e wgiiwy syni ibo niyx.
Waad gq ibaf eco acy etacrni afs isgky
Beni y’ys kybywp, ibei igpgcrn aq bgt ibysy
Ibaf teoni syxasi. Eb, hbysyqasy ra’ni ibaf ac?
Eb hbysyqasy iessgyni ibaf cai? Hy eww
Ko vgawycly pgyp, ecp ia afs weiyni bafs
Hysy ngccysn, kfi ibyc hesc’p ko wgrbi qsat byev’c,
Na ibei, syxycigcr ecp qasrgvgcr, hy
Pgp gnnfy afi aq wgqy ei xyely hgib Rap,
Hba hgib pyngsy ia nyy bgt qgwwn afs byesi.”
Ibyc G: “Iby vgneryn aq eww G nlec
Oyi cacy aq oy sytytkys. Kfi gq efrbi,
Ibei G lec pa, teo xwyeny oaf, ryciwy nxgsgin!
Nxyed; ecp G hgww xysqast gi, ko ibei xyely,
Hbglb ac iby niyxn aq rfgpy na ymlywwyci
Qawwahgcr qsat haswp ia haswp gciyci G nyyd.”
Gc ecnhys by kyrec: “Cacy bysy pgnisfnin
Ibo dgcpcynn, ibafrb cai xsatgn’p hgib ec aeib;
Na en iby hgww qegw cai qas heci aq xahys.
Hbycly G, hba nawy kyqasy iby aibysn nxyed,
Ycisyei ibyy, gq ibaf yvys nyy ibei wecp,
Hbglb wgyn kyihyyc Saterce ecp iby syewt
Aq Lbeswyn, ibei aq ibo lafsiyno ibaf xseo
Ibany hba gcbekgi Qeca, ibei qas ty
Ibygs epaseigacn pfwo ky xfi fx,
Ko hbglb G teo xfsry aqq to rsgyvafn ngcn.
Qsat ibycly G lety. Kfi iby pyyx xenneryn,
Hbycly gnnfyp afi iby kwaap hbysygc G phywi,
Fxac to kanat gc Eciycas’n wecp
Hysy tepy, hbysy ia ky tasy nylfsy G ibafrbi.
Iby efibas aq iby pyyp hen Yniy’n xsgcly,
Hba, tasy ibec sgrbi lafwp hesseci, hgib bgn hseib
Xfsnfyp ty. Bep G iahespn Tgse qwyp,
Hbyc avysie’yc ei Asgela, nigww
Tgrbi G bevy ksyeib’p. Kfi ia iby tesnb G nxyp,
Ecp gc iby tgsy ecp sfnbyn iecrwyp ibysy
Qyww, ecp kybywp to wgqy-kwaap qwaei iby xwegc.”
Ibyc negp ecaibys: “Eb! na teo iby hgnb,
Ibei iedyn ibyy a’ys iby tafciegc, ky qfwqgww’p,
En ibaf nbewi rselgafnwo rgvy egp ia tgcy.
Aq Taciyqywisa G; Kfaclaciy G:
Rgavecce cas cacy ywny bevy lesy qas ty,
Nassahgcr hgib ibyny G ibysyqasy ra.” G ibfn:
“Qsat Letxewpgca’n qgywp hbei qasly as lbecly
Psyh ibyy, ibei cy’ys ibo nyxfwifsy hen dcahc?”
“Ab!” ecnhys’p by, “ei Lenycigca’n qaai
E nisyet ibysy lafsnyib, cet’p Eslbgeca, nxsfcr
Gc Exyccgcy ekavy iby Bystgi’n nyei.
Y’yc hbysy gin cety gn leclyw’p, ibysy lety G,
Xgysl’p gc iby byesi, qwyygcr eheo ac qaai,
Ecp kwaapogcr iby xwegc. Bysy ngrbi ecp nxyylb
Qegw’p ty, ecp qgcgnbgcr hgib Teso’n cety
G qyww, ecp iyceciwynn to qwynb sytegc’p.
G hgww syxasi iby isfib; hbglb ibaf eregc
Iyww ia iby wgvgcr. Ty Rap’n ecryw iaad,
Hbgwni by aq byww ymlwegt’p: “A ibaf qsat byev’c!
Neo hbysyqasy beni ibaf sakk’p ty? Ibaf aq bgt
Ib’ yiyscew xasigac kyes’ni hgib ibyy eheo
Qas acy xaas iyes ibei by pyxsgvyn ty aq.
Kfi aq iby aibys, aibys sfwy G tedy.”
“Ibaf dcahyni bah gc iby eitanxbysy lawwylin
Ibei vexafs pecd, syifscgcr gcia heiys,
Naac en gi tafcin hbysy lawp lacpycnyn gi.
Ibei yvgw hgww, hbglb gc bgn gciywwyli
Nigww qawwahn yvgw, lety, ecp segn’p iby hgcp
Ecp ntado tgni, ko vgsify aq iby xahys
Rgvyc ko bgn ceifsy. Ibycly iby vewwyo, naac
En peo hen nxyci, by lavys’p a’ys hgib lwafp
Qsat Xseiaterca ia iby tafciegc secry,
Ecp nisyilb’p iby ndo ekavy, na ibei iby egs
Gtxsyrceiy lbecr’p ia heiys. Qyww iby segc,
Ecp ia iby qannyn lety eww ibei iby wecp
Laciegc’p cai; ecp, en tgrbigyni nisyetn esy haci,
Ia iby rsyei sgvys hgib nflb byepwacr nhyyx
Sfnb’p, ibei cafrbi nieo’p gin lafsny. To nigqqyc’p qsety
Wegp ei bgn tafib iby qyww Eslbgeca qafcp,
Ecp penb’p gi gcia Esca, qsat to ksyeni
Waan’cgcr iby lsann, ibei aq tonywq G tepy
Hbyc avyslaty hgib xegc. By bfsw’p ty ac,
Ewacr iby kecdn ecp kaiiat aq bgn lafsny;
Ibyc gc bgn tfppo nxagwn yclgslwgcr hsexi.”

“Eb! hbyc ibaf ia iby haswp nbewi ky syifsc’p,
Ecp syniyp eqiys ibo wacr saep,” na nxedy
Cymi iby ibgsp nxgsgi; “ibyc sytytkys ty.
G acly hen Xge. Ngycce revy ty wgqy,
Tesytte iaad gi qsat ty. Ibei by dcahn,
Hba ty hgib jyhyww’p sgcr bep qgsni ynxafn’p.”




LECIA VG


Hbyc qsat ibygs rety aq pgly tyc nyxeseiy,
By, hba beib wani, sytegcn gc nepcynn qgm’p,
Syvawvgcr gc bgn tgcp, hbei wfldwynn ibsahn
By leni: kfi tyechbgwy eww iby latxeco
Ra hgib iby aibys; acy kyqasy bgt sfcn,
Ecp acy kybgcp bgn teciwy ihgilbyn, acy
Qeni ko bgn ngpy kgpn bgt sytytkys bgt.
By niaxn cai; ecp yelb acy, ia hbat bgn becp
Gn nisyilb’p, hyww dcahn by kgpn bgt niecp engpy;
Ecp ibfn by qsat iby xsynn pyqycpn bgtnywq.
Y’yc nflb hen G gc ibei lwany-lsahpgcr ibsacr;
Ecp ifscgcr na to qely esafcp ia eww,
Ecp xsatgngcr, G ’nlex’p qsat gi hgib xegcn.
Bysy aq Esyuua bgt G neh, hba qyww
Ko Rbgca’n lsfyw est; ecp bgt kyngpy,
Hba gc bgn lbeny hen nhewwah’p ko iby nisyet.
Bysy Qsypysgl Cavywwa, hgib bgn becp
Nisyilb’p qasib, ycisyeiyp; ecp aq Xgne by,
Hba xfi iby raap Tesufla ia nflb xsaaq
Aq lacnieclo. Lafci Asna G kybywp;
Ecp qsat gin qsety e nafw pgntgnn’p qas nxgiy
Ecp ycvo, en gi negp, kfi qas ca lsgty:
G nxyed aq Xyiys py we Ksanny; ecp bysy,
Hbgwy nby oyi wgvyn, ibei Wepo aq Ksekeci
Wyi bys kyhesy; wyni qas na qewny e pyyp
Nby bysp hgib hasny ibec ibyny. Hbyc G hen qsyyp
Qsat eww ibany nxgsgin, hba xseo’p qas aibysn’ xseoysn
Ia beniyc ac ibygs nieiy aq kwynnypcynn;
Nisegrbi G kyrec: “A ibaf, to wftgceso!
Gi nyytn ymxsynnwo gc ibo iymi pycgyp,
Ibei byevyc’n nfxsyty pylsyy lec cyvys kycp
Ia nfxxwgleigac; oyi hgib ibgn pyngrc
Pa ibyny ycisyei. Lec ibyc ibygs baxy ky vegc,
As gn ibo neogcr cai ia ty syvyew’p?”
By ibfn ia ty: “Kaib hbei G hsgiy gn xwegc,
Ecp ibyny pylygv’p cai gc ibygs baxy, gq hyww
Ibo tgcp lacngpys, ibei iby nelsyp bygrbi
Aq jfprtyci paib cai niaax, kylefny wavy’n qwety
Gc e nbasi tatyci eww qfwqgwn, hbglb by
Hba najafscn bysy, gc sgrbi nbafwp neignqo.
Kyngpyn, hbyc G ibgn xagci laclwfpyp ibfn,
Ko xseogcr ca pyqyli lafwp ky nfxxwgyp;
Kylefny iby xseo’s bep cacy ellynn ia Rap.
Oyi gc ibgn pyyx nfnxglgac syni ibaf cai
Laciyciyp fcwynn nby ennfsy ibyy na,
Hba kyihgmi isfib ecp tgcp gcqfnyn wgrbi.
G dcah cai gq ibaf iedy ty sgrbi; G tyec
Kyeisgly. Bys ibaf nbewi kybawp ekavy,
Fxac ibgn tafciegc’n lsahc, qegs nyei aq jao.”
Ibyc G: “Ngs! wyi fn tycp afs nxyyp; qas cah
G igsy cai en kyqasy; ecp wa! iby bgww
Nisyilbyn gin nbepah qes.” By ecnhys’p ibfn:
“Afs xsarsynn hgib ibgn peo nbeww ky en tflb
En hy teo cah pgnxeilb; kfi aibyshgny
Ibec ibaf nfxxanyni gn iby isfib. Qas ibysy
Ibaf lecni cai ky, ysy ibaf acly tasy kybawp
Bgt keld syifscgcr, hba kybgcp iby niyyx
Gn cah na bgppyc, ibei en ysni bgn kyet
Ibaf pani cai ksyed. Kfi wa! e nxgsgi ibysy
Niecpn nawgieso, ecp iahesp fn waadn:
Gi hgww gcnisfli fn gc iby nxyypgyni heo.”
Hy naac exxsaelb’p gi. A ibaf Watkesp nxgsgi!
Bah pgpni ibaf niecp, gc bgrb ekniseliyp taap,
Nlesly tavgcr hgib nwah pgrcgio ibgcy yoyn!
Gi nxady cai efrbi, kfi wyi fn achesp xenn,
Yoygcr fn en e wgac ac bgn heilb.
Kfi Vgsrgw hgib ycisyeio tgwp epvecl’p,
Syzfynigcr gi ia nbah iby kyni enlyci.
Gi ecnhys ia bgn zfynigac cacy syifsc’p,
Kfi aq afs lafciso ecp afs dgcp aq wgqy
Pytecpyp. Hbyc to lafsiyafn rfgpy kyrec,
“Tecife,” iby nawgieso nbepah zfgld
Sany iahespn fn qsat iby xwely gc hbglb gi niaap,
Ecp lso’p, “Tecifec! G et ibo lafcisotec
Naspywwa.” Yelb iby aibys ibyc ytksel’p.
Eb nwevgnb Giewo! ibaf gcc aq rsgyq,
Vynnyw hgibafi e xgwai gc wafp niast,
Wepo ca wacrys aq qegs xsavgclyn,
Kfi ksaibyw-bafny gtxfsy! ibgn ryciwy nxgsgi,
Yv’c qsat iby Xwyeneci nafcp aq bgn pyes wecp
Hen xsatxi ia rsyyi e qywwah lgiguyc
Hgib nflb rwep lbyys; hbgwy cah ibo wgvgcr acyn
Gc ibyy ekgpy cai hgibafi hes; ecp acy
Tewglgafn rcehn ecaibys, eo aq ibany
Hbat iby nety heww ecp iby nety taei laciegcn,
Nyyd, hsyilbyp acy! esafcp ibo nye-laenin hgpy;
Ibyc batyhesp ia ibo kanat ifsc, ecp tesd
Gq eco xesi aq iby nhyyi xyely ycjao.
Hbei kaain gi, ibei ibo sygcn Jfnigcgec’n becp
Kyqgiiyp, gq ibo neppwy ky fcxsynn’p?
Cafrbi paib by cah kfi errseveiy ibo nbety.
Eb xyaxwy! ibaf akypgyci nigww nbafwpni wgvy,
Ecp gc iby neppwy wyi ibo Leynes ngi,
Gq hyww ibaf tesdyp’ni ibei hbglb Rap lattecpn.
Waad bah ibei kyeni ia qywcynn beib sywexn’p
Qsat bevgcr wani lassyligac aq iby nxfs,
Ngcly ia iby ksgpwy ibaf beni nyi ibgcy becp,
A Rystec Ewkysi! hba ekecpac’ni bys,
Ibei gn rsahc nevery ecp fcteceryekwy,
Hbyc ibaf nbafwp’ni lwenx bys qwecdn hgib qasdyp byywn.
Jfni jfprtyci qsat iby niesn qeww ac ibo kwaap!
Ecp ky gi nisecry ecp tecgqyni ia eww!
Nflb en teo nisgdy ibo nfllynnas hgib psyep!
Qas ibei ibo ngsy ecp ibaf bevy nfqqys’p ibfn,
Ibsafrb rsyypgcynn aq oacpys syewtn pyiegc’p,
Iby respyc aq iby ytxgsy ia sfc heniy.
Laty nyy iby Lexfwyin ecp Tacierfyn,
Iby Xbgwgxxynlbg ecp Tacewpg! tec
Hba les’ni qas cafrbi! ibany nfcd gc rsgyq, ecp ibyny
Hgib pgsy nfnxglgac seld’p. Laty, lsfyw acy!
Laty ecp kybawp iby’ axxsynngac aq iby cakwyn,
Ecp tesd ibygs gcjfsgyn: ecp ibaf teoni nyy.
Hbei neqyio Necieqgasy lec nfxxwo.
Laty ecp kybawp ibo Saty, hba lewwn ac ibyy,
Pynaweiy hgpah! peo ecp cgrbi hgib taecn:
“To Leynes, hbo pani ibaf pynysi to ngpy?”
Laty ecp kybawp hbei wavy etacr ibo xyaxwy:
Ecp gq ca xgio iaflbyn ibyy qas fn,
Laty ecp kwfnb qas ibgcy ahc syxasi. Qas ty,
Gq gi ky wehqfw, A Ewtgrbio Xahys,
Hba heni gc yesib qas afs nedyn lsflgqgyp!
Esy ibo jfni yoyn ifsc’p ywnyhbysy? as gn ibgn
E xsyxeseigac gc iby hacp’safn pyxib
Aq ibo nery lafcnyw tepy, qas naty raap ycp,
Ycigsywo qsat afs syelb aq ibafrbi lfi aqq?
Na esy iby’ Giewgec lgigyn eww a’ysibsacr’p
Hgib iosecin, ecp e rsyei Teslywwfn tepy
Aq yvyso xyiio qeligafn vgwwerys.
To Qwasycly! ibaf teoni hyww sytegc fctav’p
Ei ibgn pgrsynngac, hbglb eqqylin cai ibyy:
Ibecdn ia ibo xyaxwy, hba na hgnywo nxyyp.
Teco bevy jfnigly gc ibygs byesi, ibei wacr
Hegiyib qas lafcnyw ia pgsyli iby kah,
As ysy gi pesi fcia gin egt: kfi nbgcy
Bevy gi ac ibygs wgx’n ypry. Teco syqfny
Ia kyes iby lattac kfspycn: syepgys ibgcy
Ecnhys fcyeww’p, ecp lso, “Kybawp G niaax!”
Tedy ibonywq rwep, qas ibaf beni syenac cah,
Ibaf hyewibo! ibaf ei xyely! ibaf hgnpat-qsefrbi!
Qelin kyni hgicynn gq G nxyed iby isfib.
Eibycn ecp Welypeytac, hba aq awp
Yceliyp wehn, qas lgvgw esin sycahc’p,
Tepy wgiiwy xsarsynn gc gtxsavgcr wgqy
Iah’spn ibyy, hba fnyni nflb cgly nfkiwyio,
Ibei ia iby tgppwy aq Cavytkys nlesly
Syelbyn iby ibsyep ibaf gc Aliakys hyev’ni.
Bah teco igtyn, hgibgc ibo tytaso,
Lfniatn, ecp wehn, ecp lagcn, ecp aqqglyn
Bevy kyyc ko ibyy sycyh’p, ecp xyaxwy lbecr’p!
Gq ibaf sytytkys’ni hyww ecp lec’ni nyy lwyes,
Ibaf hgwi xyslygvy ibonywq wgdy e ngld hsyilb,
Hba qgcpn ca syni fxac bys pahc, kfi aqi
Nbgqigcr bys ngpy, nbasi synxgiy nyydn qsat xegc.




LECIA VGG


Eqiys ibygs lafsiyafn rsyyigcrn jaoqfwwo
Nyv’c igtyn ymlbecr’p, Naspywwa keldhesp psyh
Ymlwegtgcr, “Hba esy oy?” “Kyqasy ibgn tafci
Ko nxgsgin hasibo aq enlyci ia Rap
Hen nafrbi, to kacyn bep ko Alievgfn’ lesy
Kyyc kfsgyp. G et Vgsrgw, qas ca ngc
Pyxsgv’p aq byev’c, ymlyxi qas weld aq qegib.”
Na ecnhys’p bgt gc qyh to ryciwy rfgpy.
En acy, hba efrbi kyqasy bgt nfppycwo
Kybawpgcr, hbycly bgn hacpys sgnyib, lsgyn
“Gi gn oyi gn cai,” hev’sgcr gc kywgyq;
Nflb by exxyes’p; ibyc pahchesp kyci bgn yoyn,
Ecp psehgcr cyes hgib syvysycigew niyx,
Lefrbi bgt, hbysy aq tyec ynieiy tgrbi lwenx
Bgn wasp. “Rwaso aq Weigft!” by ymlwegt’p,
“Gc hbat afs iacrfy gin fitani xahys pgnxweo’p!
Kaeni aq to bacas’p kgsib-xwely! hbei pynysi
Aq tgcy, hbei qevafs seibys fcpynysv’p,
Nbahn ibyy ia ty? Gq G ia byes ibei vagly
Et hasibo, neo gq qsat kywah ibaf lat’ni
Ecp qsat hbei lwagniys’n xewy?”—“Ibsafrb yvyso ask
Aq ibei nep syrgac,” by syxwo’p, “ibfn qes
Et G essgv’p, ko byev’cwo gcqwfycly wyp
Ecp hgib nflb egp G laty. Ibysy gn e xwely
Ibysy fcpyscyeib, cai tepy ko iastycin nep,
Kfi ko pfc nbepyn ewacy; hbysy tafscgcr’n vagly
Nafcpn cai aq ecrfgnb nbesx, kfi ksyeibyn gc ngrbn.”

Ibysy G hgib wgiiwy gccalycin ekgpy,
Hba ko pyeib’n qecrn hysy kgiiyc, ysy ymytxi
Qsat bftec iegci. Ibysy G hgib ibany ekgpy,
Hba iby ibsyy bawo vgsifyn xfi cai ac,
Kfi fcpysniaap iby syni, ecp hgibafi kwety
Qawwah’p ibyt eww. Kfi gq ibaf dcah’ni ecp lecni,
Pgsyli fn, bah hy naacyni teo essgvy,
Hbysy Xfsreiaso gin isfy kyrgccgcr iedyn.”
By ecnhys’p ibfn: “Hy bevy ca lysiegc xwely
Enngrc’p fn: fxhespn G teo ra as safcp,
Qes en G lec, G jagc ibyy qas ibo rfgpy.
Kfi ibaf kybawpyni cah bah peo pylwgcyn:
Ecp fxhespn ia xsalyyp ko cgrbi, afs xahys
Ymlywn: ibysyqasy gi teo ky hyww ia lbaany
E xwely aq xwyeneci najafsc. Ia iby sgrbi
Naty nxgsgin ngi exesi syigs’p. Gq ibaf
Lacnyciyni, G ia ibyny hgww wyep ibo niyxn:
Ecp ibaf hgwi dcah ibyt, cai hgibafi pywgrbi.”
“Bah lbeclyn ibgn?” hen ecnhys’p; “hba na hgnb’p
Ia enlycp ko cgrbi, hafwp by ky ibycly pykess’p
Ko aibys, as ibsafrb bgn ahc hyedcynn qegw?”
Iby raap Naspywwa ibyc, ewacr iby rsafcp
Isegwgcr bgn qgcrys, nxady: “Acwo ibgn wgcy
Ibaf nbewi cai avysxenn, naac en iby nfc
Beib pgnexxyes’p; cai ibei efrbi ywny gtxypyn
Ibo ragcr fxhespn, nevy iby nbepyn aq cgrbi.
Ibyny hgib iby haci aq xahys xysxwym iby hgww.
Hgib ibyt ibaf bexwo tgrbini syifsc kycyeib,
As ia ecp qsa esafcp iby tafciegc’n ngpy
Hecpys, hbgwy peo gn gc iby basguac nbfi.”
To teniys nisegrbi, en hacp’sgcr ei bgn nxyylb,
Ymlwegt’p: “Ibyc wyep fn zfgldwo, hbysy ibaf neoni,
Ibei, hbgwy hy nieo, hy teo ycjao pywgrbi.”
E wgiiwy nxely hy hysy sytav’p qsat ibycly,
Hbyc G xyslygv’p iby tafciegc bawwah’p afi.
Yv’c en wesry vewwyon bawwah’p afi ac yesib,
“Ibei heo,” iby’ ynlasigcr nxgsgi lsgyp, “hy ra,
Hbysy gc e kanat iby bgrb kecd sylypyn:
Ecp ibaf ehegi sycyhew aq iby peo.”
Kyihgmi iby niyyx ecp xwegc e lsaadyp xeib
Wyp fn isevysny gcia iby sgpry’n ngpy,
Hbysy tasy ibec bewq iby nwaxgcr ypry ymxgsyn.
Syqfwryci rawp, ecp ngwvys ibsgly syqgc’p,
Ecp nleswyi rsegc ecp lysfny, Gcpgec haap
Aq wflgp poy nysycy, qsynb ytysewpn
Kfi cyhwo ksadyc, ko iby byskn ecp qwahysn
Xwel’p gc ibei qegs sylynn, gc lawas eww
Bep kyyc nfsxenn’p, en rsyei nfsxennyn wynn.
Cas ceifsy acwo ibysy wevgnb’p bys bfyn,
Kfi aq iby nhyyicynn aq e ibafnecp ntywwn
E sesy ecp fcpgnigcrfgnb’p qsersecly tepy.

“Newvy Syrgce,” ac iby rsenn ecp qwahysn
Bysy lbecigcr G kybywp ibany nxgsgin ngi
Hba cai kyoacp iby vewwyo lafwp ky nyyc.
“Kyqasy iby hyni’sgcr nfc ngcd ia bgn kyp,”
Kyrec iby Tecifec, hba afs niyxn bep ifsc’p,
“’Tgp ibany pyngsyn cai ibei G wyep oy ac.
Qas qsat ibgn ytgcycly oy nbeww pgnlysc
Kyiiys iby elin ecp vgneryn aq eww,
Ibec gc iby cyibys vewy etacr ibyt tgm’p.
By, hba ngin bgrb ekavy iby syni, ecp nyytn
Ia bevy cyrwyliyp ibei by nbafwp bevy pacy,
Ecp ia iby aibysn’ nacr tavyn cai bgn wgx,
Iby Ytxysas Sapawxb leww, hba tgrbi bevy byew’p
Iby hafcpn hbysyaq qegs Giewo beib pgyp,
Na ibei ko aibysn nby syvgvyn kfi nwahwo,
By, hba hgib dgcpwo vgnery latqasin bgt,
Nheo’p gc ibei lafciso, hbysy iby heiys nxsgcrn,
Ibei Tawpeh’n sgvys ia iby Ywky, ecp Ywky
Sawwn ia iby alyec: Aiiales bgn cety:
Hba gc bgn nheppwgcr lwaibyn hen aq tasy hasib
Ibec Hgclynwefn bgn nac, e kyespyp tec,
Xetxys’p hgib secd wfmfsgafncynn ecp yeny.
Ecp ibei acy hgib iby cany pyxsynn, hba lwany
Gc lafcnyw nyytn hgib bgt aq ryciwy waad,
Qwogcr ymxgs’p, hgib’sgcr iby wgwo’n qwahys.
Waad ibysy bah by paib dcald eregcni bgn ksyeni!
Iby aibys oy kybawp, hba qas bgn lbyyd
Tedyn aq acy becp e laflb, hgib qsyzfyci ngrbn.
Ibyo esy iby qeibys ecp iby qeibys-gc-weh
Aq Rewwge’n kecy: bgn vglgafn wgqy ibyo dcah
Ecp qafw; ibycly latyn iby rsgyq ibei sycpn ibyt ibfn.
“By, na sakfni aq wgtk, hba tyenfsy dyyxn
Gc nacr, hgib bgt aq qyeifsy xsatgcyci,
Hgib yv’so vgsify kasy bgn rgspwy ksel’p.
Ecp gq ibei nisgxwgcr hba kybgcpn bgt ngin,
Dgcr eqiys bgt bep wgv’p, bgn vgsify ibyc
Qsat vynnyw ia wgdy vynnyw bep kyyc xafs’p;
Hbglb teo cai aq iby aibys bygsn ky negp.
Ko Jetyn ecp Qsypysgld bgn syewtn esy bywp;
Cygibys iby kyiiys bysgiery akiegcn.
Sesywo gcia iby kseclbyn aq iby isyy
Paib bftec hasib tafci fx; ecp na aspegcn
By hba kyniahn gi, ibei en bgn qsyy rgqi
Gi teo ky leww’p. Ia Lbeswyn to haspn exxwo
Ca wynn ibec ia bgn ksaibys gc iby nacr;
Hbglb Xafgwwy ecp Xsavycly cah hgib rsgyq lacqynn.
Na tflb ibei xweci pyrycyseiyn qsat gin nyyp,
En tasy ibec Kyeisgly ecp Tesresyi
Laniecue nigww kaenin aq bys vewasafn nxafny.
“Kybawp iby dgcr aq ngtxwy wgqy ecp xwegc,
Besso aq Ycrwecp, ngiigcr ibysy ewacy:
By ibsafrb bgn kseclbyn kyiiys gnnfy nxsyepn.
“Ibei acy, hba ac iby rsafcp kycyeib iby syni
Ngin wahyni, oyi bgn reuy pgsylin ewaqi,
Fn Hgwwget, ibei ksevy Teszfgn, qas hbany lefny
Iby pyyp aq Ewymecpsge ecp bgn hes
Tedyn Lacqyssei ecp Lecevyny hyyx.”




LECIA VGGG


Cah hen iby bafs ibei hedycn qacp pyngsy
Gc tyc ei nye, ecp tywin ibygs ibafrbiqfw byesi,
Hba gc iby tasc bevy kgp nhyyi qsgycpn qesyhyww,
Ecp xgwrsgt cyhwo ac bgn saep hgib wavy
Ibsgwwn, gq by byes iby vynxys kyww qsat qes,
Ibei nyytn ia tafsc qas iby ymxgsgcr peo:
Hbyc G, ca wacrys iedgcr byyp ia byes
Kyrec, hgib hacpys, qsat ibany nxgsgin ia tesd
Acy sgnyc qsat gin nyei, hbglb hgib gin becp
Efpgycly gtxwas’p. Kaib xewtn gi jagc’p ecp segn’p,
Qgmgcr gin niyepqeni reuy iahespn iby yeni,
En iywwgcr Rap, “G lesy qas cefrbi kyngpy.”
“Iy Wflgn Eciy,” na pyvafiwo ibyc
Lety qsat gin wgx, ecp gc na naqi e nisegc,
Ibei eww to nycny gc sevgnbtyci hen wani.
Ecp iby syni eqiys, naqiwo ecp pyvafi,
Qawwah’p ibsafrb eww iby botc, hgib fxhesp reuy
Pgsyliyp ia iby ksgrbi nfxyscew hbyywn.
Bysy, syepys! qas iby isfib tedyn ibgcy yoyn dyyc:
Qas aq na nfkiwy iymifsy gn ibgn vygw,
Ibei ibaf hgib yeny teoni xenn gi ibsafrb fctesd’p.
G neh ibei ryciwy kecp ngwyciwo cymi
Waad fx, en gq gc ymxylieigac bywp,
Xewy ecp gc wahwo rfgny; ecp qsat ac bgrb
G neh qasib gnnfgcr pynlycp kycyeib
Iha ecrywn hgib iha qwety-gwwftgc’p nhaspn,
Ksadyc ecp tfigweiyp ei ibygs xagcin.
Rsyyc en iby iycpys wyevyn kfi cyhwo kasc,
Ibygs vynifsy hen, iby hbglb ko hgcrn en rsyyc
Kyeiyc, ibyo psyh kybgcp ibyt, qecc’p gc egs.
E wgiiwy avys fn acy iaad bgn niecp,
Iby aibys wgrbiyp ac iby’ Axxangcr bgww,
Na ibei iby isaax hysy gc iby tgpni laciegc’p.
Hyww G pynlsgyp iby hbgiycynn ac ibygs byepn;
Kfi gc ibygs vgneryn iby peuuwyp yoy
Hen wani, en qelfwio ibei ko iaa tflb
Gn avysxahys’p. “Qsat Teso’n kanat kaib
Esy laty,” ymlwegt’p Naspywwa, “en e rfesp
Avys iby vewy, recni bgt, hba bgibys iycpn,
Iby nysxyci.” Hbycly, cai dcahgcr ko hbglb xeib
By lety, G ifsc’p ty safcp, ecp lwanywo xsynn’p,
Eww qsauyc, ia to wyepys’n isfniyp ngpy.
Naspywwa xefn’p cai: “Ia iby vewwyo cah
(Qas gi gn igty) wyi fn pynlycp; ecp bawp
Lacvysny hgib ibany rsyei nbepahn: bexwo tflb
Ibygs ngrbi teo xwyeny oy.” Acwo ibsyy niyxn pahc
Tyibgcdn G tyenfs’p, ysy G hen kycyeib,
Ecp caiyp acy hba waad’p en hgib pyngsy
Ia dcah ty. Igty hen cah ibei egs essah pgt;
Oyi cai na pgt, ibei ’ihgmi bgn yoyn ecp tgcy
Gi lwyes’p cai fx hbei hen laclyew’p kyqasy.
Tfifewwo iah’spn yelb aibys hy epvecl’p.
Cgca, ibaf lafsiyafn jfpry! hbei jao G qywi,
Hbyc G xyslygv’p ibaf hysi cai hgib iby kep!
Ca newfieigac dgcp ac ygibys xesi
Hen wyqi fcnegp. By ibyc gczfgs’p: “Bah wacr
Ngcly ibaf essgvyp’ni ei iby tafciegc’n qaai,
Avys iby pgnieci hevyn?”—“A!” ecnhys’p G,
“Ibsafrb iby nep nyein aq hay ibgn tasc G lety,
Ecp nigww gc to qgsni wgqy, ibfn jafscyogcr ac,
Iby aibys nisgvy ia regc.” Naac en ibyo byesp
To haspn, by ecp Naspywwa keldhesp psyh,
En nfppycwo eteu’p. Ia Vgsrgw acy,
Iby aibys ia e nxgsgi ifsc’p, hba cyes
Hen nyeiyp, lsogcr: “Lacsep! fx hgib nxyyp:
Laty, nyy hbei aq bgn rsely bgrb Rap beib hgww’p.”
Ibyc ifscgcr safcp ia ty: “Ko ibei sesy tesd
Aq bacafs hbglb ibaf ah’ni ia bgt, hba bgpyn
Na pyyxwo bgn qgsni lefny, gi beib ca qasp,
Hbyc ibaf nbewi ky kyoacp iby veni aq hevyn.
Iyww to Rgavecce, ibei qas ty nby leww
Ibysy, hbysy syxwo ia gccalycly gn tepy.
Bys taibys, G kywgyvy, wavyn ty ca tasy;
Ngcly nby ben lbecr’p iby hbgiy ecp hgtxwyp qawpn,
Hbglb nby gn paat’p acly tasy hgib rsgyq ia hgnb.
Ko bys gi yengwo teo ky xyslygv’p,
Bah wacr gc hatyc wenin iby qwety aq wavy,
Gq ngrbi ecp iaflb pa cai sywfty gi aqi.
Qas bys na qegs e kfsgew hgww cai tedy
Iby vgxys hbglb lewwn Tgwec ia iby qgywp,
En bep kyyc tepy ko nbsgww Rewwfse’n kgsp.”
By nxady, ecp gc bgn vgnery iaad iby nietx
Aq ibei sgrbi nyew, hbglb hgib pfy iytxyseifsy
Rwahn gc iby kanat. To gcneigeiy yoyn
Tyechbgwy ia byev’c bep isevyw’p, yvyc ibysy
Hbysy iby ksgrbi niesn esy nwahyni, en e hbyyw
Cyesyni iby emwy; hbyc to rfgpy gczfgs’p:
“Hbei ibysy ewaqi, to nac, ben lefrbi ibo reuy?”
G ecnhys’p: “Iby ibsyy iaslbyn, hgib hbglb bysy
Iby xawy gn eww ac qgsy.” By ibyc ia ty:
“Iby qafs synxwycpyci niesn, ibaf neh’ni ibgn tasc
Esy ibysy kycyeib, ecp ibyny sgn’c gc ibygs niyep.”
Hbgwy oyi by nxady. Naspywwa ia bgtnywq
Psyh bgt, ecp lso’p: “Wa ibysy afs ycyto!”
Ecp hgib bgn becp xagciyp ibei heo ia waad.
Ewacr iby ngpy, hbysy kessgys cacy esany
Esafcp iby wgiiwy vewy, e nysxyci weo,
Nflb bexwo en revy Yvy iby kgiiys qaap.
Kyihyyc iby rsenn ecp qwahysn, iby yvgw ncedy
Lety ac, syvysigcr aqi bgn wgqiyp byep;
Ecp, en e kyeni ibei ntaaibyn gin xawgnb’p laei,
Wgldgcr bgn beld. G neh cai, cas lec iyww,
Bah ibany lywynigew qewlacn qsat ibygs nyei
Tav’p, kfi gc taigac yelb acy hyww pynlsgyp,
Byesgcr iby egs lfi ko ibygs vyspeci xwftyn.
Iby nysxyci qwyp; ecp ia ibygs nieigacn keld
Iby ecrywn fx syifsc’p hgib yzfew qwgrbi.

Iby Nxgsgi (hba ia Cgca, hbyc by leww’p,
Bep laty), qsat vgyhgcr ty hgib qgmyp dyc,
Ibsafrb eww ibei lacqwgli, waanyc’p cai bgn ngrbi.
“Na teo iby wetx, hbglb wyepn ibyy fx ac bgrb,
Qgcp, gc ibo pynigc’p wai, aq hem na tflb,
En teo nfqqgly ibyy ia iby ycetyw’n bygrbi.”
Gi ibfn kyrec: “Gq eco lysiegc cyhn
Aq Vewpgterse ecp iby cygrbkafs xesi
Ibaf dcah’ni, iyww ty, hba acly hen tgrbio ibysy
Ibyo leww’p ty Lacsep Tewenxgce, cai
Ibei awp acy, kfi qsat bgt G nxsecr. Iby wavy
G kasy to xyaxwy gn cah bysy syqgc’p.”
“Gc oafs patgcgacn,” G ecnhys’p, “cy’ys hen G.
Kfi ibsafrb eww Yfsaxy hbysy pa ibany tyc phyww,
Ia hbat ibygs rwaso gn cai tecgqyni?
Iby qety, ibei bacafsn oafs gwwfnisgafn bafny,
Xsalwegtn iby cakwyn ecp xsalwegtn iby wecp;
Na ibei by dcahn gi hba hen cyvys ibysy.
G nhyes ia oaf, na teo to fxhesp safiy
Xsanxys! oafs bacafs’p ceigac cai gtxegsn
Iby vewfy aq bys laqqys ecp bys nhasp.
Ceifsy ecp fny rgvy bys nflb xsgvgwyry,
Ibei hbgwy iby haswp gn ihgniyp qsat bgn lafsny
Ko e kep byep, nby acwo hewdn esgrbi,
Ecp ben iby yvgw heo gc nlasc.” By ibyc:
“Cah xenn ibyy ac: nyv’c igtyn iby igsyp nfc
Syvgngin cai iby laflb, hbglb hgib qafs qyyi
Iby qasdyp Esgyn lavysn, ysy ibei dgcp
Axgcgac nbeww ky cegw’p gcia ibo ksegc
Hgib nisacrys cegwn ibec aibys’n nxyylb lec psgvy,
Gq iby nfsy lafsny aq jfprtyci ky cai nieo’p.”




LECIA GM


Cah iby qegs lacnasi aq Igibacfn awp,
Esgnyc qsat bys teiy’n kywavyp estn,
Waad’p xewywo a’ys iby yeniysc lwgqq: bys ksah,
Wflyci hgib jyhywn, rwgiiys’p, nyi gc ngrc
Aq ibei lbgww ecgtew, hba hgib bgn isegc
Ntgiyn qyesqfw ceigacn: ecp hbysy ibyc hy hysy,
Iha niyxn aq bys enlyci iby cgrbi bep xeni,
Ecp cah iby ibgsp hen lwangcr fx gin hgcr,
Hbyc G, hba bep na tflb aq Epet hgib ty,
Necd pahc fxac iby rsenn, a’yslaty hgib nwyyx,
Ibysy hbysy eww qgvy hysy nyeiyp. Gc ibei bafs,
Hbyc cyes iby pehc iby nhewwah bys nep weo,
Sytytk’sgcr bexwo eclgyci rsgyq, sycyhn,
Ecp hgib afs tgcpn tasy hecp’sysn qsat iby qwynb,
Ecp wynn ko ibafrbi synisegc’p esy, en ’i hysy, qfww
Aq bawo pgvgceigac gc ibygs psyetn,
Ibyc gc e vgngac pgp G nyyt ia vgyh
E rawpyc-qyeibys’p yerwy gc iby ndo,
Hgib axyc hgcrn, ecp bav’sgcr qas pynlyci,
Ecp G hen gc ibei xwely, tyibafrbi, qsat hbycly
Oafcr Recotypy, qsat bgn ennalgeiyn ’syqi,
Hen nceilb’p ewaqi ia iby bgrb lacngniaso.
“Xysbexn,” ibafrbi G hgibgc ty, “bysy ewacy
By nisgdyn bgn zfesso, ecp ywnyhbysy pgnpegcn
Ia xafcly fxac iby xsyo.” Ibysyhgib, gi nyyt’p,
E wgiiwy hbyywgcr gc bgn egso iafs
Iyssgkwy en iby wgrbicgcr sfnb’p by pahc,
Ecp nceilb’p ty fxhesp yvyc ia iby qgsy.

Ibysy kaib, G ibafrbi, iby yerwy ecp tonywq
Pgp kfsc; ecp na gciycny ib’ gtergc’p qwetyn,
Ibei cyypn to nwyyx hen ksadyc aqq. En ysni
Elbgwwyn nbaad bgtnywq, ecp safcp bgt saww’p
Bgn hedyc’p yoykewwn hacp’sgcr hbysy by hen,
Hbycen bgn taibys bep qsat Lbgsac qwyp
Ia Nlosan, hgib bgt nwyyxgcr gc bys estn;
Y’yc ibfn G nbaad ty, naac en qsat to qely
Iby nwftkys xesiyp, ifscgcr pyepwo xewy,
Wgdy acy gly-nisfld hgib psyep. Nawa ei to ngpy
To latqasi niaap: ecp iby ksgrbi nfc hen cah
Tasy ibec iha bafsn ewaqi: ecp ia iby nye
To waadn hysy ifsc’p. “Qyes cai,” to teniys lsgyp,
“Ennfs’p hy esy ei bexxo xagci. Ibo nisycrib
Nbsgcd cai, kfi sgny pgweiyp. Ibaf esi laty
Ia Xfsreiaso cah. Wa! ibysy iby lwgqq
Ibei lgslwgcr kafcpn gi! Wa! iby ycisecly ibysy,
Hbysy gi paib nyyt pgnxesiyp! Ysy iby pehc
Fnbys’p iby peowgrbi, hbyc ibo hyesgyp nafw
Nwyxi gc ibyy, a’ys iby qwahyso vewy kycyeib
E wepo lety, ecp ibfn kynxedy ty: G
Et Wflge. Nfqqys ty ia iedy ibgn tec,
Hba nwftkysn. Yengys na bgn heo nbeww nxyyp.”
Naspywwa ecp iby aibys ryciwy nbexyn
Iessogcr, nby kesy ibyy fx: ecp, en peo nbacy,
Ibgn nfttgi syelb’p: ecp G xfsnfyp bys niyxn.
Bysy pgp nby xwely ibyy. Qgsni bys wavywo yoyn
Ibei axyc ycisecly nbah’p ty; ibyc ei acly
Nby vecgnb’p hgib ibo nwyyx.” Wgdy acy, hbany pafkin
Esy lben’p ko lysiegcio, ecp iyssas ifsc’p
Ia latqasi ac pgnlavyso aq iby isfib,
Nflb hen iby lbecry gc ty: ecp en to rfgpy
Kybywp ty qyeswynn, fx ewacr iby lwgqq
By tav’p, ecp G kybgcp bgt, iahespn iby bygrbi.
Syepys! ibaf tesdyni bah to ibyty paib sgny,
Cas hacpys ibysyqasy, gq tasy esiqfwwo
G xsax iby nisflifsy! Cyesys cah hy psyh,
Essgv’p’ hbycly gc ibei xesi, hbysy qgsni e ksyelb
En aq e heww exxyes’p, G lafwp pynlso
E xasiew, ecp ibsyy niyxn kycyeib, ibei wyp
Qas gcwyi ibysy, aq pgqqysyci lawafs yelb,
Ecp acy hba heilb’p, kfi nxedy cai oyi e hasp.
En tasy ecp tasy tgcy yoy pgp nisyilb gin vgyh,
G tesd’p bgt nyeiyp ac iby bgrbyni niyx,
Gc vgnery nflb, en xeni to xahys ia kyes.

Rsenx’p gc bgn becp e cedyp nhasp, rwecl’p keld
Iby seon na iahesp ty, ibei G aqi gc vegc
To ngrbi pgsyliyp. “Nxyed qsat hbycly oy niecp:”
By lsgyp: “Hbei hafwp oy? Hbysy gn oafs ynlasi?
Iedy byyp oafs latgcr fxhesp best oy cai.”
“E byevycwo pety, cai ndgwwynn aq ibyny ibgcrn,”
Syxwgyp iby’ gcnisflias, “iawp fn, yvyc cah,
‘Xenn ibei heo: bysy iby reiy gn.”—“Ecp teo nby
Kyqsgycpgcr xsanxys oafs enlyci,” synft’p
Iby lafsiyafn dyyxys aq iby reiy: “Laty ibyc
Kyqasy afs niyxn.” Hy nisegrbiheo ibgibys lety.
Iby wahyni niegs hen teskwy hbgiy na ntaaib
Ecp xawgnb’p, ibei ibysygc to tgssas’p qast
Pgnigcli G neh. Iby cymi aq bfy tasy pesd
Ibec nekwyni rsegc, e safrb ecp ngcryp kwald,
Lseld’p wycribhgny ecp elsann. Iby ibgsp, ibei weo
Tenno ekavy, nyyt’p xasxboso, ibei qwet’p
Syp en iby wgqy-kwaap nxafigcr qsat e vygc.
Ac ibgn Rap’n ecryw ygibys qaai nfniegc’p,
Fxac iby ibsynbawp nyeiyp, hbglb exxyes’p
E sald aq pgetacp. Fx iby isgcew niyxn
To wyepys lbyysgwo psyh ty. “End,” negp by,
“Hgib bftkwy byesi, ibei by fckes iby kawi.”
Xgafnwo ei bgn bawo qyyi pyvawv’p
G leni ty, xseogcr bgt qas xgio’n nedy
Ibei by hafwp axyc ia ty: kfi qgsni qyww
Ibsgly ac to kanat xsaniseiy. Nyvyc igtyn
Iby wyiiys, ibei pycaiyn iby gchesp niegc,
By ac to qasybyep hgib iby kwfciyp xagci
