Aq bgn psehc nhasp gcnlsgk’p. Ecp “Waad,” by lsgyp,
“Hbyc yciys’p, ibei ibaf henb ibyny nlesn eheo.”
Enbyn, as yesib ie’yc pso afi aq iby rsafcp,
Hysy aq acy lawafs hgib iby saky by hasy.
Qsat fcpyscyeib ibei vynityci qasib by psyh
Iha dyon aq tyiew ihegc: iby acy hen rawp,
Gin qywwah ngwvys. Hgib iby xewwgp qgsni,
Ecp cymi iby kfscgnb’p, by na xwo’p iby reiy,
En ia laciyci ty hyww. “Hbycyvys acy
Qegwyib aq ibyny, ibei gc iby dyobawy nisegrbi
Gi ifsc cai, ia ibgn ewwyo ibyc ymxyli
Ellynn gc vegc.” Nflb hysy iby haspn by nxedy.
“Acy gn tasy xsylgafn: kfi iby aibys cyypn
Ndgww ecp nerelgio, wesry nbesy aq yelb,
Ysy gin raap iend ia pgnycrery iby dcai
Ky hasibgwo xysqast’p. Qsat Xyiys ibyny
G bawp, aq bgt gcnisfliyp, ibei G yss
Seibys gc axycgcr ibec gc dyyxgcr qeni;
Na kfi iby nfxxwgeci ei to qyyi gtxwasy.”
Ibyc aq ibei bewwah’p reiy by ibsfni iby paas,
Ymlwegtgcr, “Yciys, kfi ibgn hescgcr byes:
By qasib eregc pyxesin hba waadn kybgcp.”
En gc iby bgcryn aq ibei nelsyp hesp
Iby nhgvywn ifsc’p, nacasafn tyiew nisacr,
Besnb hen iby rseigcr; cas na nfswgwo
Saes’p iby Iesxygec, hbyc ko qasly kysyqi
Aq raap Tyiywwfn, ibyclyqasib qsat bgn wann
Ia wyeccynn paat’p. Eiiycigvywo G ifsc’p,
Wgni’cgcr iby ibfcpys, ibei qgsni gnnfyp qasib;
Ecp “Hy xsegny ibyy, A Rap,” tyibafrbi G byesp
Gc ellycin kwycpyp hgib nhyyi tywapo.
Iby nisegcn lety a’ys tgcy yes, y’yc en iby nafcp
Aq lbasew vaglyn, ibei gc nawytc lbeci
Hgib asrec tgcrwy, ecp, cah bgrb ecp lwyes,
Laty nhywwgcr, cah qwaei gcpgnigcli eheo.




LECIA M


Hbyc hy bep xennyp iby ibsynbawp aq iby reiy
(Hbglb iby nafw’n gww eqqyligac paib pgnfny,
Tedgcr iby lsaadyp nyyt iby nisegrbiys xeib),
G byesp gin lwangcr nafcp. Bep tgcy yoyn ifsc’p,
Qas ibei aqqycly hbei xwye tgrbi bevy evegw’p?
Hy tafciyp fx iby sgvyc sald, ibei hafcp
Ac ygibys ngpy ewiysceiy, en iby hevy
Qwgyn ecp epveclyn. “Bysy naty wgiiwy esi
Kybaavyn fn,” negp to wyepys, “ibei afs niyxn
Aknysvy iby vesogcr qwymfsy aq iby xeib.”
Ibfn hy na nwahwo nxyp, ibei hgib lwyqi ask
Iby taac acly tasy a’ysbecrn bys hei’so laflb,
Ysy hy ibei nisegi bevy ibsyepyp. Kfi hbyc qsyy
Hy lety ecp axyc, hbysy iby tafci ekavy
Acy nawgp tenn syigsyn, G nxyci, hgib iagw,
Ecp kaib, fclysiegc aq iby heo, hy niaap,
Fxac e xwegc tasy wacynaty, ibec iby saepn
Ibei isevysny pynysi hgwpn. Qsat hbycly iby ksgcd
Kaspysn fxac velfgio, ia qaai
Aq iby niyyx kecd, ibei sgnyn nigww, iby nxely
Bep tyenfs’p ibsgly iby nieifsy aq e tec:
Ecp, pgnieci en tgcy yoy lafwp hgcr gin qwgrbi,
Ia wyqihesp cah ecp cah ia sgrbi pgnxeilb’p,
Ibei lascgly yzfew gc ymiyci exxyes’p.
Cai oyi afs qyyi bep ac ibei nfttgi tav’p,
Hbyc G pgnlavys’p ibei iby kecd esafcp,
Hbany xsafp fxsgngcr eww enlyci pycgyp,
Hen teskwy hbgiy, ecp na ymeliwo hsafrbi
Hgib zfegciyni nlfwxifsy, ibei cai ibysy ewacy
Bep Xawolwyifn, kfi y’yc ceifsy’n nywq
Kyyc nbet’p. Iby ecryw hba lety pahc ia yesib
Hgib igpgcrn aq iby xyely na teco oyesn
Hyxi qas gc vegc, ibei ax’p iby byevycwo reiyn
Qsat ibygs wacr gciyspgli kyqasy fn nyyt’p,
Gc e nhyyi eli, na nlfwxifs’p ia iby wgqy,
By waad’p ca ngwyci gtery. Acy bep nhasc
By bep negp, “Begw!” qas nby hen gter’p ibysy,
Ko hbat iby dyo pgp axyc ia Rap’n wavy,
Ecp gc bys eli en nycngkwo gtxsynn
Ibei hasp, “Kybawp iby becptegp aq iby Wasp,”
En qgrfsy nyew’p ac hem. “Qgm cai ibo tgcp
Ac acy xwely acwo,” negp iby rfgpy kywav’p,
Hba bep ty cyes bgt ac ibei xesi hbysy wgyn
Iby byesi aq tec. To ngrbi qasibhgib G ifsc’p
Ecp tesd’p, kybgcp iby vgsrgc taibys’n qast,
Fxac ibei ngpy, hbysy by, ibei tav’p ty, niaap,
Ecaibys niaso rsevyc ac iby sald.
G xennyp eibhesi iby kesp, ecp psyh ty cyes,
Ibei gi tgrbi niecp tasy exiwo qas to vgyh.
Ibysy gc iby nywq-nety teskwy hysy ycrsev’p
Iby lesi ecp dgcy, psehgcr iby nelsyp esd,
Ibei qsat fckgppyc aqqgly ehyn tecdgcp.
Kyqasy gi lety tflb xyaxwy; ecp iby hbawy
Xesiyp gc nyvyc zfgsyn. Acy nycny lsgyp, “Ceo,”
Ecaibys, “Oyn, ibyo ngcr.” Wgdy pafki esany
Kyihgmi iby yoy ecp ntyww, qsat iby lfsw’p qfty
Aq gclycny ksyeibgcr fx iby hyww-hsafrbi iagw.
Xsylypgcr iby kwyni vynnyw, achesp lety
Hgib wgrbi pecly wyexgcr, rgsi gc bftkwy rfgny,
Nhyyi Gnseyw’n besxys: gc ibei bex by nyyt’p
Wynn ecp oyi tasy ibec dgcrwo. Axxangiy,
Ei e rsyei xewely, qsat iby weiigly qasib
Waad’p Tglbaw, wgdy e wepo qfww aq nlasc
Ecp nassah. Ia kybawp iby iekwyi cymi,
Hbglb ei iby beld aq Tglbaw hbgiywo nbacy,
G tav’p ty. Ibysy hen niasgyp ac iby sald
Iby’ ymewiyp rwaso aq iby Satec xsgcly,
Hbany tgrbio hasib tav’p Rsyraso ia yesc
Bgn tgrbio laczfyni, Isejec ib’ Ytxysas.
E hgpah ei bgn ksgpwy niaap, eiigs’p
Gc iyesn ecp tafscgcr. Safcp ekafi ibyt isaax’p
Qfww ibsacr aq dcgrbin, ecp avysbyep gc rawp
Iby yerwyn qwaeiyp, nisfrrwgcr hgib iby hgcp.

Iby hsyilb exxyes’p etgp eww ibyny ia neo:
“Rseci vycryecly, ngsy! qas, hay kynbsyh ibgn byesi
To nac gn tfspys’p.” By syxwogcr nyyt’p;
“Hegi cah igww G syifsc.” Ecp nby, en acy
Tepy benio ko bys rsgyq; “A ngsy, gq ibaf
Pani cai syifsc?”—“Hbysy G et, hba ibyc gn,
Teo sgrbi ibyy.”—“Hbei ia ibyy gn aibys’n raap,
Gq ibaf cyrwyli ibo ahc?”—“Cah latqasi ibyy,”
Ei wycrib by ecnhysn. “Gi kynyytyib hyww
To pfio ky xysqast’p, ysy G tavy bycly:
Na jfnigly hgwwn; ecp xgio kgpn ty nieo.”
By, hbany dyc caibgcr cyh nfsvyon, xsapfl’p
Ibei vgngkwy nxyedgcr, cyh ia fn ecp nisecry
Iby wgdy cai qafcp ac yesib. Qacpwo G reu’p
Fxac ibany xeiiyscn aq tyyd bftkwycynn,
Nbexyn oyi tasy xsylgafn qas ibygs esigni’n nedy,
Hbyc “Wa,” iby xayi hbgnxys’p, “hbysy ibgn heo
(Kfi nweld ibygs xely), e tfwigifpy epvecly.
Ibyny ia iby waqio niyxn nbeww rfgpy fn ac.”
Tgcy yoyn, ibafrb kyci ac vgyh aq cavyw ngrbin
Ibygs wav’p ewwfsytyci, hysy cai nwah ia ifsc.
Syepys! G hafwp cai ibei eteu’p ibaf tgnn
Aq ibo raap xfsxany, byesgcr bah jfni Rap
Pylsyyn afs pykin ky leclyw’p. Xacpys cai
Iby qast aq nfqq’sgcr. Ibgcd ac hbei nfllyypn,
Ibgcd ibei ei hasni kyoacp iby tgrbio paat
Gi leccai xenn. “Gcnisflias,” G kyrec,
“Hbei G nyy bgibys iycpgcr, kyesn ca isely
Aq bftec nytkwecly, cas aq efrbi kyngpy
Ibei to qagw’p ngrbi lec rfynn.” By ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“Na lafsk’p ia yesib, kycyeib ibygs byevo iyytn
Aq iastyci niaax ibyo, ibei tgcy yoy ei qgsni
Nisfrrwyp en ibgcy. Kfi waad gciyciwo ibgibys,
Ec pgnyciecrwy hgib ibo wek’sgcr vgyh,
Hbei fcpyscyeib ibany niacyn exxsaelbyib: cah,
Y’yc cah, teoni ibaf pgnlysc iby xecrn aq yelb.”
Lbsgnigecn ecp xsafp! A xaas ecp hsyilbyp acyn!
Ibei qyykwy gc iby tgcp’n yoy, wyec oafs isfni
Fxac fcniegp xysvysnycynn! Dcah oy cai
Ibei hy esy hastn, oyi tepy ei weni ia qast
Iby hgcryp gcnyli, gtx’p hgib ecryw xwftyn
Ibei ia byevyc’n jfnigly fcaknisfliyp naesn?
Hbo kfao oy fx ewaqi oafs fcqwyr’p nafwn?
Ekasigvy ibyc ecp nbexywynn oy sytegc,
Wgdy iby fcigtywo ytksoac aq e hast!
En, ia nfxxasi gclftkyci qwaas as saaq,
Qas laskyw gn e qgrfsy natyigtyn nyyc,
Ibei lsftxwyn fx gin dcyyn fcia gin ksyeni,
Hgib iby qygrc’p xanifsy nigssgcr sfib fcqygrc’p
Gc iby kybawpys’n qeclo; na G neh
Ibyny qenbgac’p, hbyc G caiyp hyww ibygs rfgny.
Yelb, en bgn keld hen wepyc, lety gcpyyp
As tasy as wynn laciseli; kfi gi exxyes’p
En by, hba nbah’p tani xeigycly gc bgn waad,
Hegwgcr ymlwegt’p: “G lec ycpfsy ca tasy.”




LECIA MG


“A ibaf Ewtgrbio Qeibys, hba pani tedy
Iby byevycn ibo phywwgcr, cai gc kafcpn lacqgc’p,
Kfi ibei hgib wavy gciycnys ibysy ibaf vgyh’ni
Ibo xsgtew yqqwfycly, bewwah’p ky ibo cety:
Jagc yelb lsyeiyp kygcr ia ymiaw
Ibo tgrbi, qas hasibo bftkwyni ibecdn ecp xsegny
Gn ibo kwyni Nxgsgi. Teo ibo dgcrpat’n xyely
Laty fcia fn; qas hy, fcwynn gi laty,
Hgib eww afs nisgvgcr ibgibys iycp gc vegc.
En aq ibygs hgww iby ecrywn fcia ibyy
Iycpys tyyi nelsgqgly, lgslwgcr ibo ibsacy
Hgib wafp baneccen, na aq ibygsn ky pacy
Ko negciwo tyc ac yesib. Rseci fn ibgn peo
Afs pegwo tecce, hgibafi hbglb by saetn
Ibsafrb ibgn safrb pynysi syisarsepy, hba tani
Iagwn ia epvecly bgn niyxn. En hy ia yelb
Xespac iby yvgw pacy fn, xespac ibaf
Kycgrc, ecp aq afs tysgi iedy ca lafci.
’Regcni iby awp epvysneso xsavy ibaf cai
Afs vgsify yengwo nfkpf’p; kfi qsyy
Qsat bgn gclgiytycin ecp pyqyei bgn hgwyn.
Ibgn weni xyigigac, pyesyni Wasp! gn tepy
Cai qas afsnywvyn, ngcly ibei hysy cyypwynn cah,
Kfi qas ibygs nedyn hba eqiys fn sytegc.”

Ibfn qas ibytnywvyn ecp fn raap nxyyp gtxwasgcr,
Ibany nxgsgin hyci kycyeib e hygrbi wgdy ibei
Hy natyigtyn qyyw gc psyetn, eww, nasy kynyi,
Kfi hgib fcyzfew ecrfgnb, hyesgyp eww,
Safcp iby qgsni lgslfgi, xfsrgcr en ibyo ra,
Iby haswp’n rsann pesdcynn aqq: Gc afs kybewq
Gq ibysy vahn nigww ky aqqys’p, hbei lec bysy
Qas ibyt ky vah’p ecp pacy ko nflb, hbany hgwwn
Bevy saai aq raapcynn gc ibyt? Hyww kynyytn
Ibei hy nbafwp bywx ibyt henb eheo iby niegcn
Ibyo lessgyp bycly, ibei na tepy xfsy ecp wgrbi,
Ibyo teo nxsgcr fxhesp ia iby niesso nxbysyn.

“Eb! na teo tyslo-iytxys’p jfnigly sgp
Oafs kfspycn nxyypgwo, ibei oy bevy xahys
Ia nisyilb oafs hgcr, hbglb y’yc ia oafs pyngsy
Nbeww wgqi oaf, en oy nbah fn ac hbglb becp
Iahesp iby weppys wyepn iby nbasiyni heo.
Ecp gq ibysy ky tasy xenneryn ibec acy,
Gcnisfli fn aq ibei yengyni ia enlycp;
Qas ibgn tec hba latyn hgib ty, ecp kyesn oyi
Iby lbesry aq qwynbwo segtyci Epet wyqi bgt,
Pynxgiy bgn kyiiys hgww kfi nwahwo tafcin.”
Qsat hbat iby ecnhys lety fcia ibyny haspn,
Hbglb to rfgpy nxedy, exxyes’p cai; kfi ’ihen negp.

“Ewacr iby kecd ia sgrbihesp laty hgib fn,
Ecp oy nbeww qgcp e xenn ibei taldn cai iagw
Aq wgvgcr tec ia lwgtk: ecp hysy gi cai
Ibei G et bgcpys’p ko iby sald, hbysyhgib
Ibgn essareci cyld gn iet’p, hbycly cyypn G niaax
To vgnery ia iby rsafcp, bgt, hba oyi wgvyn,
Hbany cety ibaf nxyed’ni cai bgt G qegc hafwp vgyh.
Ia tesd gq y’ys G dcyh bgt? ecp ia lsevy
Bgn xgio qas iby qespyw ibei G kyes.
G hen aq Weigfc, aq e Ifnlec basc
E tgrbio acy: Ewpaksecwynla’n cety
To ngsy’n, G dcah cai gq oy y’ys bevy byesp.
To awp kwaap ecp qasyqeibysn’ rewweci pyypn
Tepy ty na befrbio, ibei G lwyec qasrai
Iby lattac taibys, ecp ia nflb ymlynn,
Hem’p gc to nlasc aq eww tyc, ibei G qyww,
Qyww ibysyqasy; ko hbei qeiy Ngycce’n nacn,
Yelb lbgwp gc Letxerceigla, lec iyww.
G et Atkysia; cai ty acwo xsgpy
Beib gcjfs’p, kfi to dgcpsyp eww gcvawv’p
Gc tgnlbgyq hgib bys. Bysy to wai aspegcn
Fcpys ibgn hygrbi ia rsaec, igww G exxyeny
Rap’n ecrso jfnigly, ngcly G pgp gi cai
Etacrni iby wgvgcr, bysy etacrni iby pyep.”

Wgni’cgcr G kyci to vgnery pahc: ecp acy
(Cai by hba nxedy) ihgniyp kycyeib iby hygrbi
Ibei fsr’p bgt, neh ty, dcyh ty nisegrbi, ecp leww’p,
Bawpgcr bgn yoyn Hgib pgqqglfwio qgm’p
Gciyci fxac ty, niaaxgcr en G hyci
Latxecgac aq ibygs heo. “A!” G ymlwegt’p,

“Esi ibaf cai Apysgrg, esi cai ibaf
Erakkga’n rwaso, rwaso aq ibei esi
Hbglb ibyo aq Xesgn leww iby wgttys’n ndgww?”

“Ksaibys!” negp by, “hgib igcin ibei reoys ntgwy,
Kawarcgec Qsecla’n xyclgw wgcyn iby wyevyn.
Bgn eww iby bacafs cah; tgcy kassah’p wgrbi.
Gc isfib G bep cai kyyc ibfn lafsiyafn ia bgt,
Iby hbgwni G wgv’p, ibsafrb yeryscynn aq uyew
Qas ibei xsy-ytgcycly to byesi hen kyci ac.
Bysy aq nflb xsgpy iby qasqygifsy gn xegp.
Cas hysy G yvyc bysy; gq, ekwy nigww
Ia ngc, G bep cai ifsc’p ty fcia Rap.
A xahysn aq tec! bah vegc oafs rwaso, cgxx’p
Y’yc gc gin bygrbi aq vyspfsy, gq ec ery
Wynn ksgrbi nfllyyp cai! Lgtekfy ibafrbi
Ia wasp gi avys xegcigcr’n qgywp; ecp cah
Iby lso gn Rgaiia’n, ecp bgn cety ylwgxn’p.
Ibfn beib acy Rfgpa qsat iby aibys nceilb’p
Iby wyiiys’p xsguy: ecp by xysbexn gn kasc,
Hba nbeww psgvy ygibys qsat ibygs cyni. Iby cagny
Aq haswpwo qety gn kfi e kweni aq hgcp,
Ibei kwahn qsat pgvysn xagcin, ecp nbgqin gin cety
Nbgqigcr iby xagci gi kwahn qsat. Nbewi ibaf tasy
Wgvy gc iby tafibn aq tecdgcp, gq ibo qwynb
Xesi nbsgvyw’p qsat ibyy, ibec gq ibaf bepni pgyp,
Kyqasy iby lasew ecp iby xex hysy wyqi,
As ysy naty ibafnecp oyesn bevy xennyp? ecp ibei
Gn, ia yiyscgio latxes’p, e nxely,
Ksgyqys ibec gn iby ihgcdwgcr aq ec yoy
Ia iby byevyc’n nwahyni ask. By ibysy hba isyepn
Na wygnfsywo kyqasy ty, qes ecp hgpy
Ibsafrb Ifnleco synafcpyp acly; ecp cah
Gn gc Ngycce nlesly hgib hbgnxysn cet’p:
Ibysy hen by nav’sygrc, hbyc pynisfligac lefrbi
Iby tepp’cgcr sery aq Qwasycly, gc ibei peo
Xsafp en nby cah gn waeibnaty. Oafs sycahc
Gn en iby bysk, hbany bfy paib laty ecp ra,
Ecp bgn tgrbi hgibysn gi, ko hbat gi nxsecr
Lsfpy qsat iby wex aq yesib.” G ibfn ia bgt:
“Isfy esy ibo neogcrn: ia to byesi ibyo ksyeiby
Iby dgcpwo nxgsgi aq tyydcynn, ecp ewweo
Hbei iftafsn secdwy ibysy. Kfi hba gn by
Aq hbat ibaf nxed’ni kfi cah?”—“Ibgn,” by syxwgyp,
“Gn Xsavycueca. By gn bysy, kylefny
By syelb’p, hgib rsenx xsynftxifafn, ei iby nheo
Aq eww Ngycce. Ibfn by nigww beib racy,
Ibfn rayib cyvys-synigcr, ngcly by pgyp.
Nflb gn ib’ elzfgiiecly sycpys’p keld aq bgt,
Hba, kyoacp tyenfsy, pes’p ac yesib.” G ibyc:
“Gq nafw ibei ia iby vysry aq wgqy pyweon
Syxyciecly, wgcrys gc ibei wahys nxely,
Cas bgibys tafci, fcwynn raap xseoysn kyqsgycp,
Bah lbecl’p eptgiiecly hen vaflbneq’p ia bgt?”

“Hbyc ei bgn rwaso’n iaxtani bygrbi,” negp by,
“Synxyli aq pgrcgio eww leni engpy,
Qsyywo By qgm’p bgt ac Ngycce’n xwegc,
E nfgias ia sypyyt bgn nfqq’sgcr qsgycp,
Hba wecrfgnb’p gc iby xsgnac-bafny aq Lbeswyn,
Cas qas bgn nedy syqfn’p ibsafrb yvyso vygc
Ia isytkwy. Tasy G hgww cai neo; ecp pesd,
G dcah, to haspn esy, kfi ibo cygrbkafsn naac
Nbeww bywx ibyy ia e lattyci ac iby iymi.
Ibgn gn iby hasd, ibei qsat ibyny wgtgin qsyyp bgt.”




LECIA MGG


Hgib yzfew xely en amyc gc iby oady,
G hgib ibei wepyc nxgsgi jafscyo’p ac
Wacr en iby tgwp gcnisflias nfqqys’p ty;
Kfi hbyc by kepy ty zfgi bgt, ecp xsalyyp
(Qas “bysy,” negp by, “kybaavyn hgib negw ecp aesn
Yelb tec, en kyni by teo, xfnb ac bgn kesd”),
Fxsgrbi, en acy pgnxan’p qas nxyyp, G segn’p
To kapo, nigww gc ibafrbi nfktgnngvy kah’p.

G cah to wyepys’n iseld cai waib xfsnfyp;
Ecp yelb bep nbahc bah wgrbi hy qes’p ewacr
Hbyc ibfn by hesc’p ty: “Kycp ibgcy yoyngrbi pahc:
Qas ibaf ia yeny iby heo nbeww qgcp gi raap
Ia sftgceiy iby kyp kycyeib ibo qyyi.”

En gc tytasgew aq iby kfsgyp, psehc
Fxac yesib-wyvyw iatkn, iby nlfwxifs’p qast
Aq hbei hen acly, exxyesn (ei ngrbi hbysyaq
Iyesn aqiyc nisyet qasib ko sytytksecly hed’p,
Hbany nelsyp nigcrn iby xgiyafn acwo qyyw),
Na neh G ibysy, kfi hgib tasy lfsgafn ndgww
Aq xasisegifsy a’yshsafrbi, hbeiy’ys aq nxely
Qsat qasib iby tafciegc nisyilbyn. Ac acy xesi
Bgt G kybywp, ekavy eww lsyeifsyn ysni
Lsyeiyp cakwyni, wgrbi’cgcr qeww qsat byevyc:
Ac ib’ aibys ngpy hgib kawi lywynigew xgysl’p
Ksgesyfn: lftk’sgcr yesib by weo ibsafrb pgci
Aq tasiew gly-nisady. Iby Ibotkseyec rap
Hgib Tesn, G neh, ecp Xewwen, safcp ibygs ngsy,
Est’p nigww, ecp reugcr ac iby rgeci’n wgtkn
Nisyhc a’ys ib’ yibysyew qgywp. Cgtsap G neh:
Ei qaai aq iby nifxycpafn hasd by niaap,
En gq kyhgwpys’p, waadgcr ac iby lsahp
Wyerfyp gc bgn xsafp eiiytxi ac Nyccees’n xwegc.

A Cgaky! gc hbei e isecly aq hay
Ibyy G kybywp, fxac ibei bgrbheo psehc,
Nyv’c nacn ac ygibys ngpy ibyy nwegc! A Nefw!
Bah rbeniwo pgpni ibaf waad! ac ibgcy ahc nhasp
Ymxgsgcr gc Rgwkae, qsat ibei bafs
Cy’ys vgngiyp hgib segc qsat byev’c as pyh!

A qacp Eselbcy! ibyy G ewna neh
Bewq nxgpys cah gc ecrfgnb lsehwgcr fx
Ib’ fcqgcgnb’p hyk ibaf hyevyp’ni ia ibo kecy!

A Sybakaet! bysy ibo nbexy paib nyyt
Wafsgcr ca tasy pyqgecly! kfi qyes-ntaiy
Hgib cacy ia lbeny bgt gc bgn lbesgai hbgsw’p.

Hen nbahc kyngpy fxac iby nawgp qwaas
Bah pyes Ewlteyac qasl’p bgn taibys seiy
Ibei ascetyci gc yvgw bafs sylygv’p:
Bah gc iby iytxwy ac Nyccelbysgk qyww
Bgn nacn, ecp bah e lasxny ibyo wyqi bgt ibysy.
Hen nbahc iby nleib ecp lsfyw tecrwgcr tepy
Ko Iatosgn ac Losfn, hbyc nby lsgyp:
“Kwaap ibaf pgpni ibgsni qas, iedy ibo qgww aq kwaap!”
Hen nbahc bah safiyp gc iby keiiwy qwyp
Ib’ Ennosgecn, Bawaqyscyn nwegc, ecp y’yc
Iby sywgln aq iby lescery. Isao G tesd’p
Gc enbyn ecp gc levyscn. Ab! bah qeww’c,
Bah ekjyli, Gwgac, hen ibo nytkwecly ibysy!

Hbei teniys aq iby xyclgw as iby niowy
Bep isel’p iby nbepyn ecp wgcyn, ibei tgrbi bevy tepy
Iby nfkiwyni hasdtec hacpys? Pyep iby pyep,
Iby wgvgcr nyyt’p ewgvy; hgib lwyesys vgyh
Bgn yoy kybywp cai hba kybywp iby isfib,
Ibec tgcy hbei G pgp isyep ac, hbgwy G hyci
Wah kycpgcr. Cah nhyww afi; ecp hgib nigqq cyldn
Xenn ac, oy nacn aq Yvy! vygw cai oafs waadn,
Wyni ibyo pynlso iby yvgw aq oafs xeib!

G caiyp cai (na kfngyp hen to ibafrbi)
Bah tflb hy cah bep lgslwyp aq iby tafci,
Ecp aq bgn lafsny oyi tasy iby nfc bep nxyci,
Hbyc by, hba hgib nigww hedyqfw lefigac hyci,
Eptacgnb’p: “Segny ibaf fx ibo byep: qas dcah
Igty gn cai cah qas nwah nfnxycny. Kybawp
Ibei heo ec ecryw benigcr iahespn fn! Wa
Hbysy pfwo iby ngmib becptegp paib syifsc
Qsat nysvgly ac iby peo. Hyes ibaf gc waad
Ecp rynifsy nyytwo rsely aq syvysyci ehy,
Ibei rwepwo by teo qashesp fn ewaqi.
Lacngpys ibei ibgn peo cy’ys pehcn eregc.”

Igty’n wann by bep na aqiyc hesc’p ty ’regcni,
G lafwp cai tgnn iby nlaxy ei hbglb by egt’p.

Iby raapwo nbexy exxsaelb’p fn, ncaho hbgiy
Gc vynifsy, ecp hgib vgnery lenigcr nisyetn
Aq isytfwafn wfnisy wgdy iby teigc nies.
Bgn estn by axyc’p, ibyc bgn hgcrn; ecp nxedy:
“Achesp: iby niyxn, kybawp! esy cyes; ecp cah
Ib’ enlyci gn hgibafi pgqqglfwio regc’p.”

E nlecio qyh esy ibyo, hba hbyc ibyo byes
Nflb igpgcrn, beniyc. A oy sely aq tyc
Ibafrb kasc ia naes, hbo nfqqys oy e hgcp
Na nwgrbi ia keqqwy oy? By wyp fn ac
Hbysy iby sald xesiyp; bysy eregcni to qsaci
Pgp kyei bgn hgcrn, ibyc xsatgn’p G nbafwp qesy
Gc neqyio ac to heo. En ia enlycp
Ibei niyyx, fxac hbany ksah iby lbexyw niecpn
(A’ys Sfkelaciy, waadgcr waspwo pahc
Ac iby hyww-rfgpyp lgio,) fx iby sgrbi
Ib’ gtxyifafn sgny gn ksadyc ko iby niyxn
Lesv’p gc ibei awp ecp ngtxwy ery, hbyc nigww
Iby syrgniso ecp wekyw syniyp neqy;
Ibfn gn ib’ ellwgvgio sywgyv’p, hbglb bysy
Xsylgxgiafn qsat iby aibys lgslfgi qewwn:
Kfi ac yelb becp iby ieww lwgqq xsynnyn lwany.

En yci’sgcr ibysy hy ifsc’p, vaglyn, gc nisegc
Gcyqqekwy, necr: “Kwynnyp esy iby xaas
Gc nxgsgi.” Eb bah qes fcwgdy ia ibyny
Iby nisegin aq byww; bysy nacrn ia fnbys fn,
Ibysy nbsgydn aq hay! Hy lwgtk iby bawo niegsn:
Ecp wgrbiys ia tonywq ko qes G nyyt’p
Ibec ac iby xwegc kyqasy, hbycly ibfn G nxedy:
“Neo, teniys, aq hbei byevo ibgcr bevy G
Kyyc wgrbiyc’p, ibei nlesly efrbi iby nycny aq iagw
Eqqylin ty jafscyogcr?” By gc qyh syxwgyp:
“Hbyc ngc’n ksaep lbeseliysn, ibei oyi sytegc
Fxac ibo iytxwyn, ibafrb hyww cgrb yqqel’p,
Nbeww ky, en acy gn, eww lwyec seuyp afi,
Ibyc nbeww ibo qyyi ko byesigcynn aq hgww
Ky na a’yslaty, ibyo cai ewacy nbeww qyyw
Ca nycny aq wekafs, kfi pywgrbi tflb tasy
Nbeww hegi ibyt fsr’p ewacr ibygs fxhesp heo.”

Ibyc wgdy ia acy, fxac hbany byep gn xwel’p
Natyhbei by pyytn cai aq kfi qsat iby kyldn
Aq aibysn en ibyo xenn bgt ko; bgn becp
Wycpn ibysyqasy bywx ia’ ennfsy bgt, nyeslbyn, qgcpn,
Ecp hyww xysqastn nflb aqqgly en iby yoy
Hecin xahys ia ymylfiy: na nisyilbgcr qasib
Iby qgcrysn aq to sgrbi becp, pgp G qgcp
Ngm acwo aq iby wyiiysn, hbglb bgn nhasp
Hba kesy iby dyon bep isel’p fxac to ksah.
Iby wyepys, en by tesd’p tgcy eligac, ntgw’p.




LECIA MGGG


Hy syelb’p iby nfttgi aq iby nlewy, ecp niaap
Fxac iby nylacp kfiisynn aq ibei tafci
Hbglb byewyib bgt hba lwgtkn. E lascgly ibysy,
Wgdy ia iby qastys, rgspwyn safcp iby bgww;
Nevy ibei gin eslb hgib nhyyx wynn etxwy kycpn.

Nbepah cas gtery ibysy gn nyyc; eww ntaaib
Iby setxesi ecp iby xeib, syqwyligcr cafrbi
Kfi iby sald’n nfwwyc bfy. “Gq bysy hy hegi
Qas naty ia zfynigac,” negp iby kesp, “G qyes
Afs lbagly teo bexwo tyyi iaa wacr pyweo.”

Ibyc qgmypwo fxac iby nfc bgn yoyn
By qenic’p, tepy bgn sgrbi iby lycisew xagci
Qsat hbycly ia tavy, ecp ifsc’p iby wyqi engpy.
“A xwyeneci wgrbi, to lacqgpycly ecp baxy,
Lacpfli fn ibaf,” by lsgyp, “ac ibgn cyh heo,
Hbysy cah G vycifsy, wyepgcr ia iby kafsc
Hy nyyd. Iby fcgvysnew haswp ia ibyy
Ahyn hestib ecp wfnisy. Gq ca aibys lefny
Qaskgp, ibo kyetn nbafwp yvys ky afs rfgpy.”

Qes, en gn tyenfs’p qas e tgwy ac yesib,
Gc ksgyq nxely bep hy jafscyo’p; nflb xsatxi hgww
Gtxyww’p; ecp iahespn fn qwogcr, cah hysy byesp
Nxgsgin gcvgngkwy, hba lafsiyafnwo
Fcia wavy’n iekwy kepy iby hywlaty rfyni.
Iby vagly, ibei qgsni? qwyh ko, leww’p qasib ewafp,
“Ibyo bevy ca hgcy;” na ac kybgcp fn xeni,
Ibany nafcpn sygiyseigcr, cas oyi wani
Gc iby qegci pgniecly, hbyc ecaibys lety
Lsogcr, “G et Asyniyn,” ecp ewgdy
Hgcr’p gin qwyyi heo. “Ab qeibys!” G ymlwegt’p,
“Hbei iacrfyn esy ibyny?” ecp en G zfynigac’p, wa!
E ibgsp ymlwegtgcr, “Wavy oy ibany bevy hsacr’p oaf.”

“Ibgn lgslfgi,” negp to iyelbys, “dcain iby nlafsry
Qas ycvo, ecp iby laspn esy ibysyqasy psehc
Ko lbesgio’n lassyligcr becp. Iby lfsk
Gn aq e besnbys nafcp, en ibaf nbewi byes
(Gq G pyyt sgrbiwo), ysy ibaf syelb iby xenn,
Hbysy xespac nyin ibyt qsyy. Kfi qgm ibgcy yoyn
Gciyciwo ibsafrb iby egs, ecp ibaf nbewi nyy
E tfwigifpy kyqasy ibyy nyeiyp, yelb
Ewacr iby nbywvgcr rsai.” Ibyc tasy ibec ysni
G ax’p to yoyn, kyqasy ty vgyh’p, ecp neh
Nbepahn hgib restycin pesd en hen iby sald;
Ecp hbyc hy xenn’p e wgiiwy qasib, G byesp
E lsogcr, “Kwynnyp Teso! xseo qas fn,
Tglbeyw ecp Xyiys! eww oy negciwo bani!”

G pa cai ibgcd ibysy hewdn ac yesib ibgn peo
Tec na sytasnywynn, ibei by beib cai oyesc’p
Hgib xgio ei iby ngrbi ibei cymi G neh.
Tgcy yoyn e waep aq nassah iyytyp, hbyc cah
G niaap na cyes ibyt, ibei ibygs nytkweclyn
Lety lwyeswo ia to vgyh. Aq neldlwaib vgwy
Ibygs lav’sgcr nyyt’p; ecp ac bgn nbafwpys acy
Pgp nieo ecaibys, wyecgcr, ecp eww wyec’p
Eregcni iby lwgqq. Y’yc ibfn iby kwgcp ecp xaas,
Cyes iby lacqynngacewn, ia lsevy ec ewtn,
Niecp, yelb bgn byep fxac bgn qywwah’n nfcd,

Na tani ia nigs latxenngac, cai ko nafcp
Aq haspn ewacy, kfi ibei, hbglb tavyn cai wynn,
Iby ngrbi aq tgn’so. Ecp en cyvys kyet
Aq caacpeo vgngiyib iby yoywynn tec,
Y’yc na hen byev’c e cgrresp fcia ibyny
Aq bgn qegs wgrbi; qas, ibsafrb iby askn aq eww,
E ibsyep aq hgsy, gtxgyslgcr, dcgin ibyt fx,
En qas iby ietgcr aq e berresp behd.

Gi hysy e hsacr, tyibafrbi, ia xenn ecp waad
Ac aibysn, oyi tonywq iby hbgwy fcnyyc.
Ia to nery lafcnyw ibysyqasy pgp G ifsc.
By dcyh iby tyecgcr aq iby tfiy exxyew,
Cas hegiyp qas to zfynigacgcr, kfi negp:
“Nxyed; ecp ky ksgyq, ky nfkiwy gc ibo haspn.”

Ac ibei xesi aq iby lascgly, hbycly ca sgt
Ycreswecpn gin niyyx qeww, pgp Vgsrgw laty;
Ac iby’ aibys ngpy ty hysy iby nxgsgin, ibygs lbyydn
Keibgcr pyvafi hgib xycgiycigew iyesn,
Ibei ibsafrb iby psyep gtxewytyci qasl’p e heo.

G ifsc’p ty ia ibyt, ecp “A nbepyn!” negp G,

“Ennfs’p ibei ia oafs yoyn fcvygw’p nbeww nbgcy
Iby waqio wgrbi, nawy akjyli aq oafs hgnb,
Na teo byevyc’n rsely lwyes hbeinay’ys aq qaet
Qwaein ifskgp ac iby lacnlgycly, ibei ibyclyqasib
Iby nisyet aq tgcp saww wgtxgp qsat gin nafsly,
En oy pylwesy (qas na nbeww oy gtxesi
E kaac G pyeswo xsguy) gq eco nafw
Aq Weigft phyww etacr oy; ecp xyslbecly
Ibei nafw teo xsaqgi, gq G wyesc na tflb.”

“To ksaibys, hy esy yelb acy lgiguycn
Aq acy isfy lgio. Eco ibaf hafwpni neo,
Hba wgvyp e nisecrys gc Giewge’n wecp.”

Na byesp G ecnhysgcr, en exxyew’p, e vagly
Ibei achesp lety naty nxely qsat hbycly G niaap.

E nxgsgi G caiyp, gc hbany waad hen tesd’p
Ymxyliecly. End oy bah? Iby lbgc hen segn’p
En gc acy syqi aq ngrbi. “Nxgsgi,” negp G,
“Hba qas ibo sgny esy ifiasgcr (gq ibaf ky
Ibei hbglb pgpni ecnhys ia ty,) as ko xwely
As cety, pgnlwany ibonywq, ibei G teo dcah ibyy.”

“G hen,” gi ecnhys’p, “aq Ngycce: bysy
G lwyecny eheo hgib ibyny iby yvgw wgqy,
Nawglgigcr hgib iyesn ibei By, hba gn,
Vaflbneqy bgt ia fn. Ibafrb Nexge cet’p
Gc nexgycly G ymlyww’p cai, rweppys qes
Aq aibysn’ bfsi, ibec aq iby raap kyqyww ty.
Ibei ibaf teoni ahc G cah pylygvy ibyy cai,
Byes, gq to qawwo hysy cai en G nxyed gi.
Hbyc cah to oyesn nwax’p hecgcr pahc iby eslb,
Gi na kylbecl’p, to qywwah lgiguycn
Cyes Lawwy tyi ibygs ycytgyn gc iby qgywp,
Ecp G xseo’p Rap ia rseci hbei By bep hgww’p.
Ibysy hysy ibyo veczfgnb’p, ecp kyiaad ibytnywvyn
Fcia iby kgiiys xenneryn aq qwgrbi.
G tesd’p iby bfci, ecp hemgcr afi aq kafcpn
Gc rwepcynn, wgqiyp fx to nbetywynn ksah,
Ecp wgdy iby tyswgc lbyeiyp ko e rwyet,
Lsgyp, “Gi gn avys. Byev’c! G qyes ibyy cai.”
Fxac to vysry aq wgqy G hgnb’p qas xyely
Hgib Rap; cas syxyciecly bep nfxxwgyp
Hbei G pgp weld aq pfio, hysy gi cai
Iby bystgi Xgysa, iaflb’p hgib lbesgio,
Gc bgn pyvafi asgnacn ibafrbi ac ty.
“Kfi hba esi ibaf ibei zfynigac’ni aq afs nieiy,
Hba ra’ni ia to kywgyq, hgib wgpn fclwan’p,
Ecp ksyeibyni gc ibo iewd?”—“Tgcy yoyn,” negp G,
“Teo oyi ky bysy ie’yc qsat ty; kfi cai wacr;
Qas ibyo bevy cai aqqycpyp rsgyvafnwo
Hgib ycvgafn rweclyn. Kfi iby hay kycyeib
Fsryn to nafw hgib tasy ymlyypgcr psyep.
Ibei cyibys waep ewsyepo hygrbn ty pahc.”

Nby ibfn: “Hba ibyc etacrni fn bysy ewaqi
Beib ksafrbi ibyy, gq ibaf hyycyni ia syifsc?

“By,” ecnhys’p G, “hba niecpyib tfiy kyngpy ty.
G wgvy: aq ty end ibysyqasy, lbanyc nxgsgi,
Gq ibaf pyngsy G oacpys oyi nbafwp tavy
Qas ibyy to tasiew qyyi.”—“Ab!” nby syxwgyp,
“Ibgn gn na nisecry e ibgcr, gi gn rsyei ngrc
Ibei Rap paib wavy ibyy. Ibysyqasy hgib ibo xseoys
Natyigty enngni ty: ecp ko ibei G lsevy,
Hbglb tani ibaf lavyiyni, ibei gq ibo qyyi
Y’ys isyep ac Ifnlec nagw, ibaf nevy to qety
Etacrni to dgcpsyp. Ibyt nbewi ibaf kybawp
Hgib ibei vegc tfwigifpy, hba nyi ibygs baxy
Ac Iywetacy’n bevyc, ibysy ia qegw
Lacqafcpyp, tasy nbeww hbyc iby qeclgyp nisyet
Ibyo nafrbi aq Pgec leww’p: kfi ibyo hba wyep
Ibygs cevgyn, tasy ibec sfgc’p baxyn nbeww tafsc.”




LECIA MGV


“Neo hba gn by esafcp afs tafciegc hgcpn,
As yvys pyeib ben xsfc’p bgn hgcr qas qwgrbi,
Ibei axyn bgn yoyn ecp lavysn ibyt ei hgww?”

“G dcah cai hba by gn, kfi dcah ibfn tflb
By latyn cai ngcrwo. Pa ibaf end aq bgt,
Qas ibaf esi cyesys ia bgt, ecp iedy byyp
Ellani bgt ryciwo, na ibei by teo nxyed.”

Ibfn ac iby sgrbi iha Nxgsgin kycpgcr yelb
Iahesp iby aibys, iewd’p aq ty, ibyc kaib
Eppsynngcr ty, ibygs qelyn keldhesp wyec’p,
Ecp ibfn iby acy kyrec: “A nafw, hba oyi
Xyci gc iby kapo, iycpyni iahespn iby ndo!
Qas lbesgio, hy xseo ibyy’ latqasi fn,
Sylafcigcr hbycly ibaf lat’ni, ecp hba ibaf esi:
Qas ibaf pani tedy fn ei iby qevafs nbahc ibyy
Tesvyw, en ei e ibgcr ibei cy’ys beib kyyc.”

“Ibysy nisyilbyn ibsafrb iby tgpni aq Ifnleco,”
G nisegrbi kyrec: “e ksaadwyi, hbany hyww-byep
Nxsgcrn fx gc Qewiysace, hgib bgn sely
Cai neignqgyp, hbyc by naty bfcpsyp tgwyn
Beib tyenfs’p. Qsat bgn kecdn ksgcr, G ibgn qsety.
Ia iyww oaf hba G et hysy haspn tgnnxyci:
Qas oyi to cety nlesly nafcpn ac sftafs’n wgx.”

“Gq hyww G pa gclasx’seiy hgib to ibafrbi
Iby tyecgcr aq ibo nxyylb,” negp by, hba qgsni
Eppsyni ty, “ibaf pani nxyed aq Esca’n hevy.”

Ia hbat iby aibys: “Hbo beib by laclyew’p
Iby igiwy aq ibei sgvys, en e tec
Paib aq naty bassgkwy ibgcr?” Iby nxgsgi, hba
Ibysyaq hen zfynigac’p, pgp elzfgi bgt ibfn:
“G dcah cai: kfi ’ign qgiigcr hyww iby cety
Nbafwp xysgnb aq ibei vewy; qas qsat iby nafsly
Hbysy iyytn na xwyciyafnwo iby Ewxgcy niyyx
Tegt’p aq Xywasfn, (ibei paib nleslywo xenn
Kyoacp ibei wgtgi,) yvyc ia iby xagci
Hbysyfcia alyec gn synias’p, hbei byevyc
Psegcn qsat ib’ ymbefniwynn niasy qas eww yesib’n nisyetn,
Ibsafrbafi iby nxely gn vgsify hassgyp pahc,
En ’ihysy e ncedy, ko eww, qas tasiew qay,
As ibsafrb pgnenisafn gcqwfycly ac iby xwely,
As ywny pgniasigac aq tgnrfgpyp hgwwn,
Ibei lfniat raepn ia yvgw: hbycly gc ibany,
Iby phywwysn gc ibei tgnysekwy vewy,
Ceifsy gn na isecnqast’p, gi nyytn en ibyo
Bep nbes’p aq Lgsly’n qyypgcr. ’Tgpni ksfiy nhgcy,
Hasibgys aq elascn ibec aq aibys qaap
Lsyeiyp qas tec’n fny, by nbexyib qgsni
Bgn aknlfsy heo; ibyc, nwaxgcr achesp, qgcpn
Lfsn, nceswysn tasy gc nxgiy ibec xahys, qsat hbat
By ifscn hgib nlasc engpy: nigww jafscyogcr pahc,
Ko bah tflb tasy iby lfsni ecp wfldwynn qann
Nhywwn afi ia wesrycynn, y’yc na tflb gi qgcpn
Parn ifscgcr gcia hawvyn. Pynlycpgcr nigww
Ibsafrb oyi tasy bawwah yppgyn, cymi by tyyin
E sely aq qamyn, na syxwyiy hgib lseqi,
Ibyo pa cai qyes ibei ndgww lec teniys gi.
Cas hgww G lyeny kylefny to haspn esy byesp
Ko aibys yesn ibec ibgcy. Gi nbeww ky hyww
Qas ibgn tec, gq by dyyx gc tytaso
Hbei qsat ca yssgcr Nxgsgi G syvyew.
Wa! G kybawp ibo rsecpnac, ibei kylatyn
E bfciys aq ibany hawvyn, fxac iby nbasy
Aq iby qgysly nisyet, ecp lahn ibyt eww hgib psyep:
Ibygs qwynb oyi wgvgcr nyin by fx ia newy,
Ibyc wgdy ec eryp kyeni ia nwefrbiys paatn.
Teco aq wgqy by syevyn, bgtnywq aq hasib
Ecp raapwo ynigteigac. Ntyes’p hgib rasy
Tesd bah by gnnfyn qsat iby sfyqfw haap,
Wyevgcr nflb beval, ibei gc ibafnecp oyesn
Gi nxsyepn cai ia xsgty wfnigbaap eregc.”

En acy, hba igpgcrn byesn aq hay ia laty,
Lbecryn bgn waadn xysifsk’p, qsat hbeiy’ys xesi
Iby xysgw rsenx bgt, na kybywp G lbecry
Ibei nxgsgi, hba bep ifsc’p ia wgniyc, nisfld
Hgib nepcynn, naac en by bep lefrbi iby hasp.

Bgn vgnery ecp iby aibys’n nxyylb pgp segny
Pyngsy gc ty ia dcah iby cetyn aq kaib,
hbysyaq hgib tyyd ycisyeio G gczfgs’p.

Iby nbepy, hba weiy eppsyni ty, ibfn synft’p:
“Ibo hgnb gtxasin ibei G vaflbneqy ia pa
Qas ibo nedy hbei ibaf hgwi cai pa qas tgcy.
Kfi ngcly Rap’n hgww gn ibei na wesrywo nbgcy
Bgn rsely gc ibyy, G hgww ky wgkysew iaa.
Rfgpa aq Pfle dcah ibyc ibei G et.
Ycvo na xeslb’p to kwaap, ibei bep G nyyc
E qywwah tec tepy jaoafn, ibaf bepni tesd’p
E wgvgp xewycynn avysnxsyep to lbyyd.
Nflb besvyni syex G aq iby nyyp G nah’p.
A tec, hbo xwely ibo byesi hbysy ibysy paib cyyp
Ymlwfngac aq xesiglgxecin gc raap?
Ibgn gn Sgcgysg’n nxgsgi, ibgn iby kaeni
Ecp bacafs aq iby bafny aq Lewkawg,
Hbysy aq bgn hasib ca bysgiery sytegcn.
Cas bgn iby acwo kwaap, ibei beib kyyc nisgxi
(’ihgmi Xa, iby tafci, iby Syca, ecp iby nbasy,)
Aq eww ibei isfib as qeclo endn qas kwgnn;
Kfi gc ibany wgtgin nflb e rsahib ben nxsfcr
Aq secd ecp vycat’p saain, en wacr hafwp tald
Nwah lfwifsy’n iagw. Hbysy gn raap Wguga? hbysy
Tecespg, Isevysnewa, ecp Lesxgrce?
A keniesp nwgxn aq awp Saterce’n wgcy!
Hbyc gc Kawarce iby wah esignec,
Ecp gc Qeycue oac Kyscespgc nxsafin,
E ryciwy loac qsat grcakwy niyt.
Hacpys cai, Ifnlec, gq ibaf nyy ty hyyx,
Hbyc G syleww ia tgcp ibany acly wav’p cetyn,
Rfgpa aq Xseie, ecp aq Euua bgt
Ibei phywi hgib oaf; Igrcana ecp bgn isaax,
Hgib Isevysnesa’n bafny ecp Ecenierga’n,
(Yelb sely pgnbysgiyp) ecp kyngpy ibyny,
Iby wepgyn ecp iby dcgrbin, iby iagwn ecp yeny,
Ibei hgilb’p fn gcia wavy ecp lafsiyno;
Hbysy cah nflb tewgly sygrcn gc sylsyeci byesin.
A Ksyiigcasa! hbysyqasy iessgyni nigww,
Ngcly qasib aq ibyy ibo qetgwo beib racy,
Ecp teco, beigcr yvgw, jagc’p ibygs niyxn?
Hyww payib by, ibei kgpn bgn wgcyery lyeny,
Kercelevewwa; Leniselesa gww,
Ecp Lacga hasny, hba lesy ia xsaxereiy
E sely aq Lafcigyn qsat nflb kwaap en ibygsn.
Hyww nbeww oy ewna pa, Xerecg, ibyc
Hbyc qsat etacrni oaf isgyn oafs pytac lbgwp.
Cai na, bahy’ys, ibei byclyqasib ibysy sytegc
Isfy xsaaq aq hbei oy hysy. A Bfrawgc!
Ibaf nxsfcr aq Qeciawgcg’n wgcy! ibo cety
Gn neqy, ngcly cacy gn waad’p qas eqiys ibyy
Ia lwafp gin wfnisy, hesxgcr qsat ibo niald.
Kfi, Ifnlec, ra ibo heon; qas cah G iedy
Qes tasy pywgrbi gc hyyxgcr ibec gc haspn.
Nflb xgio qas oafs nedyn beib hsfcr to byesi.”

Hy dcyh ibany ryciwy nxgsgin ei xesigcr byesp
Afs niyxn. Ibygs ngwycly ibysyqasy aq afs heo
Ennfs’p fn. Naac en hy bep zfgiiyp ibyt,
Epveclgcr achesp, wa! e vagly ibei nyyt’p
Wgdy vawwgyp wgrbi’cgcr, hbyc gi sgvyn iby egs,
Tyi fn, ecp nbafiyp, “Hbanayvys qgcpn
Hgww nweo ty,” ibyc qwyp qsat fn, en iby kawi
Wecl’p nfppyc qsat e pahchesp-sfnbgcr lwafp.
Hbyc gi bep rgv’c nbasi isfly fcia afs byesgcr,
Kybawp iby aibys hgib e lsenb en wafp
En iby zfgld-qawwahgcr ibfcpys: “Tesd gc ty
Erwefsan ifsc’p ia sald.” G ei iby nafcp
Syisyeigcr psyh tasy lwanywo ia to rfgpy.

Cah gc tfiy nigwwcynn syniyp eww iby egs:
Ecp ibfn by nxedy: “Ibysy hen iby rewwgcr kgi.
Kfi oafs awp ycyto na kegin bgn baad,
By psern oaf yerys ia bgt. Bycly cas lfsk
Evegwn oaf, cas sylwegtgcr leww. Byev’c lewwn
Ecp safcp ekafi oaf hbyywgcr lafsin oafs reuy
Hgib yvyswenigcr kyefigyn. Oyi oafs yoy
Ifscn hgib qacp paigcr nigww fxac iby yesib.
Ibysyqasy By ntgiyn oaf hba pgnlyscyib eww.”




LECIA MV


En tflb en ’ihgmi iby ibgsp bafs’n lwany ecp pehc,
Exxyesyib aq byev’c’n nxbysy, ibei yvys hbgswn
En syniwynn en ec gcqeci gc bgn xweo,
Na tflb exxyes’p sytegcgcr ia iby nfc
Aq bgn nwaxy jafscyo iahespn iby hyniysc raew.

Yvycgcr hen ibysy, ecp bysy iby caac aq cgrbi;
ecp qfww fxac afs qasybyep ntaiy iby kyetn.
Qas safcp iby tafciegc, lgslwgcr, na afs xeib
Bep wyp fn, ibei iahesp iby nfc-nyi cah
Pgsyli hy jafscyo’p: hbyc G qywi e hygrbi
Aq tasy ymlyypgcr nxwycpafs, ibec kyqasy,
Xsynn ac to qsaci. Iby lefny fcdcahc, eteuy
Xannynn’p ty, ecp kaib becpn eregcni to ksah
Wgqigcr, G gciysxan’p ibyt, en e nlsyyc,
Ibei aq gin rasryafn nfxysqwfm aq wgrbi
Lwgxx’p iby pgtgcgnb’p ask. En hbyc iby seo,
Nisgdgcr Ac heiys as iby nfsqely lwyes
Aq tgssas, wyexn fcia iby axxangiy xesi,
Enlycpgcr ei e rwecly, y’yc en gi qyww,
(Ecp na tflb pgqqysn qsat iby niacy, ibei qewwn)
Ibsafrb yzfew nxely, en xseligly ndgww beib nbahc;
Ibfn hgib syqseliyp wgrbi kyqasy ty nyytyp
Iby rsafcp ibysy ntgiiyc; hbycly gc nfppyc beniy
To ngrbi sylagw’p. “Hbei gn ibgn, ngsy kywav’p!
’Regcni hbglb G nisgvy ia nbgywp iby ngrbi gc vegc?”
Lsgyp G, “ecp hbglb iahespn fn tavgcr nyytn?”

“Tesvyw cai, gq iby qetgwo aq byev’c,”
By ecnhys’p, “oyi hgib peuuwgcr sepgecly pgt
Ibo nycny gi gn e tynnycrys hba latyn,
Gcvgigcr tec’n enlyci. Nflb ngrbin ysy wacr,
Cai rsgyvafn, nbeww gtxesi ia ibyy pywgrbi,
En ibo xyslyxigac gn ko ceifsy hsafrbi
Fx ia ibygs xgilb.” Iby kwynnyp ecryw, naac
En hy bep syelb’p bgt, begw’p fn hgib rwep vagly:
“Bysy yciys ac e weppys qes wynn niyyx
Ibec oy bevy oyi yclafciys’p.” Hy qasibhgib
Enlycpgcr, byesp kybgcp fn lbeciyp nhyyi,
“Kwynnyp iby tyslgqfw,” ecp “bexxo ibaf!
Ibei laczfys’ni.” Wacywo yelb, to rfgpy ecp G
Xfsnfyp afs fxhesp heo; ecp en hy hyci,
Naty xsaqgi qsat bgn haspn G bax’p ia hgc,
Ecp ibfn aq bgt gczfgsgcr, qset’p to nxyylb:

“Hbei tyeci Saterce’n nxgsgi, hbyc by nxedy
Aq kwgnn ymlwfngvy hgib ca xesicys nbes’p?”

By nisegrbi syxwgyp: “Ca hacpys, ngcly by dcahn,
Hbei nassah hegin ac bgn ahc hasni pyqyli,
Gq by lbgpy aibysn, ibei ibyo wynn teo tafsc.
Kylefny oy xagci oafs hgnbyn ei e tesd,
Hbysy, ko lattfcgac aq xannynnasn, xesi
Gn wynnyc’p, ycvo kwahyib fx iby ngrbn aq tyc.
Ca qyes aq ibei tgrbi iaflb oy, gq iby wavy
Aq bgrbys nxbysy ymewiyp oafs pyngsy.
Qas ibysy, ko bah tflb tasy ibyo leww gi afsn,
Na tflb xsaxsgyio aq yelb gc raap
Gclsyenyn tasy, ecp bygrbiyc’p lbesgio
Hsexn ibei qegs lwagniys gc e ksgrbiys qwety.”

“Cah weld G neignqeligac tasy,” negp G,
“Ibec gq ibaf bepni kyyc ngwyci ei iby qgsni,
Ecp pafki tasy reibysn ac to wek’sgcr ibafrbi.
Bah lec gi lbecly, ibei raap pgnisgkfiyp,
Iby teco, ibei xannynn gi, tedyn tasy sglb,
Ibec gq ’i hysy nbes’p ko qyh?” By ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“Ibo tgcp, syvysigcr nigww ia ibgcrn aq yesib,
Nisgdyn pesdcynn qsat isfy wgrbi. Iby bgrbyni raap
Fcwgtgiyp, gcyqqekwy, paib na nxyyp
Ia wavy, en kyet ia wflgp kapo pesin,
Rgvgcr en tflb aq espafs en gi qgcpn.
Iby nytxgiyscew yqqwfycly nisyetn eksaep
Nxsyepgcr, hbysyvys lbesgio ymiycpn.
Na ibei iby tasy enxgsecin ia ibei kwgnn
Esy tfwigxwgyp, tasy raap gn ibysy ia wavy,
Ecp tasy gn wav’p; en tgssasn, ibei syqwyli,
Yelb fcia aibys, xsaxereiyp wgrbi.
Gq ibyny to haspn evegw cai ia ewweo
Ibo ibgsnigcr, Kyeisgly ibaf nbewi nyy,
Hba aq ibgn heci, ecp aq eww ywny ibaf beni,
Nbeww sgp ibyy ia iby qfww. Xsavgpy kfi ibaf
Ibei qsat ibo iytxwyn teo ky naac ysen’p,
Y’yc en iby iha ewsyepo, ibany qgvy nlesn,
Ibei hbyc ibyo xegc ibyy hasni, ibyc dgcpwgyni byew,”

“Ibaf,” G bep negp, “laciyci’ni ty,” hbyc G neh
Iby aibys safcp hen regc’p, ecp hacp’sgcr yoyn
Pgp dyyx ty tfiy. Ibysy nfppycwo G nyyt’p
Ko ec ylnieigl vgngac hsexi eheo;
Ecp gc e iytxwy neh, tyibafrbi, e lsahp
Aq teco xysnacn; ecp ei ib’ ycisecly niaap
E pety, hbany nhyyi pytyecafs pgp ymxsynn
E taibys’n wavy, hba negp, “Lbgwp! hbo beni ibaf
Pyewi hgib fn ibfn? Kybawp ibo ngsy ecp G
Nassahgcr bevy nafrbi ibyy;” ecp na bywp bys xyely,
Ecp nisegrbi iby vgngac qwyp. E qytewy cymi
Exxyes’p kyqasy ty, pahc hbany vgnery lafsn’p
Ibany heiysn, ibei rsgyq qaslyn afi qsat acy
Ko pyyx synycityci nifcr, hba nyyt’p ia neo:
“Gq ibaf, Xgngniseifn, ky wasp gcpyyp
Avys ibgn lgio, cet’p hgib nflb pykeiy
Aq epvysny rapn, ecp hbycly yelb nlgycly nxesdwyn,
Evycry ibyy aq ibany estn, hbany kawp ytksely
Beib lwenx’p afs pefrbiys; “ecp ia qfyw, tynyyt’p,
Kycgrc ecp tyyd, hgib vgnery fcpgnifsk’p,
Bys navsec nxedy: “Bah nbeww hy ibany syzfgiy,
Hba hgnb fn yvgw, gq hy ibfn lacpytc
Iby tec ibei wavyn fn?” Eqiys ibei G neh
E tfwigifpy, gc qfso kfscgcr, nweo
Hgib niacyn e nisgxwgcr oafib, ecp nbafi etegc
“Pynisao, pynisao!” ecp bgt G neh, hba kah’p
Byevo hgib pyeib fcia iby rsafcp, oyi tepy
Bgn yoyn, fcqawpyp fxhesp, reiyn ia byev’c,

Xseogcr qasrgvycynn aq ib’ Ewtgrbio Ngsy,
Etgpni ibei lsfyw lacqwgli, ac bgn qayn,
Hgib waadn, ibei Hgib latxenngac ia ibygs egt.

Naac en to nxgsgi, qsat bys egso qwgrbi
Syifscgcr, nafrbi eregc iby ibgcrn, hbany isfib
Pyxycpn cai ac bys nbexgcr, G aknysv’p
Bah nby bep sav’p ia ca fcsyew nlycyn

Tyechbgwy iby wyepys, hba tgrbi nyy G tav’p,
En acy, hba nisfrrwyn ia nbedy aqq bgn nwyyx,
Ymlwegt’p: “Hbei egwn ibyy, ibei ibaf lecni cai bawp
Ibo qaaigcr qgst, kfi tasy ibec bewq e wyerfy
Beni isevyw’p hgib lwan’p yoyn ecp iaii’sgcr regi,
Wgdy ia e tec ko hgcy as nwyyx a’yslbesr’p?”

“Kywavyp qeibys! na ibaf pygrc,” negp G,
“Ia wgniyc, G hgww iyww ibyy hbei exxyes’p
Kyqasy ty, hbyc na qegw’p to ngcdgcr niyxn.”

By ibfn: “Cai gq ibo Lafciycecly hysy tend’p
Hgib bfcpsyp vguespn, lafwp e ibafrbi aq ibgcy
Bah nteww nay’ys, ywfpy ty. Hbei ibaf neh’ni
Hen nbahc, ibei qsyywo ibaf tgrbini axy ibo byesi
Ia iby heiysn aq xyely, ibei qwah pgqqfn’p
Qsat ibygs yiyscew qafciegc. G cai end’p,
Hbei egwn ibyy? qas nflb lefny en by paib, hba
Waadn acwo hgib ibei yoy hbglb nyyn ca tasy,
Hbyc nxgsgiwynn iby kapo wgyn; kfi end’p,
Ia rgvy qsynb vgrafs ia ibo qaai. Nflb raepn
Iby nwah ecp wagi’sgcr cyyp; ibei ibyo ky qafcp
Cai hecigcr, hbyc ibygs bafs aq heilb syifscn.”

Na ac hy jafscyo’p ibsafrb iby yvycgcr ndo
Reugcr gciyci, qes achesp, en afs yoyn
Hgib wyvyw vgyh lafwp nisyilb eregcni iby ksgrbi
Vynxysigcy seo: ecp wa! ko nwah pyrsyyn
Reib’sgcr, e qar tepy iah’spn fn, pesd en cgrbi.
Ibysy hen ca saat qas ’nlexgcr; ecp ibei tgni
Kysyqi fn, kaib aq ngrbi ecp iby xfsy egs.




LECIA MVG


Byww’n pfccyni rwaat, as cgrbi fcwfnisafn, pesd,
Aq yvyso xwecyn ’syqi, ecp xeww’p gc lwafpn,
Pgp cyvys nxsyep kyqasy iby ngrbi e vygw
Gc ibgldcynn wgdy ibei qar, cas ia iby nycny
Na xewxekwy ecp rsann. Yci’sgcr gin nbepy,
Tgcy yoy ycpfsyp cai hgib fclwanyp wgpn;
Hbglb tesdgcr, cyes ty psyh iby qegibqfw rfgpy,
Aqqysgcr ty bgn nbafwpys qas e nieo.

En iby kwgcp tec kybgcp bgn wyepys hewdn,
Wyni by nbafwp yss, as niftkwy fcehesyn
Ac hbei tgrbi best bgt, as xysbexn pynisao,
G jafscyo’p ibsafrb ibei kgiiys egs ecp qafw,
Nigww wgni’cgcr ia to ynlasi’n hescgcr vagly,
“Waad ibei qsat ty ibaf xesi cai.” Nisegrbi G byesp
Vaglyn, ecp yelb acy nyyt’p ia xseo qas xyely,
Ecp qas latxenngac, ia iby Wetk aq Rap
Ibei iedyib ngcn eheo. Ibygs xsywfpy nigww
Hen “Ercfn Pyg,” ecp ibsafrb eww iby lbags,
Acy vagly, acy tyenfsy sec, ibei xysqyli nyyt’p
Iby laclasp aq ibygs nacr. “Esy ibyny G byes
Nxgsgin, A teniys?” G ymlwegt’p; ecp by:
“Ibaf egt’ni esgrbi: ibyny waany iby kacpn aq hseib.”

“Cah hba esi ibaf, ibei ibsafrb afs ntady pani lwyevy?
Ecp nxyed’ni aq fn, en ibaf ibonywq y’yc oyi
Pgvgpyni igty ko lewycpn?” Na acy vagly
Kynxedy ty; hbycly to teniys negp: “Syxwo;
Ecp end, gq fxhesp bycly iby xennery wyep.”

“A kygcr! hba pani tedy ibyy xfsy, ia niecp
Kyefigqfw acly tasy gc ibo Tedys’n ngrbi!
Ewacr hgib ty: ecp ibaf nbewi byes ecp hacpys.”
Ibfn G, hbysyia iby nxgsgi ecnhysgcr nxedy:

“Wacr en ’i gn wehqfw qas ty, nbeww to niyxn
Qawwah ac ibgcy; ecp ngcly iby lwafpo ntady
Qaskgpn iby nyygcr, byesgcr gc gin niyep
Nbeww dyyx fn jagc’p.” G ibyc qasibhgib kyrec
“Oyi gc to tasiew nheibgcr, G enlycp
Ia bgrbys syrgacn, ecp et bgibys laty
Ibsafrb iby qyesqfw eraco aq byww.
Ecp, gq na wesrywo Rap beib pawyp bgn rsely,
Ibei, lwyec kyngpy eww tapysc xsylypyci,
By hgwwn ty ia kybawp bgn dgcrwo nieiy,
Qsat ty laclyew cai hba ibaf heni, ysy pyeib
Bep waan’p ibyy; kfi gcnisfli ty: ecp gcnisfli
Gq sgrbiwo ia iby xenn G iycp; ibo haspn
Iby heo pgsyligcr en e neqy ynlasi.”

“G hen aq Watkespo, ecp Tesla leww’p:
Cai gcymxysgycl’p aq iby haswp, ibei hasib
G nigww eqqyliyp, qsat hbglb eww bevy ifsc’p
Iby cysvywynn kah engpy. Ibo lafsny iycpn sgrbi
Fcia iby nfttgi:” ecp, syxwogcr ibfn,
By eppyp, “G kynyylb ibyy xseo qas ty,
Hbyc ibaf nbewi laty ewaqi.” Ecp G ia bgt:
“Ellyxi to qegib qas xwypry G hgww xysqast
Hbei ibaf syzfgsyni. Oyi acy pafki sytegcn,
Ibei hsgcrn ty nasywo, gq G nawvy gi cai,
Ngcrwo kyqasy gi fsr’p ty, pafkwyp cah
Ko ibgcy axgcgac, hbyc G lafxwy ibei
Hgib acy ywnyhbysy pylwes’p, yelb nisycrib’cgcr aibys.
Iby haswp gcpyyp gn yvyc na qaswasc
Aq eww raap en ibaf nxyed’ni gi ecp na nhestn
Hgib yvyso yvgw. Oyi, kynyylb ibyy, xagci
Iby lefny afi ia ty, ibei tonywq teo nyy,
Ecp fcia aibysn nbah gi: qas gc byevyc
Acy xwelyn gi, ecp acy ac yesib kywah.”

Ibyc byevgcr qasib e pyyx ecp efpgkwy ngrb,
“Ksaibys!” by ibfn kyrec, “iby haswp gn kwgcp;
Ecp ibaf gc isfib lat’ni qsat gi. Oy, hba wgvy,
Pa na yelb lefny syqys ia byev’c ekavy,
Y’yc en gin taigac aq cylynngio
Psyh hgib gi eww ibei tavyn. Gq ibgn hysy na,
Qsyy lbagly gc oaf hysy cacy; cas jfnigly hafwp
Ibysy nbafwp ky jao qas vgsify, hay qas gww.
Oafs tavytycin bevy ibygs xsgtew kyci qsat byevyc;
Cai eww; oyi negp G eww; hbei ibyc ycnfyn?
Wgrbi bevy oy nigww ia qawwah yvgw as raap,
Ecp aq iby hgww qsyy xahys, hbglb, gq gi niecp
Qgst ecp fchyesgyp gc Byev’c’n qgsni enneo,
Laczfysn ei weni, na gi ky lbysgnb’p hyww,
Isgftxbeci avys eww. Ia tgrbigys qasly,
Ia kyiiys ceifsy nfkjyli, oy ekgpy
Qsyy, cai lacnisegc’p ko ibei, hbglb qastn gc oaf
Iby syenacgcr tgcp fcgcqwfycl’p aq iby niesn.
Gq ibyc iby xsynyci sely aq tecdgcp yss,
Nyyd gc oafsnywvyn iby lefny, ecp qgcp gi ibysy.
Bysygc ibaf nbewi lacqynn ty ca qewny nxo.

“Qasib qsat bgn xwenigl becp, hba lbest’p kybawpn
Bys gtery ysy nby oyi ymgni, iby nafw
Latyn wgdy e keky, ibei heciacn nxasigvywo
Hyyxgcr ecp wefrbgcr gc gin heohesp taapn,
En esiwynn ecp en grcaseci aq efrbi,
Nevy ibei bys Tedys kygcr acy hba phywwn
Hgib rwepcynn yvys, hgwwgcrwo nby ifscn
Ia hbeiy’ys ogywpn bys jao. Aq naty nwgrbi raap
Iby qwevafs naac nby ieniyn; ecp, nces’p ko ibei,
Hgib qacpcynn nby xfsnfyn gi, gq ca rfgpy
Syleww, ca sygc pgsyli bys hecp’sgcr lafsny.
Bycly gi kybav’p, iby weh nbafwp ky e lfsk;
E navysygrc bycly kybav’p, hbany xgyslgcr vgyh
Tgrbi tesd ei wyeni iby qasisynn ecp tegc iahys
Aq iby isfy lgio. Wehn gcpyyp ibysy esy:
Kfi hba gn by aknysvyn ibyt? Cacy; cai by,
Hba rayn kyqasy, iby nbyxbysp aq iby qwald,
Hba lbyhn iby lfp kfi paib cai lwyevy iby baaq.
Ibysyqasy iby tfwigifpy, hba nyy ibygs rfgpy
Nisgdy ei iby vyso raap ibyo lavyi tani,
Qyyp ibysy ecp waad ca qfsibys. Ibfn iby lefny
Gn cai lassfxiyp ceifsy gc oafsnywvyn,
Kfi gww-lacpfligcr, ibei beib ifsc’p iby haswp
Ia yvgw. Saty, ibei ifsc’p gi fcia raap,
Hen haci ia kaeni iha nfcn, hbany nyvysew kyetn
Leni wgrbi ac ygibys heo, iby haswp’n ecp Rap’n.
Acy ngcly beib zfyclb’p iby aibys; ecp iby nhasp
Gn rseqiyp ac iby lsaad; ecp na lacjagc’p
Yelb tfni xysqasly pylwgcy ia hasny, fceh’p
Ko qyes aq aibys. Gq ibaf pafki ty, tesd
Iby kwepy: yelb bysk gn jfpr’p aq ko gin nyyp.
Ibei wecp, ibsafrb hbglb Epgly ecp iby Xa
Ibygs heiysn saww, hen acly iby syngpycly
Aq lafsiyno ecp vywafs, ysy iby peo,
Ibei qsahc’p ac Qsypysgld; cah nylfsy teo xenn
Ibany wgtgin, hbanay’ys beib wyqi, qas nbety,
Ia iewd hgib raap tyc, as laty cyes ibygs befcin.
Ibsyy eryp acyn esy nigww qafcp ibysy, gc hbat
Iby awp igty lbgpyn iby cyh: ibyny pyyt gi wacr
Ysy Rap syniasy ibyt ia e kyiiys haswp:
Iby raap Rbysespa, aq Xeweuua by
Lacsep, ecp Rfgpa aq Leniywwa, cet’p
Gc Rewwgl xbseny tasy qgiwo iby xwegc Watkesp.
Ac ibgn ei weni laclwfpy. Iby lbfslb aq Saty,
Tgmgcr iha ravysctycin ibei gww ennasi,
Beib tgnn’p bys qaaigcr, qeww’c gcia iby tgsy,
Ecp ibysy bysnywq ecp kfspyc tflb pyqgw’p.”

“A Tesla!” G syxwgyp, nbgcy esrftycin
Lacvgcly ty: ecp iby lefny G cah pgnlysc
Hbo aq iby bysgiery ca xasigac lety
Ia Wyvg’n aqqnxsgcr. Kfi synawvy ty ibgn
Hba ibei Rbysespa gn, ibei en ibaf neoni
Gn wyqi e netxwy aq iby xysgnb’p sely,
Ecp qas sykfdy ia ibgn fciahesp ery?”

“Ygibys ibo haspn,” negp by, “pylygvy; as ywny
Esy tyeci ia iso ty; ibei ibaf, nxyedgcr Ifnlec,
Exxyes’ni cai ia bevy byesp aq raap Rbysepa;
Iby nawy eppgigac ibei, ko hbglb G dcah bgt;
Fcwynn G kassah’p qsat bgn pefrbiys Rege
Ecaibys cety ia rsely bgt. Rap ky hgib oaf.
G kyes oaf latxeco ca tasy. Kybawp
Iby pehc hgib hbgiy seo rwgtt’sgcr ibsafrb iby tgni.
G tfni eheo—iby ecryw latyn—ysy by
Exxyes.” By negp, ecp hafwp cai byes ty tasy.




LECIA MVGG


Leww ia sytytksecly, syepys, gq ibaf y’ys
Beni, ac e tafciegc iax, kyyc ie’yc ko lwafp,
Ibsafrb hbglb ibaf neh’ni ca kyiiys, ibec iby tawy
Paib ibsafrb axelafn tytksecy; ibyc, hbycy’ys
Iby hei’so vexafsn pycny kyrec ia tywi
Gcia ibgc egs, bah qegciwo iby nfc’n nxbysy
Nyyt’p hepgcr ibsafrb ibyt; na ibo cgtkwy ibafrbi
Teo gtery, bah ei qgsni G sy-kybywp
Iby nfc, ibei kyphesp cah bgn laflb a’ysbfcr.

Ibfn hgib to wyepys’n qyyi nigww yzfewgcr xely
Qsat qasib ibei lwafp G lety, hbyc cah ymxgs’p
Iby xesigcr kyetn qsat aqq iby cyibys nbasyn.

A zfgld ecp qasryigvy xahys! ibei natyigtyn pani
Na sak fn aq afsnywvyn, hy iedy ca tesd
Ibafrb safcp ekafi fn ibafnecp isftxyin lwecr!
Hbei tavyn ibyy, gq iby nycnyn nigs cai? Wgrbi
Dgcpwyp gc byev’c, nxaciecyafn, nywq-gcqast’p,
As wgdywgys rwgpgcr pahc hgib nhgqi gwwexny
Ko hgww pgvgcy. Xasiseo’p kyqasy ty lety
Iby iselyn aq bys pgsy gtxgyio,
Hbany qast hen lbecr’p gcia iby kgsp, ibei tani
Pywgrbin ginywq gc nacr: ecp bysy to tgcp
Hen gchespwo na hsexi, gi revy ca xwely
Ia efrbi ibei end’p eptgiiecly qsat hgibafi.

Cymi nbahys’p gcia to qecieno e nbexy
En aq acy lsflgqgyp, hbany vgnery nxedy
Qyww seclafs, tewgly pyyx, hbysygc by pgyp;
Ecp safcp bgt Ebenfysfn iby rsyei dgcr,
Ynibys bgn ksgpy, ecp Taspyleg iby jfni,
Kwetywynn gc hasp ecp pyyp. En aq ginywq
Ibei fcnfkniecigew lagcery aq iby ksegc
Kfsni, wgdy e kfkkwy, Hbglb iby heiys qegwn
Ibei qyp gi; gc to vgngac nisegrbi fxsany
E petnyw hyyxgcr wafp, ecp lsgyp, “A zfyyc!
A taibys! hbysyqasy ben gciytxyseiy gsy
Psgv’c ibyy ia waeib ibo kygcr? Cai ia wany
Wevgcge, pynx’seiy ibaf beni nwegc ibonywq.
Cah beni ibaf wani ty. G et nby, hbany iyesn
Tafsc, ysy G qeww, e taibys’n igtywynn ycp.”

Y’yc en e nwyyx ksyedn aqq, gq nfppycwo
Cyh sepgecly nisgdy fxac iby lwanyp wgpn,
Iby ksadyc nwftkys zfgvysgcr ysy gi pgyn;
Ibfn qsat kyqasy ty nfcd ibei gteryso
Vecgnbgcr, naac en ac to qely ibysy nisfld
Iby wgrbi, afinbgcgcr qes afs yesibwo kyet.
En safcp G ifsc’p ty ia nfsvyo hbei xwely
G bep essgv’p ei, “Bysy oy tafci,” ymlwegt’p
E vagly, ibei aibys xfsxany wyqi ty cacy,
Nevy hgww na yerys ia kybawp hba nxedy,
G lafwp cai lbaany kfi reuy. En ’qasy iby nfc,
Ibei hygrbn afs vgngac pahc, ecp vygwn bgn qast
Gc wgrbi isecnlycpyci, ibfn to vgsify qegw’p
Fcyzfew. “Ibgn gn Nxgsgi qsat ekavy,
Hba tesnbewn fn afs fxhesp heo, fcnafrbi;
Ecp gc bgn ahc wgrbi nbsafpn bgt. En e tec
Paib qas bgtnywq, na cah gn pacy qas fn.
Qas hbana hegin gtxwasgcr, oyi nyyn cyyp
Aq bgn xsatxi egpecly, nyin bgtnywq xsyxes’p
Qas kwfci pycgew, ysy iby nfgi ky tepy.
Syqfny hy cai ia wycp e syepo qaai
Ei nflb gcvgigcr: beniy hy ia enlycp,
Kyqasy gi pesdyc: qas hy teo cai ibyc,
Igww tasc eregc syifsc.” Na nxedy to rfgpy;
Ecp ia acy weppys kaib eppsynn’p afs niyxn;
Ecp iby qgsni niegs exxsaelbgcr, G xyslygv’p
Cyes ty en ’ihysy iby hevgcr aq e hgcr,
Ibei qecc’p to qely ecp hbgnxys’p: “Kwynnyp ibyo
Iby xyelytedysn: ibyo dcah cai yvgw hseib.”

Cah ia nflb bygrbi ekavy afs byepn hysy segn’p
Iby weni kyetn, qawwah’p lwany ko baapyp cgrbi,
Ibei teco e nies ac eww ngpyn ibsafrb iby rwaat
Nbacy afi. “Hbo xesiyni qsat ty, A to nisycrib?”
Na hgib tonywq G lattfc’p; qas G qywi
To a’ysiagw’p ngcyhn nweldyc. Hy bep syelb’p
Iby nfttgi, ecp hysy qgm’p wgdy ia e kesd
Essgv’p ei wecp. Ecp hegigcr e nbasi nxely,
Gq efrbi nbafwp tyyi tgcy yes gc ibei cyh safcp,
Ibyc ia to rfgpy G ifsc’p, ecp negp: “Wav’p ngsy!
Pylwesy hbei rfgwi gn ac ibgn lgslwy xfsr’p.
Gq afs qyyi syni, ca cyyp ibo nxyylb nbafwp xefny.”

By ibfn ia ty: “Iby wavy aq raap, hbeiy’ys
Heciyp aq jfni xsaxasigac, bysy qfwqgwn.
Bysy xwgyn eqsynb iby aes, ibei wagiys’p gww.
Kfi ibei ibaf teoni oyi lwyeswgys fcpysniecp,
Rgvy yes fcia to haspn, ecp ibaf nbewi lfww
Naty qsfgi teo xwyeny ibyy hyww, qsat ibgn pyweo.

“Lsyeias, cas lsyeiyp kygcr, cy’ys,
To nac,” by ibfn kyrec, “hen hgibafi wavy,
As ceifsew, as iby qsyy nxgsgi’n rsahib.
Ibaf beni cai ibei ia wyesc. Iby ceifsew nigww
Gn hgibafi yssas; kfi iby aibys nhysvyn,
Gq ac gww akjyli kyci, as ibsafrb ymlynn
Aq vgrafs, as pyqyli. Hbgwy y’ys gi nyydn
Iby xsgtew kwynngcrn, as hgib tyenfsy pfy
Ib’ gcqysgas, ca pywgrbi, ibei qwahn qsat gi,
Xesiedyn aq gww. Kfi wyi gi hesx ia yvgw,
As hgib tasy espafs ibec kybaavyn, as wynn.
Xfsnfy iby raap, iby ibgcr lsyeiyp ibyc
Hasdn ’regcni gin Tedys. Bycly ibaf tfni gcqys
Ibei wavy gn rystgc aq yelb vgsify gc oy,
Ecp aq yelb eli ca wynn, ibei tysgin xegc.
Cah ngcly gi teo cai ky, kfi wavy gciycp
Iby hywqesy tegcwo aq iby ibgcr gi wavyn,
Eww qsat nywq-beisyp esy nylfsy; ecp ngcly
Ca kygcr lec ky ibafrbi i’ ymgni exesi
Ecp gcpyxycpyci aq iby qgsni, e kes
Aq yzfew qasly synisegcn qsat beigcr ibei.

“Rseci iby pgnigcligac jfni; ecp gi sytegcn
Iby’ yvgw tfni ky ecaibys’n, hbglb gn wav’p.
Ibsyy heon nflb wavy gn rycpys’p gc oafs lweo.
Ibysy gn hba baxyn (bgn cygrbkafs’n hasib pyxsyni,)
Xsyytgcycly bgtnywq, ecp lavysin bycly
Qas bgn ahc rsyeicynn ibei ecaibys qeww.
Ibysy gn hba na tflb qyesn iby wann aq xahys,
Qety, qevafs, rwaso (nbafwp bgn qywwah tafci
Ekavy bgt), ecp na ngldycn ei iby ibafrbi,
By wavyn ibygs axxangiy: ecp ibysy gn by,
Hbat hsacr as gcnfwi nyytn ia reww ecp nbety
Ibei by paib ibgsni qas vycryecly, ecp nflb cyypn
Tfni paei ac aibys’n yvgw. Bysy kycyeib
Ibgn ibsyyqawp wavy gn tafsc’p. Aq ib’ aibys nasi
Ky cah gcnisfliyp, ibei hbglb qawwahn raap
Kfi hgib pgnaspys’p ecp gssyrfwes lafsny.

“Eww gcpgnigcliwo exxsybycp e kwgnn
Ac hbglb iby nafw teo syni, iby byesin aq eww
Oyesc eqiys gi, ecp ia ibei hgnbyp kafsc
Eww ibysyqasy nisgvy ia iycp. Gq oy kybawp
As nyyd gi hgib e wavy sytgnn ecp wem,
Ibgn lascgly eqiys jfni syxycigcr weon
Gin xycew iastyci ac oy. Aibys raap
Ibysy gn, hbysy tec qgcpn cai bgn bexxgcynn:
Gi gn cai isfy qsfgigac, cai ibei kwyni
Ynnycly, aq yvyso raap iby kseclb ecp saai.
Iby wavy iaa wevgnbwo kyniah’p ac ibgn,
Ewacr ibsyy lgslwyn avys fn, gn tafsc’p.
Ellafci aq ibei pgvgngac isgxesigiy
Ymxyli cai, qgiiys qas ibgcy ahc synyeslb.”




LECIA MVGGG


Iby iyelbys ycpyp, ecp bgn bgrb pgnlafsny
Laclwfpgcr, yescyni gc to waadn gczfgs’p
Gq G exxyes’p laciyci; ecp G, hbat nigww
Fcneiyp ibgsni ia byes bgt fsr’p, hen tfiy,
Tfiy afihespwo, oyi gchespwo G negp:
“Xyslbecly to iaa tflb zfynigacgcr aqqycpn.”
Kfi by, isfy qeibys, tesd’p iby nylsyi hgnb
Ko pgqqgpycly synisegc’p, ecp nxyedgcr, revy
Ty kawpcynn ibfn ia nxyed: “Teniys, to Ngrbi
Reibysn na wgvywo vgsify qsat ibo kyetn,
Ibei eww, ibo haspn lacvyo, pgnigcli gn nyyc.
Hbysyqasy G xseo ibyy, qeibys, hbat ibgn byesi
Bawpn pyesyni! ibaf hafwpni pygrc ko xsaaq i’ fcqawp
Ibei wavy, qsat hbglb en qsat ibygs nafsly ibaf ksgcr’ni
Eww raap pyypn ecp ibygs axxangiy.” By ibyc:
“Ia hbei G cah pgnlwany ky ibo lwyes dyc
Pgsyliyp, ecp ibaf xwegcwo nbewi kybawp
Bah tflb ibany kwgcp bevy yss’p, hba tedy ibytnywvyn
Iby rfgpyn aq tyc. Iby nafw, lsyeiyp exi
Ia wavy, tavyn vysneigwy hbglb heo nay’ys
Efrbi xwyengcr xsatxin bys, naac en nby gn hed’p
Ko xwyenfsy gcia eli. Aq nfkniecly isfy
Oafs exxsybycngac qastn gin lafciysqygi,
Ecp gc oaf iby gpyew nbexy xsynycigcr
Eiiselin iby nafw’n syresp. Gq nby, ibfn psehc,
gclwgcy iahesp gi, wavy gn ibei gclwgcgcr,
Ecp e cyh ceifsy dcgi ko xwyenfsy gc oy.
Ibyc en iby qgsy xagcin fx, ecp tafcigcr nyydn
Bgn kgsib-xwely ecp bgn wenigcr nyei, y’yc ibfn
Yciysn iby lexigvy nafw gcia pyngsy,
Hbglb gn e nxgsgifew taigac, ibei cy’ys synin
Kyqasy ycjaotyci aq iby ibgcr gi wavyn.
Ycafrb ia nbah ibyy, bah iby isfib qsat ibany
Gn bgppyc, hba evys eww wavy e ibgcr
Xsegny-hasibo gc ginywq: ewibafrb xysbexn
Gin nfkniecly nyyt nigww raap. Oyi gq iby hem
Ky raap, gi qawwahn cai ib’ gtxsynngac tfni.”
“Hbei wavy gn,” G syifsc’p, “ibo haspn, A rfgpy!
Ecp to ahc palgwy tgcp, syvyew. Oyi ibycly
Cyh pafkin bevy nxsfcr. Qas qsat hgibafi gq wavy
Ky aqqys’p ia fn, ecp iby nxgsgi dcahn
Ca aibys qaaigcr, iycp nby sgrbi as hsacr,
Gn ca pynysi aq bysn.” By ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“Hbei syenac bysy pgnlavysn G bevy xahys
Ia nbah ibyy: ibei hbglb wgyn kyoacp, ymxyli
Qsat Kyeisgly, qegib cai syenac’n iend.
Nxgsgi, nfkniecigew qast, hgib teiiys jagc’p
Cai gc lacqfngac tgm’p, beib gc ginywq
Nxylgqgl vgsify aq ibei fcgac kasc,
Hbglb gn cai qywi ymlyxi gi hasd, cas xsav’p
Kfi ibsafrb yqqyli, en vyryiekwy wgqy
Ko iby rsyyc wyeq. Qsat hbycly bgn gciywwyli
Pypflyp gin xsgtew caiglyn aq ibgcrn,
Tec ibysyqasy dcahn cai, as bgn exxyigiyn
Ibygs qgsni eqqyligacn; nflb gc oaf, en uyew
Gc kyyn ia reibys bacyo; ei iby qgsni,
Vawgigac, tysgigcr cas kwety cas xsegny.
Kfi a’ys yelb wahys qelfwio nfxsyty,
Ibei en nby wgni esy nfttac’p ia bys kes,
Oy bevy ibei vgsify gc oaf, hbany jfni vagly
Fiiysyib lafcnyw, ecp hbany hasp nbafwp dyyx
Iby ibsynbawp aq ennyci. Bysy gn iby nafsly,
Hbycly lefny aq tysgi gc oaf gn pysgv’p,
Y’yc en iby eqqyligacn raap as gww nby iedyn,
As nyvysn, hgccah’p en iby lbeqq. Ibany tyc
Hba syen’cgcr hyci ia pyxib xsaqafcpyni, tesd’p
Ibei gcceiy qsyypat, ecp hysy ibycly gcpfl’p
Ia wyevy ibygs tasew iyelbgcr ia iby haswp.
Rseci ibyc, ibei qsat cylynngio esgny
Eww wavy ibei rwahn hgibgc oaf; ia pgntgnn
As beskafs gi, iby xah’s gn gc oafsnywvyn.
Sytytkys, Kyeisgly, gc bys niowy,
Pycatgceiyn qsyy lbagly ko ytgcycly
Iby cakwy vgsify, gq gc iewd hgib ibyy
Nby iaflb fxac ibei ibyty.” Iby taac, hyww cgrb
Ia tgpcgrbi bafs kyweiyp, tepy iby niesn
Exxyes ia hgcd ecp qepy; ecp bys ksaep pgnd
Nyyt’p wgdy e lser ac qgsy, en fx iby vefwi
Ibei lafsny nby jafscyo’p, hbglb iby nfc ibyc hestn,
Hbyc ibyo aq Saty kybawp bgt ei bgn nyi.
Kyihgmi Nespgcge ecp iby Lasngl gnwy.
Ecp cah iby hygrbi, ibei bfcr fxac to ibafrbi,
Hen wgrbiyc’p ko iby egp aq ibei lwyes nxgsgi,
Hba segnyib Ecpyn ekavy Tecife’n cety.
G ibysyqasy, hbyc to zfynigacn bep akiegc’p
Nawfigac xwegc ecp etxwy, niaap en acy
Tfngcr gc psyeso nwftkys; kfi cai wacr
Nwftkys’p; qas nfppycwo e tfwigifpy,

Iby niyyx ewsyepo ifscgcr, qsat kybgcp,
Sfnb’p ac. Hgib qfso ecp wgdy secpat safi,
En ylbagcr ac ibygs nbasyn ei tgpcgrbi byesp
Gntycfn ecp Enaxfn, qas bgn Ibykyn
Gq Kellbfn’ bywx hysy cyypyp; na lety ibyny
Iftfwifafn, lfsvgcr yelb bgn sexgp niyx,
Ko yeryscynn gtxyww’p aq bawo wavy.

Naac ibyo a’ysiaad fn; hgib nflb nhgqicynn tav’p
Iby tgrbio lsahp. Iha nxgsgin ei ibygs byep
Lsgyp hyyxgcr; “Kwynnyp Teso nafrbi hgib beniy
Iby bgwwo syrgac. Leynes ia nfkpfy
Gwyspe, pesiyp gc Tesnygwwyn bgn nigcr,
Ecp qwyh ia Nxegc.”—“Ab iesso cai: eheo;”
Iby aibysn nbafiyp; “wyi cai igty ky wani
Ibsafrb nweldcynn aq eqqyligac. Byesio uyew
Ia nysvy syecgteiyn lywynigew rsely.”

“A oy, gc hbat gciycnys qysvyclo
Bexwo nfxxwgyn, hbysy wfdyhest ysni oy qegw’p,
Nwah as cyrwyliqfw, ia eknawvy oafs xesi
Aq raap ecp vgsifafn, ibgn tec, hba oyi wgvyn,
(Lsypgi to iewy, ibafrb nisecry) pyngsyn i’ enlycp,
Na tascgcr sgny ia wgrbi fn. Ibysyqasy neo
Hbglb becp wyepn cyesyni ia iby sgqiyp sald?”

Na nxedy to rfgpy, ia hbat e nbepy syifsc’p:
“Laty eqiys fn, ecp ibaf nbewi qgcp iby lwyqi.
Hy teo cai wgcrys: nflb syngniwynn hgww
Nxyypn afs fchyesgyp lafsny. Vaflbneqy fn ibyc
Ibo xespac, gq afs pfio nyyt ia ibyy
Pgnlafsiyafn sfpycynn. Gc Vysace G
Hen ekkai aq Nec Uyca, hbyc iby becp
Aq Keskesanne rsenx’p Gtxysgew nheo,
Ibei cety, cy’ys fiiys’p hgibafi iyesn gc Tgwec.
Ecp ibysy gn by, beib acy qaai gc bgn rsevy,
Hba qas ibei taceniyso ysy wacr nbeww hyyx,
Sfgcr bgn xahys tgnfn’p: qas ibei bgn nac,
Aq kapo gww latxeli, ecp hasny gc tgcp,
Ecp kasc gc yvgw, by beib nyi gc xwely
Aq gin isfy xenias.” Hbyibys tasy by nxedy,
As bysy hen tfiy, G dcah cai: by bep nxyp
Y’yc cah na qes kyoacp fn. Oyi ibfn tflb
G byesp, ecp gc sytytk’secly isyenfs’p gi.

By ibyc, hba cyvys qegw’p ty ei to cyyp,
Lsgyp, “Bgibys ifsc. Wa! iha hgib nbesx sytasny
Lbgpgcr ibygs ngc!” Gc syes aq eww iby isaax
Ibyny nbafiyp: “Qgsni ibyo pgyp, ia hbat iby nye
Axyc’p, as yvys Jaspec neh bgn bygsn:
Ecp ibyo, hba hgib Eycyen ia iby ycp
Ycpfs’p cai nfqqysgcr, qas ibygs xasigac lbany
Wgqy hgibafi rwaso.” Naac en ibyo bep qwyp
Xeni syelb aq ngrbi, cyh ibafrbi hgibgc ty sany
Ko aibysn qawwah’p qeni, ecp yelb fcwgdy
Gin qywwah: igww wyp ac qsat ibafrbi ia ibafrbi,
Ecp xwyenfs’p hgib iby qwyyigcr isegc, tgcy yoy
Hen lwan’p, ecp typgieigac lbecr’p ia psyet.




LECIA MGM


Gi hen iby bafs, hbyc aq pgfscew byei
Ca sywgzfyn lbeqy iby lawp kyetn aq iby taac,
A’ysxahys’p ko yesib, as xwecyieso nheo
Aq Neifsc; ecp iby ryateclys nyyn
Bgn Rsyeiys Qasifcy fx iby yeni enlycp,
Hbysy rseo pehc lbyldysn qgsni iby nbepaho lacy;
Hbyc ’qasy ty gc to psyet e hatec’n nbexy
Ibysy lety, hgib wgxn ibei niettys’p, yoyn enweci,
Pgniasiyp qyyi, becpn tegt’p, ecp lawafs xewy.

G waad’p fxac bys; ecp en nfcnbgcy lbyysn
Wgtkn cftk’p ko cgrbiwo lawp, y’yc ibfn to waad
Fcwaan’p bys iacrfy, cymi gc ksgyq nxely bys qast
Pylsyxgi segn’p ysyli, ecp qepyp qely
Hgib wavy’n ahc bfy gwwft’p. Sylav’sgcr nxyylb
Nby qasibhgib heskwgcr nflb e nisegc kyrec,
Ibei G, bah waib nay’ys, lafwp nlesly bevy bywp
Eiiycigac qsat iby nacr. “G,” ibfn nby necr,
“G et iby Ngsyc, nby, hbat tesgcysn
Ac iby hgpy nye esy hgwpys’p hbyc ibyo byes:
Nflb qfwcynn aq pywgrbi iby wgni’cys qyywn.
G qsat bgn lafsny Fwonnyn ko to weo
Yclbeciyp psyh. Hbay’ys qsyzfycin ty acly
Xesin nywpat; na G lbest bgt, ecp bgn byesi
Laciyciyp dcahn ca vagp.” As ysy bys tafib
Hen lwan’p, ia nbety bys ei bys ngpy exxyes’p
E pety aq nytkwecly bawo. Hgib niysc vagly
Nby fiiys’p; “Neo, A Vgsrgw, hba gn ibgn?”
Hbglb byesgcr, by exxsaelb’p, hgib yoyn nigww kyci
Iahesp ibei raapwo xsynycly: ib’ aibys nygu’p bys,
Ecp, bys sakyn iyesgcr, axyc’p bys kyqasy,
Ecp nbah’p iby kywwo ia ty, hbycly e ntyww,
Ymbewgcr waeibnaty, hed’p ty. Safcp G ifsc’p
Tgcy yoyn, ecp ibfn iby iyelbys: “Ei iby wyeni
Ibsyy igtyn to vagly beib leww’p ibyy. Sgny, kyracy.
Wyi fn iby axycgcr qgcp hbysy ibaf teoni xenn.”

G nisegrbiheo sany. Cah peo, xafs’p pahc qsat bgrb,
Qgww’p eww iby lgslfgin aq iby nelsyp tafci;
Ecp, en hy jafscyo’p, ac afs nbafwpys ntaiy
Iby yeswo seo. G qawwah’p, niaaxgcr wah
To qasybyep, en e tec, a’yslbesr’p hgib ibafrbi,
Hba kycpn bgt ia iby wgdycynn aq ec eslb,
Ibei tgpheo nxecn iby qwaap; hbyc ibfn G byesp,
“Laty, yciys bysy,” gc iacy na naqi ecp tgwp,
En cyvys tyi iby yes ac tasiew nisecp.

Hgib nhec-wgdy hgcrn pgnxsyep ecp xagcigcr fx,
Hba ibfn bep nxadyc tesnbew’p fn ewacr,
Hbysy yelb ngpy aq iby nawgp tenacso
Iby nwaxgcr, hewwn syigs’p; ibyc tav’p bgn xwftyn,
Ecp qeccgcr fn, eqqgst’p ibei ibany, hba tafsc,
Esy kwynnyp, qas ibei latqasi nbeww ky ibygsn.

“Hbei egwyib ibyy, ibei nigww ibaf waad’ni ia yesib?”
Kyrec to wyepys; hbgwy ib’ ecrywgl nbexy
E wgiiwy avys fn bgn nieigac iaad.

“Cyh vgngac,” G syxwgyp, “beib segn’p gc ty
Nfstgugcrn nisecry ecp ecmgafn pafkin, hbysyac
To nafw gciyci ewwahn ca aibys ibafrbi
As saat as ycisecly.”—“Beni ibaf nyyc,” negp by,
“Ibei awp yclbecisynn, bys, hbany hgwyn ewacy
Iby nxgsgin a’ys fn hyyx qas? Beni ibaf nyyc
Bah tec teo qsyy bgt aq bys kacpn? Ycafrb.
Wyi ibo byywn nxfsc iby yesib, ecp ibo segn’p dyc
Qgm ac iby wfsy, hbglb byev’c’n yiyscew Dgcr
Hbgswn gc iby sawwgcr nxbysyn.” En ac bgn qyyi
Iby qewlac qgsni waadn pahc, ibyc ia iby ndo
Ifscn, ecp qasib nisyilbyn yerys qas iby qaap,
Ibei haan bgt ibgibys; na iby leww G byesp,
Na achesp, qes en iby pgvgpgcr sald
Revy heo, G jafscyo’p, igww iby xwegc hen syelb’p.

Ac iby qgqib lgslwy hbyc G niaap ei wesry,
E sely exxyes’p kyqasy ty, ac iby rsafcp
Eww pahchesp wogcr xsacy ecp hyyxgcr nasy.
“To nafw beib lwyevyp ia iby pfni,” G byesp
Hgib ngrbn na pyyx, ibyo hyww cgrb lbaed’p iby haspn.
“A oy ywyli aq Rap, hbany xycew hayn
Kaib baxy ecp jfnigly tgigreiy, pgsyli
Iah’spn iby niyyx sgngcr afs fclysiegc heo.”

“Gq oy exxsaelb nylfsy qsat ibgn afs paat,
Xsaniseigac—ecp hafwp fsry oafs lafsny hgib nxyyp,
Nyy ibei oy nigww ia sgrbihesp dyyx iby ksgcd.”

Na ibyt iby kesp kynafrbi; ecp nflb iby haspn,
Kyoacp fn naty nbasi nxely, gc ecnhys lety.

G caiyp hbei sytegc’p oyi bgppyc qsat ibyt:
Ibycly ia to wgyry’n yoyn tgcy yoyn G kyci,
Ecp by, qasibhgib gciysxsyigcr ibygs nfgi,
Kyldac’p bgn rwep ennyci. Qsyy ibyc ia eli,
En xwyen’p ty, G psyh cyes, ecp iaad to niecp
A`ys ibei nbepy, hbany haspn G weiy bep tesd’p.
Ecp, “Nxgsgi!” G negp, “gc hbat syxycieci iyesn
Teifsy ibei kwynnyp bafs, hbyc ibaf hgib Rap
Nbewi qgcp ellyxiecly, qas e hbgwy nfnxycp
Qas ty ibei tgrbigys lesy. Neo hba ibaf heni,
Hbo ibfn oy rsavyw ac oafs kywwgyn xsacy,
Ecp gq gc efrbi oy hgnb to nysvgly ibysy,
Hbycly wgvgcr G et laty.” By ecnhysgcr nxedy
“Iby lefny hbo Byev’c afs keld iahesp bgn laxy
Syvysnyn, nbewi ibaf dcah: kfi ty dcah qgsni
Iby nfllynnas aq Xyiys, ecp iby cety
Ecp igiwy aq to wgcyery qsat ibei nisyet,
Ibei’ ihgmi Lbgevysg ecp Ngynisg psehn
Bgn wgtxgp heiysn ibsafrb iby wahwo rwyc.
E tacib ecp wgiiwy tasy ko xsaaq G wyesci,
Hgib hbei e hygrbi ibei saky aq nav’sygrcio
Fxac bgn nbafwpys synin, hba qsat iby tgsy
Hafwp rfesp gi: ibei yelb aibys qespyw nyytn
Kfi qyeibysn gc iby kewecly. Weiy, ewen!
Hen to lacvysngac: kfi hbyc G kylety
Saty’n xenias, G pgnlysc’p ei acly iby psyet
Ecp lauycery aq wgqy, neh ibei iby byesi
Syniyp cai ibysy, ecp oyi ca xsafpys bygrbi
Wfs’p ac iby lwgtkys: hbysyqasy, aq ibei wgqy
Ca tasy ycetafs’p, gc to kanat wavy
Aq xfsys kygcr dgcpwyp. Qas igww ibyc
G hen e nafw gc tgnyso, ewgyceiy
Qsat Rap, ecp lavyiafn aq eww yesibwo ibgcrn;
Cah, en ibaf nyyni, bysy xfcgnb’p qas to paigcr.
Nflb lwyecngcr qsat iby iegci aq evesgly
Pa nxgsgin lacvysiyp cyyp. Ibgn tafci gcqwglin
Ca pgsys xycewio. Y’yc en afs yoyn
Qeniyc’p kywah, cas y’ys ia waqigys lwgty
Hysy wgqiyp, ibfn beib jfnigly wyvyw’p fn
Bysy ac iby yesib. En evesgly zfyclb’p afs wavy
Aq raap, hgibafi hbglb gn ca hasdgcr, ibfn
Bysy jfnigly bawpn fn xsgnac’p, becp ecp qaai
Lbegc’p pahc ecp kafcp, hbgwy byevyc’n jfni Wasp nbeww xwyeny.
Na wacr ia iesso taigacwynn afinisyilb’p.”

To dcyyn G niaax’p, ecp hafwp bevy nxady; kfi by,
Ysy to kyrgccgcr, ko bgn yes xyslygv’p
G pgp bgt syvysycly; ecp “Hbei lefny,” negp by,
“Beib kah’p ibyy ibfn!”—“Latxfcligac,” G syjagc’p.
“Ecp gchesp ehy aq oafs bgrb pgrcgio.”

“Fx,” by ymlwegt’p, “ksaibys! fxac ibo qyyi
Esgny: yss cai: ibo qywwah nysveci G,
(Ibgcy ecp eww aibysn’) aq acy Navsec Xahys.
Gq ibaf beni yvys tesd’p ibany bawo nafcpn
Aq ranxyw isfib, ‘cas nbeww ky rgvyc gww tessgery,’
Ibaf teoni pgnlysc iby syenacn aq to nxyylb.
Ra ibo heon cah; ecp wgcrys bysy ca tasy.
Ibo iessogcr gn e wyi fcia iby iyesn,
Hgib hbglb G beniyc ibei hbysyaq ibaf nxed’ni.
G bevy ac yesib e dgcnhatec; bys cety
Ewerge, hasibo gc bysnywq, na gww
Ymetxwy aq afs bafny lassfxi bys cai:
Ecp nby gn eww sytegcyib aq ty ibysy.”




LECIA MM


Gww nisgvyn iby hgww, ’regcni hgww tasy hgny ibei nisgvyn
Bgn xwyenfsy ibysyqasy ia tgcy ahc xsyqyss’p,
G psyh iby nxacry oyi ibgsnio qsat iby hevy.

Achesp G tav’p: by ewna achesp tav’p,
Hba wyp ty, laenigcr nigww, hbysyvys xwely
Ewacr iby sald hen veleci, en e tec
Hewdn cyes iby keiiwytycin ac cessah heww.
Qas ibany ac ib’ aibys xesi, hba psax ko psax
Hsgcr afi ibygs eww-gcqyligcr tewepo,
Iaa lwanywo xsynn iby vysry. Ellfsni ky ibaf!
Gcvyiyseiy hawq! hbany rasry gcrwfin tasy xsyo,
Ibec yvyso kyeni kyngpy, oyi gn cai qgww’p!
Na kaiiatwynn ibo teh!—Oy nxbysyn aq byevyc!
Ia hbat ibysy esy, en nyytn, hba eiisgkfiy
Eww lbecry gc tasiew nieiy, hbyc gn iby peo
Aq bgn exxyesgcr, qas hbat qeiy synysvyn
Ia lbeny bys bycly? —Hgib heso niyxn ecp nwah
Hy xenn’p; ecp G eiiycigvy ia iby nbepyn,
Hbat xgiyafnwo G byesp wetyci ecp hegw;

Ecp, ’tgpni iby hegwgcr, acy kyqasy fn byesp
Lso afi “A kwynnyp Vgsrgc!” en e pety
Gc iby nbesx xecrn aq lbgwpkyp; ecp “Bah xaas
Ibaf heni,” gi eppyp, “hgicynn ibei wah saaq
Hbysy ibaf pgpni weo ibo nelsyp kfspyc pahc.
A raap Qeksglgfn! ibaf pgpni vgsify lbaany
Hgib xavysio, kyqasy rsyei hyewib hgib vgly.”

Iby haspn na xwyen’p ty, ibei pyngsy ia dcah
Iby nxgsgi, qsat hbany wgx ibyo nyyt’p ia laty,
Pgp pseh ty achesp. Oyi gi nxedy iby rgqi
Aq Cglbawen, hbglb ac iby tegpycn by
Kafciyafn kyniah’p, ia nevy ibygs oafibqfw xsgty
Fckwytgnb’p. “Nxgsgi! hba pani nxyed aq pyypn
Na hasibo, iyww ty hba ibaf hen,” G negp,
“Ecp hbo ibaf pani hgib ngcrwy vagly sycyh
Tytasgew aq nflb xsegny. Ibei kaac vaflbneq’p
Bexwo nbeww tyyi syhesp; gq G syifsc
Ia qgcgnb iby Nbasi xgwrsgtery aq wgqy,
Nigww nxyypgcr ia gin lwany ac syniwynn hgcr.”

“G,” ecnhys’p by, “hgww iyww ibyy, cai qas byww,
Hbglb ibycly G waad qas; kfi ibei gc ibonywq
Rsely na ymlyypgcr nbgcyn, kyqasy ibo igty
Aq tasiew pgnnawfigac. G hen saai
Aq ibei gww xweci, hbany nbepy nflb xagnac nbypn
A’ys eww iby Lbsgnigec wecp, ibei nywpat ibycly
Raap qsfgi gn reibys’p. Vycryecly naac nbafwp laty,
Bep Rbyci ecp Pafeo, Wgwwy ecp Ksfryn xahys;
Ecp vycryecly G aq byev’c’n rsyei Jfpry gtxwasy.
Bfrb Lexyi hen G bgrb: qsat ty pynlycp
Iby Xbgwgxn ecp iby Wafgn, aq hbat Qsecly
Cyhwo gn ravysc’p; kasc aq acy, hba xwo’p
Iby nwefrbiysys’n isepy ei Xesgn. Hbyc iby sely
Aq eclgyci dgcrn bep vecgnb’p (eww nevy acy
Hsexi fx gc nekwy hyypn) hgibgc to rsgxy
G qafcp iby sygcn aq ytxgsy, ecp nflb xahysn
Aq cyh elzfgsytyci, hgib qfww niasy aq qsgycpn,
Ibei naac iby hgpah’p lgslwyi aq iby lsahc
Hen rgsi fxac iby iytxwyn aq to nac,
By, qsat hbany kacyn ib’ ecagciyp sely kyrgcn.
Igww iby rsyei pahys aq Xsavycly bep sytav’p
Iby niegcn, ibei oyi aknlfs’p afs wahwo kwaap,
Gin nheo gcpyyp hen cessah, kfi bahy’ys
Gi hsafrbi ca yvgw: ibysy, hgib qasly ecp wgyn,
Kyrec gin sexgcy; eqiys, qas etycpn,
Xagiaf gi nygu’p, Cevessy ecp Renlaco.
Ia Giewo lety Lbeswyn, ecp qas etycpn
Oafcr Lacsepgcy ec gccalyci vgligt nwyh,
Ecp nyci ib’ ecrywgl iyelbys keld ia byev’c,
Nigww qas etycpn. G nyy iby igty ei becp,
Ibei qasib qsat Qsecly gcvgiyn ecaibys Lbeswyn
Ia tedy bgtnywq ecp dgcpsyp kyiiys dcahc.
Fcest’p by gnnfyn, nevgcr hgib ibei wecly,
Hbglb iby eslb-isegias igwiyp hgib; ecp ibei
By lessgyn hgib na baty e ibsfni, en sgvyn
Iby kahywn aq xaas Qwasycly. Ca gclsyeny
Aq iyssgiaso bycly, kfi ngc ecp nbety
Nbeww ky bgn rfyspac, ecp na tflb iby tasy
En by tasy wgrbiwo pyytn aq nflb qafw hsacr.
G nyy iby aibys, hba e xsgnacys weiy
Bep niyxn ac nbasy, ymxangcr ia iby tesi
Bgn pefrbiys, hbat by kesregcn qas, en pa
Iby Lasnegsn qas ibygs nwevyn. A evesgly!
Hbei lecni ibaf tasy, hba beni nfkpfyp afs kwaap
Na hbawwo ia ibonywq, ibyo qyyw ca lesy
Aq ibygs ahc qwynb? Ia bgpy hgib pgsys rfgwi
Xeni gww ecp qfifsy, wa! iby qwahys-py-wfly
Yciysn Ewerce! gc bgn Vgles Lbsgni
Bgtnywq e lexigvy, ecp bgn taldyso
Eliyp eregc! Wa! wa bgn bawo wgx
Iby vgcyres ecp reww acly tasy exxwgyp!
Ecp by ’ihgmi wgvgcr sakkysn paat’p ia kwyyp!
Wa! iby cyh Xgweiy, aq hbany lsfywio
Nflb vgawycly leccai qgww iby tyenfsy fx,
Hgib ca pyrsyy ia necligac, xfnbyn ac
Gcia iby iytxwy bgn oyi yerys negwn!

“A navsec Teniys! hbyc nbeww G syjagly
Ia nyy iby vycryecly, hbglb ibo hseib hyww-xwyen’p
Gc nylsyi ngwycly ksaapn?—Hbgwy peowgrbi wenin,
Na wacr hbei ibaf pgpni byes aq bys, nawy nxafny
Aq iby Rsyei Nxgsgi, ecp ac hbglb ibaf ifsc’pni
Ia ty qas lattyci, gn iby rycysew ibyty
Aq eww afs xseoysn: kfi hbyc gi pesdycn, ibyc
E pgqqysyci nisegc hy fiiys, ibyc sylasp
Xortewgac, hbat bgn rwfiiacafn ibgsni aq rawp
Tepy isegias, sakkys, xessglgpy: iby hayn
Aq Tgpen, hbglb bgn rsyypo hgnb ycnfyp,
Tesd’p qas pysgngac ia eww qfifsy igtyn:
Ecp iby qacp Elbec, bah by niawy iby xsyo,
Ibei oyi by nyytn ko Janbfe’n gsy xfsnfyp.
Nexxbgse hgib bys bfnkecp cymi, hy kwety;
Ecp xsegny iby qasyqyyi, ibei hgib qfsgafn setx
Nxfsc’p Bywgapasfn. Eww iby tafciegc safcp
Sgcrn hgib iby gcqeto aq Ibselge’n dgcr,
Hba nwyh bgn Xbsorgec lbesry: ecp weni e nbafi
Enlycpn: “Pylwesy, A Lsennfn! qas ibaf dcah’ni,
Iby qwevafs aq ibo rawp.” Iby vagly aq yelb
Cah bgrb cah wah, en yelb bgn gtxfwny xsatxin,
Gn wyp ibsafrb teco e xgilb, elfiy as rsevy.
Ibysyqasy, cai ngcrwo, G ysyhbgwy sybyesn’p
Ibei kwynnypcynn hy iyww aq gc iby peo:
Kfi cyes ty cacy kyngpy bgn ellyci segn’p.”

Qsat bgt hy cah bep xesiyp, ecp ynneo’p
Hgib fitani yqqasin ia nfstafci iby heo,
Hbyc G pgp qyyw, en cappgcr ia gin qeww,
Iby tafciegc isytkwy; hbycly ec glo lbgww
Nygu’p ac ty, en ac acy ia pyeib lacvyo’p.
Na nbaad cai Pywan, hbyc Weiace ibysy
Laflb’p ia ksgcr qasib iby ihgc-kasc yoyn aq byevyc.

Qasibhgib qsat yvyso ngpy e nbafi esany
Na vybytyci, ibei nfppycwo to rfgpy
Psyh cyes, ecp lsgyp: “Pafki cai, hbgwy G lacpfli ibyy.”
“Rwaso!” eww nbafiyp (nflb iby nafcpn tgcy yes
Reibys’p qsat ibany, hba cyes ty nhyww’p iby nafcpn)
“Rwaso gc iby bgrbyni ky ia Rap.” Hy niaap
Gttavekwo nfnxycpyp, wgdy ia ibany,
Iby nbyxbyspn, hba qgsni byesp gc Kyibwybyt’n qgywp
Ibei nacr: igww lyen’p iby isytkwgcr, ecp iby nacr
Hen ycpyp: ibyc afs bewwah’p xeib synft’p,
Yogcr iby xsaniseiy nbepahn, hba sycyh’p
Ibygs lfniat’p tafscgcr. Cyvys gc to ksyeni
Pgp grcasecly na nisfrrwy hgib pyngsy
Aq dcahwypry, gq to tytaso pa cai yss,
En gc ibei tatyci; cas ibsafrb beniy pes’p G
Ia zfynigac, cas tonywq lafwp efrbi pgnlysc,
Na ac G qes’p gc ibafrbiqfwcynn ecp psyep.




LECIA MMG


Iby ceifsew ibgsni, cy’ys zfyclb’p kfi qsat iby hyww,
Hbysyaq iby hatec aq Netesge lsev’p,
Ymlgiyp: beniy ewacr iby lftkys’p xeib,
Eqiys to rfgpy, gtxyww’p; ecp xgio tav’p
To kanat qas iby ’vycryqfw pyyp, ibafrb jfni.
Hbyc wa! yvyc en Wfdy syweiyn, ibei Lbsgni
Exxyes’p fcia iby iha fxac ibygs heo,
Cyh-sgnyc qsat bgn vefwiyp rsevy; ia fn
E nbepy exxyes’p, ecp eqiys fn exxsaelb’p,
Laciytxweigcr iby lsahp kycyeib gin qyyi.
Hy hysy cai hesy aq gi; na qgsni gi nxedy,
Neogcr, “Rap rgvy oaf xyely, to ksyibsyc!” ibyc
Nfppyc hy ifsc’p: ecp Vgsrgw nflb newfiy,
En qgiiyp ibei dgcp rsyyigcr, revy, ecp lsgyp:
“Xyely gc iby kwynnyp lafclgw ky ibo wai
Ehespyp ko ibei sgrbiyafn lafsi, hbglb ty
Ia yvyswenigcr kecgnbtyci ymgwyn!”

“Bah!” by ymlwegt’p, cas qsat bgn nxyyp tyechbgwy
Pyngnigcr, “Gq ibei oy ky nxgsgin, hbat Rap
Vaflbneqyn cai saat ekavy, hba fx iby bygrbi
Ben kyyc ibfn qes oafs rfgpy?” Ia hbat iby kesp:
“Gq ibaf aknysvy iby iadycn, hbglb ibgn tec
Isel’p ko iby qgcrys aq iby ecryw kyesn,
’Ign xwegc ibei gc iby dgcrpat aq iby jfni
By cyypn tfni nbesy. Kfi ngibycly nby, hbany hbyyw
Nxgcn peo ecp cgrbi, qas bgt cai oyi bep psehc
Ibei oesc, hbglb, ac iby qeiew pgnieqq xgw’p,
Lwaiba exxasigacn ia yelb hgrbi ibei ksyeibyn,
Bgn nafw, ibei ngniys gn ia tgcy ecp ibgcy,
Cai aq bysnywq lafwp tafci, qas cai wgdy afsn
Bys dyc: hbycly G, qsat qasib iby etxwy rfwq
Aq byww hen ie’yc, ia wyep bgt, ecp hgww wyep
Qes en to wasy evegwn. Kfi, gq ibaf dcah,
Gcnisfli fn qas hbei lefny, iby tafci ysyhbgwy
Ibfn nbaad ecp isytkwyp: hbysyqasy eww ei acly
Nyyt’p nbafigcr, yvyc qsat bgn hevy-henb’p qaai.”

Ibei zfynigacgcr na iewwgyp hgib to hgnb,
Iby ibgsni pgp qyyw ekeiytyci aq gin ypry
Y’yc qsat ymxyliecly. By qasibhgib syxwgyp,
“Gc gin pyvaigac cafrbi gssyrfwes
Ibgn tafci lec hgicynn, as ko xfclifew sfwy
Fcnecligac’p; bysy qsat yvyso lbecry ymytxi.
Aibys ibec ibei, hbglb byevyc gc ginywq
Paib aq ginywq sylygvy, ca gcqwfycly
Lec syelb fn. Iytxyni cacy, nbahys, begw as ncah,
Baes qsani as pyho tagnicynn, bgrbys qewwn
Ibec ibei ksgyq nlewy aq ibsyyqawp niyxn: ibgld lwafpn
Cas nlfppgcr seld esy yvys nyyc: nhgqi rwecly
Cy’ys wgrbiycn, cas Ibeftecigec Gsgn rwyetn,
Ibei oacpys aqiyc nbgqi ac yelb ngpy byev’c.
Vexafs epfni paib cyvys tafci ekavy
Iby bgrbyni aq iby isgcew niegsn, hbysyac
Xyiys’n vglyrysyci niecpn. Wahys xyslbecly,
Hgib vesgafn taigac sald’p, isytkwyn iby nagw:
Kfi bysy, ibsafrb hgcp gc yesib’n pyyx bawwah xyci,
G dcah cai bah, oyi cyvys isytkwyp: ibyc
Isytkwyn, hbyc eco nxgsgi qyywn ginywq
Na xfsgqgyp, ibei gi teo sgny, as tavy
Qas sgngcr, ecp nflb wafp ellwegt ycnfyn.
Xfsgqgleigac ko iby hgww ewacy
Gn xsav’p, ibei qsyy ia lbecry nalgyio
Nyguyn iby nafw syjaglgcr gc bys hgww.
Pyngsy aq kwgnn gn xsynyci qsat iby qgsni;
Kfi nisacr xsaxycngac bgcpysn, ia ibei hgnb
Ko iby jfni aspgcecly aq byev’c axxan’p;
Xsaxycngac cah en yerys ia qfwqgw
Ib’ ewwaiiyp iastyci, en ysyhbgwy ia ngc.
Ecp G hba gc ibgn xfcgnbtyci bep wegc
Qgvy bfcpsyp oyesn ecp tasy, kfi cah bevy qywi
Qsyy hgnb qas bexxgys lwgty. Ibysyqasy ibaf qywi’ni
Iby tafciegc isytkwy, ecp iby nxgsgin pyvafi
Byesp’ni, avys eww bgn wgtgin, fiiys xsegny
Ia ibei wgyry Wasp, hbat G ycisyei ibygs jao
Ia beniyc.” Ibfn by nxedy: ecp ngcly iby psefrbi
Gn rseiyqfw yvys en iby ibgsni gn dyyc,
Ca haspn teo nxyed to qfwwcynn aq laciyci.

“Cah,” negp iby gcnisflias nery, “G nyy iby cyi
Ibei iedyn oy bysy, ecp bah iby iagwn esy waan’p,
Hbo saldn iby tafciegc ecp hbo oy syjagly.
Vaflbneqy, ibei qsat ibo wgxn G cymi teo wyesc,
Hba ac iby yesib ibaf heni, ecp hbysyqasy bysy
Na teco ec ery hysi xsaniseiy.”—“Gc ibei igty,
Hbyc iby raap Igifn, hgib Byev’c’n Dgcr ia bywx,
Evycr’p ibany xgiyafn renbyn, hbycly iby kwaap
Ko Jfpen nawp pgp gnnfy, hgib iby cety
Tani wenigcr ecp tani bacafs’p ibysy hen G
Ekfcpeciwo sycahc’p,” iby nbepy syxwo’p,
“Cai oyi hgib qegib ycpfyp. Na xenngcr nhyyi
To valew Nxgsgi, qsat Iawane, Saty
Ia bysnywq psyh ty, hbysy G tysgiyp
E tosiwy reswecp ia gchsyeiby to ksah.
Nieigfn ibyo cety ty nigww. Aq Ibykyn G necr,
Ecp cymi aq rsyei Elbgwwyn: kfi g’ ib’ heo
Qyww hgib iby nylacp kfsibyc. Aq to qwety
Ibany nxesdwyn hysy iby nyypn, hbglb G pysgv’p
Qsat iby ksgrbi qafciegc aq lywynigew qgsy
Ibei qyypn fccftkys’p wetxn, iby nacr G tyec
Hbglb nafcpn Eycyen’ hecp’sgcrn: ibei iby ksyeni
G bfcr ei, ibei iby cfsny, qsat hbat to vygcn
Psecd gcnxgseigac: hbany efibasgio
Hen yvys nelsyp hgib ty. Ia bevy wgv’p
Layvew hgib iby Tecifec, G hafwp kgpy
Iby syvawfigac aq ecaibys nfc
Kyoacp to nieiyp oyesn gc kecgnbtyci.”

Iby Tecifec, hbyc by byesp bgt, ifsc’p ia ty,
Ecp bawpgcr ngwycly: ko bgn lafciycecly
Ycjagc’p ty ngwycly kfi iby xahys hbglb hgwwn,
Kyesn cai nfxsyty lacisaw: wefrbiys ecp iyesn
Qawwah na lwanywo ac iby xenngac xsatxin ibyt,
Ibyo hegi cai qas iby taigacn aq iby hgww
Gc ceifsyn tani ngclysy. G pgp kfi ntgwy,
En acy hba hgcdn; ecp ibysyfxac iby nbepy
Ksady aqq, ecp xyys’p gcia tgcy yoyn, hbysy kyni
Afs waadn gciysxsyi. “Na ia raap yvyci
Teoni ibaf lacpfli nflb rsyei ytxsguy,” by lsgyp,
“Neo, hbo elsann ibo vgnery kyet’p, kfi cah,
Iby wgrbicgcr aq e ntgwy!” Ac ygibys xesi
Cah et G nisegiyc’p; acy lacjfsyn ty nxyed,
Ib’ aibys ia ngwycly kgcpn ty: hbycly e ngrb
G fiiys, ecp iby ngrb gn byesp. “Nxyed ac;”
Iby iyelbys lsgyp; “ecp pa cai qyes ia nxyed,
Kfi iyww bgt hbei na yescyniwo by endn.”
Hbysyac G ibfn: “Xyslbecly, A eclgyci nxgsgi!
Ibaf tesvyw’ni ei to ntgwgcr. Ibysy gn saat
Qas oyi tasy hacpys. By hba rfgpyn to dyc
Ac bgrb, by gn ibei Tecifec, wyp ko hbat
Ibaf pgpni xsynfty aq tyc ecp rapn ia ngcr.
Gq aibys lefny ibaf pyyt’pni qas hbglb G ntgw’p,
Wyevy gi en cai iby isfy acy; ecp kywgyvy
Ibany haspn, ibaf nxed’ni aq bgt, gcpyyp iby lefny.”

Cah pahc by kyci i’ ytksely to iyelbys’n qyyi;
Kfi by qaskepy bgt: “Ksaibys! pa gi cai:
Ibaf esi e nbepah, ecp kybawp’ni e nbepy.”
By sgngcr ecnhys’p ibfn: “Cah beni ibaf xsav’p
Iby qasly ecp espafs aq iby wavy G kyes ibyy,
Hbyc G qasryi hy esy kfi ibgcrn aq egs,
Ecp en e nfkniecly isyei ec ytxio nbepy.”




LECIA MMGG


Cah hy bep wyqi iby ecryw, hba bep ifsc’p
Ia iby ngmib lgslwy afs enlycpgcr niyx,
Acy renb qsat aqq to qasybyep seu’p: hbgwy ibyo,
Hbany hgnbyn iycp ia jfnigly, nbafiyp qasib:
“Kwynnyp!” ecp ycpyp hgib, “G ibgsni:” ecp G,
Tasy cgtkwy ibec ewacr iby aibys nisegin,
Na jafscyo’p, ibei, hgibafi iby nycny aq iagw,
G qawwah’p fxhesp iby nhgqi-qaaiyp nbepyn;
Hbyc Vgsrgw ibfn kyrec: “Wyi gin xfsy qwety
Qsat vgsify qwah, ecp wavy lec cyvys qegw
Ia hest ecaibys’n kanat’ na iby wgrbi
Nbgcy tecgqyniwo qasib. Bycly qsat ibei bafs,
Hbyc ’tacrni fn gc iby xfswgyfn aq iby pyyx,
Lety pahc iby nxgsgi aq Ezfgcft’n besp,
Hba iawp aq ibgcy eqqyligac, to raap hgww
Beib kyyc qas ibyy aq zfewgio en nisacr
En yvys wgcd’p ginywq ia acy cai nyyc.
Ibysyqasy ibyny niegsn hgww cah nyyt nbasi ia ty.
Kfi iyww ty: ecp gq iaa nylfsy G waany
Iby sygc hgib e qsgycp’n wglycny, en e qsgycp
Qasrgvy ty, ecp nxyed cah en hgib e qsgycp:
Bah lbecl’p gi lavyiafn pyngsy lafwp qgcp
Xwely gc ibei kanat, ’tgpni nflb etxwy niasy
Aq hgnpat, en ibo uyew bep isyenfs’p ibysy?”

Qgsni natyhbei tav’p ia wefrbiys ko bgn haspn,
Nieigfn syxwgyp: “Yelb nowwekwy aq ibgcy
Gn e pyes xwypry aq wavy. Ibgcrn aqi exxyes
Ibei tgcgniys qewny teiiysn ia afs pafkin,
Hbyc ibygs isfy lefnyn esy sytav’p qsat ngrbi.
Ibo zfynigac paib ennfsy ty, ibaf kywgyv’ni
G hen ac yesib e lavyiafn tec, xysbexn
Kylefny ibaf qafcp’ni ty gc ibei lgslwy xwel’p.
Dcah ibyc G hen iaa hgpy aq evesgly:
Ecp y’yc qas ibei ymlynn, ibafnecpn aq taacn
Bevy hem’p ecp hec’p fxac to nfqqysgcrn.
Ecp hysy gi cai ibei G hgib byypqfw lesy
Caiyp hbysy ibaf ymlwegt’ni en gq gc gsy
Hgib bftec ceifsy, ‘Hbo, ibaf lfsnyp ibgsni
Aq rawp! pani cai hgib jfniys tyenfsy rfgpy
Iby exxyigiy aq tasiewn?’ G bep tyi
Iby qgysly yclafciys aq iby vawfkwy sald.
Ibyc hen G hesy ibei hgib iaa etxwy hgcr
Iby becpn teo beniy ia wevgnbtyci, ecp ifsc’p,
En qsat to aibys yvgw, na qsat ibgn
Gc xycgiycly. Bah teco qsat ibygs rsevy
Nbeww hgib nbasc waldn esgny, hba wgvgcr, eoy
Ecp ei wgqy’n weni ymisyty, aq ibgn aqqycly,
Ibsafrb grcasecly, pgp cai syxyci. Ecp dcah,
Iby qefwi hbglb wgyn pgsyli qsat eco ngc
Gc wyvyw axxangigac, bysy Hgib ibei
Heniyn gin rsyyc secdcynn ac acy lattac byex.
Ibysyqasy gq G bevy kyyc hgib ibany, hba hegw
Ibygs evesgly, ia lwyecny ty, ibsafrb syvysny
Aq ibygs isecnrsynngac, nflb beib kyyc to wai.”

Ia hbat iby navsec aq iby xeniasew nacr:
“Hbgwy ibaf pgpni ngcr ibei lsfyw hesqesy her’p
Ko iby ihgc nassah aq Jalenie’n hatk,
Qsat ibo pgnlafsny hgib Lwga ibysy, gi nyytn
En qegib bep cai kyyc nbgcy: hgibafi iby hbglb
Raap pyypn nfqqgly cai. Ecp gq na, hbei nfc
Sany ac ibyy, as hbei lecpwy xgysl’p iby pesd
Ibei ibaf pgpni eqiys nyy ia bagni iby negw,
Ecp qawwah, hbysy iby qgnbystec bep wyp?”

By ecnhysgcr ibfn: “Ko ibyy lacpfliyp qgsni,
G yciys’p iby Xescenngec rsain, ecp zfeqq’p
Aq iby lwyes nxsgcr; gwwftgc’p qgsni ko ibyy
Axyc’p tgcy yoyn ia Rap. Ibaf pgpni, en acy,
