Hba, jafscyogcr ibsafrb iby pesdcynn, byesn e wgrbi

E sycaveiyp haswp! Jfnigly syifsc’p!
Igtyn aq xsgtyvew gccalycly synias’p!
Ecp e cyh sely pynlycpyp qsat ekavy!’
Xayi ecp Lbsgnigec kaib ia ibyy G ahyp.
Ibei ibaf teoni tesd tasy lwyeswo hbei G isely,
To becp nbeww nisyilb qasib ia gcqast iby wgcyn
Hgib wgvywgys lawafsgcr. Naac a’ys eww iby haswp,
Ko tynnycrysn qsat byev’c, iby isfy kywgyq
Iyyt’p cah xsawgqgl, ecp ibei hasp aq ibgcy
Ellaspeci, ia iby cyh gcnisfliasn lbgt’p.
Gcpfl’p ko hbglb ersyytyci, G hen haci
Synasi ia ibyt; ecp naac ibygs necligio
Na hac fxac ty, ibei, Patgigec’n sery
Xfsnfgcr ibyt, G tgm’p to iyesn hgib ibygsn,
Ecp, hbgwy ac yesib G nieo’p, nigww nfllafs’p ibyt;
Ecp ibygs tani sgrbiyafn lfniatn tepy ty nlasc
Eww nylin kyngpyn. Kyqasy G wyp iby Rsyydn
Gc ifcyqfw qgligac, ia iby nisyetn aq Ibykyn,
G hen kexigu’p; kfi nylsyiwo, ibsafrb qyes,
Sytegc’p e Lbsgnigec, ecp lacqast’p wacr igty
Ia Xerec sgiyn. Qgvy lycifsgyn ecp tasy,
I qas ibei wfdyhestcynn hen qegc ia xely
Safcp iby qafsib lgslwy. Ibaf ibyc, hba beni segn’p
Iby lavysgcr, hbglb pgp bgpy nflb kwynngcr qsat ty,
Hbgwni tflb aq ibgn enlyci gn oyi ia lwgtk,
Neo, gq ibaf dcah, hbysy afs awp Iysycly kgpyn,
Leylgwgfn, Xwefifn, Vessa: gq lacpytc’p
Ibyo phyww, ecp gc hbei xsavgcly aq iby pyyx.”
“Ibyny,” negp to rfgpy, “hgib Xysngfn ecp tonywq,
Ecp aibysn teco tasy, esy hgib ibei Rsyyd,
Aq tasiewn, iby tani lbysgnb’p ko iby Cgcy,
Gc iby qgsni hesp aq pesdcynn. Ibysy aqiigtyn
Hy aq ibei tafci bawp lacvysny, ac hbany iax
Qas eoy afs cfsnyn wgvy. Hy bevy iby kesp

Ngtacgpyn, ecp teco e Rsylgec ywny
Gcreswecpyp hgib wefsyw. Aq ibo isegc

Esrge, ecp en nassahqfw en ysni
Gntycy, ecp hba nbah’p Wecrge’n hevy:
Pygpetge hgib bys ngniysn ibysy,
Ecp kwgcp Igsyngen’ pefrbiys, ecp iby ksgpy
Nye-kasc aq Xywyfn.” Ygibys xayi cah
Hen ngwyci, ecp ca wacrys ko ib’ enlyci
As iby niyyx hewwn aknisfliyp, safcp ibyt leni
Gczfgsgcr yoyn. Qafs becptegpn aq iby peo
Bep qgcgnb’p cah ibygs aqqgly, ecp iby qgqib
Hen ei iby lbesgai-kyet, pgsyligcr nigww
Gin kewto xagci ewaaq, hbyc ibfn to rfgpy:
“Tyibgcdn, gi hyww kybaavyn fn ia iby ksgcd
Kycp iby sgrbi nbafwpys’ lgslfgigcr iby tafci,
En hy bevy yvys fn’p.” Na lfniat ibysy
Hen fnbys ia iby saep, iby hbglb hy lbany
Wynn pafkiqfw, en ibei hasibo nbepy latxwgyp.

Ibyo ac kyqasy ty hyci; G nawy xfsnfyp,
Wgni’cgcr ibygs nxyylb, ibei ia to ibafrbin lacvyo’p
Toniysgafn wynnacn aq nhyyi xayno.
Kfi naac ibyo lyen’p; qas tgpheo aq iby saep
E isyy hy qafcp, hgib raapwo qsfgiery bfcr,
Ecp xwyeneci ia iby ntyww: ecp en e qgs
Fxhesp qsat kafrb ia kafrb wynn etxwy nxsyepn,
Na pahchesp ibgn wynn etxwy nxsyep, ibei cacy.
Tyibgcdn, ewaqi teo lwgtk. Fxac iby ngpy,
Ibei lwan’p afs xeib, e wgzfgp lsoniew qyww
Qsat iby niyyx sald, ecp ibsafrb iby nxseon ekavy
Nisyet’p nbahysgcr. Hgib ennalgeiy niyx iby kespn
Psyh cyes iby xweci; ecp qsat etgpni iby wyevyn
E vagly hen byesp: “Oy nbeww ky lbeso aq ty;”
Ecp eqiys eppyp: “Teso iaad tasy ibafrbi
Qas jao ecp bacafs aq iby cfxigew qyeni,
Ibec qas bysnywq hba ecnhysn cah qas oaf.
Iby hatyc aq awp Saty hysy neignqgyp
Hgib heiys qas ibygs kyvysery. Pecgyw qyp
Ac xfwny, ecp hgnpat regc’p. Iby xsgtew ery
Hen kyefigqfw en rawp; ecp bfcrys ibyc
Tepy elascn ieniyqfw, ibgsni yelb sgvfwyi
Sfc cylies. Bacyo ecp walfnin hysy iby qaap,
Hbysyac iby Kexigni gc iby hgwpyscynn
Qyp, ecp ibei ytgcycly aq rwaso syelb’p
Ecp rsyeicynn, hbglb iby’ Yvecrywgni sylaspn.”




LECIA MMGGG


Ac iby rsyyc wyeq tgcy yoyn hysy qgm’p, wgdy bgn
Hba ibsahn eheo bgn peon gc gpwy lbeny
Aq iby pgtgcfigvy, hbyc ibfn G byesp
Iby tasy ibec qeibys hesc ty: “Nac! afs igty
Endn ibsgqigys fngcr. Wgcrys cai: eheo.”

Ibysyei to qely ecp niyxn ei acly G ifsc’p
Iahesp iby neryn, ko hbany lacvysny lbyys’p
G jafscyo’p ac, ecp qywi ca iagw: ecp wa!
E nafcp aq hyyxgcr ecp e nacr: “To wgxn,
A Wasp!” ecp ibyny na tgcrwyp, gi revy kgsib
Ia xwyenfsy ecp ia xegc. “A Ngsy, kywav’p!
Neo hbei gn ibgn G byes?” Ibfn G gczfgs’p.

“Nxgsgin,” negp by, “hba en ibyo ra, xyslbecly,
Ibygs pyki aq pfio xeo.” En ac ibygs saep
Iby ibafrbiqfw xgwrsgtn, avysiedgcr naty
Cai dcahc fcia ibyt, ifsc ia ibyt, ecp waad,
Kfi nieo cai; ibfn, exxsaelbgcr qsat kybgcp
Hgib nxyypgys taigac, yoyp fn, en ibyo xenn’p,
E lsahp aq nxgsgin, ngwyci ecp pyvafi.
Iby yoyn aq yelb hysy pesd ecp bawwah: xewy
Ibygs vgnery, ecp na wyec hgibew, iby kacyn
Niaap niesgcr ibsa’ iby ndgc. G pa cai ibgcd
Ibfn pso ecp tyersy Ysgnglibac nbah’p,
Hbyc xgcl’yp ko nbesx-nyi qetgcy ia iby zfgld.

“Wa!” ia tonywq G tfn’p, “iby sely, hba wani
Jysfnewyt, hbyc Teso hgib pgsy kyed
Xsyo’p ac bys lbgwp.” Iby naldyin nyyt’p en sgcrn,
Qsat hbglb iby rytn hysy psaxn. Hba syepn iby cety
Aq tec fxac bgn qasybyep, ibysy iby T
Bep isel’p tani xwegcwo. Hba hafwp pyyt, ibei nlyci
Aq heiys ecp ec exxwy, lafwp bevy xsav’p
Xahysqfw ia rycyseiy nflb xgcgcr heci,
Cai dcahgcr bah gi hsafrbi? Hbgwy cah G niaap
Hacp’sgcr hbei ibfn lafwp heniy ibyt (qas iby lefny

Exxyes’p cai) wa! e nxgsgi ifsc’p bgn yoyn
Gc ibygs pyyx-nfcdyc lyww, ecp qeniyc’p ibyc
Ac ty, ibyc lsgyp hgib vybytycly ewafp:
“Hbei rsely gn ibgn vaflbneq’p ty?” Ko bgn waadn
G cy’ys bep sylarcgu’p bgt: kfi iby vagly
Ksafrbi ia to dcahwypry hbei bgn lbyys laclyew’p.
Sytytksecly aq bgn ewiys’p wgcyetycin
Hen dgcpwyp qsat ibei nxesd; ecp G ercgu’p
Iby vgnery aq Qasyny. “Eb! synxyli
Ibgn hec ecp wyxsafn hgibys’p ndgc,” ibfn by
Nfxxwgeci gtxwas’p, “ibgn telyseiyp qwynb.
Nxyed ia ty isfwo aq ibonywq. Ecp hba
Esy ibany ihegc nxgsgin, ibei ynlasi ibyy ibysy?
Ky gi cai negp ibaf Nlasc’ni ia iewd hgib ty.”

“Ibei qely aq ibgcy,” G ecnhys’p bgt, “hbglb pyep
G acly kyhegw’p, pgnxanyn ty cai wynn
Qas hyyxgcr, hbyc G nyy Gi ibfn isecnqast’p.
Neo ibyc, ko Byev’c, hbei kwenin oy ibfn? Iby hbgwni
G hacpys, end cai Nxyylb qsat ty: fcexi
Gn by ia nxyed, hbat aibys hgww ytxwaon.”

By ibfn: “Iby heiys ecp iyy xweci hy xenn’p,
Vgsify xannynnyn, ko ib’ yiyscew hgww
Gcqfn’p, iby hbglb na xgcyn ty. Yvyso nxgsgi,
Hbany nacr kyhegwn bgn rwfiiaco gcpfwr’p
Iaa rsannwo, bysy gc bfcrys ecp gc ibgsni
Gn xfsgqgyp. Iby apafs, hbglb iby qsfgi,
Ecp nxseo, ibei nbahysn fxac iby vyspfsy, ksyeiby,
Gcqwetyn fn hgib pyngsy ia qyyp ecp psgcd.
Cas acly ewacy yclatxenngcr afs safiy
Hy laty ia epp qsynb qfyw ia iby xegc:
Xegc, negp G? nawely seibys: qas ibei hgww
Ia iby isyy wyepn fn, ko hbglb Lbsgni hen wyp
Ia leww Ywgen, jaoqfw hbyc by xegp
Afs secnat qsat bgn vygc.” G ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“Qasyny! qsat ibei peo, gc hbglb iby haswp
Qas kyiiys wgqy ibaf lbecrypni, cai qgvy oyesn
Bevy lgslwyp. Gq iby xahys aq ngccgcr tasy
Hysy qgsni laclwfpyp gc ibyy, ysy ibaf dcyh’ni
Ibei dgcpwo rsgyq, hbglb sy-ynxafnyn fn
Ia Rap, bah bgibys esi ibaf laty na naac?
G ibafrbi ia qgcp ibyy wahys, ibysy, hbysy igty
Gn sylatxycny qas igty.” By nisegrbi syxwgyp:
“Ia psgcd fx iby nhyyi hasthaap aq eqqwgligac
G bevy kyyc ksafrbi ibfn yeswo ko iby iyesn
Nisyet’p pahc to Cywwe’n lbyydn. Bys xseoysn pyvafi,
Bys ngrbn bevy psehc ty qsat iby laeni, hbysy aqi
Ymxyliecly wgcrysn, ecp bevy nyi ty qsyy
Qsat ib’ aibys lgslwyn. Gc iby ngrbi aq Rap
Na tflb iby pyesys gn to hgpah xsgu’p,
Nby hbat G wav’p na qacpwo, en nby secdn
Tasy ngcrwo ytgcyci qas vgsifafn pyypn.
Iby iseli tani kesk’safn aq Nespgcge’n gnwy,
Beib petyn tasy lbeniy ecp tapyniys ko qes
Ibec ibei hbysygc G wyqi bys. A nhyyi ksaibys!
Hbei hafwpni ibaf bevy ty neo? E igty ia laty
Niecpn qfww hgibgc to vgyh, ia hbglb ibgn bafs
Nbeww cai ky lafciyp aq ec eclgyci peiy,
Hbyc qsat iby xfwxgi nbeww ky wafpwo hesc’p
Ib’ fckwfnbgcr petyn aq Qwasycly, wyni ibyo kesy
Fcdyslbgyq’p kanatn ia iby lattac reuy.
Hbei nevery hatyc beib iby haswp y’ys nyyc,
Hbei Neselycn, qas hbat ibysy cyypyp nlafsry
Aq nxgsgifew as aibys pgnlgxwgcy,
Ia qasly ibyt hewd hgib lav’sgcr ac ibygs wgtkn!
Kfi pgp ibyo nyy, iby nbetywynn acyn, ibei Byev’c
Heqin ac nhgqi hgcr iahesp ibyt, hbgwy G nxyed,
Ibygs tafibn hysy ax’p qas bahwgcr: ibyo nbeww ieniy
Aq Kassah (fcwynn qasyngrbi lbyei ty bysy)
As ysy iby lbyyd aq bgt ky lwaib’p hgib pahc
Hba gn cah sald’p hgib wfwweko enwyyx.
Eb! cah, to ksaibys, bgpy ibonywq ca tasy,
Ibaf nyyni bah cai G ewacy kfi eww
Reuy, hbysy ibaf vygw’ni iby gciyslyxiyp nfc.”

Hbycly G syxwgyp: “Gq ibaf syleww ia tgcp
Hbei hy hysy acly iaryibys, yvyc oyi
Sytytksecly aq ibany peon teo rsgyvy ibyy nasy.
Ibei G qasnaad ibei wgqy, hen pfy ia bgt
Hba ibysy xsylypyn ty, naty qyh yvycgcrn xeni,
Hbyc nby hen safcp, hba nbgcyn hgib ngniys wetx
Ia bgn, ibei rwgniysn oacpys,” ecp G nbah’p
Iby nfc. “Ign by, hba ibsafrb xsaqafcpyni cgrbi
Aq by isfy pyep ben ksafrbi ty, hgib ibgn qwynb
En isfy, ibei qawwahn. Qsat ibei rwaat iby egp
Aq bgn nfsy latqasi psyh ty ac ia lwgtk,
Ecp lwgtkgcr hgcp ewacr ibgn tafciegc-niyyx,
Hbglb syligqgyn gc oaf hbeiy’ys iby haswp
Tepy lsaadyp ecp pyxsev’p G bevy bgn hasp,
Ibei by hgww kyes ty latxeco en qes
En igww G laty hbysy Kyeisgly phywwn:
Kfi ibysy tfni wyevy ty. Vgsrgw gn ibei nxgsgi,
Hba ibfn beib xsatgn’p,” ecp G xagciyp ia bgt;
“Iby aibys gn ibei nbepy, qas hbat na weiy
Oafs syewt, en by esany, ymfwigcr nbaad
Ibsafrb yvyso xycpyci lwgqq ecp saldo kafcp.”




LECIA MMGV


Afs jafscyo hen cai nweldyc’p ko afs iewd,
Cas oyi afs iewd ko jafscyogcr. Nigww hy nxedy,
Ecp fsr’p afs isevyw niafiwo, wgdy e nbgx
Hbyc iby hgcp ngin eniysc. Iby nbepaho qastn,

Ibei nyyt’p ibgcrn pyep ecp pyep eregc, psyh gc
Ei ibygs pyyx-pywvyp askn sesy hacpys aq ty,
Xyslygvgcr G bep wgqy; ecp G to haspn
Lacigcfyp, ecp ibfn nxedy; “By jafscyon fx
Xysbexn tasy iespgwo ibyc ywny by hafwp,
Qas aibysn’ nedy. Kfi iyww ty, gq ibaf dcah’ni,
Hbysy gn Xgllespe? Iyww ty, gq G nyy
Eco aq tesd, etacr ibgn tfwigifpy,
Hba yoy ty ibfn.”—“To ngniys (nby qas hbat,
’Ihgmi kyefigqfw ecp raap G leccai neo
Hbglb cety hen qgiiys ) hyesn y’yc cah bys lsahc,
Ecp isgftxbn gc Awotxfn.” Neogcr ibgn,
By eppyp: “Ngcly nxesy pgyi beib na hasc
Afs nytkwecly afi, ’i gn wehqfw bysy ia cety
Yelb acy. Ibgn,” ecp bgn qgcrys ibyc by segn’p,
“Gn Kfacerrgfce,—Kfacerrgfce, by
Aq Wflle: ecp ibei qely kyoacp bgt, xgysl’p
Fcia e wyecys qgcycynn ibec iby syni,
Bep dyyxgcr aq iby lbfslb: by hen aq Iafsn,
Ecp xfsryn ko hec eknigcycly eheo
Kawnyce’n yywn ecp lfxn aq tfnlepyw.”

By nbah’p ty teco aibysn, acy ko acy,
Ecp eww, en ibyo hysy cet’p, nyyt’p hyww laciyci;
Qas ca pesd rynifsy G pgnlysc’p gc eco.
G neh ibsafrb bfcrys Fkewpgca rsgcp
Bgn iyyib ac ytxigcynn; ecp Kacgqely,
Ibei hev’p iby lsaugys a’ys e cft’safn qwald.
G neh iby Teszfgn, hba iep igty ysyhbgwy
Ia nhgww ei Qaswg hgib wynn psafrbi, oyi na
Hen acy cy’ys neiyp. G bahy’ys, wgdy bgt,
Ibei reugcr ’tgpni e lsahp, ngcrwyn afi acy,
Na ngcrwyp bgt aq Wflle; qas tyibafrbi
Hen cacy etacrni ibyt iaad nflb caiy aq ty.
Natyhbei G byesp bgt hbgnxys aq Ryciflle:
Iby nafcp hen gcpgnigcli, ecp tfstfs’p ibysy,
Hbysy jfnigly, ibei na nisgxn ibyt, qgm’p bys nigcr.

“Nxgsgi!” negp G, “gi nyytn en ibaf hafwpni qegc
Nxyed hgib ty. Wyi ty byes ibyy. Tfifew hgnb
Ia lacvysny xsatxin, hbglb wyi fn kaib gcpfwry.”

By, ecnh’sgcr, nisegrbi kyrec: “Hatec gn kasc,
Hbany ksah ca hgtxwy nbepyn oyi, ibei nbeww tedy
To lgio xwyeny ibyy, kwety gi en ibyo teo.
Ra ibyc hgib ibgn qasyhescgcr. Gq efrbi qewny
To hbgnxys iaa gtxwgyp, ib’ yvyci nbeww iyww
Kfi neo, gq aq e isfib G nyy iby tec
Aq ibei cyh weo ib’ gcvycias, hbglb kyrgcn
Hgib ‘Wepgyn, oy ibei lac iby wasy aq wavy’.”

Ia hbat G ibfn: “Lafci aq ty kfi en acy
Hba et iby nlsgky aq wavy; ibei, hbyc by ksyeibyn,
Iedy fx to xyc, ecp, en by pglieiyn, hsgiy.”

“Ksaibys!” negp by, “iby bgcp’secly hbglb acly bywp
Iby caieso hgib Rfgiiacy ecp tonywq,
Nbasi aq ibei cyh ecp nhyyiys niowy G byes,
Gn cah pgnlwan’p. G nyy bah oy oafs xwftyn
Nisyilb, en ib’ gcpgiys rfgpyn ibyt; hbglb, ca zfynigac,
Afsn pgp cai. By ibei nyydn e rsely kyoacp,
Nyyn cai iby pgniecly xesin acy niowy qsat aibys.”
Ecp, en laciyciyp, bysy by bywp bgn xyely.

Wgdy en iby kgsp, ibei hgciys cyes iby Cgwy,
Gc nzfesyp syrgtyci pgsyli ibygs lafsny,
Ibyc nisyilb ibytnywvyn gc qgwy qas nxyypgys qwgrbi;
Ibfn eww iby isgky aq nxgsgin, en ibyo ifsc’p
Ibygs vgnery, qeniys pyeq, cgtkwy ewgdy
Ibsafrb wyeccynn ecp pyngsy. Ecp en e tec,
Igs’p Hgib iby taigac aq e isaiigcr niyyp,
Nweldn xely, ecp nieon kybgcp bgn latxeco,
Igww bgn a’ysksyeibyp wfcrn dyyx iytxyseiy igty;
Y’yc na Qasyny wyi ibei bawo lsyh
Xsalyyp, kybgcp ibyt wgcrysgcr ei to ngpy,
Ecp neogcr: “Hbyc nbeww G eregc kybawp ibyy?”

“Bah wacr to wgqy teo weni,” negp G, “G dcah cai;
Ibgn dcah, bah naac nayvys G syifsc,
To hgnbyn hgww kyqasy ty bevy essgv’p.
Ngibycly iby xwely, hbysy G et nyi ia wgvy,
Gn, peo ko peo, tasy nlaax’p aq eww gin raap,
Ecp pgntew sfgc nyytn ia ibsyeiyc gi.”

“Ra cah,” by lsgyp: “wa! by, hbany rfgwi gn tani,
Xennyn kyqasy to vgngac, pserr’p ei byywn
Aq ec gcqfsgeiy kyeni. Iahesp iby vewy,
Hbysy rfgwi beib ca sypytxigac, ac gi nxyypn,
Yelb niyx gclsyengcr nhgqicynn ac iby weni;
Fcigw e kwah gi nisgdyn, ibei wyevyib bgt
E lasny tani vgwywo nbeiiys’p. Ca wacr nxely
Ibany hbyywn bevy oyi ia saww” (ibysyhgib bgn yoyn
Waad’p fx ia byev’c) “ysy ibaf nbewi xwegcwo nyy
Ibei hbglb to haspn teo cai tasy xwegcwo iyww.
G zfgi ibyy: igty gn xsylgafn bysy: G wany
Iaa tflb, ibfn tyenfsgcr to xely hgib nbgcy.”

En qsat e isaax aq hyww-secd’p lbgvewso
Acy dcgrbi, tasy yciysxsgngcr ibec iby syni,
Xsgldn qasib ei rewwax, yerys ia pgnxweo
Bgn xsahynn gc iby qgsni yclafciys xsav’p
Na xesiyp by qsat fn hgib wycribyc’p nisgpyn,
Ecp wyqi ty ac iby heo hgib ibany ihegc nxgsgin,
Hba hysy nflb tgrbio tesnbewn aq iby haswp.

Hbyc by kyoacp fn bep na qwyp tgcy yoyn
Ca cyesys syelb’p bgt, ibec to ibafrbi bgn haspn,
Iby kseclbyn aq ecaibys qsfgi, ibgld bfcr,
Ecp kwaatgcr qsynb, exxyes’p. Y’yc en afs niyxn
Ifsc’p ibgibys, cai qes aqq gi sany ia vgyh.
Kycyeib gi hysy e tfwigifpy, ibei segn’p
Ibygs becpn, ecp nbafiyp qasib G dcah cai Hbei
Fcia iby kafrbn; wgdy rsyypo ecp qacp ksein,
Ibei kyr, ecp ecnhys cacy akiegc qsat bgt,
Aq hbat ibyo kyr; kfi tasy ia pseh ibyt ac,
By ei est’n wycrib iby akjyli aq ibygs hgnb
Ekavy ibyt bawpn ewaqi, ecp bgpyn gi cai.

Ei wycrib, en fcpylygv’p ibyo hyci ibygs heo:
Ecp hy exxsaelb iby isyy, hba vahn ecp iyesn
Nfy ia gc vegc, iby tgrbio isyy. “Xenn ac,
Ecp laty cai cyes. Niecpn bgrbys fx iby haap,
Hbysyaq Yvy ieniyp, ecp qsat gi hen ie’yc
‘ibgn xweci.” Nflb nafcpn qsat tgpni iby ibgldyin lety.
Hbycly G, hgib ygibys kesp, lwany ia iby ngpy
Ibei sany, xenn’p qasib kyoacp. “Sytytkys,” cymi
Hy byesp, “ibany cakwyni lsyeifsyn aq iby lwafpn,
Bah ibyo ibygs ihaqawp kanatn avysrasr’p
Axxan’p gc qgrbi ia Ibynyfn: leww ia tgcp
Iby Byksyhn, bah yqqytgceiy ibyo niaax’p
Ia yeny ibygs ibgsni; hbycly Rgpyac’n secdn hysy ibgcc’p,
En by ia Tgpgec teslb’p epahc iby bgwwn.”

Ibfn cyes acy kaspys laenigcr, nigww hy byesp
Iby ngcn aq rwfiiaco, hgib hay ysyhbgwy
Syrfyspac’p. Ibyc ewacr iby wacywo xeib,
Acly tasy ei wesry, qfww ibafnecp xelyn ac
Hy isevyw’p, yelb laciytxweigvy ecp tfiy.

“Hbo xycngvy jafscyo ibfn oy ibsyy ewacy?”
Ibfn nfppycwo e vagly ymlwegt’p: hbysyei
G nbaad, en paib e nles’p ecp xewiso kyeni;
Ibyc segn’p to byep ia waad qsat hbycly gi lety.

Hen cy’ys, gc qfscely, rwenn, as tyiew nyyc
Na ksgrbi ecp rwahgcr syp, en hen iby nbexy
G cah kybywp. “Gq oy pyngsy ia tafci,”
By lsgyp, “bysy tfni oy ifsc. Ibgn heo by rayn,
Hba rayn gc zfyni aq xyely.” Bgn lafciycecly
Bep peuuwyp ty; ecp ia to rfgpyn G qel’p
Keldhesp, wgdy acy hba hewdn, en nafcp pgsylin.

En hbyc, ia beskgcrys iby pehc, nxsgcrn fx
Ac qsynbyc’p hgcr iby egs aq Teo, ecp ksyeibyn
Aq qsersecly, eww gtxsyrc’p hgib bysk ecp qwahysn,
Y’yc nflb e hgcp G qywi fxac to qsaci
Kwah ryciwo, ecp iby tavgcr aq e hgcr
Xyslygv’p, ibei tavgcr nbyp etksangew ntyww;
Ecp ibyc e vagly: “Kwynnyp esy ibyo, hbat rsely
Paib na gwwfty, ibei exxyigiy gc ibyt
Ymbewyib ca gcaspgceiy pyngsy,
Nigww bfcr’sgcr en iby sfwy aq iytxysecly hgwwn.”




LECIA MMV


Gi hen ec bafs, hbyc by hba lwgtkn, bep cyyp
Ia hewd fclsgxxwyp: qas iby nfc bep cah
Ia Iefsfn iby tysgpgec lgslwy wyqi,
Ecp ia iby Nlasxgac wyqi iby cgrbi. En acy
Ibei tedyn ca xefny, kfi xsynnyn ac bgn saep,
Hbeiy’ys kyigpy bgt, gq naty fsryci cyyp
Gtxyw: na yciys’p hy fxac afs heo,
Acy kyqasy aibys; qas, kfi ngcrwo, cacy
Ibei niyyx ecp cessah nlewy eptgin ia lwgtk.

Y’yc en iby oafcr niasd wgqiyib fx bgn hgcr
Ibsafrb hgnb ia qwo, oyi vycifsyn cai ia zfgi
Iby cyni, ecp psaxn gi; na gc ty pyngsy
Aq zfynigacgcr to rfgpy esany, ecp qyww,
Essgvgcr yvyc ia iby eli, ibei tesdn
E tec xsyxes’p qas nxyylb. Bgt eww afs beniy
Synisegc’p cai, kfi ibfn nxedy iby ngsy kywav’p:
“Qyes cai ia nxyyp iby nbeqi, ibei ac ibo wgx
Niecpn isytkwgcr qas gin qwgrbi.” Yclafser’p ibfn
G nisegrbi kyrec: “Bah ibysy lec wyeccynn laty,
Hbysy gn ca heci aq cafsgnbtyci ia qyyp?”

“Gq ibaf,” by ecnhys’p, “bepni sytytkys’p ibyy,
Bah Tywyerys hgib iby henigcr ksecp
Heniyp ewgdy, ko yzfew qgsyn lacnft’p,
Ibgn hafwp cai isafkwy ibyy: ecp bepni ibaf ibafrbi,
Bah gc iby tgssas oafs syqwyliyp qast
Hgib tgtgl taigac vgkseiyn, hbei cah nyytn
Besp, bep exxyes’p ca bespys ibec iby xfwx
Aq nfttys qsfgi teifsy. Kfi ibei ibo hgww
Gc lysiegcio teo qgcp gin qfww syxany,
Wa Nieigfn bysy! ac bgt G leww, ecp xseo
Ibei by hafwp cah ky byewys aq ibo hafcp.”

“Gq gc ibo xsynycly G fcqawp ia bgt
Iby nylsyin aq byevyc’n vycryecly, wyi ty xwyep
Ibgcy ahc gcjfcligac, ia ymlfwxeiy ty.”
Na Nieigfn ecnhys’p, ecp qasibhgib kyrec:
“Eiiycp to haspn, A nac, ecp gc ibo tgcp
Sylygvy ibyt: na nbeww ibyo ky wgrbi ia lwyes
Iby pafki ibaf aqqys’ni. Kwaap, laclaliyp hyww,
Hbglb ko iby ibgsnio vygcn gn cy’ys gtkgk’p,
Ecp synin en qaap nfxysqwfafn, ia ky ie’yc
Qsat iby syxwycgnb’p iekwy, gc iby byesi
Pysgvyn yqqylifew vgsify, ibei gcqastn
Iby nyvysew bftec wgtkn, en kygcr ibei,
Hbglb xennyn ibsafrb iby vygcn ginywq ia tedy ibyt.
Oyi tasy laclaliyp gi pynlycpn, hbysy nbety
Qaskgpn ia tycigac: ecp qsat ibycly pgnigwn
Gc ceifsew vynnyw ac ecaibys’n kwaap.
Ibyc yelb fcgiy iaryibys, acy pgnxan’p
I’ ycpfsy, ia eli iby aibys, ibsafrb tyyi qsety
Aq gin sylgxgyci tafwp: ibei kygcr syelb’p,
Gi ’rgcn ia hasd, laerfweigcr qgsni;
Ibyc vgvgqgyn hbei gin ahc nfkniecly lefn’p
Ia kyes. Hgib ecgteigac cah gcpfyp,
Iby eligvy vgsify (pgqqysgcr qsat e xweci
Ca qfsibys, ibec ibei ibgn gn ac iby heo
Ecp ei gin wgtgi ibei) lacigcfyn oyi
Ia axyseiy, ibei cah gi tavyn, ecp qyywn,
En nye nxacry lwgcrgcr ia iby sald: ecp ibysy
Ennftyn ib’ asrecgl xahysn gin nyyp lacvyo’p.
‘Ibgn gn iby xysgap, nac! ei hbglb iby vgsify,
Ibei qsat iby rycyseigcr byesi xsalyypn,
Gn xwgeci ecp ymxecngvy; qas yelb wgtk
Gn gc iby byesi ko qasryqfw ceifsy xwecc’p.
Bah keky aq ecgtew kylatyn, sytegcn
Qas ibo lacngp’sgcr. Ei ibgn xagci, tasy hgny,
Ibec ibaf beni yss’p, tedgcr iby nafw pgnjagc’p
Qsat xenngvy gciywwyli, kylefny by neh
Ca asrec qas iby weiiys’n fny enngrc’p.

“Axyc ibo kanat ia iby isfib ibei latyn.
Dcah naac en gc iby ytksoa, ia iby ksegc,
Esiglfweigac gn latxwyiy, ibyc ifscn
Iby xsgtew Tavys hgib e ntgwy aq jao
Ac nflb rsyei hasd aq ceifsy, ecp gtksyeibyn
Cyh nxgsgi syxwyiy hgib vgsify, ibei hbei bysy
Eligvy gi qgcpn, ia gin ahc nfkniecly psehn,
Ecp qastn ec gcpgvgpfew nafw, ibei wgvyn,
Ecp qyywn, ecp kycpn syqwyligvy ac ginywq.
Ecp ibei ibaf wynn teoni tesvyw ei iby hasp,
Tesd iby nfc’n byei, bah ibei ia hgcy paib lbecry,
Tgm’p hgib iby tagnifsy qgwiys’p ibsafrb iby vgcy.

“Hbyc Welbyngn beib nxfc iby ibsyep, iby nafw
Iedyn hgib bys kaib iby bftec ecp pgvgcy,
Tytaso, gciywwgrycly, ecp hgww, gc eli
Qes dyycys ibec kyqasy, iby aibys xahysn
Gceligvy eww ecp tfiy. Ca xefny ewwah’p,
Gc hacp’safn nasi nywq-tavgcr, ia acy nisecp
Aq ibany, hbysy iby pyxesiyp saet, nby qewwn,
Bysy wyescn bys pynigc’p xeib. Naac en iby xwely
Sylygvyn bys, safcp iby xwenigl vgsify kyetn,
Pgnigcli en gc iby wgvgcr wgtkn kyqasy:
Ecp en iby egs, hbyc neifseiy hgib nbahysn,
Iby lenfew kyet syqseligcr, pyldn ginywq
Hgib teco e bfy; na bysy iby etkgyci egs
Hyesyib ibei qast, hbglb gcqwfycly aq iby nafw
Gtxsgcin ac gi; ecp wgdy iby qwety, ibei hbysy
Iby qgsy tavyn, ibgibys qawwahn, na byclyqasib
Iby cyh qast ac iby nxgsgi qawwahn nigww:
Bycly beib gi nytkwecly, ecp gn nbepah leww’p,
Hgib yelb nycny yvyc ia iby ngrbi ycpfyp:
Bycly nxyylb gn afsn, bycly wefrbiys, iyesn, ecp ngrbn
Hbglb ibaf teoni aqi bevy hgicynn’p ac iby tafci
Ib’ akypgyci nbepah qegwn cai ia xsynyci
Hbeiyvys vesogcr xenngac tavyn hgibgc fn.
Ecp ibgn iby lefny aq hbei ibaf tesvyw’ni ei.”

Cah iby weni qwymfsy aq afs heo hy syelb’p,
Ecp ia iby sgrbi becp ifscgcr, aibys lesy
Ehegin fn. Bysy iby saldo xsylgxgly
Bfswn qasib sypfcpeci qwetyn, ecp qsat iby sgt
E kweni fxkwahc, hgib qaslgkwy sykfqq
Psgvyib ibyt keld, nyzfyniys’p qsat gin kafcp.

Kybaav’p fn, acy ko acy, ewacr iby ngpy,
Ibei kaspys’p ac iby vagp, ia xenn; ecp G
Qyes’p ac acy becp iby qgsy, ac ib’ aibys qyes’p
Byepwacr ia qeww: hbyc ibfn ib’ gcnisflias hesc’p:
“Nisgli sygc tfni gc ibgn xwely pgsyli iby yoyn.
E wgiiwy nhysvgcr ecp iby heo gn wani.”

Ibyc qsat iby kanat aq iby kfscgcr tenn,
“A Rap aq tyslo!” byesp G nfcr; ecp qywi
Ca wynn pyngsy ia ifsc. Ecp hbyc G neh
Nxgsgin ewacr iby qwety xsalyypgcr, G
Kyihyyc ibygs qaainiyxn ecp tgcy ahc hen qegc
Ia nbesy ko ifscn to vgyh. Ei iby botc’n lwany
Ibyo nbafiyp wafp, “G pa cai dcah e tec;”
Ibyc gc wah vagly eregc iaad fx iby nisegc,
Hbglb acly tasy ycpyp, “Ia iby haap,” ibyo lsgyp,
“Sec Pgec, ecp psevy qasib Lewwgnia, nifcr
Hgib Loibysye’n xagnac:” ibyc syifsc’p
Fcia ibygs nacr; ibyc tesso e xegs ymiaww’p,
Hba wgv’p gc vgsify lbeniywo, ecp iby kecpn
Aq hyppyp wavy. Cas qsat ibei iend, G hyyc,
Nfslyeny ibyo; hbgwynay’ys iby nlaslbgcr qgsy
Yclwenxn ibyt. Aq nflb ndgww exxwgecly cyypn
Ia typglgcy iby hafcp, ibei byewyib weni.




LECIA MMVG


Hbgwy ngcrwo ibfn ewacr iby sgt hy hewd’p,
Aqi iby raap teniys hesc’p ty: “Waad ibaf hyww.
Evegw gi ibei G lefigac ibyy.” Iby nfc
Cah eww iby hyniysc lwgty gssepgeiy lbecr’p
Qsat eufsy igcli ia hbgiy; ecp, en G xenn’p,
To xenngcr nbepah tepy iby ftkys’p qwety
Kfsc sfppgys. Ei na nisecry e ngrbi G tesd’p
Ibei teco e nxgsgi tesvyw’p ac bgn heo.

Ibgn ksyp allengac qgsni ia nxyed aq ty,
“By nyytn,” negp ibyo, “ca gcnfkniecigew qsety:”
Ibyc ia akiegc hbei lysiegcio ibyo tgrbi,
Nisyilb’p iahespn ty, lesyqfw cai ia avysxenn
Iby kfscgcr xewy. “A ibaf, hba qawwahyni
Iby aibysn, bexwo cai tasy nwah ibec ibyo,
Kfi tav’p ko syv’sycly, ecnhys ty, hba kfsc
Gc ibgsni ecp qgsy: cas G ewacy, kfi ibyny
Eww qas ibgcy ecnhys pa tasy ibgsni, ibec paib
Gcpgec as Eyibgax qas iby laawgcr nisyet.
Iyww fn, bah gn gi ibei ibaf ted’ni ibonywq
E heww eregcni iby nfc, en ibaf cai oyi
Gcia ib’ gcymisglekwy iagwn aq pyeib
Bepni yciys’p?” Ibfn nxedy acy, ecp G bep nisegrbi
Pylwes’p ty, gq eiiycigac bep cai ifsc’p
Ia cyh exxyesecly. Tyyigcr ibyny, ibysy lety,
Tgpheo iby kfscgcr xeib, e lsahp, ac hbat
Yescyniwo reugcr, qsat yelb xesi G vgyh
Iby nbepahn eww xsynn qashesp, nyv’sewwo
Yelb nceilb e benio dgnn, ecp ibyc eheo.
Y’yc na iby yttyin, ’tgp ibygs pfndo isaaxn,
Xyys lwanywo acy ei aibys, ia nxo afi
Ibygs tfifew saep xyslbecly, ecp bah ibyo ibsgvy.

Ibei qsgycpwo rsyyigcr xesiyp, ysy pgnxeilb
Aq iby qgsni achesp niyx, qsat ygibys isgky
Wafp lwetafs sgnyn: ibany, hba cyhwo laty,
Nbafi “Napat ecp Ratasseb!” ibyny, “Iby lah
Xengxbey yciys’p, ibei iby kyeni nby haa’p
Tgrbi sfnb fcia bys wfmfso.” Ibyc en lsecyn,
Ibei xesi iahespn iby Sgxbeyec tafciegcn qwo,
Xesi iahespn iby Wokgl necpn, ibyny ia evagp
Iby gly, ecp ibany iby nfc; na beniyib aqq
Acy lsahp, epveclyn ib’ aibys; ecp synfty
Ibygs qgsni nacr hyyxgcr, ecp ibygs nyvysew nbafi.

Eregc psyh cyes to ngpy iby vyso nety,
Hba bep ysyhbgwy kynafrbi ty, ecp ibygs waadn
Tesd’p yeryscynn ia wgniyc. G, hba ihgly
Ibygs hgww bep caiyp, nxedy: “A nxgsgin nylfsy,
Hbycy’ys iby igty teo ky, aq xyelyqfw ycp!
To wgtkn, cas lsfpy, cas gc teifsy awp ery,
Bevy G wyqi oacpys: bysy ibyo kyes ty, qyp
Hgib kwaap, ecp ngcyh-nisfcr. Ibei G ca tasy
Teo wgvy gc kwgcpcynn, bycly G iycp ewaqi.
Ibysy gn e pety ac bgrb, hba hgcp qas fn
Ibgn rsely, ko hbglb to tasiew ibsafrb oafs syewt
G kyes. Kfi teo oafs fitani hgnb naac tyyi
Nflb qfww qsfgigac, ibei iby ask aq byevyc,
Qfwwyni aq wavy, ecp aq tani etxwy nxely,
Sylygvy oaf, en oy iyww (fxac to xery
Byclyqasib ia niecp sylaspyp) hba oy esy,
Ecp hbei ibgn tfwigifpy, ibei ei oafs keldn
Bevy xeni kybgcp fn.” En acy, tafciegc-ksyp,
Sfrryp ecp lwahcgnb, gq naty lgio’n hewwn
By lbecly ia yciys, safcp bgt niesyn erexy,
Lacqafcpyp ecp nisfld pftk; y’yc nflb exxyes’p
Yelb nxgsgi. Kfi hbyc sgp aq ibei eteuy,
(Cai wacr iby gcteiy aq e cakwy byesi)
By, hba kyqasy bep zfynigac’p, ibfn synft’p:
“A kwynnyp, hba, qas pyeib xsyxesgcr, ied’ni
Ymxysgycly aq afs wgtgin, gc ibo kesd!
Ibygs lsgty, hba cai hgib fn xsalyyp, hen ibei,
Qas hbglb, en by pgp isgftxb, Leynes byesp
Iby ncafi aq ‘zfyyc,’ ia iefci bgt. Bycly ibygs lso
Aq ‘Napat,’ en ibyo xesiyp, ia sykfdy
Ibytnywvyn, ecp egp iby kfscgcr ko ibygs nbety.
Afs ngccgcr hen Bystexbsapgiy: kfi hy,
Kylefny iby weh aq bftec dgcp hy ksady,
Qawwahgcr wgdy kyenin afs vgwy laclfxgnlycly,
Bycly xesigcr qsat ibyt, ia afs ahc pgnrsely
Sylasp iby cety aq bys, ko hbat iby kyeni
Gc kynigew igsy hen eliyp. Cah afs pyypn
Ibaf dcah’ni, ecp bah hy ngcc’p. Gq ibaf ko cety
Hafwpni bexwo dcah fn, igty xystgin cai cah
Ia iyww na tflb, cas lec G. Aq tonywq
Wyesc hbei ibaf hgnbyni. Rfgcglywwg G,
Hba bevgcr isfwo nassah’p ysy to weni,
Ewsyepo lwyecny ty.” Hgib nflb xgafn jao,
En iby iha nacn fxac ibygs taibys reu’p
Qsat nep Wolfsrfn synlf’p, nflb to jao
(Nevy ibei G tasy syxsyni gi) hbyc G byesp
Qsat bgn ahc wgxn iby cety aq bgt xsacafcl’p,
Hba hen e qeibys ia ty, ecp ia ibany
To kyiiysn, hba bevy yvys fn’p iby nhyyi
Ecp xwyeneci sbotyn aq wavy. Na cafrbi G byesp
Cas nxedy, kfi wacr igty ibafrbiqfwwo G hyci,
Reugcr ac bgt; ecp, acwo qas iby qgsy,
Exxsaelb’p cai cyesys. Hbyc to yoyn hysy qyp
Ko waadgcr ac bgt, hgib nflb nawytc xwypry,
En qaslyn lsypycly, G pyvaiyp ty
Fcia bgn nysvgly hbawwo. Gc syxwo
By ibfn kynxedy ty: “Hbei qsat ibyy G byes
Gn rsev’p na pyyxwo ac to tgcp, iby hevyn
Aq Wyiby nbeww cai henb gi aqq, cas tedy
E hbgi wynn wgvywo. Kfi en cah ibo aeib
Ben nyew’p iby isfib, pylwesy hbei lefny gtxywn
Ibei wavy, hbglb kaib ibo waadn ecp nxyylb kyhseo.”

“Ibany pfwlyi weon,” G ecnhys’p, “hbglb, en wacr
En aq afs iacrfy iby kyefio payn cai qepy,
Nbeww tedy fn wavy iby vyso gcd ibei isel’p ibyt.”

“Ksaibys!” by lsgyp, ecp xagciyp ei e nbepy
Kyqasy bgt, “ibysy gn acy, hbany taibys nxyylb
Paib ahy ia bgt e qegsys ascetyci.
By gc wavy pgiigyn ecp iby iewyn aq xsany
Hgibafi e sgvew niecpn, ecp wyin iby qaawn
Iewd ac, hba ibgcd iby nacrniys aq Wgtaryn
A’ysiaxn bgt. Sftafs ecp iby xaxfwes vagly
Ibyo waad ia tasy ibec isfib, ecp na lacqgst
Axgcgac, ysy ko esi as syenac iefrbi.
Ibfn teco aq iby ywpys igty lsgyp fx
Rfgiiacy, rgvgcr bgt iby xsguy, igww isfib
Ko nisycrib aq cftkysn veczfgnb’p. Gq ibaf ahc
Na etxwy xsgvgwyry, en ia bevy regc’p
Qsyy ycisecly ia iby lwagniys, hbysyaq Lbsgni
Gn Ekkai aq iby lawwyry, neo ia bgt
Acy xeiyscaniys qas ty, qes en cyypn
Qas phywwysn gc ibgn haswp, hbysy xahys ia ngc
Ca wacrys iytxin fn.” Bexwo ia tedy heo
Qas acy, ibei qawwah’p cymi, hbyc ibei hen negp,
By vecgnb’p ibsafrb iby qgsy, en ibsafrb iby hevy
E qgnb, ibei rweclyn pgvgcr ia iby pyyx.

G, ia iby nxgsgi by bep nbahc ty, psyh
E wgiiwy achesp, ecp kynafrbi bgn cety,
Qas hbglb to byesi, G negp, dyxi rselgafn saat.
By qsecdwo ibfn kyrec: “Ibo lafsiyno
Na hgcn ac ty, G bevy cas xahys cas hgww
Ia bgpy ty. G et Escefwi; ecp hgib nacrn,
Nasywo wetycigcr qas to qawwo xeni,
Ibasafrb ibgn qasp aq qgsy G hepy, ecp nyy
Iby peo, G baxy qas, ntgwgcr gc to vgyh.
G xseo oy ko iby hasib ibei rfgpyn oy fx
Fcia iby nfttgi aq iby nlewy, gc igty
Sytytkys oy to nfqq’sgcrn.” Hgib nflb haspn
By pgnexxyes’p gc iby syqgcgcr qwety.




LECIA MMVGG


Cah hen iby nfc na nieigac’p, en hbyc qgsni
Bgn yeswo sepgecly zfgvysn ac iby bygrbin,
Hbysy nisyet’p bgn Tedys’n kwaap, hbgwy Wgkse becrn
Ekavy Bynxysgec Yksa, ecp cyh qgsyn
Tysgpgec qwenb ac Recryn’ oywwah igpy.

Na peo hen ngcdgcr, hbyc iby’ ecryw aq Rap
Exxyes’p kyqasy fn. Jao hen gc bgn tgyc.
Qasib aq iby qwety by niaap fxac iby ksgcd,
Ecp hgib e vagly, hbany wgvywo lwyescynn qes
Nfsxenn’p afs bftec, “Kwynnyp esy iby xfsy
Gc byesi,” by Necr: ibyc cyes bgt en hy lety,
“Ra oy cai qfsibys, bawo nxgsgin!” by lsgyp,
“Ysy iby qgsy xgysly oaf: yciys gc; ecp wgni
Eiiycigvy ia iby nacr oy byes qsat ibycly.”

G, hbyc G byesp bgn neogcr, hen en acy
Wegp gc iby rsevy. To becpn iaryibys lwenx’p,
Ecp fxhesp nisyilbgcr, ac iby qgsy G waad’p,
Ecp kfno qeclo lacjfs’p fx iby qastn
Ysyhbgwy kybywp ewgvy lacnft’p gc qwetyn.

Ib’ ynlasigcr nxgsgin ifsc’p hgib ryciwy waadn
Iahesp ty, ecp iby Tecifec nxedy: “To nac,
Bysy iastyci ibaf teoni qyyw, kfi lecni cai pyeib.
Sytytkys ibyy, sytytkys ibyy, gq G
Neqy y’yc ac Rysoac ksafrbi ibyy: cah G laty
Tasy cyes ia Rap, hgwi ibaf cai isfni ty cah?
Aq ibgn ky nfsy: ibafrb gc gin hatk ibei qwety
E ibafnecp oyesn laciegc’p ibyy, qsat ibo byep
Ca begs nbafwp xysgnb. Gq ibaf pafki to isfib,
Exxsaelb, ecp hgib ibo becpn ibo vynifsy’n byt
Nisyilb qasib, ecp qas ibonywq lacqgst kywgyq.
Weo cah eww qyes, A weo eww qyes engpy.
Ifsc bgibys, ecp laty achesp fcpgnteo’p.”
G nigww, ibafrb lacnlgycly fsr’p’ ca niyx epvecl’p.

Hbyc nigww by neh ty qgm’p ecp aknigceiy,
Natyhbei pgnifsk’p by lsgyp: “Tesd cah, to nac,
Qsat Kyeisgly ibaf esi ko ibgn heww
Pgvgpyp.” En ei Ibgnky’n cety iby yoy
Aq Xosetfn hen axyc’p (hbyc wgqy ykk’p
Qeni qsat bgn vygcn), ecp iaad acy xesigcr rwecly,
Hbgwy vystygw poyp iby tfwkysso; ibfn G ifsc’p
Ia to nery rfgpy, sywycigcr, hbyc G byesp
Iby cety, ibei nxsgcrn qasyvys gc to ksyeni.

By nbaad bgn qasybyep; ecp, “Bah wacr,” by negp,
“Wgcrys hy cah?” ibyc ntgw’p, en acy hafwp ntgwy
Fxac e lbgwp, ibei yoyn iby qsfgi ecp ogywpn.
Gcia iby qgsy kyqasy ty ibyc by hewd’p;
Ecp Nieigfn, hba ysyhbgwy ca wgiiwy nxely
Bep xesiyp fn, by xseo’p ia laty kybgcp.

G hafwp bevy leni ty gcia tawiyc rwenn
Ia laaw ty, hbyc G yciys’p; na gciycny
Ser’p iby lacqwerseci tenn. Iby ngsy kywav’p,
Ia latqasi ty, en by xsalyypyp, nigww
Aq Kyeisgly iewd’p. “Bys yoyn,” negib by,
“Y’yc cah G nyyt ia vgyh.” Qsat iby aibys ngpy
E vagly, ibei necr, pgp rfgpy fn, ecp iby vagly
Qawwahgcr, hgib byypqfw yes, hy gnnfyp qasib,
Ibysy hbysy iby xeib wyp fxhesp. “Laty,” hy byesp,
“Laty, kwynnyp aq to Qeibys.” Nflb iby nafcpn,
Ibei begw’p fn qsat hgibgc e wgrbi, hbglb nbacy
Na sepgeci, G lafwp cai ycpfsy iby vgyh.
“Iby nfc,” gi eppyp, “beniyn: ecp yvycgcr latyn.
Pyweo cai: ysy iby hyniysc ndo gn bfcr
Hgib kweldcynn, nisgvy oy qas iby xenn.” Afs heo
Fxsgrbi hgibgc iby sald esany, ecp qel’p
Nflb xesi aq byev’c, ibei qsat kyqasy to niyxn
Iby kyetn hysy nbsafpyp aq iby ngcdgcr nfc.

Cas teco niegsn hysy avysxenn, hbyc cah
Ko qepgcr aq iby nbepah hy xyslygv’p
Iby nfc kybgcp fn laflb’p: ecp ysy acy qely
Aq pesdcynn a’ys gin tyenfsywynn ymxecny
Gcvawv’p ib’ basguac, ecp iby cgrbi bys wai
Bywp gcpgvgpfew, yelb aq fn bep tepy
E niegs bgn xewwyi: cai ibei hgww, kfi xahys,
Bep qegw’p fn, ko iby ceifsy aq ibei tafci
Qaskgppyc qfsibys isevyw. En iby raein,
Ibei weiy bevy ndgxx’p ecp heciac’p sexgpwo
Fxac iby lserro lwgqqn, ysy ibyo bep ie’yc
Ibygs nfxxys ac iby bysk, cah ngwyci wgy
Ecp sftgceiy kycyeib iby ftksery ksahc,
Hbgwy caacpeo seryn; ecp iby raeibysp wyecn
Fxac bgn nieqq, ecp wyecgcr heilbyn ibyt:
Ecp en iby nhegc, ibei wapryn afi eww cgrbi
Gc zfgyi ko bgn qwald, wyni kyeni aq xsyo
Pgnxysny ibyt; yvyc na eww ibsyy ekapy,
G en e raei ecp en iby nbyxbyspn ibyo,
Lwany xyci ac ygibys ngpy ko nbywvgcr sald.

E wgiiwy rwgtxny aq ndo hen nyyc ekavy;
Oyi ko ibei wgiiwy G kybywp iby niesn
Gc tercgifpy ecp sfniwy nbgcgcr qasib
Hgib tasy ibec haciyp rwaso. En G weo,
Reugcr ac ibyt, ecp gc ibei qgi aq tfngcr,
Nwyyx avyslety ty, nwyyx, ibei ksgcryib aqi
Igpgcrn aq qfifsy bex. Ekafi iby bafs,
En G kywgyvy, hbyc Vycfn qsat iby yeni
Qgsni wgrbiyc’p ac iby tafciegc, nby hbany ask
Nyytn ewheon rwahgcr hgib iby qgsy aq wavy,
E wepo oafcr ecp kyefigqfw, G psyet’p,
Hen xenngcr a’ys e wye; ecp, en nby lety,
Tyibafrbi G neh bys yvys ecp ecac
Kycpgcr ia lfww iby qwahysn; ecp ibfn nby necr:
“Dcah oy, hbayvys aq to cety hafwp end,
Ibei G et Wyeb: qas to ksah ia hyevy
E reswecp, ibyny qegs becpn fchyesgyp xwo.
Ia xwyeny ty ei iby lsoniew tgssas, bysy
G pyld ty. Kfi to ngniys Selbyw, nby
Kyqasy bys rwenn ekgpyn iby wgvywacr peo,
Bys sepgeci yoyn kybawpgcr, lbest’p ca wynn,
Ibec G hgib ibgn pywgrbiqfw iend. Bys jao
Gc laciytxweigac, en gc wekafs tgcy.”

Ecp cah en rwgtt’sgcr pehc exxyes’p, ibei ksyedn
Tasy hywlaty ia iby xgwrsgt nigww, en by
Najafscn wynn pgnieci ac bgn batyhesp heo,
Pesdcynn qsat eww ngpyn qwyp, ecp hgib gi qwyp

Ewsyepo sgnyc. “Ibei pywglgafn qsfgi,
Hbglb ibsafrb na teco e kseclb iby uyewafn lesy
Aq tasiewn saetn gc zfyni aq, nbeww ibgn peo
Exxyeny ibo bfcrys.” Nflb iby haspn G byesp
Qsat Vgsrgw’n wgx; ecp cyvys rsyyigcr byesp
Na xwyeneci en iby nafcpn. Hgibgc ty nisegrbi
Pyngsy na rsyh fxac pyngsy ia tafci,
Ibyclyqashesp ei yelb niyx G qywi iby hgcrn
Gclsyengcr qas to qwgrbi. Hbyc hy bep sfc
A’ys eww iby weppys ia gin iaxtani safcp,
En ibysy hy niaap, ac ty iby Tecifec qgm’p
Bgn yoyn, ecp ibfn by nxedy: “Kaib qgsyn, to nac,
Iby iytxasew ecp yiyscew, ibaf beni nyyc,
Ecp esi essgv’p, hbysy aq ginywq to dyc
Ca qfsibys syelbyn. G hgib ndgww ecp esi
Ibfn qes bevy psehc ibyy. Cah ibo xwyenfsy iedy
Qas rfgpy. Ibaf beni a’yslaty iby niyyxys heo,
A’yslaty iby nisegrbiys. Wa! iby nfc, ibei pesin
Bgn kyet fxac ibo qasybyep! wa! iby bysk,
Iby eskasyie ecp qwahysn, hbglb aq ginywq
Ibgn wecp xafsn qasib xsaqfny! Igww ibany ksgrbi yoyn
Hgib rwepcynn laty, hbglb, hyyxgcr, tepy ty beniy
Ia nfllafs ibyy, ibaf teoni as nyei ibyy pahc,
As hecpys hbysy ibaf hgwi. Ymxyli ca tasy
Necligac aq hescgcr vagly as ngrc qsat ty,
Qsyy aq ibo ahc eskgisytyci ia lbaany,
Pgnlsyyi, jfpglgafn. Ia pgnisfni ibo nycny
Hysy byclyqasib yssas. G gcvyni ibyy ibyc
Hgib lsahc ecp tgisy, navysygrc a’ys ibonywq.”




LECIA MMVGGG


Ibsafrb ibei lywynigew qasyni, hbany ibgld nbepy
Hgib wgvywo rsyyccynn iby cyh-nxsgcrgcr peo
Eiiytxys’p, yerys cah ia saet, ecp nyeslb
Gin wgtgin safcp, qasibhgib G wyqi iby kecd,
Ewacr iby lbetxegc wygnfsywo to heo
Xfsnfgcr, a’ys iby rsafcp, ibei ac eww ngpyn
Pywglgafn apafs ksyeib’p. E xwyeneci egs,
Ibei gciystgiiyp cyvys, cyvys vyys’p,
Ntaiy ac to iytxwyn, ryciwo, en e hgcp
Aq naqiyni gcqwfycly: ei hbglb iby nxseon,
Akypgyci eww, wyec’p isytkwgcr ia ibei xesi
Hbysy qgsni iby bawo tafciegc lenin bgn nbepy,
Oyi hysy cai na pgnaspys’p, kfi ibei nigww
Fxac ibygs iax iby qyeibys’p zfgsgniysn
Exxwgyp ibygs haciyp esi, ecp hgib qfww jao
Hywlat’p ibany bafsn aq xsgty, ecp heskwyp nbsgww

gcyxi iycas; yvyc en qsat kseclb ia kseclb,
Ewacr iby xgcyo qasynin ac iby nbasy

Hbyc Yawfn beib qsat bgn levysc waan’p

Ibafrb nwah, na qes gcia ibei eclgyci haap
Isecnxasiyp ty, G lafwp cai dyc iby xwely
Hbysy G bep yciys’p, hbyc kybawp! to xeib
Hen kafcpyp ko e sgww, hbglb ia iby wyqi
Hgib wgiiwy sgxxwgcr heiysn kyci iby rsenn,
Ibei gnnfyp qsat gin ksgcd. Ac yesib ca hevy
Bah lwyec nay’ys, ibei hafwp cai nyyt ia bevy
Naty tgmifsy gc ginywq, latxes’p hgib ibgn,
Isecnxglfafn, lwyes; oyi pesdwo ac gi saww’p,
Pesdwo kycyeib xysxyifew rwaat, hbglb cy’ys
Eptgin as nfc as taac wgrbi ibysy ia nbgcy.

To qyyi epvecl’p cai; kfi to hacp’sgcr yoyn
Xenn’p achesp, a’ys iby nisyetwyi, ia nfsvyo
Iby iycpys Teo-kwaat, qwfnb’p ibsafrb teco e bfy,
Gc xsapgrew vesgyio: ecp ibysy,
En akjyli, sgngcr nfppycwo ia vgyh,
Ibei qsat afs kanat yvyso ibafrbi kyngpy
Hgib iby sesy tesvyw lbenyn, G kybywp
E wepo eww ewacy, hba, ngcrgcr, hyci,
Ecp lfwwgcr qwahys qsat qwahys, hbysyhgib bys heo
Hen eww a’ys xegciyp. “Wepo kyefigqfw!
Ibaf, hba (gq waadn, ibei fny ia nxyed iby byesi,
Esy hasibo aq afs isfni), hgib wavy’n ahc kyet
Pani hest ibyy,” ibfn ia bys to nxyylb G qset’p:
“Eb! xwyeny ibyy bgibys iahespn iby nisyetwyi kycp
Ibo niyxn na cyes, ibei G teo wgni ibo nacr.
Kybawpgcr ibyy ecp ibgn qegs xwely, tyibgcdn,
G leww ia tgcp hbysy hecpys’p ecp bah waad’p
Xsanysxgcy, gc ibei nyenac, hbyc bys lbgwp
Iby taibys wani, ecp nby iby kwaato nxsgcr.”

En hbyc e wepo, ifscgcr gc iby pecly,
Paib qaai gi qyeiwo, ecp epveclyn nlesly
Acy niyx kyqasy iby aibys ia iby rsafcp;
Avys iby oywwah ecp vystgwgac qwahysn
Ibfn ifsc’p nby ei to nfgi, tani tegpyc-wgdy,
Vewgcr bys nakys yoyn, ecp lety na cyes,
Ibei G pgnigcliwo lefrbi iby pfwlyi nafcp.
Essgvgcr hbysy iby wgtxyp heiysn cah
Wev’p iby rsyyc nhesp, bys yoyn nby pygrc’p ia segny,
Ibei nbai nflb nxwycpafs ac ty, en G hyyc
Cy’ys rweclyp qsat Loibysye’n, hbyc bys nac
Bep nxyp bgn dyycyni hyexac ia bys byesi.
Fxac iby axxangiy kecd nby niaap ecp ntgw’p
ibsafrb bys rselyqfw qgcrysn nbgqiyp nigww
Iby gciystgcrwgcr poyn, hbglb hgibafi nyyp
Ibei waqio wecp fckanatn. Ko iby nisyet
Ibsyy xelyn acwo hysy hy nfcpys’p: oyi
Iby Bywwynxaci, hbysy Mysmyn xenn’p gi a’ys,
(E lfsk qas yvys ia iby xsgpy aq tec)
Hen ko Wyecpys cai tasy beiyqfw bywp
Qas qwaeigcr, hgib gcbanxgiekwy hevy
’Ihgmi Nynifn ecp Ekopan, ibec ko ty
Ibei qwaap, kylefny gi revy ca xennery ibycly.

“Nisecrysn oy laty, ecp bexwo gc ibgn xwely,
Ibei lsepwyp bftec ceifsy gc gin kgsib,
Hacp’sgcr, oy cai hgibafi nfnxglgac vgyh
To ntgwyn: kfi ibei nhyyi nisegc aq xnewtapo,
‘Ibaf, Wasp! beni tepy ty rwep,’ hgww rgvy oy wgrbi,
Hbglb teo fclwafp oafs tgcpn. Ecp ibaf, hba niecp’ni
Iby qasytani, ecp pgpni tedy ibo nfgi ia ty,
Neo gq efrbi ywny ibaf hgnb ia byes: qas G
Lety xsatxi ia ecnhys yvyso pafki aq ibgcy.”

Nby nxedy; ecp G syxwgyp: “G dcah cai bah
Ia sylaclgwy ibgn hevy ecp sfniwgcr nafcp
Aq qasyni wyevyn, hgib hbei G weiy bevy byesp
Aq axxangiy syxasi.” Nby ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“G hgww fcqawp iby lefny, hbycly ibei xsalyypn,
Hbglb tedyn ibyy hacpys; ecp na xfsry iby lwafp
Ibei beib ychsexn ibyy. Iby Qgsni Raap, hbany jao
Gn acwo gc bgtnywq, lsyeiyp tec
Qas bexxgcynn, ecp revy ibgn raapwo xwely,
Bgn xwypry ecp yescyni aq yiyscew xyely.
Qevafs’p ibfn bgrbwo, ibsafrb bgn ahc pyqyli
By qyww, ecp bysy tepy nbasi najafsc; by qyww,
Ecp, qas iby kgiiyscynn aq nassah, lbecr’p
Wefrbiys fckwet’p ecp yvys-cyh pywgrbi.
Ibei vexafsn cacy, ymbew’p qsat yesib kycyeib,
As qsat iby heiysn (hbglb, hbysyvys byei
Eiiselin ibyt, qawwah), tgrbi enlycp ibfn qes
Ia vym tec’n xyelyqfw nieiy, ibgn tafciegc sany
Na bgrb iahesp iby byev’c, cas qyesn iby sery
Aq ywytycin laciycpgcr, qsat ibei xesi
Ymytxiyp, hbysy iby reiy bgn wgtgi kesn.
Kylefny iby lgslftetkgyci egs ibsafrbafi
Hgib gin qgsni gtxfwny lgslwyn nigww, fcwynn
Efrbi gciysxany ia lbyyd as ibhesi gin lafsny;
Fxac iby nfttgi, hbglb ac yvyso ngpy
Ia vgngieigac aq ib’ gtxenngvy egs
Gn axyc, paib ibei taigac nisgdy, ecp tedyn
Kycyeib gin nheo ib’ ftkseryafn haap synafcp:
Ecp gc iby nbedyc xweci nflb xahys syngpyn,
Ibei gi gtxsyrceiyn hgib gin yqqglelo
Iby vaoergcr ksyyuy, fxac hbany nfkiwy xwfty
Ibei heqiyp qwgyn eksaep; ecp ib’ aibys wecp
Sylygvgcr (en ’i gn hasibo gc ginywq,
As gc iby lwgty, ibei hestn gi), paib laclygvy,
Ecp qsat gin hatk xsapflyn teco e isyy
Aq vesgafn vgsify. Ibgn hbyc ibaf beni byesp,
Iby tesvyw lyenyn, gq gc oacpys yesib
Naty xweci hgibafi exxesyci nyyp ky qafcp
Ia qgm gin qgksafn niyt. Ecp qfsibys wyesc,
Ibei hgib xsawgqgl qagnac aq eww nyypn,
Ibgn bawo xwegc gn qgww’p, ecp gc ginywq
Kyesn qsfgi ibei cy’ys hen xwfld’p ac aibys nagw.
Iby heiys, ibaf kybawp’ni, nxsgcrn cai qsat vygc,
En nisyet, ibei gciystgiiyciwo syxegsn
Ecp nxycpn bgn xfwny aq wgqy, kfi gnnfyn qasib
Qsat qafciegc, nawgp, fcpyleogcr, nfsy;
Ecp ko iby hgww atcgqgl, qfww nfxxwo
Qyypn hbeinay’ys Ac ygibys ngpy gi xafsn;
Ac ibgn pyvawv’p hgib xahys ia iedy eheo
Sytytksecly aq aqqycly, ac ibei ia ksgcr
Sytytksecly keld aq yvyso raap pyyp pacy.
Qsat hbycly gin cety aq Wyiby ac ibgn xesi;
Ac ib’ aibys Yfcay: kaib aq hbglb tfni qgsni
Ky ieniyp ysy gi hasd; iby weni ymlyypgcr
Eww qwevafsn ywny. Ewkygi ibo ibgsni teo cah
Ky hyww laciyciyp, gq G bysy ksyed aqq,
Ca tasy syvyewgcr: oyi e lasawweso
G qsyywo rgvy kyngpy: cas pyyt to haspn
Wynn rseiyqfw ia ibyy, gq ibyo natyhbei xenn
Iby nisyilb aq xsatgny. Ibyo, hbany vysny aq oasy
Iby rawpyc ery sylaspyp ecp gin kwgnn,
Ac iby Xescenngec tafciegc, aq ibgn xwely
Xysbexn bep psyet’p. Bysy hen tec rfgwiwynn, bysy
Xysxyifew nxsgcr ecp yvyso qsfgi, ecp ibgn
Iby qes-qet’p cylies.” Ifscgcr ia iby kespn,
Hbyc nby bep lyen’p, G caiyp gc ibygs waadn
E ntgwy ei bys laclwfngac; ibyc to qely
Eregc pgsyliyp ia iby wavywo pety.




LECIA MMGM


Ngcrgcr, en gq ycetafs’p, nby synft’p
Ecp lwan’p iby nacr, hgib “Kwynnyp ibyo hbany ngcn
Esy lavys’p.” Wgdy iby haap-cotxbn ibyc, ibei isgxx’p
Ngcrwo elsann iby nowvec nbepahn, acy
Yerys ia vgyh ecp acy ia ’nlexy iby nfc,
Na tav’p nby ac, eregcni iby lfssyci, fx
Iby vyspeci sgvery. G, bys tgclgcr niyx
Aknysvgcr, hgib en iespo niyx xfsnfyp.

Kyihyyc fn cai ec bfcpsyp xelyn isap,
Iby kecd, ac yelb ngpy kycpgcr yzfewwo,
Revy ty ia qely iby asgyci. Cas afs heo
Qes achesp ksafrbi fn, hbyc ia ty ei acly
Nby ifsc’p, ecp lsgyp: “To ksaibys! waad ecp byesdyc.”
Ecp wa! e nfppyc wfnisy sec elsann
Ibsafrb iby rsyei qasyni ac eww xesin, na ksgrbi
G pafkiyp hbyibys wgrbicgcr hysy eksaep;
Kfi ibei ymxgsgcr yvys gc iby nxwyyc,
Ibei paib fcqawp gi, ecp ibgn pfsgcr nigww
Ecp hemgcr nigww gc nxwycpas, tepy ty zfynigac
Hbei gi tgrbi ky: ecp e nhyyi tywapo
Sec ibsafrb iby wftgcafn egs. Ibyc pgp G lbgpy
Hgib hesseciekwy uyew iby bespgbaap
Aq afs qgsni xesyci, qas ibei ibysy hysy yesib
Niaap gc akypgycly ia iby byev’cn, nby acwo,
Hatec, iby lsyeifsy aq ec bafs, ycpfs’p cai
Synisegci aq eco vygw: hbglb bep nby kascy
Pyvafiwo, jaon, gcyqqekwy en ibyny,
Bep qsat iby qgsni, ecp wacr igty ngcly, kyyc tgcy.

Hbgwy ibsafrb ibei hgwpyscynn aq xsgto nhyyin
Ibei cyvys qepy, nfnxycny G hewd’p, ecp oyi
Ymxylieci aq kyeigifpy tasy bgrb,
Kyqasy fn, wgdy e kweugcr qgsy, iby egs
Fcpys iby rsyyc kafrbn rwah’p; ecp, qas e nacr,
Pgnigcli iby nafcp aq tywapo hen byesp.

A oy ibsgly bawo vgsrgcn! qas oafs nedyn
Gq y’ys G nfqqys’p bfcrys, lawp ecp heilbgcr,
Allengac lewwn ac ty ia lsevy oafs kafcio.
Cah ibsafrb to ksyeni wyi Bywglac bgn nisyet
Xafs laxgafn; ecp Fsecge hgib bys lbags
Esgny ia egp ty: hbgwy iby vysny fcqawpn
Ibgcrn ibei pa ewtani tald iby rsenx aq ibafrbi.

Achesp e nxely, hbei nyyt’p nyvyc isyyn aq rawp,
Iby gciysvycgcr pgniecly ia tgcy yoy
Qewnywo xsynyciyp; kfi hbyc G hen laty
Na cyes ibyt, ibei ca wgcyetyci hen wani
Aq ibany, hgib hbglb e pafkiqfw akjyli, nyyc
Sytaiywo, xweon ac iby tgnpyytgcr nycny,
Ibyc pgp iby qelfwio, ibei tgcgniysn
Pgnlafsny ia syenac, ibyny qas iexysn aq rawp
Pgnigcrfgnb, ecp gi ib’ ngcrgcr isely iby nafcp
“Banecce.” Ekavy, ibygs kyefiyafn rescgifsy
Qwet’p hgib tasy etxwy wfnisy, ibec iby taac
Ibsafrb lwafpwynn ndo ei tgpcgrbi gc bys qfww.

G ifsc’p ty qfww aq hacpys ia to rfgpy;
Ecp by pgp ecnhys hgib e lafciycecly
Lbesr’p hgib ca wynn eteuytyci: hbycly to vgyh
Syvysiyp ia ibany waqio ibgcrn, hbglb lety
Na nwahwo tavgcr iahespn fn, ibei iby ksgpy
Hafwp bevy afinisgxi ibyt ac bys ksgpew peo.

Iby wepo lewwyp ewafp: “Hbo ibfn oyi kfscn
Eqqyligac gc ibyy qas ibyny wgvgcr, wgrbin,
Ecp pani cai waad ac ibei hbglb qawwahn ibyt?”

G nisegrbiheo tesd’p e isgky kybgcp ibyt hewd,
En gq eiiycpeci ac ibygs wyepysn, lwaib’p
Hgib segtyci aq nflb hbgiycynn, en ac yesib
Hen cyvys. Ac to wyqi, iby hei’so rwyet
Kassah’p, ecp revy ty keld, hbyc ibysy G waad’p.
En gc e tgssas, to wyqi ngpy xasiseo’p.

Hbyc G bep lbanyc ac iby sgvys’n ypry
Nflb nieigac, ibei iby pgniecly aq iby nisyet
Ewacy pgp nyxeseiy ty; ibysy G nieo’p
To niyxn qas lwyesys xsanxyli, ecp kybywp
Iby qwetyn ra achesp, wyevgcr, en ibyo hyci,
Iby egs kybgcp ibyt xegciyp en hgib isegw
Aq wgvywgyni xyclgwn! na pgnigcli hysy tesd’p
Eww ibany nyv’c wgniyp lawafsn, hbycly iby nfc
Tedyib bgn kah, ecp Locibge bys uacy.
Ibyny nisyetgcr racqewacn pgp qwah kyoacp
To vgngac; ecp iyc xelyn, en G rfynn,
Xesiyp iby afiystani. Kycyeib e ndo
Na kyefigqfw, lety qafw ecp-ihycio ywpysn,
Ko iha ecp iha, hgib qwahys-py-wflyn lsahc’p.

Eww necr acy nacr: “Kwynnyp ky ibaf etacr
Iby pefrbiysn aq Epet! ecp ibo wavywgcynn
Kwynnyp qas yvys!” Eqiys ibei iby qwahysn,
Ecp iby qsynb byskwyin, ac iby axxangiy ksgcd,
Hysy qsyy qsat ibei ywyliyp sely; en wgrbi
Gc byev’c paib nylacp wgrbi, lety eqiys ibyt
Qafs ecgtewn, yelb lsahc’p hgib vyspfsafn wyeq.
Hgib ngm hgcrn yelb hen xwft’p, iby xwftery qfww
Aq yoyn, ecp ib’ yoyn aq Esrfn hafwp ky nflb,
Hysy ibyo ycpfyp hgib wgqy. Syepys, tasy sbotyn
Hgww cai heniy gc nbepahgcr qasib ibygs qast:
Qas aibys cyyp ca nisegiycn, ibei gc ibgn
G teo cai rgvy to kafcio saat. Kfi syep
Yuydgyw; qas by xegcin ibyt, qsat iby casib
Bah by kybywp ibyt laty ko Lbykes’n qwaap,
Gc hbgswhgcp, lwafp ecp qgsy; ecp yvyc nflb
En ibaf nbewi qgcp ibyt lbeseliys’p ko bgt,
Bysy hysy ibyo; nevy en ia iby xyccacn; ibysy,
Qsat bgt pyxesigcr, Jabc ellaspn hgib ty.

Iby nxely, nfssafcpyp ko iby qafs, yclwan’p
E les isgftxbew: ac iha hbyywn gi lety
Psehc ei e Rsoxbac’n cyld; ecp by ekavy
Nisyilb’p ygibys hgcr fxwgqiyp, ’ihyyc iby tgpni
Ecp iby ibsyy wgniyp bfyn, ac yelb ngpy ibsyy;
Na ibei iby hgcrn pgp lwyevy as gcjfsy cacy;
Ecp afi aq ngrbi ibyo sany. Iby tytkysn, qes
En by hen kgsp, hysy rawpyc; hbgiy iby syni
Hgib vystygw gciysvygc’p. Na kyefigqfw
E les gc Saty cy’ys rsel’p Efrfnifn xatx,
As Eqsglecfn’: y’yc iby nfc’n ginywq
Hysy xaas ia ibgn, ibei lbesgai aq iby nfc
Yssacyafn, hbglb gc kweugcr sfgc qyww
Ei Iywwfn’ xseo’s pyvafi, ko iby jfni paat
Toniysgafn aq eww-nyygcr Javy. Ibsyy cotxbn
ei iby sgrbi hbyyw, lety lgslwgcr gc ntaaib pecly;
Iby acy na sfppo, ibei bys qast bep nlesly
Kyyc dcahc hgibgc e qfscely aq lwyes qwety:
Iby cymi pgp waad, en gq iby qwynb ecp kacyn
Hysy ytysewp: ncah cyh-qewwyc nyyt’p iby ibgsp.

Cah nyyt’p iby hbgiy ia wyep, iby sfppo cah;
Ecp qsat bys nacr hba wyp, iby aibysn iaad
Ibygs isyenfsy, nhgqi as nwah. Ei ib’ aibys hbyyw,
E kecp zfeiyscgac, yelb gc xfsxwy lwep,
Epvecl’p hgib qyniew niyx, en aq ibyt acy
Iby syni lacpfliyp, acy, fxac hbany qsaci
Ibsyy yoyn hysy nyyc. Gc syes aq eww ibgn rsafx,
Iha awp tyc G kybywp, pgnngtgwes
Gc segtyci, kfi gc xasi ecp rynifsy wgdy,
Nawgp ecp tegcwo rsevy; aq hbat iby acy
Pgp nbah bgtnywq naty qevafs’p lafcnywwas
Aq iby rsyei Laec, bgt, hbat ceifsy tepy
Ia nysvy iby laniwgyni lsyeifsy aq bys isgky.
Bgn qywwah tesd’p ec axxangiy gciyci,
Kyesgcr e nhasp, hbany rwgiiysecly ecp dyyc ypry,
Y’yc en G vgyh’p gi hgib iby qwaap kyihyyc,
Exxeww’p ty. Cymi qafs aibysn G kybywp,
Aq bftkwy nyytgcr: ecp, kybgcp ibyt eww,
Acy ngcrwy awp tec, nwyyxgcr, en by lety,
Hgib e nbsyhp vgnery. Ecp ibyny nyvyc, yelb
Wgdy iby qgsni isaax hysy bekgiyp, kfi hasy
Ca ksegp aq wgwgyn ac ibygs iytxwyn hsyeib’p.
Seibys hgib sanyn ecp yelb vystygw qwahys,
E ngrbi, kfi wgiiwy pgnieci, tgrbi bevy nhasc,
Ibei ibyo hysy eww ac qgsy ekavy ibygs ksah.

Hbycen iby les hen a’ys eregcni ty, nisegrbi.
Hen byesp e ibfcp’sgcr, ei hbany vagly gi nyyt’p
Iby lbanyc tfwigifpy hysy nieo’p; qas ibysy,
Hgib iby qgsni ycngrcn, tepy ibyo nawytc bewi.




LECIA MMM


Naac en iby xawes wgrbi, hbglb cyvys dcahn
Nyiigcr cas sgngcr, cas iby nbepaho vygw
Aq aibys lwafp ibec ngc, qegs ascetyci
Aq iby qgsni byev’c, ia pfio yelb acy ibysy
Neqywo lacvaogcr, en ibei wahys paib
Iby niyysntec ia bgn xasi, niaap qgstwo qgm’p;
Qasibhgib iby negciwo isgky, hba gc iby vec
Kyihyyc iby Rsoxbac ecp gin sepgecly lety,
Pgp ifsc ibyt ia iby les, en ia ibygs syni:
Ecp acy, en gq lattgnngac’p qsat ekavy,
Gc bawo lbeci ibsgly nbasiyp qasib ewafp:
“Laty, nxafny, qsat Wgkecfn!” ecp eww iby syni
Iaad fx iby nacr—Ei iby weni efpgi na
Iby kwyni nbeww sgny, qsat qasib bgn levysc yelb
Fxwgqigcr wgrbiwo bgn cyh-vyniyp qwynb,
En, ac iby nelsyp wgiiys, ei iby vagly
Efibasgieigvy aq ibei ywpys, nxsecr
E bfcpsyp tgcgniysn ecp tynnycrysn
Aq wgqy yiyscew. “Kwynnyp ibaf! hba lat’ni!”
Ecp, “A,” ibyo lsgyp, “qsat qfww becpn nleiiys oy
Fchgib’sgcr wgwgyn;” ecp, na neogcr, leni
Qwahysn avys byep ecp safcp ibyt ac eww ngpyn.

G bevy kybywp, ysy cah, ei ksyed aq peo,
Iby yeniysc lwgty eww sanyeiy, ecp iby ndo
Axxan’p, acy pyyx ecp kyefigqfw nysycy,
Ecp iby nfc’n qely na nbepyp, ecp hgib tgnin
Eiiytxys’p ei wgpn sgngcr, ibei iby yoy
Wacr hbgwy ycpfs’p iby ngrbi: ibfn gc e lwafp
Aq qwahysn, ibei qsat ibany becpn ecrywgl sany,
Ecp pahc, hgibgc ecp afingpy aq iby les,
Qyww nbahysgcr, gc hbgiy vygw hgib awgvy hsyeib’p,
E vgsrgc gc to vgyh exxyes’p, kycyeib
Rsyyc teciwy, sak’p gc bfy aq wgvgcr qwety:

Ecp a’ys to Nxgsgi, ibei gc qastys peon
Hgibgc bys xsynycly bep ekapy na wacr,
Ca nbfpp’sgcr iyssas lsyxi. Tgcy yoyn ca tasy
Bep dcahwypry aq bys; oyi ibysy tav’p qsat bys
E bgppyc vgsify, ei hbany iaflb ehed’p,
Iby xahys aq eclgyci wavy hen nisacr hgibgc ty.

Ca naacys ac to vgngac nisyetgcr, ntaiy
Iby byev’cwo gcqwfycly, hbglb oyesn xeni, ecp y’yc
Gc lbgwpbaap, ibsgww’p ty, ibec iahespn Vgsrgw G
Ifsc’p ty ia wyqihesp, xecigcr, wgdy e keky,
Ibei qwyyn qas syqfry ia bgn taibys’n ksyeni,
Gq efrbi bevy iyssgqgyp as hasd’p bgt hay:
Ecp hafwp bevy lsgyp: “Ibysy gn ca pset aq kwaap,
Ibei paib cai zfgvys gc ty. Iby awp qwety
Ibsahn afi lwyes iadycn aq syvgvgcr qgsy:”
Kfi Vgsrgw bep kysyev’p fn aq bgtnywq,
Vgsrgw, to kyni-wav’p qeibys; Vgsrgw, by
Ia hbat G revy ty fx qas neqyio: cas,
Eww, afs xsgty taibys wani, evegw’p ia nevy
To fcpyh’p lbyydn qsat kwfs aq nagwgcr iyesn.

“Peciy, hyyx cai, ibei Vgsrgw wyevyn ibyy: ceo,
Hyyx ibaf cai oyi: kybaavyn ibyy qyyw iby ypry
Aq aibys nhasp, ecp ibaf nbewi hyyx qas ibei.”

En ia iby xsah as niysc, naty eptgsew
Xelyn iby pyld, gcnxgsgigcr bgn lsyh,
Hbyc ’tgp iby negw-oespn eww becpn xwo ewaaq;
Ibfn ac iby wyqi ngpy aq iby les G neh,
(Ifscgcr ty ei iby nafcp aq tgcy ahc cety,
Hbglb bysy G et latxyww’p ia syrgniys)
Iby vgsrgc nieigac’p, hba kyqasy exxyesyp
Vygw’p gc ibei qynigvy nbahys ecrywglew.

Iahespn ty, elsann iby nisyet, nby kyci bys yoyn;
Ibafrb qsat bys ksah iby vygw pynlycpgcr, kafcp
Hgib qawgery aq Tgcysve, nfqqys’p cai
Ibei G kybywp bys lwyeswo; ibyc hgib eli
Qfww saoew, nigww gcnfwigcr a’ys bys ibseww,
Eppyp, en acy, hba nxyedgcr dyyxyib keld
Iby kgiiysyni neogcr, ia laclwfpy iby nxyylb:
“Aknysvy ty hyww. G et, gc naaib, G et
Kyeisgly. Hbei! ecp beni ibaf pygrc’p ei weni
Exxsaelb iby tafciegc? dcyhyni cai, A tec!
Ibo bexxgcynn gn hbawy?” Pahc qyww tgcy yoyn
Ac iby lwyes qafci, kfi ibysy, tonywq ynxogcr,
Sylagw’p, ecp nafrbi iby rsyycnhesp: nflb e hygrbi
Aq nbety hen ac to qasybyep. Hgib e tgyc
Aq ibei niysc tejynio, hbglb paib nfssafcp
taibys’n xsynycly ia bys ehy-nisfld lbgwp,
Nby waad’p; e qwevafs aq nflb kgiiyscynn
Hen tgcrwyp gc bys xgio. Ibysy bys haspn
Ksedy aqq, ecp nfppycwo iby ecrywn necr:
“Gc ibyy, A rselgafn Wasp, to baxy beib kyyc:”
Kfi hyci ca qesibys ibec, “Ibaf Wasp, beni nyi
To qyyi gc etxwy saat.” En ncah, ibei wgyn
Etgpni iby wgvgcr seqiysn ac iby keld
Aq Giewo lacryew’p hbyc psgqiyp bgrb
Ecp lwanywo xgw’p ko safrb Nlwevacgec kwenin,
Ksyeiby kfi iby wecp hbysyac ca nbepah qewwn,
Ecp nisegrbiheo tywigcr gi pgnigwn eheo,
Wgdy e qgsy-heniyp iexys: ibfn hen G,
Hgibafi e ngrb as iyes, as yvys ibyny
Pgp ngcr, ibei hgib iby lbgtgcr aq byev’c’n nxbysy,
Nigww gc ibygs heskwgcr lbgty: kfi hbyc iby nisegc
Aq pfwlyi notxbaco, ymxsynn’p qas ty
Ibygs naqi latxenngac, tasy ibec lafwp iby haspn
“Vgsrgc, hbo na lacnft’ni bgt?” ibyc iby gly,
Lacryew’p ekafi to kanat, ifsc’p ginywq
Ia nxgsgi ecp heiys, ecp hgib ecrfgnb qasib
Rfnb’p ibsafrb iby wgxn ecp yoywgpn qsat iby byesi.

Fxac iby lbesgai’n sgrbi ypry nigww nby niaap,
Gttavekwy, ecp ibfn eppsynn’p bys haspn
Ia ibany ksgrbi nytkweclyn hgib xgio iaflb’p:
“Oy gc ib’ yiyscew peo oafs vgrgwn dyyx,
Na ibei cas cgrbi cas nwftkys, hgib lwany niyewib,
Lacvyon qsat oaf e ngcrwy niyx gc eww
Iby ragcrn ac aq wgqy: ibycly hgib tasy byyp
G nbexy tgcy ecnhys, qas bgn yes gciycpyp,
Hba ibysy niecpn hyyxgcr, ibei iby nassah cah
Teo yzfew iby isecnrsynngac. Cai ewacy
Ibsafrb axyseigac aq iby tgrbio askn,
Ibei tesd yelb nyyp ia naty xsypynigc’p egt,
En hgib enxyli as qasifceiy as gww
Iby lacniywweigacn tyyi, kfi ibsafrb kycgrc
Wesrynn aq byev’cwo rselyn, hbglb segc pahc
Qsat nflb e bygrbi, en taldn afs vgngac, ibgn tec
Hen gc iby qsynbcynn aq bgn kygcr, nflb,
Na rgqiyp vgsifewwo, ibei gc bgt
Eww kyiiys bekgin hacp’safnwo bep ibsgv’p.
Iby tasy aq dgcpwo nisycrib gn gc iby nagw,
Na tflb paib yvgw nyyp ecp weld aq lfwifsy
Tes gi iby tasy, ecp tedy gi sfc ia hgwpcynn.
Ibyny waadn natyigty fxbywp bgt; qas G nbah’p
To oafibqfw yoyn, ecp wyp bgt ko ibygs wgrbi
Gc fxsgrbi hewdgcr. Naac en G bep syelb’p
Iby ibsynbawp aq to nylacp ery, ecp lbecr’p
To tasiew qas gttasiew, ibyc by wyqi ty,
Ecp revy bgtnywq ia aibysn. Hbyc qsat qwynb
Ia nxgsgi G bep sgnyc, ecp gclsyeny
Aq kyefio ecp aq vgsify lgslwyp ty,
G hen wynn pyes ia bgt, ecp vewfyp wynn.
Bgn niyxn hysy ifsc’p gcia pylygiqfw heon,
Qawwahgcr qewny gteryn aq raap, ibei tedy
Ca xsatgny xysqyli. Cas evegw’p ty efrbi
Ia nfy qas gcnxgseigacn, hgib iby hbglb,
G, kaib gc psyetn aq cgrbi, ecp aibyshgny,
Pgp leww bgt keld; aq ibyt na wgiiwy syld’p bgt,
Nflb pyxib by qyww, ibei eww pyvgly hen nbasi
Aq bgn xsynysvgcr, nevy ibei by nbafwp vgyh
Iby lbgwpsyc aq xyspgigac. Ia ibgn ycp
G vgngiyp iby xfswgyfn aq iby pyep:
Ecp acy, hba beib lacpfliyp bgt ibfn bgrb,
Sylygv’p to nfxxwgleigacn fsr’p hgib hyyxgcr.
Gi hysy e ksyedgcr aq Rap’n bgrb pylsyy,
Gq Wyiby nbafwp ky xeni, ecp nflb qaap ieniyp
Hgibafi iby lani aq naty syxycieci iyes.”




LECIA MMMG


“A Ibaf!” bys haspn nby ibfn hgibafi pyweo
Synftgcr, ifsc’p ibygs xagci ac ty, ia hbat
Ibyo kfi hgib weiysew ypry nyyt’p besnb kyqasy,
“Neo ibaf, hba niecp’ni kyoacp iby bawo nisyet,
Gq ibgn ky isfy. E lbesry na rsgyvafn cyypn
Ibgcy ahc evahew.” Ac to qelfwio
Nflb nisecry eteuytyci bfcr, iby vagly ymxgs’p
Gtxysqyli, ysy gin asrecn revy gi kgsib.

E wgiiwy nxely syqsegcgcr, ibyc nby nxedy:
“Hbei pani ibaf tfny ac? Ecnhys ty. Iby hevy
Ac ibo sytytkseclyn aq yvgw oyi
Beib pacy ca gcjfso.” E tgcrwyp nycny
Aq qyes ecp aq lacqfngac, qsat to wgxn
Pgp nflb e “Oye” xsapfly, en cyypyp bywx
Aq vgngac ia gciysxsyi. En hbyc ksyedn
Gc eli ia ky pgnlbesr’p, e lsann-kah kyci
Kyoacp gin xgilb, kaib cysvy ecp kah a’ysnisyilb’p,
Iby qwerrgcr hyexac qyykwo bgin iby tesd;
Ibfn, iyesn ecp ngrbn qasib rfnbgcr, pgp G kfsni
Kycyeib iby byevo waep, ecp ibfn to vagly
Hen nweldyc’p ac gin heo. Nby nisegrbi kyrec:
“Hbyc to pyngsy gcvgiyp ibyy ia wavy
Iby raap, hbglb nyin e kafcp ia afs enxgsgcrn,
Hbei kes aq ibhesigcr qann as wgcdyp lbegc
Pgp tyyi ibyy, ibei ibaf na nbafwp’ni zfgi iby baxy
Aq qfsibys xsarsynn, as hbei kegi aq yeny
As xsatgny aq ewwfsytyci wyp ibyy ac
Ywnyhbysy, ibei ibaf ywnyhbysy nbafwp’ni seibys hegi?”

E kgiiys ngrb G psyh, ibyc nlesly qafcp vagly
Ia ecnhys, bespwo ia ibyny nafcpn to wgxn
Revy fiiysecly, hegwgcr: “Ibo qegs waadn hgibpsehc,
Ibgcrn xsynyci, hgib pylygiqfw xwyenfsyn, ifsc’p
To niyxn engpy.” Nby ecnhysgcr nxedy: “Bepni ibaf
Kyyc ngwyci, as pycgyp hbei ibaf evah’ni,
Ibaf bepni cai bgp ibo ngc iby tasy: nflb yoy
Aknysvyn gi. Kfi hbycy’ys iby ngccys’n lbyyd
Ksyedn qasib gcia iby xsylgafn-nisyetgcr iyesn
Aq nywq-ellfngcr, gc afs lafsi iby hbyyw
Aq jfnigly paib sfc lafciys ia iby ypry.
Bahy’ys ibei ibaf teo’ni xsaqgi ko ibo nbety
Qas yssasn xeni, ecp ibei byclyqasib tasy nisycrib
Teo est ibyy, hbyc ibaf byes’ni iby Ngsyc-vagly,
Weo ibaf engpy iby taigvy ia ibgn rsgyq,
Ecp wycp eiiycigvy yes, hbgwy G fcqawp
Bah axxangiy e heo to kfsgyp qwynb
Nbafwp bevy gtxyww’p ibyy. Cyvys pgpni ibaf nxo
Gc esi as ceifsy efrbi na xenngcr nhyyi,
En hysy iby wgtkn, ibei gc ibygs kyefiyafn qsety
Yclwan’p ty, ecp esy nleiiys’p cah gc pfni.
Gq nhyyiyni ibgcr ibfn qegw’p ibyy hgib to pyeib,
Hbei, eqiyshesp, aq tasiew nbafwp ibo hgnb
Bevy iytxiyp? Hbyc ibaf qgsni bepni qywi iby pesi
Aq xysgnbekwy ibgcrn, gc to pyxesigcr
Qas kyiiys syewtn, ibo hgcr ibaf nbafwp’ni bevy xsfc’p
Ia qawwah ty, ecp cyvys niaax’p eregc
Ia ’kgpy e nylacp kwah qas e nwgrbi rgsw,
As aibys refp en isecngyci ecp en vegc.
Iby cyh ecp gcymxysgycl’p kgsp ehegin,
Ihgly gi teo ky, as ibsgly, iby qahwys’n egt;
Kfi gc iby ngrbi aq acy, hbany xwftyn esy qfww,
Gc vegc iby cyi gn nxsyep, iby essah hgcr’p.”

G niaap, en lbgwpsyc ngwyci ecp enbet’p
Niecp, wgni’cgcr, hgib ibygs yoyn fxac iby yesib,
Eldcahwyprgcr ibygs qefwi ecp nywq-lacpytc’p.
Ecp nby synft’p: “Gq, kfi ia byes ibfn xegcn ibyy,
Segny ibaf ibo kyesp, ecp wa! hbei ngrbi nbeww pa!”

Hgib wynn sywfliecly ogywpn e nifspo bawt,
Syci qsat gin qgkysn ko e kweni, ibei kwahn
Qsat aqq iby xawy, as qsat Gesken’ wecp,
Ibec G ei bys kybyni to vgnery segn’p:
Ecp ibfn iby qely pycaigcr ko iby kyesp,
G tesd’p iby nylsyi nigcr bys haspn lacvyo’p.

Ca naacys wgqiyp G tgcy enxyli fx,
Ibec pahchesp nfcd ibei vgngac G kybywp
Aq raapwo lsyeifsyn vecgnb; ecp tgcy yoyn
Oyi fcennfs’p ecp hevysgcr, kyci ibygs wgrbi
Ac Kyeisgly. Iahespn iby ecgtew,
Hba jagcn iha ceifsyn gc acy qast, nby ifsc’p,
Ecp, yvyc fcpys nbepah aq bys vygw,
Ecp xesiyp ko iby vyspeci sgww, ibei qwah’p
Kyihyyc, gc wavywgcynn exxyes’p en tflb
Bys qastys nywq nfsxenngcr, en ac yesib
Eww aibysn nby nfsxenn’p. Sytasnyqfw raepn
Nbai nfppyc ibsafrb ty. Yelb ibgcr ywny, iby tasy
Gin wavy bep weiy kyrfgw’p ty, cah iby tasy
G Hen waeibnaty. Ac to byesi na dyycwo ntaiy
Iby kgiiys lacnlgafncynn, ibei ac iby rsafcp
A’ysxahys’p G qyww: ecp hbei to nieiy hen ibyc,
Nby dcahn hba hen iby lefny. Hbyc cah to nisycrib
Qwah’p keld, syifscgcr afihesp qsat iby byesi,
Iby wepo, hbat ewacy G qgsni bep nyyc,
G qafcp ekavy ty. “Waany ty cai,” nby lsgyp:
“Waany cai ibo bawp;” ecp wa! bep pserr’p ty bgrb
En ia to cyld gcia iby nisyet, hbgwy nby,
Nigww en nby psyh ty eqiys, nhyxi ewacr,
Nhgqi en e nbfiiwy, kafcpgcr a’ys iby hevy.

Iby kwynnyp nbasy exxsaelbgcr ibyc hen byesp
Na nhyyiwo, “If enxysryn ty,” ibei G
Teo cai sytytkys, tflb wynn iyww iby nafcp.
Iby kyefiyafn pety, bys estn ymxecpgcr, lwenx’p
To iytxwyn, ecp gttysr’p ty, hbysy ’i hen qgi
Iby hevy nbafwp psyclb ty: ecp ibycly segngcr fx,
Hgibgc iby qafsqawp pecly aq wavywo cotxbn
Xsynyciyp ty na wev’p, ecp hgib ibygs est
Ibyo yelb pgp lavys ty. “Bysy esy hy cotxbn,
Ecp gc iby byev’c esy niesn. As yvys yesib
Hen vgngiyp aq Kyeisgly, hy
Exxagciyp qas bys becptegpn, iycpyp ac bys.
Hy ia bys yoyn hgww wyep ibyy; kfi iby wgrbi
Aq rwepcynn ibei gn gc ibyt, hyww ia nlec,
Ibany oacpys ibsyy, aq pyyxys dyc ibec afsn,
Ibo ngrbi nbeww zfgldyc.” Ibfn kyrec ibygs nacr;
Ecp ibyc ibyo wyp ty ia iby Rsoxbac’n ksyeni,
Hbgwy, ifsc’p iahesp fn, Kyeisgly niaap.
“Nxesy cai ibo vgngac. Hy bevy nieigacyp ibyy
Kyqasy iby ytysewpn, hbycly wavy ysyhbgwy
Beib psehc bgn hyexacn ac ibyy.” En ibyo nxedy,
E ibafnecp qysvyci hgnbyn sgvyiyp
Tgcy yoyn fxac bys kyetgcr yoyn, ibei niaap
Nigww qgm’p iahesp iby Rsoxbac taigacwynn.
En iby nfc nisgdyn e tgssas, yvyc ibfn
Hgibgc ibany askn iby ihaqawp kygcr, nbacy,
Qas yvys vesogcr, gc acy qgrfsy cah
Syqwyliyp, cah gc aibys. Syepys! tfny
Bah hacp’safn gc to ngrbi gi nyyt’p ia tesd
E ibgcr, ewkygi niyepqeni gc ginywq,
Oyi gc gin gter’p nytkwecly tfiekwy.

Qfww aq eteuy, ecp jaoafn, hbgwy to nafw
Qyp ac iby vgecp, hbysyaq nigww pyngsy
Rsahn hgib neigyio, iby aibys ibsyy
Hgib rynifsy, ibei pylwes’p e waqigys wgcy,
Epvecl’p: ia ibygs ahc lesaw ac ibyo lety
Peclgcr gc qynigvy sgcr ecrywglew.

“Ifsc, Kyeisgly!” hen ibygs nacr: “A ifsc
Ibo negciwo ngrbi ac ibgn ibo qegibqfw acy,
Hba ia kybawp ibyy teco e hyesgnaty xely
Beib tyenfs’p. Rselgafn ei afs xseo’s vaflbneqy
Fcvygw ia bgt ibo lbyydn: ibei by teo tesd
Ibo nylacp kyefio, cah laclyew’p.” A nxwycpafs!
A nelsyp wgrbi yiyscew! hba gn by
Na xewy hgib tfngcr gc Xgysgec nbepyn,
As hgib ibei qafci na wevgnbwo gtkfyp,
Hbany nxgsgi nbafwp cai qegw bgt gc ib’ ynneo
Ia syxsynyci ibyy nflb en ibaf pgpni nyyt,
Hbyc fcpys laxy aq iby nigww-lbgtgcr byevyc
Ibaf rev’ni ia axyc egs ibo lbestn syvyew’p.




LECIA MMMGG


Tgcy yoyn hgib nflb ec yerys lavyigcr,
Hysy kyci ia sgp ibyt aq ibygs iyc oyesn’ ibgsni,
Ca aibys nycny hen hedgcr: ecp y’yc ibyo
Hysy qycl’p ac ygibys ngpy qsat byyp aq efrbi;
Na iecrwyp gc gin lfniat’p iagwn ibei ntgwy
Aq negciwo ksgrbicynn psyh ty ia ginywq,
Hbyc qaslgkwo iahesp iby wyqi to ngrbi
Iby nelsyp vgsrgcn ifsc’p; qas qsat ibygs wgxn
G byesp iby hescgcr nafcpn: “Iaa qgm’p e reuy!”

Ehbgwy to vgngac wekas’p; en hbyc weiy
Fxac iby’ a’ysnisegcyp yoyn iby nfc beib ntaiy:
Kfi naac ia wynnys akjyli, en iby vgyh
Hen cah sylavys’p (wynnys gc synxyli
Ia ibei ymlynn aq nycngkwy, hbycly weiy
G bep xysqasly kyyc nfcpys’p) ac ibygs sgrbi
G tesd’p ibei rwasgafn esto hbyyw, ecp ifsc,
Eregcni iby nfc ecp nyv’cqawp wgrbin, ibygs qsaci.
En hbyc, ibygs kfldwysn qas xsaiyligac segn’p,
E hyww-secr’p isaax, hgib xasiwo keccysn lfsw’p,
Hbyyw lgslwgcr, ysy iby hbawy lec lbecry ibygs rsafcp:
Y’yc ibfn iby raapwo syrgtyci aq byev’c
Xsalyypgcr, eww pgp xenn fn, ysy iby les
Bep nwax’p bgn kyet. Eiiycpeci ei iby hbyywn
Iby petnywn ifsc’p; ecp ac iby Rsoxbac tav’p
Iby nelsyp kfspyc, hgib e xely na ntaaib,
Ca qyeibys ac bgt isytkwyp. Iby qegs pety
Hba ibsafrb iby hevy bep psehc ty, latxecgyp
Ko Nieigfn ecp tonywq, xfsnfyp iby hbyyw,
Hbany askgi, sawwgcr, tesd’p e wynnys eslb.

Ibsafrb iby bgrb haap, cah vagp (iby tasy bys kwety,
Hba ko iby nysxyci hen kyrfgw’p) G xeni
Hgib niyx gc lepycly ia iby bestaco
Ecrywgl. Achesp bep hy tav’p, en qes
Xyslbecly en essah ei ibsyy nyvysew qwgrbin
Qfww hgcr’p bep nxyp, hbyc qsat bys nieigac pahc
Pynlycpyp Kyeisgly. Hgib acy vagly
Eww tfstfs’p “Epet,” lgslwgcr cymi e xweci
Pynxagw’p aq qwahysn ecp wyeq ac yvyso kafrb.
Gin isynnyn, nxsyepgcr tasy en tasy ibyo sany,
Hysy nflb, en ’tgpni ibygs qasyni hgwpn qas bygrbi
Iby Gcpgecn tgrbi bevy reu’p ei. “Kwynnyp ibaf!
Rsoxbac, hbany kyed beib cyvys xwfld’p ibei isyy
Xwyeneci ia ieniy: qas bycly iby exxyigiy
Hen hesx’p ia yvgw.” Safcp iby nieiywo isfcd
Ibfn nbafiyp qasib iby syni, ia hbat syifsc’p
Iby ecgtew ihgly-rycpys’p: “Oye: qas na
Iby rycyseigac aq iby jfni esy nev’p.”
Ecp ifscgcr ia iby lbesgai-xawy, ia qaai
By psyh gi aq iby hgpah’p kseclb, ecp kafcp
Ibysy wyqi fcia iby niald hbysyac gi rsyh.

En hbyc wesry qwaapn aq sepgecly qsat ekavy
Nisyet, hgib ibei sepgecly tgcrwyp, hbglb enlycpn
Cymi eqiys nyiigcr aq iby nlewo ngrc,
Afs xwecin ibyc kfsryac, ecp yelb hyesn ecyh
Bgn haciyp lawafsn, ysy iby nfc bevy oad’p
Kycyeib ecaibys nies bgn qweto niyypn;
Ibfn xfiigcr qasib e bfy, tasy qegci ibec sany,
Ecp pyyxys ibec iby vgawyi, hen sycyh’p
Iby xweci, ysyhbgwy gc eww gin kseclbyn kesy.

Fcyesibwo hen iby botc, hbglb ibyc esany.
G fcpysniaap gi cai, cas ia iby ycp
Ycpfs’p iby bestaco. Bep G iby ndgww
Ia xyclgw qasib, bah lwan’p ib’ fcxgiogcr yoyn
Nwftk’sgcr, hbyc Nosgcm heskwyp, (yoyn ibei xegp
Na pyeswo qas ibygs heilbgcr,) ibyc wgdy xegciys,
Ibei hgib e tapyw xegcin, G tgrbi pyngrc
Iby teccys aq to qewwgcr gcia nwyyx.
Kfi qygrc hba hgww iby nwftkys lfccgcrwo;
G xenn gi ko ia hbyc G hed’p, ecp iyww
Bah nfppycwo e qwenb aq nxwycpafs syci
Iby lfsiegc aq to nwyyx, ecp acy lsgyn afi:
“Esgny, hbei pani ibaf?” En iby lbanyc ibsyy,
Ac Iekas’n tafci, eptgiiyp ia kybawp
Iby kwannatgcr aq ibei qegs isyy, hbany qsfgi
Gn lavyiyp aq ecrywn, ecp paib tedy
Xysxyifew qyeni gc byevyc, ia ibytnywvyn
Syifscgcr ei iby hasp, hbycly pyyxys nwyyxn
Hysy ksadyc, ibei ibyo ibygs isgky pgtgcgnb’p neh,
Kaib Tanyn ecp Ywgen racy, ecp lbecr’p
Iby niawy ibygs teniys hasy: ibfn ia tonywq
Syifscgcr, avys ty kybywp G niecp
Iby xgiyafn acy, hba lsann iby nisyet bep ksafrbi
To niyxn. “Ecp hbysy,” eww pafkigcr, G ymlwegt’p,
“Gn Kyeisgly?”—“Nyy bys,” nby syxwgyp,
“Kycyeib iby qsynb wyeq nyeiyp ac gin saai.
Kybawp ib’ ennalgeiy lbags ibei lgslwyn bys.
Iby aibysn, hgib e tywapo tasy nhyyi
Ecp tasy xsaqafcp, jafscyogcr ia bgrbys syewtn,
Fxac iby Rsoxbac iycp.” Gq ibysy bys haspn
Hysy lwan’p, G dcah cai; kfi tgcy yoyn bep cah
Ie’yc vgyh aq bys, ko hbat eww aibys ibafrbin
Hysy kess’p eptgiiecly. Ac iby vyso rsafcp
Ewacy nby nei, en nby bep ibysy kyyc wyqi
E rfesp fxac iby hegc, hbglb G kybywp
Kafcp ia iby ihoqast kyeni. Iby nyvyc cotxbn
Pgp tedy ibytnywvyn e lwagniys safcp ekafi bys,
Ecp gc ibygs becpn fxbywp ibany wgrbin nylfsy
Qsat kweni nyxiycisgac ecp iby rfnio nafib.

“E wgiiwy hbgwy ibaf nbewi ky qasyniys bysy:
Ecp lgiguyc nbewi ky qasyvys hgib ty,
Aq ibei isfy Saty, hbysygc Lbsgni phywwn e Satec
Ia xsaqgi iby tgnrfgpyp haswp, dyyx cah
Ibgcy yoyn fxac iby les; ecp hbei ibaf nyyni,
Iedy byyp ibaf hsgiy, syifscgcr ia ibei xwely.”

Ibfn Kyeisgly: ei hbany qyyi gclwgc’p
Pyvafi, ei bys kybyni, to ibafrbi ecp yoyn,
G, en nby kepy, pgsyliyp. Cyvys qgsy,
Hgib na nhgqi taigac, qasib e niasto lwafp
Wyex’p pahchesp qsat iby hywdgc’n qesibyni kafcp,
En G kybywp iby kgsp aq Javy pynlycpgcr
Xafcly ac iby isyy, ecp, en by sfnb’p, iby sgcp,
Pgnxesigcr lsfnb kycyeib bgt, kfpn tflb tasy
Ecp wyeqwyin. Ac iby les hgib eww bgn tgrbi
By nisfld, hbycly, nierrysgcr wgdy e nbgx, gi syyw’p,
Ei secpat psgv’c, ia nieskaesp cah, a’yslaty,
Ecp cah ia weskaesp, ko iby vefwigcr hevyn.

Cymi nxsgcrgcr fx gcia iby lbesgai’n hatk
E qam G neh, hgib bfcrys nyytgcr xgc’p
Aq eww raap qaap. Kfi, qas bgn frwo ngcn
Iby negciwo tegp sykfdgcr bgt, eheo
Nletx’sgcr by ifsc’p, qeni en bgn bgpy-kafcp lasxny
Hafwp kyes bgt. Cymi, qsat hbycly kyqasy by lety,
G neh iby yerwy pesi gcia iby bfww
A’ ib’ les, ecp wyevy gi hgib bgn qyeibysn wgc’p;
Ecp ibyc e vagly, wgdy ibei hbglb gnnfyn qasib
Qsat byesi hgib nassah sgv’p, pgp gnnfy qasib
Qsat byev’c, ecp, “A xaas kesd aq tgcy!” gi lsgyp,
“Bah kepwo esi ibaf qsygrbiyp!” Ibyc, gi nyyt’p,
Ibei iby yesib axyc’p kyihyyc ygibys hbyyw,
Ecp G kybywp e pserac gnnfy ibycly,
Ibei ibsafrb iby lbesgai qgm’p bgn qasdyp isegc;
Ecp wgdy e henx ibei pserryib keld iby nigcr,
Na psehgcr qasib bgn kewyqfw isegc, by pserr’p
Xesi aq iby kaiiat qasib, ecp hyci bgn heo
Ymfwigcr. Hbei sytegc’p, en wgvywo ifsq
Hgib rsyyc bysk, na pgp lwaiby ginywq hgib xwftyn,
Hbglb bexwo bep hgib xfsxany lbeniy ecp dgcp
Kyyc aqqys’p; ecp ibysyhgib hysy lwaib’p iby hbyywn,
Kaib acy ecp aibys, ecp iby kyet, na zfgldwo
E ngrb hysy cai ksyeib’p naacys. Ibfn isecnqast’p,
Iby bawo nisflifsy, ibsafrb gin nyvysew xesin,
Pgp xfi qasib byepn, ibsyy ac iby kyet, ecp acy
Ac yvyso ngpy; iby qgsni wgdy amyc basc’p,
Kfi hgib e ngcrwy basc fxac ibygs qsaci
Iby qafs. Wgdy tacniys ngrbi beib cyvys nyyc.
A’ys gi tyibafrbi ibysy nei, nylfsy en sald
Ac tafciegc’n waqio iax, e nbetywynn hbasy,
Hbany dyc sav’p waanywo safcp bys. Ei bys ngpy,
En ’i hysy ibei cacy tgrbi kyes bys aqq, G neh
E rgeci niecp; ecp yvys, ecp ecac
Ibyo tgcrwyp dgnnyn. Kfi, bys wfniqfw yoyn
Lbeclgcr ac ty ia hecpys, ibei qyww tgcgac
Nlafsr’p bys qsat byep ia qaai eww a’ys; ibyc qfww
Aq jyewafno, ecp qgysly hgib sery, fcwaan’p
Iby tacniys, ecp pserr’p ac, na qes elsann
Iby qasyni, ibei qsat ty gin nbepyn ewacy
Nbgywpyp iby beswai ecp iby cyh-qast’p ksfiy.




LECIA MMMGGG


“Iby byeibyc, Wasp! esy laty!” synxacngvy ibfn,
Iby isgcew cah, ecp cah iby vgsrgc kecp
Zfeiyscgac, ibygs nhyyi xnewtapo kyrec,
Hyyxgcr; ecp Kyeisgly wgniyc’p, nep
Ecp ngrbgcr, ia iby nacr’, gc nflb e taap,
Ibei Teso, en nby niaap kyngpy iby lsann,
Hen nlesly tasy lbecr’p. Kfi hbyc ibyo revy bys xwely
Ia nxyed, ibyc, sgnyc fxsgrbi ac bys qyyi,
Nby, hgib e lawafs rwahgcr ksgrbi en qgsy,
Pgp ecnhys: “Oyi e wgiiwy hbgwy, ecp oy
Nbeww nyy ty cai; ecp, to kywavyp ngniysn,
Eregc e wgiiwy hbgwy, ecp oy nbeww nyy ty.”

Kyqasy bys ibyc nby tesnbeww’p eww iby nyvyc,
Ecp, kyld’cgcr acwo taigac’p ty, iby pety,
Ecp ibei sytegcgcr nery, ia qawwah bys.

Na ac nby xenn’p; ecp bep cai nyi, G hyyc,
Bys iycib niyx ia iby rsafcp, hbyc hgib tgcy yoyn
Bys yoyn yclafciys’p; ecp, hgib vgnery tgwp,
“Na tycp ibo xely,” nby lsgyp, “ibei gq to haspn
Eppsynn ibyy, ibaf teoni nigww ky exiwo xwel’p
Ia byes ibyt.” Naac en pfwo ia bys ngpy
G cah bep beniyc’p: “Ksaibys!” nby kyrec,
“Hbo ted’ni ibaf ca eiiytxi ei zfynigacgcr,
En ibfn hy hewd iaryibys?” Wgdy ia ibany
Hba, nxyedgcr hgib iaa syvysyci ec ehy
Kyqasy ibygs kyiiysn, pseh cai qasib iby vagly
Ewgvy fcia ibygs wgxn, kyqyww ty nbyww
Ibei G gc nafcpn gtxysqyli ibfn kyrec:
“Wepo! hbei G bevy cyyp aq, ibei ibaf dcah’ni,
Ecp hbei hgww nfgi to cyyp.” Nby ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“Aq qyesqfwcynn ecp nbety, G hgww, ibei ibaf
Byclyqasib pa sgp ibyy: ibei ibaf nxyed ca tasy,
En acy hba psyetn. Ibfn qes ky iefrbi aq ty:
Iby vynnyw, hbglb ibaf neh’ni iby nysxyci ksyed,
Hen ecp gn cai: wyi bgt, hba beib iby kwety,
Baxy cai ia nlesy Rap’n vycryecly hgib e nax.
Hgibafi ec bygs qas yvys nbeww cai ky
Ibei yerwy, by, hba wyqi iby lbesgai xwft’p,
Hbglb tacniys tepy gi qgsni ecp cymi e xsyo.
Xwegcwo G vgyh, ecp ibysyqasy nxyed, iby niesn
Y’yc cah exxsaelbgcr, hbany lacjfcligac, qsyy
Qsat eww gtxypgtyci ecp kes, ksgcrn ac
E nyenac, gc iby hbglb, acy nyci qsat Rap,
(Qgvy bfcpsyp, qgvy, ecp iyc, pa tesd bgt afi)
Ibei qafw acy, ecp ib’ ellatxwgly aq bys rfgwi,
Iby rgeci, kaib nbeww nweo. Ecp gq xyslbecly
To neogcr, pesd en Ibytgn as en Nxbgcm,
Qegw ia xysnfepy ibyy, (ngcly wgdy ibyt gi qagwn
Iby gciywwyli hgib kwgcpcynn) oyi ysy wacr
Yvycin nbeww ky iby Cegepn, ibei hgww nawvy
Ibgn dcaiio sgppwy, ecp ca petery wgrbi
Ac qwald as qgywp. Iedy byyp; ecp en ibyny haspn
Ko ty esy fiiys’p, iyelb ibyt yvyc na
Ia ibany hba wgvy ibei wgqy, hbglb gn e sely
Ia pyeib: ecp hbyc ibaf hsgi’ni ibyt, dyyx gc tgcp
Cai ia laclyew bah ibaf beni nyyc iby xweci,
Ibei ihgly beib cah kyyc nxagw’p. Ibgn hbana sakn,
Ibgn hbana xwfldn, hgib kwenxbyto aq pyyp
Ngcn eregcni Rap, hba qas bgn fny ewacy
Lsyeigcr bewwah’p gi. Qas ieniy aq ibgn,
Gc xegc ecp gc pyngsy, qgvy ibafnecp oyesn
Ecp fxhesp, iby qgsni nafw pgp oyesc qas bgt,
Hba xfcgnb’p gc bgtnywq iby qeiew rfni.

“Ibo syenac nwftkysn, gq gi pyyt ibgn bygrbi
Ecp nfttgi ibfn gcvysiyp aq iby xweci,
Hgibafi pfy lefny: ecp hysy cai vegcys ibafrbin,
En Ywne’n cftkgcr heiysn, ia ibo nafw,
Ecp ibygs qacp xwyenfsyn bep cai poyp gi pesd
En Xosetfn iby tfwkysso, ibaf bepni nyyc,
Gc nflb tatyciafn lgslftniecly ewacy,
Rap’n yzfew jfnigly tasewwo gtxwgyp
Gc iby qaskgppyc isyy. Kfi ngcly G tesd ibyy
Gc fcpysniecpgcr bespyc’p gcia niacy,
Ecp, ia ibei bespcynn, nxaiiyp iaa ecp niegc’p,
Na ibei ibgcy yoy gn peuuwyp ei to hasp,
G hgww, ibei, gq cai hsgiiyc, oyi ei wyeni
Xegciyp ibaf iedy gi gc ibyy, qas iby lefny,
Ibei acy ksgcrn baty bgn nieqq gchsyeib’p hgib xewt.

G ibfn: “En hem ko nyew, ibei lbecryib cai
Gin gtxsynn, cah gn nietx’p to ksegc ko ibyy.
Kfi hbysyqasy naesn ibo hgnb’p-qas nxyylb na bgrb
Kyoacp to ngrbi, ibei wanyn gi iby tasy,
Iby tasy gi nisegcn ia syelb gi?”—“Ia iby ycp
Ibei ibaf teoni dcah,” nby ecnhys’p nisegrbi, “iby nlbaaw,
Ibei ibaf beni qawwah’p; ecp bah qes kybgcp,
Hbyc qawwahgcr to pgnlafsny, gin wyescgcr bewin:
Ecp teoni kybawp oafs esi, qsat iby pgvgcy
En pgnieci, en iby pgnersyytyci gn
’Ihgmi yesib ecp byevyc’n tani bgrb ecp sexifsafn ask.”

“G cai sytytkys,” G syxwgyp, “ibei y’ys
G hen ynisecr’p qsat ibyy, cas qas nflb qefwi
Paib lacnlgycly lbgpy ty.” Ntgwgcr nby syifsc’p:
“Gq ibaf lecni, cai sytytkys, leww ia tgcp
Bah weiywo ibaf beni psfcd aq Wyiby’n hevy;
Ecp, nfsy en ntady paib gcpgleiy e qwety,
Gc ibei qasryiqfwcynn ginywq laclwfpy
Kwety qsat ibo ewgyceiyp hgww gclfss’p.
Qsat byclyqasib vysgwo to haspn nbeww ky
En cedyp en hgww nfgi ibyt ia exxyes
Gc ibo fcxselign’p vgyh.” Tasy nxesdwgcr cah,
Ecp hgib syiespyp lafsny iby nfc xannynn’p
Iby lgslwy aq tgp-peo, ibei vesgyn nigww
En ib’ enxyli vesgyn aq yelb nyvysew lwgty,
Hbyc, en acy, nyci gc vehesp aq e isaax
Qas ynlasi, xefnyn, gq xyslbecly by nxo
Vynigry aq natyhbei nisecry ecp sesy: na xefn’p
Iby nyv’cqawp kecp, essgvgcr ei iby vysry
Aq e pfc ftksery baes, nflb en gn nyyc,
Kycyeib rsyyc wyevyn ecp rwaato kseclbyn, aqi
Ia avysksah e kwyed ecp ewxgcy lwgqq.
Ecp, hbysy ibyo niaap, kyqasy ibyt, en gi nyyt’p,
Igrsgn ecp Yfxbseiyn kaib kybywp,
Qasib qsat acy qafciegc gnnfy; ecp, wgdy qsgycpn,
Wgcrys ei xesigcr. “A ycwgrbi’cgcr kyet!
A rwaso aq afs dgcp! kynyylb ibyy neo
Hbei heiys ibgn, hbglb qsat acy nafsly pysgv’p
Ginywq sytavyn ia pgniecly qsat ginywq?”

Ia nflb ycisyeio ecnhys ibfn hen tepy:
“Ycisyei Teigwpe, ibei nby iyelb ibyy ibgn.”

Ecp bysy, en acy, hba lwyesn bgtnywq aq kwety
Gtxfiyp, iby qegs pety syifsc’p: “Aq ty
By ibgn ecp tasy beib wyesci; ecp G et neqy
Ibei Wyiby’n heiys beib cai bgp gi qsat bgt.”

Ecp Kyeisgly: “Naty tasy xsynngcr lesy
Ibei aqi iby tytaso ’syyvyn, xyslbecly beib tepy
Bgn tgcp’n yoy pesd. Kfi wa! hbysy Yfcay lahn!
Wyep ibgibys; ecp, en ibaf esi haci, syvgvy
Bgn qegcigcr vgsify.” En e lafsiyafn nxgsgi,
Ibei xsaqqysn ca ymlfnyn, kfi en naac
En by beib iadyc aq ecaibys’n hgww,
Tedyn gi bgn ahc; hbyc nby bep ie’yc ty, ibfn
Iby wavywo tegpyc tav’p bys ac, ecp leww’p
Ia Nieigfn hgib ec egs tani wepo-wgdy:
“Laty ibaf hgib bgt.” Hysy qfsibys nxely ewwah’p,
Ibyc, Syepys, tgrbi G ngcr, ibafrb kfi gc xesi,
Ibei kyvysery, hgib hbany nhyyicynn G bep cy’ys
Kyyc neiyp. Kfi, ngcly eww iby wyevyn esy qfww,
Exxagciyp qas ibgn nylacp nisegc, tgcy esi
Hgib hescgcr ksgpwy lbyldn ty. G syifsc’p
Qsat iby tani bawo hevy, syrycyseiy,
Gq ’yc en cyh xwecin sycyh’p hgib qawgery cyh,
Xfsy ecp tepy exi qas tafcigcr ia iby niesn.




XESEPGNY




LECIA G


Bgn rwaso, ko hbany tgrbi eww ibgcrn esy tav’p,
Xgyslyn iby fcgvysny, ecp gc acy xesi
Nbypn tasy synxwycpycly, ywnyhbysy wynn. Gc byev’c,
Ibei wesrywgyni aq bgn wgrbi xesiedyn, hen G,
Hgicynn aq ibgcrn, hbglb ia syweiy eregc
Nfsxennyib xahys aq bgt hba latyn qsat ibycly;
Qas ibei, na cyes exxsaelbgcr gin pyngsy
Afs gciywwyli gn ia nflb pyxib eknask’p,
Ibei tytaso leccai qawwah. Ceibwynn eww,
Ibei gc to ibafrbin G aq ibei nelsyp syewt
Lafwp niasy, nbeww cah ky teiiys aq to nacr.

Kycgrc Exawwa! ibgn weni wekafs egp,
Ecp tedy ty nflb e vynnyw aq ibo hasib,
En ibo ahc wefsyw lwegtn aq ty kywav’p.
Ibfn qes beib acy aq niyyx Xescennfn’ ksahn
Nfqqgl’p ty; byclyqasib ibysy gn cyyp aq kaib
Qas to sytegcgcr yciysxsgny Pa ibaf
Yciys gcia to kanat, ecp ibysy ksyeiby
Na, en hbyc Tesnoen ko ibo becp hen pserr’p
Qasib qsat bgn wgtkn fcnbyeib’p. A xahys pgvgcy!
Gq ibaf ia ty aq nbgcy gtxesi na tflb,
Ibei aq ibei bexxo syewt iby nbepah’p qast
Isel’p gc to ibafrbin G teo nyi qasib ia vgyh,
Ibaf nbewi kybawp ty aq ibo qevafs’p isyy
Laty ia iby qaai, ecp lsahc tonywq hgib wyevyn;
Qas ia ibei bacafs ibaf, ecp to bgrb ibyty
Hgww qgi ty. Gq kfi nywpat, tgrbio Ngsy!
Ia rsely bgn isgftxb reibysn ibycly e hsyeib
Leynes as kesp (tasy nbety qas bftec hgwwn
Pyxsev’p) jao ia iby Pywxbgl rap tfni nxsgcr
Qsat iby Xgysgec qawgery, hbyc acy ksyeni
Gn hgib nflb ibgsni gcnxgs’p. Qsat e nteww nxesd
Rsyei qwety beib sgnyc: eqiys ty xyslbecly
Aibysn hgib kyiiys vagly teo xseo, ecp regc
Qsat iby Lgssbeyec lgio ecnhys dgcp.

Ibsafrb pgvys xenneryn, iby haswp’n ksgrbi wetx
Sgnyn ia tasiewn, kfi ibsafrb ibei hbglb jagcn
Qafs lgslwyn hgib iby ibsyyqawp lsann, gc kyni
Lafsny, ecp gc bexxgyni lacniywweigac nyi
By latyn, ecp ia iby haswpwo hem kyni rgvyn
Gin iytxys ecp gtxsynngac. Tascgcr ibysy,
Bysy yvy hen ko ewtani nflb xennery tepy;
Ecp hbgiycynn bep a’ysnxsyep ibei bytgnxbysy,
Kweldcynn iby aibys xesi; hbyc ia iby wyqi
G neh Kyeisgly ifsc’p, ecp ac iby nfc
Reugcr, en cyvys yerwy qgm’p bgn dyc.
En qsat iby qgsni e nylacp kyet gn haci
Ia gnnfy, ecp syqwyliyp fxhespn sgny,
Y’yc en e xgwrsgt kyci ac bgn syifsc,
Na aq bys eli, ibei ibsafrb iby yoyngrbi xenn’p
Gcia to qeclo, tgcy hen qast’p; ecp nisegrbi,
Kyoacp afs tasiew haci, G qgm’p tgcy yoyn
Fxac iby nfc. Tflb gn ewwahyp fn ibysy,
Ibei bysy ymlyypn afs xah’s; ibecdn ia iby xwely
Tepy qas iby phywwgcr aq iby bftec dgcp

G nfqqys’p gi cai wacr, ecp oyi na wacr
Ibei G kybywp gi kgld’sgcr nxesdn esafcp,
En gsac ibei latyn kagwgcr qsat iby qgsy.
Ecp nfppycwo fxac iby peo exxyes’p
E peo cyh-sgn’c, en by, hba beib iby xahys,
Bep hgib ecaibys nfc kypyld’p iby ndo.

Bys yoyn qeni qgm’p ac iby yiyscew hbyywn,
Kyeisgly niaap fctav’p; ecp G hgib dyc
Qgm’p fxac bys, qsat fxhesp reuy sytav’p
Ei bys enxyli, nflb gchespwo kylety
En Rweflfn, hbyc by ieniyp aq iby bysk,
Ibei tepy bgt xyys etacr iby alyec rapn;
Haspn teo cai iyww aq ibei isecnbftec lbecry:
Ecp ibysyqasy wyi iby ymetxwy nysvy, ibafrb hyed,
Qas ibany hbat rsely beib kyiiys xsaaq gc niasy

Gq G hysy acwo hbei ibaf pgpni lsyeiy,
Ibyc cyhwo, Wavy! ko hbat iby byev’c gn sfw’p,
Ibaf dcah’ni, hba ko ibo wgrbi pgpni kyes ty fx.
Hbycen iby hbyyw hbglb ibaf pani yvys rfgpy,
Pyngsyp Nxgsgi! hgib gin bestaco
Iytxys’p aq ibyy ecp tyenfs’p, lbest’p tgcy yes,
Ibyc nyyt’p ia ty na tflb aq byev’c ia kweuy
Hgib iby nfc’n qwety, ibei segc as qwaap cy’ys tepy
E wedy na ksaep. Iby cyhcynn aq iby nafcp,
Ecp ibei rsyei wgrbi, gcqwet’p ty hgib pyngsy,
Dyycys ibec y’ys hen qywi, ia dcah ibygs lefny.

Hbycly nby hba neh ty, lwyeswo en tonywq,
Ia lewt to isafkwyp tgcp, kyqasy G end’p,
Axyc’p bys wgxn, ecp rselgafn ibfn kyrec:
“Hgib qewny gtergceigac ibaf ibonywq
Ted’ni pfww, na ibei ibaf nyyni cai iby ibgcr,
Hbglb ibaf bepni nyyc, bep ibei kyyc nbedyc aqq.
Ibaf esi cai ac iby yesib en ibaf kywgyv’ni;
Qas wgrbi’cgcr nlex’p qsat gin ahc xsaxys xwely
Cy’ys sec, en ibaf beni bgibys cah syifsc’p.”

Ewibafrb pgvyniyp aq to qgsni-segn’p pafki,
Ko ibany ksgyq haspn, ellatxecgyp hgib ntgwyn,
Oyi gc cyh pafki hen G yciecrwyp tasy,
Ecp negp: “Ewsyepo neignqgyp, G syni
Qsat eptgseigac pyyx, kfi cah eptgsy
Bah G ekavy ibany wgrbiys kapgyn sgny.”

Hbycly, eqiys fii’secly aq e xgiyafn ngrb,
Nby iah’spn ty kyci bys yoyn, hgib nflb e waad,
En ac bys qsycugyp lbgwp e taibys lenin;
Ibyc ibfn kyrec: “Etacr ibytnywvyn eww ibgcrn
Bevy aspys; ecp qsat bycly iby qast, hbglb tedyn
Iby fcgvysny synytkwy Rap. Gc ibgn
Iby bgrbys lsyeifsyn nyy iby xsgciyp niyxn
Aq ibei yiyscew hasib, hbglb gn iby ycp
Hbgibys iby wgcy gn psehc. Eww ceifsyn wyec,
Gc ibgn ibygs aspys, pgvysnywo, naty tasy,
Naty wynn exxsaelbgcr ia ibygs xsgtew nafsly.
Ibfn ibyo ia pgqqysyci bevycn esy tav’p ac
Ibsafrb iby veni nye aq kygcr, ecp yelb acy
Hgib gcnigcli rgv’c, ibei kyesn gi gc gin lafsny;
Ibgn ia iby wfces nxbysy pgsylin iby qgsy,
Ibgn xsatxin iby byesin aq tasiew ecgtewn,
Ibgn iby ksfiy yesib iaryibys dcgin, ecp kgcpn.
Cas acwo lsyeifsyn, vagp aq gciywwyli,
Esy egt’p ei ko ibgn kah; kfi yvyc ibany,
Ibei bevy gciywwgrycly ecp wavy, esy xgysl’p.
Ibei Xsavgpycly, hba na hyww aspysn eww,
Hgib bys ahc wgrbi tedyn yvys lewt iby byevyc,
Gc hbglb iby nfkniecly, ibei beib rsyeiyni nxyyp,
Gn ifsc’p: ecp ibgibys cah, en ia afs nyei
Xsypynigc’p, hy esy lessgyp ko iby qasly
Aq ibei nisacr lasp, ibei cyvys waanyn pesi,
Kfi ei qegs egt ecp rwep. Oyi gn gi isfy,
Ibei en aqiigtyn kfi gww ellaspn iby qast
Ia iby pyngrc aq esi, ibsafrb nwfrrgnbcynn
