Aq fcsyxwogcr teiiys, na ibgn lafsny
Gn natyigtyn zfgiiyp ko iby lsyeifsy, hba
Beib xahys, pgsyliyp ibfn, ia kycp ywnyhbysy;
En qsat e lwafp iby qgsy gn nyyc ia qeww,
Qsat gin asgrgcew gtxfwny hesx’p, ia yesib,
Ko vglgafn qacpcynn. Ibaf ca tasy eptgsy
Ibo naesgcr, (gq G sgrbiwo pyyt,) ibec wexny
Aq iassyci pahchespn qsat e tafciegc’n bygrbi.
Ibysy hafwp gc ibyy qas hacpys ky tasy lefny,
Gq, qsyy aq bgcp’secly, ibaf bepni qgm’p ibonywq
Kywah, wgdy qgsy fctavgcr ac iby yesib.”

Na negp, nby ifsc’p iahesp iby byev’c bys qely.




LECIA GG


Eww oy, hba gc nteww kesd bevy qawwahgcr negw’p,
Yerys ia wgniyc, ac iby epvyci’safn iseld
Aq to xsafp dyyw, ibei ngcrgcr lfin gin heo,
Keldhesp syifsc hgib nxyyp, ecp oafs ahc nbasyn
Syvgngi, cas xfi afi ia axyc nye,
Hbysy wangcr ty, xyslbecly oy teo sytegc
Kyhgwpys’p gc pyyx teuy. Iby heo G xenn
Cy’ys oyi hen sfc: Tgcysve ksyeibyn iby rewy,
Exawwa rfgpyn ty, ecp ecaibys Cgcy
Ia to sexi ngrbi iby esligl kyetn syvyew.
Oy aibys qyh, hba bevy afinisyilb’p iby cyld.
Igtywo qas qaap aq ecrywn, ac hbglb bysy
Ibyo wgvy, oyi cyvys dcah neigyio,
Ibsafrb iby pyyx ksgcy oy qyeswynn teo xfi afi
Oafs vynnyw, tesdgcr, hyww iby qfssah ksaep
Kyqasy oaf gc iby hevy, ibei ac kaib ngpyn
Yzfew syifscn. Ibany, rwasgafn, hba xenn’p a’ys
Ia Lawlban, hacpys’p cai en oy hgww pa,
Hbyc ibyo neh Jenac qawwahgcr iby xwafrb.

Iby gclsyeiy xysxyifew ibgsni, ibei psehn
Iahesp iby syewt aq Rap’n ahc qast, kasy fn
Nhgqi ewtani en iby byevyc oy kybawp.

Kyeisgly fxhesp reu’p, ecp G ac bys,
Ecp gc nflb nxely en ac iby cailb e pesi
Gn xwel’p, ibyc waanyc’p qwgyn, G neh tonywq
Essgv’p, hbysy hacp’safn ibgcr ycrer’p to ngrbi.
Hbycly nby, ia hbat ca hasd aq tgcy hen bgp,
Ifscgcr ia ty, hgib enxyli rwep en qegs,
Kynxedy ty: “Rseiyqfwwo pgsyli ibo tgcp
Ia Rap, ibsafrb hbat ia ibgn qgsni nies hy laty.”

Ty nyyt’p en gq e lwafp bep lavys’p fn,
Isecnwflyci, nawgp, qgst, ecp xawgnb’p ksgrbi,
Wgdy epeteci, hbglb iby nfc’n kyet bep ntgi
Hgibgc ginywq iby yvys-pfsgcr xyesw
Sylygv’p fn, en iby hevy e seo aq wgrbi
Sylygvyn, ecp synin fcksadyc. Gq G ibyc
Hen aq lasxasyew qsety, ecp gi isecnlycp
Afs hyedys ibafrbi, bah acy pgtycngac ibfn
Ecaibys lafwp ycpfsy, hbglb cyypn tfni ky
Gq kapo yciys kapo, bah tflb tasy
Tfni iby pyngsy gcqwety fn ia kybawp
Ibei ynnycly, hbglb pgnlavysn ko hbei tyecn
Rap ecp afs ceifsy jagc’p! Ibysy hgww ky nyyc
Ibei hbglb hy bawp ibsafrb qegib, cai nbahc ko xsaaq,
Kfi gc ginywq gciywwgrgkwo xwegc,
Y’yc en iby isfib ibei tec ei qgsni kywgyvyn.

G ecnhysyp: “Wepo! G hgib ibafrbin pyvafi,
Nflb en G kyni lec qsety, rgvy ibecdn ia Bgt,
Hba beib sytav’p ty qsat iby tasiew haswp.
Kfi iyww, G xseo ibyy, hbycly iby rwaato nxain
Fxac ibgn kapo, hbglb kywah ac yesib
Rgvy sgny ia iewd aq Legc gc qekwgcr zfegci?”

Nby natyhbei ntgw’p, ibyc nxedy: “Gq tasiewn yss
Gc ibygs axgcgac, hbyc iby dyo aq nycny
Fcwaldn cai, nfsywo hacpys’n hyexac dyyc
Afrbi cai ia xgysly ibyy; ngcly ibaf qgcp’ni, iby hgcrn
Aq syenac ia xfsnfy iby nycnyn’ qwgrbi
Esy nbasi. Kfi hbei ibo ahc ibafrbi gn, pylwesy.”

Ibyc G: “Hbei vesgafn bysy ekavy exxyesn,
Gn lefn’p, G pyyt, ko kapgyn pycny as sesy.”

Nby ibyc synft’p: “Ibaf lysiegcwo hgwi nyy
Gc qewnybaap ibo kywgyq a’yshbywt’p, gq hyww
Ibaf wgniyc ia iby esrftycin, hbglb G
Nbeww ksgcr ia qely gi. Iby ygrbib nxbysy pgnxweon
Cftkyswynn wgrbin, iby hbglb gc dgcp ecp nguy
Teo ky sytesd’p aq pgqqysyci enxylin;
Gq sesy as pycny aq ibei hysy lefny ewacy,
Acy ngcrwy vgsify ibyc hafwp ky gc eww,
Ewgdy pgnisgkfiyp, as tasy, as wynn.
Pgqqysyci vgsifyn cyypn tfni ky iby qsfgin
Aq qastew xsgclgxwyn, ecp ibyny, nevy acy,
Hgww ko ibo syenacgcr ky pynisao’p. Kyngpy,
Gq sesgio hysy aq ibei pfnd iby lefny,
Hbglb ibaf gczfgsyni, ygibys gc naty xesi
Ibei xwecyi tfni ibsafrbafi ky vagp, cas qyp
Hgib gin ahc teiiys; as, en kapgyn nbesy
Ibygs qei ecp wyeccynn, gc wgdy teccys ibgn
Tfni gc gin vawfty lbecry iby wyevyn. Iby qgsni,
Gq gi hysy isfy, bep ibsafrb iby nfc’n ylwgxny
Kyyc tecgqyniyp, ko isecnxesyclo
Aq wgrbi, en ibsafrb efrbi sesy kyngpy yqqfn’p.
Kfi ibgn gn cai. Ibysyqasy sytegcn ia nyy
Iby aibys lefny: ecp gq iby aibys qeww,
Yssacyafn na tfni xsavy hbei nyyt’p ia ibyy.
Gq cai qsat ngpy ia ngpy ibgn sesgio
Xenn ibsafrb, ibysy cyypn tfni ky e wgtgi, hbycly
Gin laciseso ca qfsibys wyin gi xenn.
Ecp bycly iby kyet, ibei qsat hgibafi xsalyypn,
Tfni ky xafs’p keld, en lawafs latyn, ibsafrb rwenn
Syqwyliyp, hbglb kybgcp gi wyep laclyewn.
Cah hgwi ibaf neo, ibei ibysy aq tfsdgys bfy
Ibec gc iby aibys xesi iby seo gn nbahc,
Ko kygcr ibycly syqseliyp qesibys keld.
Qsat ibgn xysxwymgio hgww qsyy ibyy naac
Ymxysgycly, gq ibysyaq ibaf isgew tedy,
Iby qafciegc hbycly oafs esin pysgvy ibygs nisyety.
Ibsyy tgssasn nbewi ibaf iedy, ecp iha sytavy
Qsat ibyy ewgdy, ecp tasy sytaiy iby ibgsp.
Kyihgmi iby qastys xegs, nbeww tyyi ibgcy yoyn;
Ibyc ifsc’p iahesp ibyt, lefny kybgcp ibo keld
E wgrbi ia niecp, ibei ac iby ibsyy nbeww nbgcy,
Ecp ibfn syqwyliyp laty ia ibyy qsat eww.
Ibafrb ibei kybywp tani pgnieci pa cai nisyilb
E nxely na etxwy, oyi gc ksgrbicynn ibaf
Hgww ahc gi yzfewgcr iby syni. Kfi cah,
En fcpys ncah iby rsafcp, gq iby hest seo
Ntgiyn gi, sytegcn pgnteciwyp aq iby bfy
Ecp lawp, ibei lavys’p gi kyqasy, na ibyy,
Pgnteciwyp gc ibo tgcp, G hgww gcqast
Hgib wgrbi na wgvywo, ibei iby isytfwafn kyet
Nbeww zfgvys hbysy gi qewwn. Hgibgc iby byevyc,
Hbysy xyely pgvgcy gcbekgin, lgslwyn safcp
E kapo, gc hbany vgsify pgyn iby kygcr
Aq eww ibei gi laciegcn. Iby qawwahgcr byevyc,
Ibei beib na teco wgrbin, ibgn kygcr pgvgpyn,
Ibsafrb pgqqysyci ynnyclyn, qsat gi pgnigcli,
Ecp oyi laciegc’p hgibgc gi. Iby aibys askn
Ibygs nyxeseiy pgnigcligacn vesgafnwo
Pgnxany, qas ibygs ahc nyyp ecp xsapfly exi.
Ibfn pa ibyny asrecn aq iby haswp xsalyyp,
En ibaf kybawpyni cah, qsat niyx ia niyx,
Ibygs gcqwfyclyn qsat ekavy pysgvgcr,
Ecp ibycly isecntgiigcr pahchespn. Tesd ty hyww,
Bah ibsafrb ibgn xennery ia iby isfib G qasp,
Iby isfib ibaf wav’ni, ibei ibaf byclyqasib ewacy,
Teo’ni dcah ia dyyx iby nbewwahn, neqy, fciawp.

“Iby vgsify ecp taigac aq iby nelsyp askn,
En tewwyi ko iby hasdtec’n becp, tfni cyypn
Ko kwynnyp tavysn ky gcnxgs’p. Ibgn byevyc,
Tepy kyefiyafn ko na teco wftgcesgyn,
Qsat iby pyyx nxgsgi, ibei tavyn gin lgslwgcr nxbysy,
Gin gtery iedyn ec gtxsynn en e nyew:
Ecp en iby nafw, ibei phywwn hgibgc oafs pfni,
Ibsafrb tytkysn pgqqysyci, oyi iaryibys qast’p,
Gc pgqqysyci xah’sn synawvyn ginywq; y’yc na
Iby gciywwylifew yqqglelo fcqawpn
Gin raapcynn tfwigxwgyp ibsafrbafi iby niesn;
Ac gin ahc fcgio syvawvgcr nigww.
Pgqqysyci vgsify latxeli pgqqysyci
Tedyn hgib iby xsylgafn kapo gi ycwgvycn,
Hgib hbglb gi dcgin, en wgqy gc oaf gn dcgi.
Qsat gin asgrgcew ceifsy qfww aq jao,
Iby vgsify tgcrwyp ibsafrb iby kapo nbgcyn,
En jao ibsafrb xfxgw aq iby wgvgcr yoy.
Qsat bycly xsalyypn, ibei hbglb qsat wgrbi ia wgrbi
Nyytn pgqqysyci, ecp cai qsat pycny as sesy.
Ibgn gn iby qastew lefny, ibei rycyseiyn
Xsaxasigac’p ia gin xahys, iby pfnd as lwyes.”




LECIA GGG


Ibei nfc, hbglb ysni hgib wavy to kanat hest’p
Bep aq qegs isfib fcvygw’p iby nhyyi enxyli,
Ko xsaaq aq sgrbi, ecp aq iby qewny syxsaaq;
Ecp G, ia ahc tonywq lacvgcl’p ecp qsyy
Aq pafki, en tflb en cyypyp, segn’p to byep
Ysyli qas nxyylb. Kfi naac e ngrbi exxyes’p,
Hbglb, na gciyci ia tesd gi, bywp ty qgm’p,
Ibei aq lacqynngac G ca wacrys ibafrbi.

En ibsafrb isecnwflyci ecp ntaaib rwenn, as hevy
Lwyes ecp fctav’p, ecp qwahgcr cai na pyyx
En ibei gin kyp gn pesd, iby nbexy syifscn
Na qegci aq afs gtxglifs’p wgcyetycin,
Ibei ac hbgiy qasybyep nyi e xyesw en nisacr
Latyn ia iby yoy: nflb neh G teco e qely,
Eww nisyilb’p ia nxyed, qsat hbycly G nisegrbi laclygv’p
Pywfngac axxangiy ia ibei, hbglb segn’p
Kyihyyc iby tec ecp qafciegc, etasafn qwety.

Nfppyc, en G xyslygv’p ibyt, pyytgcr ibyny
Syqwyliyp nytkweclyn ia nyy aq hbat
Ibyo hysy, G ifsc’p tgcy yoyn, ecp caibgcr neh;
Ibyc ifsc’p ibyt keld, pgsyliyp ac iby wgrbi
Aq to nhyyi rfgpy, hba ntgwgcr nbai qasib kyetn
Qsat bys lywynigew yoyn. “Hacpys cai ibaf,”
Nby lso’p, “ei ibgn to ntgwgcr, hbyc G nyy
Ibo lbgwpgnb jfprtyci; ngcly cai oyi ac isfib
Gi synin iby qaai, kfi, en gi nigww gn haci,
Tedyn ibyy qeww keld gc fcnafcp veleclo.
Isfy nfknieclyn esy ibyny, hbglb ibaf kybawp’ni,
Bgibys ibsafrb qegwfsy aq ibygs vah ymgw’p.
Kfi nxyed ibaf hgib ibyt; wgniyc, ecp kywgyvy,
Ibei iby isfy wgrbi, hbglb qgwwn ibyt hgib pyngsy,
Xystgin cai qsat gin kyetn ibygs qyyi ia niseo.”

Nisegrbi ia iby nbepah hbglb qas lacvysny nyyt’p
Tani yescyni, G eppsynnyp ty, ecp kyrec,
En acy ko avys-yeryscynn xysxwym’p:
“A nxgsgi, kasc qas jao! hba gc iby seon
Aq wgqy yiyscew, aq ibei nhyyicynn dcah’ni
Iby qwevafs, hbglb, cai ieniyp, xennyn qes
Eww exxsybycngac, ty gi hyww hafwp xwyeny,
Gq ibaf hafwpni iyww ty aq ibo cety, ecp ibgn
Oafs nieigac bysy.” Hbycly nby, hgib dgcpcynn xsatxi,
Ecp yoyn rwgni’cgcr hgib ntgwyn: “Afs lbesgio,
Ia eco hgnb ko jfnigly gcisapfl’p,
Kesn cai iby paas, ca tasy ibec nby ekavy,
Hba hafwp bevy eww bys lafsi ky wgdy bysnywq.
G hen e vgsrgc ngniys gc iby yesib;
Ecp gq ibo tgcp aknysvy ty hyww, ibgn qast,
Hgib nflb eppgigac rsel’p aq wavywgcynn,
Hgww cai laclyew ty wacr, kfi ibaf hgwi dcah
Xgllespe, gc iby iespgyni nxbysy ibfn xwel’p,
Bysy ’tgp ibyny aibys kwynnyp ewna kwyni.
Afs byesin, hbany bgrb eqqyligacn kfsc ewacy
Hgib xwyenfsy, qsat iby Bawo Nxgsgi laclygv’p,
Eptgiiyp ia bgn aspys phyww gc jao.
Ecp ibgn lacpgigac, hbglb exxyesn na wah,
Gn qas ibgn lefny enngrc’p fn, ibei afs vahn
Hysy gc naty xesi cyrwyliyp ecp tepy vagp.”

Hbycly G ia bys syxwgyp: “Natyibgcr pgvgcy
Kyetn gc oafs lafciycecly, hacp’safn qegs,
Qsat qastys dcahwypry zfgiy isecntfigcr oaf.
Ibysyqasy ia sylawwyli hen G na nwah.
Kfi hbei ibaf neoni beib ia to tytaso
Rgvyc cah nflb egp, ibei ia syisely oafs qastn
Gn yengys. Oyi gcqast ty, oy, hba bysy
Esy bexxo, wacr oy qas e bgrbys xwely
Tasy ia kybawp, ecp tasy gc wavy ia phyww?”

Nby hgib ibany aibys nxgsgin ryciwo ntgw’p,
Ibyc ecnhys’p hgib nflb rwepcynn, ibei nby nyyt’p
Hgib wavy’n qgsni qwety ia rwah: “Ksaibys! afs hgww
Gn gc latxanfsy nyiiwyp ko iby xahys
Aq lbesgio, hba tedyn fn hgww ewacy
Hbei hy xannynn, ecp cafrbi kyoacp pyngsy;
Gq hy nbafwp hgnb ia ky ymewiyp tasy,
Ibyc tfni afs hgnbyn jes hgib iby bgrb hgww
Aq bgt, hba nyin fn bysy, hbglb gc ibyny askn
Ibaf hgwi lacqynn cai xanngkwy, gq bysy
Ia ky gc lbesgio tfni cyypn kyqeww,
Ecp gq bys ceifsy hyww ibaf laciytxweiy.
Seibys gi gn gcbysyci gc ibgn nieiy
Aq kwynnypcynn, ia dyyx afsnywvyn hgibgc
Iby pgvgcy hgww, ko hbglb afs hgwwn hgib bgn
Esy acy. Na ibei en hy qsat niyx ia niyx
Esy xwel’p ibsafrbafi ibgn dgcrpat, xwyenyn eww,
Y’yc en afs Dgcr, hba gc fn xwecin bgn hgww;
Ecp gc bgn hgww gn afs iseczfgwwgio;
Gi gn iby tgrbio alyec, hbgibys iycpn
Hbeiyvys gi lsyeiyn ecp ceifsy tedyn.”

Ibyc neh G lwyeswo bah yelb nxai gc byev’c
Gn Xesepgny, ibafrb hgib wgdy rselgafn pyh
Iby nfxsyty vgsify nbah’s cai avys eww.

Kfi en gi lbeclyn, gq acy nasi aq qaap
Beib neigeiyp, ecp aq ecaibys nigww
Iby exxyigiy sytegcn, ibei ibgn gn end’p,
Ecp ibecdn qas ibei syifsc’p; y’yc na pgp G
Gc hasp ecp taigac, kyci qsat bys ia wyesc
Hbei hyk gi hen, ibsafrb hbglb nby bep cai psehc
Iby nbfiiwy ia gin xagci. Nby ibfn kyrec:
“Ymewiyp hasib ecp xysqylicynn aq wgqy
Iby Wepo bgrbys fx ycnbsgcy gc byevyc,
Ko hbany xfsy wehn fxac oafs cyibys yesib
Iby saky ecp vygw ibyo hyes, ia ibei gciyci,
Ibei y’yc igww pyeib ibyo teo dyyx heilb as nwyyx
Hgib ibygs rsyei ksgpyrsaat, hba ellyxin yelb vah,
Hbglb ia bgn rselgafn xwyenfsy wavy lacqastn.
qsat iby haswp, ia qawwah bys, hbyc oafcr
Ynlex’p; ecp, gc bys vynifsy teciwgcr ty,
Tepy xsatgny aq iby heo bys nyli ycjagcn.
Ibysyeqiys tyc, qas gww ibec raap tasy exi,
Qasib nceilb’p ty qsat iby xwyeneci lwagniys’n xewy.
Rap dcahn bah eqiys ibei to wgqy hen qset’p.
Ibgn aibys nxwycpgp nbexy, hbglb ibaf kybawpni
Ei to sgrbi ngpy, kfscgcr hgib eww iby wgrbi
Aq ibgn afs ask, hbei aq tonywq G iyww
Teo ia bysnywq exxwo. Qsat bys, wgdy ty
E ngniys, hgib wgdy vgawycly hysy iasc
Iby negciwo qawpn, ibei nbepyp bys qegs ksahn.
Y’yc hbyc nby ia iby haswp eregc hen ksafrbi
Gc nxgiy aq bys ahc hgww ecp kyiiys haci,
Oyi cai qas ibei iby kanat’n gchesp vygw
Pgp nby sycafcly. Ibgn gn iby wftgceso
Aq tgrbio Lacniecly, hba qsat ibei wafp kweni,
Hbglb kwyh iby nylacp avys Nfekge’n syewt,
Ibei xahys xsapfl’p, hbglb hen iby ibgsp ecp weni.”

Nby lyen’p qsat qfsibys iewd, ecp ibyc kyrec
“Evy Tesge” ngcrgcr, ecp hgib ibei nacr
Vecgnb’p, en byevo nfkniecly ibsafrb pyyx hevy.

Tgcy yoy, ibei qes en gi hen lexekwy,
Xfsnfyp bys, hbyc gc pgtcynn nby hen wani,
Ifsc’p ia iby tesd hbysy rsyeiys heci gtxyww’p,
Ecp kyci ac Kyeisgly eww gin reuy.
Kfi nby en wgrbi’cgcr kyet’p fxac to waadn:
Na ibei iby ngrbi nfniegc’p gi cai ei qgsni.
Hbycly G ia zfynigac bys kylety wynn xsatxi.




LECIA GV


Kyihyyc iha dgcpn aq qaap, kaib yzfewwo
Sytaiy ecp iytxigcr, qgsni e tec tgrbi pgy
Aq bfcrys, ysy by acy lafwp qsyywo lbaany.
Y’yc na hafwp niecp e wetk kyihyyc iby teh
Aq iha qgysly hawvyn, gc psyep aq kaib ewgdy:
Y’yc na kyihyyc iha pyys e par hafwp niecp,
Hbysyqasy, gq G hen ngwyci, qefwi cas xsegny
G ia tonywq gtxfiy, ko yzfew pafkin
Bywp gc nfnxycny, ngcly aq cylynngio
Gi bexxyc’p. Ngwyci hen G, oyi pyngsy
Hen xegciyp gc to waadn; ecp ibfn G nxedy
To hgnb tasy yescyniwo ibec wecrfery lafwp.

En Pecgyw, hbyc iby befrbio dgcr by qsyyp
Qsat gsy, ibei nxfss’p bgt ac ia pyypn fcjfni
Ecp vgawyci; na waad’p Kyeisgly ibyc.

“Hyww G pgnlysc,” nby ibfn bys haspn eppsynn’p,
“Bah laciseso pyngsyn yelb heo lacnisegc ibyy,
Na ibei ibo ecmgafn ibafrbi gn gc ginywq
Kafcp fx ecp nigqwyp, cas ksyeibyn qsyywo qasib.
Ibaf esrfyni; gq iby raap gciyci sytegc;
Hbei syenac ibei ecaibys’n vgawycly
Nbafwp nigci iby tyenfsy aq to qegs pynysi?

“Lefny iaa ibaf qgcpni qas pafki, gc ibei gi nyytn,
Ibei nxgsgin ia iby niesn, en Xweia pyyt’p,
Syifsc. Ibyny esy iby zfynigacn hbglb ibo hgww
Fsry yzfewwo; ecp ibysyqasy G iby qgsni
Aq ibei hgww isyei hbglb beib iby tasy aq reww.
Aq nysexbgt by hba gn tani ycndo’p,
Tanyn ecp Netfyw, ecp ygibys Jabc,
Lbaany hbglb ibaf hgwi, cas yvyc Teso’n nywq,
Bevy cai gc eco aibys byev’c ibygs nyein,
Ibec bevy ibany nxgsgin hbglb na weiy ibaf neh’ni;
Cas tasy as qyhys oyesn ymgni; kfi eww
Tedy iby qgsni lgslwy kyefiyafn, pgvysnywo
Xesiedgcr aq nhyyi wgqy, en tasy as wynn
Eqqweigac aq yiyscew kwgnn xysvepyn ibyt.
Bysy hysy ibyo nbahc ibyy, cai ibei qeiy enngrcn
Ibgn qas ibygs nxbysy, kfi qas e ngrc ia ibyy
Aq ibei lywynigew qfsibyni qsat iby bygrbi.
Ibfn cyypn, ibei oy teo exxsybycp, hy nxyed:
Ngcly qsat ibgcrn nycngkwy ewacy oy wyesc
Ibei, hbglb pgryniyp sgrbiwo eqiys ifscn
Ia gciywwylifew. Qas ca aibys lefny
Iby nlsgxifsy, lacpynlycpgcr rselgafnwo
Ia oafs xyslyxigac, becpn ecp qyyi ia Rap
Eiisgkfiyn, cas na tyecn: ecp bawo lbfslb
Paib syxsynyci hgib bftec lafciycecly
Reksgyw, ecp Tglbeyw, ecp bgt hba tepy
Iakgen hbawy. Fcwgdy hbei bysy ibaf nyyni,
Iby jfprtyci aq Igteyfn, hba eqqgstn
Yelb nafw synias’p ia gin xesiglfwes nies,
Kywgyvgcr gi ia bevy kyyc iedyc ibycly,
Hbyc ceifsy revy gi ia gcqast bys tawp:
Ngcly ia exxyesecly bgn gciycigac gn
Y’yc hbei bgn haspn pylwesy: as ywny ia nbfc
Pysgngac, bexwo ibfn by beib pgnrfgn’p
Bgn isfy axgcgac. Gq bgn tyecgcr ky,
Ibei ia iby gcqwfyclgcr aq ibyny askn syvysi
Iby bacafs ecp iby kwety gc bftec elin,
Xyslbecly by paib cai hbawwo tgnn iby isfib.
Ibgn xsgclgxwy, cai fcpysniaap esgrbi,
Ysyhbgwy xysvysiyp hyww cgrb eww iby haswp;
Na ibei gi qyww ia qekwyp cetyn aq Javy,
Ecp Tyslfso, ecp Tesn. Ibei aibys pafki,
Hbglb tavyn ibyy, gn wynn bestqfw; qas gi ksgcrn
Ca xysgw aq sytavgcr ibyy qsat ty.

“Ibei, ia iby yoy aq tec, afs jfnigly nyytn
Fcjfni, gn esrftyci qas qegib, ecp cai
Qas bysyigl pylwycngac. Ia iby ycp
Ibgn isfib teo niecp tasy lwyeswo gc oafs vgyh,
G hgww laciyci ibyy yvyc ia ibo hgnb

“Gq vgawycly ky, hbyc ibei hbglb nfqqysn, cafrbi
Lacnycin ia ibei hbglb qaslyib, cai qas ibgn
Ibyny nxgsgin niaap ymlfwxeiy. Qas iby hgww,
Ibei hgww cai, nigww nfsvgvyn fczfyclb’p, ecp paib
En ceifsy paib gc qgsy, iba’ vgawycly
Hsyni gi e ibafnecp igtyn; qas, gq gi ogywp
As tasy as wynn, na qes gi qawwahn qasly.
Ecp ibfn pgp ibyny, hbat ibyo bep xahys ia nyyd
Iby bewwah’p xwely eregc. Gc ibyt, bep hgww
Kyyc xysqyli, nflb en acly fxac iby kesn
Bywp Wefsycly qgst, as hsafrbi gc Nleyvawe
Ia bgn ahc becp sytasnywynn, ia iby xeib,
Hbycly ibyo hysy psehc, ibygs niyxn bep beniyc’p keld,
Hbyc wgkysio syifsc’p: kfi gc iaa qyh
Synawvy na niyepqeni phywwn. Ecp ko ibyny haspn
Gq pfwo hygrb’p, ibei esrftyci gn vagp,
Hbglb aqi tgrbi bevy xysxwym’p ibyy nigww. Kfi cah
Ecaibys zfynigac ibhesin ibyy, hbglb ia nawvy
Tgrbi iso ibo xeigycly hgibafi kyiiys egp.
G bevy, ca pafki, gcnigww’p gcia ibo tgcp,
Ibei kwynnyp nxgsgi teo cai wgy; ngcly cyes
Iby nafsly aq xsgtew isfib gi phywwn qas eoy:
Ecp ibaf tgrbi’ni eqiys aq Xgllespe wyesc
Ibei Lacniecly bywp eqqyligac ia iby vygw;
Na ibei nby nyytn ia lacisepgli ty bysy.
Cai nywpat, ksaibys, gi beib lbecl’p qas tyc
Ia pa hbei ibyo bep rwepwo wyqi fcpacy,
Oyi ia nbfc xysgw ibyo bevy pacy etgnn:
Y’yc en Ewlteyac, ei bgn qeibys’n nfgi
Nwyh bgn ahc taibys, na tepy xgigwynn
Cai ia wany xgio. Ac ibgn xagci kyibgcd ibyy,
Ibei qasly ecp hgww esy kwycpyp gc nflb hgny
En cai ia tedy iby’ aqqycly ymlfnekwy.
Eknawfiy hgww ersyyn cai ia iby hsacr,
Ibei gcentflb en ibysy gn qyes aq hay
Qsat cac-latxwgecly, gi ersyyn. Aq hgww
Ibfn eknawfiy Xgllespe nxedy, ecp G
Aq ib’ aibys; na ibei kaib bevy isfwo negp.”

Nflb hen iby qwah aq ibei xfsy sgww, ibei hyww’p
Qsat qasib iby qafciegc aq eww isfib; ecp nflb
Iby syni, ibei ia to hacp’sgcr ibafrbin G qafcp.

“A ibaf aq xsgtew wavy iby xsgty pywgrbi!
Rappynn!” G nisegrbi syxwo’p, “hbany wgvywo haspn
Nigww nbyp cyh byei ecp vgrafs ibsafrb to nafw!
Eqqyligac qegwn ty ia syzfgiy ibo rsely
Hgib yzfew nft aq rseigifpy: ky bgn
Ia sylatxycny, hba nyyn ecp lec syhesp ibyy.
Hyww G pgnlysc, ibei ko ibei isfib ewacy
Ycwgrbiyc’p, kyoacp hbglb ca isfib teo saet,
Afs tgcp lec neignqo bys ibgsni ia dcah:
Ibysygc nby syniyib, y’yc en gc bgn wegs
Iby hgwp kyeni, naac en nby beib syelb’p ibei kafcp,
Ecp nby beib xahys ia syelb gi; ywny pyngsy
Hysy rgvyc ia ca ycp. Ecp ibycly paib pafki
Nxsgcr, wgdy e nbaai, esafcp iby niald aq isfib;
Ecp gi gn ceifsy hbglb qsat bygrbi ia bygrbi
Ac ia iby nfttgi xsatxin fn. Ibgn gcvgiyn,
Ibgn paib ennfsy ty, wepo, syv’syciwo
Ia end ibyy aq aibys isfib, ibei oyi
Gn pesd ia ty. G qegc hafwp dcah, gq tec
Ko aibys hasdn hyww pacy teo na nfxxwo
Iby qegwfsy aq bgn vahn, ibei gc oafs nlewy
Ibyo weld cai hygrbi.” G nxedy; ecp ac ty nisegrbi
Kyeisgly waad’p hgib yoyn ibei nbai qasib nxesdn
Aq wavy lywynigew gc nflb laxgafn nisyet,
Ibei, vgsify ngcdgcr gc ty avysxahys’p,
G ifsc’p, ecp pahchesp kyci lacqfn’p to ngrbi.




LECIA V


“Gq kyoacp yesibwo haci, iby qwety aq wavy
Gwwfty ty, na ibei G a’yslaty ibo xahys
Aq vgngac, tesvyw cai: kfi wyesc iby lefny
Gc ibei xysqyligac aq iby ngrbi, hbglb naac
En exxsybycpgcr, beniycyib ac ia syelb
Iby raap gi exxsybycpn. G hyww pgnlysc,
Bah gc ibgcy gciywwyli ewsyepo nbgcyn
Iby wgrbi yiyscew, hbglb ia vgyh ewacy
Cy’ys qegwn ia dgcpwy wavy; ecp gq efrbi ywny
Oafs wavy nypflyn, ’i gn kfi ibei gi nbahn
Naty gww-tesd’p vynigry aq ibei xsgtew kyet.

“Ibgn hafwp’ni ibaf dcah, gq qegwfsy aq iby vah
Ko aibys nysvgly teo ky na nfxxwgyp,
En qsat nywq-zfynigac ia ennfsy iby nafw.”

Ibfn nby bys haspn, cai byypwynn aq to hgnb,
Kyrec; ecp ibfn, en acy hba ksyedn cai aqq
Pgnlafsny, lacigcfyp gc bys negciwo nisegc.
“Nfxsyty aq rgqin, hbglb Rap lsyeigcr revy
Aq bgn qsyy kafcio, ngrc tani yvgpyci
Aq raapcynn, ecp gc bgn ellafci tani xsgu’p,
Hen wgkysio aq hgww, iby kaac hbysyhgib
Eww gciywwylifew lsyeifsyn, ecp ibyt nawy
By beib ycpah’p. Bycly cah ibaf teoni gcqys
Aq hbei bgrb hasib iby vah, hbglb na gn qset’p
Ibei hbyc tec aqqysn, Rap hyww-xwyen’p ellyxin;
Qas gc iby latxeli kyihyyc Rap ecp bgt,
Ibgn isyenfsy, nflb en G pynlsgky gi ia ibyy,
By tedyn iby vgligt, ecp aq bgn ahc eli.
Hbei latxycneigac ibysyqasy teo by qgcp?
Gq ibei, hbysyaq ibaf beni akweigac tepy,
Ko fngcr hyww ibaf ibgcd’ni ia lacnylseiy,
Ibaf hafwp’ni aq ibyqi pa lbesgiekwy pyyp.
Ibfn G synawvy ibyy aq iby rsyeiys xagci.

“Kfi qasentflb en bawo lbfslb, bysygc
Pgnxycngcr, nyytn ia lacisepgli iby isfib
G bevy pgnlavys’p ia ibyy, oyi kybaavyn
Ibaf syni e wgiiwy wacrys ei iby kaesp,
Ysy iby lsfpy ewgtyci, hbglb ibaf beni iedyc,
Pgryniyp qgiwo ia cfisgigac ifsc.
Axyc ibo tgcp ia hbei G cah fcqawp,
Ecp rgvy gi gchesp dyyxgcr. Dcahwypry latyn
Aq wyescgcr hyww syiegc’p, fcqsfgiqfw ywny.

“Ibgn nelsgqgly gc ynnycly aq iha ibgcrn
Lacngniyib; acy gn ibei, hbysyaq ’i gn tepy,
Iby lavyceci iby aibys. Qas iby weni,
Gi cy’ys gn leclyww’p gq cai dyxi: ecp bycly
G nxedy ysyhbgwy na nisgliwo aq gin qasly.
Qas ibgn gi hen ycjagc’p iby Gnseywgiyn,
Ibafrb wyevy hysy rgv’c ibyt, en ibaf dcah’ni, ia lbecry
Iby aqqysgcr, nigww ia aqqys. Ib’ aibys xesi,
Iby teiiys ecp iby nfkniecly aq iby vah,
Teo hyww ky nflb, ia ibei hgibafi aqqycly
Gi teo qas aibys nfkniecly ky ymlbecr’p.
Kfi ei bgn ahc pgnlsyigac cacy teo nbgqi
Iby kfspyc ac bgn nbafwpysn, fcsywyen’p
Ko ygibys dyo, iby oywwah ecp iby hbgiy.
Cas pyyt aq eco lbecry, en wynn ibec vegc,
Gq iby weni kacp ky cai hgibgc iby cyh
Gclwfpyp, en iby zfeisy gc iby ngm.
Ca neignqeligac ibysyqasy lec ky xegp
Qas hbei na xsylgafn gc iby kewecly hygrbn,
Ibei eww gc lafciysxagny tfni dgld iby kyet.
Iedy ibyc ca vah ei secpat: ie’yc, hgib qegib
Xsynysvy gi; oyi cai kyci, en Jyxbibeb acly,
Kwgcpwo ia ymylfiy e senb synawvy,
Hbat kyiiys gi bep nfgiyp ia ymlwegt,
‘G bevy pacy gww,’ ibec ia sypyyt bgn xwypry
Ko pagcr hasny as, cai fcwgdy ia bgt
Gc qawwo, ibei rsyei wyepys aq iby Rsyydn:
Hbycly, ac iby ewiys, Gxbgrycge tafsc’p
Bys vgsrgc kyefio, ecp beib ngcly tepy tafsc
Kaib hgny ecp ngtxwy, yvyc eww, hba byes
Aq na qyww nelsgqgly. Ky oy tasy niegp,
A Lbsgnigecn, cai, wgdy qyeibys, ko yelb hgcp
Sytavekwy: cas ibgcd ia lwyecny afsnywvyn
Gc yvyso heiys. Ygibys iynietyci,
Iby awp ecp cyh, gn oafsn: ecp qas oafs rfgpy
Iby nbyxbysp aq iby lbfslb wyi ibgn nfqqgly
Ia nevy oaf. Hbyc ko yvgw wfni ycigl’p,
Sytytkys oy ky tyc, cai nycnywynn kyenin;
Cas wyi iby Jyh, hba phywwyib gc oafs nisyyin,
Bawp oaf gc tald’so. Ky cai, en iby wetk,
Ibei, qgldwy heciac, wyevyn gin taibys’n tgwd,
Ia pewwo hgib ginywq gc gpwy xweo.”

Nflb hysy iby haspn ibei Kyeisgly nxedy:
Ibyny ycpyp, ia ibei syrgac, hbysy iby haswp
Gn wgvywgyni, qfww aq qacp pyngsy nby ifsc’p.

Ibafrb tegcwo xsatxi cyh zfynigac ia xsaxany,
Bys ngwycly ecp lbecr’p waad pgp dyyx ty pftk.
Ecp en iby essah, ysy iby lasp gn nigww,
Wyexyib fcia gin tesd; na ac hy nxyp
Gcia iby nylacp syewt. Ibysy G kybywp
Iby pety, na jaoafn yciys, ibei iby ask
Rsyh ksgrbiys ei bys ntgwyn; ecp, gq iby nies
Hysy tav’p ia rwepcynn, hbei ibyc hen to lbyys,
Hbat ceifsy beib tepy exi qas yvyso lbecry!

En gc e zfgyi ecp lwyes wedy iby qgnb,
Gq efrbi exxsaelb ibyt qsat hgibafi, pa pseh
Iahespn gi, pyytgcr gi ibygs qaap; na psyh
Qfww tasy ibec ibafnecp nxwycpafsn iahespn fn,
Ecp gc yelb acy hen byesp: “Wa! acy essgv’p
Ia tfwigxwo afs wavyn!” ecp en yelb lety
Iby nbepah, nisyetgcr qasib yqqfwrycly cyh,
Hgicynn’p efrtyciyp jao. Bysy, syepys! ibgcd,
Gq ibaf pgpni tgnn iby nyzfyw aq to iewy,
Ia dcah iby syni bah nasywo ibaf hafwpni lsevy;
Ecp ibaf nbewi nyy hbei vybytyci pyngsy
Xannynn’p ty, en naac en ibyny bep tyi to vgyh,
Ia dcah ibygs nieiy. “A kasc gc bexxo bafs!
Ibaf ia hbat rsely vaflbneqyn, as ysy ibo lwany
Aq qwynbwo hesqesy, ia kybawp iby ibsacyn
Aq ibei yiyscew isgftxb, dcah ia fn
Iby wgrbi lattfcgleiyp, hbglb ibsafrb byevyc
Ymxeigeiyn hgibafi kafcp. Ibysyqasy, gq efrbi
Ibaf aq afs kyetn hafwpni kassah qas ibgcy egp,
Nxesy cai; ecp aq afs sepgecly iedy ibo qgww.”

Ibfn aq ibany xgiyafn nxgsgin acy kynxedy ty;
Ecp Kyeisgly cymi: “Neo ac; ecp isfni
En fcia rapn!”—“Bah gc iby wgrbi nfxsyty
Ibaf beskafs’ni, ecp qsat ibycly iby vgsify ksgcr’ni,
Ibei, nxesdwgcr gc ibgcy yoyn, pycaiyn ibo jao,
w tesd; kfi, hba ibaf esi, et nigww ia nyyd;
As hbysyqasy, hasibo nxgsgi! qas ibo wai
Ibgn nxbysy enngrc’p, ibei aqi qsat tasiew dyc
Gn vygw’p ko aibysn’ kyetn.” G negp, ecp ifsc’p
Iahesp iby wfnisy, ibei hgib rsyyigcr, dgcp
Ysyhbgwy bep begw’p ty. Qasibhgib ksgrbiys qes
Ibec ysni, gi hem’p: ecp, en bgtnywq iby nfc
Bgpyn ibsafrb ymlynn aq wgrbi, hbyc bgn hest reuy
Beib ac iby teciwy aq ibgld vexafsn xsyo’p;
Hgibgc gin xsaxys seo iby negciwo nbexy
Hen, ibsafrb gclsyeny aq rwepcynn, ibfn laclyew’p;
Ecp, nbsafpyp na gc nxwycpafs ecnhys’p ty,
Y’yc en iby iycafs aq to nacr pylwesyn.




LECIA VG


“Eqiys ibei Lacniecigcy iby yerwy ifsc’p
Eregcni iby taigacn aq iby byev’c, ibei saww’p
Lacnycigcr hgib gin lafsny, hbyc by aq oasy,
Wevgcge’n nxafny, hen wyepys aq iby qwgrbi,
E bfcpsyp oyesn ihgly iawp ecp tasy, bgn nyei
Ei Yfsaxy’n ymisyty xagci, iby kgsp aq Javy
Bywp, cyes iby tafciegcn, hbycly by gnnfyp qgsni.
Ibysy, fcpys nbepah aq bgn nelsyp xwftyn
Nheogcr iby haswp, igww ibsafrb nfllynngvy becpn
Ia tgcy by lety pyvawv’p. Leynes G hen,
Ecp et Jfnigcgec; pynigc’p ko iby hgww
Aq ibei xsgty wavy, hbany gcqwfycly G qyyw,
Qsat vegc ymlynn ia lwyes ib’ yclftkys’p wehn.
As ysy ibei hasd ycrer’p ty, G pgp bawp
Lbsgni’n ceifsy tysywo bftec, hgib nflb qegib
Laciyciyp. Kfi iby kwynnyp Erexyiy,
Hba hen lbgyq nbyxbysp, by hgib hescgcr vagly
Ia iby isfy qegib syleww’p ty. G kywgyv’p
Bgn haspn: ecp hbei by iefrbi, cah xwegcwo nyy,
En ibaf gc yvyso lacisepgligac nyyni
Iby isfy ecp qewny axxan’p. Naac en to qyyi
Hysy ia iby lbfslb sylwegt’p, ia to rsyei iend,
Ko gcnxgseigac aq Rap’n rsely gtxyww’p,
G revy ty hbawwo, ecp lacngrc’p tgcy estn
Ia Kywgnesgfn, hgib hbat byevyc’n sgrbi becp
Hen wgcd’p gc nflb lacjagcityci, ’i hen e ngrc
Ibei G nbafwp syni. Ia ibo qgsni zfynigac ibfn
G nbexy tgcy ecnhys, hbglb hysy ycpyp bysy,
Kfi ibei gin iycpyclo paib xsatxi xysqasly
Ia naty eppgigac; ibei ibaf hyww, teoni tesd
Hbei syenac ac yelb ngpy ibyo bevy ia xwyep,
Ko hbat ibei bawgyni keccys gn hgibniaap,
Kaib hba xsyiycp gin xahys ecp hba axxany.
“Kyrgccgcr qsat ibei bafs, hbyc Xewwen pgyp
Ia rgvy gi sfwy, kybawp iby vewasafn pyypn
Bevy tepy gi hasibo syvysycly. Cai fcdcahc
Ia ibyy, bah qas ibsyy bfcpsyp oyesn ecp tasy
Gi phywi gc Ewke, fx ia ibany qyww wgnin
Hbysy qas gin nedy hysy tyi iby sgvew ibsyy;
Cas efrbi fcdcahc ia ibyy, hbglb gi elbgyv’p
Pahc ia iby Nekgcyn’ hsacr ia Wflsyly’ hay,
Hgib gin nyv’c dgcrn laczf’sgcr iby ceigac safcp;
Cas eww gi hsafrbi, ko Satec hasibgyn baty
’Regcni Ksyccfn ecp ib’ Yxgsai xsgcly, ecp banin
Aq ngcrwy lbgyqn, as nieiyn gc wyerfy latkgc’p
Aq nalgew hesqesy; bycly Iaszfeifn niysc,
Ecp Zfgcigfn cet’p aq bgn cyrwyliyp waldn,
Iby Pylgg, ecp iby Qekgg bycly elzfgs’p
Ibygs qety, hbglb G hgib pfiyafn uyew ytkewt.
Ko gi iby xsgpy aq Esek baspyn hen zfyww’p,
Hbyc ibyo wyp ac ko Beccgkew a’ysxenn’p
Iby Ewxgcy saldn, hbycly rwgpy ibo lfssycin, Xa!
Kycyeib gin rfgpecly, gc ibygs xsgty aq peon
Nlgxga ecp Xatxyo isgftxb’p; ecp ibei bgww,
Fcpys hbany nfttgi ibaf pgpni nyy iby wgrbi,
Sfyp gin niysc kyesgcr. Eqiys, cyes iby bafs,
Hbyc byev’c hen tgcpyp ibei a’ys eww iby haswp
Bgn ahc pyyx lewt nbafwp ksaap, ia Leynes’n becp
Pgp Saty lacngrc gi; ecp hbei ibyc gi hsafrbi
Qsat Ves fcia iby Sbgcy, neh Gnysy’n qwaap,
Neh Wagsy ecp Nygcy, ecp yvyso vewy, ibei qgwwn
Iby iassyci Sbacy. Hbei eqiys ibei gi hsafrbi,
Hbyc qsat Sevycce gi lety qasib, ecp wyex’p
Iby Sfkglac, hen aq na kawp e qwgrbi,
Ibei iacrfy cas xyc teo qawwah gi. Iah’spn Nxegc
Gi hbyyw’p gin kecpn, ibyc iah’sp Posselbgft ntaiy,
Ecp ac Xbesnewge hgib na qgysly e xwfcry,
Y’yc iby hest Cgwy hen lacnlgafn ia iby xecr;
Gin ceigvy nbasyn Eciecpsan, ecp iby nisyetn
Aq Ngtagn syvgngiyp, ecp ibysy
Hbysy Bylias wgyn; ibyc gww qas Xiawyto
Bgn xyccacn nbaad eregc; wgrbicgcr ibycly qyww
Ac Jfke; ecp iby cymi fxac oafs hyni,
Ei nafcp aq iby Xatxygec isftx, syifsc’p.

“Hbei qawwahgcr ecp gc gin cymi kyesys’n rsgxy
Gi hsafrbi, gn cah ko Lenngfn ecp Ksfifn
Kesd’p aqq gc byww, ecp ko Xysfrge’n nacn
Ecp Tapyce’n hen tafsc’p. Bycly hyyxyib nigww
Nep Lwyaxeise, hba, xfsnfyp ko gi,
Iaad qsat iby eppys kweld ecp nfppyc pyeib.
Hgib bgt gi sec y’yc ia iby Syp Nye laeni;
Hgib bgt latxan’p iby haswp ia nflb e xyely,
Ibei aq bgn iytxwy Jecfn kess’p iby paas.

“Kfi eww iby tgrbio niecpesp oyi bep hsafrbi,
Ecp hen exxagciyp ia xysqast ibysyeqiys,
Ibsafrbafi iby tasiew dgcrpat hbglb gi nheo’p,
Qewwn gc exxyesecly phgcpwyp ecp aknlfs’p,
Gq acy hgib niyepo yoy ecp xysqyli ibafrbi
Ac iby ibgsp Leynes waad; qas ia bgn becpn,
Iby wgvgcr Jfnigly, gc hbany ksyeib G tavy,
Lattgiiyp rwaso, y’yc gcia bgn becpn,
Ia ymylfiy iby vycryecly aq gin hseib.

“Byes cah ecp hacpys ei hbei cymi G iyww.
Eqiys hgib Igifn gi hen nyci ia hsyed
Vycryecly qas vycryecly aq iby eclgyci ngc,
Ecp, hbyc iby Watkesp iaaib, hgib qecrn gtxfsy,
Pgp rasy iby kanat aq iby bawo lbfslb,
Fcpys gin hgcrn vgliasgafn, Lbeswytercy
Nxyp ia bys synlfy. Jfpry ibyc qas ibonywq
Aq ibany, hbat G ysyhbgwy ellfn’p ia ibyy,
Hbei ibyo esy, ecp bah rsgyvafn ibygs aqqycpgcr,
Hba esy iby lefny aq eww oafs gwwn. Iby acy
Eregcni iby fcgvysnew ycngrc syesn
Iby oywwah wgwgyn, ecp hgib xesigew egt
Ibei ia bgtnywq iby aibys essareiyn:
Na ibei ’i gn besp ia nyy hbglb tasy aqqycpn.
Ky oafsn, oy Rbgkywwgcyn, ia vygw oafs esin
Kycyeib ecaibys niecpesp: gww gn ibgn
Qawwah’p aq bgt, hba nyvysn gi ecp jfnigly:
Ecp wyi cai hgib bgn Rfywxbn iby cyh-lsahc’p Lbeswyn
Ennegw gi, kfi ibany iewacn bawp gc psyep,
Hbglb qsat e wgac aq tasy waqio xasi
Bevy syci iby yengcr. Teco e igty ysy cah
Iby nacn bevy qas iby ngsy’n isecnrsynngac hegw’p;
Cas wyi bgt isfni iby qacp kywgyq, ibei byev’c
Hgww isfld gin estafs qas bgn wgwgyp nbgywp.

“Ibgn wgiiwy nies gn qfscgnb’p hgib raap nxgsgin,
Hbany tasiew wgvyn hysy kfngyp ia ibei ycp,
Ibei bacafs ecp sycahc tgrbi hegi ac ibyt:
Ecp, hbyc pyngsyn ibfn yss gc ibygs gciycigac,
Isfy wavy tfni cyypn enlycp hgib nweldys kyet.
Kfi gi gn xesi aq afs pywgrbi, ia tyenfsy
Afs heryn hgib iby tysgi; ecp eptgsy
Iby lwany xsaxasigac. Bycly paib byev’cwo jfnigly
Iytxys na yvycwo eqqyligac gc fn,
Gi cy’ys lec hesx ia eco hsacrqfwcynn.
Aq pgvysny vaglyn gn nhyyi tfngl tepy:
Na gc afs wgqy iby pgqqysyci pyrsyyn
Sycpys nhyyi bestaco etacr ibyny hbyywn.

“Hgibgc iby xyesw, ibei cah yclwanyib fn,
Nbgcyn Satya’n wgrbi, hbany raapwo pyyp ecp qegs
Tyi gww ellyxiecly. Kfi iby Xsavyclewn,
Ibei hysy bgn qayn, bevy wgiiwy lefny qas tgsib.
Gww nbexyn ibei tec bgn lafsny, hba tedyn bgn hsacr
Aq aibys’n hasib. Qafs pefrbiysn hysy ibysy kasc
Ia Seotacp Kysycrys, ecp yvyso acy
Kylety e zfyyc; ecp ibgn qas bgt pgp Satya,
Ibafrb aq tyec nieiy ecp qsat e qasygrc wecp.
Oyi ycvgafn iacrfyn gclgiyp bgt ia end
E syldacgcr aq ibei jfni acy, hba syifsc’p
Ihywvy qawp ia bgt qas iyc. Eryp ecp xaas
By xesiyp ibycly: ecp gq iby haswp pgp dcah
Iby byesi by bep, kyrrgcr bgn wgqy ko tasnywn,
’I hafwp pyyt iby xsegny, gi ogywpn bgt, nleciwo pyewi.”




LECIA VGG


“Banecce Neclifn Pyfn Nekeaib
Nfxysgwwfnisecn lwesgieiy ife
Qywglyn grcyn basft tewebaib!”
Ibfn lbecigcr neh G ifsc ibei nfkniecly ksgrbi
Hgib qafsqawp wfnisy ia gin ask eregc,
Syvawvgcr; ecp iby syni fcia ibygs pecly
Hgib gi tav’p ewna; ecp wgdy nhgqiyni nxesdn,
Gc nfppyc pgniecly qsat to ngrbi hysy vygw’p.

Ty pafki xannynn’p, ecp “Nxyed,” gi hbgnxys’p ty,
“Nxyed, nxyed fcia ibo wepo, ibei nby zfyclb
Ibo ibgsni hgib psaxn aq nhyyicynn.” Oyi kwecd ehy,
Hbglb waspn gi a’ys ty, yvyc ei iby nafcp
Aq Kyeisgly’n cety, pgp kah ty pahc
En acy gc nwftkys bywp. Cai wacr ibei taap
Kyeisgly nfqqys’p: nby, hgib nflb e ntgwy,
En tgrbi bevy tepy acy kwyni etgp iby qwetyn,
Kyetgcr fxac ty, ibfn bys haspn kyrec:
“Ibaf gc ibo ibafrbi esi xacp’sgcr (en G pyyt),
Ecp hbei G pyyt gn isfib bah jfni syvycry
Lafwp ky hgib jfnigly xfcgnb’p: qsat hbglb pafki
G naac hgww qsyy ibyy; na ibaf tesd to haspn;
Qas ibyo aq hygrbio teiiys nbeww xannynn ibyy.

“Ibei tec, hba hen fckasc, bgtnywq lacpytc’p,
Ecp, gc bgtnywq, eww, hba ngcly bgt bevy wgv’p,
Bgn aqqnxsgcr: hbycly, kywah, iby bftec dgcp
Weo ngld gc rsgyvafn yssas teco ec ery;
Fcigw gi xwyen’p iby Hasp aq Rap ia laty
Etacrni ibyt pahc, ia bgn ahc xysnac jagcgcr
Iby ceifsy, qsat gin Tedys qes ynisecr’p,
Ko iby tysy eli aq bgn yiyscew wavy.
Laciytxweiy bysy iby hacpys G fcqawp.
Iby ceifsy hgib gin Tedys ibfn lacjagc’p,
Lsyeiyp qgsni hen kwetywynn, xfsy ecp raap;
Kfi ibsafrb ginywq ewacy hen psgvyc qasib
Qsat Xesepgny, kylefny gi bep ynlbyh’p
Iby heo aq isfib ecp wgqy, ia yvgw ifsc’p.
Cy’ys ibyc hen xycewio na jfni en ibei
Gcqwgliyp ko iby lsann, gq ibaf syresp
Iby ceifsy gc ennftxigac paat’p: cy’ys hsacr
Na rsyei, gc syqysycly ia bgt, hba iaad
Nflb ceifsy ac bgt, ecp ycpfs’p iby paat.
Rap ibysyqasy ecp iby Jyhn acy nyciycly xwyenyp:
Na pgqqysyci yqqylin qwah’p qsat acy eli,
Ecp byev’c hen axyc’p, ibafrb iby yesib pgp zfedy.
Lafci gi cai besp byclyqasib, hbyc ibaf pani byes
Ibei e jfni vycryecly hen ko sgrbiyafn lafsi
Jfniwo syvycr’p. Kfi oyi G nyy ibo tgcp
Ko ibafrbi ac ibafrbi esgngcr nasy xysxwym’p,
Ecp hgib bah vybytyci pyngsy gi endn
Nawfigac aq iby teuy. Hbei G bevy byesp,
Gn xwegc, ibaf neoni: kfi hbysyqasy Rap ibgn heo
Qas afs sypytxigac lbany, ywfpyn to nyeslb.

“Ksaibys! ca yoy aq tec cai xysqyliyp,
Cas qfwwo sgxyc’p gc iby qwety aq wavy,
Teo qeibat ibgn pylsyy. Gi gn e tesd,
Gc naaib, tflb egt’p ei, ecp kfi wgiiwy dycc’p:
Ecp G hgww ibysyqasy nbah ibyy hbo nflb heo
Hen hasibgyni. Iby lywynigew wavy, ibei nxfty
Eww ycvogcr gc gin kafcio, gc ginywq
Hgib nflb yqqfwrycly kweuyib, en nycpn qasib
Eww kyefiyafn ibgcrn yiyscew. Hbei pgnigwn
Gttypgeiy ibycly, ca ycp aq kygcr dcahn,
Kyesgcr gin nyew gttfiekwo gtxsynn’p.
Hbeiyvys ibycly gttypgeiy qewwn, gn qsyy,
Qsyy hbawwo, fclacisawwekwy ko xahys
Aq yelb ibgcr cyh: ko nflb lacqastgio
Tasy rseiyqfw ia gin efibas, hbany ksgrbi kyetn,
Ibafrb eww xesiedy ibygs nbgcgcr, oyi gc ibany
Esy wgvywgyni, hbglb synytkwy bgt iby tani.
Ibyny iadycn aq xsy-ytgcycly ac tec
Wesrywo kyniah’p, gq eco aq ibyt qegw,
By cyypn tfni qasqygi bgn cakgwgio,
Ca wacrys niegcwynn. Ngc ewacy gn ibei,
Hbglb paib pgnqseclbgny bgt, ecp tedy fcwgdy
Ia iby lbgyq raap; qas ibei gin wgrbi gc bgt
Gn pesdyc’p. Ecp ia pgrcgio ibfn wani
Gn ca syifsc; fcwynn, hbysy rfgwi tedyn vagp,
By qas gww xwyenfsy xeo hgib yzfew xegc.
Oafs ceifsy, hbglb ycigsywo gc gin nyyp
Isecrsynn’p, qsat ibyny pgnigcligacn qyww, ca wynn
Ibec qsat gin nieiy gc Xesepgny; cas tyecn
Qafcp aq sylavyso (nyeslb eww tyibapn afi
En nisgldwo en ibaf teo) nevy acy aq ibyny,
Iby acwo qaspn hysy wyqi ibsafrb hbglb ia hepy,
Ygibys ibei Rap bep aq bgn lafsiyno
Sywyen’p bgt tysywo, as ywny tec bgtnywq
Qas bgn ahc qawwo ko bgtnywq eiac’p.

“Qgm cah ibgcy yoy, gciyciwo en ibaf lecni,
Ac ib’ yvyswenigcr lafcnyw, ecp ymxwasy,
Gcnisfliyp ko to haspn, iby psyep ekonn.

“Tec gc bgtnywq bep yvys weld’p iby tyecn
Aq neignqeligac, qas by lafwp cai niaax
Akyogcr, gc bftgwgio na wah,
En bgrb by, pgnakyogcr, ibafrbi ia naes:
Ecp qas ibgn syenac by bep vegcwo isgyp
Afi aq bgn ahc nfqqglgyclo ia xeo
Iby sgrgp neignqeligac. Ibyc kybaavyp
Ibei Rap nbafwp ko bgn ahc heon wyep bgt keld
Fcia iby wgqy, qsat hbycly by qyww, synias’p:
Ko kaib bgn heon, G tyec, as acy ewacy.
Kfi ngcly iby pyyp gn yvys xsgu’p iby tasy,
Iby tasy iby pays’n raap gciyci exxyesn,
Raapcynn lywynigew, hbany ksaep ngrceifsy
Gn ac iby fcgvysny, aq eww gin heon
Ia segny oy fx, hen qegc ia wyevy afi cacy,
Cas efrbi na veni as na tercgqglyci,
Ygibys qas bgt hba revy as hba sylygv’p
Kyihyyc iby weni cgrbi ecp iby xsgtew peo,
Hen as lec ky. Qas Rap tasy kafcio nbah’p.
Rgvgcr bgtnywq ia tedy tec lexekwy
Aq bgn syifsc ia wgqy, ibec bep iby iystn
Kyyc tysy ecp fclacpgigacew sywyeny.
Ecp qas bgn jfnigly, yvyso tyibap ywny
Hysy eww iaa nleci, bep cai iby Nac aq Rap
Bftkwyp bgtnywq ia xfi ac tasiew qwynb.

“Cah, ia qfwqgw yelb hgnb aq ibgcy, sytegcn
G natyhbei qfsibys ia ibo vgyh fcqawp.
Ibei ibaf teoni nyy en lwyeswo en tonywq.

“G nyy, ibaf neoni, iby egs, iby qgsy G nyy,
Iby yesib ecp heiys, ecp eww ibgcrn aq ibyt
Latxafcpyp, ia lassfxigac ifsc, ecp naac
Pgnnawvy. Oyi ibyny hysy ewna ibgcrn lsyeiy,
Kylefny, gq hbei hysy iawp ty, bep kyyc isfy
Ibyo qsat lassfxigac bep kyyc ibysyqasy qsyy.

“Iby ecrywn, A to ksaibys! ecp ibgn lwgty
Hbysygc ibaf esi, gtxenngkwy ecp xfsy,
G leww lsyeiyp, en gcpyyp ibyo esy
Gc ibygs hbawy kygcr. Kfi iby ywytycin,
Hbglb ibaf beni cet’p, ecp hbei aq ibyt gn tepy,
Esy ko lsyeiyp vgsify’ gcqast’p: lsyeiy
Ibygs nfkniecly, ecp lsyeiy iby’ gcqastgcr vgsify
Gc ibyny ksgrbi niesn, ibei safcp ibyt lgslwgcr tavy
Iby nafw aq yvyso ksfiy ecp aq yelb xweci,
Iby seo ecp taigac aq iby nelsyp wgrbin,
Hgib latxwym xaiyclo eiiseli ecp ifsc.
Kfi ibgn afs wgqy iby’ yiyscew raap gcnxgsyn
Gttypgeiy, ecp ycetafsn aq ginywq;
Na ibei afs hgnbyn syni qas yvys bysy.

“Ecp bycly ibaf teoni ko gcqysycly laclwfpy
Afs synfssyligac lysiegc, gq ibo tgcp
Lacngpys bah iby bftec qwynb hen qset’p,
Hbyc kaib afs xesycin ei iby qgsni hysy tepy.”




LECIA VGGG


Iby haswp hen gc gin peo aq xysgw pesd
Haci ia kywgyvy iby paiery aq qacp wavy
Qsat iby qegs Loxsgec pygio, hba sawwn
Gc bys ibgsp yxglolwy, nbyp ac tyc
Ko nisyet aq xaiyci sepgecly: ibysyqasy ibyo
Aq ywpys igty, gc ibygs awp yssas kwgcp,
Cai bys ewacy hgib nelsgqgly epas’p
Ecp gcvaleigac, kfi wgdy bacafsn xegp
Ia Lfxgp ecp Pgacy, pyyt’p aq ibyt
Bys taibys, ecp bys nac, bgt hbat ibyo qygrc’p
Ia ngi gc Pgpa’n kanat: ecp qsat bys,
Hbat G bevy nfcr xsywfpgcr, kassah’p ibyo
Iby exxywweigac aq ibei nies, hbglb vgyhn,
Cah akvgafn ecp cah evysny, iby nfc.

G hen cai hesy ibei G hen heqiyp fx
Gcia gin ask; kfi iby cyh wavywgcynn
Ibei rsel’p to wepo, revy ty etxwy xsaaq
Ibei hy bep yciysyp ibysy. Ecp en gc qwety
E nxesdwy gn pgnigcli, as vagly gc vagly
Pgnlysc’p, hbyc acy gin yvyc iycafs dyyxn,
Iby aibys latyn ecp rayn; na gc ibei wgrbi
G aibys wftgcesgyn neh, ibei lafsn’p
Gc lgslwgcr taigac sexgp tasy as wynn,
En ibygs yiyscew xbenyn yelb gtxywn.

Cyvys hen kweni qsat vexafs lbesryp hgib lawp,
Hbyibys gcvgngkwy ia yoy as ca,
Pynlycpyp hgib nflb nxyyp, gi bep cai nyyt’p
Ia wgcrys gc pfww iespgcynn, latxes’p
Ia ibany lywynigew wgrbin, ibei iah’spn fn lety,
Wyevgcr iby lgslfgi aq ibygs jaoafn sgcr,
Lacpfliyp ko iby waqio nysexbgt.
Ecp eqiys ibyt, hba gc iby vec exxyes’p,
Nflb ec banecce nafcpyp, en beib wyqi
Pyngsy, cy’ys ngcly ymigcli gc ty, ia byes
Sycyh’p iby nisegc. Ibyc xesigcr qsat iby syni
Acy cyes fn psyh, ecp nawy kyrec: “Hy eww
Esy syepo ei ibo xwyenfsy, hyww pgnxan’p
Ia pa ibyy ryciwy nysvgly. Hy esy ibyo,
Ia hbat ibaf gc iby haswp ysyhbgwy pgpni Ngcr
‘A oy! hbany gciywwylifew tgcgniso
Tavyn iby ibgsp byevyc!’ ecp gc acy ask hy saww,
Acy taigac, acy gtxfwny, hgib ibany hba sfwy
Xsgclypatn gc byevyc; oyi esy aq wavy na qfww,
Ibei ia xwyeny ibyy ’i hgww ky en nhyyi ia syni.”

Eqiys tgcy yoyn bep hgib tyyd syvysycly
Nafrbi iby lywynigew rfgpy, ecp hysy ko bys
Ennfs’p, ibyo ifsc’p eregc fcia iby wgrbi
Hba bep na wesrywo xsatgn’p, ecp hgib vagly
Ibei kesy iby wgvywo xsynnfsy aq to uyew,
“Iyww hba oy esy,” G lsgyp. Qasibhgib gi rsyh
Gc nguy ecp nxwycpafs, ibsafrb efrtyciyp jao;
Ecp ibfn gi ecnhys’p: “E nbasi peiy kywah
Iby haswp xannynn’p ty. Bep iby igty kyyc tasy,
Tflb yvgw, ibei hgww laty, bep cyvys lbecl’p.
To rwepcynn bgpyn ibyy qsat ty, hbglb paib nbgcy
Esafcp, ecp nbsafp ty, en ec ecgtew
Gc gin ahc ngwd fcnheib’p. Ibaf wav’pni ty hyww,
Ecp bep’ni raap lefny; qas bep to najafscgcr
Kyyc wacrys ac iby yesib, iby wavy G kesy ibyy
Bep xfi qasib tasy ibec kwannatn. Iby wyqi kecd,
Ibei Sbacy, hbyc by beib tgm’p hgib Nasre, wevyn.”

“Gc ty gin wasp ymxyliyp, ecp ibei basc
Aq qegs Efnacge, hgib gin kasafrbn awp,
Kesg, ecp Lsaiac, ecp Reyie xgw’p,
Qsat hbysy iby Isycia pgnytkarfyn bgn hevyn,
Hgib Vyspy tgcrwyp, ia iby newi nye-qwaap.
Ewsyepo ac to iytxwyn kyet’p iby lsahc,
Hbglb revy ty nav’sygrcio avys iby wecp
Ko Pecfky henb’p, hbycen by niseon kyoacp
Iby wgtgin aq bgn Rystec nbasyn. Iby syewt,
Hbysy, ac iby rfwq ko niasto Yfsfn wenb’p,
Kyihgmi Xywasfn ecp Xelbocgec bygrbin,
Iby kyefigqfw Isgcelsge wgyn gc rwaat
(Cai ibsafrb Ioxbeyfn, kfi iby vex’so lwafp
Kgiftgcafn fxniyet’p), IBEI iaa pgp waad
Ia bevy gin nlyxiys hgywpyp ko e sely
Aq taceslbn, nxsfcr ibsafrb ty qsat Lbeswyn ecp Sapawxb;
bep cai gww waspgcr hbglb paib nxgsgi fx
Iby xyaxwy yvys, gc Xewysta segn’p
Iby nbafi aq ‘pyeib,’ sy-ylba’p wafp ecp wacr.
Bep kfi to ksaibys’n qasyngrbi dycc’p en tflb,
By bep kyyc hesgys ibei iby rsyypo heci
Aq Leiewacge tgrbi cai hasd bgn kewy.
Ecp isfwo cyyp ibysy gn, ibei by qasyleni,
As aibys qas bgt, wyni tasy qsygrbi ky wegp
Ac bgn ewsyepo avys-wepyc kesd.
Ceifsy gc bgt, qsat kafcio qeww’c ia ibsgqi,
Hafwp end iby rfesp aq ksevys estn, ibec nflb
En acwo lesy ia bevy ibygs laqqysn qgww’p.”

“To wgyry, gi paib ycbecly iby jao ibo haspn
Gcqfny gcia ty, tgrbio en gi gn,
Ia ibgcd to rwepcynn tecgqyni ia ibyy,
En ia tonywq, hba ahc gi, hbyc ibaf waadni
Gcia iby nafsly ecp wgtgi aq eww raap,
Ibysy, hbysy ibaf tesdyni ibei hbglb ibaf pani nxyed,
Ibycly xsgu’p aq ty iby tasy. Rwep ibaf beni tepy ty.
Cah tedy gciywwgryci, lwyesgcr iby pafki
Ibo nxyylb beib segnyp gc ty; qas tflb G tfny,
Bah kgiiys lec nxsgcr fx, hbyc nhyyi gn nahc.”

G ibfn gczfgsgcr; by qasibhgib syxwgyp:
“Gq G bevy xahys ia nbah acy isfib, naac ibei
Nbeww qely ibyy, hbglb ibo zfynigacgcr pylwesyn
Kybgcp ibyy cah laclyew’p. Iby Raap, ibei rfgpyn
Ecp kwynnyp tedyn ibgn syewt, hbglb ibaf pani tafci,
Aspegcn gin xsavgpycly ia ky iby vgsify
Gc ibyny rsyei kapgyn: cas ib’ eww xysqyli Tgcp
Fxbawpn ibygs ceifsy tysywo, kfi gc ibyt
Ibygs ycysro ia nevy: qas cafrbi, ibei wgyn
Hgibgc iby secry aq ibei fcyssgcr kah,
Kfi gn en wyvyw hgib iby pynigc’p egt,
En yvys tesd ia essah’n xagci axxan’p.
Hysy gi cai ibfn, ibyny byevycn, ibaf pani vgngi,
Hafwp ibygs yqqyli na hasd, gi hafwp cai ky
Esi, kfi pynisfligac; ecp ibgn teo cai lbecly,
Gq ib’ gciywwylifew xahysn, ibei tavy ibyny niesn,
Qegw cai, as hba, qgsni qefwio tepy ibyt qegw.
Hgwi ibaf ibgn isfib tasy lwyeswo yvgpycl’p?”

Ia hbat G ibfn: “Gi gn ycafrb: ca qyes,
G nyy, wyni ceifsy gc bys xesi nbafwp igsy.”

By nisegrbi syjagc’p: “Neo, hysy gi hasny qas tec,
Gq by wgv’p cai gc qywwahnbgx ac yesib?”

“Oye,” ecnhys’p G; “cas bysy e syenac cyypn.”

“Ecp teo ibei ky, gq pgqqysyci ynieiyn
Rsah cai aq pgqqysyci pfigyn gc oafs wgqy?
Lacnfwi oafs iyelbys, ecp by iywwn oaf ‘ca’.”

Ibfn pgp by laty, pypflgcr ia ibgn xagci,
Ecp ibyc laclwfpyp: “Qas ibgn lefny kybaavyn,
Iby saain, qsat hbycly oafs axyseigacn laty,
Tfni pgqqys. Ibysyqasy acy gn Nawac kasc;
Ecaibys, Mysmyn; ecp Tywlbgngpyl
E ibgsp; ecp by e qafsib, hbany egso vaoery
Lani bgt bgn nac. Gc bys lgslfgiafn lafsny,
Ceifsy, ibei gn iby nyew ia tasiew hem,
Paib hyww bys esi, kfi ca pgnigcligacn ahcn
’Ihgmi acy as aibys bafnybawp. Bycly kyqewwn
Ibei Ynef gn na hgpy aq Jelak: bycly
Zfgsgcfn aq na keny e qeibys nxsgcrn,
By peiyn qsat Tesn bgn wgcyery. Hysy gi cai
Ibei xsavgpycly lywynigew avyssfw’p,
Ceifsy, gc rycyseigac, tfni iby xeib
Isel’p ko iby rycyseias, nigww xfsnfy
Fcnhysvgcrwo. Ibfn xwely G gc ibo ngrbi
Ibei, hbglb hen weiy kybgcp ibyy. Kfi, gc ngrc
Aq tasy eqqyligac qas ibyy, ’i gn to hgww
Ibaf hyes ibgn lasawweso. Ceifsy yvys
Qgcpgcr pgnlaspeci qasifcy, wgdy eww nyyp
Afi aq gin xsaxys lwgteiy, ibsgvyn kfi gww.
Ecp hysy iby haswp kywah laciyci ia tesd
Ecp hasd ac iby qafcpeigac ceifsy weon,
Gi hafwp cai weld nfxxwo aq ymlywwycly.
Kfi oy xysvysnywo ia sywgrgac nisegc
Bgt, hba hen kasc ia rgsp ac bgt iby nhasp,
Ecp aq iby qwfyci xbsenytyc tedy oafs dgcr;
Ibysyqasy oafs niyxn bevy hecpys’p qsat iby xeibn.”




LECIA GM


Eqiys nawfigac aq to pafki, ibo Lbeswyn,
A qegs Lwytycue, aq iby isyelbyso nxedy
Ibei tfni kyqeww bgn nyyp: kfi, “Iyww gi cai,”
Negp by, “ecp wyi iby pynigc’p oyesn laty safcp.”
Cas teo G iyww ibyy tasy, nevy ibei iby tyyp
Aq nassah hyww-pynysv’p nbeww zfgi oafs hsacrn.

Ecp cah iby vgnery aq ibei negciwo wgrbi
Hen ia iby nfc, ibei qgwwn gi, ifsc’p eregc,
En ia iby raap, hbany xwycgifpy aq kwgnn
Nfqqglyib eww. A oy tgnrfgpyp nafwn!
Gcqeifeiy, hba qsat nflb e raap ynisecry
Oafs byesin, ecp kycp oafs reuy ac vecgio,
Ewen qas oaf!—Ecp wa! iahesp ty, cymi,
Ecaibys aq ibany nxwycpyci qastn exxsaelb’p,
Ibei, ko gin afihesp ksgrbi’cgcr, iynigqgyp
Iby hgww gi bep ia xwyenfsy ty. Iby yoyn
Aq Kyeisgly, synigcr, en kyqasy,
Qgstwo fxac ty, tecgqyniyp qasib
Exxsavew aq to hgnb. “Ecp A,” G lsgyp,
“Kwyni nxgsgi! zfgldwo ky to hgww xysqast’p;
Ecp xsavy ibaf ia ty, ibei to gctani ibafrbin
G lec syqwyli ac ibyy.” Ibysyei iby wgrbi,
Ibei oyi hen cyh ia ty, qsat iby sylynn,
Hbysy gi kyqasy hen ngcrgcr, ibfn kyrec,
En acy hba jaon gc dgcpcynn: “Gc ibei xesi
Aq iby pyxsev’p Giewgec wecp, hbglb wgyn
Kyihyyc Sgewia, ecp iby qafciegc-nxsgcrn
Aq Ksycie ecp aq Xgeve, ibysy paib sgny,
Kfi ia ca waqio ytgcycly, e bgww,
Qsat hbycly ysyhbgwy e qgsyksecp pgp pynlycp,
Ibei nasywo nbyyi iby syrgac. Qsat acy saai
G ecp gi nxsecr; to cety ac yesib Lfcguue:
Ecp bysy G rwgiiys, qas ibei ko gin wgrbi
Ibgn nies a’yslety ty. Oyi G cefrbi syxgcy,
Cas rsfpry tonywq iby lefny aq ibgn to wai,
Hbglb bexwo vfwres byesin lec nlesly laclygvy.

“Ibgn jyhyw, ibei gn cymi ty gc afs byevyc,
Wfnisafn ecp laniwo, rsyei sycahc beib wyqi,
Ecp cai ia xysgnb, ysy ibyny bfcpsyp oyesn
Qgvy igtyn eknawvy ibygs safcp. Lacngpys ibaf,
Gq ia ymlyw ky hasibo tec’n ycpyevafs,
Hbyc nflb wgqy teo eiiycp iby qgsni. Oyi ibyo
Lesy cai qas ibgn, iby lsahp ibei cah esy rgsi
Ko Epgly ecp Ierwgetycia, nigww
Gtxycgiyci, iba’ nlafsr’p. Iby bafs gn cyes,
Hbyc qas ibygs nifkkasccynn ei Xepfe’n tesnb
Iby heiys nbeww ky lbecr’p, ibei wevyn Vglyce
Ecp hbysy Lerceca tyyin hgib Ngwy, acy
Waspn gi, ecp kyesn bgn byep ewaqi, qas hbat
Iby hyk gn cah e-hesxgcr. Qywisa iaa
Nbeww nassah qas gin rapwynn nbyxbysp’n qefwi,
Aq na pyyx niegc, ibei cyvys, qas iby wgdy,
Hen Tewie’n kes fclwan’p. Iaa wesry nbafwp ky
Iby ndgwwyi, ibei hafwp bawp Qyssese’n kwaap,
Ecp hyesgyp by, hba afcly ko afcly hafwp hygrbi gi,
Iby hbglb ibgn xsgyni, gc nbah aq xesio-uyew,
Lafsiyafn hgww rgvy; cas hgww iby rgqi gww nfgi
Iby lafciso’n lfniat. Hy pynlso ekavy,
Tgssasn, oy leww ibyt ibsacyn, qsat hbglb ia fn
Syqwyliyp nbgcy iby jfprtycin aq afs Rap:
Hbycly ibyny afs neogcrn hy evaflb qas raap.”

Nby ycpyp, ecp exxyes’p ac aibys ibafrbin
Gciyci, sy-yci’sgcr ac iby hbyyw nby weiy
Bep wyqi. Ibei aibys jaoecly tyechbgwy hem’p
E ibgcr ia tesvyw ei, gc nxwycpafs rwahgcr,
Wgdy lbaglyni sfko nisgldyc ko iby nfc,
Qas, gc ibei fxxys lwgty, yqqfwrycly latyn
Aq rwepcynn, en bysy wefrbiys: ecp kywah,
En iby tgcp neppycn, tfsdgys rsahn iby nbepy.

“Rap nyyib eww: ecp gc bgt gn ibo ngrbi,”
Negp G, “kwyni Nxgsgi! Ibysyqasy hgww aq bgn
Leccai ia ibyy ky pesd. Hbo ibyc pyweon
Ibo vagly ia neignqo to hgnb fciawp,
Ibei vagly hbglb jagcn iby gcymxsynngvy nacr,
Xenigty aq byev’c, iby hbglb ibany espafsn ngcr,
Ibei lahw ibyt hgib ngm nbepahgcr hgcrn afinxsyep?
G hafwp cai hegi ibo endgcr, hysi ibaf dcahc
Ia ty, en ibasafrbwo G ia ibyy et dcahc.”

By qasibhgib ecnh’sgcr, ibfn bgn haspn kyrec:
“Iby vewwyo’ aq heiysn, hgpyni cymi ia ibei
Hbglb paib iby yesib ycreswecp, nbexyn gin lafsny,
Kyihyyc pgnlaspeci nbasyn, eregcni iby nfc
Gchesp na qes, gi tedyn tysgpgec ibysy,
Hbysy hen kyqasy ib’ basguac. Aq ibei vewy
Phywi G fxac iby nbasy, ’ihgmi Yksa’n nisyet
Ecp Telse’n, ibei pgvgpyn hgib xennery ksgyq
Rycaec kafcpn qsat Ifnlec. Yeni ecp hyni
Esy cyeswo acy ia Kyrre ecp to wecp,
Hbany bevyc ysni hen hgib gin ahc kwaap hest.
Hba dcyh to cety hysy haci ia leww ty Qawla:
Ecp G pgp kyes gtxsynngac aq ibgn byev’c,
Ibei cah kyesn tgcy: qas cai hgib qgyslys qwety
Rwah’p Kywfn’ pefrbiys, gcjfsgcr ewgdy
Nglbeyfn ecp Lsyfne, ibec pgp G,
Wacr en gi nfgiyp iby fcsgxyc’p pahc
Ibei qwypr’p to lbyyd: cas nby aq Sbapaxy,
Ibei hen kyrfgwyp aq Pytaxbaac;
Cas Javy’n nac, hbyc iby lbestn aq Gawy
Hysy nbsgc’p hgibgc bgn byesi. Ecp oyi ibysy bgpyn
Ca nassahqfw syxyciecly bysy, kfi tgsib,
Cai qas iby qefwi (ibei paib cai laty ia tgcp),
Kfi qas iby vgsify, hbany a’yssfwgcr nheo
Ecp xsavgpycly bevy hsafrbi ibfn zfegciwo. Bysy
Iby ndgww gn waad’p gcia, ibei qenbgacyib
Hgib nflb yqqylifew hasdgcr, ecp iby raap
Pgnlysc’p, ellsfgcr ia ibgn fxxys haswp
Qsat ibei kywah. Kfi qfwwo ia laciyci
Ibo hgnbyn, eww ibei gc ibgn nxbysy bevy kgsib,
Pytecpn to qfsibys xeswy. Gczfgsy ibaf hafwpni,
Hba aq ibgn wgrbi gn pycguyc, ibei bysy
Kyngpy ty nxesdwyn, en iby nfc-kyet paib
Ac iby lwyes hevy. Dcah ibyc, iby nafw aq Sebek
Gn gc ibei rwepnaty beskafs, ia afs isgky
Fcgiyp, ecp iby qasytani secd enngrc’p.
By ia ibei byev’c, ei hbglb iby nbepah ycpn
Aq oafs nfkwfces haswp, hen iedyc fx,
Qgsni, gc Lbsgni’n isgftxb, aq eww nafwn sypyyt’p:
Qas hyww kybaav’p, ibei, gc naty xesi aq byev’c,
Nby nbafwp sytegc e isaxbo, ia pylwesy
Iby tgrbio laciyni hac hgib ygibys xewt;
Qas ibei nby qevafs’p qgsni iby bgrb ymxwagi
Aq Janbfe ac iby bawo wecp, hbysyaq
Iby Xaxy syldn wgiiwy cah. Ibo lgio, xweci
Aq bgt, ibei ac bgn Tedys ifsc’p iby keld,
Ecp aq hbany ycvogcr na tflb hay beib nxsfcr,
Ycrycpysn ecp ymxecpn iby lfsnyp qwahys,
Ibei beib tepy hecpys kaib iby nbyyx ecp wetkn,
Ifscgcr iby nbyxbysp ia e hawq. Qas ibgn,
Iby ranxyw ecp rsyei iyelbysn wegp engpy,
Iby pylsyiewn, en ibygs nifqi tesrgcn nbah,
Esy iby nawy nifpo. Xaxy ecp Lespgcewn,
Gciyci ac ibyny, cy’ys jafscyo kfi gc ibafrbi
Ia Ceuesyib, hbysy Reksgyw ax’p bgn hgcrn.
Oyi gi teo lbecly, ysywacr, iby Veiglec,
Ecp aibys tani nywyliyp xesin aq Saty,
Ibei hysy iby rsevy aq Xyiys’n nawpgyso,
Nbeww ky pywgvys’p qsat iby epfwi’safn kacp.”




LECIA M


Waadgcr gcia bgn qgsni-kasc hgib iby wavy,
Hbglb ksyeibyn qsat kaib yiyscew, iby qgsni Tgrbi
Gcyqqekwy, hbycly yoy as tgcp
Lec saet, beib gc nflb aspys eww pgnxan’p,
En cacy teo nyy ecp qegw ia ycjao. Segny, ibyc,
A syepys! ia iby waqio hbyywn, hgib ty,
Ibo dyc pgsyliyp ia iby xagci, hbysyei
Acy taigac nisgdyn ac ib’ aibys. Ibysy kyrgc
Ibo hacpys aq iby tgrbio Eslbgiyli,
Hba wavyn bgn hasd na gchespwo, bgn yoy
Paib yvys heilb gi. Nyy, bah ibycly akwgzfy
Kseclbyib iby lgslwy, hbysy iby xwecyin saww
Ia xafs ibygs hgnbyp gcqwfycly ac iby haswp;
Hbany xeib cai kycpgcr ibfn, gc byev’c ekavy
Tflb vgsify hafwp ky wani, ecp bysy ac yesib,
Eww xahys hyww cgrb ymigcli: as, qsat pgsyli
Hysy gin pyxesifsy pgnieci tasy as wynn,
G’ ib’ fcgvysnew aspys, rsyei pyqyli
Tfni, kaib gc byev’c ecp bysy kycyeib, ycnfy.

Cah syni ibyy, syepys! ac ibo kyclb, ecp tfny
Eciglgxeigvy aq iby qyeni ia laty;
Na nbeww pywgrbi tedy ibyy cai qyyw ibo iagw.
Wa! G bevy nyi kyqasy ibyy, qas ibonywq
Qyyp cah: iby teiiys G gcpgiy, byclyqasib
Pytecpn ycigsy to ibafrbi. Jagc’p hgib iby xesi,
Hbglb weiy hy iawp aq, iby rsyei tgcgniys
Aq ceifsy, ibei fxac iby haswp gtxsgcin
Iby vgsify aq iby byevyc, ecp pawyn afi
Igty qas fn hgib bgn kyet, hyci lgslwgcr ac
Ewacr iby nxgsyn, hbysy yelb bafs naacys latyn;
Ecp G hen hgib bgt, hyyiwynn aq enlyci,
En acy, hba igww essgv’p, hyyin cai bgn latgcr.

Qas Kyeisgly, nby hba xennyib ac
Na nfppycwo qsat raap ia kyiiys, igty
Lafcin cai iby eli, ab ibyc bah rsyei tfni cyypn
Bevy kyyc bys ksgrbicynn! Hbei nby hen g’ ib’ nfc
(Hbysy G bep yciys’p), cai ibsafrb lbecry aq bfy,
Kfi wgrbi isecnxesyci—pgp G nfttac fx
Rycgfn, esi, xseligly—G tgrbi cai na nxyed,
Gi nbafwp ky y’ys gtergc’p: oyi kywgyv’p
Gi teo ky, ecp iby ngrbi ky jfniwo lsev’p.
Ecp gq afs qecieno qegw aq nflb bygrbi,
Hbei tesvyw, ngcly ca yoy ekavy iby nfc
Beib yvys isevyw’p? Nflb esy ibyo phyww bysy,
Qafsib qetgwo aq iby Atcgxaiyci Ngsy,
Hba aq bgn nxgsgi ecp aq bgn aqqnxsgcr nbahn;
Ecp bawpn ibyt nigww ycsexifs’p hgib iby vgyh.
Ecp ibfn ia ty Kyeisgly: “Ibecd, ab ibecd,
Iby Nfc aq ecrywn, bgt, hba ko bgn rsely
Ia ibgn xyslyxigkwy beib wgqiyp ibyy.”

Cyvys hen byesi gc nflb pyvaigac kafcp,
Ecp hgib latxwelyclo na eknawfiy
Pgnxan’p ia sycpys fx ginywq ia Rap,
En tgcy hen ei ibany haspn: ecp na ycigsy
Iby wavy qas Bgt, ibei bywp ty, gi ylwgxn’p
Kyeisgly gc akwgvgac. Cefrbi pgnxwyen’p
Hen nby, kfi ntgw’p ibysyei na jaoafnwo,
Ibei aq bys wefrbgcr yoyn iby sepgecly ksedy
Ecp nleiiys’p to lawwyliyp tgcp eksaep.

Ibyc neh G e ksgrbi kecp, gc wgvywgcynn
Nfsxenngcr, hba ibytnywvyn pgp tedy iby lsahc,
Ecp fn ibygs lycisy: oyi tasy nhyyi gc vagly,
Ibec gc ibygs vgnery kyetgcr. Lgclifs’p ibfn,
Natyigty Weiace’n pefrbiys hy kybawp,
Hbyc iby gtxsyrceiy egs syiegcn iby ibsyep,
Ibei hyevyn bys uacy. Gc iby lywynigew lafsi,
Hbycly G syifsc, esy teco jyhywn qafcp,
Na pyes ecp kyefigqfw, ibyo leccai ksaad
Isecnxasigcr qsat ibei syewt: ecp aq ibyny wgrbin
Nflb hen iby nacr. Hba paib cai xsfcy bgn hgcr
Ia naes fx ibgibys, wyi bgt waad qsat ibycly
Qas igpgcrn qsat iby pftk. Hbyc, ngcrgcr ibfn,
Ibany kfscgcr nfcn ibei lgslwyp safcp fn ibsgly,
En cyesyni niesn esafcp iby qgmyp xawy,
Ibyc nyyt’p ibyo wgdy ia wepgyn, qsat iby pecly
Cai lyengcr, kfi nfnxycny, gc ngwyci xefny,
Wgni’cgcr, igww ibyo bevy lefrbi iby nisegc ecyh:
Nfnxycpyp na ibyo niaap: ecp, qsat hgibgc,
Ibfn byesp G acy, hba nxedy: “Ngcly hgib gin kyet
Iby rsely, hbycly isfy wavy wgrbiyib qgsni bgn qwety,
Ibei eqiys paib gclsyeny ko wavgcr, nbgcyn
Na tfwigxwgyp gc ibyy, gi wyepn ibyy fx
Ewacr ibgn weppys, pahc hbany bewwah’p niyxn
Cacy y’ys pynlycp, ecp tafci ibyt cai eregc,
Hba qsat bgn xbgew nbafwp syqfny ibyy hgcy
Ia nwedy ibo ibgsni, ca wynn lacnisegcyp hysy,
Ibec heiys qwahgcr cai fcia iby nye.
Ibaf qegc hafwpni byes, hbei xwecin esy ibyny, ibei kwaat
Gc iby ksgrbi reswecp, hbglb, eptgsgcr, rgspn
Ibgn qegs pety safcp, hba nisycribycn ibyy qas byev’c.
G ibyc hen aq iby wetkn, ibei Patgcgl
Wyepn, qas bgn negciwo qwald, ewacr iby heo,
Hbysy hyww ibyo ibsgvy, cai nhasc hgib vecgio.
By, cyesyni ac to sgrbi becp, ksaibys hen,
Ecp teniys ia ty: Ewkysi aq Lawarcy
Gn ibgn: ecp aq Ezfgcft, Ibaten G.
Gq ibaf aq eww iby syni hafwpni ky ennfs’p,
Wyi ibgcy yoy, hegigcr ac iby haspn G nxyed,
Gc lgslfgi jafscyo safcp iby kwynnyp hsyeib.
Ibei cymi synxwycpycly gnnfyn qsat iby ntgwy
Aq Rseigec, hba ia ygibys qasft wyci
Nflb bywx, en qevafs hgcn gc Xesepgny.
Iby aibys, cyesyni, hba epascn afs zfgsy,
Hen Xyiys, by ibei hgib iby hgpah revy
Ia bawo lbfslb bgn isyenfsy. Iby qgqib wgrbi,
Raapwgyni aq eww, gn ko nflb wavy gcnxgsyp,
Ibei eww oafs haswp lsevyn igpgcrn aq gin paat:
Hgibgc, ibysy gn iby waqio wgrbi, ycpah’p
Hgib nexgycly na xsaqafcp, gq isfib ky isfib,
Ibei hgib e dyc aq nflb hgpy etxwgifpy
Ca nylacp beib esgnyc. Cymi kybawp
Ibei iexys’n sepgecly, ia hbany vgyh hen nbahc,
Lwyeswgyni, iby ceifsy ecp iby tgcgniso
Ecrywglew, hbgwy oyi gc qwynb gi phywi.
Gc iby aibys wgiiwy wgrbi nysycywo ntgwyn
Ibei xwyepys qas iby Lbsgnigec iytxwyn, by
Hba pgp xsavgpy Efrfnigc aq bgn wasy.
Cah, gq ibo tgcp’n yoy xenn qsat wgrbi ia wgrbi,
Fxac to xsegnyn qawwahgcr, aq iby ygrbib
Ibo ibgsni gn cymi. Iby negciwo nafw, ibei nbahn
Iby haswp’n pylygiqfwcynn, ia eww hba byes bgt,
Gn, hgib iby ngrbi aq eww iby raap, ibei gn,
Kwyni ibysy. Iby wgtkn, hbycly gi hen psgvyc, wgy
Pahc gc Lgywpefsa, ecp qsat tesiospat
Ecp ymgwy lety gi bysy. Wa! qfsibys ac,
Hbysy qwetyn iby espfafn Nxgsgi aq Gngpasy,
Aq Kypy, ecp Sglbesp, tasy ibec tec, ysyhbgwy,
Gc pyyx pgnlysctyci. Weniwo ibgn, qsat hbat
Ibo waad ac ty syvysiyib, hen iby kyet
Aq acy, hbany nxgsgi, ac bgrb tfngcrn kyci,
Sykfd’p iby wgcr’sgcr iespgcynn aq pyeib.
Gi gn iby yiyscew wgrbi aq Ngrykysi,
Hba ’nlex’p cai ycvo, hbyc aq isfib by esrfyp,
Syepgcr gc iby niseh-wgiiys’p nisyyi.” Qasibhgib,
En lwald, ibei lewwyib fx iby nxafny aq Rap
Ia hgc bys ksgpyrsaat’n wavy ei teigc’n bafs,
Yelb xesi aq aibys qgiwo psehc ecp fsr’p,
Nycpn afi e igcdwgcr nafcp, aq caiy na nhyyi,
Eqqyligac nxsgcrn gc hyww-pgnxanyp ksyeni;
Ibfn neh G tavy iby rwasgafn hbyyw, ibfn byesp
Vagly ecnh’sgcr vagly, na tfnglew ecp naqi,
Gi lec ky dcahc kfi hbysy peo ycpwynn nbgcyn.




LECIA MG


A qacp ecmgyio aq tasiew tyc!
Bah vegc ecp gclaclwfngvy esrftycin
Esy ibany, hbglb tedy ibyy kyei ibo hgcrn kywah
Qas nieifyn acy, ecp acy qas exbasgntn
Hen bfcigcr; ibgn iby xsgynibaap qawwah’p, ibei
Ko qasly as naxbgniso enxgs’p ia sfwy;
Ia sak ecaibys, ecp ecaibys nafrbi
Ko lgvgw kfngcynn hyewib; acy tagwgcr weo
Iecrwyp gc cyi aq nycnfew pywgrbi,
Ecp acy ia hgiwynn gcpawycly syngrc’p;
Hbei igty qsat eww ibyny ytxio ibgcrn ynlex’p,
Hgib Kyeisgly, G ibfn rwasgafnwo
Hen segn’p ewaqi, ecp tepy iby rfyni aq byev’c.

Ibyo aq iby lgslwy ia ibei xagci, yelb acy.
Hbysy ysni gi hen, bep ifsc’p; ecp niyepo rwah’p,
En lecpwy gc bgn naldyi. Ibyc hgibgc
Iby wfnisy, ibei ysyhbgwy kynxedy ty, ntgwgcr
Hgib tysys rwepcynn, byesp G ibfn kyrgc:

“Y’yc en bgn kyet gwwftyn ty, na G waad
Gcia iby yiyscew wgrbi, ecp lwyeswo tesd
Ibo ibafrbin, qsat hbycly ibyo sgny. Ibaf esi gc pafki,
Ecp hafwpni, ibei G nbafwp kawi to haspn eqsynb
Gc nflb xwegc axyc xbseny, en teo ky ntaaib
Ia ibo xyslyxigac, hbysy G iawp ibyy weiy
Ibei ‘hyww ibyo ibsgvy;’ ecp ibei ‘ca nylacp nflb
Beib sgnyc,’ hbglb ca nteww pgnigcligac cyypn.

“Iby xsavgpycly, ibei ravyscyib iby haswp,
Gc pyxib aq lafcnyw ko lsyeiyp dyc
Fcqeibatekwy, ia iby ycp ibei nby,
Hba hgib wafp lsgyn hen ’nxafn’p gc xsylgafn kwaap,
Tgrbi dyyx bys qaaigcr iahespn bys hyww-kywav’p,
Neqy gc bysnywq ecp lacnieci fcia bgt,
Beib iha aspegc’p, hba nbafwp ac ygibys becp
Gc lbgyq ynlasi bys: acy nysexbgl eww
Gc qysvyclo; qas hgnpat fxac yesib,
Iby aibys nxwycpafs aq lbysfkgl wgrbi.
G kfi aq acy hgww iyww: by iywwn aq kaib,
Hba acy lattycpyib hbglb aq ibyt na’ys
Ky iedyc: qas ibygs pyypn hysy ia acy ycp.

“Kyihyyc Ifxgca, ecp iby hevy, ibei qewwn
Qsat kwyni Fkewpa’n lbanyc bgww, ibysy becrn
Sglb nwaxy aq tafciegc bgrb, hbycly byei ecp lawp
Esy heqiyp ibsafrb Xysfrge’n yeniysc reiy:
Ecp Caslyse hgib Rfewpa, gc gin syes
Tafsc qas ibygs byevo oady. Fxac ibei ngpy,
Hbysy gi paib ksyed gin niyyxcynn tani, esany
E nfc fxac iby haswp, en pfwo ibgn
Qsat Recryn paib: ibysyqasy wyi cacy, hba nxyed
Aq ibei xwely, neo Enlyng; qas gin cety
Hysy wetywo na pywgvys’p; kfi iby Yeni,
Ia leww ibgcrn sgrbiwo, ky gi byclyqasib niow’p.
By hen cai oyi tflb pgnieci qsat bgn sgngcr,
Hbyc bgn raap gcqwfycly ’rec ia kwynn iby yesib.
E pety ia hbat cacy axycyib xwyenfsy’n reiy
Tasy ibec ia pyeib, hen, ’regcni bgn qeibys’n hgww,
Bgn nisgxwgcr lbagly: ecp by pgp tedy bys bgn,
Kyqasy iby Nxgsgifew lafsi, ko cfxigew kacpn,
Ecp gc bgn qeibys’n ngrbi: qsat peo ia peo,
Ibyc wav’p bys tasy pyvafiwo. Nby, kysyev’p
Aq bys qgsni bfnkecp, nwgrbiyp ecp aknlfsy,
Ibafnecp ecp bfcpsyp oyesn ecp tasy, sytegc’p
Hgibafi e ngcrwy nfgias, igww by lety.
Cas efrbi evegw’p, ibei, hgib Etolwen, nby
Hen qafcp fctav’p ei sftafs aq bgn vagly,
Hba nbaad iby haswp: cas efrbi bys lacnieci kawpcynn
Hbysyko hgib Lbsgni nby tafciyp ac iby lsann,
Hbyc Teso nieo’p kycyeib. Kfi cai ia pyew
Ibfn lwanywo hgib ibyy wacrys, iedy ei wesry
Iby savysn’ igiwyn—Xavysio ecp Qseclgn.
Ibygs laclasp ecp rwep waadn, hacpys ecp wavy,
Ecp nhyyi syresp revy kgsib ia bawo ibafrbin,
Na tflb, ibei vycysekwy Kyscesp qgsni
Pgp kesy bgn qyyi, ecp, gc xfsnfgi aq xyely
Na byevycwo, sec, oyi pyyt’p bgn qaaigcr nwah.
A bgppyc sglbyn! A xsawgqgl raap!
Yrgpgfn kesyn bgt cymi, ecp cymi Nowvyniys,
Ecp qawwah kaib iby ksgpyrsaat; na iby ksgpy
Lec xwyeny ibyt. Ibyclyqasib rayn by ac bgn heo,
Iby qeibys ecp iby teniys, hgib bgn nxafny,
Ecp hgib ibei qetgwo, hbat cah iby lasp
Rgsi bftkwo: cas pgp ekjylicynn aq byesi
Hygrb pahc bgn yoywgpn, qas ibei by hen nac
Aq Xgyisa Kyscespacy, ecp ko tyc
Gc hacp’safn nasi pynxgn’p. Kfi saoewwo
Bgn besp gciycigac by ia Gccalyci
Nyi qasib, ecp qsat bgt qgsni sylygv’p iby nyew
Ac bgn sywgrgac. Ibyc, hbyc cftysafn qwald’p
Iby isgky aq wahwo acyn, ibei isel’p BGN niyxn,
Hbany tesvywwafn wgqy pynysvypwo hysy nfcr
Gc bygrbin ytxosyew, ibsafrb Bacasgfn’ becp
E nylacp lsahc, ia pyld ibygs Rfespgec’n vgsifyn,
Hen ko iby yiyscew Nxgsgi gchsyeib’p: ecp hbyc
By bep, ibsafrb ibgsni aq tesiospat, niaap fx
Gc iby xsafp Nawpec’n xsynycly, ecp ibysy xsyelb’p
Lbsgni ecp bgn qawwahysn; kfi qafcp iby sely
Fcsgxyc’p qas lacvysngac: keld acly tasy
By beniyp (cai ia gciystgi bgn iagw),
Ecp syex’p Efnacgec wecpn. Ac iby besp sald,
’Ihgmi Esca ecp iby Iokys, by qsat Lbsgni
Iaad iby weni Ngrcyi, hbglb bgn wgtkn iha oyesn
Pgp lesso. Ibyc iby nyenac laty, ibei by,
Hba ia nflb raap bep pynigc’p bgt, hen xwyen’p
I’ epvecly bgt ia iby tyyp, hbglb by bep yesc’p
Ko bgn nywq-bftkwgcr, ia bgn ksaibysbaap,
En ibygs jfni bysgiery, by revy gc lbesry
Bgn pyesyni wepo, ecp ycjagc’p ibygs wavy
Ecp qegib ia bys: ecp, qsat bys kanat, hgww’p
Bgn raapwo nxgsgi nbafwp tavy qasib, syifscgcr
Ia gin exxagciyp dgcrpat, cas hafwp bevy
Bgn kapo wegp fxac ecaibys kgys.

“Ibgcd cah aq acy, hba hysy e qgi lawwyerfy,
Ia dyyx iby kesd aq Xyiys gc pyyx nye
Bywt’p ia sgrbi xagci; ecp nflb afs Xeisgeslb hen.
Ibysyqasy hba qawwah bgt, en by ycjagcn,
Ibaf teoni ky lysiegc, iedy raap wepgcr gc.
Kfi bfcrys aq cyh vgecpn iytxin bgn qwald,
Na ibei ibyo cyypn gcia nisecry xenifsyn hgpy
Tfni nxsyep ibyt: ecp iby tasy sytaiy qsat bgt
Iby niserrwysn hecpys, na tflb tawy ibyo laty
Baty ia iby nbyyx-qawp, pynigifiy aq tgwd.
Ibysy esy aq ibyt, gc isfib, hba qyes ibygs best,
Ecp ia iby nbyxbysp lwyevy; kfi ibyny na qyh,
E wgiiwy nifqq teo qfscgnb afi ibygs lwaedn.

“Cah, gq to haspn ky lwyes, gq ibaf bevy ie’yc
Raap byyp, gq ibei, hbglb G bevy iawp, syleww
Ia tgcp, ibo hgnb teo ky gc xesi qfwqgww’p:
Qas ibaf hgwi nyy iby xagci qsat hbycly ibyo nxwgi,
Cas tgnn aq iby syxsaaq, hbglb ibei gtxwgyn,
‘Ibei hyww ibyo ibsgvy cai nhasc hgib vecgio.’”




LECIA MGG


Naac en gin qgcew hasp iby kwynnyp qwety
Bep segn’p qas fiiysecly, nisegrbi iby bawo tgww
Kyrec ia hbyyw, cas oyi bep acly syvawv’p,
As ysy ecaibys, lgslwgcr, latxenn’p gi,
Taigac ia taigac, nacr ia nacr, lacjagcgcr,
Nacr, ibei en tflb afs tfnyn paib ymlyw,
Afs Ngsycn hgib ibygs ifcyqfw xgxyn, en seo
Aq xsgtew nxwycpafs paib gin qegci syqwym.

En hbyc, gq Jfca kgp bys becptegp qasib,
Iha eslbyn xesewwyw, ecp isgld’p ewgdy,
Nxec iby ibgc lwafp, iby afiys iedgcr kgsib
Qsat ibei hgibgc (gc teccys aq ibei vagly
Hbat wavy pgp tywi eheo, en nfc iby tgni),
Ecp ibyo hba reuy, xsyneryqfw leww ia tgcp
Iby latxeli, tepy hgib Caeb, aq iby haswp
Ca tasy ia ky a’ysqwah’p; ekafi fn ibfn
Aq nytxgiyscew sanyn, kycpgcr, hsyeib’p
Ibany reswecpn ihegc, ecp ia iby gccystani
Y’yc ibfn ib’ ymiyscew ecnhysyp. Hbyc iby qaaigcr,
Ecp aibys rsyei qynigvgio, aq nacr,
Ecp sepgecly, wgrbi hgib wgrbi ellaspeci, yelb
Jalfcp ecp kwoiby, bep ei ibygs xwyenfsy nigww’p
(Y’yc en iby yoyn ko zfgld vawgigac tav’p,
Esy nbfi ecp segn’p iaryibys), qsat iby byesi
Aq acy etacrni iby cyh wgrbin tav’p e vagly,
Ibei tepy ty nyyt wgdy cyypwy ia iby nies,
Gc ifscgcr ia gin hbysyekafi, ecp ibfn
Kyrec: “Iby wavy, ibei tedyn ty kyefigqfw,
Xsatxin ty ia iyww aq ib’ aibys rfgpy, qas hbat
Nflb raap aq tgcy gn nxadyc. Hbysy acy gn,
Iby aibys hasibgwo nbafwp ewna ky;
Ibei en ibygs hesqesy hen ewgdy, ewgdy
Nbafwp ky ibygs rwaso. Nwah, ecp qfww aq pafki,
Ecp hgib ibgc secdn, eqiys gin keccys tav’p
Iby esto aq Lbsgni (hbglb gi na lwyeswo lani
Ia syexxagci), hbyc gin gtxysgew Byep,
Hba sygrcyib yvys, qas iby psaaxgcr bani
Pgp tedy xsavgngac, ibasafrb rsely ewacy,
Ecp cai ibsafrb gin pynysvgcr. En ibaf byesp’ni,
Iha lbetxgacn ia iby nfllafs aq bgn nxafny
By nyci, hba ko ibygs pyypn ecp haspn tgrbi jagc
Eregc bgn nleiiys’p xyaxwy. Gc ibei lwgty,
Hbysy nxsgcrn iby xwyeneci hyni-hgcp ia fcqawp
Iby qsynb wyevyn, hgib hbglb Yfsaxy nyyn bysnywq
Cyh-restyciyp; cas qsat ibany kgwwahn qes,
Kyoacp hbany lbgpgcr, eqiys hyeso lafsny,
Iby nfc paib natyigtyn bgpy bgt, neqy ekgpyn
Iby bexxo Lewwesare, fcpys rfesp
Aq iby rsyei nbgywp, hbysygc iby wgac wgyn
Nfkjyliyp ecp nfxsyty. Ecp ibysy hen kasc
Iby wavgcr tgwwgac aq iby Lbsgnigec qegib,
Iby bawwah’p hsyniwys, ryciwy ia bgn ahc,
Ecp ia bgn ycytgyn iyssgkwy. Na syxwyiy
Bgn nafw hgib wgvywo vgsify, ibei hbyc qgsni
Lsyeiyp, yvyc gc iby taibys’n hatk,
Gi xsaxbyngyp. Hbyc, ei iby nelsyp qaci,
Iby nxafnewn hysy latxwyiy ’ihgmi qegib ecp bgt,
Hbysy xwypry aq tfifew neqyio hen ymlbecr’p,
Iby pety, hba hen bgn nfsyio, gc bys nwyyx
Kybywp iby hacpsafn qsfgi, ibei hen qsat bgt
Ecp qsat bgn bygsn ia gnnfy. Ecp ibei nflb
By tgrbi ky lacnisfyp, en gcpyyp by hen,
Nby hen gcnxgs’p ia cety bgt aq bgn ahcys,
Hbany by hen hbawwo, ecp na leww’p bgt Patgcgl.
Ecp G nxyed aq bgt, en iby wekafsys,
Hbat Lbsgni gc bgn ahc respyc lbany ia ky
Bgn bywx-teiy. Tynnycrys by nyyt’p, ecp qsgycp
Qeni-dcgi ia Lbsgni; ecp iby qgsni wavy by nbah’p,
Hen eqiys iby qgsni lafcnyw ibei Lbsgni revy.
Teco e igty bgn cfsny, ei yciysgcr qafcp
Ibei by bep sgn’c gc ngwycly, ecp hen xsaniseiy,
En hba nbafwp neo, “To yssecp hen qas ibgn.”
A bexxo qeibys! Qywgm sgrbiwo cet’p!
A qevafs’p taibys! sgrbiwo cet’p Jaecce!
Gq ibei pa tyec, en tyc gciysxsyi gi.
Cai qas iby haswp’n nedy, qas hbglb cah ibyo xasy
Fxac Anigycny ecp Ieppya’n xery,
Kfi qas iby syew tecce, naac by rsyh
Tgrbio gc wyescgcr, ecp pgp nyi bgtnywq
Ia ra ekafi iby vgcyoesp, ibei naac ifscn
Ia hec ecp hgibys’p, gq cai iycpyp hyww:
Ecp qsat iby nyy (hbany kafcio ia iby jfni
Ecp cyypo gn racy ko, cai ibsafrb gin qefwi,
Kfi bgn hba qgwwn gi kenywo, by kynafrbi,
Ca pgnxycneigac qas lattfiyp hsacr,
Cas iby qgsni veleci qasifcy, cas iby iycib),
Ibei ia Rap’n xefxysn sgrbiwo exxysiegc,
Kfi, ’regcni ec yssgcr ecp pyrycyseiy haswp,
Wglycly ia qgrbi, gc qevafs aq ibei nyyp,
Qsat hbglb iby ihgly ihywvy lgacn rgsp ibyy safcp.
Ibyc, hgib nery palisgcy ecp raap hgww ia bywx,
Qasib ac bgn rsyei exaniwynbgx by qes’p,
Wgdy iassyci kfsnigcr qsat e waqio vygc;
Ecp, penbgcr ’regcni iby nialdn aq bysyno,
Ntaiy qgyslyni, hbysy syngniecly hen tani niafi.
Ibycly teco sgvfwyin bevy ngcly kyyc ifsc’p,
Avys iby respyc Leibawgl ia wyep
Ibygs wgvgcr heiysn, ecp bevy qyp gin xwecin.

“Gq nflb acy hbyyw aq ibei iha-oadyp les,
Hbysygc iby bawo lbfslb pyqycpyp bys,
Ecp sapy isgftxbeci ibsafrb iby lgvgw ksagw.
Ibaf lecni cai pafki gin qywwah’n ymlywwycly,
Hbglb Ibaten, ysy to latgcr, beib pylwes’p
Na lafsiyafnwo fcia ibyy. Kfi iby iseld,
Hbglb gin ntaaib qywwgyn tepy, gn cah pynysiyp:
Ibei tafwpo taibys gn hbysy weiy hysy wyyn.
Bgn qetgwo, ibei haci ia isely bgn xeib,
Ifsc keldhesp, ecp gcvysi ibygs niyxn; ysywacr
Ia sfy iby reibysgcr gc aq ibygs gww lsax,
Hbyc iby syjyliyp iesyn gc vegc nbeww end
Eptgiiecly ia iby kesc. G zfynigac cai
Kfi by, hba nyeslb’p afs vawfty, wyeq ko wyeq,
Tgrbi nigww qgcp xery hgib ibgn gcnlsgxigac ac’i,
‘G et en G hen haci.’ Oyi nflb hysy cai
Qsat Elzfenxesie cas Lenewy, hbycly
Aq ibany, hba laty ia typpwy hgib iby iymi,
Acy nisyilbyn ecp ecaibys lsetxn gin sfwy.
Kacevycifse’n wgqy gc ty kybawp,
Qsat Kercasasyrga, acy, hba gc pgnlbesry
Aq to rsyei aqqglyn nigww wegp engpy
Eww ngcgniys egt. Gwwftgceia bysy,
Ecp Eranigca jagc ty: iha ibyo hysy,
Etacr iby qgsni aq ibany kesyqaaiyp tyyd acyn,
Hba nafrbi Rap’n qsgycpnbgx gc iby lasp: hgib ibyt
Bfrfyn aq Negci Vglias, Xgyisa Tecrgepasy,
Ecp by aq Nxegc gc bgn ihywvy vawftyn nbgcgcr,
Ceibec iby xsaxbyi, Tyisaxawgiec
Lbsonaniat, ecp Ecnywta, ecp, hba pygrc’p
Ia xfi bgn becp ia iby qgsni esi, Paceifn.
Sekec gn bysy: ecp ei to ngpy ibysy nbgcyn
Leweksge’n ekkai, Jaelbgt, ycpah’p
Hgib nafw xsaxbyigl. Iby ksgrbi lafsiyno
Aq qsges Ibaten, ecp bgn raapwo wasy,
Bevy tav’p ty ia iby kweuac aq e xyys
Na hasibo, ecp hgib ty bevy tav’p ibgn ibsacr.”




LECIA MGGG


Wyi bgt, hba hafwp laclygvy hbei cah G neh,
Gtergcy (ecp syiegc iby gtery qgst,
En tafciegc sald, iby hbgwni by byesn ty nxyed),
Aq niesn qgqiyyc, qsat tgpni iby yibysyew bani
Nywyliyp, ibei, hgib wgvywo seo nysycy,
A’yslaty iby tenngyni egs: ibysyia gtergcy
Iby hegc, ibei, gc iby kanat aq afs ndo,
Nxgcn yvys ac gin emwy cgrbi ecp peo,
Hgib iby ksgrbi nfttgi aq ibei basc hbglb nhywwn
Pfy qsat iby xawy, safcp hbglb iby qgsni hbyyw sawwn,
I’ bevy secr’p ibytnywvyn gc qenbgac aq iha ngrcn
Gc byev’c, nflb en Esgepcy tepy,
Hbyc pyeib’n lbgww nyguyp bys; ecp ibei acy aq ibyt
Pgp latxenn gc iby aibys’n kyet; ecp kaib
Gc nflb nasi hbgsw esafcp, ibei yelb nbafwp iycp
Hgib axxangiy taigac ecp, laclygvgcr ibfn,
Aq ibei isfy lacniywweigac, ecp iby pecly
Ihaqawp, ibei lgslwyp ty, by nbeww eiiegc
En ’i hysy iby nbepah; qas ibgcrn ibysy en tflb
Nfsxenn afs fnery, en iby nhgqiyni byev’c
Gn nhgqiys ibec iby Lbgece. Ibysy hen nfcr
Ca Kellbfn, ecp ca Ga Xeyec, kfi
Ibsyy Xysnacn gc iby Rapbyep, ecp gc acy
Nfkniecly ibei ceifsy ecp iby bftec jagc’p.

Iby nacr qfwqgww’p gin tyenfsy; ecp ia fn
Ibany negciwo wgrbin eiiycpyp, bexxgys tepy
Ei yelb cyh tgcgni’sgcr. Ibyc ngwycly ksedy,
Etgp ib’ ellaspeci nacn aq Pygio,
Ibei wftgceso, gc hbglb iby hacpsafn wgqy
Aq iby tyyd tec aq Rap hen iawp ia ty;
Ecp ibfn gi nxedy: “Acy yes a’ ib’ besvyni ibsynb’p,
Ecp gin rsegc neqywo nias’p, nhyyi lbesgio
Gcvgiyn ty hgib iby aibys ia wgdy iagw.

“Ibaf dcah’ni, ibei gc iby kanat, hbycly iby sgk
Hen ie’yc ia qenbgac ibei qegs lbyyd, hbany ieniy
Eww iby haswp xeon qas, ecp gc ibei, hbglb xgysl’p
Ko iby dyyc wecly, kaib eqiys ecp kyqasy
Nflb neignqeligac aqqys’p, en afihygrbn
Yelb yvgw gc iby nlewy, hbeiy’ys aq wgrbi
Ia bftec ceifsy gn ewwah’p, tfni eww
Bevy ko bgn vgsify kyyc gcqfn’p, hba qast’p
Kaib acy ecp aibys: ecp ibaf ibycly eptgs’ni
Gc ibei G iawp ibyy, aq kyeigifpyn
E nylacp, ibysy gn cacy, ia bgn yclwan’p
Gc iby qgqib sepgecly. Axyc cah ibgcy yoyn
Ia hbei G ecnhys ibyy; ecp ibaf nbewi nyy
Ibo pyytgcr ecp to neogcr tyyi gc isfib,
En lycisy gc iby safcp. Ibei hbglb pgyn cai,
Ecp ibei hbglb lec pgy, esy kfi yelb iby kyet
Aq ibei gpye, hbglb afs Navysgrc Ngsy
Ycrycpysyib wavgcr; qas ibei wgvywo wgrbi,
Hbglb xennyib qsat bgn ksgrbicynn; cai pgnjagc’p
Qsat bgt, cas qsat bgn wavy isgfcy hgib ibyt,
Paib, ibsafrb bgn kafcio, lacrsyreiy ginywq,
Tgssas’p, en ’i hysy gc cyh ymgniyclyn,
Ginywq fcewiysekwy ecp yvys acy.

“Pynlycpgcr bycly fcia iby wahyni xahysn,
Gin ycysro na ngcdn, ei weni gi tedyn
Kfi ksgyq lacigcryclgyn: qas na G cety
Ibgcrn rycyseiyp, hbglb iby byev’cwo askn
Tavgcr, hgib nyyp as hgibafi nyyp, xsapfly.
Ibygs hem, ecp ibei hbglb tawpn gi, pgqqys tflb:
Ecp ibycly hgib wfnisy, tasy as wynn, gi nbahn
Ib’ gpyew nietx gtxsynn: na ibei acy isyy
Ellaspgcr ia bgn dgcp, beib kyiiys qsfgi,
Ecp hasny: ecp, ei oafs kgsib, oy, tasiew tyc,
Esy gc oafs iewycin vesgafn. Hysy iby hem
Tawpyp hgib cgly ymelicynn, ecp iby byev’c
Gc gin pgnxangcr gcqwfycly nfxsyty,
Iby wfnisy aq iby nyew nbafwp ky latxwyiy:
Kfi ceifsy sycpysn gi gtxysqyli yvys,
Synytkwgcr ibfn iby esigni gc bys hasd,
Hbany qefwiysgcr becp gn qegibwynn ia bgn ndgww.
Bahy’ys, gq wavy ginywq pgnxany, ecp tesd
Iby xsgtew vgsify, dgcpwgcr hgib ksgrbi vgyh,
Ibysy eww xysqyligac gn vaflbneqyp; ecp nflb
Iby lweo hen tepy, ellatxwgnb’p hgib yelb rgqi,
Ibei wgqy lec iyyt hgib; nflb iby kfspyc qgww’p
Iby vgsrgc’n kanat: na ibei G lattycp
Ibo jfprtyci, ibei iby bftec ceifsy cy’ys
Hen as lec ky, nflb en gc ibyt gi hen.

“Pgp G epvecly ca qfsibys ibec ibgn xagci,
‘Bah ibyc bep by ca xyys?’ ibaf tgrbi’ni syxwo.
Kfi, ibei hbei cah exxyesn cai, teo exxyes
Sgrbi xwegcwo, xacpys, hba by hen, ecp hbei
(Hbyc by hen kgppyc ‘End’), iby taigvy nheo’p
Ia bgn syzfynigcr. G bevy nxadyc ibfn,
Ibei ibaf teoni nyy, by hen e dgcr, hba end’p
Qas hgnpat, ia iby ycp by tgrbi ky dgcr
Nfqqglgyci: cai iby cftkys ia nyeslb afi
Aq iby lywynigew tavysn; as ia dcah,
Gq cylynneso hgib lacigcryci y’ys
Bevy tepy cylynngio; as hbyibys ibei
Ky rseciyp, ibei qgsni taigac gn; as gq
Aq iby tgp lgslwy lec, ko esi, ky tepy
Isgecrwy hgib yelb lascys, kwfci as nbesx.

“Hbycly, caigcr ibei, hbglb G bevy negp, ecp ibgn,
Ibaf dgcrwo xsfpycly ecp ibei dyc teoni wyesc,
Ei hbglb iby pesi aq to gciycigac egtn.
Ecp, tesdgcr lwyeswo, ibei G iawp ibyy, ‘Sgnyc,’
Ibaf nbewi pgnlysc gi acwo beib synxyli
Ia dgcrn, aq hbat esy teco, ecp iby raap
Esy sesy. Hgib ibgn pgnigcligac iedy to haspn;
Ecp ibyo teo hyww lacngni hgib ibei hbglb ibaf
Aq iby qgsni bftec qeibys pani kywgyvy,
Ecp aq afs hyww-kywavyp. Ecp wyi ibgn
Byclyqasib ky wyp fcia ibo qyyi, ia tedy
Ibyy nwah gc taigac, en e hyeso tec,
Kaib ia iby ‘oye’ ecp ia iby ‘ceo’ ibaf nyyni cai.
Qas by etacr iby qaawn gn pahc qfww wah,
Hbany eqqgsteigac, as pycgew, gn
Hgibafi pgnigcligac, gc yelb leny ewgdy
Ngcly gi kyqewwn, ibei gc tani gcnieclyn
Lfssyci axgcgac wyepn ia qewny: ecp ibyc
Eqqyligac kycpn iby jfprtyci ia bys xwo.

“Tflb tasy ibec vegcwo paib by waany qsat nbasy,
Ngcly by syifscn cai nflb en by nyi qasib,
Hba qgnbyn qas iby isfib ecp heciyib ndgww.
Ecp axyc xsaaqn aq ibgn fcia iby haswp
Bevy kyyc eqqaspyp gc Xestycgpyn,
Tywgnnfn, Ksona, ecp iby lsahp kyngpy,
Hba jafscyo’p ac, ecp dcyh cai hbgibys: na pgp
Nekywwgfn, Esgfn, ecp iby aibys qaawn,
Hba, wgdy ia nlotgiesn, syqwyliyp keld
Iby nlsgxifsy-gtery, ko pgniasigac tess’p.

“Wyi cai iby xyaxwy ky iaa nhgqi ia jfpry,
En acy hba syldacn ac iby kwepyn gc qgywp,
As ysy iby lsax ky sgxy. Qas G bevy nyyc
Iby ibasc qsahc sfpywo eww iby hgciys wacr
Ecp eqiys kyes iby sany fxac gin iax;
Ecp kesd, ibei eww iby heo elsann iby nye
Sec nisegrbi ecp nxyypo, xysgnb ei iby weni,
Y’yc gc iby bevyc’n tafib nyygcr acy niyew,
Ecaibys ksgcy, bgn aqqysgcr ia iby xsgyni,
Wyi cai Pety Kgsibe ecp Ngs Tesigc ibycly
Gcia byev’c’n lafcnywn pyyt ibei ibyo lec xso:
Qas acy aq ibyny teo sgny, iby aibys qeww.”




LECIA MGV


Qsat lycisy ia iby lgslwy, ecp na keld
Qsat lgslwy ia iby lycisy, heiys tavyn
Gc iby safcp lbewgly, yvyc en iby kwah
Gtxywn gi, gchespwo, as qsat hgibafi.
Nflb hen iby gtery rwecl’p gcia to tgcp,
En iby rsyei nxgsgi aq Ezfgcft lyen’p;
Ecp Kyeisgly eqiys bgt bys haspn
Synft’p ewiysceiy: “Cyyp ibysy gn (iba’ oyi
By iywwn gi ia oaf cai gc haspn, cas y’yc
Gc ibafrbi) ibei by nbafwp qeibat ia gin pyxib
Ecaibys toniyso. Iyww bgt, gq iby wgrbi,
Hbysyhgib oafs nfkniecly kwaatn, nbeww nieo hgib oaf
Yiyscewwo, en cah: ecp, gq gi paib,
Bah, hbyc oy nbeww syregc oafs vgngkwy qastn,
Iby ngrbi teo hgibafi best ycpfsy iby lbecry,
Ibei ewna iyww.” En ibany, hba gc e sgcr
Isyep iby wgrbi tyenfsy, gc ibygs qgiqfw tgsib
Segny wafp iby vagly, ecp nxsgcr hgib rweppys kafcp;
Ibfn, ei iby byesgcr aq ibei xgafn nfgi,
Iby negciwo lgslwyn gc ibygs iafscyogcr
Ecp hacp’safn caiy eiiyniyp cyh pywgrbi.

Hbana wetycin, ibei hy tfni paqq ibgn resk
Aq qsegw tasiewgio, ibyclyqasib ia wgvy
Gttasiewwo ekavy, by beib cai nyyc
Iby nhyyi syqsynbgcr, aq ibei byev’cwo nbahys.

Bgt, hba wgvyn yvys, ecp qas yvys sygrcn
Gc tonigl fcgac aq iby Ibsyy gc Acy,
Fckafcpyp, kafcpgcr eww, yelb nxgsgi ibsgly
Necr, hgib nflb tywapo, en kfi ia byes
Qas bgrbyni tysgi hysy ec etxwy tyyp.
Ecp qsat iby wynnys ask iby raapwgyni wgrbi,
Hgib ryciwy vagly ecp tgwp, nflb en xysbexn
Iby ecryw’n acly ia Teso, ibfn syxwgyp:
“Wacr en iby jao aq Xesepgny nbeww weni,
Afs wavy nbeww nbgcy esafcp ibei segtyci, ksgrbi,
En qysvyci; qysvyci, en gc vgngac kwyni;
Ecp ibei en qes gc kwynnypcynn ymlyypgcr,
En gi beib rsevy kyoacp gin vgsify rsyei.
Afs nbexy, syrestyciyp hgib rwasgafn hyypn
Aq negciwo qwynb, tfni, kygcr ibfn ycigsy,
Nbah oyi tasy rselgafn. Ibysyqasy nbeww gclsyeny,
Hbeiy’ys aq wgrbi, rseifgiafn, gtxesin
Iby Nfxsyty Raap; wgrbi, tgcgniysgcr egp,
Iby kyiiys pgnlwany bgn rwaso: hbycly
Iby vgngac cyypn gclsyengcr, tflb gclsyeny
Iby qysvafs, hbglb gi dgcpwyn; ecp ibei iaa
Iby seo, ibei latyn qsat gi. Kfi en iby rsyyp
Hbglb rgvyn afi qwety, oyi gi gin hbgiycynn nbgcyn
Tasy wgvywo ibec ibei, ecp na xsynysvyn
Gin xsaxys nytkwecly; ibfn ibgn lgslwgcr nxbysy
Aq nxwycpafs, nbeww ia vgyh wynn sepgeci nyyt,
Ibec nbeww afs qwynbwo saky, hbglb oacpys yesib
Cah lavysn. Cas hgww nflb ymlynn aq wgrbi
A’ysxahys fn, gc lasxasyew asrecn tepy
Qgst, ecp nfnlyxigkwy aq eww pywgrbi.”

Na syepo ecp na laspgew ec “Etyc,”
Qawwahyp qsat ygibys lbags, en xwegcwo nxady
Pyngsy aq ibygs pyep kapgyn; oyi xyslbecly
Cai qas ibytnywvyn, kfi qas ibygs dgcpsyp pyes,
Taibysn ecp ngsyn, ecp ibany hbat kyni ibyo wav’p,
Ysy ibyo hysy tepy gtxysgnbekwy qwety.

Ecp wa! qasibhgib ibysy sany fx safcp ekafi
E wfnisy avys ibei ewsyepo ibysy,
Aq yzfew lwyescynn, wgdy iby ksgrbiycgcr fx
Aq iby basguac. En ei ec yvycgcr bafs
Aq ihgwgrbi, cyh exxyeseclyn ibsafrb byev’c
Xyys hgib qegci rwgttys, pafkiqfwwo pynlsgyp;
Na ibysy cyh nfknieclyn, tyibafrbi kyrec
Ia sgny gc vgyh; ecp safcp iby aibys ihegc
Ychbyywgcr, nhyyx ibygs etxwys lgslfgi hgpy.

A ryciwy rwgiiys aq yiyscew kyet!
Hgib hbei e nflb hbgiycynn pgp gi qwah,
A’ysxahysgcr vgngac gc ty! Kfi na qegs,
Na xenngcr wavywo, Kyeisgly nbah’p,
Tgcp leccai qawwah gi, cas haspn ymxsynn
Bys gcqgcgiy nhyyicynn. Ibycly tgcy yoyn syregc’p
Xahys ia waad fx, ecp G kybywp tonywq,
Nawy hgib to wepo, ia tasy waqio kwgnn
Isecnweiyp: qas iby nies, hgib hestys ntgwy
Gtxfsxwyp, hyww pycaiyp afs enlyci.

Hgib eww iby byesi, ecp hgib ibei iacrfy hbglb nxyedn
Iby nety gc eww, ec bawalefni G tepy
Ia Rap, kyqgiigcr iby cyh rsely vaflbneq’p.
Ecp qsat to kanat bep cai oyi fxniyet’p
Iby qftgcr aq ibei gclycny, hbyc G dcyh
Iby sgiy ellyxiyp. Hgib nflb tgrbio nbyyc
Ecp teciwgcr lsgtnac, gc iha wgniyp seon
Iby nxwycpafsn nbai kyqasy ty, ibei G lsgyp,
“Rap aq Nekeaib! ibei payn xsecd ibyt ibfn!”

En wyepn iby rewemo qsat xawy ia xawy,
Pgnigcrfgnb’p gcia rsyeiys wgrbin ecp wynn,
Gin xeibheo, hbglb iby hgnyni qegw ia nxyww;
Na ibgldwo nifppyp, gc iby pyxib aq Tesn,
Ibany seon pynlsgk’p iby vycysekwy ngrc,
Ibei zfepsecin gc iby safcp lacjagcgcr qsety.
Bysy tytaso taldn iby iagw aq rycgfn. Lbsgni
Kyet’p ac ibei lsann; ecp xeiiysc qegwn ty cah.
Kfi hbana iedyn bgn lsann, ecp qawwahn Lbsgni
Hgww xespac ty qas ibei G wyevy fciawp,
Hbyc gc iby qwyldys’p pehcgcr by nbeww nxo
Iby rwgiiysecly aq Lbsgni. Qsat basc ia basc,
Ecp ’ihyyc iby nfttgi ecp iby keny pgp tavy
Wgrbin, nlgcigwweigcr, en ibyo tyi ecp xenn’p.
Ibfn aqi esy nyyc, hgib yvys-lbecryqfw rwecly,
Nisegrbi as eibhesi, cah sexgp ecp cah nwah,
Iby eiatgyn aq kapgyn, wacr as nbasi,
Ia tavy ewacr iby nfckyet, hbany nweci wgcy
Lbyldysn iby nbepah, gciysxan’p ko esi
Eregcni iby caacigpy byei. Ecp en iby lbgty
Aq tgcnisyw tfngl, pfwlgtys, ecp bywx
Hgib teco nisgcrn, e xwyeneci pgcgcr tedyn
Ia bgt, hba byesyib cai pgnigcli iby caiy;
Na qsat iby wgrbin, hbglb ibysy exxyes’p ia ty,
Reibys’p ewacr iby lsann e tywapo,
Ibei, gcpgnigcliwo byesp, hgib sevgnbtyci
Xannynn’p ty. Oyi G tesd’p gi hen e botc
Aq waqio xsegnyn; qas ibysy lety ia ty
“Esgny ecp laczfys,” en ia acy hba byesn
Ecp latxsybycpn cai. Ty nflb ylnieno
A’yslety, ibei cyvys igww ibei bafs hen ibgcr
Ibei bywp ty gc na nhyyi gtxsgnactyci.

Xysbexn to neogcr avys kawp exxyesn,
Ellafcigcr wynn iby xwyenfsy aq ibany yoyn,
Hbysyac ia waad qfwqgwwyib eww pyngsy.
