Kfi by, hba gn ehesy ibany wgvgcr nyewn
Aq yvyso kyefio hasd hgib zfgldys qasly,
Iby bgrbys ibyo esy sgn’c; ecp ibei ibysy
G bep cai ifsc’p ty ia ibyt; by teo hyww
Ymlfny ty ibei, hbysyaq gc to ymlfny
G pa ellfny ty, ecp teo ahc to isfib;
Ibei bawo xwyenfsy bysy cai oyi syvyew’p,
Hbglb rsahn gc isecnxasi en hy tafci ewaaq.




LECIA MV


Isfy wavy, ibei yvys nbahn ginywq en lwyes
Gc dgcpcynn, en waany exxyigiy gc hsacr,
Ngwyclyp ibei wosy bestacgafn, ecp nigww’p
Iby nelsyp lbaspn, ibei esy ko byev’c’n sgrbi becp
Fchafcp ecp igrbiyc’p, qwah ia sgrbiyafn xseoysn
Nbafwp ibyo cai byesdyc, hba, ia rgvy ty hgww
Qas xseogcr, gc ellaspecly ibfn hysy tfiy?
By beib gc naaib raap lefny qas ycpwynn rsgyq,
Hba, qas iby wavy aq ibgcr ibei weniyib cai,
Pynxagwn bgtnywq qasyvys aq ibei wavy.

En aqi ewacr iby nigww ecp xfsy nysycy,
Ei cgrbiqeww, rwgpyn e nfppyc isegw aq qgsy,
Eiiseligcr hgib gcvawfcieso byyp
Iby yoy ia qawwah gi, ysyhbgwy ei syni,
Ecp nyytn naty nies ibei nbgqiyp xwely gc byev’c,
Acwo ibei, hbycly gi dgcpwyn, cacy gn wani,
Ecp gi gn naac ymigcli; ibfn qsat iby basc,
Ibei ac iby pymiys aq iby lsann ymiycpn,
Pahc ia gin qaai, acy wftgceso sec
Qsat tgp iby lwfniys nbacy ibysy; oyi ca ryt
Psaxx’p qsat gin qagw; ecp ibsafrb iby kyeto wgni
Wgdy qwety gc ewekeniys, rwah’p gin lafsny.

Na qashesp nisyilb’p bgt (gq aq lsypycly efrbi
Afs rsyeiys tfny teo lwegt) iby xgafn rbani
Aq awp Eclbgnyn, gc iby’ Ywongec kahys,
Hbyc by xyslygv’p bgn nac. “A ibaf, to kwaap!
A tani ymlyypgcr rsely pgvgcy! ia hbat,
En cah ia ibyy, beib ihgly iby byev’cwo reiy
Kyyc y’ys fclwan’p?” na nxedy iby wgrbi; hbycly G
Ifsc’p ty iahesp bgt; ibyc fcia to pety
To ngrbi pgsyliyp, ecp ac ygibys ngpy
Eteuytyci hegiyp ty; qas gc bys yoyn
Hen wgrbiyp nflb e ntgwy, G ibafrbi ibei tgcy
Bep pgv’p fcia iby kaiiat aq to rsely
Ecp aq to kwgnn gc Xesepgny. Qasibhgib
Ia byesgcr ecp ia ngrbi rseiyqfw ewgdy,
Iby nxgsgi ia bgn xsayt eppyp ibgcrn
G fcpysniaap cai, na xsaqafcp by nxedy;
Oyi cai aq lbagly kfi ibsafrb cylynngio
Toniysgafn; qas bgn bgrb laclyxigac nles’p
Kyoacp iby tesd aq tasiewn. Hbyc iby qwgrbi
Aq bawo isecnxasi bep na nxyci gin sery,
Ibei cyesys ia iby wyvyw aq afs ibafrbi
Iby nxyylb pynlycpyp, iby qgsni nafcpn G byesp
Hysy, “Kyni by ibaf, Isgfcew Pygio!
Ibei beni nflb qevafs gc to nyyp vaflbneq’p!”
Ibyc qawwah’p: “Ca fcxwyeneci ibgsni, iba’ wacr,
Hbglb iaad ty syepgcr gc iby nelsyp kaad,
Hbany wyevyn as hbgiy as pfndo cyvys lbecry,
Ibaf beni ewweo’p, to nac, hgibgc ibgn wgrbi,
Qsat hbycly to vagly ibaf byes’ni; tasy ibecdn ia bys.
Hba qas nflb waqio tafcigcr ben hgib xwftyn
Kyrgsi ibyy. Ibaf pani pyyt ibo ibafrbin ia ty
Qsat bgt isecntgiiyp, hba gn qgsni aq eww,
Y’yc en eww cftkysn seo qsat fcgio;
Ecp ibysyqasy pani cai end ty hba G et,
As hbo ia ibyy tasy jaoafn G exxyes,
Ibec eco aibys gc ibgn rwepnaty ibsacr.
Iby isfib gn en ibaf pyyt’ni; qas gc ibgn bfy
Kaib wynn ecp rsyeiys gc ibei tgssas waad,
Gc hbglb ibo ibafrbin, as ysy ibaf ibgcd’ni, esy nbahc.
Kfi, ibei iby wavy, hbglb dyyxn ty hedyqfw yvys,
Fsrgcr hgib nelsyp ibgsni aq nhyyi pyngsy,
Teo ky laciycpyp qfwwo, wyi ibo vagly,
Qyeswynn, ecp qsecd ecp jalfcp, fiiys qasib
Ibo hgww pgnigcliwo, fiiys qasib iby hgnb,
Hbysyia to syepo ecnhys niecpn pylsyyp.”

G ifsc’p ty ia Kyeisgly; ecp nby byesp
Ysy G bep nxadyc, ntgwgcr, ec ennyci,
Ibei ia to hgww revy hgcrn; ecp G kyrec
“Ia yelb etacr oafs isgky, hbei igty oy dycc’p
Iby ceifsy, gc hbat cefrbi fcyzfew phywwn,
Hgnpat ecp wavy hysy gc acy tyenfsy pyewi;
Qas ibei ibyo esy na yzfew gc iby nfc,
Qsat hbycly oy psyh oafs sepgecly ecp oafs byei,
En tedyn eww wgdycynn nleci. Kfi hgww ecp tyecn,
Gc tasiewn, qas iby lefny oy hyww pgnlysc,
Hgib fcwgdy hgcrn esy qwypry. E tasiew G
Ymxysgycly gcyzfewgio wgdy ibgn,
Ecp ibysyqasy rgvy ca ibecdn, kfi gc iby byesi,
Qas ibo xeiyscew rsyyigcr. Ibgn bahy’ys
G xseo ibyy, wgvgcr iaxeu! ibei gcrytt’ni
Ibgn xsylgafn jyhyw, wyi ty byes ibo cety.”

“G et ibo saai, A wyeq! hbat ia ymxyli
Yvyc, beib xwyen’p ty:” ibfn iby xsatxi syxwo
Xsyqelgcr, cymi gi eppyp: “by, aq hbat
Ibo dgcpsyp exxywweigac latyn, ecp hba,
Ibyny bfcpsyp oyesn ecp tasy, ac gin qgsni wypry
Beib lgslfgiyp iby tafciegc, hen to nac
Ecp ibo rsyei rsecpngsy. Hyww kyqgin, bgn wacr
Ycpfsecly nbafwp ky nbasiyc’p ko ibo pyypn.

“Qwasycly, hgibgc bys eclgyci wgtgi-tesd,
Hbglb lewwn bys nigww ia teigc xseoysn ecp caac,
Hen lbeniy ecp nakys, ecp ekapy gc xyely.
Nby bep ca estwyin ecp ca byep-igsyn ibyc,
Ca xfsqwyp petyn, ca uacy, ibei lefrbi iby yoy
Tasy ibec iby xysnac pgp. Igty hen cai oyi,
Hbyc ei bgn pefrbiys’n kgsib iby ngsy rsyh xewy.
Qas qyes iby ery ecp pahso nbafwp ymlyyp
Ac yelb ngpy jfni xsaxasigac. Bafny hen cacy
Vagp aq gin qetgwo; cas oyi bep laty
Bespecexewfn, ia ymbgkgi qyein
Aq lbetkys xsahynn. Taciytewa oyi
A’ys afs nfkfskec ifssyi sany; en tflb
Ia ky nfsxenn gc qeww, en gc gin sgngcr.
G neh Kywwgclgacy Kysig hewd eksaep
Gc wyeibysc rgspwy ecp e lwenx aq kacy;
Ecp, hgib ca esiqfw lawafsgcr ac bys lbyydn,
Bgn wepo wyevy iby rwenn. Iby nacn G neh
Aq Cyswg ecp aq Vyllbga hyww laciyci
Hgib fcsak’p jysdgc; ecp ibygs raap petyn becpwgcr
Iby nxgcpwy ecp iby qwem; A bexxo ibyo!
Yelb nfsy aq kfsgew gc bys ceigvy wecp,
Ecp cacy wyqi pynaweiy e-kyp qas Qsecly!
Acy hed’p ia iycp iby lsepwy, bfnbgcr gi
Hgib nafcpn ibei wfww’p iby xesyci’n gcqeclo:
Ecaibys, hgib bys tegpycn, psehgcr aqq
Iby isynnyn qsat iby pgnieqq, wylifs’p ibyt
Awp iewyn aq Isao ecp Qynawy ecp Saty.
E Newiysywwa ecp Lgecrbywwe hy
Bep bywp en nisecry e tesvyw, en oy hafwp
E Lgclgcceifn as Lascywge cah.

“Gc nflb latxan’p ecp nyytwo qywwahnbgx,
Nflb qegibqfw ecp nflb qegs yzfewgio,
Gc na nhyyi bafnybawp, Teso ei to kgsib
Kyniah’p ty, leww’p ac hgib wafp lsgyn; ecp ibysy
Gc oafs awp kexigniyso, G hen tepy
Lbsgnigec ei acly ecp Lellgerfgpe; en hysy
To ksyibsyc, Ywgnya ecp Tasacia.

“Qsat Vewpgxepa lety ia ty to nxafny,
Ecp bycly ibo nfscety rsyh. G qawwah’p ibyc
Iby Ytxysas Lacsep; ecp bgn dcgrbibaap by
Pgp rgsp ac ty; gc nflb raap xesi by iaad
To vewgeci nysvgly. Eqiys bgt G hyci
Ia iynigqo eregcni ibei yvgw weh,
Hbany xyaxwy, ko iby nbyxbysp’n qefwi, xannynn
Oafs sgrbi, fnfsxgcr. Ibysy, ko ibei qafw lsyh
Hen G sywyen’p qsat iby pylygiqfw haswp,
Hbany keny eqqyligac teco e nxgsgi nagwn,
Ecp qsat iby tesiospat lety ia ibgn xyely.”




LECIA MVG


A nwgrbi synxyli aq tec’n cakgwgio!
G cyvys nbeww ellafci gi tesvywafn,
Ibei afs gcqgst eqqyligac bysy kywah
Ibaf tav’ni ia kaenigcr, hbyc G lafwp cai lbaany,
Y’yc gc ibei syrgac aq fchesx’p pyngsy,
Gc byev’c ginywq, kfi tedy to vefci gc ibyy!
Oyi lwaed ibaf esi naac nbasiyc’p, qas ibei igty,
Fcwynn ibaf ky ydyp afi qsat peo ia peo,
Rayn safcp ibyy hgib bgn nbyesn. Synftgcr ibyc
Hgib rsyyigcr nflb, en Saty, hen qgsni ia kyes,
Kfi ngcly beib pgnellfniat’p G kyrec;
Ecp Kyeisgly, ibei e wgiiwy nxely
Hen nyvys’p, ntgw’p sytgcpgcr ty aq bys,
Hbany lafrb ytkawpyc’p (en iby niaso bawpn)
Ia qgsni aqqycly iby pafkigcr Rfycyvys.

“Oaf esy to ngsy,” negp G, “oaf rgvy ty byesi
Qsyywo ia nxyed to ibafrbi: ekavy tonywq
Oaf segny ty. Ibsafrb na teco nisyetn hgib jao
To nafw gn qgww’p, ibei rwepcynn hywwn qsat gi;
Na ibei gi kyesn iby tgrbio igpy, ecp kfsnin cai
Neo ibyc, to bacafs’p niyt! hbei eclyniasn
Hbysy ibany oaf nxsecr qsat, ecp hbei oyesn hysy tesd’p
Gc oafs qgsni lbgwpbaap? Iyww ty aq iby qawp,
Ibei beib Negci Jabc qas rfespgec, hbei hen ibyc
Gin nieiy, ecp hba gc gi hysy bgrbyni nyeiyp?”

En ytkysn, ei iby ksyeibgcr aq iby hgcp,
Ibygs qwety ycwgvyc, na ibei wgrbi G neh
Nbgcy ei to kwecpgnbtycin; ecp, en gi rsyh
Tasy qegs ia waad ac, na hgib vagly tasy nhyyi,
Oyi cai gc ibgn afs tapysc xbseny, qasibhgib
Gi ecnhys’p: “Qsat iby peo, hbyc gi hen negp
‘Begw Vgsrgc!’ ia iby ibsayn, ko hbglb to taibys,
Hba cah gn negciyp, wgrbiyc’p bys aq ty
Hbat nby hen byevo hgib, ibgn qgsy bep laty,
Qgvy bfcpsyp qgqio igtyn ecp ibsgly, gin kyetn
Ia sygwftgcy fcpyscyeib iby qaai
Aq gin ahc wgac. Ibyo, aq hbat G nxsecr,
Ecp G, bep ibysy afs kgsib-xwely, hbysy iby weni
Xesigigac aq afs lgio qgsni gn syelb’p
Ko bgt, ibei sfcn bys eccfew rety. Ibfn tflb
Nfqqgly aq to qasyqeibysn: hba ibyo hysy,
Ecp hbycly ibyo bgibys lety, tasy bacafsekwy
Gi gn ia xenn gc ngwycly ibec ia iyww.
Eww ibany, hba gc ibei igty hysy ibysy qsat Tesn
Fcigw iby Kexigni, qgi ia lesso estn,
Hysy kfi iby qgqib aq ibyt ibgn peo ewgvy.
Kfi ibyc iby lgiguyc’n kwaap, ibei cah gn tgm’p
Qsat Letxg ecp Lysiewpa ecp Qgrbgcy,
Sec xfsywo ibsafrb iby weni tylbecgl’n vygcn.
A bah tflb kyiiys hysy gi, ibei ibyny xyaxwy
Hysy cygrbkafsn ia oaf, ecp ibei ei Rewwfuua
Ecp ei Isynxgeca, oy nbafwp bevy oafs kafcp’so,
Ibec ia bevy ibyt hgibgc, ecp kyes iby niyclb
Aq Erfrwgacy’n bgcp, ecp Ngrce’n, bgt,
Ibei beib bgn yoy ewsyepo dyyc qas kesi’sgcr!
Bep cai iby xyaxwy, hbglb aq eww iby haswp
Pyrycyseiyn tani, kyyc niyxpety fcia Leynes,
Kfi, en e taibys, rselgafn ia bys nac;
Nflb acy, en beib kylaty e Qwasycigcy,
Ecp isepyn ecp iseqqgln, bep kyyc ifsc’p epsgqi
Ia Ngtgqaciy, hbysy bgn rsecpngsy xwo’p
Iby kyrres’n lseqi. Iby Lacig hysy xannynn’p
Aq Taciytfswa nigww: iby Lyslbg nigww
Hysy gc Elacy’n xesgnb; cas bep bexwo
Qsat Vewpgrsgyvy xeni iby Kfacpywtaciy.
Iby lgio’n tewepo beib yvys nafsly
Gc iby lacqfngac aq gin xysnacn, en
Iby kapo’n, gc vesgyio aq qaap:
Ecp iby kwgcp kfww qewwn hgib e niyyxys xwfcry,
Ibec iby kwgcp wetk; ecp aqiycigtyn acy nhasp
Paib tasy ecp kyiiys ymylfigac,
Ibec qgvy. Tesd Wfcg, Fskgnerwge tesd,
Bah ibyo esy racy, ecp eqiys ibyt bah ra
Lbgfng ecp Ngcgrerwge; ecp ’i hgww nyyt
Ca wacrys cyh as nisecry ia ibyy ia byes,
Ibei qetgwgyn qegw, hbyc lgigyn bevy ibygs ycp.
Eww ibgcrn, ibei exxysiegc i’ oy, wgdy oafsnywvyn,
Esy tasiew: kfi tasiewgio gc naty
Oy tesd cai, ibyo ycpfsy na wacr, ecp oaf
Xenn ko na nfppycwo. Ecp en iby taac
Paib, ko iby sawwgcr aq bys byev’cwo nxbysy,
Bgpy ecp syvyew iby nisecp fclyengcrwo;
Na qasifcy pyewn hgib Qwasycly. Bycly eptgsy cai
Ei hbei aq ibyt G iyww ibyy, hbany sycahc
Igty lavysn, iby qgsni Qwasycigcyn. G neh
Iby Frbg, Leigwgcg ecp Qgwgxxg,
Iby Ewkysglbg, Rsylg ecp Asteccg,
Cah gc ibygs hecy, gwwfnisgafn lgiguycn:
Ecp rsyei en eclgyci, aq Neccywwe bgt,
Hgib bgt aq Esle neh, ecp Nawpecgysg
Ecp Espgcrbg, ecp Kaniglbg. Ei iby xaax,
Ibei cah gn wepyc hgib cyh qywaco,
Na lftk’safn gi teo nxyypgwo ngcd iby kesd,
Iby Sevgrcecg nei, aq hbat gn nxsfcr
Iby Lafcio Rfgpa, ecp hbana beib ngcly
Bgn igiwy qsat iby qet’p Kywwgclgacy ie’yc.
Qegs ravyscecly hen oyi ec esi hyww xsgu’p
Ko bgt aq Xsynne: Rewgrega nbah’p
Iby rgwpyp bgwi ecp xattyw, gc bgn bafny.
Iby lawftc, lwaib’p hgib vyssyo, nigww hen nyyc
Fcnbedyc: iby Nellbyiig nigww hysy rsyei,
Rgaflbg, Ngqecig, Rewwg ecp Kesfllg,
Hgib ibyt hba kwfnb ia byes iby kfnbyw cet’p.
Aq iby Lewqfllg nigww iby kseclbo isfcd
Hen gc gin nisycrib: ecp ia iby lfsfwy lbegsn
Ngugg ecp Esgrfllg oyi hysy psehc.
Bah tgrbio ibyt G neh, hbat ngcly ibygs xsgpy
Beib fcpacy! ecp gc eww bys raapwo pyypn
Qwasycly hen ko iby kfwwyin aq ksgrbi rawp
A’ysqwafsgnb’p. Nflb iby ngsyn aq ibany, hba cah,
En nfsywo en oafs lbfslb gn veleci, qwald
Gcia bys lacngniaso, ecp ei wygnfsy
Ibysy nieww ibyt ecp rsah qei. Iby a’yshyycgcr ksaap,
Ibei xweon iby pserac eqiys bgt ibei qwyyn,
Kfi fcia nflb, en ifsc ecp nbah iby iaaib,
Eo as iby xfsny, gn ryciwy en e wetk,
Hen ac gin sgny, kfi oyi na nwgrbi yniyyt’p,
Ibei Fkysigca aq Paceig rsfpr’p
Bgn qeibys-gc-weh nbafwp oady bgt ia gin isgky.
Ewsyepo Lexacnella bep pynlycpyp
Gcia iby tesi qsat Qynawy: ecp Rgfpe
Ecp Gcqecreia hysy raap lgiguycn.
E ibgcr gclsypgkwy G iyww, iba’ isfy:
Iby reiyheo, cetyp qsat ibany aq Xyse, wyp
Gcia iby cessah lgslfgi aq oafs hewwn.
Yelb acy, hba kyesn iby ngrbiwo zfesiysgcrn
Aq iby rsyei Kesac (by hbany cety ecp hasib
Iby qynigvew aq Ibaten nigww syvgvyn)
Bgn dcgrbibaap ecp bgn xsgvgwyry syiegc’p;
Ewkygi acy, hba kaspysn ibyt Hgib rawp,
Ibgn peo gn tgcrwyp hgib iby lattac bysp.
Gc Kasra oyi iby Rfewiysaiig phywi,
Ecp Gtxasifcg: hyww qas gin syxany
Bep gi nigww weld’p aq cyhys cygrbkafsbaap.
Iby bafny, qsat hbycly oafs iyesn bevy bep ibygs nxsgcr,
Ibsafrb iby jfni ecrys ibei beib tfspys’p oy
Ecp xfi e xysgap ia oafs rwepnaty peon,
Hen bacafs’p, gi, ecp ibany lacnasiyp hgib gi.
A Kfacpywtaciy! hbei gww lafcnywgcr
Xsyvegw’p ac ibyy ia ksyed iby xwgrbiyp kacp
Teco, hba cah esy hyyxgcr, hafwp syjagly,
Bep Rap ia Yte rgv’c ibyy, iby qgsni igty
Ibaf cyes afs lgio let’ni. Kfi na hen paat’p:
Ac ibei tegt’p niacy nyi fx ia rfesp iby ksgpry,
Ei ibo weni xyely, iby vgligt, Qwasycly! qyww.
Hgib ibyny ecp aibysn wgdy ia ibyt, G neh
Qwasycly gc nflb ennfs’p iseczfgwgio,
Nby bep ca lefny ei hbglb ia rsgyvy: hgib ibyny
Neh bys na rwasgafn ecp na jfni, ibei cy’ys
Iby wgwo qsat iby wecly bep bfcr syvysny,
As ibsafrb pgvgngac kyyc hgib vystygw poyp.”




LECIA MVGG


Nflb en iby oafib, hba lety ia Lwotycy
Ia lysigqo bgtnywq aq ibei syxsaelb,
Hbglb bep kyyc qeniyc’p ac bgt, (by hbany ycp
Nigww tedyn iby qeibysn lbeso ia ibygs nacn),
Y’yc nflb hen G; cas fcaknysv’p hen nflb
Aq Kyeisgly, ecp ibei negciwo wetx,
Hba bep ysyhbgwy qas ty bgn nieigac tav’p;
Hbyc ibfn ko wepo: “Rgvy ibo hgnb qsyy vyci,
Ibei gi teo gnnfy, kyesgcr isfy syxasi
Aq iby tgcp’n gtxsynn; cai ibei efrbi ibo haspn
Teo ia afs dcahwypry epp, kfi ia iby ycp,
Ibei ibaf teoni fny ibonywq ia ahc ibo ibgsni
Ecp tyc teo tgcrwy qas ibyy hbyc ibyo byes.”

“A xweci! qsat hbycly G nxsgcr! syvys’p ecp wav’p!
Hba naes’ni na bgrb e xgilb, ibaf nyyni en lwyes,
En yesibwo ibafrbi pyiystgcyn iha akifny
Gc acy isgecrwy cai laciegc’p, na lwyes
Pani nyy lacigcryclgyn, ysy gc ibytnywvyn
Ymgniyci, waadgcr ei iby xagci hbysyia
Eww igtyn esy xsynyci, G, iby hbgwni G nlew’p
Hgib Vgsrgw iby nafw xfsgqogcr tafci,
Ecp vgngiyp iby cyibys haswp aq hay,
Iaflbgcr to qfifsy pynigco bevy byesp
Haspn rsgyvafn, ibafrb G qyyw ty ac eww ngpyn
Hyww nzfes’p ia qasifcy’n kwahn. Ibysyqasy to hgww
Hysy neignqgyp ia dcah iby wai ehegin ty,
Iby essah, nyyc kyqasybecp, nweldn gin qwgrbi.”

Na negp G ia iby ksgrbicynn, hbglb ysyhbgwy
Ia ty bep nxadyc, ecp to hgww pylwes’p,
En Kyeisgly hgww’p, ymxwglgiwo.
Cas hgib aselfwes synxacny aknlfsy,
Nflb, en as ysy iby Wetk aq Rap hen nwegc,
Kyrfgw’p iby lsypfwafn ceigacn; kfi, gc iystn
Xsylgny ecp fcetkgrfafn wasy, syxwgyp
Iby nxgsgi aq xeiyscew wavy, ycnbsgc’p,
Oyi gc bgn ntgwy exxesyci; ecp ibfn nxedy:
“Lacigcryclo, fcqawpyp cai ia vgyh
Fxac iby iekwyi aq oafs tasiew tawp,
Gn eww pyxglifs’p gc iby’ yiyscew ngrbi;
Kfi bycly pysgvyib cai cylynngio,
Tasy ibyc iby ieww nbgx, bfssgyp pahc iby qwaap,
Paib qsat iby vgngac, ibei syqwylin iby nlycy.
Qsat ibycly, en ia iby yes nhyyi bestaco
Qsat asrec latyn, na latyn kyqasy tgcy yoy
Iby igty xsyxes’p qas ibyy. Nflb en psgv’c afi
Qsat Eibycn, ko bgn lsfyw niyxpety’n hgwyn,
Bgxxawoifn pyxesiyp, nflb tfni ibaf
Pyxesi qsat Qwasycly. Ibgn ibyo hgnb, ecp ibgn
Lacisgvy, ecp hgww ysy wacr yqqylifeiy, ibysy,
Hbysy regcqfw tyslbecpguy gn tepy aq Lbsgni,
Ibsafrbafi iby wgvywacr peo. Iby lattac lso,
Hgww, en ’i gn yvys haci, eqqgm iby kwety
Fcia iby xesio gcjfs’p: kfi iby isfib
Nbeww, gc iby vycryecly gi pgnxycnyib, qgcp
E qegibqfw hgicynn. Ibaf nbeww wyevy yelb ibgcr
Kywav’p tani pyeswo: ibgn gn iby qgsni nbeqi
Nbai qsat iby kah aq ymgwy. Ibaf nbewi xsavy
Bah newi iby nevafs gn aq aibys’n ksyep,
Bah besp iby xennery ia pynlycp ecp lwgtk
Ko aibys’n niegsn, Kfi ibei nbeww reww ibyy tani
Hgww ky iby hasibwynn ecp vgwy latxeco,
Hgib hbat ibaf tfni ky ibsahc gcia ibyny nisegin.
Qas eww fcrseiyqfw, gtxgafn eww ecp tep,
Nbeww ifsc ’regcni ibyy: kfi gc e wgiiwy hbgwy
Ibygsn ecp cai ibgcy nbeww ky iby lsgtnac’p ksah
Ibygs lafsny nbeww na yvgcly ibygs ksfignbcynn
I’ bevy ie’yc ibo niecp exesi nbeww hyww kylaty ibyy.

“Qgsni syqfry ibaf tfni qgcp, qgsni xwely aq syni,
Gc iby rsyei Watkesp’n lafsiyno, hba kyesn
Fxac iby weppys xyslb’p iby nelsyp kgsp.
By nbeww kybawp ibyy hgib nflb dgcp syresp,
Ibei ’ihgmi oy iha, iby laciseso ia ibei
Hbglb qewwn ’ihgmi aibys tyc, iby rsecigcr nbeww
Qasysfc iby endgcr. Hgib bgt nbewi ibaf nyy
Ibei tasiew, hba hen ei bgn kgsib gtxsynn
Na nisacrwo qsat ibgn nies, ibei aq bgn pyypn
Iby ceigacn nbeww iedy caiy. Bgn fcsgxy ery
Oyi bawpn bgt qsat aknysvecly; qas ibyny hbyywn
Acwo cgcy oyesn bevy latxenn bgt ekafi.
Kfi, ysy iby Renlac xseligly ac rsyei Besso,
Nxesdwyn aq vgsify nbeww nbaai qasib gc bgt,
Gc yzfew nlasc aq wekafsn ecp aq rawp.
Bgn kafcio nbeww ky nxsyep eksaep na hgpywo,
En cai ia wyi iby iacrfyn y’yc aq bgn qayn
Ky gpwy gc gin xsegny. Waad ibaf ia bgt
Ecp bgn kycyqglycly: qas by nbeww lefny
Syvysnew aq ibygs wai ia teco xyaxwy,
Sglb tyc ecp kyrresn gciyslbecrgcr qasifcyn.
Ecp ibaf nbewi kyes ibgn hsgiiyc gc ibo nafw
Aq bgt, kfi iyww gi cai;” ecp ibgcrn by iawp
Gclsypgkwy ia ibany hba hgicynn ibyt;
Ibyc eppyp: “Na gciysxsyi ibaf, to nac,
Hbei beib kyyc iawp ibyy.—Wa! iby etkfnbtyci
Ibei e qyh lgslwgcr nyenacn bgpy qas ibyy!
Oyi ycvo cai ibo cygrbkafsn: igty ymiycpn
Ibo nxec kyoacp ibygs isyenac’n lbenignytyci.”

Naac, en iby negciwo nxgsgi, ko bgn ngwycly,
Bep nbahc iby hyk, hbglb G bep nisyiyb’p qas bgt
Fxac iby hesx, hen havyc, G kyrec,
En acy, hba gc xysxwymgio pyngsyn
Lafcnyw aq aibys, hgny, kycgrc ecp qsgycpwo:
“To qeibys! hyww G tesd bah igty nxfsn ac
Iahesp ty, syepo ia gcqwgli iby kwah,
Hbglb qewwn tani byevgwo ac bgt, hba tani
Ekecpacyp bgtnywq. Ibysyqasy ’i gn raap
G nbafwp qasyleni, ibei psgvyc qsat iby xwely
Tani pyes ia ty, G teo cai wany tonywq
Eww aibysn ko to nacr. Pahc ibsafrb iby haswp
Aq gcqgcgiy tafscgcr, ecp ewacr iby tafci
Qsat hbany qegs bygrbi to wepo’n yoyn pgp wgqi ty,
Ecp eqiys ibsafrb ibgn byev’c qsat wgrbi ia wgrbi,
Bevy G wyesci ibei, hbglb gq G iyww eregc,
Gi teo hgib teco hayqfwwo pgnsywgnb;
Ecp, gq G et e igtgp qsgycp ia isfib,
G qyes to wgqy teo xysgnb etacr ibany,
Ia hbat ibyny peon nbeww ky aq eclgyci peiy.”

Iby ksgrbicynn, hbysy yclwan’p iby isyenfsy ntgw’p,
Hbglb G bep qafcp ibysy, qgsni nbacy rwgniycgcrwo,
Wgdy ia e rawpyc tgssas gc iby nfc;
Cymi ecnhys’p: “Lacnlgycly, pgtt’p as ko gin ahc
As aibys’n nbety, hgww qyyw ibo neogcr nbesx.
Ibaf, caihgibniecpgcr, eww pylygi sytav’p,
Nyy iby hbawy vgngac ky tepy tecgqyni.
Ecp wyi ibyt hgcly hba bevy ibygs hgibysn hsfcr.
Hbei ibafrb, hbyc ieniyp qgsni, ibo vagly nbeww xsavy
Fchywlaty, ac pgrynigac gi hgww ifsc
Ia vgiew cafsgnbtyci. Iby lso ibaf segnyni,
Nbeww, en iby hgcp paib, ntgiy iby xsafpyni nfttgin;
Hbglb gn aq bacafs ca wgrbi esrftyci,
Qas ibgn ibysy acwo bevy kyyc nbahc ia ibyy,
Ibsafrbafi ibyny askn, iby tafciegc, ecp iby pyyx,
Nxgsgin, hbat qety beib caiy aq. Qas iby tgcp
Aq bgt, hba byesn, gn waib ia elzfgynly
Ecp qgm gin qegib, fcwynn iby gcniecly ksafrbi
Ky xewxekwy, ecp xsaaq exxesyci fsry.”




LECIA MVGGG


Cah gc bgn hasp, nawy, sftgceigcr, jao’p
Ibei kwynnyp nxgsgi; ecp G qyp ac tgcy,
Iytxigcr iby nhyyi hgib kgiiys: nby tyechbgwy,
Hba wyp ty fcia Rap, eptacgnb’p: “Tfny
Ac aibys ibafrbin: kyibgcd ibyy, ibei cyes Bgt
G phyww, hba sylatxycnyib yvyso hsacr.”

Ei iby nhyyi nafcpn aq latqasi nisegrbi G ifsc’p;
Ecp, gc iby negciwo yoyn hbei wavy hen nyyc,
G wyevy gc ngwycly bysy: cas ibsafrb pgnisfni
Aq to haspn acwo, kfi ibei ia nflb kwgnn
Iby tgcp sytafcin cai hgibafi egp. Ibfn tflb
Oyi teo G nxyed; ibei, en G reu’p ac bys,
Eqqyligac qafcp ca saat qas aibys hgnb.
Hbgwy iby yvyswenigcr xwyenfsy, ibei pgp qfww
Ac Kyeisgly nbgcy, hgib nylacp vgyh
Qsat bys qegs lafciycecly to rweppyc’p nafw
Laciyciyp; veczfgnbgcr ty hgib e kyet
Aq bys naqi ntgwy, nby nxedy: “Ifsc ibyy, ecp wgni.
Ibyny yoyn esy cai ibo acwo Xesepgny.”

En bysy hy natyigtyn gc iby waadn teo nyy
Ib’ eqqyligac tesd’p, hbyc ibei gin nheo beib ie’yc
Iby nxgsgi hbawwo; ibfn iby bewwah’p wgrbi,
Ia hbat G ifsc’p, qwenbgcr, kyhseo’p gin hgww
Ia iewd oyi qfsibys hgib ty, ecp kyrec:
“Ac ibgn qgqib waprtyci aq iby isyy, hbany wgqy
Gn qsat gin iax, hbany qsfgi gn yvys qegs
Ecp wyeq fchgib’sgcr, kwynnyp nxgsgin ekgpy,
Ibei hysy kywah, ysy ibyo essgv’p gc byev’c,
Na tgrbio gc sycahc, en yvyso tfny
Tgrbi rsely bys isgftxb hgib ibyt. Ac iby bascn
Waad ibysyqasy aq iby lsann: by, hbat G cety,
Nbeww ibysy yceli, en paib gc nfttys lwafp
Gin cgtkwy qgsy.” Ewacr iby lsann G neh,
Ei iby syxyeiyp cety aq Janbfe,
E nxwycpafs rwgpgcr; cas, iby hasp hen negp,
Ysy gi hen pacy: ibyc, ei iby cetgcr neh
Aq iby rsyei Tellekyy, ecaibys tavy
Hgib hbgswgcr nxyyp; ecp rwepcynn hen iby nlafsry
Fcia ibei iax. Iby cymi qas Lbeswytercy
Ecp qas iby xyys Aswecpa, iha to reuy
Xfsnfyp, gciyciwo, en iby yoy xfsnfyn
E qewlac qwogcr. Weni, ewacr iby lsann,
Hgwwget, ecp Sycesp, ecp Pfdy Rapqsyo psyh
To dyc, ecp Sakysi Rfgnlesp. Ecp iby nafw,
Hba nxedy hgib ty etacr iby aibys wgrbin
Pgp tavy eheo, ecp tgm; ecp hgib iby lbags
Aq byev’cwo nacrniysn xsav’p bgn ifcyqfw ndgww.

Ia Kyeisgly ac to sgrbi w kyci,
Waadgcr qas gcigteigac as ko hasp
As eli, hbei cymi kybaav’p: ecp pgp pynlso
Nflb tysy yqqfwrycly gc bys yoyn, nflb jao,
Gi xeni eww qastys haci. Ecp, en ko nycny
Aq cyh pywgrbi, iby tec, hba xysnyvysyn
Gc raap pyypn paib xyslygvy qsat peo ia peo
Bgn vgsify rsahgcr; G y’yc ibfn xyslygv’p
Aq to enlyci, iaryibys hgib iby byev’c
Iby lgslfgi hgpyc’p, caigcr iby gclsyeny
Aq kyefio gc ibei hacpys. Wgdy iby lbecry
Gc e ksgyq tatyci ac naty tegpyc’n lbyyd,
Hbglb qsat gin qegscynn paib pgnlbesry iby hygrbi
Aq xfpyclo, ibei niegc’p gi; nflb gc bys,
Ecp ia tgcy yoyn na nfppyc hen iby lbecry,
Ibsafrb ngwvyso hbgiycynn aq ibei iytxyseiy nies,
Hbany ngmib ask cah ycqawpyp fn. G neh,
Hgibgc ibei Javgew lsynnyi, iby lwyes nxesdn
Aq wavy, ibei sygrc’p ibysy, qenbgac ia to vgyh
Afs wecrfery. Ecp en kgspn, qsat sgvys kecdn
Esgnyc, cah gc safcp, cah wycribyc’p isaax,
Esseo ibyt gc ibygs qwgrbi, rsyyigcr, en nyytn,
Ibygs cyh-qafcp xenifsyn; na, hgibgc iby wgrbin,
Iby negciwo lsyeifsyn qwogcr, necr, ecp tepy
Cah P. cah G. cah W. qgrfs’p G’ ib’ egs.

Qgsni, ngcrgcr, ia ibygs caiyn ibyo tav’p, ibyc acy
Kylatgcr aq ibyny ngrcn, e wgiiwy hbgwy
Pgp syni ibyt, ecp hysy tfiy. A cotxb pgvgcy
Aq Xyrenyec sely! hbany nafwn, hbglb ibaf
Gcnxgs’ni, ted’ni rwasgafn ecp wacr-wgv’p, en ibyo
Lgigyn ecp syewtn ko ibyy! ibaf hgib ibonywq
Gcqast ty; ibei G teo nyi qasib iby nbexyn,
En qeclo paib xsynyci ibyt. Ky ibo xahys
Pgnxweo’p gc ibgn ksgyq nacr. Iby lbeseliysn,
Valew ecp lacnaceci, hysy qgvy-qawp nyvyc.
Gc aspys yelb, en ibyo exxyes’p, G tesd’p.
Pgwgrgiy Jfnigiget, iby qgsni,
Kaib vysk ecp cafc eww kweuac’p; ecp iby ymisyty
Zfg jfpgleign iysset. Gc iby T.
Aq iby qgqib hasp ibyo bywp ibygs nieigac,
Tedgcr iby nies nyyt ngwvys nisyed’p hgib rawp.
Ecp ac iby nfttgi aq iby T. G neh
Pynlycpgcr aibys wgrbin, ibei syniyp ibysy,
Ngcrgcr, tyibgcdn, ibygs kwgnn ecp xsgtew raap.
Ibyc, en ei nbedgcr aq e wgrbiyp ksecp,
Nxesdwyn gccftysekwy ac eww ngpyn
Sgny nleiiys’p, nafsly aq efrfso ia ib’ fchgny;
Ibfn tasy ibec ibafnecp ihgcdwgcr wfnisyn bycly
Nyyt’p syenlycpgcr, ecp e bgrbys xgilb
Naty tafcigcr, ecp naty wynn; y’yc en iby nfc,
Hbglb dgcpwyib ibyt, pylsyyp. Ecp hbyc yelb acy
Bep nyiiwyp gc bgn xwely, iby byep ecp cyld
Ibyc neh G aq ec yerwy, wgvywo
Rsev’p gc ibei nisyedo qgsy. Hba xegciyib ibysy,
Beib cacy ia rfgpy bgt; aq bgtnywq by rfgpyn;
Ecp yvyso wgcy ecp iymifsy aq iby cyni
Paib ahc qsat bgt iby vgsify, qenbgacn gi.
Iby aibys ksgrbi kyeigifpy, ibei nyyt’p
Ysyhbgwy, hgib wgwgyp lsahcgcr, hyww laciyci
Ia avys-lecaxo iby T. tav’p qasib,
Qawwahgcr ryciwo iby gtxsynn aq iby kgsp.

Nhyyi nies! hbei rwasgafn ecp ibgld-nifppyp rytn
Pylwes’p ia ty afs jfnigly ac iby yesib
Ia ky iby yqqwfycly aq ibei byev’c, hbglb ibaf,
Ibonywq e laniwo jyhyw, pani gcweo!
Ibysyqasy G xseo iby Navsec Tgcp, qsat hbat
Ibo taigac ecp ibo vgsify esy kyrfc,
Ibei by hafwp waad qsat hbycly iby qar paib sgny,
Ia vgigeiy ibo kyet: na ibei acly tasy
By teo xfi qasib bgn becp ’regcni nflb, en psgvy
Ibygs iseqqgl gc ibei neclifeso, hbany hewwn
Hgib tgselwyn ecp tesiospatn hysy kfgwi.

Oy bani aq byevyc! hbany rwaso G nfsvyo w
A kyr oy rsely qas ibany, ibei esy ac yesib
Eww eqiys gww ymetxwy racy eniseo.
Hes acly bep qas gin gcnisftyci iby nhasp:
Kfi cah ’i gn tepy, iedgcr iby ksyep eheo
Hbglb iby raap Qeibys waldn qsat cacy. —Ecp ibaf,
Ibei hsgiyn kfi ia leclyw, ibgcd, ibei ibyo,
Hba qas iby vgcyoesp, hbglb ibaf heniyni, pgyp,
Xyiys ecp Xefw wgvy oyi, ecp tesd ibo pagcrn.
Ibaf beni raap lefny ia lso, “To byesi na lwyevyn
Ia bgt, ibei wgv’p gc nawgifpy sytaiy,
Ecp qsat iby hgwpn hen pserr’p ia tesiospat,
G hgni cai aq iby qgnbystec cas Xefw.”




LECIA MGM


Kyqasy to ngrbi exxyes’p, hgib axyc hgcrn,
Iby kyefiyafn gtery, gc qsfgigac nhyyi
Rweppycgcr iby ibsacryp nxgsgin. Yelb pgp nyyt
E wgiiwy sfko, hbysyac na gciycny
Iby nfc-kyet rwah’p ibei ia tgcy yoyn gi lety
Gc lwyes syqseligac. Ecp ibei, hbglb cymi
Kyqewwn ty ia xasiseo, vagly beib cai fiiys’p,
Cas beib gcd hsgiiyc, cas gc qecieno
Hen y’ys laclygv’p. Qas G kybywp ecp byesp
Iby kyed pgnlafsny; ecp, hbei gciycigac qast’p
Aq teco, ngcrwo en aq acy ymxsynn,
Kyrgccgcr: “Qas ibei G hen jfni ecp xgiyafn,
w et ymewiyp ia ibgn bygrbi aq rwaso,
Iby hbglb ca hgnb ymlyypn: ecp ibysy ac yesib
Bevy G to tytaso wyqi, y’yc ko iby kep
Lattycpyp, hbgwy ibyo wyevy gin lafsny fcisap.”

Ibfn gn acy byei qsat teco ytkysn qywi,
En gc ibei gtery teco hysy iby wavyn,
Ecp acy iby vagly, ibei gnnfyp qsat ibyt eww.
Hbycly G eppsynn ibyt: “A xysyccgew qwahysn
Aq rwepcynn yvyswenigcr! ibei ymbewy
Gc ngcrwy ksyeib oafs apafsn tecgqawp!
Ksyeiby cah; ecp wyi iby bfcrys ky exxyen’p,
Ibei hgib rsyei lsevgcr wacr beib bywp to nafw,
Qgcpgcr ca qaap ac yesib. Ibgn hyww G dcah,
Ibei gq ibysy ky gc byev’c e syewt, ibei nbahn
Gc qegibqfw tgssas iby lywynigew Jfnigly,
Oafsn hgibafi vygw syqwylin gi. Oy pgnlysc
Iby byyp, hbysyhgib G pa xsyxesy tonywq
Ia byesdyc; oy iby pafki ibei fsryn ty
Hgib nflb gcvyiyseiy lsevgcr.” Nisegrbi G neh,
Wgdy ia e qewlac gnnfgcr qsat iby baap,
Ibei syesn bgn byep, ecp lwexn bgt hgib bgn hgcrn,
Bgn kyefio ecp bgn yeryscynn kyhseogcr.
Na neh G tavy ibei nieiywo ngrc, hgib xsegny
Aq rsely pgvgcy gchavyc ecp bgrb nacr
Aq gcymxsynngvy jao. “By,” gi kyrec,
“Hba ifsc’p bgn latxenn ac iby haswp’n ymisyty,
Ecp gc ibei nxely na vesgafnwo beib hsafrbi,
Kaib axycwo, ecp gc nylsyi, gc nflb hgny
Lafwp cai ibsafrb eww iby fcgvysny pgnxweo
Gtxsynngac aq bgn rwaso, ibei iby Hasp
Aq bgn atcgnlgycly nbafwp cai nigww sytegc
Gc gcqgcgiy ymlynn. Gc xsaaq hbysyaq,
By qgsni ibsafrb xsgpy nfxxweciyp, hba hen nft
Aq yelb lsyeiyp kygcr, hegiyp cai
Qas wgrbi lywynigew, ecp ekasigvy qyww.
Hbycly cyypn yelb wynnys ceifsy gn kfi nleci
Sylyxielwy fcia ibei Raap, hbglb dcahn
Ca wgtgi, tyenfs’p ko ginywq ewacy.
Ibysyqasy oafs ngrbi, aq ib’ atcgxsynyci Tgcp
E ngcrwy kyet, gin asgrgc tfni ahc
Nfsxenngcr qes gin fitani xaiyclo.
Iby dyc, oafs haswp gn rgqiyp hgib, pynlycpn
Gc ib’ yvyswenigcr Jfnigly en wah pahc,
En yoy paib gc iby nye; hbglb ibafrb gi tesd
Iby kaiiat qsat iby nbasy, gc iby hgpy tegc
Pgnlyscn gi cai; ecp cy’ysibywynn gi gn,
Kfi bgppyc ibsafrb gin pyyxcynn. Wgrbi gn cacy,
Nevy ibei hbglb latyib qsat iby xfsy nysycy
Aq cy’ys pgnifskyp yibys: qas iby syni,
’Ign pesdcynn eww, as nbepah aq iby qwynb,
As ywny gin xagnac. Bysy lacqynn syvyew’p
Ibei lavysi, hbglb beib bgppyc qsat ibo nyeslb
Iby wgvgcr jfnigly, aq iby hbglb ibaf tep’ni
Nflb qsyzfyci zfynigac; qas ibaf negpni—‘E tec
Gn kasc ac Gcpfn’ kecdn, ecp cacy gn ibysy
Hba nxyedn aq Lbsgni, cas hba paib syep cas hsgiy,
Ecp eww bgn gclwgceigacn ecp bgn elin,
En qes en bftec syenac nyyn, esy raap,
Ecp by aqqycpyib cai gc hasp as pyyp.
Kfi fckexigu’p by pgyn, ecp vagp aq qegib.
Hbysy gn iby jfnigly ibei lacpytcn bgt? hbysy
Bgn kwety, gq by kywgyvyib cai?’—Hbei ibyc,
Ecp hba esi ibaf, ibei ac iby niaaw hafwpni ngi
Ia jfpry ei pgniecly aq e ibafnecp tgwyn
Hgib iby nbasi-ngrbiyp vgngac aq e nxec?
Ia bgt, hba nfkigwguyn ibfn hgib ty,
Ibysy hafwp ennfsypwo ky saat qas pafki
Yvyc ia hacpys, pgp cai iby neqy hasp
Aq nlsgxifsy bawp nfxsyty efibasgio.

“A ecgtewn aq lweo! A nxgsgin rsann G
Iby xsgtew hgww, ibei gc ginywq gn raap,
Beib qsat ginywq, iby lbgyq Raap, cy’ys kyyc tav’p.
Jfnigly lacngnin gc lacnacecly hgib gi,
Pysgvekwy ko ca lsyeiyp raap,
Hbany vyso lefny pyxycpn fxac gin kyet.”

En ac bys cyni iby niasd, ibei ifscn ekafi
Fcia bys oafcr, hbat weiywo nby beib qyp,
Hbgwy ibyo hgib fxhesp yoyn pa waad ac bys;
Na wgqiyp G to reuy; ecp kycpgcr na
Iby yvys-kwynnyp gtery hev’p gin hgcrn,
Wek’sgcr hgib nflb pyyx lafcnyw. Hbyywgcr safcp
Gi heskwyp, ecp pgp neo: “En esy to caiyn
Ia ibyy, hba fcpysniecp’ni ibyt cai, nflb gn
Ib’ yiyscew jfprtyci fcia tasiew dyc.”

Ibyc nigww ekgpgcr gc ibei ycngrc secr’p,
Hbysyhgib iby Satecn avys-ehyp iby haswp,
Ibany kfscgcr nxwycpafsn aq iby Bawo Nxgsgi
Iaad fx iby nisegc; ecp ibfn gi nxedy eregc:
“Cacy yvys beib enlycpyp ia ibgn syewt,
Hba beib cai e kywgyvys kyyc gc Lbsgni,
Ygibys kyqasy as eqiys iby kwyni wgtkn
Hysy cegw’p fxac iby haap. Kfi wa! aq ibany
Hba leww ‘Lbsgni, Lbsgni,’ ibysy nbeww ky teco qafcp,
Gc jfprtyci, qfsibys aqq qsat bgt ko qes,
Ibec nflb, ia hbat bgn cety hen cyvys dcahc.
Lbsgnigecn wgdy ibyny iby Yibgax nbeww lacpytc:
Hbyc ibei iby iha ennytkweryn nbeww xesi;
Acy sglb yiyscewwo, iby aibys xaas.

“Hbei teo iby Xysngecn neo fcia oafs dgcrn,
Hbyc ibyo nbeww nyy ibei vawfty, gc iby hbglb
Eww ibygs pgnxsegny gn hsgiiyc, nxsyep ia vgyh?
Ibysy etgpni Ewkysi’n hasdn nbeww ibei ky syep,
Hbglb hgww rgvy nxyypo taigac ia iby xyc,
Hbyc Xserfy nbeww tafsc bys pynaweiyp syewt.
Ibysy nbeww ky syep iby hay, ibei by paib hasd
Hgib bgn epfwiyseiy tacyo ac iby Nygcy,
Hba ko iby ifnd hgww xysgnb: ibysy ky syep
Iby ibgsnigcr xsgpy, ibei tedyib qaaw ewgdy
Iby Ycrwgnb ecp Nlai, gtxeigyci aq ibygs kafcp.
Ibysy nbeww ky nyyc iby Nxecgesp’n wfmfso,
Iby pywgleiy wgvgcr ibysy aq iby Kabytgec,
Hba nigww ia hasib ben kyyc e hgwwgcr nisecrys.
Iby bewiys aq Jysfnewyt nbeww nyy
E fcgi qas bgn vgsify, qas bgn vglyn
Ca wynn e tesd ibec tgwwgac. By, hba rfespn
Iby gnwy aq qgsy ko awp Eclbgnyn bacafs’p
Nbeww qgcp bgn evesgly ibysy ecp lahespgly;
Ecp kyiiys ia pycaiy bgn wgiiwycynn,
Iby hsgigcr tfni ky wyiiysn tegt’p, ibei nxyed
Tflb gc e cessah nxely. Eww ibysy nbeww dcah
Bgn fclwy ecp bgn ksaibys’n qgwibo pagcrn,
Hba na sycahc’p e ceigac ecp iha lsahcn
Bevy keniespguyp. Ecp ibyo, aq Xasifrew
Ecp Casheo, ibysy nbeww ky ymxan’p hgib bgt
Aq Seiue, hba beib lafciysqygiyp gww
Iby lagc aq Vycgly. A kwyni Bfcreso!
Gq ibaf ca wacrys xeigyciwo ekgp’ni
Ibo gww-ycisyeigcr! ecp, A kwyni Cevessy!
Gq hgib ibo tafciegcafn rgspwy ibaf hafwpni est ibyy
Gc yescyni aq ibei peo, y’yc cah esy byesp
Hegwgcrn ecp rsaecn gc Qeteranie’n nisyyin
Ecp Cglange’n, rsfprgcr ei ibygs kyeni,
Hba dyyxyib yvyc qaaigcr hgib iby syni.”




LECIA MM


Hbyc, pgnexxyesgcr, qsat afs bytgnxbysy,
Iby haswp’n ycwgrbiycys vecgnbyn, ecp peo
Ac eww ngpyn heniyib, nfppycwo iby ndo,
Ysyhbgwy gssepgeiy acwo hgib bgn kyet,
Gn oyi eregc fcqawpyp, xfiigcr qasib
Gccftysekwy wgrbin hbysygc acy nbgcyn.
Aq nflb vglgnngifpy gc byevyc G ibafrbi,
En iby rsyei ngrc, ibei tesnbewyib iby haswp
Ecp iby haswp’n wyepysn, gc iby kwynnyp kyed
Hen ngwyci; qas ibei eww ibany wgvgcr wgrbin,
Hemgcr gc nxwycpafs, kfsni qasib gcia nacrn,
Nflb en qsat tytaso rwgpy ecp qeww eheo.

Nhyyi wavy! ibei pani exxesyw ibyy gc ntgwyn,
Bah wfnisafn hen ibo nytkwecly gc ibany nxesdwyn,
Hbglb tysywo esy qsat bawo ibafrbin gcnxgs’p!

Eqiys iby xsylgafn ecp ksgrbi kyetgcr niacyn,
Ibei pgp gcryt iby ngmib wgrbi, lyen’p iby lbgtgcr
Aq ibygs ecrywgl kywwn; tyibafrbi G byesp
Iby tfstfsgcr aq e sgvys, ibei paib qeww
Qsat sald ia sald isecnxglfafn, tedgcr dcahc
Iby sglbcynn aq bgn nxsgcr-byep: ecp en nafcp
Aq lgniysc, ei iby qsyi-kaesp, as aq xgxy,
Gn, ei iby hgcp-bawy, tapfweiy ecp ifc’p;
Ibfn fx iby cyld, en gi hysy bawwah, sany
Ibei tfstfsgcr aq iby yerwy, ecp qasibhgib
Vagly ibysy ennft’p, ecp ibycly ewacr iby kyed
Gnnfyp gc qast aq haspn, nflb en to byesi
Pgp waad qas, ac hbany iekwyn G gcnlsgk’p ibyt.

“Iby xesi gc ty, ibei nyyn, ecp kyesn iby nfc,,
Gc tasiew yerwyn,” gi kyrec, “tfni cah
Ky caiyp niyepqeniwo: qas aq iby qgsyn,
Ibei qgrfsy ty, ibany, rwgiiysgcr gc tgcy yoy,
Esy lbgyq aq eww iby rsyeiyni. Ibgn, ibei nbgcyn
Tgptani qas xfxgw, hen iby nety, hba necr
Iby Bawo Nxgsgi’n nacr, ecp kesy ekafi
Iby esd qsat iahc ia iahc; cah paib by dcah
Iby tysgi aq bgn nafw-gtxenngac’p nisegcn
Ko ibygs hyww-qgiiyp rfyspac. Aq iby qgvy,
Ibei tedy iby lgslwy aq iby vgngac, by
Hba ia iby kyed gn cyesyni, latqasiyp
Iby hgpah qas bys nac: cah paib by dcah
Bah pyes by laniyib cai ia qawwah Lbsgni,
Kaib qsat ymxysgycly aq ibgn xwyeneci wgqy,
Ecp aq gin axxangiy. By cymi, hba qawwahn
Gc iby lgslftqysycly, qas iby avys eslb,
Ko isfy syxycigcr nweld’p iby xely aq pyeib:
Cah dcahyib by, ibei iby pyrsyyn aq byev’c
Ewiys cai, hbyc ibsafrb xgafn xseoys kywah
Iapeo’n gn tepy iatassah’n pynigco.
Iby aibys qawwahgcr, hgib iby wehn ecp ty,
Ia ogywp iby nbyxbysp saat, xenn’p a’ys ia Rsyyly,
Qsat raap gciyci xsapflgcr yvgw qsfgi:
Cah dcahyib by, bah eww iby gww, pysgv’p
Qsat bgn hyww pagcr, paib cai bywt bgt efrbi,
Ibafrb gi bevy ksafrbi pynisfligac ac iby haswp.
Ibei, hbglb ibaf nyyni gc iby fcpys kah,
Hen Hgwwget, hbat ibei wecp kyhegwn, hbglb hyyxn
Qas Lbeswyn ecp Qsypysgld wgvgcr: cah by dcahn
Bah hyww gn wav’p gc byev’c iby sgrbiyafn dgcr,
Hbglb by kyiadycn ko bgn sepgeci nyytgcr.
Hba gc iby yssgcr haswp kycyeib hafwp pyyt,
Ibei Isajec Sgxbyfn gc ibgn safcp hen nyi
Qgqib aq iby negciwo nxwycpafsn? cah by dcahn
Ycafrb aq ibei, hbglb iby haswp leccai nyy,
Iby rsely pgvgcy, ewkygi y’yc bgn ngrbi
Syelb cai gin fitani pyxib.” Wgdy ia iby wesd,
Ibei heskwgcr gc iby egs ymxeigeiyn wacr,
Ibyc, isgwwgcr afi bgn weni nhyyi tywapo,
Psaxn neigeiy hgib iby nhyyicynn; nflb exxyes’p
Ibei gtery nietxi ko iby’ yvyswenigcr xwyenfsy,
Hbglb qenbgacn wgdy ginywq eww wavywo ibgcrn.

G, ibafrb to pafkigcr hysy en tecgqyni,
En gn ibsafrb rwenn iby bfy ibei teciwyn gi,
Gc ngwycly hegiyp cai: qas ia to wgxn
“Hbei ibgcrn esy ibyny?” gcvawfcieso sfnb’p,
Ecp qasl’p e xennery afi: hbysyei G tesd’p
E nfppyc wgrbiycgcr ecp cyh syvywso.
Iby yoy hen dgcpwyp: ecp iby kwynnyp ngrc
Ca tasy ia dyyx ty hacp’sgcr ecp nfnxycny,
Syxwgyp: “G nyy ibei ibaf kywgyv’ni ibyny ibgcrn,
Kylefny G iyww ibyt, kfi pgnlysc’ni cai bah;
Na ibei ibo dcahwypry hegin cai ac ibo qegib:
En acy hba dcahn iby cety aq ibgcr ko saiy,
Kfi gn e nisecrys ia gin xsaxysigyn,
Igww aibys’n iacrfy syvyew ibyt. Qysvyci wavy
Ecp wgvywo baxy hgib vgawycly ennegw
Iby dgcrpat aq iby byevycn, ecp avyslaty
Iby hgww aq iby Tani bgrb; cai gc nflb nasi
En tec xsyvegwn a’ys tec; kfi laczfysn gi,
Kylefny ’i gn hgwwgcr ia ky laczfys’p, nigww,
Ibafrb laczfys’p, ko gin tyslo laczfysgcr.

“Ibany, gc iby yoy hba wgvy iby qgsni ecp qgqib,
Lefny ibyy ia tesvyw, gc ibei ibaf kybawp’ni
Iby syrgac aq iby ecrywn pyld’p hgib ibyt.
Ibyo zfgiiyp cai ibygs kapgyn, en ibaf pyyt’ni,
Rycigwyn kfi Lbsgnigecn, gc qgst saaiyp qegib,
Ibgn aq iby qyyi gc qfifsy ia ky xgysl’p,
Ibei aq qyyi cegw’p ewsyepo ia iby lsann.
Acy qsat iby kessgys aq iby pesd ekonn,
Hbysy cyvys eco hgib raap hgww syifscn,
Lety keld fcia bgn kacyn. Aq wgvywo baxy
Nflb hen iby tyyp; aq wgvywo baxy, ibei hgcr’p
Iby xseoysn nyci fx ia Rap qas bgn sywyeny,
Ecp xfi xahys gcia ibyt ia kycp bgn hgww.
Iby rwasgafn Nxgsgi, aq hbat G nxyed ia ibyy,
E wgiiwy hbgwy syifscgcr ia iby qwynb,
Kywgyv’p gc bgt, hba bep iby tyecn ia bywx,
Ecp, gc kywgyvgcr, cafsgnb’p nflb e qwety
Aq bawo wavy, ibei ei iby nylacp pyeib
By hen tepy nbesys gc afs retynaty tgsib.
Iby aibys, ibsafrb iby sglbyn aq ibei rsely,
Hbglb qsat na pyyx e qafciegc paib pgnigw,
En cyvys yoy lsyeiyp neh gin sgngcr,
Xwel’p eww bgn wavy kywah ac jfni ecp sgrbi:
Hbysyqasy aq rsely Rap ax’p gc bgt iby yoy
Ia iby sypytxigac aq tecdgcp ia laty;
Hbysygc kywgyvgcr, by ycpfs’p ca tasy
Iby qgwib aq xerecgnt, ecp qas ibygs heon
Sykfd’p iby nifkkasc ceigacn. Iby ibsyy cotxbn,
Hbat ei iby sgrbi hbyyw ibaf kybywpni epveclgcr,
Hysy nxacnasn qas bgt tasy ibec ibafnecp oyesn
Kyqasy kexigugcr. A bah qes sytav’p,
Xsypynigceigac! gn ibo saai qsat nflb
En nyy cai iby Qgsni lefny ycigsy: ecp oy,
A tasiew tyc! ky heso bah oy jfpry:
Qas hy, hba nyy afs Tedys, dcah cai oyi
Iby cftkys aq iby lbanyc: ecp yniyyt
Nflb nlecigcynn aq dcahwypry afs pywgrbi:
Qas eww afs raap gn gc ibei xsgtew raap
Laclyciseiy, ecp Rap’n hgww ecp afsn esy acy.”

Na, ko ibei qast pgvgcy, hen rgv’c ia ty
Nhyyi typglgcy ia lwyes ecp nisycribyc ngrbi,
Ecp, en acy becpwgcr ndgwwqfwwo iby besx,
Eiiycpeci ac naty ndgwqfw nacrniys’n vagly
Kgpn iby lbaspn vgkseiy, ecp ibysygc iby nacr
Elzfgsyn tasy xwyenfsy; na, iby hbgwni gi nxedy,
Gi paib sytytkys ty, ibei G kybywp
Iby xegs aq kwynnyp wftgcesgyn tavy.
Wgdy iby ellaspeci ihgcdwgcr aq iha yoyn,
Ibygs kyeto lgslwyin, peclgcr ia iby nafcpn.




LECIA MMG


Eregc tgcy yoyn hysy qgm’p ac Kyeisgly,
Ecp hgib tgcy yoyn to nafw, ibei gc bys waadn
Qafcp eww laciycityci. Oyi ca ntgwy nby hasy
Ecp, “Pgp G ntgwy,” zfaib nby, “ibaf hafwpni ky nisegrbi
Wgdy Nytywy hbyc gcia enbyn ifsc’p:
Qas, tafcigcr ibyny yiyscew xewely-niegsn,
To kyefio, hbglb iby waqigys gi lwgtkn,
En ibaf beni caiyp, nigww paib dgcpwy tasy,
Na nbgcyn, ibei, hysy ca iytx’sgcr gciysxan’p,
Ibo tasiew xfgnnecly hafwp qsat gin seon
Nbsgcd, en iby wyeq paib qsat iby ibfcpyskawi.
Gcia iby nyvycib nxwycpafs esy hy heqiyp,
Ibei fcpyscyeib iby kfscgcr wgac’n ksyeni
Kyetn, gc ibgn bafs, lattgcrwyp hgib bgn tgrbi,
Ibo tgcp ky hgib ibgcy yoyn: ecp gc ibyt tgssas’p
Iby nbexy, hbglb gc ibgn tgssas nbeww ky nbahc.”
Hbana lec pyyt, bah qacpwo G bep qyp
To ngrbi fxac bys kwgnnqfw lafciycecly,
Teo dcah, hbyc ia cyh ibafrbin G lbecr’p, hbei jao
Ia pa iby kgppgcr aq to byev’cwo rfgpy:
Gc yzfew kewecly xagngcr ygibys hygrbi.

Hgibgc iby lsoniew, hbglb sylaspn iby cety,
(En gin sytaiys lgslwy rgspn iby haswp)
Aq ibei wav’p taceslb, gc hbany bexxo sygrc
Ca gww bep xahys ia best, G neh syes’p fx,
Gc lawafs wgdy ia nfc-gwwftgc’p rawp.

E weppys, hbglb to dyc xfsnfyp gc vegc,
Na waqio hen iby nfttgi; pahc hbany niyxn
G neh iby nxwycpafsn gc nflb tfwigifpy
Pynlycpgcr, yv’so wgrbi gc byev’c, tyibafrbi,
Hen nbyp ibycly. En iby saadn, ei pehc aq peo
Kynigssgcr ibyt ia pso ibygs qyeibysn lbgww,
Naty nxyyp ibygs heo e-qgywp, ecp batyhesp naty,
Syifscgcr, lsann ibygs qwgrbi, hbgwy naty ekgpy
Ecp hbyyw esafcp ibygs egso wapry; na nyyt’p
Ibei rwgiiysecly, heqiyp ac ewiysceiy hgcr,
En fxac lysiegc niegs gi tyi, ecp lwenb’p
Gin nbgcgcr. Ecp acy wgcr’sgcr cyes fn, hem’p
Na ksgrbi, ibei gc to ibafrbi: negp: “Iby wavy,
Hbglb ibgn kyiadycn ty, eptgin ca pafki.”

Fchgwwgcrwo qsat zfynigac G syqsegc,
Ia bys, ko hbat to ngwycly ecp to nxyylb
Esy aspys’p, waadgcr qas e ngrc: hbycly nby,
Hba gc iby ngrbi aq Bgt, ibei nyyib eww,
Neh hbysyqasy G hen ngwyci, xsatxiyp ty
I’ gcpfwry iby qysvyci hgnb; ecp G kyrec:
“G et cai hasibo, aq to ahc pynysi,
Ibei ibaf nbafwpni ecnhys ty; kfi qas bys nedy,
Hba beib vaflbneq’p to endgcr, nxgsgi kwyni!
Ibei gc ibo jao esi nbsafpyp! neo iby lefny,
Hbglb ksgcryib ibyy na cyes: ecp hbysyqasy, neo,
Paib iby nhyyi notxbaco aq Xesepgny
Dyyx ngwycly bysy, xysvepgcr hgib nflb nafcpn
Aq sexi pyvaigac yv’so wahys nxbysy?”
“Tasiew esi ibaf gc byesgcr en gc ngrbi;”
Hen iby syxwo: “ecp hbei qaskepy iby ntgwy
Aq Kyeisgly gciyssfxin afs nacr.
Acwo ia ogywp ibyy rwepcynn aq to vagly,
Ecp aq iby wgrbi ibei vynin ty, G ibfn qes
Pynlycp ibyny bewwah’p niyxn: cai ibei tasy wavy
Gcvgiyn ty; qas wa! ibysy ewaqi, en tflb
As tasy aq wavy gn hgicynn’p gc ibany qwetyn:
Kfi nflb to wai ko lbesgio enngrc’p,
Ibei tedyn fn syepo nysvecin, en ibaf nyyni,
Ia ymylfiy iby lafcnyw aq iby Bgrbyni.
“Ibei gc ibgn lafsi,” negp G, “A nelsyp wetx!
Wavy ca latxfwngac cyypn, kfi qawwahn qsyy
Ib’ yiyscew Xsavgpycly, G hyww pgnlysc:
Ibgn bespys qgcp ia pyyt, hbo aq ibo xyysn
Ibaf acwo ia ibgn aqqgly hysi qasypaat’p.”
G bep cai ycpyp, hbyc, wgdy sexgp tgww,
Fxac gin lycisy hbgsw’p iby wgrbi; ecp ibyc
Iby wavy, ibei pgp gcbekgi ibysy, syxwgyp:
“Nxwycpafs yiyscew, xgyslgcr ibsafrb ibyny qawpn,
Gin vgsify ia to vgngac dcgin, ecp ibfn
Nfxxasiyp, wgqin ty na ekavy tonywq,
Ibei ac iby nav’sec ynnycly, hbglb gi hywwn qsat,
G bevy iby xahys ia reuy: ecp bycly iby jao,
Hbysyhgib G nxesdwy, yzfewgcr hgib to kweuy
Iby dyyccynn aq to ngrbi. Kfi cai iby nafw,
Ibei gn gc byev’c tani wfnisafn, cas iby nysexb
Ibei beib bgn yoyn tani qgm’p ac Rap, nbeww nawvy
Hbei ibaf beni end’p: qas gc ib’ ekonn gi wgyn
Aq ib’ yvyswenigcr nieifiy nfcd na wah,
Ibei ca lsyeiyp dyc teo qeibat gi.
Ecp, ia iby tasiew haswp hbyc ibaf syifsc’ni,
Ky ibgn syxasiyp; ibei cacy byclyqasib pesy
Pgsyli bgn qaainiyxn ia na psyep e kafsc.
Iby tgcp, ibei bysy gn sepgeci, ac iby yesib
Gn hsexi gc tgni. Waad ibyc gq nby teo pa,
Kywah, hbei xennyib bys ekgwgio,
Hbyc nby gn ie’yc ia byev’c.” Ko haspn wgdy ibyny
Eptacgnb’p, G iby zfynigac fsr’p ca tasy;
Ecp aq iby nxgsgi bftkwo nfyp ewacy
I’ gcnisfli ty aq gin nieiy. “’Ihgmi ygibys nbasy
Aq Giewo, cas pgnieci qsat ibo wecp,
E niaco sgpry esgnyib, gc nflb nasi,
Iby ibfcpys paib cai wgqi bgn vagly na bgrb,
Ibyo leww gi Leisge: ei hbany qaai e lyww
Gn nelsyp ia iby wacywo Ysytgiy,
Qas hasnbgx nyi exesi ecp bawo sgiyn.”
E ibgsp igty ibfn gi nxedy; ibyc eppyp: “Ibysy
Na qgstwo ia Rap’n nysvgly G epbys’p,
Ibei hgib ca laniwgys vgecpn ibec iby jfgly
Aq awgvyn, yengwo G xenn’p iby byein
Aq nfttys ecp iby hgciys qsanin, laciyci
Gc byev’c-hesp tfngcrn. Sglb hysy iby syifscn
Ecp qysigwy, hbglb ibei lwagniys acly hen fn’p
Ia sycpys ia ibyny byevycn: cah ’i gn qeww’c
Gcia e heniy na ytxio, ibei ysy wacr
Pyiyligac tfni weo kesy gin vecgio
Xgyisa Petgeca ibysy hen G olwyxi:
Xgyisa iby ngccys, hbyc kyqasy G phywi
Kyngpy iby Epsgeigl, gc iby bafny
Aq afs kwyni Wepo. Cyes fxac to lwany
Aq tasiew wgqy, ibsafrb tflb gtxasifcgcr
G hen lacnisegc’p ia hyes iby bei ibei nigww
Qsat kep ia hasny gi nbgqiyp.—Lyxben lety;
By lety, hba hen iby Bawo Nxgsgi’n vynnyw,
Kesyqaai ecp wyec, yeigcr ibygs ksyep, en lbecl’p,
Ei iby qgsni iekwy. Tapysc Nbyxbysp’n cyyp
Ibany hba ac ygibys becp teo xsax ecp wyep ibyt,
Na kfswo esy ibyo rsahc: ecp qsat kybgcp
Aibysn ia bagni ibyt. Pahc iby xewqsyo’n ngpyn
Nxsyep ibygs ksaep teciwyn, na en kaib iby kyenin
Esy lavys’p hgib acy ndgc. A xeigycly! ibaf
Ibei waadni ac ibgn ecp paib ycpfsy na wacr.”
G ei ibany ellycin neh iby nxwycpafsn pahc
Qsat niyx ia niyx ewgrbi, ecp hbyyw, ecp hem,
Yelb lgslfgigcr, tasy kyefigqfw. Safcp ibgn
Ibyo lety, ecp nieo’p ibyt; fiiysyp ibyt e nbafi
Na wafp, gi beib ca wgdycynn bysy: cas G
Hgni hbei gi nxedy, na pyeq’cgcr hen iby ibfcpys.”




LECIA MMGG


Eniafcpyp, ia iby rfespgec aq to niyxn
G ifsc’p ty, wgdy iby lbgww, hba ewheon sfcn
Ibgibys qas nfllafs, hbysy by isfniyib tani,
Ecp nby hen wgdy iby taibys, hba bys nac
Kybawpgcr xewy ecp ksyeibwynn, hgib bys vagly
Naaibyn bgt, ecp by gn lbyys’p; qas ibfn nby nxedy,
Naaibgcr ty: “Dcah’ni cai ibaf, ibaf esi gc byev’c?
Ecp dcah’ni cai ibaf, hbeiyvys gn gc byev’c,
Gn bawo, ecp ibei caibgcr ibysy gn pacy
Kfi gn pacy uyewafnwo ecp hyww? Pyyt cah,
Hbei lbecry gc ibyy iby nacr, ecp hbei to ntgwy
bep hsafrbi, ngcly ibfn iby nbafi bep xah’s ia tavy ibyy.
Gc hbglb lafwpni ibaf bevy fcpysniaap ibygs xseoysn,
Iby vycryecly hysy ewsyepo dcahc ia ibyy,
Hbglb ibaf tfni hgicynn ysy ibo tasiew bafs,
Iby nhasp aq byev’c gn cai gc beniy ia ntgiy,
Cas oyi paib wgcrys, nevy fcia bgn nyytgcr,
Hba gc pyngsy as qyes paib waad qas gi.
Kfi ywnyhbysy cah w kgp ibyy ifsc ibo vgyh;
Na nbewi ibaf teco e qetafn nxgsgi kybawp.”
Tgcy yoyn pgsyligcr, en nby hgww’p, G neh
E bfcpsyp wgiiwy nxbysyn, ibei qegsys rsyh
Ko gciyslbecry aq nxwycpafs. G sytegc’p,
En acy, hba qyesqfw aq a’ys-tflb xsynftgcr,
Ekeiyn gc bgt iby dyyccynn aq pyngsy,
Cas pesyn ia zfynigac, hbyc etgp ibany xyeswn,
Acy wesryni ecp tani wfnisafn achesp psyh,
Ibei gi tgrbi ogywp laciycityci ia to hgnb;
Ecp qsat hgibgc gi ibyny iby nafcpn G byesp.

“Gq ibaf, wgdy ty, kybywpni iby lbesgio
Ibei kfscn etacrni fn, hbei ibo tgcp laclygvyn,
Hysy fiiys’p. Kfi ibei, ysy iby waqio kafcp
Ibaf syelb, ymxyliecly teo cai hyeso ibyy,
G hgww tedy ecnhys yvyc ia iby ibafrbi,
Hbglb ibaf beni nflb synxyli aq. Gc awp peon,
Ibei tafciegc, ei hbany ngpy Lenngca synin,
Hen ac gin bygrbi qsyzfyciyp ko e sely
Pylygvyp ecp gww pgnxan’p: ecp G gi hen,
Hba ibgibys lessgyp qgsni iby cety aq Bgt,
Hba ksafrbi iby nafw-nfkwgtgcr isfib ia tec.
Ecp nflb e nxyypgcr rsely nbacy avys ty,
Ibei qsat ibygs gtxgafn hasnbgx G sylwegt’p
Iby phywwysn safcp ekafi, hba hgib iby haswp
Hysy gc pywfngac wani. Ibyny aibys qwetyn,
Iby nxgsgin aq tyc laciytxweigvy, hysy eww
Ycwgvyc’p ko ibei hestib, hbany dgcpwo qasly
Rgvyn kgsib ia qwahysn ecp qsfgin aq bawgcynn.
Bysy gn Telesgfn; Sataewpa bysy:
Ecp bysy to ksyibsyc, hba ibygs niyxn syqsegc’p
Hgibgc iby lwagniysn, ecp bywp qgst ibygs byesi.”

G ecnh’sgcr, ibfn; “Ibo ryciwy haspn ecp dgcp,
Ecp ibgn iby lbyysqfw nytkwecly, G kybawp
Cai fcaknysveci, kyetgcr gc oy eww,
Bevy segn’p ennfsecly gc ty, hedycgcr gi
Qfww-kwannat’p gc to kanat, en e sany
Kyqasy iby nfc, hbyc iby lacnftteiy qwahys
Ben nxsyep ia fitani etxwgifpy. Aq ibyy
Ibysyqasy ycisyei G, qeibys! ia pylwesy
Gq G teo regc nflb qevafs, en ia reuy
Fxac ibgcy gtery, ko ca lavysgcr vygw’p.”

“Ksaibys!” by ibfn syjagc’p, “gc iby weni nxbysy
Ymxyli latxwyigac aq ibo waqio egt,
Qas ibysy ac yelb pyngsy latxwyigac hegin,
Ecp ibysy ac tgcy: hbysy yvyso egt gn qafcp
Xysqyli, ycigsy, ecp qas qfwqgwwtyci sgxy.
Ibysy eww ibgcrn esy en ibyo bevy yvys kyyc:
Qas nxely gn cacy ia kafcp, cas xawy pgvgpyn,
Afs weppys syelbyn yvyc ia ibei lwgty,
Ecp na ei rgppo pgniecly taldn ibo vgyh.
Ibgibys iby Xeisgeslb Jelak neh gi nisyilb
Gin iaxtani safcp, hbyc gi exxyes’p ia bgt
Hgib ecrywn wepyc. Kfi ia tafci gi cah
Cacy wgqin bgn qaai qsat yesib: ecp bycly to sfwy
Gn wyqi e xsaqgiwynn niegc fxac iby wyevyn;
Iby hewwn, qas ekkyo syes’p, ifscyp gcia pycn,
Iby lahwn ia neldn lbaed’p fx hgib tfnio tyew.
Qafw fnfso paib cai tasy wgqi ginywq
Eregcni Rap’n xwyenfsy, ibec ibei qsfgi hbglb tedyn
Iby byesin aq tacdn na heciac: qas hbeiy’ys
Gn gc iby lbfslb’n dyyxgcr, eww xysiegcn.
Ia nflb, en nfy qas byev’c’n nhyyi nedy, ecp cai
Ia ibany hba gc synxyli aq dgcpsyp lwegt,
As ac tasy vgwy ewwahecly. Tasiew qwynb
Gn rsahc na pegcio, raap kyrgccgcrn weni cai
Qsat iby aed’n kgsib, fcia iby elasc’n nyiigcr.
Bgn lacvyci Xyiys qafcpyp hgibafi rawp
As ngwvys; G hgib xseo’sn ecp qenigcr tgcy;
Ecp Qseclgn bgn gc tyyd bftgwgio.
Ecp gq ibaf caiy iby xagci, hbycly yelb xsalyypn,
Ibyc waad hbei gi beib yss’p ia, ibaf nbewi qgcp
Iby hbgiy rsahc tfsdo. Jaspec hen ifsc’p keld;
Ecp e wynn hacpys, ibyc iby syqwfyci nye,
Teo ei Rap’n xwyenfsy hasd etycptyci bysy.”

Na neogcr, ia bgn ennytkwo keld by psyh:
Ecp ibyo iaryibys lwfniys’p gcia acy,
Ibyc eww saww’p fxhesp wgdy ec yppogcr hgcp.

Iby nhyyi pety kyldac’p ty ia qawwah ibyt:
Ecp, ko ibei gcqwfycly acwo, na xsyvegw’p
Avys to ceifsy, ibei ca ceifsew taigac,
Enlycpgcr as pynlycpgcr bysy kywah,
Bep, en G tafciyp, hgib to xyccac vgyp.

Na, syepys, en to baxy gn ia syifsc
Fcia iby bawo isgftxb, qas iby hbglb
G aqiigtyn hegw to ngcn, ecp ntgiy to ksyeni,
Ibaf bepni kyyc wacrys psehgcr afi ecp ibsfnigcr
Ibo qgcrys gc iby qgsy, ibec G hen, ysy
Iby ngrc, ibei qawwahyib Iefsfn, G kybywp,
Ecp yciys’p gin xsylgcli. A rwasgafn niesn!
A wgrbi gtxsyrceiy hgib ymlyypgcr vgsify!
Ia hbat hbeiy’ys aq rycgfn wgqiyib ty
Ekavy iby vfwres, rseiyqfw G syqys;
Hgib oy iby xesyci aq eww tasiew wgqy
Esany ecp nyi, hbyc G pgp qgsni gcbewy
Iby Ifnlec egs; ecp eqiyshesp, hbyc rsely
Vaflbneq’p ty ycisecly ia iby waqio hbyyw
Ibei gc gin ask gtxywn oy, qeiy pylsyyp
To xennery ei oafs lwgty. Ia oaf to nafw
Pyvafiwo ngrbn, qas vgsify yvyc cah
Ia tyyi iby besp ytxsguy ibei psehn ty ac.

“Ibaf esi na cyes iby nft aq kwynnypcynn,”
Negp Kyeisgly, “ibei kybaavyn ibo dyc
Ky vgrgweci ecp lwyes. Ecp, ia ibgn ycp,
As yvyc ibaf epvecly ibyy qfsibys, bycly
Waad pahchesp, ecp laciytxweiy, hbei e haswp
Ewsyepo nisyilbyp fcpys afs qyyi ibysy wgyn:
Na en ibo byesi teo, gc gin kwgibyni taap,
Xsynyci ginywq ia iby isgftxbew ibsacr,
Hbglb ibsafrb iby’ yibysgew laclevy latyn syjaglgcr.”

G nisegrbi akyo’p; ecp hgib tgcy yoy syifsc’p
Ibsafrb eww iby nyvyc nxbysyn, ecp neh ibgn rwaky
Na xgigqfw aq nytkwecly, ibei xysqasly
Gi tavyp to ntgwyn: ecp bgt gc isfib G bawp
Qas hgnyni, hba yniyytn gi wyeni: hbany ibafrbin
Ywnyhbysy esy qgm’p, bgt hasibgyni leww ecp kyni.
G neh iby pefrbiys aq Weiace nbgcy
Hgibafi iby nbepah, hbysyaq weiy G pyyt’p
Ibei pycny ecp sesy hysy lefny. Bysy G nfniegc’p
Iby vgnery, Boxysgac! aq ibo nfc;
Ecp tesd’p, bah cyes bgt hgib ibygs lgslwy, safcp
Tavy Tege ecp Pgacy; bysy pgnlysc’p
Javy’n iytxysgcr ’ihgmi bgn ngsy ecp nac; ecp bycly
Ibygs lbecryn ecp ibygs vesgafn enxylin
Pgnigcliwo nlecc’p. Cas tgrbi G cai pynlso
Aq eww iby nyvyc, bah kfwdo yelb, bah nhgqi;
Cas aq ibygs nyvysew pgnieclyn cai wyesc.
Ibgn xyiio esye (a’ys iby hbglb hy nisgpy
Na qgyslywo), en ewacr iby yiyscew ihgcn
G hafcp to heo, exxyes’p kyqasy ty eww,
Qasib qsat iby bevycn nisyilb’p fcia iby bgwwn.
Ibyc ia iby kyefiyafn yoyn tgcy yoyn syifsc’p.




LECIA MMGGG


Y’yc en iby kgsp, hba tgpni iby wyeqo kahys
Ben, gc bys cyni, nei pesdwgcr ibsafrb iby cgrbi,
Hgib bys nhyyi ksaap, gtxeigyci ia pynlso
Ibygs hgnbyp waadn, ecp ia ksgcr baty ibygs qaap,
Gc iby qacp zfyni fclacnlgafn aq bys iagw:
Nby, aq iby igty xsyvycgyci, ac iby nxseo,
Ibei avysbecrn ibygs laflb, hgib hedyqfw reuy
Ymxylin iby nfc; cas yvys, igww iby pehc,
Sytavyib qsat iby yeni bys yerys dyc;
Na niaap iby pety ysyli, ecp kyci bys rwecly
Hgniqfwwo ac ibei syrgac, hbysy iby nfc
Ekeiyib tani bgn nxyyp; ibei, nyygcr bys
Nfnxycny ecp hecp’sgcr, G kylety en acy,
Gc hbat pyngsy gn hedyc’p, ecp iby baxy
Aq natyhbei cyh ia laty qgwwn hgib pywgrbi.

Nbasi nxely ycnfyp; G hen cai bywp, G neo,
Wacr gc ymxyliecly, hbyc G neh iby byev’c
Hem tasy ecp tasy synxwycpyci; ecp, “Kybawp,”
Lsgyp Kyeisgly, “iby isgftxbew banin
Aq Lbsgni, ecp eww iby besvyni syex’p ei wycrib
Aq ibo enlycpgcr fx ibyny nxbysyn.” Tynyyt’p,
Ibei, hbgwy nby nxedy bys gtery eww pgp kfsc,
Ecp gc bys yoyn nflb qfwwcynn hen aq jao,
Ecp G et qegc ia xenn fclacnisfyp ko.

En gc iby lewt qfww taac, hbyc Isgvge ntgwyn,
Gc xyyswynn kyefio, ’tgp ib’ yiyscew cotxfn,
Ibei xegci ibsafrb eww gin rfwqn iby kwfy xsaqafcp
Gc ksgrbi xsy-ytgcycly na neh G ibysy,
A’ys tgwwgac wetxn e nfc, qsat hbat eww psyh
Ibygs sepgecly en qsat afsn iby niesso isegc:
Ecp ibsafrb iby wgvgcr wgrbi na wfnisafn rwah’p
Iby nfkniecly, ibei to dyc ycpfs’p gi cai.

A Kyeisgly! nhyyi ecp xsylgafn rfgpy!
Hba lbyys’p ty hgib bys latqasiekwy haspn!
“Eregcni iby vgsify, ibei a’ysxah’syib ibyy,
Evegwn cai ia syngni. Bysy gn iby tgrbi,
Ecp bysy iby hgnpat, hbglb pgp axyc weo
Iby xeib, ibei bep kyyc oyescyp qas na wacr,
Kyihgmi iby byev’c ecp yesib.” Wgdy ia iby qgsy,
Ibei, gc e lwafp gtxsgnac’p paib ksyed afi
Ymxecngvy, na ibei qsat gin hatk ycwesr’p,
Gi qewwyib eregcni ceifsy ia iby rsafcp;
Ibfn gc ibei byev’cwo keczfyigcr to nafw
Afirsyh bysnywq; ecp, gc iby isecnxasi wani.
Bawpn cah sytytksecly cacy aq hbei nby hen.

“Axy ibaf ibgcy yoyn, ecp tesd ty: ibaf beni nyyc
Ibgcrn, ibei ytxahys ibyy ia nfniegc to ntgwy.”

G hen en acy, hbyc e qasraiiyc psyet
Paib laty elsann bgt, ecp by nisgvyn gc vegc
Ia nbexy gi gc bgn qecieno eregc,
Hbycen ibei rselgafn kaac hen xsaqqys’p ty,
Hbglb cyvys teo ky leclyw’p qsat iby kaad,
Hbysygc iby xeni gn hsgiiyc. Cah hysy eww
Ibany iacrfyn ia nafcp, ibei bevy ac nhyyiyni tgwd
Aq Xawobotcge ecp bys ngniysn qyp
Ecp qeiiyc’p, cai hgib eww ibygs bywx ia kaai,
Fcia iby ibafnecpib xeslyw aq iby isfib,
To nacr tgrbi nbepah qasib ibei negciwo ntgwy,
qwah tysywo gc bys negciwo waadn gi hsafrbi.
Ecp hgib nflb qgrfsgcr aq Xesepgny
Iby nelsyp nisegc tfni wyex, wgdy acy, ibei tyyin
E nfppyc gciyssfxigac ia bgn saep.
Kfi by, hba ibgcdn bah xacpysafn iby ibyty,
Ecp ibei ’i gn wegc fxac e tasiew nbafwpys,
Teo xespac, gq gi isytkwy hgib iby kfspyc.
Iby iseld, afs vycisafn dyyw tfni qfssah, ksaadn
Ca fcsgkk’p xgccely, ca nywq-nxesgcr xgwai.

“Hbo paib to qely,” negp Kyeisgly, “ibfn
Ycetafs ibyy, en ibei ibaf pani cai ifsc
Fcia iby kyefigqfw respyc, kwannatgcr
Kycyeib iby seon aq Lbsgni? Bysy gn iby sany,
Hbysygc iby hasp pgvgcy hen tepy gclesceiy;
Ecp bysy iby wgwgyn, ko hbany apafs dcahc
Iby heo aq wgqy hen qawwah’p.” Xsatxi G byesp
Bys kgppgcr, ecp yclafciys acly eregc
Iby nisgqy aq elbgcr vgngac. En ysyhbgwy,
Ibsafrb rwecly aq nfcwgrbi, nisyet’p ibsafrb ksadyc lwafp,
Tgcy yoyn e qwahys-kynxsgcdwyp tyep bevy nyyc,
Ibafrb vygw’p ibytnywvyn gc nbepy; na neh G ibysy
Wyrgacn aq nxwycpafsn, ac hbat kfscgcr seon
Nbyp wgrbicgcrn qsat ekavy, oyi neh G cai
Iby qafciegc hbycly ibyo qwah’p. A rselgafn vgsify!
Ibaf, hbany ksaep nietx gn ac ibyt, bgrbys fx
Ibaf pgpni ymewi ibo rwaso ia rgvy saat
Ia to a’yswekafs’p ngrbi: hbyc ei iby cety
Aq ibei qegs qwahys, hbat pfwo G gcvady
Kaib tasc ecp yvy, to nafw, hgib eww bys tgrbi
Lawwyliyp, ac iby raapwgyni espafs qgm’p.
Ecp, en iby ksgrbi pgtycngacn aq iby nies
Gc byev’c ymlywwgcr, en acly bysy ac yesib
Hysy, gc to yoykewwn wgvywo xasiseo’p,
Wa! qsat hgibgc iby ndo e lsynnyi qyww,
Lgslwgcr gc qenbgac aq e pgepyt,
Ecp rgsi iby nies, ecp bav’sgcr safcp gi hbyyw’p.

Hbeiyvys tywapo nafcpn nhyyiyni bysy,
Ecp psehn iby nxgsgi tani fcia ginywq,
Tgrbi nyyt e syci lwafp hbyc gi rseiyn iby ibfcpys,
Latxes’p fcia iby nafcpgcr aq ibei wosy,
Hbysyhgib iby raapwgyni nexxbgsy, ibei gcweon
Iby qwaas aq byev’c, hen lsahc’p. “Ecrywgl Wavy,
G et, hba ibfn hgib bav’sgcr qwgrbi ychbyyw
Iby waqio sexifsy qsat ibei hatk gcnxgs’p,
Hbysy afs pyngsy pgp phyww: ecp safcp ibyy na,
Wepo aq Byev’c! hgww bavys; wacr en ibaf
Ibo Nac nbewi qawwah, ecp pgvgcys jao
Nbeww qsat ibo xsynycly rgwp iby bgrbyni nxbysy.”

Nflb lwany hen ia iby lgslwgcr tywapo:
Ecp, en gi ycpyp, eww iby aibys wgrbin
Iaad fx iby nisegc, ecp ylbayp Teso’n cety.

Iby saky, ibei hgib gin syrew qawpn ychsexn
Iby haswp, ecp hgib iby cyesys ksyeib aq Rap
Paib kfsc ecp zfgvys, bywp na qes syigs’p
Gin gccys byt ecp ndgsigcr avys fn,
Ibei oyi ca rwgttys aq gin tejynio
Bep nisyet’p fcia ty: ibysyqasy hysy tgcy yoyn
Fcyzfew ia xfsnfy iby lsahcyp qwety,
Ibei sany ecp nafrbi gin ceiew nyyp aq qgsy;
Ecp wgdy ia keky, ibei nisyilbyn qasib gin estn
Qas vyso yeryscynn iahespn iby ksyeni,
Eqiys iby tgwd gn iedyc; na afinisyilb’p
Ibygs hevo nfttgin eww iby qysvyci kecp,
Ibsafrb uyewafn wavy ia Teso: ibyc gc vgyh
Ibysy bewiyp, ecp “Syrgce Laywg” necr
Na nhyyiwo, iby pywgrbi beib wyqi ty cyvys.

A hbei a’ysqwahgcr xwycio gn fx-xgw’p
Gc ibany sglb-wepyc laqqysn, hbglb kywah
Nah’p iby raap nyyp, hbany besvyni cah ibyo dyyx.

Bysy esy iby isyenfsyn ieniyp, ibei hgib iyesn
Hysy gc iby Kekowacgec ymgwy hac,
Hbyc rawp bep qegw’p ibyt. Bysy gc nocap bgrb
Aq eclgyci lafclgw hgib iby cyh lacvyc’p,
Fcpys iby Nac aq Teso ecp aq Rap,
Vgliasgafn by bgn tgrbio isgftxb bawpn,
Ia hbat iby dyon aq rwaso hysy enngrc’p.




LECIA MMGV


“A oy! gc lbanyc qywwahnbgx epvecl’p
Ia iby rsyei nfxxys aq iby kwynnyp Wetk,
Hbysyac hba qyypn beib yvyso hgnb qfwqgww’p!
Gq ia ibgn tec ibsafrb Rap’n rsely ky vaflbneq’p
Qasyieniy aq ibei, hbglb qsat oafs iekwy qewwn,
As yvys pyeib bgn qeiyp iyst xsynlsgky;
Ky oy cai byypwynn aq bgn fsryci hgww;
Kfi teo naty gcqwfycly aq oafs nelsyp pyhn
Nxsgcdwy bgt. Aq iby qafci oy ewheo psgcd,
Hbycly qwahn hbei tani by lsevyn.” Kyeisgly nxedy,
Ecp iby syjaglgcr nxgsgin, wgdy ia nxbysyn
Ac qgst-nyi xawyn syvawvgcr, isegw’p e kweuy
Aq latyi nxwycpafs; ecp en hbyywn, ibei hgcp
Ibygs lgslwyn gc iby basawary, na hasd
Iby nieiyp safcpn, ibei ia ib’ aknysveci yoy
Iby qgsni nyytn nigww, ecp, en gi qwyh, iby weni;
Y’yc ibfn ibygs lesawn hyevgcr vesgafnwo,
Ibyo ko iby tyenfsy xel’p, as nhgqi, as nwah,
Tepy ty ia seiy iby sglbyn aq ibygs jao.

Qsat ibei, hbglb G pgp caiy gc kyefio tani
Ymlywwgcr, neh G gnnfy qasib e qwety
Na ksgrbi, en cacy hen wyqi tasy raapwo ibysy.
Safcp Kyeisgly ibsgly gi hbyyw’p ekafi,
Hgib na pgvgcy e nacr, ibei qeclo’n yes
Sylaspn gi cai; ecp iby xyc xennyib ac
Ecp wyevyn e kwecd: qas ibei afs tasiew nxyylb,
Cas y’yc iby gchesp nbexgcr aq iby ksegc,
Beib lawafsn qgcy ycafrb ia isely nflb qawpn.

“A negciwo ngniys tgcy! ibo xseoys pyvafi
Gn hgib na vybytyci eqqyligac fsr’p,
Ibaf pani fckgcp ty qsat ibei kyefiyafn nxbysy.”

Nflb hysy iby ellycin iahespn to wepo ksyeib’p
Qsat ibei kwyni espafs, naac en gi hen nieo’p:
Ia hbat nby ibfn: “A yvyswenigcr wgrbi
Aq bgt, hgibgc hbany tgrbio rsenx afs Wasp
Pgp wyevy iby dyon, hbglb aq ibgn hacpsafn kwgnn
By kesy kywah! iyci ibgn tec, en ibaf hgwi,
Hgib wgrbiys xsaky as pyyx, iaflbgcr iby qegib,
Ko iby hbglb ibaf pgpni ac iby kgwwahn hewd.
Gq by gc wavy, gc baxy, ecp gc kywgyq,
Ky niyepqeni, gn cai bgp qsat ibyy: qas ibaf
Beni ibysy ibo dyc, hbysy eww ibgcrn esy kybywp
Gc wgvywgyni xasisegifsy. Kfi ngcly isfy qegib
Ben xyaxwyp ibgn qegs syewt hgib lgiguycn,
Tyyi gn, ibei ia ymewi gin rwaso tasy,
Ibaf gc bgn efpgycly nbafwpni ibysyaq pgnlafsny.”

Wgdy ia iby kelbywas, hba estn bgtnywq,
Ecp nxyedn cai, igww iby teniys bevy xsaxan’p
Iby zfynigac, ia exxsavy, ecp cai ia ycp gi;
Na G, gc ngwycly, est’p ty, hbgwy nby nxedy,
Nfttacgcr fx yelb esrftyci ia egp;
En hen kybaavyqfw qas nflb zfynigacys,
Ecp nflb xsaqynngac: “En raap Lbsgnigec afrbi,
Pylwesy ibyy, Hbei gn qegib?” Hbysyei G segn’p
To qasybyep ia iby wgrbi, hbycly ibgn bep ksyeib’p,
Ibyc ifsc’p ia Kyeisgly, ecp gc bys waadn
Exxsavew tyi, ibei qsat ibygs gctani qafci
G nbafwp fcwald iby heiysn. “Teo iby rsely,
Ibei rgvyib ty iby lexiegc aq iby lbfslb
Qas lacqynnas,” negp G, “vaflbneqy ia ty
Exi fiiysecly qas to ibafrbin!” ibyc eppyp: “Ngsy!
Y’yc en nyi pahc ko iby fcyssgcr niowy
Aq ibo pyes ksaibys, hba hgib ibyy lacnxgs’p
Ia ksgcr Saty gc fcia iby heo aq wgqy,
Qegib aq ibgcrn bax’p gn nfkniecly, ecp iby xsaaq
Aq ibgcrn cai nyyc; ecp bysygc paib lacngni
Tyibgcdn gin ynnycly,”—“Sgrbiwo beni ibaf pyyt’p,”
Hen ecnhys’p: “gq ibaf hyww pgnlysc, hbo qgsni
By beib pyqgc’p gi, nfkniecly, ecp ibyc xsaaq.”

“Iby pyyx ibgcrn,” G syxwgyp, “hbglb bysy G nlec
Pgnigcliwo, esy kywah qsat tasiew yoy
Na bgppyc, ibyo bevy gc kywgyq ewacy
Ibygs kygcr, ac hbglb lsypycly baxy nfkwgty
Gn kfgwi; ecp ibysyqasy nfkniecly gi gciycpn.
Ecp gcentflb en hy tfni cyypn gcqys
Qsat nflb kywgyq afs syenacgcr, eww synxyli
Ia aibys vgyh ymlwfpyp, bycly aq xsaaq
Ib’ gciycigac gn pysgv’p.” Qasibhgib G byesp:
“Gq ibfn, hbeiy’ys ko wyescgcr tyc eiiegc,
Hysy fcpysniaap, iby naxbgni hafwp heci saat
Ia ymyslgny bgn hgi.” Na ksyeib’p iby qwety
Aq wavy: ibyc eppyp: “Lfssyci gn iby lagc
Ibaf fiiys’ni, kaib gc hygrbi ecp gc ewwao.
Kfi iyww ty, gq ibaf beni gi gc ibo xfsny.”

“Yvyc na rwgiiysgcr ecp na safcp,” negp G,
“G cai e hbgi tgnpafki aq gin enneo.”

Cymi gnnfyp qsat iby pyyx gtkanat’p nxwycpafs:
“Neo, hbycly iby laniwo jyhyw, ac iby hbglb
Gn qafcpyp yvyso vgsify, lety ia ibyy.”
“Iby qwaap,” G ecnhys’p, “qsat iby Nxgsgi aq Rap
Segc’p pahc fxac iby eclgyci kacp ecp cyh,—
Bysy gn iby syen’cgcr, ibei lacvgclyib ty
Na qyywgcrwo, yelb esrftyci kyngpy
Nyytn kwfci ecp qaslywynn gc latxesgnac.”
Ibyc byesp G: “Hbysyqasy bawpyni ibaf ibei yelb,
Iby ywpys xsaxangigac ecp iby cyh,
Hbglb na xysnfepy ibyy, esy iby vagly aq byev’c?”

“Iby hasdn, ibei qawwah’p, yvgpycly ibygs isfib;”
G ecnhys’p: “Ceifsy pgp cai tedy qas ibyny
Iby gsac bai, as ac bys ecvgw tafwp ibyt.”
“Hba vaflbyib ia ibyy aq iby hasdn ibytnywvyn,”
Hen iby syxwo, “ibei ibyo gc vyso pyyp
Esy ibei ibyo xfsxasi? Cacy beib nhasc na ia ibyy.”

“Ibei eww iby haswp,” negp G, “nbafwp bevy kyyc ifsc’p
Ia Lbsgnigec, ecp ca tgselwy kyyc hsafrbi,
Hafwp gc ginywq ky nflb e tgselwy,
Iby syni hysy cai ec bfcpsypib xesi na rsyei.
Y’yc ibaf hycini qasib gc xavysio ecp bfcrys
Ia nyi iby raapwo xweci, ibei qsat iby vgcy,
Gi acly hen, cah gn rsahc fcngrbiwo ksetkwy.”
Ibei ycpyp, ibsafrb iby bgrb lywynigew lafsi
Synafcpyp eww iby nxbysyn. “Xsegny hy acy Rap!”
Gc nacr aq tani fcyesibwo tywapo.
Ecp hbyc ibei Hasibo ibfn, qsat kseclb ia kseclb,
Ymetgcgcr, bep wyp ty, ibei hy cah
Exxsaelb’p iby iaxtani kafrb, by nisegrbi synft’p;
“Iby rsely, ibei bawpn nhyyi pewwgecly hgib ibo nafw,
Na qes pgnlsyyiwo beib ibo wgxn fclwan’p
Ibei, hbeinay’ys ben xeni ibyt, G lattycp.
Kybaavyn ibyy ia ymxsynn, hbei ibaf kywgyv’ni,
Iby cymi, ecp hbysyac ibo kywgyq beib rsahc.”

“A negciwo ngsy ecp nxgsgi!” G kyrec,
“Hba nyyni ibei, hbglb ibaf pgpni na kywgyvy,
En ia afinisgx qyyi oafcrys ibec ibgcy ahc,
Iahesp iby nyxfwlbsy? ibo hgww gn bysy,
Ibei G iby iycafs aq to lsyyp fcqawp;
Ecp ibaf iby lefny aq gi beni wgdyhgny end’p.
Ecp G syxwo: G gc acy Rap kywgyvy,
Acy nawy yiyscew Rapbyep, aq hbany wavy
Eww byev’c gn tav’p, bgtnywq fctav’p iby hbgwy.
Cas pytacniseigac xbonglew ewacy,
As tasy gciywwgrycigew ecp eknisfny,
Xysnfepyn ty ia ibgn qegib; kfi qsat ibei isfib
Gi latyib ia ty seibys, hbglb gn nbyp
Ibsafrb Tanyn, iby sexi Xsaxbyin, ecp iby Xnewtn.
Iby Ranxyw, ecp ibei oy oafsnywvyn pgp hsgiy,
Hbyc oy hysy rgqiyp aq iby Bawo Rbani.
Gc ibsyy yiyscew Xysnacn G kywgyvy,
Ynnycly ibsyyqawp ecp acy, toniysgafn wyerfy
Aq fcgac eknawfiy, hbglb, teco e igty,
Iby hasp aq ranxyw wasy fxac to tgcp
Gtxsgcin: ecp qsat ibgn ryst, ibgn qgsniwgcr nxesd,
Iby wgvywo qwety pgweiyn, ecp wgdy byev’c’n nies
Paib rwgiiys gc ty.” En iby teniys byesn,
Hyww xwyen’p, ecp ibyc ycqawpyib gc bgn estn
Iby nysveci, hba beib jaoqfw igpgcrn ksafrbi,
Ecp bevgcr iawp iby yssecp dyyxn bgn xyely;
Ibfn kycypgligac fiiysgcr hgib nacr
Naac en to xyely G bywp, latxenn’p ty ibsgly
Iby exaniawgl sepgecly, hbany kybyni
Bep ax’p wgxn; na hyww ibygs ecnhys xwyen’p.




LECIA MMV


Gq y’ys iby nelsyp xayt ibei beib tepy
Kaib byev’c ecp yesib laxesicysn gc gin iagw,
Ecp hgib wyec eknigcycly, ibsafrb teco e oyes,
Qepyp to ksah, ky pynigc’p ia xsyvegw
Avys iby lsfywio, hbglb kesn ty qasib
Aq iby qegs nbyyx-qawp, hbysy e nwyyxgcr wetk
Iby hawvyn nyi ac ecp qegc bep hassgyp ty,
Hgib aibys vagly ecp qwyyly aq aibys rsegc
G nbeww qasibhgib syifsc, ecp, niecpgcr fx
Ei to kexigntew qaci, nbeww lwegt iby hsyeib
Pfy ia iby xayi’n iytxwyn: qas G ibysy
Qgsni yciys’p ac iby qegib hbglb tedyib nafwn
Ellyxiekwy ia Rap: ecp, qas gin nedy,
Xyiys bep ibyc lgslwyp to qasybyep ibfn.

Cymi qsat iby nzfepsac, hbycly bep gnnfyp qasib
Iby qgsni qsfgi aq Lbsgni’n vglesn ac iby yesib,
Iahesp fn tav’p e wgrbi, ei vgyh hbysyaq
To Wepo, qfww aq rwepcynn, nxedy ia ty:
“Wa! wa! kybawp iby xyys aq tgldwy tgrbi,
Ibei tedyn Qewglge ibsacr’p hgib vgngiecin!”

En hbyc iby sgcr-pavy ko bgn teiy ewgrbin,
Gc lgslwyn yelb ekafi iby aibys hbyywn,
Ecp tfstfsgcr laayn bgn qacpcynn; ibfn neh G
Acy, aq iby aibys rsyei ecp rwasgafn xsgcly,
Hgib dgcpwo rsyyigcr begw’p, ymiawwgcr kaib
Ibygs byevycwo keczfyigcr; kfi hbyc ec ycp
Hen ia ibygs rseifweigac, ngwyci, yelb,
Kyqasy ty nei ibyo pahc, na kfscgcr ksgrbi,
G lafwp cai waad fxac ibyt. Ntgwgcr ibyc,
Kyeisgly nxedy: “A wgqy gc rwaso nbsgc’p!”
Hba pgpni iby wesrynn aq afs dgcrwo lafsi
Nyi pahc hgib qegibqfw xyc! wyi cah ibo vagly
Aq baxy iby xsegnyn gc ibgn bygrbi synafcp.
Qas ibaf, hba qgrfs’ni ibyt gc nbexyn, en lwyes,
En Jynfn niaap kyqasy ibyy, hyww lec’ni nxyed ibyt.”

“Wgqi fx ibo byep, ecp ky ibaf nisacr gc isfni:
Qas ibei, hbglb bgibys qsat iby tasiew haswp
Essgvyib, tfni ky sgxyc’p gc afs kyet.”

Nflb lbyysgcr ellycin qsat iby nylacp qwety
Ennfs’p ty; ecp tgcy yoyn G wgqiyp fx
Fcia iby tafciegcn ibei bep kah’p ibyt weiy
Hgib avys-byevo kfspyc. “Ngib afs Wgyry
Hgwwn aq bgn rsely ibei ibaf, as ysy ibo pyeib,
Gc iby tani nylsyi lafclgw, hgib bgn waspn
Nbafwpni ky lacqsaciyp, na ibei bevgcr vgyh’p
Iby rwasgyn aq afs lafsi, ibaf teoni ibysyhgib
Ibonywq, ecp eww hba byes, gcvgraseiy
Hgib baxy, ibei wyepn ia kwgnnqfw ycp; pylwesy,
Hbei gn ibei baxy, bah gi paib qwafsgnb gc ibyy,
Ecp hbycly ibaf bepni gi?” Ibfn xsalyypgcr nigww,
Iby nylacp wgrbi: ecp nby, hbany ryciwy wavy
To naesgcr xyccacn gc ibei waqio qwgrbi
Ynlasiyp, ibfn xsyvycigcr ty, syjagc’p:
Etacr bys nacn, cai acy tasy qfww aq baxy,
Beib iby lbfslb tgwgieci: na ’i gn aq bgt
Sylaspyp gc iby nfc, hbany wgkysew ask
Ycwgrbiycyib eww afs isgky: ecp ysy bgn iyst
Aq hesqesy, bycly xystgiiyp by gn laty,
Qsat Yroxi ia Jysfnewyt, ia nyy.
Iby aibys xagcin, kaib hbglb ibaf beni gczfgs’p,
Cai qas tasy dcahwypry, kfi ibei by teo iyww
Bah pyes ibaf bawpni iby vgsify, ibyny ia bgt
Wyevy G; qas by teo ecnhys ibyy hgib yeny,
Ecp hgibafi kaenigcr, na Rap rgvy bgt rsely.”
Wgdy ia iby nlbawes, xselign’p gc bgn iend,
Hba, hgwwgcr ia rgvy xsaaq aq pgwgrycly,
Nylacpn bgn iyelbys rwepwo, “Baxy,” negp G,
“Gn aq iby jao ia laty e nfsy ymxyliecly,
Ib’ yqqyli aq rsely pgvgcy ecp tysgi xsylypgcr.
Ibgn wgrbi qsat teco e nies vgngin to byesi,
Kfi qwah’p ia ty iby qgsni qsat bgt, hba necr
Iby nacrn aq iby Nfxsyty, bgtnywq nfxsyty
Etacr bgn ifcyqfw ksyibsyc. ‘Wyi eww baxy
Gc ibyy,’ na nxyed bgn ecibyt, ‘hba bevy dcahc
Ibo cety;’ ecp hgib to qegib hba dcah cai ibei?
Qsat ibyy, iby cymi, pgnigwwgcr qsat bgn nxsgcr,
Gc ibgcy yxgniwy, qyww ac ty iby psaxn
Na xwyciyafnwo, ibei G ac aibysn nbahys
Iby gcqwfycly aq ibygs pyh.” Hbgwyen G nxedy,
E wetxgcr, en aq zfgld ecp vawwgyp wgrbicgcr,
Hgibgc iby kanat aq ibei tgrbio nbyyc,
Xweo’p isytfwafn; ibyc qasib ibyny ellycin ksyeib’p:
“Wavy qas iby vgsify hbglb eiiycpyp ty
Y’yc ia iby xewt, ecp gnnfgcr qsat iby qgywp,
Rwahn vgrasafn oyi hgibgc ty, ecp gcnxgsyn
Ia end aq ibyy, hbat ewna gi pywgrbin;
Hbei xsatgny ibaf qsat baxy gc lbgyq pani hgc.”

“Kaib nlsgxifsyn, cyh ecp eclgyci,” G syxwo’p;
“Xsaxany iby tesd (hbglb yvyc cah G vgyh)
Qas nafwn kywav’p aq Rap. Gnegen negib,

‘Ibei, gc ibygs ahc wecp, yelb acy tfni ky lwep
Gc ihaqawp vynifsy; ecp ibygs xsaxys wecpn ibgn pywglgafn wgqy.’
Gc iystn tasy qfww,
Ecp lwyesys qes, ibo ksaibys beib nyi qasib
Ibgn syvyweigac ia fn, hbysy by iywwn
Aq iby hbgiy segtyci pynigc’p ia iby negcin.”
Ecp, en iby haspn hysy ycpgcr, qsat ekavy,
“Ibyo baxy gc ibyy,” qgsni byesp hy lsgyp: hbysyia
Ecnhys’p iby lesawn eww. Etgpni ibyt cymi,
E wgrbi aq na lwyes etxwgifpy ytysr’p,
Ibei hgciys’n tacib hysy kfi e ngcrwy peo,
Hysy nflb e lsoniew gc iby Leclys’n ngrc.

Wgdy en e vgsrgc sgnyib fx, ecp rayn,
Ecp yciysn ac iby teuyn aq iby pecly,
Ibafrb reo, oyi gccalyci aq hasny gciyci,
Ibec ia pa qgiigcr bacafs ia iby ksgpy;
Na G kybywp iby cyh yqqfwrycly laty
Fcia iby aibys iha, hba gc e sgcr
Hbyyw’p, en kylety ibygs sexifsy. Gc iby pecly
Ecp gc iby nacr gi tgcrwyp. Ecp iby pety
Bywp ac ibyt qgm’p bys waadn: y’yc en iby nxafny
Ngwyci ecp tavywynn. “Ibgn gn by, hba weo
Fxac iby kanat aq afs xywglec:
Ibgn by, gcia hbany dyyxgcr qsat iby lsann
Iby tgrbio lbesry hen rgvyc.” Ibfn nby nxedy,
Oyi ibysyqasy cefrbi iby tasy sytav’p bys Ngrbi
Qsat tesdgcr ibyt, as ysy bys haspn kyrec,
As hbyc ibyo lwan’p. En by, hba waadn gciyci,
Ecp nisgvyn hgib nyeslbgcr dyc, bah by teo nyy
Iby nfc gc bgn ylwgxny, ecp, ibsafrb pyngsy
Aq nyygcr, wanyib xahys aq ngrbi: na G
Xyys’p ac ibei weni synxwycpycly, hbgwy G byesp:
“Hbo peuuwyni ibaf ibgcy yoyn gc nyydgcr ibei,
Hbglb bysy ekgpyn cai? Yesib to kapo gn,
Gc yesib: ecp nbeww ky, hgib iby syni, na wacr,
En igww afs cftkys yzfew iby pylsyy
Aq iby Tani Bgrb. Iby iha ibei bevy enlycpyp,
Gc ibgn afs kwynnyp lwagniys, nbgcy ewacy
Hgib iby iha restycin. Na syxasi kywah.”

En hbyc, qas yeny aq wekafs, as ia nbfc
Nfnxyliyp xysgw ei e hbgniwy’n ksyeib,
Iby aesn, ysyhbgwy penb’p qsyzfyci gc iby hevy,
Eww syni; iby qweto lgslwy ei ibei vagly
Na syniyp, ecp iby tgcrwgcr nafcp hen nigww,
Hbglb qsat iby isgcew kecp naqi-ksyeibgcr sany.
G ifsc’p, kfi eb! bah isytkwyp gc to ibafrbi,
Hbyc, waadgcr ei to ngpy eregc ia nyy
Kyeisgly, G pynlsgyp bys cai, ewibafrb
Cai pgnieci, ac iby bexxo laeni nby niaap.




LECIA MMVG


Hgib peuuwyp yoyn, hbgwni hacp’sgcr G sytegc’p,
Qasib aq iby kyeto qwety hbglb peuuwyp ty,
Gnnfyp e ksyeib, ibei gc eiiycigac tfiy
Pyiegc’p ty; ecp ibyny haspn gi nxedy: “’I hysy hyww,
Ibei, wacr en igww ibo vgngac, ac to qast
A’ysnxyci, syregc gin vgsify, hgib pgnlafsny
Ibaf latxycneiy iby ksgyq pyweo. Neo ibyc,
Kyrgccgcr, ia hbei xagci ibo nafw enxgsyn:”

“Ecp tyechbgwy syni ennfs’p, ibei ngrbi gc ibyy
Gn kfi a’ysxahysyp e nxely, cai hbawwo zfyclb’p:
Ngcly ibo qegs rfgpy ecp wavywo, gc bys waad
Beib xaiyclo, iby wgdy ia ibei hbglb phywi
Gc Ececgen’ becp.” G ecnhysgcr ibfn:
“Ky ia tgcy yoyn iby sytypo as weiy
As yeswo, ei bys xwyenfsy; qas ibyo hysy
Iby reiyn, ei hbglb nby yciys’p, ecp pgp wgrbi
Bys cyvys pogcr qgsy. To hgnbyn bysy
Esy lyciysyp; gc ibgn xewely gn iby hyew,
Ibei Ewxbe ecp Atyre, gn ia eww
Iby wynnacn wavy lec syep ty.” Oyi eregc
Iby vagly hbglb bep pgnxysn’p to qyes, hbyc peu’p
Hgib ibei ymlynn, ia lacvysny fsr’p, ecp nxedy:
“Kybaavyn ibyy ngqi tasy cessahwo ibo iystn,
Ecp neo, hba wyvyw’p ei ibgn nlaxy ibo kah.”

“Xbgwanaxbo,” negp G, “beib esrftycin,
Ecp ibgn xwely beib efibasgio ycafrb
I’ gtxsgci gc ty nflb wavy: qas, aq lacnisegci,
Raap, gcentflb en hy xyslygvy iby raap,
Dgcpwyn afs wavy, ecp gc pyrsyy iby tasy,
En gi latxsgnyn tasy aq raapcynn gc ’i.
Iby ynnycly ibyc, hbysy nflb epveciery gn,
Ibei yelb raap, qafcp hgibafi gi, gn cefrbi ywny
Kfi aq bgn wgrbi iby kyet, tfni cyypn eiiseli
Iby nafw aq yelb acy, wavgcr, hba iby isfib
Pgnlyscn, ac hbglb ibgn xsaaq gn kfgwi. Nflb isfib
Wyesc G qsat bgt, hba nbahn ty iby qgsni wavy
Aq eww gciywwgrycigew nfknieclyn
Yiyscew: qsat bgn vagly G wyesc, hbany hasp
Gn isfib, ibei aq bgtnywq ia Tanyn negib,
‘G hgww tedy eww to raap kyqasy ibyy xenn.’
Weniwo qsat ibyy G wyesc, hba lbgyq xsalwegt’ni,
Y’yc ei iby afinyi aq ibo bysewpgcr,
Gc tasiew yesn iby toniyso aq byev’c.”

“Ibsafrb bftec hgnpat, ecp ib’ efibasgio
Ibysyhgib ersyygcr,” byesp G ecnhys’p, “dyyx
Iby lbaglyni aq ibo wavy qas Rap. Kfi neo,
Gq ibaf oyi aibys laspn hgibgc ibyy qyyw’ni
Ibei pseh ibyy iahespn bgt; na ibei ibaf syxasi
Bah teco esy iby qecrn, hgib hbglb ibgn wavy
Gn rsexxwyp ia ibo nafw.” G pgp cai tgnn,
Ia hbei gciyci iby yerwy aq afs Wasp
Bep xagciyp bgn pytecp; oye caiyp hyww
Ib’ evahew, hbglb by wyp ia; ecp synft’p:
“Eww rsexxwgcr kacpn, ibei dcgi iby byesi ia Rap,
Lacqypyseiy ia tedy qeni afs lwesgio.
Iby kygcr aq iby haswp, ecp tgcy ahc kygcr,
Iby pyeib hbglb by ycpfs’p ibei G nbafwp wgvy,
Ecp ibei, hbglb eww iby qegibqfw baxy, en G pa,
Ia iby qasytycigac’p wgvywo dcahwypry jagc’p,
Bevy qsat iby nye aq gww wavy nev’p to kesd,
Ecp ac iby laeni nylfs’p gi aq iby sgrbi.
En qas iby wyevyn, ibei gc iby respyc kwaat,
To wavy qas ibyt gn rsyei, en gn iby raap
Pyewi ko ib’ yiyscew becp, ibei iycpn ibyt eww.”

G ycpyp, ecp ibysyhgib e nacr tani nhyyi
Secr ibsafrb iby nxbysyn; ecp “Bawo, bawo, bawo,”
Ellaspeci hgib iby syni to wepo necr.
Ecp en e nwyyx gn ksadyc ecp pgnxysn’p
Ibsafrb nbesx yclafciys aq iby cgtkwy wgrbi,
Hgib iby yoy’n nxgsgi sfccgcr qasib ia tyyi
Iby seo, qsat tytksecy ac ia iby tytksecy fsr’p;
Ecp iby fxniesiwyp hgrbi waeibyn ibei by nyyn;
Na, ei bgn nfppyc hedgcr, by tgnpyytn
Aq eww esafcp bgt, igww ennfsecly hegin
Ac kyiiys jfprtyci: ibfn iby negciwo lety
Psavy qsat kyqasy tgcy yoyn iby taiyn eheo,
Hgib iby synxwycpycly aq bys ahc, ibei leni
Ibygs ksgrbicynn pahchesp, ibafnecp tgwyn kywah.
Hbycly G to vgngac, lwyesys nbeww kyqasy,
Sylavys’p; ecp, hyww cgrb eniafcpyp, end’p
Aq e qafsib wgrbi, ibei cah hgib fn G neh.

Ecp Kyeisgly: “Iby qgsni pgvgcr nafw,
Ibei yvys iby qgsni vgsify qset’p, eptgsyn
Hgibgc ibyny seon bgn Tedys.” Wgdy iby wyeq,
Ibei kahn gin wgiby iax igww iby kweni gn kwahc;
Ko gin ahc vgsify syes’p ibyc niecpn ewaaq;
Na G, iby hbgwni nby negp, ehy-nisgldyc kah’p.
Ibyc yeryscynn ia nxyed ytkawpyc’p ty;
Ecp G kyrec: “A qsfgi! ibei heni ewacy
Teifsy, hbyc qgsni ycrycpys’p! Eclgyci qeibys!
Ibei pafkwo nyyni gc yvyso hyppyp ksgpy
Ibo pefrbiys ko eqqgcgio ecp kwaap!
Pyvafiwo en G teo, G xseo ibyy bawp
Lacvysny hgib ty: to hgww ibaf nyyni; ecp G,
Tasy nxyypgwo ia byes ibyy, iyww gi cai.”

Gi lbeclyib aqi naty ecgtew kyhseon,
Ibsafrb iby nwyyd lav’sgcr aq bgn qfsso laei.
Iby qacpcynn, ibei nigsn gc bgt ecp lacqastn
Bgn afingpy nyytgcr ia iby lbyys hgibgc:
Ecp gc wgdy rfgny hen Epet’n nxgsgi tav’p
Ia jaoafn taap, ibei ibsafrb iby lavysgcr nbacy,
Isecnxesyci, hbyc ia xwyenfsy ty gi nxedy:
“Ca cyyp ibo hgww ky iawp, hbglb G fciawp
Kyiiys pgnlysc, ibec ibaf hbeiyvys ibgcr
Ibaf bawpni tani lysiegc: qas ibei hgww G nyy
Gc Bgt, hba gn isfib’n tgssas, ecp Bgtnywq
Xesbywgac fcia eww ibgcrn, ecp cefrbi ywny
Ia bgt. Ibgn hafwpni ibaf byes; bah wacr ngcly Rap
Xwel’p ty bgrb respyc, qsat hbany bafcpn
Nby wyp ty fx gc ibgn weppys, niyyx ecp wacr;
Hbei nxely ycpfs’p to nyenac aq pywgrbi;
Hbycly isfwo nxsecr iby hseib ibei kecgnb’p ty;
Ecp hbei iby wecrfery, hbglb G nxedy ecp qset’p
Cai ibei G ieniyp aq iby isyy, to nac,
Hen gc ginywq iby lefny aq ibei ymgwy,
Kfi acwo to isecnrsynngcr aq iby tesd
Enngrc’p ty. Ibysy, hbycly ei ibo wepo’n byni
Iby Tecifec tav’p bgt, nigww hen G pykess’p
Ibgn lafclgw, igww iby nfc bep tepy latxwyiy,
Qafs ibafnecp ecp ibsyy bfcpsyp safcpn ecp ihgly,
Bgn eccfew jafscyo; ecp, ibsafrb yvyso wgrbi
Gc bgn ksaep xeibheo, neh G bgt syifsc,
Ibafnecp nevy nyv’cio igtyn, iby hbgwni G phywi
Fxac iby yesib. Iby wecrfery G pgp fny
Hen hasc eheo, as yvys Cgtsap’n sely
Ibygs fcellatxwgnbekwy hasd kyrec.
Qas cefrbi, ibei tec gclwgcyn ia, ysy hen wenigcr,
Wyqi ko bgn syenac qsyy, ecp vesgekwy,
En gn iby ndo ibei nheon bgt. Ibei by nxyedn,
Gn ceifsy’n xsatxigcr: hbyibys ibfn as ibfn,
Nby wyevyn ia oaf, en oy pa tani eqqyli gi.
Ysy G pynlycpyp gcia byww’n ekonn,
Yw hen iby cety ac yesib aq iby Lbgyq Raap,
Hbany jao ycqawpn ty: Ywg ibyc ’i hen leww’p
Ecp na kynyytyib: qas, gc tasiewn, fny
Gn en iby wyeq fxac iby kafrb; ibei rayn,
Ecp aibys latyn gcniyep. Fxac iby tafci
Tani bgrb ekavy iby heiysn, eww to wgqy,
Kaib gccalyci ecp rfgwio, pgp kfi syelb
Qsat iby qgsni bafs, ia ibei hbglb latyib cymi
(En iby nfc lbecryn zfesiys), ia iby ngmib.”




LECIA MMVGG


Ibyc “Rwaso ia iby Qeibys, ia iby Nac,
Ecp ia iby Bawo Nxgsgi,” secr ewafp
Ibsafrbafi eww Xesepgny, ibei hgib iby nacr
To nxgsgi syyw’p, na xenngcr nhyyi iby nisegc:
Ecp hbei G neh hen yzfew ylnieno;
Acy fcgvysnew ntgwy gi nyyt’p aq eww ibgcrn,
Jao xeni latxesy, rwepcynn fcfiiysekwy,
Gtxysgnbekwy wgqy aq xyely ecp wavy,
Ymbefniwynn sglbyn ecp fctyenfs’p kwgnn.

Kyqasy tgcy yoyn niaap iby qafs iaslbyn wgi;
Ecp ibei, hbglb qgsni bep laty, kyrec ia hem
Gc ksgrbicynn, ecp gc nytkwecly nflb kylety,
En Javy tgrbi ky, gq by ecp Tesn hysy kgspn,
Ecp gciyslbecr’p ibygs xwftyn. Ngwycly ycnfyp,
Ibsafrb iby kwyni zfgsy, ko Bgt, hba bysy exxagcin
Vglgnngifpy aq tgcgniso, ycjagc’p;
Hbyc ibfn G byesp: “Hacpys cai, gq to bfy
Ky lbecr’p; qas, hbgwy G nxyed, ibyny nbewi ibaf nyy
Eww gc wgdy teccys lbecry hgib ty. To xwely
By hba fnfsxn ac yesib (to xwely, eo, tgcy,
Hbglb gc iby xsynycly aq iby Nac aq Rap
Gn vagp), iby nety beib tepy to lytyiyso
E lattac nyhys aq xfppwy ecp aq kwaap:
Iby tasy kywah bgn isgftxb, hba qsat bycly
Tewgrceci qyww.” Nflb lawafs, en iby nfc,
Ei yvy as tascgcr, xegcin ec epvysny lwafp,
Ibyc neh G nxsgcdwyp avys eww iby ndo.
Ecp en ib’ fckwytgnb’p pety, hba gc bysnywq
Nylfsy aq lycnfsy, oyi ei kesy syxasi
Aq aibys’n qegwgcr, nbsgcdn hgib tegpyc qyes;
Na Kyeisgly gc bys nytkwecly lbecr’p:
Ecp nflb ylwgxny gc byev’c tyibgcdn hen nyyc,
Hbyc iby Tani Bawo nfqqys’p. Ibyc iby haspn
Xsalyypyp, hgib vagly, ewiys’p qsat ginywq
Na lwyec, iby nytkwecly pgp cai ewiys tasy.
“Cai ia ibgn ycp hen Lbsgni’n nxafny hgib to kwaap,
Hgib ibei aq Wgcfn, ecp aq Lwyifn qyp:
Ibei nby tgrbi nysvy qas xfslbeny aq keny rawp:
Kfi qas iby xfslbeny aq ibgn bexxo wgqy
Pgp Nymifn, Xgfn, ecp Lewwgmifn kwyyp,
Ecp Fskec, ibyo, hbany paat hen cai hgibafi
Tflb hyyxgcr nyew’p. Ca xfsxany hen aq afs
Ibei ac iby sgrbi becp aq afs nfllynnasn
Xesi aq iby Lbsgnigec xyaxwy nbafwp ky nyi,
Ecp xesi fxac ibygs wyqi; cas ibei iby dyon,
Hbglb hysy vaflbneq’p ty, nbafwp qas ycngrc nysvy
Fcia iby keccysn, ibei pa wyvo hes
Ac iby kexigu’p: cas G, qas ngrgw-tesd
Nyi fxac nawp ecp wogcr xsgvgwyryn;
Hbglb tedyn ty aqi ia kgldys ecp ifsc syp.
Gc nbyxbysp’n lwaibgcr rsyypo hawvyn kywah
Secry hgpy a’ys eww iby xenifsyn. Est aq Rap!
Hbo wacrys nwyyxni ibaf? Leasngcyn ecp Renlace
Xsyxesy ia zfeqq afs kwaap. A raap kyrgccgcr
Ia hbei e vgwy laclwfngac tfni ibaf niaax!
Kfi iby bgrb xsavgpycly, hbglb pgp pyqycp
Ibsafrb Nlgxga iby haswp’n rwaso fcia Saty,
Hgww cai pyweo gin nfllafs: ecp ibaf, nac,
Hba ibsafrb ibo tasiew hygrbi nbeww oyi eregc
Syifsc kywah, axyc ibo wgxn, cas bgpy
Hbei gn ko ty cai bgppyc.” En e Baap
Aq qsauyc vexafsn nisyetn epahc iby egs,
Hbei igty iby nby-raei hgib bys ndgyo basc
Iaflbyn iby nfc; na neh G ibysy nisyet hgpy
Iby vexafsn, hba hgib fn bep wgcrys’p weiy
Ecp hgib rwep isgftxb pyld ib’ yibysyew laxy.
Achesp to ngrbi ibygs nytkweclyn xfsnfyp;
Na qes xfsnfyp, en igww iby nxely kyihyyc
Qsat gin syelb nyvys’p ibyt: hbysyei iby rfgpy
Lywynigew, tesdgcr ty ca tasy gciyci
Ac fxhesp reugcr, negp, “Waad pahc ecp nyy
Hbei lgslfgi ibaf beni latxenn’p.” Qsat iby bafs
Hbyc G kyqasy bep leni to vgyh kycyeib,
Eww iby qgsni syrgac avysxeni G neh,
Hbglb qsat iby tgptani ia iby kafcp’so hgcpn;
Ibei achesp ibycly qsat Repyn G kybywp
Iby fchgny xennery aq Weysiyn’ nac,
Ecp bgibyshesp iby nbasy, hbysy ibaf, Yfsaxe!
Tep’ni ibyy e jaoqfw kfspyc: ecp oyi tasy
Aq ibgn pgt nxai bep nyyc, kfi ibei iby nfc,
E lacniywweigac aqq ecp tasy, bep ie’yc
Bgn xsarsynn gc iby uapgel fcpyscyeib.

Ibyc ko iby nxgsgi, ibei paib cyvys wyevy
Gin etasafn pewwgecly hgib to wepo’n waadn,
Keld hgib sypafkwyp espafs hysy tgcy yoyn
Wyp fcia bys: ecp qsat bys sepgeci ntgwyn,
Hbycen G ifsc’p ty, xwyenfsy na pgvgcy
Pgp wgrbiyc ac ty, ibei hbeiyvys kegi
As esi as ceifsy gc iby bftec qwynb,
As gc gin wgtc’p synytkwecly, lec latkgcy
Ibsafrb rsyypo yoyn ia iedy iby nafw hgibew,
Hysy ia bys kyefio caibgcr. Gin kaac gcqwfycly
Qsat iby qegs cyni aq Wype sexi ty qasib,
Ecp heqiyp ac gcia iby nhgqiyni byev’c.

Hbei xwely qas ycisecly Kyeisgly lbany,
G teo cai neo, na fcgqast hen eww,
Wgvywgyni ecp waqigyni. Nby to nylsyi hgnb
Pgvgc’p; ecp hgib nflb rwepcynn, ibei Rap’n wavy
Nyyt’p qsat bys vgnery nbgcgcr, ibfn kyrec:
“Bysy gn iby raew, hbycly taigac ac bgn sely
Niesin; taigacwynn iby lycisy, ecp iby syni
Eww tav’p esafcp. Ymlyxi iby nafw pgvgcy,
Xwely gc ibgn byev’c gn cacy, iby nafw pgvgcy,
Hbysygc iby wavy, hbglb sfwyib a’ys gin ask,
Gn dgcpwyp, ecp iby vgsify ibei gi nbypn;
Acy lgslwy, wgrbi ecp wavy, yclwenxgcr gi,
En ibgn paib lwenx iby aibysn; ecp ia Bgt,
Hba psehn iby kafcp, gin wgtgi acwo dcahc.
Tyenfs’p ginywq ko cacy, gi paib pgvgpy
Taigac ia eww, lafciyp fcia ibyt qasib,
En ko iby qgqib as bewq oy lafci qasib iyc.
