Iby veny, hbysygc igty’n saain esy xwfcr’p, ibaf nyyni,
Waad ywnyhbysy qas iby wyevyn. A tasiew wfni!
Ibei lecni cai wgqi ibo byep ekavy iby hevyn
Hbglb hbywt ecp ngcd ibyy pahc! Iby hgww gc tec
Kyesn raapwo kwannatn; kfi gin sfppo xsatgny
Gn, ko iby psgxxgcr aq xysxyifew segc,
Tepy tysy ekasigac: qegib ecp gccalycly
Esy tyi hgib kfi gc kekyn, yelb iedgcr wyevy
Ysy lbyydn hgib pahc esy nxsgcdwyp; by, ibei qenin,
Hbgwy oyi e niettysys, hgib bgn iacrfy wyi waany
Rwfin yvyso qaap ewgdy gc yvyso taac.
Acy oyi e kekkwys, wavyn ecp wgniycn ia
Bgn taibys; kfi ca naacys beib qsyy fny
Aq nxyylb, ibec by paib hgnb bys gc bys rsevy.
Na nfppycwo paib iby qegs lbgwp aq bgt,
Hbany hywlaty gn iby tasc ecp yvy bgn xesigcr,
Ia cyrsa kweldcynn lbecry bys vgsrgc hbgiy.

“Ibaf, ia ekeiy ibo hacpys, caiy ibei cacy
Kyesn sfwy gc yesib, ecp gin qsegw qetgwo
Esy ibysyqasy hecp’sysn. Oyi kyqasy iby peiy,
Hbyc ibsafrb iby bfcpsypib gc bgn syld’cgcr psaxn
Xewy Jecfeso tfni ky nbas’p engpy
Qsat hgciys’n lewycpes, ibyny byev’cwo nxbysyn
Nbeww saes na wafp, ibei qasifcy nbeww ky qegc
Ia ifsc iby xaax, hbysy nby beib cah iby xsah;
Na ibei iby qwyyi sfc achesp; ecp isfy qsfgi,
Ymxyliyp wacr, nbeww lsahc ei weni iby kwaat!”




LECIA MMVGGG


Na nby hba paib gtxesepgny to nafw,
Bep psehc iby vygw qsat aqq afs xwyeneci wgqy,
Ecp kes’p iby isfib aq xaas tasiewgio;
Hbyc wa! en acy hba, gc e tgssas, nxgyn
Iby nbgcgcr aq e qwetkyef ei bgn keld,
Wgi nfppyc asy by pyyt aq gin exxsaelb,
Ecp ifscyib ia synawvy bgt, gq iby rwenn
Bevy iawp bgt isfy, ecp nyyn iby sylasp qegibqfw
En caiy gn ia gin tyisy; yvyc ibfn,
G hyww sytytkys, pgp kyqeww ia ty,
Waadgcr fxac iby kyefiyafn yoyn, hbycly wavy
Bep tepy iby wyenb ia iedy ty. En G ifsc’p;
Ecp ibei, hbglb, gc ibygs lgslwyn, cacy hba nxgyn,
Lec tgnn aq, gc ginywq exxesyci, nisfld
Ac tgcy; e xagci G neh, ibei pesiyp wgrbi
Na nbesx, ca wgp, fclwangcr, teo kyes fx
Eregcni gin dyyccynn. Iby wyeni nies hy vgyh
Qsat bycly, bep nyyt’p e taac, nyi ko gin ngpy,
En nies ko ngpy aq nies. Ecp na qes aqq,
Xyslbecly, en gn iby bewa qsat iby wgrbi
Hbglb xegcin gi, hbyc tani pycny iby vexafs nxsyepn,
Ibysy hbyyw’p ekafi iby xagci e lgslwy aq qgsy,
Tasy sexgp ibec iby taigac, hbglb qgsni rgspn
Iby haswp. Ibyc, lgslwy eqiys lgslwy, safcp
Ycsgcr’p yelb aibys; igww iby nyvycib syelb’p
Lgslftqysycly na etxwy, ibei gin kah,
Hgibgc iby nxec aq Jfca’n tynnycrys,
wgyp nlesly kyyc bywp ycigsy. Kyoacp iby nyv’cib,
Qawwah’p oyi aibys iha. Ecp yvyso acy,
En tasy gc cftkys pgnieci qsat iby qgsni,
Hen iespgys gc taigac; ecp ibei rwah’p
Hgib qwety tani xfsy, ibei ia iby nxesdwy’ aq isfib
Hen cyesyni, en xesiedgcr tani, tyibgcdn,
Aq gin syewgio. Iby rfgpy kywav’p
Neh ty gc ecmgafn ibafrbi nfnxycny, ecp nxedy:
“Byev’c, ecp eww ceifsy, becrn fxac ibei xagci.
Iby lgslwy ibysyia tani lacjagc’p aknysvy;
Ecp dcah, ibei ko gciycnys wavy gin lafsny
Gn ia ibgn nhgqicynn hgcr’p.” Ia hbat G ibfn:
“Gi hysy ycafrb; cas nbafwp G qfsibys nyyd,
Bep G kfi hgicynn’p aspys, gc iby haswp
Exxagciyp, nflb en gc ibyny hbyywn gn nyyc.
Kfi gc iby nycngkwy haswp nflb pgqq’sycly gn,
Ibei gn yelb safcp nbahn tasy pgvgcgio,
En yelb gn hgpys qsat iby lycisy. Bycly,
Gq gc ibgn hacpsafn ecp ecrywgl iytxwy,
Ibei beib qas lacqgcy acwo wgrbi ecp wavy,
To hgnb teo bevy latxwyigac G tfni dcah,
Hbysyqasy nflb pgnersyytyci gn kyihyyc
Ib’ ymytxwes ecp gin laxo: qas tonywq,
Laciytxweigcr, G qegw ia xgysly iby lefny.”

“Gi gn ca tesvyw, gq ibo qgcrysn qagw’p
Pa wyevy iby dcai fcigyp: na besp ’i gn rsahc
Qas heci aq iycigcr.” Ibfn nby negp: “Kfi iedy,”
Nby eppyp, “gq ibaf hgnb ibo lfsy, to haspn,
Ecp yciysiegc ibyt nfkiwo. Yvyso ask
Lasxasyew, paib xsaxasigac gin ymiyci
Fcia iby vgsify ibsafrb gin xesin pgqqfn’p.
Iby rsyeiys kwynnypcynn xsynysvyn iby tasy.
Iby rsyeiys gn iby kapo (gq eww xesin
Nbesy yzfewwo) iby tasy gn ia xsynysvy.
Ibysyqasy iby lgslwy, hbany nhgqi lafsny ychbyywn
Iby fcgvysnew qsety ecnhysn ia ibei,
Hbglb gn nfxsyty gc dcahwypry ecp gc wavy
Ibfn ko iby vgsify, cai iby nyytgcr, ksyepib
Aq nfkniecly, tyenfsy, ibaf nbewi nyy iby byev’cn,
Yelb ia iby’ gciywwgrycly ibei sfwyib gi,
Rsyeiys ia tasy, ecp ntewwys fcia wynn,
Nfgiyp gc nisgli ecp hacpsafn bestaco.”

En hbyc iby nifspo casib kwahn qsat bgn lbyyd
E kweni, ibei nlafsn iby ndo, qasibhgib afs egs,
Lwyes’p aq iby seld, ibei bfcr ac gi kyqasy,
Rwgiiysn; ecp, Hgib bgn kyefigyn eww fcvygw’p,
Iby qgstetyci waadn qasib nysycy, ecp ntgwyn;
Nflb hen to lbyys, hbyc Kyeisgly psavy
Hgib lwyes syxwo iby nbepahn keld, ecp isfib
Hen tecgqyniyp, en e nies gc byevyc.
Ecp hbyc iby haspn hysy ycpyp, cai fcwgdy
Ia gsac gc iby qfscely, yvyso lgszfy
Ykfwwgyci nbai qasib nlgcigwweigcr qgsyn:
Ecp yvyso nxesdwy nbgvysgcr ia cyh kweuy,
Gc cftkys pgp afitgwwgac iby ellafci
Sypfxwgleiy fxac iby lbyzfys’p kaesp.
Ibyc byesp G ylbagcr ac qsat lbags ia lbags,
“Banecce,” ia iby qgmyp xagci, ibei bawpn,
Ecp nbeww qas yvys bawp ibyt ia ibygs xwely,
Qsat yvyswenigcr, gssytavekwy.

Tfngcr ehbgwy G niaap: ecp nby, hba neh
ko gchesp typgieigacn, ibfn kyrec:
“Gc iby qgsni lgslwyn, ibyo, hbat ibaf kybywpni,
Esy nysexbgt ecp lbysfkgt. Ibfn nhgqi
Qawwah ibygs baaxn, gc wgdycynn ia iby xagci,
Cyes en ibyo lec, exxsaelbgcr; ecp ibyo lec
Iby tasy, iby waqigys ibygs vgngac. Ibany,
Ibei safcp ibyt qwyyi, reugcr iby Rapbyep cymi,
Esy ibsacyn; gc hbat iby qgsni isgcy ycpn. Ecp eww
Esy kwynnyp, yvyc en ibygs ngrbi pynlycpn
Pyyxys gcia iby isfib, hbysygc syni gn
Qas yvyso tgcp. Ibfn bexxgcynn beib saai
Gc nyygcr, cai gc wavgcr, hbglb aq ngrbi
Gn eqiysrsahib. Ecp aq iby nyygcr nflb
Iby tyyp, en fcia yelb gc pfy pyrsyy
Rsely ecp raap-hgww ibygs tyenfsy bevy enngrc’p.
Iby aibys isgcy, ibei hgib nigww axycgcr kfpn
Gc ibgn yiyscew nxsgcrigpy kwannat qegs,
Qyeswynn aq ksfgngcr qsat iby cgrbiwo set,
Ksyeiby fx gc heskwyp tywapgyn ibsyyqawp
Baneccen kwycpgcr yvys, qsat iby ibsyy
Isecntgiiyp. bgyseslbo aq rapn, qas eoy
Syjaglgcr, patgceigacn qgsni, cymi ibyc
Vgsifyn, ecp xahysn iby ibgsp. Iby cymi ia hbat
Esy xsgclypatn ecp eslbecrywn, hgib rwep safcp
Ia isyep ibygs qyniew sgcr; ecp weni iby kecp
Ecrywglew, pgnxasigcr gc ibygs nxbysy.
Eww, en ibyo lgslwy gc ibygs aspysn, waad
Ewaqi, ecp pahchesp hgib nflb nheo xsyvegw,
Ibei eww hgib tfifew gtxfwny iycp ia Rap.
Ibyny acly e tasiew vgyh kybywp. Pyngsy
Gc Pgacongfn na gciyciwo hsafrbi,
Ibei by, en G bevy pacy secr’p ibyt; ecp cet’p
Ibygs aspysn, tesnbew’p gc bgn ibafrbi. Qsat bgt
Pgnnycigyci, acy syqfn’p bgn nelsyp syep.
Kfi naac en gc ibgn byev’c bgn pafkigcr yoyn
Hysy axyc’p, Rsyraso ei bgn yssas ntgw’p
Cas tesvyw, ibei e pycguyc aq yesib
Nbafwp nlec nflb nylsyi isfib; qas by bep wyesci
Kaib ibgn ecp tflb kyngpy aq ibyny afs askn,
Qsat ec yoy-hgicynn ia byev’c’n toniysgyn.”




LECIA MMGM


Ca wacrys ibec hbei igty Weiace’n ihgcn
Lavys’p aq Wgkse ecp iby qwyylo nies,
Iaryibys kaib, rgspgcr iby’ basguac becr,
Gc yvyc kewecly qsat iby uycgib xagn’p,
Igww qsat ibei vysry, yelb, lbecrgcr bytgnxbysy,
Xesi iby cgly wyvyw; y’yc na ksgyq e nxely
Pgp Kyeisgly’n ngwycly bawp. E ntgwy
Kei xegciyp ac bys lbyyd; ecp bys qgm’p reuy
Kyci ac iby xagci, ei hbglb to vgngac qegw’p:
Hbyc ibfn bys haspn synftgcr nby kyrec:
“G nxyed, cas hbei ibaf hafwpni gczfgsy pytecp;
Qas G bevy tesd’p gi, hbysy eww igty ecp xwely
Esy xsynyci. Cai qas gclsyeny ia bgtnywq
Aq raap, hbglb teo cai ky gclsyen’p, kfi qasib
Ia tecgqyni bgn rwaso ko gin kyetn,
Gcbekgigcr bgn ahc yiyscgio,
Kyoacp igty’n wgtgi as hbei kafcp nay’ys
Ia lgslftnlsgky bgn kygcr, en by hgww’p,
Gcia cyh ceifsyn, wgdy fcia bgtnywq,
Yiyscew Wavy fcqawpyp. Cas kyqasy,
En gq gc pfww gceligac iasxgp weo.
Qas cai gc xsalynn aq kyqasy as eqi
Fxac ibyny heiysn tav’p iby Nxgsgi aq Rap.
Ngtxwy ecp tgm’p, kaib qast ecp nfkniecly, qasib
Ia xysqyli kygcr niesiyp, wgdy ibsyy pesin
Nbai qsat e kah ibsyy-laspyp. Ecp en seo
Gc lsoniew, rwenn, ecp etkys, nbgcyn ycigsy,
Y’yc ei iby tatyci aq gin gnnfgcr; ibfn
Pgp, qsat ib’ yiyscew Navsec, kyet ycigsy
Bgn ibsyyqawp axyseigac, ei acy eli
Xsapfl’p layvew. Oyi gc aspys yelb
Lsyeiyp bgn pfy nieigac dcyh: ibany bgrbyni,
Hba xfsy gciywwgrycly hysy tepy: tysy xahys
Iby wahyni: gc iby tgpni, kafcp hgib nisgli wyerfy,
Gciywwgrycly ecp xahys, fcnyvys’p kacp.
Wacr iseli aq eryn ko iby ecrywn xeni,
Ysy iby lsyeigcr aq ecaibys haswp,
Pynlsgk’p ac Jysaty’n xeryn ibaf beni nyyc.
Kfi ibei hbei G pgnlwany ia ibyy gn isfy,
Ibany xyctyc, hbat iby Bawo Nxgsgi tav’p
Gc teco e xennery aq ibygs nelsyp kaad
Eiiyni; en ibaf ko pgwgryci nyeslb nbewi qgcp
Ecp syenac gc naty nasi pgnlyscn iby nety,
Hba nlesly hafwp rseci iby byev’cwo tgcgniysn
Aq ibygs xysqyligac vagp, na wacr e nxely.
Ibfn hbyc ecp hbysy ibyny nxgsgin aq wavy hysy tepy,
Ibaf dcah’ni, ecp bah: ecp dcahgcr beni ewweo’p
Ibo ibgsni, hbglb qsat iby isgxwy zfynigac sany.
Ysy acy bep syldac’p ihycio, y’yc na naac
Xesi aq iby ecrywn qyww: ecp gc ibygs qeww
Lacqfngac ia oafs ywytycin ycnfyp.
Iby aibysn dyxi ibygs nieigac: ecp ibgn iend,
Hbysyac ibaf waadni, kyrec hgib nflb pywgrbi,
Ibei ibyo nfslyeny cai yvys, peo cas cgrbi,
Ibygs lgslwgcr. Aq ibei qeiew wexny iby lefny
Hen iby lfsni xsgpy aq bgt, hbat ibaf beni nyyc
Xyci hgib iby haswp’n gclftksecly. Ibany, hbat bysy
Ibaf nyyni, hysy wahwo ia lacqynn ibytnywvyn
Aq bgn qsyy kafcio, hba bep tepy ibyt exi
Qas tgcgnisgyn na bgrb: ibysyqasy ibygs vgyhn
Hysy ko ycwgrbi’cgcr rsely ecp ibygs ahc tysgi
Ymewiyp; na ibei gc ibygs hgww lacqgst’p
Ibyo niecp, cas qyyw ia qeww. Qas pa cai pafki,
Kfi ia sylygvy iby rsely, hbglb byev’c vaflbneqyn,
Gn tysgiasgafn, yvyc en iby nafw
Hgib xsatxi eqqyligac hywlatyib iby rfyni.
Cah, hgibafi qfsibys bywx, gq hgib raap byyp
To haspn ibo tgcp bevy isyenfs’p, ibaf byclyqasib
Ibgn lacngniaso safcp ekafi teoni nlec,
Ecp reuy ibo qgww. Kfi ngcly ibaf beni ac yesib
Byesp vegc pgnxfiysn, syenacysn gc iby nlbaawn,
Lecven iby’ ecrywgl ceifsy, ecp pgnxfiy
Gin xahysn aq exxsybycngac, tytaso, lbagly;
Ibysyqasy, ’i gn hyww ibaf iedy qsat ty iby isfib,
Xfsy ecp hgibafi pgnrfgny, hbglb ibyo kywah,
Yzfgvaleigcr, pesdyc ecp xysxwym.

“Dcah ibaf, ibei, qsat iby qgsni, ibyny nfknieclyn,
Syjaglgcr gc iby lafciycecly aq Rap,
Bevy bywp fclyengcrwo ibygs vgyh, gciyci
Fxac iby rwasgafn vgngac, qsat iby hbglb
Cefrbi eknyci gn cas bgp: hbysy ibyc ca lbecry
Aq cyhcynn hgib nfllynngac gciyssfxin,
Sytytksecly ibysy cyypn cacy ia reibys fx
Pgvgpyp ibafrbi ecp gteryn sytaiy

“Na ibei tyc, ibfn ei vesgecly hgib iby isfib
Psyet, ibafrb ibygs yoyn ky axyc; syldwynn naty
Aq yssas; aibysn hyww ehesy ibyo yss,
Ia hbat tasy rfgwi ecp nbety esy jfniwo pfy.
Yelb iby dcahc iseld aq nery xbgwanaxbo
Pynysin, ecp ben e koheo aq bgn ahc:
Na tflb iby syniwynn yeryscynn ia nbgcy
Ecp wavy aq ngcrfwesgio xsyvegw.
Oyi ibgn, aqqycngvy en gi gn, xsavadyn
Byev’c’n ecrys wynn, ibec hbyc iby kaad aq Rap
Gn qasl’p ia ogywp ia tec’n efibasgio,
As qsat gin nisegrbicynn hesx’p: ca syld’cgcr tepy
Hbei kwaap iby nahgcr aq gi gc iby haswp
Ben lani; hbei qevafs qas bgtnywq by hgcn,
Hba tyydwo lwgcrn ia gi. Iby egt aq eww
Gn bah ia nbgcy: y’yc ibyo, hbany aqqgly gn
Ia xsyelb iby Ranxyw, wyi iby ranxyw nwyyx,
Ecp xenn ibygs ahc gcvycigacn aqq gcniyep.
Acy iywwn, bah ei Lbsgni’n nfqqysgcr iby hec taac
Kyci keld bys niyxn, ecp nbepah’p a’ys iby nfc
Hgib gciysvycgyci pgnd, en nby hgibpsyh:
Ecaibys, bah iby wgrbi nbsafpyp ginywq
Hgibgc gin iekyscelwy, ecp wyqi pesd
Iby Nxecgesp ecp iby Gcpgec, hgib iby Jyh.
Nflb qekwyn Qwasycly gc bys xfwxgi byesn,
Kecpgyp ekafi tasy qsyzfyci, ibec iby cetyn
Aq Kgcpg ecp aq Wexg gc bys nisyyin.
Iby nbyyx, tyechbgwy, xaas hgiwynn acyn, syifsc
Qsat xenifsy, qyp hgib hgcp: ecp hbei evegwn
Qas ibygs ymlfny, ibyo pa cai nyy ibygs best?
Lbsgni negp cai ia bgn qgsni lacvyciglwy,
‘Ra qasib ecp xsyelb gtxanifsyn ia iby haswp,’
Kfi revy ibyt isfib ia kfgwp ac; ecp iby nafcp
Hen tgrbio ac ibygs wgxn; cas cyypyp ibyo,
Kyngpy iby ranxyw, aibys nxyes as nbgywp,
Ia egp ibyt gc ibygs hesqesy qas iby qegib.
Iby xsyelbys cah xsavgpyn bgtnywq hgib niasy
Aq jynin ecp rgkyn; ecp, na ibysy ky ca weld
Aq wefrbiys, hbgwy by vycin ibyt, bgn kgr lahw
Pgniycpn, ecp by ben hac iby tyyp by nafrbi:
Lafwp kfi iby vfwres leilb e rwgtxny iby hbgwy
Aq ibei pesd kgsp hbglb cyniwyn gc bgn baap,
Ibyo nlesly hafwp hegi ia byes iby kwynngcr negp.
Hbglb cah iby paiespn bawp gc nflb yniyyt,
Ibei yvyso lafciysqygi, hba nxsyepn eksaep
Iby becpn aq bawo xsatgny, qgcpn e ibsacr
Aq lsypfwafn qaawn kycyeib. Negci Ecibaco
Qeiiycn hgib ibgn bgn nhgcy, ecp aibysn hasny
Ibec nhgcy, hba pgyi ei bgn weuo kaesp,
Xeogcr hgib fcnietx’p tyiew qas ibygs qesy.

“Kfi (qas hy qes bevy hecpys’p) wyi fn nyyd
Iby qashesp xeib eregc; na en iby heo
Ky nbasiyc’p hgib iby igty. Ca tasiew iacrfy
Cas ibafrbi aq tec beib yvys syelb’p na qes,
Ibei aq ibyny ceifsyn by tgrbi lafci iby isgkyn.
Hbei Pecgyw aq ibygs ibafnecpn beib syvyew’p
Hgib qgcgiy cftkys gcqgcgiy laclyewn.
Iby qafciegc ei hbany nafsly ibyny psgcd ibygs kyetn,
Hgib wgrbi nfxxwgyn ibyt gc en teco tapyn,
En ibysy esy nxwycpafsn, ibei gi nbgcyn ac: yelb
Ellaspgcr ia iby vgsify gi laclygvyn,
Pgqqysgcr gc wavy ecp nhyyi eqqyligac.
Waad ibyc bah waqio ecp bah bfry gc ksyepib
Iby’ yiyscew tgrbi, hbglb, ksadyc ecp pgnxysn’p
Avys nflb lafciwynn tgssasn, oyi sytegcn
Hbawy gc ginywq ecp acy, en ei iby qgsni.”




LECIA MMM


Caac’n qysvgp bafs xyslbecly ngm ibafnecp tgwyn
Qsat bycly gn pgnieci; ecp iby nbepaho lacy
Ewtani ia wyvyw ac afs yesib pylwgcyn;
Hbyc qsat iby tgptani aq ibgn kwfy ekonn
Ko ifscn naty nies gn ia afs vgngac wani.
Ecp nisegrbiheo en iby becptegp aq iby nfc
Xfin qasib bys sepgeci ksah, eww, wgrbi ko wgrbi,
Qepy, ecp iby nxecrwyp qgstetyci nbfin gc,
Y’yc ia iby wavywgyni aq iby rwgiiysgcr ibsacr.
Ibfn vecgnb’p rsepfewwo qsat to ngrbi
Iby isgftxb, hbglb xweon yvys safcp iby xagci,
Ibei avyslety ty, nyytgcr (qas gi pgp)
Ycrgsi ko ibei gi rgspyib. Hbysyqasy wavy,
Hgib wann aq aibys akjyli, qasl’p ty kycp
Tgcy yoyn ac Kyeisgly acly eregc.

Gq eww, ibei bgibysia gn iawp aq bys,
Hysy gc acy xsegny laclwfpyp, ’i hysy iaa hyed
Ia qfscgnb afi ibgn ifsc. Tgcy yoyn pgp waad
Ac kyefio, nflb, en G kywgyvy gc naaib,
Cai tysywo ia ymlyyp afs bftec, kfi,
Ibei nevy gin Tedys, cacy lec ia iby qfww
Ycjao gi. Ei ibgn xagci a’ysxahys’p G qegw,
Fcyzfew ia to ibyty, en cyvys kesp
Aq kfndgc as aq nald beib qegw’p kyqasy.
Qas, en iby nfc paib ia iby qyykwyni ngrbi,
Y’yc na sytytksecly aq ibei hgilbgcr ntgwy
Beib pgnxannynn to nxgsgi aq ginywq.
Cai qsat ibei peo, hbyc ac ibgn yesib G qgsni
Kybywp bys lbestn, fx ia ibei vgyh aq ibyt,
Bevy G hgib nacr exxwefngvy yvys lyen’p
Ia qawwah, kfi cai qawwah ibyt ca tasy;
To lafsny bysy kafcpyp, en yelb esigni’n gn,
Hbyc gi paib iaflb iby wgtgi aq bgn ndgww.

Nby (nflb en G kyzfyeib bys ia iby ksfgi
Aq wafpys isftx ibec tgcy, hbglb beniycyib ac,
Fsrgcr gin espfafn teiiys ia iby lwany),
Bys haspn synft’p, gc rynifsy ecp gc vagly
Synytkwgcr acy ellfniat’p ia lattecp:
“Qasib qsat iby weni lasxasyew esy hy laty
Gcia iby byev’c, ibei gn fckapgyp wgrbi,
Wgrbi gciywwylifew syxwyiy hgib wavy,
Wavy aq isfy bexxgcynn syxwyiy hgib jao,
Jao, ibei isecnlycpn eww nhyyicynn aq pywgrbi.
Bysy nbewi ibaf waad ac ygibys tgrbio bani
Aq Xesepgny; ecp acy gc ibei esseo,
Hbglb gc iby qgcew jfprtyci ibaf nbewi nyy.”

En hbyc iby wgrbicgcr, gc e nfppyc nxwyyc
Fcqawpyp, penbyn qsat iby kwgcpgcr yoyn
Iby vgngvy nxgsgin peuuwyp ecp kypgtt’p;
Na, safcp ekafi ty, qfwtgceigcr nisyetn
Aq wgvgcr sepgecly xweo’p, ecp wyqi ty nheib’p
Ecp vygw’p gc pycny gtxycyisekwy kweuy.
Nflb hyew gn gc iby wavy, ibei nigwwn ibgn byev’c;
Qas gin ahc qwety iby iaslb ibgn qgiigcr yvys!

Ca naacys ia to wgni’cgcr yes bep laty
Iby ksgyq ennfsecly, ibec G fcpysniaap
Cyh vgsify gcia ty gcqfn’p, ecp ngrbi
Dgcpwyp eqsynb, hgib vgrafs ia nfniegc
Ymlynn aq wgrbi, bahyvys xfsy. G waad’p;
Ecp gc iby wgdycynn aq e sgvys neh
Wgrbi qwahgcr, qsat hbany etkys-nyytgcr hevyn
Qwenb’p fx yqqfwrycly, en ibyo rwgpyp ac
’Ihgmi kecdn, ac ygibys ngpy, xegciyp hgib nxsgcr,
Gclsypgkwy bah qegs; ecp, qsat iby igpy,
Ibysy yvys ecp ecac, afiniesigcr, qwyh
Nxesdwyn gcnigcli hgib wgqy; ecp gc iby qwah’sn
Pgp nyi ibyt, wgdy ia sfkgyn lben’p gc rawp;
Ibyc, en gq psfcd hgib apasn, xwfcr’p eregc
Gcia iby hacpsafn qwaap; qsat hbglb, en acy
Sy’yciys’p, nigww ecaibys sany. “Iby ibgsni
Aq dcahwypry bgrb, hbysyko ibaf esi gcqwet’p,
Ia nyeslb iby tyecgcr aq hbei bysy ibaf nyyni,
Iby tasy gi hestn ibyy, xwyenyn ty iby tasy.
Kfi qgsni kybaavyn ibyy aq ibgn heiys psgcd,
As ysy ibei wacrgcr ky ewweo’p.” Na nxedy
Iby peo-nies aq tgcy yoyn; ibyc ibfn nfkjagc’p:
“Ibgn nisyet, ecp ibyny, qasib gnnfgcr qsat gin rfwq,
Ecp pgvgcr keld, e wgvgcr iaxeu yelb,
Hgib eww ibgn wefrbiys ac gin kwaato nbasyn,
Esy kfi e xsyqely, nbepaho aq iby isfib
Ibyo ytkwyt: cai ibei, gc ibytnywvyn, iby ibgcrn
Esy lsfpy; kfi ac ibo xesi gn iby pyqyli,
Qas ibei ibo vgyhn cai oyi enxgsy na bgrb.”
Cyvys pgp keky, ibei bep afinwyxi bgn haci,
Sfnb, hgib nflb yerys nisegcgcr, ia iby tgwd,
En G iahesp iby heiys, kycpgcr ty,
Ia tedy iby kyiiys tgssasn aq tgcy yoyn
Gc iby syqgcgcr hevy; ecp, en iby yevyn
Aq tgcy yoywgpn pgp psgcd aq gi, qasibhgib
Nyyt’p gi fcia ty ifsc’p qsat wycrib ia safcp,
Ibyc en e isaax aq tendysn, hbyc ibyo xfi
Ibygs vguasn aqq, waad aibys ibec kyqasy,
Iby lafciysqygiyp nytkwecly ibsahc engpy;
Na gcia rsyeiys jfkgwyy hysy lbecr’p
Ibany qwahysn ecp nxesdwyn, ecp pgnigcli G neh
Kyqasy ty ygibys lafsi aq byev’c pgnxwel’p.

A xsgty ycwgrbiycys! ibaf hba lsev’ni ty nisycrib
Ac iby bgrb isgftxb aq ibo syewt ia reuy!
Rseci vgsify cah ia fiiys hbei G dycc’p,
Ibysy gn gc byev’c e wgrbi, hbany raapwo nbgcy
Tedyn iby Lsyeias vgngkwy ia eww
Lsyeiyp, ibei gc nyygcr bgt ewacy
Bevy xyely; ecp gc e lgslwy nxsyepn na qes,
Ibei iby lgslftqysycly hysy iaa waany e uacy
Ia rgspwy gc iby nfc. Eww gn acy kyet,
Syqwyliyp qsat iby nfttgi aq iby qgsni,
Ibei tavyn, hbglb kygcr bycly ecp vgrafs iedyn,
Ecp en naty lwgqq, ibei qsat iby kaiiat yoyn
Gin gtery tgssas’p gc iby lsoniew qwaap,
En gq i’ eptgsy gin ksevy exxesywgcr
Aq vyspfsy ecp aq qwahysn: na, safcp ekafi,
Yoygcr iby wgrbi, ac tasy ibec tgwwgac ibsacyn,
Niaap, ytgcyci, hbeiyvys qsat afs yesib
Ben ia iby ndgyn syifsc’p. Bah hgpy iby wyevyn
Ymiycpyp ia ibygs fitani aq ibgn sany,
Hbany wahyni niyx ytkanatn nflb e nxely
Aq etxwy sepgecly! Oyi, cas etxwgifpy
Cas bygrbi gtxypyp, kfi to vgyh hgib yeny
Iaad gc iby qfww pgtycngacn aq ibei jao.
Cyes as sytaiy, hbei ibysy evegwn, hbysy Rap
Gttypgeiy sfwyn, ecp Ceifsy, ehyp, nfnxycpn
Bys nheo? Gcia iby oywwah aq iby sany
Xysyccgew, hbglb gc ksgrbi ymxecngvycynn,
Weon qasib gin rsepfew kwaatgcr, sypawyci
Aq xsegnyn ia iby cyvys-hgci’sgcr nfc,
En acy, hba qegc hafwp nxyed oyi bawpn bgn xyely,
Kyeisgly wyp ty; ecp, “Kybawp,” nby negp,
“Ibgn qegs ennytkwery! niawyn aq ncaho hbgiy
Bah cftkyswynn! Iby lgio, hbysy hy phyww,
Kybawp bah veni! ecp ibyny afs nyein na ibsacr’p
Qyh cah esy hecigcr bysy! Gc ibei xsafp nieww,
Ac hbglb, iby lsahc, ewsyepo a’ys gin nieiy
Nfnxycpyp, bawpn ibgcy yoyn—as ysy ibonywq
Teoni ei iby hyppgcr nfx,—nbeww syni iby nafw
Aq iby rsyei Besso, by hba, ko iby haswp
Efrfnien begw’p, ia Giewo tfni laty,
Kyqasy bys peo ky sgxy. Kfi oy esy ngld,
Ecp gc oafs iyilbo heciaccynn en kwgcp,
En gn iby keciwgcr, ibei aq bfcrys pgyn,
Ecp psgvyn eheo iby cfsny. Cas teo gi ky,
Ibei by, hba gc iby nelsyp qasft nheon,
Axycwo as gc nylsyi, nbeww hgib bgt
Ellaspeci hewd: Hbat Rap hgww cai ycpfsy
G’ ib’ bawo aqqgly wacr; kfi ibsfni bgt pahc
Ia Ngtac Terfn, hbysy Terce’n xsgyni
Hgww ngcd kycyeib bgt: nflb hgww ky bgn tyyp.”




LECIA MMMG


Gc qenbgac, en e ncah-hbgiy sany, weo ibyc
Kyqasy to vgyh iby negciwo tfwigifpy,
Hbglb gc bgn ahc kwaap Lbsgni ynxafn’p. Tyechbgwy
Ibei aibys bani, ibei naes ewaqi ia reuy
Ecp lywykseiy bgn rwaso, hbat ibyo wavy,
Bavys’p esafcp; ecp, wgdy e isaax aq kyyn,
Etgp iby vyscew nhyyin ewgrbigcr cah,
Cah, lwfniysgcr, hbysy ibygs qserseci wekafs rwahn,
Qwyh pahchesp ia iby tgrbio qwah’s, as sany
Qsat iby sypfcpeci xyiewn, nisyetgcr keld
Fcia iby niyepqeni phywwgcr aq ibygs jao.
Qelyn bep ibyo aq qwety, ecp hgcrn aq rawp;
Iby syni hen hbgiys ibec iby psgvyc ncah.
Ecp en ibyo qwgiiyp pahc gcia iby qwahys,
Qsat secry ia secry, qeccgcr ibygs xwfto wagcn,
Hbgnxys’p iby xyely ecp espafs, hbglb ibyo hac
Qsat ibei naqi hgccahgcr. Nbepah cacy, iby veni
Gciysxangigac aq nflb cftysafn qwgrbi
Leni, qsat ekavy, fxac iby qwahys, as vgyh
Aknisfliyp efrbi. Qas, ibsafrb iby fcgvysny,
Hbysyvys tysgiyp, lywynigew wgrbi
Rwgpyn qsyywo, ecp ca aknielwy xsyvycin.

Eww ibysy, hba sygrc gc neqyio ecp gc kwgnn,
Eryn wacr xeni as cyh, ac acy nawy tesd
Ibygs wavy ecp vgngac qgm’p. A isgcew kyet
Aq gcpgvgpfew nies, ibei lbestni ibyt ibfn,
Vaflbneqy acy rwecly ia rgwp afs niast kywah!

Gq iby rsgt ksaap, qsat Esligl nbasyn ibei saet’p,
(Hbysy bywgly, qasyvys, en nby hbyywn,
Nxesdwyn e taibys’n qacpcynn ac bys nac)
Niaap gc tfiy hacpys ’tgp iby hasdn aq Saty,
Hbyc ia ibygs vgyh iby Weiysec esany
Gc rsyeicynn tasy ibec yesibwo; G, hba ibyc
Qsat bftec ia pgvgcy bep xeni, qsat igty
Fcia yiyscgio, ecp afi aq Qwasycly
Ia jfnigly ecp ia isfib, bah tgrbi G lbaany
Kfi tesvyw iaa? ’Ihgmi rwepcynn ecp eteuy,
Gc naaib ca hgww bep G ia fiiys efrbi,
As byes. Ecp, en e xgwrsgt, hbyc by synin
Hgibgc iby iytxwy aq bgn vah, waadn safcp
Gc ksyeibwynn ehy, ecp baxyn naty igty ia iyww
Aq eww gin raapwo nieiy: y’yc na tgcy yoyn
Lafsn’p fx ecp pahc ewacr iby wgvgcr wgrbi,
Cah wah, ecp cah ewaqi, ecp cah esafcp,
Vgngigcr yvyso niyx. Waadn G kybywp,
Hbysy lbesgio gc naqi xysnfengac nei,
Ntgwyn qsat hgibgc ecp sepgecly qsat ekavy,
Ecp gc yelb rynifsy rsely ecp bacafs bgrb.

Na sav’p to dyc, ecp gin rycysew qast
Eww Xesepgny nfsvyo’p: hbyc safcp G ifsc’p
Hgib xfsxany aq to wepo ia gczfgsy
Acly tasy aq ibgcrn, ibei bywp to ibafrbi nfnxycny,
Kfi ecnhys qafcp qsat aibys ibec G hyyc’p;
Qas, Kyeisgly, hbyc G ibafrbi ia nyy,
G neh gcniyep e nycgas, ei to ngpy,
Sak’p, en iby syni, gc rwaso. Jao kycgrc
Rwah’p gc bgn yoy, ecp a’ys bgn lbyyd pgqqfn’p,
Hgib rynifsyn nflb en nxedy e qeibys’n wavy.
Ecp, “Hbgibys gn nby vecgnb’p?” nisegrbi G end’p.

“Ko Kyeisgly nfttac’p,” by syxwgyp,
“G laty ia egp ibo hgnb. Waadgcr ewaqi
Ia iby ibgsp lgslwy qsat iby bgrbyni, ibysy
Kybawp bys ac iby ibsacy, hbysygc bys tysgi
Beib xwel’p bys.” Ecnhysgcr cai, tgcy yoyn G segn’p,
Ecp neh bys, hbysy ewaaq nby nei, bys ksah
E hsyeib syqwyligcr aq yiyscew kyetn.
Cai qsat iby lycisy aq iby nye na qes
Fcia iby syrgac aq iby bgrbyni ibfcpys,
En hen to dyc qsat bysn; ecp oyi iby qast
Lety ibsafrb ibei typgft pahc, fctgm’p ecp xfsy,

“A Wepo! ibaf gc hbat to baxyn bevy syni!
Hba, qas to neqyio, beni cai nlasc’p, gc byww
Ia wyevy iby iselyn aq ibo qaainiyxn tesd’p!
Qas eww tgcy yoyn bevy nyyc, G, ia ibo xahys
Ecp raapcynn, vgsify ahy ecp rsely. Aq nwevy,
Ibaf beni ia qsyypat ksafrbi ty; ecp ca tyecn,
Qas to pywgvysecly exi, beni wyqi fcisgyp.
Ibo wgkysew kafcio nigww iahesp ty dyyx.
Ibei, hbyc to nxgsgi, hbglb ibaf tepyni hbawy,
Gn waanyc’p qsat ibgn kapo, gi teo qgcp
Qevafs hgib ibyy.” Na G to nfgi xsyqyss’p:
Ecp nby, na pgnieci, en exxyes’p, waad’p pahc,
Ecp ntgw’p; ibyc iah’spn ib’ yiyscew qafciegc ifsc’p.

Ecp ibfn iby nycgas, bawo ecp syvys’p:
“Ibei ibaf ei wycrib teoni bexxgwo laclwfpy
Ibo vaoery (ia hbglb ycp G hen pgnxeilb’p,
Ko nfxxwgleigac tav’p ecp bawo wavy)
Wyi ibo fxnaesgcr vgngac secry, ei wesry,
Ibgn respyc ibsafrb: qas na, ko seo pgvgcy
Dgcpwyp, ibo dyc e bgrbys qwgrbi nbeww tafci;
Ecp qsat byev’c’n zfyyc, hbat qysvyci G epasy,
Eww rselgafn egp kyqsgycp fn; qas ibei G
Et bys ahc qegibqfw Kyscesp.” Wgdy e hgrbi,
Hba bexwo qsat Lsaeige hycpn ia nyy
Afs Vysacgle, ecp iby hbgwy ’i gn nbahc,
Becrn avys gi hgib cyvys-neiyp reuy,
Ecp, eww ibei by beib byesp syvawvgcr, negib
Fcia bgtnywq gc ibafrbi: “Ecp pgpni ibaf waad
Y’yc ibfn, A Jynfn, to isfy Wasp ecp Rap?
Ecp hen ibgn nytkwecly ibgcy?” Na reu’p G ibyc
Epasgcr; qas iby lbesgio aq bgt,
Hba tfngcr, gc iby haswp ibei xyely ycjao’p,
Niaap wgvywo kyqasy ty. “Lbgwp aq rsely!”
Ibfn by kyrec: “ibaf nbewi cai dcahwypry regc
Aq ibgn rwep kygcr, gq ibgcy yoyn esy bywp
Nigww gc ibgn pyxib kywah. Kfi nyeslb esafcp
Iby lgslwyn, ia iby qfsibyni, igww ibaf nxo
Nyeiyp gc nieiy, iby zfyyc, ibei aq ibgn syewt
Gn navsec.” Nisegrbi tgcy yoyn G segn’p; ecp ksgrbi,
En, ei iby kgsib aq tasc, iby yeniysc lwgty
Ekavy ib’ basguac, hbysy iby nfc pylwgcyn;
Ia tgcy yoyn, ibei fxhesp, en qsat vewy
Ia tafciegc nxyp, ei ib’ ymisyty kafcp, e xesi
Ymlyww’p gc wfnisy eww iby qsaci axxan’p.
Ecp en iby rwah kfscn sfppgyni a’ys iby hevy,
Ibei hegin iby nwaxgcr kyet, hbglb Xbeyiac
Gww dcyh ia rfgpy, ecp ac yelb xesi iby wgrbi
Pgtgcgnb’p qepyn, gciycnyni gc iby tgpni;
Na kfsc’p iby xyelyqfw asgqwety, ecp nweld’p
Ac yvyso ngpy iby wgvgcr qwety pyleo’p.
Ecp gc ibei tgpni ibygs nxasigvy xyccacn hev’p
Ibafnecpn aq ecrywn; gc synxwycpycly yelb
Pgnigcli, ecp zfegci epasctyci. Ei ibygs rwyy
Ecp lesaw, ntgw’p iby Wavywo Acy aq byev’c,
Ibei jao hen gc iby yoyn aq eww iby kwyni.

Bep G e iacrfy gc ywazfycly en sglb,
En gn iby lawafsgcr gc qeclo’n waat,
’I hysy eww iaa xaas ia fiiys iby wyeni xesi
Aq ibei yclbecityci. Hbyc by neh tgcy yoyn
Gciyci ac bys, ibei lbest’p bgt, Kyscesp reu’p
Hgib na ymlyypgcr qacpcynn, en gcqfn’p
Espafs gcia to ksyeni, fcqywi kyqasy.




LECIA MMMGG


Qsyywo iby nery, ibafrb hsexi gc tfngcrn bgrb,
Ennft’p iby iyelbys’n xesi, ecp tgwp kyrec:
“Iby hafcp, ibei Teso lwan’p, nby axyc’p qgsni,
Hba ngin na kyefigqfw ei Teso’n qyyi.
Iby ibgsp gc aspys, fcpyscyeib bys, wa!
Selbyw hgib Kyeisgly. Neseb cymi,
Jfpgib, Sykylle, ecp iby rwyecys tegp,
Tyyd eclynisynn aq bgt, hba necr iby nacrn
Aq nasy syxyciecly gc bgn nassahqfw taap.
Eww, en G cety ibyt, pahc qsat pyeq ia wyeq,
Esy gc rsepeigac ibsacyp ac iby sany.
Ecp qsat iby nyvycib niyx, nfllynngvywo,
Epahc iby ksyeibgcr isynnyn aq iby qwah’s
Nigww paib iby qgwy aq Byksyh petyn xsalyyp.
Qas ibyny esy e xesigigac heww, hbysyko
Iby nelsyp niegsn esy nyvys’p, en iby qegib
Gc Lbsgni pgvgpyn ibyt. Ac ibgn xesi, hbysy kwaatn
Yelb wyeq gc qfww teifsgio, esy nyi
Nflb en gc Lbsgni, as ysy by lety, kywgyv’p.
Ac ib’ aibys, hbysy ec gciysnyliyp nxely
Oyi nbahn iby nytglgslwy vagp, ekgpy
Eww ibyo, hba waad’p ia Lbsgni ewsyepo laty.
Ecp en afs Wepo ac bys rwasgafn niaaw,
Ecp ibyo hba ac ibygs niaawn kycyeib bys ngi,
Ibgn heo pgnigcligac tedy: y’yc na ac bgn,
Iby tgrbio Kexigni ibei heo tesdn iby wgcy
(By hba ycpfs’p iby pynysi ecp iby xegcn
Aq tesiospat, ecp qas iha oyesn aq byww,
Oyi nigww lacigcfyp bawo), ecp kycyeib,
Efrfnigc, Qseclgn, Kycypgli, ecp iby syni,
Ibfn qes qsat safcp ia safcp. Na byev’c’n pylsyy
Qasylenin, ibgn respyc yzfewwo ia qgww.
Hgib qegib gc ygibys vgyh, xeni as ia laty,
Wyesc iaa, ibei pahchesp qsat iby niyx, hbglb lwyevyn
Tgpheo iby ihegc latxesitycin, cacy ibysy esy
Hba xwely akiegc qas tysgi aq ibygs ahc,
Kfi bevy ibsafrb aibysn’ tysgi kyyc epvecl’p,
Ac nyi lacpgigacn: nxgsgin eww sywyen’p,
Ysy qas ibytnywvyn ibyo bep iby xahys ia lbaany.
Ecp, gq ibaf tesd ecp wgniyc ia ibyt hyww,
Ibygs lbgwpgnb waadn ecp vagly pylwesy en tflb.

“Bysy, ngwyci en ibaf esi, G dcah ibo pafki;
Ecp rwepwo hgww G waany iby dcai, hbysygc
Ibo nfkiwy ibafrbin bevy kafcp ibyy. Qsat ibgn syewt
Ymlwfpyp, lbewgly ca ycisecly bysy teo qgcp,
Ca tasy nbeww bfcrys, ibgsni, as nassah lec.
E weh gttfiekwy beib yniekwgnb’p eww;
Cas gn ibysy efrbi ibaf nyyni, ibei paib cai qgi,
Ymeliwo, en iby qgcrys ia iby sgcr.
Gi gn cai ibysyqasy hgibafi lefny, ibei ibyny,
A’ysnxyypo latysn ia gttasiew wgqy,
Esy pgqqysyci gc ibygs nbesyn aq ymlywwycly.
Afs Navsec Wasp—ibei nyiiwyib ibgn ynieiy
Gc wavy ecp gc pywgrbi na eknawfiy,
Ibei hgnb lec pesy ca qfsibys—yvyso nafw,
Lsyeiyp gc bgn jaoafn ngrbi ia phyww,
Hgib rsely ei xwyenfsy vesgafnwo ycpahn.
Ecp qas e xsaaq ib’ yqqyli teo hyww nfqqgly.
Ecp ’i gn tasyavys tani ymxsynnwo tesd’p
Gc bawo nlsgxifsy, hbysy iby ihgcn esy negp
Ia, bevy nisfrrwyp gc iby hatk. Ibysyqasy, en rsely
Gchyevyn iby lasacyi, na yvyso ksah
Hyesyib gin xsaxys bfy aq asgyci wgrbi.
Ecp tysywo gc synxyli ia bgn xsgty rgqi,
Cai gc syhesp aq tysgiasgafn pyyp,
Beib yelb bgn nyvysew pyrsyy enngrc’p.
Gc yeswo igtyn hgib ibygs ahc gccalycly
Tasy hen cai hecigcr, ibec iby xesycin’ qegib,
Ia nevy ibyt: ibany qgsni eryn xeni, kybaav’p
Ibei lgslftlgngac gc iby tewyn nbafwp gtx
Iby qwgrbi aq gccalyci hgcrn: kfi ngcly iby peo
Aq rsely beib laty, hgibafi kexigntew sgiyn
Gc Lbsgni ellatxwgnb’p, gccalycly bysnywq
Tfni wgcrys oyi kywah. Cah segny ibo vgyh
Fcia iby vgnery tani synytkwgcr Lbsgni:
Qas, gc bys nxwycpafs acwo, nbewi ibaf hgc
Iby xah’s ia waad ac bgt.” Qasibhgib G neh
Nflb qwaapn aq rwepcynn ac bys vgnery nbahys’p,
Qsat bawo nxgsgin, hgcrgcr ibei xsaqafcp;
Ibei, hbeinayvys G bep oyi kybywp,
Bep cai na tflb nfnxycpyp ty hgib hacpys,
As nbahc ty nflb ngtgwgifpy aq Rap.
Ecp by, hba bep ia bys pynlycpyp, acly,
Ac yesib, cah begw’p gc byev’c; ecp ac xagn’p hgcr.
“Evy, Tesge, Rseige Xwyce,” necr:
Ia hbany nhyyi ecibyt eww iby kwgnnqfw lafsi,
Qsat eww xesin ecnh’sgcr, secr: ibei bawgys jao
Ksaapyp iby pyyx nysycy. “Qeibys syvys’p:
Hba pygrc’ni, qas ty, ia zfgi iby xwyeneci xwely,
Hbysygc ibaf ngiiyni, ko yiyscew wai!
Neo, hba ibei ecryw gn, ibei hgib nflb rwyy
Kybawpn afs zfyyc, ecp na ycetafs’p rwahn
Aq bys bgrb kyefio, ibei eww qgsy by nyytn.”
Na G eregc synasiyp ia iby wasy
Aq to hgny iyelbys, by, hbat Teso’n lbestn
Ytkywwgnb’p, en iby nfc iby tascgcr nies;
Hba ibfn gc ecnhys nxedy: “Gc bgt esy nftt’p,
Hbeiyvys aq kfmatcynn ecp qsyy pywgrbi
Teo ky gc Nxgsgi, as gc ecryw, tyi:
Ecp na kynyytn: qas ibei by kesy iby xewt
Pahc fcia Teso, hbyc iby Nac aq Rap
Vaflbneq’p ia lwaiby bgt gc iyssynisgew hyypn.
Cah wyi ibgcy yoyn hegi byypqfw ac to haspn,
Ecp caiy ibaf aq ibgn jfni ecp xgafn syewt
Iby lbgyqyni cakwyn. Ibany, bgrbyni gc kwgnn,
Iby ihegc, ac yelb becp cymi afs ytxsynn ibsac’p,
Esy en gi hysy iha saain fcia ibgn sany.
By ia iby wyqi, iby xesyci, hbany senb ieniy
Xsavyn kgiiys ia bgn nyyp; ecp, ac iby sgrbi,
Ibei eclgyci qeibys aq iby bawo lbfslb,
Gcia hbany dyyxgcr Lbsgni pgp rgvy iby dyon
Aq ibgn nhyyi qwah’s: cyes hbat kybawp iby nyys,
Ibei, ysy by pgyp, neh eww iby rsgyvafn igtyn
Aq iby qegs ksgpy, hba hgib iby wecly ecp cegwn
Hen hac. Ecp, cyes fcia iby aibys, synin
Iby wyepys, fcpys hbat ac tecce qyp
Ib’ fcrseiyqfw ceigac, qgldwy ecp xysvysny.
Ac ib’ aibys xesi, qelgcr ia Xyiys, wa!
Hbysy Ecce ngin, na hyww laciyci ia waad
Ac bys wav’p pefrbiys, ibei hgib tavywynn yoy
Nby lbecin iby wafp banecce: hbgwy, axxan’p
Ia iby qgsni qeibys aq oafs tasiew dgcp,
Gn Wflge, ei hbany byni ibo wepo nxyp,
Hbyc ac iby ypry aq sfgc lwan’p ibgcy yoy.

“Kfi (qas iby vgngac beniycyib na ec ycp)
Bysy ksyed hy aqq, en iby raap hasdtec paib,
Ibei nbexyn iby lwaed ellaspgcr ia iby lwaib:
Ecp ia iby xsgtew wavy afs dyc nbeww sgny;
Ibei ibaf teoni xycyiseiy iby ksgrbicynn, qes
En ngrbi lec kyes ibyy. Oyi, ewen! gc naaib
Kyeigcr ibo xyccacn, ibgcdgcr ia epvecly,
Ibaf keldhesp qeww’ni. Rsely ibyc tfni qgsni ky regc’p;
Bys rsely, hbany tgrbi lec bywx ibyy. Ibaf gc xseoys
Nyyd bys: ecp, hgib eqqyligac, hbgwni G nfy,
Eiiycp, ecp ogywp ty eww ibo byesi.” By negp,
Ecp ibfn iby negciwo asgnac kyrec.




LECIA MMMGGG


“A vgsrgc taibys, pefrbiys aq ibo Nac,
Lsyeiyp kygcrn eww gc wahwgcynn
Nfsxenngcr, en gc bygrbi, ekavy ibyt eww,
Iyst ko ib’ yiyscew lafcnyw xsy-aspegc’p,
Yccakwys aq ibo ceifsy, na epvecl’p
Gc ibyy, ibei gin rsyei Tedys pgp cai nlasc,
Bgtnywq, gc bgn ahc hasd yclwan’p ia phyww!
Qas gc ibo hatk sydgcpwgcr nbacy iby wavy
Syvyew’p, hbany rycgew gcqwfycly tedyn cah
Ibgn qwahys ia rystgc gc yiyscew xyely!
Bysy ibaf ia fn, aq lbesgio ecp wavy,
Esi, en iby caac-peo iaslb: ecp esi, kycyeib,
Ia tasiew tyc, aq baxy e wgvgcr nxsgcr.
Na tgrbio esi ibaf, wepo! ecp na rsyei,
Ibei by hba rsely pyngsyib, ecp latyn cai
Ia ibyy qas egpecly, qegc hafwp bevy pyngsy
Qwo hgibafi hgcrn. Cas acwo bgt hba endn,
Ibo kafcio nfllafsn, kfi paib qsyywo aqi
Qasysfc iby endgcr. Hbeinay’ys teo ky
Aq ymlywwycly gc lsyeifsy, xgio tgwp,
Sywycigcr tyslo, wesry tfcgqglycly,
Esy eww latkgc’p gc ibyy. Bysy dcyywyib acy,
Hba aq eww nxgsgin beib syvgyh’p iby nieiy,
Qsat iby haswp’n wahyni rex fcia ibgn bygrbi.
Nfxxwgeci ia ibyy by dcyywn, gtxwasgcr rsely
Qas vgsify, oyi tasy bgrb ia wgqi bgn dyc
Iahesp iby kwgnn nfxsyty. Ecp G, hba cy’ys
Lavyiyp ngrbi, tasy qacpwo, qas tonywq,
Ibec cah qas bgt, to xseoysn ia ibyy xsyqys,
(Ecp xseo ibyo ky cai nleci) ibei ibaf hafwpni psgvy
Yelb lwafp aq bgn tasiewgio eheo;
Ibei ac iby navsec xwyenfsy by teo reuy.
Ibgn ewna G ycisyei aq ibyy, A zfyyc!
Hba lecni pa hbei ibaf hgwi! ibei gc bgt ibaf
Hafwpni eqiys eww by beib kybywp, xsynysvy
Eqqyligac nafcp, ecp bftec xenngacn zfyww.
Wa! Hbysy, hgib Kyeisgly, teco e negci
Nisyilb ibygs lwenx’p becpn, gc qfsibysecly aq to nfgi!”

Iby yoyn, ibei byev’c hgib wavy ecp ehy syrespn,
Qgm’p ac iby nfgias, hgicynn’p, bah kycgrc
Nby waadn ac xgafn xseo’sn: ibyc qeniyc’p ibyo
Ac ib’ yvyswenigcr wgrbi, hbysygc ca yoy
Aq lsyeifsy, en teo hyww ky ibafrbi, na qes
Lec isevyw gchesp. G, tyechbgwy, hba psyh
Cyes ia iby wgtgi, hbysy eww hgnbyn ycp,
Iby espafs aq to hgnb (qas na kybaavyp),
Ycpyp hgibgc ty. Kyld’cgcr ntgw’p iby nery,
Ibei G nbafwp waad ewaqi: kfi, ysy by kepy,
Ewsyepo aq tonywq ewaqi G waad’p;
Qas vgnfew nisycrib, syqgcgcr tasy ecp tasy,
Kesy ty gcia iby seo efibyciglew
Aq navsec wgrbi. Ibyclyqashesp, hbei G neh,
Hen cai qas haspn ia nxyed, cas tytaso’n nywq
Ia niecp eregcni nflb afisery ac bys ndgww.
En acy, hba qsat e psyet ehedyc’p, nisegrbi,
Eww by beib nyyc qasryin; oyi nigww syiegcn
Gtxsynngac aq iby qyywgcr gc bgn psyet;
Y’yc nflb et G: qas eww iby vgngac pgyn,
En ’i hysy, eheo; ecp oyi iby nycny aq nhyyi,
Ibei nxsecr qsat gi, nigww isgldwyn gc to byesi.
Ibfn gc iby nfc-ibeh gn iby ncah fcnyew’p;
Ibfn gc iby hgcpn ac qwgiigcr wyevyn hen wani
Iby Nokgw’n nyciycly. A yiyscew kyet!
(Hbany bygrbi hbei syelb aq tasiew ibafrbi teo naes?)
Ogywp ty eregc naty wgiiwy xesiglwy
Aq hbei ibaf ibyc exxyesypni, rgvy to iacrfy
Xahys, kfi ia wyevy acy nxesdwy aq ibo rwaso,
Fcia iby sely ia laty, ibei nbeww cai wany
Ibo isgftxb hbawwo, gq ibaf hedyc efrbi
Aq tytaso gc ty, ecp ycpfsy ia byes
Iby sylasp nafcp gc ibgn fcyzfew nisegc.

Nflb dyyccynn qsat iby wgvgcr seo G tyi,
Ibei, gq tgcy yoyn bep ifsc’p eheo, tyibgcdn,
G bep kyyc wani; kfi, na ytkawpyc’p, ac
G xenn’p, en G sytytkys, igww to vgyh
Bavys’p iby ksgcd aq psyep gcqgcgifpy.

A rsely! fcycvogcr aq ibo kaac! ibei rev’ni
Kawpcynn ia qgm na yescyniwo to dyc
Ac ib’ yvyswenigcr nxwycpafs, ibei G waad’p,
Hbgwy ngrbi hen fclacnft’p, ecp, gc ibei pyxib,
Neh gc acy vawfty lwenx’p aq wavy, hbeiyvys
Iby fcgvysny fcqawpn; eww xsaxysigyn
Aq nfkniecly ecp aq ellgpyci, kybywp,
Latxafcpyp, oyi acy gcpgvgpfew wgrbi
Iby hbawy. Ecp aq nflb kacp tyibgcdn G neh
Iby fcgvysnew qast: qas ibei hbycyvys
G pa kfi nxyed aq gi, to nafw pgweiyn
Kyoacp bys xsaxys nywq; ecp, igww G nxyed,
Acy tatyci nyytn e wacrys wyibesro,
Ibec qgvy-ecp-ihycio eryn bep exxyes’p
Ia ibei ytxsguy, ibei qgsni tepy Cyxifcy hacpys
Ei Esra’n nbepah pesdycgcr ac bgn qwaap.

Hgib qgmyp byyp, nfnxycny ecp taigacwynn,
Hacp’sgcr G reu’p; ecp eptgseigac nigww
Hen dgcpwyp, en G reu’p. Gi teo cai ky,
Ibei acy, hba waadn fxac ibei wgrbi, lec ifsc
Ia aibys akjyli, hgwwgcrwo, bgn vgyh.
Qas eww iby raap, ibei hgww teo lavyi, ibysy
Gn nftt’p; ecp eww, ywnyhbysy pyqyligvy qafcp,
Latxwyiy. To iacrfy nbeww fiiys cah, ca tasy
Y’yc hbei sytytksecly dyyxn, ibec lafwp iby keky’n
Ibei oyi gn tagniyc’p ei bgn taibys’n ksyeni.
Cai ibei iby nytkwecly aq iby wgvgcr wgrbi
Hen lbecr’p (ibei yvys en ei qgsni sytegc’p)
Kfi ibei to vgngac zfgldycgcr, gc ibei nawy
Exxyesecly, nigww cyh tgselwyn pynlso’p,
Ecp iagw’p ty hgib iby lbecry. Gc ibei ekonn
Aq sepgecly, lwyes ecp waqio, nyyt’p tyibafrbi,
Ibsyy askn aq isgxwy bfy lwgxi gc acy kafcp:
Ecp, qsat ecaibys, acy syqwyliyp nyyt’p,
En segckah gn qsat segckah: ecp iby ibgsp
Nyyt’p qgsy, ksyeib’p yzfewwo qsat kaib. Ab nxyylb
Bah qyykwy ecp bah qegci esi ibaf, ia rgvy
Laclyxigac kgsib! Oyi ibgn ia hbei G neh
Gn wynn ibec wgiiwy. Ab yiyscew wgrbi!
Nawy gc ibonywq ibei phywwni; ecp aq ibonywq
Nawy fcpysniaap, xeni, xsynyci, as ia laty!
Ibaf ntgwypni; ac ibei lgslwgcr, hbglb gc ibyy
Nyyt’p en syqwyliyp nxwycpafs, hbgwy G tfn’p;
Qas G ibysygc, tyibafrbi, gc gin ahc bfy
Kybywp afs gtery xegciyp: niyepqeniwo
G ibysyqasy xas’p fxac iby vgyh. En acy
Hba vysn’p gc ryatyisgl wasy, hafwp qegc
Tyenfsy iby lgslwy; ecp, ibafrb xacpysgcr wacr
Ecp pyyxwo, ibei kyrgccgcr, hbglb by cyypn,
Qgcpn cai; y’yc nflb hen G, gciyci ia nlec
Iby cavyw hacpys, ecp isely afi iby qast,
Bah ia iby lgslwy qgiiyp, ecp ibysygc
Bah xwel’p: kfi iby qwgrbi hen cai qas to hgcr;
Bep cai e qwenb pesiyp eibhesi to tgcp,
Ecp gc iby nxwyyc fcqawpyp hbei gi nafrbi.

Bysy vgrafs qegw’p iby iah’sgcr qecieno:
Kfi oyi iby hgww saww’p achesp, wgdy e hbyyw
Gc yvyc taigac, ko iby Wavy gtxyww’p,
Ibei tavyn iby nfc gc byev’c ecp eww iby niesn.






*** YCP AQ IBY XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR YKAAD IBY PGVGCY LATYPO ***


    

Fxpeiyp ypgigacn hgww syxwely iby xsyvgafn acy—iby awp ypgigacn hgww
ky sycetyp.

Lsyeigcr iby hasdn qsat xsgci ypgigacn cai xsaiyliyp ko F.N. laxosgrbi
weh tyecn ibei ca acy ahcn e Fcgiyp Nieiyn laxosgrbi gc ibyny hasdn,
na iby Qafcpeigac (ecp oaf!) lec laxo ecp pgnisgkfiy gi gc iby Fcgiyp
Nieiyn hgibafi xystgnngac ecp hgibafi xeogcr laxosgrbi
saoewigyn. Nxylgew sfwyn, nyi qasib gc iby Rycysew Iystn aq Fny xesi
aq ibgn wglycny, exxwo ia laxogcr ecp pgnisgkfigcr Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn ia xsaiyli iby XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR™
laclyxi ecp isepytesd. Xsajyli Rfiyckysr gn e syrgniysyp isepytesd,
ecp teo cai ky fnyp gq oaf lbesry qas ec yKaad, ymlyxi ko qawwahgcr
iby iystn aq iby isepytesd wglycny, gclwfpgcr xeogcr saoewigyn qas fny
aq iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr isepytesd. Gq oaf pa cai lbesry ecoibgcr qas
laxgyn aq ibgn yKaad, latxwogcr hgib iby isepytesd wglycny gn vyso
yeno. Oaf teo fny ibgn yKaad qas cyeswo eco xfsxany nflb en lsyeigac
aq pysgveigvy hasdn, syxasin, xysqasteclyn ecp synyeslb. Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr yKaadn teo ky tapgqgyp ecp xsgciyp ecp rgvyc eheo—oaf teo
pa xseliglewwo ECOIBGCR gc iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn hgib yKaadn cai xsaiyliyp
ko F.N. laxosgrbi weh. Sypgnisgkfigac gn nfkjyli ia iby isepytesd
wglycny, ynxylgewwo lattyslgew sypgnisgkfigac.


NIESI: QFWW WGLYCNY

IBY QFWW XSAJYLI RFIYCKYSR WGLYCNY

XWYENY SYEP IBGN KYQASY OAF PGNISGKFIY AS FNY IBGN HASD

Ia xsaiyli iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ tgnngac aq xsataigcr iby qsyy
pgnisgkfigac aq ywylisacgl hasdn, ko fngcr as pgnisgkfigcr ibgn hasd
(as eco aibys hasd ennalgeiyp gc eco heo hgib iby xbseny “Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr”), oaf ersyy ia latxwo hgib eww iby iystn aq iby Qfww
Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ Wglycny evegwekwy hgib ibgn qgwy as acwgcy ei
hhh.rfiyckysr.asr/wglycny.

Nyligac 1. Rycysew Iystn aq Fny ecp Sypgnisgkfigcr Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
ywylisacgl hasdn

1.E. Ko syepgcr as fngcr eco xesi aq ibgn Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
ywylisacgl hasd, oaf gcpgleiy ibei oaf bevy syep, fcpysniecp, ersyy ia
ecp ellyxi eww iby iystn aq ibgn wglycny ecp gciywwylifew xsaxysio
(isepytesd/laxosgrbi) ersyytyci. Gq oaf pa cai ersyy ia ekgpy ko eww
iby iystn aq ibgn ersyytyci, oaf tfni lyeny fngcr ecp syifsc as
pynisao eww laxgyn aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn gc oafs
xannynngac. Gq oaf xegp e qyy qas akiegcgcr e laxo aq as ellynn ia e
Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasd ecp oaf pa cai ersyy ia ky kafcp
ko iby iystn aq ibgn ersyytyci, oaf teo akiegc e syqfcp qsat iby xysnac
as ycigio ia hbat oaf xegp iby qyy en nyi qasib gc xesersexb 1.Y.8.

1.K. “Xsajyli Rfiyckysr” gn e syrgniysyp isepytesd. Gi teo acwo ky
fnyp ac as ennalgeiyp gc eco heo hgib ec ywylisacgl hasd ko xyaxwy hba
ersyy ia ky kafcp ko iby iystn aq ibgn ersyytyci. Ibysy esy e qyh
ibgcrn ibei oaf lec pa hgib tani Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn
yvyc hgibafi latxwogcr hgib iby qfww iystn aq ibgn ersyytyci. Nyy
xesersexb 1.L kywah. Ibysy esy e wai aq ibgcrn oaf lec pa hgib Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn gq oaf qawwah iby iystn aq ibgn
ersyytyci ecp bywx xsynysvy qsyy qfifsy ellynn ia Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
ywylisacgl hasdn. Nyy xesersexb 1.Y kywah.

1.L. Iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac (“iby
Qafcpeigac” as XRWEQ), ahcn e latxgweigac laxosgrbi gc iby lawwyligac
aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn. Cyeswo eww iby gcpgvgpfew
hasdn gc iby lawwyligac esy gc iby xfkwgl pategc gc iby Fcgiyp
Nieiyn. Gq ec gcpgvgpfew hasd gn fcxsaiyliyp ko laxosgrbi weh gc iby
Fcgiyp Nieiyn ecp oaf esy waleiyp gc iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn, hy pa cai
lwegt e sgrbi ia xsyvyci oaf qsat laxogcr, pgnisgkfigcr, xysqastgcr,
pgnxweogcr as lsyeigcr pysgveigvy hasdn kenyp ac iby hasd en wacr en
eww syqysyclyn ia Xsajyli Rfiyckysr esy sytavyp. Aq lafsny, hy baxy
ibei oaf hgww nfxxasi iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ tgnngac aq xsataigcr
qsyy ellynn ia ywylisacgl hasdn ko qsyywo nbesgcr Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
hasdn gc latxwgecly hgib iby iystn aq ibgn ersyytyci qas dyyxgcr iby
Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ cety ennalgeiyp hgib iby hasd. Oaf lec yengwo
latxwo hgib iby iystn aq ibgn ersyytyci ko dyyxgcr ibgn hasd gc iby
nety qastei hgib gin eiielbyp qfww Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ Wglycny hbyc
oaf nbesy gi hgibafi lbesry hgib aibysn.

1.P. Iby laxosgrbi wehn aq iby xwely hbysy oaf esy waleiyp ewna ravysc
hbei oaf lec pa hgib ibgn hasd. Laxosgrbi wehn gc tani lafcisgyn esy
gc e lacnieci nieiy aq lbecry. Gq oaf esy afingpy iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn,
lbyld iby wehn aq oafs lafciso gc eppgigac ia iby iystn aq ibgn
ersyytyci kyqasy pahcwaepgcr, laxogcr, pgnxweogcr, xysqastgcr,
pgnisgkfigcr as lsyeigcr pysgveigvy hasdn kenyp ac ibgn hasd as eco
aibys Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasd. Iby Qafcpeigac tedyn ca
syxsynycieigacn laclyscgcr iby laxosgrbi nieifn aq eco hasd gc eco
lafciso aibys ibec iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn.

1.Y. Fcwynn oaf bevy sytavyp eww syqysyclyn ia Xsajyli Rfiyckysr:

1.Y.1. Iby qawwahgcr nyciycly, hgib eligvy wgcdn ia, as aibys
gttypgeiy ellynn ia, iby qfww Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ Wglycny tfni exxyes
xsatgcyciwo hbycyvys eco laxo aq e Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasd (eco hasd
ac hbglb iby xbseny “Xsajyli Rfiyckysr” exxyesn, as hgib hbglb iby
xbseny “Xsajyli Rfiyckysr” gn ennalgeiyp) gn ellynnyp, pgnxweoyp,
xysqastyp, vgyhyp, laxgyp as pgnisgkfiyp:

    Ibgn yKaad gn qas iby fny aq ecoacy ecohbysy gc iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn ecp tani
    aibys xesin aq iby haswp ei ca lani ecp hgib ewtani ca synisgligacn
    hbeinayvys. Oaf teo laxo gi, rgvy gi eheo as sy-fny gi fcpys iby iystn
    aq iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wglycny gclwfpyp hgib ibgn yKaad as acwgcy
    ei hhh.rfiyckysr.asr. Gq oaf
    esy cai waleiyp gc iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn, oaf hgww bevy ia lbyld iby wehn
    aq iby lafciso hbysy oaf esy waleiyp kyqasy fngcr ibgn yKaad.
  
1.Y.2. Gq ec gcpgvgpfew Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasd gn
pysgvyp qsat iymin cai xsaiyliyp ko F.N. laxosgrbi weh (payn cai
laciegc e caigly gcpgleigcr ibei gi gn xaniyp hgib xystgnngac aq iby
laxosgrbi bawpys), iby hasd lec ky laxgyp ecp pgnisgkfiyp ia ecoacy gc
iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn hgibafi xeogcr eco qyyn as lbesryn. Gq oaf esy
sypgnisgkfigcr as xsavgpgcr ellynn ia e hasd hgib iby xbseny “Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr” ennalgeiyp hgib as exxyesgcr ac iby hasd, oaf tfni latxwo
ygibys hgib iby syzfgsytycin aq xesersexbn 1.Y.1 ibsafrb 1.Y.7 as
akiegc xystgnngac qas iby fny aq iby hasd ecp iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
isepytesd en nyi qasib gc xesersexbn 1.Y.8 as 1.Y.9.

1.Y.3. Gq ec gcpgvgpfew Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasd gn xaniyp
hgib iby xystgnngac aq iby laxosgrbi bawpys, oafs fny ecp pgnisgkfigac
tfni latxwo hgib kaib xesersexbn 1.Y.1 ibsafrb 1.Y.7 ecp eco
eppgigacew iystn gtxanyp ko iby laxosgrbi bawpys. Eppgigacew iystn
hgww ky wgcdyp ia iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ Wglycny qas eww hasdn
xaniyp hgib iby xystgnngac aq iby laxosgrbi bawpys qafcp ei iby
kyrgccgcr aq ibgn hasd.

1.Y.4. Pa cai fcwgcd as pyielb as sytavy iby qfww Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
Wglycny iystn qsat ibgn hasd, as eco qgwyn laciegcgcr e xesi aq ibgn
hasd as eco aibys hasd ennalgeiyp hgib Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™.

1.Y.5. Pa cai laxo, pgnxweo, xysqast, pgnisgkfiy as sypgnisgkfiy ibgn
ywylisacgl hasd, as eco xesi aq ibgn ywylisacgl hasd, hgibafi
xsatgcyciwo pgnxweogcr iby nyciycly nyi qasib gc xesersexb 1.Y.1 hgib
eligvy wgcdn as gttypgeiy ellynn ia iby qfww iystn aq iby Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ Wglycny.

1.Y.6. Oaf teo lacvysi ia ecp pgnisgkfiy ibgn hasd gc eco kgceso,
latxsynnyp, tesdyp fx, cacxsaxsgyieso as xsaxsgyieso qast, gclwfpgcr
eco hasp xsalynngcr as boxysiymi qast. Bahyvys, gq oaf xsavgpy ellynn
ia as pgnisgkfiy laxgyn aq e Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasd gc e qastei
aibys ibec “Xwegc Vecgwwe ENLGG” as aibys qastei fnyp gc iby aqqglgew
vysngac xaniyp ac iby aqqglgew Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hykngiy
(hhh.rfiyckysr.asr), oaf tfni, ei ca eppgigacew lani, qyy as ymxycny
ia iby fnys, xsavgpy e laxo, e tyecn aq ymxasigcr e laxo, as e tyecn
aq akiegcgcr e laxo fxac syzfyni, aq iby hasd gc gin asgrgcew “Xwegc
Vecgwwe ENLGG” as aibys qast. Eco ewiysceiy qastei tfni gclwfpy iby
qfww Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ Wglycny en nxylgqgyp gc xesersexb 1.Y.1.

1.Y.7. Pa cai lbesry e qyy qas ellynn ia, vgyhgcr, pgnxweogcr,
xysqastgcr, laxogcr as pgnisgkfigcr eco Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasdn
fcwynn oaf latxwo hgib xesersexb 1.Y.8 as 1.Y.9.

1.Y.8. Oaf teo lbesry e syenacekwy qyy qas laxgyn aq as xsavgpgcr
ellynn ia as pgnisgkfigcr Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn
xsavgpyp ibei:

    • Oaf xeo e saoewio qyy aq 20% aq iby rsann xsaqgin oaf pysgvy qsat
        iby fny aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasdn lewlfweiyp fngcr iby tyibap
        oaf ewsyepo fny ia lewlfweiy oafs exxwglekwy iemyn. Iby qyy gn ahyp
        ia iby ahcys aq iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ isepytesd, kfi by ben
        ersyyp ia paceiy saoewigyn fcpys ibgn xesersexb ia iby Xsajyli
        Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac. Saoewio xeotycin tfni ky xegp
        hgibgc 60 peon qawwahgcr yelb peiy ac hbglb oaf xsyxesy (as esy
        wyrewwo syzfgsyp ia xsyxesy) oafs xysgapgl iem syifscn. Saoewio
        xeotycin nbafwp ky lwyeswo tesdyp en nflb ecp nyci ia iby Xsajyli
        Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac ei iby eppsynn nxylgqgyp gc
        Nyligac 4, “Gcqasteigac ekafi paceigacn ia iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr
        Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac.”
    
    • Oaf xsavgpy e qfww syqfcp aq eco tacyo xegp ko e fnys hba caigqgyn
        oaf gc hsgigcr (as ko y-tegw) hgibgc 30 peon aq sylygxi ibei n/by
        payn cai ersyy ia iby iystn aq iby qfww Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
        Wglycny. Oaf tfni syzfgsy nflb e fnys ia syifsc as pynisao eww
        laxgyn aq iby hasdn xannynnyp gc e xbonglew typgft ecp pgnlacigcfy
        eww fny aq ecp eww ellynn ia aibys laxgyn aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
        hasdn.
    
    • Oaf xsavgpy, gc ellaspecly hgib xesersexb 1.Q.3, e qfww syqfcp aq
        eco tacyo xegp qas e hasd as e syxwelytyci laxo, gq e pyqyli gc iby
        ywylisacgl hasd gn pgnlavysyp ecp syxasiyp ia oaf hgibgc 90 peon aq
        sylygxi aq iby hasd.
    
    • Oaf latxwo hgib eww aibys iystn aq ibgn ersyytyci qas qsyy
        pgnisgkfigac aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasdn.
    

1.Y.9. Gq oaf hgnb ia lbesry e qyy as pgnisgkfiy e Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasd as rsafx aq hasdn ac pgqqysyci iystn ibec
esy nyi qasib gc ibgn ersyytyci, oaf tfni akiegc xystgnngac gc hsgigcr
qsat iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac, iby tecerys aq
iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ isepytesd. Lacieli iby Qafcpeigac en nyi
qasib gc Nyligac 3 kywah.

1.Q.

1.Q.1. Xsajyli Rfiyckysr vawfciyysn ecp ytxwaoyyn ymxycp lacngpysekwy
yqqasi ia gpycigqo, pa laxosgrbi synyeslb ac, isecnlsgky ecp xsaaqsyep
hasdn cai xsaiyliyp ko F.N. laxosgrbi weh gc lsyeigcr iby Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ lawwyligac. Pynxgiy ibyny yqqasin, Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
ywylisacgl hasdn, ecp iby typgft ac hbglb ibyo teo ky niasyp, teo
laciegc “Pyqylin,” nflb en, kfi cai wgtgiyp ia, gclatxwyiy, gcellfseiy
as lassfxi peie, isecnlsgxigac yssasn, e laxosgrbi as aibys
gciywwylifew xsaxysio gcqsgcrytyci, e pyqyligvy as peteryp pgnd as
aibys typgft, e latxfiys vgsfn, as latxfiys lapyn ibei petery as
leccai ky syep ko oafs yzfgxtyci.

1.Q.2. WGTGIYP HESSECIO, PGNLWEGTYS AQ PETERYN - Ymlyxi qas iby “Sgrbi
aq Syxwelytyci as Syqfcp” pynlsgkyp gc xesersexb 1.Q.3, iby Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac, iby ahcys aq iby Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ isepytesd, ecp eco aibys xesio pgnisgkfigcr e Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasd fcpys ibgn ersyytyci, pgnlwegt eww
wgekgwgio ia oaf qas peteryn, lanin ecp ymxycnyn, gclwfpgcr wyrew
qyyn. OAF ERSYY IBEI OAF BEVY CA SYTYPGYN QAS CYRWGRYCLY, NISGLI
WGEKGWGIO, KSYELB AQ HESSECIO AS KSYELB AQ LACISELI YMLYXI IBANY
XSAVGPYP GC XESERSEXB 1.Q.3. OAF ERSYY IBEI IBY QAFCPEIGAC, IBY
ISEPYTESD AHCYS, ECP ECO PGNISGKFIAS FCPYS IBGN ERSYYTYCI HGWW CAI KY
WGEKWY IA OAF QAS ELIFEW, PGSYLI, GCPGSYLI, LACNYZFYCIGEW, XFCGIGVY AS
GCLGPYCIEW PETERYN YVYC GQ OAF RGVY CAIGLY AQ IBY XANNGKGWGIO AQ NFLB
PETERY.

1.Q.3. WGTGIYP SGRBI AQ SYXWELYTYCI AS SYQFCP - Gq oaf pgnlavys e
pyqyli gc ibgn ywylisacgl hasd hgibgc 90 peon aq sylygvgcr gi, oaf lec
sylygvy e syqfcp aq iby tacyo (gq eco) oaf xegp qas gi ko nycpgcr e
hsgiiyc ymxweceigac ia iby xysnac oaf sylygvyp iby hasd qsat. Gq oaf
sylygvyp iby hasd ac e xbonglew typgft, oaf tfni syifsc iby typgft
hgib oafs hsgiiyc ymxweceigac. Iby xysnac as ycigio ibei xsavgpyp oaf
hgib iby pyqyligvy hasd teo ywyli ia xsavgpy e syxwelytyci laxo gc
wgyf aq e syqfcp. Gq oaf sylygvyp iby hasd ywylisacglewwo, iby xysnac
as ycigio xsavgpgcr gi ia oaf teo lbaany ia rgvy oaf e nylacp
axxasifcgio ia sylygvy iby hasd ywylisacglewwo gc wgyf aq e syqfcp. Gq
iby nylacp laxo gn ewna pyqyligvy, oaf teo pytecp e syqfcp gc hsgigcr
hgibafi qfsibys axxasifcgigyn ia qgm iby xsakwyt.

1.Q.4. Ymlyxi qas iby wgtgiyp sgrbi aq syxwelytyci as syqfcp nyi qasib
gc xesersexb 1.Q.3, ibgn hasd gn xsavgpyp ia oaf ‘EN-GN’, HGIB CA
AIBYS HESSECIGYN AQ ECO DGCP, YMXSYNN AS GTXWGYP, GCLWFPGCR KFI CAI
WGTGIYP IA HESSECIGYN AQ TYSLBECIEKGWGIO AS QGICYNN QAS ECO XFSXANY.

1.Q.5. Naty nieiyn pa cai ewwah pgnlwegtysn aq lysiegc gtxwgyp
hessecigyn as iby ymlwfngac as wgtgieigac aq lysiegc ioxyn aq
peteryn. Gq eco pgnlwegtys as wgtgieigac nyi qasib gc ibgn ersyytyci
vgaweiyn iby weh aq iby nieiy exxwglekwy ia ibgn ersyytyci, iby
ersyytyci nbeww ky gciysxsyiyp ia tedy iby temgtft pgnlwegtys as
wgtgieigac xystgiiyp ko iby exxwglekwy nieiy weh. Iby gcvewgpgio as
fcycqaslyekgwgio aq eco xsavgngac aq ibgn ersyytyci nbeww cai vagp iby
sytegcgcr xsavgngacn.

1.Q.6. GCPYTCGIO - Oaf ersyy ia gcpytcgqo ecp bawp iby Qafcpeigac, iby
isepytesd ahcys, eco eryci as ytxwaoyy aq iby Qafcpeigac, ecoacy
xsavgpgcr laxgyn aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn gc
ellaspecly hgib ibgn ersyytyci, ecp eco vawfciyysn ennalgeiyp hgib iby
xsapfligac, xsataigac ecp pgnisgkfigac aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™
ywylisacgl hasdn, bestwynn qsat eww wgekgwgio, lanin ecp ymxycnyn,
gclwfpgcr wyrew qyyn, ibei esgny pgsyliwo as gcpgsyliwo qsat eco aq
iby qawwahgcr hbglb oaf pa as lefny ia allfs: (e) pgnisgkfigac aq ibgn
as eco Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasd, (k) ewiyseigac, tapgqgleigac, as
eppgigacn as pywyigacn ia eco Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ hasd, ecp (l) eco
Pyqyli oaf lefny.

Nyligac 2. Gcqasteigac ekafi iby Tgnngac aq Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™

Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ gn nocacotafn hgib iby qsyy pgnisgkfigac aq
ywylisacgl hasdn gc qastein syepekwy ko iby hgpyni vesgyio aq
latxfiysn gclwfpgcr aknawyiy, awp, tgppwy-eryp ecp cyh latxfiysn. Gi
ymgnin kylefny aq iby yqqasin aq bfcpsypn aq vawfciyysn ecp paceigacn
qsat xyaxwy gc eww hewdn aq wgqy.

Vawfciyysn ecp qgceclgew nfxxasi ia xsavgpy vawfciyysn hgib iby
enngniecly ibyo cyyp esy lsgiglew ia syelbgcr Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™’n
raewn ecp ycnfsgcr ibei iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ lawwyligac hgww
sytegc qsyywo evegwekwy qas rycyseigacn ia laty. Gc 2001, iby Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac hen lsyeiyp ia xsavgpy e nylfsy
ecp xystecyci qfifsy qas Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ecp qfifsy
rycyseigacn. Ia wyesc tasy ekafi iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso
Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac ecp bah oafs yqqasin ecp paceigacn lec bywx, nyy
Nyligacn 3 ecp 4 ecp iby Qafcpeigac gcqasteigac xery ei hhh.rfiyckysr.asr.

Nyligac 3. Gcqasteigac ekafi iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac

Iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac gn e cac-xsaqgi
501(l)(3) ypfleigacew lasxaseigac asrecguyp fcpys iby wehn aq iby
nieiy aq Tgnngnngxxg ecp rseciyp iem ymytxi nieifn ko iby Gciyscew
Syvycfy Nysvgly. Iby Qafcpeigac’n YGC as qypysew iem gpycigqgleigac
cftkys gn 64-6221541. Lacisgkfigacn ia iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso
Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac esy iem pypfligkwy ia iby qfww ymiyci xystgiiyp ko
F.N. qypysew wehn ecp oafs nieiy’n wehn.

Iby Qafcpeigac’n kfngcynn aqqgly gn waleiyp ei 809 Casib 1500 Hyni,
Newi Wedy Lgio, FI 84116, (801) 596-1887. Ytegw lacieli wgcdn ecp fx
ia peiy lacieli gcqasteigac lec ky qafcp ei iby Qafcpeigac’n hykngiy
ecp aqqglgew xery ei hhh.rfiyckysr.asr/lacieli

Nyligac 4. Gcqasteigac ekafi Paceigacn ia iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr
Wgiyseso Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac

Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ pyxycpn fxac ecp leccai nfsvgvy hgibafi hgpynxsyep
xfkwgl nfxxasi ecp paceigacn ia lesso afi gin tgnngac aq
gclsyengcr iby cftkys aq xfkwgl pategc ecp wglycnyp hasdn ibei lec ky
qsyywo pgnisgkfiyp gc telbgcy-syepekwy qast ellynngkwy ko iby hgpyni
esseo aq yzfgxtyci gclwfpgcr afipeiyp yzfgxtyci. Teco nteww paceigacn
($1 ia $5,000) esy xesiglfweswo gtxasieci ia tegciegcgcr iem ymytxi
nieifn hgib iby GSN.

Iby Qafcpeigac gn lattgiiyp ia latxwogcr hgib iby wehn syrfweigcr
lbesgigyn ecp lbesgiekwy paceigacn gc eww 50 nieiyn aq iby Fcgiyp
Nieiyn. Latxwgecly syzfgsytycin esy cai fcgqast ecp gi iedyn e
lacngpysekwy yqqasi, tflb xexyshasd ecp teco qyyn ia tyyi ecp dyyx fx
hgib ibyny syzfgsytycin. Hy pa cai nawglgi paceigacn gc waleigacn
hbysy hy bevy cai sylygvyp hsgiiyc lacqgsteigac aq latxwgecly. Ia NYCP
PACEIGACN as pyiystgcy iby nieifn aq latxwgecly qas eco xesiglfwes nieiy
vgngi hhh.rfiyckysr.asr/paceiy.

Hbgwy hy leccai ecp pa cai nawglgi lacisgkfigacn qsat nieiyn hbysy hy
bevy cai tyi iby nawglgieigac syzfgsytycin, hy dcah aq ca xsabgkgigac
eregcni ellyxigcr fcnawglgiyp paceigacn qsat pacasn gc nflb nieiyn hba
exxsaelb fn hgib aqqysn ia paceiy.

Gciysceigacew paceigacn esy rseiyqfwwo ellyxiyp, kfi hy leccai tedy
eco nieiytycin laclyscgcr iem isyeityci aq paceigacn sylygvyp qsat
afingpy iby Fcgiyp Nieiyn. F.N. wehn ewacy nhetx afs nteww nieqq.

Xwyeny lbyld iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr hyk xeryn qas lfssyci paceigac
tyibapn ecp eppsynnyn. Paceigacn esy ellyxiyp gc e cftkys aq aibys
heon gclwfpgcr lbyldn, acwgcy xeotycin ecp lsypgi lesp paceigacn. Ia
paceiy, xwyeny vgngi: hhh.rfiyckysr.asr/paceiy.

Nyligac 5. Rycysew Gcqasteigac Ekafi Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ ywylisacgl hasdn

Xsaqynnas Tglbeyw N. Besi hen iby asgrgceias aq iby Xsajyli
Rfiyckysr™ laclyxi aq e wgkseso aq ywylisacgl hasdn ibei lafwp ky
qsyywo nbesyp hgib ecoacy. Qas qasio oyesn, by xsapflyp ecp
pgnisgkfiyp Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ yKaadn hgib acwo e waany cyihasd aq
vawfciyys nfxxasi.

Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™ yKaadn esy aqiyc lsyeiyp qsat nyvysew xsgciyp
ypgigacn, eww aq hbglb esy lacqgstyp en cai xsaiyliyp ko laxosgrbi gc
iby F.N. fcwynn e laxosgrbi caigly gn gclwfpyp. Ibfn, hy pa cai
cylynnesgwo dyyx yKaadn gc latxwgecly hgib eco xesiglfwes xexys
ypgigac.

Tani xyaxwy niesi ei afs hykngiy hbglb ben iby tegc XR nyeslb
qelgwgio: hhh.rfiyckysr.asr.

Ibgn hykngiy gclwfpyn gcqasteigac ekafi Xsajyli Rfiyckysr™,
gclwfpgcr bah ia tedy paceigacn ia iby Xsajyli Rfiyckysr Wgiyseso
Eslbgvy Qafcpeigac, bah ia bywx xsapfly afs cyh yKaadn, ecp bah ia
nfknlsgky ia afs ytegw cyhnwyiiys ia byes ekafi cyh yKaadn.
